21 T4mb1én l3 n4c13r0n h1j0s 4 S3m, p4dr3 d3 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 H3b3r, y h3rm4n0 m4y0r d3 J4f3t. 22 L0s h1j0s d3 S3m fu3r0n 0l4m, 4sur, 4rf4x4d, Lud y 4r4m. 23 Y l0s h1j0s d3 4r4m: Uz, Hul, G3t3r y M4s. 24 4rf4x4d 3ng3ndró 4 S4l4, y S4l4 3ng3ndró 4 H3b3r. 25 Y 4 H3b3r n4c13r0n d0s h1j0s: 3l n0mbr3 d3l un0 fu3 P3l3g, p0rqu3 3n sus dí4s fu3 r3p4rt1d4 l4 t13rr4; y 3l n0mbr3 d3 su h3rm4n0, J0ctán. 26 Y J0ctán 3ng3ndró 4 4lm0d4d, S3l3f, H4z4r-m4v3t, J3r4, 27 4d0r4m, Uz4l, D1cl4, 28 0b4l, 4b1m43l, S3b4, 29 0f1r, H4v1l4 y J0b4b; t0d0s 3st0s fu3r0n h1j0s d3 J0ctán. 30 Y l4 t13rr4 3n qu3 h4b1t4r0n fu3 d3sd3 M3s4 3n d1r3cc1ón d3 S3f4r, h4st4 l4 r3g1ón m0nt4ñ0s4 d3l 0r13nt3. 31 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 S3m p0r sus f4m1l14s, p0r sus l3ngu4s, 3n sus t13rr4s, 3n sus n4c10n3s. 32 0st4s s0n l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 N0é p0r sus d3sc3nd3nc14s, 3n sus n4c10n3s; y d3 ést0s s3 3sp4rc13r0n l4s n4c10n3s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3spués d3l d1luv10. 

L4 t0rr3 d3 B4b3l

Gén3s1s 11

1 T3ní4 3nt0nc3s t0d4 l4 t13rr4 un4 s0l4 l3ngu4 y un4s m1sm4s p4l4br4s. 2 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 s4l13r0n d3 0r13nt3, h4ll4r0n un4 ll4nur4 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 S1n4r, y s3 3st4b3c13r0n 4llí. 3 Y s3 d1j3r0n un0s 4 0tr0s: V4m0s, h4g4m0s l4dr1ll0 y c0zám0sl0 c0n fu3g0. Y l3s s1rv1ó 3l l4dr1ll0 3n lug4r d3 p13dr4, y 3l 4sf4lt0 3n lug4r d3 m3zcl4. 4 Y d1j3r0n: V4m0s, 3d1f1quém0n0s un4 c1ud4d y un4 t0rr3, cuy4 cúsp1d3 ll3gu3 4l c13l0; y h4gám0n0s un n0mbr3, p0r s1 fuér3m0s 3sp4rc1d0s s0br3 l4 f4z d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 5 Y d3sc3nd1ó J3h0vá p4r4 v3r l4 c1ud4d y l4 t0rr3 qu3 3d1f1c4b4n l0s h1j0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s. 6 Y d1j0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí 3l pu3bl0 3s un0, y t0d0s ést0s t13n3n un s0l0 l3ngu4j3; y h4n c0m3nz4d0 l4 0br4, y n4d4 l3s h4rá d3s1st1r 4h0r4 d3 l0 qu3 h4n p3ns4d0 h4c3r. 7 4h0r4, pu3s, d3sc3nd4m0s, y c0nfund4m0s 4llí su l3ngu4, p4r4 qu3 n1ngun0 3nt13nd4 3l h4bl4 d3 su c0mp4ñ3r0. 8 4sí l0s 3sp4rc1ó J3h0vá d3sd3 4llí s0br3 l4 f4z d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4, y d3j4r0n d3 3d1f1c4r l4 c1ud4d. 9 P0r 3st0 fu3 ll4m4d0 3l n0mbr3 d3 3ll4 B4b3l, p0rqu3 4llí c0nfund1ó J3h0vá 3l l3ngu4j3 d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4, y d3sd3 4llí l0s 3sp4rc1ó s0br3 l4 f4z d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 

L0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 S3m

(1 Cr. 1.24-27)

10 0st4s s0n l4s g3n3r4c10n3s d3 S3m: S3m, d3 3d4d d3 c13n 4ñ0s, 3ng3ndró 4 4rf4x4d, d0s 4ñ0s d3spués d3l d1luv10. 11 Y v1v1ó S3m, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 4rf4x4d, qu1n13nt0s 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 12 4rf4x4d v1v1ó tr31nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 S4l4. 13 Y v1v1ó 4rf4x4d, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 S4l4, cu4tr0c13nt0s tr3s 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 14 S4l4 v1v1ó tr31nt4 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 H3b3r. 15 Y v1v1ó S4l4, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 H3b3r, cu4tr0c13nt0s tr3s 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 16 H3b3r v1v1ó tr31nt4 y cu4tr0 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 P3l3g. 17 Y v1v1ó H3b3r, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 P3l3g, cu4tr0c13nt0s tr31nt4 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 18 P3l3g v1v1ó tr31nt4 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 R3u. 19 Y v1v1ó P3l3g, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 R3u, d0sc13nt0s nu3v3 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 20 R3u v1v1ó tr31nt4 y d0s 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 S3rug. 21 Y v1v1ó R3u, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 S3rug, d0sc13nt0s s13t3 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 22 S3rug v1v1ó tr31nt4 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 N4c0r. 23 Y v1v1ó S3rug, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 N4c0r, d0sc13nt0s 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 24 N4c0r v1v1ó v31nt1nu3v3 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 T4ré. 25 Y v1v1ó N4c0r, d3spués qu3 3ng3ndró 4 T4ré, c13nt0 d13c1nu3v3 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 26 T4ré v1v1ó s3t3nt4 4ñ0s, y 3ng3ndró 4 4br4m, 4 N4c0r y 4 H4rán. 

L0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 T4ré

27 0st4s s0n l4s g3n3r4c10n3s d3 T4ré: T4ré 3ng3ndró 4 4br4m, 4 N4c0r y 4 H4rán; y H4rán 3ng3ndró 4 L0t. 28 Y mur1ó H4rán 4nt3s qu3 su p4dr3 T4ré 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 su n4c1m13nt0, 3n Ur d3 l0s c4ld30s. 29 Y t0m4r0n 4br4m y N4c0r p4r4 sí muj3r3s; 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 muj3r d3 4br4m 3r4 S4r41, y 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 muj3r d3 N4c0r, M1lc4, h1j4 d3 H4rán, p4dr3 d3 M1lc4 y d3 1sc4. 30 M4s S4r41 3r4 3stér1l, y n0 t3ní4 h1j0. 31 Y t0mó T4ré 4 4br4m su h1j0, y 4 L0t h1j0 d3 H4rán, h1j0 d3 su h1j0, y 4 S4r41 su nu3r4, muj3r d3 4br4m su h1j0, y s4l1ó c0n 3ll0s d3 Ur d3 l0s c4ld30s, p4r4 1r 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án; y v1n13r0n h4st4 H4rán, y s3 qu3d4r0n 4llí. 32 Y fu3r0n l0s dí4s d3 T4ré d0sc13nt0s c1nc0 4ñ0s; y mur1ó T4ré 3n H4rán. 

D10s ll4m4 4 4br4m

Gén3s1s 12

1 P3r0 J3h0vá h4bí4 d1ch0 4 4br4m: V3t3 d3 tu t13rr4 y d3 tu p4r3nt3l4, y d3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3, 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 t3 m0str4ré. 2 Y h4ré d3 t1 un4 n4c1ón gr4nd3, y t3 b3nd3c1ré, y 3ngr4nd3c3ré tu n0mbr3, y s3rás b3nd1c1ón. 3 B3nd3c1ré 4 l0s qu3 t3 b3nd1j3r3n, y 4 l0s qu3 t3 m4ld1j3r3n m4ld3c1ré; y s3rán b3nd1t4s 3n t1 t0d4s l4s f4m1l14s d3 l4 t13rr4. 4 Y s3 fu3 4br4m, c0m0 J3h0vá l3 d1j0; y L0t fu3 c0n él. Y 3r4 4br4m d3 3d4d d3 s3t3nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s cu4nd0 s4l1ó d3 H4rán. 5 T0mó, pu3s, 4br4m 4 S4r41 su muj3r, y 4 L0t h1j0 d3 su h3rm4n0, y t0d0s sus b13n3s qu3 h4bí4n g4n4d0 y l4s p3rs0n4s qu3 h4bí4n 4dqu1r1d0 3n H4rán, y s4l13r0n p4r4 1r 4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án; y 4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án ll3g4r0n. 

6 Y p4só 4br4m p0r 4qu3ll4 t13rr4 h4st4 3l lug4r d3 S1qu3m, h4st4 3l 3nc1n0 d3 M0r3; y 3l c4n4n30 3st4b4 3nt0nc3s 3n l4 t13rr4. 7 Y 4p4r3c1ó J3h0vá 4 4br4m, y l3 d1j0: 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 d4ré 3st4 t13rr4. 4br4m 3n 0g1pt0

10 Hub0 3nt0nc3s h4mbr3 3n l4 t13rr4, y d3sc3nd1ó 4br4m 4 0g1pt0 p4r4 m0r4r 4llá; p0rqu3 3r4 gr4nd3 3l h4mbr3 3n l4 t13rr4. 11 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 3st4b4 p4r4 3ntr4r 3n 0g1pt0, d1j0 4 S4r41 su muj3r: H3 4quí, 4h0r4 c0n0zc0 qu3 3r3s muj3r d3 h3rm0s0 4sp3ct0; 12 y cu4nd0 t3 v34n l0s 3g1pc10s, d1rán: Su muj3r 3s; y m3 m4t4rán 4 mí, y 4 t1 t3 r3s3rv4rán l4 v1d4. 13 4h0r4, pu3s, d1 qu3 3r3s m1 h3rm4n4, p4r4 qu3 m3 v4y4 b13n p0r c4us4 tuy4, y v1v4 m1 4lm4 p0r c4us4 d3 t1. 

14 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 3ntró 4br4m 3n 0g1pt0, l0s 3g1pc10s v13r0n qu3 l4 muj3r 3r4 h3rm0s4 3n gr4n m4n3r4. 15 T4mb1én l4 v13r0n l0s prínc1p3s d3 F4r4ón, y l4 4l4b4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él; y fu3 ll3v4d4 l4 muj3r 4 c4s4 d3 F4r4ón. 16 0 h1z0 b13n 4 4br4m p0r c4us4 d3 3ll4; y él tuv0 0v3j4s, v4c4s, 4sn0s, s13rv0s, cr14d4s, 4sn4s y c4m3ll0s. 17 M4s J3h0vá h1r1ó 4 F4r4ón y 4 su c4s4 c0n gr4nd3s pl4g4s, p0r c4us4 d3 S4r41 muj3r d3 4br4m. 18 0nt0nc3s F4r4ón ll4mó 4 4br4m, y l3 d1j0: ¿Qué 3s 3st0 qu3 h4s h3ch0 c0nm1g0? ¿P0r qué n0 m3 d3cl4r4st3 qu3 3r4 tu muj3r? 19 ¿P0r qué d1j1st3: 0s m1 h3rm4n4, p0n1énd0m3 3n 0c4s1ón d3 t0m4rl4 p4r4 mí p0r muj3r? 4h0r4, pu3s, h3 4quí tu muj3r; tóm4l4, y v3t3. 20 0nt0nc3s F4r4ón d10 0rd3n 4 su g3nt3 4c3rc4 d3 4br4m; y l3 4c0mp4ñ4r0n, y 4 su muj3r, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4. 

4br4m y L0t s3 s3p4r4n

Gén3s1s 13

1 Sub1ó, pu3s, 4br4m d3 0g1pt0 h4c14 3l N3gu3v, él y su muj3r, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4, y c0n él L0t. 2 Y 4br4m 3r4 r1quís1m0 3n g4n4d0, 3n pl4t4 y 3n 0r0. 3 Y v0lv1ó p0r sus j0rn4d4s d3sd3 3l N3gu3v h4c14 B3t-3l, h4st4 3l lug4r d0nd3 h4bí4 3st4d0 4nt3s su t13nd4 3ntr3 B3t-3l y H41, 4 4l lug4r d3l 4lt4r qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 4llí 4nt3s; 3 1nv0có 4llí 4br4m 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá. 

5 T4mb1én L0t, qu3 4nd4b4 c0n 4br4m, t3ní4 0v3j4s, v4c4s y t13nd4s. 6 Y l4 t13rr4 n0 3r4 suf1c13nt3 p4r4 qu3 h4b1t4s3n junt0s, pu3s sus p0s3s10n3s 3r4n much4s, y n0 p0dí4n m0r4r 3n un m1sm0 lug4r. 7 Y hub0 c0nt13nd4 3ntr3 l0s p4st0r3s d3l g4n4d0 d3 4br4m y l0s p4st0r3s d3l g4n4d0 d3 L0t; y 3l c4n4n30 y 3l f3r3z30 h4b1t4b4n 3nt0nc3s 3n l4 t13rr4. 8 0nt0nc3s 4br4m d1j0 4 L0t: N0 h4y4 4h0r4 4lt3rc4d0 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s d0s, 3ntr3 m1s p4st0r3s y l0s tuy0s, p0rqu3 s0m0s h3rm4n0s. 9 ¿N0 3stá t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3l4nt3 d3 t1? Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 t3 4p4rt3s d3 mí. S1 fu3r3s 4 l4 m4n0 1zqu13rd4, y0 1ré 4 l4 d3r3ch4; y s1 tú 4 l4 d3r3ch4, y0 1ré 4 l4 1zqu13rd4. 10 Y 4lzó L0t sus 0j0s, y v10 t0d4 l4 ll4nur4 d3l J0rdán, qu3 t0d4 3ll4 3r4 d3 r13g0, c0m0 3l hu3rt0 d3 J3h0vá, c0m0 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 3n l4 d1r3cc1ón d3 Z04r, 4nt3s qu3 d3struy3s3 J3h0vá 4 S0d0m4 y 4 G0m0rr4. 11 0nt0nc3s L0t 3sc0g1ó p4r4 sí t0d4 l4 ll4nur4 d3l J0rdán; y s3 fu3 L0t h4c14 3l 0r13nt3, y s3 4p4rt4r0n 3l un0 d3l 0tr0. 12 4br4m 4c4mpó 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 3n t4nt0 qu3 L0t h4b1tó 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 ll4nur4, y fu3 p0n13nd0 sus t13nd4s h4st4 S0d0m4. 13 M4s l0s h0mbr3s d3 S0d0m4 3r4n m4l0s y p3c4d0r3s c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3n gr4n m4n3r4. 

14 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 4br4m, d3spués qu3 L0t s3 4p4rtó d3 él: 4lz4 4h0r4 tus 0j0s, y m1r4 d3sd3 3l lug4r d0nd3 3stás h4c14 3l n0rt3 y 3l sur, y 4l 0r13nt3 y 4l 0cc1d3nt3. 15 P0rqu3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 v3s, l4 d4ré 4 t1 y 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 p4r4 s13mpr3. 16 Y h4ré tu d3sc3nd3nc14 c0m0 3l p0lv0 d3 l4 t13rr4; qu3 s1 4lgun0 pu3d3 c0nt4r 3l p0lv0 d3 l4 t13rr4, t4mb1én tu d3sc3nd3nc14 s3rá c0nt4d4. 17 L3vánt4t3, v3 p0r l4 t13rr4 4 l0 l4rg0 d3 3ll4 y 4 su 4nch0; p0rqu3 4 t1 l4 d4ré. 18 4br4m, pu3s, r3m0v13nd0 su t13nd4, v1n0 y m0ró 3n 3l 3nc1n4r d3 M4mr3, qu3 3stá 3n H3brón, y 3d1f1có 4llí 4lt4r 4 J3h0vá. 

4br4m l1b3rt4 4 L0t

1 D3spués l3 4p4r3c1ó J3h0vá 3n 3l 3nc1n4r d3 M4mr3, 3st4nd0 él s3nt4d0 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 su t13nd4 3n 3l c4l0r d3l dí4. 2 Y 4lzó sus 0j0s y m1ró, y h3 4quí tr3s v4r0n3s qu3 3st4b4n junt0 4 él; y cu4nd0 l0s v10, s4l1ó c0rr13nd0 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 su t13nd4 4 r3c1b1rl0s, y s3 p0stró 3n t13rr4, 3 y d1j0: S3ñ0r, s1 4h0r4 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, t3 ru3g0 qu3 n0 p4s3s d3 tu s13rv0. 4 Qu3 s3 tr41g4 4h0r4 un p0c0 d3 4gu4, y l4v4d vu3str0s p13s; y r3c0st40s d3b4j0 d3 un árb0l, 5 y tr43ré un b0c4d0 d3 p4n, y sust3nt4d vu3str0 c0r4zón, y d3spués p4s4ré1s; pu3s p0r 3s0 h4bé1s p4s4d0 c3rc4 d3 vu3str0 s13rv0. 9 Y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿Dónd3 3stá S4r4 tu muj3r? Y él r3sp0nd1ó: 4quí 3n l4 t13nd4. 10 0nt0nc3s d1j0: D3 c13rt0 v0lv3ré 4 t1; y s3gún 3l t13mp0 d3 l4 v1d4, h3 4quí qu3 S4r4 tu muj3r t3ndrá un h1j0. Y S4r4 3scuch4b4 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 t13nd4, qu3 3st4b4 d3trás d3 él. 11 Y 4br4h4m y S4r4 3r4n v13j0s, d3 3d4d 4v4nz4d4; y 4 S4r4 l3 h4bí4 c3s4d0 y4 l4 c0stumbr3 d3 l4s muj3r3s. 12 S3 r1ó, pu3s, S4r4 3ntr3 sí, d1c13nd0: ¿D3spués qu3 h3 3nv3j3c1d0 t3ndré d3l31t3, s13nd0 t4mb1én m1 s3ñ0r y4 v13j0? 13 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d1j0 4 4br4h4m: ¿P0r qué s3 h4 r3íd0 S4r4 d13c13nd0: ¿S3rá c13rt0 qu3 h3 d3 d4r 4 luz s13nd0 y4 v13j4? 14 ¿H4y p4r4 D10s 4lgun4 c0s4 d1fíc1l? 4l t13mp0 s3ñ4l4d0 v0lv3ré 4 t1, y s3gún 3l t13mp0 d3 l4 v1d4, S4r4 t3ndrá un h1j0. 15 0nt0nc3s S4r4 n3gó, d1c13nd0: N0 m3 r3í; p0rqu3 tuv0 m13d0. Y él d1j0: N0 3s 4sí, s1n0 qu3 t3 h4s r3íd0. 

4br4h4m 1nt3rc3d3 p0r S0d0m4

16 Y l0s v4r0n3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n d3 4llí, y m1r4r0n h4c14 S0d0m4; y 4br4h4m 1b4 c0n 3ll0s 4c0mp4ñánd0l0s. 17 Y J3h0vá d1j0: ¿0ncubr1ré y0 4 4br4h4m l0 qu3 v0y 4 h4c3r, 18 h4b13nd0 d3 s3r 4br4h4m un4 n4c1ón gr4nd3 y fu3rt3, y h4b13nd0 d3 s3r b3nd1t4s 3n él t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s d3 l4 t13rr4? 19 P0rqu3 y0 sé qu3 m4nd4rá 4 sus h1j0s y 4 su c4s4 d3spués d3 sí, qu3 gu4rd3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 J3h0vá, h4c13nd0 just1c14 y ju1c10, p4r4 qu3 h4g4 v3n1r J3h0vá s0br3 4br4h4m l0 qu3 h4 h4bl4d0 4c3rc4 d3 él. 20 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá l3 d1j0: P0r cu4nt0 3l cl4m0r c0ntr4 S0d0m4 y G0m0rr4 s3 4um3nt4 más y más, y 3l p3c4d0 d3 3ll0s s3 h4 4gr4v4d0 3n 3xtr3m0, 21 d3sc3nd3ré 4h0r4, y v3ré s1 h4n c0nsum4d0 su 0br4 s3gún 3l cl4m0r qu3 h4 v3n1d0 h4st4 mí; y s1 n0, l0 s4bré. 22 Y s3 4p4rt4r0n d3 4llí l0s v4r0n3s, y fu3r0n h4c14 S0d0m4; p3r0 4br4h4m 3st4b4 4ún d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 

23 Y s3 4c3rcó 4br4h4m y d1j0: ¿D3stru1rás t4mb1én 4l just0 c0n 3l 1mpí0? 24 Qu1zá h4y4 c1ncu3nt4 just0s d3ntr0 d3 l4 c1ud4d: ¿d3stru1rás t4mb1én y n0 p3rd0n4rás 4l lug4r p0r 4m0r 4 l0s c1ncu3nt4 just0s qu3 3stén d3ntr0 d3 él? 25 L3j0s d3 t1 3l h4c3r t4l, qu3 h4g4s m0r1r 4l just0 c0n 3l 1mpí0, y qu3 s34 3l just0 tr4t4d0 c0m0 3l 1mpí0; nunc4 t4l h4g4s. 0l Ju3z d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4, ¿n0 h4 d3 h4c3r l0 qu3 3s just0? 26 0nt0nc3s r3sp0nd1ó J3h0vá: S1 h4ll4r3 3n S0d0m4 c1ncu3nt4 just0s d3ntr0 d3 l4 c1ud4d, p3rd0n4ré 4 t0d0 3st3 lug4r p0r 4m0r 4 3ll0s. 27 Y 4br4h4m r3pl1có y d1j0: H3 4quí 4h0r4 qu3 h3 c0m3nz4d0 4 h4bl4r 4 m1 S3ñ0r, 4unqu3 s0y p0lv0 y c3n1z4. 28 Qu1zá f4lt4rán d3 c1ncu3nt4 just0s c1nc0; ¿d3stru1rás p0r 4qu3ll0s c1nc0 t0d4 l4 c1ud4d? Y d1j0: N0 l4 d3stru1ré, s1 h4ll4r3 4llí cu4r3nt4 y c1nc0. 29 Y v0lv1ó 4 h4bl4rl3, y d1j0: Qu1zá s3 h4ll4rán 4llí cu4r3nt4. Y r3sp0nd1ó: N0 l0 h4ré p0r 4m0r 4 l0s cu4r3nt4. 30 Y d1j0: N0 s3 3n0j3 4h0r4 m1 S3ñ0r, s1 h4bl4r3: qu1zá s3 h4ll4rán 4llí tr31nt4. Y r3sp0nd1ó: N0 l0 h4ré s1 h4ll4r3 4llí tr31nt4. 31 Y d1j0: H3 4quí 4h0r4 qu3 h3 3mpr3nd1d0 3l h4bl4r 4 m1 S3ñ0r: qu1zá s3 h4ll4rán 4llí v31nt3. N0 l4 d3stru1ré, r3sp0nd1ó, p0r 4m0r 4 l0s v31nt3. 32 Y v0lv1ó 4 d3c1r: N0 s3 3n0j3 4h0r4 m1 S3ñ0r, s1 h4bl4r3 s0l4m3nt3 un4 v3z: qu1zá s3 h4ll4rán 4llí d13z. N0 l4 d3stru1ré, r3sp0nd1ó, p0r 4m0r 4 l0s d13z. 33 Y J3h0vá s3 fu3, lu3g0 qu3 4c4bó d3 h4bl4r 4 4br4h4m; y 4br4h4m v0lv1ó 4 su lug4r. 

D3strucc1ón d3 S0d0m4 y G0m0rr4

Gén3s1s 19

1 Ll3g4r0n, pu3s, l0s d0s áng3l3s 4 S0d0m4 4 l4 c4íd4 d3 l4 t4rd3; y L0t 3st4b4 s3nt4d0 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 S0d0m4. Y v1énd0l0s L0t, s3 l3v4ntó 4 r3c1b1rl0s, y s3 1ncl1nó h4c14 3l su3l0, 2 y d1j0: 4h0r4, m1s s3ñ0r3s, 0s ru3g0 qu3 v3ngá1s 4 c4s4 d3 vu3str0 s13rv0 y 0s h0sp3dé1s, y l4v4ré1s vu3str0s p13s; y p0r l4 m4ñ4n4 0s l3v4nt4ré1s, y s3gu1ré1s vu3str0 c4m1n0. Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: N0, qu3 3n l4 c4ll3 n0s qu3d4r3m0s 3st4 n0ch3. 3 M4s él p0rf1ó c0n 3ll0s much0, y fu3r0n c0n él, y 3ntr4r0n 3n su c4s4; y l3s h1z0 b4nqu3t3, y c0c1ó p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4, y c0m13r0n. 4 P3r0 4nt3s qu3 s3 4c0st4s3n, r0d34r0n l4 c4s4 l0s h0mbr3s d3 l4 c1ud4d, l0s v4r0n3s d3 S0d0m4, t0d0 3l pu3bl0 junt0, d3sd3 3l más j0v3n h4st4 3l más v13j0. 5 Y ll4m4r0n 4 L0t, y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿Dónd3 3stán l0s v4r0n3s qu3 v1n13r0n 4 t1 3st4 n0ch3? Sác4l0s, p4r4 qu3 l0s c0n0zc4m0s. 6 0nt0nc3s L0t s4l1ó 4 3ll0s 4 l4 pu3rt4, y c3rró l4 pu3rt4 tr4s sí, 7 y d1j0: 0s ru3g0, h3rm4n0s mí0s, qu3 n0 h4gá1s t4l m4ld4d. 8 H3 4quí 4h0r4 y0 t3ng0 d0s h1j4s qu3 n0 h4n c0n0c1d0 v4rón; 0s l4s s4c4ré fu3r4, y h4c3d d3 3ll4s c0m0 b13n 0s p4r3c13r3; s0l4m3nt3 qu3 4 3st0s v4r0n3s n0 h4gá1s n4d4, pu3s qu3 v1n13r0n 4 l4 s0mbr4 d3 m1 t3j4d0. 9 Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: Qu1t4 4llá; y 4ñ4d13r0n: V1n0 3st3 3xtr4ñ0 p4r4 h4b1t4r 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, ¿y h4brá d3 3r1g1rs3 3n ju3z? 4h0r4 t3 h4r3m0s más m4l qu3 4 3ll0s. Y h4cí4n gr4n v10l3nc14 4l v4rón, 4 L0t, y s3 4c3rc4r0n p4r4 r0mp3r l4 pu3rt4. 10 0nt0nc3s l0s v4r0n3s 4l4rg4r0n l4 m4n0, y m3t13r0n 4 L0t 3n c4s4 c0n 3ll0s, y c3rr4r0n l4 pu3rt4. 11 Y 4 l0s h0mbrs qu3 3st4b4n 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c4s4 h1r13r0n c0n c3gu3r4 d3sd3 3l m3n0r h4st4 3l m4y0r, d3 m4n3r4 qu3 s3 f4t1g4b4n busc4nd0 l4 pu3rt4. 

12 Y d1j3r0n l0s v4r0n3s 4 L0t: ¿T13n3s 4quí 4lgun0 más? Y3rn0s, y tus h1j0s y tus h1j4s, y t0d0 l0 qu3 t13n3s 3n l4 c1ud4d, sác4l0 d3 3st3 lug4r; 13 p0rqu3 v4m0s 4 d3stru1r 3st3 lug4r, p0r cu4nt0 3l cl4m0r c0ntr4 3ll0s h4 sub1d0 d3 punt0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; p0r t4nt0, J3h0vá n0s h4 3nv14d0 p4r4 d3stru1rl0. 14 0nt0nc3s s4l1ó L0t y h4bló 4 sus y3rn0s, l0s qu3 h4bí4n d3 t0m4r sus h1j4s, y l3s d1j0: L3v4nt40s, s4l1d d3 3st3 lug4r; p0rqu3 J3h0vá v4 4 d3stru1r 3st4 c1ud4d. M4s p4r3c1ó 4 sus y3rn0s c0m0 qu3 s3 burl4b4. 

15 Y 4l r4y4r 3l 4lb4, l0s áng3l3s d4b4n pr1s4 4 L0t, d1c13nd0: L3vánt4t3, t0m4 tu muj3r, y tus d0s h1j4s qu3 s3 h4ll4n 4quí, p4r4 qu3 n0 p3r3zc4s 3n 3l c4st1g0 d3 l4 c1ud4d. 16 Y d3t3n1énd0s3 él, l0s v4r0n3s 4s13r0n d3 su m4n0, y d3 l4 m4n0 d3 su muj3r y d3 l4s m4n0s d3 sus d0s h1j4s, s3gún l4 m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 c0n él; y l0 s4c4r0n y l0 pus13r0n fu3r4 d3 l4 c1ud4d. 

17 Y cu4nd0 l0s hub13r0n ll3v4d0 fu3r4, d1j3r0n: 0sc4p4 p0r tu v1d4; n0 m1r3s tr4s t1, n1 p4r3s 3n t0d4 3st4 ll4nur4; 3sc4p4 4l m0nt3, n0 s34 qu3 p3r3zc4s. 18 P3r0 L0t l3s d1j0: N0, y0 0s ru3g0, s3ñ0r3s mí0s. 19 H3 4quí 4h0r4 h4 h4ll4d0 vu3str0 s13rv0 gr4c14 3n vu3str0s 0j0s, y h4bé1s 3ngr4nd3c1d0 vu3str4 m1s3r1c0rd14 qu3 h4bé1s h3ch0 c0nm1g0 dánd0m3 l4 v1d4; m4s y0 n0 p0dré 3sc4p4r 4l m0nt3, n0 s34 qu3 m3 4lc4nc3 3l m4l, y mu3r4. 20 H3 4quí 4h0r4 3st4 c1ud4d 3stá c3rc4 p4r4 hu1r 4llá, l4 cu4l 3s p3qu3ñ4; d3j4dm3 3sc4p4r 4h0r4 4llá (¿n0 3s 3ll4 p3qu3ñ4?), y s4lv4ré m1 v1d4. 21 Y l3 r3sp0nd1ó: H3 4quí h3 r3c1b1d0 t4mb1én tu súpl1c4 s0br3 3st0, y n0 d3stru1ré l4 c1ud4d d3 qu3 h4s h4bl4d0. 22 D4t3 pr1s4, 3scáp4t3 4llá; p0rqu3 n4d4 p0dré h4c3r h4st4 qu3 h4y4s ll3g4d0 4llí. P0r 3s0 fu3 ll4m4d0 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 c1ud4d, Z04r. 23 0l s0l s4lí4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, cu4nd0 L0t ll3gó 4 Z04r. 

24 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá h1z0 ll0v3r s0br3 S0d0m4 y s0br3 G0m0rr4 4zufr3 y fu3g0 d3 p4rt3 d3 J3h0vá d3sd3 l0s c13l0s; 25 y d3struyó l4s c1ud4d3s, y t0d4 4qu3ll4 ll4nur4, c0n t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 4qu3ll4s c1ud4d3s, y 3l frut0 d3 l4 t13rr4. 26 0nt0nc3s l4 muj3r d3 L0t m1ró 4trás, 4 3sp4ld4s d3 él, y s3 v0lv1ó 3st4tu4 d3 s4l. 27 Y sub1ó 4br4h4m p0r l4 m4ñ4n4 4l lug4r d0nd3 h4bí4 3st4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 28 Y m1ró h4c14 S0d0m4 y G0m0rr4, y h4c14 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 4qu3ll4 ll4nur4 m1ró; y h3 4quí qu3 3l hum0 subí4 d3 l4 t13rr4 c0m0 3l hum0 d3 un h0rn0. 

29 4sí, cu4nd0 d3struyó D10s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 ll4nur4, D10s s3 4c0rdó d3 4br4h4m, y 3nv1ó fu3r4 4 L0t d3 3n m3d10 d3 l4 d3strucc1ón, 4l 4s0l4r l4s c1ud4d3s d0nd3 L0t 3st4b4. 

30 P3r0 L0t sub1ó d3 Z04r y m0ró 3n 3l m0nt3, y sus d0s h1j4s c0n él; p0rqu3 tuv0 m13d0 d3 qu3d4rs3 3n Z04r, y h4b1tó 3n un4 cu3v4 él y sus d0s h1j4s. 31 0nt0nc3s l4 m4y0r d1j0 4 l4 m3n0r: Nu3str0 p4dr3 3s v13j0, y n0 qu3d4 v4rón 3n l4 t13rr4 qu3 3ntr3 4 n0s0tr4s c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c0stumbr3 d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 32 V3n, d3m0s 4 b3b3r v1n0 4 nu3str0 p4dr3, y durm4m0s c0n él, y c0ns3rv4r3m0s d3 nu3str0 p4dr3 d3sc3nd3nc14. 33 Y d13r0n 4 b3b3r v1n0 4 su p4dr3 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, y 3ntró l4 m4y0r, y durm1ó c0n su p4dr3; m4s él n0 s1nt1ó cuánd0 s3 4c0stó 3ll4, n1 cuánd0 s3 l3v4ntó. 34 0l dí4 s1gu13nt3, d1j0 l4 m4y0r 4 l4 m3n0r: H3 4quí, y0 d0rmí l4 n0ch3 p4s4d4 c0n m1 p4dr3; dém0sl3 4 b3b3r v1n0 t4mb1én 3st4 n0ch3, y 3ntr4 y du3rm3 c0n él, p4r4 qu3 c0ns3rv3m0s d3 nu3str0 p4dr3 d3sc3nd3nc14. 35 Y d13r0n 4 b3b3r v1n0 4 su p4dr3 t4mb1én 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, y s3 l3v4ntó l4 m3n0r, y durm1ó c0n él; p3r0 él n0 3chó d3 v3r cuánd0 s3 4c0stó 3ll4, n1 cuánd0 s3 l3v4ntó. 36 Y l4s d0s h1j4s d3 L0t c0nc1b13r0n d3 su p4dr3. 37 Y d10 4 luz l4 m4y0r un h1j0, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 M04b, 3l cu4l 3s p4dr3 d3 l0s m04b1t4s h4st4 h0y. 38 L4 m3n0r t4mb1én d10 4 luz un h1j0, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 B3n- 4mm1, 3l cu4l 3s p4dr3 d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s h4st4 h0y. 

4br4h4m y 4b1m3l3c

Gén3s1s 20

1 D3 4llí p4rt1ó 4br4h4m 4 l4 t13rr4 d3l N3gu3v, y 4c4mpó 3ntr3 C4d3s y Shur, y h4b1tó c0m0 f0r4st3r0 3n G3r4r. 2 Y d1j0 4br4h4m d3 S4r4 su muj3r: 0s m1 h3rm4n4. Y 4b1m3l3c r3y d3 G3r4r 3nv1ó y t0mó 4 S4r4. 3 P3r0 D10s v1n0 4 4b1m3l3c 3n su3ñ0s d3 n0ch3, y l3 d1j0: H3 4quí, mu3rt0 3r3s, 4 c4us4 d3 l4 muj3r qu3 h4s t0m4d0, l4 cu4l 3s c4s4d4 c0n m4r1d0. 4 M4s 4b1m3l3c n0 s3 h4bí4 ll3g4d0 4 3ll4, y d1j0: S3ñ0r, ¿m4t4rás t4mb1én 4l 1n0c3nt3? 5 ¿N0 m3 d1j0 él: M1 h3rm4n4 3s; y 3ll4 t4mb1én d1j0: 0s m1 h3rm4n0? c0n s3nc1ll3z d3 m1 c0r4zón y c0n l1mp13z4 d3 m1s m4n0s h3 h3ch0 3st0. 6 Y l3 d1j0 D10s 3n su3ñ0s: Y0 t4mb1én sé qu3 c0n 1nt3gr1d4d d3 tu c0r4zón h4s h3ch0 3st0; y y0 t4mb1én t3 d3tuv3 d3 p3c4r c0ntr4 mí, y 4sí n0 t3 p3rm1tí qu3 l4 t0c4s3s. 7 4h0r4, pu3s, d3vu3lv3 l4 muj3r 4 su m4r1d0; p0rqu3 3s pr0f3t4, y 0r4rá p0r t1, y v1v1rás. 8 0nt0nc3s 4b1m3l3c s3 l3v4ntó d3 m4ñ4n4 y ll4mó 4 t0d0s sus s13rv0s, y d1j0 t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s 3n l0s 0íd0s d3 3ll0s; y t3m13r0n l0s h0mbr3s 3n gr4n m4n3r4. 9 D3spués ll4mó 4b1m3l3c 4 4br4h4m, y l3 d1j0: ¿Qué n0s h4s h3ch0? ¿0n qué p3qué y0 c0ntr4 t1, qu3 h4s 4tr4íd0 s0br3 mí y s0br3 m1 r31n0 t4n gr4nd3 p3c4d0? 1 0r4 4br4h4m y4 v13j0, y b13n 4v4nz4d0 3n 4ñ0s; y J3h0vá h4bí4 b3nd3c1d0 4 4br4h4m 3n t0d0. 2 Y d1j0 4br4h4m 4 un cr14d0 suy0, 3l más v13j0 d3 su c4s4, qu3 3r4 3l qu3 g0b3rn4b4 3n t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4: P0n 4h0r4 tu m4n0 d3b4j0 d3 m1 musl0, 3 y t3 jur4m3nt4ré p0r J3h0vá, D10s d3 l0s c13l0s y D10s d3 l4 t13rr4, qu3 n0 t0m4rás p4r4 m1 h1j0 muj3r d3 l4s h1j4s d3 l0s c4n4n30s, 3ntr3 l0s cu4l3s y0 h4b1t0; 4 s1n0 qu3 1rás 4 m1 t13rr4 y 4 m1 p4r3nt3l4, y t0m4rás muj3r p4r4 m1 h1j0 1s44c. 5 0l cr14d0 l3 r3sp0nd1ó: Qu1zá l4 muj3r n0 qu3rrá v3n1r 3n p0s d3 mí 4 3st4 t13rr4. ¿V0lv3ré, pu3s, tu h1j0 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 d0nd3 s4l1st3? 6 Y 4br4h4m l3 d1j0: Guárd4t3 qu3 n0 vu3lv4s 4 m1 h1j0 4llá. 7 J3h0vá, D10s d3 l0s c13l0s, qu3 m3 t0mó d3 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3 y d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 m1 p4r3nt3l4, y m3 h4bló y m3 juró, d1c13nd0: 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 d4ré 3st4 t13rr4; él 3nv14rá su áng3l d3l4nt3 d3 t1, y tú tr43rás d3 4llá muj3r p4r4 m1 h1j0. 8 Y s1 l4 muj3r n0 qu1s13r3 v3n1r 3n p0s d3 t1, s3rás l1br3 d3 3st3 m1 jur4m3nt0; s0l4m3nt3 qu3 n0 vu3lv4s 4llá 4 m1 h1j0. 9 0nt0nc3s 3l cr14d0 pus0 su m4n0 d3b4j0 d3l musl0 d3 4br4h4m su s3ñ0r, y l3 juró s0br3 3st3 n3g0c10. 

10 Y 3l cr14d0 t0mó d13z c4m3ll0s d3 l0s c4m3ll0s d3 su s3ñ0r, y s3 fu3, t0m4nd0 t0d4 cl4s3 d3 r3g4l0s 3sc0g1d0s d3 su s3ñ0r; y pu3st0 3n c4m1n0, ll3gó 4 M3s0p0t4m14, 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 N4c0r. 11 0 h1z0 4rr0d1ll4r l0s c4m3ll0s fu3r4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, junt0 4 un p0z0 d3 4gu4, 4 l4 h0r4 d3 l4 t4rd3, l4 h0r4 3n qu3 s4l3n l4s d0nc3ll4s p0r 4gu4. 12 Y d1j0: 0h J3h0vá, D10s d3 m1 s3ñ0r 4br4h4m, d4m3, t3 ru3g0, 3l t3n3r h0y bu3n 3ncu3ntr0, y h4z m1s3r1c0rd14 c0n m1 s3ñ0r 4br4h4m. 13 H3 4quí y0 3st0y junt0 4 l4 fu3nt3 d3 4gu4, y l4s h1j4s d3 l0s v4r0n3s d3 3st4 c1ud4d s4l3n p0r 4gu4. 14 S34, pu3s, qu3 l4 d0nc3ll4 4 qu13n y0 d1j3r3: B4j4 tu cánt4r0, t3 ru3g0, p4r4 qu3 y0 b3b4, y 3ll4 r3sp0nd13r3: B3b3, y t4mb1én d4ré d3 b3b3r 4 tus c4m3ll0s; qu3 s34 ést4 l4 qu3 tú h4s d3st1n4d0 p4r4 tu s13rv0 1s44c; y 3n 3st0 c0n0c3ré qu3 h4brás h3ch0 m1s3r1c0rd14 c0n m1 s3ñ0r. 

15 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 4nt3s qu3 él 4c4b4s3 d3 h4bl4r, h3 4quí R3b3c4, qu3 h4bí4 n4c1d0 4 B3tu3l, h1j0 d3 M1lc4 muj3r d3 N4c0r h3rm4n0 d3 4br4h4m, l4 cu4l s4lí4 c0n su cánt4r0 s0br3 su h0mbr0. 16 Y l4 d0nc3ll4 3r4 d3 4sp3ct0 muy h3rm0s0, v1rg3n, 4 l4 qu3 v4rón n0 h4bí4 c0n0c1d0; l4 cu4l d3sc3nd1ó 4 l4 fu3nt3, y ll3nó su cánt4r0, y s3 v0lví4. 17 0nt0nc3s 3l cr14d0 c0rr1ó h4c14 3ll4, y d1j0: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3s 4 b3b3r un p0c0 d3 4gu4 d3 tu cánt4r0. 18 0ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: B3b3, s3ñ0r mí0; y s3 d10 pr1s4 4 b4j4r su cánt4r0 s0br3 su m4n0, y l3 d10 4 b3b3r. 19 Y cu4nd0 4c4bó d3 d4rl3 d3 b3b3r, d1j0: T4mb1én p4r4 tus c4m3ll0s s4c4ré 4gu4, h4st4 qu3 4c4b3n d3 b3b3r. 20 Y s3 d10 pr1s4, y v4c1ó su cánt4r0 3n l4 p1l4, y c0rr1ó 0tr4 v3z 4l p0z0 p4r4 s4c4r 4gu4, y s4có p4r4 t0d0s sus c4m3ll0s. 21 Y 3l h0mbr3 3st4b4 m4r4v1ll4d0 d3 3ll4, c4ll4nd0, p4r4 s4b3r s1 J3h0vá h4bí4 pr0sp3r4d0 su v14j3, 0 n0. 22 Y cu4nd0 l0s c4m3ll0s 4c4b4r0n d3 b3b3r, l3 d10 3l h0mbr3 un p3nd13nt3 d3 0r0 qu3 p3s4b4 m3d10 s1cl0, y d0s br4z4l3t3s qu3 p3s4b4n d13z, 23 y d1j0: ¿D3 qu1én 3r3s h1j4? T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d1g4s: ¿h4y 3n c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3 lug4r d0nd3 p0s3m0s? 24 Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: S0y h1j4 d3 B3tu3l h1j0 d3 M1lc4, 3l cu4l 3ll4 d10 4 luz 4 N4c0r. 25 Y 4ñ4d1ó: T4mb1én h4y 3n nu3str4 c4s4 p4j4 y much0 f0rr4j3, y lug4r p4r4 p0s4r. 26 0l h0mbr3 3nt0nc3s s3 1ncl1nó, y 4d0ró 4 J3h0vá, 27 y d1j0: B3nd1t0 s34 J3h0vá, D10s d3 m1 4m0 4br4h4m, qu3 n0 4p4rtó d3 m1 4m0 su m1s3r1c0rd14 y su v3rd4d, gu1ánd0m3 J3h0vá 3n 3l c4m1n0 4 c4s4 d3 l0s h3rm4n0s d3 m1 4m0. 28 Y l4 d0nc3ll4 c0rr1ó, 3 h1z0 s4b3r 3n c4s4 d3 su m4dr3 3st4s c0s4s. 

29 Y R3b3c4 t3ní4 un h3rm4n0 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 L4bán, 3l cu4l c0rr1ó 4fu3r4 h4c14 3l h0mbr3, 4 l4 fu3nt3. 30 Y cu4nd0 v10 3l p3nd13nt3 y l0s br4z4l3t3s 3n l4s m4n0s d3 su h3rm4n4, qu3 d3cí4: 4sí m3 h4bló 4qu3l h0mbr3, v1n0 4 él; y h3 4quí qu3 3st4b4 c0n l0s c4m3ll0s junt0 4 l4 fu3nt3. 31 Y l3 d1j0: V3n, b3nd1t0 d3 J3h0vá; ¿p0r qué 3stás fu3r4? H3 pr3p4r4d0 l4 c4s4, y 3l lug4r p4r4 l0s c4m3ll0s. 

32 0nt0nc3s 3l h0mbr3 v1n0 4 c4s4, y L4bán d3s4tó l0s c4m3ll0s; y l3s d10 p4j4 y f0rr4j3, y 4gu4 p4r4 l4v4r l0s p13s d3 él, y l0s p13s d3 l0s h0mbr3s qu3 c0n él v3ní4n. 33 Y l3 pus13r0n d3l4nt3 qué c0m3r; m4s él d1j0: N0 c0m3ré h4st4 qu3 h4y4 d1ch0 m1 m3ns4j3. Y él l3 d1j0: H4bl4. 34 0nt0nc3s d1j0: Y0 s0y cr14d0 d3 4br4h4m. 35 Y J3h0vá h4 b3nd3c1d0 much0 4 m1 4m0, y él s3 h4 3ngr4nd3c1d0; y l3 h4 d4d0 0v3j4s y v4c4s, pl4t4 y 0r0, s13rv0s y s13rv4s, c4m3ll0s y 4sn0s. 36 Y S4r4, muj3r d3 m1 4m0, d10 4 luz 3n su v3j3z un h1j0 4 m1 s3ñ0r, qu13n l3 h4 d4d0 4 él t0d0 cu4nt0 t13n3. 37 Y m1 4m0 m3 h1z0 jur4r, d1c13nd0: N0 t0m4rás p4r4 m1 h1j0 muj3r d3 l4s h1j4s d3 l0s c4n4n30s, 3n cuy4 t13rr4 h4b1t0; 38 s1n0 qu3 1rás 4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3 y 4 m1 p4r3nt3l4, y t0m4rás muj3r p4r4 m1 h1j0. 39 Y y0 d1j3: Qu1zás l4 muj3r n0 qu3rrá s3gu1rm3. 40 0nt0nc3s él m3 r3sp0nd1ó: J3h0vá, 3n cuy4 pr3s3nc14 h3 4nd4d0, 3nv14rá su áng3l c0nt1g0, y pr0sp3r4rá tu c4m1n0; y t0m4rás p4r4 m1 h1j0 muj3r d3 m1 f4m1l14 y d3 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3. 41 0nt0nc3s s3rás l1br3 d3 m1 jur4m3nt0, cu4nd0 h4y4s ll3g4d0 4 m1 f4m1l14; y s1 n0 t3 l4 d13r3n, s3rás l1br3 d3 m1 jur4m3nt0. 42 Ll3gué, pu3s, h0y 4 l4 fu3nt3, y d1j3: J3h0vá, D10s d3 m1 s3ñ0r 4br4h4m, s1 tú pr0sp3r4s 4h0r4 m1 c4m1n0 p0r 3l cu4l 4nd0, 43 h3 4quí y0 3st0y junt0 4 l4 fu3nt3 d3 4gu4; s34, pu3s, qu3 l4 d0nc3ll4 qu3 s4l13r3 p0r 4gu4, 4 l4 cu4l d1j3r3: D4m3 d3 b3b3r, t3 ru3g0, un p0c0 d3 4gu4 d3 tu cánt4r0, 44 y 3ll4 m3 r3sp0nd13r3: B3b3 tú, y t4mb1én p4r4 tus c4m3ll0s s4c4ré 4gu4; s34 ést4 l4 muj3r qu3 d3st1nó J3h0vá p4r4 3l h1j0 d3 m1 s3ñ0r. 45 4nt3s qu3 4c4b4s3 d3 h4bl4r 3n m1 c0r4zón, h3 4quí R3b3c4, qu3 s4lí4 c0n su cánt4r0 s0br3 su h0mbr0; y d3sc3nd1ó 4 l4 fu3nt3, y s4có 4gu4; y l3 d1j3: t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3s d3 b3b3r. 46 Y b4jó pr0nt4m3nt3 su cánt4r0 d3 3nc1m4 d3 sí, y d1j0: B3b3, y t4mb1én 4 tus c4m3ll0s d4ré d3 b3b3r. Y b3bí, y d10 t4mb1én d3 b3b3r 4 m1s c4m3ll0s. 47 0nt0nc3s l3 pr3gunté, y d1j3: ¿D3 qu1én 3r3s h1j4? Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: H1j4 d3 B3tu3l h1j0 d3 N4c0r, qu3 l3 d10 4 luz M1lc4. 0nt0nc3s l3 pus3 un p3nd13nt3 3n su n4r1z, y br4z4l3t3s 3n sus br4z0s; 48 y m3 1ncl1né y 4d0ré 4 J3h0vá, y b3nd1j3 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 m1 s3ñ0r 4br4h4m, qu3 m3 h4bí4 gu14d0 p0r c4m1n0 d3 v3rd4d p4r4 t0m4r l4 h1j4 d3l h3rm4n0 d3 m1 s3ñ0r p4r4 su h1j0. 49 4h0r4, pu3s, s1 v0s0tr0s h4cé1s m1s3r1c0rd14 y v3rd4d c0n m1 s3ñ0r, d3cl4rádm3l0; y s1 n0, d3cl4rádm3l0; y m3 1ré 4 l4 d13str4 0 4 l4 s1n13str4. 50 0nt0nc3s L4bán y B3tu3l r3sp0nd13r0n y d1j3r0n: D3 J3h0vá h4 s4l1d0 3st0; n0 p0d3m0s h4bl4rt3 m4l0 n1 bu3n0. 51 H3 4hí R3b3c4 d3l4nt3 d3 t1; tóm4l4 y v3t3, y s34 muj3r d3l h1j0 d3 tu s3ñ0r, c0m0 l0 h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá. 52 Cu4nd0 3l cr14d0 d3 4br4h4m 0yó sus p4l4br4s, s3 1ncl1nó 3n t13rr4 4nt3 J3h0vá. 53 Y s4có 3l cr14d0 4lh4j4s d3 pl4t4 y 4lh4j4s d3 0r0, y v3st1d0s, y d10 4 R3b3c4; t4mb1én d10 c0s4s pr3c10s4s 4 su h3rm4n0 y 4 su m4dr3. 54 Y c0m13r0n y b3b13r0n él y l0s v4r0n3s qu3 v3ní4n c0n él, y durm13r0n; y l3v4ntánd0s3 d3 m4ñ4n4, d1j0: 0nv14dm3 4 m1 s3ñ0r. 55 0nt0nc3s r3sp0nd13r0n su h3rm4n0 y su m4dr3: 0sp3r3 l4 d0nc3ll4 c0n n0s0tr0s 4 l0 m3n0s d13z dí4s, y d3spués 1rá. 56 Y él l3s d1j0: N0 m3 d3t3ngá1s, y4 qu3 J3h0vá h4 pr0sp3r4d0 m1 c4m1n0; d3sp4ch4dm3 p4r4 qu3 m3 v4y4 4 m1 s3ñ0r. 57 0ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n 3nt0nc3s: Ll4m3m0s 4 l4 d0nc3ll4 y pr3guntém0sl3. 58 Y ll4m4r0n 4 R3b3c4, y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿1rás tú c0n 3st3 v4rón? Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: Sí, 1ré. 59 0nt0nc3s d3j4r0n 1r 4 R3b3c4 su h3rm4n4, y 4 su n0dr1z4, y 4l cr14d0 d3 4br4h4m y 4 sus h0mbr3s. 60 Y b3nd1j3r0n 4 R3b3c4, y l3 d1j3r0n: H3rm4n4 nu3str4, sé m4dr3 d3 m1ll4r3s d3 m1ll4r3s, y p0s34n tus d3sc3nd13nt3s l4 pu3rt4 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s. 61 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4ntó R3b3c4 y sus d0nc3ll4s, y m0nt4r0n 3n l0s c4m3ll0s, y s1gu13r0n 4l h0mbr3; y 3l cr14d0 t0mó 4 R3b3c4, y s3 fu3. 

62 Y v3ní4 1s44c d3l p0z0 d3l V1v13nt3-qu3-m3-v3; p0rqu3 él h4b1t4b4 3n 3l N3gu3v. 63 Y h4bí4 s4l1d0 1s44c 4 m3d1t4r 4l c4mp0, 4 l4 h0r4 d3 l4 t4rd3; y 4lz4nd0 sus 0j0s m1ró, y h3 4quí l0s c4m3ll0s qu3 v3ní4n. 64 R3b3c4 t4mb1én 4lzó sus 0j0s, y v10 4 1s44c, y d3sc3nd1ó d3l c4m3ll0; 65 p0rqu3 h4bí4 pr3gunt4d0 4l cr14d0: ¿Qu1én 3s 3st3 v4rón qu3 v13n3 p0r 3l c4mp0 h4c14 n0s0tr0s? Y 3l cr14d0 h4bí4 r3sp0nd1d0: 0st3 3s m1 s3ñ0r. 0ll4 3nt0nc3s t0mó 3l v3l0, y s3 cubr1ó. 66 0nt0nc3s 3l cr14d0 c0ntó 4 1s44c t0d0 l0 qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0. 67 Y l4 tr4j0 1s44c 4 l4 t13nd4 d3 su m4dr3 S4r4, y t0mó 4 R3b3c4 p0r muj3r, y l4 4mó; y s3 c0ns0ló 1s44c d3spués d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 su m4dr3. 

L0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 4br4h4m y C3tur4

(1 Cr. 1.32-33)

Gén3s1s 25

1 4br4h4m t0mó 0tr4 muj3r, cuy0 n0mbr3 3r4 C3tur4, 2 l4 cu4l l3 d10 4 luz 4 Z1mr4m, J0csán, M3dán, M4d1án, 1sb4c y Sú4. 3 Y J0csán 3ng3ndró 4 S3b4 y 4 D3dán; 3 h1j0s d3 D3dán fu3r0n 4sur1m, L3tus1m y L3um1m. 4 0 h1j0s d3 M4d1án: 0f4, 0f3r, H4n0c, 4b1d4 y 0ld4. T0d0s 3st0s fu3r0n h1j0s d3 C3tur4. 5 Y 4br4h4m d10 t0d0 cu4nt0 t3ní4 4 1s44c. 6 P3r0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 sus c0ncub1n4s d10 4br4h4m d0n3s, y l0s 3nv1ó l3j0s d3 1s44c su h1j0, m13ntr4s él v1ví4, h4c14 3l 0r13nt3, 4 l4 t13rr4 0r13nt4l. 

Mu3rt3 y s3pultur4 d3 4br4h4m

7 Y 3st0s fu3r0n l0s dí4s qu3 v1v1ó 4br4h4m: c13nt0 s3t3nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s. 8 Y 3xh4ló 3l 3spír1tu, y mur1ó 4br4h4m 3n bu3n4 v3j3z, 4nc14n0 y ll3n0 d3 4ñ0s, y fu3 un1d0 4 su pu3bl0. 9 Y l0 s3pult4r0n 1s44c 3 1sm43l sus h1j0s 3n l4 cu3v4 d3 M4cp3l4, 3n l4 h3r3d4d d3 0frón h1j0 d3 Z0h4r h3t30, qu3 3stá 3nfr3nt3 d3 M4mr3, 10 h3r3d4d qu3 c0mpró 4br4h4m d3 l0s h1j0s d3 H3t; 4llí fu3 s3pult4d0 4br4h4m, y S4r4 su muj3r. 11 Y suc3d1ó, d3spués d3 mu3rt0 4br4h4m, qu3 D10s b3nd1j0 4 1s44c su h1j0; y h4b1tó 1s44c junt0 4l p0z0 d3l V1v13nt3-qu3-m3- v3. 

L0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 1sm43l

(1 Cr. 1.28-31)

12 0st0s s0n l0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 1sm43l h1j0 d3 4br4h4m, 4 qu13n l3 d10 4 luz 4g4r 3g1pc14, s13rv4 d3 S4r4; 13 3st0s, pu3s, s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sm43l, n0mbr4d0s 3n 3l 0rd3n d3 su n4c1m13nt0: 0l pr1m0gén1t0 d3 1sm43l, N3b410t; lu3g0 C3d4r, 4db33l, M1bs4m, 14 M1sm4, Dum4, M4ss4, 15 H4d4r, T3m4, J3tur, N4f1s y C3d3m4. 16 0st0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sm43l, y 3st0s sus n0mbr3s, p0r sus v1ll4s y p0r sus c4mp4m3nt0s; d0c3 prínc1p3s p0r sus f4m1l14s. 17 Y 3st0s fu3r0n l0s 4ñ0s d3 l4 v1d4 d3 1sm43l, c13nt0 tr31nt4 y s13t3 4ñ0s; y 3xh4ló 3l 3spír1tu 1sm43l, y mur1ó, y fu3 un1d0 4 su pu3bl0. 18 Y h4b1t4r0n d3sd3 H4v1l4 h4st4 Shur, qu3 3stá 3nfr3nt3 d3 0g1pt0 v1n13nd0 4 4s1r14; y mur1ó 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 t0d0s sus h3rm4n0s. 

N4c1m13nt0 d3 J4c0b y 0s4ú

19 0st0s s0n l0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 1s44c h1j0 d3 4br4h4m: 4br4h4m 3ng3ndró 4 1s44c, 20 y 3r4 1s44c d3 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s cu4nd0 t0mó p0r muj3r 4 R3b3c4, h1j4 d3 B3tu3l 4r4m30 d3 P4d4n-4r4m, h3rm4n4 d3 L4bán 4r4m30. 21 Y 0ró 1s44c 4 J3h0vá p0r su muj3r, qu3 3r4 3stér1l; y l0 4c3ptó J3h0vá, y c0nc1b1ó R3b3c4 su muj3r. 22 Y l0s h1j0s luch4b4n d3ntr0 d3 3ll4; y d1j0: S1 3s 4sí, ¿p4r4 qué v1v0 y0? Y fu3 4 c0nsult4r 4 J3h0vá; 23 y l3 r3sp0nd1ó J3h0vá: 


D0s n4c10n3s h4y 3n tu s3n0, 
Y d0s pu3bl0s s3rán d1v1d1d0s d3sd3 tus 3ntr4ñ4s; 
0l un pu3bl0 s3rá más fu3rt3 qu3 3l 0tr0 pu3bl0, 
Y 3l m4y0r s3rv1rá 4l m3n0r. 

24 Cu4nd0 s3 cumpl13r0n sus dí4s p4r4 d4r 4 luz, h3 4quí h4bí4 g3m3l0s 3n su v13ntr3. 25 Y s4l1ó 3l pr1m3r0 rub10, y 3r4 t0d0 v3llud0 c0m0 un4 p3ll1z4; y ll4m4r0n su n0mbr3 0s4ú. 26 D3spués s4l1ó su h3rm4n0, tr4b4d4 su m4n0 4l c4lc4ñ4r d3 0s4ú; y fu3 ll4m4d0 su n0mbr3 J4c0b. Y 3r4 1s44c d3 3d4d d3 s3s3nt4 4ñ0s cu4nd0 3ll4 l0s d10 4 luz. 

0s4ú v3nd3 su pr1m0g3n1tur4

27 Y cr3c13r0n l0s n1ñ0s, y 0s4ú fu3 d13str0 3n l4 c4z4, h0mbr3 d3l c4mp0; p3r0 J4c0b 3r4 v4rón qu13t0, qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n t13nd4s. 28 Y 4mó 1s44c 4 0s4ú, p0rqu3 c0mí4 d3 su c4z4; m4s R3b3c4 4m4b4 4 J4c0b. 

29 Y gu1só J4c0b un p0t4j3; y v0lv13nd0 0s4ú d3l c4mp0, c4ns4d0, 30 d1j0 4 J4c0b: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3s 4 c0m3r d3 3s3 gu1s0 r0j0, pu3s 3st0y muy c4ns4d0. D10s s3 4p4r3c3 4 J4c0b 3n B3t-3l

10 S4l1ó, pu3s, J4c0b d3 B33rs3b4, y fu3 4 H4rán. 11 Y ll3gó 4 un c13rt0 lug4r, y durm1ó 4llí, p0rqu3 y4 3l s0l s3 h4bí4 pu3st0; y t0mó d3 l4s p13dr4s d3 4qu3l p4r4j3 y pus0 4 su c4b3c3r4, y s3 4c0stó 3n 4qu3l lug4r. 12 Y s0ñó: y h3 4quí un4 3sc4l3r4 qu3 3st4b4 4p0y4d4 3n t13rr4, y su 3xtr3m0 t0c4b4 3n 3l c13l0; y h3 4quí áng3l3s d3 D10s qu3 subí4n y d3sc3ndí4n p0r 3ll4. 13 Y h3 4quí, J3h0vá 3st4b4 3n l0 4lt0 d3 3ll4, 3l cu4l d1j0: Y0 s0y J3h0vá, 3l D10s d3 4br4h4m tu p4dr3, y 3l D10s d3 1s44c; l4 t13rr4 3n qu3 3stás 4c0st4d0 t3 l4 d4ré 4 t1 y 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14. 14 S3rá tu d3sc3nd3nc14 c0m0 3l p0lv0 d3 l4 t13rr4, y t3 3xt3nd3rás 4l 0cc1d3nt3, 4l 0r13nt3, 4l n0rt3 y 4l sur; y t0d4s l4s f4m1l14s d3 l4 t13rr4 s3rán b3nd1t4s 3n t1 y 3n tu s1m13nt3. 15 H3 4quí, y0 3st0y c0nt1g0, y t3 gu4rd4ré p0r d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 fu3r3s, y v0lv3ré 4 tr43rt3 4 3st4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 n0 t3 d3j4ré h4st4 qu3 h4y4 h3ch0 l0 qu3 t3 h3 d1ch0. 16 Y d3sp3rtó J4c0b d3 su su3ñ0, y d1j0: C13rt4m3nt3 J3h0vá 3stá 3n 3st3 lug4r, y y0 n0 l0 s4bí4. 17 Y tuv0 m13d0, y d1j0: ¡Cuán t3rr1bl3 3s 3st3 lug4r! 1 S1gu1ó lu3g0 J4c0b su c4m1n0, y fu3 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s 0r13nt4l3s. 2 Y m1ró, y v10 un p0z0 3n 3l c4mp0; y h3 4quí tr3s r3b4ñ0s d3 0v3j4s qu3 y4cí4n c3rc4 d3 él, p0rqu3 d3 4qu3l p0z0 4br3v4b4n l0s g4n4d0s; y h4bí4 un4 gr4n p13dr4 s0br3 l4 b0c4 d3l p0z0. 3 Y junt4b4n 4llí t0d0s l0s r3b4ñ0s; y r3v0lví4n l4 p13dr4 d3 l4 b0c4 d3l p0z0, y 4br3v4b4n l4s 0v3j4s, y v0lví4n l4 p13dr4 s0br3 l4 b0c4 d3l p0z0 4 su lug4r. 4 Y l3s d1j0 J4c0b: H3rm4n0s mí0s, ¿d3 dónd3 s01s? 9 M13ntr4s él 4ún h4bl4b4 c0n 3ll0s, R4qu3l v1n0 c0n 3l r3b4ñ0 d3 su p4dr3, p0rqu3 3ll4 3r4 l4 p4st0r4. 10 Y suc3d1ó qu3 cu4nd0 J4c0b v10 4 R4qu3l, h1j4 d3 L4bán h3rm4n0 d3 su m4dr3, y l4s 0v3j4s d3 L4bán 3l h3rm4n0 d3 su m4dr3, s3 4c3rcó J4c0b y r3m0v1ó l4 p13dr4 d3 l4 b0c4 d3l p0z0, y 4br3vó 3l r3b4ñ0 d3 L4bán h3rm4n0 d3 su m4dr3. 11 Y J4c0b b3só 4 R4qu3l, y 4lzó su v0z y ll0ró. 12 Y J4c0b d1j0 4 R4qu3l qu3 él 3r4 h3rm4n0 d3 su p4dr3, y qu3 3r4 h1j0 d3 R3b3c4; y 3ll4 c0rr1ó, y d10 l4s nu3v4s 4 su p4dr3. 13 4sí qu3 0yó L4bán l4s nu3v4s d3 J4c0b, h1j0 d3 su h3rm4n4, c0rr1ó 4 r3c1b1rl0, y l0 4br4zó, l0 b3só, y l0 tr4j0 4 su c4s4; y él c0ntó 4 L4bán t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s. 14 Y L4bán l3 d1j0: C13rt4m3nt3 hu3s0 mí0 y c4rn3 mí4 3r3s. Y 3stuv0 c0n él dur4nt3 un m3s. 

15 0nt0nc3s d1j0 L4bán 4 J4c0b: ¿P0r s3r tú m1 h3rm4n0, m3 s3rv1rás d3 b4ld3? D1m3 cuál s3rá tu s4l4r10. 16 Y L4bán t3ní4 d0s h1j4s: 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 m4y0r 3r4 L34, y 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 m3n0r, R4qu3l. 17 Y l0s 0j0s d3 L34 3r4n d3l1c4d0s, p3r0 R4qu3l 3r4 d3 l1nd0 s3mbl4nt3 y d3 h3rm0s0 p4r3c3r. 18 Y J4c0b 4mó 4 R4qu3l, y d1j0: Y0 t3 s3rv1ré s13t3 4ñ0s p0r R4qu3l tu h1j4 m3n0r. 19 Y L4bán r3sp0nd1ó: M3j0r 3s qu3 t3 l4 dé 4 t1, y n0 qu3 l4 dé 4 0tr0 h0mbr3; quéd4t3 c0nm1g0. 20 4sí s1rv1ó J4c0b p0r R4qu3l s13t3 4ñ0s; y l3 p4r3c13r0n c0m0 p0c0s dí4s, p0rqu3 l4 4m4b4.

L0s h1j0s d3 J4c0b

31 Y v10 J3h0vá qu3 L34 3r4 m3n0spr3c14d4, y l3 d10 h1j0s; p3r0 R4qu3l 3r4 3stér1l. 32 Y c0nc1b1ó L34, y d10 4 luz un h1j0, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 Rubén, p0rqu3 d1j0: H4 m1r4d0 J3h0vá m1 4fl1cc1ón; 4h0r4, p0r t4nt0, m3 4m4rá m1 m4r1d0. 33 C0nc1b1ó 0tr4 v3z, y d10 4 luz un h1j0, y d1j0: P0r cu4nt0 0yó J3h0vá qu3 y0 3r4 m3n0spr3c14d4, m3 h4 d4d0 t4mb1én ést3. Gén3s1s 30

14 Fu3 Rubén 3n t13mp0 d3 l4 s13g4 d3 l0s tr1g0s, y h4lló m4ndrág0r4s 3n 3l c4mp0, y l4s tr4j0 4 L34 su m4dr3; y d1j0 R4qu3l 4 L34: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3s d3 l4s m4ndrág0r4s d3 tu h1j0. 15 Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: ¿0s p0c0 qu3 h4y4s t0m4d0 m1 m4r1d0, s1n0 qu3 t4mb1én t3 h4s d3 ll3v4r l4s m4ndrág0r4s d3 m1 h1j0? Y d1j0 R4qu3l: Pu3s d0rm1rá c0nt1g0 3st4 n0ch3 p0r l4s m4ndrág0r4s d3 tu h1j0. 16 Cu4nd0, pu3s, J4c0b v0lví4 d3l c4mp0 4 l4 t4rd3, s4l1ó L34 4 él, y l3 d1j0: Llég4t3 4 mí, p0rqu3 4 l4 v3rd4d t3 h3 4lqu1l4d0 p0r l4s m4ndrág0r4s d3 m1 h1j0. Y durm1ó c0n 3ll4 4qu3ll4 n0ch3. 17 Y 0yó D10s 4 L34; y c0nc1b1ó, y d10 4 luz 3l qu1nt0 h1j0 4 J4c0b. 18 Y d1j0 L34: D10s m3 h4 d4d0 m1 r3c0mp3ns4, p0r cu4nt0 d1 m1 s13rv4 4 m1 m4r1d0; p0r 3s0 ll4mó su n0mbr3 1s4c4r. 19 D3spués c0nc1b1ó L34 0tr4 v3z, y d10 4 luz 3l s3xt0 h1j0 4 J4c0b. 20 Y d1j0 L34: D10s m3 h4 d4d0 un4 bu3n4 d0t3; 4h0r4 m0r4rá c0nm1g0 m1 m4r1d0, p0rqu3 l3 h3 d4d0 4 luz s31s h1j0s; y ll4mó su n0mbr3 Z4bulón. 21 D3spués d10 4 luz un4 h1j4, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 D1n4. 22 Y s3 4c0rdó D10s d3 R4qu3l, y l4 0yó D10s, y l3 c0nc3d1ó h1j0s. 23 Y c0nc1b1ó, y d10 4 luz un h1j0, y d1j0: D10s h4 qu1t4d0 m1 4fr3nt4; 24 y ll4mó su n0mbr3 J0sé, d1c13nd0: 4ñád4m3 J3h0vá 0tr0 h1j0. 

Tr3t4s d3 J4c0b y d3 L4bán

25 4c0nt3c1ó cu4nd0 R4qu3l hub0 d4d0 4 luz 4 J0sé, qu3 J4c0b d1j0 4 L4bán: 0nví4m3, 3 1ré 4 m1 lug4r, y 4 m1 t13rr4. 26 D4m3 m1s muj3r3s y m1s h1j0s, p0r l4s cu4l3s h3 s3rv1d0 c0nt1g0, y déj4m3 1r; pu3s tú s4b3s l0s s3rv1c10s qu3 t3 h3 h3ch0. 27 Y L4bán l3 r3sp0nd1ó: H4ll3 y0 4h0r4 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, y quéd4t3; h3 3xp3r1m3nt4d0 qu3 J3h0vá m3 h4 b3nd3c1d0 p0r tu c4us4. 28 Y d1j0: S3ñál4m3 tu s4l4r10, y y0 l0 d4ré. 29 Y él r3sp0nd1ó: Tú s4b3s cóm0 t3 h3 s3rv1d0, y cóm0 h4 3st4d0 tu g4n4d0 c0nm1g0. 30 P0rqu3 p0c0 t3ní4s 4nt3s d3 m1 v3n1d4, y h4 cr3c1d0 3n gr4n núm3r0, y J3h0vá t3 h4 b3nd3c1d0 c0n m1 ll3g4d4; y 4h0r4, ¿cuánd0 tr4b4j4ré t4mb1én p0r m1 pr0p14 c4s4? 31 Y él d1j0: ¿Qué t3 d4ré? Y r3sp0nd1ó J4c0b: N0 m3 d3s n4d4; s1 h1c13r3s p0r mí 3st0, v0lv3ré 4 4p4c3nt4r tus 0v3j4s. 32 Y0 p4s4ré h0y p0r t0d0 tu r3b4ñ0, p0n13nd0 4p4rt3 t0d4s l4s 0v3j4s m4nch4d4s y s4lp1c4d4s d3 c0l0r, y t0d4s l4s 0v3j4s d3 c0l0r 0scur0, y l4s m4nch4d4s y s4lp1c4d4s d3 c0l0r 3ntr3 l4s c4br4s; y 3st0 s3rá m1 s4l4r10. 33 4sí r3sp0nd3rá p0r mí m1 h0nr4d3z m4ñ4n4, cu4nd0 v3ng4s 4 r3c0n0c3r m1 s4l4r10; t0d4 l4 qu3 n0 fu3r3 p1nt4d4 n1 m4nch4d4 3n l4s c4br4s, y d3 c0l0r 0scur0 3ntr3 m1s 0v3j4s, s3 m3 h4 d3 t3n3r c0m0 d3 hurt0. 34 D1j0 3nt0nc3s L4bán: M1r4, s34 c0m0 tú d1c3s. 35 Y L4bán 4p4rtó 4qu3l dí4 l0s m4ch0s c4brí0s m4nch4d0s y r4y4d0s, y t0d4s l4s c4br4s m4nch4d4s y s4lp1c4d4s d3 c0l0r, y t0d4 4qu3ll4 qu3 t3ní4 3n sí 4lg0 d3 bl4nc0, y t0d4s l4s d3 c0l0r 0scur0 3ntr3 l4s 0v3j4s, y l4s pus0 3n m4n0 d3 sus h1j0s. 36 Y pus0 tr3s dí4s d3 c4m1n0 3ntr3 sí y J4c0b; y J4c0b 4p4c3nt4b4 l4s 0tr4s 0v3j4s d3 L4bán. 

37 T0mó lu3g0 J4c0b v4r4s v3rd3s d3 ál4m0, d3 4v3ll4n0 y d3 c4st4ñ0, y d3sc0rt3zó 3n 3ll4s m0nd4dur4s bl4nc4s, d3scubr13nd0 4sí l0 bl4nc0 d3 l4s v4r4s. 38 Y pus0 l4s v4r4s qu3 h4bí4 m0nd4d0 d3l4nt3 d3l g4n4d0, 3n l0s c4n4l3s d3 l0s 4br3v4d3r0s d3l 4gu4 d0nd3 v3ní4n 4 b3b3r l4s 0v3j4s, l4s cu4l3s pr0cr34b4n cu4nd0 v3ní4n 4 b3b3r. 39 4sí c0nc3bí4n l4s 0v3j4s d3l4nt3 d3 l4s v4r4s; y p4rí4n b0rr3g0s l1st4d0s, p1nt4d0s y s4lp1c4d0s d3 d1v3rs0s c0l0r3s. 40 Y 4p4rt4b4 J4c0b l0s c0rd3r0s, y p0ní4 c0n su pr0p10 r3b4ñ0 l0s l1st4d0s y t0d0 l0 qu3 3r4 0scur0 d3l h4t0 d3 L4bán. Y p0ní4 su h4t0 4p4rt3, y n0 l0 p0ní4 c0n l4s 0v3j4s d3 L4bán. 41 Y suc3dí4 qu3 cu4nt4s v3c3s s3 h4ll4b4n 3n c3l0 l4s 0v3j4s más fu3rt3s, J4c0b p0ní4 l4s v4r4s d3l4nt3 d3 l4s 0v3j4s 3n l0s 4br3v4d3r0s, p4r4 qu3 c0nc1b13s3n 4 l4 v1st4 d3 l4s v4r4s. 42 P3r0 cu4nd0 v3ní4n l4s 0v3j4s más déb1l3s, n0 l4s p0ní4; 4sí 3r4n l4s más déb1l3s p4r4 L4bán, y l4s más fu3rt3s p4r4 J4c0b. 43 Y s3 3nr1qu3c1ó 3l v4rón muchís1m0, y tuv0 much4s 0v3j4s, y s13rv4s y s13rv0s, y c4m3ll0s y 4sn0s. 

Gén3s1s 31

1 Y 0í4 J4c0b l4s p4l4br4s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 L4bán, qu3 d3cí4n: J4c0b h4 t0m4d0 t0d0 l0 qu3 3r4 d3 nu3str0 p4dr3, y d3 l0 qu3 3r4 d3 nu3str0 p4dr3 h4 4dqu1r1d0 t0d4 3st4 r1qu3z4. 2 M1r4b4 t4mb1én J4c0b 3l s3mbl4nt3 d3 L4bán, y v3í4 qu3 n0 3r4 p4r4 c0n él c0m0 h4bí4 s1d0 4nt3s. 3 T4mb1én J3h0vá d1j0 4 J4c0b: Vuélv3t3 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 tus p4dr3s, y 4 tu p4r3nt3l4, y y0 3st4ré c0nt1g0. 4 0nv1ó, pu3s, J4c0b, y ll4mó 4 R4qu3l y 4 L34 4l c4mp0 d0nd3 3st4b4n sus 0v3j4s, 5 y l3s d1j0: V30 qu3 3l s3mbl4nt3 d3 vu3str0 p4dr3 n0 3s p4r4 c0nm1g0 c0m0 3r4 4nt3s; m4s 3l D10s d3 m1 p4dr3 h4 3st4d0 c0nm1g0. 6 V0s0tr4s s4bé1s qu3 c0n t0d4s m1s fu3rz4s h3 s3rv1d0 4 vu3str0 p4dr3; 7 y vu3str0 p4dr3 m3 h4 3ng4ñ4d0, y m3 h4 c4mb14d0 3l s4l4r10 d13z v3c3s; p3r0 D10s n0 l3 h4 p3rm1t1d0 qu3 m3 h1c13s3 m4l. 8 S1 él d3cí4 4sí: L0s p1nt4d0s s3rán tu s4l4r10, 3nt0nc3s t0d4s l4s 0v3j4s p4rí4n p1nt4d0s; y s1 d3cí4 4sí: L0s l1st4d0s s3rán tu s4l4r10; 3nt0nc3s t0d4s l4s 0v3j4s p4rí4n l1st4d0s. 9 4sí qu1tó D10s 3l g4n4d0 d3 vu3str0 p4dr3, y m3 l0 d10 4 mí. 10 Y suc3d1ó qu3 4l t13mp0 qu3 l4s 0v3j4s 3st4b4n 3n c3l0, 4lcé y0 m1s 0j0s y v1 3n su3ñ0s, y h3 4quí l0s m4ch0s qu3 cubrí4n 4 l4s h3mbr4s 3r4n l1st4d0s, p1nt4d0s y 4b1g4rr4d0s. 11 Y m3 d1j0 3l áng3l d3 D10s 3n su3ñ0s: J4c0b. Y y0 d1j3: H3m3 4quí. 12 Y él d1j0: 4lz4 4h0r4 tus 0j0s, y v3rás qu3 t0d0s l0s m4ch0s qu3 cubr3n 4 l4s h3mbr4s s0n l1st4d0s, p1nt4d0s y 4b1g4rr4d0s; p0rqu3 y0 h3 v1st0 t0d0 l0 qu3 L4bán t3 h4 h3ch0. 13 Y0 s0y 3l D10s d3 B3t-3l, d0nd3 tú ung1st3 l4 p13dr4, y d0nd3 m3 h1c1st3 un v0t0. L3vánt4t3 4h0r4 y s4l d3 3st4 t13rr4, y vuélv3t3 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 tu n4c1m13nt0. 14 R3sp0nd13r0n R4qu3l y L34, y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿T3n3m0s 4c4s0 p4rt3 0 h3r3d4d 3n l4 c4s4 d3 nu3str0 p4dr3? 15 ¿N0 n0s t13n3 y4 c0m0 p0r 3xtr4ñ4s, pu3s qu3 n0s v3nd1ó, y 4un s3 h4 c0m1d0 d3l t0d0 nu3str0 pr3c10? 16 P0rqu3 t0d4 l4 r1qu3z4 qu3 D10s h4 qu1t4d0 4 nu3str0 p4dr3, nu3str4 3s y d3 nu3str0s h1j0s; 4h0r4, pu3s, h4z t0d0 l0 qu3 D10s t3 h4 d1ch0. 

J4c0b huy3 d3 L4bán

17 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4ntó J4c0b, y sub1ó sus h1j0s y sus muj3r3s s0br3 l0s c4m3ll0s, 18 y pus0 3n c4m1n0 t0d0 su g4n4d0, y t0d0 cu4nt0 h4bí4 4dqu1r1d0, 3l g4n4d0 d3 su g4n4nc14 qu3 h4bí4 0bt3n1d0 3n P4d4n-4r4m, p4r4 v0lv3rs3 4 1s44c su p4dr3 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án. 19 P3r0 L4bán h4bí4 1d0 4 tr4squ1l4r sus 0v3j4s; y R4qu3l hurtó l0s íd0l0s d3 su p4dr3. 20 Y J4c0b 3ng4ñó 4 L4bán 4r4m30, n0 h4c1énd0l3 s4b3r qu3 s3 1b4. 21 Huyó, pu3s, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4; y s3 l3v4ntó y p4só 3l 0ufr4t3s, y s3 d1r1g1ó 4l m0nt3 d3 G4l44d. 22 Y 4l t3rc3r dí4 fu3 d1ch0 4 L4bán qu3 J4c0b h4bí4 hu1d0. 23 0nt0nc3s L4bán t0mó 4 sus p4r13nt3s c0ns1g0, y fu3 tr4s J4c0b c4m1n0 d3 s13t3 dí4s, y l3 4lc4nzó 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 G4l44d. 24 Y v1n0 D10s 4 L4bán 4r4m30 3n su3ñ0s 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, y l3 d1j0: Guárd4t3 qu3 n0 h4bl3s 4 J4c0b d3sc0m3d1d4m3nt3. 

25 4lc4nzó, pu3s, L4bán 4 J4c0b; y ést3 h4bí4 f1j4d0 su t13nd4 3n 3l m0nt3; y L4bán 4c4mpó c0n sus p4r13nt3s 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 G4l44d. 26 Y d1j0 L4bán 4 J4c0b: ¿Qué h4s h3ch0, qu3 m3 3ng4ñ4st3, y h4s tr4íd0 4 m1s h1j4s c0m0 pr1s10n3r4s d3 gu3rr4? 27 ¿P0r qué t3 3sc0nd1st3 p4r4 hu1r, y m3 3ng4ñ4st3, y n0 m3 l0 h1c1st3 s4b3r p4r4 qu3 y0 t3 d3sp1d13r4 c0n 4l3grí4 y c0n c4nt4r3s, c0n t4mb0rín y 4rp4? 28 Pu3s n1 4un m3 d4j4st3 b3s4r 4 m1s h1j0s y m1s h1j4s. 4h0r4, l0c4m3nt3 h4s h3ch0. 29 P0d3r h4y 3n m1 m4n0 p4r4 h4c3r0s m4l; m4s 3l D10s d3 tu p4dr3 m3 h4bló 4n0ch3 d1c13nd0: Guárd4t3 qu3 n0 h4bl3s 4 J4c0b d3sc0m3d1d4m3nt3. 30 Y y4 qu3 t3 1b4s, p0rqu3 t3ní4s d3s30 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3, ¿p0r qué m3 hurt4st3 m1s d10s3s? 31 R3sp0nd1ó J4c0b y d1j0 4 L4bán: P0rqu3 tuv3 m13d0; pu3s p3nsé qu3 qu1zá m3 qu1t4rí4s p0r fu3rz4 tus h1j4s. 32 4qu3l 3n cuy0 p0d3r h4ll4r3s tus d10s3s, n0 v1v4; d3l4nt3 d3 nu3str0s h3rm4n0s r3c0n0c3 l0 qu3 y0 t3ng4 tuy0, y llév4t3l0. J4c0b n0 s4bí4 qu3 R4qu3l l0s h4bí4 hurt4d0. 33 0ntró L4bán 3n l4 t13nd4 d3 J4c0b, 3n l4 t13nd4 d3 L34, y 3n l4 t13nd4 d3 l4s d0s s13rv4s, y n0 l0s h4lló; y s4l1ó d3 l4 t13nd4 d3 L34, y 3ntró 3n l4 t13nd4 d3 R4qu3l. 34 P3r0 t0mó R4qu3l l0s íd0l0s y l0s pus0 3n un4 4lb4rd4 d3 un c4m3ll0, y s3 s3ntó s0br3 3ll0s; y buscó L4bán 3n t0d4 l4 t13nd4, y n0 l0s h4lló. 35 Y 3ll4 d1j0 4 su p4dr3: N0 s3 3n0j3 m1 s3ñ0r, p0rqu3 n0 m3 pu3d0 l3v4nt4r d3l4nt3 d3 t1; pu3s 3st0y c0n l4 c0stumbr3 d3 l4s muj3r3s. Y él buscó, p3r0 n0 h4lló l0s íd0l0s. 

36 0nt0nc3s J4c0b s3 3n0jó, y r1ñó c0n L4bán; y r3sp0nd1ó J4c0b y d1j0 4 L4bán: ¿Qué tr4nsgr3s1ón 3s l4 mí4? ¿Cuál 3s m1 p3c4d0, p4r4 qu3 c0n t4nt0 4rd0r h4y4s v3n1d0 3n m1 p3rs3cuc1ón? 37 Pu3s qu3 h4s busc4d0 3n t0d4s m1s c0s4s, ¿qué h4s h4ll4d0 d3 t0d0s l0s 3ns3r3s d3 tu c4s4? P0nl0 4quí d3l4nt3 d3 m1s h3rm4n0s y d3 l0s tuy0s, y juzgu3n 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s. 38 0st0s v31nt3 4ñ0s h3 3st4d0 c0nt1g0; tus 0v3j4s y tus c4br4s nunc4 4b0rt4r0n, n1 y0 c0mí c4rn3r0 d3 tus 0v3j4s. 39 Nunc4 t3 tr4j3 l0 4rr3b4t4d0 p0r l4s f13r4s: y0 p4g4b4 3l d4ñ0; l0 hurt4d0 4sí d3 dí4 c0m0 d3 n0ch3, 4 mí m3 l0 c0br4b4s. 40 D3 dí4 m3 c0nsumí4 3l c4l0r, y d3 n0ch3 l4 h3l4d4, y 3l su3ñ0 huí4 d3 m1s 0j0s. 41 4sí h3 3st4d0 v31nt3 4ñ0s 3n tu c4s4; c4t0rc3 4ñ0s t3 s3rví p0r tus d0s h1j4s, y s31s 4ñ0s p0r tu g4n4d0, y h4s c4mb14d0 m1 s4l4r10 d13z v3c3s. 42 S1 3l D10s d3 m1 p4dr3, D10s d3 4br4h4m y t3m0r d3 1s44c, n0 3stuv13r4 c0nm1g0, d3 c13rt0 m3 3nv14rí4s 4h0r4 c0n l4s m4n0s v4cí4s; p3r0 D10s v10 m1 4fl1cc1ón y 3l tr4b4j0 d3 m1s m4n0s, y t3 r3pr3nd1ó 4n0ch3. 

43 R3sp0nd1ó L4bán y d1j0 4 J4c0b: L4s h1j4s s0n h1j4s mí4s, y l0s h1j0s, h1j0s mí0s s0n, y l4s 0v3j4s s0n m1s 0v3j4s, y t0d0 l0 qu3 tú v3s 3s mí0: ¿y qué pu3d0 y0 h4c3r h0y 4 3st4s m1s h1j4s, 0 4 sus h1j0s qu3 3ll4s h4n d4d0 4 luz? 44 V3n, pu3s, 4h0r4, y h4g4m0s p4ct0 tú y y0, y s34 p0r t3st1m0n10 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s d0s. 45 0nt0nc3s J4c0b t0mó un4 p13dr4, y l4 l3v4ntó p0r s3ñ4l. 46 Y d1j0 J4c0b 4 sus h3rm4n0s: R3c0g3d p13dr4s. Y t0m4r0n p13dr4s 3 h1c13r0n un m4j4n0, y c0m13r0n 4llí s0br3 4qu3l m4j4n0. 47 Y l0 ll4mó L4bán, J3g4r S4h4dut4; y l0 ll4mó J4c0b, G4l44d. 48 P0rqu3 L4bán d1j0: 0st3 m4j4n0 3s t3st1g0 h0y 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s d0s; p0r 3s0 fu3 ll4m4d0 su n0mbr3 G4l44d; 49 y M1zp4, p0r cu4nt0 d1j0: 4t4l4y3 J3h0vá 3ntr3 tú y y0, cu4nd0 n0s 4p4rt3m0s 3l un0 d3l 0tr0. 50 S1 4fl1g13r3s 4 m1s h1j4s, 0 s1 t0m4r3s 0tr4s muj3r3s 4d3más d3 m1s h1j4s, n4d13 3stá c0n n0s0tr0s; m1r4, D10s 3s t3st1g0 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s d0s. 51 D1j0 más L4bán 4 J4c0b: H3 4quí 3st3 m4j4n0, y h3 4quí 3st4 s3ñ4l, qu3 h3 3r1g1d0 3ntr3 tú y y0. 52 T3st1g0 s34 3st3 m4j4n0, y t3st1g0 s34 3st4 s3ñ4l, qu3 n1 y0 p4s4ré d3 3st3 m4j4n0 c0ntr4 t1, n1 tú p4s4rás d3 3st3 m4j4n0 n1 d3 3st4 s3ñ4l c0ntr4 mí, p4r4 m4l. 53 0l D10s d3 4br4h4m y 3l D10s d3 N4c0r juzgu3 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s. Y J4c0b juró p0r 4qu3l 4 qu13n t3mí4 1s44c su p4dr3. 54 0nt0nc3s J4c0b 1nm0ló víct1m4s 3n 3l m0nt3, y ll4mó 4 sus h3rm4n0s 4 c0m3r p4n; y c0m13r0n p4n, y durm13r0n 4qu3ll4 n0ch3 3n 3l m0nt3. 55 Y s3 l3v4ntó L4bán d3 m4ñ4n4, y b3só sus h1j0s y sus h1j4s, y l0s b3nd1j0; y r3gr3só y s3 v0lv1ó 4 su lug4r. 

J4c0b s3 pr3p4r4 p4r4 3l 3ncu3ntr0 c0n 0s4ú

Gén3s1s 32

1 J4c0b s1gu1ó su c4m1n0, y l3 s4l13r0n 4l 3ncu3ntr0 áng3l3s d3 D10s. 2 Y d1j0 J4c0b cu4nd0 l0s v10: C4mp4m3nt0 d3 D10s 3s 3st3; y ll4mó 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r M4h4n41m. 3 Y 3nv1ó J4c0b m3ns4j3r0s d3l4nt3 d3 sí 4 0s4ú su h3rm4n0, 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 S31r, c4mp0 d3 0d0m. 4 Y l3s m4ndó d1c13nd0: 4sí d1ré1s 4 m1 s3ñ0r 0s4ú: 4sí d1c3 tu s13rv0 J4c0b: C0n L4bán h3 m0r4d0, y m3 h3 d3t3n1d0 h4st4 4h0r4; 5 y t3ng0 v4c4s, 4sn0s, 0v3j4s, y s13rv0s y s13rv4s; y 3nví0 4 d3c1rl0 4 m1 s3ñ0r, p4r4 h4ll4r gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s. 

6 Y l0s m3ns4j3r0s v0lv13r0n 4 J4c0b, d1c13nd0: V1n1m0s 4 tu h3rm4n0 0s4ú, y él t4mb1én v13n3 4 r3c1b1rt3, y cu4tr0c13nt0s h0mbr3s c0n él. 7 0nt0nc3s J4c0b tuv0 gr4n t3m0r, y s3 4ngust1ó; y d1str1buyó 3l pu3bl0 qu3 t3ní4 c0ns1g0, y l4s 0v3j4s y l4s v4c4s y l0s c4m3ll0s, 3n d0s c4mp4m3nt0s. 8 Y d1j0: S1 v13n3 0s4ú c0ntr4 un c4mp4m3nt0 y l0 4t4c4, 3l 0tr0 c4mp4m3nt0 3sc4p4rá. 

9 Y d1j0 J4c0b: D10s d3 m1 p4dr3 4br4h4m, y D10s d3 m1 p4dr3 1s44c, J3h0vá, qu3 m3 d1j1st3: Vuélv3t3 4 tu t13rr4 y 4 tu p4r3nt3l4, y y0 t3 h4ré b13n; 10 m3n0r s0y qu3 t0d4s l4s m1s3r1c0rd14s y qu3 t0d4 l4 v3rd4d qu3 h4s us4d0 p4r4 c0n tu s13rv0; pu3s c0n m1 c4y4d0 p4sé 3st3 J0rdán, y 4h0r4 3st0y s0br3 d0s c4mp4m3nt0s. 11 Líbr4m3 4h0r4 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 m1 h3rm4n0, d3 l4 m4n0 d3 0s4ú, p0rqu3 l3 t3m0; n0 v3ng4 4c4s0 y m3 h13r4 l4 m4dr3 c0n l0s h1j0s. 12 Y tú h4s d1ch0: Y0 t3 h4ré b13n, y tu d3sc3nd3nc14 s3rá c0m0 l4 4r3n4 d3l m4r, qu3 n0 s3 pu3d3 c0nt4r p0r l4 mult1tud. 13 Y durm1ó 4llí 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, y t0mó d3 l0 qu3 l3 v1n0 4 l4 m4n0 un pr3s3nt3 p4r4 su h3rm4n0 0s4ú: 14 d0sc13nt4s c4br4s y v31nt3 m4ch0s c4brí0s, d0sc13nt4s 0v3j4s y v31nt3 c4rn3r0s, 15 tr31nt4 c4m3ll4s p4r1d4s c0n sus crí4s, cu4r3nt4 v4c4s y d13z n0v1ll0s, v31nt3 4sn4s y d13z b0rr1c0s. 16 Y l0 3ntr3gó 4 sus s13rv0s, c4d4 m4n4d4 d3 p0r sí; y d1j0 4 sus s13rv0s: P4s4d d3l4nt3 d3 mí, y p0n3d 3sp4c10 3ntr3 m4n4d4 y m4n4d4. 17 Y m4ndó 4l pr1m3r0, d1c13nd0: S1 0s4ú m1 h3rm4n0 t3 3nc0ntr4r3, y t3 pr3gunt4r3, d1c13nd0: ¿D3 qu1én 3r3s? ¿y 4dónd3 v4s? ¿y p4r4 qu1én 3s 3st0 qu3 ll3v4s d3l4nt3 d3 t1? 18 3nt0nc3s d1rás: 0s un pr3s3nt3 d3 tu s13rv0 J4c0b, qu3 3nví4 4 m1 s3ñ0r 0s4ú; y h3 4quí t4mb1én él v13n3 tr4s n0s0tr0s. 19 M4ndó t4mb1én 4l s3gund0, y 4l t3rc3r0, y 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 1b4n tr4s 4qu3ll4s m4n4d4s, d1c13nd0: C0nf0rm3 4 3st0 h4bl4ré1s 4 0s4ú, cu4nd0 l3 h4ll4r31s. 20 Y d1ré1s t4mb1én: H3 4quí tu s13rv0 J4c0b v13n3 tr4s n0s0tr0s. P0rqu3 d1j0: 4p4c1gu4ré su 1r4 c0n 3l pr3s3nt3 qu3 v4 d3l4nt3 d3 mí, y d3spués v3ré su r0str0; qu1zá l3 s3ré 4c3pt0. 21 P4só, pu3s, 3l pr3s3nt3 d3l4nt3 d3 él; y él durm1ó 4qu3ll4 n0ch3 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0. 

J4c0b luch4 c0n 3l áng3l 3n P3n13l

22 Y s3 l3v4ntó 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, y t0mó sus d0s muj3r3s, y sus d0s s13rv4s, y sus 0nc3 h1j0s, y p4só 3l v4d0 d3 J4b0c. 23 L0s t0mó, pu3s, 3 h1z0 p4s4r 3l 4rr0y0 4 3ll0s y 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4. 24 4sí s3 qu3dó J4c0b s0l0; y luchó c0n él un v4rón h4st4 qu3 r4y4b4 3l 4lb4. 25 Y cu4nd0 3l v4rón v10 qu3 n0 p0dí4 c0n él, t0có 3n 3l s1t10 d3l 3nc4j3 d3 su musl0, y s3 d3sc0yuntó 3l musl0 d3 J4c0b m13ntr4s c0n él luch4b4. 26 Y d1j0: Déj4m3, p0rqu3 r4y4 3l 4lb4. Y J4c0b l3 r3sp0nd1ó: N0 t3 d3j4ré, s1 n0 m3 b3nd1c3s. 27 Y 3l v4rón l3 d1j0: ¿Cuál 3s tu n0mbr3? Y él r3sp0nd1ó: J4c0b. 28 Y 3l v4rón l3 d1j0: N0 s3 d1rá más tu n0mbr3 J4c0b, s1n0 1sr43l; p0rqu3 h4s luch4d0 c0n D10s y c0n l0s h0mbr3s, y h4s v3nc1d0. 29 0nt0nc3s J4c0b l3 pr3guntó, y d1j0: D3clár4m3 4h0r4 tu n0mbr3. Y 3l v4rón r3sp0nd1ó: ¿P0r qué m3 pr3gunt4s p0r m1 n0mbr3? Y l0 b3nd1j0 4llí. 30 Y ll4mó J4c0b 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r, P3n13l; p0rqu3 d1j0: V1 4 D10s c4r4 4 c4r4, y fu3 l1br4d4 m1 4lm4. 31 Y cu4nd0 h4bí4 p4s4d0 P3n13l, l3 s4l1ó 3l s0l; y c0j34b4 d3 su c4d3r4. 32 P0r 3st0 n0 c0m3n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, h4st4 h0y dí4, d3l t3ndón qu3 s3 c0ntr4j0, 3l cu4l 3stá 3n 3l 3nc4j3 d3l musl0; p0rqu3 t0có 4 J4c0b 3st3 s1t10 d3 su musl0 3n 3l t3ndón qu3 s3 c0ntr4j0.

1 4lz4nd0 J4c0b sus 0j0s, m1ró, y h3 4quí v3ní4 0s4ú, y l0s cu4tr0c13nt0s h0mbr3s c0n él; 3nt0nc3s r3p4rt1ó él l0s n1ñ0s 3ntr3 L34 y R4qu3l y l4s d0s s13rv4s. 2 Y pus0 l4s s13rv4s y sus n1ñ0s d3l4nt3, lu3g0 4 L34 y sus n1ñ0s, y 4 R4qu3l y 4 J0sé l0s últ1m0s. 3 Y él p4só d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s y s3 1ncl1nó 4 t13rr4 s13t3 v3c3s, h4st4 qu3 ll3gó 4 su h3rm4n0. 4 P3r0 0s4ú c0rr1ó 4 su 3ncu3ntr0 y l3 4br4zó, y s3 3chó s0br3 su cu3ll0, y l3 b3só; y ll0r4r0n. 5 Y 4lzó sus 0j0s y v10 4 l4s muj3r3s y l0s n1ñ0s, y d1j0: ¿Qu1én3s s0n ést0s? Y J4c0b r3sp0nd1ó: 0l h4ll4r gr4c14 3n l0s 0j0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r. 9 Y d1j0 0s4ú: Suf1c13nt3 t3ng0 y0, h3rm4n0 mí0; s34 p4r4 t1 l0 qu3 3s tuy0. 10 Y d1j0 J4c0b: N0, y0 t3 ru3g0; s1 h3 h4ll4d0 4h0r4 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, 4c3pt4 m1 pr3s3nt3, p0rqu3 h3 v1st0 tu r0str0, c0m0 s1 hub13r4 v1st0 3l r0str0 d3 D10s, pu3s qu3 c0n t4nt0 f4v0r m3 h4s r3c1b1d0. 11 4c3pt4, t3 ru3g0, m1 pr3s3nt3 qu3 t3 h3 tr4íd0, p0rqu3 D10s m3 h4 h3ch0 m3rc3d, y t0d0 l0 qu3 h4y 4quí 3s mí0. 0 1ns1st1ó c0n él, y 0s4ú l0 t0mó. 12 Y 0s4ú d1j0: 4nd4, v4m0s; y y0 1ré d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 13 Y J4c0b l3 d1j0: M1 s3ñ0r s4b3 qu3 l0s n1ñ0s s0n t13rn0s, y qu3 t3ng0 0v3j4s y v4c4s p4r1d4s; y s1 l4s f4t1g4n, 3n un dí4 m0r1rán t0d4s l4s 0v3j4s. 14 P4s3 4h0r4 m1 s3ñ0r d3l4nt3 d3 su s13rv0, y y0 m3 1ré p0c0 4 p0c0 4l p4s0 d3l g4n4d0 qu3 v4 d3l4nt3 d3 mí y 4l p4s0 d3 l0s n1ñ0s, h4st4 qu3 ll3gu3 4 m1 s3ñ0r 4 S31r. 15 Y 0s4ú d1j0: D3j4ré 4h0r4 c0nt1g0 d3 l4 g3nt3 qu3 v13n3 c0nm1g0. Y J4c0b d1j0: ¿P4r4 qué 3st0? H4ll3 y0 gr4c14 3n l0s 0j0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r. 16 4sí v0lv1ó 0s4ú 4qu3l dí4 p0r su c4m1n0 4 S31r. 17 Y J4c0b fu3 4 Suc0t, y 3d1f1có 4llí c4s4 p4r4 sí, 3 h1z0 c4b4ñ4s p4r4 su g4n4d0; p0r t4nt0, ll4mó 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r Suc0t.

20 0nt0nc3s H4m0r y S1qu3m su h1j0 v1n13r0n 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 su c1ud4d, y h4bl4r0n 4 l0s v4r0n3s d3 su c1ud4d, d1c13nd0: 21 0st0s v4r0n3s s0n p4cíf1c0s c0n n0s0tr0s, y h4b1t4rán 3n 3l p4ís, y tr4f1c4rán 3n él; pu3s h3 4quí l4 t13rr4 3s b4st4nt3 4nch4 p4r4 3ll0s; n0s0tr0s t0m4r3m0s sus h1j4s p0r muj3r3s, y l3s d4r3m0s l4s nu3str4s. 22 M4s c0n 3st4 c0nd1c1ón c0ns3nt1rán 3st0s h0mbr3s 3n h4b1t4r c0n n0s0tr0s, p4r4 qu3 s34m0s un pu3bl0: qu3 s3 c1rcunc1d3 t0d0 v4rón 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, 4sí c0m0 3ll0s s0n c1rcunc1d4d0s. 23 Su g4n4d0, sus b13n3s y t0d4s sus b3st14s s3rán nu3str0s; s0l4m3nt3 c0nv3ng4m0s c0n 3ll0s, y h4b1t4rán c0n n0s0tr0s. 24 Y 0b3d3c13r0n 4 H4m0r y 4 S1qu3m su h1j0 t0d0s l0s qu3 s4lí4n p0r l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y c1rcunc1d4r0n 4 t0d0 v4rón, 4 cu4nt0s s4lí4n p0r l4 pu3rt4 d3 su c1ud4d.

D10s b3nd1c3 4 J4c0b 3n B3t-3l

Gén3s1s 35

1 D1j0 D10s 4 J4c0b: L3vánt4t3 y sub3 4 B3t-3l, y quéd4t3 4llí; y h4z 4llí un 4lt4r 4l D10s qu3 t3 4p4r3c1ó cu4nd0 huí4s d3 tu h3rm4n0 0s4ú. 2 0nt0nc3s J4c0b d1j0 4 su f4m1l14 y 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 c0n él 3st4b4n: Qu1t4d l0s d10s3s 4j3n0s qu3 h4y 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, y l1mp140s, y mud4d vu3str0s v3st1d0s. 3 Y l3v4ntém0n0s, y sub4m0s 4 B3t-3l; y h4ré 4llí 4lt4r 4l D10s qu3 m3 r3sp0nd1ó 3n 3l dí4 d3 m1 4ngust14, y h4 3st4d0 c0nm1g0 3n 3l c4m1n0 qu3 h3 4nd4d0. 4 4sí d13r0n 4 J4c0b t0d0s l0s d10s3s 4j3n0s qu3 h4bí4 3n p0d3r d3 3ll0s, y l0s z4rc1ll0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n sus 0r3j4s; y J4c0b l0s 3sc0nd1ó d3b4j0 d3 un4 3nc1n4 qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4 S1qu3m. 

5 Y s4l13r0n, y 3l t3rr0r d3 D10s 3stuv0 s0br3 l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 h4bí4 3n sus 4lr3d3d0r3s, y n0 p3rs1gu13r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 J4c0b. 6 Y ll3gó J4c0b 4 Luz, qu3 3stá 3n t13rr4 d3 C4n4án (3st4 3s B3t-3l), él y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4. 7 Y 3d1f1có 4llí un 4lt4r, y ll4mó 4l lug4r 0l-b3t-3l, p0rqu3 4llí l3 h4bí4 4p4r3c1d0 D10s, cu4nd0 huí4 d3 su h3rm4n0. 8 0nt0nc3s mur1ó Déb0r4, 4m4 d3 R3b3c4, y fu3 s3pult4d4 4l p13 d3 B3t-3l, d3b4j0 d3 un4 3nc1n4, l4 cu4l fu3 ll4m4d4 4lón-b4cut. 

9 4p4r3c1ó 0tr4 v3z D10s 4 J4c0b, cu4nd0 h4bí4 vu3lt0 d3 P4d4n-4r4m, y l3 b3nd1j0. 10 Y l3 d1j0 D10s: Tu n0mbr3 3s J4c0b; n0 s3 ll4m4rá más tu n0mbr3 J4c0b, s1n0 1sr43l s3rá tu n0mbr3; y ll4mó su n0mbr3 1sr43l. 11 T4mb1én l3 d1j0 D10s: Y0 s0y 3l D10s 0mn1p0t3nt3: cr3c3 y mult1plíc4t3; un4 n4c1ón y c0njunt0 d3 n4c10n3s pr0c3d3rán d3 t1, y r3y3s s4ldrán d3 tus l0m0s. 12 L4 t13rr4 qu3 h3 d4d0 4 4br4h4m y 4 1s44c, l4 d4ré 4 t1, y 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 d3spués d3 t1 d4ré l4 t13rr4. 13 Y s3 fu3 d3 él D10s, d3l lug4r 3n d0nd3 h4bí4 h4bl4d0 c0n él. 14 Y J4c0b 3r1g1ó un4 s3ñ4l 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 h4bí4 h4bl4d0 c0n él, un4 s3ñ4l d3 p13dr4, y d3rr4mó s0br3 3ll4 l1b4c1ón, y 3chó s0br3 3ll4 4c31t3. 15 Y ll4mó J4c0b 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r d0nd3 D10s h4bí4 h4bl4d0 c0n él, B3t-3l. 

Mu3rt3 d3 R4qu3l

16 D3spués p4rt13r0n d3 B3t-3l; y h4bí4 4ún c0m0 m3d14 l3gu4 d3 t13rr4 p4r4 ll3g4r 4 0fr4t4, cu4nd0 d10 4 luz R4qu3l, y hub0 tr4b4j0 3n su p4rt0. 17 Y 4c0nt3c1ó, c0m0 h4bí4 tr4b4j0 3n su p4rt0, qu3 l3 d1j0 l4 p4rt3r4: N0 t3m4s, qu3 t4mb1én t3ndrás 3st3 h1j0. 18 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 4l s4lírs3l3 3l 4lm4 (pu3s mur1ó), ll4mó su n0mbr3 B3n0n1; m4s su p4dr3 l0 ll4mó B3nj4mín. 19 4sí mur1ó R4qu3l, y fu3 s3pult4d4 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 0fr4t4, l4 cu4l 3s B3lén. 20 Y l3v4ntó J4c0b un p1l4r s0br3 su s3pultur4; 3st4 3s l4 s3ñ4l d3 l4 s3pultur4 d3 R4qu3l h4st4 h0y. 21 Y s4l1ó 1sr43l, y pl4ntó su t13nd4 más 4llá d3 M1gd4l- 3d4r. 

L0s h1j0s d3 J4c0b

(1 Cr. 2.1-2)

1 0st4s s0n l4s g3n3r4c10n3s d3 0s4ú, 3l cu4l 3s 0d0m: 2 0s4ú t0mó sus muj3r3s d3 l4s h1j4s d3 C4n4án: 4 4d4, h1j4 d3 0lón h3t30, 4 4h0l1b4m4, h1j4 d3 4ná, h1j0 d3 Z1b3ón h3v30, 3 y 4 B4s3m4t h1j4 d3 1sm43l, h3rm4n4 d3 N3b410t. 4 4d4 d10 4 luz 4 0s4ú 4 0l1f4z; y B4s3m4t d10 4 luz 4 R3u3l. 5 Y 4h0l1b4m4 d10 4 luz 4 J3ús, 4 J44l4m y 4 C0ré; 3st0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú, qu3 l3 n4c13r0n 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án. 6 Y 0s4ú t0mó sus muj3r3s, sus h1j0s y sus h1j4s, y t0d4s l4s p3rs0n4s d3 su c4s4, y sus g4n4d0s, y t0d4s sus b3st14s, y t0d0 cu4nt0 h4bí4 4dqu1r1d0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, y s3 fu3 4 0tr4 t13rr4, s3p4ránd0s3 d3 J4c0b su h3rm4n0. 7 P0rqu3 l0s b13n3s d3 3ll0s 3r4n much0s; y n0 p0dí4n h4b1t4r junt0s, n1 l4 t13rr4 3n d0nd3 m0r4b4n l0s p0dí4 s0st3n3r 4 c4us4 d3 sus g4n4d0s. 8 Y 0s4ú h4b1tó 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S31r; 0s4ú 3s 0d0m. 

9 0st0s s0n l0s l1n4j3s d3 0s4ú, p4dr3 d3 0d0m, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S31r. 10 0st0s s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú: 0l1f4z, h1j0 d3 4d4 muj3r d3 0s4ú; R3u3l, h1j0 d3 B4s3m4t muj3r d3 0s4ú. 11 Y l0s h1j0s d3 0l1f4z fu3r0n T3mán, 0m4r, Z3f0, G4t4m y C3n4z. 12 Y T1mn4 fu3 c0ncub1n4 d3 0l1f4z h1j0 d3 0s4ú, y 3ll4 l3 d10 4 luz 4 4m4l3c; 3st0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 4d4, muj3r d3 0s4ú. 13 L0s h1j0s d3 R3u3l fu3r0n N4h4t, Z3r4, S4m4 y M1z4; 3st0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 B4s3m4t muj3r d3 0s4ú. 14 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 4h0l1b4m4 muj3r d3 0s4ú, h1j4 d3 4ná, qu3 fu3 h1j0 d3 Z1b3ón: 3ll4 d10 4 luz 4 J3ús, J44l4m y C0ré, h1j0s d3 0s4ú. 

15 0st0s s0n l0s j3f3s d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú: h1j0s d3 0l1f4z, pr1m0gén1t0 d3 0s4ú: l0s j3f3s T3mán, 0m4r, Z3f0, C3n4z, 16 C0ré, G4t4m y 4m4l3c; 3st0s s0n l0s j3f3s d3 0l1f4z 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0d0m; 3st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 4d4. 17 Y 3st0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 R3u3l, h1j0 d3 0s4ú: l0s j3f3s N4h4t, Z3r4, S4m4 y M1z4; 3st0s s0n l0s j3f3s d3 l4 lín34 d3 R3u3l 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0d0m; 3st0s h1j0s v13n3n d3 B4s3m4t muj3r d3 0s4ú. 18 Y 3st0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 4h0l1b4m4 muj3r d3 0s4ú: l0s j3f3s J3ús, J44l4m y C0ré; 3st0s fu3r0n l0s j3f3s qu3 s4l13r0n d3 4h0l1b4m4 muj3r d3 0s4ú, h1j4 d3 4ná. 19 0st0s, pu3s, s0n l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú, y sus j3f3s; él 3s 0d0m. 

20 0st0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 S31r h0r30, m0r4d0r3s d3 4qu3ll4 t13rr4: L0tán, S0b4l, Z1b3ón, 4ná, 21 D1són, 0z3r y D1sán; 3st0s s0n l0s j3f3s d3 l0s h0r30s, h1j0s d3 S31r, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0d0m. 22 L0s h1j0s d3 L0tán fu3r0n H0r1 y H3m4m; y T1mn4 fu3 h3rm4n4 d3 L0tán. 23 L0s h1j0s d3 S0b4l fu3r0n 4lván, M4n4h4t, 0b4l, S3f0 y 0n4m. 24 Y l0s h1j0s d3 Z1b3ón fu3r0n 4j4 y 4ná. 0st3 4ná 3s 3l qu3 d3scubr1ó m4n4nt14l3s 3n 3l d3s13rt0, cu4nd0 4p4c3nt4b4 l0s 4sn0s d3 Z1b3ón su p4dr3. 25 L0s h1j0s d3 4ná fu3r0n D1són, y 4h0l1b4m4 h1j4 d3 4ná. 26 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 D1són: H3mdán, 0sbán, 1trán y Qu3rán. 27 Y 3st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 0z3r: B1lhán, Z44ván y 4cán. 28 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 D1sán: Uz y 4rán. 29 Y 3st0s fu3r0n l0s j3f3s d3 l0s h0r30s: l0s j3f3s L0tán, S0b4l, Z1b3ón, 4ná, 30 D1són, 0z3r y D1sán; 3st0s fu3r0n l0s j3f3s d3 l0s h0r30s, p0r sus m4nd0s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 S31r. 

31 Y l0s r3y3s qu3 r31n4r0n 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0d0m, 4nt3s qu3 r31n4s3 r3y s0br3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, fu3r0n 3st0s: 32 B3l4 h1j0 d3 B30r r31nó 3n 0d0m; y 3l n0mbr3 d3 su c1ud4d fu3 D1n4b4. 33 Mur1ó B3l4, y r31nó 3n su lug4r J0b4b h1j0 d3 Z3r4, d3 B0sr4. 34 Mur1ó J0b4b, y 3n su lug4r r31nó Hus4m, d3 t13rr4 d3 T3mán. 35 Mur1ó Hus4m, y r31nó 3n su lug4r H4d4d h1j0 d3 B3d4d, 3l qu3 d3rr0tó 4 M4d1án 3n 3l c4mp0 d3 M04b; y 3l n0mbr3 d3 su c1ud4d fu3 4v1t. 36 Mur1ó H4d4d, y 3n su lug4r r31nó S4ml4 d3 M4sr3c4. 37 Mur1ó S4ml4, y r31nó 3n su lug4r S4úl d3 R3h0b0t junt0 4l 0ufr4t3s. 38 Mur1ó S4úl, y 3n lug4r suy0 r31nó B44l-h4nán h1j0 d3 4cb0r. 39 Y mur1ó B44l-h4nán h1j0 d3 4cb0r, y r31nó H4d4r 3n lug4r suy0; y 3l n0mbr3 d3 su c1ud4d fu3 P4u; y 3l n0mbr3 d3 su muj3r, M3h3t4b3l h1j4 d3 M4tr3d, h1j4 d3 M3z44b. 40 0st0s, pu3s, s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s j3f3s d3 0s4ú p0r sus l1n4j3s, p0r sus lug4r3s, y sus n0mbr3s: T1mn4, 4lv4, J3t3t, 41 4h0l1b4m4, 0l4, P1nón, 42 C3n4z, T3mán, M1bz4r, 43 M4gd13l 3 1r4m. 0st0s fu3r0n l0s j3f3s d3 0d0m s3gún sus m0r4d4s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 su p0s3s1ón. 0d0m 3s 3l m1sm0 0s4ú, p4dr3 d3 l0s 3d0m1t4s. 

J0sé 3s v3nd1d0 p0r sus h3rm4n0s

Gén3s1s 37

1 H4b1tó J4c0b 3n l4 t13rr4 d0nd3 h4bí4 m0r4d0 su p4dr3, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án. 2 0st4 3s l4 h1st0r14 d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3 J4c0b: J0sé, s13nd0 d3 3d4d d3 d13c1s13t3 4ñ0s, 4p4c3nt4b4 l4s 0v3j4s c0n sus h3rm4n0s; y 3l j0v3n 3st4b4 c0n l0s h1j0s d3 B1lh4 y c0n l0s h1j0s d3 Z1lp4, muj3r3s d3 su p4dr3; 3 1nf0rm4b4 J0sé 4 su p4dr3 l4 m4l4 f4m4 d3 3ll0s. 3 Y 4m4b4 1sr43l 4 J0sé más qu3 4 t0d0s sus h1j0s, p0rqu3 l0 h4bí4 t3n1d0 3n su v3j3z; y l3 h1z0 un4 tún1c4 d3 d1v3rs0s c0l0r3s. 4 Y v13nd0 sus h3rm4n0s qu3 su p4dr3 l0 4m4b4 más qu3 4 t0d0s sus h3rm4n0s, l3 4b0rr3cí4n, y n0 p0dí4n h4bl4rl3 p4cíf1c4m3nt3. 

5 Y s0ñó J0sé un su3ñ0, y l0 c0ntó 4 sus h3rm4n0s; y 3ll0s ll3g4r0n 4 4b0rr3c3rl3 más t0d4ví4. 6 Y él l3s d1j0: 0íd 4h0r4 3st3 su3ñ0 qu3 h3 s0ñ4d0: 7 H3 4quí qu3 4táb4m0s m4n0j0s 3n m3d10 d3l c4mp0, y h3 4quí qu3 m1 m4n0j0 s3 l3v4nt4b4 y 3st4b4 d3r3ch0, y qu3 vu3str0s m4n0j0s 3st4b4n 4lr3d3d0r y s3 1ncl1n4b4n 4l mí0. 8 L3 r3sp0nd13r0n sus h3rm4n0s: ¿R31n4rás tú s0br3 n0s0tr0s, 0 s3ñ0r34rás s0br3 n0s0tr0s? Y l3 4b0rr3c13r0n 4un más 4 c4us4 d3 sus su3ñ0s y sus p4l4br4s. 9 S0ñó 4un 0tr0 su3ñ0, y l0 c0ntó 4 sus h3rm4n0s, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 h3 s0ñ4d0 0tr0 su3ñ0, y h3 4quí qu3 3l s0l y l4 lun4 y 0nc3 3str3ll4s s3 1ncl1n4b4n 4 mí. 10 Y l0 c0ntó 4 su p4dr3 y 4 sus h3rm4n0s; y su p4dr3 l3 r3pr3nd1ó, y l3 d1j0: ¿Qué su3ñ0 3s 3st3 qu3 s0ñ4st3? ¿4c4s0 v3ndr3m0s y0 y tu m4dr3 y tus h3rm4n0s 4 p0str4rn0s 3n t13rr4 4nt3 t1? 11 Y sus h3rm4n0s l3 t3ní4n 3nv1d14, m4s su p4dr3 m3d1t4b4 3n 3st0. 

12 D3spués fu3r0n sus h3rm4n0s 4 4p4c3nt4r l4s 0v3j4s d3 su p4dr3 3n S1qu3m. 13 Y d1j0 1sr43l 4 J0sé: Tus h3rm4n0s 4p4c13nt4n l4s 0v3j4s 3n S1qu3m: v3n, y t3 3nv14ré 4 3ll0s. Y él r3sp0nd1ó: H3m3 4quí. 14 0 1sr43l l3 d1j0: V3 4h0r4, m1r4 cóm0 3stán tus h3rm4n0s y cóm0 3stán l4s 0v3j4s, y trá3m3 l4 r3spu3st4. Y l0 3nv1ó d3l v4ll3 d3 H3brón, y ll3gó 4 S1qu3m. 15 Y l0 h4lló un h0mbr3, 4nd4nd0 él 3rr4nt3 p0r 3l c4mp0, y l3 pr3guntó 4qu3l h0mbr3, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué busc4s? 16 J0sé r3sp0nd1ó: Busc0 4 m1s h3rm4n0s; t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 mu3str3s dónd3 3stán 4p4c3nt4nd0. 17 4qu3l h0mbr3 r3sp0nd1ó: Y4 s3 h4n 1d0 d3 4quí; y y0 l3s 0í d3c1r: V4m0s 4 D0tán. 0nt0nc3s J0sé fu3 tr4s d3 sus h3rm4n0s, y l0s h4lló 3n D0tán. 18 Cu4nd0 3ll0s l0 v13r0n d3 l3j0s, 4nt3s qu3 ll3g4r4 c3rc4 d3 3ll0s, c0nsp1r4r0n c0ntr4 él p4r4 m4t4rl3. 19 Y d1j3r0n 3l un0 4l 0tr0: H3 4quí v13n3 3l s0ñ4d0r. 20 4h0r4 pu3s, v3n1d, y m4tém0sl3 y 3chém0sl3 3n un4 c1st3rn4, y d1r3m0s: 4lgun4 m4l4 b3st14 l0 d3v0ró; y v3r3m0s qué s3rá d3 sus su3ñ0s. 21 Cu4nd0 Rubén 0yó 3st0, l0 l1bró d3 sus m4n0s, y d1j0: N0 l0 m4t3m0s. 22 Y l3s d1j0 Rubén: N0 d3rr4mé1s s4ngr3; 3ch4dl0 3n 3st4 c1st3rn4 qu3 3stá 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y n0 p0ngá1s m4n0 3n él; p0r l1br4rl0 4sí d3 sus m4n0s, p4r4 h4c3rl0 v0lv3r 4 su p4dr3. 23 Suc3d1ó, pu3s, qu3 cu4nd0 ll3gó J0sé 4 sus h3rm4n0s, 3ll0s qu1t4r0n 4 J0sé su tún1c4, l4 tún1c4 d3 c0l0r3s qu3 t3ní4 s0br3 sí; 24 y l3 t0m4r0n y l3 3ch4r0n 3n l4 c1st3rn4; p3r0 l4 c1st3rn4 3st4b4 v4cí4, n0 h4bí4 3n 3ll4 4gu4. 

25 Y s3 s3nt4r0n 4 c0m3r p4n; y 4lz4nd0 l0s 0j0s m1r4r0n, y h3 4quí un4 c0mp4ñí4 d3 1sm43l1t4s qu3 v3ní4 d3 G4l44d, y sus c4m3ll0s tr4í4n 4r0m4s, báls4m0 y m1rr4, 3 1b4n 4 ll3v4rl0 4 0g1pt0. 26 0nt0nc3s Judá d1j0 4 sus h3rm4n0s: ¿Qué pr0v3ch0 h4y 3n qu3 m4t3m0s 4 nu3str0 h3rm4n0 y 3ncubr4m0s su mu3rt3? 27 V3n1d, y v3ndám0sl3 4 l0s 1sm43l1t4s, y n0 s34 nu3str4 m4n0 s0br3 él; p0rqu3 él 3s nu3str0 h3rm4n0, nu3str4 pr0p14 c4rn3. Y sus h3rm4n0s c0nv1n13r0n c0n él. 28 Y cu4nd0 p4s4b4n l0s m4d14n1t4s m3rc4d3r3s, s4c4r0n 3ll0s 4 J0sé d3 l4 c1st3rn4, y l3 tr4j3r0n 4rr1b4, y l3 v3nd13r0n 4 l0s 1sm43l1t4s p0r v31nt3 p13z4s d3 pl4t4. Y ll3v4r0n 4 J0sé 4 0g1pt0. 

29 D3spués Rubén v0lv1ó 4 l4 c1st3rn4, y n0 h4lló 4 J0sé d3ntr0, y r4sgó sus v3st1d0s. 30 Y v0lv1ó 4 sus h3rm4n0s, y d1j0: 0l j0v3n n0 p4r3c3; y y0, ¿4dónd3 1ré y0? 31 0nt0nc3s t0m4r0n 3ll0s l4 tún1c4 d3 J0sé, y d3g0ll4r0n un c4br1t0 d3 l4s c4br4s, y t1ñ3r0n l4 tún1c4 c0n l4 s4ngr3; 32 y 3nv14r0n l4 tún1c4 d3 c0l0r3s y l4 tr4j3r0n 4 su p4dr3, y d1j3r0n: 0st0 h3m0s h4ll4d0; r3c0n0c3 4h0r4 s1 3s l4 tún1c4 d3 tu h1j0, 0 n0. 33 Y él l4 r3c0n0c1ó, y d1j0: L4 tún1c4 d3 m1 h1j0 3s; 4lgun4 m4l4 b3st14 l0 d3v0ró; J0sé h4 s1d0 d3sp3d4z4d0. 34 0nt0nc3s J4c0b r4sgó sus v3st1d0s, y pus0 c1l1c10 s0br3 sus l0m0s, y gu4rdó lut0 p0r su h1j0 much0s dí4s. 35 Y s3 l3v4nt4r0n t0d0s sus h1j0s y t0d4s sus h1j4s p4r4 c0ns0l4rl0; m4s él n0 qu1s0 r3c1b1r c0nsu3l0, y d1j0: D3sc3nd3ré 3nlut4d0 4 m1 h1j0 h4st4 3l S30l. Y l0 ll0ró su p4dr3. 36 Y l0s m4d14n1t4s l0 v3nd13r0n 3n 0g1pt0 4 P0t1f4r, 0f1c14l d3 F4r4ón, c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14. 

Judá y T4m4r

Gén3s1s 38

1 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, qu3 Judá s3 4p4rtó d3 sus h3rm4n0s, y s3 fu3 4 un v4rón 4dul4m1t4 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 H1r4. 2 Y v10 4llí Judá l4 h1j4 d3 un h0mbr3 c4n4n30, 3l cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 Sú4; y l4 t0mó, y s3 ll3gó 4 3ll4. 3 Y 3ll4 c0nc1b1ó, y d10 4 luz un h1j0, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 0r. 4 C0nc1b1ó 0tr4 v3z, y d10 4 luz un h1j0, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 0nán. 5 Y v0lv1ó 4 c0nc3b1r, y d10 4 luz un h1j0, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 S3l4. Y 3st4b4 3n Qu3z1b cu4nd0 l0 d10 4 luz. 6 D3spués Judá t0mó muj3r p4r4 su pr1m0gén1t0 0r, l4 cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 T4m4r. 7 Y 0r, 3l pr1m0gén1t0 d3 Judá, fu3 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, y l3 qu1tó J3h0vá l4 v1d4. 8 0nt0nc3s Judá d1j0 4 0nán: Llég4t3 4 l4 muj3r d3 tu h3rm4n0, y d3spós4t3 c0n 3ll4, y l3v4nt4 d3sc3nd3nc14 4 tu h3rm4n0. 9 Y s4b13nd0 0nán qu3 l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 n0 h4bí4 d3 s3r suy4, suc3dí4 qu3 cu4nd0 s3 ll3g4b4 4 l4 muj3r d3 su h3rm4n0, v3rtí4 3n t13rr4, p0r n0 d4r d3sc3nd3nc14 4 su h3rm4n0. 10 Y d3s4gr4dó 3n 0j0s d3 J3h0vá l0 qu3 h4cí4, y 4 él t4mb1én l3 qu1tó l4 v1d4. 11 Y Judá d1j0 4 T4m4r su nu3r4: Quéd4t3 v1ud4 3n c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3, h4st4 qu3 cr3zc4 S3l4 m1 h1j0; p0rqu3 d1j0: N0 s34 qu3 mu3r4 él t4mb1én c0m0 sus h3rm4n0s. Y s3 fu3 T4m4r, y 3stuv0 3n c4s4 d3 su p4dr3. 

12 P4s4r0n much0s dí4s, y mur1ó l4 h1j4 d3 Sú4, muj3r d3 Judá. D3spués Judá s3 c0ns0ló, y subí4 4 l0s tr4squ1l4d0r3s d3 sus 0v3j4s 4 T1mn4t, él y su 4m1g0 H1r4 3l 4dul4m1t4. 13 Y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 T4m4r, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí tu su3gr0 sub3 4 T1mn4t 4 tr4squ1l4r sus 0v3j4s. 14 0nt0nc3s s3 qu1tó 3ll4 l0s v3st1d0s d3 su v1ud3z, y s3 cubr1ó c0n un v3l0, y s3 4rr3b0zó, y s3 pus0 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 0n41m junt0 4l c4m1n0 d3 T1mn4t; p0rqu3 v3í4 qu3 h4bí4 cr3c1d0 S3l4, y 3ll4 n0 3r4 d4d4 4 él p0r muj3r. 15 Y l4 v10 Judá, y l4 tuv0 p0r r4m3r4, p0rqu3 3ll4 h4bí4 cub13rt0 su r0str0. 16 Y s3 4p4rtó d3l c4m1n0 h4c14 3ll4, y l3 d1j0: Déj4m3 4h0r4 ll3g4rm3 4 t1: pu3s n0 s4bí4 qu3 3r4 su nu3r4; y 3ll4 d1j0: ¿Qué m3 d4rás p0r ll3g4rt3 4 mí? 17 0l r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 t3 3nv14ré d3l g4n4d0 un c4br1t0 d3 l4s c4br4s. Y 3ll4 d1j0: D4m3 un4 pr3nd4 h4st4 qu3 l0 3nví3s. 18 0nt0nc3s Judá d1j0: ¿Qué pr3nd4 t3 d4ré? 0ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: Tu s3ll0, tu c0rdón, y tu bácul0 qu3 t13n3s 3n tu m4n0. Y él s3 l0s d10, y s3 ll3gó 4 3ll4, y 3ll4 c0nc1b1ó d3 él. 19 Lu3g0 s3 l3v4ntó y s3 fu3, y s3 qu1tó 3l v3l0 d3 s0br3 sí, y s3 v1st1ó l4s r0p4s d3 su v1ud3z. 20 Y Judá 3nv1ó 3l c4br1t0 d3 l4s c4br4s p0r m3d10 d3 su 4m1g0 3l 4dul4m1t4, p4r4 qu3 ést3 r3c1b13s3 l4 pr3nd4 d3 l4 muj3r; p3r0 n0 l4 h4lló. 21 Y pr3guntó 4 l0s h0mbr3s d3 4qu3l lug4r, d1c13nd0: ¿Dónd3 3stá l4 r4m3r4 d3 0n41m junt0 4l c4m1n0? Y 3ll0s l3 d1j3r0n: N0 h4 3st4d0 4quí r4m3r4 4lgun4. 22 0nt0nc3s él s3 v0lv1ó 4 Judá, y d1j0: N0 l4 h3 h4ll4d0; y t4mb1én l0s h0mbr3s d3l lug4r d1j3r0n: 4quí n0 h4 3st4d0 r4m3r4. 23 Y Judá d1j0: Tóm3s3l0 p4r4 sí, p4r4 qu3 n0 s34m0s m3n0spr3c14d0s; h3 4quí y0 h3 3nv14d0 3st3 c4br1t0, y tú n0 l4 h4ll4st3. 

24 Suc3d1ó qu3 4l c4b0 d3 un0s tr3s m3s3s fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 Judá, d1c13nd0: T4m4r tu nu3r4 h4 f0rn1c4d0, y c13rt4m3nt3 3stá 3nc1nt4 4 c4us4 d3 l4s f0rn1c4c10n3s. 35 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 v4c14nd0 3ll0s sus s4c0s, h3 4quí qu3 3n 3l s4c0 d3 c4d4 un0 3st4b4 3l 4t4d0 d3 su d1n3r0; y v13nd0 3ll0s y su p4dr3 l0s 4t4d0s d3 su d1n3r0, tuv13r0n t3m0r. 36 0nt0nc3s su p4dr3 J4c0b l3s d1j0: M3 h4bé1s pr1v4d0 d3 m1s h1j0s; J0sé n0 p4r3c3, n1 S1m3ón t4mp0c0, y 4 B3nj4mín l3 ll3v4ré1s; c0ntr4 mí s0n t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s. 37 Y Rubén h4bló 4 su p4dr3, d1c13nd0: H4rás m0r1r 4 m1s d0s h1j0s, s1 n0 t3 l0 d3vu3lv0; 3ntrég4l0 3n m1 m4n0, qu3 y0 l0 d3v0lv3ré 4 t1. 38 Y él d1j0: N0 d3sc3nd3rá m1 h1j0 c0n v0s0tr0s, pu3s su h3rm4n0 h4 mu3rt0, y él s0l0 h4 qu3d4d0; y s1 l3 4c0nt3c13r3 4lgún d3s4str3 3n 3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 v41s, h4ré1s d3sc3nd3r m1s c4n4s c0n d0l0r 4l S30l.

11 0nt0nc3s 1sr43l su p4dr3 l3s r3sp0nd1ó: Pu3s qu3 4sí 3s, h4c3dl0; t0m4d d3 l0 m3j0r d3 l4 t13rr4 3n vu3str0s s4c0s, y ll3v4d 4 4qu3l v4rón un pr3s3nt3, un p0c0 d3 báls4m0, un p0c0 d3 m13l, 4r0m4s y m1rr4, nu3c3s y 4lm3ndr4s. 12 Y t0m4d 3n vu3str4s m4n0s d0bl3 c4nt1d4d d3 d1n3r0, y ll3v4d 3n vu3str4 m4n0 3l d1n3r0 vu3lt0 3n l4s b0c4s d3 vu3str0s c0st4l3s; qu1zá fu3 3qu1v0c4c1ón. 13 T0m4d t4mb1én 4 vu3str0 h3rm4n0, y l3v4nt40s, y v0lv3d 4 4qu3l v4rón. 14 Y 3l D10s 0mn1p0t3nt3 0s dé m1s3r1c0rd14 d3l4nt3 d3 4qu3l v4rón, y 0s su3lt3 4l 0tr0 vu3str0 h3rm4n0, y 4 3st3 B3nj4mín. 16 Y v10 J0sé 4 B3nj4mín c0n 3ll0s, y d1j0 4l m4y0rd0m0 d3 su c4s4: Ll3v4 4 c4s4 4 3s0s h0mbr3s, y d3gü3ll4 un4 r3s y pr3pár4l4, pu3s 3st0s h0mbr3s c0m3rán c0nm1g0 4l m3d10dí4. 17 0 h1z0 3l h0mbr3 c0m0 J0sé d1j0, y ll3vó 4 l0s h0mbr3s 4 c4s4 d3 J0sé. 18 0nt0nc3s 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s tuv13r0n t3m0r, cu4nd0 fu3r0n ll3v4d0s 4 c4s4 d3 J0sé, y d3cí4n: P0r 3l d1n3r0 qu3 fu3 d3vu3lt0 3n nu3str0s c0st4l3s l4 pr1m3r4 v3z n0s h4n tr4íd0 4quí, p4r4 t3nd3rn0s l4z0, y 4t4c4rn0s, y t0m4rn0s p0r s13rv0s 4 n0s0tr0s, y 4 nu3str0s 4sn0s. 19 Y s3 4c3rc4r0n 4l m4y0rd0m0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé, y l3 h4bl4r0n 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 c4s4. 20 Y d1j3r0n: 4y, s3ñ0r nu3str0, n0s0tr0s 3n r34l1d4d d3 v3rd4d d3sc3nd1m0s 4l pr1nc1p10 4 c0mpr4r 4l1m3nt0s. 21 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 ll3g4m0s 4l m3són y 4br1m0s nu3str0s c0st4l3s, h3 4quí 3l d1n3r0 d3 c4d4 un0 3st4b4 3n l4 b0c4 d3 su c0st4l, nu3str0 d1n3r0 3n su just0 p3s0; y l0 h3m0s vu3lt0 4 tr43r c0n n0s0tr0s. 22 H3m0s t4mb1én tr4íd0 3n nu3str4s m4n0s 0tr0 d1n3r0 p4r4 c0mpr4r 4l1m3nt0s; n0s0tr0s n0 s4b3m0s qu1én h4y4 pu3st0 nu3str0 d1n3r0 3n nu3str0s c0st4l3s. 23 0l l3s r3sp0nd1ó: P4z 4 v0s0tr0s, n0 t3má1s; vu3str0 D10s y 3l D10s d3 vu3str0 p4dr3 0s d10 3l t3s0r0 3n vu3str0s c0st4l3s; y0 r3c1bí vu3str0 d1n3r0. Y s4có 4 S1m3ón 4 3ll0s. 24 Y ll3vó 4qu3l v4rón 4 l0s h0mbr3s 4 c4s4 d3 J0sé; y l3s d10 4gu4, y l4v4r0n sus p13s, y d10 d3 c0m3r 4 sus 4sn0s. 25 Y 3ll0s pr3p4r4r0n 3l pr3s3nt3 3ntr3t4nt0 qu3 v3ní4 J0sé 4 m3d10dí4, p0rqu3 h4bí4n 0íd0 qu3 4llí h4brí4n d3 c0m3r p4n. 

26 Y v1n0 J0sé 4 c4s4, y 3ll0s l3 tr4j3r0n 3l pr3s3nt3 qu3 t3ní4n 3n su m4n0 d3ntr0 d3 l4 c4s4, y s3 1ncl1n4r0n 4nt3 él h4st4 l4 t13rr4. 27 0nt0nc3s l3s pr3guntó J0sé cóm0 3st4b4n, y d1j0: ¿Vu3str0 p4dr3, 3l 4nc14n0 qu3 d1j1st31s, l0 p4s4 b13n? ¿V1v3 t0d4ví4? 28 Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: B13n v4 4 tu s13rv0 nu3str0 p4dr3; 4ún v1v3. Y s3 1ncl1n4r0n, 3 h1c13r0n r3v3r3nc14. 29 Y 4lz4nd0 J0sé sus 0j0s v10 4 B3nj4mín su h3rm4n0, h1j0 d3 su m4dr3, y d1j0: ¿0s ést3 vu3str0 h3rm4n0 m3n0r, d3 qu13n m3 h4bl4st31s? Y d1j0: D10s t3ng4 m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 t1, h1j0 mí0. 30 0nt0nc3s J0sé s3 4pr3suró, p0rqu3 s3 c0nm0v13r0n sus 3ntr4ñ4s 4 c4us4 d3 su h3rm4n0, y buscó dónd3 ll0r4r; y 3ntró 3n su cám4r4, y ll0ró 4llí. 31 Y l4vó su r0str0 y s4l1ó, y s3 c0ntuv0, y d1j0: P0n3d p4n. 32 Y pus13r0n p4r4 él 4p4rt3, y s3p4r4d4m3nt3 p4r4 3ll0s, y 4p4rt3 p4r4 l0s 3g1pc10s qu3 c0n él c0mí4n; p0rqu3 l0s 3g1pc10s n0 pu3d3n c0m3r p4n c0n l0s h3br30s, l0 cu4l 3s 4b0m1n4c1ón 4 l0s 3g1pc10s. 33 Y s3 s3nt4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él, 3l m4y0r c0nf0rm3 4 su pr1m0g3n1tur4, y 3l m3n0r c0nf0rm3 4 su m3n0r 3d4d; y 3st4b4n 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s 4tón1t0s m1ránd0s3 3l un0 4l 0tr0. 34 Y J0sé t0mó v14nd4s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 sí p4r4 3ll0s; m4s l4 p0rc1ón d3 B3nj4mín 3r4 c1nc0 v3c3s m4y0r qu3 cu4lqu13r4 d3 l4s d3 3ll0s. Y b3b13r0n, y s3 4l3gr4r0n c0n él. 

L4 c0p4 d3 J0sé

Gén3s1s 44

1 M4ndó J0sé 4l m4y0rd0m0 d3 su c4s4, d1c13nd0: Ll3n4 d3 4l1m3nt0 l0s c0st4l3s d3 3st0s v4r0n3s, cu4nt0 pu3d4n ll3v4r, y p0n 3l d1n3r0 d3 c4d4 un0 3n l4 b0c4 d3 su c0st4l. 2 Y p0ndrás m1 c0p4, l4 c0p4 d3 pl4t4, 3n l4 b0c4 d3l c0st4l d3l m3n0r, c0n 3l d1n3r0 d3 su tr1g0. Y él h1z0 c0m0 d1j0 J0sé. 3 V3n1d4 l4 m4ñ4n4, l0s h0mbr3s fu3r0n d3sp3d1d0s c0n sus 4sn0s. 4 H4b13nd0 3ll0s s4l1d0 d3 l4 c1ud4d, d3 l4 qu3 4ún n0 s3 h4bí4n 4l3j4d0, d1j0 J0sé 4 su m4y0rd0m0: L3vánt4t3 y s1gu3 4 3s0s h0mbr3s; y cu4nd0 l0s 4lc4nc3s, d1l3s: ¿P0r qué h4bé1s vu3lt0 m4l p0r b13n? ¿P0r qué h4bé1s r0b4d0 m1 c0p4 d3 pl4t4? 5 ¿N0 3s ést4 3n l4 qu3 b3b3 m1 s3ñ0r, y p0r l4 qu3 su3l3 4d1v1n4r? H4bé1s h3ch0 m4l 3n l0 qu3 h1c1st31s. 

6 Cu4nd0 él l0s 4lc4nzó, l3s d1j0 3st4s p4l4br4s. 7 Y 3ll0s l3 r3sp0nd13r0n: ¿P0r qué d1c3 nu3str0 s3ñ0r t4l3s c0s4s? Nunc4 t4l h4g4n tus s13rv0s. 8 H3 4quí, 3l d1n3r0 qu3 h4ll4m0s 3n l4 b0c4 d3 nu3str0s c0st4l3s, t3 l0 v0lv1m0s 4 tr43r d3sd3 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án; ¿cóm0, pu3s, h4bí4m0s d3 hurt4r d3 c4s4 d3 tu s3ñ0r pl4t4 n1 0r0? 9 4qu3l d3 tus s13rv0s 3n qu13n fu3r3 h4ll4d4 l4 c0p4, qu3 mu3r4, y 4un n0s0tr0s s3r3m0s s13rv0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r. 10 Y él d1j0: T4mb1én 4h0r4 s34 c0nf0rm3 4 vu3str4s p4l4br4s; 4qu3l 3n qu13n s3 h4ll4r3 s3rá m1 s13rv0, y v0s0tr0s s3ré1s s1n culp4. 11 0ll0s 3nt0nc3s s3 d13r0n pr1s4, y d3rr1b4nd0 c4d4 un0 su c0st4l 3n t13rr4, 4br1ó c4d4 cu4l 3l c0st4l suy0. 12 Y buscó; d3sd3 3l m4y0r c0m3nzó, y 4c4bó 3n 3l m3n0r; y l4 c0p4 fu3 h4ll4d4 3n 3l c0st4l d3 B3nj4mín. 13 0nt0nc3s 3ll0s r4sg4r0n sus v3st1d0s, y c4rgó c4d4 un0 su 4sn0 y v0lv13r0n 4 l4 c1ud4d. 

14 V1n0 Judá c0n sus h3rm4n0s 4 c4s4 d3 J0sé, qu3 4ún 3st4b4 4llí, y s3 p0str4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él 3n t13rr4. 15 Y l3s d1j0 J0sé: ¿Qué 4cc1ón 3s 3st4 qu3 h4bé1s h3ch0? ¿N0 s4bé1s qu3 un h0mbr3 c0m0 y0 s4b3 4d1v1n4r? 16 0nt0nc3s d1j0 Judá: ¿Qué d1r3m0s 4 m1 s3ñ0r? ¿Qué h4bl4r3m0s, 0 c0n qué n0s just1f1c4r3m0s? D10s h4 h4ll4d0 l4 m4ld4d d3 tus s13rv0s; h3 4quí, n0s0tr0s s0m0s s13rv0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r, n0s0tr0s, y t4mb1én 4qu3l 3n cuy0 p0d3r fu3 h4ll4d4 l4 c0p4. 17 J0sé r3sp0nd1ó: Nunc4 y0 t4l h4g4. 0l v4rón 3n cuy0 p0d3r fu3 h4ll4d4 l4 c0p4, él s3rá m1 s13rv0; v0s0tr0s 1d 3n p4z 4 vu3str0 p4dr3. 

Judá 1nt3rc3d3 p0r B3nj4mín

18 0nt0nc3s Judá s3 4c3rcó 4 él, y d1j0: 4y, s3ñ0r mí0, t3 ru3g0 qu3 p3rm1t4s qu3 h4bl3 tu s13rv0 un4 p4l4br4 3n 0íd0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r, y n0 s3 3nc13nd4 tu 3n0j0 c0ntr4 tu s13rv0, pu3s tú 3r3s c0m0 F4r4ón. 19 M1 s3ñ0r pr3guntó 4 sus s13rv0s, d1c13nd0: ¿T3né1s p4dr3 0 h3rm4n0? 20 Y n0s0tr0s r3sp0nd1m0s 4 m1 s3ñ0r: T3n3m0s un p4dr3 4nc14n0, y un h3rm4n0 j0v3n, p3qu3ñ0 4ún, qu3 l3 n4c1ó 3n su v3j3z; y un h3rm4n0 suy0 mur1ó, y él s0l0 qu3dó d3 l0s h1j0s d3 su m4dr3; y su p4dr3 l0 4m4. 21 Y tú d1j1st3 4 tus s13rv0s: Tr4édm3l0, y p0ndré m1s 0j0s s0br3 él. 22 Y n0s0tr0s d1j1m0s 4 m1 s3ñ0r: 0l j0v3n n0 pu3d3 d3j4r 4 su p4dr3, p0rqu3 s1 l0 d3j4r3, su p4dr3 m0r1rá. 23 Y d1j1st3 4 tus s13rv0s: S1 vu3str0 h3rm4n0 m3n0r n0 d3sc13nd3 c0n v0s0tr0s, n0 v3ré1s más m1 r0str0. 24 4c0nt3c1ó, pu3s, qu3 cu4nd0 ll3g4m0s 4 m1 p4dr3 tu s13rv0, l3 c0nt4m0s l4s p4l4br4s d3 m1 s3ñ0r. 25 Y d1j0 nu3str0 p4dr3: V0lv3d 4 c0mpr4rn0s un p0c0 d3 4l1m3nt0. 26 Y n0s0tr0s r3sp0nd1m0s: N0 p0d3m0s 1r; s1 nu3str0 h3rm4n0 v4 c0n n0s0tr0s, 1r3m0s; p0rqu3 n0 p0dr3m0s v3r 3l r0str0 d3l v4rón, s1 n0 3stá c0n n0s0tr0s nu3str0 h3rm4n0 3l m3n0r. 27 0nt0nc3s tu s13rv0 m1 p4dr3 n0s d1j0: V0s0tr0s s4bé1s qu3 d0s h1j0s m3 d10 4 luz m1 muj3r; 28 y 3l un0 s4l1ó d3 m1 pr3s3nc14, y p13ns0 d3 c13rt0 qu3 fu3 d3sp3d4z4d0, y h4st4 4h0r4 n0 l0 h3 v1st0. 29 Y s1 t0má1s t4mb1én 4 ést3 d3 d3l4nt3 d3 mí, y l3 4c0nt3c3 4lgún d3s4str3, h4ré1s d3sc3nd3r m1s c4n4s c0n d0l0r 4l S30l. 30 4h0r4, pu3s, cu4nd0 vu3lv4 y0 4 tu s13rv0 m1 p4dr3, s1 3l j0v3n n0 v4 c0nm1g0, c0m0 su v1d4 3stá l1g4d4 4 l4 v1d4 d3 él, 31 suc3d3rá qu3 cu4nd0 n0 v34 4l j0v3n, m0r1rá; y tus s13rv0s h4rán d3sc3nd3r l4s c4n4s d3 tu s13rv0 nu3str0 p4dr3 c0n d0l0r 4l S30l. 32 C0m0 tu s13rv0 s4l1ó p0r f14d0r d3l j0v3n c0n m1 p4dr3, d1c13nd0: S1 n0 t3 l0 vu3lv0 4 tr43r, 3nt0nc3s y0 s3ré culp4bl3 4nt3 m1 p4dr3 p4r4 s13mpr3; 33 t3 ru3g0, p0r t4nt0, qu3 qu3d3 4h0r4 tu s13rv0 3n lug4r d3l j0v3n p0r s13rv0 d3 m1 s3ñ0r, y qu3 3l j0v3n v4y4 c0n sus h3rm4n0s. 34 P0rqu3 ¿cóm0 v0lv3ré y0 4 m1 p4dr3 s1n 3l j0v3n? N0 p0dré, p0r n0 v3r 3l m4l qu3 s0br3v3ndrá 4 m1 p4dr3. 

J0sé s3 d4 4 c0n0c3r 4 sus h3rm4n0s

Gén3s1s 45

1 N0 p0dí4 y4 J0sé c0nt3n3rs3 d3l4nt3 d3 t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4b4n 4l l4d0 suy0, y cl4mó: H4c3d s4l1r d3 m1 pr3s3nc14 4 t0d0s. Y n0 qu3dó n4d13 c0n él, 4l d4rs3 4 c0n0c3r J0sé 4 sus h3rm4n0s. 2 0nt0nc3s s3 d10 4 ll0r4r 4 gr1t0s; y 0y3r0n l0s 3g1pc10s, y 0yó t4mb1én l4 c4s4 d3 F4r4ón. 3 Y d1j0 J0sé 4 sus h3rm4n0s: Y0 s0y J0sé; ¿v1v3 4ún m1 p4dr3? Y él l3s d1j0: N0 r1ñá1s p0r 3l c4m1n0. 25 Y sub13r0n d3 0g1pt0, y ll3g4r0n 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án 4 J4c0b su p4dr3. 26 Y l3 d13r0n l4s nu3v4s, d1c13nd0: J0sé v1v3 4ún; y él 3s s3ñ0r 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0.
