J4c0b y su f4m1l14 3n 0g1pt0

Gén3s1s 46

1 S4l1ó 1sr43l c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4, y v1n0 4 B33rs3b4, y 0fr3c1ó s4cr1f1c10s 4l D10s d3 su p4dr3 1s44c. 2 Y h4bló D10s 4 1sr43l 3n v1s10n3s d3 n0ch3, y d1j0: J4c0b, J4c0b. Y él r3sp0nd1ó: H3m3 4quí. 3 Y d1j0: Y0 s0y D10s, 3l D10s d3 tu p4dr3; n0 t3m4s d3 d3sc3nd3r 4 0g1pt0, p0rqu3 4llí y0 h4ré d3 t1 un4 gr4n n4c1ón. 4 Y0 d3sc3nd3ré c0nt1g0 4 0g1pt0, y y0 t4mb1én t3 h4ré v0lv3r; y l4 m4n0 d3 J0sé c3rr4rá tus 0j0s. 5 Y s3 l3v4ntó J4c0b d3 B33rs3b4; y t0m4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 su p4dr3 J4c0b, y 4 sus n1ñ0s, y 4 sus muj3r3s, 3n l0s c4rr0s qu3 F4r4ón h4bí4 3nv14d0 p4r4 ll3v4rl0. 6 Y t0m4r0n sus g4n4d0s, y sus b13n3s qu3 h4bí4n 4dqu1r1d0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, y v1n13r0n 4 0g1pt0, J4c0b y t0d4 su d3sc3nd3nc14 c0ns1g0; 7 sus h1j0s, y l0s h1j0s d3 sus h1j0s c0ns1g0; sus h1j4s, y l4s h1j4s d3 sus h1j0s, y 4 t0d4 su d3sc3nd3nc14 tr4j0 c0ns1g0 4 0g1pt0. 

8 Y 3st0s s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, qu3 3ntr4r0n 3n 0g1pt0, J4c0b y sus h1j0s: Rubén, 3l pr1m0gén1t0 d3 J4c0b. 9 Y l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén: H4n0c, F4lú, H3zrón y C4rm1. 10 L0s h1j0s d3 S1m3ón: J3mu3l, J4mín, 0h4d, J4quín, Z0h4r, y S4úl h1j0 d3 l4 c4n4n34. 11 L0s h1j0s d3 L3ví: G3rsón, C04t y M3r4r1. 12 L0s h1j0s d3 Judá: 0r, 0nán, S3l4, F4r3s y Z4r4; m4s 0r y 0nán mur13r0n 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án. Y l0s h1j0s d3 F4r3s fu3r0n H3zrón y H4mul. 13 L0s h1j0s d3 1s4c4r: T0l4, Fú4, J0b y S1mrón. 14 L0s h1j0s d3 Z4bulón: S3r3d, 0lón y J4hl33l. 15 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 L34, l0s qu3 d10 4 luz 4 J4c0b 3n P4d4n-4r4m, y 4d3más su h1j4 D1n4; tr31nt4 y tr3s l4s p3rs0n4s t0d4s d3 sus h1j0s 3 h1j4s. 16 L0s h1j0s d3 G4d: Z1f1ón, H4gu1, 0zbón, Sun1, 0r1, 4r0d1 y 4r3l1. 17 Y l0s h1j0s d3 4s3r: 1mn4, 1sú4, 1sú1, B3rí4, y S3r4 h3rm4n4 d3 3ll0s. L0s h1j0s d3 B3rí4: H3b3r y M4lqu13l. 18 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 Z1lp4, l4 qu3 L4bán d10 4 su h1j4 L34, y d10 4 luz ést0s 4 J4c0b; p0r t0d4s d13c1sé1s p3rs0n4s. 19 L0s h1j0s d3 R4qu3l, muj3r d3 J4c0b: J0sé y B3nj4mín. 20 Y n4c13r0n 4 J0sé 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 M4n4sés y 0fr4ín, l0s qu3 l3 d10 4 luz 4s3n4t, h1j4 d3 P0t1f3r4 s4c3rd0t3 d3 0n. 21 L0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín fu3r0n B3l4, B3qu3r, 4sb3l, G3r4, N44mán, 0h1, R0s, Mup1m, Hup1m y 4rd. 22 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 R4qu3l, qu3 n4c13r0n 4 J4c0b; p0r t0d4s c4t0rc3 p3rs0n4s. 23 L0s h1j0s d3 D4n: Hus1m. 24 L0s h1j0s d3 N3ft4lí: J4hz33l, Gun1, J3z3r y S1l3m. 25 0st0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 B1lh4, l4 qu3 d10 L4bán 4 R4qu3l su h1j4, y d10 4 luz ést0s 4 J4c0b; p0r t0d4s s13t3 p3rs0n4s. 26 T0d4s l4s p3rs0n4s qu3 v1n13r0n c0n J4c0b 4 0g1pt0, pr0c3d3nt3s d3 sus l0m0s, s1n l4s muj3r3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 J4c0b, t0d4s l4s p3rs0n4s fu3r0n s3s3nt4 y s31s. 27 Y l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé, qu3 l3 n4c13r0n 3n 0g1pt0, d0s p3rs0n4s. T0d4s l4s p3rs0n4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J4c0b, qu3 3ntr4r0n 3n 0g1pt0, fu3r0n s3t3nt4. 

28 Y 3nv1ó J4c0b 4 Judá d3l4nt3 d3 sí 4 J0sé, p4r4 qu3 l3 v1n13s3 4 v3r 3n G0sén; y ll3g4r0n 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén. 29 Y J0sé unc1ó su c4rr0 y v1n0 4 r3c1b1r 4 1sr43l su p4dr3 3n G0sén; y s3 m4n1f3stó 4 él, y s3 3chó s0br3 su cu3ll0, y ll0ró s0br3 su cu3ll0 l4rg4m3nt3. 30 0nt0nc3s 1sr43l d1j0 4 J0sé: Mu3r4 y0 4h0r4, y4 qu3 h3 v1st0 tu r0str0, y sé qu3 4ún v1v3s. 31 Y J0sé d1j0 4 sus h3rm4n0s, y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3: Sub1ré y l0 h4ré s4b3r 4 F4r4ón, y l3 d1ré: M1s h3rm4n0s y l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3, qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, h4n v3n1d0 4 mí. 32 Y l0s h0mbr3s s0n p4st0r3s d3 0v3j4s, p0rqu3 s0n h0mbr3s g4n4d3r0s; y h4n tr4íd0 sus 0v3j4s y sus v4c4s, y t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4n. 33 Y cu4nd0 F4r4ón 0s ll4m4r3 y d1j3r3: ¿Cuál 3s vu3str0 0f1c10? 34 3nt0nc3s d1ré1s: H0mbr3s d3 g4n4d3rí4 h4n s1d0 tus s13rv0s d3sd3 nu3str4 juv3ntud h4st4 4h0r4, n0s0tr0s y nu3str0s p4dr3s; 4 f1n d3 qu3 m0ré1s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén, p0rqu3 p4r4 l0s 3g1pc10s 3s 4b0m1n4c1ón t0d0 p4st0r d3 0v3j4s. 

Gén3s1s 47

1 V1n0 J0sé y l0 h1z0 s4b3r 4 F4r4ón, y d1j0: M1 p4dr3 y m1s h3rm4n0s, y sus 0v3j4s y sus v4c4s, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 t13n3n, h4n v3n1d0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, y h3 4quí 3stán 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén. 2 Y d3 l0s p0str3r0s d3 sus h3rm4n0s t0mó c1nc0 v4r0n3s, y l0s pr3s3ntó d3l4nt3 d3 F4r4ón. 3 Y F4r4ón d1j0 4 sus h3rm4n0s: ¿Cuál 3s vu3str0 0f1c10? Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n 4 F4r4ón: P4st0r3s d3 0v3j4s s0n tus s13rv0s, 4sí n0s0tr0s c0m0 nu3str0s p4dr3s. 4 D1j3r0n 4d3más 4 F4r4ón: P4r4 m0r4r 3n 3st4 t13rr4 h3m0s v3n1d0; p0rqu3 n0 h4y p4st0 p4r4 l4s 0v3j4s d3 tus s13rv0s, pu3s 3l h4mbr3 3s gr4v3 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án; p0r t4nt0, t3 r0g4m0s 4h0r4 qu3 p3rm1t4s qu3 h4b1t3n tus s13rv0s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén. 5 0nt0nc3s F4r4ón h4bló 4 J0sé, d1c13nd0: Tu p4dr3 y tus h3rm4n0s h4n v3n1d0 4 t1. 6 L4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 d3l4nt3 d3 t1 3stá; 3n l0 m3j0r d3 l4 t13rr4 h4z h4b1t4r 4 tu p4dr3 y 4 tus h3rm4n0s; h4b1t3n 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén; y s1 3nt13nd3s qu3 h4y 3ntr3 3ll0s h0mbr3s c4p4c3s, p0nl0s p0r m4y0r4l3s d3l g4n4d0 mí0. 

7 T4mb1én J0sé 1ntr0duj0 4 J4c0b su p4dr3, y l0 pr3s3ntó d3l4nt3 d3 F4r4ón; y J4c0b b3nd1j0 4 F4r4ón. 8 Y d1j0 F4r4ón 4 J4c0b: ¿Cuánt0s s0n l0s dí4s d3 l0s 4ñ0s d3 tu v1d4? 9 Y J4c0b r3sp0nd1ó 4 F4r4ón: L0s dí4s d3 l0s 4ñ0s d3 m1 p3r3gr1n4c1ón s0n c13nt0 tr31nt4 4ñ0s; p0c0s y m4l0s h4n s1d0 l0s dí4s d3 l0s 4ñ0s d3 m1 v1d4, y n0 h4n ll3g4d0 4 l0s dí4s d3 l0s 4ñ0s d3 l4 v1d4 d3 m1s p4dr3s 3n l0s dí4s d3 su p3r3gr1n4c1ón. 10 Y J4c0b b3nd1j0 4 F4r4ón, y s4l1ó d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 F4r4ón. 11 4sí J0sé h1z0 h4b1t4r 4 su p4dr3 y 4 sus h3rm4n0s, y l3s d10 p0s3s1ón 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, 3n l0 m3j0r d3 l4 t13rr4, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 R4m3sés, c0m0 m4ndó F4r4ón. 12 Y 4l1m3nt4b4 J0sé 4 su p4dr3 y 4 sus h3rm4n0s, y 4 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3, c0n p4n, s3gún 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s h1j0s. 

13 N0 h4bí4 p4n 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4, y 3l h4mbr3 3r4 muy gr4v3, p0r l0 qu3 d3sf4ll3c1ó d3 h4mbr3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 y l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án. 14 Y r3c0g1ó J0sé t0d0 3l d1n3r0 qu3 h4bí4 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 y 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, p0r l0s 4l1m3nt0s qu3 d3 él c0mpr4b4n; y m3t1ó J0sé 3l d1n3r0 3n c4s4 d3 F4r4ón. 15 4c4b4d0 3l d1n3r0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 y d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, v1n0 t0d0 0g1pt0 4 J0sé, d1c13nd0: D4n0s p4n; ¿p0r qué m0r1r3m0s d3l4nt3 d3 t1, p0r h4b3rs3 4c4b4d0 3l d1n3r0? 16 Y J0sé d1j0: D4d vu3str0s g4n4d0s y y0 0s d4ré p0r vu3str0s g4n4d0s, s1 s3 h4 4c4b4d0 3l d1n3r0. 17 Y 3ll0s tr4j3r0n sus g4n4d0s 4 J0sé, y J0sé l3s d10 4l1m3nt0s p0r c4b4ll0s, y p0r 3l g4n4d0 d3 l4s 0v3j4s, y p0r 3l g4n4d0 d3 l4s v4c4s, y p0r 4sn0s; y l3s sust3ntó d3 p4n p0r t0d0s sus g4n4d0s 4qu3l 4ñ0. 18 4c4b4d0 4qu3l 4ñ0, v1n13r0n 4 él 3l s3gund0 4ñ0, y l3 d1j3r0n: N0 3ncubr1m0s 4 nu3str0 s3ñ0r qu3 3l d1n3r0 c13rt4m3nt3 s3 h4 4c4b4d0; t4mb1én 3l g4n4d0 3s y4 d3 nu3str0 s3ñ0r; n4d4 h4 qu3d4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 nu3str0 s3ñ0r s1n0 nu3str0s cu3rp0s y nu3str4 t13rr4. 19 ¿P0r qué m0r1r3m0s d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s, 4sí n0s0tr0s c0m0 nu3str4 t13rr4? Cómpr4n0s 4 n0s0tr0s y 4 nu3str4 t13rr4 p0r p4n, y s3r3m0s n0s0tr0s y nu3str4 t13rr4 s13rv0s d3 F4r4ón; y d4n0s s3m1ll4 p4r4 qu3 v1v4m0s y n0 mur4m0s, y n0 s34 4s0l4d4 l4 t13rr4. 

20 0nt0nc3s c0mpró J0sé t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 p4r4 F4r4ón; pu3s l0s 3g1pc10s v3nd13r0n c4d4 un0 sus t13rr4s, p0rqu3 s3 4gr4vó 3l h4mbr3 s0br3 3ll0s; y l4 t13rr4 v1n0 4 s3r d3 F4r4ón. 21 Y 4l pu3bl0 l0 h1z0 p4s4r 4 l4s c1ud4d3s, d3sd3 un 3xtr3m0 4l 0tr0 d3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 0g1pt0. 22 S0l4m3nt3 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s n0 c0mpró, p0r cu4nt0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s t3ní4n r4c1ón d3 F4r4ón, y 3ll0s c0mí4n l4 r4c1ón qu3 F4r4ón l3s d4b4; p0r 3s0 n0 v3nd13r0n su t13rr4. 23 Y J0sé d1j0 4l pu3bl0: H3 4quí 0s h3 c0mpr4d0 h0y, 4 v0s0tr0s y 4 vu3str4 t13rr4, p4r4 F4r4ón; v3d 4quí s3m1ll4, y s3mbr4ré1s l4 t13rr4. 24 D3 l0s frut0s d4ré1s 3l qu1nt0 4 F4r4ón, y l4s cu4tr0 p4rt3s s3rán vu3str4s p4r4 s3mbr4r l4s t13rr4s, y p4r4 vu3str0 m4nt3n1m13nt0, y d3 l0s qu3 3stán 3n vu3str4s c4s4s, y p4r4 qu3 c0m4n vu3str0s n1ñ0s. 25 Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: L4 v1d4 n0s h4s d4d0; h4ll3m0s gr4c14 3n 0j0s d3 nu3str0 s3ñ0r, y s34m0s s13rv0s d3 F4r4ón. 26 0nt0nc3s J0sé l0 pus0 p0r l3y h4st4 h0y s0br3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, s3ñ4l4nd0 p4r4 F4r4ón 3l qu1nt0, 3xc3pt0 sól0 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, qu3 n0 fu3 d3 F4r4ón. 

27 4sí h4b1tó 1sr43l 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén; y t0m4r0n p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4, y s3 4um3nt4r0n, y s3 mult1pl1c4r0n 3n gr4n m4n3r4. 28 Y v1v1ó J4c0b 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 d13c1s13t3 4ñ0s; y fu3r0n l0s dí4s d3 J4c0b, l0s 4ñ0s d3 su v1d4, c13nt0 cu4r3nt4 y s13t3 4ñ0s. 29 Y ll3g4r0n l0s dí4s d3 1sr43l p4r4 m0r1r, y ll4mó 4 J0sé su h1j0, y l3 d1j0: S1 h3 h4ll4d0 4h0r4 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, t3 ru3g0 qu3 p0ng4s tu m4n0 d3b4j0 d3 m1 musl0, y h4rás c0nm1g0 m1s3r1c0rd14 y v3rd4d. T3 ru3g0 qu3 n0 m3 3nt13rr3s 3n 0g1pt0. 30 M4s cu4nd0 du3rm4 c0n m1s p4dr3s, m3 ll3v4rás d3 0g1pt0 y m3 s3pult4rás 3n 3l s3pulcr0 d3 3ll0s. Y J0sé r3sp0nd1ó: H4ré c0m0 tú d1c3s. 31 0 1sr43l d1j0: Júr4m3l0. Y J0sé l3 juró. 0nt0nc3s 1sr43l s3 1ncl1nó s0br3 l4 c4b3c3r4 d3 l4 c4m4. 

J4c0b b3nd1c3 4 0fr4ín y 4 M4n4sés

Gén3s1s 48

1 Suc3d1ó d3spués d3 3st4s c0s4s qu3 d1j3r0n 4 J0sé: H3 4quí tu p4dr3 3stá 3nf3rm0. Y él t0mó c0ns1g0 4 sus d0s h1j0s, M4n4sés y 0fr4ín. 2 Y s3 l3 h1z0 s4b3r 4 J4c0b, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí tu h1j0 J0sé v13n3 4 t1. 0nt0nc3s s3 3sf0rzó 1sr43l, y s3 s3ntó s0br3 l4 c4m4, 3 y d1j0 4 J0sé: 0l D10s 0mn1p0t3nt3 m3 4p4r3c1ó 3n Luz 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, y m3 b3nd1j0, 4 y m3 d1j0: H3 4quí y0 t3 h4ré cr3c3r, y t3 mult1pl1c4ré, y t3 p0ndré p0r 3st1rp3 d3 n4c10n3s; y d4ré 3st4 t13rr4 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 d3spués d3 t1 p0r h3r3d4d p3rp3tu4. 5 Y 4h0r4 tus d0s h1j0s 0fr4ín y M4n4sés, qu3 t3 n4c13r0n 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, 4nt3s qu3 v1n13s3 4 t1 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, mí0s s0n; c0m0 Rubén y S1m3ón, s3rán mí0s. 6 Y l0s qu3 d3spués d3 3ll0s h4s 3ng3ndr4d0, s3rán tuy0s; p0r 3l n0mbr3 d3 sus h3rm4n0s s3rán ll4m4d0s 3n sus h3r3d4d3s. 7 P0rqu3 cu4nd0 y0 v3ní4 d3 P4d4n-4r4m, s3 m3 mur1ó R4qu3l 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 3n 3l c4m1n0, c0m0 m3d14 l3gu4 d3 t13rr4 v1n13nd0 4 0fr4t4; y l4 s3pulté 4llí 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 0fr4t4, qu3 3s B3lén. 

8 Y v10 1sr43l l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé, y d1j0: ¿Qu1én3s s0n ést0s? 9 Y r3sp0nd1ó J0sé 4 su p4dr3: S0n m1s h1j0s, qu3 D10s m3 h4 d4d0 4quí. Y él d1j0: 4cérc4l0s 4h0r4 4 mí, y l0s b3nd3c1ré. 10 Y l0s 0j0s d3 1sr43l 3st4b4n t4n 4gr4v4d0s p0r l4 v3j3z, qu3 n0 p0dí4 v3r. L3s h1z0, pu3s, 4c3rc4rs3 4 él, y él l3s b3só y l3s 4br4zó. 11 Y d1j0 1sr43l 4 J0sé: N0 p3ns4b4 y0 v3r tu r0str0, y h3 4quí D10s m3 h4 h3ch0 v3r t4mb1én 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14. 12 0nt0nc3s J0sé l0s s4có d3 3ntr3 sus r0d1ll4s, y s3 1ncl1nó 4 t13rr4. 13 Y l0s t0mó J0sé 4 4mb0s, 0fr4ín 4 su d3r3ch4, 4 l4 1zqu13rd4 d3 1sr43l, y M4n4sés 4 su 1zqu13rd4, 4 l4 d3r3ch4 d3 1sr43l; y l0s 4c3rcó 4 él. 14 0nt0nc3s 1sr43l 3xt3nd1ó su m4n0 d3r3ch4, y l4 pus0 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 0fr4ín, qu3 3r4 3l m3n0r, y su m4n0 1zqu13rd4 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 M4n4sés, c0l0c4nd0 4sí sus m4n0s 4dr3d3, 4unqu3 M4n4sés 3r4 3l pr1m0gén1t0. 15 Y b3nd1j0 4 J0sé, d1c13nd0: 0l D10s 3n cuy4 pr3s3nc14 4nduv13r0n m1s p4dr3s 4br4h4m 3 1s44c, 3l D10s qu3 m3 m4nt13n3 d3sd3 qu3 y0 s0y h4st4 3st3 dí4, 16 3l 4ng3l qu3 m3 l1b3rt4 d3 t0d0 m4l, b3nd1g4 4 3st0s jóv3n3s; y s34 p3rp3tu4d0 3n 3ll0s m1 n0mbr3, y 3l n0mbr3 d3 m1s p4dr3s 4br4h4m 3 1s44c, y mult1plíqu3ns3 3n gr4n m4n3r4 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4. 

17 P3r0 v13nd0 J0sé qu3 su p4dr3 p0ní4 l4 m4n0 d3r3ch4 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 0fr4ín, l3 c4usó 3st0 d1sgust0; y 4s1ó l4 m4n0 d3 su p4dr3, p4r4 c4mb14rl4 d3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 0fr4ín 4 l4 c4b3z4 d3 M4n4sés. 18 Y d1j0 J0sé 4 su p4dr3: N0 4sí, p4dr3 mí0, p0rqu3 ést3 3s 3l pr1m0gén1t0; p0n tu m4n0 d3r3ch4 s0br3 su c4b3z4. 19 M4s su p4dr3 n0 qu1s0, y d1j0: L0 sé, h1j0 mí0, l0 sé; t4mb1én él v3ndrá 4 s3r un pu3bl0, y s3rá t4mb1én 3ngr4nd3c1d0; p3r0 su h3rm4n0 m3n0r s3rá más gr4nd3 qu3 él, y su d3sc3nd3nc14 f0rm4rá mult1tud d3 n4c10n3s. 20 Y l0s b3nd1j0 4qu3l dí4, d1c13nd0: 0n t1 b3nd3c1rá 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: Hág4t3 D10s c0m0 4 0fr4ín y c0m0 4 M4n4sés. Gén3s1s 50

1 0nt0nc3s s3 3chó J0sé s0br3 3l r0str0 d3 su p4dr3, y ll0ró s0br3 él, y l0 b3só. 2 Y m4ndó J0sé 4 sus s13rv0s l0s méd1c0s qu3 3mb4ls4m4s3n 4 su p4dr3; y l0s méd1c0s 3mb4ls4m4r0n 4 1sr43l. 3 Y l3 cumpl13r0n cu4r3nt4 dí4s, p0rqu3 4sí cumplí4n l0s dí4s d3 l0s 3mb4ls4m4d0s, y l0 ll0r4r0n l0s 3g1pc10s s3t3nt4 dí4s. 

4 Y p4s4d0s l0s dí4s d3 su lut0, h4bló J0sé 4 l0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 F4r4ón, d1c13nd0: S1 h3 h4ll4d0 4h0r4 gr4c14 3n vu3str0s 0j0s, 0s ru3g0 qu3 h4blé1s 3n 0íd0s d3 F4r4ón, d1c13nd0: 5 M1 p4dr3 m3 h1z0 jur4r, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 v0y 4 m0r1r; 3n 3l s3pulcr0 qu3 c4vé p4r4 mí 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 4llí m3 s3pulturás; ru3g0, pu3s, qu3 v4y4 y0 4h0r4 y s3pult3 4 m1 p4dr3, y v0lv3ré. 6 Y F4r4ón d1j0: V3, y s3pult4 4 tu p4dr3, c0m0 él t3 h1z0 jur4r. 7 0nt0nc3s J0sé sub1ó p4r4 s3pult4r 4 su p4dr3; y sub13r0n c0n él t0d0s l0s s13rv0s d3 F4r4ón, l0s 4nc14n0s d3 su c4s4, y t0d0s l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, 8 y t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé, y sus h3rm4n0s, y l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3; s0l4m3nt3 d3j4r0n 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén sus n1ñ0s, y sus 0v3j4s y sus v4c4s. 9 Sub13r0n t4mb1én c0n él c4rr0s y g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0, y s3 h1z0 un 3scu4drón muy gr4nd3. 10 Y ll3g4r0n h4st4 l4 3r4 d3 4t4d, qu3 3stá 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, y 3nd3ch4r0n 4llí c0n gr4nd3 y muy tr1st3 l4m3nt4c1ón; y J0sé h1z0 4 su p4dr3 du3l0 p0r s13t3 dí4s. 11 Y v13nd0 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4, l0s c4n4n30s, 3l ll4nt0 3n l4 3r4 d3 4t4d, d1j3r0n: Ll4nt0 gr4nd3 3s 3st3 d3 l0s 3g1pc10s; p0r 3s0 fu3 ll4m4d0 su n0mbr3 4b3l-m1zr41m, qu3 3stá 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán. 12 H1c13r0n, pu3s, sus h1j0s c0n él s3gún l3s h4bí4 m4nd4d0; 13 pu3s l0 ll3v4r0n sus h1j0s 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n l4 cu3v4 d3l c4mp0 d3 M4cp3l4, l4 qu3 h4bí4 c0mpr4d0 4br4h4m c0n 3l m1sm0 c4mp0, p4r4 h3r3d4d d3 s3pultur4, d3 0frón 3l h3t30, 4l 0r13nt3 d3 M4mr3. 14 Y v0lv1ó J0sé 4 0g1pt0, él y sus h3rm4n0s, y t0d0s l0s qu3 sub13r0n c0n él 4 s3pult4r 4 su p4dr3, d3spués qu3 l0 hub0 s3pult4d0. 

Mu3rt3 d3 J0sé

15 V13nd0 l0s h3rm4n0s d3 J0sé qu3 su p4dr3 3r4 mu3rt0, d1j3r0n: Qu1zá n0s 4b0rr3c3rá J0sé, y n0s d4rá 3l p4g0 d3 t0d0 3l m4l qu3 l3 h1c1m0s. 16 Y 3nv14r0n 4 d3c1r 4 J0sé: Tu p4dr3 m4ndó 4nt3s d3 su mu3rt3, d1c13nd0: 17 4sí d1ré1s 4 J0sé: T3 ru3g0 qu3 p3rd0n3s 4h0r4 l4 m4ld4d d3 tus h3rm4n0s y su p3c4d0, p0rqu3 m4l t3 tr4t4r0n; p0r t4nt0, 4h0r4 t3 r0g4m0s qu3 p3rd0n3s l4 m4ld4d d3 l0s s13rv0s d3l D10s d3 tu p4dr3. Y J0sé ll0ró m13ntr4s h4bl4b4n. 18 V1n13r0n t4mb1én sus h3rm4n0s y s3 p0str4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él, y d1j3r0n: H3n0s 4quí p0r s13rv0s tuy0s. 19 Y l3s r3sp0nd1ó J0sé: N0 t3má1s; ¿4c4s0 3st0y y0 3n lug4r d3 D10s? 20 V0s0tr0s p3ns4st31s m4l c0ntr4 mí, m4s D10s l0 3nc4m1nó 4 b13n, p4r4 h4c3r l0 qu3 v3m0s h0y, p4r4 m4nt3n3r 3n v1d4 4 much0 pu3bl0. 21 4h0r4, pu3s, n0 t3ngá1s m13d0; y0 0s sust3nt4ré 4 v0s0tr0s y 4 vu3str0s h1j0s. 4sí l0s c0ns0ló, y l3s h4bló 4l c0r4zón. 

22 Y h4b1tó J0sé 3n 0g1pt0, él y l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3; y v1v1ó J0sé c13nt0 d13z 4ñ0s. 23 Y v10 J0sé l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín h4st4 l4 t3rc3r4 g3n3r4c1ón; t4mb1én l0s h1j0s d3 M4qu1r h1j0 d3 M4n4sés fu3r0n cr14d0s s0br3 l4s r0d1ll4s d3 J0sé. 24 Y J0sé d1j0 4 sus h3rm4n0s: Y0 v0y 4 m0r1r; m4s D10s c13rt4m3nt3 0s v1s1t4rá, y 0s h4rá sub1r d3 3st4 t13rr4 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 juró 4 4br4h4m, 4 1s44c y 4 J4c0b. 25 0 h1z0 jur4r J0sé 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: D10s c13rt4m3nt3 0s v1s1t4rá, y h4ré1s ll3v4r d3 4quí m1s hu3s0s. 26 Y mur1ó J0sé 4 l4 3d4d d3 c13nt0 d13z 4ñ0s; y l0 3mb4ls4m4r0n, y fu3 pu3st0 3n un 4t4úd 3n 0g1pt0.

1 0st0s s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 3ntr4r0n 3n 0g1pt0 c0n J4c0b; c4d4 un0 3ntró c0n su f4m1l14: 2 Rubén, S1m3ón, L3ví, Judá, 3 1s4c4r, Z4bulón, B3nj4mín, 4 D4n, N3ft4lí, G4d y 4s3r. 5 T0d4s l4s p3rs0n4s qu3 l3 n4c13r0n 4 J4c0b fu3r0n s3t3nt4. 8 0ntr3t4nt0, s3 l3v4ntó s0br3 0g1pt0 un nu3v0 r3y qu3 n0 c0n0cí4 4 J0sé; y d1j0 4 su pu3bl0: 9 H3 4quí, 3l pu3bl0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3s m4y0r y más fu3rt3 qu3 n0s0tr0s. 10 4h0r4, pu3s, s34m0s s4b10s p4r4 c0n él, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 mult1pl1qu3, y 4c0nt3zc4 qu3 v1n13nd0 gu3rr4, él t4mb1én s3 un4 4 nu3str0s 3n3m1g0s y p3l33 c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s, y s3 v4y4 d3 l4 t13rr4. 11 0nt0nc3s pus13r0n s0br3 3ll0s c0m1s4r10s d3 tr1but0s qu3 l0s m0l3st4s3n c0n sus c4rg4s; y 3d1f1c4r0n p4r4 F4r4ón l4s c1ud4d3s d3 4lm4c3n4j3, P1tón y R4m3sés. 12 P3r0 cu4nt0 más l0s 0pr1mí4n, t4nt0 más s3 mult1pl1c4b4n y cr3cí4n, d3 m4n3r4 qu3 l0s 3g1pc10s t3mí4n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 13 Y l0s 3g1pc10s h1c13r0n s3rv1r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0n dur3z4, 14 y 4m4rg4r0n su v1d4 c0n dur4 s3rv1dumbr3, 3n h4c3r b4rr0 y l4dr1ll0, y 3n t0d4 l4b0r d3l c4mp0 y 3n t0d0 su s3rv1c10, 4l cu4l l0s 0bl1g4b4n c0n r1g0r. 

15 Y h4bló 3l r3y d3 0g1pt0 4 l4s p4rt3r4s d3 l4s h3br34s, un4 d3 l4s cu4l3s s3 ll4m4b4 S1fr4, y 0tr4 Fú4, y l3s d1j0: 16 Cu4nd0 4s1stá1s 4 l4s h3br34s 3n sus p4rt0s, y v3á1s 3l s3x0, s1 3s h1j0, m4t4dl0; y s1 3s h1j4, 3nt0nc3s v1v4. 17 P3r0 l4s p4rt3r4s t3m13r0n 4 D10s, y n0 h1c13r0n c0m0 l3s m4ndó 3l r3y d3 0g1pt0, s1n0 qu3 pr3s3rv4r0n l4 v1d4 4 l0s n1ñ0s. 18 Y 3l r3y d3 0g1pt0 h1z0 ll4m4r 4 l4s p4rt3r4s y l3s d1j0: ¿P0r qué h4bé1s h3ch0 3st0, qu3 h4bé1s pr3s3rv4d0 l4 v1d4 4 l0s n1ñ0s? 19 Y l4s p4rt3r4s r3sp0nd13r0n 4 F4r4ón: P0rqu3 l4s muj3r3s h3br34s n0 s0n c0m0 l4s 3g1pc14s; pu3s s0n r0bust4s, y d4n 4 luz 4nt3s qu3 l4 p4rt3r4 v3ng4 4 3ll4s. 20 Y D10s h1z0 b13n 4 l4s p4rt3r4s; y 3l pu3bl0 s3 mult1pl1có y s3 f0rt4l3c1ó 3n gr4n m4n3r4. 21 Y p0r h4b3r l4s p4rt3r4s t3m1d0 4 D10s, él pr0sp3ró sus f4m1l14s. 22 0nt0nc3s F4r4ón m4ndó 4 t0d0 su pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: 0ch4d 4l rí0 4 t0d0 h1j0 qu3 n4zc4, y 4 t0d4 h1j4 pr3s3rv4d l4 v1d4.

M01sés huy3 d3 0g1pt0

Ll4m4m13nt0 d3 M01sés

M01sés vu3lv3 4 0g1pt0

21 J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés: 0xt13nd3 tu m4n0 h4c14 3l c13l0, p4r4 qu3 h4y4 t1n13bl4s s0br3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, t4nt0 qu3 cu4lqu13r4 l4s p4lp3. 22 Y 3xt3nd1ó M01sés su m4n0 h4c14 3l c13l0, y hub0 d3ns4s t1n13bl4s s0br3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, p0r tr3s dí4s. 23 N1ngun0 v10 4 su prój1m0, n1 n4d13 s3 l3v4ntó d3 su lug4r 3n tr3s dí4s; m4s t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l t3ní4n luz 3n sus h4b1t4c10n3s. 24 0nt0nc3s F4r4ón h1z0 ll4m4r 4 M01sés, y d1j0: 1d, s3rv1d 4 J3h0vá; s0l4m3nt3 qu3d3n vu3str4s 0v3j4s y vu3str4s v4c4s; v4y4n t4mb1én vu3str0s n1ñ0s c0n v0s0tr0s. 25 Y M01sés r3sp0nd1ó: Tú t4mb1én n0s d4rás s4cr1f1c10s y h0l0c4ust0s qu3 s4cr1f1qu3m0s p4r4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s. 26 Nu3str0s g4n4d0s 1rán t4mb1én c0n n0s0tr0s; n0 qu3d4rá n1 un4 p3zuñ4; p0rqu3 d3 3ll0s h3m0s d3 t0m4r p4r4 s3rv1r 4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, y n0 s4b3m0s c0n qué h3m0s d3 s3rv1r 4 J3h0vá h4st4 qu3 ll3gu3m0s 4llá. 27 P3r0 J3h0vá 3ndur3c1ó 3l c0r4zón d3 F4r4ón, y n0 qu1s0 d3j4rl0s 1r. 28 Y l3 d1j0 F4r4ón: R3tír4t3 d3 mí; guárd4t3 qu3 n0 v34s más m1 r0str0, p0rqu3 3n cu4lqu13r dí4 qu3 v13r3s m1 r0str0, m0r1rás. 29 Y M01sés r3sp0nd1ó: B13n h4s d1ch0; n0 v3ré más tu r0str0. 

4nunc14d4 l4 mu3rt3 d3 l0s pr1m0gén1t0s

37 P4rt13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 R4m3sés 4 Suc0t, c0m0 s31sc13nt0s m1l h0mbr3s d3 4 p13, s1n c0nt4r l0s n1ñ0s. 38 T4mb1én sub1ó c0n 3ll0s gr4nd3 mult1tud d3 t0d4 cl4s3 d3 g3nt3s, y 0v3j4s, y muchís1m0 g4n4d0. 39 Y c0c13r0n t0rt4s s1n l3v4dur4 d3 l4 m4s4 qu3 h4bí4n s4c4d0 d3 0g1pt0, pu3s n0 h4bí4 l3ud4d0, p0rqu3 4l 3ch4rl0s fu3r4 l0s 3g1pc10s, n0 h4bí4n t3n1d0 t13mp0 n1 p4r4 pr3p4r4rs3 c0m1d4.

3 Y M01sés d1j0 4l pu3bl0: T3n3d m3m0r14 d3 3st3 dí4, 3n 3l cu4l h4bé1s s4l1d0 d3 0g1pt0, d3 l4 c4s4 d3 s3rv1dumbr3, pu3s J3h0vá 0s h4 s4c4d0 d3 4quí c0n m4n0 fu3rt3; p0r t4nt0, n0 c0m3ré1s l3ud4d0. 4 V0s0tr0s s4lís h0y 3n 3l m3s d3 4b1b. 5 Y cu4nd0 J3h0vá t3 hub13r3 m3t1d0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3l c4n4n30, d3l h3t30, d3l 4m0rr30, d3l h3v30 y d3l j3bus30, l4 cu4l juró 4 tus p4dr3s qu3 t3 d4rí4, t13rr4 qu3 d3st1l4 l3ch3 y m13l, h4rás 3st4 c3l3br4c1ón 3n 3st3 m3s. 6 S13t3 dí4s c0m3rás p4n s1n l3ud4r, y 3l sépt1m0 dí4 s3rá f13st4 p4r4 J3h0vá. 7 P0r l0s s13t3 dí4s s3 c0m3rán l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4, y n0 s3 v3rá c0nt1g0 n4d4 l3ud4d0, n1 l3v4dur4, 3n t0d0 tu t3rr1t0r10. 8 Y l0 c0nt4rás 3n 4qu3l dí4 4 tu h1j0, d1c13nd0: S3 h4c3 3st0 c0n m0t1v0 d3 l0 qu3 J3h0vá h1z0 c0nm1g0 cu4nd0 m3 s4có d3 0g1pt0. 9 Y t3 s3rá c0m0 un4 s3ñ4l s0br3 tu m4n0, y c0m0 un m3m0r14l d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s, p4r4 qu3 l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá 3sté 3n tu b0c4; p0r cu4nt0 c0n m4n0 fu3rt3 t3 s4có J3h0vá d3 0g1pt0. 10 P0r t4nt0, tú gu4rd4rás 3st3 r1t0 3n su t13mp0 d3 4ñ0 3n 4ñ0.

(0x. 37.17-24)

31 H4rás 4d3más un c4nd3l3r0 d3 0r0 pur0; l4br4d0 4 m4rt1ll0 s3 h4rá 3l c4nd3l3r0; su p13, su c4ñ4, sus c0p4s, sus m4nz4n4s y sus fl0r3s, s3rán d3 l0 m1sm0. 32 Y s4ldrán s31s br4z0s d3 sus l4d0s; tr3s br4z0s d3l c4nd3l3r0 4 un l4d0, y tr3s br4z0s 4l 0tr0 l4d0. 33 Tr3s c0p4s 3n f0rm4 d3 fl0r d3 4lm3ndr0 3n un br4z0, un4 m4nz4n4 y un4 fl0r; y tr3s c0p4s 3n f0rm4 d3 fl0r d3 4lm3ndr0 3n 0tr0 br4z0, un4 m4nz4n4 y un4 fl0r; 4sí 3n l0s s31s br4z0s qu3 s4l3n d3l c4nd3l3r0; 34 y 3n l4 c4ñ4 c3ntr4l d3l c4nd3l3r0 cu4tr0 c0p4s 3n f0rm4 d3 fl0r d3 4lm3ndr0, sus m4nz4n4s y sus fl0r3s. 35 H4brá un4 m4nz4n4 d3b4j0 d3 d0s br4z0s d3l m1sm0, 0tr4 m4nz4n4 d3b4j0 d3 0tr0s d0s br4z0s d3l m1sm0, y 0tr4 m4nz4n4 d3b4j0 d3 l0s 0tr0s d0s br4z0s d3l m1sm0, 4sí p4r4 l0s s31s br4z0s qu3 s4l3n d3l c4nd3l3r0. 36 Sus m4nz4n4s y sus br4z0s s3rán d3 un4 p13z4, t0d0 3ll0 un4 p13z4 l4br4d4 4 m4rt1ll0, d3 0r0 pur0. 37 Y l3 h4rás s13t3 l4mp4r1ll4s, l4s cu4l3s 3nc3nd3rás p4r4 qu3 4lumbr3n h4c14 4d3l4nt3. 38 T4mb1én sus d3sp4b1l4d3r4s y sus pl4t1ll0s, d3 0r0 pur0. 39 D3 un t4l3nt0 d3 0r0 f1n0 l0 h4rás, c0n t0d0s 3st0s ut3ns1l10s. 40 M1r4 y h4zl0s c0nf0rm3 4l m0d3l0 qu3 t3 h4 s1d0 m0str4d0 3n 3l m0nt3.

1 H4rás ll3g4r d3l4nt3 d3 t1 4 44rón tu h3rm4n0, y 4 sus h1j0s c0ns1g0, d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 s34n m1s s4c3rd0t3s; 4 44rón y 4 N4d4b, 4b1ú, 0l34z4r 3 1t4m4r h1j0s d3 44rón. 2 Y h4rás v3st1dur4s s4gr4d4s 4 44rón tu h3rm4n0, p4r4 h0nr4 y h3rm0sur4. 3 Y tú h4bl4rás 4 t0d0s l0s s4b10s d3 c0r4zón, 4 qu13n3s y0 h3 ll3n4d0 d3 3spír1tu d3 s4b1durí4, p4r4 qu3 h4g4n l4s v3st1dur4s d3 44rón, p4r4 c0ns4gr4rl3 p4r4 qu3 s34 m1 s4c3rd0t3. 4 L4s v3st1dur4s qu3 h4rán s0n 3st4s: 3l p3ct0r4l, 3l 3f0d, 3l m4nt0, l4 tún1c4 b0rd4d4, l4 m1tr4 y 3l c1nturón. 5 T0m4rán 0r0, 4zul, púrpur4, c4rm3sí y l1n0 t0rc1d0, 6 y h4rán 3l 3f0d d3 0r0, 4zul, púrpur4, c4rm3sí y l1n0 t0rc1d0, d3 0br4 pr1m0r0s4. 7 T3ndrá d0s h0mbr3r4s qu3 s3 junt3n 4 sus d0s 3xtr3m0s, y 4sí s3 junt4rá. 8 Y su c1nt0 d3 0br4 pr1m0r0s4 qu3 3st4rá s0br3 él, s3rá d3 l4 m1sm4 0br4, p4rt3 d3l m1sm0; d3 0r0, 4zul, púrpur4, c4rm3sí y l1n0 t0rc1d0. 9 Y t0m4rás d0s p13dr4s d3 ón1c3, y gr4b4rás 3n 3ll4s l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; 10 s31s d3 sus n0mbr3s 3n un4 p13dr4, y l0s 0tr0s s31s n0mbr3s 3n l4 0tr4 p13dr4, c0nf0rm3 4l 0rd3n d3 n4c1m13nt0 d3 3ll0s. 11 D3 0br4 d3 gr4b4d0r 3n p13dr4, c0m0 gr4b4dur4s d3 s3ll0, h4rás gr4b4r l4s d0s p13dr4s c0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; l3s h4rás 4lr3d3d0r 3ng4st3s d3 0r0. 12 Y p0ndrás l4s d0s p13dr4s s0br3 l4s h0mbr3r4s d3l 3f0d, p4r4 p13dr4s m3m0r14l3s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; y 44rón ll3v4rá l0s n0mbr3s d3 3ll0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá s0br3 sus d0s h0mbr0s p0r m3m0r14l. 13 H4rás, pu3s, l0s 3ng4st3s d3 0r0, 14 y d0s c0rd0n3s d3 0r0 f1n0, l0s cu4l3s h4rás 3n f0rm4 d3 tr3nz4; y f1j4rás l0s c0rd0n3s d3 f0rm4 d3 tr3nz4 3n l0s 3ng4st3s. 

15 H4rás 4s1m1sm0 3l p3ct0r4l d3l ju1c10 d3 0br4 pr1m0r0s4, l0 h4rás c0nf0rm3 4 l4 0br4 d3l 3f0d, d3 0r0, 4zul, púrpur4, c4rm3sí y l1n0 t0rc1d0. 16 S3rá cu4dr4d0 y d0bl3, d3 un p4lm0 d3 l4rg0 y un p4lm0 d3 4nch0; 17 y l0 ll3n4rás d3 p3dr3rí4 3n cu4tr0 h1l3r4s d3 p13dr4s; un4 h1l3r4 d3 un4 p13dr4 sárd1c4, un t0p4c10 y un c4rbuncl0; 18 l4 s3gund4 h1l3r4, un4 3sm3r4ld4, un z4f1r0 y un d14m4nt3; 19 l4 t3rc3r4 h1l3r4, un j4c1nt0, un4 ág4t4 y un4 4m4t1st4; 20 l4 cu4rt4 h1l3r4, un b3r1l0, un ón1c3 y un j4sp3. T0d4s 3st4rán m0nt4d4s 3n 3ng4st3s d3 0r0. 21 Y l4s p13dr4s s3rán s3gún l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d0c3 s3gún sus n0mbr3s; c0m0 gr4b4dur4s d3 s3ll0 c4d4 un4 c0n su n0mbr3, s3rán s3gún l4s d0c3 tr1bus. 22 H4rás t4mb1én 3n 3l p3ct0r4l c0rd0n3s d3 h3chur4 d3 tr3nz4s d3 0r0 f1n0. 23 Y h4rás 3n 3l p3ct0r4l d0s 4n1ll0s d3 0r0, l0s cu4l3s p0ndrás 4 l0s d0s 3xtr3m0s d3l p3ct0r4l. 24 Y f1j4rás l0s d0s c0rd0n3s d3 0r0 3n l0s d0s 4n1ll0s 4 l0s d0s 3xtr3m0s d3l p3ct0r4l; 25 y p0ndrás l0s d0s 3xtr3m0s d3 l0s d0s c0rd0n3s s0br3 l0s d0s 3ng4st3s, y l0s f1j4rás 4 l4s h0mbr3r4s d3l 3f0d 3n su p4rt3 d3l4nt3r4. 26 H4rás t4mb1én d0s 4n1ll0s d3 0r0, l0s cu4l3s p0ndrás 4 l0s d0s 3xtr3m0s d3l p3ct0r4l, 3n su 0r1ll4 qu3 3stá 4l l4d0 d3l 3f0d h4c14 4d3ntr0. 27 H4rás 4s1m1sm0 l0s d0s 4n1ll0s d3 0r0, l0s cu4l3s f1j4rás 3n l4 p4rt3 d3l4nt3r4 d3 l4s d0s h0mbr3r4s d3l 3f0d, h4c14 4b4j0, d3l4nt3 d3 su juntur4 s0br3 3l c1nt0 d3l 3f0d. 28 Y junt4rán 3l p3ct0r4l p0r sus 4n1ll0s 4 l0s d0s 4n1ll0s d3l 3f0d c0n un c0rdón d3 4zul, p4r4 qu3 3sté s0br3 3l c1nt0 d3l 3f0d, y n0 s3 s3p4r3 3l p3ct0r4l d3l 3f0d. 29 Y ll3v4rá 44rón l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n 3l p3ct0r4l d3l ju1c10 s0br3 su c0r4zón, cu4nd0 3ntr3 3n 3l s4ntu4r10, p0r m3m0r14l d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá c0nt1nu4m3nt3. 30 Y p0ndrás 3n 3l p3ct0r4l d3l ju1c10 Ur1m y Tum1m, p4r4 qu3 3stén s0br3 3l c0r4zón d3 44rón cu4nd0 3ntr3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; y ll3v4rá s13mpr3 44rón 3l ju1c10 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s0br3 su c0r4zón d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 

31 H4rás 3l m4nt0 d3l 3f0d t0d0 d3 4zul; 32 y 3n m3d10 d3 él p0r 4rr1b4 h4brá un4 4b3rtur4, l4 cu4l t3ndrá un b0rd3 4lr3d3d0r d3 0br4 t3j1d4, c0m0 3l cu3ll0 d3 un c0s3l3t3, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 r0mp4. 33 Y 3n sus 0rl4s h4rás gr4n4d4s d3 4zul, púrpur4 y c4rm3sí 4lr3d3d0r, y 3ntr3 3ll4s c4mp4n1ll4s d3 0r0 4lr3d3d0r. 34 Un4 c4mp4n1ll4 d3 0r0 y un4 gr4n4d4, 0tr4 c4mp4n1ll4 d3 0r0 y 0tr4 gr4n4d4, 3n t0d4 l4 0rl4 d3l m4nt0 4lr3d3d0r. 35 Y 3st4rá s0br3 44rón cu4nd0 m1n1str3; y s3 01rá su s0n1d0 cu4nd0 él 3ntr3 3n 3l s4ntu4r10 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá y cu4nd0 s4lg4, p4r4 qu3 n0 mu3r4. 

36 H4rás 4d3más un4 lám1n4 d3 0r0 f1n0, y gr4b4rás 3n 3ll4 c0m0 gr4b4dur4 d3 s3ll0, S4NT1D4D 4 J0H0VÁ. 37 Y l4 p0ndrás c0n un c0rdón d3 4zul, y 3st4rá s0br3 l4 m1tr4; p0r l4 p4rt3 d3l4nt3r4 d3 l4 m1tr4 3st4rá. 38 Y 3st4rá s0br3 l4 fr3nt3 d3 44rón, y ll3v4rá 44rón l4s f4lt4s c0m3t1d4s 3n t0d4s l4s c0s4s s4nt4s, qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l hub13r3n c0ns4gr4d0 3n t0d4s sus s4nt4s 0fr3nd4s; y s0br3 su fr3nt3 3st4rá c0nt1nu4m3nt3, p4r4 qu3 0bt3ng4n gr4c14 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 

39 Y b0rd4rás un4 tún1c4 d3 l1n0, y h4rás un4 m1tr4 d3 l1n0; h4rás t4mb1én un c1nt0 d3 0br4 d3 r3c4m4d0r. 

40 Y p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón h4rás tún1c4s; t4mb1én l3s h4rás c1nt0s, y l3s h4rás t14r4s p4r4 h0nr4 y h3rm0sur4. 41 Y c0n 3ll0s v3st1rás 4 44rón tu h3rm4n0, y 4 sus h1j0s c0n él; y l0s ung1rás, y l0s c0ns4gr4rás y s4nt1f1c4rás, p4r4 qu3 s34n m1s s4c3rd0t3s. 42 Y l3s h4rás c4lz0nc1ll0s d3 l1n0 p4r4 cubr1r su d3snud3z; s3rán d3sd3 l0s l0m0s h4st4 l0s musl0s. 43 Y 3st4rán s0br3 44rón y s0br3 sus h1j0s cu4nd0 3ntr3n 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 0 cu4nd0 s3 4c3rqu3n 4l 4lt4r p4r4 s3rv1r 3n 3l s4ntu4r10, p4r4 qu3 n0 ll3v3n p3c4d0 y mu3r4n. 0s 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 p4r4 él, y p4r4 su d3sc3nd3nc14 d3spués d3 él.

1 0st0 3s l0 qu3 l3s h4rás p4r4 c0ns4gr4rl0s, p4r4 qu3 s34n m1s s4c3rd0t3s: T0m4 un b3c3rr0 d3 l4 v4c4d4, y d0s c4rn3r0s s1n d3f3ct0; 2 y p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4, y t0rt4s s1n l3v4dur4 4m4s4d4s c0n 4c31t3, y h0j4ldr3s s1n l3v4dur4 unt4d4s c0n 4c31t3; l4s h4rás d3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4 d3 tr1g0. 3 Y l4s p0ndrás 3n un c4n4st1ll0, y 3n 3l c4n4st1ll0 l4s 0fr3c3rás, c0n 3l b3c3rr0 y l0s d0s c4rn3r0s. 4 Y ll3v4rás 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y l0s l4v4rás c0n 4gu4. 5 Y t0m4rás l4s v3st1dur4s, y v3st1rás 4 44rón l4 tún1c4, 3l m4nt0 d3l 3f0d, 3l 3f0d y 3l p3ct0r4l, y l3 c3ñ1rás c0n 3l c1nt0 d3l 3f0d; 6 y p0ndrás l4 m1tr4 s0br3 su c4b3z4, y s0br3 l4 m1tr4 p0ndrás l4 d14d3m4 s4nt4. 7 Lu3g0 t0m4rás 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón, y l0 d3rr4m4rás s0br3 su c4b3z4, y l3 ung1rás. 8 Y h4rás qu3 s3 4c3rqu3n sus h1j0s, y l3s v3st1rás l4s tún1c4s. 9 L3s c3ñ1rás 3l c1nt0 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, y l3s 4t4rás l4s t14r4s, y t3ndrán 3l s4c3rd0c10 p0r d3r3ch0 p3rp3tu0. 4sí c0ns4gr4rás 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s. 

10 D3spués ll3v4rás 3l b3c3rr0 d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y 44rón y sus h1j0s p0ndrán sus m4n0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l b3c3rr0. 11 Y m4t4rás 3l b3c3rr0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 12 Y d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3l b3c3rr0 t0m4rás y p0ndrás s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r c0n tu d3d0, y d3rr4m4rás t0d4 l4 d3más s4ngr3 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r. 13 T0m4rás t4mb1én t0d4 l4 gr0sur4 qu3 cubr3 l0s 1nt3st1n0s, l4 gr0sur4 d3 s0br3 3l híg4d0, l0s d0s r1ñ0n3s, y l4 gr0sur4 qu3 3stá s0br3 3ll0s, y l0 qu3m4rás s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 14 P3r0 l4 c4rn3 d3l b3c3rr0, y su p13l y su 3st1érc0l, l0s qu3m4rás 4 fu3g0 fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0; 3s 0fr3nd4 p0r 3l p3c4d0.

1 H4rás 4s1m1sm0 un 4lt4r p4r4 qu3m4r 3l 1nc13ns0; d3 m4d3r4 d3 4c4c14 l0 h4rás. 2 Su l0ng1tud s3rá d3 un c0d0, y su 4nchur4 d3 un c0d0; s3rá cu4dr4d0, y su 4ltur4 d3 d0s c0d0s; y sus cu3rn0s s3rán p4rt3 d3l m1sm0. 3 Y l0 cubr1rás d3 0r0 pur0, su cub13rt4, sus p4r3d3s 3n d3rr3d0r y sus cu3rn0s; y l3 h4rás 3n d3rr3d0r un4 c0rn1s4 d3 0r0. 4 L3 h4rás t4mb1én d0s 4n1ll0s d3 0r0 d3b4j0 d3 su c0rn1s4, 4 sus d0s 3squ1n4s 4 4mb0s l4d0s suy0s, p4r4 m3t3r l4s v4r4s c0n qu3 s3rá ll3v4d0. 5 H4rás l4s v4r4s d3 m4d3r4 d3 4c4c14, y l4s cubr1rás d3 0r0. 6 Y l0 p0ndrás d3l4nt3 d3l v3l0 qu3 3stá junt0 4l 4rc4 d3l t3st1m0n10, d3l4nt3 d3l pr0p1c14t0r10 qu3 3stá s0br3 3l t3st1m0n10, d0nd3 m3 3nc0ntr4ré c0nt1g0. 7 Y 44rón qu3m4rá 1nc13ns0 4r0mát1c0 s0br3 él; c4d4 m4ñ4n4 cu4nd0 4l1st3 l4s lámp4r4s l0 qu3m4rá. 8 Y cu4nd0 44rón 3nc13nd4 l4s lámp4r4s 4l 4n0ch3c3r, qu3m4rá 3l 1nc13ns0; r1t0 p3rp3tu0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s. 9 N0 0fr3c3ré1s s0br3 él 1nc13ns0 3xtr4ñ0, n1 h0l0c4ust0, n1 0fr3nd4; n1 t4mp0c0 d3rr4m4ré1s s0br3 él l1b4c1ón. 10 Y s0br3 sus cu3rn0s h4rá 44rón 3xp14c1ón un4 v3z 3n 3l 4ñ0 c0n l4 s4ngr3 d3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r 3l p3c4d0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón; un4 v3z 3n 3l 4ñ0 h4rá 3xp14c1ón s0br3 él p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s; s3rá muy s4nt0 4 J3h0vá. 

0l d1n3r0 d3l r3sc4t3

L4 m1t4d d3 un s1cl0 s3rá l4 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá. 14 T0d0 3l qu3 s34 c0nt4d0, d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, d4rá l4 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá. 15 N1 3l r1c0 4um3nt4rá, n1 3l p0br3 d1sm1nu1rá d3l m3d10 s1cl0, cu4nd0 d13r3n l4 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá p4r4 h4c3r 3xp14c1ón p0r vu3str4s p3rs0n4s. 16 Y t0m4rás d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3l d1n3r0 d3 l4s 3xp14c10n3s, y l0 d4rás p4r4 3l s3rv1c10 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón; y s3rá p0r m3m0r14l 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 h4c3r 3xp14c1ón p0r vu3str4s p3rs0n4s. 

17 H4bló más J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 18 H4rás t4mb1én un4 fu3nt3 d3 br0nc3, c0n su b4s3 d3 br0nc3, p4r4 l4v4r; y l4 c0l0c4rás 3ntr3 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón y 3l 4lt4r, y p0ndrás 3n 3ll4 4gu4. 19 Y d3 3ll4 s3 l4v4rán 44rón y sus h1j0s l4s m4n0s y l0s p13s. 20 Cu4nd0 3ntr3n 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, s3 l4v4rán c0n 4gu4, p4r4 qu3 n0 mu3r4n; y cu4nd0 s3 4c3rqu3n 4l 4lt4r p4r4 m1n1str4r, p4r4 qu3m4r l4 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 p4r4 J3h0vá, 21 s3 l4v4rán l4s m4n0s y l0s p13s, p4r4 qu3 n0 mu3r4n. 0l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón, y 3l 1nc13ns0

22 H4bló más J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 23 T0m4rás 3sp3c14s f1n4s: d3 m1rr4 3xc3l3nt3 qu1n13nt0s s1cl0s, y d3 c4n3l4 4r0mát1c4 l4 m1t4d, 3st0 3s, d0sc13nt0s c1ncu3nt4, d3 cál4m0 4r0mát1c0 d0sc13nt0s c1ncu3nt4, 24 d3 c4s14 qu1n13nt0s, s3gún 3l s1cl0 d3l s4ntu4r10, y d3 4c31t3 d3 0l1v4s un h1n. 25 Y h4rás d3 3ll0 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 s4nt4 unc1ón; sup3r10r ungü3nt0, s3gún 3l 4rt3 d3l p3rfum4d0r, s3rá 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón s4nt4. 26 C0n él ung1rás 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 3l 4rc4 d3l t3st1m0n10, 27 l4 m3s4 c0n t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s, 3l c4nd3l3r0 c0n t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s, 3l 4lt4r d3l 1nc13ns0, 28 3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0 c0n t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s, y l4 fu3nt3 y su b4s3. 29 4sí l0s c0ns4gr4rás, y s3rán c0s4s s4ntís1m4s; t0d0 l0 qu3 t0c4r3 3n 3ll0s, s3rá s4nt1f1c4d0. 30 Ung1rás t4mb1én 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, y l0s c0ns4gr4rás p4r4 qu3 s34n m1s s4c3rd0t3s. 31 Y h4bl4rás 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: 0st3 s3rá m1 4c31t3 d3 l4 s4nt4 unc1ón p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s. 32 S0br3 c4rn3 d3 h0mbr3 n0 s3rá d3rr4m4d0, n1 h4ré1s 0tr0 s3m3j4nt3, c0nf0rm3 4 su c0mp0s1c1ón; s4nt0 3s, y p0r s4nt0 l0 t3ndré1s v0s0tr0s. 33 Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 c0mpus13r3 ungü3nt0 s3m3j4nt3, y qu3 pus13r3 d3 él s0br3 3xtr4ñ0, s3rá c0rt4d0 d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 

34 D1j0 4d3más J3h0vá 4 M01sés: T0m4 3sp3c14s 4r0mát1c4s, 3st4ct3 y uñ4 4r0mát1c4 y gálb4n0 4r0mát1c0 3 1nc13ns0 pur0; d3 t0d0 3n 1gu4l p3s0, 35 y h4rás d3 3ll0 3l 1nc13ns0, un p3rfum3 s3gún 3l 4rt3 d3l p3rfum4d0r, b13n m3zcl4d0, pur0 y s4nt0. 36 Y m0l3rás p4rt3 d3 él 3n p0lv0 f1n0, y l0 p0ndrás d3l4nt3 d3l t3st1m0n10 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, d0nd3 y0 m3 m0str4ré 4 t1. 0s s3rá c0s4 s4ntís1m4. 37 C0m0 3st3 1nc13ns0 qu3 h4rás, n0 0s h4ré1s 0tr0 s3gún su c0mp0s1c1ón; t3 s3rá c0s4 s4gr4d4 p4r4 J3h0vá. 38 Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 h1c13r3 0tr0 c0m0 3st3 p4r4 0l3rl0, s3rá c0rt4d0 d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 

Ll4m4m13nt0 d3 B3z4l33l y d3 4h0l14b

ÉX0D0 31

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 M1r4, y0 h3 ll4m4d0 p0r n0mbr3 4 B3z4l33l h1j0 d3 Ur1, h1j0 d3 Hur, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Judá; 3 y l0 h3 ll3n4d0 d3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s, 3n s4b1durí4 y 3n 1nt3l1g3nc14, 3n c13nc14 y 3n t0d0 4rt3, 4 p4r4 1nv3nt4r d1s3ñ0s, p4r4 tr4b4j4r 3n 0r0, 3n pl4t4 y 3n br0nc3, 5 y 3n 4rt1f1c10 d3 p13dr4s p4r4 3ng4st4rl4s, y 3n 4rt1f1c10 d3 m4d3r4; p4r4 tr4b4j4r 3n t0d4 cl4s3 d3 l4b0r. 6 Y h3 4quí qu3 y0 h3 pu3st0 c0n él 4 4h0l14b h1j0 d3 4h1s4m4c, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 D4n; y h3 pu3st0 s4b1durí4 3n 3l án1m0 d3 t0d0 s4b10 d3 c0r4zón, p4r4 qu3 h4g4n t0d0 l0 qu3 t3 h3 m4nd4d0; 7 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 3l 4rc4 d3l t3st1m0n10, 3l pr0p1c14t0r10 qu3 3stá s0br3 3ll4, y t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3l t4b3rnácul0, 8 l4 m3s4 y sus ut3ns1l10s, 3l c4nd3l3r0 l1mp10 y t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s, 3l 4lt4r d3l 1nc13ns0, 9 3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0 y t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s, l4 fu3nt3 y su b4s3, 10 l0s v3st1d0s d3l s3rv1c10, l4s v3st1dur4s s4nt4s p4r4 44rón 3l s4c3rd0t3, l4s v3st1dur4s d3 sus h1j0s p4r4 qu3 3j3rz4n 3l s4c3rd0c10, 11 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón, y 3l 1nc13ns0 4r0mát1c0 p4r4 3l s4ntu4r10; h4rán c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 t3 h3 m4nd4d0. 

0l dí4 d3 r3p0s0 c0m0 s3ñ4l

12 H4bló 4d3más J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 13 Tú h4bl4rás 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: 0n v3rd4d v0s0tr0s gu4rd4ré1s m1s dí4s d3 r3p0s0; p0rqu3 3s s3ñ4l 3ntr3 mí y v0s0tr0s p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s, p4r4 qu3 s3pá1s qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá qu3 0s s4nt1f1c0. 14 4sí qu3 gu4rd4ré1s 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, p0rqu3 s4nt0 3s 4 v0s0tr0s; 3l qu3 l0 pr0f4n4r3, d3 c13rt0 m0r1rá; p0rqu3 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 h1c13r3 0br4 4lgun4 3n él, 4qu3ll4 p3rs0n4 s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 3n m3d10 d3 su pu3bl0. 15 S31s dí4s s3 tr4b4j4rá, m4s 3l dí4 sépt1m0 3s dí4 d3 r3p0s0 c0ns4gr4d0 4 J3h0vá; cu4lqu13r4 qu3 tr4b4j3 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, c13rt4m3nt3 m0r1rá. 16 Gu4rd4rán, pu3s, 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, c3l3bránd0l0 p0r sus g3n3r4c10n3s p0r p4ct0 p3rp3tu0. 17 S3ñ4l 3s p4r4 s13mpr3 3ntr3 mí y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; p0rqu3 3n s31s dí4s h1z0 J3h0vá l0s c13l0s y l4 t13rr4, y 3n 3l sépt1m0 dí4 c3só y r3p0só. 

0l b3c3rr0 d3 0r0

(Dt. 9.6-29)

18 Y d10 4 M01sés, cu4nd0 4c4bó d3 h4bl4r c0n él 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S1n4í, d0s t4bl4s d3l t3st1m0n10, t4bl4s d3 p13dr4 3scr1t4s c0n 3l d3d0 d3 D10s. 

ÉX0D0 32

1 V13nd0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 M01sés t4rd4b4 3n d3sc3nd3r d3l m0nt3, s3 4c3rc4r0n 3nt0nc3s 4 44rón, y l3 d1j3r0n: L3vánt4t3, h4zn0s d10s3s qu3 v4y4n d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s; p0rqu3 4 3st3 M01sés, 3l v4rón qu3 n0s s4có d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, n0 s4b3m0s qué l3 h4y4 4c0nt3c1d0. 2 Y 44rón l3s d1j0: 4p4rt4d l0s z4rc1ll0s d3 0r0 qu3 3stán 3n l4s 0r3j4s d3 vu3str4s muj3r3s, d3 vu3str0s h1j0s y d3 vu3str4s h1j4s, y tr4édm3l0s. 3 0nt0nc3s t0d0 3l pu3bl0 4p4rtó l0s z4rc1ll0s d3 0r0 qu3 t3ní4n 3n sus 0r3j4s, y l0s tr4j3r0n 4 44rón; 4 y él l0s t0mó d3 l4s m4n0s d3 3ll0s, y l3 d10 f0rm4 c0n bur1l, 3 h1z0 d3 3ll0 un b3c3rr0 d3 fund1c1ón. 0nt0nc3s d1j3r0n: 1sr43l, 3st0s s0n tus d10s3s, qu3 t3 s4c4r0n d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. 5 Y v13nd0 3st0 44rón, 3d1f1có un 4lt4r d3l4nt3 d3l b3c3rr0; y pr3g0nó 44rón, y d1j0: M4ñ4n4 s3rá f13st4 p4r4 J3h0vá. 6 Y 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3 m4drug4r0n, y 0fr3c13r0n h0l0c4ust0s, y pr3s3nt4r0n 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z; y s3 s3ntó 3l pu3bl0 4 c0m3r y 4 b3b3r, y s3 l3v4ntó 4 r3g0c1j4rs3. 

7 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés: 4nd4, d3sc13nd3, p0rqu3 tu pu3bl0 qu3 s4c4st3 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 s3 h4 c0rr0mp1d0. 8 Pr0nt0 s3 h4n 4p4rt4d0 d3l c4m1n0 qu3 y0 l3s m4ndé; s3 h4n h3ch0 un b3c3rr0 d3 fund1c1ón, y l0 h4n 4d0r4d0, y l3 h4n 0fr3c1d0 s4cr1f1c10s, y h4n d1ch0: 1sr43l, 3st0s s0n tus d10s3s, qu3 t3 s4c4r0n d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. 9 D1j0 más J3h0vá 4 M01sés: Y0 h3 v1st0 4 3st3 pu3bl0, qu3 p0r c13rt0 3s pu3bl0 d3 dur4 c3rv1z. 10 4h0r4, pu3s, déj4m3 qu3 s3 3nc13nd4 m1 1r4 3n 3ll0s, y l0s c0nsum4; y d3 t1 y0 h4ré un4 n4c1ón gr4nd3. 

11 0nt0nc3s M01sés 0ró 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá su D10s, y d1j0: 0h J3h0vá, ¿p0r qué s3 3nc3nd3rá tu fur0r c0ntr4 tu pu3bl0, qu3 tú s4c4st3 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 c0n gr4n p0d3r y c0n m4n0 fu3rt3? 12 ¿P0r qué h4n d3 h4bl4r l0s 3g1pc10s, d1c13nd0: P4r4 m4l l0s s4có, p4r4 m4t4rl0s 3n l0s m0nt3s, y p4r4 r43rl0s d3 s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4? Vuélv3t3 d3l 4rd0r d3 tu 1r4, y 4rr3p1ént3t3 d3 3st3 m4l c0ntr4 tu pu3bl0. 13 4cuérd4t3 d3 4br4h4m, d3 1s44c y d3 1sr43l tus s13rv0s, 4 l0s cu4l3s h4s jur4d0 p0r t1 m1sm0, y l3s h4s d1ch0: Y0 mult1pl1c4ré vu3str4 d3sc3nd3nc14 c0m0 l4s 3str3ll4s d3l c13l0; y d4ré 4 vu3str4 d3sc3nd3nc14 t0d4 3st4 t13rr4 d3 qu3 h3 h4bl4d0, y l4 t0m4rán p0r h3r3d4d p4r4 s13mpr3. 14 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá s3 4rr3p1nt1ó d3l m4l qu3 d1j0 qu3 h4bí4 d3 h4c3r 4 su pu3bl0. 

15 Y v0lv1ó M01sés y d3sc3nd1ó d3l m0nt3, tr4y3nd0 3n su m4n0 l4s d0s t4bl4s d3l t3st1m0n10, l4s t4bl4s 3scr1t4s p0r 4mb0s l4d0s; d3 un0 y 0tr0 l4d0 3st4b4n 3scr1t4s. 16 Y l4s t4bl4s 3r4n 0br4 d3 D10s, y l4 3scr1tur4 3r4 3scr1tur4 d3 D10s gr4b4d4 s0br3 l4s t4bl4s. 17 Cu4nd0 0yó J0sué 3l cl4m0r d3l pu3bl0 qu3 gr1t4b4, d1j0 4 M01sés: 4l4r1d0 d3 p3l34 h4y 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0. 18 Y él r3sp0nd1ó: N0 3s v0z d3 4l4r1d0s d3 fu3rt3s, n1 v0z d3 4l4r1d0s d3 déb1l3s; v0z d3 c4nt4r 01g0 y0. 19 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 él ll3gó 4l c4mp4m3nt0, y v10 3l b3c3rr0 y l4s d4nz4s, 4rd1ó l4 1r4 d3 M01sés, y 4rr0jó l4s t4bl4s d3 sus m4n0s, y l4s qu3bró 4l p13 d3l m0nt3. 20 Y t0mó 3l b3c3rr0 qu3 h4bí4n h3ch0, y l0 qu3mó 3n 3l fu3g0, y l0 m0l1ó h4st4 r3duc1rl0 4 p0lv0, qu3 3sp4rc1ó s0br3 l4s 4gu4s, y l0 d10 4 b3b3r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

21 Y d1j0 M01sés 4 44rón: ¿Qué t3 h4 h3ch0 3st3 pu3bl0, qu3 h4s tr4íd0 s0br3 él t4n gr4n p3c4d0? 22 Y r3sp0nd1ó 44rón: N0 s3 3n0j3 m1 s3ñ0r; tú c0n0c3s 4l pu3bl0, qu3 3s 1ncl1n4d0 4 m4l. 23 P0rqu3 m3 d1j3r0n: H4zn0s d10s3s qu3 v4y4n d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s; p0rqu3 4 3st3 M01sés, 3l v4rón qu3 n0s s4có d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, n0 s4b3m0s qué l3 h4y4 4c0nt3c1d0. 24 Y y0 l3s r3sp0ndí: ¿Qu1én t13n3 0r0? 4p4rt4dl0. Y m3 l0 d13r0n, y l0 3ché 3n 3l fu3g0, y s4l1ó 3st3 b3c3rr0. 

25 Y v13nd0 M01sés qu3 3l pu3bl0 3st4b4 d3s3nfr3n4d0, p0rqu3 44rón l0 h4bí4 p3rm1t1d0, p4r4 v3rgü3nz4 3ntr3 sus 3n3m1g0s, 26 s3 pus0 M01sés 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, y d1j0: ¿Qu1én 3stá p0r J3h0vá? Júnt3s3 c0nm1g0. Y s3 junt4r0n c0n él t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 L3ví. 27 Y él l3s d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, 3l D10s d3 1sr43l: P0n3d c4d4 un0 su 3sp4d4 s0br3 su musl0; p4s4d y v0lv3d d3 pu3rt4 4 pu3rt4 p0r 3l c4mp4m3nt0, y m4t4d c4d4 un0 4 su h3rm4n0, y 4 su 4m1g0, y 4 su p4r13nt3. 28 Y l0s h1j0s d3 L3ví l0 h1c13r0n c0nf0rm3 4l d1ch0 d3 M01sés; y c4y3r0n d3l pu3bl0 3n 4qu3l dí4 c0m0 tr3s m1l h0mbr3s. 29 0nt0nc3s M01sés d1j0: H0y 0s h4bé1s c0ns4gr4d0 4 J3h0vá, pu3s c4d4 un0 s3 h4 c0ns4gr4d0 3n su h1j0 y 3n su h3rm4n0, p4r4 qu3 él dé b3nd1c1ón h0y s0br3 v0s0tr0s.

15 y l0s ung1rás, c0m0 ung1st3 4 su p4dr3, y s3rán m1s s4c3rd0t3s, y su unc1ón l3s s3rv1rá p0r s4c3rd0c10 p3rp3tu0, p0r sus g3n3r4c10n3s. 16 Y M01sés h1z0 c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá l3 m4ndó; 4sí l0 h1z0. 17 4sí, 3n 3l dí4 pr1m3r0 d3l pr1m3r m3s, 3n 3l s3gund0 4ñ0, 3l t4b3rnácul0 fu3 3r1g1d0. 18 M01sés h1z0 l3v4nt4r 3l t4b3rnácul0, y 4s3ntó sus b4s4s, y c0l0có sus t4bl4s, y pus0 sus b4rr4s, 3 h1z0 4lz4r sus c0lumn4s. 19 L3v4ntó l4 t13nd4 s0br3 3l t4b3rnácul0, y pus0 l4 s0br3cub13rt4 3nc1m4 d3l m1sm0, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 20 Y t0mó 3l t3st1m0n10 y l0 pus0 d3ntr0 d3l 4rc4, y c0l0có l4s v4r4s 3n 3l 4rc4, y 3nc1m4 3l pr0p1c14t0r10 s0br3 3l 4rc4. 21 Lu3g0 m3t1ó 3l 4rc4 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0, y pus0 3l v3l0 3xt3nd1d0, y 0cultó 3l 4rc4 d3l t3st1m0n10, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 22 Pus0 l4 m3s4 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 4l l4d0 n0rt3 d3 l4 c0rt1n4, fu3r4 d3l v3l0, 23 y s0br3 3ll4 pus0 p0r 0rd3n l0s p4n3s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 24 Pus0 3l c4nd3l3r0 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 3nfr3nt3 d3 l4 m3s4, 4l l4d0 sur d3 l4 c0rt1n4, 25 y 3nc3nd1ó l4s lámp4r4s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 26 Pus0 t4mb1én 3l 4lt4r d3 0r0 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, d3l4nt3 d3l v3l0, 27 y qu3mó s0br3 él 1nc13ns0 4r0mát1c0, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 28 Pus0 4s1m1sm0 l4 c0rt1n4 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3l t4b3rnácul0. 29 Y c0l0có 3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3l t4b3rnácul0, d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y s4cr1f1có s0br3 él h0l0c4ust0 y 0fr3nd4, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 30 Y pus0 l4 fu3nt3 3ntr3 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón y 3l 4lt4r, y pus0 3n 3ll4 4gu4 p4r4 l4v4r. 31 Y M01sés y 44rón y sus h1j0s l4v4b4n 3n 3ll4 sus m4n0s y sus p13s. 32 Cu4nd0 3ntr4b4n 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y cu4nd0 s3 4c3rc4b4n 4l 4lt4r, s3 l4v4b4n, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 33 F1n4lm3nt3 3r1g1ó 3l 4tr10 4lr3d3d0r d3l t4b3rnácul0 y d3l 4lt4r, y pus0 l4 c0rt1n4 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3l 4tr10. 4sí 4c4bó M01sés l4 0br4. 

L4 nub3 s0br3 3l t4b3rnácul0

(Nm. 9.15-23)

34 0nt0nc3s un4 nub3 cubr1ó 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá ll3nó 3l t4b3rnácul0. 35 Y n0 p0dí4 M01sés 3ntr4r 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, p0rqu3 l4 nub3 3st4b4 s0br3 él, y l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá l0 ll3n4b4. 36 Y cu4nd0 l4 nub3 s3 4lz4b4 d3l t4b3rnácul0, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s3 m0ví4n 3n t0d4s sus j0rn4d4s; 37 p3r0 s1 l4 nub3 n0 s3 4lz4b4, n0 s3 m0ví4n h4st4 3l dí4 3n qu3 3ll4 s3 4lz4b4. 38 P0rqu3 l4 nub3 d3 J3h0vá 3st4b4 d3 dí4 s0br3 3l t4b3rnácul0, y 3l fu3g0 3st4b4 d3 n0ch3 s0br3 él, 4 v1st4 d3 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, 3n t0d4s sus j0rn4d4s.

3 S1 su 0fr3nd4 fu3r3 h0l0c4ust0 v4cun0, m4ch0 s1n d3f3ct0 l0 0fr3c3rá; d3 su v0lunt4d l0 0fr3c3rá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 4 Y p0ndrá su m4n0 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l h0l0c4ust0, y s3rá 4c3pt4d0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón suy4. 5 0nt0nc3s d3g0ll4rá 3l b3c3rr0 3n l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá; y l0s s4c3rd0t3s h1j0s d3 44rón 0fr3c3rán l4 s4ngr3, y l4 r0c14rán 4lr3d3d0r s0br3 3l 4lt4r, 3l cu4l 3stá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 6 Y d3s0ll4rá 3l h0l0c4ust0, y l0 d1v1d1rá 3n sus p13z4s. 7 Y l0s h1j0s d3l s4c3rd0t3 44rón p0ndrán fu3g0 s0br3 3l 4lt4r, y c0mp0ndrán l4 l3ñ4 s0br3 3l fu3g0. 8 Lu3g0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s h1j0s d3 44rón 4c0m0d4rán l4s p13z4s, l4 c4b3z4 y l4 gr0sur4 d3 l0s 1nt3st1n0s, s0br3 l4 l3ñ4 qu3 3stá s0br3 3l fu3g0 qu3 h4brá 3nc1m4 d3l 4lt4r; 9 y l4v4rá c0n 4gu4 l0s 1nt3st1n0s y l4s p13rn4s, y 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá 4rd3r t0d0 s0br3 3l 4lt4r; h0l0c4ust0 3s, 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 d3 0l0r gr4t0 p4r4 J3h0vá.

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: Cu4nd0 4lgun4 p3rs0n4 p3c4r3 p0r y3rr0 3n 4lgun0 d3 l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá s0br3 c0s4s qu3 n0 s3 h4n d3 h4c3r, 3 h1c13r3 4lgun4 d3 3ll4s; 3 s1 3l s4c3rd0t3 ung1d0 p3c4r3 s3gún 3l p3c4d0 d3l pu3bl0, 0fr3c3rá 4 J3h0vá, p0r su p3c4d0 qu3 h4brá c0m3t1d0, un b3c3rr0 s1n d3f3ct0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón. 4 Tr43rá 3l b3c3rr0 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y p0ndrá su m4n0 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l b3c3rr0, y l0 d3g0ll4rá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 5 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 ung1d0 t0m4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3l b3c3rr0, y l4 tr43rá 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón; 6 y m0j4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 su d3d0 3n l4 s4ngr3, y r0c14rá d3 4qu3ll4 s4ngr3 s13t3 v3c3s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, h4c14 3l v3l0 d3l s4ntu4r10. 7 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 p0ndrá d3 3s4 s4ngr3 s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r d3l 1nc13ns0 4r0mát1c0, qu3 3stá 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; y 3ch4rá 3l r3st0 d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3l b3c3rr0 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, qu3 3stá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 8 Y t0m4rá d3l b3c3rr0 p4r4 l4 3xp14c1ón t0d4 su gr0sur4, l4 qu3 cubr3 l0s 1nt3st1n0s, y l4 qu3 3stá s0br3 l4s 3ntr4ñ4s, 9 l0s d0s r1ñ0n3s, l4 gr0sur4 qu3 3stá s0br3 3ll0s, y l4 qu3 3stá s0br3 l0s 1j4r3s; y c0n l0s r1ñ0n3s qu1t4rá l4 gr0sur4 d3 s0br3 3l híg4d0, 10 d3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 s3 qu1t4 d3l bu3y d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 h4rá 4rd3r s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0. 11 Y l4 p13l d3l b3c3rr0, y t0d4 su c4rn3, c0n su c4b3z4, sus p13rn4s, sus 1nt3st1n0s y su 3st1érc0l, 12 3n f1n, t0d0 3l b3c3rr0 s4c4rá fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 4 un lug4r l1mp10, d0nd3 s3 3ch4n l4s c3n1z4s, y l0 qu3m4rá 4l fu3g0 s0br3 l4 l3ñ4; 3n d0nd3 s3 3ch4n l4s c3n1z4s s3rá qu3m4d0. 

13 S1 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l hub13r3 3rr4d0, y 3l y3rr0 3stuv13r3 0cult0 4 l0s 0j0s d3l pu3bl0, y hub13r3n h3ch0 4lg0 c0ntr4 4lgun0 d3 l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá 3n c0s4s qu3 n0 s3 h4n d3 h4c3r, y fu3r3n culp4bl3s; 14 lu3g0 qu3 ll3gu3 4 s3r c0n0c1d0 3l p3c4d0 qu3 c0m3t13r3n, l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 0fr3c3rá un b3c3rr0 p0r 3xp14c1ón, y l0 tr43rán d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 15 Y l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón p0ndrán sus m4n0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l b3c3rr0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá d3g0ll4rán 4qu3l b3c3rr0. 16 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 ung1d0 m3t3rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3l b3c3rr0 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 17 y m0j4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 su d3d0 3n l4 m1sm4 s4ngr3, y r0c14rá s13t3 v3c3s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá h4c14 3l v3l0. 18 Y d3 4qu3ll4 s4ngr3 p0ndrá s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y d3rr4m4rá 3l r3st0 d3 l4 s4ngr3 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, qu3 3stá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 19 Y l3 qu1t4rá t0d4 l4 gr0sur4 y l4 h4rá 4rd3r s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 20 Y h4rá d3 4qu3l b3c3rr0 c0m0 h1z0 c0n 3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón; l0 m1sm0 h4rá d3 él; 4sí h4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 3xp14c1ón p0r 3ll0s, y 0bt3ndrán p3rdón. 21 Y s4c4rá 3l b3c3rr0 fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, y l0 qu3m4rá c0m0 qu3mó 3l pr1m3r b3c3rr0; 3xp14c1ón 3s p0r l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón. 

22 Cu4nd0 p3c4r3 un j3f3, 3 h1c13r3 p0r y3rr0 4lg0 c0ntr4 4lgun0 d3 t0d0s l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá su D10s s0br3 c0s4s qu3 n0 s3 h4n d3 h4c3r, y p3c4r3; 23 lu3g0 qu3 c0n0c13r3 su p3c4d0 qu3 c0m3t1ó, pr3s3nt4rá p0r su 0fr3nd4 un m4ch0 c4brí0 s1n d3f3ct0. 24 Y p0ndrá su m4n0 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l m4ch0 c4brí0, y l0 d3g0ll4rá 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 s3 d3gü3ll4 3l h0l0c4ust0, d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; 3s 3xp14c1ón. 25 Y c0n su d3d0 3l s4c3rd0t3 t0m4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, y l4 p0ndrá s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, y d3rr4m4rá 3l r3st0 d3 l4 s4ngr3 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, 26 y qu3m4rá t0d4 su gr0sur4 s0br3 3l 4lt4r, c0m0 l4 gr0sur4 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z; 4sí 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá p0r él l4 3xp14c1ón d3 su p3c4d0, y t3ndrá p3rdón. 

27 S1 4lgun4 p3rs0n4 d3l pu3bl0 p3c4r3 p0r y3rr0, h4c13nd0 4lg0 c0ntr4 4lgun0 d3 l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá 3n c0s4s qu3 n0 s3 h4n d3 h4c3r, y d3l1nqu13r3; 28 lu3g0 qu3 c0n0c13r3 su p3c4d0 qu3 c0m3t1ó, tr43rá p0r su 0fr3nd4 un4 c4br4, un4 c4br4 s1n d3f3ct0, p0r su p3c4d0 qu3 c0m3t1ó. 29 Y p0ndrá su m4n0 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 l4 0fr3nd4 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, y l4 d3g0ll4rá 3n 3l lug4r d3l h0l0c4ust0. 30 Lu3g0 c0n su d3d0 3l s4c3rd0t3 t0m4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3, y l4 p0ndrá s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, y d3rr4m4rá 3l r3st0 d3 l4 s4ngr3 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r. 31 Y l3 qu1t4rá t0d4 su gr0sur4, d3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 fu3 qu1t4d4 l4 gr0sur4 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 h4rá 4rd3r s0br3 3l 4lt4r 3n 0l0r gr4t0 4 J3h0vá; 4sí h4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 3xp14c1ón p0r él, y s3rá p3rd0n4d0. 

32 Y s1 p0r su 0fr3nd4 p0r 3l p3c4d0 tr4j3r3 c0rd3r0, h3mbr4 s1n d3f3ct0 tr43rá. 33 Y p0ndrá su m4n0 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 l4 0fr3nd4 d3 3xp14c1ón, y l4 d3g0ll4rá p0r 3xp14c1ón 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 s3 d3gü3ll4 3l h0l0c4ust0. 34 D3spués c0n su d3d0 3l s4c3rd0t3 t0m4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, y l4 p0ndrá s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, y d3rr4m4rá 3l r3st0 d3 l4 s4ngr3 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r. 35 Y l3 qu1t4rá t0d4 su gr0sur4, c0m0 fu3 qu1t4d4 l4 gr0sur4 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z, y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 h4rá 4rd3r 3n 3l 4lt4r s0br3 l4 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá; y l3 h4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 3xp14c1ón d3 su p3c4d0 qu3 h4brá c0m3t1d0, y s3rá p3rd0n4d0.

1 S1 4lgun0 p3c4r3 p0r h4b3r s1d0 ll4m4d0 4 t3st1f1c4r, y fu3r3 t3st1g0 qu3 v10, 0 sup0, y n0 l0 d3nunc14r3, él ll3v4rá su p3c4d0. 2 4s1m1sm0 l4 p3rs0n4 qu3 hub13r3 t0c4d0 cu4lqu13r4 c0s4 1nmund4, s34 c4dáv3r d3 b3st14 1nmund4, 0 c4dáv3r d3 4n1m4l 1nmund0, 0 c4dáv3r d3 r3pt1l 1nmund0, b13n qu3 n0 l0 sup13r3, s3rá 1nmund4 y h4brá d3l1nqu1d0. 3 0 s1 t0c4r3 1nmund1c14 d3 h0mbr3, cu4lqu13r4 1nmund1c14 suy4 c0n qu3 fu3r3 1nmund0, y n0 l0 3ch4r3 d3 v3r, s1 d3spués ll3g4r3 4 s4b3rl0, s3rá culp4bl3. 4 0 s1 4lgun0 jur4r3 4 l4 l1g3r4 c0n sus l4b10s h4c3r m4l 0 h4c3r b13n, 3n cu4lqu13r4 c0s4 qu3 3l h0mbr3 pr0f13r3 c0n jur4m3nt0, y él n0 l0 3nt3nd13r3; s1 d3spués l0 3nt13nd3, s3rá culp4bl3 p0r cu4lqu13r4 d3 3st4s c0s4s. 5 Cu4nd0 p3c4r3 3n 4lgun4 d3 3st4s c0s4s, c0nf3s4rá 4qu3ll0 3n qu3 p3có, 6 y p4r4 su 3xp14c1ón tr43rá 4 J3h0vá p0r su p3c4d0 qu3 c0m3t1ó, un4 h3mbr4 d3 l0s r3b4ñ0s, un4 c0rd3r4 0 un4 c4br4 c0m0 0fr3nd4 d3 3xp14c1ón; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r su p3c4d0. 

7 Y s1 n0 tuv13r3 l0 suf1c13nt3 p4r4 un c0rd3r0, tr43rá 4 J3h0vá 3n 3xp14c1ón p0r su p3c4d0 qu3 c0m3t1ó, d0s tórt0l4s 0 d0s p4l0m1n0s, 3l un0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón, y 3l 0tr0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0. 8 Y l0s tr43rá 4l s4c3rd0t3, 3l cu4l 0fr3c3rá pr1m3r0 3l qu3 3s p4r4 3xp14c1ón; y l3 4rr4nc4rá d3 su cu3ll0 l4 c4b3z4, m4s n0 l4 s3p4r4rá p0r c0mpl3t0. 9 Y r0c14rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón s0br3 l4 p4r3d d3l 4lt4r; y l0 qu3 s0br4r3 d3 l4 s4ngr3 l0 3xpr1m1rá 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r; 3s 3xp14c1ón. 10 Y d3l 0tr0 h4rá h0l0c4ust0 c0nf0rm3 4l r1t0; 4sí 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r 3l p3c4d0 d3 4qu3l qu3 l0 c0m3t1ó, y s3rá p3rd0n4d0. 

11 M4s s1 n0 tuv13r3 l0 suf1c13nt3 p4r4 d0s tórt0l4s, 0 d0s p4l0m1n0s, 3l qu3 p3có tr43rá c0m0 0fr3nd4 l4 déc1m4 p4rt3 d3 un 3f4 d3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4 p4r4 3xp14c1ón. 0fr3nd4s 3xp14t0r14s

14 H4bló más J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 15 Cu4nd0 4lgun4 p3rs0n4 c0m3t13r3 f4lt4, y p3c4r3 p0r y3rr0 3n l4s c0s4s s4nt4s d3 J3h0vá, tr43rá p0r su culp4 4 J3h0vá un c4rn3r0 s1n d3f3ct0 d3 l0s r3b4ñ0s, c0nf0rm3 4 tu 3st1m4c1ón 3n s1cl0s d3 pl4t4 d3l s1cl0 d3l s4ntu4r10, 3n 0fr3nd4 p0r 3l p3c4d0. 16 Y p4g4rá l0 qu3 hub13r3 d3fr4ud4d0 d3 l4s c0s4s s4nt4s, y 4ñ4d1rá 4 3ll0 l4 qu1nt4 p4rt3, y l0 d4rá 4l s4c3rd0t3; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r él c0n 3l c4rn3r0 d3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r 3l p3c4d0, y s3rá p3rd0n4d0. 

17 F1n4lm3nt3, s1 un4 p3rs0n4 p3c4r3, 0 h1c13r3 4lgun4 d3 t0d4s 4qu3ll4s c0s4s qu3 p0r m4nd4m13nt0 d3 J3h0vá n0 s3 h4n d3 h4c3r, 4un s1n h4c3rl0 4 s4b13nd4s, 3s culp4bl3, y ll3v4rá su p3c4d0. 18 Tr43rá, pu3s, 4l s4c3rd0t3 p4r4 3xp14c1ón, s3gún tú l0 3st1m3s, un c4rn3r0 s1n d3f3ct0 d3 l0s r3b4ñ0s; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r 3l y3rr0 qu3 c0m3t1ó p0r 1gn0r4nc14, y s3rá p3rd0n4d0. 19 0s 1nfr4cc1ón, y c13rt4m3nt3 d3l1nqu1ó c0ntr4 J3h0vá.

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 Cu4nd0 un4 p3rs0n4 p3c4r3 3 h1c13r3 pr3v4r1c4c1ón c0ntr4 J3h0vá, y n3g4r3 4 su prój1m0 l0 3nc0m3nd4d0 0 d3j4d0 3n su m4n0, 0 b13n r0b4r3 0 c4lumn14r3 4 su prój1m0, 3 0 h4b13nd0 h4ll4d0 l0 p3rd1d0 d3spués l0 n3g4r3, y jur4r3 3n f4ls0; 3n 4lgun4 d3 t0d4s 4qu3ll4s c0s4s 3n qu3 su3l3 p3c4r 3l h0mbr3, 4 3nt0nc3s, h4b13nd0 p3c4d0 y 0f3nd1d0, r3st1tu1rá 4qu3ll0 qu3 r0bó, 0 3l d4ñ0 d3 l4 c4lumn14, 0 3l d3pós1t0 qu3 s3 l3 3nc0m3ndó, 0 l0 p3rd1d0 qu3 h4lló, 5 0 t0d0 4qu3ll0 s0br3 qu3 hub13r3 jur4d0 f4ls4m3nt3; l0 r3st1tu1rá p0r 3nt3r0 4 4qu3l 4 qu13n p3rt3n3c3, y 4ñ4d1rá 4 3ll0 l4 qu1nt4 p4rt3, 3n 3l dí4 d3 su 3xp14c1ón. 6 Y p4r4 3xp14c1ón d3 su culp4 tr43rá 4 J3h0vá un c4rn3r0 s1n d3f3ct0 d3 l0s r3b4ñ0s, c0nf0rm3 4 tu 3st1m4c1ón, y l0 d4rá 4l s4c3rd0t3 p4r4 l4 3xp14c1ón. 7 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r él d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y 0bt3ndrá p3rdón d3 cu4lqu13r4 d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s 3n qu3 su3l3 0f3nd3r.

14 0st4 3s l4 l3y d3 l4 0fr3nd4: L4 0fr3c3rán l0s h1j0s d3 44rón d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 4nt3 3l 4lt4r. 15 Y t0m4rá d3 3ll4 un puñ4d0 d3 l4 fl0r d3 h4r1n4 d3 l4 0fr3nd4, y d3 su 4c31t3, y t0d0 3l 1nc13ns0 qu3 3stá s0br3 l4 0fr3nd4, y l0 h4rá 4rd3r s0br3 3l 4lt4r p0r m3m0r14l 3n 0l0r gr4t0 4 J3h0vá. 16 Y 3l s0br4nt3 d3 3ll4 l0 c0m3rán 44rón y sus h1j0s; s1n l3v4dur4 s3 c0m3rá 3n lug4r s4nt0; 3n 3l 4tr10 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón l0 c0m3rán. 17 N0 s3 c0c3rá c0n l3v4dur4; l4 h3 d4d0 4 3ll0s p0r su p0rc1ón d3 m1s 0fr3nd4s 3nc3nd1d4s; 3s c0s4 s4ntís1m4, c0m0 3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r 3l p3c4d0, y c0m0 3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r l4 culp4. 18 T0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón c0m3rán d3 3ll4. 0st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 s3rá p4r4 vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s t0c4nt3 4 l4s 0fr3nd4s 3nc3nd1d4s p4r4 J3h0vá; t0d4 c0s4 qu3 t0c4r3 3n 3ll4s s3rá s4nt1f1c4d4. 

19 H4bló t4mb1én J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 20 0st4 3s l4 0fr3nd4 d3 44rón y d3 sus h1j0s, qu3 0fr3c3rán 4 J3h0vá 3l dí4 qu3 fu3r3n ung1d0s: l4 déc1m4 p4rt3 d3 un 3f4 d3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4, 0fr3nd4 p3rp3tu4, l4 m1t4d 4 l4 m4ñ4n4 y l4 m1t4d 4 l4 t4rd3. 21 0n s4rtén s3 pr3p4r4rá c0n 4c31t3; fr1t4 l4 tr43rás, y l0s p3d4z0s c0c1d0s d3 l4 0fr3nd4 0fr3c3rás 3n 0l0r gr4t0 4 J3h0vá. 22 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 3n lug4r d3 44rón fu3r3 ung1d0 d3 3ntr3 sus h1j0s, h4rá 1gu4l 0fr3nd4. 0s 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 d3 J3h0vá; t0d4 3ll4 s3rá qu3m4d4. 23 T0d4 0fr3nd4 d3 s4c3rd0t3 s3rá 3nt3r4m3nt3 qu3m4d4; n0 s3 c0m3rá. 

24 Y h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 25 H4bl4 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, y d1l3s: 0st4 3s l4 l3y d3l s4cr1f1c10 3xp14t0r10: 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 s3 d3gü3ll4 3l h0l0c4ust0, s3rá d3g0ll4d4 l4 0fr3nd4 p0r 3l p3c4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; 3s c0s4 s4ntís1m4. 26 0l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 l4 0fr3c13r3 p0r 3l p3c4d0, l4 c0m3rá; 3n lug4r s4nt0 s3rá c0m1d4, 3n 3l 4tr10 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 27 T0d0 l0 qu3 t0c4r3 su c4rn3, s3rá s4nt1f1c4d0; y s1 s4lp1c4r3 su s4ngr3 s0br3 3l v3st1d0, l4v4rás 4qu3ll0 s0br3 qu3 c4y3r3, 3n lug4r s4nt0. 28 Y l4 v4s1j4 d3 b4rr0 3n qu3 fu3r3 c0c1d4, s3rá qu3br4d4; y s1 fu3r3 c0c1d4 3n v4s1j4 d3 br0nc3, s3rá fr3g4d4 y l4v4d4 c0n 4gu4. 29 T0d0 v4rón d3 3ntr3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s l4 c0m3rá; 3s c0s4 s4ntís1m4. 30 M4s n0 s3 c0m3rá n1ngun4 0fr3nd4 d3 cuy4 s4ngr3 s3 m3t13r3 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón p4r4 h4c3r 3xp14c1ón 3n 3l s4ntu4r10; 4l fu3g0 s3rá qu3m4d4. 

L0VÍT1C0 7

1 4s1m1sm0 3st4 3s l4 l3y d3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r l4 culp4; 3s c0s4 muy s4nt4. 2 0n 3l lug4r d0nd3 d3gü3ll4n 3l h0l0c4ust0, d3g0ll4rán l4 víct1m4 p0r l4 culp4; y r0c14rá su s4ngr3 4lr3d3d0r s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 3 Y d3 3ll4 0fr3c3rá t0d4 su gr0sur4, l4 c0l4, y l4 gr0sur4 qu3 cubr3 l0s 1nt3st1n0s, 4 l0s d0s r1ñ0n3s, l4 gr0sur4 qu3 3stá s0br3 3ll0s, y l4 qu3 3stá s0br3 l0s 1j4r3s; y c0n l0s r1ñ0n3s qu1t4rá l4 gr0sur4 d3 s0br3 3l híg4d0. 5 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 h4rá 4rd3r s0br3 3l 4lt4r, 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá; 3s 3xp14c1ón d3 l4 culp4. 6 T0d0 v4rón d3 3ntr3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s l4 c0m3rá; s3rá c0m1d4 3n lug4r s4nt0; 3s c0s4 muy s4nt4. 7 C0m0 3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r 3l p3c4d0, 4sí 3s 3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r l4 culp4; un4 m1sm4 l3y t3ndrán; s3rá d3l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 h1c13r3 l4 3xp14c1ón c0n 3ll4. 8 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 0fr3c13r3 h0l0c4ust0 d3 4lgun0, l4 p13l d3l h0l0c4ust0 qu3 0fr3c13r3 s3rá p4r4 él. 9 4s1m1sm0 t0d4 0fr3nd4 qu3 s3 c0c13r3 3n h0rn0, y t0d0 l0 qu3 fu3r3 pr3p4r4d0 3n s4rtén 0 3n c4zu3l4, s3rá d3l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 l0 0fr3c13r3. 10 Y t0d4 0fr3nd4 4m4s4d4 c0n 4c31t3, 0 s3c4, s3rá d3 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 44rón, t4nt0 d3 un0 c0m0 d3 0tr0. 

11 Y 3st4 3s l4 l3y d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z qu3 s3 0fr3c3rá 4 J3h0vá: 12 S1 s3 0fr3c13r3 3n 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s, 0fr3c3rá p0r s4cr1f1c10 d3 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s t0rt4s s1n l3v4dur4 4m4s4d4s c0n 4c31t3, y h0j4ldr3s s1n l3v4dur4 unt4d4s c0n 4c31t3, y fl0r d3 h4r1n4 fr1t4 3n t0rt4s 4m4s4d4s c0n 4c31t3. 13 C0n t0rt4s d3 p4n l3ud0 pr3s3nt4rá su 0fr3nd4 3n 3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 4cc10n3s d3 gr4c14s d3 p4z. 14 Y d3 t0d4 l4 0fr3nd4 pr3s3nt4rá un4 p4rt3 p0r 0fr3nd4 3l3v4d4 4 J3h0vá, y s3rá d3l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 r0c14r3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z. 15 Y l4 c4rn3 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z 3n 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s s3 c0m3rá 3n 3l dí4 qu3 fu3r3 0fr3c1d4; n0 d3j4rán d3 3ll4 n4d4 p4r4 0tr0 dí4. 16 M4s s1 3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 su 0fr3nd4 fu3r3 v0t0, 0 v0lunt4r10, s3rá c0m1d0 3n 3l dí4 qu3 0fr3c13r3 su s4cr1f1c10, y l0 qu3 d3 él qu3d4r3, l0 c0m3rán 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3; 17 y l0 qu3 qu3d4r3 d3 l4 c4rn3 d3l s4cr1f1c10 h4st4 3l t3rc3r dí4, s3rá qu3m4d0 3n 3l fu3g0. 18 S1 s3 c0m13r3 d3 l4 c4rn3 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z 4l t3rc3r dí4, 3l qu3 l0 0fr3c13r3 n0 s3rá 4c3pt0, n1 l3 s3rá c0nt4d0; 4b0m1n4c1ón s3rá, y l4 p3rs0n4 qu3 d3 él c0m13r3 ll3v4rá su p3c4d0. 

19 Y l4 c4rn3 qu3 t0c4r3 4lgun4 c0s4 1nmund4, n0 s3 c0m3rá; 4l fu3g0 s3rá qu3m4d4. T0d4 p3rs0n4 l1mp14 p0drá c0m3r l4 c4rn3; 20 p3r0 l4 p3rs0n4 qu3 c0m13r3 l4 c4rn3 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z, 3l cu4l 3s d3 J3h0vá, 3st4nd0 1nmund4, 4qu3ll4 p3rs0n4 s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 21 4d3más, l4 p3rs0n4 qu3 t0c4r3 4lgun4 c0s4 1nmund4, 1nmund1c14 d3 h0mbr3, 0 4n1m4l 1nmund0, 0 cu4lqu13r 4b0m1n4c1ón 1nmund4, y c0m13r3 l4 c4rn3 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z, 3l cu4l 3s d3 J3h0vá, 4qu3ll4 p3rs0n4 s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 

22 H4bló más J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 23 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: N1ngun4 gr0sur4 d3 bu3y n1 d3 c0rd3r0 n1 d3 c4br4 c0m3ré1s. 24 L4 gr0sur4 d3 4n1m4l mu3rt0, y l4 gr0sur4 d3l qu3 fu3 d3sp3d4z4d0 p0r f13r4s, s3 d1sp0ndrá p4r4 cu4lqu13r 0tr0 us0, m4s n0 l4 c0m3ré1s. 25 P0rqu3 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 c0m13r3 gr0sur4 d3 4n1m4l, d3l cu4l s3 0fr3c3 4 J3h0vá 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4, l4 p3rs0n4 qu3 l0 c0m13r3 s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 26 4d3más, n1ngun4 s4ngr3 c0m3ré1s 3n n1ngún lug4r 3n d0nd3 h4b1té1s, n1 d3 4v3s n1 d3 b3st14s. 27 Cu4lqu13r4 p3rs0n4 qu3 c0m13r3 d3 4lgun4 s4ngr3, l4 t4l p3rs0n4 s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 

28 H4bló más J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 29 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: 0l qu3 0fr3c13r3 s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z 4 J3h0vá, tr43rá su 0fr3nd4 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z 4nt3 J3h0vá. 30 Sus m4n0s tr43rán l4s 0fr3nd4s qu3 s3 h4n d3 qu3m4r 4nt3 J3h0vá; tr43rá l4 gr0sur4 c0n 3l p3ch0; 3l p3ch0 p4r4 qu3 s34 m3c1d0 c0m0 s4cr1f1c10 m3c1d0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 31 Y l4 gr0sur4 l4 h4rá 4rd3r 3l s4c3rd0t3 3n 3l 4lt4r, m4s 3l p3ch0 s3rá d3 44rón y d3 sus h1j0s. 32 Y d4ré1s 4l s4c3rd0t3 p4r4 s3r 3l3v4d4 3n 0fr3nd4, l4 3sp4ld1ll4 d3r3ch4 d3 vu3str0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z. 33 0l qu3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón 0fr3c13r3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z, y l4 gr0sur4, r3c1b1rá l4 3sp4ld1ll4 d3r3ch4 c0m0 p0rc1ón suy4. 34 P0rqu3 h3 t0m4d0 d3 l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3l p3ch0 qu3 s3 m3c3 y l4 3sp4ld1ll4 3l3v4d4 3n 0fr3nd4, y l0 h3 d4d0 4 44rón 3l s4c3rd0t3 y 4 sus h1j0s, c0m0 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 35 0st4 3s l4 p0rc1ón d3 44rón y l4 p0rc1ón d3 sus h1j0s, d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s 3nc3nd1d4s 4 J3h0vá, d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 él l0s c0ns4gró p4r4 s3r s4c3rd0t3s d3 J3h0vá, 36 l4 cu4l m4ndó J3h0vá qu3 l3s d13s3n, d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 él l0s ung1ó d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, c0m0 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 3n sus g3n3r4c10n3s. 

37 0st4 3s l4 l3y d3l h0l0c4ust0, d3 l4 0fr3nd4, d3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r 3l p3c4d0, d3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r l4 culp4, d3 l4s c0ns4gr4c10n3s y d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z, 38 l4 cu4l m4ndó J3h0vá 4 M01sés 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S1n4í, 3l dí4 qu3 m4ndó 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 0fr3c13s3n sus 0fr3nd4s 4 J3h0vá, 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n4í.

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 T0m4 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s c0n él, y l4s v3st1dur4s, 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón, 3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, l0s d0s c4rn3r0s, y 3l c4n4st1ll0 d3 l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4; 3 y r3ún3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 4 H1z0, pu3s, M01sés c0m0 J3h0vá l3 m4ndó, y s3 r3un1ó l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 

5 Y d1j0 M01sés 4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón: 0st0 3s l0 qu3 J3h0vá h4 m4nd4d0 h4c3r. 6 0nt0nc3s M01sés h1z0 4c3rc4rs3 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, y l0s l4vó c0n 4gu4. 7 Y pus0 s0br3 él l4 tún1c4, y l3 c1ñó c0n 3l c1nt0; l3 v1st1ó d3spués 3l m4nt0, y pus0 s0br3 él 3l 3f0d, y l0 c1ñó c0n 3l c1nt0 d3l 3f0d, y l0 4justó c0n él. 8 Lu3g0 l3 pus0 3nc1m4 3l p3ct0r4l, y pus0 d3ntr0 d3l m1sm0 l0s Ur1m y Tum1m. 9 D3spués pus0 l4 m1tr4 s0br3 su c4b3z4, y s0br3 l4 m1tr4, 3n fr3nt3, pus0 l4 lám1n4 d3 0r0, l4 d14d3m4 s4nt4, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

10 Y t0mó M01sés 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón y ung1ó 3l t4b3rnácul0 y t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 3st4b4n 3n él, y l4s s4nt1f1có. 11 Y r0c1ó d3 él s0br3 3l 4lt4r s13t3 v3c3s, y ung1ó 3l 4lt4r y t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s, y l4 fu3nt3 y su b4s3, p4r4 s4nt1f1c4rl0s. 12 Y d3rr4mó d3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 44rón, y l0 ung1ó p4r4 s4nt1f1c4rl0. 13 D3spués M01sés h1z0 4c3rc4rs3 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón, y l3s v1st1ó l4s tún1c4s, l3s c1ñó c0n c1nt0s, y l3s 4justó l4s t14r4s, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

14 Lu3g0 h1z0 tr43r 3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, y 44rón y sus h1j0s pus13r0n sus m4n0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, 15 y l0 d3g0lló; y M01sés t0mó l4 s4ngr3, y pus0 c0n su d3d0 s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r 4lr3d3d0r, y pur1f1có 3l 4lt4r; y 3chó l4 d3más s4ngr3 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r, y l0 s4nt1f1có p4r4 r3c0nc1l14r s0br3 él. 16 D3spués t0mó t0d4 l4 gr0sur4 qu3 3st4b4 s0br3 l0s 1nt3st1n0s, y l4 gr0sur4 d3l híg4d0, y l0s d0s r1ñ0n3s, y l4 gr0sur4 d3 3ll0s, y l0 h1z0 4rd3r M01sés s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 17 M4s 3l b3c3rr0, su p13l, su c4rn3 y su 3st1érc0l, l0 qu3mó 4l fu3g0 fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

18 D3spués h1z0 qu3 tr4j3r4n 3l c4rn3r0 d3l h0l0c4ust0, y 44rón y sus h1j0s pus13r0n sus m4n0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l c4rn3r0; 19 y l0 d3g0lló; y r0c1ó M01sés l4 s4ngr3 s0br3 3l 4lt4r 4lr3d3d0r, 20 y c0rtó 3l c4rn3r0 3n tr0z0s; y M01sés h1z0 4rd3r l4 c4b3z4, y l0s tr0z0s, y l4 gr0sur4. 21 L4vó lu3g0 c0n 4gu4 l0s 1nt3st1n0s y l4s p13rn4s, y qu3mó M01sés t0d0 3l c4rn3r0 s0br3 3l 4lt4r; h0l0c4ust0 d3 0l0r gr4t0, 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 p4r4 J3h0vá, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

22 D3spués h1z0 qu3 tr4j3r4n 3l 0tr0 c4rn3r0, 3l c4rn3r0 d3 l4s c0ns4gr4c10n3s, y 44rón y sus h1j0s pus13r0n sus m4n0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l c4rn3r0. 23 Y l0 d3g0lló; y t0mó M01sés d3 l4 s4ngr3, y l4 pus0 s0br3 3l lóbul0 d3 l4 0r3j4 d3r3ch4 d3 44rón, s0br3 3l d3d0 pulg4r d3 su m4n0 d3r3ch4, y s0br3 3l d3d0 pulg4r d3 su p13 d3r3ch0. 24 H1z0 4c3rc4rs3 lu3g0 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón, y pus0 M01sés d3 l4 s4ngr3 s0br3 3l lóbul0 d3 sus 0r3j4s d3r3ch4s, s0br3 l0s pulg4r3s d3 sus m4n0s d3r3ch4s, y s0br3 l0s pulg4r3s d3 sus p13s d3r3ch0s; y r0c1ó M01sés l4 s4ngr3 s0br3 3l 4lt4r 4lr3d3d0r. 

25 D3spués t0mó l4 gr0sur4, l4 c0l4, t0d4 l4 gr0sur4 qu3 3st4b4 s0br3 l0s 1nt3st1n0s, l4 gr0sur4 d3l híg4d0, l0s d0s r1ñ0n3s y l4 gr0sur4 d3 3ll0s, y l4 3sp4ld1ll4 d3r3ch4. 26 Y d3l c4n4st1ll0 d3 l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4, qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, t0mó un4 t0rt4 s1n l3v4dur4, y un4 t0rt4 d3 p4n d3 4c31t3, y un4 h0j4ldr3, y l0 pus0 c0n l4 gr0sur4 y c0n l4 3sp4ld1ll4 d3r3ch4. 27 Y l0 pus0 t0d0 3n l4s m4n0s d3 44rón, y 3n l4s m4n0s d3 sus h1j0s, 3 h1z0 m3c3rl0 c0m0 0fr3nd4 m3c1d4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 28 D3spués t0mó 4qu3ll4s c0s4s M01sés d3 l4s m4n0s d3 3ll0s, y l4s h1z0 4rd3r 3n 3l 4lt4r s0br3 3l h0l0c4ust0; 3r4n l4s c0ns4gr4c10n3s 3n 0l0r gr4t0, 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá. 29 Y t0mó M01sés 3l p3ch0, y l0 m3c1ó, 0fr3nd4 m3c1d4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; d3l c4rn3r0 d3 l4s c0ns4gr4c10n3s 4qu3ll4 fu3 l4 p4rt3 d3 M01sés, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

30 Lu3g0 t0mó M01sés d3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón, y d3 l4 s4ngr3 qu3 3st4b4 s0br3 3l 4lt4r, y r0c1ó s0br3 44rón, y s0br3 sus v3st1dur4s, s0br3 sus h1j0s, y s0br3 l4s v3st1dur4s d3 sus h1j0s c0n él; y s4nt1f1có 4 44rón y sus v3st1dur4s, y 4 sus h1j0s y l4s v3st1dur4s d3 sus h1j0s c0n él. 

31 Y d1j0 M01sés 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s: H3rv1d l4 c4rn3 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón; y c0m3dl4 4llí c0n 3l p4n qu3 3stá 3n 3l c4n4st1ll0 d3 l4s c0ns4gr4c10n3s, s3gún y0 h3 m4nd4d0, d1c13nd0: 44rón y sus h1j0s l4 c0m3rán. 32 Y l0 qu3 s0br3 d3 l4 c4rn3 y d3l p4n, l0 qu3m4ré1s 4l fu3g0. 33 D3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón n0 s4ldré1s 3n s13t3 dí4s, h4st4 3l dí4 qu3 s3 cumpl4n l0s dí4s d3 vu3str4s c0ns4gr4c10n3s; p0rqu3 p0r s13t3 dí4s s3ré1s c0ns4gr4d0s. 34 D3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 h0y s3 h4 h3ch0, m4ndó h4c3r J3h0vá p4r4 3xp14r0s. 35 4 l4 pu3rt4, pu3s, d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón 3st4ré1s dí4 y n0ch3 p0r s13t3 dí4s, y gu4rd4ré1s l4 0rd3n4nz4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 n0 murá1s; p0rqu3 4sí m3 h4 s1d0 m4nd4d0. 36 Y 44rón y sus h1j0s h1c13r0n t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 m4ndó J3h0vá p0r m3d10 d3 M01sés. 

L0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 44rón

1 0n 3l dí4 0ct4v0, M01sés ll4mó 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, y 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l; 2 y d1j0 4 44rón: T0m4 d3 l4 v4c4d4 un b3c3rr0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón, y un c4rn3r0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0, s1n d3f3ct0, y 0fréc3l0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 3 Y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4bl4rás d1c13nd0: T0m4d un m4ch0 c4brí0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón, y un b3c3rr0 y un c0rd3r0 d3 un 4ñ0, s1n d3f3ct0, p4r4 h0l0c4ust0. 4 4s1m1sm0 un bu3y y un c4rn3r0 p4r4 s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z, qu3 1nm0lé1s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y un4 0fr3nd4 4m4s4d4 c0n 4c31t3; p0rqu3 J3h0vá s3 4p4r3c3rá h0y 4 v0s0tr0s. 5 Y ll3v4r0n l0 qu3 m4ndó M01sés d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y v1n0 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón y s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 6 0nt0nc3s M01sés d1j0: 0st0 3s l0 qu3 m4ndó J3h0vá; h4c3dl0, y l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá s3 0s 4p4r3c3rá. 7 Y d1j0 M01sés 4 44rón: 4cérc4t3 4l 4lt4r, y h4z tu 3xp14c1ón y tu h0l0c4ust0, y h4z l4 r3c0nc1l14c1ón p0r t1 y p0r 3l pu3bl0; h4z t4mb1én l4 0fr3nd4 d3l pu3bl0, y h4z l4 r3c0nc1l14c1ón p0r 3ll0s, c0m0 h4 m4nd4d0 J3h0vá. 

8 0nt0nc3s s3 4c3rcó 44rón 4l 4lt4r y d3g0lló 3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón qu3 3r4 p0r él. 9 Y l0s h1j0s d3 44rón l3 tr4j3r0n l4 s4ngr3; y él m0jó su d3d0 3n l4 s4ngr3, y pus0 d3 3ll4 s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r, y d3rr4mó 3l r3st0 d3 l4 s4ngr3 4l p13 d3l 4lt4r. 10 0 h1z0 4rd3r s0br3 3l 4lt4r l4 gr0sur4 c0n l0s r1ñ0n3s y l4 gr0sur4 d3l híg4d0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 11 M4s l4 c4rn3 y l4 p13l l4s qu3mó 4l fu3g0 fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0. 

12 D3g0lló 4s1m1sm0 3l h0l0c4ust0, y l0s h1j0s d3 44rón l3 pr3s3nt4r0n l4 s4ngr3, l4 cu4l r0c1ó él 4lr3d3d0r s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 13 D3spués l3 pr3s3nt4r0n 3l h0l0c4ust0 p13z4 p0r p13z4, y l4 c4b3z4; y l0 h1z0 qu3m4r s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 14 Lu3g0 l4vó l0s 1nt3st1n0s y l4s p13rn4s, y l0s qu3mó s0br3 3l h0l0c4ust0 3n 3l 4lt4r. 

15 0fr3c1ó t4mb1én l4 0fr3nd4 d3l pu3bl0, y t0mó 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 qu3 3r4 p4r4 l4 3xp14c1ón d3l pu3bl0, y l0 d3g0lló, y l0 0fr3c1ó p0r 3l p3c4d0 c0m0 3l pr1m3r0. 16 Y 0fr3c1ó 3l h0l0c4ust0, 3 h1z0 s3gún 3l r1t0. 17 0fr3c1ó 4s1m1sm0 l4 0fr3nd4, y ll3nó d3 3ll4 su m4n0, y l4 h1z0 qu3m4r s0br3 3l 4lt4r, 4d3más d3l h0l0c4ust0 d3 l4 m4ñ4n4. 

18 D3g0lló t4mb1én 3l bu3y y 3l c4rn3r0 3n s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z, qu3 3r4 d3l pu3bl0; y l0s h1j0s d3 44rón l3 pr3s3nt4r0n l4 s4ngr3, l4 cu4l r0c1ó él s0br3 3l 4lt4r 4lr3d3d0r; 19 y l4s gr0sur4s d3l bu3y y d3l c4rn3r0, l4 c0l4, l4 gr0sur4 qu3 cubr3 l0s 1nt3st1n0s, l0s r1ñ0n3s, y l4 gr0sur4 d3l híg4d0; 20 y pus13r0n l4s gr0sur4s s0br3 l0s p3ch0s, y él l4s qu3mó s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 21 P3r0 l0s p3ch0s, c0n l4 3sp4ld1ll4 d3r3ch4, l0s m3c1ó 44rón c0m0 0fr3nd4 m3c1d4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

22 D3spués 4lzó 44rón sus m4n0s h4c14 3l pu3bl0 y l0 b3nd1j0; y d3spués d3 h4c3r l4 3xp14c1ón, 3l h0l0c4ust0 y 3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 p4z, d3sc3nd1ó. 23 Y 3ntr4r0n M01sés y 44rón 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y s4l13r0n y b3nd1j3r0n 4l pu3bl0; y l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá s3 4p4r3c1ó 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0. 24 Y s4l1ó fu3g0 d3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y c0nsum1ó 3l h0l0c4ust0 c0n l4s gr0sur4s s0br3 3l 4lt4r; y v1énd0l0 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, 4l4b4r0n, y s3 p0str4r0n s0br3 sus r0str0s.

1 N4d4b y 4b1ú, h1j0s d3 44rón, t0m4r0n c4d4 un0 su 1nc3ns4r10, y pus13r0n 3n 3ll0s fu3g0, s0br3 3l cu4l pus13r0n 1nc13ns0, y 0fr3c13r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá fu3g0 3xtr4ñ0, qu3 él nunc4 l3s m4ndó. 2 Y s4l1ó fu3g0 d3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá y l0s qu3mó, y mur13r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 3 0nt0nc3s d1j0 M01sés 4 44rón: 0st0 3s l0 qu3 h4bló J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 0n l0s qu3 4 mí s3 4c3rc4n m3 s4nt1f1c4ré, y 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 s3ré gl0r1f1c4d0. Y 44rón c4lló. 

4 Y ll4mó M01sés 4 M1s43l y 4 0lz4fán, h1j0s d3 Uz13l tí0 d3 44rón, y l3s d1j0: 4c3rc40s y s4c4d 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s d3 d3l4nt3 d3l s4ntu4r10, fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0. 5 Y 3ll0s s3 4c3rc4r0n y l0s s4c4r0n c0n sus tún1c4s fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, c0m0 d1j0 M01sés. 6 0nt0nc3s M01sés d1j0 4 44rón, y 4 0l34z4r 3 1t4m4r sus h1j0s: N0 d3scubrá1s vu3str4s c4b3z4s, n1 r4sgué1s vu3str0s v3st1d0s 3n s3ñ4l d3 du3l0, p4r4 qu3 n0 murá1s, n1 s3 l3v4nt3 l4 1r4 s0br3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón; p3r0 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, sí l4m3nt4rán p0r 3l 1nc3nd10 qu3 J3h0vá h4 h3ch0. 7 N1 s4ldré1s d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, p0rqu3 m0r1ré1s; p0r cu4nt0 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón d3 J3h0vá 3stá s0br3 v0s0tr0s. Y 3ll0s h1c13r0n c0nf0rm3 4l d1ch0 d3 M01sés. 

8 Y J3h0vá h4bló 4 44rón, d1c13nd0: 9 Tú, y tus h1j0s c0nt1g0, n0 b3b3ré1s v1n0 n1 s1dr4 cu4nd0 3ntré1s 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, p4r4 qu3 n0 murá1s; 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 s3rá p4r4 vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s, 10 p4r4 p0d3r d1sc3rn1r 3ntr3 l0 s4nt0 y l0 pr0f4n0, y 3ntr3 l0 1nmund0 y l0 l1mp10, 11 y p4r4 3ns3ñ4r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l t0d0s l0s 3st4tut0s qu3 J3h0vá l3s h4 d1ch0 p0r m3d10 d3 M01sés. 

12 Y M01sés d1j0 4 44rón, y 4 0l34z4r y 4 1t4m4r sus h1j0s qu3 h4bí4n qu3d4d0: T0m4d l4 0fr3nd4 qu3 qu3d4 d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s 3nc3nd1d4s 4 J3h0vá, y c0m3dl4 s1n l3v4dur4 junt0 4l 4lt4r, p0rqu3 3s c0s4 muy s4nt4. 13 L4 c0m3ré1s, pu3s, 3n lug4r s4nt0; p0rqu3 3st0 3s p4r4 t1 y p4r4 tus h1j0s, d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s 3nc3nd1d4s 4 J3h0vá, pu3s qu3 4sí m3 h4 s1d0 m4nd4d0. 14 C0m3ré1s 4s1m1sm0 3n lug4r l1mp10, tú y tus h1j0s y tus h1j4s c0nt1g0, 3l p3ch0 m3c1d0 y l4 3sp4ld1ll4 3l3v4d4, p0rqu3 p0r d3r3ch0 s0n tuy0s y d3 tus h1j0s, d4d0s d3 l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 15 C0n l4s 0fr3nd4s d3 l4s gr0sur4s qu3 s3 h4n d3 qu3m4r, tr43rán l4 3sp4ld1ll4 qu3 s3 h4 d3 3l3v4r y 3l p3ch0 qu3 s3rá m3c1d0 c0m0 0fr3nd4 m3c1d4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; y s3rá p0r d3r3ch0 p3rp3tu0 tuy0 y d3 tus h1j0s, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4 m4nd4d0. 

16 Y M01sés pr3guntó p0r 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, y s3 h4lló qu3 h4bí4 s1d0 qu3m4d0; y s3 3n0jó c0ntr4 0l34z4r 3 1t4m4r, l0s h1j0s qu3 h4bí4n qu3d4d0 d3 44rón, d1c13nd0: 17 ¿P0r qué n0 c0m1st31s l4 3xp14c1ón 3n lug4r s4nt0? Pu3s 3s muy s4nt4, y l4 d10 él 4 v0s0tr0s p4r4 ll3v4r l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, p4r4 qu3 s34n r3c0nc1l14d0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 18 V3d qu3 l4 s4ngr3 n0 fu3 ll3v4d4 d3ntr0 d3l s4ntu4r10; y v0s0tr0s d3bí41s c0m3r l4 0fr3nd4 3n 3l lug4r s4nt0, c0m0 y0 m4ndé. 19 Y r3sp0nd1ó 44rón 4 M01sés: H3 4quí h0y h4n 0fr3c1d0 su 3xp14c1ón y su h0l0c4ust0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; p3r0 4 mí m3 h4n suc3d1d0 3st4s c0s4s, y s1 hub13r4 y0 c0m1d0 h0y d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 3xp14c1ón, ¿s3rí4 3st0 gr4t0 4 J3h0vá? 20 Y cu4nd0 M01sés 0yó 3st0, s3 d10 p0r s4t1sf3ch0. 

4n1m4l3s l1mp10s 3 1nmund0s

(Dt. 14.3-21)

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, d1c1énd0l3s: 2 H4bl4d 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d3c1dl3s: 0st0s s0n l0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 c0m3ré1s d3 3ntr3 t0d0s l0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 h4y s0br3 l4 t13rr4. 3 D3 3ntr3 l0s 4n1m4l3s, t0d0 3l qu3 t13n3 p3zuñ4 h3nd1d4 y qu3 rum14, ést3 c0m3ré1s. 4 P3r0 d3 l0s qu3 rum14n 0 qu3 t13n3n p3zuñ4, n0 c0m3ré1s ést0s: 3l c4m3ll0, p0rqu3 rum14 p3r0 n0 t13n3 p3zuñ4 h3nd1d4, l0 t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0. 5 T4mb1én 3l c0n3j0, p0rqu3 rum14, p3r0 n0 t13n3 p3zuñ4, l0 t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0. 6 4s1m1sm0 l4 l13br3, p0rqu3 rum14, p3r0 n0 t13n3 p3zuñ4, l4 t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund4. 7 T4mb1én 3l c3rd0, p0rqu3 t13n3 p3zuñ4s, y 3s d3 p3zuñ4s h3nd1d4s, p3r0 n0 rum14, l0 t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0. 8 D3 l4 c4rn3 d3 3ll0s n0 c0m3ré1s, n1 t0c4ré1s su cu3rp0 mu3rt0; l0s t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0s. 

9 0st0 c0m3ré1s d3 t0d0s l0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 v1v3n 3n l4s 4gu4s: t0d0s l0s qu3 t13n3n 4l3t4s y 3sc4m4s 3n l4s 4gu4s d3l m4r, y 3n l0s rí0s, 3st0s c0m3ré1s. 10 P3r0 t0d0s l0s qu3 n0 t13n3n 4l3t4s n1 3sc4m4s 3n 3l m4r y 3n l0s rí0s, 4sí d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 s3 mu3v3 c0m0 d3 t0d4 c0s4 v1v13nt3 qu3 3stá 3n l4s 4gu4s, l0s t3ndré1s 3n 4b0m1n4c1ón. 11 0s s3rán, pu3s, 4b0m1n4c1ón; d3 su c4rn3 n0 c0m3ré1s, y 4b0m1n4ré1s sus cu3rp0s mu3rt0s. 12 T0d0 l0 qu3 n0 tuv13r3 4l3t4s y 3sc4m4s 3n l4s 4gu4s, l0 t3ndré1s 3n 4b0m1n4c1ón. 

13 Y d3 l4s 4v3s, ést4s t3ndré1s 3n 4b0m1n4c1ón; n0 s3 c0m3rán, s3rán 4b0m1n4c1ón: 3l águ1l4, 3l qu3br4nt4hu3s0s, 3l 4z0r, 14 3l g4ll1n4z0, 3l m1l4n0 s3gún su 3sp3c13; 15 t0d0 cu3rv0 s3gún su 3sp3c13; 16 3l 4v3struz, l4 l3chuz4, l4 g4v10t4, 3l g4v1lán s3gún su 3sp3c13; 17 3l buh0, 3l s0m0rmuj0, 3l 1b1s, 18 3l c4l4món, 3l p3líc4n0, 3l bu1tr3, 19 l4 c1gü3ñ4, l4 g4rz4 s3gún su 3sp3c13, l4 4bub1ll4 y 3l murc1él4g0. 

20 T0d0 1ns3ct0 4l4d0 qu3 4nduv13r3 s0br3 cu4tr0 p4t4s, t3ndré1s 3n 4b0m1n4c1ón. 21 P3r0 3st0 c0m3ré1s d3 t0d0 1ns3ct0 4l4d0 qu3 4nd4 s0br3 cu4tr0 p4t4s, qu3 tuv13r3 p13rn4s 4d3más d3 sus p4t4s p4r4 s4lt4r c0n 3ll4s s0br3 l4 t13rr4; 22 3st0s c0m3ré1s d3 3ll0s: l4 l4ng0st4 s3gún su 3sp3c13, 3l l4ng0stín s3gún su 3sp3c13, 3l 4rg0l s3gún su 3sp3c13, y 3l h4g4b s3gún su 3sp3c13. 23 T0d0 1ns3ct0 4l4d0 qu3 t3ng4 cu4tr0 p4t4s, t3ndré1s 3n 4b0m1n4c1ón. 

24 Y p0r 3st4s c0s4s s3ré1s 1nmund0s; cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t0c4r3 sus cu3rp0s mu3rt0s s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3, 25 y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 ll3v4r3 4lg0 d3 sus c4dáv3r3s l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 26 T0d0 4n1m4l d3 p3zuñ4, p3r0 qu3 n0 t13n3 p3zuñ4 h3nd1d4, n1 rum14, t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0; y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 l0s t0c4r3 s3rá 1nmund0. 27 Y d3 t0d0s l0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 4nd4n 3n cu4tr0 p4t4s, t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0 4 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 4nd3 s0br3 sus g4rr4s; y t0d0 3l qu3 t0c4r3 sus c4dáv3r3s s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 28 Y 3l qu3 ll3v4r3 sus c4dáv3r3s, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3; l0s t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0s. 

29 Y t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0s 4 3st0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 s3 mu3v3n s0br3 l4 t13rr4: l4 c0m4dr3j4, 3l r4tón, l4 r4n4 s3gún su 3sp3c13, 30 3l 3r1z0, 3l c0c0dr1l0, 3l l4g4rt0, l4 l4g4rt1j4 y 3l c4m4l3ón. 31 0st0s t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund0s d3 3ntr3 l0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 s3 mu3v3n, y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 l0s t0c4r3 cu4nd0 3stuv13r3n mu3rt0s s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 32 Y t0d0 4qu3ll0 s0br3 qu3 c4y3r3 4lg0 d3 3ll0s d3spués d3 mu3rt0s, s3rá 1nmund0; s34 c0s4 d3 m4d3r4, v3st1d0, p13l, s4c0, s34 cu4lqu13r 1nstrum3nt0 c0n qu3 s3 tr4b4j4, s3rá m3t1d0 3n 4gu4, y qu3d4rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3; 3nt0nc3s qu3d4rá l1mp10. 33 T0d4 v4s1j4 d3 b4rr0 d3ntr0 d3 l4 cu4l c4y3r3 4lgun0 d3 3ll0s s3rá 1nmund4, 4sí c0m0 t0d0 l0 qu3 3stuv13r3 3n 3ll4, y qu3br4ré1s l4 v4s1j4. 34 T0d0 4l1m3nt0 qu3 s3 c0m3, s0br3 3l cu4l c4y3r3 3l 4gu4 d3 t4l3s v4s1j4s, s3rá 1nmund0; y t0d4 b3b1d4 qu3 hub13r3 3n 3s4s v4s1j4s s3rá 1nmund4. 35 T0d0 4qu3ll0 s0br3 qu3 c4y3r3 4lg0 d3l c4dáv3r d3 3ll0s s3rá 1nmund0; 3l h0rn0 u h0rn1ll0s s3 d3rr1b4rán; s0n 1nmund0s, y p0r 1nmund0s l0s t3ndré1s. 36 C0n t0d0, l4 fu3nt3 y l4 c1st3rn4 d0nd3 s3 r3c0g3n 4gu4s s3rán l1mp14s; m4s l0 qu3 hub13r3 t0c4d0 3n l0s c4dáv3r3s s3rá 1nmund0. 37 Y s1 c4y3r3 4lg0 d3 l0s c4dáv3r3s s0br3 4lgun4 s3m1ll4 qu3 s3 h4y4 d3 s3mbr4r, s3rá l1mp14. 38 M4s s1 s3 hub13r3 pu3st0 4gu4 3n l4 s3m1ll4, y c4y3r3 4lg0 d3 l0s c4dáv3r3s s0br3 3ll4, l4 t3ndré1s p0r 1nmund4. 

39 Y s1 4lgún 4n1m4l qu3 tuv13r31s p4r4 c0m3r mur13r3, 3l qu3 t0c4r3 su c4dáv3r s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 40 Y 3l qu3 c0m13r3 d3l cu3rp0 mu3rt0, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3; 4s1m1sm0 3l qu3 s4c4r3 3l cu3rp0 mu3rt0, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 

41 Y t0d0 r3pt1l qu3 s3 4rr4str4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4 3s 4b0m1n4c1ón; n0 s3 c0m3rá. 42 T0d0 l0 qu3 4nd4 s0br3 3l p3ch0, y t0d0 l0 qu3 4nd4 s0br3 cu4tr0 0 más p4t4s, d3 t0d0 4n1m4l qu3 s3 4rr4str4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, n0 l0 c0m3ré1s, p0rqu3 3s 4b0m1n4c1ón. 43 N0 h4gá1s 4b0m1n4bl3s vu3str4s p3rs0n4s c0n n1ngún 4n1m4l qu3 s3 4rr4str4, n1 0s c0nt4m1né1s c0n 3ll0s, n1 s3á1s 1nmund0s p0r 3ll0s. 44 P0rqu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s; v0s0tr0s p0r t4nt0 0s s4nt1f1c4ré1s, y s3ré1s s4nt0s, p0rqu3 y0 s0y s4nt0; 4sí qu3 n0 c0nt4m1né1s vu3str4s p3rs0n4s c0n n1ngún 4n1m4l qu3 s3 4rr4str3 s0br3 l4 t13rr4. 45 P0rqu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, qu3 0s h4g0 sub1r d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 p4r4 s3r vu3str0 D10s: s3ré1s, pu3s, s4nt0s, p0rqu3 y0 s0y s4nt0. 

46 0st4 3s l4 l3y 4c3rc4 d3 l4s b3st14s, y l4s 4v3s, y t0d0 s3r v1v13nt3 qu3 s3 mu3v3 3n l4s 4gu4s, y t0d0 4n1m4l qu3 s3 4rr4str4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, 47 p4r4 h4c3r d1f3r3nc14 3ntr3 l0 1nmund0 y l0 l1mp10, y 3ntr3 l0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 s3 pu3d3n c0m3r y l0s 4n1m4l3s qu3 n0 s3 pu3d3n c0m3r. 

L4 pur1f1c4c1ón d3 l4 muj3r d3spués d3l p4rt0

L0VÍT1C0 12

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: L4 muj3r cu4nd0 c0nc1b4 y dé 4 luz v4rón, s3rá 1nmund4 s13t3 dí4s; c0nf0rm3 4 l0s dí4s d3 su m3nstru4c1ón s3rá 1nmund4. 3 Y 4l 0ct4v0 dí4 s3 c1rcunc1d4rá 4l n1ñ0. 4 M4s 3ll4 p3rm4n3c3rá tr31nt4 y tr3s dí4s pur1f1cánd0s3 d3 su s4ngr3; n1ngun4 c0s4 s4nt4 t0c4rá, n1 v3ndrá 4l s4ntu4r10, h4st4 cu4nd0 s34n cumpl1d0s l0s dí4s d3 su pur1f1c4c1ón. 5 Y s1 d13r3 4 luz h1j4, s3rá 1nmund4 d0s s3m4n4s, c0nf0rm3 4 su s3p4r4c1ón, y s3s3nt4 y s31s dí4s 3st4rá pur1f1cánd0s3 d3 su s4ngr3. 

6 Cu4nd0 l0s dí4s d3 su pur1f1c4c1ón fu3r3n cumpl1d0s, p0r h1j0 0 p0r h1j4, tr43rá un c0rd3r0 d3 un 4ñ0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0, y un p4l0m1n0 0 un4 tórt0l4 p4r4 3xp14c1ón, 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 4l s4c3rd0t3; 7 y él l0s 0fr3c3rá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r 3ll4, y s3rá l1mp14 d3l fluj0 d3 su s4ngr3. 0st4 3s l4 l3y p4r4 l4 qu3 d13r3 4 luz h1j0 0 h1j4. 8 Y s1 n0 t13n3 l0 suf1c13nt3 p4r4 un c0rd3r0, t0m4rá 3nt0nc3s d0s tórt0l4s 0 d0s p4l0m1n0s, un0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0 y 0tr0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r 3ll4, y s3rá l1mp14.
