1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, d1c13nd0: 2 Cu4nd0 3l h0mbr3 tuv13r3 3n l4 p13l d3 su cu3rp0 h1nch4zón, 0 3rupc1ón, 0 m4nch4 bl4nc4, y hub13r3 3n l4 p13l d3 su cu3rp0 c0m0 ll4g4 d3 l3pr4, s3rá tr4íd0 4 44rón 3l s4c3rd0t3 0 4 un0 d3 sus h1j0s l0s s4c3rd0t3s. 3 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 m1r4rá l4 ll4g4 3n l4 p13l d3l cu3rp0; s1 3l p3l0 3n l4 ll4g4 s3 h4 vu3lt0 bl4nc0, y p4r3c13r3 l4 ll4g4 más pr0fund4 qu3 l4 p13l d3 l4 c4rn3, ll4g4 d3 l3pr4 3s; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 r3c0n0c3rá, y l3 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0. 4 Y s1 3n l4 p13l d3 su cu3rp0 hub13r3 m4nch4 bl4nc4, p3r0 qu3 n0 p4r3c13r3 más pr0fund4 qu3 l4 p13l, n1 3l p3l0 s3 hub13r3 vu3lt0 bl4nc0, 3nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 3nc3rr4rá 4l ll4g4d0 p0r s13t3 dí4s. 5 Y 4l sépt1m0 dí4 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 m1r4rá; y s1 l4 ll4g4 c0ns3rv4 3l m1sm0 4sp3ct0, n0 h4b1énd0s3 3xt3nd1d0 3n l4 p13l, 3nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 v0lv3rá 4 3nc3rr4r p0r 0tr0s s13t3 dí4s. 6 Y 4l sépt1m0 dí4 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 r3c0n0c3rá d3 nu3v0; y s1 p4r3c3 h4b3rs3 0scur3c1d0 l4 ll4g4, y qu3 n0 h4 cund1d0 3n l4 p13l, 3nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá l1mp10: 3r4 3rupc1ón; y l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y s3rá l1mp10. 7 P3r0 s1 s3 3xt3nd13r3 l4 3rupc1ón 3n l4 p13l d3spués qu3 él s3 m0stró 4l s4c3rd0t3 p4r4 s3r l1mp10, d3b3rá m0str4rs3 0tr4 v3z 4l s4c3rd0t3. 8 Y s1 r3c0n0c1énd0l0 3l s4c3rd0t3 v3 qu3 l4 3rupc1ón s3 h4 3xt3nd1d0 3n l4 p13l, l0 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0: 3s l3pr4. 

9 Cu4nd0 hub13r3 ll4g4 d3 l3pr4 3n 3l h0mbr3, s3rá tr4íd0 4l s4c3rd0t3. 10 Y ést3 l0 m1r4rá, y s1 4p4r3c13r3 tum0r bl4nc0 3n l4 p13l, 3l cu4l h4y4 mud4d0 3l c0l0r d3l p3l0, y s3 d3scubr3 4s1m1sm0 l4 c4rn3 v1v4, 11 3s l3pr4 crón1c4 3n l4 p13l d3 su cu3rp0; y l3 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0 3l s4c3rd0t3, y n0 l3 3nc3rr4rá, p0rqu3 3s 1nmund0. 12 M4s s1 br0t4r3 l4 l3pr4 cund13nd0 p0r l4 p13l, d3 m0d0 qu3 cubr13r3 t0d4 l4 p13l d3l ll4g4d0 d3sd3 l4 c4b3z4 h4st4 sus p13s, h4st4 d0nd3 pu3d4 v3r 3l s4c3rd0t3, 13 3nt0nc3s ést3 l3 r3c0n0c3rá; y s1 l4 l3pr4 hub13r3 cub13rt0 t0d0 su cu3rp0, d3cl4r4rá l1mp10 4l ll4g4d0; t0d4 3ll4 s3 h4 vu3lt0 bl4nc4, y él 3s l1mp10. 14 M4s 3l dí4 qu3 4p4r3c13r3 3n él l4 c4rn3 v1v4, s3rá 1nmund0. 15 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 m1r4rá l4 c4rn3 v1v4, y l0 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0. 0s 1nmund4 l4 c4rn3 v1v4; 3s l3pr4. 16 M4s cu4nd0 l4 c4rn3 v1v4 c4mb14r3 y s3 v0lv13r3 bl4nc4, 3nt0nc3s v3ndrá 4l s4c3rd0t3, 17 y 3l s4c3rd0t3 m1r4rá; y s1 l4 ll4g4 s3 hub13r3 vu3lt0 bl4nc4, 3l s4c3rd0t3 d3cl4r4rá l1mp10 4l qu3 t3ní4 l4 ll4g4, y s3rá l1mp10. 

18 Y cu4nd0 3n l4 p13l d3 l4 c4rn3 hub13r3 d1v13s0, y s3 s4n4r3, 19 y 3n 3l lug4r d3l d1v13s0 hub13r3 un4 h1nch4zón, 0 un4 m4nch4 bl4nc4 r0j1z4, s3rá m0str4d0 4l s4c3rd0t3. 20 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 m1r4rá; y s1 p4r3c13r3 3st4r más pr0fund4 qu3 l4 p13l, y su p3l0 s3 hub13r3 vu3lt0 bl4nc0, 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0; 3s ll4g4 d3 l3pr4 qu3 s3 0r1g1nó 3n 3l d1v13s0. 21 Y s1 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 c0ns1d3r4r3, y n0 4p4r3c13r3 3n 3ll4 p3l0 bl4nc0, n1 fu3r3 más pr0fund4 qu3 l4 p13l, s1n0 0scur4, 3nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 3nc3rr4rá p0r s13t3 dí4s; 22 y s1 s3 fu3r3 3xt3nd13nd0 p0r l4 p13l, 3nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0; 3s ll4g4. 23 P3r0 s1 l4 m4nch4 bl4nc4 s3 3stuv13r3 3n su lug4r, y n0 s3 hub13r3 3xt3nd1d0, 3s l4 c1c4tr1z d3l d1v13s0, y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá l1mp10. 

24 4s1m1sm0 cu4nd0 hub13r3 3n l4 p13l d3l cu3rp0 qu3m4dur4 d3 fu3g0, y hub13r3 3n l0 s4n4d0 d3l fu3g0 m4nch4 bl4nqu3c1n4, r0j1z4 0 bl4nc4, 25 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 m1r4rá; y s1 3l p3l0 s3 hub13r3 vu3lt0 bl4nc0 3n l4 m4nch4, y ést4 p4r3c13r3 s3r más pr0fund4 qu3 l4 p13l, 3s l3pr4 qu3 s4l1ó 3n l4 qu3m4dur4; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0, p0r s3r ll4g4 d3 l3pr4. 26 M4s s1 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 m1r4r3, y n0 4p4r3c13r3 3n l4 m4nch4 p3l0 bl4nc0, n1 fu3r3 más pr0fund4 qu3 l4 p13l, s1n0 qu3 3stuv13r3 0scur4, l3 3nc3rr4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 p0r s13t3 dí4s. 27 Y 4l sépt1m0 dí4 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 r3c0n0c3rá; y s1 s3 hub13r3 1d0 3xt3nd13nd0 p0r l4 p13l, 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá 1nmund0; 3s ll4g4 d3 l3pr4. 28 P3r0 s1 l4 m4nch4 s3 3stuv13r3 3n su lug4r, y n0 s3 hub13r3 3xt3nd1d0 3n l4 p13l, s1n0 qu3 3stuv13r3 0scur4, 3s l4 c1c4tr1z d3 l4 qu3m4dur4; 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá l1mp10, p0rqu3 s3ñ4l d3 l4 qu3m4dur4 3s.

38 4s1m1sm0 cu4nd0 3l h0mbr3 0 l4 muj3r tuv13r3 3n l4 p13l d3 su cu3rp0 m4nch4s, m4nch4s bl4nc4s, 39 3l s4c3rd0t3 m1r4rá, y s1 3n l4 p13l d3 su cu3rp0 4p4r3c13r3n m4nch4s bl4nc4s 4lg0 0scur3c1d4s, 3s 3mp31n3 qu3 br0tó 3n l4 p13l; 3stá l1mp14 l4 p3rs0n4. 

40 Y 3l h0mbr3, cu4nd0 s3 l3 c4y3r3 3l c4b3ll0, 3s c4lv0, p3r0 l1mp10. 41 Y s1 h4c14 su fr3nt3 s3 l3 c4y3r3 3l c4b3ll0, 3s c4lv0 p0r d3l4nt3, p3r0 l1mp10. 42 M4s cu4nd0 3n l4 c4lv4 0 3n l4 4nt3c4lv4 hub13r3 ll4g4 bl4nc4 r0j1z4, l3pr4 3s qu3 br0t4 3n su c4lv4 0 3n su 4nt3c4lv4. 43 0nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 m1r4rá, y s1 p4r3c13r3 l4 h1nch4zón d3 l4 ll4g4 bl4nc4 r0j1z4 3n su c4lv4 0 3n su 4nt3c4lv4, c0m0 3l p4r3c3r d3 l4 l3pr4 d3 l4 p13l d3l cu3rp0, 44 l3pr0s0 3s, 3s 1nmund0, y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 d3cl4r4rá lu3g0 1nmund0; 3n su c4b3z4 t13n3 l4 ll4g4. 

45 Y 3l l3pr0s0 3n qu13n hub13r3 ll4g4 ll3v4rá v3st1d0s r4sg4d0s y su c4b3z4 d3scub13rt4, y 3mb0z4d0 pr3g0n4rá: ¡1nmund0! ¡1nmund0! 46 T0d0 3l t13mp0 qu3 l4 ll4g4 3stuv13r3 3n él, s3rá 1nmund0; 3st4rá 1mpur0, y h4b1t4rá s0l0; fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 s3rá su m0r4d4.

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4d 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d3c1dl3s: Cu4lqu13r v4rón, cu4nd0 tuv13r3 fluj0 d3 s3m3n, s3rá 1nmund0. 3 Y 3st4 s3rá su 1nmund1c14 3n su fluj0: s34 qu3 su cu3rp0 d3st1ló 4 c4us4 d3 su fluj0, 0 qu3 d3j3 d3 d3st1l4r 4 c4us4 d3 su fluj0, él s3rá 1nmund0. 4 T0d4 c4m4 3n qu3 s3 4c0st4r3 3l qu3 tuv13r3 fluj0, s3rá 1nmund4; y t0d4 c0s4 s0br3 qu3 s3 s3nt4r3, 1nmund4 s3rá. 5 Y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t0c4r3 su c4m4 l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s; s3 l4v4rá t4mb1én 4 sí m1sm0 c0n 4gu4, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 6 Y 3l qu3 s3 s3nt4r3 s0br3 4qu3ll0 3n qu3 s3 hub13r3 s3nt4d0 3l qu3 t13n3 fluj0, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, s3 l4v4rá t4mb1én 4 sí m1sm0 c0n 4gu4, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 7 4s1m1sm0 3l qu3 t0c4r3 3l cu3rp0 d3l qu3 t13n3 fluj0, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y 4 sí m1sm0 s3 l4v4rá c0n 4gu4, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 8 Y s1 3l qu3 t13n3 fluj0 3scup13r3 s0br3 3l l1mp10, ést3 l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y d3spués d3 h4b3rs3 l4v4d0 c0n 4gu4, s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 9 Y t0d4 m0ntur4 s0br3 qu3 c4b4lg4r3 3l qu3 tuv13r3 fluj0 s3rá 1nmund4. 10 Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t0c4r3 cu4lqu13r4 c0s4 qu3 h4y4 3st4d0 d3b4j0 d3 él, s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3; y 3l qu3 l4 ll3v4r3, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y d3spués d3 l4v4rs3 c0n 4gu4, s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 11 Y t0d0 4qu3l 4 qu13n t0c4r3 3l qu3 t13n3 fluj0, y n0 l4v4r3 c0n 4gu4 sus m4n0s, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y 4 sí m1sm0 s3 l4v4rá c0n 4gu4, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 12 L4 v4s1j4 d3 b4rr0 qu3 t0c4r3 3l qu3 t13n3 fluj0 s3rá qu3br4d4, y t0d4 v4s1j4 d3 m4d3r4 s3rá l4v4d4 c0n 4gu4. 

13 Cu4nd0 s3 hub13r3 l1mp14d0 d3 su fluj0 3l qu3 t13n3 fluj0, c0nt4rá s13t3 dí4s d3sd3 su pur1f1c4c1ón, y l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y l4v4rá su cu3rp0 3n 4gu4s c0rr13nt3s, y s3rá l1mp10. 14 Y 3l 0ct4v0 dí4 t0m4rá d0s tórt0l4s 0 d0s p4l0m1n0s, y v3ndrá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y l0s d4rá 4l s4c3rd0t3; 15 y 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá d3l un0 0fr3nd4 p0r 3l p3c4d0, y d3l 0tr0 h0l0c4ust0; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 pur1f1c4rá d3 su fluj0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 

16 Cu4nd0 3l h0mbr3 tuv13r3 3m1s1ón d3 s3m3n, l4v4rá 3n 4gu4 t0d0 su cu3rp0, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 17 Y t0d4 v3st1dur4, 0 t0d4 p13l s0br3 l4 cu4l c4y3r3 l4 3m1s1ón d3l s3m3n, s3 l4v4rá c0n 4gu4, y s3rá 1nmund4 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 18 Y cu4nd0 un h0mbr3 y4c13r3 c0n un4 muj3r y tuv13r3 3m1s1ón d3 s3m3n, 4mb0s s3 l4v4rán c0n 4gu4, y s3rán 1nmund0s h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 

19 Cu4nd0 l4 muj3r tuv13r3 fluj0 d3 s4ngr3, y su fluj0 fu3r3 3n su cu3rp0, s13t3 dí4s 3st4rá 4p4rt4d4; y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 l4 t0c4r3 s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 20 T0d0 4qu3ll0 s0br3 qu3 3ll4 s3 4c0st4r3 m13ntr4s 3stuv13r3 s3p4r4d4, s3rá 1nmund0; t4mb1én t0d0 4qu3ll0 s0br3 qu3 s3 s3nt4r3 s3rá 1nmund0. 21 Y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t0c4r3 su c4m4, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y d3spués d3 l4v4rs3 c0n 4gu4, s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 22 T4mb1én cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t0c4r3 cu4lqu13r mu3bl3 s0br3 qu3 3ll4 s3 hub13r3 s3nt4d0, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s; s3 l4v4rá lu3g0 4 sí m1sm0 c0n 4gu4, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 23 Y l0 qu3 3stuv13r3 s0br3 l4 c4m4, 0 s0br3 l4 s1ll4 3n qu3 3ll4 s3 hub13r3 s3nt4d0, 3l qu3 l0 t0c4r3 s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 24 S1 4lgun0 durm13r3 c0n 3ll4, y su m3nstru0 fu3r3 s0br3 él, s3rá 1nmund0 p0r s13t3 dí4s; y t0d4 c4m4 s0br3 qu3 durm13r3, s3rá 1nmund4. 

25 Y l4 muj3r, cu4nd0 s1gu13r3 3l fluj0 d3 su s4ngr3 p0r much0s dí4s fu3r4 d3l t13mp0 d3 su c0stumbr3, 0 cu4nd0 tuv13r3 fluj0 d3 s4ngr3 más d3 su c0stumbr3, t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 su fluj0 s3rá 1nmund4 c0m0 3n l0s dí4s d3 su c0stumbr3. 26 T0d4 c4m4 3n qu3 durm13r3 t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 su fluj0, l3 s3rá c0m0 l4 c4m4 d3 su c0stumbr3; y t0d0 mu3bl3 s0br3 qu3 s3 s3nt4r3, s3rá 1nmund0, c0m0 l4 1mpur3z4 d3 su c0stumbr3. 27 Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t0c4r3 3s4s c0s4s s3rá 1nmund0; y l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y 4 sí m1sm0 s3 l4v4rá c0n 4gu4, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 28 Y cu4nd0 fu3r3 l1br3 d3 su fluj0, c0nt4rá s13t3 dí4s, y d3spués s3rá l1mp14. 29 Y 3l 0ct4v0 dí4 t0m4rá c0ns1g0 d0s tórt0l4s 0 d0s p4l0m1n0s, y l0s tr43rá 4l s4c3rd0t3, 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón; 30 y 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá d3l un0 0fr3nd4 p0r 3l p3c4d0, y d3l 0tr0 h0l0c4ust0; y l4 pur1f1c4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá d3l fluj0 d3 su 1mpur3z4. 

31 4sí 4p4rt4ré1s d3 sus 1mpur3z4s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 4 f1n d3 qu3 n0 mu3r4n p0r sus 1mpur3z4s p0r h4b3r c0nt4m1n4d0 m1 t4b3rnácul0 qu3 3stá 3ntr3 3ll0s. 

32 0st4 3s l4 l3y p4r4 3l qu3 t13n3 fluj0, y p4r4 3l qu3 t13n3 3m1s1ón d3 s3m3n, v1n13nd0 4 s3r 1nmund0 4 c4us4 d3 3ll0; 33 y p4r4 l4 qu3 p4d3c3 su c0stumbr3, y p4r4 3l qu3 tuv13r3 fluj0, s34 v4rón 0 muj3r, y p4r4 3l h0mbr3 qu3 durm13r3 c0n muj3r 1nmund4. 

0l dí4 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón

L0VÍT1C0 16

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés d3spués d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 l0s d0s h1j0s d3 44rón, cu4nd0 s3 4c3rc4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y mur13r0n. 2 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés: D1 4 44rón tu h3rm4n0, qu3 n0 3n t0d0 t13mp0 3ntr3 3n 3l s4ntu4r10 d3trás d3l v3l0, d3l4nt3 d3l pr0p1c14t0r10 qu3 3stá s0br3 3l 4rc4, p4r4 qu3 n0 mu3r4; p0rqu3 y0 4p4r3c3ré 3n l4 nub3 s0br3 3l pr0p1c14t0r10. 3 C0n 3st0 3ntr4rá 44rón 3n 3l s4ntu4r10: c0n un b3c3rr0 p4r4 3xp14c1ón, y un c4rn3r0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0. 4 S3 v3st1rá l4 tún1c4 s4nt4 d3 l1n0, y s0br3 su cu3rp0 t3ndrá c4lz0nc1ll0s d3 l1n0, y s3 c3ñ1rá 3l c1nt0 d3 l1n0, y c0n l4 m1tr4 d3 l1n0 s3 cubr1rá. S0n l4s s4nt4s v3st1dur4s; c0n 3ll4s s3 h4 d3 v3st1r d3spués d3 l4v4r su cu3rp0 c0n 4gu4. 5 Y d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l t0m4rá d0s m4ch0s c4brí0s p4r4 3xp14c1ón, y un c4rn3r0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0. 

6 Y h4rá tr43r 44rón 3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón qu3 3s suy0, y h4rá l4 r3c0nc1l14c1ón p0r sí y p0r su c4s4. 7 D3spués t0m4rá l0s d0s m4ch0s c4brí0s y l0s pr3s3nt4rá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 8 Y 3ch4rá su3rt3s 44rón s0br3 l0s d0s m4ch0s c4brí0s; un4 su3rt3 p0r J3h0vá, y 0tr4 su3rt3 p0r 4z4z3l. 9 Y h4rá tr43r 44rón 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 s0br3 3l cu4l c4y3r3 l4 su3rt3 p0r J3h0vá, y l0 0fr3c3rá 3n 3xp14c1ón. 10 M4s 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 s0br3 3l cu4l c4y3r3 l4 su3rt3 p0r 4z4z3l, l0 pr3s3nt4rá v1v0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 h4c3r l4 r3c0nc1l14c1ón s0br3 él, p4r4 3nv14rl0 4 4z4z3l 4l d3s13rt0. 

11 Y h4rá tr43r 44rón 3l b3c3rr0 qu3 3r4 p4r4 3xp14c1ón suy4, y h4rá l4 r3c0nc1l14c1ón p0r sí y p0r su c4s4, y d3g0ll4rá 3n 3xp14c1ón 3l b3c3rr0 qu3 3s suy0. 12 D3spués t0m4rá un 1nc3ns4r10 ll3n0 d3 br4s4s d3 fu3g0 d3l 4lt4r d3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y sus puñ0s ll3n0s d3l p3rfum3 4r0mát1c0 m0l1d0, y l0 ll3v4rá d3trás d3l v3l0. 13 Y p0ndrá 3l p3rfum3 s0br3 3l fu3g0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y l4 nub3 d3l p3rfum3 cubr1rá 3l pr0p1c14t0r10 qu3 3stá s0br3 3l t3st1m0n10, p4r4 qu3 n0 mu3r4. 14 T0m4rá lu3g0 d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3l b3c3rr0, y l4 r0c14rá c0n su d3d0 h4c14 3l pr0p1c14t0r10 4l l4d0 0r13nt4l; h4c14 3l pr0p1c14t0r10 3sp4rc1rá c0n su d3d0 s13t3 v3c3s d3 4qu3ll4 s4ngr3. 15 D3spués d3g0ll4rá 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 3n 3xp14c1ón p0r 3l p3c4d0 d3l pu3bl0, y ll3v4rá l4 s4ngr3 d3trás d3l v3l0 4d3ntr0, y h4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 c0m0 h1z0 c0n l4 s4ngr3 d3l b3c3rr0, y l4 3sp4rc1rá s0br3 3l pr0p1c14t0r10 y d3l4nt3 d3l pr0p1c14t0r10. 16 4sí pur1f1c4rá 3l s4ntu4r10, 4 c4us4 d3 l4s 1mpur3z4s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d3 sus r3b3l10n3s y d3 t0d0s sus p3c4d0s; d3 l4 m1sm4 m4n3r4 h4rá t4mb1én 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 3l cu4l r3s1d3 3ntr3 3ll0s 3n m3d10 d3 sus 1mpur3z4s. 17 N1ngún h0mbr3 3st4rá 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón cu4nd0 él 3ntr3 4 h4c3r l4 3xp14c1ón 3n 3l s4ntu4r10, h4st4 qu3 él s4lg4, y h4y4 h3ch0 l4 3xp14c1ón p0r sí, p0r su c4s4 y p0r t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l. 18 Y s4ldrá 4l 4lt4r qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y l0 3xp14rá, y t0m4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3l b3c3rr0 y d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3l m4ch0 c4brí0, y l4 p0ndrá s0br3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r 4lr3d3d0r. 19 Y 3sp4rc1rá s0br3 él d3 l4 s4ngr3 c0n su d3d0 s13t3 v3c3s, y l0 l1mp14rá, y l0 s4nt1f1c4rá d3 l4s 1nmund1c14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

20 Cu4nd0 hub13r3 4c4b4d0 d3 3xp14r 3l s4ntu4r10 y 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón y 3l 4lt4r, h4rá tr43r 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 v1v0; 21 y p0ndrá 44rón sus d0s m4n0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l m4ch0 c4brí0 v1v0, y c0nf3s4rá s0br3 él t0d4s l4s 1n1qu1d4d3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, t0d4s sus r3b3l10n3s y t0d0s sus p3c4d0s, p0n1énd0l0s 4sí s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l m4ch0 c4brí0, y l0 3nv14rá 4l d3s13rt0 p0r m4n0 d3 un h0mbr3 d3st1n4d0 p4r4 3st0. 22 Y 4qu3l m4ch0 c4brí0 ll3v4rá s0br3 sí t0d4s l4s 1n1qu1d4d3s d3 3ll0s 4 t13rr4 1nh4b1t4d4; y d3j4rá 1r 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 p0r 3l d3s13rt0. 

23 D3spués v3ndrá 44rón 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y s3 qu1t4rá l4s v3st1dur4s d3 l1n0 qu3 h4bí4 v3st1d0 p4r4 3ntr4r 3n 3l s4ntu4r10, y l4s p0ndrá 4llí. 24 L4v4rá lu3g0 su cu3rp0 c0n 4gu4 3n 3l lug4r d3l s4ntu4r10, y d3spués d3 p0n3rs3 sus v3st1d0s s4ldrá, y h4rá su h0l0c4ust0, y 3l h0l0c4ust0 d3l pu3bl0, y h4rá l4 3xp14c1ón p0r sí y p0r 3l pu3bl0. 25 Y qu3m4rá 3n 3l 4lt4r l4 gr0sur4 d3l s4cr1f1c10 p0r 3l p3c4d0. 26 0l qu3 hub13r3 ll3v4d0 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 4 4z4z3l, l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, l4v4rá t4mb1én c0n 4gu4 su cu3rp0, y d3spués 3ntr4rá 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0. 27 Y s4c4rán fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 3l b3c3rr0 y 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 1nm0l4d0s p0r 3l p3c4d0, cuy4 s4ngr3 fu3 ll3v4d4 4l s4ntu4r10 p4r4 h4c3r l4 3xp14c1ón; y qu3m4rán 3n 3l fu3g0 su p13l, su c4rn3 y su 3st1érc0l. 28 0l qu3 l0s qu3m4r3 l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, l4v4rá t4mb1én su cu3rp0 c0n 4gu4, y d3spués p0drá 3ntr4r 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0. 

29 Y 3st0 t3ndré1s p0r 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0: 0n 3l m3s sépt1m0, 4 l0s d13z dí4s d3l m3s, 4fl1g1ré1s vu3str4s 4lm4s, y n1ngun4 0br4 h4ré1s, n1 3l n4tur4l n1 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 m0r4 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s. 30 P0rqu3 3n 3st3 dí4 s3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r v0s0tr0s, y s3ré1s l1mp10s d3 t0d0s vu3str0s p3c4d0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 31 Dí4 d3 r3p0s0 3s p4r4 v0s0tr0s, y 4fl1g1ré1s vu3str4s 4lm4s; 3s 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0. 32 H4rá l4 3xp14c1ón 3l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 fu3r3 ung1d0 y c0ns4gr4d0 p4r4 s3r s4c3rd0t3 3n lug4r d3 su p4dr3; y s3 v3st1rá l4s v3st1dur4s d3 l1n0, l4s v3st1dur4s s4gr4d4s. 33 Y h4rá l4 3xp14c1ón p0r 3l s4ntu4r10 s4nt0, y 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón; t4mb1én h4rá 3xp14c1ón p0r 3l 4lt4r, p0r l0s s4c3rd0t3s y p0r t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón. 34 Y 3st0 t3ndré1s c0m0 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0, p4r4 h4c3r 3xp14c1ón un4 v3z 4l 4ñ0 p0r t0d0s l0s p3c4d0s d3 1sr43l. Y M01sés l0 h1z0 c0m0 J3h0vá l3 m4ndó. 

0l s4ntu4r10 ún1c0

L0VÍT1C0 17

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, y 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y d1l3s: 0st0 3s l0 qu3 h4 m4nd4d0 J3h0vá: 3 Cu4lqu13r v4rón d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l qu3 d3g0ll4r3 bu3y 0 c0rd3r0 0 c4br4, 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 0 fu3r4 d3 él, 4 y n0 l0 tr4j3r3 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón p4r4 0fr3c3r 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, s3rá culp4d0 d3 s4ngr3 3l t4l v4rón; s4ngr3 d3rr4mó; s3rá c0rt4d0 3l t4l v4rón d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0, 5 4 f1n d3 qu3 tr41g4n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l sus s4cr1f1c10s, l0s qu3 s4cr1f1c4n 3n m3d10 d3l c4mp0, p4r4 qu3 l0s tr41g4n 4 J3h0vá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón 4l s4c3rd0t3, y s4cr1f1qu3n 3ll0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z 4 J3h0vá. 6 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 3sp4rc1rá l4 s4ngr3 s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y qu3m4rá l4 gr0sur4 3n 0l0r gr4t0 4 J3h0vá. 7 Y nunc4 más s4cr1f1c4rán sus s4cr1f1c10s 4 l0s d3m0n10s, tr4s d3 l0s cu4l3s h4n f0rn1c4d0; t3ndrán 3st0 p0r 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 p0r sus 3d4d3s. 

8 L3s d1rás t4mb1én: Cu4lqu13r v4rón d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, 0 d3 l0s 3xtr4nj3r0s qu3 m0r4n 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, qu3 0fr3c13r3 h0l0c4ust0 0 s4cr1f1c10, 9 y n0 l0 tr4j3r3 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón p4r4 h4c3rl0 4 J3h0vá, 3l t4l v4rón s3rá 1gu4lm3nt3 c0rt4d0 d3 su pu3bl0. 

Pr0h1b1c1ón d3 c0m3r l4 s4ngr3

10 S1 cu4lqu13r v4rón d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, 0 d3 l0s 3xtr4nj3r0s qu3 m0r4n 3ntr3 3ll0s, c0m13r3 4lgun4 s4ngr3, y0 p0ndré m1 r0str0 c0ntr4 l4 p3rs0n4 qu3 c0m13r3 s4ngr3, y l4 c0rt4ré d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 11 P0rqu3 l4 v1d4 d3 l4 c4rn3 3n l4 s4ngr3 3stá, y y0 0s l4 h3 d4d0 p4r4 h4c3r 3xp14c1ón s0br3 3l 4lt4r p0r vu3str4s 4lm4s; y l4 m1sm4 s4ngr3 h4rá 3xp14c1ón d3 l4 p3rs0n4. 12 P0r t4nt0, h3 d1ch0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l: N1ngun4 p3rs0n4 d3 v0s0tr0s c0m3rá s4ngr3, n1 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 m0r4 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s c0m3rá s4ngr3. 13 Y cu4lqu13r v4rón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 0 d3 l0s 3xtr4nj3r0s qu3 m0r4n 3ntr3 3ll0s, qu3 c4z4r3 4n1m4l 0 4v3 qu3 s34 d3 c0m3r, d3rr4m4rá su s4ngr3 y l4 cubr1rá c0n t13rr4.

22 Gu4rd4d, pu3s, t0d0s m1s 3st4tut0s y t0d4s m1s 0rd3n4nz4s, y p0n3dl0s p0r 0br4, n0 s34 qu3 0s v0m1t3 l4 t13rr4 3n l4 cu4l y0 0s 1ntr0duzc0 p4r4 qu3 h4b1té1s 3n 3ll4. 23 Y n0 4ndé1s 3n l4s práct1c4s d3 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 y0 3ch4ré d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s; p0rqu3 3ll0s h1c13r0n t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, y l0s tuv3 3n 4b0m1n4c1ón. 24 P3r0 4 v0s0tr0s 0s h3 d1ch0: V0s0tr0s p0s33ré1s l4 t13rr4 d3 3ll0s, y y0 0s l4 d4ré p4r4 qu3 l4 p0s3á1s p0r h3r3d4d, t13rr4 qu3 fluy3 l3ch3 y m13l. 10 Y 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 3ntr3 sus h3rm4n0s, s0br3 cuy4 c4b3z4 fu3 d3rr4m4d0 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón, y qu3 fu3 c0ns4gr4d0 p4r4 ll3v4r l4s v3st1dur4s, n0 d3scubr1rá su c4b3z4, n1 r4sg4rá sus v3st1d0s, 11 n1 3ntr4rá d0nd3 h4y4 4lgun4 p3rs0n4 mu3rt4; n1 p0r su p4dr3 n1 p0r su m4dr3 s3 c0nt4m1n4rá. 12 N1 s4ldrá d3l s4ntu4r10, n1 pr0f4n4rá 3l s4ntu4r10 d3 su D10s; p0rqu3 l4 c0ns4gr4c1ón p0r 3l 4c31t3 d3 l4 unc1ón d3 su D10s 3stá s0br3 él. Y0 J3h0vá. 13 T0m4rá p0r 3sp0s4 4 un4 muj3r v1rg3n. 14 N0 t0m4rá v1ud4, n1 r3pud14d4, n1 1nf4m3 n1 r4m3r4, s1n0 t0m4rá d3 su pu3bl0 un4 v1rg3n p0r muj3r, 15 p4r4 qu3 n0 pr0f4n3 su d3sc3nd3nc14 3n sus pu3bl0s; p0rqu3 y0 J3h0vá s0y 3l qu3 l0s s4nt1f1c0. 

16 Y J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 17 H4bl4 4 44rón y d1l3: N1ngun0 d3 tus d3sc3nd13nt3s p0r sus g3n3r4c10n3s, qu3 t3ng4 4lgún d3f3ct0, s3 4c3rc4rá p4r4 0fr3c3r 3l p4n d3 su D10s. 18 P0rqu3 n1ngún v4rón 3n 3l cu4l h4y4 d3f3ct0 s3 4c3rc4rá; v4rón c13g0, 0 c0j0, 0 mut1l4d0, 0 s0br4d0, 19 0 v4rón qu3 t3ng4 qu3br4dur4 d3 p13 0 r0tur4 d3 m4n0, 20 0 j0r0b4d0, 0 3n4n0, 0 qu3 t3ng4 nub3 3n 3l 0j0, 0 qu3 t3ng4 s4rn4, 0 3mp31n3, 0 t3stícul0 m4gull4d0. 21 N1ngún v4rón d3 l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 d3l s4c3rd0t3 44rón, 3n 3l cu4l h4y4 d3f3ct0, s3 4c3rc4rá p4r4 0fr3c3r l4s 0fr3nd4s 3nc3nd1d4s p4r4 J3h0vá. 10 N1ngún 3xtr4ñ0 c0m3rá c0s4 s4gr4d4; 3l huésp3d d3l s4c3rd0t3, y 3l j0rn4l3r0, n0 c0m3rán c0s4 s4gr4d4. 11 M4s cu4nd0 3l s4c3rd0t3 c0mpr4r3 4lgún 3scl4v0 p0r d1n3r0, ést3 p0drá c0m3r d3 3ll4, 4sí c0m0 t4mb1én 3l n4c1d0 3n su c4s4 p0drá c0m3r d3 su 4l1m3nt0. 12 L4 h1j4 d3l s4c3rd0t3, s1 s3 c4s4r3 c0n v4rón 3xtr4ñ0, n0 c0m3rá d3 l4 0fr3nd4 d3 l4s c0s4s s4gr4d4s. 13 P3r0 s1 l4 h1j4 d3l s4c3rd0t3 fu3r3 v1ud4 0 r3pud14d4, y n0 tuv13r3 pr0l3 y s3 hub13r3 vu3lt0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3, c0m0 3n su juv3ntud, p0drá c0m3r d3l 4l1m3nt0 d3 su p4dr3; p3r0 n1ngún 3xtr4ñ0 c0m4 d3 él. 14 Y 3l qu3 p0r y3rr0 c0m13r3 c0s4 s4gr4d4, 4ñ4d1rá 4 3ll4 un4 qu1nt4 p4rt3, y l4 d4rá 4l s4c3rd0t3 c0n l4 c0s4 s4gr4d4. 15 N0 pr0f4n4rán, pu3s, l4s c0s4s s4nt4s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, l4s cu4l3s 4p4rt4n p4r4 J3h0vá; 16 pu3s l3s h4rí4n ll3v4r l4 1n1qu1d4d d3l p3c4d0, c0m13nd0 l4s c0s4s s4nt4s d3 3ll0s; p0rqu3 y0 J3h0vá s0y 3l qu3 l0s s4nt1f1c0. 

17 T4mb1én h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 18 H4bl4 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, y 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y d1l3s: Cu4lqu13r v4rón d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, 0 d3 l0s 3xtr4nj3r0s 3n 1sr43l, qu3 0fr3c13r3 su 0fr3nd4 3n p4g0 d3 sus v0t0s, 0 c0m0 0fr3nd4s v0lunt4r14s 0fr3c1d4s 3n h0l0c4ust0 4 J3h0vá, 19 p4r4 qu3 s34 4c3pt4d0, 0fr3c3ré1s m4ch0 s1n d3f3ct0 d3 3ntr3 3l g4n4d0 v4cun0, d3 3ntr3 l0s c0rd3r0s, 0 d3 3ntr3 l4s c4br4s. 20 N1ngun4 c0s4 3n qu3 h4y4 d3f3ct0 0fr3c3ré1s, p0rqu3 n0 s3rá 4c3pt0 p0r v0s0tr0s. 21 4s1m1sm0, cu4nd0 4lgun0 0fr3c13r3 s4cr1f1c10 3n 0fr3nd4 d3 p4z 4 J3h0vá p4r4 cumpl1r un v0t0, 0 c0m0 0fr3nd4 v0lunt4r14, s34 d3 v4c4s 0 d3 0v3j4s, p4r4 qu3 s34 4c3pt4d0 s3rá s1n d3f3ct0. 22 C13g0, p3rn1qu3br4d0, mut1l4d0, v3rrug0s0, s4rn0s0 0 r0ñ0s0, n0 0fr3c3ré1s ést0s 4 J3h0vá, n1 d3 3ll0s p0ndré1s 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá. 23 Bu3y 0 c4rn3r0 qu3 t3ng4 d3 más 0 d3 m3n0s, p0drás 0fr3c3r p0r 0fr3nd4 v0lunt4r14; p3r0 3n p4g0 d3 v0t0 n0 s3rá 4c3pt0. 24 N0 0fr3c3ré1s 4 J3h0vá 4n1m4l c0n t3stícul0s h3r1d0s 0 m4gull4d0s, r4sg4d0s 0 c0rt4d0s, n1 3n vu3str4 t13rr4 l0 0fr3c3ré1s. 25 N1 d3 m4n0 d3 3xtr4nj3r0s t0m4rás 3st0s 4n1m4l3s p4r4 0fr3c3rl0s c0m0 3l p4n d3 vu3str0 D10s, p0rqu3 su c0rrupc1ón 3stá 3n 3ll0s; h4y 3n 3ll0s d3f3ct0, n0 s3 0s 4c3pt4rán. 

26 Y h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 27 0l b3c3rr0 0 3l c0rd3r0 0 l4 c4br4, cu4nd0 n4c13r3, s13t3 dí4s 3st4rá m4m4nd0 d3 su m4dr3; m4s d3sd3 3l 0ct4v0 dí4 3n 4d3l4nt3 s3rá 4c3pt0 p4r4 0fr3nd4 d3 s4cr1f1c10 3nc3nd1d0 4 J3h0vá. 28 Y s34 v4c4 u 0v3j4, n0 d3g0ll4ré1s 3n un m1sm0 dí4 4 3ll4 y 4 su h1j0. 29 Y cu4nd0 0fr3c13r31s s4cr1f1c10 d3 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s 4 J3h0vá, l0 s4cr1f1c4ré1s d3 m4n3r4 qu3 s34 4c3pt4bl3. 30 0n 3l m1sm0 dí4 s3 c0m3rá; n0 d3j4ré1s d3 él p4r4 0tr0 dí4. Y0 J3h0vá. 

31 Gu4rd4d, pu3s, m1s m4nd4m13nt0s, y cumpl1dl0s. Y0 J3h0vá. 32 Y n0 pr0f4né1s m1 s4nt0 n0mbr3, p4r4 qu3 y0 s34 s4nt1f1c4d0 3n m3d10 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. Y0 J3h0vá qu3 0s s4nt1f1c0, 33 qu3 0s s4qué d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, p4r4 s3r vu3str0 D10s. Y0 J3h0vá. 

L4s f13st4s s0l3mn3s

(Nm. 28.1629.40)

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: L4s f13st4s s0l3mn3s d3 J3h0vá, l4s cu4l3s pr0cl4m4ré1s c0m0 s4nt4s c0nv0c4c10n3s, s3rán 3st4s: 3 S31s dí4s s3 tr4b4j4rá, m4s 3l sépt1m0 dí4 s3rá d3 r3p0s0, s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón; n1ngún tr4b4j0 h4ré1s; dí4 d3 r3p0s0 3s d3 J3h0vá 3n d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 h4b1té1s. 

4 0st4s s0n l4s f13st4s s0l3mn3s d3 J3h0vá, l4s c0nv0c4c10n3s s4nt4s, 4 l4s cu4l3s c0nv0c4ré1s 3n sus t13mp0s: 5 0n 3l m3s pr1m3r0, 4 l0s c4t0rc3 d3l m3s, 3ntr3 l4s d0s t4rd3s, p4scu4 3s d3 J3h0vá. 6 Y 4 l0s qu1nc3 dí4s d3 3st3 m3s 3s l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 d3 l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4 4 J3h0vá; s13t3 dí4s c0m3ré1s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4. 7 0l pr1m3r dí4 t3ndré1s s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón; n1ngún tr4b4j0 d3 s13rv0s h4ré1s. 8 Y 0fr3c3ré1s 4 J3h0vá s13t3 dí4s 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4; 3l sépt1m0 dí4 s3rá s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón; n1ngún tr4b4j0 d3 s13rv0 h4ré1s. 

9 Y h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 10 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: Cu4nd0 h4yá1s 3ntr4d0 3n l4 t13rr4 qu3 y0 0s d0y, y s3gué1s su m13s, tr43ré1s 4l s4c3rd0t3 un4 g4v1ll4 p0r pr1m1c14 d3 l0s pr1m3r0s frut0s d3 vu3str4 s13g4. 11 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 m3c3rá l4 g4v1ll4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 s3á1s 4c3pt0s; 3l dí4 s1gu13nt3 d3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0 l4 m3c3rá. 12 Y 3l dí4 qu3 0fr3zcá1s l4 g4v1ll4, 0fr3c3ré1s un c0rd3r0 d3 un 4ñ0, s1n d3f3ct0, 3n h0l0c4ust0 4 J3h0vá. 13 Su 0fr3nd4 s3rá d0s déc1m4s d3 3f4 d3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4 4m4s4d4 c0n 4c31t3, 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá 3n 0l0r gr4tís1m0; y su l1b4c1ón s3rá d3 v1n0, l4 cu4rt4 p4rt3 d3 un h1n. 14 N0 c0m3ré1s p4n, n1 gr4n0 t0st4d0, n1 3sp1g4 fr3sc4, h4st4 3st3 m1sm0 dí4, h4st4 qu3 h4yá1s 0fr3c1d0 l4 0fr3nd4 d3 vu3str0 D10s; 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 3s p0r vu3str4s 3d4d3s 3n d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 h4b1té1s. 

15 Y c0nt4ré1s d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 s1gu3 4l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, d3sd3 3l dí4 3n qu3 0fr3c1st31s l4 g4v1ll4 d3 l4 0fr3nd4 m3c1d4; s13t3 s3m4n4s cumpl1d4s s3rán. 16 H4st4 3l dí4 s1gu13nt3 d3l sépt1m0 dí4 d3 r3p0s0 c0nt4ré1s c1ncu3nt4 dí4s; 3nt0nc3s 0fr3c3ré1s 3l nu3v0 gr4n0 4 J3h0vá. 17 D3 vu3str4s h4b1t4c10n3s tr43ré1s d0s p4n3s p4r4 0fr3nd4 m3c1d4, qu3 s3rán d3 d0s déc1m4s d3 3f4 d3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4, c0c1d0s c0n l3v4dur4, c0m0 pr1m1c14s p4r4 J3h0vá. 18 Y 0fr3c3ré1s c0n 3l p4n s13t3 c0rd3r0s d3 un 4ñ0, s1n d3f3ct0, un b3c3rr0 d3 l4 v4c4d4, y d0s c4rn3r0s; s3rán h0l0c4ust0 4 J3h0vá, c0n su 0fr3nd4 y sus l1b4c10n3s, 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 d3 0l0r gr4t0 p4r4 J3h0vá. 19 0fr3c3ré1s 4d3más un m4ch0 c4brí0 p0r 3xp14c1ón, y d0s c0rd3r0s d3 un 4ñ0 3n s4cr1f1c10 d3 0fr3nd4 d3 p4z. 20 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0s pr3s3nt4rá c0m0 0fr3nd4 m3c1d4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, c0n 3l p4n d3 l4s pr1m1c14s y l0s d0s c0rd3r0s; s3rán c0s4 s4gr4d4 4 J3h0vá p4r4 3l s4c3rd0t3. 21 Y c0nv0c4ré1s 3n 3st3 m1sm0 dí4 s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón; n1ngún tr4b4j0 d3 s13rv0s h4ré1s; 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 3n d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 h4b1té1s p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s. 

22 Cu4nd0 s3g4r31s l4 m13s d3 vu3str4 t13rr4, n0 s3g4ré1s h4st4 3l últ1m0 r1ncón d3 3ll4, n1 3sp1g4rás tu s13g4; p4r4 3l p0br3 y p4r4 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 l4 d3j4rás. Y0 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 

23 Y h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 24 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: 0n 3l m3s sépt1m0, 4l pr1m3r0 d3l m3s t3ndré1s dí4 d3 r3p0s0, un4 c0nm3m0r4c1ón 4l s0n d3 tr0mp3t4s, y un4 s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón. 25 N1ngún tr4b4j0 d3 s13rv0s h4ré1s; y 0fr3c3ré1s 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá. 

26 T4mb1én h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 27 4 l0s d13z dí4s d3 3st3 m3s sépt1m0 s3rá 3l dí4 d3 3xp14c1ón; t3ndré1s s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón, y 4fl1g1ré1s vu3str4s 4lm4s, y 0fr3c3ré1s 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá. 28 N1ngún tr4b4j0 h4ré1s 3n 3st3 dí4; p0rqu3 3s dí4 d3 3xp14c1ón, p4r4 r3c0nc1l14r0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 29 P0rqu3 t0d4 p3rs0n4 qu3 n0 s3 4fl1g13r3 3n 3st3 m1sm0 dí4, s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 su pu3bl0. 30 Y cu4lqu13r4 p3rs0n4 qu3 h1c13r3 tr4b4j0 4lgun0 3n 3st3 dí4, y0 d3stru1ré 4 l4 t4l p3rs0n4 d3 3ntr3 su pu3bl0. 31 N1ngún tr4b4j0 h4ré1s; 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 3s p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s 3n d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 h4b1té1s. 32 Dí4 d3 r3p0s0 s3rá 4 v0s0tr0s, y 4fl1g1ré1s vu3str4s 4lm4s, c0m3nz4nd0 4 l0s nu3v3 dí4s d3l m3s 3n l4 t4rd3; d3 t4rd3 4 t4rd3 gu4rd4ré1s vu3str0 r3p0s0. 

33 Y h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 34 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: 4 l0s qu1nc3 dí4s d3 3st3 m3s sépt1m0 s3rá l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 d3 l0s t4b3rnácul0s 4 J3h0vá p0r s13t3 dí4s. 35 0l pr1m3r dí4 h4brá s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón; n1ngún tr4b4j0 d3 s13rv0s h4ré1s. 36 S13t3 dí4s 0fr3c3ré1s 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá; 3l 0ct4v0 dí4 t3ndré1s s4nt4 c0nv0c4c1ón, y 0fr3c3ré1s 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá; 3s f13st4, n1ngún tr4b4j0 d3 s13rv0s h4ré1s. 

37 0st4s s0n l4s f13st4s s0l3mn3s d3 J3h0vá, 4 l4s qu3 c0nv0c4ré1s s4nt4s r3un10n3s, p4r4 0fr3c3r 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá, h0l0c4ust0 y 0fr3nd4, s4cr1f1c10 y l1b4c10n3s, c4d4 c0s4 3n su t13mp0, 38 4d3más d3 l0s dí4s d3 r3p0s0 d3 J3h0vá, d3 vu3str0s d0n3s, d3 t0d0s vu3str0s v0t0s, y d3 t0d4s vu3str4s 0fr3nd4s v0lunt4r14s qu3 4c0stumbrá1s d4r 4 J3h0vá. 

39 P3r0 4 l0s qu1nc3 dí4s d3l m3s sépt1m0, cu4nd0 h4yá1s r3c0g1d0 3l frut0 d3 l4 t13rr4, h4ré1s f13st4 4 J3h0vá p0r s13t3 dí4s; 3l pr1m3r dí4 s3rá d3 r3p0s0, y 3l 0ct4v0 dí4 s3rá t4mb1én dí4 d3 r3p0s0. 40 Y t0m4ré1s 3l pr1m3r dí4 r4m4s c0n frut0 d3 árb0l h3rm0s0, r4m4s d3 p4lm3r4s, r4m4s d3 árb0l3s fr0nd0s0s, y s4uc3s d3 l0s 4rr0y0s, y 0s r3g0c1j4ré1s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s p0r s13t3 dí4s. 41 Y l3 h4ré1s f13st4 4 J3h0vá p0r s13t3 dí4s c4d4 4ñ0; s3rá 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s; 3n 3l m3s sépt1m0 l4 h4ré1s. 42 0n t4b3rnácul0s h4b1t4ré1s s13t3 dí4s; t0d0 n4tur4l d3 1sr43l h4b1t4rá 3n t4b3rnácul0s, 43 p4r4 qu3 s3p4n vu3str0s d3sc3nd13nt3s qu3 3n t4b3rnácul0s h1c3 y0 h4b1t4r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l cu4nd0 l0s s4qué d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. Y0 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 

44 4sí h4bló M01sés 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s0br3 l4s f13st4s s0l3mn3s d3 J3h0vá. 

4c31t3 p4r4 l4s lámp4r4s

(0x. 27.20-21)

L0VÍT1C0 24

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 M4nd4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 t3 tr41g4n p4r4 3l 4lumbr4d0 4c31t3 pur0 d3 0l1v4s m4ch4c4d4s, p4r4 h4c3r 4rd3r l4s lámp4r4s c0nt1nu4m3nt3. 3 Fu3r4 d3l v3l0 d3l t3st1m0n10, 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, l4s d1sp0ndrá 44rón d3sd3 l4 t4rd3 h4st4 l4 m4ñ4n4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; 3s 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 p0r vu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s. 4 S0br3 3l c4nd3l3r0 l1mp10 p0ndrá s13mpr3 3n 0rd3n l4s lámp4r4s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 

0l p4n d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón

5 Y t0m4rás fl0r d3 h4r1n4, y c0c3rás d3 3ll4 d0c3 t0rt4s; c4d4 t0rt4 s3rá d3 d0s déc1m4s d3 3f4. 6 Y l4s p0ndrás 3n d0s h1l3r4s, s31s 3n c4d4 h1l3r4, s0br3 l4 m3s4 l1mp14 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 7 P0ndrás t4mb1én s0br3 c4d4 h1l3r4 1nc13ns0 pur0, y s3rá p4r4 3l p4n c0m0 p3rfum3, 0fr3nd4 3nc3nd1d4 4 J3h0vá. 8 C4d4 dí4 d3 r3p0s0 l0 p0ndrá c0nt1nu4m3nt3 3n 0rd3n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, 3n n0mbr3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, c0m0 p4ct0 p3rp3tu0. 9 Y s3rá d3 44rón y d3 sus h1j0s, l0s cu4l3s l0 c0m3rán 3n lug4r s4nt0; p0rqu3 3s c0s4 muy s4nt4 p4r4 él, d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s 3nc3nd1d4s 4 J3h0vá, p0r d3r3ch0 p3rp3tu0. 

C4st1g0 d3l bl4sf3m0

10 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 3l h1j0 d3 un4 muj3r 1sr43l1t4, 3l cu4l 3r4 h1j0 d3 un 3g1pc10, s4l1ó 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; y 3l h1j0 d3 l4 1sr43l1t4 y un h0mbr3 d3 1sr43l r1ñ3r0n 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0. 11 Y 3l h1j0 d3 l4 muj3r 1sr43l1t4 bl4sf3mó 3l N0mbr3, y m4ld1j0; 3nt0nc3s l0 ll3v4r0n 4 M01sés. Y su m4dr3 s3 ll4m4b4 S3l0m1t, h1j4 d3 D1br1, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 D4n. 12 Y l0 pus13r0n 3n l4 cárc3l, h4st4 qu3 l3s fu3s3 d3cl4r4d0 p0r p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 

13 Y J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 14 S4c4 4l bl4sf3m0 fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, y t0d0s l0s qu3 l3 0y3r0n p0ng4n sus m4n0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 él, y 4p3dré3l0 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón. 15 Y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4bl4rás, d1c13nd0: Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 m4ld1j3r3 4 su D10s, ll3v4rá su 1n1qu1d4d. 16 Y 3l qu3 bl4sf3m4r3 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá, h4 d3 s3r mu3rt0; t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón l0 4p3dr34rá; 4sí 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 c0m0 3l n4tur4l, s1 bl4sf3m4r3 3l N0mbr3, qu3 mu3r4. 17 4s1m1sm0 3l h0mbr3 qu3 h13r3 d3 mu3rt3 4 cu4lqu13r4 p3rs0n4, qu3 sufr4 l4 mu3rt3. 18 0l qu3 h13r3 4 4lgún 4n1m4l h4 d3 r3st1tu1rl0, 4n1m4l p0r 4n1m4l. 19 Y 3l qu3 c4us4r3 l3s1ón 3n su prój1m0, s3gún h1z0, 4sí l3 s34 h3ch0: 20 r0tur4 p0r r0tur4, 0j0 p0r 0j0, d13nt3 p0r d13nt3; s3gún l4 l3s1ón qu3 h4y4 h3ch0 4 0tr0, t4l s3 h4rá 4 él. 21 0l qu3 h13r3 4lgún 4n1m4l h4 d3 r3st1tu1rl0; m4s 3l qu3 h13r3 d3 mu3rt3 4 un h0mbr3, qu3 mu3r4. 22 Un m1sm0 3st4tut0 t3ndré1s p4r4 3l 3xtr4nj3r0, c0m0 p4r4 3l n4tur4l; p0rqu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 23 Y h4bló M01sés 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y 3ll0s s4c4r0n d3l c4mp4m3nt0 4l bl4sf3m0 y l0 4p3dr34r0n. Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h1c13r0n s3gún J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

0l 4ñ0 d3 r3p0s0 d3 l4 t13rr4 y 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30

L0VÍT1C0 25

1 J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S1n4í, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: Cu4nd0 h4yá1s 3ntr4d0 3n l4 t13rr4 qu3 y0 0s d0y, l4 t13rr4 gu4rd4rá r3p0s0 p4r4 J3h0vá. 3 S31s 4ñ0s s3mbr4rás tu t13rr4, y s31s 4ñ0s p0d4rás tu v1ñ4 y r3c0g3rás sus frut0s. 4 P3r0 3l sépt1m0 4ñ0 l4 t13rr4 t3ndrá d3sc4ns0, r3p0s0 p4r4 J3h0vá; n0 s3mbr4rás tu t13rr4, n1 p0d4rás tu v1ñ4. 5 L0 qu3 d3 suy0 n4c13r3 3n tu t13rr4 s3g4d4, n0 l0 s3g4rás, y l4s uv4s d3 tu v1ñ3d0 n0 v3nd1m14rás; 4ñ0 d3 r3p0s0 s3rá p4r4 l4 t13rr4. 6 M4s 3l d3sc4ns0 d3 l4 t13rr4 t3 d4rá p4r4 c0m3r 4 t1, 4 tu s13rv0, 4 tu s13rv4, 4 tu cr14d0, y 4 tu 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 m0r4r3 c0nt1g0; 7 y 4 tu 4n1m4l, y 4 l4 b3st14 qu3 hub13r3 3n tu t13rr4, s3rá t0d0 3l frut0 d3 3ll4 p4r4 c0m3r. 

8 Y c0nt4rás s13t3 s3m4n4s d3 4ñ0s, s13t3 v3c3s s13t3 4ñ0s, d3 m0d0 qu3 l0s dí4s d3 l4s s13t3 s3m4n4s d3 4ñ0s v3ndrán 4 s3rt3 cu4r3nt4 y nu3v3 4ñ0s. 9 0nt0nc3s h4rás t0c4r fu3rt3m3nt3 l4 tr0mp3t4 3n 3l m3s sépt1m0 4 l0s d13z dí4s d3l m3s; 3l dí4 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón h4ré1s t0c4r l4 tr0mp3t4 p0r t0d4 vu3str4 t13rr4. 10 Y s4nt1f1c4ré1s 3l 4ñ0 c1ncu3nt4, y pr3g0n4ré1s l1b3rt4d 3n l4 t13rr4 4 t0d0s sus m0r4d0r3s; 3s3 4ñ0 0s s3rá d3 jub1l30, y v0lv3ré1s c4d4 un0 4 vu3str4 p0s3s1ón, y c4d4 cu4l v0lv3rá 4 su f4m1l14. 11 0l 4ñ0 c1ncu3nt4 0s s3rá jub1l30; n0 s3mbr4ré1s, n1 s3g4ré1s l0 qu3 n4c13r3 d3 suy0 3n l4 t13rr4, n1 v3nd1m14ré1s sus v1ñ3d0s, 12 p0rqu3 3s jub1l30; s4nt0 s3rá 4 v0s0tr0s; 3l pr0duct0 d3 l4 t13rr4 c0m3ré1s. 

13 0n 3st3 4ñ0 d3 jub1l30 v0lv3ré1s c4d4 un0 4 vu3str4 p0s3s1ón. 14 Y cu4nd0 v3nd13r31s 4lg0 4 vu3str0 prój1m0, 0 c0mpr4r31s d3 m4n0 d3 vu3str0 prój1m0, n0 3ng4ñ3 n1ngun0 4 su h3rm4n0. 15 C0nf0rm3 4l núm3r0 d3 l0s 4ñ0s d3spués d3l jub1l30 c0mpr4rás d3 tu prój1m0; c0nf0rm3 4l núm3r0 d3 l0s 4ñ0s d3 l0s frut0s t3 v3nd3rá él 4 t1. 16 Cu4nt0 m4y0r fu3r3 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s 4ñ0s, 4um3nt4rás 3l pr3c10, y cu4nt0 m3n0r fu3r3 3l núm3r0, d1sm1nu1rás 3l pr3c10; p0rqu3 s3gún 3l núm3r0 d3 l4s c0s3ch4s t3 v3nd3rá él. 17 Y n0 3ng4ñ3 n1ngun0 4 su prój1m0, s1n0 t3m3d 4 vu3str0 D10s; p0rqu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 

18 0j3cut4d, pu3s, m1s 3st4tut0s y gu4rd4d m1s 0rd3n4nz4s, y p0n3dl0s p0r 0br4, y h4b1t4ré1s 3n l4 t13rr4 s3gur0s; 19 y l4 t13rr4 d4rá su frut0, y c0m3ré1s h4st4 s4c14r0s, y h4b1t4ré1s 3n 3ll4 c0n s3gur1d4d. 20 Y s1 d1j3r31s: ¿Qué c0m3r3m0s 3l sépt1m0 4ñ0? H3 4quí n0 h3m0s d3 s3mbr4r, n1 h3m0s d3 r3c0g3r nu3str0s frut0s; 21 3nt0nc3s y0 0s 3nv14ré m1 b3nd1c1ón 3l s3xt0 4ñ0, y 3ll4 h4rá qu3 h4y4 frut0 p0r tr3s 4ñ0s. 22 Y s3mbr4ré1s 3l 4ñ0 0ct4v0, y c0m3ré1s d3l frut0 4ñ3j0; h4st4 3l 4ñ0 n0v3n0, h4st4 qu3 v3ng4 su frut0, c0m3ré1s d3l 4ñ3j0. 23 L4 t13rr4 n0 s3 v3nd3rá 4 p3rp3tu1d4d, p0rqu3 l4 t13rr4 mí4 3s; pu3s v0s0tr0s f0r4st3r0s y 3xtr4nj3r0s s01s p4r4 c0nm1g0. 24 P0r t4nt0, 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 vu3str4 p0s3s1ón 0t0rg4ré1s r3sc4t3 4 l4 t13rr4. 

25 Cu4nd0 tu h3rm4n0 3mp0br3c13r3, y v3nd13r3 4lg0 d3 su p0s3s1ón, 3nt0nc3s su p4r13nt3 más próx1m0 v3ndrá y r3sc4t4rá l0 qu3 su h3rm4n0 hub13r3 v3nd1d0. 26 Y cu4nd0 3l h0mbr3 n0 tuv13r3 r3sc4t4d0r, y c0ns1gu13r3 l0 suf1c13nt3 p4r4 3l r3sc4t3, 27 3nt0nc3s c0nt4rá l0s 4ñ0s d3sd3 qu3 v3nd1ó, y p4g4rá l0 qu3 qu3d4r3 4l v4rón 4 qu13n v3nd1ó, y v0lv3rá 4 su p0s3s1ón. 28 M4s s1 n0 c0ns1gu13r3 l0 suf1c13nt3 p4r4 qu3 s3 l4 d3vu3lv4n, l0 qu3 v3nd1ó 3st4rá 3n p0d3r d3l qu3 l0 c0mpró h4st4 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30; y 4l jub1l30 s4ldrá, y él v0lv3rá 4 su p0s3s1ón. 

29 0l v4rón qu3 v3nd13r3 c4s4 d3 h4b1t4c1ón 3n c1ud4d 4mur4ll4d4, t3ndrá f4cult4d d3 r3d1m1rl4 h4st4 3l térm1n0 d3 un 4ñ0 d3sd3 l4 v3nt4; un 4ñ0 s3rá 3l térm1n0 d3 p0d3rs3 r3d1m1r. 30 Y s1 n0 fu3r3 r3sc4t4d4 d3ntr0 d3 un 4ñ0 3nt3r0, l4 c4s4 qu3 3stuv13r3 3n l4 c1ud4d 4mur4ll4d4 qu3d4rá p4r4 s13mpr3 3n p0d3r d3 4qu3l qu3 l4 c0mpró, y p4r4 sus d3sc3nd13nt3s; n0 s4ldrá 3n 3l jub1l30. 31 M4s l4s c4s4s d3 l4s 4ld34s qu3 n0 t13n3n mur0 4lr3d3d0r s3rán 3st1m4d4s c0m0 l0s t3rr3n0s d3l c4mp0; p0drán s3r r3sc4t4d4s, y s4ldrán 3n 3l jub1l30. 32 P3r0 3n cu4nt0 4 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, ést0s p0drán r3sc4t4r 3n cu4lqu13r t13mp0 l4s c4s4s 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 su p0s3s1ón. 33 Y 3l qu3 c0mpr4r3 d3 l0s l3v1t4s s4ldrá d3 l4 c4s4 v3nd1d4, 0 d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 su p0s3s1ón, 3n 3l jub1l30, p0r cu4nt0 l4s c4s4s d3 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s s0n l4 p0s3s1ón d3 3ll0s 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 34 M4s l4 t13rr4 d3l 3j1d0 d3 sus c1ud4d3s n0 s3 v3nd3rá, p0rqu3 3s p3rp3tu4 p0s3s1ón d3 3ll0s. 

35 Y cu4nd0 tu h3rm4n0 3mp0br3c13r3 y s3 4c0g13r3 4 t1, tú l0 4mp4r4rás; c0m0 f0r4st3r0 y 3xtr4nj3r0 v1v1rá c0nt1g0. 36 N0 t0m4rás d3 él usur4 n1 g4n4nc14, s1n0 t3ndrás t3m0r d3 tu D10s, y tu h3rm4n0 v1v1rá c0nt1g0. 37 N0 l3 d4rás tu d1n3r0 4 usur4, n1 tus vív3r3s 4 g4n4nc14. 38 Y0 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, qu3 0s s4qué d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, p4r4 d4r0s l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, p4r4 s3r vu3str0 D10s. 

39 Y cu4nd0 tu h3rm4n0 3mp0br3c13r3, 3st4nd0 c0nt1g0, y s3 v3nd13r3 4 t1, n0 l3 h4rás s3rv1r c0m0 3scl4v0. 40 C0m0 cr14d0, c0m0 3xtr4nj3r0 3st4rá c0nt1g0; h4st4 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30 t3 s3rv1rá. 41 0nt0nc3s s4ldrá l1br3 d3 tu c4s4; él y sus h1j0s c0ns1g0, y v0lv3rá 4 su f4m1l14, y 4 l4 p0s3s1ón d3 sus p4dr3s s3 r3st1tu1rá. 42 P0rqu3 s0n m1s s13rv0s, l0s cu4l3s s4qué y0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0; n0 s3rán v3nd1d0s 4 m4n3r4 d3 3scl4v0s. 43 N0 t3 3ns3ñ0r34rás d3 él c0n dur3z4, s1n0 t3ndrás t3m0r d3 tu D10s. 44 4sí tu 3scl4v0 c0m0 tu 3scl4v4 qu3 tuv13r3s, s3rán d3 l4s g3nt3s qu3 3stán 3n vu3str0 4lr3d3d0r; d3 3ll0s p0dré1s c0mpr4r 3scl4v0s y 3scl4v4s. 45 T4mb1én p0dré1s c0mpr4r d3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s f0r4st3r0s qu3 v1v3n 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, y d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 3ll0s n4c1d0s 3n vu3str4 t13rr4, qu3 3stán c0n v0s0tr0s, l0s cu4l3s p0dré1s t3n3r p0r p0s3s1ón. 46 Y l0s p0dré1s d3j4r 3n h3r3nc14 p4r4 vu3str0s h1j0s d3spués d3 v0s0tr0s, c0m0 p0s3s1ón h3r3d1t4r14; p4r4 s13mpr3 0s s3rv1ré1s d3 3ll0s; p3r0 3n vu3str0s h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l n0 0s 3ns3ñ0r34ré1s c4d4 un0 s0br3 su h3rm4n0 c0n dur3z4. 

47 S1 3l f0r4st3r0 0 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 3stá c0nt1g0 s3 3nr1qu3c13r3, y tu h3rm4n0 qu3 3stá junt0 4 él 3mp0br3c13r3, y s3 v3nd13r3 4l f0r4st3r0 0 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 3stá c0nt1g0, 0 4 4lgun0 d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3l 3xtr4nj3r0; 48 d3spués qu3 s3 hub13r3 v3nd1d0, p0drá s3r r3sc4t4d0; un0 d3 sus h3rm4n0s l0 r3sc4t4rá. 49 0 su tí0 0 3l h1j0 d3 su tí0 l0 r3sc4t4rá, 0 un p4r13nt3 c3rc4n0 d3 su f4m1l14 l0 r3sc4t4rá; 0 s1 sus m3d10s 4lc4nz4r3n, él m1sm0 s3 r3sc4t4rá. 50 H4rá l4 cu3nt4 c0n 3l qu3 l0 c0mpró, d3sd3 3l 4ñ0 qu3 s3 v3nd1ó 4 él h4st4 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30; y h4 d3 4pr3c14rs3 3l pr3c10 d3 su v3nt4 c0nf0rm3 4l núm3r0 d3 l0s 4ñ0s, y s3 c0nt4rá 3l t13mp0 qu3 3stuv0 c0n él c0nf0rm3 4l t13mp0 d3 un cr14d0 4s4l4r14d0. 51 S1 4ún fu3r3n much0s 4ñ0s, c0nf0rm3 4 3ll0s d3v0lv3rá p4r4 su r3sc4t3, d3l d1n3r0 p0r 3l cu4l s3 v3nd1ó. 52 Y s1 qu3d4r3 p0c0 t13mp0 h4st4 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30, 3nt0nc3s h4rá un cálcul0 c0n él, y d3v0lv3rá su r3sc4t3 c0nf0rm3 4 sus 4ñ0s. 53 C0m0 c0n 3l t0m4d0 4 s4l4r10 4nu4lm3nt3 h4rá c0n él; n0 s3 3ns3ñ0r34rá 3n él c0n r1g0r d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s. 54 Y s1 n0 s3 r3sc4t4r3 3n 3s0s 4ñ0s, 3n 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30 s4ldrá, él y sus h1j0s c0n él. 55 P0rqu3 m1s s13rv0s s0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; s0n s13rv0s mí0s, 4 l0s cu4l3s s4qué d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. Y0 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 

B3nd1c10n3s d3 l4 0b3d13nc14

(Dt. 7.12-24; 28.1-14)

1 N0 h4ré1s p4r4 v0s0tr0s íd0l0s, n1 3scultur4, n1 0s l3v4nt4ré1s 3st4tu4, n1 p0ndré1s 3n vu3str4 t13rr4 p13dr4 p1nt4d4 p4r4 1ncl1n4r0s 4 3ll4; p0rqu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 2 Gu4rd4d m1s dí4s d3 r3p0s0, y t3n3d 3n r3v3r3nc14 m1 s4ntu4r10. Y0 J3h0vá. 

3 S1 4nduv13r31s 3n m1s d3cr3t0s y gu4rd4r31s m1s m4nd4m13nt0s, y l0s pus13r31s p0r 0br4, 4 y0 d4ré vu3str4 lluv14 3n su t13mp0, y l4 t13rr4 r3nd1rá sus pr0duct0s, y 3l árb0l d3l c4mp0 d4rá su frut0. 5 Vu3str4 tr1ll4 4lc4nz4rá 4 l4 v3nd1m14, y l4 v3nd1m14 4lc4nz4rá 4 l4 s3m3nt3r4, y c0m3ré1s vu3str0 p4n h4st4 s4c14r0s, y h4b1t4ré1s s3gur0s 3n vu3str4 t13rr4. 6 Y y0 d4ré p4z 3n l4 t13rr4, y d0rm1ré1s, y n0 h4brá qu13n 0s 3sp4nt3; y h4ré qu1t4r d3 vu3str4 t13rr4 l4s m4l4s b3st14s, y l4 3sp4d4 n0 p4s4rá p0r vu3str0 p4ís. 7 Y p3rs3gu1ré1s 4 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s, y c43rán 4 3sp4d4 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s. 8 C1nc0 d3 v0s0tr0s p3rs3gu1rán 4 c13nt0, y c13nt0 d3 v0s0tr0s p3rs3gu1rán 4 d13z m1l, y vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s c43rán 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s. 9 P0rqu3 y0 m3 v0lv3ré 4 v0s0tr0s, y 0s h4ré cr3c3r, y 0s mult1pl1c4ré, y 4f1rm4ré m1 p4ct0 c0n v0s0tr0s. 10 C0m3ré1s l0 4ñ3j0 d3 much0 t13mp0, y p0ndré1s fu3r4 l0 4ñ3j0 p4r4 gu4rd4r l0 nu3v0. 11 Y p0ndré m1 m0r4d4 3n m3d10 d3 v0s0tr0s, y m1 4lm4 n0 0s 4b0m1n4rá; 12 y 4nd4ré 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, y y0 s3ré vu3str0 D10s, y v0s0tr0s s3ré1s m1 pu3bl0. 13 Y0 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, qu3 0s s4qué d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, p4r4 qu3 n0 fu3s31s sus s13rv0s, y r0mpí l4s c0yund4s d3 vu3str0 yug0, y 0s h3 h3ch0 4nd4r c0n 3l r0str0 3rgu1d0. 

C0ns3cu3nc14s d3 l4 d3s0b3d13nc14

(Dt. 28.15-68)

14 P3r0 s1 n0 m3 0y3r31s, n1 h1c13r31s t0d0s 3st0s m1s m4nd4m13nt0s, 15 y s1 d3sd3ñ4r31s m1s d3cr3t0s, y vu3str4 4lm4 m3n0spr3c14r3 m1s 3st4tut0s, n0 3j3cut4nd0 t0d0s m1s m4nd4m13nt0s, 3 1nv4l1d4nd0 m1 p4ct0, 16 y0 t4mb1én h4ré c0n v0s0tr0s 3st0: 3nv14ré s0br3 v0s0tr0s t3rr0r, 3xt3nu4c1ón y c4l3ntur4, qu3 c0nsum4n l0s 0j0s y 4t0rm3nt3n 3l 4lm4; y s3mbr4ré1s 3n v4n0 vu3str4 s3m1ll4, p0rqu3 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s l4 c0m3rán. 17 P0ndré m1 r0str0 c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s, y s3ré1s h3r1d0s d3l4nt3 d3 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s; y l0s qu3 0s 4b0rr3c3n s3 3ns3ñ0r34rán d3 v0s0tr0s, y hu1ré1s s1n qu3 h4y4 qu13n 0s p3rs1g4. 18 Y s1 4un c0n 3st4s c0s4s n0 m3 0y3r31s, y0 v0lv3ré 4 c4st1g4r0s s13t3 v3c3s más p0r vu3str0s p3c4d0s. 19 Y qu3br4nt4ré l4 s0b3rb14 d3 vu3str0 0rgull0, y h4ré vu3str0 c13l0 c0m0 h13rr0, y vu3str4 t13rr4 c0m0 br0nc3. 20 Vu3str4 fu3rz4 s3 c0nsum1rá 3n v4n0, p0rqu3 vu3str4 t13rr4 n0 d4rá su pr0duct0, y l0s árb0l3s d3 l4 t13rr4 n0 d4rán su frut0. 

21 S1 4nduv13r31s c0nm1g0 3n 0p0s1c1ón, y n0 m3 qu1s13r31s 0ír, y0 4ñ4d1ré s0br3 v0s0tr0s s13t3 v3c3s más pl4g4s s3gún vu3str0s p3c4d0s. 22 0nv14ré t4mb1én c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s b3st14s f13r4s qu3 0s 4rr3b4t3n vu3str0s h1j0s, y d3struy4n vu3str0 g4n4d0, y 0s r3duzc4n 3n núm3r0, y vu3str0s c4m1n0s s34n d3s13rt0s. 

23 Y s1 c0n 3st4s c0s4s n0 fu3r31s c0rr3g1d0s, s1n0 qu3 4nduv13r31s c0nm1g0 3n 0p0s1c1ón, 24 y0 t4mb1én pr0c3d3ré 3n c0ntr4 d3 v0s0tr0s, y 0s h3r1ré 4ún s13t3 v3c3s p0r vu3str0s p3c4d0s. 25 Tr43ré s0br3 v0s0tr0s 3sp4d4 v3ng4d0r4, 3n v1nd1c4c1ón d3l p4ct0; y s1 busc4r31s r3fug10 3n vu3str4s c1ud4d3s, y0 3nv14ré p3st1l3nc14 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, y s3ré1s 3ntr3g4d0s 3n m4n0 d3l 3n3m1g0. 26 Cu4nd0 y0 0s qu3br4nt3 3l sust3nt0 d3l p4n, c0c3rán d13z muj3r3s vu3str0 p4n 3n un h0rn0, y 0s d3v0lv3rán vu3str0 p4n p0r p3s0; y c0m3ré1s, y n0 0s s4c14ré1s. 

27 S1 4un c0n 3st0 n0 m3 0y3r31s, s1n0 qu3 pr0c3d13r31s c0nm1g0 3n 0p0s1c1ón, 28 y0 pr0c3d3ré 3n c0ntr4 d3 v0s0tr0s c0n 1r4, y 0s c4t1g4ré 4ún s13t3 v3c3s p0r vu3str0s p3c4d0s. 29 Y c0m3ré1s l4 c4rn3 d3 vu3str0s h1j0s, y c0m3ré1s l4 c4rn3 d3 vu3str4s h1j4s. 30 D3stru1ré vu3str0s lug4r3s 4lt0s, y d3rr1b4ré vu3str4s 1mág3n3s, y p0ndré vu3str0s cu3rp0s mu3rt0s s0br3 l0s cu3rp0s mu3rt0s d3 vu3str0s íd0l0s, y m1 4lm4 0s 4b0m1n4rá. 31 H4ré d3s13rt4s vu3str4s c1ud4d3s, y 4s0l4ré vu3str0s s4ntu4r10s, y n0 0l3ré l4 fr4g4nc14 d3 vu3str0 su4v3 p3rfum3. 32 4s0l4ré t4mb1én l4 t13rr4, y s3 p4sm4rán p0r 3ll0 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s qu3 3n 3ll4 m0r3n; 33 y 4 v0s0tr0s 0s 3sp4rc1ré 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y d3s3nv41n4ré 3sp4d4 3n p0s d3 v0s0tr0s; y vu3str4 t13rr4 3st4rá 4s0l4d4, y d3s13rt4s vu3str4s c1ud4d3s. 

34 0nt0nc3s l4 t13rr4 g0z4rá sus dí4s d3 r3p0s0, t0d0s l0s dí4s qu3 3sté 4s0l4d4, m13ntr4s v0s0tr0s 3sté1s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s; l4 t13rr4 d3sc4ns4rá 3nt0nc3s y g0z4rá sus dí4s d3 r3p0s0. 35 T0d0 3l t13mp0 qu3 3sté 4s0l4d4, d3sc4ns4rá p0r l0 qu3 n0 r3p0só 3n l0s dí4s d3 r3p0s0 cu4nd0 h4b1t4b41s 3n 3ll4. 36 Y 4 l0s qu3 qu3d3n d3 v0s0tr0s 1nfund1ré 3n sus c0r4z0n3s t4l c0b4rdí4, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, qu3 3l s0n1d0 d3 un4 h0j4 qu3 s3 mu3v4 l0s p3rs3gu1rá, y hu1rán c0m0 4nt3 l4 3sp4d4, y c43rán s1n qu3 n4d13 l0s p3rs1g4. 37 Tr0p3z4rán l0s un0s c0n l0s 0tr0s c0m0 s1 huy3r4n 4nt3 l4 3sp4d4, 4unqu3 n4d13 l0s p3rs1g4; y n0 p0dré1s r3s1st1r d3l4nt3 d3 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s. 38 Y p3r3c3ré1s 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y l4 t13rr4 d3 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s 0s c0nsum1rá. 39 Y l0s qu3 qu3d3n d3 v0s0tr0s d3c43rán 3n l4s t13rr4s d3 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s p0r su 1n1qu1d4d; y p0r l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 sus p4dr3s d3c43rán c0n 3ll0s. 

40 Y c0nf3s4rán su 1n1qu1d4d, y l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 sus p4dr3s, p0r su pr3v4r1c4c1ón c0n qu3 pr3v4r1c4r0n c0ntr4 mí; y t4mb1én p0rqu3 4nduv13r0n c0nm1g0 3n 0p0s1c1ón, 41 y0 t4mb1én h4bré 4nd4d0 3n c0ntr4 d3 3ll0s, y l0s h4bré h3ch0 3ntr4r 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s; y 3nt0nc3s s3 hum1ll4rá su c0r4zón 1nc1rcunc1s0, y r3c0n0c3rán su p3c4d0. 42 0nt0nc3s y0 m3 4c0rd4ré d3 m1 p4ct0 c0n J4c0b, y 4s1m1sm0 d3 m1 p4ct0 c0n 1s44c, y t4mb1én d3 m1 p4ct0 c0n 4br4h4m m3 4c0rd4ré, y h4ré m3m0r14 d3 l4 t13rr4. 43 P3r0 l4 t13rr4 s3rá 4b4nd0n4d4 p0r 3ll0s, y g0z4rá sus dí4s d3 r3p0s0, 3st4nd0 d3s13rt4 4 c4us4 d3 3ll0s; y 3nt0nc3s s3 s0m3t3rán 4l c4st1g0 d3 sus 1n1qu1d4d3s; p0r cu4nt0 m3n0spr3c14r0n m1s 0rd3n4nz4s, y su 4lm4 tuv0 f4st1d10 d3 m1s 3st4tut0s. 44 Y 4un c0n t0d0 3st0, 3st4nd0 3ll0s 3n t13rr4 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, y0 n0 l0s d3s3ch4ré, n1 l0s 4b0m1n4ré p4r4 c0nsum1rl0s, 1nv4l1d4nd0 m1 p4ct0 c0n 3ll0s; p0rqu3 y0 J3h0vá s0y su D10s. 45 4nt3s m3 4c0rd4ré d3 3ll0s p0r 3l p4ct0 4nt1gu0, cu4nd0 l0s s4qué d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 4 l0s 0j0s d3 l4s n4c10n3s, p4r4 s3r su D10s. Y0 J3h0vá. 

46 0st0s s0n l0s 3st4tut0s, 0rd3n4nz4s y l3y3s qu3 3st4bl3c1ó J3h0vá 3ntr3 sí y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S1n4í p0r m4n0 d3 M01sés.

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: Cu4nd0 4lgun0 h1c13r3 3sp3c14l v0t0 4 J3h0vá, s3gún l4 3st1m4c1ón d3 l4s p3rs0n4s qu3 s3 h4y4n d3 r3d1m1r, l0 3st1m4rás 4sí: 3 0n cu4nt0 4l v4rón d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s h4st4 s3s3nt4, l0 3st1m4rás 3n c1ncu3nt4 s1cl0s d3 pl4t4, s3gún 3l s1cl0 d3l s4ntu4r10. 4 Y s1 fu3r3 muj3r, l4 3st1m4rás 3n tr31nt4 s1cl0s. 5 Y s1 fu3r3 d3 c1nc0 4ñ0s h4st4 v31nt3, 4l v4rón l0 3st1m4rás 3n v31nt3 s1cl0s, y 4 l4 muj3r 3n d13z s1cl0s. 6 Y s1 fu3r3 d3 un m3s h4st4 c1nc0 4ñ0s, 3nt0nc3s 3st1m4rás 4l v4rón 3n c1nc0 s1cl0s d3 pl4t4, y 4 l4 muj3r 3n tr3s s1cl0s d3 pl4t4. 7 M4s s1 fu3r3 d3 s3s3nt4 4ñ0s 0 más, 4l v4rón l0 3st1m4rás 3n qu1nc3 s1cl0s, y 4 l4 muj3r 3n d13z s1cl0s. 8 P3r0 s1 fu3r3 muy p0br3 p4r4 p4g4r tu 3st1m4c1ón, 3nt0nc3s s3rá ll3v4d0 4nt3 3l s4c3rd0t3, qu13n f1j4rá 3l pr3c10; c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p0s1b1l1d4d d3l qu3 h1z0 3l v0t0, l3 f1j4rá pr3c10 3l s4c3rd0t3. 

9 Y s1 fu3r3 4n1m4l d3 l0s qu3 s3 0fr3c3 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá, t0d0 l0 qu3 d3 l0s t4l3s s3 d13r3 4 J3h0vá s3rá s4nt0. 10 N0 s3rá c4mb14d0 n1 tr0c4d0, bu3n0 p0r m4l0, n1 m4l0 p0r bu3n0; y s1 s3 p3rmut4r3 un 4n1m4l p0r 0tr0, él y 3l d4d0 3n c4mb10 d3 él s3rán s4gr4d0s. 11 S1 fu3r3 4lgún 4n1m4l 1nmund0, d3 qu3 n0 s3 0fr3c3 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá, 3nt0nc3s 3l 4n1m4l s3rá pu3st0 d3l4nt3 d3l s4c3rd0t3, 12 y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l0 v4l0r4rá, s34 bu3n0 0 s34 m4l0; c0nf0rm3 4 l4 3st1m4c1ón d3l s4c3rd0t3, 4sí s3rá. 13 Y s1 l0 qu1s13r3 r3sc4t4r, 4ñ4d1rá s0br3 tu v4lu4c1ón l4 qu1nt4 p4rt3. 

14 Cu4nd0 4lgun0 d3d1c4r3 su c4s4 c0ns4gránd0l4 4 J3h0vá, l4 v4l0r4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3, s34 bu3n4 0 s34 m4l4; s3gún l4 v4l0r4r3 3l s4c3rd0t3, 4sí qu3d4rá. 15 M4s s1 3l qu3 d3d1có su c4s4 d3s34r3 r3sc4t4rl4, 4ñ4d1rá 4 tu v4lu4c1ón l4 qu1nt4 p4rt3 d3l v4l0r d3 3ll4, y s3rá suy4. 

16 S1 4lgun0 d3d1c4r3 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 su p0s3s1ón 4 J3h0vá, tu 3st1m4c1ón s3rá c0nf0rm3 4 su s13mbr4; un h0m3r d3 s13mbr4 d3 c3b4d4 s3 v4l0r4rá 3n c1ncu3nt4 s1cl0s d3 pl4t4. 17 Y s1 d3d1c4r3 su t13rr4 d3sd3 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30, c0nf0rm3 4 tu 3st1m4c1ón qu3d4rá. 18 M4s s1 d3spués d3l jub1l30 d3d1c4r3 su t13rr4, 3nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá l4 cu3nt4 d3l d1n3r0 c0nf0rm3 4 l0s 4ñ0s qu3 qu3d4r3n h4st4 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30, y s3 r3b4j4rá d3 tu 3st1m4c1ón. 19 Y s1 3l qu3 d3d1có l4 t13rr4 qu1s13r3 r3d1m1rl4, 4ñ4d1rá 4 tu 3st1m4c1ón l4 qu1nt4 p4rt3 d3l pr3c10 d3 3ll4, y s3 l3 qu3d4rá p4r4 él. 20 M4s s1 él n0 r3sc4t4r3 l4 t13rr4, y l4 t13rr4 s3 v3nd13r3 4 0tr0, n0 l4 r3sc4t4rá más; 21 s1n0 qu3 cu4nd0 s4l13r3 3n 3l jub1l30, l4 t13rr4 s3rá s4nt4 p4r4 J3h0vá, c0m0 t13rr4 c0ns4gr4d4; l4 p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4 s3rá d3l s4c3rd0t3. 22 Y s1 d3d1c4r3 4lgun0 4 J3h0vá l4 t13rr4 qu3 él c0mpró, qu3 n0 3r4 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 su h3r3nc14, 23 3nt0nc3s 3l s4c3rd0t3 c4lcul4rá c0n él l4 sum4 d3 tu 3st1m4c1ón h4st4 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30, y 4qu3l dí4 d4rá tu pr3c10 s3ñ4l4d0, c0s4 c0ns4gr4d4 4 J3h0vá. 24 0n 3l 4ñ0 d3l jub1l30, v0lv3rá l4 t13rr4 4 4quél d3 qu13n él l4 c0mpró, cuy4 3s l4 h3r3nc14 d3 l4 t13rr4. 25 Y t0d0 l0 qu3 v4l0r4r3s s3rá c0nf0rm3 4l s1cl0 d3l s4ntu4r10; 3l s1cl0 t13n3 v31nt3 g3r4s. 

26 P3r0 3l pr1m0gén1t0 d3 l0s 4n1m4l3s, qu3 p0r l4 pr1m0g3n1tur4 3s d3 J3h0vá, n4d13 l0 d3d1c4rá; s34 bu3y u 0v3j4, d3 J3h0vá 3s. 27 M4s s1 fu3r3 d3 l0s 4n1m4l3s 1nmund0s, l0 r3sc4t4rán c0nf0rm3 4 tu 3st1m4c1ón, y 4ñ4d1rán s0br3 3ll4 l4 qu1nt4 p4rt3 d3 su pr3c10; y s1 n0 l0 r3sc4t4r3n, s3 v3nd3rá c0nf0rm3 4 tu 3st1m4c1ón. 

28 P3r0 n0 s3 v3nd3rá n1 s3 r3sc4t4rá n1ngun4 c0s4 c0ns4gr4d4, qu3 4lgun0 hub13r3 d3d1c4d0 4 J3h0vá; d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 tuv13r3, d3 h0mbr3s y 4n1m4l3s, y d3 l4s t13rr4s d3 su p0s3s1ón, t0d0 l0 c0ns4gr4d0 s3rá c0s4 s4ntís1m4 p4r4 J3h0vá. 29 N1ngun4 p3rs0n4 s3p4r4d4 c0m0 4n4t3m4 p0drá s3r r3sc4t4d4; 1nd3f3ct1bl3m3nt3 h4 d3 s3r mu3rt4. 

30 Y 3l d13zm0 d3 l4 t13rr4, 4sí d3 l4 s1m13nt3 d3 l4 t13rr4 c0m0 d3l frut0 d3 l0s árb0l3s, d3 J3h0vá 3s; 3s c0s4 d3d1c4d4 4 J3h0vá. 31 Y s1 4lgun0 qu1s13r3 r3sc4t4r 4lg0 d3l d13zm0, 4ñ4d1rá l4 qu1nt4 p4rt3 d3 su pr3c10 p0r 3ll0. 32 Y t0d0 d13zm0 d3 v4c4s 0 d3 0v3j4s, d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 p4s4 b4j0 l4 v4r4, 3l d13zm0 s3rá c0ns4gr4d0 4 J3h0vá. 33 N0 m1r4rá s1 3s bu3n0 0 m4l0, n1 l0 c4mb14rá; y s1 l0 c4mb14r3, t4nt0 él c0m0 3l qu3 s3 d10 3n c4mb10 s3rán c0s4s s4gr4d4s; n0 p0drán s3r r3sc4t4d0s. 

34 0st0s s0n l0s m4nd4m13nt0s qu3 0rd3nó J3h0vá 4 M01sés p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S1n4í.

L1br0 Cu4rt0 d3 M01sés

NÚM0R0S 1

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n4í, 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 3n 3l dí4 pr1m3r0 d3l m3s s3gund0, 3n 3l s3gund0 4ñ0 d3 su s4l1d4 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, d1c13nd0: 2 T0m4d 3l c3ns0 d3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p0r sus f4m1l14s, p0r l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, c0n l4 cu3nt4 d3 l0s n0mbr3s, t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s p0r sus c4b3z4s. 3 D3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, t0d0s l0s qu3 pu3d3n s4l1r 4 l4 gu3rr4 3n 1sr43l, l0s c0nt4ré1s tú y 44rón p0r sus 3jérc1t0s. 4 Y 3st4rá c0n v0s0tr0s un v4rón d3 c4d4 tr1bu, c4d4 un0 j3f3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 sus p4dr3s. 5 0st0s s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s v4r0n3s qu3 3st4rán c0n v0s0tr0s: D3 l4 tr1bu d3 Rubén, 0l1sur h1j0 d3 S3d3ur. 6 D3 S1m3ón, S3lum13l h1j0 d3 Zur1s4d41. 7 D3 Judá, N44són h1j0 d3 4m1n4d4b. 8 D3 1s4c4r, N4t4n43l h1j0 d3 Zu4r. 9 D3 Z4bulón, 0l14b h1j0 d3 H3lón. 10 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé: d3 0fr4ín, 0l1s4m4 h1j0 d3 4m1ud; d3 M4n4sés, G4m4l13l h1j0 d3 P3d4sur. 11 D3 B3nj4mín, 4b1dán h1j0 d3 G3d30n1. 12 D3 D4n, 4h13z3r h1j0 d3 4m1s4d41. 13 D3 4s3r, P4g13l h1j0 d3 0crán. 14 D3 G4d, 0l14s4f h1j0 d3 D3u3l. 15 D3 N3ft4lí, 4h1r4 h1j0 d3 0nán. 16 0st0s 3r4n l0s n0mbr4d0s d3 3ntr3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, prínc1p3s d3 l4s tr1bus d3 sus p4dr3s, c4p1t4n3s d3 l0s m1ll4r3s d3 1sr43l. 

17 T0m4r0n, pu3s, M01sés y 44rón 4 3st0s v4r0n3s qu3 fu3r0n d3s1gn4d0s p0r sus n0mbr3s, 18 y r3un13r0n 4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 3n 3l dí4 pr1m3r0 d3l m3s s3gund0, y fu3r0n 4grup4d0s p0r f4m1l14s, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 cu3nt4 d3 l0s n0mbr3s p0r c4b3z4, d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4. 19 C0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés, l0s c0ntó 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n4í. 

20 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén, pr1m0gén1t0 d3 1sr43l, p0r su d3sc3nd3nc14, p0r sus f4m1l14s, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 cu3nt4 d3 l0s n0mbr3s p0r c4b3z4, t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, t0d0s l0s qu3 p0dí4n s4l1r 4 l4 gu3rr4; 21 l0s c0nt4d0s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Rubén fu3r0n cu4r3nt4 y s31s m1l qu1n13nt0s.

30 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 Z4bulón, p0r su d3sc3nd3nc14, p0r sus f4m1l14s, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 cu3nt4 d3 sus n0mbr3s, d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, t0d0s l0s qu3 p0dí4n s4l1r 4 l4 gu3rr4; 31 l0s c0nt4d0s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Z4bulón fu3r0n c1ncu3nt4 y s13t3 m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s. 

32 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé; d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín, p0r su d3sc3nd3nc14, p0r sus f4m1l14s, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 cu3nt4 d3 l0s n0mbr3s, d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, t0d0s l0s qu3 p0dí4n s4l1r 4 l4 gu3rr4; 33 l0s c0nt4d0s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 0fr4ín fu3r0n cu4r3nt4 m1l qu1n13nt0s. 

34 Y d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés, p0r su d3sc3nd3nc14, p0r sus f4m1l14s, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 cu3nt4 d3 l0s n0mbr3s, d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, t0d0s l0s qu3 p0dí4n s4l1r 4 l4 gu3rr4; 35 l0s c0nt4d0s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés fu3r0n tr31nt4 y d0s m1l d0sc13nt0s.

44 0st0s fu3r0n l0s c0nt4d0s, l0s cu4l3s c0nt4r0n M01sés y 44rón, c0n l0s prínc1p3s d3 1sr43l, d0c3 v4r0n3s, un0 p0r c4d4 c4s4 d3 sus p4dr3s. 45 Y t0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p0r l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, t0d0s l0s qu3 p0dí4n s4l1r 4 l4 gu3rr4 3n 1sr43l, 46 fu3r0n t0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s s31sc13nt0s tr3s m1l qu1n13nt0s c1ncu3nt4. 

N0mbr4m13nt0 d3 l0s l3v1t4s

47 P3r0 l0s l3v1t4s, s3gún l4 tr1bu d3 sus p4dr3s, n0 fu3r0n c0nt4d0s 3ntr3 3ll0s; 48 p0rqu3 h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 49 S0l4m3nt3 n0 c0nt4rás l4 tr1bu d3 L3ví, n1 t0m4rás l4 cu3nt4 d3 3ll0s 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 50 s1n0 qu3 p0ndrás 4 l0s l3v1t4s 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3l t3st1m0n10, y s0br3 t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s, y s0br3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 l3 p3rt3n3c3n; 3ll0s ll3v4rán 3l t4b3rnácul0 y t0d0s sus 3ns3r3s, y 3ll0s s3rv1rán 3n él, y 4c4mp4rán 4lr3d3d0r d3l t4b3rnácul0. 51 Y cu4nd0 3l t4b3rnácul0 h4y4 d3 tr4sl4d4rs3, l0s l3v1t4s l0 d3s4rm4rán, y cu4nd0 3l t4b3rnácul0 h4y4 d3 d3t3n3rs3, l0s l3v1t4s l0 4rm4rán; y 3l 3xtr4ñ0 qu3 s3 4c3rc4r3 m0r1rá. 52 L0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4c4mp4rán c4d4 un0 3n su c4mp4m3nt0, y c4d4 un0 junt0 4 su b4nd3r4, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s; 53 p3r0 l0s l3v1t4s 4c4mp4rán 4lr3d3d0r d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3l t3st1m0n10, p4r4 qu3 n0 h4y4 1r4 s0br3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; y l0s l3v1t4s t3ndrán l4 gu4rd4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3l t3st1m0n10. 54 0 h1c13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 m4ndó J3h0vá 4 M01sés; 4sí l0 h1c13r0n. 

C4mp4m3nt0s y j3f3s d3 l4s tr1bus

NÚM0R0S 2

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, d1c13nd0: 2 L0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4c4mp4rán c4d4 un0 junt0 4 su b4nd3r4, b4j0 l4s 3ns3ñ4s d3 l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s; 4lr3d3d0r d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón 4c4mp4rán. 3 0st0s 4c4mp4rán 4l 0r13nt3, 4l 3st3: l4 b4nd3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 Judá, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá, N44són h1j0 d3 4m1n4d4b. 4 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, s3t3nt4 y cu4tr0 m1l s31sc13nt0s. 5 Junt0 4 él 4c4mp4rán l0s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 1s4c4r; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1s4c4r, N4t4n43l h1j0 d3 Zu4r. 6 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, c1ncu3nt4 y cu4tr0 m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s. 7 Y l4 tr1bu d3 Z4bulón; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Z4bulón, 0l14b h1j0 d3 H3lón. 8 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, c1ncu3nt4 y s13t3 m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s. 9 T0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 Judá, c13nt0 0ch3nt4 y s31s m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s, m4rch4rán d3l4nt3. 

10 L4 b4nd3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 Rubén 3st4rá 4l sur, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén, 0l1sur h1j0 d3 S3d3ur. 11 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, cu4r3nt4 y s31s m1l qu1n13nt0s. 12 4c4mp4rán junt0 4 él l0s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 S1m3ón; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 S1m3ón, S3lum13l h1j0 d3 Zur1s4d41. 13 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, c1ncu3nt4 y nu3v3 m1l tr3sc13nt0s. 14 Y l4 tr1bu d3 G4d; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d, 0l14s4f h1j0 d3 R3u3l. 15 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, cu4r3nt4 y c1nc0 m1l s31sc13nt0s c1ncu3nt4. 16 T0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 Rubén, c13nt0 c1ncu3nt4 y un m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s c1ncu3nt4, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s, m4rch4rán l0s s3gund0s. 

17 Lu3g0 1rá 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, c0n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 l0s l3v1t4s, 3n m3d10 d3 l0s c4mp4m3nt0s 3n 3l 0rd3n 3n qu3 4c4mp4n; 4sí m4rch4rá c4d4 un0 junt0 4 su b4nd3r4. 

18 L4 b4nd3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 0fr4ín p0r sus 3jérc1t0s, 4l 0cc1d3nt3; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín, 0l1s4m4 h1j0 d3 4m1ud. 19 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, cu4r3nt4 m1l qu1n13nt0s. 20 Junt0 4 él 3st4rá l4 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés, G4m4l13l h1j0 d3 P3d4sur. 21 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, tr31nt4 y d0s m1l d0sc13nt0s. 22 Y l4 tr1bu d3 B3nj4mín; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín, 4b1dán h1j0 d3 G3d30n1. 23 Y su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, tr31nt4 y c1nc0 m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s. 24 T0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 0fr4ín, c13nt0 0ch0 m1l c13n, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s, 1rán l0s t3rc3r0s. 

25 L4 b4nd3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 D4n 3st4rá 4l n0rt3, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 D4n, 4h13z3r h1j0 d3 4m1s4d41. 26 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, s3s3nt4 y d0s m1l s3t3c13nt0s. 27 Junt0 4 él 4c4mp4rán l0s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 4s3r; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4s3r, P4g13l h1j0 d3 0crán. 28 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, cu4r3nt4 y un m1l qu1n13nt0s. 29 Y l4 tr1bu d3 N3ft4lí; y 3l j3f3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 N3ft4lí, 4h1r4 h1j0 d3 0nán. 30 Su cu3rp0 d3 3jérc1t0, c0n sus c0nt4d0s, c1ncu3nt4 y tr3s m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s. 31 T0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 D4n, c13nt0 c1ncu3nt4 y s13t3 m1l s31sc13nt0s, 1rán l0s últ1m0s tr4s sus b4nd3r4s. 

32 0st0s s0n l0s c0nt4d0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s; t0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s p0r c4mp4m3nt0s, p0r sus 3jérc1t0s, s31sc13nt0s tr3s m1l qu1n13nt0s c1ncu3nt4. 33 M4s l0s l3v1t4s n0 fu3r0n c0nt4d0s 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 m4ndó 4 M01sés. 

34 0 h1c13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 J3h0vá m4ndó 4 M01sés; 4sí 4c4mp4r0n p0r sus b4nd3r4s, y 4sí m4rch4r0n c4d4 un0 p0r sus f4m1l14s, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s.

1 0st0s s0n l0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 44rón y d3 M01sés, 3n 3l dí4 3n qu3 J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S1n4í. 2 Y 3st0s s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón: N4d4b 3l pr1m0gén1t0, 4b1ú, 0l34z4r 3 1t4m4r. 3 0st0s s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón, s4c3rd0t3s ung1d0s, 4 l0s cu4l3s c0ns4gró p4r4 3j3rc3r 3l s4c3rd0c10. 4 P3r0 N4d4b y 4b1ú mur13r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá cu4nd0 0fr3c13r0n fu3g0 3xtr4ñ0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n4í; y n0 tuv13r0n h1j0s; y 0l34z4r 3 1t4m4r 3j3rc13r0n 3l s4c3rd0c10 d3l4nt3 d3 44rón su p4dr3. 

5 Y J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 6 H4z qu3 s3 4c3rqu3 l4 tr1bu d3 L3ví, y h4zl4 3st4r d3l4nt3 d3l s4c3rd0t3 44rón, p4r4 qu3 l3 s1rv4n, 7 y d3s3mp3ñ3n 3l 3nc4rg0 d3 él, y 3l 3nc4rg0 d3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón p4r4 s3rv1r 3n 3l m1n1st3r10 d3l t4b3rnácul0; 8 y gu4rd3n t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y t0d0 l0 3nc4rg4d0 4 3ll0s p0r l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y m1n1str3n 3n 3l s3rv1c10 d3l t4b3rnácul0. 9 Y d4rás l0s l3v1t4s 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s; l3 s0n 3nt3r4m3nt3 d4d0s d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 10 Y c0nst1tu1rás 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s p4r4 qu3 3j3rz4n su s4c3rd0c10; y 3l 3xtr4ñ0 qu3 s3 4c3rc4r3, m0r1rá. 

11 H4bló 4d3más J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 12 H3 4quí, y0 h3 t0m4d0 4 l0s l3v1t4s d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n lug4r d3 t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s, l0s pr1m3r0s n4c1d0s 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; s3rán, pu3s, mí0s l0s l3v1t4s. 13 P0rqu3 mí0 3s t0d0 pr1m0gén1t0; d3sd3 3l dí4 3n qu3 y0 h1c3 m0r1r 4 t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, s4nt1f1qué p4r4 mí 4 t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s 3n 1sr43l, 4sí d3 h0mbr3s c0m0 d3 4n1m4l3s; mí0s s3rán. Y0 J3h0vá. 

14 Y J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n4í, d1c13nd0: 15 Cu3nt4 l0s h1j0s d3 L3ví s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, p0r sus f4m1l14s; c0nt4rás t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 un m3s 4rr1b4. 16 Y M01sés l0s c0ntó c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, c0m0 l3 fu3 m4nd4d0. 17 L0s h1j0s d3 L3ví fu3r0n 3st0s p0r sus n0mbr3s: G3rsón, C04t y M3r4r1. 18 Y l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 G3rsón p0r sus f4m1l14s s0n 3st0s: L1bn1 y S1m31. 19 L0s h1j0s d3 C04t p0r sus f4m1l14s s0n: 4mr4m, 1zh4r, H3brón y Uz13l. 20 Y l0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1 p0r sus f4m1l14s: M4hl1 y Mus1. 0st4s s0n l4s f4m1l14s d3 L3ví, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s. 

21 D3 G3rsón 3r4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 L1bn1 y l4 d3 S1m31; 3st4s s0n l4s f4m1l14s d3 G3rsón. 22 L0s c0nt4d0s d3 3ll0s c0nf0rm3 4 l4 cu3nt4 d3 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 un m3s 4rr1b4, l0s c0nt4d0s d3 3ll0s fu3r0n s13t3 m1l qu1n13nt0s. 23 L4s f4m1l14s d3 G3rsón 4c4mp4rán 4 3sp4ld4s d3l t4b3rnácul0, 4l 0cc1d3nt3; 24 y 3l j3f3 d3l l1n4j3 d3 l0s g3rs0n1t4s, 0l14s4f h1j0 d3 L43l. 25 4 c4rg0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 G3rsón, 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 3st4rán 3l t4b3rnácul0, l4 t13nd4 y su cub13rt4, l4 c0rt1n4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 26 l4s c0rt1n4s d3l 4tr10, y l4 c0rt1n4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l 4tr10, qu3 3stá junt0 4l t4b3rnácul0 y junt0 4l 4lt4r 4lr3d3d0r; 4s1m1sm0 sus cu3rd4s p4r4 t0d0 su s3rv1c10. 

27 D3 C04t 3r4n l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s 4mr4m1t4s, l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s 1zh4r1t4s, l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s h3br0n1t4s y l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s uz13l1t4s; 3st4s s0n l4s f4m1l14s c04t1t4s. 28 0l núm3r0 d3 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 un m3s 4rr1b4 3r4 0ch0 m1l s31sc13nt0s, qu3 t3ní4n l4 gu4rd4 d3l s4ntu4r10. 29 L4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t 4c4mp4rán 4l l4d0 d3l t4b3rnácul0, 4l sur; 30 y 3l j3f3 d3l l1n4j3 d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 C04t, 0l1z4fán h1j0 d3 Uz13l. 31 4 c4rg0 d3 3ll0s 3st4rán 3l 4rc4, l4 m3s4, 3l c4nd3l3r0, l0s 4lt4r3s, l0s ut3ns1l10s d3l s4ntu4r10 c0n qu3 m1n1str4n, y 3l v3l0 c0n t0d0 su s3rv1c10. 32 Y 3l pr1nc1p4l d3 l0s j3f3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s s3rá 0l34z4r h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 44rón, j3f3 d3 l0s qu3 t13n3n l4 gu4rd4 d3l s4ntu4r10. 

33 D3 M3r4r1 3r4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s m4hl1t4s y l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s mus1t4s; 3st4s s0n l4s f4m1l14s d3 M3r4r1. 34 L0s c0nt4d0s d3 3ll0s c0nf0rm3 4l núm3r0 d3 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 un m3s 4rr1b4 fu3r0n s31s m1l d0sc13nt0s. 35 Y 3l j3f3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3l l1n4j3 d3 M3r4r1, Zur13l h1j0 d3 4b1h41l; 4c4mp4rán 4l l4d0 d3l t4b3rnácul0, 4l n0rt3. 36 4 c4rg0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1 3st4rá l4 cust0d14 d3 l4s t4bl4s d3l t4b3rnácul0, sus b4rr4s, sus c0lumn4s, sus b4s4s y t0d0s sus 3ns3r3s, c0n t0d0 su s3rv1c10; 37 y l4s c0lumn4s 4lr3d3d0r d3l 4tr10, sus b4s4s, sus 3st4c4s y sus cu3rd4s. 

38 L0s qu3 4c4mp4rán d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 4l 0r13nt3, d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón 4l 3st3, s3rán M01sés y 44rón y sus h1j0s, t3n13nd0 l4 gu4rd4 d3l s4ntu4r10 3n lug4r d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; y 3l 3xtr4ñ0 qu3 s3 4c3rc4r3, m0r1rá. 39 T0d0s l0s c0nt4d0s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, qu3 M01sés y 44rón c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá c0nt4r0n p0r sus f4m1l14s, t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 un m3s 4rr1b4, fu3r0n v31nt1dós m1l. 

R3sc4t3 d3 l0s pr1m0gén1t0s

40 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés: Cu3nt4 t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s v4r0n3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 un m3s 4rr1b4, y cuént4l0s p0r sus n0mbr3s. 41 Y t0m4rás 4 l0s l3v1t4s p4r4 mí 3n lug4r d3 t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y l0s 4n1m4l3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s 3n lug4r d3 t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s d3 l0s 4n1m4l3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. Y0 J3h0vá. 42 C0ntó M01sés, c0m0 J3h0vá l3 m4ndó, t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 43 Y t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s v4r0n3s, c0nf0rm3 4l núm3r0 d3 sus n0mbr3s, d3 un m3s 4rr1b4, fu3r0n v31nt1dós m1l d0sc13nt0s s3t3nt4 y tr3s. 

44 Lu3g0 h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 45 T0m4 l0s l3v1t4s 3n lug4r d3 t0d0s l0s pr1m0gén1t0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y l0s 4n1m4l3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s 3n lug4r d3 sus 4n1m4l3s; y l0s l3v1t4s s3rán mí0s. Y0 J3h0vá. 46 Y p4r4 3l r3sc4t3 d3 l0s d0sc13nt0s s3t3nt4 y tr3s d3 l0s pr1m0gén1t0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, qu3 3xc3d3n 4 l0s l3v1t4s, 47 t0m4rás c1nc0 s1cl0s p0r c4b3z4; c0nf0rm3 4l s1cl0 d3l s4ntu4r10 l0s t0m4rás. 0l s1cl0 t13n3 v31nt3 g3r4s. 48 Y d4rás 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s 3l d1n3r0 d3l r3sc4t3 d3 l0s qu3 3xc3d3n. 49 T0mó, pu3s, M01sés 3l d1n3r0 d3l r3sc4t3 d3 l0s qu3 3xc3dí4n 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s r3d1m1d0s p0r l0s l3v1t4s, 50 y r3c1b1ó d3 l0s pr1m0gén1t0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 3n d1n3r0, m1l tr3sc13nt0s s3s3nt4 y c1nc0 s1cl0s, c0nf0rm3 4l s1cl0 d3l s4ntu4r10. 51 Y M01sés d10 3l d1n3r0 d3 l0s r3sc4t3s 4 44rón y 4 sus h1j0s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, s3gún l0 qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés. 

T4r34s d3 l0s l3v1t4s

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, d1c13nd0: 2 T0m4 l4 cu3nt4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 L3ví, p0r sus f4m1l14s, s3gún l4s c4s4s d3 sus p4dr3s, 3 d3 3d4d d3 tr31nt4 4ñ0s 4rr1b4 h4st4 c1ncu3nt4 4ñ0s, t0d0s l0s qu3 3ntr4n 3n c0mp4ñí4 p4r4 s3rv1r 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 4 0l 0f1c10 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, 3n 3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, s3rá 3st3: 5 Cu4nd0 h4y4 d3 mud4rs3 3l c4mp4m3nt0, v3ndrán 44rón y sus h1j0s y d3s4rm4rán 3l v3l0 d3 l4 t13nd4, y cubr1rán c0n él 3l 4rc4 d3l t3st1m0n10; 6 y p0ndrán s0br3 3ll4 l4 cub13rt4 d3 p13l3s d3 t3j0n3s, y 3xt3nd3rán 3nc1m4 un p4ñ0 t0d0 d3 4zul, y l3 p0ndrán sus v4r4s. 7 S0br3 l4 m3s4 d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón 3xt3nd3rán un p4ñ0 4zul, y p0ndrán s0br3 3ll4 l4s 3scud1ll4s, l4s cuch4r4s, l4s c0p4s y l0s t4z0n3s p4r4 l1b4r; y 3l p4n c0nt1nu0 3st4rá s0br3 3ll4. 8 Y 3xt3nd3rán s0br3 3ll4 un p4ñ0 c4rm3sí, y l0 cubr1rán c0n l4 cub13rt4 d3 p13l3s d3 t3j0n3s; y l3 p0ndrán sus v4r4s. 9 T0m4rán un p4ñ0 4zul y cubr1rán 3l c4nd3l3r0 d3l 4lumbr4d0, sus l4mp4r1ll4s, sus d3sp4b1l4d3r4s, sus pl4t1ll0s, y t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s d3l 4c31t3 c0n qu3 s3 s1rv3; 10 y l0 p0ndrán c0n t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s 3n un4 cub13rt4 d3 p13l3s d3 t3j0n3s, y l0 c0l0c4rán s0br3 un4s p4r1hu3l4s. 11 S0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 0r0 3xt3nd3rán un p4ñ0 4zul, y l0 cubr1rán c0n l4 cub13rt4 d3 p13l3s d3 t3j0n3s, y l3 p0ndrán sus v4r4s. 12 Y t0m4rán t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3l s3rv1c10 d3 qu3 h4c3n us0 3n 3l s4ntu4r10, y l0s p0ndrán 3n un p4ñ0 4zul, y l0s cubr1rán c0n un4 cub13rt4 d3 p13l3s d3 t3j0n3s, y l0s c0l0c4rán s0br3 un4s p4r1hu3l4s. 13 Qu1t4rán l4 c3n1z4 d3l 4lt4r, y 3xt3nd3rán s0br3 él un p4ñ0 d3 púrpur4; 14 y p0ndrán s0br3 él t0d0s sus 1nstrum3nt0s d3 qu3 s3 s1rv3: l4s p4l3t4s, l0s g4rf10s, l0s br4s3r0s y l0s t4z0n3s, t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3l 4lt4r; y 3xt3nd3rán s0br3 él l4 cub13rt4 d3 p13l3s d3 t3j0n3s, y l3 p0ndrán 4d3más l4s v4r4s; 16 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4rá qu3 3ll4 s3 4c3rqu3 y s3 p0ng4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 17 Lu3g0 t0m4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 d3l 4gu4 s4nt4 3n un v4s0 d3 b4rr0; t0m4rá t4mb1én 3l s4c3rd0t3 d3l p0lv0 qu3 hub13r3 3n 3l su3l0 d3l t4b3rnácul0, y l0 3ch4rá 3n 3l 4gu4. 18 Y h4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 3st4r 3n p13 4 l4 muj3r d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y d3scubr1rá l4 c4b3z4 d3 l4 muj3r, y p0ndrá s0br3 sus m4n0s l4 0fr3nd4 r3c0rd4t1v4, qu3 3s l4 0fr3nd4 d3 c3l0s; y 3l s4c3rd0t3 t3ndrá 3n l4 m4n0 l4s 4gu4s 4m4rg4s qu3 4c4rr34n m4ld1c1ón. 19 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l4 c0njur4rá y l3 d1rá: S1 n1ngun0 h4 d0rm1d0 c0nt1g0, y s1 n0 t3 h4s 4p4rt4d0 d3 tu m4r1d0 4 1nmund1c14, l1br3 s34s d3 3st4s 4gu4s 4m4rg4s qu3 tr43n m4ld1c1ón; 20 m4s s1 t3 h4s d3sc4rr14d0 d3 tu m4r1d0 y t3 h4s 4m4nc1ll4d0, y h4 c0h4b1t4d0 c0nt1g0 4lgun0 fu3r4 d3 tu m4r1d0 21 (3l s4c3rd0t3 c0njur4rá 4 l4 muj3r c0n jur4m3nt0 d3 m4ld1c1ón, y d1rá 4 l4 muj3r): J3h0vá t3 h4g4 m4ld1c1ón y 3x3cr4c1ón 3n m3d10 d3 tu pu3bl0, h4c13nd0 J3h0vá qu3 tu musl0 c41g4 y qu3 tu v13ntr3 s3 h1nch3; 22 y 3st4s 4gu4s qu3 d4n m4ld1c1ón 3ntr3n 3n tus 3ntr4ñ4s, y h4g4n h1nch4r tu v13ntr3 y c43r tu musl0. Y l4 muj3r d1rá: 4mén, 4mén. 

23 0l s4c3rd0t3 3scr1b1rá 3st4s m4ld1c10n3s 3n un l1br0, y l4s b0rr4rá c0n l4s 4gu4s 4m4rg4s; 24 y d4rá 4 b3b3r 4 l4 muj3r l4s 4gu4s 4m4rg4s qu3 tr43n m4ld1c1ón; y l4s 4gu4s qu3 0br4n m4ld1c1ón 3ntr4rán 3n 3ll4 p4r4 4m4rg4r. 25 D3spués 3l s4c3rd0t3 t0m4rá d3 l4 m4n0 d3 l4 muj3r l4 0fr3nd4 d3 l0s c3l0s, y l4 m3c3rá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y l4 0fr3c3rá d3l4nt3 d3l 4lt4r. 26 Y t0m4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 un puñ4d0 d3 l4 0fr3nd4 3n m3m0r14 d3 3ll4, y l0 qu3m4rá s0br3 3l 4lt4r, y d3spués d4rá 4 b3b3r l4s 4gu4s 4 l4 muj3r. 27 L3 d4rá, pu3s, 4 b3b3r l4s 4gu4s; y s1 fu3r3 1nmund4 y hub13r3 s1d0 1nf13l 4 su m4r1d0, l4s 4gu4s qu3 0br4n m4ld1c1ón 3ntr4rán 3n 3ll4 p4r4 4m4rg4r, y su v13ntr3 s3 h1nch4rá y c43rá su musl0; y l4 muj3r s3rá m4ld1c1ón 3n m3d10 d3 su pu3bl0. 28 M4s s1 l4 muj3r n0 fu3r3 1nmund4, s1n0 qu3 3stuv13r3 l1mp14, 3ll4 s3rá l1br3, y s3rá f3cund4. 

29 0st4 3s l4 l3y d3 l0s c3l0s, cu4nd0 l4 muj3r c0m3t13r3 1nf1d3l1d4d c0ntr4 su m4r1d0, y s3 4m4nc1ll4r3; 30 0 d3l m4r1d0 s0br3 3l cu4l p4s4r3 3spír1tu d3 c3l0s, y tuv13r3 c3l0s d3 su muj3r; l4 pr3s3nt4rá 3nt0nc3s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y 3l s4c3rd0t3 3j3cut4rá 3n 3ll4 t0d4 3st4 l3y. 31 0l h0mbr3 s3rá l1br3 d3 1n1qu1d4d, y l4 muj3r ll3v4rá su p3c4d0.

6 T0d0 3l t13mp0 qu3 s3 4p4rt3 p4r4 J3h0vá, n0 s3 4c3rc4rá 4 p3rs0n4 mu3rt4. 7 N1 4un p0r su p4dr3 n1 p0r su m4dr3, n1 p0r su h3rm4n0 n1 p0r su h3rm4n4, p0drá c0nt4m1n4rs3 cu4nd0 mu3r4n; p0rqu3 l4 c0ns4gr4c1ón d3 su D10s t13n3 s0br3 su c4b3z4. 8 T0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 su n4z4r34t0, s3rá s4nt0 p4r4 J3h0vá. 


9 S1 4lgun0 mur13r3 súb1t4m3nt3 junt0 4 él, su c4b3z4 c0ns4gr4d4 s3rá c0nt4m1n4d4; p0r t4nt0, 3l dí4 d3 su pur1f1c4c1ón r43rá su c4b3z4; 4l sépt1m0 dí4 l4 r43rá. 10 Y 3l dí4 0ct4v0 tr43rá d0s tórt0l4s 0 d0s p4l0m1n0s 4l s4c3rd0t3, 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 11 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 0fr3c3rá 3l un0 3n 3xp14c1ón, y 3l 0tr0 3n h0l0c4ust0; y h4rá 3xp14c1ón d3 l0 qu3 p3có 4 c4us4 d3l mu3rt0, y s4nt1f1c4rá su c4b3z4 3n 4qu3l dí4. 12 Y c0ns4gr4rá p4r4 J3h0vá l0s dí4s d3 su n4z4r34t0, y tr43rá un c0rd3r0 d3 un 4ñ0 3n 3xp14c1ón p0r l4 culp4; y l0s dí4s pr1m3r0s s3rán 4nul4d0s, p0r cu4nt0 fu3 c0nt4m1n4d0 su n4z4r34t0.

4 Y l4 g3nt3 3xtr4nj3r4 qu3 s3 m3zcló c0n 3ll0s tuv0 un v1v0 d3s30, y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l t4mb1én v0lv13r0n 4 ll0r4r y d1j3r0n: ¡Qu1én n0s d13r4 4 c0m3r c4rn3! 5 N0s 4c0rd4m0s d3l p3sc4d0 qu3 c0mí4m0s 3n 0g1pt0 d3 b4ld3, d3 l0s p3p1n0s, l0s m3l0n3s, l0s pu3rr0s, l4s c3b0ll4s y l0s 4j0s; 6 y 4h0r4 nu3str4 4lm4 s3 s3c4; pu3s n4d4 s1n0 3st3 m4ná v3n nu3str0s 0j0s. 

7 Y 3r4 3l m4ná c0m0 s3m1ll4 d3 cul4ntr0, y su c0l0r c0m0 c0l0r d3 b3d3l10. 8 0l pu3bl0 s3 3sp4rcí4 y l0 r3c0gí4, y l0 m0lí4 3n m0l1n0s 0 l0 m4j4b4 3n m0rt3r0s, y l0 c0cí4 3n c4ld3r4 0 h4cí4 d3 él t0rt4s; su s4b0r 3r4 c0m0 s4b0r d3 4c31t3 nu3v0. 9 Y cu4nd0 d3sc3ndí4 3l r0cí0 s0br3 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 n0ch3, 3l m4ná d3sc3ndí4 s0br3 él. 

10 Y 0yó M01sés 4l pu3bl0, qu3 ll0r4b4 p0r sus f4m1l14s, c4d4 un0 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 su t13nd4; y l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd1ó 3n gr4n m4n3r4; t4mb1én l3 p4r3c1ó m4l 4 M01sés. 11 Y d1j0 M01sés 4 J3h0vá: ¿P0r qué h4s h3ch0 m4l 4 tu s13rv0? ¿y p0r qué n0 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, qu3 h4s pu3st0 l4 c4rg4 d3 t0d0 3st3 pu3bl0 s0br3 mí? 12 ¿C0nc3bí y0 4 t0d0 3st3 pu3bl0? ¿L0 3ng3ndré y0, p4r4 qu3 m3 d1g4s: Llév4l0 3n tu s3n0, c0m0 ll3v4 l4 qu3 crí4 4l qu3 m4m4, 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l4 cu4l jur4st3 4 sus p4dr3s? 13 ¿D3 dónd3 c0ns3gu1ré y0 c4rn3 p4r4 d4r 4 t0d0 3st3 pu3bl0? P0rqu3 ll0r4n 4 mí, d1c13nd0: D4n0s c4rn3 qu3 c0m4m0s. 14 N0 pu3d0 y0 s0l0 s0p0rt4r 4 t0d0 3st3 pu3bl0, qu3 m3 3s p3s4d0 3n d3m4sí4. 15 Y s1 4sí l0 h4c3s tú c0nm1g0, y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3s mu3rt3, s1 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s; y qu3 y0 n0 v34 m1 m4l. 

16 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés: R3ún3m3 s3t3nt4 v4r0n3s d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l, qu3 tú s4b3s qu3 s0n 4nc14n0s d3l pu3bl0 y sus pr1nc1p4l3s; y trá3l0s 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y 3sp3r3n 4llí c0nt1g0. 17 Y y0 d3sc3nd3ré y h4bl4ré 4llí c0nt1g0, y t0m4ré d3l 3spír1tu qu3 3stá 3n t1, y p0ndré 3n 3ll0s; y ll3v4rán c0nt1g0 l4 c4rg4 d3l pu3bl0, y n0 l4 ll3v4rás tú s0l0. 18 P3r0 4l pu3bl0 d1rás: S4nt1f1c40s p4r4 m4ñ4n4, y c0m3ré1s c4rn3; p0rqu3 h4bé1s ll0r4d0 3n 0íd0s d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: ¡Qu1én n0s d13r4 4 c0m3r c4rn3! ¡C13rt4m3nt3 m3j0r n0s 1b4 3n 0g1pt0! 24 Y s4l1ó M01sés y d1j0 4l pu3bl0 l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3h0vá; y r3un1ó 4 l0s s3t3nt4 v4r0n3s d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3l pu3bl0, y l0s h1z0 3st4r 4lr3d3d0r d3l t4b3rnácul0. 25 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d3sc3nd1ó 3n l4 nub3, y l3 h4bló; y t0mó d3l 3spír1tu qu3 3st4b4 3n él, y l0 pus0 3n l0s s3t3nt4 v4r0n3s 4nc14n0s; y cu4nd0 p0só s0br3 3ll0s 3l 3spír1tu, pr0f3t1z4r0n, y n0 c3s4r0n.

31 Y v1n0 un v13nt0 d3 J3h0vá, y tr4j0 c0d0rn1c3s d3l m4r, y l4s d3jó s0br3 3l c4mp4m3nt0, un dí4 d3 c4m1n0 4 un l4d0, y un dí4 d3 c4m1n0 4l 0tr0, 4lr3d3d0r d3l c4mp4m3nt0, y c4s1 d0s c0d0s s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4. 32 0nt0nc3s 3l pu3bl0 3stuv0 l3v4nt4d0 t0d0 4qu3l dí4 y t0d4 l4 n0ch3, y t0d0 3l dí4 s1gu13nt3, y r3c0g13r0n c0d0rn1c3s; 3l qu3 m3n0s, r3c0g1ó d13z m0nt0n3s; y l4s t3nd13r0n p4r4 sí 4 l0 l4rg0 4lr3d3d0r d3l c4mp4m3nt0. 33 4ún 3st4b4 l4 c4rn3 3ntr3 l0s d13nt3s d3 3ll0s, 4nt3s qu3 fu3s3 m4st1c4d4, cu4nd0 l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd1ó 3n 3l pu3bl0, 3 h1r1ó J3h0vá 4l pu3bl0 c0n un4 pl4g4 muy gr4nd3. 34 Y ll4mó 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r K1br0t-h4t44v4, p0r cu4nt0 4llí s3pult4r0n 4l pu3bl0 c0d1c10s0. 35 D3 K1br0t-h4t44v4 p4rt1ó 3l pu3bl0 4 H4z3r0t, y s3 qu3dó 3n H4z3r0t.

P3r0 l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá s3 m0stró 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 11 y J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés: ¿H4st4 cuánd0 m3 h4 d3 1rr1t4r 3st3 pu3bl0? ¿H4st4 cuánd0 n0 m3 cr33rán, c0n t0d4s l4s s3ñ4l3s qu3 h3 h3ch0 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s? 12 Y0 l0s h3r1ré d3 m0rt4nd4d y l0s d3stru1ré, y 4 t1 t3 p0ndré s0br3 g3nt3 más gr4nd3 y más fu3rt3 qu3 3ll0s. 

13 P3r0 M01sés r3sp0nd1ó 4 J3h0vá: L0 01rán lu3g0 l0s 3g1pc10s, p0rqu3 d3 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s s4c4st3 4 3st3 pu3bl0 c0n tu p0d3r; 14 y l0 d1rán 4 l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 3st4 t13rr4, l0s cu4l3s h4n 0íd0 qu3 tú, 0h J3h0vá, 3st4b4s 3n m3d10 d3 3st3 pu3bl0, qu3 c4r4 4 c4r4 4p4r3cí4s tú, 0h J3h0vá, y qu3 tu nub3 3st4b4 s0br3 3ll0s, y qu3 d3 dí4 1b4s d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s 3n c0lumn4 d3 nub3, y d3 n0ch3 3n c0lumn4 d3 fu3g0; 15 y qu3 h4s h3ch0 m0r1r 4 3st3 pu3bl0 c0m0 4 un s0l0 h0mbr3; y l4s g3nt3s qu3 hub13r3n 0íd0 tu f4m4 h4bl4rán, d1c13nd0: 16 P0r cu4nt0 n0 pud0 J3h0vá m3t3r 3st3 pu3bl0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l4 cu4l l3s h4bí4 jur4d0, l0s m4tó 3n 3l d3s13rt0. 17 4h0r4, pu3s, y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 s34 m4gn1f1c4d0 3l p0d3r d3l S3ñ0r, c0m0 l0 h4bl4st3, d1c13nd0: 18 J3h0vá, t4rd0 p4r4 l4 1r4 y gr4nd3 3n m1s3r1c0rd14, qu3 p3rd0n4 l4 1n1qu1d4d y l4 r3b3l1ón, 4unqu3 d3 n1ngún m0d0 t3ndrá p0r 1n0c3nt3 4l culp4bl3; qu3 v1s1t4 l4 m4ld4d d3 l0s p4dr3s s0br3 l0s h1j0s h4st4 l0s t3rc3r0s y h4st4 l0s cu4rt0s. 19 P3rd0n4 4h0r4 l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 3st3 pu3bl0 s3gún l4 gr4nd3z4 d3 tu m1s3r1c0rd14, y c0m0 h4s p3rd0n4d0 4 3st3 pu3bl0 d3sd3 0g1pt0 h4st4 4quí.

1 C0ré h1j0 d3 1zh4r, h1j0 d3 C04t, h1j0 d3 L3ví, y D4tán y 4b1r4m h1j0s d3 0l14b, y 0n h1j0 d3 P3l3t, d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén, t0m4r0n g3nt3, 2 y s3 l3v4nt4r0n c0ntr4 M01sés c0n d0sc13nt0s c1ncu3nt4 v4r0n3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, prínc1p3s d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, d3 l0s d3l c0ns3j0, v4r0n3s d3 r3n0mbr3. 3 Y s3 junt4r0n c0ntr4 M01sés y 44rón y l3s d1j3r0n: ¡B4st4 y4 d3 v0s0tr0s! P0rqu3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, t0d0s 3ll0s s0n s4nt0s, y 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s 3stá J3h0vá; ¿p0r qué, pu3s, 0s l3v4ntá1s v0s0tr0s s0br3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 J3h0vá? 4 Cu4nd0 0yó 3st0 M01sés, s3 p0stró s0br3 su r0str0; 5 y h4bló 4 C0ré y 4 t0d0 su séqu1t0, d1c13nd0: M4ñ4n4 m0str4rá J3h0vá qu1én 3s suy0, y qu1én 3s s4nt0, y h4rá qu3 s3 4c3rqu3 4 él; 4l qu3 él 3sc0g13r3, él l0 4c3rc4rá 4 sí. 6 H4c3d 3st0: t0m40s 1nc3ns4r10s, C0ré y t0d0 su séqu1t0, 7 y p0n3d fu3g0 3n 3ll0s, y p0n3d 3n 3ll0s 1nc13ns0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá m4ñ4n4; y 3l v4rón 4 qu13n J3h0vá 3sc0g13r3, 4qu3l s3rá 3l s4nt0; 3st0 0s b4st3, h1j0s d3 L3ví. 8 D1j0 más M01sés 4 C0ré: 0íd 4h0r4, h1j0s d3 L3ví: 9 ¿0s 3s p0c0 qu3 3l D10s d3 1sr43l 0s h4y4 4p4rt4d0 d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l, 4c3rcánd00s 4 él p4r4 qu3 m1n1stré1s 3n 3l s3rv1c10 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, y 3sté1s d3l4nt3 d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón p4r4 m1n1str4rl3s, 10 y qu3 t3 h1z0 4c3rc4r 4 t1, y 4 t0d0s tus h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3 L3ví c0nt1g0? ¿Pr0curá1s t4mb1én 3l s4c3rd0c10? 11 P0r t4nt0, tú y t0d0 tu séqu1t0 s01s l0s qu3 0s juntá1s c0ntr4 J3h0vá; pu3s 44rón, ¿qué 3s, p4r4 qu3 c0ntr4 él murmuré1s? 

12 Y 3nv1ó M01sés 4 ll4m4r 4 D4tán y 4b1r4m, h1j0s d3 0l14b; m4s 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: N0 1r3m0s 4llá. 13 ¿0s p0c0 qu3 n0s h4y4s h3ch0 v3n1r d3 un4 t13rr4 qu3 d3st1l4 l3ch3 y m13l, p4r4 h4c3rn0s m0r1r 3n 3l d3s13rt0, s1n0 qu3 t4mb1én t3 3ns3ñ0r33s d3 n0s0tr0s 1mp3r10s4m3nt3? 14 N1 t4mp0c0 n0s h4s m3t1d0 tú 3n t13rr4 qu3 fluy4 l3ch3 y m13l, n1 n0s h4s d4d0 h3r3d4d3s d3 t13rr4s y v1ñ4s. ¿S4c4rás l0s 0j0s d3 3st0s h0mbr3s? N0 sub1r3m0s. 

15 0nt0nc3s M01sés s3 3n0jó 3n gr4n m4n3r4, y d1j0 4 J3h0vá: N0 m1r3s 4 su 0fr3nd4; n1 4un un 4sn0 h3 t0m4d0 d3 3ll0s, n1 4 n1ngun0 d3 3ll0s h3 h3ch0 m4l. 16 D3spués d1j0 M01sés 4 C0ré: Tú y t0d0 tu séqu1t0, p0n30s m4ñ4n4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; tú, y 3ll0s, y 44rón; 17 y t0m4d c4d4 un0 su 1nc3ns4r10 y p0n3d 1nc13ns0 3n 3ll0s, y 4c3rc40s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá c4d4 un0 c0n su 1nc3ns4r10, d0sc13nt0s c1ncu3nt4 1nc3ns4r10s; tú t4mb1én, y 44rón, c4d4 un0 c0n su 1nc3ns4r10. 18 Y t0mó c4d4 un0 su 1nc3ns4r10, y pus13r0n 3n 3ll0s fu3g0, y 3ch4r0n 3n 3ll0s 1nc13ns0, y s3 pus13r0n 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón c0n M01sés y 44rón. 19 Y4 C0ré h4bí4 h3ch0 junt4r c0ntr4 3ll0s t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón; 3nt0nc3s l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá 4p4r3c1ó 4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón. 20 Y J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, d1c13nd0: 21 4p4rt40s d3 3ntr3 3st4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, y l0s c0nsum1ré 3n un m0m3nt0. 22 Y 3ll0s s3 p0str4r0n s0br3 sus r0str0s, y d1j3r0n: D10s, D10s d3 l0s 3spír1tus d3 t0d4 c4rn3, ¿n0 3s un s0l0 h0mbr3 3l qu3 p3có? ¿P0r qué 41r4rt3 c0ntr4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón? 23 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 24 H4bl4 4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón y d1l3s: 4p4rt40s d3 3n d3rr3d0r d3 l4 t13nd4 d3 C0ré, D4tán y 4b1r4m. 

25 0nt0nc3s M01sés s3 l3v4ntó y fu3 4 D4tán y 4 4b1r4m, y l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l fu3r0n 3n p0s d3 él. 26 Y él h4bló 4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, d1c13nd0: 4p4rt40s 4h0r4 d3 l4s t13nd4s d3 3st0s h0mbr3s 1mpí0s, y n0 t0qué1s n1ngun4 c0s4 suy4, p4r4 qu3 n0 p3r3zcá1s 3n t0d0s sus p3c4d0s. 27 Y s3 4p4rt4r0n d3 l4s t13nd4s d3 C0ré, d3 D4tán y d3 4b1r4m 3n d3rr3d0r; y D4tán y 4b1r4m s4l13r0n y s3 pus13r0n 4 l4s pu3rt4s d3 sus t13nd4s, c0n sus muj3r3s, sus h1j0s y sus p3qu3ñu3l0s. 28 Y d1j0 M01sés: 0n 3st0 c0n0c3ré1s qu3 J3h0vá m3 h4 3nv14d0 p4r4 qu3 h1c13s3 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, y qu3 n0 l4s h1c3 d3 m1 pr0p14 v0lunt4d. 29 S1 c0m0 mu3r3n t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s mur13r3n ést0s, 0 s1 3ll0s 4l s3r v1s1t4d0s s1gu3n l4 su3rt3 d3 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s, J3h0vá n0 m3 3nv1ó. 30 M4s s1 J3h0vá h1c13r3 4lg0 nu3v0, y l4 t13rr4 4br13r3 su b0c4 y l0s tr4g4r3 c0n t0d4s sus c0s4s, y d3sc3nd13r3n v1v0s 4l S30l, 3nt0nc3s c0n0c3ré1s qu3 3st0s h0mbr3s 1rr1t4r0n 4 J3h0vá. 

31 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 c3só él d3 h4bl4r t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s, s3 4br1ó l4 t13rr4 qu3 3st4b4 d3b4j0 d3 3ll0s. 32 4br1ó l4 t13rr4 su b0c4, y l0s tr4gó 4 3ll0s, 4 sus c4s4s, 4 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 C0ré, y 4 t0d0s sus b13n3s. 33 Y 3ll0s, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4n, d3sc3nd13r0n v1v0s 4l S30l, y l0s cubr1ó l4 t13rr4, y p3r3c13r0n d3 3n m3d10 d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón. 34 Y t0d0 1sr43l, l0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n d3rr3d0r d3 3ll0s, huy3r0n 4l gr1t0 d3 3ll0s; p0rqu3 d3cí4n: N0 n0s tr4gu3 t4mb1én l4 t13rr4. 35 T4mb1én s4l1ó fu3g0 d3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y c0nsum1ó 4 l0s d0sc13nt0s c1ncu3nt4 h0mbr3s qu3 0fr3cí4n 3l 1nc13ns0.

8 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 3l dí4 s1gu13nt3 v1n0 M01sés 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3l t3st1m0n10; y h3 4quí qu3 l4 v4r4 d3 44rón d3 l4 c4s4 d3 L3ví h4bí4 r3v3rd3c1d0, y 3ch4d0 fl0r3s, y 4rr0j4d0 r3nu3v0s, y pr0duc1d0 4lm3ndr4s. 9 0nt0nc3s s4có M01sés t0d4s l4s v4r4s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; y 3ll0s l0 v13r0n, y t0m4r0n c4d4 un0 su v4r4. 10 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés: Vu3lv3 l4 v4r4 d3 44rón d3l4nt3 d3l t3st1m0n10, p4r4 qu3 s3 gu4rd3 p0r s3ñ4l 4 l0s h1j0s r3b3ld3s; y h4rás c3s4r sus qu3j4s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 mí, p4r4 qu3 n0 mu3r4n. 11 0 h1z0 M01sés c0m0 l3 m4ndó J3h0vá, 4sí l0 h1z0. 

12 0nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4bl4r0n 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí n0s0tr0s s0m0s mu3rt0s, p3rd1d0s s0m0s, t0d0s n0s0tr0s s0m0s p3rd1d0s. 13 Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 s3 4c3rc4r3, 3l qu3 v1n13r3 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, m0r1rá. ¿4c4b4r3m0s p0r p3r3c3r t0d0s?
