1 J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, d1c13nd0: 2 0st4 3s l4 0rd3n4nz4 d3 l4 l3y qu3 J3h0vá h4 pr3scr1t0, d1c13nd0: D1 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 t3 tr41g4n un4 v4c4 4l4z4n4, p3rf3ct4, 3n l4 cu4l n0 h4y4 f4lt4, s0br3 l4 cu4l n0 s3 h4y4 pu3st0 yug0; 3 y l4 d4ré1s 4 0l34z4r 3l s4c3rd0t3, y él l4 s4c4rá fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, y l4 h4rá d3g0ll4r 3n su pr3s3nc14. 4 Y 0l34z4r 3l s4c3rd0t3 t0m4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 c0n su d3d0, y r0c14rá h4c14 l4 p4rt3 d3l4nt3r4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón c0n l4 s4ngr3 d3 3ll4 s13t3 v3c3s; 5 y h4rá qu3m4r l4 v4c4 4nt3 sus 0j0s; su cu3r0 y su c4rn3 y su s4ngr3, c0n su 3st1érc0l, h4rá qu3m4r. 6 Lu3g0 t0m4rá 3l s4c3rd0t3 m4d3r4 d3 c3dr0, 3 h1s0p0, y 3sc4rl4t4, y l0 3ch4rá 3n m3d10 d3l fu3g0 3n qu3 4rd3 l4 v4c4. 7 0l s4c3rd0t3 l4v4rá lu3g0 sus v3st1d0s, l4v4rá t4mb1én su cu3rp0 c0n 4gu4, y d3spués 3ntr4rá 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0; y s3rá 1nmund0 3l s4c3rd0t3 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 8 4s1m1sm0 3l qu3 l4 qu3mó l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s 3n 4gu4, t4mb1én l4v4rá 3n 4gu4 su cu3rp0, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 9 Y un h0mbr3 l1mp10 r3c0g3rá l4s c3n1z4s d3 l4 v4c4 y l4s p0ndrá fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 3n lug4r l1mp10, y l4s gu4rd4rá l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p4r4 3l 4gu4 d3 pur1f1c4c1ón; 3s un4 3xp14c1ón. 10 Y 3l qu3 r3c0g1ó l4s c3n1z4s d3 l4 v4c4 l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s, y s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3; y s3rá 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0 p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y p4r4 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 m0r4 3ntr3 3ll0s. 

11 0l qu3 t0c4r3 c4dáv3r d3 cu4lqu13r p3rs0n4 s3rá 1nmund0 s13t3 dí4s. 12 4l t3rc3r dí4 s3 pur1f1c4rá c0n 4qu3ll4 4gu4, y 4l sépt1m0 dí4 s3rá l1mp10; y s1 4l t3rc3r dí4 n0 s3 pur1f1c4r3, n0 s3rá l1mp10 4l sépt1m0 dí4. 13 T0d0 4qu3l qu3 t0c4r3 c4dáv3r d3 cu4lqu13r p3rs0n4, y n0 s3 pur1f1c4r3, 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá c0nt4m1nó, y 4qu3ll4 p3rs0n4 s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 1sr43l; p0r cu4nt0 3l 4gu4 d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón n0 fu3 r0c14d4 s0br3 él, 1nmund0 s3rá, y su 1nmund1c14 s3rá s0br3 él. 

14 0st4 3s l4 l3y p4r4 cu4nd0 4lgun0 mu3r4 3n l4 t13nd4: cu4lqu13r4 qu3 3ntr3 3n l4 t13nd4, y t0d0 3l qu3 3sté 3n 3ll4, s3rá 1nmund0 s13t3 dí4s. 15 Y t0d4 v4s1j4 4b13rt4, cuy4 t4p4 n0 3sté b13n 4just4d4, s3rá 1nmund4; 16 y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t0c4r3 4lgún mu3rt0 4 3sp4d4 s0br3 l4 f4z d3l c4mp0, 0 4lgún c4dáv3r, 0 hu3s0 hum4n0, 0 s3pulcr0, s13t3 dí4s s3rá 1nmund0. 17 Y p4r4 3l 1nmund0 t0m4rán d3 l4 c3n1z4 d3 l4 v4c4 qu3m4d4 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, y 3ch4rán s0br3 3ll4 4gu4 c0rr13nt3 3n un r3c1p13nt3; 18 y un h0mbr3 l1mp10 t0m4rá h1s0p0, y l0 m0j4rá 3n 3l 4gu4, y r0c14rá s0br3 l4 t13nd4, s0br3 t0d0s l0s mu3bl3s, s0br3 l4s p3rs0n4s qu3 4llí 3stuv13r3n, y s0br3 4qu3l qu3 hub13r3 t0c4d0 3l hu3s0, 0 3l 4s3s1n4d0, 0 3l mu3rt0, 0 3l s3pulcr0. 19 Y 3l l1mp10 r0c14rá s0br3 3l 1nmund0 4l t3rc3r0 y 4l sépt1m0 dí4; y cu4nd0 l0 h4y4 pur1f1c4d0 4l dí4 sépt1m0, él l4v4rá lu3g0 sus v3st1d0s, y 4 sí m1sm0 s3 l4v4rá c0n 4gu4, y s3rá l1mp10 4 l4 n0ch3. 

20 Y 3l qu3 fu3r3 1nmund0, y n0 s3 pur1f1c4r3, l4 t4l p3rs0n4 s3rá c0rt4d4 d3 3ntr3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, p0r cu4nt0 c0nt4m1nó 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá; n0 fu3 r0c14d4 s0br3 él 3l 4gu4 d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón; 3s 1nmund0. 21 L3s s3rá 3st4tut0 p3rp3tu0; t4mb1én 3l qu3 r0c14r3 3l 4gu4 d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón l4v4rá sus v3st1d0s; y 3l qu3 t0c4r3 3l 4gu4 d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón s3rá 1nmund0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 22 Y t0d0 l0 qu3 3l 1nmund0 t0c4r3, s3rá 1nmund0; y l4 p3rs0n4 qu3 l0 t0c4r3 s3rá 1nmund4 h4st4 l4 n0ch3. 

4gu4 d3 l4 r0c4

NÚM0R0S 20

1 Ll3g4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, 4l d3s13rt0 d3 Z1n, 3n 3l m3s pr1m3r0, y 4c4mpó 3l pu3bl0 3n C4d3s; y 4llí mur1ó M4rí4, y 4llí fu3 s3pult4d4.

10 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 11 F1n33s h1j0 d3 0l34z4r, h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 44rón, h4 h3ch0 4p4rt4r m1 fur0r d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, ll3v4d0 d3 c3l0 3ntr3 3ll0s; p0r l0 cu4l y0 n0 h3 c0nsum1d0 3n m1 c3l0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 12 P0r t4nt0 d1l3s: H3 4quí y0 3st4bl3zc0 m1 p4ct0 d3 p4z c0n él; 13 y t3ndrá él, y su d3sc3nd3nc14 d3spués d3 él, 3l p4ct0 d3l s4c3rd0c10 p3rp3tu0, p0r cu4nt0 tuv0 c3l0 p0r su D10s 3 h1z0 3xp14c1ón p0r l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l.

1 V1n13r0n l4s h1j4s d3 Z3l0f3h4d h1j0 d3 H3f3r, h1j0 d3 G4l44d, h1j0 d3 M4qu1r, h1j0 d3 M4n4sés, d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 M4n4sés h1j0 d3 J0sé, l0s n0mbr3s d3 l4s cu4l3s 3r4n M44l4, N04, H0gl4, M1lc4 y T1rs4; 2 y s3 pr3s3nt4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 M01sés y d3l4nt3 d3l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r, y d3l4nt3 d3 l0s prínc1p3s y d3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y d1j3r0n: 3 Nu3str0 p4dr3 mur1ó 3n 3l d3s13rt0; y él n0 3stuv0 3n l4 c0mp4ñí4 d3 l0s qu3 s3 junt4r0n c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3n 3l grup0 d3 C0ré, s1n0 qu3 3n su pr0p10 p3c4d0 mur1ó, y n0 tuv0 h1j0s. 4 ¿P0r qué s3rá qu1t4d0 3l n0mbr3 d3 nu3str0 p4dr3 d3 3ntr3 su f4m1l14, p0r n0 h4b3r t3n1d0 h1j0? 1 L0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d t3ní4n un4 muy 1nm3ns4 much3dumbr3 d3 g4n4d0; y v13r0n l4 t13rr4 d3 J4z3r y d3 G4l44d, y l3s p4r3c1ó 3l p4ís lug4r d3 g4n4d0. 2 V1n13r0n, pu3s, l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén, y h4bl4r0n 4 M01sés y 4l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r, y 4 l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, d1c13nd0: 3 4t4r0t, D1bón, J4z3r, N1mr4, H3sbón, 0l34l3, S3b4m, N3b0 y B3ón, 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá h1r1ó d3l4nt3 d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l, 3s t13rr4 d3 g4n4d0, y tus s13rv0s t13n3n g4n4d0. 5 P0r t4nt0, d1j3r0n, s1 h4ll4m0s gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, dés3 3st4 t13rr4 4 tus s13rv0s 3n h3r3d4d, y n0 n0s h4g4s p4s4r 3l J0rdán. 

6 Y r3sp0nd1ó M01sés 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén: ¿1rán vu3str0s h3rm4n0s 4 l4 gu3rr4, y v0s0tr0s 0s qu3d4ré1s 4quí? 7 ¿Y p0r qué d3s4n1má1s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 n0 p4s3n 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 l3s h4 d4d0 J3h0vá? 8 4sí h1c13r0n vu3str0s p4dr3s, cu4nd0 l0s 3nv1é d3sd3 C4d3s- b4rn34 p4r4 qu3 v13s3n l4 t13rr4. 9 Sub13r0n h4st4 3l t0rr3nt3 d3 0sc0l, y d3spués qu3 v13r0n l4 t13rr4, d3s4l3nt4r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p4r4 qu3 n0 v1n13s3n 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá l3s h4bí4 d4d0. 10 Y l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd1ó 3nt0nc3s, y juró d1c13nd0: 11 N0 v3rán l0s v4r0n3s qu3 sub13r0n d3 0g1pt0 d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, l4 t13rr4 qu3 pr0m3tí c0n jur4m3nt0 4 4br4h4m, 1s44c y J4c0b, p0r cu4nt0 n0 fu3r0n p3rf3ct0s 3n p0s d3 mí; 12 3xc3pt0 C4l3b h1j0 d3 J3f0n3 c3n3z30, y J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun, qu3 fu3r0n p3rf3ct0s 3n p0s d3 J3h0vá. 13 Y l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd1ó c0ntr4 1sr43l, y l0s h1z0 4nd4r 3rr4nt3s cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s p0r 3l d3s13rt0, h4st4 qu3 fu3 4c4b4d4 t0d4 4qu3ll4 g3n3r4c1ón qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 m4l d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 14 Y h3 4quí, v0s0tr0s h4bé1s suc3d1d0 3n lug4r d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s, pr0l3 d3 h0mbr3s p3c4d0r3s, p4r4 4ñ4d1r 4ún 4 l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 1sr43l. 15 S1 0s v0lv13r31s d3 3n p0s d3 él, él v0lv3rá 0tr4 v3z 4 d3j4r0s 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y d3stru1ré1s 4 t0d0 3st3 pu3bl0. 

16 0nt0nc3s 3ll0s v1n13r0n 4 M01sés y d1j3r0n: 0d1f1c4r3m0s 4quí m4j4d4s p4r4 nu3str0 g4n4d0, y c1ud4d3s p4r4 nu3str0s n1ñ0s; 17 y n0s0tr0s n0s 4rm4r3m0s, 3 1r3m0s c0n d1l1g3nc14 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, h4st4 qu3 l0s m3t4m0s 3n su lug4r; y nu3str0s n1ñ0s qu3d4rán 3n c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s 4 c4us4 d3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l p4ís. 18 N0 v0lv3r3m0s 4 nu3str4s c4s4s h4st4 qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p0s34n c4d4 un0 su h3r3d4d. 19 P0rqu3 n0 t0m4r3m0s h3r3d4d c0n 3ll0s 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán n1 4d3l4nt3, p0r cu4nt0 t3ndr3m0s y4 nu3str4 h3r3d4d 4 3st3 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán 4l 0r13nt3. 20 0nt0nc3s l3s r3sp0nd1ó M01sés: S1 l0 h4cé1s 4sí, s1 0s d1sp0né1s p4r4 1r d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 4 l4 gu3rr4, 21 y t0d0s v0s0tr0s p4sá1s 4rm4d0s 3l J0rdán d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, h4st4 qu3 h4y4 3ch4d0 4 sus 3n3m1g0s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 sí, 22 y s34 3l p4ís s0juzg4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; lu3g0 v0lv3ré1s, y s3ré1s l1br3s d3 culp4 p4r4 c0n J3h0vá, y p4r4 c0n 1sr43l; y 3st4 t13rr4 s3rá vu3str4 3n h3r3d4d d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 23 M4s s1 4sí n0 l0 h4cé1s, h3 4quí h4bré1s p3c4d0 4nt3 J3h0vá; y s4b3d qu3 vu3str0 p3c4d0 0s 4lc4nz4rá. 24 0d1f1c40s c1ud4d3s p4r4 vu3str0s n1ñ0s, y m4j4d4s p4r4 vu3str4s 0v3j4s, y h4c3d l0 qu3 h4 d3cl4r4d0 vu3str4 b0c4. 25 Y h4bl4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: Tus s13rv0s h4rán c0m0 m1 s3ñ0r h4 m4nd4d0. 26 Nu3str0s n1ñ0s, nu3str4s muj3r3s, nu3str0s g4n4d0s y t0d4s nu3str4s b3st14s, 3st4rán 4hí 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 G4l44d; 27 y tus s13rv0s, 4rm4d0s t0d0s p4r4 l4 gu3rr4, p4s4rán d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 4 l4 gu3rr4, d3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 m1 s3ñ0r d1c3. 

28 0nt0nc3s l3s 3nc0m3ndó M01sés 4l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r, y 4 J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun, y 4 l0s prínc1p3s d3 l0s p4dr3s d3 l4s tr1bus d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 29 Y l3s d1j0 M01sés: S1 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén p4s4n c0n v0s0tr0s 3l J0rdán, 4rm4d0s t0d0s p4r4 l4 gu3rr4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, lu3g0 qu3 3l p4ís s34 s0juzg4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, l3s d4ré1s l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d 3n p0s3s1ón; 30 m4s s1 n0 p4s4n 4rm4d0s c0n v0s0tr0s, 3nt0nc3s t3ndrán p0s3s1ón 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án. 31 Y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén r3sp0nd13r0n d1c13nd0: H4r3m0s l0 qu3 J3h0vá h4 d1ch0 4 tus s13rv0s. 32 N0s0tr0s p4s4r3m0s 4rm4d0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, y l4 p0s3s1ón d3 nu3str4 h3r3d4d s3rá 4 3st3 l4d0 d3l J0rdán. 

33 4sí M01sés d10 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d, 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén, y 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés h1j0 d3 J0sé, 3l r31n0 d3 S3hón r3y 4m0rr30 y 3l r31n0 d3 0g r3y d3 B4sán, l4 t13rr4 c0n sus c1ud4d3s y sus t3rr1t0r10s, l4s c1ud4d3s d3l p4ís 4lr3d3d0r. 34 Y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d 3d1f1c4r0n D1bón, 4t4r0t, 4r03r, 35 4t4r0t-s0fán, J4z3r, J0gb3h4, 36 B3t-n1mr4 y B3t-4rán, c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s; h1c13r0n t4mb1én m4j4d4s p4r4 0v3j4s. 37 Y l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén 3d1f1c4r0n H3sbón, 0l34l3, Qu1r14t41m, 38 N3b0, B44l-m3ón (mud4d0s l0s n0mbr3s) y S1bm4; y pus13r0n n0mbr3s 4 l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 3d1f1c4r0n. 39 Y l0s h1j0s d3 M4qu1r h1j0 d3 M4n4sés fu3r0n 4 G4l44d, y l4 t0m4r0n, y 3ch4r0n 4l 4m0rr30 qu3 3st4b4 3n 3ll4. 40 Y M01sés d10 G4l44d 4 M4qu1r h1j0 d3 M4n4sés, 3l cu4l h4b1tó 3n 3ll4. 41 T4mb1én J41r h1j0 d3 M4n4sés fu3 y t0mó sus 4ld34s, y l3s pus0 p0r n0mbr3 H4v0t-j41r. 42 4s1m1sm0 N0b4 fu3 y t0mó K3n4t y sus 4ld34s, y l0 ll4mó N0b4, c0nf0rm3 4 su n0mbr3. 

J0rn4d4s d3 1sr43l d3sd3 0g1pt0 h4st4 3l J0rdán

NÚM0R0S 33

1 0st4s s0n l4s j0rn4d4s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, qu3 s4l13r0n d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 p0r sus 3jérc1t0s, b4j0 3l m4nd0 d3 M01sés y 44rón. 2 M01sés 3scr1b1ó sus s4l1d4s c0nf0rm3 4 sus j0rn4d4s p0r m4nd4t0 d3 J3h0vá. 0st4s, pu3s, s0n sus j0rn4d4s c0n 4rr3gl0 4 sus s4l1d4s. 3 D3 R4m3sés s4l13r0n 3n 3l m3s pr1m3r0, 4 l0s qu1nc3 dí4s d3l m3s pr1m3r0; 3l s3gund0 dí4 d3 l4 p4scu4 s4l13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0n m4n0 p0d3r0s4, 4 v1st4 d3 t0d0s l0s 3g1pc10s, 4 m13ntr4s 3nt3rr4b4n l0s 3g1pc10s 4 l0s qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h3r1d0 d3 mu3rt3 d3 3ntr3 3ll0s, 4 t0d0 pr1m0gén1t0; t4mb1én h4bí4 h3ch0 J3h0vá ju1c10s c0ntr4 sus d10s3s. 

5 S4l13r0n, pu3s, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 R4m3sés, y 4c4mp4r0n 3n Suc0t. 6 S4l13r0n d3 Suc0t y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 0t4m, qu3 3stá 4l c0nfín d3l d3s13rt0. 7 S4l13r0n d3 0t4m y v0lv13r0n s0br3 P1-h4h1r0t, qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 B44l-z3fón, y 4c4mp4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 M1gd0l. 8 S4l13r0n d3 P1-h4h1r0t y p4s4r0n p0r 3n m3d10 d3l m4r 4l d3s13rt0, y 4nduv13r0n tr3s dí4s d3 c4m1n0 p0r 3l d3s13rt0 d3 0t4m, y 4c4mp4r0n 3n M4r4. 9 S4l13r0n d3 M4r4 y v1n13r0n 4 0l1m, d0nd3 h4bí4 d0c3 fu3nt3s d3 4gu4s, y s3t3nt4 p4lm3r4s; y 4c4mp4r0n 4llí. 10 S4l13r0n d3 0l1m y 4c4mp4r0n junt0 4l M4r R0j0. 11 S4l13r0n d3l M4r R0j0 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n. 12 S4l13r0n d3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n y 4c4mp4r0n 3n D0fc4. 13 S4l13r0n d3 D0fc4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 4lús. 14 S4l13r0n d3 4lús y 4c4mp4r0n 3n R3f1d1m, d0nd3 3l pu3bl0 n0 tuv0 4gu4s p4r4 b3b3r. 15 S4l13r0n d3 R3f1d1m y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n4í. 16 S4l13r0n d3l d3s13rt0 d3 S1n4í y 4c4mp4r0n 3n K1br0t- h4t44v4. 17 S4l13r0n d3 K1br0t-h4t44v4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n H4z3r0t. 18 S4l13r0n d3 H4z3r0t y 4c4mp4r0n 3n R1tm4. 19 S4l13r0n d3 R1tm4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n R1món-p3r3s. 20 S4l13r0n d3 R1món-p3r3s y 4c4mp4r0n 3n L1bn4. 21 S4l13r0n d3 L1bn4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n R1ss4. 22 S4l13r0n d3 R1ss4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n C33l4t4. 23 S4l13r0n d3 C33l4t4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S3f3r. 24 S4l13r0n d3l m0nt3 d3 S3f3r y 4c4mp4r0n 3n H4r4d4. 25 S4l13r0n d3 H4r4d4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n M4c3l0t. 26 S4l13r0n d3 M4c3l0t y 4c4mp4r0n 3n T4h4t. 27 S4l13r0n d3 T4h4t y 4c4mp4r0n 3n T4r4. 28 S4l13r0n d3 T4r4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n M1tc4. 29 S4l13r0n d3 M1tc4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n H4sm0n4. 30 S4l13r0n d3 H4sm0n4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n M0s3r0t. 31 S4l13r0n d3 M0s3r0t y 4c4mp4r0n 3n B3n3-j44cán. 32 S4l13r0n d3 B3n3-j44cán y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 G1dg4d. 33 S4l13r0n d3l m0nt3 d3 G1dg4d y 4c4mp4r0n 3n J0tb4t4. 34 S4l13r0n d3 J0tb4t4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 4br0n4. 35 S4l13r0n d3 4br0n4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 0z1ón-g3b3r. 36 S4l13r0n d3 0z1ón-g3b3r y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 Z1n, qu3 3s C4d3s. 37 Y s4l13r0n d3 C4d3s y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 H0r, 3n l4 3xtr3m1d4d d3l p4ís d3 0d0m. 

38 Y sub1ó 3l s4c3rd0t3 44rón 4l m0nt3 d3 H0r, c0nf0rm3 4l d1ch0 d3 J3h0vá, y 4llí mur1ó 4 l0s cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s d3 l4 s4l1d4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, 3n 3l m3s qu1nt0, 3n 3l pr1m3r0 d3l m3s. 39 0r4 44rón d3 3d4d d3 c13nt0 v31nt1trés 4ñ0s, cu4nd0 mur1ó 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 H0r. 

40 Y 3l c4n4n30, r3y d3 4r4d, qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n 3l N3gu3v 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 0yó qu3 h4bí4n v3n1d0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

41 Y s4l13r0n d3l m0nt3 d3 H0r y 4c4mp4r0n 3n Z4lm0n4. 42 S4l13r0n d3 Z4lm0n4 y 4c4mp4r0n 3n Punón. 43 S4l13r0n d3 Punón y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 0b0t. 44 S4l13r0n d3 0b0t y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 1j3-4b4r1m, 3n l4 fr0nt3r4 d3 M04b. 45 S4l13r0n d3 1j3-4b4r1m y 4c4mp4r0n 3n D1bón-g4d. 46 S4l13r0n d3 D1bón-g4d y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 4lmón-d1bl4t41m. 47 S4l13r0n d3 4lmón-d1bl4t41m y 4c4mp4r0n 3n l0s m0nt3s d3 4b4r1m, d3l4nt3 d3 N3b0. 48 S4l13r0n d3 l0s m0nt3s d3 4b4r1m y 4c4mp4r0n 3n l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b, junt0 4l J0rdán, fr3nt3 4 J3r1có. 49 F1n4lm3nt3 4c4mp4r0n junt0 4l J0rdán, d3sd3 B3t-j3s1m0t h4st4 4b3l-s1t1m, 3n l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b. 

Lím1t3s y r3p4rt1c1ón d3 C4n4án

50 Y h4bló J3h0vá 4 M01sés 3n l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b junt0 4l J0rdán fr3nt3 4 J3r1có, d1c13nd0: 51 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y d1l3s: Cu4nd0 h4yá1s p4s4d0 3l J0rdán 3ntr4nd0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 52 3ch4ré1s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s 4 t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l p4ís, y d3stru1ré1s t0d0s sus íd0l0s d3 p13dr4, y t0d4s sus 1mág3n3s d3 fund1c1ón, y d3stru1ré1s t0d0s sus lug4r3s 4lt0s; 53 y 3ch4ré1s 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4, y h4b1t4ré1s 3n 3ll4; p0rqu3 y0 0s l4 h3 d4d0 p4r4 qu3 s34 vu3str4 pr0p13d4d. 54 Y h3r3d4ré1s l4 t13rr4 p0r s0rt30 p0r vu3str4s f4m1l14s; 4 l0s much0s d4ré1s much0 p0r h3r3nc14, y 4 l0s p0c0s d4ré1s m3n0s p0r h3r3nc14; d0nd3 l3 c4y3r3 l4 su3rt3, 4llí l4 t3ndrá c4d4 un0; p0r l4s tr1bus d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s h3r3d4ré1s. 55 Y s1 n0 3ch4r31s 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l p4ís d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, suc3d3rá qu3 l0s qu3 d3j4r31s d3 3ll0s s3rán p0r 4gu1j0n3s 3n vu3str0s 0j0s y p0r 3sp1n4s 3n vu3str0s c0st4d0s, y 0s 4fl1g1rán s0br3 l4 t13rr4 3n qu3 v0s0tr0s h4b1t4r31s. 56 4d3más, h4ré 4 v0s0tr0s c0m0 y0 p3nsé h4c3rl3s 4 3ll0s. 

NÚM0R0S 34

1 Y J3h0vá h4bló 4 M01sés, d1c13nd0: 2 M4nd4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: Cu4nd0 h4yá1s 3ntr4d0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 3st0 3s, l4 t13rr4 qu3 0s h4 d3 c43r 3n h3r3nc14, l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án s3gún sus lím1t3s, 3 t3ndré1s 3l l4d0 d3l sur d3sd3 3l d3s13rt0 d3 Z1n h4st4 l4 fr0nt3r4 d3 0d0m; y s3rá 3l lím1t3 d3l sur 4l 3xtr3m0 d3l M4r S4l4d0 h4c14 3l 0r13nt3. 4 0st3 lím1t3 0s 1rá r0d34nd0 d3sd3 3l sur h4st4 l4 sub1d4 d3 4cr4b1m, y p4s4rá h4st4 Z1n; y s3 3xt3nd3rá d3l sur 4 C4d3s- b4rn34; y c0nt1nu4rá 4 H4s4r-4d4r, y p4s4rá h4st4 4smón. 5 R0d34rá 3st3 lím1t3 d3sd3 4smón h4st4 3l t0rr3nt3 d3 0g1pt0, y sus r3m4t3s s3rán 4l 0cc1d3nt3. 

6 Y 3l lím1t3 0cc1d3nt4l s3rá 3l M4r Gr4nd3; 3st3 lím1t3 s3rá 3l lím1t3 0cc1d3nt4l. 

7 0l lím1t3 d3l n0rt3 s3rá 3st3: d3sd3 3l M4r Gr4nd3 tr4z4ré1s 4l m0nt3 d3 H0r. 8 D3l m0nt3 d3 H0r tr4z4ré1s 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 H4m4t, y s3gu1rá 4qu3l lím1t3 h4st4 Z3d4d; 9 y s3gu1rá 3st3 lím1t3 h4st4 Z1frón, y t3rm1n4rá 3n H4z4r- 3nán; 3st3 s3rá 3l lím1t3 d3l n0rt3. 

10 P0r lím1t3 4l 0r13nt3 tr4z4ré1s d3sd3 H4z4r-3nán h4st4 S3f4m; 11 y b4j4rá 3st3 lím1t3 d3sd3 S3f4m 4 R1bl4, 4l 0r13nt3 d3 4ín; y d3sc3nd3rá 3l lím1t3, y ll3g4rá 4 l4 c0st4 d3l m4r d3 C1n3r3t, 4l 0r13nt3. 12 D3spués d3sc3nd3rá 3st3 lím1t3 4l J0rdán, y t3rm1n4rá 3n 3l M4r S4l4d0: 3st4 s3rá vu3str4 t13rr4 p0r sus lím1t3s 4lr3d3d0r.

19 Y s4l1d0s d3 H0r3b, 4nduv1m0s t0d0 4qu3l gr4nd3 y t3rr1bl3 d3s13rt0 qu3 h4bé1s v1st0, p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3l m0nt3 d3l 4m0rr30, c0m0 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s l0 m4ndó; y ll3g4m0s h4st4 C4d3s- b4rn34. 20 0nt0nc3s 0s d1j3: H4bé1s ll3g4d0 4l m0nt3 d3l 4m0rr30, 3l cu4l J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s d4. 21 M1r4, J3h0vá tu D10s t3 h4 3ntr3g4d0 l4 t13rr4; sub3 y t0m4 p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4, c0m0 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 tus p4dr3s t3 h4 d1ch0; n0 t3m4s n1 d3sm4y3s. 22 Y v1n1st31s 4 mí t0d0s v0s0tr0s, y d1j1st31s: 0nv13m0s v4r0n3s d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s qu3 n0s r3c0n0zc4n l4 t13rr4, y 4 su r3gr3s0 n0s tr41g4n r4zón d3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 h3m0s d3 sub1r, y d3 l4s c1ud4d3s 4d0nd3 h3m0s d3 ll3g4r. 23 Y 3l d1ch0 m3 p4r3c1ó b13n; y t0mé d0c3 v4r0n3s d3 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, un v4rón p0r c4d4 tr1bu. 24 Y s3 3nc4m1n4r0n, y sub13r0n 4l m0nt3, y ll3g4r0n h4st4 3l v4ll3 d3 0sc0l, y r3c0n0c13r0n l4 t13rr4. 25 Y t0m4r0n 3n sus m4n0s d3l frut0 d3l p4ís, y n0s l0 tr4j3r0n, y n0s d13r0n cu3nt4, y d1j3r0n: 0s bu3n4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s d4. 26 S1n 3mb4rg0, n0 qu1s1st31s sub1r, 4nt3s fu1st31s r3b3ld3s 4l m4nd4t0 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s; 27 y murmur4st31s 3n vu3str4s t13nd4s, d1c13nd0: P0rqu3 J3h0vá n0s 4b0rr3c3, n0s h4 s4c4d0 d3 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, p4r4 3ntr3g4rn0s 3n m4n0s d3l 4m0rr30 p4r4 d3stru1rn0s. 28 ¿4 dónd3 sub1r3m0s? Nu3str0s h3rm4n0s h4n 4t3m0r1z4d0 nu3str0 c0r4zón, d1c13nd0: 0st3 pu3bl0 3s m4y0r y más 4lt0 qu3 n0s0tr0s, l4s c1ud4d3s gr4nd3s y 4mur4ll4d4s h4st4 3l c13l0; y t4mb1én v1m0s 4llí 4 l0s h1j0s d3 4n4c. 29 0nt0nc3s 0s d1j3: N0 t3má1s, n1 t3ngá1s m13d0 d3 3ll0s. 30 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, 3l cu4l v4 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, él p3l34rá p0r v0s0tr0s, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h1z0 p0r v0s0tr0s 3n 0g1pt0 d3l4nt3 d3 vu3str0s 0j0s. 31 Y 3n 3l d3s13rt0 h4s v1st0 qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 h4 tr4íd0, c0m0 tr43 3l h0mbr3 4 su h1j0, p0r t0d0 3l c4m1n0 qu3 h4bé1s 4nd4d0, h4st4 ll3g4r 4 3st3 lug4r. 32 Y 4un c0n 3st0 n0 cr3íst31s 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, 33 qu13n 1b4 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s p0r 3l c4m1n0 p4r4 r3c0n0c3r0s 3l lug4r d0nd3 h4bí41s d3 4c4mp4r, c0n fu3g0 d3 n0ch3 p4r4 m0str4r0s 3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 4nduv13s31s, y c0n nub3 d3 dí4.

D0UT0R0N0M10 2

1 Lu3g0 v0lv1m0s y s4l1m0s 4l d3s13rt0, c4m1n0 d3l M4r R0j0, c0m0 J3h0vá m3 h4bí4 d1ch0; y r0d34m0s 3l m0nt3 d3 S31r p0r much0 t13mp0. 2 Y J3h0vá m3 h4bló, d1c13nd0: 3 B4st4nt3 h4bé1s r0d34d0 3st3 m0nt3; v0lv30s 4l n0rt3. 4 Y m4nd4 4l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: P4s4nd0 v0s0tr0s p0r 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú, qu3 h4b1t4n 3n S31r, 3ll0s t3ndrán m13d0 d3 v0s0tr0s; m4s v0s0tr0s gu4rd40s much0. 5 N0 0s m3tá1s c0n 3ll0s, p0rqu3 n0 0s d4ré d3 su t13rr4 n1 4un l0 qu3 cubr3 l4 pl4nt4 d3 un p13; p0rqu3 y0 h3 d4d0 p0r h3r3d4d 4 0s4ú 3l m0nt3 d3 S31r. 6 C0mpr4ré1s d3 3ll0s p0r d1n3r0 l0s 4l1m3nt0s, y c0m3ré1s; y t4mb1én c0mpr4ré1s d3 3ll0s 3l 4gu4, y b3b3ré1s; 7 pu3s J3h0vá tu D10s t3 h4 b3nd3c1d0 3n t0d4 0br4 d3 tus m4n0s; él s4b3 qu3 4nd4s p0r 3st3 gr4n d3s13rt0; 3st0s cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s J3h0vá tu D10s h4 3st4d0 c0nt1g0, y n4d4 t3 h4 f4lt4d0. 8 Y n0s 4l3j4m0s d3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 nu3str0s h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú, qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n S31r, p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3l 4r4bá d3sd3 0l4t y 0z1ón-g3b3r; y v0lv1m0s, y t0m4m0s 3l c4m1n0 d3l d3s13rt0 d3 M04b.

16 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 d3spués qu3 mur13r0n t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4 d3 3ntr3 3l pu3bl0, 17 J3h0vá m3 h4bló, d1c13nd0: 18 Tú p4s4rás h0y 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 M04b, 4 4r. 19 Y cu4nd0 t3 4c3rqu3s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, n0 l0s m0l3st3s, n1 c0nt13nd4s c0n 3ll0s; p0rqu3 n0 t3 d4ré p0s3s1ón d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, pu3s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 L0t l4 h3 d4d0 p0r h3r3d4d. 20 (P0r t13rr4 d3 g1g4nt3s fu3 t4mb1én 3ll4 t3n1d4; h4b1t4r0n 3n 3ll4 g1g4nt3s 3n 0tr0 t13mp0, 4 l0s cu4l3s l0s 4m0n1t4s ll4m4b4n z0mz0m30s; 21 pu3bl0 gr4nd3 y num3r0s0, y 4lt0, c0m0 l0s h1j0s d3 4n4c; 4 l0s cu4l3s J3h0vá d3struyó d3l4nt3 d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s. 0st0s suc3d13r0n 4 4quéll0s, y h4b1t4r0n 3n su lug4r, 22 c0m0 h1z0 J3h0vá c0n l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n S31r, d3l4nt3 d3 l0s cu4l3s d3struyó 4 l0s h0r30s; y 3ll0s suc3d13r0n 4 ést0s, y h4b1t4r0n 3n su lug4r h4st4 h0y. 23 Y 4 l0s 4v30s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n 4ld34s h4st4 G4z4, l0s c4ft0r30s qu3 s4l13r0n d3 C4ft0r l0s d3struy3r0n, y h4b1t4r0n 3n su lug4r.) 24 L3v4nt40s, s4l1d, y p4s4d 3l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón; h3 4quí h3 3ntr3g4d0 3n tu m4n0 4 S3hón r3y d3 H3sbón, 4m0rr30, y 4 su t13rr4; c0m13nz4 4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4, y 3ntr4 3n gu3rr4 c0n él. 25 H0y c0m3nz4ré 4 p0n3r tu t3m0r y tu 3sp4nt0 s0br3 l0s pu3bl0s d3b4j0 d3 t0d0 3l c13l0, l0s cu4l3s 01rán tu f4m4, y t3mbl4rán y s3 4ngust14rán d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 

1sr43l d3rr0t4 4 S3hón

(Nm. 21.21-30)

26 Y 3nv1é m3ns4j3r0s d3sd3 3l d3s13rt0 d3 C4d3m0t 4 S3hón r3y d3 H3sbón c0n p4l4br4s d3 p4z, d1c13nd0: 27 P4s4ré p0r tu t13rr4 p0r 3l c4m1n0; p0r 3l c4m1n0 1ré, s1n 4p4rt4rm3 n1 4 d13str4 n1 4 s1n13str4. 28 L4 c0m1d4 m3 v3nd3rás p0r d1n3r0, y c0m3ré; 3l 4gu4 t4mb1én m3 d4rás p0r d1n3r0, y b3b3ré; s0l4m3nt3 p4s4ré 4 p13, 29 c0m0 l0 h1c13r0n c0nm1g0 l0s h1j0s d3 0s4ú qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n S31r, y l0s m04b1t4s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n 4r; h4st4 qu3 cruc3 3l J0rdán 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 n0s d4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s. 30 M4s S3hón r3y d3 H3sbón n0 qu1s0 qu3 p4sás3m0s p0r 3l t3rr1t0r10 suy0; p0rqu3 J3h0vá tu D10s h4bí4 3ndur3c1d0 su 3spír1tu, y 0bst1n4d0 su c0r4zón p4r4 3ntr3g4rl0 3n tu m4n0, c0m0 h4st4 h0y. 31 Y m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí y0 h3 c0m3nz4d0 4 3ntr3g4r d3l4nt3 d3 t1 4 S3hón y 4 su t13rr4; c0m13nz4 4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4 p4r4 qu3 l4 h3r3d3s. 32 Y n0s s4l1ó S3hón 4l 3ncu3ntr0, él y t0d0 su pu3bl0, p4r4 p3l34r 3n J4h4z4. 33 M4s J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s l0 3ntr3gó d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s; y l0 d3rr0t4m0s 4 él y 4 sus h1j0s, y 4 t0d0 su pu3bl0. 34 T0m4m0s 3nt0nc3s t0d4s sus c1ud4d3s, y d3stru1m0s t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s, h0mbr3s, muj3r3s y n1ñ0s; n0 d3j4m0s n1ngun0. 35 S0l4m3nt3 t0m4m0s p4r4 n0s0tr0s l0s g4n4d0s, y l0s d3sp0j0s d3 l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 h4bí4m0s t0m4d0. 36 D3sd3 4r03r, qu3 3stá junt0 4 l4 r1b3r4 d3l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón, y l4 c1ud4d qu3 3stá 3n 3l v4ll3, h4st4 G4l44d, n0 hub0 c1ud4d qu3 3sc4p4s3 d3 n0s0tr0s; t0d4s l4s 3ntr3gó J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s 3n nu3str0 p0d3r. 37 S0l4m3nt3 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món n0 ll3g4m0s; n1 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 3stá 4 l4 0r1ll4 d3l 4rr0y0 d3 J4b0c n1 4 l4s c1ud4d3s d3l m0nt3, n1 4 lug4r 4lgun0 qu3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s h4bí4 pr0h1b1d0. 

1sr43l d3rr0t4 4 0g r3y d3 B4sán

(Nm. 21.31-35)

D0UT0R0N0M10 3

1 V0lv1m0s, pu3s, y sub1m0s c4m1n0 d3 B4sán, y n0s s4l1ó 4l 3ncu3ntr0 0g r3y d3 B4sán p4r4 p3l34r, él y t0d0 su pu3bl0, 3n 0dr31. 2 Y m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: N0 t3ng4s t3m0r d3 él, p0rqu3 3n tu m4n0 h3 3ntr3gd0 4 él y 4 t0d0 su pu3bl0, c0n su t13rr4; y h4rás c0n él c0m0 h1c1st3 c0n S3hón r3y 4m0rr30, qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n H3sbón. 3 Y J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s 3ntr3gó t4mb1én 3n nu3str4 m4n0 4 0g r3y d3 B4sán, y 4 t0d0 su pu3bl0, 4l cu4l d3rr0t4m0s h4st4 4c4b4r c0n t0d0s. 4 Y t0m4m0s 3nt0nc3s t0d4s sus c1ud4d3s; n0 qu3dó c1ud4d qu3 n0 l3s t0más3m0s; s3s3nt4 c1ud4d3s, t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 4rg0b, d3l r31n0 d3 0g 3n B4sán. 5 T0d4s 3st4s 3r4n c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s c0n mur0s 4lt0s, c0n pu3rt4s y b4rr4s, s1n c0nt4r 0tr4s much4s c1ud4d3s s1n mur0. 6 Y l4s d3stru1m0s, c0m0 h1c1m0s 4 S3hón r3y d3 H3sbón, m4t4nd0 3n t0d4 c1ud4d 4 h0mbr3s, muj3r3s y n1ñ0s. 7 Y t0m4m0s p4r4 n0s0tr0s t0d0 3l g4n4d0, y l0s d3sp0j0s d3 l4s c1ud4d3s. 8 T4mb1én t0m4m0s 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 l4 t13rr4 d3sd3 3l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón h4st4 3l m0nt3 d3 H3rmón, d3 m4n0s d3 l0s d0s r3y3s 4m0rr30s qu3 3st4b4n 4 3st3 l4d0 d3l J0rdán. 9 (L0s s1d0n10s ll4m4n 4 H3rmón, S1r1ón; y l0s 4m0rr30s, S3n1r.) 10 T0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 ll4nur4, y t0d0 G4l44d, y t0d0 B4sán h4st4 S4lc4 y 0dr31, c1ud4d3s d3l r31n0 d3 0g 3n B4sán. 11 P0rqu3 ún1c4m3nt3 0g r3y d3 B4sán h4bí4 qu3d4d0 d3l r3st0 d3 l0s g1g4nt3s. Su c4m4, un4 c4m4 d3 h13rr0, ¿n0 3stá 3n R4bá d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món? L4 l0ng1tud d3 3ll4 3s d3 nu3v3 c0d0s, y su 4nchur4 d3 cu4tr0 c0d0s, s3gún 3l c0d0 d3 un h0mbr3. 

Rubén, G4d y l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés s3 3st4bl3c3n 4l 0r13nt3 d3l J0rdán

(Nm. 32.1-42)

12 Y 3st4 t13rr4 qu3 h3r3d4m0s 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, d3sd3 4r03r, qu3 3stá junt0 4l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón, y l4 m1t4d d3l m0nt3 d3 G4l44d c0n sus c1ud4d3s, l4 d1 4 l0s rub3n1t4s y 4 l0s g4d1t4s; 13 y 3l r3st0 d3 G4l44d, y t0d0 B4sán, d3l r31n0 d3 0g, t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 4rg0b, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s g1g4nt3s, l0 d1 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés. 14 J41r h1j0 d3 M4n4sés t0mó t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 4rg0b h4st4 3l lím1t3 c0n G3sur y M44c4, y l4 ll4mó p0r su n0mbr3, B4sán- h4v0t-j41r, h4st4 h0y. 15 Y G4l44d s3 l0 d1 4 M4qu1r. 16 Y 4 l0s rub3n1t4s y g4d1t4s l3s d1 d3 G4l44d h4st4 3l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón, t3n13nd0 p0r lím1t3 3l m3d10 d3l v4ll3, h4st4 3l 4rr0y0 d3 J4b0c, 3l cu4l 3s lím1t3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món; 17 t4mb1én 3l 4r4bá, c0n 3l J0rdán c0m0 lím1t3 d3sd3 C1n3r3t h4st4 3l m4r d3l 4r4bá, 3l M4r S4l4d0, 4l p13 d3 l4s l4d3r4s d3l P1sg4 4l 0r13nt3. 

18 Y 0s m4ndé 3nt0nc3s, d1c13nd0: J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 0s h4 d4d0 3st4 t13rr4 p0r h3r3d4d; p3r0 1ré1s 4rm4d0s t0d0s l0s v4l13nt3s d3l4nt3 d3 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 19 S0l4m3nt3 vu3str4s muj3r3s, vu3str0s h1j0s y vu3str0s g4n4d0s (y0 sé qu3 t3né1s much0 g4n4d0), qu3d4rán 3n l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 0s h3 d4d0, 20 h4st4 qu3 J3h0vá dé r3p0s0 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, 4sí c0m0 4 v0s0tr0s, y h3r3d3n 3ll0s t4mb1én l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s l3s d4 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán; 3nt0nc3s 0s v0lv3ré1s c4d4 un0 4 l4 h3r3d4d qu3 y0 0s h3 d4d0. 21 0rd3né t4mb1én 4 J0sué 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, d1c13nd0: Tus 0j0s v13r0n t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s h4 h3ch0 4 4qu3ll0s d0s r3y3s; 4sí h4rá J3h0vá 4 t0d0s l0s r31n0s 4 l0s cu4l3s p4s4rás tú. 22 N0 l0s t3má1s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, él 3s 3l qu3 p3l34 p0r v0s0tr0s.

1 4h0r4, pu3s, 0h 1sr43l, 0y3 l0s 3st4tut0s y d3cr3t0s qu3 y0 0s 3ns3ñ0, p4r4 qu3 l0s 3j3cuté1s, y v1vá1s, y 3ntré1s y p0s3á1s l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s 0s d4. 2 N0 4ñ4d1ré1s 4 l4 p4l4br4 qu3 y0 0s m4nd0, n1 d1sm1nu1ré1s d3 3ll4, p4r4 qu3 gu4rdé1s l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s qu3 y0 0s 0rd3n3. 3 Vu3str0s 0j0s v13r0n l0 qu3 h1z0 J3h0vá c0n m0t1v0 d3 B44l- p30r; qu3 4 t0d0 h0mbr3 qu3 fu3 3n p0s d3 B44l-p30r d3struyó J3h0vá tu D10s d3 3n m3d10 d3 t1. 4 M4s v0s0tr0s qu3 s3gu1st31s 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, t0d0s 3stá1s v1v0s h0y. 5 M1r4d, y0 0s h3 3ns3ñ4d0 3st4tut0s y d3cr3t0s, c0m0 J3h0vá m1 D10s m3 m4ndó, p4r4 qu3 h4gá1s 4sí 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4 3n l4 cu4l 3ntrá1s p4r4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4. 6 Gu4rd4dl0s, pu3s, y p0n3dl0s p0r 0br4; p0rqu3 3st4 3s vu3str4 s4b1durí4 y vu3str4 1nt3l1g3nc14 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 l0s pu3bl0s, l0s cu4l3s 01rán t0d0s 3st0s 3st4tut0s, y d1rán: C13rt4m3nt3 pu3bl0 s4b10 y 3nt3nd1d0, n4c1ón gr4nd3 3s 3st4. 7 P0rqu3 ¿qué n4c1ón gr4nd3 h4y qu3 t3ng4 d10s3s t4n c3rc4n0s 4 3ll0s c0m0 l0 3stá J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s 3n t0d0 cu4nt0 l3 p3d1m0s? 8 Y ¿qué n4c1ón gr4nd3 h4y qu3 t3ng4 3st4tut0s y ju1c10s just0s c0m0 3s t0d4 3st4 l3y qu3 y0 p0ng0 h0y d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s? 

L4 3xp3r13nc14 d3 1sr43l 3n H0r3b

9 P0r t4nt0, guárd4t3, y gu4rd4 tu 4lm4 c0n d1l1g3nc14, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3 0lv1d3s d3 l4s c0s4s qu3 tus 0j0s h4n v1st0, n1 s3 4p4rt3n d3 tu c0r4zón t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 tu v1d4; 4nt3s b13n, l4s 3ns3ñ4rás 4 tus h1j0s, y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 tus h1j0s. 10 0l dí4 qu3 3stuv1st3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá tu D10s 3n H0r3b, cu4nd0 J3h0vá m3 d1j0: R3ún3m3 3l pu3bl0, p4r4 qu3 y0 l3s h4g4 0ír m1s p4l4br4s, l4s cu4l3s 4pr3nd3rán, p4r4 t3m3rm3 t0d0s l0s dí4s qu3 v1v13r3n s0br3 l4 t13rr4, y l4s 3ns3ñ4rán 4 sus h1j0s; 11 y 0s 4c3rc4st31s y 0s pus1st31s 4l p13 d3l m0nt3; y 3l m0nt3 4rdí4 3n fu3g0 h4st4 3n m3d10 d3 l0s c13l0s c0n t1n13bl4s, nub3 y 0scur1d4d; 12 y h4bló J3h0vá c0n v0s0tr0s d3 3n m3d10 d3l fu3g0; 0íst31s l4 v0z d3 sus p4l4br4s, m4s 4 3xc3pc1ón d3 0ír l4 v0z, n1ngun4 f1gur4 v1st31s. 13 Y él 0s 4nunc1ó su p4ct0, 3l cu4l 0s m4ndó p0n3r p0r 0br4; l0s d13z m4nd4m13nt0s, y l0s 3scr1b1ó 3n d0s t4bl4s d3 p13dr4. 14 4 mí t4mb1én m3 m4ndó J3h0vá 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 qu3 0s 3ns3ñ4s3 l0s 3st4tut0s y ju1c10s, p4r4 qu3 l0s pus13s31s p0r 0br4 3n l4 t13rr4 4 l4 cu4l p4sá1s 4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4. 

4dv3rt3nc14 c0ntr4 l4 1d0l4trí4

15 Gu4rd4d, pu3s, much0 vu3str4s 4lm4s; pu3s n1ngun4 f1gur4 v1st31s 3l dí4 qu3 J3h0vá h4bló c0n v0s0tr0s d3 3n m3d10 d3l fu3g0; 16 p4r4 qu3 n0 0s c0rr0mpá1s y h4gá1s p4r4 v0s0tr0s 3scultur4, 1m4g3n d3 f1gur4 4lgun4, 3f1g13 d3 v4rón 0 h3mbr4, 17 f1gur4 d3 4n1m4l 4lgun0 qu3 3stá 3n l4 t13rr4, f1gur4 d3 4v3 4lgun4 4l4d4 qu3 vu3l3 p0r 3l 41r3, 18 f1gur4 d3 n1ngún 4n1m4l qu3 s3 4rr4str3 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, f1gur4 d3 p3z 4lgun0 qu3 h4y4 3n 3l 4gu4 d3b4j0 d3 l4 t13rr4. 19 N0 s34 qu3 4lc3s tus 0j0s 4l c13l0, y v13nd0 3l s0l y l4 lun4 y l4s 3str3ll4s, y t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3l c13l0, s34s 1mpuls4d0, y t3 1ncl1n3s 4 3ll0s y l3s s1rv4s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá tu D10s l0s h4 c0nc3d1d0 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3b4j0 d3 t0d0s l0s c13l0s. 20 P3r0 4 v0s0tr0s J3h0vá 0s t0mó, y 0s h4 s4c4d0 d3l h0rn0 d3 h13rr0, d3 0g1pt0, p4r4 qu3 s3á1s 3l pu3bl0 d3 su h3r3d4d c0m0 3n 3st3 dí4. 21 Y J3h0vá s3 3n0jó c0ntr4 mí p0r c4us4 d3 v0s0tr0s, y juró qu3 y0 n0 p4s4rí4 3l J0rdán, n1 3ntr4rí4 3n l4 bu3n4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 d4 p0r h3r3d4d. 22 4sí qu3 y0 v0y 4 m0r1r 3n 3st4 t13rr4, y n0 p4s4ré 3l J0rdán; m4s v0s0tr0s p4s4ré1s, y p0s33ré1s 4qu3ll4 bu3n4 t13rr4. 23 Gu4rd40s, n0 0s 0lv1dé1s d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, qu3 él 3st4bl3c1ó c0n v0s0tr0s, y n0 0s h4gá1s 3scultur4 0 1m4g3n d3 n1ngun4 c0s4 qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 h4 pr0h1b1d0. 24 P0rqu3 J3h0vá tu D10s 3s fu3g0 c0nsum1d0r, D10s c3l0s0. 

25 Cu4nd0 h4yá1s 3ng3ndr4d0 h1j0s y n13t0s, y h4yá1s 3nv3j3c1d0 3n l4 t13rr4, s1 0s c0rr0mp13r31s 3 h1c13r31s 3scultur4 0 1m4g3n d3 cu4lqu13r c0s4, 3 h1c13r31s l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, p4r4 3n0j4rl0; 26 y0 p0ng0 h0y p0r t3st1g0s 4l c13l0 y 4 l4 t13rr4, qu3 pr0nt0 p3r3c3ré1s t0t4lm3nt3 d3 l4 t13rr4 h4c14 l4 cu4l p4sá1s 3l J0rdán p4r4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4; n0 3st4ré1s 3n 3ll4 l4rg0s dí4s s1n qu3 s3á1s d3stru1d0s. 27 Y J3h0vá 0s 3sp4rc1rá 3ntr3 l0s pu3bl0s, y qu3d4ré1s p0c0s 3n núm3r0 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s 4 l4s cu4l3s 0s ll3v4rá J3h0vá. 28 Y s3rv1ré1s 4llí 4 d10s3s h3ch0s d3 m4n0s d3 h0mbr3s, d3 m4d3r4 y p13dr4, qu3 n0 v3n, n1 0y3n, n1 c0m3n, n1 hu3l3n. 29 M4s s1 d3sd3 4llí busc4r3s 4 J3h0vá tu D10s, l0 h4ll4rás, s1 l0 busc4r3s d3 t0d0 tu c0r4zón y d3 t0d4 tu 4lm4. 30 Cu4nd0 3stuv13r3s 3n 4ngust14, y t3 4lc4nz4r3n t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, s1 3n l0s p0str3r0s dí4s t3 v0lv13r3s 4 J3h0vá tu D10s, y 0y3r3s su v0z; 31 p0rqu3 D10s m1s3r1c0rd10s0 3s J3h0vá tu D10s; n0 t3 d3j4rá, n1 t3 d3stru1rá, n1 s3 0lv1d4rá d3l p4ct0 qu3 l3s juró 4 tus p4dr3s. 

32 P0rqu3 pr3gunt4 4h0r4 s1 3n l0s t13mp0s p4s4d0s qu3 h4n s1d0 4nt3s d3 t1, d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 cr3ó D10s 4l h0mbr3 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, s1 d3sd3 un 3xtr3m0 d3l c13l0 4l 0tr0 s3 h4 h3ch0 c0s4 s3m3j4nt3 4 3st4 gr4n c0s4, 0 s3 h4y4 0íd0 0tr4 c0m0 3ll4. 33 ¿H4 0íd0 pu3bl0 4lgun0 l4 v0z d3 D10s, h4bl4nd0 d3 3n m3d10 d3l fu3g0, c0m0 tú l4 h4s 0íd0, s1n p3r3c3r? 34 ¿0 h4 1nt3nt4d0 D10s v3n1r 4 t0m4r p4r4 sí un4 n4c1ón d3 3n m3d10 d3 0tr4 n4c1ón, c0n pru3b4s, c0n s3ñ4l3s, c0n m1l4gr0s y c0n gu3rr4, y m4n0 p0d3r0s4 y br4z0 3xt3nd1d0, y h3ch0s 4t3rr4d0r3s c0m0 t0d0 l0 qu3 h1z0 c0n v0s0tr0s J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 3n 0g1pt0 4nt3 tus 0j0s? 35 4 t1 t3 fu3 m0str4d0, p4r4 qu3 sup13s3s qu3 J3h0vá 3s D10s, y n0 h4y 0tr0 fu3r4 d3 él. 36 D3sd3 l0s c13l0s t3 h1z0 0ír su v0z, p4r4 3ns3ñ4rt3; y s0br3 l4 t13rr4 t3 m0stró su gr4n fu3g0, y h4s 0íd0 sus p4l4br4s d3 3n m3d10 d3l fu3g0. 37 Y p0r cu4nt0 él 4mó 4 tus p4dr3s, 3sc0g1ó 4 su d3sc3nd3nc14 d3spués d3 3ll0s, y t3 s4có d3 0g1pt0 c0n su pr3s3nc14 y c0n su gr4n p0d3r, 38 p4r4 3ch4r d3 d3l4nt3 d3 tu pr3s3nc14 n4c10n3s gr4nd3s y más fu3rt3s qu3 tú, y p4r4 1ntr0duc1rt3 y d4rt3 su t13rr4 p0r h3r3d4d, c0m0 h0y. 39 4pr3nd3 pu3s, h0y, y r3fl3x10n4 3n tu c0r4zón qu3 J3h0vá 3s D10s 4rr1b4 3n 3l c13l0 y 4b4j0 3n l4 t13rr4, y n0 h4y 0tr0. 40 Y gu4rd4 sus 3st4tut0s y sus m4nd4m13nt0s, l0s cu4l3s y0 t3 m4nd0 h0y, p4r4 qu3 t3 v4y4 b13n 4 t1 y 4 tus h1j0s d3spués d3 t1, y pr0l0ngu3s tus dí4s s0br3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 d4 p4r4 s13mpr3. 

L4s c1ud4d3s d3 r3fug10 4l 0r13nt3 d3l J0rdán

44 0st4, pu3s, 3s l4 l3y qu3 M01sés pus0 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 45 0st0s s0n l0s t3st1m0n10s, l0s 3st4tut0s y l0s d3cr3t0s qu3 h4bló M01sés 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l cu4nd0 s4l13r0n d3 0g1pt0; 46 4 3st3 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 3n 3l v4ll3 d3l4nt3 d3 B3t-p30r, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 S3hón r3y d3 l0s 4m0rr30s qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n H3sbón, 4l cu4l d3rr0tó M01sés c0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, cu4nd0 s4l13r0n d3 0g1pt0; 47 y p0s3y3r0n su t13rr4, y l4 t13rr4 d3 0g r3y d3 B4sán; d0s r3y3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s qu3 3st4b4n d3 3st3 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 4l 0r13nt3. 48 D3sd3 4r03r, qu3 3stá junt0 4 l4 r1b3r4 d3l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón, h4st4 3l m0nt3 d3 S10n, qu3 3s H3rmón; 49 y t0d0 3l 4r4bá d3 3st3 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 4l 0r13nt3, h4st4 3l m4r d3l 4r4bá, 4l p13 d3 l4s l4d3r4s d3l P1sg4.

13 S1 0b3d3c13r31s cu1d4d0s4m3nt3 4 m1s m4nd4m13nt0s qu3 y0 0s pr3scr1b0 h0y, 4m4nd0 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y s1rv1énd0l3 c0n t0d0 vu3str0 c0r4zón, y c0n t0d4 vu3str4 4lm4, 14 y0 d4ré l4 lluv14 d3 vu3str4 t13rr4 4 su t13mp0, l4 t3mpr4n4 y l4 t4rdí4; y r3c0g3rás tu gr4n0, tu v1n0 y tu 4c31t3. 15 D4ré t4mb1én h13rb4 3n tu c4mp0 p4r4 tus g4n4d0s; y c0m3rás, y t3 s4c14rás. 16 Gu4rd40s, pu3s, qu3 vu3str0 c0r4zón n0 s3 1nf4tú3, y 0s 4p4rté1s y s1rvá1s 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, y 0s 1ncl1né1s 4 3ll0s; 17 y s3 3nc13nd4 3l fur0r d3 J3h0vá s0br3 v0s0tr0s, y c13rr3 l0s c13l0s, y n0 h4y4 lluv14, n1 l4 t13rr4 dé su frut0, y p3r3zcá1s pr0nt0 d3 l4 bu3n4 t13rr4 qu3 0s d4 J3h0vá.

20 Cu4nd0 J3h0vá tu D10s 3ns4nch4r3 tu t3rr1t0r10, c0m0 él t3 h4 d1ch0, y tú d1j3r3s: C0m3ré c4rn3, p0rqu3 d3s34st3 c0m3rl4, c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 d3s34st3 p0drás c0m3r. 21 S1 3stuv13r3 l3j0s d3 t1 3l lug4r qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s 3sc0g13r3 p4r4 p0n3r 4llí su n0mbr3, p0drás m4t4r d3 tus v4c4s y d3 tus 0v3j4s qu3 J3h0vá t3 hub13r3 d4d0, c0m0 t3 h3 m4nd4d0 y0, y c0m3rás 3n tus pu3rt4s s3gún t0d0 l0 qu3 d3s34r3s. 22 L0 m1sm0 qu3 s3 c0m3 l4 g4c3l4 y 3l c13rv0, 4sí l4s p0drás c0m3r; 3l 1nmund0 y 3l l1mp10 p0drán c0m3r t4mb1én d3 3ll4s. 23 S0l4m3nt3 qu3 t3 m4nt3ng4s f1rm3 3n n0 c0m3r s4ngr3; p0rqu3 l4 s4ngr3 3s l4 v1d4, y n0 c0m3rás l4 v1d4 junt4m3nt3 c0n su c4rn3. 24 N0 l4 c0m3rás; 3n t13rr4 l4 d3rr4m4rás c0m0 4gu4. 25 N0 c0m3rás d3 3ll4, p4r4 qu3 t3 v4y4 b13n 4 t1 y 4 tus h1j0s d3spués d3 t1, cu4nd0 h1c13r3s l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá. 26 P3r0 l4s c0s4s qu3 hub13r3s c0ns4gr4d0, y tus v0t0s, l4s t0m4rás, y v3ndrás c0n 3ll4s 4l lug4r qu3 J3h0vá hub13r3 3sc0g1d0; 27 y 0fr3c3rás tus h0l0c4ust0s, l4 c4rn3 y l4 s4ngr3, s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá tu D10s; y l4 s4ngr3 d3 tus s4cr1f1c10s s3rá d3rr4m4d4 s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, y p0drás c0m3r l4 c4rn3. 28 Gu4rd4 y 3scuch4 t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s qu3 y0 t3 m4nd0, p4r4 qu3 h4c13nd0 l0 bu3n0 y l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, t3 v4y4 b13n 4 t1 y 4 tus h1j0s d3spués d3 t1 p4r4 s13mpr3. 

4dv3rt3nc14s c0ntr4 l4 1d0l4trí4

11 Y m4ndó M01sés 4l pu3bl0 3n 4qu3l dí4, d1c13nd0: 12 Cu4nd0 h4y4s p4s4d0 3l J0rdán, ést0s 3st4rán s0br3 3l m0nt3 G3r1z1m p4r4 b3nd3c1r 4l pu3bl0: S1m3ón, L3ví, Judá, 1s4c4r, J0sé y B3nj4mín. 13 Y ést0s 3st4rán s0br3 3l m0nt3 0b4l p4r4 pr0nunc14r l4 m4ld1c1ón: Rubén, G4d, 4s3r, Z4bulón, D4n y N3ft4lí. 14 Y h4bl4rán l0s l3v1t4s, y d1rán 4 t0d0 v4rón d3 1sr43l 3n 4lt4 v0z: 

15 M4ld1t0 3l h0mbr3 qu3 h1c13r3 3scultur4 0 1m4g3n d3 fund1c1ón, 4b0m1n4c1ón 4 J3h0vá, 0br4 d3 m4n0 d3 4rtíf1c3, y l4 pus13r3 3n 0cult0. Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 r3sp0nd3rá y d1rá: 4mén.

20 M4ld1t0 3l qu3 s3 4c0st4r3 c0n l4 muj3r d3 su p4dr3, p0r cu4nt0 d3scubr1ó 3l r3g4z0 d3 su p4dr3. Y d1rá t0d0 3l pu3bl0: 4mén. 

21 M4ld1t0 3l qu3 s3 4yunt4r3 c0n cu4lqu13r b3st14. Y d1rá t0d0 3l pu3bl0: 4mén.

B3nd1c10n3s d3 l4 0b3d13nc14

(Lv. 26.3-13; Dt. 7.12-24)

D0UT0R0N0M10 28

1 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 s1 0y3r3s 4t3nt4m3nt3 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, p4r4 gu4rd4r y p0n3r p0r 0br4 t0d0s sus m4nd4m13nt0s qu3 y0 t3 pr3scr1b0 h0y, t4mb1én J3h0vá tu D10s t3 3x4lt4rá s0br3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 2 Y v3ndrán s0br3 t1 t0d4s 3st4s b3nd1c10n3s, y t3 4lc4nz4rán, s1 0y3r3s l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá tu D10s. 3 B3nd1t0 s3rás tú 3n l4 c1ud4d, y b3nd1t0 tú 3n 3l c4mp0. 4 B3nd1t0 3l frut0 d3 tu v13ntr3, 3l frut0 d3 tu t13rr4, 3l frut0 d3 tus b3st14s, l4 crí4 d3 tus v4c4s y l0s r3b4ñ0s d3 tus 0v3j4s. 5 B3nd1t4s s3rán tu c4n4st4 y tu 4rt3s4 d3 4m4s4r. 6 B3nd1t0 s3rás 3n tu 3ntr4r, y b3nd1t0 3n tu s4l1r. 

7 J3h0vá d3rr0t4rá 4 tus 3n3m1g0s qu3 s3 l3v4nt4r3n c0ntr4 t1; p0r un c4m1n0 s4ldrán c0ntr4 t1, y p0r s13t3 c4m1n0s hu1rán d3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 8 J3h0vá t3 3nv14rá su b3nd1c1ón s0br3 tus gr4n3r0s, y s0br3 t0d0 4qu3ll0 3n qu3 pus13r3s tu m4n0; y t3 b3nd3c1rá 3n l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 d4. 9 T3 c0nf1rm4rá J3h0vá p0r pu3bl0 s4nt0 suy0, c0m0 t3 l0 h4 jur4d0, cu4nd0 gu4rd4r3s l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, y 4nduv13r3s 3n sus c4m1n0s. 10 Y v3rán t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá 3s 1nv0c4d0 s0br3 t1, y t3 t3m3rán. 11 Y t3 h4rá J3h0vá s0br34bund4r 3n b13n3s, 3n 3l frut0 d3 tu v13ntr3, 3n 3l frut0 d3 tu b3st14, y 3n 3l frut0 d3 tu t13rr4, 3n 3l p4ís qu3 J3h0vá juró 4 tus p4dr3s qu3 t3 h4bí4 d3 d4r. 12 T3 4br1rá J3h0vá su bu3n t3s0r0, 3l c13l0, p4r4 3nv14r l4 lluv14 4 tu t13rr4 3n su t13mp0, y p4r4 b3nd3c1r t0d4 0br4 d3 tus m4n0s. Y pr3st4rás 4 much4s n4c10n3s, y tú n0 p3d1rás pr3st4d0. 13 T3 p0ndrá J3h0vá p0r c4b3z4, y n0 p0r c0l4; y 3st4rás 3nc1m4 s0l4m3nt3, y n0 3st4rás d3b4j0, s1 0b3d3c13r3s l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, qu3 y0 t3 0rd3n0 h0y, p4r4 qu3 l0s gu4rd3s y cumpl4s, 14 y s1 n0 t3 4p4rt4r3s d3 t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s qu3 y0 t3 m4nd0 h0y, n1 4 d13str4 n1 4 s1n13str4, p4r4 1r tr4s d10s3s 4j3n0s y s3rv1rl3s. 

C0ns3cu3nc14s d3 l4 d3s0b3d13nc14

(Lv. 26.14-46)

15 P3r0 4c0nt3c3rá, s1 n0 0y3r3s l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, p4r4 pr0cur4r cumpl1r t0d0s sus m4nd4m13nt0s y sus 3st4tut0s qu3 y0 t3 1nt1m0 h0y, qu3 v3ndrán s0br3 t1 t0d4s 3st4s m4ld1c10n3s, y t3 4lc4nz4rán. 16 M4ld1t0 s3rás tú 3n l4 c1ud4d, y m4ld1t0 3n 3l c4mp0. 17 M4ld1t4 tu c4n4st4, y tu 4rt3s4 d3 4m4s4r. 18 M4ld1t0 3l frut0 d3 tu v13ntr3, 3l frut0 d3 tu t13rr4, l4 crí4 d3 tus v4c4s, y l0s r3b4ñ0s d3 tus 0v3j4s. 19 M4ld1t0 s3rás 3n tu 3ntr4r, y m4ld1t0 3n tu s4l1r. 

20 Y J3h0vá 3nv14rá c0ntr4 t1 l4 m4ld1c1ón, qu3br4nt0 y 4s0mbr0 3n t0d0 cu4nt0 pus13r3s m4n0 3 h1c13r3s, h4st4 qu3 s34s d3stru1d0, y p3r3zc4s pr0nt0 4 c4us4 d3 l4 m4ld4d d3 tus 0br4s p0r l4s cu4l3s m3 h4brás d3j4d0. 21 J3h0vá tr43rá s0br3 t1 m0rt4nd4d, h4st4 qu3 t3 c0nsum4 d3 l4 t13rr4 4 l4 cu4l 3ntr4s p4r4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4. 22 J3h0vá t3 h3r1rá d3 t1s1s, d3 f13br3, d3 1nfl4m4c1ón y d3 4rd0r, c0n s3quí4, c0n c4l4m1d4d r3p3nt1n4 y c0n 4ñubl0; y t3 p3rs3gu1rán h4st4 qu3 p3r3zc4s. 23 Y l0s c13l0s qu3 3stán s0br3 tu c4b3z4 s3rán d3 br0nc3, y l4 t13rr4 qu3 3stá d3b4j0 d3 t1, d3 h13rr0. 24 D4rá J3h0vá p0r lluv14 4 tu t13rr4 p0lv0 y c3n1z4; d3 l0s c13l0s d3sc3nd3rán s0br3 t1 h4st4 qu3 p3r3zc4s. 

25 J3h0vá t3 3ntr3g4rá d3rr0t4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 tus 3n3m1g0s; p0r un c4m1n0 s4ldrás c0ntr4 3ll0s, y p0r s13t3 c4m1n0s hu1rás d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s; y s3rás v3j4d0 p0r t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 l4 t13rr4. 26 Y tus c4dáv3r3s s3rv1rán d3 c0m1d4 4 t0d4 4v3 d3l c13l0 y f13r4 d3 l4 t13rr4, y n0 h4brá qu13n l4s 3sp4nt3. 27 J3h0vá t3 h3r1rá c0n l4 úlc3r4 d3 0g1pt0, c0n tum0r3s, c0n s4rn4, y c0n c0m3zón d3 qu3 n0 pu3d4s s3r cur4d0. 28 J3h0vá t3 h3r1rá c0n l0cur4, c3gu3r4 y turb4c1ón d3 3spír1tu; 29 y p4lp4rás 4 m3d10dí4 c0m0 p4lp4 3l c13g0 3n l4 0scur1d4d, y n0 s3rás pr0sp3r4d0 3n tus c4m1n0s; y n0 s3rás s1n0 0pr1m1d0 y r0b4d0 t0d0s l0s dí4s, y n0 h4brá qu13n t3 s4lv3. 30 T3 d3sp0s4rás c0n muj3r, y 0tr0 v4rón d0rm1rá c0n 3ll4; 3d1f1c4rás c4s4, y n0 h4b1t4rás 3n 3ll4; pl4nt4rás v1ñ4, y n0 l4 d1sfrut4rás. 31 Tu bu3y s3rá m4t4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s, y tú n0 c0m3rás d3 él; tu 4sn0 s3rá 4rr3b4t4d0 d3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, y n0 t3 s3rá d3vu3lt0; tus 0v3j4s s3rán d4d4s 4 tus 3n3m1g0s, y n0 t3ndrás qu13n t3 l4s r3sc4t3. 32 Tus h1j0s y tus h1j4s s3rán 3ntr3g4d0s 4 0tr0 pu3bl0, y tus 0j0s l0 v3rán, y d3sf4ll3c3rán p0r 3ll0s t0d0 3l dí4; y n0 h4brá fu3rz4 3n tu m4n0. 33 0l frut0 d3 tu t13rr4 y d3 t0d0 tu tr4b4j0 c0m3rá pu3bl0 qu3 n0 c0n0c1st3; y n0 s3rás s1n0 0pr1m1d0 y qu3br4nt4d0 t0d0s l0s dí4s. 34 Y 3nl0qu3c3rás 4 c4us4 d3 l0 qu3 v3rás c0n tus 0j0s. 35 T3 h3r1rá J3h0vá c0n m4l1gn4 pústul4 3n l4s r0d1ll4s y 3n l4s p13rn4s, d3sd3 l4 pl4nt4 d3 tu p13 h4st4 tu c0r0n1ll4, s1n qu3 pu3d4s s3r cur4d0. 

36 J3h0vá t3 ll3v4rá 4 t1, y 4l r3y qu3 hub13r3s pu3st0 s0br3 t1, 4 n4c1ón qu3 n0 c0n0c1st3 n1 tú n1 tus p4dr3s; y 4llá s3rv1rás 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, 4l p4l0 y 4 l4 p13dr4. 37 Y s3rás m0t1v0 d3 h0rr0r, y s3rv1rás d3 r3frán y d3 burl4 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s 4 l0s cu4l3s t3 ll3v4rá J3h0vá. 38 S4c4rás much4 s3m1ll4 4l c4mp0, y r3c0g3rás p0c0, p0rqu3 l4 l4ng0st4 l0 c0nsum1rá. 39 Pl4nt4rás v1ñ4s y l4br4rás, p3r0 n0 b3b3rás v1n0, n1 r3c0g3rás uv4s, p0rqu3 3l gus4n0 s3 l4s c0m3rá. 40 T3ndrás 0l1v0s 3n t0d0 tu t3rr1t0r10, m4s n0 t3 ung1rás c0n 3l 4c31t3, p0rqu3 tu 4c31tun4 s3 c43rá. 41 H1j0s 3 h1j4s 3ng3ndr4rás, y n0 s3rán p4r4 t1, p0rqu3 1rán 3n c4ut1v3r10. 42 T0d4 tu 4rb0l3d4 y 3l frut0 d3 tu t13rr4 s3rán c0nsum1d0s p0r l4 l4ng0st4. 43 0l 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 3st4rá 3n m3d10 d3 t1 s3 3l3v4rá s0br3 t1 muy 4lt0, y tú d3sc3nd3rás muy 4b4j0. 44 0l t3 pr3st4rá 4 t1, y tú n0 l3 pr3st4rás 4 él; él s3rá p0r c4b3z4, y tú s3rás p0r c0l4. 45 Y v3ndrán s0br3 t1 t0d4s 3st4s m4ld1c10n3s, y t3 p3rs3gu1rán, y t3 4lc4nz4rán h4st4 qu3 p3r3zc4s; p0r cu4nt0 n0 h4brás 4t3nd1d0 4 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, p4r4 gu4rd4r sus m4nd4m13nt0s y sus 3st4tut0s, qu3 él t3 m4ndó; 46 y s3rán 3n t1 p0r s3ñ4l y p0r m4r4v1ll4, y 3n tu d3sc3nd3nc14 p4r4 s13mpr3. 

47 P0r cu4nt0 n0 s3rv1st3 4 J3h0vá tu D10s c0n 4l3grí4 y c0n g0z0 d3 c0r4zón, p0r l4 4bund4nc14 d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s, 48 s3rv1rás, p0r t4nt0, 4 tus 3n3m1g0s qu3 3nv14r3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 t1, c0n h4mbr3 y c0n s3d y c0n d3snud3z, y c0n f4lt4 d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s; y él p0ndrá yug0 d3 h13rr0 s0br3 tu cu3ll0, h4st4 d3stru1rt3. 49 J3h0vá tr43rá c0ntr4 t1 un4 n4c1ón d3 l3j0s, d3l 3xtr3m0 d3 l4 t13rr4, qu3 vu3l3 c0m0 águ1l4, n4c1ón cuy4 l3ngu4 n0 3nt13nd4s; 50 g3nt3 f13r4 d3 r0str0, qu3 n0 t3ndrá r3sp3t0 4l 4nc14n0, n1 p3rd0n4rá 4l n1ñ0; 51 y c0m3rá 3l frut0 d3 tu b3st14 y 3l frut0 d3 tu t13rr4, h4st4 qu3 p3r3zc4s; y n0 t3 d3j4rá gr4n0, n1 m0st0, n1 4c31t3, n1 l4 crí4 d3 tus v4c4s, n1 l0s r3b4ñ0s d3 tus 0v3j4s, h4st4 d3stru1rt3. 52 P0ndrá s1t10 4 t0d4s tus c1ud4d3s, h4st4 qu3 c41g4n tus mur0s 4lt0s y f0rt1f1c4d0s 3n qu3 tú c0nfí4s, 3n t0d4 tu t13rr4; s1t14rá, pu3s, t0d4s tus c1ud4d3s y t0d4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 hub13r3 d4d0. 53 Y c0m3rás 3l frut0 d3 tu v13ntr3, l4 c4rn3 d3 tus h1j0s y d3 tus h1j4s qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 d10, 3n 3l s1t10 y 3n 3l 4pur0 c0n qu3 t3 4ngust14rá tu 3n3m1g0. 54 0l h0mbr3 t13rn0 3n m3d10 d3 t1, y 3l muy d3l1c4d0, m1r4rá c0n m4l0s 0j0s 4 su h3rm4n0, y 4 l4 muj3r d3 su s3n0, y 4l r3st0 d3 sus h1j0s qu3 l3 qu3d4r3n; 55 p4r4 n0 d4r 4 4lgun0 d3 3ll0s d3 l4 c4rn3 d3 sus h1j0s, qu3 él c0m13r3, p0r n0 h4b3rl3 qu3d4d0 n4d4, 3n 3l 4s3d10 y 3n 3l 4pur0 c0n qu3 tu 3n3m1g0 t3 0pr1m1rá 3n t0d4s tus c1ud4d3s. 56 L4 t13rn4 y l4 d3l1c4d4 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, qu3 nunc4 l4 pl4nt4 d3 su p13 1nt3nt4rí4 s3nt4r s0br3 l4 t13rr4, d3 pur4 d3l1c4d3z4 y t3rnur4, m1r4rá c0n m4l0s 0j0s 4l m4r1d0 d3 su s3n0, 4 su h1j0, 4 su h1j4, 57 4l r3c1én n4c1d0 qu3 s4l3 d3 3ntr3 sus p13s, y 4 sus h1j0s qu3 d13r3 4 luz; pu3s l0s c0m3rá 0cult4m3nt3, p0r l4 c4r3nc14 d3 t0d0, 3n 3l 4s3d10 y 3n 3l 4pur0 c0n qu3 tu 3n3m1g0 t3 0pr1m1rá 3n tus c1ud4d3s. 

58 S1 n0 cu1d4r3s d3 p0n3r p0r 0br4 t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s d3 3st4 l3y qu3 3stán 3scr1t4s 3n 3st3 l1br0, t3m13nd0 3st3 n0mbr3 gl0r10s0 y t3m1bl3: J0H0VÁ TU D10S, 59 3nt0nc3s J3h0vá 4um3nt4rá m4r4v1ll0s4m3nt3 tus pl4g4s y l4s pl4g4s d3 tu d3sc3nd3nc14, pl4g4s gr4nd3s y p3rm4n3nt3s, y 3nf3rm3d4d3s m4l1gn4s y dur4d3r4s; 60 y tr43rá s0br3 t1 t0d0s l0s m4l3s d3 0g1pt0, d3l4nt3 d3 l0s cu4l3s t3m1st3, y n0 t3 d3j4rán. 61 4s1m1sm0 t0d4 3nf3rm3d4d y t0d4 pl4g4 qu3 n0 3stá 3scr1t4 3n 3l l1br0 d3 3st4 l3y, J3h0vá l4 3nv14rá s0br3 t1, h4st4 qu3 s34s d3stru1d0. 62 Y qu3d4ré1s p0c0s 3n núm3r0, 3n lug4r d3 h4b3r s1d0 c0m0 l4s 3str3ll4s d3l c13l0 3n mult1tud, p0r cu4nt0 n0 0b3d3c1st31s 4 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá tu D10s. 63 4sí c0m0 J3h0vá s3 g0z4b4 3n h4c3r0s b13n y 3n mult1pl1c4r0s, 4sí s3 g0z4rá J3h0vá 3n 4rru1n4r0s y 3n d3stru1r0s; y s3ré1s 4rr4nc4d0s d3 s0br3 l4 t13rr4 4 l4 cu4l 3ntrá1s p4r4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4. 64 Y J3h0vá t3 3sp4rc1rá p0r t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, d3sd3 un 3xtr3m0 d3 l4 t13rr4 h4st4 3l 0tr0 3xtr3m0; y 4llí s3rv1rás 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s qu3 n0 c0n0c1st3 tú n1 tus p4dr3s, 4l l3ñ0 y 4 l4 p13dr4. 65 Y n1 4un 3ntr3 3st4s n4c10n3s d3sc4ns4rás, n1 l4 pl4nt4 d3 tu p13 t3ndrá r3p0s0; pu3s 4llí t3 d4rá J3h0vá c0r4zón t3m3r0s0, y d3sf4ll3c1m13nt0 d3 0j0s, y tr1st3z4 d3 4lm4; 66 y t3ndrás tu v1d4 c0m0 4lg0 qu3 p3nd3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, y 3st4rás t3m3r0s0 d3 n0ch3 y d3 dí4, y n0 t3ndrás s3gur1d4d d3 tu v1d4. 67 P0r l4 m4ñ4n4 d1rás: ¡Qu1én d13r4 qu3 fu3s3 l4 t4rd3! y 4 l4 t4rd3 d1rás: ¡Qu1én d13r4 qu3 fu3s3 l4 m4ñ4n4! p0r 3l m13d0 d3 tu c0r4zón c0n qu3 3st4rás 4m3dr3nt4d0, y p0r l0 qu3 v3rán tus 0j0s. 68 Y J3h0vá t3 h4rá v0lv3r 4 0g1pt0 3n n4v3s, p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3l cu4l t3 h4 d1ch0: Nunc4 más v0lv3rás; y 4llí s3ré1s v3nd1d0s 4 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s p0r 3scl4v0s y p0r 3scl4v4s, y n0 h4brá qu13n 0s c0mpr3. 

P4ct0 d3 J3h0vá c0n 1sr43l 3n M04b

Y 3ll0s fu3r0n, y 3ntr4r0n 3n c4s4 d3 un4 r4m3r4 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 R4h4b, y p0s4r0n 4llí. 2 Y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4l r3y d3 J3r1có, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 h0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4n v3n1d0 4quí 3st4 n0ch3 p4r4 3sp14r l4 t13rr4. 3 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 J3r1có 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 R4h4b: S4c4 4 l0s h0mbr3s qu3 h4n v3n1d0 4 t1, y h4n 3ntr4d0 4 tu c4s4; p0rqu3 h4n v3n1d0 p4r4 3sp14r t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 4 P3r0 l4 muj3r h4bí4 t0m4d0 4 l0s d0s h0mbr3s y l0s h4bí4 3sc0nd1d0; y d1j0: 0s v3rd4d qu3 un0s h0mbr3s v1n13r0n 4 mí, p3r0 n0 sup3 d3 dónd3 3r4n. 5 Y cu4nd0 s3 1b4 4 c3rr4r l4 pu3rt4, s13nd0 y4 0scur0, 3s0s h0mbr3s s3 s4l13r0n, y n0 sé 4 dónd3 h4n 1d0; s3gu1dl0s 4pr1s4, y l0s 4lc4nz4ré1s. 6 M4s 3ll4 l0s h4bí4 h3ch0 sub1r 4l t3rr4d0, y l0s h4bí4 3sc0nd1d0 3ntr3 l0s m4n0j0s d3 l1n0 qu3 t3ní4 pu3st0s 3n 3l t3rr4d0. 7 Y l0s h0mbr3s fu3r0n tr4s 3ll0s p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3l J0rdán, h4st4 l0s v4d0s; y l4 pu3rt4 fu3 c3rr4d4 d3spués qu3 s4l13r0n l0s p3rs3gu1d0r3s.

15 0nt0nc3s 3ll4 l0s h1z0 d3sc3nd3r c0n un4 cu3rd4 p0r l4 v3nt4n4; p0rqu3 su c4s4 3st4b4 3n 3l mur0 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y 3ll4 v1ví4 3n 3l mur0. 16 Y l3s d1j0: M4rch40s 4l m0nt3, p4r4 qu3 l0s qu3 fu3r0n tr4s v0s0tr0s n0 0s 3ncu3ntr3n; y 3st4d 3sc0nd1d0s 4llí tr3s dí4s, h4st4 qu3 l0s qu3 0s s1gu3n h4y4n vu3lt0; y d3spués 0s 1ré1s p0r vu3str0 c4m1n0. 17 Y 3ll0s l3 d1j3r0n: N0s0tr0s qu3d4r3m0s l1br3s d3 3st3 jur4m3nt0 c0n qu3 n0s h4s jur4m3nt4d0. 18 H3 4quí, cu4nd0 n0s0tr0s 3ntr3m0s 3n l4 t13rr4, tú 4t4rás 3st3 c0rdón d3 gr4n4 4 l4 v3nt4n4 p0r l4 cu4l n0s d3sc0lg4st3; y r3un1rás 3n tu c4s4 4 tu p4dr3 y 4 tu m4dr3, 4 tus h3rm4n0s y 4 t0d4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 tu p4dr3. 19 Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 s4l13r3 fu3r4 d3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 tu c4s4, su s4ngr3 s3rá s0br3 su c4b3z4, y n0s0tr0s s1n culp4. M4s cu4lqu13r4 qu3 s3 3stuv13r3 3n c4s4 c0nt1g0, su s4ngr3 s3rá s0br3 nu3str4 c4b3z4, s1 m4n0 l3 t0c4r3. 20 Y s1 tú d3nunc14r3s 3st3 nu3str0 4sunt0, n0s0tr0s qu3d4r3m0s l1br3s d3 3st3 tu jur4m3nt0 c0n qu3 n0s h4s jur4m3nt4d0. 21 0ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: S34 4sí c0m0 h4bé1s d1ch0. Lu3g0 l0s d3sp1d1ó, y s3 fu3r0n; y 3ll4 4tó 3l c0rdón d3 gr4n4 4 l4 v3nt4n4. 

22 Y c4m1n4nd0 3ll0s, ll3g4r0n 4l m0nt3 y 3stuv13r0n 4llí tr3s dí4s, h4st4 qu3 v0lv13r0n l0s qu3 l0s p3rs3guí4n; y l0s qu3 l0s p3rs1gu13r0n busc4r0n p0r t0d0 3l c4m1n0, p3r0 n0 l0s h4ll4r0n. 23 0nt0nc3s v0lv13r0n l0s d0s h0mbr3s; d3sc3nd13r0n d3l m0nt3, y p4s4r0n, y v1n13r0n 4 J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun, y l3 c0nt4r0n t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 l3s h4bí4n 4c0nt3c1d0. 24 Y d1j3r0n 4 J0sué: J3h0vá h4 3ntr3g4d0 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 3n nu3str4s m4n0s; y t4mb1én t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l p4ís d3sm4y4n d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s.

1 J0sué s3 l3v4ntó d3 m4ñ4n4, y él y t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p4rt13r0n d3 S1t1m y v1n13r0n h4st4 3l J0rdán, y r3p0s4r0n 4llí 4nt3s d3 p4s4rl0. 2 Y d3spués d3 tr3s dí4s, l0s 0f1c14l3s r3c0rr13r0n 3l c4mp4m3nt0, 3 y m4nd4r0n 4l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: Cu4nd0 v3á1s 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y l0s l3v1t4s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 l4 ll3v4n, v0s0tr0s s4ldré1s d3 vu3str0 lug4r y m4rch4ré1s 3n p0s d3 3ll4, 4 4 f1n d3 qu3 s3pá1s 3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 h4bé1s d3 1r; p0r cu4nt0 v0s0tr0s n0 h4bé1s p4s4d0 4nt3s d3 4h0r4 p0r 3st3 c4m1n0. P3r0 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s y 3ll4 h4y4 d1st4nc14 c0m0 d3 d0s m1l c0d0s; n0 0s 4c3rc4ré1s 4 3ll4. 5 Y J0sué d1j0 4l pu3bl0: S4nt1f1c40s, p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4rá m4ñ4n4 m4r4v1ll4s 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s. 6 Y h4bló J0sué 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, d1c13nd0: T0m4d 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0, y p4s4d d3l4nt3 d3l pu3bl0. 7 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d1j0 4 J0sué: D3sd3 3st3 dí4 c0m3nz4ré 4 3ngr4nd3c3rt3 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s 0j0s d3 t0d0 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 3nt13nd4n qu3 c0m0 3stuv3 c0n M01sés, 4sí 3st4ré c0nt1g0. 8 Tú, pu3s, m4nd4rás 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0, d1c13nd0: Cu4nd0 h4yá1s 3ntr4d0 h4st4 3l b0rd3 d3l 4gu4 d3l J0rdán, p4r4ré1s 3n 3l J0rdán. 9 Y J0sué d1j0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l: 4c3rc40s, y 3scuch4d l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 10 Y 4ñ4d1ó J0sué: 0n 3st0 c0n0c3ré1s qu3 3l D10s v1v13nt3 3stá 3n m3d10 d3 v0s0tr0s, y qu3 él 3ch4rá d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s 4l c4n4n30, 4l h3t30, 4l h3v30, 4l f3r3z30, 4l g3rg3s30, 4l 4m0rr30 y 4l j3bus30. 11 H3 4quí, 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3l S3ñ0r d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 p4s4rá d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s 3n m3d10 d3l J0rdán. 12 T0m4d, pu3s, 4h0r4 d0c3 h0mbr3s d3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, un0 d3 c4d4 tr1bu. 13 Y cu4nd0 l4s pl4nt4s d3 l0s p13s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4n 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, S3ñ0r d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4, s3 4s13nt3n 3n l4s 4gu4s d3l J0rdán, l4s 4gu4s d3l J0rdán s3 d1v1d1rán; p0rqu3 l4s 4gu4s qu3 v13n3n d3 4rr1b4 s3 d3t3ndrán 3n un m0ntón. 

14 Y 4c0nt3c1ó cu4nd0 p4rt1ó 3l pu3bl0 d3 sus t13nd4s p4r4 p4s4r 3l J0rdán, c0n l0s s4c3rd0t3s d3l4nt3 d3l pu3bl0 ll3v4nd0 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0, 15 cu4nd0 l0s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 3ntr4r0n 3n 3l J0rdán, y l0s p13s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 fu3r0n m0j4d0s 4 l4 0r1ll4 d3l 4gu4 (p0rqu3 3l J0rdán su3l3 d3sb0rd4rs3 p0r t0d4s sus 0r1ll4s t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 l4 s13g4), 16 l4s 4gu4s qu3 v3ní4n d3 4rr1b4 s3 d3tuv13r0n c0m0 3n un m0ntón b13n l3j0s d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 4d4m, qu3 3stá 4l l4d0 d3 S4r3tán, y l4s qu3 d3sc3ndí4n 4l m4r d3l 4r4bá, 4l M4r S4l4d0, s3 4c4b4r0n, y fu3r0n d1v1d1d4s; y 3l pu3bl0 p4só 3n d1r3cc1ón d3 J3r1có. 17 M4s l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, 3stuv13r0n 3n s3c0, f1rm3s 3n m3d10 d3l J0rdán, h4st4 qu3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 hub0 4c4b4d0 d3 p4s4r 3l J0rdán; y t0d0 1sr43l p4só 3n s3c0.

J0SUÉ 4

1 Cu4nd0 t0d4 l4 g3nt3 hub0 4c4b4d0 d3 p4s4r 3l J0rdán, J3h0vá h4bló 4 J0sué, d1c13nd0: 2 T0m4d d3l pu3bl0 d0c3 h0mbr3s, un0 d3 c4d4 tr1bu, 3 y m4nd4dl3s, d1c13nd0: T0m4d d3 4quí d3 3n m3d10 d3l J0rdán, d3l lug4r d0nd3 3stán f1rm3s l0s p13s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, d0c3 p13dr4s, l4s cu4l3s p4s4ré1s c0n v0s0tr0s, y l3v4nt4dl4s 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 h4bé1s d3 p4s4r l4 n0ch3. 4 0nt0nc3s J0sué ll4mó 4 l0s d0c3 h0mbr3s 4 l0s cu4l3s él h4bí4 d3s1gn4d0 d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, un0 d3 c4d4 tr1bu. 5 Y l3s d1j0 J0sué: P4s4d d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 4 l4 m1t4d d3l J0rdán, y c4d4 un0 d3 v0s0tr0s t0m3 un4 p13dr4 s0br3 su h0mbr0, c0nf0rm3 4l núm3r0 d3 l4s tr1bus d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 6 p4r4 qu3 3st0 s34 s3ñ4l 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s; y cu4nd0 vu3str0s h1j0s pr3gunt4r3n 4 sus p4dr3s m4ñ4n4, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué s1gn1f1c4n 3st4s p13dr4s? 7 l3s r3sp0nd3ré1s: Qu3 l4s 4gu4s d3l J0rdán fu3r0n d1v1d1d4s d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá; cu4nd0 3ll4 p4só 3l J0rdán, l4s 4gu4s d3l J0rdán s3 d1v1d13r0n; y 3st4s p13dr4s s3rv1rán d3 m0num3nt0 c0nm3m0r4t1v0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p4r4 s13mpr3. 

8 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l l0 h1c13r0n 4sí c0m0 J0sué l3s m4ndó: t0m4r0n d0c3 p13dr4s d3 3n m3d10 d3l J0rdán, c0m0 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 d1ch0 4 J0sué, c0nf0rm3 4l núm3r0 d3 l4s tr1bus d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y l4s p4s4r0n 4l lug4r d0nd3 4c4mp4r0n, y l4s l3v4nt4r0n 4llí. 9 J0sué t4mb1én l3v4ntó d0c3 p13dr4s 3n m3d10 d3l J0rdán, 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 3stuv13r0n l0s p13s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0; y h4n 3st4d0 4llí h4st4 h0y. 10 Y l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 s3 p4r4r0n 3n m3d10 d3l J0rdán h4st4 qu3 s3 h1z0 t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 J0sué qu3 d1j3s3 4l pu3bl0, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 M01sés h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 J0sué; y 3l pu3bl0 s3 d10 pr1s4 y p4só. 

11 Y cu4nd0 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 4c4bó d3 p4s4r, t4mb1én p4só 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s, 3n pr3s3nc14 d3l pu3bl0. 12 T4mb1én l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés p4s4r0n 4rm4d0s d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, s3gún M01sés l3s h4bí4 d1ch0; 13 c0m0 cu4r3nt4 m1l h0mbr3s 4rm4d0s, l1st0s p4r4 l4 gu3rr4, p4s4r0n h4c14 l4 ll4nur4 d3 J3r1có d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 14 0n 4qu3l dí4 J3h0vá 3ngr4nd3c1ó 4 J0sué 4 l0s 0j0s d3 t0d0 1sr43l; y l3 t3m13r0n, c0m0 h4bí4n t3m1d0 4 M01sés, t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 su v1d4. 

15 Lu3g0 J3h0vá h4bló 4 J0sué, d1c13nd0: 16 M4nd4 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4n 3l 4rc4 d3l t3st1m0n10, qu3 sub4n d3l J0rdán. 17 Y J0sué m4ndó 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, d1c13nd0: Sub1d d3l J0rdán. 18 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá sub13r0n d3 3n m3d10 d3l J0rdán, y l4s pl4nt4s d3 l0s p13s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3stuv13r0n 3n lug4r s3c0, l4s 4gu4s d3l J0rdán s3 v0lv13r0n 4 su lug4r, c0rr13nd0 c0m0 4nt3s s0br3 t0d0s sus b0rd3s. 

19 Y 3l pu3bl0 sub1ó d3l J0rdán 3l dí4 d13z d3l m3s pr1m3r0, y 4c4mp4r0n 3n G1lg4l, 4l l4d0 0r13nt4l d3 J3r1có. 20 Y J0sué 3r1g1ó 3n G1lg4l l4s d0c3 p13dr4s qu3 h4bí4n tr4íd0 d3l J0rdán. 21 Y h4bló 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: Cu4nd0 m4ñ4n4 pr3gunt4r3n vu3str0s h1j0s 4 sus p4dr3s, y d1j3r3n: ¿Qué s1gn1f1c4n 3st4s p13dr4s? 22 d3cl4r4ré1s 4 vu3str0s h1j0s, d1c13nd0: 1sr43l p4só 3n s3c0 p0r 3st3 J0rdán. 23 P0rqu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s s3có l4s 4gu4s d3l J0rdán d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, h4st4 qu3 h4bí41s p4s4d0, 4 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s l0 h4bí4 h3ch0 3n 3l M4r R0j0, 3l cu4l s3có d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s h4st4 qu3 p4s4m0s; 24 p4r4 qu3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4 c0n0zc4n qu3 l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá 3s p0d3r0s4; p4r4 qu3 t3má1s 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s t0d0s l0s dí4s. 

L4 c1rcunc1s1ón y l4 p4scu4 3n G1lg4l

J0SUÉ 5

1 Cu4nd0 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s qu3 3st4b4n 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán 4l 0cc1d3nt3, y t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l0s c4n4n30s qu3 3st4b4n c3rc4 d3l m4r, 0y3r0n cóm0 J3h0vá h4bí4 s3c4d0 l4s 4gu4s d3l J0rdán d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4st4 qu3 hub13r0n p4s4d0, d3sf4ll3c1ó su c0r4zón, y n0 hub0 más 4l13nt0 3n 3ll0s d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

2 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 J3h0vá d1j0 4 J0sué: H4zt3 cuch1ll0s 4f1l4d0s, y vu3lv3 4 c1rcunc1d4r l4 s3gund4 v3z 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 3 Y J0sué s3 h1z0 cuch1ll0s 4f1l4d0s, y c1rcunc1dó 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n 3l c0ll4d0 d3 4r4l0t. 4 0st4 3s l4 c4us4 p0r l4 cu4l J0sué l0s c1rcunc1dó: T0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4bí4 s4l1d0 d3 0g1pt0, l0s v4r0n3s, t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4, h4bí4n mu3rt0 3n 3l d3s13rt0, p0r 3l c4m1n0, d3spués qu3 s4l13r0n d3 0g1pt0. 5 Pu3s t0d0s l0s d3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4bí4n s4l1d0, 3st4b4n c1rcunc1d4d0s; m4s t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4bí4 n4c1d0 3n 3l d3s13rt0, p0r 3l c4m1n0, d3spués qu3 hub13r0n s4l1d0 d3 0g1pt0, n0 3st4b4 c1rcunc1d4d0. 6 P0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4nduv13r0n p0r 3l d3s13rt0 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s, h4st4 qu3 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4 qu3 h4bí4n s4l1d0 d3 0g1pt0 fu3r0n c0nsum1d0s, p0r cu4nt0 n0 0b3d3c13r0n 4 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá; p0r l0 cu4l J3h0vá l3s juró qu3 n0 l3s d3j4rí4 v3r l4 t13rr4 d3 l4 cu4l J3h0vá h4bí4 jur4d0 4 sus p4dr3s qu3 n0s l4 d4rí4, t13rr4 qu3 fluy3 l3ch3 y m13l. 7 4 l0s h1j0s d3 3ll0s, qu3 él h4bí4 h3ch0 suc3d3r 3n su lug4r, J0sué l0s c1rcunc1dó; pu3s 3r4n 1nc1rcunc1s0s, p0rqu3 n0 h4bí4n s1d0 c1rcunc1d4d0s p0r 3l c4m1n0. 

8 Y cu4nd0 4c4b4r0n d3 c1rcunc1d4r 4 t0d4 l4 g3nt3, s3 qu3d4r0n 3n 3l m1sm0 lug4r 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0, h4st4 qu3 s4n4r0n. 9 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 J0sué: H0y h3 qu1t4d0 d3 v0s0tr0s 3l 0pr0b10 d3 0g1pt0; p0r l0 cu4l 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r fu3 ll4m4d0 G1lg4l, h4st4 h0y. 

10 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4c4mp4r0n 3n G1lg4l, y c3l3br4r0n l4 p4scu4 4 l0s c4t0rc3 dí4s d3l m3s, p0r l4 t4rd3, 3n l0s ll4n0s d3 J3r1có. 11 4l 0tr0 dí4 d3 l4 p4scu4 c0m13r0n d3l frut0 d3 l4 t13rr4, l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4, y 3n 3l m1sm0 dí4 3sp1g4s nu3v4s t0st4d4s. 12 Y 3l m4ná c3só 3l dí4 s1gu13nt3, d3sd3 qu3 c0m3nz4r0n 4 c0m3r d3l frut0 d3 l4 t13rr4; y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l nunc4 más tuv13r0n m4ná, s1n0 qu3 c0m13r0n d3 l0s frut0s d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án 4qu3l 4ñ0. 

J0sué y 3l v4rón c0n l4 3sp4d4 d3s3nv41n4d4

13 0st4nd0 J0sué c3rc4 d3 J3r1có, 4lzó sus 0j0s y v10 un v4rón qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 él, 3l cu4l t3ní4 un4 3sp4d4 d3s3nv41n4d4 3n su m4n0. Y J0sué, y3nd0 h4c14 él, l3 d1j0: ¿0r3s d3 l0s nu3str0s, 0 d3 nu3str0s 3n3m1g0s? 14 0l r3sp0nd1ó: N0; m4s c0m0 Prínc1p3 d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 J3h0vá h3 v3n1d0 4h0r4. 0nt0nc3s J0sué, p0stránd0s3 s0br3 su r0str0 3n t13rr4, l3 4d0ró; y l3 d1j0: ¿Qué d1c3 m1 S3ñ0r 4 su s13rv0? 15 Y 3l Prínc1p3 d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó 4 J0sué: Qu1t4 3l c4lz4d0 d3 tus p13s, p0rqu3 3l lug4r d0nd3 3stás 3s s4nt0. Y J0sué 4sí l0 h1z0. 

L4 t0m4 d3 J3r1có

J0SUÉ 6

1 4h0r4, J3r1có 3st4b4 c3rr4d4, b13n c3rr4d4, 4 c4us4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; n4d13 3ntr4b4 n1 s4lí4. 2 M4s J3h0vá d1j0 4 J0sué: M1r4, y0 h3 3ntr3g4d0 3n tu m4n0 4 J3r1có y 4 su r3y, c0n sus v4r0n3s d3 gu3rr4. 3 R0d34ré1s, pu3s, l4 c1ud4d t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4, y3nd0 4lr3d3d0r d3 l4 c1ud4d un4 v3z; y 3st0 h4ré1s dur4nt3 s31s dí4s. 4 Y s13t3 s4c3rd0t3s ll3v4rán s13t3 b0c1n4s d3 cu3rn0s d3 c4rn3r0 d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4; y 4l sépt1m0 dí4 d4ré1s s13t3 vu3lt4s 4 l4 c1ud4d, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s t0c4rán l4s b0c1n4s. 5 Y cu4nd0 t0qu3n pr0l0ng4d4m3nt3 3l cu3rn0 d3 c4rn3r0, 4sí qu3 01gá1s 3l s0n1d0 d3 l4 b0c1n4, t0d0 3l pu3bl0 gr1t4rá 4 gr4n v0z, y 3l mur0 d3 l4 c1ud4d c43rá; 3nt0nc3s sub1rá 3l pu3bl0, c4d4 un0 d3r3ch0 h4c14 4d3l4nt3. 6 Ll4m4nd0, pu3s, J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, l3s d1j0: Ll3v4d 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0, y s13t3 s4c3rd0t3s ll3v3n b0c1n4s d3 cu3rn0 d3 c4rn3r0 d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá. 7 Y d1j0 4l pu3bl0: P4s4d, y r0d34d l4 c1ud4d; y l0s qu3 3stán 4rm4d0s p4s4rán d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá. 

8 Y 4sí qu3 J0sué hub0 h4bl4d0 4l pu3bl0, l0s s13t3 s4c3rd0t3s, ll3v4nd0 l4s s13t3 b0c1n4s d3 cu3rn0 d3 c4rn3r0, p4s4r0n d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, y t0c4r0n l4s b0c1n4s; y 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá l0s s3guí4. 9 Y l0s h0mbr3s 4rm4d0s 1b4n d3l4nt3 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 t0c4b4n l4s b0c1n4s, y l4 r3t4gu4rd14 1b4 tr4s 3l 4rc4, m13ntr4s l4s b0c1n4s s0n4b4n c0nt1nu4m3nt3. 10 Y J0sué m4ndó 4l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: V0s0tr0s n0 gr1t4ré1s, n1 s3 01rá vu3str4 v0z, n1 s4ldrá p4l4br4 d3 vu3str4 b0c4, h4st4 3l dí4 qu3 y0 0s d1g4: Gr1t4d; 3nt0nc3s gr1t4ré1s. 11 4sí qu3 él h1z0 qu3 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá d13r4 un4 vu3lt4 4lr3d3d0r d3 l4 c1ud4d, y v0lv13r0n lu3g0 4l c4mp4m3nt0, y 4llí p4s4r0n l4 n0ch3. 

12 Y J0sué s3 l3v4ntó d3 m4ñ4n4, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s t0m4r0n 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá. 13 Y l0s s13t3 s4c3rd0t3s, ll3v4nd0 l4s s13t3 b0c1n4s d3 cu3rn0 d3 c4rn3r0, fu3r0n d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, 4nd4nd0 s13mpr3 y t0c4nd0 l4s b0c1n4s; y l0s h0mbr3s 4rm4d0s 1b4n d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, y l4 r3t4gu4rd14 1b4 tr4s 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, m13ntr4s l4s b0c1n4s t0c4b4n c0nt1nu4m3nt3. 14 4sí d13r0n 0tr4 vu3lt4 4 l4 c1ud4d 3l s3gund0 dí4, y v0lv13r0n 4l c4mp4m3nt0; y d3 3st4 m4n3r4 h1c13r0n dur4nt3 s31s dí4s. 

15 4l sépt1m0 dí4 s3 l3v4nt4r0n 4l d3spunt4r 3l 4lb4, y d13r0n vu3lt4 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 l4 m1sm4 m4n3r4 s13t3 v3c3s; s0l4m3nt3 3st3 dí4 d13r0n vu3lt4 4lr3d3d0r d3 3ll4 s13t3 v3c3s. 16 Y cu4nd0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s t0c4r0n l4s b0c1n4s l4 sépt1m4 v3z, J0sué d1j0 4l pu3bl0: Gr1t4d, p0rqu3 J3h0vá 0s h4 3ntr3g4d0 l4 c1ud4d. 17 Y s3rá l4 c1ud4d 4n4t3m4 4 J3h0vá, c0n t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 3stán 3n 3ll4; s0l4m3nt3 R4h4b l4 r4m3r4 v1v1rá, c0n t0d0s l0s qu3 3stén 3n c4s4 c0n 3ll4, p0r cu4nt0 3sc0nd1ó 4 l0s m3ns4j3r0s qu3 3nv14m0s. 18 P3r0 v0s0tr0s gu4rd40s d3l 4n4t3m4; n1 t0qué1s, n1 t0mé1s 4lgun4 c0s4 d3l 4n4t3m4, n0 s34 qu3 h4gá1s 4n4t3m4 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 1sr43l, y l0 turbé1s. 19 M4s t0d4 l4 pl4t4 y 3l 0r0, y l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 br0nc3 y d3 h13rr0, s34n c0ns4gr4d0s 4 J3h0vá, y 3ntr3n 3n 3l t3s0r0 d3 J3h0vá. 20 0nt0nc3s 3l pu3bl0 gr1tó, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s t0c4r0n l4s b0c1n4s; y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 3l pu3bl0 hub0 0íd0 3l s0n1d0 d3 l4 b0c1n4, gr1tó c0n gr4n v0c3rí0, y 3l mur0 s3 d3rrumbó. 0l pu3bl0 sub1ó lu3g0 4 l4 c1ud4d, c4d4 un0 d3r3ch0 h4c14 4d3l4nt3, y l4 t0m4r0n. 21 Y d3struy3r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4 t0d0 l0 qu3 3n l4 c1ud4d h4bí4; h0mbr3s y muj3r3s, jóv3n3s y v13j0s, h4st4 l0s bu3y3s, l4s 0v3j4s, y l0s 4sn0s. 

22 M4s J0sué d1j0 4 l0s d0s h0mbr3s qu3 h4bí4n r3c0n0c1d0 l4 t13rr4: 0ntr4d 3n c4s4 d3 l4 muj3r r4m3r4, y h4c3d s4l1r d3 4llí 4 l4 muj3r y 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 fu3r3 suy0, c0m0 l0 jur4st31s. 23 Y l0s 3spí4s 3ntr4r0n y s4c4r0n 4 R4h4b, 4 su p4dr3, 4 su m4dr3, 4 sus h3rm4n0s y t0d0 l0 qu3 3r4 suy0; y t4mb1én s4c4r0n 4 t0d4 su p4r3nt3l4, y l0s pus13r0n fu3r4 d3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 1sr43l. 24 Y c0nsum13r0n c0n fu3g0 l4 c1ud4d, y t0d0 l0 qu3 3n 3ll4 h4bí4; s0l4m3nt3 pus13r0n 3n 3l t3s0r0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá l4 pl4t4 y 3l 0r0, y l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 br0nc3 y d3 h13rr0. 25 M4s J0sué s4lvó l4 v1d4 4 R4h4b l4 r4m3r4, y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3, y 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 3ll4 t3ní4; y h4b1tó 3ll4 3ntr3 l0s 1sr43l1t4s h4st4 h0y, p0r cu4nt0 3sc0nd1ó 4 l0s m3ns4j3r0s qu3 J0sué h4bí4 3nv14d0 4 r3c0n0c3r 4 J3r1có. 

26 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 h1z0 J0sué un jur4m3nt0, d1c13nd0: M4ld1t0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3l h0mbr3 qu3 s3 l3v4nt4r3 y r33d1f1c4r3 3st4 c1ud4d d3 J3r1có. S0br3 su pr1m0gén1t0 3ch3 l0s c1m13nt0s d3 3ll4, y s0br3 su h1j0 m3n0r 4s13nt3 sus pu3rt4s. 

27 0st4b4, pu3s, J3h0vá c0n J0sué, y su n0mbr3 s3 d1vulgó p0r t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 

0l p3c4d0 d3 4cán

J0SUÉ 7

1 P3r0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0m3t13r0n un4 pr3v4r1c4c1ón 3n cu4nt0 4l 4n4t3m4; p0rqu3 4cán h1j0 d3 C4rm1, h1j0 d3 Z4bd1, h1j0 d3 Z3r4, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Judá, t0mó d3l 4n4t3m4; y l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd1ó c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

2 D3spués J0sué 3nv1ó h0mbr3s d3sd3 J3r1có 4 H41, qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4 B3t-4vén h4c14 3l 0r13nt3 d3 B3t-3l; y l3s h4bló d1c13nd0: Sub1d y r3c0n0c3d l4 t13rr4. Y 3ll0s sub13r0n y r3c0n0c13r0n 4 H41. 3 Y v0lv13nd0 4 J0sué, l3 d1j3r0n: N0 sub4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, s1n0 sub4n c0m0 d0s m1l 0 tr3s m1l h0mbr3s, y t0m4rán 4 H41; n0 f4t1gu3s 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 y3nd0 4llí, p0rqu3 s0n p0c0s. 4 Y sub13r0n 4llá d3l pu3bl0 c0m0 tr3s m1l h0mbr3s, l0s cu4l3s huy3r0n d3l4nt3 d3 l0s d3 H41. 5 Y l0s d3 H41 m4t4r0n d3 3ll0s 4 un0s tr31nt4 y s31s h0mbr3s, y l0s s1gu13r0n d3sd3 l4 pu3rt4 h4st4 S3b4r1m, y l0s d3rr0t4r0n 3n l4 b4j4d4; p0r l0 cu4l 3l c0r4zón d3l pu3bl0 d3sf4ll3c1ó y v1n0 4 s3r c0m0 4gu4. 

6 0nt0nc3s J0sué r0mp1ó sus v3st1d0s, y s3 p0stró 3n t13rr4 s0br3 su r0str0 d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá h4st4 c43r l4 t4rd3, él y l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l; y 3ch4r0n p0lv0 s0br3 sus c4b3z4s. 7 Y J0sué d1j0: ¡4h, S3ñ0r J3h0vá! ¿P0r qué h1c1st3 p4s4r 4 3st3 pu3bl0 3l J0rdán, p4r4 3ntr3g4rn0s 3n l4s m4n0s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, p4r4 qu3 n0s d3struy4n? ¡0j4lá n0s hub1ér4m0s qu3d4d0 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán! 8 ¡4y, S3ñ0r! ¿qué d1ré, y4 qu3 1sr43l h4 vu3lt0 l4 3sp4ld4 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s? 9 P0rqu3 l0s c4n4n30s y t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4 01rán, y n0s r0d34rán, y b0rr4rán nu3str0 n0mbr3 d3 s0br3 l4 t13rr4; y 3nt0nc3s, ¿qué h4rás tú 4 tu gr4nd3 n0mbr3? 

10 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 J0sué: L3vánt4t3; ¿p0r qué t3 p0str4s 4sí s0br3 tu r0str0? 11 1sr43l h4 p3c4d0, y 4un h4n qu3br4nt4d0 m1 p4ct0 qu3 y0 l3s m4ndé; y t4mb1én h4n t0m4d0 d3l 4n4t3m4, y h4st4 h4n hurt4d0, h4n m3nt1d0, y 4un l0 h4n gu4rd4d0 3ntr3 sus 3ns3r3s. 12 P0r 3st0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l n0 p0drán h4c3r fr3nt3 4 sus 3n3m1g0s, s1n0 qu3 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s v0lv3rán l4 3sp4ld4, p0r cu4nt0 h4n v3n1d0 4 s3r 4n4t3m4; n1 3st4ré más c0n v0s0tr0s, s1 n0 d3struy3r31s 3l 4n4t3m4 d3 3n m3d10 d3 v0s0tr0s. 13 L3vánt4t3, s4nt1f1c4 4l pu3bl0, y d1: S4nt1f1c40s p4r4 m4ñ4n4; p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l d1c3 4sí: 4n4t3m4 h4y 3n m3d10 d3 t1, 1sr43l; n0 p0drás h4c3r fr3nt3 4 tus 3n3m1g0s, h4st4 qu3 h4yá1s qu1t4d0 3l 4n4t3m4 d3 3n m3d10 d3 v0s0tr0s. 14 0s 4c3rc4ré1s, pu3s, m4ñ4n4 p0r vu3str4s tr1bus; y l4 tr1bu qu3 J3h0vá t0m4r3, s3 4c3rc4rá p0r sus f4m1l14s; y l4 f4m1l14 qu3 J3h0vá t0m4r3, s3 4c3rc4rá p0r sus c4s4s; y l4 c4s4 qu3 J3h0vá t0m4r3, s3 4c3rc4rá p0r l0s v4r0n3s; 15 y 3l qu3 fu3r3 s0rpr3nd1d0 3n 3l 4n4t3m4, s3rá qu3m4d0, él y t0d0 l0 qu3 t13n3, p0r cu4nt0 h4 qu3br4nt4d0 3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, y h4 c0m3t1d0 m4ld4d 3n 1sr43l. 


16 J0sué, pu3s, l3v4ntánd0s3 d3 m4ñ4n4, h1z0 4c3rc4r 4 1sr43l p0r sus tr1bus; y fu3 t0m4d4 l4 tr1bu d3 Judá. 17 Y h4c13nd0 4c3rc4r 4 l4 tr1bu d3 Judá, fu3 t0m4d4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s d3 Z3r4; y h4c13nd0 lu3g0 4c3rc4r 4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s d3 Z3r4 p0r l0s v4r0n3s, fu3 t0m4d0 Z4bd1. 18 H1z0 4c3rc4r su c4s4 p0r l0s v4r0n3s, y fu3 t0m4d0 4cán h1j0 d3 C4rm1, h1j0 d3 Z4bd1, h1j0 d3 Z3r4, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Judá. 19 0nt0nc3s J0sué d1j0 4 4cán: H1j0 mí0, d4 gl0r14 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l, y d4l3 4l4b4nz4, y d3clár4m3 4h0r4 l0 qu3 h4s h3ch0; n0 m3 l0 3ncubr4s. 20 Y 4cán r3sp0nd1ó 4 J0sué d1c13nd0: V3rd4d3r4m3nt3 y0 h3 p3c4d0 c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l, y 4sí y 4sí h3 h3ch0. 21 Pu3s v1 3ntr3 l0s d3sp0j0s un m4nt0 b4b1lón1c0 muy bu3n0, y d0sc13nt0s s1cl0s d3 pl4t4, y un l1ng0t3 d3 0r0 d3 p3s0 d3 c1ncu3nt4 s1cl0s, l0 cu4l c0d1c1é y t0mé; y h3 4quí qu3 3stá 3sc0nd1d0 b4j0 t13rr4 3n m3d10 d3 m1 t13nd4, y 3l d1n3r0 d3b4j0 d3 3ll0. 

22 J0sué 3nt0nc3s 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s, l0s cu4l3s fu3r0n c0rr13nd0 4 l4 t13nd4; y h3 4quí 3st4b4 3sc0nd1d0 3n su t13nd4, y 3l d1n3r0 d3b4j0 d3 3ll0. 23 Y t0mánd0l0 d3 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13nd4, l0 tr4j3r0n 4 J0sué y 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y l0 pus13r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 24 0nt0nc3s J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, t0m4r0n 4 4cán h1j0 d3 Z3r4, 3l d1n3r0, 3l m4nt0, 3l l1ng0t3 d3 0r0, sus h1j0s, sus h1j4s, sus bu3y3s, sus 4sn0s, sus 0v3j4s, su t13nd4 y t0d0 cu4nt0 t3ní4, y l0 ll3v4r0n t0d0 4l v4ll3 d3 4c0r. 25 Y l3 d1j0 J0sué: ¿P0r qué n0s h4s turb4d0? 1 Cu4nd0 0y3r0n 3st4s c0s4s t0d0s l0s r3y3s qu3 3st4b4n 4 3st3 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 4sí 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s c0m0 3n l0s ll4n0s, y 3n t0d4 l4 c0st4 d3l M4r Gr4nd3 d3l4nt3 d3l Líb4n0, l0s h3t30s, 4m0rr30s, c4n4n30s, f3r3z30s, h3v30s y j3bus30s, 2 s3 c0nc3rt4r0n p4r4 p3l34r c0ntr4 J0sué 3 1sr43l. 

3 M4s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 G4b4ón, cu4nd0 0y3r0n l0 qu3 J0sué h4bí4 h3ch0 4 J3r1có y 4 H41, 4 us4r0n d3 4stuc14; pu3s fu3r0n y s3 f1ng13r0n 3mb4j4d0r3s, y t0m4r0n s4c0s v13j0s s0br3 sus 4sn0s, y cu3r0s v13j0s d3 v1n0, r0t0s y r3m3nd4d0s, 5 y z4p4t0s v13j0s y r3c0s1d0s 3n sus p13s, c0n v3st1d0s v13j0s s0br3 sí; y t0d0 3l p4n qu3 tr4í4n p4r4 3l c4m1n0 3r4 s3c0 y m0h0s0. 6 Y v1n13r0n 4 J0sué 4l c4mp4m3nt0 3n G1lg4l, y l3 d1j3r0n 4 él y 4 l0s d3 1sr43l: N0s0tr0s v3n1m0s d3 t13rr4 muy l3j4n4; h4c3d, pu3s, 4h0r4 4l14nz4 c0n n0s0tr0s. 7 Y l0s d3 1sr43l r3sp0nd13r0n 4 l0s h3v30s: Qu1zás h4b1tá1s 3n m3d10 d3 n0s0tr0s. ¿Cóm0, pu3s, p0dr3m0s h4c3r 4l14nz4 c0n v0s0tr0s? 8 0ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n 4 J0sué: N0s0tr0s s0m0s tus s13rv0s. Y J0sué l3s d1j0: ¿Qu1én3s s01s v0s0tr0s, y d3 dónd3 v3nís? 9 Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: Tus s13rv0s h4n v3n1d0 d3 t13rr4 muy l3j4n4, p0r c4us4 d3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá tu D10s; p0rqu3 h3m0s 0íd0 su f4m4, y t0d0 l0 qu3 h1z0 3n 0g1pt0, 10 y t0d0 l0 qu3 h1z0 4 l0s d0s r3y3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s qu3 3st4b4n 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán: 4 S3hón r3y d3 H3sbón, y 4 0g r3y d3 B4sán, qu3 3st4b4 3n 4st4r0t. 11 P0r l0 cu4l nu3str0s 4nc14n0s y t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 nu3str4 t13rr4 n0s d1j3r0n: T0m4d 3n vu3str4s m4n0s pr0v1s1ón p4r4 3l c4m1n0, 3 1d 4l 3ncu3ntr0 d3 3ll0s, y d3c1dl3s: N0s0tr0s s0m0s vu3str0s s13rv0s; h4c3d 4h0r4 4l14nz4 c0n n0s0tr0s. 12 0st3 nu3str0 p4n l0 t0m4m0s c4l13nt3 d3 nu3str4s c4s4s p4r4 3l c4m1n0 3l dí4 qu3 s4l1m0s p4r4 v3n1r 4 v0s0tr0s; y h3l0 4quí 4h0r4 y4 s3c0 y m0h0s0. 13 0st0s cu3r0s d3 v1n0 t4mb1én l0s ll3n4m0s nu3v0s; h3l0s 4quí y4 r0t0s; t4mb1én 3st0s nu3str0s v3st1d0s y nu3str0s z4p4t0s 3stán y4 v13j0s 4 c4us4 d3 l0 muy l4rg0 d3l c4m1n0. 14 Y l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l t0m4r0n d3 l4 pr0v1s10n3s d3 3ll0s, y n0 c0nsult4r0n 4 J3h0vá. 15 Y J0sué h1z0 p4z c0n 3ll0s, y c3l3bró c0n 3ll0s 4l14nz4 c0nc3d1énd0l3s l4 v1d4; y t4mb1én l0 jur4r0n l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón. 

16 P4s4d0s tr3s dí4s d3spués qu3 h1c13r0n 4l14nz4 c0n 3ll0s, 0y3r0n qu3 3r4n sus v3c1n0s, y qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s. 17 Y s4l13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y 4l t3rc3r dí4 ll3g4r0n 4 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 3ll0s; y sus c1ud4d3s 3r4n G4b4ón, C4f1r4, B33r0t y Qu1r14t-j34r1m. 18 Y n0 l0s m4t4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, p0r cu4nt0 l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón l3s h4bí4n jur4d0 p0r J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l. Y t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón murmur4b4 c0ntr4 l0s prínc1p3s. 19 M4s t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s r3sp0nd13r0n 4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón: N0s0tr0s l3s h3m0s jur4d0 p0r J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l; p0r t4nt0, 4h0r4 n0 l3s p0d3m0s t0c4r. 20 0st0 h4r3m0s c0n 3ll0s: l3s d3j4r3m0s v1v1r, p4r4 qu3 n0 v3ng4 1r4 s0br3 n0s0tr0s p0r c4us4 d3l jur4m3nt0 qu3 l3s h3m0s h3ch0. 21 D1j3r0n, pu3s, d3 3ll0s l0s prínc1p3s: D3j4dl0s v1v1r; y fu3r0n c0nst1tu1d0s l3ñ4d0r3s y 4gu4d0r3s p4r4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, c0nc3d1énd0l3s l4 v1d4, s3gún l3s h4bí4n pr0m3t1d0 l0s prínc1p3s. 

22 Y ll4mánd0l0s J0sué, l3s h4bló d1c13nd0: ¿P0r qué n0s h4bé1s 3ng4ñ4d0, d1c13nd0: H4b1t4m0s muy l3j0s d3 v0s0tr0s, s13nd0 4sí qu3 m0rá1s 3n m3d10 d3 n0s0tr0s? 23 4h0r4, pu3s, m4ld1t0s s01s, y n0 d3j4rá d3 h4b3r d3 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s s13rv0s, y qu13n c0rt3 l4 l3ñ4 y s4qu3 3l 4gu4 p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 D10s. 24 Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n 4 J0sué y d1j3r0n: C0m0 fu3 d4d0 4 3nt3nd3r 4 tus s13rv0s qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés su s13rv0 qu3 0s h4bí4 d3 d4r t0d4 l4 t13rr4, y qu3 h4bí4 d3 d3stru1r 4 t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, p0r 3st0 t3m1m0s 3n gr4n m4n3r4 p0r nu3str4s v1d4s 4 c4us4 d3 v0s0tr0s, 3 h1c1m0s 3st0. 25 4h0r4, pu3s, h3n0s 4quí 3n tu m4n0; l0 qu3 t3 p4r3c13r3 bu3n0 y r3ct0 h4c3r d3 n0s0tr0s, h4zl0. 26 Y él l0 h1z0 4sí c0n 3ll0s; pu3s l0s l1bró d3 l4 m4n0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y n0 l0s m4t4r0n. 27 Y J0sué l0s d3st1nó 4qu3l dí4 4 s3r l3ñ4d0r3s y 4gu4d0r3s p4r4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, y p4r4 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá 3n 3l lug4r qu3 J3h0vá 3l1g13s3, l0 qu3 s0n h4st4 h0y.

1 Cu4nd0 4d0n1s3d3c r3y d3 J3rus4lén 0yó qu3 J0sué h4bí4 t0m4d0 4 H41, y qu3 l4 h4bí4 4s0l4d0 (c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 4 J3r1có y 4 su r3y, 4sí h1z0 4 H41 y 4 su r3y), y qu3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 G4b4ón h4bí4n h3ch0 p4z c0n l0s 1sr43l1t4s, y qu3 3st4b4n 3ntr3 3ll0s, 2 tuv0 gr4n t3m0r; p0rqu3 G4b4ón 3r4 un4 gr4n c1ud4d, c0m0 un4 d3 l4s c1ud4d3s r34l3s, y m4y0r qu3 H41, y t0d0s sus h0mbr3s 3r4n fu3rt3s. 3 P0r l0 cu4l 4d0n1s3d3c r3y d3 J3rus4lén 3nv1ó 4 H0h4m r3y d3 H3brón, 4 P1r34m r3y d3 J4rmut, 4 J4fí4 r3y d3 L4qu1s y 4 D3b1r r3y d3 0glón, d1c13nd0: 4 Sub1d 4 mí y 4yud4dm3, y c0mb4t4m0s 4 G4b4ón; p0rqu3 h4 h3ch0 p4z c0n J0sué y c0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 5 Y c1nc0 r3y3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, 3l r3y d3 J3rus4lén, 3l r3y d3 H3brón, 3l r3y d3 J4rmut, 3l r3y d3 L4qu1s y 3l r3y d3 0glón, s3 junt4r0n y sub13r0n, 3ll0s c0n t0d0s sus 3jérc1t0s, y 4c4mp4r0n c3rc4 d3 G4b4ón, y p3l34r0n c0ntr4 3ll4. 

6 0nt0nc3s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 G4b4ón 3nv14r0n 4 d3c1r 4 J0sué 4l c4mp4m3nt0 3n G1lg4l: N0 n13gu3s 4yud4 4 tus s13rv0s; sub3 pr0nt4m3nt3 4 n0s0tr0s p4r4 d3f3nd3rn0s y 4yud4rn0s; p0rqu3 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s s3 h4n un1d0 c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s. 7 Y sub1ó J0sué d3 G1lg4l, él y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 gu3rr4 c0n él, y t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s v4l13nt3s. 8 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 J0sué: N0 t3ng4s t3m0r d3 3ll0s; p0rqu3 y0 l0s h3 3ntr3g4d0 3n tu m4n0, y n1ngun0 d3 3ll0s pr3v4l3c3rá d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 9 Y J0sué v1n0 4 3ll0s d3 r3p3nt3, h4b13nd0 sub1d0 t0d4 l4 n0ch3 d3sd3 G1lg4l. 10 Y J3h0vá l0s ll3nó d3 c0nst3rn4c1ón d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l, y l0s h1r1ó c0n gr4n m0rt4nd4d 3n G4b4ón; y l0s s1gu1ó p0r 3l c4m1n0 qu3 sub3 4 B3t-h0rón, y l0s h1r1ó h4st4 4z3c4 y M4c3d4. 11 Y m13ntr4s 1b4n huy3nd0 d3 l0s 1sr43l1t4s, 4 l4 b4j4d4 d3 B3t-h0rón, J3h0vá 4rr0jó d3sd3 3l c13l0 gr4nd3s p13dr4s s0br3 3ll0s h4st4 4z3c4, y mur13r0n; y fu3r0n más l0s qu3 mur13r0n p0r l4s p13dr4s d3l gr4n1z0, qu3 l0s qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l m4t4r0n 4 3sp4d4. 

12 0nt0nc3s J0sué h4bló 4 J3h0vá 3l dí4 3n qu3 J3h0vá 3ntr3gó 4l 4m0rr30 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y d1j0 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 l0s 1sr43l1t4s:

Y tú, lun4, 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 4j4lón. 
13 Y 3l s0l s3 d3tuv0 y l4 lun4 s3 p4ró, 
H4st4 qu3 l4 g3nt3 s3 hub0 v3ng4d0 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s. 

¿N0 3stá 3scr1t0 3st0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 J4s3r? Y 3l s0l s3 p4ró 3n m3d10 d3l c13l0, y n0 s3 4pr3suró 4 p0n3rs3 c4s1 un dí4 3nt3r0. 14 Y n0 hub0 dí4 c0m0 4qu3l, n1 4nt3s n1 d3spués d3 él, h4b13nd0 4t3nd1d0 J3h0vá 4 l4 v0z d3 un h0mbr3; p0rqu3 J3h0vá p3l34b4 p0r 1sr43l. 

15 Y J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, v0lv1ó 4l c4mp4m3nt0 3n G1lg4l. 

16 Y l0s c1nc0 r3y3s huy3r0n, y s3 3sc0nd13r0n 3n un4 cu3v4 3n M4c3d4. 17 Y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 J0sué qu3 l0s c1nc0 r3y3s h4bí4n s1d0 h4ll4d0s 3sc0nd1d0s 3n un4 cu3v4 3n M4c3d4. 18 0nt0nc3s J0sué d1j0: R0d4d gr4nd3s p13dr4s 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 cu3v4, y p0n3d h0mbr3s junt0 4 3ll4 p4r4 qu3 l0s gu4rd3n; 19 y v0s0tr0s n0 0s d3t3ngá1s, s1n0 s3gu1d 4 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s, y h3r1dl3s l4 r3t4gu4rd14, s1n d3j4rl3s 3ntr4r 3n sus c1ud4d3s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s l0s h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n vu3str4 m4n0. 20 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 J0sué y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4c4b4r0n d3 h3r1rl0s c0n gr4n m0rt4nd4d h4st4 d3stru1rl0s, l0s qu3 qu3d4r0n d3 3ll0s s3 m3t13r0n 3n l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s. 21 T0d0 3l pu3bl0 v0lv1ó s4n0 y s4lv0 4 J0sué, 4l c4mp4m3nt0 3n M4c3d4; n0 hub0 qu13n m0v13s3 su l3ngu4 c0ntr4 n1ngun0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

22 0nt0nc3s d1j0 J0sué: 4br1d l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 cu3v4, y s4c4d d3 3ll4 4 3s0s c1nc0 r3y3s. 23 Y l0 h1c13r0n 4sí, y s4c4r0n d3 l4 cu3v4 4 4qu3ll0s c1nc0 r3y3s: 4l r3y d3 J3rus4lén, 4l r3y d3 H3brón, 4l r3y d3 J4rmut, 4l r3y d3 L4qu1s y 4l r3y d3 0glón. 24 Y cu4nd0 l0s hub13r0n ll3v4d0 4 J0sué, ll4mó J0sué 4 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l, y d1j0 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l4 g3nt3 d3 gu3rr4 qu3 h4bí4n v3n1d0 c0n él: 4c3rc40s, y p0n3d vu3str0s p13s s0br3 l0s cu3ll0s d3 3st0s r3y3s. Y 3ll0s s3 4c3rc4r0n y pus13r0n sus p13s s0br3 l0s cu3ll0s d3 3ll0s. 25 Y J0sué l3s d1j0: N0 t3má1s, n1 0s 4t3m0r1cé1s; s3d fu3rt3s y v4l13nt3s, p0rqu3 4sí h4rá J3h0vá 4 t0d0s vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s c0ntr4 l0s cu4l3s p3l3á1s. 26 Y d3spués d3 3st0 J0sué l0s h1r1ó y l0s m4tó, y l0s h1z0 c0lg4r 3n c1nc0 m4d3r0s; y qu3d4r0n c0lg4d0s 3n l0s m4d3r0s h4st4 c43r l4 n0ch3. 27 Y cu4nd0 3l s0l s3 1b4 4 p0n3r, m4ndó J0sué qu3 l0s qu1t4s3n d3 l0s m4d3r0s, y l0s 3ch4s3n 3n l4 cu3v4 d0nd3 s3 h4bí4n 3sc0nd1d0; y pus13r0n gr4nd3s p13dr4s 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 cu3v4, l4s cu4l3s p3rm4n3c3n h4st4 h0y. 

28 0n 4qu3l m1sm0 dí4 t0mó J0sué 4 M4c3d4, y l4 h1r1ó 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, y m4tó 4 su r3y; p0r c0mpl3t0 l0s d3struyó, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 3n 3ll4 t3ní4 v1d4, s1n d3j4r n4d4; 3 h1z0 4l r3y d3 M4c3d4 c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 4l r3y d3 J3r1có. 

29 Y d3 M4c3d4 p4só J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, 4 L1bn4; y p3l3ó c0ntr4 L1bn4; 30 y J3h0vá l4 3ntr3gó t4mb1én 4 3ll4 y 4 su r3y 3n m4n0s d3 1sr43l; y l4 h1r1ó 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 3n 3ll4 t3ní4 v1d4, s1n d3j4r n4d4; 3 h1z0 4 su r3y d3 l4 m4n3r4 c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 4l r3y d3 J3r1có. 

31 Y J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, p4só d3 L1bn4 4 L4qu1s, y 4c4mpó c3rc4 d3 3ll4, y l4 c0mb4t1ó; 32 y J3h0vá 3ntr3gó 4 L4qu1s 3n m4n0 d3 1sr43l, y l4 t0mó 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, y l4 h1r1ó 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 3n 3ll4 t3ní4 v1d4, 4sí c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 3n L1bn4. 

33 0nt0nc3s H0r4m r3y d3 G3z3r sub1ó 3n 4yud4 d3 L4qu1s; m4s 4 él y 4 su pu3bl0 d3struyó J0sué, h4st4 n0 d3j4r 4 n1ngun0 d3 3ll0s. 

34 D3 L4qu1s p4só J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, 4 0glón; y 4c4mp4r0n c3rc4 d3 3ll4, y l4 c0mb4t13r0n; 35 y l4 t0m4r0n 3l m1sm0 dí4, y l4 h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4; y 4qu3l dí4 m4tó 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 3n 3ll4 t3ní4 v1d4, c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 3n L4qu1s. 

36 Sub1ó lu3g0 J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, d3 0glón 4 H3brón, y l4 c0mb4t13r0n. 37 Y t0mánd0l4, l4 h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, 4 su r3y y 4 t0d4s sus c1ud4d3s, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 3n 3ll4 t3ní4 v1d4, s1n d3j4r n4d4; c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 4 0glón, 4sí l4 d3struy3r0n c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 3n 3ll4 t3ní4 v1d4. 

38 D3spués v0lv1ó J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, s0br3 D3b1r, y c0mb4t1ó c0ntr4 3ll4; 39 y l4 t0mó, y 4 su r3y, y 4 t0d4s sus c1ud4d3s; y l4s h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, y d3struy3r0n t0d0 l0 qu3 4llí d3ntr0 t3ní4 v1d4, s1n d3j4r n4d4; c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 4 H3brón, y c0m0 h4bí4 h3ch0 4 L1bn4 y 4 su r3y, 4sí h1z0 4 D3b1r y 4 su r3y. 

40 H1r1ó, pu3s, J0sué t0d4 l4 r3g1ón d3 l4s m0nt4ñ4s, d3l N3gu3v, d3 l0s ll4n0s y d3 l4s l4d3r4s, y 4 t0d0s sus r3y3s, s1n d3j4r n4d4; t0d0 l0 qu3 t3ní4 v1d4 l0 m4tó, c0m0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l s3 l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0. 41 Y l0s h1r1ó J0sué d3sd3 C4d3s-b4rn34 h4st4 G4z4, y t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 G0sén h4st4 G4b4ón. 42 T0d0s 3st0s r3y3s y sus t13rr4s l0s t0mó J0sué d3 un4 v3z; p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l p3l34b4 p0r 1sr43l. 43 Y v0lv1ó J0sué, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, 4l c4mp4m3nt0 3n G1lg4l.

J0SUÉ 11

1 Cu4nd0 0yó 3st0 J4bín r3y d3 H4z0r, 3nv1ó m3ns4j3 4 J0b4b r3y d3 M4dón, 4l r3y d3 S1mrón, 4l r3y d3 4cs4f, 2 y 4 l0s r3y3s qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 r3g1ón d3l n0rt3 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s, y 3n 3l 4r4bá 4l sur d3 C1n3r3t, 3n l0s ll4n0s, y 3n l4s r3g10n3s d3 D0r 4l 0cc1d3nt3; 3 y 4l c4n4n30 qu3 3st4b4 4l 0r13nt3 y 4l 0cc1d3nt3, 4l 4m0rr30, 4l h3t30, 4l f3r3z30, 4l j3bus30 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s, y 4l h3v30 4l p13 d3 H3rmón 3n t13rr4 d3 M1zp4. 4 0st0s s4l13r0n, y c0n 3ll0s t0d0s sus 3jérc1t0s, much4 g3nt3, c0m0 l4 4r3n4 qu3 3stá 4 l4 0r1ll4 d3l m4r 3n mult1tud, c0n muchís1m0s c4b4ll0s y c4rr0s d3 gu3rr4. 5 T0d0s 3st0s r3y3s s3 un13r0n, y v1n13r0n y 4c4mp4r0n un1d0s junt0 4 l4s 4gu4s d3 M3r0m, p4r4 p3l34r c0ntr4 1sr43l. 

6 M4s J3h0vá d1j0 4 J0sué: N0 t3ng4s t3m0r d3 3ll0s, p0rqu3 m4ñ4n4 4 3st4 h0r4 y0 3ntr3g4ré 4 t0d0s 3ll0s mu3rt0s d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l; d3sj4rr3t4rás sus c4b4ll0s, y sus c4rr0s qu3m4rás 4 fu3g0. 7 Y J0sué, y t0d4 l4 g3nt3 d3 gu3rr4 c0n él, v1n0 d3 r3p3nt3 c0ntr4 3ll0s junt0 4 l4s 4gu4s d3 M3r0m. 8 Y l0s 3ntr3gó J3h0vá 3n m4n0s d3 1sr43l, y l0s h1r13r0n y l0s s1gu13r0n h4st4 S1dón l4 gr4nd3 y h4st4 M1sr3f0tm41m, y h4st4 3l ll4n0 d3 M1zp4 4l 0r13nt3, h1r1énd0l0s h4st4 qu3 n0 l3s d3j4r0n n1ngun0. 9 Y J0sué h1z0 c0n 3ll0s c0m0 J3h0vá l3 h4bí4 m4nd4d0: d3sj4rr3tó sus c4b4ll0s, y sus c4rr0s qu3mó 4 fu3g0. 

10 Y v0lv13nd0 J0sué, t0mó 3n 3l m1sm0 t13mp0 4 H4z0r, y m4tó 4 3sp4d4 4 su r3y; pu3s H4z0r h4bí4 s1d0 4nt3s c4b3z4 d3 t0d0s 3st0s r31n0s. 11 Y m4t4r0n 4 3sp4d4 t0d0 cu4nt0 3n 3ll4 t3ní4 v1d4, d3struyénd0l0 p0r c0mpl3t0, s1n qu3d4r n4d4 qu3 r3sp1r4s3; y 4 H4z0r pus13r0n fu3g0. 12 4s1m1sm0 t0mó J0sué t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 4qu3ll0s r3y3s, y 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 3ll4s, y l0s h1r1ó 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, y l0s d3struyó, c0m0 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0. 13 P3r0 4 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 3st4b4n s0br3 c0l1n4s, n0 l4s qu3mó 1sr43l; ún1c4m3nt3 4 H4z0r qu3mó J0sué. 14 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l t0m4r0n p4r4 sí t0d0 3l b0tín y l4s b3st14s d3 4qu3ll4s c1ud4d3s; m4s 4 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4 h4st4 d3stru1rl0s, s1n d3j4r 4lgun0 c0n v1d4. 15 D3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés su s13rv0, 4sí M01sés l0 m4ndó 4 J0sué; y 4sí J0sué l0 h1z0, s1n qu1t4r p4l4br4 d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés.

T13rr4 4ún s1n c0nqu1st4r
