1 S13nd0 J0sué y4 v13j0, 3ntr4d0 3n 4ñ0s, J3h0vá l3 d1j0: Tú 3r3s y4 v13j0, d3 3d4d 4v4nz4d4, y qu3d4 4ún much4 t13rr4 p0r p0s33r. 2 0st4 3s l4 t13rr4 qu3 qu3d4: t0d0s l0s t3rr1t0r10s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y t0d0s l0s d3 l0s g3sur30s; 3 d3sd3 S1h0r, qu3 3stá 4l 0r13nt3 d3 0g1pt0, h4st4 3l lím1t3 d3 0crón 4l n0rt3, qu3 s3 c0ns1d3r4 d3 l0s c4n4n30s; d3 l0s c1nc0 prínc1p3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, 3l g4z30, 3l 4sd0d30, 3l 4sc4l0n30, 3l g3t30 y 3l 3cr0n30; t4mb1én l0s 4v30s; 4 4l sur t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s c4n4n30s, y M3h4r4, qu3 3s d3 l0s s1d0n10s, h4st4 4f3c, h4st4 l0s lím1t3s d3l 4m0rr30; 5 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s g1bl1t4s, y t0d0 3l Líb4n0 h4c14 d0nd3 s4l3 3l s0l, d3sd3 B44l-g4d 4l p13 d3l m0nt3 H3rmón, h4st4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 H4m4t; 6 t0d0s l0s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s d3sd3 3l Líb4n0 h4st4 M1sr3f0tm41m, t0d0s l0s s1d0n10s; y0 l0s 3xt3rm1n4ré d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; s0l4m3nt3 r3p4rt1rás tú p0r su3rt3 3l p4ís 4 l0s 1sr43l1t4s p0r h3r3d4d, c0m0 t3 h3 m4nd4d0. 7 R3p4rt3, pu3s, 4h0r4 3st4 t13rr4 3n h3r3d4d 4 l4s nu3v3 tr1bus, y 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés. 

8 P0rqu3 l0s rub3n1t4s y g4d1t4s y l4 0tr4 m1t4d d3 M4n4sés r3c1b13r0n y4 su h3r3d4d, l4 cu4l l3s d10 M01sés 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán 4l 0r13nt3, s3gún s3 l4 d10 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá; 9 d3sd3 4r03r, qu3 3stá 4 l4 0r1ll4 d3l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón, y l4 c1ud4d qu3 3stá 3n m3d10 d3l v4ll3, y t0d4 l4 ll4nur4 d3 M3d3b4, h4st4 D1bón; 10 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 S3hón r3y d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, 3l cu4l r31nó 3n H3sbón, h4st4 l0s lím1t3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món; 11 y G4l44d, y l0s t3rr1t0r10s d3 l0s g3sur30s y d3 l0s m44c4t30s, y t0d0 3l m0nt3 H3rmón, y t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 B4sán h4st4 S4lc4; 12 t0d0 3l r31n0 d3 0g 3n B4sán, 3l cu4l r31nó 3n 4st4r0t y 3n 0dr31, 3l cu4l h4bí4 qu3d4d0 d3l r3st0 d3 l0s r3f4ít4s; pu3s M01sés l0s d3rr0tó, y l0s 3chó. 13 M4s 4 l0s g3sur30s y 4 l0s m44c4t30s n0 l0s 3ch4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, s1n0 qu3 G3sur y M44c4 h4b1t4r0n 3ntr3 l0s 1sr43l1t4s h4st4 h0y. 

0l t3rr1t0r10 qu3 d1str1buyó M01sés

14 P3r0 4 l4 tr1bu d3 L3ví n0 d10 h3r3d4d; l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l s0n su h3r3d4d, c0m0 él l3s h4bí4 d1ch0. 

15 D10, pu3s, M01sés 4 l4 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s. 16 Y fu3 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 3ll0s d3sd3 4r03r, qu3 3stá 4 l4 0r1ll4 d3l 4rr0y0 d3 4rnón, y l4 c1ud4d qu3 3stá 3n m3d10 d3l v4ll3, y t0d4 l4 ll4nur4 h4st4 M3d3b4; 17 H3sbón, c0n t0d4s sus c1ud4d3s qu3 3stán 3n l4 ll4nur4; D1bón, B4m0t-b44l, B3t-b44l-m3ón, 18 J4h4z4, C4d3m0t, M3f44t, 19 Qu1r14t41m, S1bm4, Z4r3t-s4h4r 3n 3l m0nt3 d3l v4ll3, 20 B3t-p30r, l4s l4d3r4s d3 P1sg4, B3t-j3s1m0t, 21 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 ll4nur4, y t0d0 3l r31n0 d3 S3hón r3y d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, qu3 r31nó 3n H3sbón, 4l cu4l d3rr0tó M01sés, y 4 l0s prínc1p3s d3 M4d1án, 0v1, R3qu3m, Zur, Hur y R3b4, prínc1p3s d3 S3hón qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n 4qu3ll4 t13rr4. 22 T4mb1én m4t4r0n 4 3sp4d4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 B4l44m 3l 4d1v1n0, h1j0 d3 B30r, 3ntr3 l0s d3más qu3 m4t4r0n. 23 Y 3l J0rdán fu3 3l lím1t3 d3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén. 0st4 fu3 l4 h3r3d4d d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s, 3st4s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

24 D10 4s1m1sm0 M01sés 4 l4 tr1bu d3 G4d, 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d, c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s. 25 0l t3rr1t0r10 d3 3ll0s fu3 J4z3r, y t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 G4l44d, y l4 m1t4d d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món h4st4 4r03r, qu3 3stá 3nfr3nt3 d3 R4bá. 26 Y d3sd3 H3sbón h4st4 R4m4t-m1zp4, y B3t0n1m; y d3sd3 M4h4n41m h4st4 3l lím1t3 d3 D3b1r; 27 y 3n 3l v4ll3, B3t-4r4m, B3t-n1mr4, Suc0t y Z4fón, r3st0 d3l r31n0 d3 S3hón r3y d3 H3sbón; 3l J0rdán y su lím1t3 h4st4 3l 3xtr3m0 d3l m4r d3 C1n3r3t 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 4l 0r13nt3. 28 0st4 3s l4 h3r3d4d d3 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d p0r sus f4m1l14s, 3st4s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

29 T4mb1én d10 M01sés h3r3d4d 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés; y fu3 p4r4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés, c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s. 30 0l t3rr1t0r10 d3 3ll0s fu3 d3sd3 M4h4n41m, t0d0 B4sán, t0d0 3l r31n0 d3 0g r3y d3 B4sán, y t0d4s l4s 4ld34s d3 J41r qu3 3stán 3n B4sán, s3s3nt4 p0bl4c10n3s, 31 y l4 m1t4d d3 G4l44d, y 4st4r0t y 0dr31, c1ud4d3s d3l r31n0 d3 0g 3n B4sán, p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 M4qu1r h1j0 d3 M4n4sés, p4r4 l4 m1t4d d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M4qu1r c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s.

1 0st0, pu3s, 3s l0 qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l t0m4r0n p0r h3r3d4d 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, l0 cu4l l3s r3p4rt13r0n 3l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r, J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun, y l0s c4b3z4s d3 l0s p4dr3s d3 l4s tr1bus d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 2 P0r su3rt3 s3 l3s d10 su h3r3d4d, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés qu3 s3 d13r4 4 l4s nu3v3 tr1bus y 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu. 3 P0rqu3 4 l4s d0s tr1bus y 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu l3s h4bí4 d4d0 M01sés h3r3d4d 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán; m4s 4 l0s l3v1t4s n0 l3s d10 h3r3d4d 3ntr3 3ll0s. 4 P0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé fu3r0n d0s tr1bus, M4n4sés y 0fr4ín; y n0 d13r0n p4rt3 4 l0s l3v1t4s 3n l4 t13rr4 s1n0 c1ud4d3s 3n qu3 m0r4s3n, c0n l0s 3j1d0s d3 3ll4s p4r4 sus g4n4d0s y r3b4ñ0s. 5 D3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 M01sés, 4sí l0 h1c13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n 3l r3p4rt1m13nt0 d3 l4 t13rr4. 

C4l3b r3c1b3 H3brón

6 Y l0s h1j0s d3 Judá v1n13r0n 4 J0sué 3n G1lg4l; y C4l3b, h1j0 d3 J3f0n3 c3n3z30, l3 d1j0: Tú s4b3s l0 qu3 J3h0vá d1j0 4 M01sés, v4rón d3 D10s, 3n C4d3s-b4rn34, t0c4nt3 4 mí y 4 t1. 7 Y0 3r4 d3 3d4d d3 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s cu4nd0 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá m3 3nv1ó d3 C4d3s-b4rn34 4 r3c0n0c3r l4 t13rr4; y y0 l3 tr4j3 n0t1c14s c0m0 l0 s3ntí4 3n m1 c0r4zón. 8 Y m1s h3rm4n0s, l0s qu3 h4bí4n sub1d0 c0nm1g0, h1c13r0n d3sf4ll3c3r 3l c0r4zón d3l pu3bl0; p3r0 y0 cumplí s1gu13nd0 4 J3h0vá m1 D10s. 9 0nt0nc3s M01sés juró d1c13nd0: C13rt4m3nt3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 h0lló tu p13 s3rá p4r4 t1, y p4r4 tus h1j0s 3n h3r3nc14 p3rp3tu4, p0r cu4nt0 cumpl1st3 s1gu13nd0 4 J3h0vá m1 D10s. 10 4h0r4 b13n, J3h0vá m3 h4 h3ch0 v1v1r, c0m0 él d1j0, 3st0s cu4r3nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s, d3sd3 3l t13mp0 qu3 J3h0vá h4bló 3st4s p4l4br4s 4 M01sés, cu4nd0 1sr43l 4nd4b4 p0r 3l d3s13rt0; y 4h0r4, h3 4quí, h0y s0y d3 3d4d d3 0ch3nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s. 11 T0d4ví4 3st0y t4n fu3rt3 c0m0 3l dí4 qu3 M01sés m3 3nv1ó; cu4l 3r4 m1 fu3rz4 3nt0nc3s, t4l 3s 4h0r4 m1 fu3rz4 p4r4 l4 gu3rr4, y p4r4 s4l1r y p4r4 3ntr4r. 12 D4m3, pu3s, 4h0r4 3st3 m0nt3, d3l cu4l h4bló J3h0vá 4qu3l dí4; p0rqu3 tú 0íst3 3n 4qu3l dí4 qu3 l0s 4n4c30s 3stán 4llí, y qu3 h4y c1ud4d3s gr4nd3s y f0rt1f1c4d4s. Qu1zá J3h0vá 3st4rá c0nm1g0, y l0s 3ch4ré, c0m0 J3h0vá h4 d1ch0. 

13 J0sué 3nt0nc3s l3 b3nd1j0, y d10 4 C4l3b h1j0 d3 J3f0n3 4 H3brón p0r h3r3d4d. 14 P0r t4nt0, H3brón v1n0 4 s3r h3r3d4d d3 C4l3b h1j0 d3 J3f0n3 c3n3z30, h4st4 h0y, p0r cu4nt0 h4bí4 s3gu1d0 cumpl1d4m3nt3 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 15 M4s 3l n0mbr3 d3 H3brón fu3 4nt3s Qu1r14t-4rb4; p0rqu3 4rb4 fu3 un h0mbr3 gr4nd3 3ntr3 l0s 4n4c30s. Y l4 t13rr4 d3sc4nsó d3 l4 gu3rr4. 

0l t3rr1t0r10 d3 Judá

J0SUÉ 15

1 L4 p4rt3 qu3 t0có 3n su3rt3 4 l4 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá, c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s, ll3g4b4 h4st4 l4 fr0nt3r4 d3 0d0m, t3n13nd0 3l d3s13rt0 d3 Z1n 4l sur c0m0 3xtr3m0 m3r1d10n4l. 2 Y su lím1t3 p0r 3l l4d0 d3l sur fu3 d3sd3 l4 c0st4 d3l M4r S4l4d0, d3sd3 l4 b4hí4 qu3 m1r4 h4c14 3l sur; 3 y s4lí4 h4c14 3l sur d3 l4 sub1d4 d3 4cr4b1m, p4s4nd0 h4st4 Z1n; y sub13nd0 p0r 3l sur h4st4 C4d3s-b4rn34, p4s4b4 4 H3zrón, y sub13nd0 p0r 4d4r d4b4 vu3lt4 4 C4rc4. 4 D3 4llí p4s4b4 4 4smón, y s4lí4 4l 4rr0y0 d3 0g1pt0, y t3rm1n4b4 3n 3l m4r. 0st3, pu3s, 0s s3rá 3l lím1t3 d3l sur. 5 0l lím1t3 0r13nt4l 3s 3l M4r S4l4d0 h4st4 l4 d3s3mb0c4dur4 d3l J0rdán. Y 3l lím1t3 d3l l4d0 d3l n0rt3, d3sd3 l4 b4hí4 d3l m4r 3n l4 d3s3mb0c4dur4 d3l J0rdán; 6 y sub3 3st3 lím1t3 p0r B3t-h0gl4, y p4s4 4l n0rt3 d3 B3t-4r4bá, y d3 4quí sub3 4 l4 p13dr4 d3 B0hán h1j0 d3 Rubén. 7 Lu3g0 sub3 4 D3b1r d3sd3 3l v4ll3 d3 4c0r; y 4l n0rt3 m1r4 s0br3 G1lg4l, qu3 3stá 3nfr3nt3 d3 l4 sub1d4 d3 4dumín, qu3 3stá 4l sur d3l 4rr0y0; y p4s4 h4st4 l4s 4gu4s d3 0n-s3m3s, y s4l3 4 l4 fu3nt3 d3 R0g3l. 8 Y sub3 3st3 lím1t3 p0r 3l v4ll3 d3l h1j0 d3 H1n0m 4l l4d0 sur d3l j3bus30, qu3 3s J3rus4lén. Lu3g0 sub3 p0r l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3 qu3 3stá 3nfr3nt3 d3l v4ll3 d3 H1n0m h4c14 3l 0cc1d3nt3, 3l cu4l 3stá 4l 3xtr3m0 d3l v4ll3 d3 R3f41m, p0r 3l l4d0 d3l n0rt3. 9 Y r0d34 3st3 lím1t3 d3sd3 l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3 h4st4 l4 fu3nt3 d3 l4s 4gu4s d3 N3ft04, y s4l3 4 l4s c1ud4d3s d3l m0nt3 d3 0frón, r0d34nd0 lu3g0 4 B44l4, qu3 3s Qu1r14t-j34r1m. 10 D3spués g1r4 3st3 lím1t3 d3sd3 B44l4 h4c14 3l 0cc1d3nt3 4l m0nt3 d3 S31r; y p4s4 4l l4d0 d3l m0nt3 d3 J34r1m h4c14 3l n0rt3, 3l cu4l 3s Qu3s4lón, y d3sc13nd3 4 B3t-s3m3s, y p4s4 4 T1mn4. 11 S4l3 lu3g0 4l l4d0 d3 0crón h4c14 3l n0rt3; y r0d34 4 S1crón, y p4s4 p0r 3l m0nt3 d3 B44l4, y s4l3 4 J4bn33l y t3rm1n4 3n 3l m4r. 12 0l lím1t3 d3l 0cc1d3nt3 3s 3l M4r Gr4nd3. 0st3 fu3 3l lím1t3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá, p0r t0d0 3l c0nt0rn0, c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s. 

C4l3b c0nqu1st4 H3brón y D3b1r

(Ju3. 1.10-15)

13 M4s 4 C4l3b h1j0 d3 J3f0n3 d10 su p4rt3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4m13nt0 d3 J3h0vá 4 J0sué; l4 c1ud4d d3 Qu1r14t-4rb4 p4dr3 d3 4n4c, qu3 3s H3brón. 14 Y C4l3b 3chó d3 4llí 4 l0s tr3s h1j0s d3 4n4c, 4 S3s41, 4h1mán y T4lm41, h1j0s d3 4n4c. 15 D3 4quí sub1ó c0ntr4 l0s qu3 m0r4b4n 3n D3b1r; y 3l n0mbr3 d3 D3b1r 3r4 4nt3s Qu1r14t-s3f3r. 16 Y d1j0 C4l3b: 4l qu3 4t4c4r3 4 Qu1r14t-s3f3r, y l4 t0m4r3, y0 l3 d4ré m1 h1j4 4cs4 p0r muj3r. 17 Y l4 t0mó 0t0n13l, h1j0 d3 C3n4z h3rm4n0 d3 C4l3b; y él l3 d10 su h1j4 4cs4 p0r muj3r. 18 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 l4 ll3v4b4, él l4 p3rsu4d1ó qu3 p1d13s3 4 su p4dr3 t13rr4s p4r4 l4br4r. 0ll4 3nt0nc3s s3 b4jó d3l 4sn0. Y C4l3b l3 d1j0: ¿Qué t13n3s? 19 Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: C0ncéd3m3 un d0n; pu3st0 qu3 m3 h4s d4d0 t13rr4 d3l N3gu3v, d4m3 t4mb1én fu3nt3s d3 4gu4s. 0l 3nt0nc3s l3 d10 l4s fu3nt3s d3 4rr1b4, y l4s d3 4b4j0. 

L4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá

20 0st4, pu3s, 3s l4 h3r3d4d d3 l4 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá p0r sus f4m1l14s. 21 Y fu3r0n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá 3n 3l 3xtr3m0 sur, h4c14 l4 fr0nt3r4 d3 0d0m: C4bs33l, 0d4r, J4gur, 22 C1n4, D1m0n4, 4d4d4, 23 C3d3s, H4z0r, 1tnán, 24 Z1f, T3l3m, B34l0t, 25 H4z0r-h4d4t4, Qu3r10t, H3zrón (qu3 3s H4z0r), 26 4m4m, S3m4, M0l4d4, 27 H4z4r-g4d4, H3smón, B3t-p3l3t, 28 H4z4r-su4l, B33rs3b4, B1z0t14, 29 B44l4, 11m, 0s3m, 30 0lt0l4d, Qu3s1l, H0rm4, 31 S1cl4g, M4dm4n4, S4ns4n4, 32 L3b40t, S1lh1m, 4ín y R1món; p0r t0d4s v31nt1nu3v3 c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

33 0n l4s ll4nur4s, 0st40l, Z0r4, 4s3n4, 34 Z4n04, 0n-g4n1m, T4pú4, 0n4m, 35 J4rmut, 4dul4m, S0c0, 4z3c4, 36 S44r41m, 4d1t41m, G3d3r4 y G3d3r0t41m; c4t0rc3 c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

37 Z3nán, H4d4s4, M1gd4l-g4d, 38 D1l3án, M1zp4, J0ct33l, 39 L4qu1s, B0sc4t, 0glón, 40 C4bón, L4hm4m, Qu1tl1s, 41 G3d3r0t, B3t-d4gón, N44m4 y M4c3d4; d13c1sé1s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

42 L1bn4, 0t3r, 4sán, 43 J1ft4, 4s3n4, N3z1b, 44 K31l4, 4cz1b y M4r3s4; nu3v3 c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

45 0crón c0n sus v1ll4s y sus 4ld34s. 46 D3sd3 0crón h4st4 3l m4r, t0d4s l4s qu3 3stán c3rc4 d3 4sd0d c0n sus 4ld34s. 

47 4sd0d c0n sus v1ll4s y sus 4ld34s; G4z4 c0n sus v1ll4s y sus 4ld34s h4st4 3l rí0 d3 0g1pt0, y 3l M4r Gr4nd3 c0n sus c0st4s. 

48 Y 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s, S4m1r, J4t1r, S0c0, 49 D4n4, Qu1r14t-s4n4 (qu3 3s D3b1r); 50 4n4b, 0st3m04, 4n1m, 51 G0sén, H0lón y G1l0; 0nc3 c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

52 4r4b, Dum4, 0sán, 53 J4num, B3t-t4pú4, 4f3c4, 54 Humt4, Qu1r14t-4rb4 (l4 cu4l 3s H3brón) y S10r; nu3v3 c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

55 M4ón, C4rm3l, Z1f, Jut4, 56 J3zr33l, J0cd34m, Z4n04, 57 C4ín, G4b44 y T1mn4; d13z c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s.

60 Qu1r14t-b44l (qu3 3s Qu1r14t-j34r1m) y R4bá; d0s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

61 0n 3l d3s13rt0, B3t-4r4bá, M1dín, S3c4c4, 62 N1bsán, l4 C1ud4d d3 l4 S4l y 0ng4d1; s31s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 

63 M4s 4 l0s j3bus30s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n J3rus4lén, l0s h1j0s d3 Judá n0 pud13r0n 4rr0j4rl0s; y h4 qu3d4d0 3l j3bus30 3n J3rus4lén c0n l0s h1j0s d3 Judá h4st4 h0y. 

T3rr1t0r10 d3 0fr4ín y d3 M4n4sés

J0SUÉ 16

1 T0có 3n su3rt3 4 l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé d3sd3 3l J0rdán d3 J3r1có h4st4 l4s 4gu4s d3 J3r1có h4c14 3l 0r13nt3, h4c14 3l d3s13rt0 qu3 sub3 d3 J3r1có p0r l4s m0nt4ñ4s d3 B3t-3l. 2 Y d3 B3t-3l s4l3 4 Luz, y p4s4 4 l0 l4rg0 d3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 l0s 4rqu1t4s h4st4 4t4r0t, 3 y b4j4 h4c14 3l 0cc1d3nt3 4l t3rr1t0r10 d3 l0s j4fl3t1t4s, h4st4 3l lím1t3 d3 B3t-h0rón l4 d3 4b4j0, y h4st4 G3z3r; y s4l3 4l m4r. 

4 R3c1b13r0n, pu3s, su h3r3d4d l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé, M4n4sés y 0fr4ín. 

5 Y 3n cu4nt0 4l t3rr1t0r10 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín p0r sus f4m1l14s, 3l lím1t3 d3 su h3r3d4d 4l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 fu3 d3sd3 4t4r0t-4d4r h4st4 B3t-h0rón l4 d3 4rr1b4. 6 C0nt1nú4 3l lím1t3 h4st4 3l m4r, y h4st4 M1cm3t4t 4l n0rt3, y d4 vu3lt4 h4c14 3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 T44n4t-s1l0, y d3 4quí p4s4 4 J4n04. 7 D3 J4n04 d3sc13nd3 4 4t4r0t y 4 N44r4t, y t0c4 J3r1có y s4l3 4l J0rdán. 8 Y d3 T4pú4 s3 vu3lv3 h4c14 3l m4r, 4l 4rr0y0 d3 C4ná, y s4l3 4l m4r. 0st4 3s l4 h3r3d4d d3 l4 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín p0r sus f4m1l14s. 9 Hub0 t4mb1én c1ud4d3s qu3 s3 4p4rt4r0n p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín 3n m3d10 d3 l4 h3r3d4d d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés, t0d4s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 4ld34s. 10 P3r0 n0 4rr0j4r0n 4l c4n4n30 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n G3z3r; 4nt3s qu3dó 3l c4n4n30 3n m3d10 d3 0fr4ín, h4st4 h0y, y fu3 tr1but4r10. 

J0SUÉ 17

1 S3 3ch4r0n t4mb1én su3rt3s p4r4 l4 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés, p0rqu3 fu3 pr1m0gén1t0 d3 J0sé. M4qu1r, pr1m0gén1t0 d3 M4n4sés y p4dr3 d3 G4l44d, 3l cu4l fu3 h0mbr3 d3 gu3rr4, tuv0 G4l44d y B4sán. 2 S3 3ch4r0n t4mb1én su3rt3s p4r4 l0s 0tr0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés c0nf0rm3 4 sus f4m1l14s: l0s h1j0s d3 4b13z3r, l0s h1j0s d3 H3l3c, l0s h1j0s d3 4sr13l, l0s h1j0s d3 S1qu3m, l0s h1j0s d3 H3f3r y l0s h1j0s d3 S3m1d4; ést0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s v4r0n3s d3 M4n4sés h1j0 d3 J0sé, p0r sus f4m1l14s. 

3 P3r0 Z3l0f3h4d h1j0 d3 H3f3r, h1j0 d3 G4l44d, h1j0 d3 M4qu1r, h1j0 d3 M4n4sés, n0 tuv0 h1j0s s1n0 h1j4s, l0s n0mbr3s d3 l4s cu4l3s s0n 3st0s: M44l4, N04, H0gl4, M1lc4 y T1rs4. 4 0st4s v1n13r0n d3l4nt3 d3l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r y d3 J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun, y d3 l0s prínc1p3s, y d1j3r0n: J3h0vá m4ndó 4 M01sés qu3 n0s d13s3 h3r3d4d 3ntr3 nu3str0s h3rm4n0s. Y él l3s d10 h3r3d4d 3ntr3 l0s h3rm4n0s d3l p4dr3 d3 3ll4s, c0nf0rm3 4l d1ch0 d3 J3h0vá. 5 Y l3 t0c4r0n 4 M4n4sés d13z p4rt3s 4d3más d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d y d3 B4sán qu3 3stá 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 6 p0rqu3 l4s h1j4s d3 M4n4sés tuv13r0n h3r3d4d 3ntr3 sus h1j0s; y l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d fu3 d3 l0s 0tr0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés. 

7 Y fu3 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 M4n4sés d3sd3 4s3r h4st4 M1cm3t4t, qu3 3stá 3nfr3nt3 d3 S1qu3m; y v4 4l sur, h4st4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n T4pú4. 8 L4 t13rr4 d3 T4pú4 fu3 d3 M4n4sés; p3r0 T4pú4 m1sm4, qu3 3stá junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 M4n4sés, 3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín. 9 D3sc13nd3 3st3 lím1t3 4l 4rr0y0 d3 C4ná, h4c14 3l sur d3l 4rr0y0. 0st4s c1ud4d3s d3 0fr4ín 3stán 3ntr3 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 M4n4sés; y 3l lím1t3 d3 M4n4sés 3s d3sd3 3l n0rt3 d3l m1sm0 4rr0y0, y sus s4l1d4s s0n 4l m4r. 10 0fr4ín 4l sur, y M4n4sés 4l n0rt3, y 3l m4r 3s su lím1t3; y s3 3ncu3ntr4 c0n 4s3r 4l n0rt3, y c0n 1s4c4r 4l 0r13nt3. 11 Tuv0 t4mb1én M4n4sés 3n 1s4c4r y 3n 4s3r 4 B3t-s3án y sus 4ld34s, 4 1bl34m y sus 4ld34s, 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 D0r y sus 4ld34s, 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 0nd0r y sus 4ld34s, 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 T44n4c y sus 4ld34s, y 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 M3gu1d0 y sus 4ld34s; tr3s pr0v1nc14s. 12 M4s l0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés n0 pud13r0n 4rr0j4r 4 l0s d3 4qu3ll4s c1ud4d3s; y 3l c4n4n30 p3rs1st1ó 3n h4b1t4r 3n 4qu3ll4 t13rr4. 13 P3r0 cu4nd0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l fu3r0n l0 suf1c13nt3m3nt3 fu3rt3s, h1c13r0n tr1but4r10 4l c4n4n30, m4s n0 l0 4rr0j4r0n. 

14 Y l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé h4bl4r0n 4 J0sué, d1c13nd0: ¿P0r qué n0s h4s d4d0 p0r h3r3d4d un4 s0l4 su3rt3 y un4 s0l4 p4rt3, s13nd0 n0s0tr0s un pu3bl0 t4n gr4nd3, y qu3 J3h0vá n0s h4 b3nd3c1d0 h4st4 4h0r4? 15 Y J0sué l3s r3sp0nd1ó: S1 s01s pu3bl0 t4n gr4nd3, sub1d 4l b0squ3, y h4c30s d3sm0nt3s 4llí 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s f3r3z30s y d3 l0s r3f4ít4s, y4 qu3 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín 3s 3str3ch0 p4r4 v0s0tr0s. 16 Y l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé d1j3r0n: N0 n0s b4st4rá 4 n0s0tr0s 3st3 m0nt3; y t0d0s l0s c4n4n30s qu3 h4b1t4n l4 t13rr4 d3 l4 ll4nur4, t13n3n c4rr0s h3rr4d0s; l0s qu3 3stán 3n B3t-s3án y 3n sus 4ld34s, y l0s qu3 3stán 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 J3zr33l. 17 0nt0nc3s J0sué r3sp0nd1ó 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé, 4 0fr4ín y 4 M4n4sés, d1c13nd0: Tú 3r3s gr4n pu3bl0, y t13n3s gr4nd3 p0d3r; n0 t3ndrás un4 s0l4 p4rt3, 18 s1n0 qu3 4qu3l m0nt3 s3rá tuy0; pu3s 4unqu3 3s b0squ3, tú l0 d3sm0nt4rás y l0 p0s33rás h4st4 sus lím1t3s más l3j4n0s; p0rqu3 tú 4rr0j4rás 4l c4n4n30, 4unqu3 t3ng4 c4rr0s h3rr4d0s, y 4unqu3 s34 fu3rt3.

2 P3r0 h4bí4n qu3d4d0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s13t3 tr1bus 4 l4s cu4l3s 4ún n0 h4bí4n r3p4rt1d0 su p0s3s1ón. 3 Y J0sué d1j0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l: ¿H4st4 cuánd0 s3ré1s n3gl1g3nt3s p4r4 v3n1r 4 p0s33r l4 t13rr4 qu3 0s h4 d4d0 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s? 4 S3ñ4l4d tr3s v4r0n3s d3 c4d4 tr1bu, p4r4 qu3 y0 l0s 3nví3, y qu3 3ll0s s3 l3v4nt3n y r3c0rr4n l4 t13rr4, y l4 d3scr1b4n c0nf0rm3 4 sus h3r3d4d3s, y vu3lv4n 4 mí. 5 Y l4 d1v1d1rán 3n s13t3 p4rt3s; y Judá qu3d4rá 3n su t3rr1t0r10 4l sur, y l0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé 3n 3l suy0 4l n0rt3. 6 V0s0tr0s, pu3s, d3l1n34ré1s l4 t13rr4 3n s13t3 p4rt3s, y m3 tr43ré1s l4 d3scr1pc1ón 4quí, y y0 0s 3ch4ré su3rt3s 4quí d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s. 7 P3r0 l0s l3v1t4s n1ngun4 p4rt3 t13n3n 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, p0rqu3 3l s4c3rd0c10 d3 J3h0vá 3s l4 h3r3d4d d3 3ll0s; G4d t4mb1én y Rubén, y l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés, y4 h4n r3c1b1d0 su h3r3d4d 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán 4l 0r13nt3, l4 cu4l l3s d10 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá.

49 Y d3spués qu3 4c4b4r0n d3 r3p4rt1r l4 t13rr4 3n h3r3d4d p0r sus t3rr1t0r10s, d13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h3r3d4d 4 J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s; 50 s3gún l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, l3 d13r0n l4 c1ud4d qu3 él p1d1ó, T1mn4t-s3r4, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín; y él r33d1f1có l4 c1ud4d y h4b1tó 3n 3ll4.

1 H4bló J3h0vá 4 J0sué, d1c13nd0: 2 H4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d1l3s: S3ñ4l40s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 r3fug10, d3 l4s cu4l3s y0 0s h4blé p0r m3d10 d3 M01sés, 3 p4r4 qu3 s3 4c0j4 4llí 3l h0m1c1d4 qu3 m4t4r3 4 4lgun0 p0r 4cc1d3nt3 y n0 4 s4b13nd4s; y 0s s3rv1rán d3 r3fug10 c0ntr4 3l v3ng4d0r d3 l4 s4ngr3. 4 Y 3l qu3 s3 4c0g13r3 4 4lgun4 d3 4qu3ll4s c1ud4d3s, s3 pr3s3nt4rá 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y 3xp0ndrá sus r4z0n3s 3n 0íd0s d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 4qu3ll4 c1ud4d; y 3ll0s l3 r3c1b1rán c0ns1g0 d3ntr0 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y l3 d4rán lug4r p4r4 qu3 h4b1t3 c0n 3ll0s. 5 S1 3l v3ng4d0r d3 l4 s4ngr3 l3 s1gu13r3, n0 3ntr3g4rán 3n su m4n0 4l h0m1c1d4, p0r cu4nt0 h1r1ó 4 su prój1m0 p0r 4cc1d3nt3, y n0 tuv0 c0n él n1ngun4 3n3m1st4d 4nt3s. 6 Y qu3d4rá 3n 4qu3ll4 c1ud4d h4st4 qu3 c0mp4r3zc4 3n ju1c10 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, y h4st4 l4 mu3rt3 d3l qu3 fu3r3 sum0 s4c3rd0t3 3n 4qu3l t13mp0; 3nt0nc3s 3l h0m1c1d4 p0drá v0lv3r 4 su c1ud4d y 4 su c4s4 y 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 d0nd3 huyó. 

7 0nt0nc3s s3ñ4l4r0n 4 C3d3s 3n G4l1l34, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 N3ft4lí, S1qu3m 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, y Qu1r14t-4rb4 (qu3 3s H3brón) 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 Judá. 8 Y 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán 4l 0r13nt3 d3 J3r1có, s3ñ4l4r0n 4 B3s3r 3n 3l d3s13rt0, 3n l4 ll4nur4 d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Rubén, R4m0t 3n G4l44d d3 l4 tr1bu d3 G4d, y G0lán 3n B4sán d3 l4 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés. 9 0st4s fu3r0n l4s c1ud4d3s s3ñ4l4d4s p4r4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y p4r4 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 m0r4s3 3ntr3 3ll0s, p4r4 qu3 s3 4c0g13s3 4 3ll4s cu4lqu13r4 qu3 h1r13s3 4 4lgun0 p0r 4cc1d3nt3, 4 f1n d3 qu3 n0 mur13s3 p0r m4n0 d3l v3ng4d0r d3 l4 s4ngr3, h4st4 qu3 c0mp4r3c13s3 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón. 

C1ud4d3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s

(1 Cr. 6.54-81)

J0SUÉ 21

1 L0s j3f3s d3 l0s p4dr3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s v1n13r0n 4l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r, 4 J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun y 4 l0s c4b3z4s d3 l0s p4dr3s d3 l4s tr1bus d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 2 y l3s h4bl4r0n 3n S1l0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, d1c13nd0: J3h0vá m4ndó p0r m3d10 d3 M01sés qu3 n0s fu3s3n d4d4s c1ud4d3s d0nd3 h4b1t4r, c0n sus 3j1d0s p4r4 nu3str0s g4n4d0s. 3 0nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d13r0n d3 su pr0p14 h3r3nc14 4 l0s l3v1t4s, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4t0 d3 J3h0vá, 3st4s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 3j1d0s. 

4 Y l4 su3rt3 c4yó s0br3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s c04t1t4s; y l0s h1j0s d3 44rón 3l s4c3rd0t3, qu3 3r4n d3 l0s l3v1t4s, 0btuv13r0n p0r su3rt3 d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Judá, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 S1m3ón y d3 l4 tr1bu d3 B3nj4mín, tr3c3 c1ud4d3s. 

5 Y l0s 0tr0s h1j0s d3 C04t 0btuv13r0n p0r su3rt3 d13z c1ud4d3s d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 0fr4ín, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 D4n y d3 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés. 

6 L0s h1j0s d3 G3rsón 0btuv13r0n p0r su3rt3, d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 1s4c4r, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 4s3r, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 N3ft4lí y d3 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés 3n B4sán, tr3c3 c1ud4d3s. 

7 L0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1 s3gún sus f4m1l14s 0btuv13r0n d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Rubén, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 G4d y d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Z4bulón, d0c3 c1ud4d3s. 

8 D13r0n, pu3s, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 l0s l3v1t4s 3st4s c1ud4d3s c0n sus 3j1d0s, p0r su3rt3s, c0m0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 J3h0vá p0r c0nduct0 d3 M01sés. 

9 D3 l4 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá, y d3 l4 tr1bu d3 l0s h1j0s d3 S1m3ón, d13r0n 3st4s c1ud4d3s qu3 fu3r0n n0mbr4d4s, 10 l4s cu4l3s 0btuv13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 44rón d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 C04t, d3 l0s h1j0s d3 L3ví; p0rqu3 p4r4 3ll0s fu3 l4 su3rt3 3n pr1m3r lug4r. 11 L3s d13r0n Qu1r14t-4rb4 d3l p4dr3 d3 4n4c, l4 cu4l 3s H3brón, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 Judá, c0n sus 3j1d0s 3n sus c0nt0rn0s. 12 M4s 3l c4mp0 d3 l4 c1ud4d y sus 4ld34s d13r0n 4 C4l3b h1j0 d3 J3f0n3, p0r p0s3s1ón suy4. 

13 Y 4 l0s h1j0s d3l s4c3rd0t3 44rón d13r0n H3brón c0n sus 3j1d0s c0m0 c1ud4d d3 r3fug10 p4r4 l0s h0m1c1d4s; 4d3más, L1bn4 c0n sus 3j1d0s, 14 J4t1r c0n sus 3j1d0s, 0st3m04 c0n sus 3j1d0s, 15 H0lón c0n sus 3j1d0s, D3b1r c0n sus 3j1d0s, 16 4ín c0n sus 3j1d0s, Jut4 c0n sus 3j1d0s y B3t-s3m3s c0n sus 3j1d0s; nu3v3 c1ud4d3s d3 3st4s d0s tr1bus; 17 y d3 l4 tr1bu d3 B3nj4mín, G4b4ón c0n sus 3j1d0s, G3b4 c0n sus 3j1d0s, 18 4n4t0t c0n sus 3j1d0s, 4lmón c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 19 T0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s h1j0s d3 44rón s0n tr3c3 c0n sus 3j1d0s. 

20 M4s l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t, l3v1t4s, l0s qu3 qu3d4b4n d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t, r3c1b13r0n p0r su3rt3 c1ud4d3s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 0fr4ín. 21 L3s d13r0n S1qu3m c0n sus 3j1d0s, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, c0m0 c1ud4d d3 r3fug10 p4r4 l0s h0m1c1d4s; 4d3más, G3z3r c0n su 3j1d0s, 22 K1bs41m c0n sus 3j1d0s y B3t-h0rón c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 23 D3 l4 tr1bu d3 D4n, 0lt3qu3 c0n sus 3j1d0s, G1b3tón c0n sus 3j1d0s, 24 4j4lón c0n sus 3j1d0s y G4t-r1món c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 25 Y d3 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés, T44n4c c0n sus 3j1d0s y G4t-r1món c0n sus 3j1d0s; d0s c1ud4d3s. 26 T0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s p4r4 3l r3st0 d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t fu3r0n d13z c0n sus 3j1d0s. 

27 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G3rsón d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, d13r0n d3 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés 4 G0lán 3n B4sán c0n sus 3j1d0s c0m0 c1ud4d d3 r3fug10 p4r4 l0s h0m1c1d4s, y 4d3más, B33st3r4 c0n sus 3j1d0s; d0s c1ud4d3s. 28 D3 l4 tr1bu d3 1s4c4r, C1són c0n sus 3j1d0s, D4b3r4t c0n sus 3j1d0s, 29 J4rmut c0n sus 3j1d0s y 0n-g4n1m c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 30 D3 l4 tr1bu d3 4s3r, M1s34l c0n sus 3j1d0s, 4bdón c0n sus 3j1d0s, 31 H3lc4t c0n sus 3j1d0s y R3h0b c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 32 Y d3 l4 tr1bu d3 N3ft4lí, C3d3s 3n G4l1l34 c0n sus 3j1d0s c0m0 c1ud4d d3 r3fug10 p4r4 l0s h0m1c1d4s, y 4d3más, H4m0t-d0r c0n sus 3j1d0s y C4rtán c0n sus 3j1d0s; tr3s c1ud4d3s. 33 T0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s g3rs0n1t4s p0r sus f4m1l14s fu3r0n tr3c3 c1ud4d3s c0n sus 3j1d0s. 

34 Y 4 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1, l3v1t4s qu3 qu3d4b4n, s3 l3s d10 d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Z4bulón, J0cn34m c0n sus 3j1d0s, C4rt4 c0n sus 3j1d0s, 35 D1mn4 c0n sus 3j1d0s y N44l4l c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 36 Y d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Rubén, B3s3r c0n sus 3j1d0s, J4h4z4 c0n sus 3j1d0s, 37 C4d3m0t c0n sus 3j1d0s y M3f44t c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 38 D3 l4 tr1bu d3 G4d, R4m0t d3 G4l44d c0n sus 3j1d0s c0m0 c1ud4d d3 r3fug10 p4r4 l0s h0m1c1d4s; 4d3más, M4h4n41m c0n sus 3j1d0s, 39 H3sbón c0n sus 3j1d0s y J4z3r c0n sus 3j1d0s; cu4tr0 c1ud4d3s. 40 T0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1 p0r sus f4m1l14s, qu3 r3st4b4n d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, fu3r0n p0r sus su3rt3s d0c3 c1ud4d3s. 

41 Y t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s 3n m3d10 d3 l4 p0s3s1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, fu3r0n cu4r3nt4 y 0ch0 c1ud4d3s c0n sus 3j1d0s. 42 Y 3st4s c1ud4d3s 3st4b4n 4p4rt4d4s l4 un4 d3 l4 0tr4, c4d4 cu4l c0n sus 3j1d0s 4lr3d3d0r d3 3ll4; 4sí fu3 c0n t0d4s 3st4s c1ud4d3s. 

1sr43l 0cup4 l4 t13rr4

43 D3 3st4 m4n3r4 d10 J3h0vá 4 1sr43l t0d4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 h4bí4 jur4d0 d4r 4 sus p4dr3s, y l4 p0s3y3r0n y h4b1t4r0n 3n 3ll4. 44 Y J3h0vá l3s d10 r3p0s0 4lr3d3d0r, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 h4bí4 jur4d0 4 sus p4dr3s; y n1ngun0 d3 t0d0s sus 3n3m1g0s pud0 h4c3rl3s fr3nt3, p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3ntr3gó 3n sus m4n0s 4 t0d0s sus 3n3m1g0s. 45 N0 f4ltó p4l4br4 d3 t0d4s l4s bu3n4s pr0m3s4s qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h3ch0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l; t0d0 s3 cumpl1ó. 

0l 4lt4r junt0 4l J0rdán

J0SUÉ 22

1 0nt0nc3s J0sué ll4mó 4 l0s rub3n1t4s, 4 l0s g4d1t4s, y 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés, 2 y l3s d1j0: V0s0tr0s h4bé1s gu4rd4d0 t0d0 l0 qu3 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá 0s m4ndó, y h4bé1s 0b3d3c1d0 4 m1 v0z 3n t0d0 l0 qu3 0s h3 m4nd4d0. 3 N0 h4bé1s d3j4d0 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s 3n 3st3 l4rg0 t13mp0 h4st4 3l dí4 d3 h0y, s1n0 qu3 0s h4bé1s cu1d4d0 d3 gu4rd4r l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 4 4h0r4, pu3s, qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s h4 d4d0 r3p0s0 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, c0m0 l0 h4bí4 pr0m3t1d0, v0lv3d, r3gr3s4d 4 vu3str4s t13nd4s, 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 vu3str4s p0s3s10n3s, qu3 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá 0s d10 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán. 5 S0l4m3nt3 qu3 c0n d1l1g3nc14 cu1dé1s d3 cumpl1r 3l m4nd4m13nt0 y l4 l3y qu3 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá 0s 0rd3nó: qu3 4mé1s 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y 4ndé1s 3n t0d0s sus c4m1n0s; qu3 gu4rdé1s sus m4nd4m13nt0s, y l3 s1gá1s 4 él, y l3 s1rvá1s d3 t0d0 vu3str0 c0r4zón y d3 t0d4 vu3str4 4lm4. 6 Y b3nd1c1énd0l0s, J0sué l0s d3sp1d1ó, y s3 fu3r0n 4 sus t13nd4s. 

7 T4mb1én 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés h4bí4 d4d0 M01sés p0s3s1ón 3n B4sán; m4s 4 l4 0tr4 m1t4d d10 J0sué h3r3d4d 3ntr3 sus h3rm4n0s 4 3st3 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 4l 0cc1d3nt3; y t4mb1én 4 ést0s 3nv1ó J0sué 4 sus t13nd4s, d3spués d3 h4b3rl0s b3nd3c1d0. 8 Y l3s h4bló d1c13nd0: V0lv3d 4 vu3str4s t13nd4s c0n gr4nd3s r1qu3z4s, c0n much0 g4n4d0, c0n pl4t4, c0n 0r0, y br0nc3, y much0s v3st1d0s; c0mp4rt1d c0n vu3str0s h3rm4n0s 3l b0tín d3 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s. 9 4sí l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés, s3 v0lv13r0n, s3p4ránd0s3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d3sd3 S1l0, qu3 3stá 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, p4r4 1r 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d, 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 sus p0s3s10n3s, d3 l4 cu4l s3 h4bí4n p0s3s10n4d0 c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4t0 d3 J3h0vá p0r c0nduct0 d3 M01sés. 

10 Y ll3g4nd0 4 l0s lím1t3s d3l J0rdán qu3 3stá 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés 3d1f1c4r0n 4llí un 4lt4r junt0 4l J0rdán, un 4lt4r d3 gr4nd3 4p4r13nc14. 11 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 0y3r0n d3c1r qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés h4bí4n 3d1f1c4d0 un 4lt4r fr3nt3 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 3n l0s lím1t3s d3l J0rdán, d3l l4d0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 12 Cu4nd0 0y3r0n 3st0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, s3 juntó t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n S1l0, p4r4 sub1r 4 p3l34r c0ntr4 3ll0s. 

13 Y 3nv14r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés 3n t13rr4 d3 G4l44d, 4 F1n33s h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r, 14 y 4 d13z prínc1p3s c0n él: un prínc1p3 p0r c4d4 c4s4 p4t3rn4 d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, c4d4 un0 d3 l0s cu4l3s 3r4 j3f3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 sus p4dr3s 3ntr3 l0s m1ll4r3s d3 1sr43l. 15 L0s cu4l3s fu3r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y 4 l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d, y l3s h4bl4r0n d1c13nd0: 16 T0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 J3h0vá d1c3 4sí: ¿Qué tr4nsgr3s1ón 3s 3st4 c0n qu3 pr3v4r1cá1s c0ntr4 3l D10s d3 1sr43l p4r4 4p4rt4r0s h0y d3 s3gu1r 4 J3h0vá, 3d1f1cánd00s 4lt4r p4r4 s3r r3b3ld3s c0ntr4 J3h0vá? 17 ¿N0 h4 s1d0 b4st4nt3 l4 m4ld4d d3 P30r, d3 l4 qu3 n0 3st4m0s 4ún l1mp10s h4st4 3st3 dí4, p0r l4 cu4l v1n0 l4 m0rt4nd4d 3n l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 J3h0vá, 18 p4r4 qu3 v0s0tr0s 0s 4p4rté1s h0y d3 s3gu1r 4 J3h0vá? V0s0tr0s 0s r3b3lá1s h0y c0ntr4 J3h0vá, y m4ñ4n4 s3 41r4rá él c0ntr4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l. 19 S1 0s p4r3c3 qu3 l4 t13rr4 d3 vu3str4 p0s3s1ón 3s 1nmund4, p4s40s 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l4 p0s3s1ón d3 J3h0vá, 3n l4 cu4l 3stá 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, y t0m4d p0s3s1ón 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s; p3r0 n0 0s r3b3lé1s c0ntr4 J3h0vá, n1 0s r3b3lé1s c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s, 3d1f1cánd00s 4lt4r 4d3más d3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s. 20 ¿N0 c0m3t1ó 4cán h1j0 d3 Z3r4 pr3v4r1c4c1ón 3n 3l 4n4t3m4, y v1n0 1r4 s0br3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l? 21 0nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l4 m3d14 tr1bu d3 M4n4sés r3sp0nd13r0n y d1j3r0n 4 l0s c4b3z4s d3 l0s m1ll4r3s d3 1sr43l: 22 J3h0vá D10s d3 l0s d10s3s, J3h0vá D10s d3 l0s d10s3s, él s4b3, y h4c3 s4b3r 4 1sr43l: s1 fu3 p0r r3b3l1ón 0 p0r pr3v4r1c4c1ón c0ntr4 J3h0vá, n0 n0s s4lv3s h0y. 23 S1 n0s h3m0s 3d1f1c4d0 4lt4r p4r4 v0lv3rn0s d3 3n p0s d3 J3h0vá, 0 p4r4 s4cr1f1c4r h0l0c4ust0 u 0fr3nd4, 0 p4r4 0fr3c3r s0br3 él 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z, 3l m1sm0 J3h0vá n0s l0 d3m4nd3. 24 L0 h1c1m0s más b13n p0r t3m0r d3 qu3 m4ñ4n4 vu3str0s h1j0s d1g4n 4 nu3str0s h1j0s: ¿Qué t3né1s v0s0tr0s c0n J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l? 25 J3h0vá h4 pu3st0 p0r l1nd3r0 3l J0rdán 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s y v0s0tr0s, 0h h1j0s d3 Rubén 3 h1j0s d3 G4d; n0 t3né1s v0s0tr0s p4rt3 3n J3h0vá; y 4sí vu3str0s h1j0s h4rí4n qu3 nu3str0s h1j0s d3j4s3n d3 t3m3r 4 J3h0vá. 26 P0r 3st0 d1j1m0s: 0d1f1qu3m0s 4h0r4 un 4lt4r, n0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0 n1 p4r4 s4cr1f1c10, 27 s1n0 p4r4 qu3 s34 un t3st1m0n10 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s y v0s0tr0s, y 3ntr3 l0s qu3 v3ndrán d3spués d3 n0s0tr0s, d3 qu3 p0d3m0s h4c3r 3l s3rv1c10 d3 J3h0vá d3l4nt3 d3 él c0n nu3str0s h0l0c4ust0s, c0n nu3str0s s4cr1f1c10s y c0n nu3str4s 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z; y n0 d1g4n m4ñ4n4 vu3str0s h1j0s 4 l0s nu3str0s: V0s0tr0s n0 t3né1s p4rt3 3n J3h0vá. 28 N0s0tr0s, pu3s, d1j1m0s: S1 4c0nt3c13r3 qu3 t4l d1g4n 4 n0s0tr0s, 0 4 nu3str4s g3n3r4c10n3s 3n l0 p0r v3n1r, 3nt0nc3s r3sp0nd3r3m0s: M1r4d 3l sím1l d3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá, 3l cu4l h1c13r0n nu3str0s p4dr3s, n0 p4r4 h0l0c4ust0s 0 s4cr1f1c10s, s1n0 p4r4 qu3 fu3s3 t3st1m0n10 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s y v0s0tr0s. 29 Nunc4 t4l 4c0nt3zc4 qu3 n0s r3b3l3m0s c0ntr4 J3h0vá, 0 qu3 n0s 4p4rt3m0s h0y d3 s3gu1r 4 J3h0vá, 3d1f1c4nd0 4lt4r p4r4 h0l0c4ust0s, p4r4 0fr3nd4 0 p4r4 s4cr1f1c10, 4d3más d3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 su t4b3rnácul0. 

30 0y3nd0 F1n33s 3l s4c3rd0t3 y l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, y l0s j3f3s d3 l0s m1ll4r3s d3 1sr43l qu3 c0n él 3st4b4n, l4s p4l4br4s qu3 h4bl4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y l0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés, l3s p4r3c1ó b13n t0d0 3ll0. 31 Y d1j0 F1n33s h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén, 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 M4n4sés: H0y h3m0s 3nt3nd1d0 qu3 J3h0vá 3stá 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, pu3s qu3 n0 h4bé1s 1nt3nt4d0 3st4 tr41c1ón c0ntr4 J3h0vá. 4h0r4 h4bé1s l1br4d0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá. 

32 Y F1n33s h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 0l34z4r, y l0s prínc1p3s, d3j4r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 G4d, y r3gr3s4r0n d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 4 l0s cu4l3s d13r0n l4 r3spu3st4. 33 Y 3l 4sunt0 p4r3c1ó b13n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y b3nd1j3r0n 4 D10s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; y n0 h4bl4r0n más d3 sub1r c0ntr4 3ll0s 3n gu3rr4, p4r4 d3stru1r l4 t13rr4 3n qu3 h4b1t4b4n l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d. 34 Y l0s h1j0s d3 Rubén y l0s h1j0s d3 G4d pus13r0n p0r n0mbr3 4l 4lt4r 0d; p0rqu3 t3st1m0n10 3s 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s qu3 J3h0vá 3s D10s. 

0xh0rt4c1ón d3 J0sué 4l pu3bl0

1 4c0nt3c1ó, much0s dí4s d3spués qu3 J3h0vá d13r4 r3p0s0 4 1sr43l d3 t0d0s sus 3n3m1g0s 4lr3d3d0r, qu3 J0sué, s13nd0 y4 v13j0 y 4v4nz4d0 3n 4ñ0s, 2 ll4mó 4 t0d0 1sr43l, 4 sus 4nc14n0s, sus prínc1p3s, sus ju3c3s y sus 0f1c14l3s, y l3s d1j0: Y0 y4 s0y v13j0 y 4v4nz4d0 3n 4ñ0s. 3 Y v0s0tr0s h4bé1s v1st0 t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s h4 h3ch0 c0n t0d4s 3st4s n4c10n3s p0r vu3str4 c4us4; p0rqu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 3s qu13n h4 p3l34d0 p0r v0s0tr0s. 4 H3 4quí 0s h3 r3p4rt1d0 p0r su3rt3, 3n h3r3nc14 p4r4 vu3str4s tr1bus, 3st4s n4c10n3s, 4sí l4s d3stru1d4s c0m0 l4s qu3 qu3d4n, d3sd3 3l J0rdán h4st4 3l M4r Gr4nd3, h4c14 d0nd3 s3 p0n3 3l s0l. 5 Y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s l4s 3ch4rá d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, y l4s 4rr0j4rá d3 vu3str4 pr3s3nc14; y v0s0tr0s p0s33ré1s sus t13rr4s, c0m0 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 0s h4 d1ch0. 6 0sf0rz40s, pu3s, much0 3n gu4rd4r y h4c3r t0d0 l0 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4 l3y d3 M01sés, s1n 4p4rt4r0s d3 3ll0 n1 4 d13str4 n1 4 s1n13str4; 7 p4r4 qu3 n0 0s m3zclé1s c0n 3st4s n4c10n3s qu3 h4n qu3d4d0 c0n v0s0tr0s, n1 h4gá1s m3nc1ón n1 juré1s p0r 3l n0mbr3 d3 sus d10s3s, n1 l0s s1rvá1s, n1 0s 1ncl1né1s 4 3ll0s. 8 M4s 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s s3gu1ré1s, c0m0 h4bé1s h3ch0 h4st4 h0y. 9 Pu3s h4 4rr0j4d0 J3h0vá d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s gr4nd3s y fu3rt3s n4c10n3s, y h4st4 h0y n4d13 h4 p0d1d0 r3s1st1r d3l4nt3 d3 vu3str0 r0str0. 10 Un v4rón d3 v0s0tr0s p3rs3gu1rá 4 m1l; 14 Y h3 4quí qu3 y0 3st0y p4r4 3ntr4r h0y p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4; r3c0n0c3d, pu3s, c0n t0d0 vu3str0 c0r4zón y c0n t0d4 vu3str4 4lm4, qu3 n0 h4 f4lt4d0 un4 p4l4br4 d3 t0d4s l4s bu3n4s p4l4br4s qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s h4bí4 d1ch0 d3 v0s0tr0s; t0d4s 0s h4n 4c0nt3c1d0, n0 h4 f4lt4d0 n1ngun4 d3 3ll4s. 15 P3r0 4sí c0m0 h4 v3n1d0 s0br3 v0s0tr0s t0d4 p4l4br4 bu3n4 qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 0s h4bí4 d1ch0, t4mb1én tr43rá J3h0vá s0br3 v0s0tr0s t0d4 p4l4br4 m4l4, h4st4 d3stru1r0s d3 s0br3 l4 bu3n4 t13rr4 qu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 0s h4 d4d0, 16 s1 tr4sp4s4r31s 3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s qu3 él 0s h4 m4nd4d0, y3nd0 y h0nr4nd0 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, 3 1ncl1nánd00s 4 3ll0s. 0nt0nc3s l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd3rá c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s, y p3r3c3ré1s pr0nt4m3nt3 d3 3st4 bu3n4 t13rr4 qu3 él 0s h4 d4d0. 

D1scurs0 d3 d3sp3d1d4 d3 J0sué

J0SUÉ 24

1 R3un1ó J0sué 4 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l 3n S1qu3m, y ll4mó 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l, sus prínc1p3s, sus ju3c3s y sus 0f1c14l3s; y s3 pr3s3nt4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 D10s. 2 Y d1j0 J0sué 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0: 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá, D10s d3 1sr43l: Vu3str0s p4dr3s h4b1t4r0n 4nt1gu4m3nt3 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l rí0, 3st0 3s, T4ré, p4dr3 d3 4br4h4m y d3 N4c0r; y s3rví4n 4 d10s3s 3xtr4ñ0s. 3 Y y0 t0mé 4 vu3str0 p4dr3 4br4h4m d3l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l rí0, y l0 tr4j3 p0r t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án, y 4um3nté su d3sc3nd3nc14, y l3 d1 1s44c. 4 4 1s44c d1 J4c0b y 0s4ú. Y 4 0s4ú d1 3l m0nt3 d3 S31r, p4r4 qu3 l0 p0s3y3s3; p3r0 J4c0b y sus h1j0s d3sc3nd13r0n 4 0g1pt0. 5 Y y0 3nv1é 4 M01sés y 4 44rón, y h3rí 4 0g1pt0, c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 h1c3 3n m3d10 d3 él, y d3spués 0s s4qué. 6 S4qué 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s d3 0g1pt0; y cu4nd0 ll3g4r0n 4l m4r, l0s 3g1pc10s s1gu13r0n 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s h4st4 3l M4r R0j0 c0n c4rr0s y c4b4ll3rí4. 7 Y cu4nd0 3ll0s cl4m4r0n 4 J3h0vá, él pus0 0scur1d4d 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s y l0s 3g1pc10s, 3 h1z0 v3n1r s0br3 3ll0s 3l m4r, 3l cu4l l0s cubr1ó; y vu3str0s 0j0s v13r0n l0 qu3 h1c3 3n 0g1pt0. D3spués 3stuv1st31s much0s dí4s 3n 3l d3s13rt0. 8 Y0 0s 1ntr0duj3 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, qu3 h4b1t4b4n 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, l0s cu4l3s p3l34r0n c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s; m4s y0 l0s 3ntr3gué 3n vu3str4s m4n0s, y p0s3íst31s su t13rr4, y l0s d3struí d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s. 9 D3spués s3 l3v4ntó B4l4c h1j0 d3 Z1p0r, r3y d3 l0s m04b1t4s, y p3l3ó c0ntr4 1sr43l; y 3nv1ó 4 ll4m4r 4 B4l44m h1j0 d3 B30r, p4r4 qu3 0s m4ld1j3s3. 10 M4s y0 n0 qu1s3 3scuch4r 4 B4l44m, p0r l0 cu4l 0s b3nd1j0 r3p3t1d4m3nt3, y 0s l1bré d3 sus m4n0s. 11 P4s4st31s 3l J0rdán, y v1n1st31s 4 J3r1có, y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3r1có p3l34r0n c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s: l0s 4m0rr30s, f3r3z30s, c4n4n30s, h3t30s, g3rg3s30s, h3v30s y j3bus30s, y y0 l0s 3ntr3gué 3n vu3str4s m4n0s. 12 Y 3nv1é d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s táb4n0s, l0s cu4l3s l0s 4rr0j4r0n d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, 3st0 3s, 4 l0s d0s r3y3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s; n0 c0n tu 3sp4d4, n1 c0n tu 4rc0. 13 Y 0s d1 l4 t13rr4 p0r l4 cu4l n4d4 tr4b4j4st31s, y l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 n0 3d1f1c4st31s, 3n l4s cu4l3s m0rá1s; y d3 l4s v1ñ4s y 0l1v4r3s qu3 n0 pl4nt4st31s, c0mé1s. 

14 4h0r4, pu3s, t3m3d 4 J3h0vá, y s3rv1dl3 c0n 1nt3gr1d4d y 3n v3rd4d; y qu1t4d d3 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s l0s d10s3s 4 l0s cu4l3s s1rv13r0n vu3str0s p4dr3s 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l rí0, y 3n 0g1pt0; y s3rv1d 4 J3h0vá. 15 Y s1 m4l 0s p4r3c3 s3rv1r 4 J3h0vá, 3sc0g30s h0y 4 qu1én s1rvá1s; s1 4 l0s d10s3s 4 qu13n3s s1rv13r0n vu3str0s p4dr3s, cu4nd0 3stuv13r0n 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l rí0, 0 4 l0s d10s3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s 3n cuy4 t13rr4 h4b1tá1s; p3r0 y0 y m1 c4s4 s3rv1r3m0s 4 J3h0vá. 

16 0nt0nc3s 3l pu3bl0 r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: Nunc4 t4l 4c0nt3zc4, qu3 d3j3m0s 4 J3h0vá p4r4 s3rv1r 4 0tr0s d10s3s; 17 p0rqu3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s 3s 3l qu3 n0s s4có 4 n0s0tr0s y 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, d3 l4 c4s4 d3 s3rv1dumbr3; 3l qu3 h4 h3ch0 3st4s gr4nd3s s3ñ4l3s, y n0s h4 gu4rd4d0 p0r t0d0 3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 h3m0s 4nd4d0, y 3n t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s p0r 3ntr3 l0s cu4l3s p4s4m0s. 18 Y J3h0vá 4rr0jó d3 d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, y 4l 4m0rr30 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n l4 t13rr4; n0s0tr0s, pu3s, t4mb1én s3rv1r3m0s 4 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 él 3s nu3str0 D10s. 

19 0nt0nc3s J0sué d1j0 4l pu3bl0: N0 p0dré1s s3rv1r 4 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 él 3s D10s s4nt0, y D10s c3l0s0; n0 sufr1rá vu3str4s r3b3l10n3s y vu3str0s p3c4d0s. 20 S1 d3j4r31s 4 J3h0vá y s1rv13r31s 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, él s3 v0lv3rá y 0s h4rá m4l, y 0s c0nsum1rá, d3spués qu3 0s h4 h3ch0 b13n. 21 0l pu3bl0 3nt0nc3s d1j0 4 J0sué: N0, s1n0 qu3 4 J3h0vá s3rv1r3m0s. 22 Y J0sué r3sp0nd1ó 4l pu3bl0: V0s0tr0s s01s t3st1g0s c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s m1sm0s, d3 qu3 h4bé1s 3l3g1d0 4 J3h0vá p4r4 s3rv1rl3. Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: T3st1g0s s0m0s. 23 Qu1t4d, pu3s, 4h0r4 l0s d10s3s 4j3n0s qu3 3stán 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, 3 1ncl1n4d vu3str0 c0r4zón 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 24 Y 3l pu3bl0 r3sp0nd1ó 4 J0sué: 4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s s3rv1r3m0s, y 4 su v0z 0b3d3c3r3m0s. 25 0nt0nc3s J0sué h1z0 p4ct0 c0n 3l pu3bl0 3l m1sm0 dí4, y l3s d10 3st4tut0s y l3y3s 3n S1qu3m. 26 Y 3scr1b1ó J0sué 3st4s p4l4br4s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4 l3y d3 D10s; y t0m4nd0 un4 gr4n p13dr4, l4 l3v4ntó 4llí d3b4j0 d3 l4 3nc1n4 qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4l s4ntu4r10 d3 J3h0vá. 27 Y d1j0 J0sué 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0: H3 4quí 3st4 p13dr4 n0s s3rv1rá d3 t3st1g0, p0rqu3 3ll4 h4 0íd0 t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s qu3 J3h0vá n0s h4 h4bl4d0; s3rá, pu3s, t3st1g0 c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 m1ntá1s c0ntr4 vu3str0 D10s. 28 Y 3nv1ó J0sué 4l pu3bl0, c4d4 un0 4 su p0s3s1ón. 

Mu3rt3 d3 J0sué

(Ju3. 2.6-10)

29 D3spués d3 3st4s c0s4s mur1ó J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun, s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá, s13nd0 d3 c13nt0 d13z 4ñ0s. 30 Y l3 s3pult4r0n 3n su h3r3d4d 3n T1mn4t-s3r4, qu3 3stá 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, 4l n0rt3 d3l m0nt3 d3 G44s. 

31 Y s1rv1ó 1sr43l 4 J3h0vá t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 J0sué, y t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 l0s 4nc14n0s qu3 s0br3v1v13r0n 4 J0sué y qu3 s4bí4n t0d4s l4s 0br4s qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h3ch0 p0r 1sr43l. 

S3pultur4 d3 l0s hu3s0s d3 J0sé 3n S1qu3m

32 Y 3nt3rr4r0n 3n S1qu3m l0s hu3s0s d3 J0sé, qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4bí4n tr4íd0 d3 0g1pt0, 3n l4 p4rt3 d3l c4mp0 qu3 J4c0b c0mpró d3 l0s h1j0s d3 H4m0r p4dr3 d3 S1qu3m, p0r c13n p13z4s d3 d1n3r0; y fu3 p0s3s1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 J0sé. 

Mu3rt3 d3 0l34z4r

33 T4mb1én mur1ó 0l34z4r h1j0 d3 44rón, y l0 3nt3rr4r0n 3n 3l c0ll4d0 d3 F1n33s su h1j0, qu3 l3 fu3 d4d0 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín.

1 4c0nt3c1ó d3spués d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 J0sué, qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0nsult4r0n 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: ¿Qu1én d3 n0s0tr0s sub1rá pr1m3r0 4 p3l34r c0ntr4 l0s c4n4n30s? 2 Y J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó: Judá sub1rá; h3 4quí qu3 y0 h3 3ntr3g4d0 l4 t13rr4 3n sus m4n0s. 3 Y Judá d1j0 4 S1m3ón su h3rm4n0: Sub3 c0nm1g0 4l t3rr1t0r10 qu3 s3 m3 h4 4djud1c4d0, y p3l33m0s c0ntr4 3l c4n4n30, y y0 t4mb1én 1ré c0nt1g0 4l tuy0. Y S1m3ón fu3 c0n él. 4 Y sub1ó Judá, y J3h0vá 3ntr3gó 3n sus m4n0s 4l c4n4n30 y 4l f3r3z30; 3 h1r13r0n d3 3ll0s 3n B3z3c 4 d13z m1l h0mbr3s. 5 Y h4ll4r0n 4 4d0n1-b3z3c 3n B3z3c, y p3l34r0n c0ntr4 él; y d3rr0t4r0n 4l c4n4n30 y 4l f3r3z30. 6 M4s 4d0n1-b3z3c huyó; y l3 s1gu13r0n y l3 pr3nd13r0n, y l3 c0rt4r0n l0s pulg4r3s d3 l4s m4n0s y d3 l0s p13s. 7 0nt0nc3s d1j0 4d0n1-b3z3c: S3t3nt4 r3y3s, c0rt4d0s l0s pulg4r3s d3 sus m4n0s y d3 sus p13s, r3c0gí4n l4s m1g4j4s d3b4j0 d3 m1 m3s4; c0m0 y0 h1c3, 4sí m3 h4 p4g4d0 D10s. Y l3 ll3v4r0n 4 J3rus4lén, d0nd3 mur1ó. 

Judá c0nqu1st4 J3rus4lén y H3brón

8 Y c0mb4t13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 Judá 4 J3rus4lén y l4 t0m4r0n, y p4s4r0n 4 sus h4b1t4nt3s 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4 y pus13r0n fu3g0 4 l4 c1ud4d. 9 D3spués l0s h1j0s d3 Judá d3sc3nd13r0n p4r4 p3l34r c0ntr4 3l c4n4n30 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s, 3n 3l N3gu3v, y 3n l0s ll4n0s. 10 Y m4rchó Judá c0ntr4 3l c4n4n30 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n H3brón, l4 cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 4nt3s Qu1r14t-4rb4; 3 h1r13r0n 4 S3s41, 4 4h1mán y 4 T4lm41. 

0t0n13l c0nqu1st4 D3b1r y r3c1b3 4 4cs4

(J0s. 15.15-19)

11 D3 4llí fu3 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n D3b1r, qu3 4nt3s s3 ll4m4b4 Qu1r14t-s3f3r. 12 Y d1j0 C4l3b: 0l qu3 4t4c4r3 4 Qu1r14t-s3f3r y l4 t0m4r3, y0 l3 d4ré 4cs4 m1 h1j4 p0r muj3r. 13 Y l4 t0mó 0t0n13l h1j0 d3 C3n4z, h3rm4n0 m3n0r d3 C4l3b; y él l3 d10 4cs4 su h1j4 p0r muj3r. 14 Y cu4nd0 3ll4 s3 1b4 c0n él, l4 p3rsu4d1ó qu3 p1d13s3 4 su p4dr3 un c4mp0. Y 3ll4 s3 b4jó d3l 4sn0, y C4l3b l3 d1j0: ¿Qué t13n3s? 15 0ll4 3nt0nc3s l3 r3sp0nd1ó: C0ncéd3m3 un d0n; pu3st0 qu3 m3 h4s d4d0 t13rr4 d3l N3gu3v, d4m3 t4mb1én fu3nt3s d3 4gu4s. 0nt0nc3s C4l3b l3 d10 l4s fu3nt3s d3 4rr1b4 y l4s fu3nt3s d3 4b4j0. 

0xt3ns1ón d3 l4s c0nqu1st4s d3 Judá y d3 B3nj4mín

16 Y l0s h1j0s d3l c3n30, su3gr0 d3 M01sés, sub13r0n d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 l4s p4lm3r4s c0n l0s h1j0s d3 Judá 4l d3s13rt0 d3 Judá, qu3 3stá 3n 3l N3gu3v c3rc4 d3 4r4d; y fu3r0n y h4b1t4r0n c0n 3l pu3bl0. 17 Y fu3 Judá c0n su h3rm4n0 S1m3ón, y d3rr0t4r0n 4l c4n4n30 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n S3f4t, y l4 4s0l4r0n; y pus13r0n p0r n0mbr3 4 l4 c1ud4d, H0rm4. 18 T0mó t4mb1én Judá 4 G4z4 c0n su t3rr1t0r10, 4sc4lón c0n su t3rr1t0r10 y 0crón c0n su t3rr1t0r10. 19 Y J3h0vá 3st4b4 c0n Judá, qu13n 4rr0jó 4 l0s d3 l4s m0nt4ñ4s; m4s n0 pud0 4rr0j4r 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n l0s ll4n0s, l0s cu4l3s t3ní4n c4rr0s h3rr4d0s. 20 Y d13r0n H3brón 4 C4l3b, c0m0 M01sés h4bí4 d1ch0; y él 4rr0jó d3 4llí 4 l0s tr3s h1j0s d3 4n4c. 21 M4s 4l j3bus30 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n J3rus4lén n0 l0 4rr0j4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín, y 3l j3bus30 h4b1tó c0n l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín 3n J3rus4lén h4st4 h0y. 

J0sé c0nqu1st4 B3t-3l

22 T4mb1én l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé sub1ó c0ntr4 B3t-3l; y J3h0vá 3st4b4 c0n 3ll0s. 23 Y l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé pus0 3spí4s 3n B3t-3l, c1ud4d qu3 4nt3s s3 ll4m4b4 Luz. 24 Y l0s qu3 3sp14b4n v13r0n 4 un h0mbr3 qu3 s4lí4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y l3 d1j3r0n: Muéstr4n0s 4h0r4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y h4r3m0s c0nt1g0 m1s3r1c0rd14. 25 Y él l3s m0stró l4 3ntr4d4 4 l4 c1ud4d, y l4 h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4; p3r0 d3j4r0n 1r 4 4qu3l h0mbr3 c0n t0d4 su f4m1l14. 26 Y s3 fu3 3l h0mbr3 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s h3t30s, y 3d1f1có un4 c1ud4d 4 l4 cu4l ll4mó Luz; y 3st3 3s su n0mbr3 h4st4 h0y. 

0xt3ns1ón d3 l4s c0nqu1st4s d3 M4n4sés y d3 0fr4ín

27 T4mp0c0 M4n4sés 4rr0jó 4 l0s d3 B3t-s3án, n1 4 l0s d3 sus 4ld34s, n1 4 l0s d3 T44n4c y sus 4ld34s, n1 4 l0s d3 D0r y sus 4ld34s, n1 4 l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 1bl34m y sus 4ld34s, n1 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n M3gu1d0 y 3n sus 4ld34s; y 3l c4n4n30 p3rs1stí4 3n h4b1t4r 3n 4qu3ll4 t13rr4. 28 P3r0 cu4nd0 1sr43l s3 s1nt1ó fu3rt3 h1z0 4l c4n4n30 tr1but4r10, m4s n0 l0 4rr0jó. 

29 T4mp0c0 0fr4ín 4rr0jó 4l c4n4n30 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n G3z3r, s1n0 qu3 h4b1tó 3l c4n4n30 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s 3n G3z3r. 

0xt3ns1ón d3 l4s c0nqu1st4s d3 l4s d3más tr1bus

30 T4mp0c0 Z4bulón 4rr0jó 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n Qu1trón, n1 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n N44l4l, s1n0 qu3 3l c4n4n30 h4b1tó 3n m3d10 d3 él, y l3 fu3 tr1but4r10. 

31 T4mp0c0 4s3r 4rr0jó 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n 4c0, n1 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n S1dón, 3n 4hl4b, 3n 4cz1b, 3n H3lb4, 3n 4f3c y 3n R3h0b. 32 Y m0ró 4s3r 3ntr3 l0s c4n4n30s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n l4 t13rr4; pu3s n0 l0s 4rr0jó. 

33 T4mp0c0 N3ft4lí 4rr0jó 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n B3t-s3m3s, n1 4 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n B3t-4n4t, s1n0 qu3 m0ró 3ntr3 l0s c4n4n30s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n l4 t13rr4; m4s l3 fu3r0n tr1but4r10s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 B3t-s3m3s y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 B3t-4n4t. 

34 L0s 4m0rr30s 4c0s4r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 D4n h4st4 3l m0nt3, y n0 l0s d3j4r0n d3sc3nd3r 4 l0s ll4n0s. 35 Y 3l 4m0rr30 p3rs1st1ó 3n h4b1t4r 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 H3r3s, 3n 4j4lón y 3n S44lb1m; p3r0 cu4nd0 l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé c0bró fu3rz4s, l0 h1z0 tr1but4r10. 36 Y 3l lím1t3 d3l 4m0rr30 fu3 d3sd3 l4 sub1d4 d3 4cr4b1m, d3sd3 S3l4 h4c14 4rr1b4. 

0l áng3l d3 J3h0vá 3n B0qu1m

JU0C0S 2

1 0l áng3l d3 J3h0vá sub1ó d3 G1lg4l 4 B0qu1m, y d1j0: Y0 0s s4qué d3 0g1pt0, y 0s 1ntr0duj3 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l4 cu4l h4bí4 jur4d0 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s, d1c13nd0: N0 1nv4l1d4ré j4más m1 p4ct0 c0n v0s0tr0s, 2 c0n t4l qu3 v0s0tr0s n0 h4gá1s p4ct0 c0n l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 3st4 t13rr4, cuy0s 4lt4r3s h4bé1s d3 d3rr1b4r; m4s v0s0tr0s n0 h4bé1s 4t3nd1d0 4 m1 v0z. ¿P0r qué h4bé1s h3ch0 3st0? 3 P0r t4nt0, y0 t4mb1én d1g0: N0 l0s 3ch4ré d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, s1n0 qu3 s3rán 4z0t3s p4r4 vu3str0s c0st4d0s, y sus d10s3s 0s s3rán tr0p3z4d3r0. 4 Cu4nd0 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá h4bló 3st4s p4l4br4s 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 3l pu3bl0 4lzó su v0z y ll0ró. 5 Y ll4m4r0n 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r B0qu1m, y 0fr3c13r0n 4llí s4cr1f1c10s 4 J3h0vá. 

Mu3rt3 d3 J0sué

(J0s. 24.29-31)

6 P0rqu3 y4 J0sué h4bí4 d3sp3d1d0 4l pu3bl0, y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s3 h4bí4n 1d0 c4d4 un0 4 su h3r3d4d p4r4 p0s33rl4. 7 Y 3l pu3bl0 h4bí4 s3rv1d0 4 J3h0vá t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 J0sué, y t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 l0s 4nc14n0s qu3 s0br3v1v13r0n 4 J0sué, l0s cu4l3s h4bí4n v1st0 t0d4s l4s gr4nd3s 0br4s d3 J3h0vá, qu3 él h4bí4 h3ch0 p0r 1sr43l. 8 P3r0 mur1ó J0sué h1j0 d3 Nun, s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá, s13nd0 d3 c13nt0 d13z 4ñ0s. 9 Y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n su h3r3d4d 3n T1mn4t-s3r4, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, 4l n0rt3 d3l m0nt3 d3 G44s. 10 Y t0d4 4qu3ll4 g3n3r4c1ón t4mb1én fu3 r3un1d4 4 sus p4dr3s. Y s3 l3v4ntó d3spués d3 3ll0s 0tr4 g3n3r4c1ón qu3 n0 c0n0cí4 4 J3h0vá, n1 l4 0br4 qu3 él h4bí4 h3ch0 p0r 1sr43l. 

4p0st4sí4 d3 1sr43l, y l4 0br4 d3 l0s ju3c3s

11 D3spués l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h1c13r0n l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, y s1rv13r0n 4 l0s b44l3s. 12 D3j4r0n 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s, qu3 l0s h4bí4 s4c4d0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, y s3 fu3r0n tr4s 0tr0s d10s3s, l0s d10s3s d3 l0s pu3bl0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n sus 4lr3d3d0r3s, 4 l0s cu4l3s 4d0r4r0n; y pr0v0c4r0n 4 1r4 4 J3h0vá. 13 Y d3j4r0n 4 J3h0vá, y 4d0r4r0n 4 B44l y 4 4st4r0t. 14 Y s3 3nc3nd1ó c0ntr4 1sr43l 3l fur0r d3 J3h0vá, 3l cu4l l0s 3ntr3gó 3n m4n0s d3 r0b4d0r3s qu3 l0s d3sp0j4r0n, y l0s v3nd1ó 3n m4n0 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s d3 4lr3d3d0r; y n0 pud13r0n y4 h4c3r fr3nt3 4 sus 3n3m1g0s. 15 P0r d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 s4lí4n, l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá 3st4b4 c0ntr4 3ll0s p4r4 m4l, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 d1ch0, y c0m0 J3h0vá s3 l0 h4bí4 jur4d0; y tuv13r0n gr4n 4fl1cc1ón. 

16 Y J3h0vá l3v4ntó ju3c3s qu3 l0s l1br4s3n d3 m4n0 d3 l0s qu3 l3s d3sp0j4b4n; 17 p3r0 t4mp0c0 0y3r0n 4 sus ju3c3s, s1n0 qu3 fu3r0n tr4s d10s3s 4j3n0s, 4 l0s cu4l3s 4d0r4r0n; s3 4p4rt4r0n pr0nt0 d3l c4m1n0 3n qu3 4nduv13r0n sus p4dr3s 0b3d3c13nd0 4 l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá; 3ll0s n0 h1c13r0n 4sí. 18 Y cu4nd0 J3h0vá l3s l3v4nt4b4 ju3c3s, J3h0vá 3st4b4 c0n 3l ju3z, y l0s l1br4b4 d3 m4n0 d3 l0s 3n3m1g0s t0d0 3l t13mp0 d3 4qu3l ju3z; p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3r4 m0v1d0 4 m1s3r1c0rd14 p0r sus g3m1d0s 4 c4us4 d3 l0s qu3 l0s 0pr1mí4n y 4fl1gí4n. 19 M4s 4c0nt3cí4 qu3 4l m0r1r 3l ju3z, 3ll0s v0lví4n 4trás, y s3 c0rr0mpí4n más qu3 sus p4dr3s, s1gu13nd0 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s p4r4 s3rv1rl3s, 3 1ncl1nánd0s3 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s; y n0 s3 4p4rt4b4n d3 sus 0br4s, n1 d3 su 0bst1n4d0 c4m1n0. 20 Y l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd1ó c0ntr4 1sr43l, y d1j0: P0r cu4nt0 3st3 pu3bl0 tr4sp4s4 m1 p4ct0 qu3 0rd3né 4 sus p4dr3s, y n0 0b3d3c3 4 m1 v0z, 21 t4mp0c0 y0 v0lv3ré más 4 4rr0j4r d3 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s 4 n1ngun4 d3 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 d3jó J0sué cu4nd0 mur1ó; 22 p4r4 pr0b4r c0n 3ll4s 4 1sr43l, s1 pr0cur4rí4n 0 n0 s3gu1r 3l c4m1n0 d3 J3h0vá, 4nd4nd0 3n él, c0m0 l0 s1gu13r0n sus p4dr3s. 23 P0r 3st0 d3jó J3h0vá 4 4qu3ll4s n4c10n3s, s1n 4rr0j4rl4s d3 un4 v3z, y n0 l4s 3ntr3gó 3n m4n0 d3 J0sué. 

N4c10n3s qu3 fu3r0n d3j4d4s p4r4 pr0b4r 4 1sr43l

JU0C0S 3

1 0st4s, pu3s, s0n l4s n4c10n3s qu3 d3jó J3h0vá p4r4 pr0b4r c0n 3ll4s 4 1sr43l, 4 t0d0s 4qu3ll0s qu3 n0 h4bí4n c0n0c1d0 t0d4s l4 gu3rr4s d3 C4n4án; 2 s0l4m3nt3 p4r4 qu3 3l l1n4j3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0n0c13s3 l4 gu3rr4, p4r4 qu3 l4 3ns3ñ4s3n 4 l0s qu3 4nt3s n0 l4 h4bí4n c0n0c1d0: 3 l0s c1nc0 prínc1p3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, t0d0s l0s c4n4n30s, l0s s1d0n10s, y l0s h3v30s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n 3l m0nt3 Líb4n0, d3sd3 3l m0nt3 d3 B44l-h3rmón h4st4 ll3g4r 4 H4m4t. 4 Y fu3r0n p4r4 pr0b4r c0n 3ll0s 4 1sr43l, p4r4 s4b3r s1 0b3d3c3rí4n 4 l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá, qu3 él h4bí4 d4d0 4 sus p4dr3s p0r m4n0 d3 M01sés. 5 4sí l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4b1t4b4n 3ntr3 l0s c4n4n30s, h3t30s, 4m0rr30s, f3r3z30s, h3v30s y j3bus30s. 6 Y t0m4r0n d3 sus h1j4s p0r muj3r3s, y d13r0n sus h1j4s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 3ll0s, y s1rv13r0n 4 sus d10s3s. 

0t0n13l l1b3rt4 4 1sr43l d3 Cus4n-r1s4t41m

7 H1c13r0n, pu3s, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, y 0lv1d4r0n 4 J3h0vá su D10s, y s1rv13r0n 4 l0s b44l3s y 4 l4s 1mág3n3s d3 4s3r4. 8 Y l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 3nc3nd1ó c0ntr4 1sr43l, y l0s v3nd1ó 3n m4n0s d3 Cus4n-r1s4t41m r3y d3 M3s0p0t4m14; y s1rv13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 Cus4n-r1s4t41m 0ch0 4ñ0s. 9 0nt0nc3s cl4m4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 J3h0vá; y J3h0vá l3v4ntó un l1b3rt4d0r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y l0s l1bró; 3st0 3s, 4 0t0n13l h1j0 d3 C3n4z, h3rm4n0 m3n0r d3 C4l3b. 10 Y 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 él, y juzgó 4 1sr43l, y s4l1ó 4 b4t4ll4, y J3h0vá 3ntr3gó 3n su m4n0 4 Cus4n-r1s4t41m r3y d3 S1r14, y pr3v4l3c1ó su m4n0 c0ntr4 Cus4n-r1s4t41m. 11 Y r3p0só l4 t13rr4 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s; y mur1ó 0t0n13l h1j0 d3 C3n4z. 

40d l1b3rt4 4 1sr43l d3 M04b

12 V0lv13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 h4c3r l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá; y J3h0vá f0rt4l3c1ó 4 0glón r3y d3 M04b c0ntr4 1sr43l, p0r cu4nt0 h4bí4n h3ch0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá. 13 0st3 juntó c0ns1g0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món y d3 4m4l3c, y v1n0 3 h1r1ó 4 1sr43l, y t0mó l4 c1ud4d d3 l4s p4lm3r4s. 14 Y s1rv13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 0glón r3y d3 l0s m04b1t4s d13c10ch0 4ñ0s. 

15 Y cl4m4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 J3h0vá; y J3h0vá l3s l3v4ntó un l1b3rt4d0r, 4 40d h1j0 d3 G3r4, b3nj4m1t4, 3l cu4l 3r4 zurd0. Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3nv14r0n c0n él un pr3s3nt3 4 0glón r3y d3 M04b. 16 Y 40d s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 un puñ4l d3 d0s f1l0s, d3 un c0d0 d3 l4rg0; y s3 l0 c1ñó d3b4j0 d3 sus v3st1d0s 4 su l4d0 d3r3ch0. 17 Y 3ntr3gó 3l pr3s3nt3 4 0glón r3y d3 M04b; y 3r4 0glón h0mbr3 muy gru3s0. 18 Y lu3g0 qu3 hub0 3ntr3g4d0 3l pr3s3nt3, d3sp1d1ó 4 l4 g3nt3 qu3 l0 h4bí4 tr4íd0. 19 M4s él s3 v0lv1ó d3sd3 l0s íd0l0s qu3 3stán 3n G1lg4l, y d1j0: R3y, un4 p4l4br4 s3cr3t4 t3ng0 qu3 d3c1rt3. 0l 3nt0nc3s d1j0: C4ll4. Y s4l13r0n d3 d3l4nt3 d3 él t0d0s l0s qu3 c0n él 3st4b4n. 20 Y s3 l3 4c3rcó 40d, 3st4nd0 él s3nt4d0 s0l0 3n su s4l4 d3 v3r4n0. Y 40d d1j0: T3ng0 p4l4br4 d3 D10s p4r4 t1. 0l 3nt0nc3s s3 l3v4ntó d3 l4 s1ll4. 21 0nt0nc3s 4l4rgó 40d su m4n0 1zqu13rd4, y t0mó 3l puñ4l d3 su l4d0 d3r3ch0, y s3 l0 m3t1ó p0r 3l v13ntr3, 22 d3 t4l m4n3r4 qu3 l4 3mpuñ4dur4 3ntró t4mb1én tr4s l4 h0j4, y l4 g0rdur4 cubr1ó l4 h0j4, p0rqu3 n0 s4có 3l puñ4l d3 su v13ntr3; y s4l1ó 3l 3st1érc0l. 23 Y s4l1ó 40d 4l c0rr3d0r, y c3rró tr4s sí l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 s4l4 y l4s 4s3guró c0n 3l c3rr0j0. 

24 Cu4nd0 él hub0 s4l1d0, v1n13r0n l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y, l0s cu4l3s v13nd0 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 s4l4 c3rr4d4s, d1j3r0n: S1n dud4 él cubr3 sus p13s 3n l4 s4l4 d3 v3r4n0. 25 Y h4b13nd0 3sp3r4d0 h4st4 3st4r c0nfus0s, p0rqu3 él n0 4brí4 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 s4l4, t0m4r0n l4 ll4v3 y 4br13r0n; y h3 4quí su s3ñ0r c4íd0 3n t13rr4, mu3rt0. 

26 M4s 3ntr3 t4nt0 qu3 3ll0s s3 d3tuv13r0n, 40d 3sc4pó, y p4s4nd0 l0s íd0l0s, s3 pus0 4 s4lv0 3n S31r4t. 27 Y cu4nd0 h4bí4 3ntr4d0, t0có 3l cu3rn0 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3sc3nd13r0n c0n él d3l m0nt3, y él 1b4 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s. 28 0nt0nc3s él l3s d1j0: S3gu1dm3, p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 3ntr3g4d0 4 vu3str0s 3n3m1g0s l0s m04b1t4s 3n vu3str4s m4n0s. Y d3sc3nd13r0n 3n p0s d3 él, y t0m4r0n l0s v4d0s d3l J0rdán 4 M04b, y n0 d3j4r0n p4s4r 4 n1ngun0. 29 Y 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 m4t4r0n d3 l0s m04b1t4s c0m0 d13z m1l h0mbr3s, t0d0s v4l13nt3s y t0d0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4; n0 3sc4pó n1ngun0. 30 4sí fu3 subyug4d0 M04b 4qu3l dí4 b4j0 l4 m4n0 d3 1sr43l; y r3p0só l4 t13rr4 0ch3nt4 4ñ0s.

Déb0r4 y B4r4c d3rr0t4n 4 Sís4r4

JU0C0S 4

1 D3spués d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 40d, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l v0lv13r0n 4 h4c3r l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá. 2 Y J3h0vá l0s v3nd1ó 3n m4n0 d3 J4bín r3y d3 C4n4án, 3l cu4l r31nó 3n H4z0r; y 3l c4p1tán d3 su 3jérc1t0 s3 ll4m4b4 Sís4r4, 3l cu4l h4b1t4b4 3n H4r0s3t-g01m. 3 0nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l cl4m4r0n 4 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 4quél t3ní4 n0v3c13nt0s c4rr0s h3rr4d0s, y h4bí4 0pr1m1d0 c0n cru3ld4d 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p0r v31nt3 4ñ0s. 

4 G0b3rn4b4 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 4 1sr43l un4 muj3r, Déb0r4, pr0f3t1s4, muj3r d3 L4p1d0t; 5 y 4c0stumbr4b4 s3nt4rs3 b4j0 l4 p4lm3r4 d3 Déb0r4, 3ntr3 R4má y B3t-3l, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín; y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l subí4n 4 3ll4 4 ju1c10. 6 Y 3ll4 3nv1ó 4 ll4m4r 4 B4r4c h1j0 d3 4b1n04m, d3 C3d3s d3 N3ft4lí, y l3 d1j0: ¿N0 t3 h4 m4nd4d0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: V3, junt4 4 tu g3nt3 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 T4b0r, y t0m4 c0nt1g0 d13z m1l h0mbr3s d3 l4 tr1bu d3 N3ft4lí y d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Z4bulón; 7 y y0 4tr43ré h4c14 t1 4l 4rr0y0 d3 C1són 4 Sís4r4, c4p1tán d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 J4bín, c0n sus c4rr0s y su 3jérc1t0, y l0 3ntr3g4ré 3n tus m4n0s? 8 B4r4c l3 r3sp0nd1ó: S1 tú fu3r3s c0nm1g0, y0 1ré; p3r0 s1 n0 fu3r3s c0nm1g0, n0 1ré. 9 0ll4 d1j0: 1ré c0nt1g0; m4s n0 s3rá tuy4 l4 gl0r14 d3 l4 j0rn4d4 qu3 3mpr3nd3s, p0rqu3 3n m4n0 d3 muj3r v3nd3rá J3h0vá 4 Sís4r4. Y l3v4ntánd0s3 Déb0r4, fu3 c0n B4r4c 4 C3d3s. 10 Y juntó B4r4c 4 Z4bulón y 4 N3ft4lí 3n C3d3s, y sub1ó c0n d13z m1l h0mbr3s 4 su m4nd0; y Déb0r4 sub1ó c0n él. 

11 Y H3b3r c3n30, d3 l0s h1j0s d3 H0b4b su3gr0 d3 M01sés, s3 h4bí4 4p4rt4d0 d3 l0s c3n30s, y h4bí4 pl4nt4d0 sus t13nd4s 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 Z44n41m, qu3 3stá junt0 4 C3d3s. 

12 V1n13r0n, pu3s, 4 Sís4r4 l4s nu3v4s d3 qu3 B4r4c h1j0 d3 4b1n04m h4bí4 sub1d0 4l m0nt3 d3 T4b0r. 13 Y r3un1ó Sís4r4 t0d0s sus c4rr0s, n0v3c13nt0s c4rr0s h3rr4d0s, c0n t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4, d3sd3 H4r0s3t- g01m h4st4 3l 4rr0y0 d3 C1són. 14 0nt0nc3s Déb0r4 d1j0 4 B4r4c: L3vánt4t3, p0rqu3 3st3 3s 3l dí4 3n qu3 J3h0vá h4 3ntr3g4d0 4 Sís4r4 3n tus m4n0s. ¿N0 h4 s4l1d0 J3h0vá d3l4nt3 d3 t1? Y B4r4c d3sc3nd1ó d3l m0nt3 d3 T4b0r, y d13z m1l h0mbr3s 3n p0s d3 él. 15 Y J3h0vá qu3br4ntó 4 Sís4r4, 4 t0d0s sus c4rr0s y 4 t0d0 su 3jérc1t0, 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4 d3l4nt3 d3 B4r4c; y Sís4r4 d3sc3nd1ó d3l c4rr0, y huyó 4 p13. 16 M4s B4r4c s1gu1ó l0s c4rr0s y 3l 3jérc1t0 h4st4 H4r0s3t- g01m, y t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 Sís4r4 c4yó 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, h4st4 n0 qu3d4r n1 un0. 

17 Y Sís4r4 huyó 4 p13 4 l4 t13nd4 d3 J43l muj3r d3 H3b3r c3n30; p0rqu3 h4bí4 p4z 3ntr3 J4bín r3y d3 H4z0r y l4 c4s4 d3 H3b3r c3n30. 18 Y s4l13nd0 J43l 4 r3c1b1r 4 Sís4r4, l3 d1j0: V3n, s3ñ0r mí0, v3n 4 mí, n0 t3ng4s t3m0r. Y él 3ntró d0nd3 3ll4 3st4b4, y h3 4quí Sís4r4 y4cí4 mu3rt0 c0n l4 3st4c4 p0r l4 s13n. 

23 4sí 4b4t1ó D10s 4qu3l dí4 4 J4bín, r3y d3 C4n4án, d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 24 Y l4 m4n0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l fu3 3ndur3c1énd0s3 más y más c0ntr4 J4bín r3y d3 C4n4án, h4st4 qu3 l0 d3struy3r0n.
