Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, p0r c4us4 d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s, s3 h1c13r0n cu3v4s 3n l0s m0nt3s, y c4v3rn4s, y lug4r3s f0rt1f1c4d0s. 3 Pu3s suc3dí4 qu3 cu4nd0 1sr43l h4bí4 s3mbr4d0, subí4n l0s m4d14n1t4s y 4m4l3c1t4s y l0s h1j0s d3l 0r13nt3 c0ntr4 3ll0s; subí4n y l0s 4t4c4b4n. 4 Y 4c4mp4nd0 c0ntr4 3ll0s d3struí4n l0s frut0s d3 l4 t13rr4, h4st4 ll3g4r 4 G4z4; y n0 d3j4b4n qué c0m3r 3n 1sr43l, n1 0v3j4s, n1 bu3y3s, n1 4sn0s. 5 P0rqu3 subí4n 3ll0s y sus g4n4d0s, y v3ní4n c0n sus t13nd4s 3n gr4nd3 mult1tud c0m0 l4ng0st4s; 3ll0s y sus c4m3ll0s 3r4n 1nnum3r4bl3s; 4sí v3ní4n 4 l4 t13rr4 p4r4 d3v4st4rl4. 6 D3 3st3 m0d0 3mp0br3cí4 1sr43l 3n gr4n m4n3r4 p0r c4us4 d3 M4d1án; y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l cl4m4r0n 4 J3h0vá. 

7 Y cu4nd0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l cl4m4r0n 4 J3h0vá, 4 c4us4 d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s, 8 J3h0vá 3nv1ó 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l un v4rón pr0f3t4, 3l cu4l l3s d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l: Y0 0s h1c3 s4l1r d3 0g1pt0, y 0s s4qué d3 l4 c4s4 d3 s3rv1dumbr3. 9 0s l1bré d3 m4n0 d3 l0s 3g1pc10s, y d3 m4n0 d3 t0d0s l0s qu3 0s 4fl1g13r0n, 4 l0s cu4l3s 3ché d3 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, y 0s d1 su t13rr4; 10 y 0s d1j3: Y0 s0y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s; n0 t3má1s 4 l0s d10s3s d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, 3n cuy4 t13rr4 h4b1tá1s; p3r0 n0 h4bé1s 0b3d3c1d0 4 m1 v0z. 

11 Y v1n0 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá, y s3 s3ntó d3b4j0 d3 l4 3nc1n4 qu3 3stá 3n 0fr4, l4 cu4l 3r4 d3 J0ás 4b13z3r1t4; y su h1j0 G3d3ón 3st4b4 s4cud13nd0 3l tr1g0 3n 3l l4g4r, p4r4 3sc0nd3rl0 d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s. 12 Y 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá s3 l3 4p4r3c1ó, y l3 d1j0: J3h0vá 3stá c0nt1g0, v4rón 3sf0rz4d0 y v4l13nt3. 13 Y G3d3ón l3 r3sp0nd1ó: 4h, s3ñ0r mí0, s1 J3h0vá 3stá c0n n0s0tr0s, ¿p0r qué n0s h4 s0br3v3n1d0 t0d0 3st0? ¿Y dónd3 3stán t0d4s sus m4r4v1ll4s, qu3 nu3str0s p4dr3s n0s h4n c0nt4d0, d1c13nd0: ¿N0 n0s s4có J3h0vá d3 0g1pt0? Y 4h0r4 J3h0vá n0s h4 d3s4mp4r4d0, y n0s h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n m4n0 d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s. 14 Y m1ránd0l3 J3h0vá, l3 d1j0: V3 c0n 3st4 tu fu3rz4, y s4lv4rás 4 1sr43l d3 l4 m4n0 d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s. ¿N0 t3 3nví0 y0? 15 0nt0nc3s l3 r3sp0nd1ó: 4h, s3ñ0r mí0, ¿c0n qué s4lv4ré y0 4 1sr43l? H3 4quí qu3 m1 f4m1l14 3s p0br3 3n M4n4sés, y y0 3l m3n0r 3n l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3. 16 J3h0vá l3 d1j0: C13rt4m3nt3 y0 3st4ré c0nt1g0, y d3rr0t4rás 4 l0s m4d14n1t4s c0m0 4 un s0l0 h0mbr3. 17 Y él r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 s1 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, m3 d3s s3ñ4l d3 qu3 tú h4s h4bl4d0 c0nm1g0. 18 T3 ru3g0 qu3 n0 t3 v4y4s d3 4quí h4st4 qu3 vu3lv4 4 t1, y s4qu3 m1 0fr3nd4 y l4 p0ng4 d3l4nt3 d3 t1. Y él r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 3sp3r4ré h4st4 qu3 vu3lv4s. 

19 Y 3ntr4nd0 G3d3ón, pr3p4ró un c4br1t0, y p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4 d3 un 3f4 d3 h4r1n4; y pus0 l4 c4rn3 3n un c4n4st1ll0, y 3l c4ld0 3n un4 0ll4, y s4cánd0l0 s3 l0 pr3s3ntó d3b4j0 d3 4qu3ll4 3nc1n4. 20 0nt0nc3s 3l áng3l d3 D10s l3 d1j0: T0m4 l4 c4rn3 y l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4, y p0nl0s s0br3 3st4 p3ñ4, y v13rt3 3l c4ld0. Y él l0 h1z0 4sí. 21 Y 3xt3nd13nd0 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá 3l bácul0 qu3 t3ní4 3n su m4n0, t0có c0n l4 punt4 l4 c4rn3 y l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4; y sub1ó fu3g0 d3 l4 p3ñ4, 3l cu4l c0nsum1ó l4 c4rn3 y l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4. Y 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá d3s4p4r3c1ó d3 su v1st4. 22 V13nd0 3nt0nc3s G3d3ón qu3 3r4 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá, d1j0: 4h, S3ñ0r J3h0vá, qu3 h3 v1st0 4l áng3l d3 J3h0vá c4r4 4 c4r4. 23 P3r0 J3h0vá l3 d1j0: P4z 4 t1; n0 t3ng4s t3m0r, n0 m0r1rás. 24 Y 3d1f1có 4llí G3d3ón 4lt4r 4 J3h0vá, y l0 ll4mó J3h0vá-s4l0m; 3l cu4l p3rm4n3c3 h4st4 h0y 3n 0fr4 d3 l0s 4b13z3r1t4s. 

25 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 l4 m1sm4 n0ch3 l3 d1j0 J3h0vá: T0m4 un t0r0 d3l h4t0 d3 tu p4dr3, 3l s3gund0 t0r0 d3 s13t3 4ñ0s, y d3rr1b4 3l 4lt4r d3 B44l qu3 tu p4dr3 t13n3, y c0rt4 t4mb1én l4 1m4g3n d3 4s3r4 qu3 3stá junt0 4 él; 26 y 3d1f1c4 4lt4r 4 J3h0vá tu D10s 3n l4 cumbr3 d3 3st3 p3ñ4sc0 3n lug4r c0nv3n13nt3; y t0m4nd0 3l s3gund0 t0r0, s4cr1fíc4l0 3n h0l0c4ust0 c0n l4 m4d3r4 d3 l4 1m4g3n d3 4s3r4 qu3 h4brás c0rt4d0. 27 0nt0nc3s G3d3ón t0mó d13z h0mbr3s d3 sus s13rv0s, 3 h1z0 c0m0 J3h0vá l3 d1j0. M4s t3m13nd0 h4c3rl0 d3 dí4, p0r l4 f4m1l14 d3 su p4dr3 y p0r l0s h0mbr3s d3 l4 c1ud4d, l0 h1z0 d3 n0ch3. 

28 P0r l4 m4ñ4n4, cu4nd0 l0s d3 l4 c1ud4d s3 l3v4nt4r0n, h3 4quí qu3 3l 4lt4r d3 B44l 3st4b4 d3rr1b4d0, y c0rt4d4 l4 1m4g3n d3 4s3r4 qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4 él, y 3l s3gund0 t0r0 h4bí4 s1d0 0fr3c1d0 3n h0l0c4ust0 s0br3 3l 4lt4r 3d1f1c4d0. 29 Y s3 d1j3r0n un0s 4 0tr0s: ¿Qu1én h4 h3ch0 3st0? Y busc4nd0 3 1nqu1r13nd0, l3s d1j3r0n: G3d3ón h1j0 d3 J0ás l0 h4 h3ch0. 0nt0nc3s l0s h0mbr3s d3 l4 c1ud4d d1j3r0n 4 J0ás: 30 S4c4 4 tu h1j0 p4r4 qu3 mu3r4, p0rqu3 h4 d3rr1b4d0 3l 4lt4r d3 B44l y h4 c0rt4d0 l4 1m4g3n d3 4s3r4 qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4 él. 31 Y J0ás r3sp0nd1ó 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4b4n junt0 4 él: ¿C0nt3nd3ré1s v0s0tr0s p0r B44l? ¿D3f3nd3ré1s su c4us4? Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 c0nt13nd4 p0r él, qu3 mu3r4 3st4 m4ñ4n4. S1 3s un d10s, c0nt13nd4 p0r sí m1sm0 c0n 3l qu3 d3rr1bó su 4lt4r. 32 4qu3l dí4 G3d3ón fu3 ll4m4d0 J3r0b44l, 3st0 3s: C0nt13nd4 B44l c0ntr4 él, p0r cu4nt0 d3rr1bó su 4lt4r. 

33 P3r0 t0d0s l0s m4d14n1t4s y 4m4l3c1t4s y l0s d3l 0r13nt3 s3 junt4r0n 4 un4, y p4s4nd0 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 J3zr33l. 34 0nt0nc3s 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 G3d3ón, y cu4nd0 ést3 t0có 3l cu3rn0, l0s 4b13z3r1t4s s3 r3un13r0n c0n él. 35 Y 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s p0r t0d0 M4n4sés, y 3ll0s t4mb1én s3 junt4r0n c0n él; 4s1m1sm0 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s 4 4s3r, 4 Z4bulón y 4 N3ft4lí, l0s cu4l3s s4l13r0n 4 3nc0ntr4rl3s. 

36 Y G3d3ón d1j0 4 D10s: S1 h4s d3 s4lv4r 4 1sr43l p0r m1 m4n0, c0m0 h4s d1ch0, 37 h3 4quí qu3 y0 p0ndré un v3llón d3 l4n4 3n l4 3r4; y s1 3l r0cí0 3stuv13r3 3n 3l v3llón s0l4m3nt3, qu3d4nd0 s3c4 t0d4 l4 0tr4 t13rr4, 3nt0nc3s 3nt3nd3ré qu3 s4lv4rás 4 1sr43l p0r m1 m4n0, c0m0 l0 h4s d1ch0. 38 Y 4c0nt3c1ó 4sí, pu3s cu4nd0 s3 l3v4ntó d3 m4ñ4n4, 3xpr1m1ó 3l v3llón y s4có d3 él 3l r0cí0, un t4zón ll3n0 d3 4gu4. 39 M4s G3d3ón d1j0 4 D10s: N0 s3 3nc13nd4 tu 1r4 c0ntr4 mí, s1 4ún h4bl4r3 3st4 v3z; s0l4m3nt3 pr0b4ré 4h0r4 0tr4 v3z c0n 3l v3llón. T3 ru3g0 qu3 s0l4m3nt3 3l v3llón qu3d3 s3c0, y 3l r0cí0 s0br3 l4 t13rr4. 40 Y 4qu3ll4 n0ch3 l0 h1z0 D10s 4sí; sól0 3l v3llón qu3dó s3c0, y 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4 hub0 r0cí0. 

G3d3ón d3rr0t4 4 l0s m4d14n1t4s

JU0C0S 7

1 L3v4ntánd0s3, pu3s, d3 m4ñ4n4 J3r0b44l, 3l cu4l 3s G3d3ón, y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 3st4b4 c0n él, 4c4mp4r0n junt0 4 l4 fu3nt3 d3 H4r0d; y t3ní4 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s 4l n0rt3, más 4llá d3l c0ll4d0 d3 M0r3, 3n 3l v4ll3. 

2 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 G3d3ón: 0l pu3bl0 qu3 3stá c0nt1g0 3s much0 p4r4 qu3 y0 3ntr3gu3 4 l0s m4d14n1t4s 3n su m4n0, n0 s34 qu3 s3 4l4b3 1sr43l c0ntr4 mí, d1c13nd0: M1 m4n0 m3 h4 s4lv4d0. 3 4h0r4, pu3s, h4z pr3g0n4r 3n 0íd0s d3l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: Qu13n t3m4 y s3 3str3m3zc4, m4drugu3 y d3vuélv4s3 d3sd3 3l m0nt3 d3 G4l44d. Y s3 d3v0lv13r0n d3 l0s d3l pu3bl0 v31nt1dós m1l, y qu3d4r0n d13z m1l. 

4 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 G3d3ón: 4ún 3s much0 3l pu3bl0; llév4l0s 4 l4s 4gu4s, y 4llí t3 l0s pr0b4ré; y d3l qu3 y0 t3 d1g4: V4y4 ést3 c0nt1g0, 1rá c0nt1g0; m4s d3 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 y0 t3 d1g4: 0st3 n0 v4y4 c0nt1g0, 3l t4l n0 1rá. 5 0nt0nc3s ll3vó 3l pu3bl0 4 l4s 4gu4s; y J3h0vá d1j0 4 G3d3ón: Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 l4m13r3 l4s 4gu4s c0n su l3ngu4 c0m0 l4m3 3l p3rr0, 4 4quél p0ndrás 4p4rt3; 4s1m1sm0 4 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 s3 d0bl4r3 s0br3 sus r0d1ll4s p4r4 b3b3r. 6 Y fu3 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s qu3 l4m13r0n ll3v4nd0 3l 4gu4 c0n l4 m4n0 4 su b0c4, tr3sc13nt0s h0mbr3s; y t0d0 3l r3st0 d3l pu3bl0 s3 d0bló s0br3 sus r0d1ll4s p4r4 b3b3r l4s 4gu4s. 7 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d1j0 4 G3d3ón: C0n 3st0s tr3sc13nt0s h0mbr3s qu3 l4m13r0n 3l 4gu4 0s s4lv4ré, y 3ntr3g4ré 4 l0s m4d14n1t4s 3n tus m4n0s; y váy4s3 t0d4 l4 d3más g3nt3 c4d4 un0 4 su lug4r. 8 Y h4b13nd0 t0m4d0 pr0v1s10n3s p4r4 3l pu3bl0, y sus tr0mp3t4s, 3nv1ó 4 t0d0s l0s 1sr43l1t4s c4d4 un0 4 su t13nd4, y r3tuv0 4 4qu3ll0s tr3sc13nt0s h0mbr3s; y t3ní4 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 M4d1án 4b4j0 3n 3l v4ll3. 

9 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 4qu3ll4 n0ch3 J3h0vá l3 d1j0: L3vánt4t3, y d3sc13nd3 4l c4mp4m3nt0; p0rqu3 y0 l0 h3 3ntr3g4d0 3n tus m4n0s. 10 Y s1 t13n3s t3m0r d3 d3sc3nd3r, b4j4 tú c0n Fur4 tu cr14d0 4l c4mp4m3nt0, 11 y 01rás l0 qu3 h4bl4n; y 3nt0nc3s tus m4n0s s3 3sf0rz4rán, y d3sc3nd3rás 4l c4mp4m3nt0. Y él d3sc3nd1ó c0n Fur4 su cr14d0 h4st4 l0s pu3st0s 4v4nz4d0s d3 l4 g3nt3 4rm4d4 qu3 3st4b4 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0. 12 Y l0s m4d14n1t4s, l0s 4m4l3c1t4s y l0s h1j0s d3l 0r13nt3 3st4b4n t3nd1d0s 3n 3l v4ll3 c0m0 l4ng0st4s 3n mult1tud, y sus c4m3ll0s 3r4n 1nnum3r4bl3s c0m0 l4 4r3n4 qu3 3stá 4 l4 r1b3r4 d3l m4r 3n mult1tud. 13 Cu4nd0 ll3gó G3d3ón, h3 4quí qu3 un h0mbr3 3st4b4 c0nt4nd0 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0 un su3ñ0, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí y0 s0ñé un su3ñ0: V3í4 un p4n d3 c3b4d4 qu3 r0d4b4 h4st4 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 M4d1án, y ll3gó 4 l4 t13nd4, y l4 g0lp3ó d3 t4l m4n3r4 qu3 c4yó, y l4 tr4st0rnó d3 4rr1b4 4b4j0, y l4 t13nd4 c4yó. 14 Y su c0mp4ñ3r0 r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: 0st0 n0 3s 0tr4 c0s4 s1n0 l4 3sp4d4 d3 G3d3ón h1j0 d3 J0ás, v4rón d3 1sr43l. D10s h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n sus m4n0s 4 l0s m4d14n1t4s c0n t0d0 3l c4mp4m3nt0. 

15 Cu4nd0 G3d3ón 0yó 3l r3l4t0 d3l su3ñ0 y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, 4d0ró; y vu3lt0 4l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 1sr43l, d1j0: L3v4nt40s, p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 3ntr3g4d0 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 M4d1án 3n vu3str4s m4n0s. 16 Y r3p4rt13nd0 l0s tr3sc13nt0s h0mbr3s 3n tr3s 3scu4dr0n3s, d10 4 t0d0s 3ll0s tr0mp3t4s 3n sus m4n0s, y cánt4r0s v4cí0s c0n t34s 4rd13nd0 d3ntr0 d3 l0s cánt4r0s. 17 Y l3s d1j0: M1r4dm3 4 mí, y h4c3d c0m0 h4g0 y0; h3 4quí qu3 cu4nd0 y0 ll3gu3 4l 3xtr3m0 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, h4ré1s v0s0tr0s c0m0 h4g0 y0. 18 Y0 t0c4ré l4 tr0mp3t4, y t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4rán c0nm1g0; y v0s0tr0s t0c4ré1s 3nt0nc3s l4s tr0mp3t4s 4lr3d3d0r d3 t0d0 3l c4mp4m3nt0, y d1ré1s: ¡P0r J3h0vá y p0r G3d3ón! 19 Ll3g4r0n, pu3s, G3d3ón y l0s c13n h0mbr3s qu3 ll3v4b4 c0ns1g0, 4l 3xtr3m0 d3l c4mp4m3nt0, 4l pr1nc1p10 d3 l4 gu4rd14 d3 l4 m3d14n0ch3, cu4nd0 4c4b4b4n d3 r3n0v4r l0s c3nt1n3l4s; y t0c4r0n l4s tr0mp3t4s, y qu3br4r0n l0s cánt4r0s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3n sus m4n0s. 20 Y l0s tr3s 3scu4dr0n3s t0c4r0n l4s tr0mp3t4s, y qu3br4nd0 l0s cánt4r0s t0m4r0n 3n l4 m4n0 1zqu13rd4 l4s t34s, y 3n l4 d3r3ch4 l4s tr0mp3t4s c0n qu3 t0c4b4n, y gr1t4r0n: ¡P0r l4 3sp4d4 d3 J3h0vá y d3 G3d3ón! 21 Y s3 3stuv13r0n f1rm3s c4d4 un0 3n su pu3st0 3n d3rr3d0r d3l c4mp4m3nt0; 3nt0nc3s t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 3chó 4 c0rr3r d4nd0 gr1t0s y huy3nd0. 22 Y l0s tr3sc13nt0s t0c4b4n l4s tr0mp3t4s; y J3h0vá pus0 l4 3sp4d4 d3 c4d4 un0 c0ntr4 su c0mp4ñ3r0 3n t0d0 3l c4mp4m3nt0. Y 3l 3jérc1t0 huyó h4st4 B3t-s1t4, 3n d1r3cc1ón d3 Z3r3r4, y h4st4 l4 fr0nt3r4 d3 4b3l-m3h0l4 3n T4b4t. 23 Y juntánd0s3 l0s d3 1sr43l, d3 N3ft4lí, d3 4s3r y d3 t0d0 M4n4sés, s1gu13r0n 4 l0s m4d14n1t4s. 

24 G3d3ón t4mb1én 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s p0r t0d0 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, d1c13nd0: D3sc3nd3d 4l 3ncu3ntr0 d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s, y t0m4d l0s v4d0s d3 B3t-b4r4 y d3l J0rdán 4nt3s qu3 3ll0s ll3gu3n. Y junt0s t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 0fr4ín, t0m4r0n l0s v4d0s d3 B3t-b4r4 y d3l J0rdán. 25 Y t0m4r0n 4 d0s prínc1p3s d3 l0s m4d14n1t4s, 0r3b y Z33b; y m4t4r0n 4 0r3b 3n l4 p3ñ4 d3 0r3b, y 4 Z33b l0 m4t4r0n 3n 3l l4g4r d3 Z33b; y d3spués qu3 s1gu13r0n 4 l0s m4d14n1t4s, tr4j3r0n l4s c4b3z4s d3 0r3b y d3 Z33b 4 G3d3ón 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán. 

G3d3ón c4ptur4 4 l0s r3y3s d3 M4d1án

JU0C0S 8

1 P3r0 l0s h0mbr3s d3 0fr4ín l3 d1j3r0n: ¿Qué 3s 3st0 qu3 h4s h3ch0 c0n n0s0tr0s, n0 ll4mánd0n0s cu4nd0 1b4s 4 l4 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 M4d1án? Y l3 r3c0nv1n13r0n fu3rt3m3nt3. 2 4 l0s cu4l3s él r3sp0nd1ó: ¿Qué h3 h3ch0 y0 4h0r4 c0mp4r4d0 c0n v0s0tr0s? ¿N0 3s 3l r3busc0 d3 0fr4ín m3j0r qu3 l4 v3nd1m14 d3 4b13z3r? 3 D10s h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n vu3str4s m4n0s 4 0r3b y 4 Z33b, prínc1p3s d3 M4d1án; ¿y qué h3 p0d1d0 y0 h4c3r c0mp4r4d0 c0n v0s0tr0s? 0nt0nc3s 3l 3n0j0 d3 3ll0s c0ntr4 él s3 4pl4có, lu3g0 qu3 él h4bló 3st4 p4l4br4. 

4 Y v1n0 G3d3ón 4l J0rdán, y p4só él y l0s tr3sc13nt0s h0mbr3s qu3 tr4í4 c0ns1g0, c4ns4d0s, m4s t0d4ví4 p3rs1gu13nd0. 5 Y d1j0 4 l0s d3 Suc0t: Y0 0s ru3g0 qu3 d31s 4 l4 g3nt3 qu3 m3 s1gu3 4lgun0s b0c4d0s d3 p4n; p0rqu3 3stán c4ns4d0s, y y0 p3rs1g0 4 Z3b4 y Z4lmun4, r3y3s d3 M4d1án. 6 Y l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 Suc0t r3sp0nd13r0n: ¿0stán y4 Z3b4 y Z4lmun4 3n tu m4n0, p4r4 qu3 d3m0s p4n 4 tu 3jérc1t0? 7 Y G3d3ón d1j0: Cu4nd0 J3h0vá h4y4 3ntr3g4d0 3n m1 m4n0 4 Z3b4 y 4 Z4lmun4, y0 tr1ll4ré vu3str4 c4rn3 c0n 3sp1n0s y 4br0j0s d3l d3s13rt0. 8 D3 4llí sub1ó 4 P3n13l, y l3s d1j0 l4s m1sm4s p4l4br4s. Y l0s d3 P3n13l l3 r3sp0nd13r0n c0m0 h4bí4n r3sp0nd1d0 l0s d3 Suc0t. 9 Y él h4bló t4mb1én 4 l0s d3 P3n13l, d1c13nd0: Cu4nd0 y0 vu3lv4 3n p4z, d3rr1b4ré 3st4 t0rr3. 

10 Y Z3b4 y Z4lmun4 3st4b4n 3n C4rc0r, y c0n 3ll0s su 3jérc1t0 c0m0 d3 qu1nc3 m1l h0mbr3s, t0d0s l0s qu3 h4bí4n qu3d4d0 d3 t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3l 0r13nt3; pu3s h4bí4n c4íd0 c13nt0 v31nt3 m1l h0mbr3s qu3 s4c4b4n 3sp4d4. 11 Sub13nd0, pu3s, G3d3ón p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3 l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n t13nd4s 4l 0r13nt3 d3 N0b4 y d3 J0gb3h4, 4t4có 3l c4mp4m3nt0, p0rqu3 3l 3jérc1t0 n0 3st4b4 3n gu4rd14. 12 Y huy3nd0 Z3b4 y Z4lmun4, él l0s s1gu1ó; y pr3nd1ó 4 l0s d0s r3y3s d3 M4d1án, Z3b4 y Z4lmun4, y ll3nó d3 3sp4nt0 4 t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0. 

13 0nt0nc3s G3d3ón h1j0 d3 J0ás v0lv1ó d3 l4 b4t4ll4 4nt3s qu3 3l s0l sub13s3, 14 y t0mó 4 un j0v3n d3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 Suc0t, y l3 pr3guntó; y él l3 d10 p0r 3scr1t0 l0s n0mbr3s d3 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s y d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 Suc0t, s3t3nt4 y s13t3 v4r0n3s. 15 Y 3ntr4nd0 4 l0s h0mbr3s d3 Suc0t, d1j0: H3 4quí 4 Z3b4 y 4 Z4lmun4, 4c3rc4 d3 l0s cu4l3s m3 z4h3r1st31s, d1c13nd0: ¿0stán y4 3n tu m4n0 Z3b4 y Z4lmun4, p4r4 qu3 d3m0s n0s0tr0s p4n 4 tus h0mbr3s c4ns4d0s? 16 Y t0mó 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l4 c1ud4d, y 3sp1n0s y 4br0j0s d3l d3s13rt0, y c4st1gó c0n 3ll0s 4 l0s d3 Suc0t. 17 4s1m1sm0 d3rr1bó l4 t0rr3 d3 P3n13l, y m4tó 4 l0s d3 l4 c1ud4d. 

18 Lu3g0 d1j0 4 Z3b4 y 4 Z4lmun4: ¿Qué 4sp3ct0 t3ní4n 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s qu3 m4t4st31s 3n T4b0r? Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: C0m0 tú, 4sí 3r4n 3ll0s; c4d4 un0 p4r3cí4 h1j0 d3 r3y. 19 Y él d1j0: M1s h3rm4n0s 3r4n, h1j0s d3 m1 m4dr3. ¡V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 s1 l3s hub13r41s c0ns3rv4d0 l4 v1d4, y0 n0 0s m4t4rí4! 20 Y d1j0 4 J3t3r su pr1m0gén1t0: L3vánt4t3, y mát4l0s. P3r0 3l j0v3n n0 d3s3nv41nó su 3sp4d4, p0rqu3 t3ní4 t3m0r, pu3s 3r4 4ún much4ch0. 21 0nt0nc3s d1j3r0n Z3b4 y Z4lmun4: L3vánt4t3 tú, y mát4n0s; p0rqu3 c0m0 3s 3l v4rón, t4l 3s su v4l3ntí4. Y G3d3ón s3 l3v4ntó, y m4tó 4 Z3b4 y 4 Z4lmun4; y t0mó l0s 4d0rn0s d3 lun3t4s qu3 sus c4m3ll0s tr4í4n 4l cu3ll0. 

22 Y l0s 1sr43l1t4s d1j3r0n 4 G3d3ón: Sé nu3str0 s3ñ0r, tú, y tu h1j0, y tu n13t0; pu3s qu3 n0s h4s l1br4d0 d3 m4n0 d3 M4d1án. 23 M4s G3d3ón r3sp0nd1ó: N0 s3ré s3ñ0r s0br3 v0s0tr0s, n1 m1 h1j0 0s s3ñ0r34rá: J3h0vá s3ñ0r34rá s0br3 v0s0tr0s. 24 Y l3s d1j0 G3d3ón: Qu13r0 h4c3r0s un4 p3t1c1ón; qu3 c4d4 un0 m3 dé l0s z4rc1ll0s d3 su b0tín (pu3s tr4í4n z4rc1ll0s d3 0r0, p0rqu3 3r4n 1sm43l1t4s). 25 0ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: D3 bu3n4 g4n4 t3 l0s d4r3m0s. Y t3nd13nd0 un m4nt0, 3chó 4llí c4d4 un0 l0s z4rc1ll0s d3 su b0tín. 26 Y fu3 3l p3s0 d3 l0s z4rc1ll0s d3 0r0 qu3 él p1d1ó, m1l s3t3c13nt0s s1cl0s d3 0r0, s1n l4s pl4nch4s y j0y3l3s y v3st1d0s d3 púrpur4 qu3 tr4í4n l0s r3y3s d3 M4d1án, y s1n l0s c0ll4r3s qu3 tr4í4n sus c4m3ll0s 4l cu3ll0. 27 Y G3d3ón h1z0 d3 3ll0s un 3f0d, 3l cu4l h1z0 gu4rd4r 3n su c1ud4d d3 0fr4; y t0d0 1sr43l s3 pr0st1tuyó tr4s d3 3s3 3f0d 3n 4qu3l lug4r; y fu3 tr0p3z4d3r0 4 G3d3ón y 4 su c4s4. 28 4sí fu3 subyug4d0 M4d1án d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y nunc4 más v0lv1ó 4 l3v4nt4r c4b3z4. Y r3p0só l4 t13rr4 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s 3n l0s dí4s d3 G3d3ón. 

29 Lu3g0 J3r0b44l h1j0 d3 J0ás fu3 y h4b1tó 3n su c4s4. 30 Y tuv0 G3d3ón s3t3nt4 h1j0s qu3 c0nst1tuy3r0n su d3sc3nd3nc14, p0rqu3 tuv0 much4s muj3r3s. 31 T4mb1én su c0ncub1n4 qu3 3st4b4 3n S1qu3m l3 d10 un h1j0, y l3 pus0 p0r n0mbr3 4b1m3l3c. 32 Y mur1ó G3d3ón h1j0 d3 J0ás 3n bu3n4 v3j3z, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n 3l s3pulcr0 d3 su p4dr3 J0ás, 3n 0fr4 d3 l0s 4b13z3r1t4s. 

33 P3r0 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 mur1ó G3d3ón, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l v0lv13r0n 4 pr0st1tu1rs3 y3nd0 tr4s l0s b44l3s, y 3sc0g13r0n p0r d10s 4 B44l-b3r1t. 34 Y n0 s3 4c0rd4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 J3h0vá su D10s, qu3 l0s h4bí4 l1br4d0 d3 t0d0s sus 3n3m1g0s 3n d3rr3d0r; 35 n1 s3 m0str4r0n 4gr4d3c1d0s c0n l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b44l, 3l cu4l 3s G3d3ón, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 3l b13n qu3 él h4bí4 h3ch0 4 1sr43l. 

R31n4d0 d3 4b1m3l3c

JU0C0S 9

1 4b1m3l3c h1j0 d3 J3r0b44l fu3 4 S1qu3m, 4 l0s h3rm4n0s d3 su m4dr3, y h4bló c0n 3ll0s, y c0n t0d4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 l4 c4s4 d3l p4dr3 d3 su m4dr3, d1c13nd0: 2 Y0 0s ru3g0 qu3 d1gá1s 3n 0íd0s d3 t0d0s l0s d3 S1qu3m: ¿Qué 0s p4r3c3 m3j0r, qu3 0s g0b13rn3n s3t3nt4 h0mbr3s, t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 J3r0b44l, 0 qu3 0s g0b13rn3 un s0l0 h0mbr3? 4c0rd40s qu3 y0 s0y hu3s0 vu3str0, y c4rn3 vu3str4. 3 Y h4bl4r0n p0r él l0s h3rm4n0s d3 su m4dr3 3n 0íd0s d3 t0d0s l0s d3 S1qu3m t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s; y 3l c0r4zón d3 3ll0s s3 1ncl1nó 4 f4v0r d3 4b1m3l3c, p0rqu3 d3cí4n: Nu3str0 h3rm4n0 3s. 4 Y l3 d13r0n s3t3nt4 s1cl0s d3 pl4t4 d3l t3mpl0 d3 B44l-b3r1t, c0n l0s cu4l3s 4b1m3l3c 4lqu1ló h0mbr3s 0c10s0s y v4g4bund0s, qu3 l3 s1gu13r0n. 5 Y v1n13nd0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3 3n 0fr4, m4tó 4 sus h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3 J3r0b44l, s3t3nt4 v4r0n3s, s0br3 un4 m1sm4 p13dr4; p3r0 qu3dó J0t4m 3l h1j0 m3n0r d3 J3r0b44l, qu3 s3 3sc0nd1ó. 6 0nt0nc3s s3 junt4r0n t0d0s l0s d3 S1qu3m c0n t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 M1l0, y fu3r0n y 3l1g13r0n 4 4b1m3l3c p0r r3y, c3rc4 d3 l4 ll4nur4 d3l p1l4r qu3 3st4b4 3n S1qu3m. 

7 Cu4nd0 s3 l0 d1j3r0n 4 J0t4m, fu3 y s3 pus0 3n l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3 d3 G3r1z1m, y 4lz4nd0 su v0z cl4mó y l3s d1j0: 0ídm3, v4r0n3s d3 S1qu3m, y 4sí 0s 01g4 D10s. 8 Fu3r0n un4 v3z l0s árb0l3s 4 3l3g1r r3y s0br3 sí, y d1j3r0n 4l 0l1v0: R31n4 s0br3 n0s0tr0s. 9 M4s 3l 0l1v0 r3sp0nd1ó: ¿H3 d3 d3j4r m1 4c31t3, c0n 3l cu4l 3n mí s3 h0nr4 4 D10s y 4 l0s h0mbr3s, p4r4 1r 4 s3r gr4nd3 s0br3 l0s árb0l3s? 10 Y d1j3r0n l0s árb0l3s 4 l4 h1gu3r4: 4nd4 tú, r31n4 s0br3 n0s0tr0s. 11 Y r3sp0nd1ó l4 h1gu3r4: ¿H3 d3 d3j4r m1 dulzur4 y m1 bu3n frut0, p4r4 1r 4 s3r gr4nd3 s0br3 l0s árb0l3s? 12 D1j3r0n lu3g0 l0s árb0l3s 4 l4 v1d: Pu3s v3n tú, r31n4 s0br3 n0s0tr0s. 13 Y l4 v1d l3s r3sp0nd1ó: ¿H3 d3 d3j4r m1 m0st0, qu3 4l3gr4 4 D10s y 4 l0s h0mbr3s, p4r4 1r 4 s3r gr4nd3 s0br3 l0s árb0l3s? 14 D1j3r0n 3nt0nc3s t0d0s l0s árb0l3s 4 l4 z4rz4: 4nd4 tú, r31n4 s0br3 n0s0tr0s. 15 Y l4 z4rz4 r3sp0nd1ó 4 l0s árb0l3s: S1 3n v3rd4d m3 3l3gís p0r r3y s0br3 v0s0tr0s, v3n1d, 4br1g40s b4j0 d3 m1 s0mbr4; y s1 n0, s4lg4 fu3g0 d3 l4 z4rz4 y d3v0r3 4 l0s c3dr0s d3l Líb4n0. 

16 4h0r4, pu3s, s1 c0n v3rd4d y c0n 1nt3gr1d4d h4bé1s pr0c3d1d0 3n h4c3r r3y 4 4b1m3l3c, y s1 h4bé1s 4ctu4d0 b13n c0n J3r0b44l y c0n su c4s4, y s1 l3 h4bé1s p4g4d0 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s 17 (p0rqu3 m1 p4dr3 p3l3ó p0r v0s0tr0s, y 3xpus0 su v1d4 4l p3l1gr0 p4r4 l1br4r0s d3 m4n0 d3 M4d1án, 18 y v0s0tr0s 0s h4bé1s l3v4nt4d0 h0y c0ntr4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3, y h4bé1s m4t4d0 4 sus h1j0s, s3t3nt4 v4r0n3s s0br3 un4 m1sm4 p13dr4; y h4bé1s pu3st0 p0r r3y s0br3 l0s d3 S1qu3m 4 4b1m3l3c h1j0 d3 su cr14d4, p0r cu4nt0 3s vu3str0 h3rm4n0); 19 s1 c0n v3rd4d y c0n 1nt3gr1d4d h4bé1s pr0c3d1d0 h0y c0n J3r0b44l y c0n su c4s4, qu3 g0cé1s d3 4b1m3l3c, y él g0c3 d3 v0s0tr0s. 20 Y s1 n0, fu3g0 s4lg4 d3 4b1m3l3c, qu3 c0nsum4 4 l0s d3 S1qu3m y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 M1l0, y fu3g0 s4lg4 d3 l0s d3 S1qu3m y d3 l4 c4s4 d3 M1l0, qu3 c0nsum4 4 4b1m3l3c. 21 Y 3sc4pó J0t4m y huyó, y s3 fu3 4 B33r, y 4llí s3 3stuv0 p0r m13d0 d3 4b1m3l3c su h3rm4n0. 

22 D3spués qu3 4b1m3l3c hub0 d0m1n4d0 s0br3 1sr43l tr3s 4ñ0s, 23 3nv1ó D10s un m4l 3spír1tu 3ntr3 4b1m3l3c y l0s h0mbr3s d3 S1qu3m, y l0s d3 S1qu3m s3 l3v4nt4r0n c0ntr4 4b1m3l3c; 24 p4r4 qu3 l4 v10l3nc14 h3ch4 4 l0s s3t3nt4 h1j0s d3 J3r0b44l, y l4 s4ngr3 d3 3ll0s, r3c4y3r4 s0br3 4b1m3l3c su h3rm4n0 qu3 l0s m4tó, y s0br3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 S1qu3m qu3 f0rt4l3c13r0n l4s m4n0s d3 él p4r4 m4t4r 4 sus h3rm4n0s. 25 Y l0s d3 S1qu3m pus13r0n 3n l4s cumbr3s d3 l0s m0nt3s 4s3ch4d0r3s qu3 r0b4b4n 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 p4s4b4n junt0 4 3ll0s p0r 3l c4m1n0; d3 l0 cu4l fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 4b1m3l3c. 

26 Y G44l h1j0 d3 0b3d v1n0 c0n sus h3rm4n0s y s3 p4s4r0n 4 S1qu3m, y l0s d3 S1qu3m pus13r0n 3n él su c0nf14nz4. 27 Y s4l13nd0 4l c4mp0, v3nd1m14r0n sus v1ñ3d0s, y p1s4r0n l4 uv4 3 h1c13r0n f13st4; y 3ntr4nd0 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 sus d10s3s, c0m13r0n y b3b13r0n, y m4ld1j3r0n 4 4b1m3l3c. 28 Y G44l h1j0 d3 0b3d d1j0: ¿Qu1én 3s 4b1m3l3c, y qué 3s S1qu3m, p4r4 qu3 n0s0tr0s l3 s1rv4m0s? ¿N0 3s h1j0 d3 J3r0b44l, y n0 3s Z3bul 4yud4nt3 suy0? S3rv1d 4 l0s v4r0n3s d3 H4m0r p4dr3 d3 S1qu3m; p3r0 ¿p0r qué l3 h3m0s d3 s3rv1r 4 él? 29 0j4lá 3stuv13r4 3st3 pu3bl0 b4j0 m1 m4n0, pu3s y0 4rr0j4rí4 lu3g0 4 4b1m3l3c, y d1rí4 4 4b1m3l3c: 4um3nt4 tus 3jérc1t0s, y s4l. 

30 Cu4nd0 Z3bul g0b3rn4d0r d3 l4 c1ud4d 0yó l4s p4l4br4s d3 G44l h1j0 d3 0b3d, s3 3nc3nd1ó 3n 1r4, 31 y 3nv1ó s3cr3t4m3nt3 m3ns4j3r0s 4 4b1m3l3c, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 G44l h1j0 d3 0b3d y sus h3rm4n0s h4n v3n1d0 4 S1qu3m, y h3 4quí qu3 3stán subl3v4nd0 l4 c1ud4d c0ntr4 t1. 32 L3vánt4t3, pu3s, 4h0r4 d3 n0ch3, tú y 3l pu3bl0 qu3 3stá c0nt1g0, y p0n 3mb0sc4d4s 3n 3l c4mp0. 33 Y p0r l4 m4ñ4n4 4l s4l1r 3l s0l m4drug4 y c43 s0br3 l4 c1ud4d; y cu4nd0 él y 3l pu3bl0 qu3 3stá c0n él s4lg4n c0ntr4 t1, tú h4rás c0n él s3gún s3 pr3s3nt3 l4 0c4s1ón. 

34 L3v4ntánd0s3, pu3s, d3 n0ch3 4b1m3l3c y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4, pus13r0n 3mb0sc4d4 c0ntr4 S1qu3m c0n cu4tr0 c0mp4ñí4s. 35 Y G44l h1j0 d3 0b3d s4l1ó, y s3 pus0 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c1ud4d; y 4b1m3l3c y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4, s3 l3v4nt4r0n d3 l4 3mb0sc4d4. 36 Y v13nd0 G44l 4l pu3bl0, d1j0 4 Z3bul: H3 4llí g3nt3 qu3 d3sc13nd3 d3 l4s cumbr3s d3 l0s m0nt3s. Y Z3bul l3 r3sp0nd1ó: Tú v3s l4 s0mbr4 d3 l0s m0nt3s c0m0 s1 fu3r4n h0mbr3s. 37 V0lv1ó G44l 4 h4bl4r, y d1j0: H3 4llí g3nt3 qu3 d3sc13nd3 d3 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4, y un4 tr0p4 v13n3 p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3 l4 3nc1n4 d3 l0s 4d1v1n0s. 38 Y Z3bul l3 r3sp0nd1ó: ¿Dónd3 3stá 4h0r4 tu b0c4 c0n qu3 d3cí4s: ¿Qu1én 3s 4b1m3l3c p4r4 qu3 l3 s1rv4m0s? ¿N0 3s 3st3 3l pu3bl0 qu3 t3ní4s 3n p0c0? S4l pu3s, 4h0r4, y p3l34 c0n él. 39 Y G44l s4l1ó d3l4nt3 d3 l0s d3 S1qu3m, y p3l3ó c0ntr4 4b1m3l3c. 40 M4s l0 p3rs1gu1ó 4b1m3l3c, y G44l huyó d3l4nt3 d3 él; y c4y3r0n h3r1d0s much0s h4st4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4. 41 Y 4b1m3l3c s3 qu3dó 3n 4rum4; y Z3bul 3chó fu3r4 4 G44l y 4 sus h3rm4n0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 m0r4s3n 3n S1qu3m. 

42 4c0nt3c1ó 3l s1gu13nt3 dí4, qu3 3l pu3bl0 s4l1ó 4l c4mp0; y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 4b1m3l3c, 43 3l cu4l, t0m4nd0 g3nt3, l4 r3p4rt1ó 3n tr3s c0mp4ñí4s, y pus0 3mb0sc4d4s 3n 3l c4mp0; y cu4nd0 m1ró, h3 4quí 3l pu3bl0 qu3 s4lí4 d3 l4 c1ud4d; y s3 l3v4ntó c0ntr4 3ll0s y l0s 4t4có. 44 P0rqu3 4b1m3l3c y l4 c0mp4ñí4 qu3 3st4b4 c0n él 4c0m3t13r0n c0n ímp3tu, y s3 d3tuv13r0n 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y l4s 0tr4s d0s c0mp4ñí4s 4c0m3t13r0n 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n 3l c4mp0, y l0s m4t4r0n. 45 Y 4b1m3l3c p3l3ó c0ntr4 l4 c1ud4d t0d0 4qu3l dí4, y t0mó l4 c1ud4d, y m4tó 4l pu3bl0 qu3 3n 3ll4 3st4b4; y 4s0ló l4 c1ud4d, y l4 s3mbró d3 s4l. 

46 Cu4nd0 0y3r0n 3st0 t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 t0rr3 d3 S1qu3m, s3 m3t13r0n 3n l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3l t3mpl0 d3l d10s B3r1t. 47 Y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 4b1m3l3c, d3 qu3 3st4b4n r3un1d0s t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 l4 t0rr3 d3 S1qu3m. 48 0nt0nc3s sub1ó 4b1m3l3c 4l m0nt3 d3 S4lmón, él y t0d4 l4 g3nt3 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4; y t0mó 4b1m3l3c un h4ch4 3n su m4n0, y c0rtó un4 r4m4 d3 l0s árb0l3s, y l3v4ntánd0l4 s3 l4 pus0 s0br3 sus h0mbr0s, d1c13nd0 4l pu3bl0 qu3 3st4b4 c0n él: L0 qu3 m3 h4bé1s v1st0 h4c3r, 4pr3sur40s 4 h4c3rl0 c0m0 y0. 49 Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 c0rtó t4mb1én c4d4 un0 su r4m4, y s1gu13r0n 4 4b1m3l3c, y l4s pus13r0n junt0 4 l4 f0rt4l3z4, y pr3nd13r0n fu3g0 c0n 3ll4s 4 l4 f0rt4l3z4, d3 m0d0 qu3 t0d0s l0s d3 l4 t0rr3 d3 S1qu3m mur13r0n, c0m0 un0s m1l h0mbr3s y muj3r3s. 

50 D3spués 4b1m3l3c s3 fu3 4 T3b3s, y pus0 s1t10 4 T3b3s, y l4 t0mó. 51 0n m3d10 d3 4qu3ll4 c1ud4d h4bí4 un4 t0rr3 f0rt1f1c4d4, 4 l4 cu4l s3 r3t1r4r0n t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s y l4s muj3r3s, y t0d0s l0s s3ñ0r3s d3 l4 c1ud4d; y c3rr4nd0 tr4s sí l4s pu3rt4s, s3 sub13r0n 4l t3ch0 d3 l4 t0rr3. 52 Y v1n0 4b1m3l3c 4 l4 t0rr3, y c0mb4t1énd0l4, ll3gó h4st4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 t0rr3 p4r4 pr3nd3rl3 fu3g0. 53 M4s un4 muj3r d3jó c43r un p3d4z0 d3 un4 ru3d4 d3 m0l1n0 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 4b1m3l3c, y l3 r0mp1ó 3l crán30. 54 0nt0nc3s ll4mó 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3 4 su 3scud3r0, y l3 d1j0: S4c4 tu 3sp4d4 y mát4m3, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 d1g4 d3 mí: Un4 muj3r l0 m4tó. Y su 3scud3r0 l3 4tr4v3só, y mur1ó. 55 Y cu4nd0 l0s 1sr43l1t4s v13r0n mu3rt0 4 4b1m3l3c, s3 fu3r0n c4d4 un0 4 su c4s4. 56 4sí p4gó D10s 4 4b1m3l3c 3l m4l qu3 h1z0 c0ntr4 su p4dr3, m4t4nd0 4 sus s3t3nt4 h3rm4n0s. 57 Y t0d0 3l m4l d3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 S1qu3m l0 h1z0 D10s v0lv3r s0br3 sus c4b3z4s, y v1n0 s0br3 3ll0s l4 m4ld1c1ón d3 J0t4m h1j0 d3 J3r0b44l. 

T0l4 y J41r juzg4n 4 1sr43l

JU0C0S 10

1 D3spués d3 4b1m3l3c, s3 l3v4ntó p4r4 l1br4r 4 1sr43l T0l4 h1j0 d3 Fú4, h1j0 d3 D0d0, v4rón d3 1s4c4r, 3l cu4l h4b1t4b4 3n S4m1r 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín. 2 Y juzgó 4 1sr43l v31nt1trés 4ñ0s; y mur1ó, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n S4m1r. 

3 Tr4s él s3 l3v4ntó J41r g4l44d1t4, 3l cu4l juzgó 4 1sr43l v31nt1dós 4ñ0s. 4 0st3 tuv0 tr31nt4 h1j0s, qu3 c4b4lg4b4n s0br3 tr31nt4 4sn0s; y t3ní4n tr31nt4 c1ud4d3s, qu3 s3 ll4m4n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 J41r h4st4 h0y, l4s cu4l3s 3stán 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d. 5 Y mur1ó J41r, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n C4món. 

J3fté l1b3rt4 4 1sr43l d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s

6 P3r0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l v0lv13r0n 4 h4c3r l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, y s1rv13r0n 4 l0s b44l3s y 4 4st4r0t, 4 l0s d10s3s d3 S1r14, 4 l0s d10s3s d3 S1dón, 4 l0s d10s3s d3 M04b, 4 l0s d10s3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món y 4 l0s d10s3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s; y d3j4r0n 4 J3h0vá, y n0 l3 s1rv13r0n. 7 Y s3 3nc3nd1ó l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 1sr43l, y l0s 3ntr3gó 3n m4n0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y 3n m4n0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món; 8 l0s cu4l3s 0pr1m13r0n y qu3br4nt4r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 d13c10ch0 4ñ0s, 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 3st4b4n 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán 3n l4 t13rr4 d3l 4m0rr30, qu3 3stá 3n G4l44d. 9 Y l0s h1j0s d3 4món p4s4r0n 3l J0rdán p4r4 h4c3r t4mb1én gu3rr4 c0ntr4 Judá y c0ntr4 B3nj4mín y l4 c4s4 d3 0fr4ín, y fu3 4fl1g1d0 1sr43l 3n gr4n m4n3r4. 

10 0nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l cl4m4r0n 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: N0s0tr0s h3m0s p3c4d0 c0ntr4 t1; p0rqu3 h3m0s d3j4d0 4 nu3str0 D10s, y s3rv1d0 4 l0s b44l3s. 11 Y J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l: ¿N0 h4bé1s s1d0 0pr1m1d0s d3 0g1pt0, d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s, d3 l0s f1l1st30s, 12 d3 l0s d3 S1dón, d3 4m4l3c y d3 M4ón, y cl4m4nd0 4 mí n0 0s l1bré d3 sus m4n0s? 13 M4s v0s0tr0s m3 h4bé1s d3j4d0, y h4bé1s s3rv1d0 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s; p0r t4nt0, y0 n0 0s l1br4ré más. 14 4nd4d y cl4m4d 4 l0s d10s3s qu3 0s h4bé1s 3l3g1d0; qu3 0s l1br3n 3ll0s 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 vu3str4 4fl1cc1ón. 15 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l r3sp0nd13r0n 4 J3h0vá: H3m0s p3c4d0; h4z tú c0n n0s0tr0s c0m0 b13n t3 p4r3zc4; sól0 t3 r0g4m0s qu3 n0s l1br3s 3n 3st3 dí4. 16 Y qu1t4r0n d3 3ntr3 sí l0s d10s3s 4j3n0s, y s1rv13r0n 4 J3h0vá; y él fu3 4ngust14d0 4 c4us4 d3 l4 4fl1cc1ón d3 1sr43l. 

17 0nt0nc3s s3 junt4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y 4c4mp4r0n 3n G4l44d; s3 junt4r0n 4s1m1sm0 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y 4c4mp4r0n 3n M1zp4. 18 Y l0s prínc1p3s y 3l pu3bl0 d3 G4l44d d1j3r0n 3l un0 4l 0tr0: ¿Qu1én c0m3nz4rá l4 b4t4ll4 c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món? S3rá c4ud1ll0 s0br3 t0d0s l0s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n G4l44d. 

JU0C0S 11

1 J3fté g4l44d1t4 3r4 3sf0rz4d0 y v4l3r0s0; 3r4 h1j0 d3 un4 muj3r r4m3r4, y 3l p4dr3 d3 J3fté 3r4 G4l44d. 2 P3r0 l4 muj3r d3 G4l44d l3 d10 h1j0s, l0s cu4l3s, cu4nd0 cr3c13r0n, 3ch4r0n fu3r4 4 J3fté, d1c1énd0l3: N0 h3r3d4rás 3n l4 c4s4 d3 nu3str0 p4dr3, p0rqu3 3r3s h1j0 d3 0tr4 muj3r. 3 Huyó, pu3s, J3fté d3 sus h3rm4n0s, y h4b1tó 3n t13rr4 d3 T0b; y s3 junt4r0n c0n él h0mbr3s 0c10s0s, l0s cu4l3s s4lí4n c0n él. 

4 4c0nt3c1ó 4nd4nd0 3l t13mp0, qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món h1c13r0n gu3rr4 c0ntr4 1sr43l. 5 Y cu4nd0 l0s h1j0s d3 4món h1c13r0n gu3rr4 c0ntr4 1sr43l, l0s 4nc14n0s d3 G4l44d fu3r0n 4 tr43r 4 J3fté d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 T0b; 6 y d1j3r0n 4 J3fté: V3n, y s3rás nu3str0 j3f3, p4r4 qu3 p3l33m0s c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 7 J3fté r3sp0nd1ó 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 G4l44d: ¿N0 m3 4b0rr3c1st31s v0s0tr0s, y m3 3ch4st31s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3? ¿P0r qué, pu3s, v3nís 4h0r4 4 mí cu4nd0 3stá1s 3n 4fl1cc1ón? 8 Y l0s 4nc14n0s d3 G4l44d r3sp0nd13r0n 4 J3fté: P0r 3st4 m1sm4 c4us4 v0lv3m0s 4h0r4 4 t1, p4r4 qu3 v3ng4s c0n n0s0tr0s y p3l33s c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y s34s c4ud1ll0 d3 t0d0s l0s qu3 m0r4m0s 3n G4l44d. 9 J3fté 3nt0nc3s d1j0 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 G4l44d: S1 m3 h4cé1s v0lv3r p4r4 qu3 p3l33 c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y J3h0vá l0s 3ntr3g4r3 d3l4nt3 d3 mí, ¿s3ré y0 vu3str0 c4ud1ll0? 10 Y l0s 4nc14n0s d3 G4l44d r3sp0nd13r0n 4 J3fté: J3h0vá s34 t3st1g0 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, s1 n0 h1c1ér3m0s c0m0 tú d1c3s. 11 0nt0nc3s J3fté v1n0 c0n l0s 4nc14n0s d3 G4l44d, y 3l pu3bl0 l0 3l1g1ó p0r su c4ud1ll0 y j3f3; y J3fté h4bló t0d4s sus p4l4br4s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3n M1zp4. 

12 Y 3nv1ó J3fté m3ns4j3r0s 4l r3y d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué t13n3s tú c0nm1g0, qu3 h4s v3n1d0 4 mí p4r4 h4c3r gu3rr4 c0ntr4 m1 t13rr4? 13 0l r3y d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s r3sp0nd1ó 4 l0s m3ns4j3r0s d3 J3fté: P0r cu4nt0 1sr43l t0mó m1 t13rr4, cu4nd0 sub1ó d3 0g1pt0, d3sd3 4rnón h4st4 J4b0c y 3l J0rdán; 4h0r4, pu3s, d3vuélv3l4 3n p4z. 14 Y J3fté v0lv1ó 4 3nv14r 0tr0s m3ns4j3r0s 4l r3y d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s, 15 p4r4 d3c1rl3: J3fté h4 d1ch0 4sí: 1sr43l n0 t0mó t13rr4 d3 M04b, n1 t13rr4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 16 P0rqu3 cu4nd0 1sr43l sub1ó d3 0g1pt0, 4nduv0 p0r 3l d3s13rt0 h4st4 3l M4r R0j0, y ll3gó 4 C4d3s. 17 0nt0nc3s 1sr43l 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s 4l r3y d3 0d0m, d1c13nd0: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3j3s p4s4r p0r tu t13rr4; p3r0 3l r3y d3 0d0m n0 l0s 3scuchó. 0nv1ó t4mb1én 4l r3y d3 M04b, 3l cu4l t4mp0c0 qu1s0; s3 qu3dó, p0r t4nt0, 1sr43l 3n C4d3s. 18 D3spués, y3nd0 p0r 3l d3s13rt0, r0d3ó l4 t13rr4 d3 0d0m y l4 t13rr4 d3 M04b, y v1n13nd0 p0r 3l l4d0 0r13nt4l d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 M04b, 4c4mpó 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3 4rnón, y n0 3ntró 3n t3rr1t0r10 d3 M04b; p0rqu3 4rnón 3s t3rr1t0r10 d3 M04b. 19 Y 3nv1ó 1sr43l m3ns4j3r0s 4 S3hón r3y d3 l0s 4m0rr30s, r3y d3 H3sbón, d1c1énd0l3: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3j3s p4s4r p0r tu t13rr4 h4st4 m1 lug4r. 20 M4s S3hón n0 s3 f10 d3 1sr43l p4r4 d4rl3 p4s0 p0r su t3rr1t0r10, s1n0 qu3 r3un13nd0 S3hón t0d4 su g3nt3, 4c4mpó 3n J4h4z4, y p3l3ó c0ntr4 1sr43l. 21 P3r0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l 3ntr3gó 4 S3hón y 4 t0d0 su pu3bl0 3n m4n0 d3 1sr43l, y l0s d3rr0tó; y s3 4p0d3ró 1sr43l d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s 4m0rr30s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n 4qu3l p4ís. 22 S3 4p0d3r4r0n t4mb1én d3 t0d0 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3l 4m0rr30 d3sd3 4rnón h4st4 J4b0c, y d3sd3 3l d3s13rt0 h4st4 3l J0rdán. 23 4sí qu3, l0 qu3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l d3sp0s3yó 4l 4m0rr30 d3l4nt3 d3 su pu3bl0 1sr43l, ¿pr3t3nd3s tú 4p0d3r4rt3 d3 él? 24 L0 qu3 t3 h1c13r3 p0s33r Qu3m0s tu d10s, ¿n0 l0 p0s33rí4s tú? 4sí, t0d0 l0 qu3 d3sp0s3yó J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s, n0s0tr0s l0 p0s33r3m0s. 25 ¿0r3s tú 4h0r4 m3j0r 3n 4lg0 qu3 B4l4c h1j0 d3 Z1p0r, r3y d3 M04b? ¿Tuv0 él cu3st1ón c0ntr4 1sr43l, 0 h1z0 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 3ll0s? 26 Cu4nd0 1sr43l h4 3st4d0 h4b1t4nd0 p0r tr3sc13nt0s 4ñ0s 4 H3sbón y sus 4ld34s, 4 4r03r y sus 4ld34s, y t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 3stán 3n 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 4rnón, ¿p0r qué n0 l4s h4bé1s r3c0br4d0 3n 3s3 t13mp0? 27 4sí qu3, y0 n4d4 h3 p3c4d0 c0ntr4 t1, m4s tú h4c3s m4l c0nm1g0 p3l34nd0 c0ntr4 mí. J3h0vá, qu3 3s 3l ju3z, juzgu3 h0y 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 28 M4s 3l r3y d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món n0 4t3nd1ó 4 l4s r4z0n3s qu3 J3fté l3 3nv1ó. 

29 Y 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 J3fté; y p4só p0r G4l44d y M4n4sés, y d3 4llí p4só 4 M1zp4 d3 G4l44d, y d3 M1zp4 d3 G4l44d p4só 4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 30 Y J3fté h1z0 v0t0 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: S1 3ntr3g4r3s 4 l0s 4m0n1t4s 3n m1s m4n0s, 31 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 s4l13r3 d3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 m1 c4s4 4 r3c1b1rm3, cu4nd0 r3gr3s3 v1ct0r10s0 d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s, s3rá d3 J3h0vá, y l0 0fr3c3ré 3n h0l0c4ust0. 32 Y fu3 J3fté h4c14 l0s h1j0s d3 4món p4r4 p3l34r c0ntr4 3ll0s; y J3h0vá l0s 3ntr3gó 3n su m4n0. 33 Y d3sd3 4r03r h4st4 ll3g4r 4 M1n1t, v31nt3 c1ud4d3s, y h4st4 l4 v3g4 d3 l4s v1ñ4s, l0s d3rr0tó c0n muy gr4nd3 3str4g0. 4sí fu3r0n s0m3t1d0s l0s 4m0n1t4s p0r l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

34 0nt0nc3s v0lv1ó J3fté 4 M1zp4, 4 su c4s4; y h3 4quí su h1j4 qu3 s4lí4 4 r3c1b1rl3 c0n p4nd3r0s y d4nz4s, y 3ll4 3r4 s0l4, su h1j4 ún1c4; n0 t3ní4 fu3r4 d3 3ll4 h1j0 n1 h1j4. 35 Y cu4nd0 él l4 v10, r0mp1ó sus v3st1d0s, d1c13nd0: ¡4y, h1j4 mí4! 3n v3rd4d m3 h4s 4b4t1d0, y tú m1sm4 h4s v3n1d0 4 s3r c4us4 d3 m1 d0l0r; p0rqu3 l3 h3 d4d0 p4l4br4 4 J3h0vá, y n0 p0dré r3tr4ct4rm3. 36 0ll4 3nt0nc3s l3 r3sp0nd1ó: P4dr3 mí0, s1 l3 h4s d4d0 p4l4br4 4 J3h0vá, h4z d3 mí c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 pr0m3t1st3, y4 qu3 J3h0vá h4 h3ch0 v3ng4nz4 3n tus 3n3m1g0s l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 37 Y v0lv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 su p4dr3: C0ncéd3m3 3st0: déj4m3 p0r d0s m3s3s qu3 v4y4 y d3sc13nd4 p0r l0s m0nt3s, y ll0r3 m1 v1rg1n1d4d, y0 y m1s c0mp4ñ3r4s. 38 0l 3nt0nc3s d1j0: V3. Y l4 d3jó p0r d0s m3s3s. Y 3ll4 fu3 c0n sus c0mp4ñ3r4s, y ll0ró su v1rg1n1d4d p0r l0s m0nt3s. 39 P4s4d0s l0s d0s m3s3s v0lv1ó 4 su p4dr3, qu13n h1z0 d3 3ll4 c0nf0rm3 4l v0t0 qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0. Y 3ll4 nunc4 c0n0c1ó v4rón. 40 Y s3 h1z0 c0stumbr3 3n 1sr43l, qu3 d3 4ñ0 3n 4ñ0 fu3r4n l4s d0nc3ll4s d3 1sr43l 4 3nd3ch4r 4 l4 h1j4 d3 J3fté g4l44d1t4, cu4tr0 dí4s 3n 3l 4ñ0. 

JU0C0S 12

1 0nt0nc3s s3 r3un13r0n l0s v4r0n3s d3 0fr4ín, y p4s4r0n h4c14 3l n0rt3, y d1j3r0n 4 J3fté: ¿P0r qué fu1st3 4 h4c3r gu3rr4 c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y n0 n0s ll4m4st3 p4r4 qu3 fuér4m0s c0nt1g0? N0s0tr0s qu3m4r3m0s tu c4s4 c0nt1g0. 2 Y J3fté l3s r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 y m1 pu3bl0 t3ní4m0s un4 gr4n c0nt13nd4 c0n l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y 0s ll4mé, y n0 m3 d3f3nd1st31s d3 su m4n0. 3 V13nd0, pu3s, qu3 n0 m3 d3f3ndí41s, 4rr13sgué m1 v1d4, y p4sé c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y J3h0vá m3 l0s 3ntr3gó; ¿p0r qué, pu3s, h4bé1s sub1d0 h0y c0ntr4 mí p4r4 p3l34r c0nm1g0? 4 0nt0nc3s r3un1ó J3fté 4 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 G4l44d, y p3l3ó c0ntr4 0fr4ín; y l0s d3 G4l44d d3rr0t4r0n 4 0fr4ín, p0rqu3 h4bí4n d1ch0: V0s0tr0s s01s fug1t1v0s d3 0fr4ín, v0s0tr0s l0s g4l44d1t4s, 3n m3d10 d3 0fr4ín y d3 M4n4sés. 5 Y l0s g4l44d1t4s t0m4r0n l0s v4d0s d3l J0rdán 4 l0s d3 0fr4ín; y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 d3cí4n l0s fug1t1v0s d3 0fr4ín: Qu13r0 p4s4r, l0s d3 G4l44d l3s pr3gunt4b4n: ¿0r3s tú 3fr4t30? S1 él r3sp0ndí4: N0, 6 3nt0nc3s l3 d3cí4n: 4h0r4, pu3s, d1 Sh1b0l3t. Y él d3cí4 S1b0l3t; p0rqu3 n0 p0dí4 pr0nunc14rl0 c0rr3ct4m3nt3. 0nt0nc3s l3 3ch4b4n m4n0, y l3 d3g0ll4b4n junt0 4 l0s v4d0s d3l J0rdán. Y mur13r0n 3nt0nc3s d3 l0s d3 0fr4ín cu4r3nt4 y d0s m1l. 7 Y J3fté juzgó 4 1sr43l s31s 4ñ0s; y mur1ó J3fté g4l44d1t4, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n un4 d3 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 G4l44d. 

1bzán, 0lón y 4bdón, ju3c3s d3 1sr43l

8 D3spués d3 él juzgó 4 1sr43l 1bzán d3 B3lén, 9 3l cu4l tuv0 tr31nt4 h1j0s y tr31nt4 h1j4s, l4s cu4l3s c4só fu3r4, y t0mó d3 fu3r4 tr31nt4 h1j4s p4r4 sus h1j0s; y juzgó 4 1sr43l s13t3 4ñ0s. 10 Y mur1ó 1bzán, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n B3lén. 11 D3spués d3 él juzgó 4 1sr43l 0lón z4bul0n1t4, 3l cu4l juzgó 4 1sr43l d13z 4ñ0s. 12 Y mur1ó 0lón z4bul0n1t4, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n 4j4lón 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 Z4bulón. 13 D3spués d3 él juzgó 4 1sr43l 4bdón h1j0 d3 H1l3l, p1r4t0n1t4. 14 0st3 tuv0 cu4r3nt4 h1j0s y tr31nt4 n13t0s, qu3 c4b4lg4b4n s0br3 s3t3nt4 4sn0s; y juzgó 4 1sr43l 0ch0 4ñ0s. 15 Y mur1ó 4bdón h1j0 d3 H1l3l p1r4t0n1t4, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n P1r4tón, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0fr4ín, 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 4m4l3c. 

JU0C0S 13

N4c1m13nt0 d3 S4nsón

1 L0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l v0lv13r0n 4 h4c3r l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá; y J3h0vá l0s 3ntr3gó 3n m4n0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s p0r cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s. 2 Y h4bí4 un h0mbr3 d3 Z0r4, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 D4n, 3l cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 M4n04; y su muj3r 3r4 3stér1l, y nunc4 h4bí4 t3n1d0 h1j0s. 3 4 3st4 muj3r 4p4r3c1ó 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá, y l3 d1j0: H3 4quí qu3 tú 3r3s 3stér1l, y nunc4 h4s t3n1d0 h1j0s; p3r0 c0nc3b1rás y d4rás 4 luz un h1j0. 4 4h0r4, pu3s, n0 b3b4s v1n0 n1 s1dr4, n1 c0m4s c0s4 1nmund4. 5 Pu3s h3 4quí qu3 c0nc3b1rás y d4rás 4 luz un h1j0; y n4v4j4 n0 p4s4rá s0br3 su c4b3z4, p0rqu3 3l n1ñ0 s3rá n4z4r30 4 D10s d3sd3 su n4c1m13nt0, y él c0m3nz4rá 4 s4lv4r 4 1sr43l d3 m4n0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s. 6 Y l4 muj3r v1n0 y s3 l0 c0ntó 4 su m4r1d0, d1c13nd0: Un v4rón d3 D10s v1n0 4 mí, cuy0 4sp3ct0 3r4 c0m0 3l 4sp3ct0 d3 un áng3l d3 D10s, t3m1bl3 3n gr4n m4n3r4; y n0 l3 pr3gunté d3 dónd3 n1 qu1én 3r4, n1 t4mp0c0 él m3 d1j0 su n0mbr3. 7 Y m3 d1j0: H3 4quí qu3 tú c0nc3b1rás, y d4rás 4 luz un h1j0; p0r t4nt0, 4h0r4 n0 b3b4s v1n0, n1 s1dr4, n1 c0m4s c0s4 1nmund4, p0rqu3 3st3 n1ñ0 s3rá n4z4r30 4 D10s d3sd3 su n4c1m13nt0 h4st4 3l dí4 d3 su mu3rt3. 

8 0nt0nc3s 0ró M4n04 4 J3h0vá, y d1j0: 4h, S3ñ0r mí0, y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 4qu3l v4rón d3 D10s qu3 3nv14st3, vu3lv4 4h0r4 4 v3n1r 4 n0s0tr0s, y n0s 3ns3ñ3 l0 qu3 h4y4m0s d3 h4c3r c0n 3l n1ñ0 qu3 h4 d3 n4c3r. 9 Y D10s 0yó l4 v0z d3 M4n04; y 3l áng3l d3 D10s v0lv1ó 0tr4 v3z 4 l4 muj3r, 3st4nd0 3ll4 3n 3l c4mp0; m4s su m4r1d0 M4n04 n0 3st4b4 c0n 3ll4. 10 Y l4 muj3r c0rr1ó pr0nt4m3nt3 4 4v1s4rl3 4 su m4r1d0, d1c1énd0l3: M1r4 qu3 s3 m3 h4 4p4r3c1d0 4qu3l v4rón qu3 v1n0 4 mí 3l 0tr0 dí4. 11 Y s3 l3v4ntó M4n04, y s1gu1ó 4 su muj3r; y v1n0 4l v4rón y l3 d1j0: ¿0r3s tú 4qu3l v4rón qu3 h4bló 4 l4 muj3r? Y él d1j0: Y0 s0y. 12 0nt0nc3s M4n04 d1j0: Cu4nd0 tus p4l4br4s s3 cumpl4n, ¿cóm0 d3b3 s3r l4 m4n3r4 d3 v1v1r d3l n1ñ0, y qué d3b3m0s h4c3r c0n él? 13 Y 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó 4 M4n04: L4 muj3r s3 gu4rd4rá d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 y0 l3 d1j3. 14 N0 t0m4rá n4d4 qu3 pr0c3d4 d3 l4 v1d; n0 b3b3rá v1n0 n1 s1dr4, y n0 c0m3rá c0s4 1nmund4; gu4rd4rá t0d0 l0 qu3 l3 m4ndé. 

15 0nt0nc3s M4n04 d1j0 4l áng3l d3 J3h0vá: T3 ru3g0 n0s p3rm1t4s d3t3n3rt3, y t3 pr3p4r4r3m0s un c4br1t0. 16 Y 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó 4 M4n04: 4unqu3 m3 d3t3ng4s, n0 c0m3ré d3 tu p4n; m4s s1 qu13r3s h4c3r h0l0c4ust0, 0fréc3l0 4 J3h0vá. Y n0 s4bí4 M4n04 qu3 4quél fu3s3 áng3l d3 J3h0vá. 17 0nt0nc3s d1j0 M4n04 4l áng3l d3 J3h0vá: ¿Cuál 3s tu n0mbr3, p4r4 qu3 cu4nd0 s3 cumpl4 tu p4l4br4 t3 h0nr3m0s? 18 Y 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó: ¿P0r qué pr3gunt4s p0r m1 n0mbr3, qu3 3s 4dm1r4bl3? 19 Y M4n04 t0mó un c4br1t0 y un4 0fr3nd4, y l0s 0fr3c1ó s0br3 un4 p3ñ4 4 J3h0vá; y 3l áng3l h1z0 m1l4gr0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 M4n04 y d3 su muj3r. 20 P0rqu3 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 l4 ll4m4 subí4 d3l 4lt4r h4c14 3l c13l0, 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá sub1ó 3n l4 ll4m4 d3l 4lt4r 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 M4n04 y d3 su muj3r, l0s cu4l3s s3 p0str4r0n 3n t13rr4. 

21 Y 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá n0 v0lv1ó 4 4p4r3c3r 4 M4n04 n1 4 su muj3r. 0nt0nc3s c0n0c1ó M4n04 qu3 3r4 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá. 22 Y d1j0 M4n04 4 su muj3r: C13rt4m3nt3 m0r1r3m0s, p0rqu3 4 D10s h3m0s v1st0. 23 Y su muj3r l3 r3sp0nd1ó: S1 J3h0vá n0s qu1s13r4 m4t4r, n0 4c3pt4rí4 d3 nu3str4s m4n0s 3l h0l0c4ust0 y l4 0fr3nd4, n1 n0s hub13r4 m0str4d0 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, n1 4h0r4 n0s h4brí4 4nunc14d0 3st0. 24 Y l4 muj3r d10 4 luz un h1j0, y l3 pus0 p0r n0mbr3 S4nsón. Y 3l n1ñ0 cr3c1ó, y J3h0vá l0 b3nd1j0. 25 Y 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá c0m3nzó 4 m4n1f3st4rs3 3n él 3n l0s c4mp4m3nt0s d3 D4n, 3ntr3 Z0r4 y 0st40l. 

S4nsón y l4 muj3r f1l1st34 d3 T1mn4t

JU0C0S 14

1 D3sc3nd1ó S4nsón 4 T1mn4t, y v10 3n T1mn4t 4 un4 muj3r d3 l4s h1j4s d3 l0s f1l1st30s. 2 Y sub1ó, y l0 d3cl4ró 4 su p4dr3 y 4 su m4dr3, d1c13nd0: Y0 h3 v1st0 3n T1mn4t un4 muj3r d3 l4s h1j4s d3 l0s f1l1st30s; 0s ru3g0 qu3 m3 l4 t0mé1s p0r muj3r. 3 Y su p4dr3 y su m4dr3 l3 d1j3r0n: ¿N0 h4y muj3r 3ntr3 l4s h1j4s d3 tus h3rm4n0s, n1 3n t0d0 nu3str0 pu3bl0, p4r4 qu3 v4y4s tú 4 t0m4r muj3r d3 l0s f1l1st30s 1nc1rcunc1s0s? Y S4nsón r3sp0nd1ó 4 su p4dr3: Tóm4m3 ést4 p0r muj3r, p0rqu3 3ll4 m3 4gr4d4. 

4 M4s su p4dr3 y su m4dr3 n0 s4bí4n qu3 3st0 v3ní4 d3 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 él busc4b4 0c4s1ón c0ntr4 l0s f1l1st30s; pu3s 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 l0s f1l1st30s d0m1n4b4n s0br3 1sr43l. 

5 Y S4nsón d3sc3nd1ó c0n su p4dr3 y c0n su m4dr3 4 T1mn4t; y cu4nd0 ll3g4r0n 4 l4s v1ñ4s d3 T1mn4t, h3 4quí un l3ón j0v3n qu3 v3ní4 rug13nd0 h4c14 él. 6 Y 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 S4nsón, qu13n d3sp3d4zó 4l l3ón c0m0 qu13n d3sp3d4z4 un c4br1t0, s1n t3n3r n4d4 3n su m4n0; y n0 d3cl4ró n1 4 su p4dr3 n1 4 su m4dr3 l0 qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0. 7 D3sc3nd1ó, pu3s, y h4bló 4 l4 muj3r; y 3ll4 4gr4dó 4 S4nsón. 8 Y v0lv13nd0 d3spués d3 4lgun0s dí4s p4r4 t0m4rl4, s3 4p4rtó d3l c4m1n0 p4r4 v3r 3l cu3rp0 mu3rt0 d3l l3ón; y h3 4quí qu3 3n 3l cu3rp0 d3l l3ón h4bí4 un 3nj4mbr3 d3 4b3j4s, y un p4n4l d3 m13l. 9 Y t0mánd0l0 3n sus m4n0s, s3 fu3 c0m1énd0l0 p0r 3l c4m1n0; y cu4nd0 4lc4nzó 4 su p4dr3 y 4 su m4dr3, l3s d10 t4mb1én 4 3ll0s qu3 c0m13s3n; m4s n0 l3s d3scubr1ó qu3 h4bí4 t0m4d0 4qu3ll4 m13l d3l cu3rp0 d3l l3ón. 

10 V1n0, pu3s, su p4dr3 4d0nd3 3st4b4 l4 muj3r, y S4nsón h1z0 4llí b4nqu3t3; p0rqu3 4sí s0lí4n h4c3r l0s jóv3n3s. 11 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 3ll0s l3 v13r0n, t0m4r0n tr31nt4 c0mp4ñ3r0s p4r4 qu3 3stuv13s3n c0n él. 12 Y S4nsón l3s d1j0: Y0 0s pr0p0ndré 4h0r4 un 3n1gm4, y s1 3n l0s s13t3 dí4s d3l b4nqu3t3 m3 l0 d3cl4rá1s y d3sc1frá1s, y0 0s d4ré tr31nt4 v3st1d0s d3 l1n0 y tr31nt4 v3st1d0s d3 f13st4. 13 M4s s1 n0 m3 l0 p0dé1s d3cl4r4r, 3nt0nc3s v0s0tr0s m3 d4ré1s 4 mí l0s tr31nt4 v3st1d0s d3 l1n0 y l0s v3st1d0s d3 f13st4. Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: Pr0pón tu 3n1gm4, y l0 01r3m0s. 14 0nt0nc3s l3s d1j0: 


D3l d3v0r4d0r s4l1ó c0m1d4, 
Y d3l fu3rt3 s4l1ó dulzur4. 

Y 3ll0s n0 pud13r0n d3cl4r4rl3 3l 3n1gm4 3n tr3s dí4s. 

15 4l sépt1m0 dí4 d1j3r0n 4 l4 muj3r d3 S4nsón: 1nduc3 4 tu m4r1d0 4 qu3 n0s d3cl4r3 3st3 3n1gm4, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3 qu3m3m0s 4 t1 y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3. ¿N0s h4bé1s ll4m4d0 4quí p4r4 d3sp0j4rn0s? 16 Y ll0ró l4 muj3r d3 S4nsón 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 él, y d1j0: S0l4m3nt3 m3 4b0rr3c3s, y n0 m3 4m4s, pu3s n0 m3 d3cl4r4s 3l 3n1gm4 qu3 pr0pus1st3 4 l0s h1j0s d3 m1 pu3bl0. Y él r3sp0nd1ó: H3 4quí qu3 n1 4 m1 p4dr3 n1 4 m1 m4dr3 l0 h3 d3cl4r4d0, ¿y t3 l0 h4bí4 d3 d3cl4r4r 4 t1? 17 Y 3ll4 ll0ró 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 él l0s s13t3 dí4s qu3 3ll0s tuv13r0n b4nqu3t3; m4s 4l sépt1m0 dí4 él s3 l0 d3cl4ró, p0rqu3 l3 pr3s10n4b4; y 3ll4 l0 d3cl4ró 4 l0s h1j0s d3 su pu3bl0. 18 4l sépt1m0 dí4, 4nt3s qu3 3l s0l s3 pus13s3, l0s d3 l4 c1ud4d l3 d1j3r0n: 


¿Qué c0s4 más dulc3 qu3 l4 m13l? 
¿Y qué c0s4 más fu3rt3 qu3 3l l3ón? 

Y él l3s r3sp0nd1ó: 


S1 n0 4r4s31s c0n m1 n0v1ll4, 
Nunc4 hub13r41s d3scub13rt0 m1 3n1gm4. 19 Y 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 él, y d3sc3nd1ó 4 4sc4lón y m4tó 4 tr31nt4 h0mbr3s d3 3ll0s; y t0m4nd0 sus d3sp0j0s, d10 l4s mud4s d3 v3st1d0s 4 l0s qu3 h4bí4n 3xpl1c4d0 3l 3n1gm4; y 3nc3nd1d0 3n 3n0j0 s3 v0lv1ó 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3. 20 Y l4 muj3r d3 S4nsón fu3 d4d4 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0, 4l cu4l él h4bí4 tr4t4d0 c0m0 su 4m1g0. 



JU0C0S 15

1 4c0nt3c1ó d3spués d3 4lgún t13mp0, qu3 3n l0s dí4s d3 l4 s13g4 d3l tr1g0 S4nsón v1s1tó 4 su muj3r c0n un c4br1t0, d1c13nd0: 0ntr4ré 4 m1 muj3r 3n 3l 4p0s3nt0. M4s 3l p4dr3 d3 3ll4 n0 l0 d3jó 3ntr4r. 2 Y d1j0 3l p4dr3 d3 3ll4: M3 p3rsu4dí d3 qu3 l4 4b0rr3cí4s, y l4 d1 4 tu c0mp4ñ3r0. M4s su h3rm4n4 m3n0r, ¿n0 3s más h3rm0s4 qu3 3ll4? Tóm4l4, pu3s, 3n su lug4r. 3 0nt0nc3s l3 d1j0 S4nsón: S1n culp4 s3ré 3st4 v3z r3sp3ct0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s, s1 m4l l3s h1c13r3. 4 Y fu3 S4nsón y c4zó tr3sc13nt4s z0rr4s, y t0mó t34s, y juntó c0l4 c0n c0l4, y pus0 un4 t34 3ntr3 c4d4 d0s c0l4s. 5 D3spués, 3nc3nd13nd0 l4s t34s, s0ltó l4s z0rr4s 3n l0s s3mbr4d0s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y qu3mó l4s m13s3s 4m0nt0n4d4s y 3n p13, v1ñ4s y 0l1v4r3s. 6 Y d1j3r0n l0s f1l1st30s: ¿Qu1én h1z0 3st0? Y l3s c0nt3st4r0n: S4nsón, 3l y3rn0 d3l t1mn4t30, p0rqu3 l3 qu1tó su muj3r y l4 d10 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0. Y v1n13r0n l0s f1l1st30s y l4 qu3m4r0n 4 3ll4 y 4 su p4dr3. 7 0nt0nc3s S4nsón l3s d1j0: Y4 qu3 4sí h4bé1s h3ch0, jur0 qu3 m3 v3ng4ré d3 v0s0tr0s, y d3spués d3s1st1ré. 8 Y l0s h1r1ó c4d3r4 y musl0 c0n gr4n m0rt4nd4d; y d3sc3nd1ó y h4b1tó 3n l4 cu3v4 d3 l4 p3ñ4 d3 0t4m. 

S4nsón d3rr0t4 4 l0s f1l1st30s 3n L3h1

9 0nt0nc3s l0s f1l1st30s sub13r0n y 4c4mp4r0n 3n Judá, y s3 3xt3nd13r0n p0r L3h1. 10 Y l0s v4r0n3s d3 Judá l3s d1j3r0n: ¿P0r qué h4bé1s sub1d0 c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s? Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: 4 pr3nd3r 4 S4nsón h3m0s sub1d0, p4r4 h4c3rl3 c0m0 él n0s h4 h3ch0. 11 Y v1n13r0n tr3s m1l h0mbr3s d3 Judá 4 l4 cu3v4 d3 l4 p3ñ4 d3 0t4m, y d1j3r0n 4 S4nsón: ¿N0 s4b3s tú qu3 l0s f1l1st30s d0m1n4n s0br3 n0s0tr0s? ¿P0r qué n0s h4s h3ch0 3st0? Y él l3s r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 l3s h3 h3ch0 c0m0 3ll0s m3 h1c13r0n. 12 0ll0s 3nt0nc3s l3 d1j3r0n: N0s0tr0s h3m0s v3n1d0 p4r4 pr3nd3rt3 y 3ntr3g4rt3 3n m4n0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s. Y S4nsón l3s r3sp0nd1ó: Jur4dm3 qu3 v0s0tr0s n0 m3 m4t4ré1s. 13 Y 3ll0s l3 r3sp0nd13r0n, d1c13nd0: N0; s0l4m3nt3 t3 pr3nd3r3m0s, y t3 3ntr3g4r3m0s 3n sus m4n0s; m4s n0 t3 m4t4r3m0s. 0nt0nc3s l3 4t4r0n c0n d0s cu3rd4s nu3v4s, y l3 h1c13r0n v3n1r d3 l4 p3ñ4. 

14 Y 4sí qu3 v1n0 h4st4 L3h1, l0s f1l1st30s s4l13r0n gr1t4nd0 4 su 3ncu3ntr0; p3r0 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 él, y l4s cu3rd4s qu3 3st4b4n 3n sus br4z0s s3 v0lv13r0n c0m0 l1n0 qu3m4d0 c0n fu3g0, y l4s 4t4dur4s s3 c4y3r0n d3 sus m4n0s. 15 Y h4ll4nd0 un4 qu1j4d4 d3 4sn0 fr3sc4 4ún, 3xt3nd1ó l4 m4n0 y l4 t0mó, y m4tó c0n 3ll4 4 m1l h0mbr3s. 16 0nt0nc3s S4nsón d1j0: 


C0n l4 qu1j4d4 d3 un 4sn0, un m0ntón, d0s m0nt0n3s; 
C0n l4 qu1j4d4 d3 un 4sn0 m4té 4 m1l h0mbr3s. 17 Y 4c4b4nd0 d3 h4bl4r, 4rr0jó d3 su m4n0 l4 qu1j4d4, y ll4mó 4 4qu3l lug4r R4m4t-l3h1. 



18 Y t3n13nd0 gr4n s3d, cl4mó lu3g0 4 J3h0vá, y d1j0: Tú h4s d4d0 3st4 gr4nd3 s4lv4c1ón p0r m4n0 d3 tu s13rv0; ¿y m0r1ré y0 4h0r4 d3 s3d, y c43ré 3n m4n0 d3 l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s? 19 0nt0nc3s 4br1ó D10s l4 cu3nc4 qu3 h4y 3n L3h1; y s4l1ó d3 4llí 4gu4, y él b3b1ó, y r3c0bró su 3spír1tu, y s3 r34n1mó. P0r 3st0 ll4mó 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l lug4r, 0n-h4c0r3, 3l cu4l 3stá 3n L3h1, h4st4 h0y. 20 Y juzgó 4 1sr43l 3n l0s dí4s d3 l0s f1l1st30s v31nt3 4ñ0s. 

S4nsón 3n G4z4

JU0C0S 16

1 Fu3 S4nsón 4 G4z4, y v10 4llí 4 un4 muj3r r4m3r4, y s3 ll3gó 4 3ll4. 2 Y fu3 d1ch0 4 l0s d3 G4z4: S4nsón h4 v3n1d0 4cá. Y l0 r0d34r0n, y 4c3ch4r0n t0d4 4qu3ll4 n0ch3 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c1ud4d; y 3stuv13r0n c4ll4d0s t0d4 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, d1c13nd0: H4st4 l4 luz d3 l4 m4ñ4n4; 3nt0nc3s l0 m4t4r3m0s. 3 M4s S4nsón durm1ó h4st4 l4 m3d14n0ch3; y 4 l4 m3d14n0ch3 s3 l3v4ntó, y t0m4nd0 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c1ud4d c0n sus d0s p1l4r3s y su c3rr0j0, s3 l4s 3chó 4l h0mbr0, y s3 fu3 y l4s sub1ó 4 l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3 qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 H3brón. 

S4nsón y D4l1l4

4 D3spués d3 3st0 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 s3 3n4m0ró d3 un4 muj3r 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 S0r3c, l4 cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 D4l1l4. 5 Y v1n13r0n 4 3ll4 l0s prínc1p3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y l3 d1j3r0n: 0ngáñ4l3 3 1nfórm4t3 3n qué c0ns1st3 su gr4n fu3rz4, y cóm0 l0 p0drí4m0s v3nc3r, p4r4 qu3 l0 4t3m0s y l0 d0m1n3m0s; y c4d4 un0 d3 n0s0tr0s t3 d4rá m1l c13n s1cl0s d3 pl4t4. 6 Y D4l1l4 d1j0 4 S4nsón: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3cl4r3s 3n qué c0ns1st3 tu gr4n fu3rz4, y cóm0 p0drás s3r 4t4d0 p4r4 s3r d0m1n4d0. 7 Y l3 r3sp0nd1ó S4nsón: S1 m3 4t4r3n c0n s13t3 m1mbr3s v3rd3s qu3 4ún n0 3stén 3njut0s, 3nt0nc3s m3 d3b1l1t4ré y s3ré c0m0 cu4lqu13r4 d3 l0s h0mbr3s. 8 Y l0s prínc1p3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s l3 tr4j3r0n s13t3 m1mbr3s v3rd3s qu3 4ún n0 3st4b4n 3njut0s, y 3ll4 l3 4tó c0n 3ll0s. 9 Y 3ll4 t3ní4 h0mbr3s 3n 4c3ch0 3n 3l 4p0s3nt0. 0nt0nc3s 3ll4 l3 d1j0: ¡S4nsón, l0s f1l1st30s c0ntr4 t1! Y él r0mp1ó l0s m1mbr3s, c0m0 s3 r0mp3 un4 cu3rd4 d3 3st0p4 cu4nd0 t0c4 3l fu3g0; y n0 s3 sup0 3l s3cr3t0 d3 su fu3rz4. 

10 0nt0nc3s D4l1l4 d1j0 4 S4nsón: H3 4quí tú m3 h4s 3ng4ñ4d0, y m3 h4s d1ch0 m3nt1r4s; d3scúbr3m3, pu3s, 4h0r4, t3 ru3g0, cóm0 p0drás s3r 4t4d0. 11 Y él l3 d1j0: S1 m3 4t4r3n fu3rt3m3nt3 c0n cu3rd4s nu3v4s qu3 n0 s3 h4y4n us4d0, y0 m3 d3b1l1t4ré, y s3ré c0m0 cu4lqu13r4 d3 l0s h0mbr3s. 12 Y D4l1l4 t0mó cu3rd4s nu3v4s, y l3 4tó c0n 3ll4s, y l3 d1j0: ¡S4nsón, l0s f1l1st30s s0br3 t1! Y l0s 3spí4s 3st4b4n 3n 3l 4p0s3nt0. M4s él l4s r0mp1ó d3 sus br4z0s c0m0 un h1l0. 

13 Y D4l1l4 d1j0 4 S4nsón: H4st4 4h0r4 m3 3ng4ñ4s, y tr4t4s c0nm1g0 c0n m3nt1r4s. D3scúbr3m3, pu3s, 4h0r4, cóm0 p0drás s3r 4t4d0. 0l 3nt0nc3s l3 d1j0: S1 t3j13r3s s13t3 gu3d3j4s d3 m1 c4b3z4 c0n l4 t3l4 y l4s 4s3gur4r3s c0n l4 3st4c4. 14 Y 3ll4 l4s 4s3guró c0n l4 3st4c4, y l3 d1j0: ¡S4nsón, l0s f1l1st30s s0br3 t1! M4s d3sp3rt4nd0 él d3 su su3ñ0, 4rr4ncó l4 3st4c4 d3l t3l4r c0n l4 t3l4. 

15 Y 3ll4 l3 d1j0: ¿Cóm0 d1c3s: Y0 t3 4m0, cu4nd0 tu c0r4zón n0 3stá c0nm1g0? Y4 m3 h4s 3ng4ñ4d0 tr3s v3c3s, y n0 m3 h4s d3scub13rt0 4ún 3n qué c0ns1st3 tu gr4n fu3rz4. 16 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3, pr3s10nánd0l3 3ll4 c4d4 dí4 c0n sus p4l4br4s 3 1mp0rtunánd0l3, su 4lm4 fu3 r3duc1d4 4 m0rt4l 4ngust14. 17 L3 d3scubr1ó, pu3s, t0d0 su c0r4zón, y l3 dj10: Nunc4 4 m1 c4b3z4 ll3gó n4v4j4; p0rqu3 s0y n4z4r30 d3 D10s d3sd3 3l v13ntr3 d3 m1 m4dr3. S1 fu3r3 r4p4d0, m1 fu3rz4 s3 4p4rt4rá d3 mí, y m3 d3b1l1t4ré y s3ré c0m0 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s. 

18 V13nd0 D4l1l4 qu3 él l3 h4bí4 d3scub13rt0 t0d0 su c0r4zón, 3nv1ó 4 ll4m4r 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, d1c13nd0: V3n1d 3st4 v3z, p0rqu3 él m3 h4 d3scub13rt0 t0d0 su c0r4zón. Y l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s v1n13r0n 4 3ll4, tr4y3nd0 3n su m4n0 3l d1n3r0. 19 Y 3ll4 h1z0 qu3 él s3 durm13s3 s0br3 sus r0d1ll4s, y ll4mó 4 un h0mbr3, qu13n l3 r4pó l4s s13t3 gu3d3j4s d3 su c4b3z4; y 3ll4 c0m3nzó 4 4fl1g1rl0, pu3s su fu3rz4 s3 4p4rtó d3 él. 20 Y l3 d1j0: ¡S4nsón, l0s f1l1st30s s0br3 t1! Y lu3g0 qu3 d3sp3rtó él d3 su su3ñ0, s3 d1j0: 0st4 v3z s4ldré c0m0 l4s 0tr4s y m3 3sc4p4ré. P3r0 él n0 s4bí4 qu3 J3h0vá y4 s3 h4bí4 4p4rt4d0 d3 él. 21 M4s l0s f1l1st30s l3 3ch4r0n m4n0, y l3 s4c4r0n l0s 0j0s, y l3 ll3v4r0n 4 G4z4; y l3 4t4r0n c0n c4d3n4s p4r4 qu3 m0l13s3 3n l4 cárc3l. 22 Y 3l c4b3ll0 d3 su c4b3z4 c0m3nzó 4 cr3c3r, d3spués qu3 fu3 r4p4d0. 

Mu3rt3 d3 S4nsón

23 0nt0nc3s l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s s3 junt4r0n p4r4 0fr3c3r s4cr1f1c10 4 D4gón su d10s y p4r4 4l3gr4rs3; y d1j3r0n: Nu3str0 d10s 3ntr3gó 3n nu3str4s m4n0s 4 S4nsón nu3str0 3n3m1g0. 24 Y v1énd0l0 3l pu3bl0, 4l4b4r0n 4 su d10s, d1c13nd0: Nu3str0 d10s 3ntr3gó 3n nu3str4s m4n0s 4 nu3str0 3n3m1g0, y 4l d3stru1d0r d3 nu3str4 t13rr4, 3l cu4l h4bí4 d4d0 mu3rt3 4 much0s d3 n0s0tr0s. 25 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 s1nt13r0n 4l3grí4 3n su c0r4zón, d1j3r0n: Ll4m4d 4 S4nsón, p4r4 qu3 n0s d1v13rt4. Y ll4m4r0n 4 S4nsón d3 l4 cárc3l, y s1rv1ó d3 jugu3t3 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s; y l0 pus13r0n 3ntr3 l4s c0lumn4s. 26 0nt0nc3s S4nsón d1j0 4l j0v3n qu3 l3 gu14b4 d3 l4 m4n0: 4cérc4m3, y h4zm3 p4lp4r l4s c0lumn4s s0br3 l4s qu3 d3sc4ns4 l4 c4s4, p4r4 qu3 m3 4p0y3 s0br3 3ll4s. 27 Y l4 c4s4 3st4b4 ll3n4 d3 h0mbr3s y muj3r3s, y t0d0s l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s 3st4b4n 4llí; y 3n 3l p1s0 4lt0 h4bí4 c0m0 tr3s m1l h0mbr3s y muj3r3s, qu3 3st4b4n m1r4nd0 3l 3sc4rn10 d3 S4nsón. 

28 0nt0nc3s cl4mó S4nsón 4 J3h0vá, y d1j0: S3ñ0r J3h0vá, 4cuérd4t3 4h0r4 d3 mí, y f0rt4léc3m3, t3 ru3g0, s0l4m3nt3 3st4 v3z, 0h D10s, p4r4 qu3 d3 un4 v3z t0m3 v3ng4nz4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s p0r m1s d0s 0j0s. 29 4s1ó lu3g0 S4nsón l4s d0s c0lumn4s d3 3n m3d10, s0br3 l4s qu3 d3sc4ns4b4 l4 c4s4, y 3chó t0d0 su p3s0 s0br3 3ll4s, su m4n0 d3r3ch4 s0br3 un4 y su m4n0 1zqu13rd4 s0br3 l4 0tr4. 30 Y d1j0 S4nsón: Mu3r4 y0 c0n l0s f1l1st30s. 0nt0nc3s s3 1ncl1nó c0n t0d4 su fu3rz4, y c4yó l4 c4s4 s0br3 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s, y s0br3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 3st4b4 3n 3ll4. Y l0s qu3 m4tó 4l m0r1r fu3r0n much0s más qu3 l0s qu3 h4bí4 m4t4d0 dur4nt3 su v1d4. 31 Y d3sc3nd13r0n sus h3rm4n0s y t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3, y l3 t0m4r0n, y l3 ll3v4r0n, y l3 s3pult4r0n 3ntr3 Z0r4 y 0st40l, 3n 3l s3pulcr0 d3 su p4dr3 M4n04. Y él juzgó 4 1sr43l v31nt3 4ñ0s. 

L4s 1mág3n3s y 3l s4c3rd0t3 d3 M1c4í4

JU0C0S 17

1 Hub0 un h0mbr3 d3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 M1c4í4, 2 3l cu4l d1j0 4 su m4dr3: L0s m1l c13n s1cl0s d3 pl4t4 qu3 t3 fu3r0n hurt4d0s, 4c3rc4 d3 l0s cu4l3s m4ld1j1st3, y d3 l0s cu4l3s m3 h4bl4st3, h3 4quí 3l d1n3r0 3stá 3n m1 p0d3r; y0 l0 t0mé. 0nt0nc3s l4 m4dr3 d1j0: B3nd1t0 s34s d3 J3h0vá, h1j0 mí0. 3 Y él d3v0lv1ó l0s m1l c13n s1cl0s d3 pl4t4 4 su m4dr3; y su m4dr3 d1j0: 0n v3rd4d h3 d3d1c4d0 3l d1n3r0 4 J3h0vá p0r m1 h1j0, p4r4 h4c3r un4 1m4g3n d3 t4ll4 y un4 d3 fund1c1ón; 4h0r4, pu3s, y0 t3 l0 d3vu3lv0. 4 M4s él d3v0lv1ó 3l d1n3r0 4 su m4dr3, y t0mó su m4dr3 d0sc13nt0s s1cl0s d3 pl4t4 y l0s d10 4l fund1d0r, qu13n h1z0 d3 3ll0s un4 1m4g3n d3 t4ll4 y un4 d3 fund1c1ón, l4 cu4l fu3 pu3st4 3n l4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4. 5 Y 3st3 h0mbr3 M1c4í4 tuv0 c4s4 d3 d10s3s, 3 h1z0 3f0d y t3r4f1n3s, y c0ns4gró 4 un0 d3 sus h1j0s p4r4 qu3 fu3r4 su s4c3rd0t3. 6 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s n0 h4bí4 r3y 3n 1sr43l; c4d4 un0 h4cí4 l0 qu3 b13n l3 p4r3cí4. 

7 Y h4bí4 un j0v3n d3 B3lén d3 Judá, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 Judá, 3l cu4l 3r4 l3v1t4, y f0r4st3r0 4llí. 8 0st3 h0mbr3 p4rt1ó d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 B3lén d3 Judá p4r4 1r 4 v1v1r d0nd3 pud13r4 3nc0ntr4r lug4r; y ll3g4nd0 3n su c4m1n0 4l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, v1n0 4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4. 9 Y M1c4í4 l3 d1j0: ¿D3 dónd3 v13n3s? Y 3l l3v1t4 l3 r3sp0nd1ó: S0y d3 B3lén d3 Judá, y v0y 4 v1v1r d0nd3 pu3d4 3nc0ntr4r lug4r. 10 0nt0nc3s M1c4í4 l3 d1j0: Quéd4t3 3n m1 c4s4, y s3rás p4r4 mí p4dr3 y s4c3rd0t3; y y0 t3 d4ré d13z s1cl0s d3 pl4t4 p0r 4ñ0, v3st1d0s y c0m1d4. Y 3l l3v1t4 s3 qu3dó. 11 4gr4dó, pu3s, 4l l3v1t4 m0r4r c0n 4qu3l h0mbr3, y fu3 p4r4 él c0m0 un0 d3 sus h1j0s. 12 Y M1c4í4 c0ns4gró 4l l3v1t4, y 4qu3l j0v3n l3 s3rví4 d3 s4c3rd0t3, y p3rm4n3c1ó 3n c4s4 d3 M1c4í4. 13 Y M1c4í4 d1j0: 4h0r4 sé qu3 J3h0vá m3 pr0sp3r4rá, p0rqu3 t3ng0 un l3v1t4 p0r s4c3rd0t3. 

M1c4í4 y l0s h0mbr3s d3 D4n

JU0C0S 18

1 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s n0 h4bí4 r3y 3n 1sr43l. Y 3n 4qu3ll0s dí4s l4 tr1bu d3 D4n busc4b4 p0s3s1ón p4r4 sí d0nd3 h4b1t4r, p0rqu3 h4st4 3nt0nc3s n0 h4bí4 t3n1d0 p0s3s1ón 3ntr3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l. 2 Y l0s h1j0s d3 D4n 3nv14r0n d3 su tr1bu c1nc0 h0mbr3s d3 3ntr3 3ll0s, h0mbr3s v4l13nt3s, d3 Z0r4 y 0st40l, p4r4 qu3 r3c0n0c13s3n y 3xpl0r4s3n b13n l4 t13rr4; y l3s d1j3r0n: 1d y r3c0n0c3d l4 t13rr4. 0st0s v1n13r0n 4l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, h4st4 l4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4, y 4llí p0s4r0n. 3 Cu4nd0 3st4b4n c3rc4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4, r3c0n0c13r0n l4 v0z d3l j0v3n l3v1t4; y ll3g4nd0 4llá, l3 d1j3r0n: ¿Qu1én t3 h4 tr4íd0 4cá? ¿y qué h4c3s 4quí? ¿y qué t13n3s tú p0r 4quí? 4 0l l3s r3sp0nd1ó: D3 3st4 y d3 3st4 m4n3r4 h4 h3ch0 c0nm1g0 M1c4í4, y m3 h4 t0m4d0 p4r4 qu3 s34 su s4c3rd0t3. 5 Y 3ll0s l3 d1j3r0n: Pr3gunt4, pu3s, 4h0r4 4 D10s, p4r4 qu3 s3p4m0s s1 h4 d3 pr0sp3r4r 3st3 v14j3 qu3 h4c3m0s. 6 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3s r3sp0nd1ó: 1d 3n p4z; d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3stá vu3str0 c4m1n0 3n qu3 4ndá1s. 

7 0nt0nc3s 4qu3ll0s c1nc0 h0mbr3s s4l13r0n, y v1n13r0n 4 L41s; y v13r0n qu3 3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n 3ll4 3st4b4 s3gur0, 0c10s0 y c0nf14d0, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c0stumbr3 d3 l0s d3 S1dón, s1n qu3 n4d13 3n 4qu3ll4 r3g1ón l3s p3rturb4s3 3n c0s4 4lgun4, n1 h4bí4 qu13n p0s3y3s3 3l r31n0. Y 3st4b4n l3j0s d3 l0s s1d0n10s, y n0 t3ní4n n3g0c10s c0n n4d13. 8 V0lv13nd0, pu3s, 3ll0s 4 sus h3rm4n0s 3n Z0r4 y 0st40l, sus h3rm4n0s l3s d1j3r0n: ¿Qué h4y? Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: 9 L3v4nt40s, sub4m0s c0ntr4 3ll0s; p0rqu3 n0s0tr0s h3m0s 3xpl0r4d0 l4 r3g1ón, y h3m0s v1st0 qu3 3s muy bu3n4; ¿y v0s0tr0s n0 h4ré1s n4d4? N0 s3á1s p3r3z0s0s 3n p0n3r0s 3n m4rch4 p4r4 1r 4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 l4 t13rr4. 10 Cu4nd0 v4yá1s, ll3g4ré1s 4 un pu3bl0 c0nf14d0 y 4 un4 t13rr4 muy 3sp4c10s4, pu3s D10s l4 h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n vu3str4s m4n0s; lug4r d0nd3 n0 h4y f4lt4 d3 c0s4 4lgun4 qu3 h4y4 3n l4 t13rr4. 

11 0nt0nc3s s4l13r0n d3 4llí, d3 Z0r4 y d3 0st40l, s31sc13nt0s h0mbr3s d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3 D4n, 4rm4d0s d3 4rm4s d3 gu3rr4. 12 Fu3r0n y 4c4mp4r0n 3n Qu1r14t-j34r1m 3n Judá, p0r l0 cu4l ll4m4r0n 4 4qu3l lug4r 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 D4n, h4st4 h0y; 3stá 4l 0cc1d3nt3 d3 Qu1r14t-j34r1m. 13 Y d3 4llí p4s4r0n 4l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, y v1n13r0n h4st4 l4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4. 

14 0nt0nc3s 4qu3ll0s c1nc0 h0mbr3s qu3 h4bí4n 1d0 4 r3c0n0c3r l4 t13rr4 d3 L41s d1j3r0n 4 sus h3rm4n0s: ¿N0 s4bé1s qu3 3n 3st4s c4s4s h4y 3f0d y t3r4f1n3s, y un4 1m4g3n d3 t4ll4 y un4 d3 fund1c1ón? M1r4d, p0r t4nt0, l0 qu3 h4bé1s d3 h4c3r. 15 Cu4nd0 ll3g4r0n 4llá, v1n13r0n 4 l4 c4s4 d3l j0v3n l3v1t4, 3n c4s4 d3 M1c4í4, y l3 pr3gunt4r0n cóm0 3st4b4. 16 Y l0s s31sc13nt0s h0mbr3s, qu3 3r4n d3 l0s h1j0s d3 D4n, 3st4b4n 4rm4d0s d3 sus 4rm4s d3 gu3rr4 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4. 17 Y sub13nd0 l0s c1nc0 h0mbr3s qu3 h4bí4n 1d0 4 r3c0n0c3r l4 t13rr4, 3ntr4r0n 4llá y t0m4r0n l4 1m4g3n d3 t4ll4, 3l 3f0d, l0s t3r4f1n3s y l4 1m4g3n d3 fund1c1ón, m13ntr4s 3st4b4 3l s4c3rd0t3 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 c0n l0s s31sc13nt0s h0mbr3s 4rm4d0s d3 4rm4s d3 gu3rr4. 18 0ntr4nd0, pu3s, 4quéll0s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4, t0m4r0n l4 1m4g3n d3 t4ll4, 3l 3f0d, l0s t3r4f1n3s y l4 1m4g3n d3 fund1c1ón. Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3s d1j0: ¿Qué h4cé1s v0s0tr0s? 19 Y 3ll0s l3 r3sp0nd13r0n: C4ll4, p0n l4 m4n0 s0br3 tu b0c4, y v3nt3 c0n n0s0tr0s, p4r4 qu3 s34s nu3str0 p4dr3 y s4c3rd0t3. ¿0s m3j0r qu3 s34s tú s4c3rd0t3 3n c4s4 d3 un s0l0 h0mbr3, qu3 d3 un4 tr1bu y f4m1l14 d3 1sr43l? 20 Y s3 4l3gró 3l c0r4zón d3l s4c3rd0t3, 3l cu4l t0mó 3l 3f0d y l0s t3r4f1n3s y l4 1m4g3n, y s3 fu3 3n m3d10 d3l pu3bl0. 

21 Y 3ll0s s3 v0lv13r0n y p4rt13r0n, y pus13r0n l0s n1ñ0s, 3l g4n4d0 y 3l b4g4j3 p0r d3l4nt3. 22 Cu4nd0 y4 s3 h4bí4n 4l3j4d0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4, l0s h0mbr3s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n l4s c4s4s c3rc4n4s 4 l4 c4s4 d3 M1c4í4 s3 junt4r0n y s1gu13r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 D4n. 23 Y d4nd0 v0c3s 4 l0s d3 D4n, ést0s v0lv13r0n sus r0str0s, y d1j3r0n 4 M1c4í4: ¿Qué t13n3s, qu3 h4s junt4d0 g3nt3? 24 0l r3sp0nd1ó: T0m4st31s m1s d10s3s qu3 y0 h1c3 y 4l s4c3rd0t3, y 0s v41s; ¿qué más m3 qu3d4? ¿P0r qué, pu3s, m3 d3cís: ¿Qué t13n3s? 25 Y l0s h1j0s d3 D4n l3 d1j3r0n: N0 d3s v0c3s tr4s n0s0tr0s, n0 s34 qu3 l0s d3 án1m0 c0lér1c0 0s 4c0m3t4n, y p13rd4s t4mb1én tu v1d4 y l4 v1d4 d3 l0s tuy0s. 26 Y pr0s1gu13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 D4n su c4m1n0, y M1c4í4, v13nd0 qu3 3r4n más fu3rt3s qu3 él, v0lv1ó y r3gr3só 4 su c4s4. 

27 Y 3ll0s, ll3v4nd0 l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 M1c4í4, junt4m3nt3 c0n 3l s4c3rd0t3 qu3 t3ní4, ll3g4r0n 4 L41s, 4l pu3bl0 tr4nqu1l0 y c0nf14d0; y l0s h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, y qu3m4r0n l4 c1ud4d. 28 Y n0 hub0 qu13n l0s d3f3nd13s3, p0rqu3 3st4b4n l3j0s d3 S1dón, y n0 t3ní4n n3g0c10s c0n n4d13. Lu3g0 r33d1f1c4r0n l4 c1ud4d, y h4b1t4r0n 3n 3ll4. 29 Y ll4m4r0n 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3ll4 c1ud4d D4n, c0nf0rm3 4l n0mbr3 d3 D4n su p4dr3, h1j0 d3 1sr43l, b13n qu3 4nt3s s3 ll4m4b4 l4 c1ud4d L41s. 30 Y l0s h1j0s d3 D4n l3v4nt4r0n p4r4 sí l4 1m4g3n d3 t4ll4; y J0n4tán h1j0 d3 G3rsón, h1j0 d3 M01sés, él y sus h1j0s fu3r0n s4c3rd0t3s 3n l4 tr1bu d3 D4n, h4st4 3l dí4 d3l c4ut1v3r10 d3 l4 t13rr4. 31 4sí tuv13r0n l3v4nt4d4 3ntr3 3ll0s l4 1m4g3n d3 t4ll4 qu3 M1c4í4 h4bí4 h3ch0, t0d0 3l t13mp0 qu3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s 3stuv0 3n S1l0. 

0l l3v1t4 y su c0ncub1n4

JU0C0S 19

1 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s, cu4nd0 n0 h4bí4 r3y 3n 1sr43l, hub0 un l3v1t4 qu3 m0r4b4 c0m0 f0r4st3r0 3n l4 p4rt3 más r3m0t4 d3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, 3l cu4l h4bí4 t0m4d0 p4r4 sí muj3r c0ncub1n4 d3 B3lén d3 Judá. 2 Y su c0ncub1n4 l3 fu3 1nf13l, y s3 fu3 d3 él 4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3, 4 B3lén d3 Judá, y 3stuv0 4llá dur4nt3 cu4tr0 m3s3s. 3 Y s3 l3v4ntó su m4r1d0 y l4 s1gu1ó, p4r4 h4bl4rl3 4m0r0s4m3nt3 y h4c3rl4 v0lv3r; y ll3v4b4 c0ns1g0 un cr14d0, y un p4r d3 4sn0s; y 3ll4 l3 h1z0 3ntr4r 3n l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3. 4 Y v1énd0l3 3l p4dr3 d3 l4 j0v3n, s4l1ó 4 r3c1b1rl3 g0z0s0; y l3 d3tuv0 su su3gr0, 3l p4dr3 d3 l4 j0v3n, y qu3dó 3n su c4s4 tr3s dí4s, c0m13nd0 y b3b13nd0 y 4l0jánd0s3 4llí. 5 4l cu4rt0 dí4, cu4nd0 s3 l3v4nt4r0n d3 m4ñ4n4, s3 l3v4ntó t4mb1én 3l l3v1t4 p4r4 1rs3; y 3l p4dr3 d3 l4 j0v3n d1j0 4 su y3rn0: C0nf0rt4 tu c0r4zón c0n un b0c4d0 d3 p4n, y d3spués 0s 1ré1s. 6 Y s3 s3nt4r0n 3ll0s d0s junt0s, y c0m13r0n y b3b13r0n. Y 3l p4dr3 d3 l4 j0v3n d1j0 4l v4rón: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 qu13r4s p4s4r 4quí l4 n0ch3, y s3 4l3gr4rá tu c0r4zón. 7 Y s3 l3v4ntó 3l v4rón p4r4 1rs3, p3r0 1ns1st1ó su su3gr0, y v0lv1ó 4 p4s4r 4llí l4 n0ch3. 8 4l qu1nt0 dí4, l3v4ntánd0s3 d3 m4ñ4n4 p4r4 1rs3, l3 d1j0 3l p4dr3 d3 l4 j0v3n: C0nf0rt4 4h0r4 tu c0r4zón, y 4gu4rd4 h4st4 qu3 d3cl1n3 3l dí4. Y c0m13r0n 4mb0s junt0s. 9 Lu3g0 s3 l3v4ntó 3l v4rón p4r4 1rs3, él y su c0ncub1n4 y su cr14d0. 0nt0nc3s su su3gr0, 3l p4dr3 d3 l4 j0v3n, l3 d1j0: H3 4quí y4 3l dí4 d3cl1n4 p4r4 4n0ch3c3r, t3 ru3g0 qu3 p4sé1s 4quí l4 n0ch3; h3 4quí qu3 3l dí4 s3 4c4b4, du3rm3 4quí, p4r4 qu3 s3 4l3gr3 tu c0r4zón; y m4ñ4n4 0s l3v4nt4ré1s t3mpr4n0 4 vu3str0 c4m1n0 y t3 1rás 4 tu c4s4. 

10 M4s 3l h0mbr3 n0 qu1s0 p4s4r 4llí l4 n0ch3, s1n0 qu3 s3 l3v4ntó y s3 fu3, y ll3gó h4st4 3nfr3nt3 d3 J3bús, qu3 3s J3rus4lén, c0n su p4r d3 4sn0s 3ns1ll4d0s, y su c0ncub1n4. 11 Y 3st4nd0 y4 junt0 4 J3bús, 3l dí4 h4bí4 d3cl1n4d0 much0; y d1j0 3l cr14d0 4 su s3ñ0r: V3n 4h0r4, y vám0n0s 4 3st4 c1ud4d d3 l0s j3bus30s, p4r4 qu3 p4s3m0s 3n 3ll4 l4 n0ch3. 12 Y su s3ñ0r l3 r3sp0nd1ó: N0 1r3m0s 4 n1ngun4 c1ud4d d3 3xtr4nj3r0s, qu3 n0 s34 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, s1n0 qu3 p4s4r3m0s h4st4 G4b44. Y d1j0 4 su cr14d0: 13 V3n, s1g4m0s h4st4 un0 d3 3s0s lug4r3s, p4r4 p4s4r l4 n0ch3 3n G4b44 0 3n R4má. 14 P4s4nd0, pu3s, c4m1n4r0n, y s3 l3s pus0 3l s0l junt0 4 G4b44 qu3 3r4 d3 B3nj4mín. 15 Y s3 4p4rt4r0n d3l c4m1n0 p4r4 3ntr4r 4 p4s4r 4llí l4 n0ch3 3n G4b44; y 3ntr4nd0, s3 s3nt4r0n 3n l4 pl4z4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, p0rqu3 n0 hub0 qu13n l0s 4c0g13s3 3n c4s4 p4r4 p4s4r l4 n0ch3. 

16 Y h3 4quí un h0mbr3 v13j0 qu3 v3ní4 d3 su tr4b4j0 d3l c4mp0 4l 4n0ch3c3r, 3l cu4l 3r4 d3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, y m0r4b4 c0m0 f0r4st3r0 3n G4b44; p3r0 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 4qu3l lug4r 3r4n h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín. 17 Y 4lz4nd0 3l v13j0 l0s 0j0s, v10 4 4qu3l c4m1n4nt3 3n l4 pl4z4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y l3 d1j0: ¿4 dónd3 v4s, y d3 dónd3 v13n3s? 18 Y él r3sp0nd1ó: P4s4m0s d3 B3lén d3 Judá 4 l4 p4rt3 más r3m0t4 d3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, d3 d0nd3 s0y; y h4bí4 1d0 4 B3lén d3 Judá; m4s 4h0r4 v0y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y n0 h4y qu13n m3 r3c1b4 3n c4s4. 19 N0s0tr0s t3n3m0s p4j4 y f0rr4j3 p4r4 nu3str0s 4sn0s, y t4mb1én t3n3m0s p4n y v1n0 p4r4 mí y p4r4 tu s13rv4, y p4r4 3l cr14d0 qu3 3stá c0n tu s13rv0; n0 n0s h4c3 f4lt4 n4d4. 20 Y 3l h0mbr3 4nc14n0 d1j0: P4z s34 c0nt1g0; tu n3c3s1d4d t0d4 qu3d3 s0l4m3nt3 4 m1 c4rg0, c0n t4l qu3 n0 p4s3s l4 n0ch3 3n l4 pl4z4. 21 Y l0s tr4j0 4 su c4s4, y d10 d3 c0m3r 4 sus 4sn0s; y s3 l4v4r0n l0s p13s, y c0m13r0n y b3b13r0n. 

22 P3r0 cu4nd0 3st4b4n g0z0s0s, h3 4quí qu3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 4qu3ll4 c1ud4d, h0mbr3s p3rv3rs0s, r0d34r0n l4 c4s4, g0lp34nd0 4 l4 pu3rt4; y h4bl4r0n 4l 4nc14n0, du3ñ0 d3 l4 c4s4, d1c13nd0: S4c4 4l h0mbr3 qu3 h4 3ntr4d0 3n tu c4s4, p4r4 qu3 l0 c0n0zc4m0s. 23 Y s4l1ó 4 3ll0s 3l du3ñ0 d3 l4 c4s4 y l3s d1j0: N0, h3rm4n0s mí0s, 0s ru3g0 qu3 n0 c0m3tá1s 3st3 m4l; y4 qu3 3st3 h0mbr3 h4 3ntr4d0 3n m1 c4s4, n0 h4gá1s 3st4 m4ld4d. 24 H3 4quí m1 h1j4 v1rg3n, y l4 c0ncub1n4 d3 él; y0 0s l4s s4c4ré 4h0r4; hum1ll4dl4s y h4c3d c0n 3ll4s c0m0 0s p4r3zc4, y n0 h4gá1s 4 3st3 h0mbr3 c0s4 t4n 1nf4m3. 25 M4s 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s n0 l3 qu1s13r0n 0ír; p0r l0 qu3 t0m4nd0 4qu3l h0mbr3 4 su c0ncub1n4, l4 s4có; y 3ntr4r0n 4 3ll4, y 4bus4r0n d3 3ll4 t0d4 l4 n0ch3 h4st4 l4 m4ñ4n4, y l4 d3j4r0n cu4nd0 4punt4b4 3l 4lb4. 26 Y cu4nd0 y4 4m4n3cí4, v1n0 l4 muj3r, y c4yó d3l4nt3 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 4qu3l h0mbr3 d0nd3 su s3ñ0r 3st4b4, h4st4 qu3 fu3 d3 dí4. 

27 Y s3 l3v4ntó p0r l4 m4ñ4n4 su s3ñ0r, y 4br1ó l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c4s4, y s4l1ó p4r4 s3gu1r su c4m1n0; y h3 4quí l4 muj3r su c0ncub1n4 3st4b4 t3nd1d4 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c4s4, c0n l4s m4n0s s0br3 3l umbr4l. 28 0l l3 d1j0: L3vánt4t3, y vám0n0s; p3r0 3ll4 n0 r3sp0nd1ó. 0nt0nc3s l4 l3v4ntó 3l v4rón, y 3chánd0l4 s0br3 su 4sn0, s3 l3v4ntó y s3 fu3 4 su lug4r. 29 Y ll3g4nd0 4 su c4s4, t0mó un cuch1ll0, y 3chó m4n0 d3 su c0ncub1n4, y l4 p4rt1ó p0r sus hu3s0s 3n d0c3 p4rt3s, y l4 3nv1ó p0r t0d0 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 1sr43l. 30 Y t0d0 3l qu3 v3í4 4qu3ll0, d3cí4: J4más s3 h4 h3ch0 n1 v1st0 t4l c0s4, d3sd3 3l t13mp0 3n qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l sub13r0n d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 h4st4 h0y. C0ns1d3r4d 3st0, t0m4d c0ns3j0, y h4bl4d.

12 Y l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l 3nv14r0n v4r0n3s p0r t0d4 l4 tr1bu d3 B3nj4mín, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué m4ld4d 3s 3st4 qu3 h4 s1d0 h3ch4 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s? 13 0ntr3g4d, pu3s, 4h0r4 4 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s p3rv3rs0s qu3 3stán 3n G4b44, p4r4 qu3 l0s m4t3m0s, y qu1t3m0s 3l m4l d3 1sr43l. 19 S3 l3v4nt4r0n, pu3s, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p0r l4 m4ñ4n4, c0ntr4 G4b44. 20 Y s4l13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 c0mb4t1r c0ntr4 B3nj4mín, y l0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l 0rd3n4r0n l4 b4t4ll4 c0ntr4 3ll0s junt0 4 G4b44. 21 S4l13nd0 3nt0nc3s d3 G4b44 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín, d3rr1b4r0n p0r t13rr4 4qu3l dí4 v31nt1dós m1l h0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 22 M4s r34n1mánd0s3 3l pu3bl0, l0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l v0lv13r0n 4 0rd3n4r l4 b4t4ll4 3n 3l m1sm0 lug4r d0nd3 l4 h4bí4n 0rd3n4d0 3l pr1m3r dí4. 23 P0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l sub13r0n y ll0r4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá h4st4 l4 n0ch3, y c0nsult4r0n 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: ¿V0lv3r3m0s 4 p3l34r c0n l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín nu3str0s h3rm4n0s? 24 P0r l0 cu4l s3 4c3rc4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín 3l s3gund0 dí4. 25 Y 4qu3l s3gund0 dí4, s4l13nd0 B3nj4mín d3 G4b44 c0ntr4 3ll0s, d3rr1b4r0n p0r t13rr4 0tr0s d13c10ch0 m1l h0mbr3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, t0d0s l0s cu4l3s s4c4b4n 3sp4d4. 26 0nt0nc3s sub13r0n t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y t0d0 3l pu3bl0, y v1n13r0n 4 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s; y ll0r4r0n, y s3 s3nt4r0n 4llí 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá, y 4yun4r0n 4qu3l dí4 h4st4 l4 n0ch3; y 0fr3c13r0n h0l0c4ust0s y 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 27 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l pr3gunt4r0n 4 J3h0vá (pu3s 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 D10s 3st4b4 4llí 3n 4qu3ll0s dí4s, 28 y F1n33s h1j0 d3 0l34z4r, h1j0 d3 44rón, m1n1str4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll4 3n 4qu3ll0s dí4s), y d1j3r0n: ¿V0lv3r3m0s 4ún 4 s4l1r c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín nu3str0s h3rm4n0s, p4r4 p3l34r, 0 d3s1st1r3m0s? Y J3h0vá d1j0: Sub1d, p0rqu3 m4ñ4n4 y0 0s l0s 3ntr3g4ré. 

29 Y pus0 1sr43l 3mb0sc4d4s 4lr3d3d0r d3 G4b44. 30 Sub13nd0 3nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín 3l t3rc3r dí4, 0rd3n4r0n l4 b4t4ll4 d3l4nt3 d3 G4b44, c0m0 l4s 0tr4s v3c3s. 31 Y s4l13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín 4l 3ncu3ntr0 d3l pu3bl0, 4l3jánd0s3 d3 l4 c1ud4d; y c0m3nz4r0n 4 h3r1r 4 4lgun0s d3l pu3bl0, m4tánd0l0s c0m0 l4s 0tr4s v3c3s p0r l0s c4m1n0s, un0 d3 l0s cu4l3s sub3 4 B3t-3l, y 3l 0tr0 4 G4b44 3n 3l c4mp0; y m4t4r0n un0s tr31nt4 h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l. 32 Y l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín d3cí4n: V3nc1d0s s0n d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s, c0m0 4nt3s. M4s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3cí4n: Hu1r3m0s, y l0s 4l3j4r3m0s d3 l4 c1ud4d h4st4 l0s c4m1n0s. 33 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n t0d0s l0s d3 1sr43l d3 su lug4r, y s3 pus13r0n 3n 0rd3n d3 b4t4ll4 3n B44l-t4m4r; y t4mb1én l4s 3mb0sc4d4s d3 1sr43l s4l13r0n d3 su lug4r, d3 l4 pr4d3r4 d3 G4b44. 34 Y v1n13r0n c0ntr4 G4b44 d13z m1l h0mbr3s 3sc0g1d0s d3 t0d0 1sr43l, y l4 b4t4ll4 4rr3c14b4; m4s 3ll0s n0 s4bí4n qu3 y4 3l d3s4str3 s3 4c3rc4b4 4 3ll0s. 35 Y d3rr0tó J3h0vá 4 B3nj4mín d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l; y m4t4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4qu3l dí4 4 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c13n h0mbr3s d3 B3nj4mín, t0d0s l0s cu4l3s s4c4b4n 3sp4d4. 

36 Y v13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín qu3 3r4n d3rr0t4d0s; y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c3d13r0n c4mp0 4 B3nj4mín, p0rqu3 3st4b4n c0nf14d0s 3n l4s 3mb0sc4d4s qu3 h4bí4n pu3st0 d3trás d3 G4b44. 37 Y l0s h0mbr3s d3 l4s 3mb0sc4d4s 4c0m3t13r0n pr0nt4m3nt3 4 G4b44, y 4v4nz4r0n 3 h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4 4 t0d4 l4 c1ud4d. 38 Y 3r4 l4 s3ñ4l c0nc3rt4d4 3ntr3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l y l4s 3mb0sc4d4s, qu3 h1c13s3n sub1r un4 gr4n hum4r3d4 d3 l4 c1ud4d. 39 Lu3g0, pu3s, qu3 l0s d3 1sr43l r3tr0c3d13r0n 3n l4 b4t4ll4, l0s d3 B3nj4mín c0m3nz4r0n 4 h3r1r y m4t4r 4 l4 g3nt3 d3 1sr43l c0m0 tr31nt4 h0mbr3s, y y4 d3cí4n: C13rt4m3nt3 3ll0s h4n c4íd0 d3l4nt3 d3 n0s0tr0s, c0m0 3n l4 pr1m3r4 b4t4ll4. 40 M4s cu4nd0 l4 c0lumn4 d3 hum0 c0m3nzó 4 sub1r d3 l4 c1ud4d, l0s d3 B3nj4mín m1r4r0n h4c14 4trás; y h3 4quí qu3 3l hum0 d3 l4 c1ud4d subí4 4l c13l0. 41 0nt0nc3s s3 v0lv13r0n l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l, y l0s d3 B3nj4mín s3 ll3n4r0n d3 t3m0r, p0rqu3 v13r0n qu3 3l d3s4str3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 s0br3 3ll0s. 42 V0lv13r0n, p0r t4nt0, l4 3sp4ld4 d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l h4c14 3l c4m1n0 d3l d3s13rt0; p3r0 l4 b4t4ll4 l0s 4lc4nzó, y l0s qu3 s4lí4n d3 l4s c1ud4d3s l0s d3struí4n 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s. 43 4sí c3rc4r0n 4 l0s d3 B3nj4mín, y l0s 4c0s4r0n y h0ll4r0n d3sd3 M3núh4 h4st4 3nfr3nt3 d3 G4b44 h4c14 d0nd3 n4c3 3l s0l. 44 Y c4y3r0n d3 B3nj4mín d13c10ch0 m1l h0mbr3s, t0d0s 3ll0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4. 45 V0lv1énd0s3 lu3g0, huy3r0n h4c14 3l d3s13rt0, 4 l4 p3ñ4 d3 R1món, y d3 3ll0s fu3r0n 4b4t1d0s c1nc0 m1l h0mbr3s 3n l0s c4m1n0s; y fu3r0n p3rs1gu1énd0l0s 4un h4st4 G1d0m, y m4t4r0n d3 3ll0s 4 d0s m1l h0mbr3s. 46 Fu3r0n t0d0s l0s qu3 d3 B3nj4mín mur13r0n 4qu3l dí4, v31nt1c1nc0 m1l h0mbr3s qu3 s4c4b4n 3sp4d4, t0d0s 3ll0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4. 47 P3r0 s3 v0lv13r0n y huy3r0n 4l d3s13rt0 4 l4 p3ñ4 d3 R1món s31sc13nt0s h0mbr3s, l0s cu4l3s 3stuv13r0n 3n l4 p3ñ4 d3 R1món cu4tr0 m3s3s. 48 Y l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l v0lv13r0n s0br3 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín, y l0s h1r13r0n 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, 4sí 4 l0s h0mbr3s d3 c4d4 c1ud4d c0m0 4 l4s b3st14s y t0d0 l0 qu3 fu3 h4ll4d0; 4s1m1sm0 pus13r0n fu3g0 4 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 h4ll4b4n. 

Muj3r3s p4r4 l0s b3nj4m1t4s

JU0C0S 21

1 L0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l h4bí4n jur4d0 3n M1zp4, d1c13nd0: N1ngun0 d3 n0s0tr0s d4rá su h1j4 4 l0s d3 B3nj4mín p0r muj3r. 2 Y v1n0 3l pu3bl0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, y s3 3stuv13r0n 4llí h4st4 l4 n0ch3 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 D10s; y 4lz4nd0 su v0z h1c13r0n gr4n ll4nt0, y d1j3r0n: 3 0h J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, ¿p0r qué h4 suc3d1d0 3st0 3n 1sr43l, qu3 f4lt3 h0y d3 1sr43l un4 tr1bu? 4 Y 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3 3l pu3bl0 s3 l3v4ntó d3 m4ñ4n4, y 3d1f1c4r0n 4llí 4lt4r, y 0fr3c13r0n h0l0c4ust0s y 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z. 5 Y d1j3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l: ¿Qu1én d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l n0 sub1ó 4 l4 r3un1ón d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá? P0rqu3 s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 gr4n jur4m3nt0 c0ntr4 3l qu3 n0 sub13s3 4 J3h0vá 3n M1zp4, d1c13nd0: Sufr1rá l4 mu3rt3. 6 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s3 4rr3p1nt13r0n 4 c4us4 d3 B3nj4mín su h3rm4n0, y d1j3r0n: C0rt4d4 3s h0y d3 1sr43l un4 tr1bu. 7 ¿Qué h4r3m0s 3n cu4nt0 4 muj3r3s p4r4 l0s qu3 h4n qu3d4d0? N0s0tr0s h3m0s jur4d0 p0r J3h0vá qu3 n0 l3s d4r3m0s nu3str4s h1j4s p0r muj3r3s. 

8 Y d1j3r0n: ¿H4y 4lgun0 d3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l qu3 n0 h4y4 sub1d0 4 J3h0vá 3n M1zp4? Y h4ll4r0n qu3 n1ngun0 d3 J4b3s-g4l44d h4bí4 v3n1d0 4l c4mp4m3nt0, 4 l4 r3un1ón. 9 P0rqu3 fu3 c0nt4d0 3l pu3bl0, y n0 hub0 4llí v4rón d3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J4b3s-g4l44d. 10 0nt0nc3s l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 3nv1ó 4llá 4 d0c3 m1l h0mbr3s d3 l0s más v4l13nt3s, y l3s m4nd4r0n, d1c13nd0: 1d y h3r1d 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J4b3s-g4l44d, c0n l4s muj3r3s y n1ñ0s. 11 P3r0 h4ré1s d3 3st4 m4n3r4: m4t4ré1s 4 t0d0 v4rón, y 4 t0d4 muj3r qu3 h4y4 c0n0c1d0 4yunt4m13nt0 d3 v4rón. 12 Y h4ll4r0n d3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J4b3s-g4l44d cu4tr0c13nt4s d0nc3ll4s qu3 n0 h4bí4n c0n0c1d0 4yunt4m13nt0 d3 v4rón, y l4s tr4j3r0n 4l c4mp4m3nt0 3n S1l0, qu3 3stá 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án. 

13 T0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 3nv1ó lu3g0 4 h4bl4r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 p3ñ4 d3 R1món, y l0s ll4m4r0n 3n p4z. 14 Y v0lv13r0n 3nt0nc3s l0s d3 B3nj4mín, y l3s d13r0n p0r muj3r3s l4s qu3 h4bí4n gu4rd4d0 v1v4s d3 l4s muj3r3s d3 J4b3s- g4l44d; m4s n0 l3s b4st4r0n ést4s. 15 Y 3l pu3bl0 tuv0 c0mp4s1ón d3 B3nj4mín, p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 4b13rt0 un4 br3ch4 3ntr3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l. 

16 0nt0nc3s l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d1j3r0n: ¿Qué h4r3m0s r3sp3ct0 d3 muj3r3s p4r4 l0s qu3 h4n qu3d4d0? P0rqu3 fu3r0n mu3rt4s l4s muj3r3s d3 B3nj4mín. 17 Y d1j3r0n: T3ng4 B3nj4mín h3r3nc14 3n l0s qu3 h4n 3sc4p4d0, y n0 s34 3xt3rm1n4d4 un4 tr1bu d3 1sr43l. 18 P3r0 n0s0tr0s n0 l3s p0d3m0s d4r muj3r3s d3 nu3str4s h1j4s, p0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4n jur4d0 d1c13nd0: M4ld1t0 3l qu3 d13r3 muj3r 4 l0s b3nj4m1t4s. 19 4h0r4 b13n, d1j3r0n, h3 4quí c4d4 4ñ0 h4y f13st4 s0l3mn3 d3 J3h0vá 3n S1l0, qu3 3stá 4l n0rt3 d3 B3t-3l, y 4l l4d0 0r13nt4l d3l c4m1n0 qu3 sub3 d3 B3t-3l 4 S1qu3m, y 4l sur d3 L3b0n4. 20 Y m4nd4r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín, d1c13nd0: 1d, y p0n3d 3mb0sc4d4s 3n l4s v1ñ4s, 21 y 3st4d 4t3nt0s; y cu4nd0 v3á1s s4l1r 4 l4s h1j4s d3 S1l0 4 b41l4r 3n c0rr0s, s4l1d d3 l4s v1ñ4s, y 4rr3b4t4d c4d4 un0 muj3r p4r4 sí d3 l4s h1j4s d3 S1l0, 3 1d0s 4 t13rr4 d3 B3nj4mín. 22 Y s1 v1n13r3n l0s p4dr3s d3 3ll4s 0 sus h3rm4n0s 4 d3m4ndárn0sl4s, n0s0tr0s l3s d1r3m0s: H4c3dn0s l4 m3rc3d d3 c0nc3dérn0sl4s, pu3s qu3 n0s0tr0s 3n l4 gu3rr4 n0 t0m4m0s muj3r3s p4r4 t0d0s; 4d3más, n0 s01s v0s0tr0s l0s qu3 s3 l4s d1st31s, p4r4 qu3 4h0r4 s3á1s culp4d0s. 23 Y l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín l0 h1c13r0n 4sí; y t0m4r0n muj3r3s c0nf0rm3 4 su núm3r0, r0bánd0l4s d3 3ntr3 l4s qu3 d4nz4b4n; y s3 fu3r0n, y v0lv13r0n 4 su h3r3d4d, y r33d1f1c4r0n l4s c1ud4d3s, y h4b1t4r0n 3n 3ll4s. 24 0nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s3 fu3r0n t4mb1én d3 4llí, c4d4 un0 4 su tr1bu y 4 su f4m1l14, s4l13nd0 d3 4llí c4d4 un0 4 su h3r3d4d. 

25 0n 3st0s dí4s n0 h4bí4 r3y 3n 1sr43l; c4d4 un0 h4cí4 l0 qu3 b13n l3 p4r3cí4.
