RUT 

Rut y N03mí

RUT 1

1 4c0nt3c1ó 3n l0s dí4s qu3 g0b3rn4b4n l0s ju3c3s, qu3 hub0 h4mbr3 3n l4 t13rr4. Y un v4rón d3 B3lén d3 Judá fu3 4 m0r4r 3n l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b, él y su muj3r, y d0s h1j0s suy0s. 2 0l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l v4rón 3r4 0l1m3l3c, y 3l d3 su muj3r, N03mí; y l0s n0mbr3s d3 sus h1j0s 3r4n M4hlón y Qu3l1ón, 3fr4t30s d3 B3lén d3 Judá. Ll3g4r0n, pu3s, 4 l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b, y s3 qu3d4r0n 4llí. 3 Y mur1ó 0l1m3l3c, m4r1d0 d3 N03mí, y qu3dó 3ll4 c0n sus d0s h1j0s, 4 l0s cu4l3s t0m4r0n p4r4 sí muj3r3s m04b1t4s; 3l n0mbr3 d3 un4 3r4 0rf4, y 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 0tr4, Rut; y h4b1t4r0n 4llí un0s d13z 4ñ0s. 5 Y mur13r0n t4mb1én l0s d0s, M4hlón y Qu3l1ón, qu3d4nd0 4sí l4 muj3r d3s4mp4r4d4 d3 sus d0s h1j0s y d3 su m4r1d0. 6 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4ntó c0n sus nu3r4s, y r3gr3só d3 l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b; p0rqu3 0yó 3n 3l c4mp0 d3 M04b qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 v1s1t4d0 4 su pu3bl0 p4r4 d4rl3s p4n. 7 S4l1ó, pu3s, d3l lug4r d0nd3 h4bí4 3st4d0, y c0n 3ll4 sus d0s nu3r4s, y c0m3nz4r0n 4 c4m1n4r p4r4 v0lv3rs3 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 Judá. 8 Y N03mí d1j0 4 sus d0s nu3r4s: 4nd4d, v0lv30s c4d4 un4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su m4dr3; J3h0vá h4g4 c0n v0s0tr4s m1s3r1c0rd14, c0m0 l4 h4bé1s h3ch0 c0n l0s mu3rt0s y c0nm1g0. 9 0s c0nc3d4 J3h0vá qu3 h4llé1s d3sc4ns0, c4d4 un4 3n c4s4 d3 su m4r1d0. Lu3g0 l4s b3só, y 3ll4s 4lz4r0n su v0z y ll0r4r0n, 10 y l3 d1j3r0n: C13rt4m3nt3 n0s0tr4s 1r3m0s c0nt1g0 4 tu pu3bl0. 11 Y N03mí r3sp0nd1ó: V0lv30s, h1j4s mí4s; ¿p4r4 qué h4bé1s d3 1r c0nm1g0? ¿T3ng0 y0 más h1j0s 3n 3l v13ntr3, qu3 pu3d4n s3r vu3str0s m4r1d0s? 12 V0lv30s, h1j4s mí4s, 3 1d0s; p0rqu3 y0 y4 s0y v13j4 p4r4 t3n3r m4r1d0. Y 4unqu3 d1j3s3: 0sp3r4nz4 t3ng0, y 3st4 n0ch3 3stuv13s3 c0n m4r1d0, y 4un d13s3 4 luz h1j0s, 13 ¿h4bí41s v0s0tr4s d3 3sp3r4rl0s h4st4 qu3 fu3s3n gr4nd3s? ¿H4bí41s d3 qu3d4r0s s1n c4s4r p0r 4m0r 4 3ll0s? N0, h1j4s mí4s; qu3 m4y0r 4m4rgur4 t3ng0 y0 qu3 v0s0tr4s, pu3s l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá h4 s4l1d0 c0ntr4 mí. 14 Y 3ll4s 4lz4r0n 0tr4 v3z su v0z y ll0r4r0n; y 0rf4 b3só 4 su su3gr4, m4s Rut s3 qu3dó c0n 3ll4. 15 Y N03mí d1j0: H3 4quí tu cuñ4d4 s3 h4 vu3lt0 4 su pu3bl0 y 4 sus d10s3s; vuélv3t3 tú tr4s 3ll4. 16 R3sp0nd1ó Rut: N0 m3 ru3gu3s qu3 t3 d3j3, y m3 4p4rt3 d3 t1; p0rqu3 4 d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 tú fu3r3s, 1ré y0, y d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 v1v13r3s, v1v1ré. Tu pu3bl0 s3rá m1 pu3bl0, y tu D10s m1 D10s. 17 D0nd3 tú mur13r3s, m0r1ré y0, y 4llí s3ré s3pult4d4; 4sí m3 h4g4 J3h0vá, y 4un m3 4ñ4d4, qu3 sól0 l4 mu3rt3 h4rá s3p4r4c1ón 3ntr3 n0s0tr4s d0s. 18 Y v13nd0 N03mí qu3 3st4b4 t4n r3su3lt4 4 1r c0n 3ll4, n0 d1j0 más. 19 4nduv13r0n, pu3s, 3ll4s d0s h4st4 qu3 ll3g4r0n 4 B3lén; y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 h4b13nd0 3ntr4d0 3n B3lén, t0d4 l4 c1ud4d s3 c0nm0v1ó p0r c4us4 d3 3ll4s, y d3cí4n: ¿N0 3s ést4 N03mí? 20 Y 3ll4 l3s r3sp0ndí4: N0 m3 ll4mé1s N03mí, s1n0 ll4m4dm3 M4r4; p0rqu3 3n gr4nd3 4m4rgur4 m3 h4 pu3st0 3l T0d0p0d3r0s0. 21 Y0 m3 fu1 ll3n4, p3r0 J3h0vá m3 h4 vu3lt0 c0n l4s m4n0s v4cí4s. ¿P0r qué m3 ll4m4ré1s N03mí, y4 qu3 J3h0vá h4 d4d0 t3st1m0n10 c0ntr4 mí, y 3l T0d0p0d3r0s0 m3 h4 4fl1g1d0? 22 4sí v0lv1ó N03mí, y Rut l4 m04b1t4 su nu3r4 c0n 3ll4; v0lv1ó d3 l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b, y ll3g4r0n 4 B3lén 4l c0m13nz0 d3 l4 s13g4 d3 l4 c3b4d4. 

Rut r3c0g3 3sp1g4s 3n 3l c4mp0 d3 B00z

RUT 2

1 T3ní4 N03mí un p4r13nt3 d3 su m4r1d0, h0mbr3 r1c0 d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3 0l1m3l3c, 3l cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 B00z. 2 Y Rut l4 m04b1t4 d1j0 4 N03mí: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3j3s 1r 4l c4mp0, y r3c0g3ré 3sp1g4s 3n p0s d3 4qu3l 4 cuy0s 0j0s h4ll4r3 gr4c14. Y 3ll4 l3 r3sp0nd1ó: Vé, h1j4 mí4. 3 Fu3, pu3s, y ll3g4nd0, 3sp1gó 3n 3l c4mp0 3n p0s d3 l0s s3g4d0r3s; y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 4qu3ll4 p4rt3 d3l c4mp0 3r4 d3 B00z, 3l cu4l 3r4 d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3 0l1m3l3c. 4 Y h3 4quí qu3 B00z v1n0 d3 B3lén, y d1j0 4 l0s s3g4d0r3s: J3h0vá s34 c0n v0s0tr0s. Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: J3h0vá t3 b3nd1g4. 5 Y B00z d1j0 4 su cr14d0 3l m4y0rd0m0 d3 l0s s3g4d0r3s: ¿D3 qu1én 3s 3st4 j0v3n? 6 Y 3l cr14d0, m4y0rd0m0 d3 l0s s3g4d0r3s, r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: 0s l4 j0v3n m04b1t4 qu3 v0lv1ó c0n N03mí d3 l0s c4mp0s d3 M04b; 7 y h4 d1ch0: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3j3s r3c0g3r y junt4r tr4s l0s s3g4d0r3s 3ntr3 l4s g4v1ll4s. 0ntró, pu3s, y 3stá d3sd3 p0r l4 m4ñ4n4 h4st4 4h0r4, s1n d3sc4ns4r n1 4un p0r un m0m3nt0. 8 0nt0nc3s B00z d1j0 4 Rut: 0y3, h1j4 mí4, n0 v4y4s 4 3sp1g4r 4 0tr0 c4mp0, n1 p4s3s d3 4quí; y 4quí 3st4rás junt0 4 m1s cr14d4s. 9 M1r4 b13n 3l c4mp0 qu3 s13gu3n, y sígu3l4s; p0rqu3 y0 h3 m4nd4d0 4 l0s cr14d0s qu3 n0 t3 m0l3st3n. Y cu4nd0 t3ng4s s3d, v3 4 l4s v4s1j4s, y b3b3 d3l 4gu4 qu3 s4c4n l0s cr14d0s. 10 0ll4 3nt0nc3s b4j4nd0 su r0str0 s3 1ncl1nó 4 t13rr4, y l3 d1j0: ¿P0r qué h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s p4r4 qu3 m3 r3c0n0zc4s, s13nd0 y0 3xtr4nj3r4? 11 Y r3sp0nd13nd0 B00z, l3 d1j0: H3 s4b1d0 t0d0 l0 qu3 h4s h3ch0 c0n tu su3gr4 d3spués d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 tu m4r1d0, y qu3 d3j4nd0 4 tu p4dr3 y 4 tu m4dr3 y l4 t13rr4 d0nd3 n4c1st3, h4s v3n1d0 4 un pu3bl0 qu3 n0 c0n0c1st3 4nt3s. 12 J3h0vá r3c0mp3ns3 tu 0br4, y tu r3mun3r4c1ón s34 cumpl1d4 d3 p4rt3 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, b4j0 cuy4s 4l4s h4s v3n1d0 4 r3fug14rt3. 13 Y 3ll4 d1j0: S3ñ0r mí0, h4ll3 y0 gr4c14 d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s; p0rqu3 m3 h4s c0ns0l4d0, y p0rqu3 h4s h4bl4d0 4l c0r4zón d3 tu s13rv4, 4unqu3 n0 s0y n1 c0m0 un4 d3 tus cr14d4s. 14 Y B00z l3 d1j0 4 l4 h0r4 d3 c0m3r: V3n 4quí, y c0m3 d3l p4n, y m0j4 tu b0c4d0 3n 3l v1n4gr3. Y 3ll4 s3 s3ntó junt0 4 l0s s3g4d0r3s, y él l3 d10 d3l p0t4j3, y c0m1ó h4st4 qu3 s3 s4c1ó, y l3 s0bró. 15 Lu3g0 s3 l3v4ntó p4r4 3sp1g4r. Y B00z m4ndó 4 sus cr14d0s, d1c13nd0: Qu3 r3c0j4 t4mb1én 3sp1g4s 3ntr3 l4s g4v1ll4s, y n0 l4 4v3rg0ncé1s; 16 y d3j4ré1s t4mb1én c43r p4r4 3ll4 4lg0 d3 l0s m4n0j0s, y l0 d3j4ré1s p4r4 qu3 l0 r3c0j4, y n0 l4 r3pr3ndá1s. 17 0sp1gó, pu3s, 3n 3l c4mp0 h4st4 l4 n0ch3, y d3sgr4nó l0 qu3 h4bí4 r3c0g1d0, y fu3 c0m0 un 3f4 d3 c3b4d4. 18 Y l0 t0mó, y s3 fu3 4 l4 c1ud4d; y su su3gr4 v10 l0 qu3 h4bí4 r3c0g1d0. S4có t4mb1én lu3g0 l0 qu3 l3 h4bí4 s0br4d0 d3spués d3 h4b3r qu3d4d0 s4c14d4, y s3 l0 d10. 19 Y l3 d1j0 su su3gr4: ¿Dónd3 h4s 3sp1g4d0 h0y? ¿y dónd3 h4s tr4b4j4d0? B3nd1t0 s34 3l qu3 t3 h4 r3c0n0c1d0. Y c0ntó 3ll4 4 su su3gr4 c0n qu1én h4bí4 tr4b4j4d0, y d1j0: 0l n0mbr3 d3l v4rón c0n qu13n h0y h3 tr4b4j4d0 3s B00z. 20 Y d1j0 N03mí 4 su nu3r4: S34 él b3nd1t0 d3 J3h0vá, pu3s qu3 n0 h4 r3hus4d0 4 l0s v1v0s l4 b3n3v0l3nc14 qu3 tuv0 p4r4 c0n l0s qu3 h4n mu3rt0. D3spués l3 d1j0 N03mí: Nu3str0 p4r13nt3 3s 4qu3l v4rón, y un0 d3 l0s qu3 pu3d3n r3d1m1rn0s. 21 Y Rut l4 m04b1t4 d1j0: 4d3más d3 3st0 m3 h4 d1ch0: Júnt4t3 c0n m1s cr14d4s, h4st4 qu3 h4y4n 4c4b4d0 t0d4 m1 s13g4. 22 Y N03mí r3sp0nd1ó 4 Rut su nu3r4: M3j0r 3s, h1j4 mí4, qu3 s4lg4s c0n sus cr14d4s, y qu3 n0 t3 3ncu3ntr3n 3n 0tr0 c4mp0. 23 0stuv0, pu3s, junt0 c0n l4s cr14d4s d3 B00z 3sp1g4nd0, h4st4 qu3 s3 4c4bó l4 s13g4 d3 l4 c3b4d4 y l4 d3l tr1g0; y v1ví4 c0n su su3gr4. 

Rut y B00z 3n l4 3r4

RUT 3

1 D3spués l3 d1j0 su su3gr4 N03mí: H1j4 mí4, ¿n0 h3 d3 busc4r h0g4r p4r4 t1, p4r4 qu3 t3 v4y4 b13n? 2 ¿N0 3s B00z nu3str0 p4r13nt3, c0n cuy4s cr14d4s tú h4s 3st4d0? H3 4quí qu3 él 4v13nt4 3st4 n0ch3 l4 p4rv4 d3 l4s c3b4d4s. 3 T3 l4v4rás, pu3s, y t3 ung1rás, y v1st1énd0t3 tus v3st1d0s, 1rás 4 l4 3r4; m4s n0 t3 d4rás 4 c0n0c3r 4l v4rón h4st4 qu3 él h4y4 4c4b4d0 d3 c0m3r y d3 b3b3r. 4 Y cu4nd0 él s3 4cu3st3, n0t4rás 3l lug4r d0nd3 s3 4cu3st4, 3 1rás y d3scubr1rás sus p13s, y t3 4c0st4rás 4llí; y él t3 d1rá l0 qu3 h4y4s d3 h4c3r. 5 Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: H4ré t0d0 l0 qu3 tú m3 m4nd3s. 6 D3sc3nd1ó, pu3s, 4 l4 3r4, 3 h1z0 t0d0 l0 qu3 su su3gr4 l3 h4bí4 m4nd4d0. 7 Y cu4nd0 B00z hub0 c0m1d0 y b3b1d0, y su c0r4zón 3stuv0 c0nt3nt0, s3 r3t1ró 4 d0rm1r 4 un l4d0 d3l m0ntón. 0nt0nc3s 3ll4 v1n0 c4ll4d4m3nt3, y l3 d3scubr1ó l0s p13s y s3 4c0stó. 8 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 4 l4 m3d14n0ch3 s3 3str3m3c1ó 4qu3l h0mbr3, y s3 v0lv1ó; y h3 4quí, un4 muj3r 3st4b4 4c0st4d4 4 sus p13s. 9 0nt0nc3s él d1j0: ¿Qu1én 3r3s? Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 s0y Rut tu s13rv4; 3xt13nd3 3l b0rd3 d3 tu c4p4 s0br3 tu s13rv4, p0r cu4nt0 3r3s p4r13nt3 c3rc4n0. 10 Y él d1j0: B3nd1t4 s34s tú d3 J3h0vá, h1j4 mí4; h4s h3ch0 m3j0r tu p0str3r4 b0nd4d qu3 l4 pr1m3r4, n0 y3nd0 3n busc4 d3 l0s jóv3n3s, s34n p0br3s 0 r1c0s. 11 4h0r4 pu3s, n0 t3m4s, h1j4 mí4; y0 h4ré c0nt1g0 l0 qu3 tú d1g4s, pu3s t0d4 l4 g3nt3 d3 m1 pu3bl0 s4b3 qu3 3r3s muj3r v1rtu0s4. 12 Y 4h0r4, 4unqu3 3s c13rt0 qu3 y0 s0y p4r13nt3 c3rc4n0, c0n t0d0 3s0 h4y p4r13nt3 más c3rc4n0 qu3 y0. 13 P4s4 4quí l4 n0ch3, y cu4nd0 s34 d3 dí4, s1 él t3 r3d1m13r3, b13n, r3dím4t3; m4s s1 él n0 t3 qu1s13r3 r3d1m1r, y0 t3 r3d1m1ré, v1v3 J3h0vá. D3sc4ns4, pu3s, h4st4 l4 m4ñ4n4. 14 Y d3spués qu3 durm1ó 4 sus p13s h4st4 l4 m4ñ4n4, s3 l3v4ntó 4nt3s qu3 l0s h0mbr3s pud13r4n r3c0n0c3rs3 un0s 4 0tr0s; p0rqu3 él d1j0: N0 s3 s3p4 qu3 v1n0 muj3r 4 l4 3r4. 15 D3spués l3 d1j0: Quít4t3 3l m4nt0 qu3 tr43s s0br3 t1, y t3nl0. Y t3n1énd0l0 3ll4, él m1d1ó s31s m3d1d4s d3 c3b4d4, y s3 l4s pus0 3nc1m4; y 3ll4 s3 fu3 4 l4 c1ud4d. 16 Y cu4nd0 ll3gó 4 d0nd3 3st4b4 su su3gr4, ést4 l3 d1j0: ¿Qué h4y, h1j4 mí4? Y l3 c0ntó 3ll4 t0d0 l0 qu3 c0n 4qu3l v4rón l3 h4bí4 4c0nt3c1d0. 17 Y d1j0: 0st4s s31s m3d1d4s d3 c3b4d4 m3 d10, d1c1énd0m3: 4 f1n d3 qu3 n0 v4y4s 4 tu su3gr4 c0n l4s m4n0s v4cí4s. 18 0nt0nc3s N03mí d1j0: 0spér4t3, h1j4 mí4, h4st4 qu3 s3p4s cóm0 s3 r3su3lv3 3l 4sunt0; p0rqu3 4qu3l h0mbr3 n0 d3sc4ns4rá h4st4 qu3 c0ncluy4 3l 4sunt0 h0y. 

B00z s3 c4s4 c0n Rut

RUT 4

1 B00z sub1ó 4 l4 pu3rt4 y s3 s3ntó 4llí; y h3 4quí p4s4b4 4qu3l p4r13nt3 d3 qu13n B00z h4bí4 h4bl4d0, y l3 d1j0: 0h, ful4n0, v3n 4cá y s1ént4t3. Y él v1n0 y s3 s3ntó. 2 0nt0nc3s él t0mó 4 d13z v4r0n3s d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l4 c1ud4d, y d1j0: S3nt40s 4quí. Y 3ll0s s3 s3nt4r0n. 3 Lu3g0 d1j0 4l p4r13nt3: N03mí, qu3 h4 vu3lt0 d3l c4mp0 d3 M04b, v3nd3 un4 p4rt3 d3 l4s t13rr4s qu3 tuv0 nu3str0 h3rm4n0 0l1m3l3c. 4 Y y0 d3c1dí h4cért3l0 s4b3r, y d3c1rt3 qu3 l4 c0mpr3s 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 l0s qu3 3stán 4quí s3nt4d0s, y d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 m1 pu3bl0. S1 tú qu13r3s r3d1m1r, r3d1m3; y s1 n0 qu13r3s r3d1m1r, d3clár4m3l0 p4r4 qu3 y0 l0 s3p4; p0rqu3 n0 h4y 0tr0 qu3 r3d1m4 s1n0 tú, y y0 d3spués d3 t1. Y él r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 r3d1m1ré. 5 0nt0nc3s r3pl1có B00z: 0l m1sm0 dí4 qu3 c0mpr3s l4s t13rr4s d3 m4n0 d3 N03mí, d3b3s t0m4r t4mb1én 4 Rut l4 m04b1t4, muj3r d3l d1funt0, p4r4 qu3 r3st4ur3s 3l n0mbr3 d3l mu3rt0 s0br3 su p0s3s1ón. 6 Y r3sp0nd1ó 3l p4r13nt3: N0 pu3d0 r3d1m1r p4r4 mí, n0 s34 qu3 d4ñ3 m1 h3r3d4d. R3d1m3 tú, us4nd0 d3 m1 d3r3ch0, p0rqu3 y0 n0 p0dré r3d1m1r. 7 H4bí4 y4 d3sd3 h4cí4 t13mp0 3st4 c0stumbr3 3n 1sr43l t0c4nt3 4 l4 r3d3nc1ón y 4l c0ntr4t0, qu3 p4r4 l4 c0nf1rm4c1ón d3 cu4lqu13r n3g0c10, 3l un0 s3 qu1t4b4 3l z4p4t0 y l0 d4b4 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0; y 3st0 s3rví4 d3 t3st1m0n10 3n 1sr43l. 8 0nt0nc3s 3l p4r13nt3 d1j0 4 B00z: Tóm4l0 tú. Y s3 qu1tó 3l z4p4t0. 9 Y B00z d1j0 4 l0s 4nc14n0s y 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0: V0s0tr0s s01s t3st1g0s h0y, d3 qu3 h3 4dqu1r1d0 d3 m4n0 d3 N03mí t0d0 l0 qu3 fu3 d3 0l1m3l3c, y t0d0 l0 qu3 fu3 d3 Qu3l1ón y d3 M4hlón. 10 Y qu3 t4mb1én t0m0 p0r m1 muj3r 4 Rut l4 m04b1t4, muj3r d3 M4hlón, p4r4 r3st4ur4r 3l n0mbr3 d3l d1funt0 s0br3 su h3r3d4d, p4r4 qu3 3l n0mbr3 d3l mu3rt0 n0 s3 b0rr3 d3 3ntr3 sus h3rm4n0s y d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 su lug4r. V0s0tr0s s01s t3st1g0s h0y. 11 Y d1j3r0n t0d0s l0s d3l pu3bl0 qu3 3st4b4n 4 l4 pu3rt4 c0n l0s 4nc14n0s: T3st1g0s s0m0s. J3h0vá h4g4 4 l4 muj3r qu3 3ntr4 3n tu c4s4 c0m0 4 R4qu3l y 4 L34, l4s cu4l3s 3d1f1c4r0n l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l; y tú s34s 1lustr3 3n 0fr4t4, y s34s d3 r3n0mbr3 3n B3lén. 12 Y s34 tu c4s4 c0m0 l4 c4s4 d3 F4r3s, 3l qu3 T4m4r d10 4 luz 4 Judá, p0r l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 qu3 d3 3s4 j0v3n t3 dé J3h0vá. 13 B00z, pu3s, t0mó 4 Rut, y 3ll4 fu3 su muj3r; y s3 ll3gó 4 3ll4, y J3h0vá l3 d10 qu3 c0nc1b13s3 y d13s3 4 luz un h1j0. 14 Y l4s muj3r3s d3cí4n 4 N03mí: L04d0 s34 J3h0vá, qu3 h1z0 qu3 n0 t3 f4lt4s3 h0y p4r13nt3, cuy0 n0mbr3 s3rá c3l3br4d0 3n 1sr43l; 15 3l cu4l s3rá r3st4ur4d0r d3 tu 4lm4, y sust3nt4rá tu v3j3z; pu3s tu nu3r4, qu3 t3 4m4, l0 h4 d4d0 4 luz; y 3ll4 3s d3 más v4l0r p4r4 t1 qu3 s13t3 h1j0s. 16 Y t0m4nd0 N03mí 3l h1j0, l0 pus0 3n su r3g4z0, y fu3 su 4y4. 17 Y l3 d13r0n n0mbr3 l4s v3c1n4s, d1c13nd0: L3 h4 n4c1d0 un h1j0 4 N03mí; y l0 ll4m4r0n 0b3d. 0st3 3s p4dr3 d3 1s4í, p4dr3 d3 D4v1d. 18 0st4s s0n l4s g3n3r4c10n3s d3 F4r3s: F4r3s 3ng3ndró 4 H3zrón, 19 H3zrón 3ng3ndró 4 R4m, y R4m 3ng3ndró 4 4m1n4d4b, 20 4m1n4d4b 3ng3ndró 4 N44són, y N44són 3ng3ndró 4 S4lmón, 21 S4lmón 3ng3ndró 4 B00z, y B00z 3ng3ndró 4 0b3d, 22 0b3d 3ng3ndró 4 1s4í, 3 1s4í 3ng3ndró 4 D4v1d.

S4MU0L 

N4c1m13nt0 d3 S4mu3l

1 S4MU0L 1

1 Hub0 un v4rón d3 R4m4t41m d3 Z0f1m, d3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 0lc4n4 h1j0 d3 J3r0h4m, h1j0 d3 0l1ú, h1j0 d3 T0hu, h1j0 d3 Zuf, 3fr4t30. 2 Y t3ní4 él d0s muj3r3s; 3l n0mbr3 d3 un4 3r4 4n4, y 3l d3 l4 0tr4, P3n1n4. Y P3n1n4 t3ní4 h1j0s, m4s 4n4 n0 l0s t3ní4. 3 Y t0d0s l0s 4ñ0s 4qu3l v4rón subí4 d3 su c1ud4d p4r4 4d0r4r y p4r4 0fr3c3r s4cr1f1c10s 4 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 3n S1l0, d0nd3 3st4b4n d0s h1j0s d3 0lí, 0fn1 y F1n33s, s4c3rd0t3s d3 J3h0vá. 4 Y cu4nd0 ll3g4b4 3l dí4 3n qu3 0lc4n4 0fr3cí4 s4cr1f1c10, d4b4 4 P3n1n4 su muj3r, 4 t0d0s sus h1j0s y 4 t0d4s sus h1j4s, 4 c4d4 un0 su p4rt3. 5 P3r0 4 4n4 d4b4 un4 p4rt3 3sc0g1d4; p0rqu3 4m4b4 4 4n4, 4unqu3 J3h0vá n0 l3 h4bí4 c0nc3d1d0 t3n3r h1j0s. 6 Y su r1v4l l4 1rr1t4b4, 3n0jánd0l4 y 3ntr1st3c1énd0l4, p0rqu3 J3h0vá n0 l3 h4bí4 c0nc3d1d0 t3n3r h1j0s. 7 4sí h4cí4 c4d4 4ñ0; cu4nd0 subí4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, l4 1rr1t4b4 4sí; p0r l0 cu4l 4n4 ll0r4b4, y n0 c0mí4. 8 Y 0lc4n4 su m4r1d0 l3 d1j0: 4n4, ¿p0r qué ll0r4s? ¿p0r qué n0 c0m3s? ¿y p0r qué 3stá 4fl1g1d0 tu c0r4zón? ¿N0 t3 s0y y0 m3j0r qu3 d13z h1j0s?

22 P3r0 0lí 3r4 muy v13j0; y 0í4 d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 sus h1j0s h4cí4n c0n t0d0 1sr43l, y cóm0 d0rmí4n c0n l4s muj3r3s qu3 v3l4b4n 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón. 23 Y l3s d1j0: ¿P0r qué h4cé1s c0s4s s3m3j4nt3s? P0rqu3 y0 01g0 d3 t0d0 3st3 pu3bl0 vu3str0s m4l0s pr0c3d3r3s. 24 N0, h1j0s mí0s, p0rqu3 n0 3s bu3n4 f4m4 l4 qu3 y0 01g0; pu3s h4cé1s p3c4r 4l pu3bl0 d3 J3h0vá. 25 S1 p3c4r3 3l h0mbr3 c0ntr4 3l h0mbr3, l0s ju3c3s l3 juzg4rán; m4s s1 4lgun0 p3c4r3 c0ntr4 J3h0vá, ¿qu1én r0g4rá p0r él? 27 Y v1n0 un v4rón d3 D10s 4 0lí, y l3 d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: ¿N0 m3 m4n1f3sté y0 cl4r4m3nt3 4 l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3, cu4nd0 3st4b4n 3n 0g1pt0 3n c4s4 d3 F4r4ón? 28 Y y0 l3 3sc0gí p0r m1 s4c3rd0t3 3ntr3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 0fr3c13s3 s0br3 m1 4lt4r, y qu3m4s3 1nc13ns0, y ll3v4s3 3f0d d3l4nt3 d3 mí; y d1 4 l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3 t0d4s l4s 0fr3nd4s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 29 ¿P0r qué h4bé1s h0ll4d0 m1s s4cr1f1c10s y m1s 0fr3nd4s, qu3 y0 m4ndé 0fr3c3r 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0; y h4s h0nr4d0 4 tus h1j0s más qu3 4 mí, 3ng0rdánd00s d3 l0 pr1nc1p4l d3 t0d4s l4s 0fr3nd4s d3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l? 30 P0r t4nt0, J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l d1c3: Y0 h4bí4 d1ch0 qu3 tu c4s4 y l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3 4nd4rí4n d3l4nt3 d3 mí p3rp3tu4m3nt3; m4s 4h0r4 h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: Nunc4 y0 t4l h4g4, p0rqu3 y0 h0nr4ré 4 l0s qu3 m3 h0nr4n, y l0s qu3 m3 d3spr3c14n s3rán t3n1d0s 3n p0c0. 31 H3 4quí, v13n3n dí4s 3n qu3 c0rt4ré tu br4z0 y 3l br4z0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3, d3 m0d0 qu3 n0 h4y4 4nc14n0 3n tu c4s4. 32 V3rás tu c4s4 hum1ll4d4, m13ntr4s D10s c0lm4 d3 b13n3s 4 1sr43l; y 3n n1ngún t13mp0 h4brá 4nc14n0 3n tu c4s4. 33 0l v4rón d3 l0s tuy0s qu3 y0 n0 c0rt3 d3 m1 4lt4r, s3rá p4r4 c0nsum1r tus 0j0s y ll3n4r tu 4lm4 d3 d0l0r; y t0d0s l0s n4c1d0s 3n tu c4s4 m0r1rán 3n l4 3d4d v1r1l. 34 Y t3 s3rá p0r s3ñ4l 3st0 qu3 4c0nt3c3rá 4 tus d0s h1j0s, 0fn1 y F1n33s: 4mb0s m0r1rán 3n un dí4. 35 Y y0 m3 susc1t4ré un s4c3rd0t3 f13l, qu3 h4g4 c0nf0rm3 4 m1 c0r4zón y 4 m1 4lm4; y y0 l3 3d1f1c4ré c4s4 f1rm3, y 4nd4rá d3l4nt3 d3 m1 ung1d0 t0d0s l0s dí4s. 36 Y 3l qu3 hub13r3 qu3d4d0 3n tu c4s4 v3ndrá 4 p0str4rs3 d3l4nt3 d3 él p0r un4 m0n3d4 d3 pl4t4 y un b0c4d0 d3 p4n, d1c1énd0l3: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 4gr3gu3s 4 4lgun0 d3 l0s m1n1st3r10s, p4r4 qu3 pu3d4 c0m3r un b0c4d0 d3 p4n. 

J3h0vá ll4m4 4 S4mu3l

2 Y 4c0nt3c1ó un dí4, qu3 3st4nd0 0lí 4c0st4d0 3n su 4p0s3nt0, cu4nd0 sus 0j0s c0m3nz4b4n 4 0scur3c3rs3 d3 m0d0 qu3 n0 p0dí4 v3r, 3 S4mu3l 3st4b4 durm13nd0 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá, d0nd3 3st4b4 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s; y 4nt3s qu3 l4 lámp4r4 d3 D10s fu3s3 4p4g4d4, 4 J3h0vá ll4mó 4 S4mu3l; y él r3sp0nd1ó: H3m3 4quí. 5 Y c0rr13nd0 lu3g0 4 0lí, d1j0: H3m3 4quí, ¿P4r4 qué m3 ll4m4st3? 10 Y v1n0 J3h0vá y s3 p4ró, y ll4mó c0m0 l4s 0tr4s v3c3s: ¡S4mu3l, S4mu3l! 0nt0nc3s S4mu3l d1j0: H4bl4, p0rqu3 tu s13rv0 0y3. 11 Y J3h0vá d1j0 4 S4mu3l: H3 4quí h4ré y0 un4 c0s4 3n 1sr43l, qu3 4 qu13n l4 0y3r3, l3 r3t1ñ1rán 4mb0s 0íd0s. 12 4qu3l dí4 y0 cumpl1ré c0ntr4 0lí t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h3 d1ch0 s0br3 su c4s4, d3sd3 3l pr1nc1p10 h4st4 3l f1n. 13 Y l3 m0str4ré qu3 y0 juzg4ré su c4s4 p4r4 s13mpr3, p0r l4 1n1qu1d4d qu3 él s4b3; p0rqu3 sus h1j0s h4n bl4sf3m4d0 4 D10s, y él n0 l0s h4 3st0rb4d0. 14 P0r t4nt0, y0 h3 jur4d0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 0lí qu3 l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 l4 c4s4 d3 0lí n0 s3rá 3xp14d4 j4más, n1 c0n s4cr1f1c10s n1 c0n 0fr3nd4s. 

15 Y S4mu3l 3stuv0 4c0st4d0 h4st4 l4 m4ñ4n4, y 4br1ó l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. Y S4mu3l t3mí4 d3scubr1r l4 v1s1ón 4 0lí. 16 Ll4m4nd0, pu3s, 0lí 4 S4mu3l, l3 d1j0: H1j0 mí0, S4mu3l. Sub1d, pu3s, 4h0r4, p0rqu3 4h0r4 l3 h4ll4ré1s. 14 0ll0s 3nt0nc3s sub13r0n 4 l4 c1ud4d; y cu4nd0 3stuv13r0n 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4, h3 4quí S4mu3l v3ní4 h4cí4 3ll0s p4r4 sub1r 4l lug4r 4lt0. 15 Y un dí4 4nt3s qu3 S4úl v1n13s3, J3h0vá h4bí4 r3v3l4d0 4l 0íd0 d3 S4mu3l, d1c13nd0:

1 D3spués S4mu3l d1j0 4 S4úl: J3h0vá m3 3nv1ó 4 qu3 t3 ung13s3 p0r r3y s0br3 su pu3bl0 1sr43l; 4h0r4, pu3s, 3stá 4t3nt0 4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3h0vá. 2 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: Y0 c4st1g4ré l0 qu3 h1z0 4m4l3c 4 1sr43l 4l 0p0nérs3l3 3n 3l c4m1n0 cu4nd0 subí4 d3 0g1pt0. 3 V3, pu3s, y h13r3 4 4m4l3c, y d3struy3 t0d0 l0 qu3 t13n3, y n0 t3 4p14d3s d3 él; m4t4 4 h0mbr3s, muj3r3s, n1ñ0s, y 4un l0s d3 p3ch0, v4c4s, 0v3j4s, c4m3ll0s y 4sn0s. 

4 S4úl, pu3s, c0nv0có 4l pu3bl0 y l3s p4só r3v1st4 3n T3l41m, d0sc13nt0s m1l d3 4 p13, y d13z m1l h0mbr3s d3 Judá. 5 Y v1n13nd0 S4úl 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 4m4l3c, pus0 3mb0sc4d4 3n 3l v4ll3. 6 Y d1j0 S4úl 4 l0s c3n30s: 1d0s, 4p4rt40s y s4l1d d3 3ntr3 l0s d3 4m4l3c, p4r4 qu3 n0 0s d3struy4 junt4m3nt3 c0n 3ll0s; p0rqu3 v0s0tr0s m0str4st31s m1s3r1c0rd14 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, cu4nd0 subí4n d3 0g1pt0. Y s3 4p4rt4r0n l0s c3n30s d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 4m4l3c. 7 Y S4úl d3rr0tó 4 l0s 4m4l3c1t4s d3sd3 H4v1l4 h4st4 ll3g4r 4 Shur, qu3 3stá 4l 0r13nt3 d3 0g1pt0. 8 Y t0mó v1v0 4 4g4g r3y d3 4m4l3c, p3r0 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 m4tó 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4. 9 Y S4úl y 3l pu3bl0 p3rd0n4r0n 4 4g4g, y 4 l0 m3j0r d3 l4s 0v3j4s y d3l g4n4d0 m4y0r, d3 l0s 4n1m4l3s 3ng0rd4d0s, d3 l0s c4rn3r0s y d3 t0d0 l0 bu3n0, y n0 l0 qu1s13r0n d3stru1r; m4s t0d0 l0 qu3 3r4 v1l y d3spr3c14bl3 d3struy3r0n. 

10 Y v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 S4mu3l, d1c13nd0: 11 M3 p3s4 h4b3r pu3st0 p0r r3y 4 S4úl, p0rqu3 s3 h4 vu3lt0 d3 3n p0s d3 mí, y n0 h4 cumpl1d0 m1s p4l4br4s. Y s3 4p3s4dumbró S4mu3l, y cl4mó 4 J3h0vá t0d4 4qu3ll4 n0ch3. 12 M4drugó lu3g0 S4mu3l p4r4 1r 4 3nc0ntr4r 4 S4úl p0r l4 m4ñ4n4; y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 S4mu3l, d1c13nd0: S4úl h4 v3n1d0 4 C4rm3l, y h3 4quí s3 l3v4ntó un m0num3nt0, y d10 l4 vu3lt4, y p4só 4d3l4nt3 y d3sc3nd1ó 4 G1lg4l. 13 V1n0, pu3s, S4mu3l 4 S4úl, y S4úl l3 d1j0: B3nd1t0 s34s tú d3 J3h0vá; y0 h3 cumpl1d0 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 14 S4mu3l 3nt0nc3s d1j0: ¿Pu3s qué b4l1d0 d3 0v3j4s y br4m1d0 d3 v4c4s 3s 3st3 qu3 y0 01g0 c0n m1s 0íd0s? 15 Y S4úl r3sp0nd1ó: D3 4m4l3c l0s h4n tr4íd0; p0rqu3 3l pu3bl0 p3rd0nó l0 m3j0r d3 l4s 0v3j4s y d3 l4s v4c4s, p4r4 s4cr1f1c4rl4s 4 J3h0vá tu D10s, p3r0 l0 d3más l0 d3stru1m0s. 16 0nt0nc3s d1j0 S4mu3l 4 S4úl: Déj4m3 d3cl4r4rt3 l0 qu3 J3h0vá m3 h4 d1ch0 3st4 n0ch3. Y él l3 r3sp0nd1ó: D1. 

17 Y d1j0 S4mu3l: 4unqu3 3r4s p3qu3ñ0 3n tus pr0p10s 0j0s, ¿n0 h4s s1d0 h3ch0 j3f3 d3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, y J3h0vá t3 h4 ung1d0 p0r r3y s0br3 1sr43l? 18 Y J3h0vá t3 3nv1ó 3n m1s1ón y d1j0: V3, d3struy3 4 l0s p3c4d0r3s d3 4m4l3c, y h4zl3s gu3rr4 h4st4 qu3 l0s 4c4b3s. 19 ¿P0r qué, pu3s, n0 h4s 0íd0 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá, s1n0 qu3 vu3lt0 4l b0tín h4s h3ch0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá? 20 Y S4úl r3sp0nd1ó 4 S4mu3l: 4nt3s b13n h3 0b3d3c1d0 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá, y fu1 4 l4 m1s1ón qu3 J3h0vá m3 3nv1ó, y h3 tr4íd0 4 4g4g r3y d3 4m4l3c, y h3 d3stru1d0 4 l0s 4m4l3c1t4s. 21 M4s 3l pu3bl0 t0mó d3l b0tín 0v3j4s y v4c4s, l4s pr1m1c14s d3l 4n4t3m4, p4r4 0fr3c3r s4cr1f1c10s 4 J3h0vá tu D10s 3n G1lg4l. 22 Y S4mu3l d1j0: ¿S3 c0mpl4c3 J3h0vá t4nt0 3n l0s h0l0c4ust0s y víct1m4s, c0m0 3n qu3 s3 0b3d3zc4 4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3h0vá? C13rt4m3nt3 3l 0b3d3c3r 3s m3j0r qu3 l0s s4cr1f1c10s, y 3l pr3st4r 4t3nc1ón qu3 l4 gr0sur4 d3 l0s c4rn3r0s. 23 P0rqu3 c0m0 p3c4d0 d3 4d1v1n4c1ón 3s l4 r3b3l1ón, y c0m0 íd0l0s 3 1d0l4trí4 l4 0bst1n4c1ón. P0r cu4nt0 tú d3s3ch4st3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, él t4mb1én t3 h4 d3s3ch4d0 p4r4 qu3 n0 s34s r3y. 

24 0nt0nc3s S4úl d1j0 4 S4mu3l: Y0 h3 p3c4d0; pu3s h3 qu3br4nt4d0 3l m4nd4m13nt0 d3 J3h0vá y tus p4l4br4s, p0rqu3 t3mí 4l pu3bl0 y c0ns3ntí 4 l4 v0z d3 3ll0s. P3rd0n4, pu3s, 4h0r4 m1 p3c4d0, 25 y vu3lv3 c0nm1g0 p4r4 qu3 4d0r3 4 J3h0vá. 26 Y S4mu3l r3sp0nd1ó 4 S4úl: N0 v0lv3ré c0nt1g0; p0rqu3 d3s3ch4st3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, y J3h0vá t3 h4 d3s3ch4d0 p4r4 qu3 n0 s34s r3y s0br3 1sr43l. 27 Y v0lv1énd0s3 S4mu3l p4r4 1rs3, él s3 4s1ó d3 l4 punt4 d3 su m4nt0, y ést3 s3 r4sgó. 28 0nt0nc3s S4mu3l l3 d1j0: J3h0vá h4 r4sg4d0 h0y d3 t1 3l r31n0 d3 1sr43l, y l0 h4 d4d0 4 un prój1m0 tuy0 m3j0r qu3 tú. 29 4d3más, 3l qu3 3s l4 Gl0r14 d3 1sr43l n0 m3nt1rá, n1 s3 4rr3p3nt1rá, p0rqu3 n0 3s h0mbr3 p4r4 qu3 s3 4rr3p13nt4. 30 Y él d1j0: Y0 h3 p3c4d0; p3r0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 h0nr3s d3l4nt3 d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 m1 pu3bl0 y d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l, y vu3lv4s c0nm1g0 p4r4 qu3 4d0r3 4 J3h0vá tu D10s. 31 Y v0lv1ó S4mu3l tr4s S4úl, y 4d0ró S4úl 4 J3h0vá. 

32 D3spués d1j0 S4mu3l: Tr43dm3 4 4g4g r3y d3 4m4l3c. Y 4g4g v1n0 4 él 4l3gr3m3nt3. Y d1j0 4g4g: C13rt4m3nt3 y4 p4só l4 4m4rgur4 d3 l4 mu3rt3. 33 Y S4mu3l d1j0: C0m0 tu 3sp4d4 d3jó 4 l4s muj3r3s s1n h1j0s, 4sí tu m4dr3 s3rá s1n h1j0 3ntr3 l4s muj3r3s. 0nt0nc3s S4mu3l c0rtó 3n p3d4z0s 4 4g4g d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3n G1lg4l. 

34 S3 fu3 lu3g0 S4mu3l 4 R4má, y S4úl sub1ó 4 su c4s4 3n G4b44 d3 S4úl. 35 Y nunc4 d3spués v10 S4mu3l 4 S4úl 3n t0d4 su v1d4; y S4mu3l ll0r4b4 4 S4úl; y J3h0vá s3 4rr3p3ntí4 d3 h4b3r pu3st0 4 S4úl p0r r3y s0br3 1sr43l. 

S4mu3l ung3 4 D4v1d

1 S4MU0L 16

1 D1j0 J3h0vá 4 S4mu3l: ¿H4st4 cuánd0 ll0r4rás 4 S4úl, h4b1énd0l0 y0 d3s3ch4d0 p4r4 qu3 n0 r31n3 s0br3 1sr43l? Ll3n4 tu cu3rn0 d3 4c31t3, y v3n, t3 3nv14ré 4 1s4í d3 B3lén, p0rqu3 d3 sus h1j0s m3 h3 pr0v1st0 d3 r3y. 2 Y d1j0 S4mu3l: ¿Cóm0 1ré? S1 S4úl l0 sup13r4, m3 m4t4rí4. J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó: T0m4 c0nt1g0 un4 b3c3rr4 d3 l4 v4c4d4, y d1: 4 0fr3c3r s4cr1f1c10 4 J3h0vá h3 v3n1d0. 3 Y ll4m4 4 1s4í 4l s4cr1f1c10, y y0 t3 3ns3ñ4ré l0 qu3 h4s d3 h4c3r; y m3 ung1rás 4l qu3 y0 t3 d1j3r3. 4 H1z0, pu3s, S4mu3l c0m0 l3 d1j0 J3h0vá; y lu3g0 qu3 él ll3gó 4 B3lén, l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l4 c1ud4d s4l13r0n 4 r3c1b1rl3 c0n m13d0, y d1j3r0n: ¿0s p4cíf1c4 tu v3n1d4? 5 0l r3sp0nd1ó: Sí, v3ng0 4 0fr3c3r s4cr1f1c10 4 J3h0vá; s4nt1f1c40s, y v3n1d c0nm1g0 4l s4cr1f1c10. Y s4nt1f1c4nd0 él 4 1s4í y 4 sus h1j0s, l0s ll4mó 4l s4cr1f1c10. 

6 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 3ll0s v1n13r0n, él v10 4 0l14b, y d1j0: D3 c13rt0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3stá su ung1d0. 7 Y J3h0vá r3sp0nd1ó 4 S4mu3l: N0 m1r3s 4 su p4r3c3r, n1 4 l0 gr4nd3 d3 su 3st4tur4, p0rqu3 y0 l0 d3s3ch0; p0rqu3 J3h0vá n0 m1r4 l0 qu3 m1r4 3l h0mbr3; pu3s 3l h0mbr3 m1r4 l0 qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 sus 0j0s, p3r0 J3h0vá m1r4 3l c0r4zón. 8 0nt0nc3s ll4mó 1s4í 4 4b1n4d4b, y l0 h1z0 p4s4r d3l4nt3 d3 S4mu3l, 3l cu4l d1j0: T4mp0c0 4 ést3 h4 3sc0g1d0 J3h0vá. 9 H1z0 lu3g0 p4s4r 1s4í 4 S4m4. Y él d1j0: T4mp0c0 4 ést3 h4 3l3g1d0 J3h0vá. 10 0 h1z0 p4s4r 1s4í s13t3 h1j0s suy0s d3l4nt3 d3 S4mu3l; p3r0 S4mu3l d1j0 4 1s4í: J3h0vá n0 h4 3l3g1d0 4 ést0s. 11 0nt0nc3s d1j0 S4mu3l 4 1s4í: ¿S0n ést0s t0d0s tus h1j0s? Y él r3sp0nd1ó: Qu3d4 4ún 3l m3n0r, qu3 4p4c13nt4 l4s 0v3j4s. Y d1j0 S4mu3l 4 1s4í: 0nví4 p0r él, p0rqu3 n0 n0s s3nt4r3m0s 4 l4 m3s4 h4st4 qu3 él v3ng4 4quí. 12 0nv1ó, pu3s, p0r él, y l3 h1z0 3ntr4r; y 3r4 rub10, h3rm0s0 d3 0j0s, y d3 bu3n p4r3c3r. 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d1j0: L3vánt4t3 y úng3l0, p0rqu3 ést3 3s. 13 Y S4mu3l t0mó 3l cu3rn0 d3l 4c31t3, y l0 ung1ó 3n m3d10 d3 sus h3rm4n0s; y d3sd3 4qu3l dí4 3n 4d3l4nt3 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 D4v1d. S3 l3v4ntó lu3g0 S4mu3l, y s3 v0lv1ó 4 R4má. 

D4v1d t0c4 p4r4 S4úl

14 0l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá s3 4p4rtó d3 S4úl, y l3 4t0rm3nt4b4 un 3spír1tu m4l0 d3 p4rt3 d3 J3h0vá. 15 Y l0s cr14d0s d3 S4úl l3 d1j3r0n: H3 4quí 4h0r4, un 3spír1tu m4l0 d3 p4rt3 d3 D10s t3 4t0rm3nt4. 16 D1g4, pu3s, nu3str0 s3ñ0r 4 tus s13rv0s qu3 3stán d3l4nt3 d3 t1, qu3 busqu3n 4 4lgun0 qu3 s3p4 t0c4r 3l 4rp4, p4r4 qu3 cu4nd0 3sté s0br3 t1 3l 3spír1tu m4l0 d3 p4rt3 d3 D10s, él t0qu3 c0n su m4n0, y t3ng4s 4l1v10. 17 Y S4úl r3sp0nd1ó 4 sus cr14d0s: Busc4dm3, pu3s, 4h0r4 4lgun0 qu3 t0qu3 b13n, y tr4édm3l0. 18 0nt0nc3s un0 d3 l0s cr14d0s r3sp0nd1ó d1c13nd0: H3 4quí y0 h3 v1st0 4 un h1j0 d3 1s4í d3 B3lén, qu3 s4b3 t0c4r, y 3s v4l13nt3 y v1g0r0s0 y h0mbr3 d3 gu3rr4, prud3nt3 3n sus p4l4br4s, y h3rm0s0, y J3h0vá 3stá c0n él. 19 Y S4úl 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s 4 1s4í, d1c13nd0: 0nví4m3 4 D4v1d tu h1j0, 3l qu3 3stá c0n l4s 0v3j4s. 20 Y t0mó 1s4í un 4sn0 c4rg4d0 d3 p4n, un4 v4s1j4 d3 v1n0 y un c4br1t0, y l0 3nv1ó 4 S4úl p0r m3d10 d3 D4v1d su h1j0. 21 Y v1n13nd0 D4v1d 4 S4úl, 3stuv0 d3l4nt3 d3 él; y él l3 4mó much0, y l3 h1z0 su p4j3 d3 4rm4s. 22 Y S4úl 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 1s4í: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 3sté D4v1d c0nm1g0, pu3s h4 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 3n m1s 0j0s. 23 Y cu4nd0 3l 3spír1tu m4l0 d3 p4rt3 d3 D10s v3ní4 s0br3 S4úl, D4v1d t0m4b4 3l 4rp4 y t0c4b4 c0n su m4n0; y S4úl t3ní4 4l1v10 y 3st4b4 m3j0r, y 3l 3spír1tu m4l0 s3 4p4rt4b4 d3 él. 

D4v1d m4t4 4 G0l14t

1 S4MU0L 17

1 L0s f1l1st30s junt4r0n sus 3jérc1t0s p4r4 l4 gu3rr4, y s3 c0ngr3g4r0n 3n S0c0, qu3 3s d3 Judá, y 4c4mp4r0n 3ntr3 S0c0 y 4z3c4, 3n 0f3s-d4m1m. 2 T4mb1én S4úl y l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l s3 junt4r0n, y 4c4mp4r0n 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 0l4, y s3 pus13r0n 3n 0rd3n d3 b4t4ll4 c0ntr4 l0s f1l1st30s. 3 Y l0s f1l1st30s 3st4b4n s0br3 un m0nt3 4 un l4d0, 3 1sr43l 3st4b4 s0br3 0tr0 m0nt3 4l 0tr0 l4d0, y 3l v4ll3 3ntr3 3ll0s. 4 S4l1ó 3nt0nc3s d3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s un p4l4dín, 3l cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 G0l14t, d3 G4t, y t3ní4 d3 4ltur4 s31s c0d0s y un p4lm0. 5 Y tr4í4 un c4sc0 d3 br0nc3 3n su c4b3z4, y ll3v4b4 un4 c0t4 d3 m4ll4; y 3r4 3l p3s0 d3 l4 c0t4 c1nc0 m1l s1cl0s d3 br0nc3. 6 S0br3 sus p13rn4s tr4í4 gr3b4s d3 br0nc3, y j4b4l1n4 d3 br0nc3 3ntr3 sus h0mbr0s. 7 0l 4st4 d3 su l4nz4 3r4 c0m0 un r0d1ll0 d3 t3l4r, y t3ní4 3l h13rr0 d3 su l4nz4 s31sc13nt0s s1cl0s d3 h13rr0; 3 1b4 su 3scud3r0 d3l4nt3 d3 él. 8 Y s3 p4ró y d10 v0c3s 4 l0s 3scu4dr0n3s d3 1sr43l, d1c1énd0l3s: ¿P4r4 qué 0s h4bé1s pu3st0 3n 0rd3n d3 b4t4ll4? ¿N0 s0y y0 3l f1l1st30, y v0s0tr0s l0s s13rv0s d3 S4úl? 0sc0g3d d3 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s un h0mbr3 qu3 v3ng4 c0ntr4 mí. 9 S1 él pud13r3 p3l34r c0nm1g0, y m3 v3nc13r3, n0s0tr0s s3r3m0s vu3str0s s13rv0s; y s1 y0 pud13r3 más qu3 él, y l0 v3nc13r3, v0s0tr0s s3ré1s nu3str0s s13rv0s y n0s s3rv1ré1s. 10 Y 4ñ4d1ó 3l f1l1st30: H0y y0 h3 d3s4f14d0 4l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 1sr43l; d4dm3 un h0mbr3 qu3 p3l33 c0nm1g0. 11 0y3nd0 S4úl y t0d0 1sr43l 3st4s p4l4br4s d3l f1l1st30, s3 turb4r0n y tuv13r0n gr4n m13d0. 

12 Y D4v1d 3r4 h1j0 d3 4qu3l h0mbr3 3fr4t30 d3 B3lén d3 Judá, cuy0 n0mbr3 3r4 1s4í, 3l cu4l t3ní4 0ch0 h1j0s; y 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 S4úl 3st3 h0mbr3 3r4 v13j0 y d3 gr4n 3d4d 3ntr3 l0s h0mbr3s. 13 Y l0s tr3s h1j0s m4y0r3s d3 1s4í h4bí4n 1d0 p4r4 s3gu1r 4 S4úl 4 l4 gu3rr4. Y l0s n0mbr3s d3 sus tr3s h1j0s qu3 h4bí4n 1d0 4 l4 gu3rr4 3r4n: 0l14b 3l pr1m0gén1t0, 3l s3gund0 4b1n4d4b, y 3l t3rc3r0 S4m4; 14 y D4v1d 3r4 3l m3n0r. S1gu13r0n, pu3s, l0s tr3s m4y0r3s 4 S4úl. 15 P3r0 D4v1d h4bí4 1d0 y vu3lt0, d3j4nd0 4 S4úl, p4r4 4p4c3nt4r l4s 0v3j4s d3 su p4dr3 3n B3lén. 16 V3ní4, pu3s, 4qu3l f1l1st30 p0r l4 m4ñ4n4 y p0r l4 t4rd3, y 4sí l0 h1z0 dur4nt3 cu4r3nt4 dí4s. 

17 Y d1j0 1s4í 4 D4v1d su h1j0: T0m4 4h0r4 p4r4 tus h3rm4n0s un 3f4 d3 3st3 gr4n0 t0st4d0, y 3st0s d13z p4n3s, y llév4l0 pr0nt0 4l c4mp4m3nt0 4 tus h3rm4n0s. 18 Y 3st0s d13z qu3s0s d3 l3ch3 l0s ll3v4rás 4l j3f3 d3 l0s m1l; y m1r4 s1 tus h3rm4n0s 3stán bu3n0s, y t0m4 pr3nd4s d3 3ll0s. 

19 Y S4úl y 3ll0s y t0d0s l0s d3 1sr43l 3st4b4n 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 0l4, p3l34nd0 c0ntr4 l0s f1l1st30s. 20 S3 l3v4ntó, pu3s, D4v1d d3 m4ñ4n4, y d3j4nd0 l4s 0v3j4s 4l cu1d4d0 d3 un gu4rd4, s3 fu3 c0n su c4rg4 c0m0 1s4í l3 h4bí4 m4nd4d0; y ll3gó 4l c4mp4m3nt0 cu4nd0 3l 3jérc1t0 s4lí4 3n 0rd3n d3 b4t4ll4, y d4b4 3l gr1t0 d3 c0mb4t3. 21 Y s3 pus13r0n 3n 0rd3n d3 b4t4ll4 1sr43l y l0s f1l1st30s, 3jérc1t0 fr3nt3 4 3jérc1t0. 22 0nt0nc3s D4v1d d3jó su c4rg4 3n m4n0 d3l qu3 gu4rd4b4 3l b4g4j3, y c0rr1ó 4l 3jérc1t0; y cu4nd0 ll3gó, pr3guntó p0r sus h3rm4n0s, s1 3st4b4n b13n. 23 M13ntr4s él h4bl4b4 c0n 3ll0s, h3 4quí qu3 4qu3l p4l4dín qu3 s3 p0ní4 3n m3d10 d3 l0s d0s c4mp4m3nt0s, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 G0l14t, 3l f1l1st30 d3 G4t, s4l1ó d3 3ntr3 l4s f1l4s d3 l0s f1l1st30s y h4bló l4s m1sm4s p4l4br4s, y l4s 0yó D4v1d. 

24 Y t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l qu3 v3í4n 4qu3l h0mbr3 huí4n d3 su pr3s3nc14, y t3ní4n gr4n t3m0r. 25 Y c4d4 un0 d3 l0s d3 1sr43l d3cí4: ¿N0 h4bé1s v1st0 4qu3l h0mbr3 qu3 h4 s4l1d0? 0l s3 4d3l4nt4 p4r4 pr0v0c4r 4 1sr43l. 4l qu3 l3 v3nc13r3, 3l r3y l3 3nr1qu3c3rá c0n gr4nd3s r1qu3z4s, y l3 d4rá su h1j4, y 3x1m1rá d3 tr1but0s 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3 3n 1sr43l. 26 0nt0nc3s h4bló D4v1d 4 l0s qu3 3st4b4n junt0 4 él, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué h4rán 4l h0mbr3 qu3 v3nc13r3 4 3st3 f1l1st30, y qu1t4r3 3l 0pr0b10 d3 1sr43l? P0rqu3 ¿qu1én 3s 3st3 f1l1st30 1nc1rcunc1s0, p4r4 qu3 pr0v0qu3 4 l0s 3scu4dr0n3s d3l D10s v1v13nt3? 27 Y 3l pu3bl0 l3 r3sp0nd1ó l4s m1sm4s p4l4br4s, d1c13nd0: 4sí s3 h4rá 4l h0mbr3 qu3 l3 v3nc13r3. 

28 Y 0yénd0l3 h4bl4r 0l14b su h3rm4n0 m4y0r c0n 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s, s3 3nc3nd1ó 3n 1r4 c0ntr4 D4v1d y d1j0: ¿P4r4 qué h4s d3sc3nd1d0 4cá? ¿y 4 qu1én h4s d3j4d0 4qu3ll4s p0c4s 0v3j4s 3n 3l d3s13rt0? Y0 c0n0zc0 tu s0b3rb14 y l4 m4l1c14 d3 tu c0r4zón, qu3 p4r4 v3r l4 b4t4ll4 h4s v3n1d0. 29 D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó: ¿Qué h3 h3ch0 y0 4h0r4? ¿N0 3s 3st0 m3r0 h4bl4r? 30 Y 4p4rtánd0s3 d3 él h4c14 0tr0s, pr3guntó d3 1gu4l m4n3r4; y l3 d10 3l pu3bl0 l4 m1sm4 r3spu3st4 d3 4nt3s. 

31 Fu3r0n 0íd4s l4s p4l4br4s qu3 D4v1d h4bí4 d1ch0, y l4s r3f1r13r0n d3l4nt3 d3 S4úl; y él l0 h1z0 v3n1r. 32 Y d1j0 D4v1d 4 S4úl: N0 d3sm4y3 3l c0r4zón d3 n1ngun0 4 c4us4 d3 él; tu s13rv0 1rá y p3l34rá c0ntr4 3st3 f1l1st30. 33 D1j0 S4úl 4 D4v1d: N0 p0drás tú 1r c0ntr4 4qu3l f1l1st30, p4r4 p3l34r c0n él; p0rqu3 tú 3r3s much4ch0, y él un h0mbr3 d3 gu3rr4 d3sd3 su juv3ntud. 34 D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó 4 S4úl: Tu s13rv0 3r4 p4st0r d3 l4s 0v3j4s d3 su p4dr3; y cu4nd0 v3ní4 un l3ón, 0 un 0s0, y t0m4b4 4lgún c0rd3r0 d3 l4 m4n4d4, 35 s4lí4 y0 tr4s él, y l0 h3rí4, y l0 l1br4b4 d3 su b0c4; y s1 s3 l3v4nt4b4 c0ntr4 mí, y0 l3 3ch4b4 m4n0 d3 l4 qu1j4d4, y l0 h3rí4 y l0 m4t4b4. 36 Fu3s3 l3ón, fu3s3 0s0, tu s13rv0 l0 m4t4b4; y 3st3 f1l1st30 1nc1rcunc1s0 s3rá c0m0 un0 d3 3ll0s, p0rqu3 h4 pr0v0c4d0 4l 3jér1ct0 d3l D10s v1v13nt3. 37 4ñ4d1ó D4v1d: J3h0vá, qu3 m3 h4 l1br4d0 d3 l4s g4rr4s d3l l3ón y d3 l4s g4rr4s d3l 0s0, él t4mb1én m3 l1br4rá d3 l4 m4n0 d3 3st3 f1l1st30. Y d1j0 S4úl 4 D4v1d: V3, y J3h0vá 3sté c0nt1g0. 38 Y S4úl v1st1ó 4 D4v1d c0n sus r0p4s, y pus0 s0br3 su c4b3z4 un c4sc0 d3 br0nc3, y l3 4rmó d3 c0r4z4. 39 Y c1ñó D4v1d su 3sp4d4 s0br3 sus v3st1d0s, y pr0bó 4 4nd4r, p0rqu3 nunc4 h4bí4 h3ch0 l4 pru3b4. Y d1j0 D4v1d 4 S4úl: Y0 n0 pu3d0 4nd4r c0n 3st0, p0rqu3 nunc4 l0 pr4ct1qué. Y D4v1d 3chó d3 sí 4qu3ll4s c0s4s. 40 Y t0mó su c4y4d0 3n su m4n0, y 3sc0g1ó c1nc0 p13dr4s l1s4s d3l 4rr0y0, y l4s pus0 3n 3l s4c0 p4st0r1l, 3n 3l zurrón qu3 tr4í4, y t0mó su h0nd4 3n su m4n0, y s3 fu3 h4c14 3l f1l1st30. 

41 Y 3l f1l1st30 v3ní4 4nd4nd0 y 4c3rcánd0s3 4 D4v1d, y su 3scud3r0 d3l4nt3 d3 él. 42 Y cu4nd0 3l f1l1st30 m1ró y v10 4 D4v1d, l3 tuv0 3n p0c0; p0rqu3 3r4 much4ch0, y rub10, y d3 h3rm0s0 p4r3c3r. 43 Y d1j0 3l f1l1st30 4 D4v1d: ¿S0y y0 p3rr0, p4r4 qu3 v3ng4s 4 mí c0n p4l0s? Y m4ld1j0 4 D4v1d p0r sus d10s3s. 44 D1j0 lu3g0 3l f1l1st30 4 D4v1d: V3n 4 mí, y d4ré tu c4rn3 4 l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 y 4 l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0. 45 0nt0nc3s d1j0 D4v1d 4l f1l1st30: Tú v13n3s 4 mí c0n 3sp4d4 y l4nz4 y j4b4l1n4; m4s y0 v3ng0 4 t1 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 3l D10s d3 l0s 3scu4dr0n3s d3 1sr43l, 4 qu13n tú h4s pr0v0c4d0. 46 J3h0vá t3 3ntr3g4rá h0y 3n m1 m4n0, y y0 t3 v3nc3ré, y t3 c0rt4ré l4 c4b3z4, y d4ré h0y l0s cu3rp0s d3 l0s f1l1st30s 4 l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 y 4 l4s b3st14s d3 l4 t13rr4; y t0d4 l4 t13rr4 s4brá qu3 h4y D10s 3n 1sr43l. 47 Y s4brá t0d4 3st4 c0ngr3g4c1ón qu3 J3h0vá n0 s4lv4 c0n 3sp4d4 y c0n l4nz4; p0rqu3 d3 J3h0vá 3s l4 b4t4ll4, y él 0s 3ntr3g4rá 3n nu3str4s m4n0s. 

48 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 3l f1l1st30 s3 l3v4ntó y 3chó 4 4nd4r p4r4 1r 4l 3ncu3ntr0 d3 D4v1d, D4v1d s3 d10 pr1s4, y c0rr1ó 4 l4 l1n34 d3 b4t4ll4 c0ntr4 3l f1l1st30. 49 Y m3t13nd0 D4v1d su m4n0 3n l4 b0ls4, t0mó d3 4llí un4 p13dr4, y l4 t1ró c0n l4 h0nd4, 3 h1r1ó 4l f1l1st30 3n l4 fr3nt3; y l4 p13dr4 qu3dó cl4v4d4 3n l4 fr3nt3, y c4yó s0br3 su r0str0 3n t13rr4. 

50 4sí v3nc1ó D4v1d 4l f1l1st30 c0n h0nd4 y p13dr4; 3 h1r1ó 4l f1l1st30 y l0 m4tó, s1n t3n3r D4v1d 3sp4d4 3n su m4n0. 51 0nt0nc3s c0rr1ó D4v1d y s3 pus0 s0br3 3l f1l1st30; y t0m4nd0 l4 3sp4d4 d3 él y s4cánd0l4 d3 su v41n4, l0 4c4bó d3 m4t4r, y l3 c0rtó c0n 3ll4 l4 c4b3z4. Y cu4nd0 l0s f1l1st30s v13r0n 4 su p4l4dín mu3rt0, huy3r0n. 52 L3v4ntánd0s3 lu3g0 l0s d3 1sr43l y l0s d3 Judá, gr1t4r0n, y s1gu13r0n 4 l0s f1l1st30s h4st4 ll3g4r 4l v4ll3, y h4st4 l4s pu3rt4s d3 0crón. Y c4y3r0n l0s h3r1d0s d3 l0s f1l1st30s p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3 S44r41m h4st4 G4t y 0crón. 53 Y v0lv13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 s3gu1r tr4s l0s f1l1st30s, y s4qu34r0n su c4mp4m3nt0. 54 Y D4v1d t0mó l4 c4b3z4 d3l f1l1st30 y l4 tr4j0 4 J3rus4lén, p3r0 l4s 4rm4s d3 él l4s pus0 3n su t13nd4. 

55 Y cu4nd0 S4úl v10 4 D4v1d qu3 s4lí4 4 3nc0ntr4rs3 c0n 3l f1l1st30, d1j0 4 4bn3r g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0: 4bn3r, ¿d3 qu1én 3s h1j0 3s3 j0v3n? Y 4bn3r r3sp0nd1ó: 56 V1v3 tu 4lm4, 0h r3y, qu3 n0 l0 sé. Y 3l r3y d1j0: Pr3gunt4 d3 qu1én 3s h1j0 3s3 j0v3n. 57 Y cu4nd0 D4v1d v0lví4 d3 m4t4r 4l f1l1st30, 4bn3r l0 t0mó y l0 ll3vó d3l4nt3 d3 S4úl, t3n13nd0 D4v1d l4 c4b3z4 d3l f1l1st30 3n su m4n0. 58 Y l3 d1j0 S4úl: Much4ch0, ¿d3 qu1én 3r3s h1j0? Y D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 s0y h1j0 d3 tu s13rv0 1s4í d3 B3lén. 

P4ct0 d3 J0n4tán y D4v1d

1 S4MU0L 18

1 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 él hub0 4c4b4d0 d3 h4bl4r c0n S4úl, 3l 4lm4 d3 J0n4tán qu3dó l1g4d4 c0n l4 d3 D4v1d, y l0 4mó J0n4tán c0m0 4 sí m1sm0. 2 Y S4úl l3 t0mó 4qu3l dí4, y n0 l3 d3jó v0lv3r 4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3. 3 0 h1c13r0n p4ct0 J0n4tán y D4v1d, p0rqu3 él l3 4m4b4 c0m0 4 sí m1sm0. 4 Y J0n4tán s3 qu1tó 3l m4nt0 qu3 ll3v4b4, y s3 l0 d10 4 D4v1d, y 0tr4s r0p4s suy4s, h4st4 su 3sp4d4, su 4rc0 y su t4l4b4rt3. 5 Y s4lí4 D4v1d 4 d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 S4úl l3 3nv14b4, y s3 p0rt4b4 prud3nt3m3nt3. Y l0 pus0 S4úl s0br3 g3nt3 d3 gu3rr4, y 3r4 4c3pt0 4 l0s 0j0s d3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, y 4 l0s 0j0s d3 l0s s13rv0s d3 S4úl. 

S4úl t13n3 c3l0s d3 D4v1d

6 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 v0lví4n 3ll0s, cu4nd0 D4v1d v0lv1ó d3 m4t4r 4l f1l1st30, s4l13r0n l4s muj3r3s d3 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 1sr43l c4nt4nd0 y d4nz4nd0, p4r4 r3c1b1r 4l r3y S4úl, c0n p4nd3r0s, c0n cánt1c0s d3 4l3grí4 y c0n 1nstrum3nt0s d3 mús1c4. 7 Y c4nt4b4n l4s muj3r3s qu3 d4nz4b4n, y d3cí4n: 


S4úl h1r1ó 4 sus m1l3s, 
Y D4v1d 4 sus d13z m1l3s. 

8 Y s3 3n0jó S4úl 3n gr4n m4n3r4, y l3 d3s4gr4dó 3st3 d1ch0, y d1j0: 4 D4v1d d13r0n d13z m1l3s, y 4 mí m1l3s; n0 l3 f4lt4 más qu3 3l r31n0. 9 Y d3sd3 4qu3l dí4 S4úl n0 m1ró c0n bu3n0s 0j0s 4 D4v1d. 

10 4c0nt3c1ó 4l 0tr0 dí4, qu3 un 3spír1tu m4l0 d3 p4rt3 d3 D10s t0mó 4 S4úl, y él d3sv4r14b4 3n m3d10 d3 l4 c4s4. D4v1d t0c4b4 c0n su m4n0 c0m0 l0s 0tr0s dí4s; y t3ní4 S4úl l4 l4nz4 3n l4 m4n0. 11 Y 4rr0jó S4úl l4 l4nz4, d1c13nd0: 0ncl4v4ré 4 D4v1d 4 l4 p4r3d. P3r0 D4v1d l0 3v4d1ó d0s v3c3s. 

12 M4s S4úl 3st4b4 t3m3r0s0 d3 D4v1d, p0r cu4nt0 J3h0vá 3st4b4 c0n él, y s3 h4bí4 4p4rt4d0 d3 S4úl; 13 p0r l0 cu4l S4úl l0 4l3jó d3 sí, y l3 h1z0 j3f3 d3 m1l; y s4lí4 y 3ntr4b4 d3l4nt3 d3l pu3bl0. 14 Y D4v1d s3 c0nducí4 prud3nt3m3nt3 3n t0d0s sus 4sunt0s, y J3h0vá 3st4b4 c0n él. 15 Y v13nd0 S4úl qu3 s3 p0rt4b4 t4n prud3nt3m3nt3, t3ní4 t3m0r d3 él. 16 M4s t0d0 1sr43l y Judá 4m4b4 4 D4v1d, p0rqu3 él s4lí4 y 3ntr4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s. 

17 0nt0nc3s d1j0 S4úl 4 D4v1d: H3 4quí, y0 t3 d4ré M3r4b m1 h1j4 m4y0r p0r muj3r, c0n t4l qu3 m3 s34s h0mbr3 v4l13nt3, y p3l33s l4s b4t4ll4s d3 J3h0vá. M4s S4úl d3cí4: N0 s3rá m1 m4n0 c0ntr4 él, s1n0 qu3 s3rá c0ntr4 él l4 m4n0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s. 18 P3r0 D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó 4 S4úl: ¿Qu1én s0y y0, 0 qué 3s m1 v1d4, 0 l4 f4m1l14 d3 m1 p4dr3 3n 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 y0 s34 y3rn0 d3l r3y? 19 Y ll3g4d0 3l t13mp0 3n qu3 M3r4b h1j4 d3 S4úl s3 h4bí4 d3 d4r 4 D4v1d, fu3 d4d4 p0r muj3r 4 4dr13l m3h0l4t1t4. 

20 P3r0 M1c4l l4 0tr4 h1j4 d3 S4úl 4m4b4 4 D4v1d; y fu3 d1ch0 4 S4úl, y l3 p4r3c1ó b13n 4 sus 0j0s. 21 Y S4úl d1j0: Y0 s3 l4 d4ré, p4r4 qu3 l3 s34 p0r l4z0, y p4r4 qu3 l4 m4n0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s s34 c0ntr4 él. D1j0, pu3s, S4úl 4 D4v1d p0r s3gund4 v3z: Tú s3rás m1 y3rn0 h0y. 22 Y m4ndó S4úl 4 sus s13rv0s: H4bl4d 3n s3cr3t0 4 D4v1d, d1c1énd0l3: H3 4quí 3l r3y t3 4m4, y t0d0s sus s13rv0s t3 qu13r3n b13n; sé, pu3s, y3rn0 d3l r3y. 23 L0s cr14d0s d3 S4úl h4bl4r0n 3st4s p4l4br4s 4 l0s 0íd0s d3 D4v1d. Y D4v1d d1j0: ¿0s p4r3c3 4 v0s0tr0s qu3 3s p0c0 s3r y3rn0 d3l r3y, s13nd0 y0 un h0mbr3 p0br3 y d3 n1ngun4 3st1m4? 24 Y l0s cr14d0s d3 S4úl l3 d13r0n l4 r3spu3st4, d1c13nd0: T4l3s p4l4br4s h4 d1ch0 D4v1d. 25 Y S4úl d1j0: D3c1d 4sí 4 D4v1d: 0l r3y n0 d3s34 l4 d0t3, s1n0 c13n pr3puc10s d3 f1l1st30s, p4r4 qu3 s34 t0m4d4 v3ng4nz4 d3 l0s 3n3m1g0s d3l r3y. P3r0 S4úl p3ns4b4 h4c3r c43r 4 D4v1d 3n m4n0s d3 l0s f1l1st30s. 26 Cu4nd0 sus s13rv0s d3cl4r4r0n 4 D4v1d 3st4s p4l4br4s, p4r3c1ó b13n l4 c0s4 4 l0s 0j0s d3 D4v1d, p4r4 s3r y3rn0 d3l r3y. Y 4nt3s qu3 3l pl4z0 s3 cumpl13s3, 27 s3 l3v4ntó D4v1d y s3 fu3 c0n su g3nt3, y m4tó 4 d0sc13nt0s h0mbr3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s; y tr4j0 D4v1d l0s pr3puc10s d3 3ll0s y l0s 3ntr3gó t0d0s 4l r3y, 4 f1n d3 h4c3rs3 y3rn0 d3l r3y. Y S4úl l3 d10 su h1j4 M1c4l p0r muj3r. 28 P3r0 S4úl, v13nd0 y c0ns1d3r4nd0 qu3 J3h0vá 3st4b4 c0n D4v1d, y qu3 su h1j4 M1c4l l0 4m4b4, 29 tuv0 más t3m0r d3 D4v1d; y fu3 S4úl 3n3m1g0 d3 D4v1d t0d0s l0s dí4s. 

30 Y s4l13r0n 4 c4mp4ñ4 l0s prínc1p3s d3 l0s f1l1st30s; y c4d4 v3z qu3 s4lí4n, D4v1d t3ní4 más éx1t0 qu3 t0d0s l0s s13rv0s d3 S4úl, p0r l0 cu4l s3 h1z0 d3 much4 3st1m4 su n0mbr3. 

S4úl pr0cur4 m4t4r 4 D4v1d

1 S4MU0L 19

1 H4bló S4úl 4 J0n4tán su h1j0, y 4 t0d0s sus s13rv0s, p4r4 qu3 m4t4s3n 4 D4v1d; p3r0 J0n4tán h1j0 d3 S4úl 4m4b4 4 D4v1d 3n gr4n m4n3r4, 2 y d10 4v1s0 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: S4úl m1 p4dr3 pr0cur4 m4t4rt3; p0r t4nt0 cuíd4t3 h4st4 l4 m4ñ4n4, y 3st4t3 3n lug4r 0cult0 y 3scónd3t3. 3 Y y0 s4ldré y 3st4ré junt0 4 m1 p4dr3 3n 3l c4mp0 d0nd3 3stés; y h4bl4ré d3 t1 4 m1 p4dr3, y t3 h4ré s4b3r l0 qu3 h4y4. 4 Y J0n4tán h4bló b13n d3 D4v1d 4 S4úl su p4dr3, y l3 d1j0: N0 p3qu3 3l r3y c0ntr4 su s13rv0 D4v1d, p0rqu3 n1ngun4 c0s4 h4 c0m3t1d0 c0ntr4 t1, y p0rqu3 sus 0br4s h4n s1d0 muy bu3n4s p4r4 c0nt1g0; 5 pu3s él t0mó su v1d4 3n su m4n0, y m4tó 4l f1l1st30, y J3h0vá d10 gr4n s4lv4c1ón 4 t0d0 1sr43l. Tú l0 v1st3, y t3 4l3gr4st3; ¿p0r qué, pu3s, p3c4rás c0ntr4 l4 s4ngr3 1n0c3nt3, m4t4nd0 4 D4v1d s1n c4us4? 6 Y 3scuchó S4úl l4 v0z d3 J0n4tán, y juró S4úl: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 n0 m0r1rá. 7 Y ll4mó J0n4tán 4 D4v1d, y l3 d3cl4ró t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s; y él m1sm0 tr4j0 4 D4v1d 4 S4úl, y 3stuv0 d3l4nt3 d3 él c0m0 4nt3s. 

8 D3spués hub0 d3 nu3v0 gu3rr4; y s4l1ó D4v1d y p3l3ó c0ntr4 l0s f1l1st30s, y l0s h1r1ó c0n gr4n 3str4g0, y huy3r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 9 Y 3l 3spír1tu m4l0 d3 p4rt3 d3 J3h0vá v1n0 s0br3 S4úl; y 3st4nd0 s3nt4d0 3n su c4s4 t3ní4 un4 l4nz4 4 m4n0, m13ntr4s D4v1d 3st4b4 t0c4nd0. 10 Y S4úl pr0curó 3ncl4v4r 4 D4v1d c0n l4 l4nz4 4 l4 p4r3d, p3r0 él s3 4p4rtó d3 d3l4nt3 d3 S4úl, 3l cu4l h1r1ó c0n l4 l4nz4 3n l4 p4r3d; y D4v1d huyó, y 3sc4pó 4qu3ll4 n0ch3. 

11 S4úl 3nv1ó lu3g0 m3ns4j3r0s 4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d p4r4 qu3 l0 v1g1l4s3n, y l0 m4t4s3n 4 l4 m4ñ4n4. M4s M1c4l su muj3r 4v1só 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: S1 n0 s4lv4s tu v1d4 3st4 n0ch3, m4ñ4n4 s3rás mu3rt0. 12 Y d3sc0lgó M1c4l 4 D4v1d p0r un4 v3nt4n4; y él s3 fu3 y huyó, y 3sc4pó. 13 T0mó lu3g0 M1c4l un4 3st4tu4, y l4 pus0 s0br3 l4 c4m4, y l3 4c0m0dó p0r c4b3c3r4 un4 4lm0h4d4 d3 p3l0 d3 c4br4 y l4 cubr1ó c0n l4 r0p4. 14 Y cu4nd0 S4úl 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s p4r4 pr3nd3r 4 D4v1d, 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: 0stá 3nf3rm0. 15 V0lv1ó S4úl 4 3nv14r m3ns4j3r0s p4r4 qu3 v13s3n 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: Tr4édm3l0 3n l4 c4m4 p4r4 qu3 l0 m4t3. 16 Y cu4nd0 l0s m3ns4j3r0s 3ntr4r0n, h3 4quí l4 3st4tu4 3st4b4 3n l4 c4m4, y un4 4lm0h4d4 d3 p3l0 d3 c4br4 4 su c4b3c3r4. 17 0nt0nc3s S4úl d1j0 4 M1c4l: ¿P0r qué m3 h4s 3ng4ñ4d0 4sí, y h4s d3j4d0 3sc4p4r 4 m1 3n3m1g0? Y M1c4l r3sp0nd1ó 4 S4úl: P0rqu3 él m3 d1j0: Déj4m3 1r; s1 n0, y0 t3 m4t4ré. 

18 Huyó, pu3s, D4v1d, y 3sc4pó, y v1n0 4 S4mu3l 3n R4má, y l3 d1j0 t0d0 l0 qu3 S4úl h4bí4 h3ch0 c0n él. Y él y S4mu3l s3 fu3r0n y m0r4r0n 3n N410t. 19 Y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 S4úl, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 D4v1d 3stá 3n N410t 3n R4má. 20 0nt0nc3s S4úl 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s p4r4 qu3 tr4j3r4n 4 D4v1d, l0s cu4l3s v13r0n un4 c0mp4ñí4 d3 pr0f3t4s qu3 pr0f3t1z4b4n, y 4 S4mu3l qu3 3st4b4 4llí y l0s pr3s1dí4. Y v1n0 3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s s0br3 l0s m3ns4j3r0s d3 S4úl, y 3ll0s t4mb1én pr0f3t1z4r0n. 21 Cu4nd0 l0 sup0 S4úl, 3nv1ó 0tr0s m3ns4j3r0s, l0s cu4l3s t4mb1én pr0f3t1z4r0n. Y S4úl v0lv1ó 4 3nv14r m3ns4j3r0s p0r t3rc3r4 v3z, y 3ll0s t4mb1én pr0f3t1z4r0n. 22 0nt0nc3s él m1sm0 fu3 4 R4má; y ll3g4nd0 4l gr4n p0z0 qu3 3stá 3n S3cú, pr3guntó d1c13nd0: ¿Dónd3 3stán S4mu3l y D4v1d? Y un0 r3sp0nd1ó: H3 4quí 3stán 3n N410t 3n R4má. 23 Y fu3 4 N410t 3n R4má; y t4mb1én v1n0 s0br3 él 3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s, y s1gu1ó 4nd4nd0 y pr0f3t1z4nd0 h4st4 qu3 ll3gó 4 N410t 3n R4má. 24 Y él t4mb1én s3 d3sp0jó d3 sus v3st1d0s, y pr0f3t1zó 1gu4lm3nt3 d3l4nt3 d3 S4mu3l, y 3stuv0 d3snud0 t0d0 4qu3l dí4 y t0d4 4qu3ll4 n0ch3. D3 4quí s3 d1j0: ¿T4mb1én S4úl 3ntr3 l0s pr0f3t4s? 

4m1st4d d3 D4v1d y J0n4tán

1 S4MU0L 20

1 D3spués D4v1d huyó d3 N410t 3n R4má, y v1n0 d3l4nt3 d3 J0n4tán, y d1j0: ¿Qué h3 h3ch0 y0? ¿Cuál 3s m1 m4ld4d, 0 cuál m1 p3c4d0 c0ntr4 tu p4dr3, p4r4 qu3 busqu3 m1 v1d4? 2 0l l3 d1j0: 0n n1ngun4 m4n3r4; n0 m0r1rás. H3 4quí qu3 m1 p4dr3 n1ngun4 c0s4 h4rá, gr4nd3 n1 p3qu3ñ4, qu3 n0 m3 l4 d3scubr4; ¿p0r qué, pu3s, m3 h4 d3 3ncubr1r m1 p4dr3 3st3 4sunt0? N0 s3rá 4sí. 3 Y D4v1d v0lv1ó 4 jur4r d1c13nd0: Tu p4dr3 s4b3 cl4r4m3nt3 qu3 y0 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s, y d1rá: N0 s3p4 3st0 J0n4tán, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 3ntr1st3zc4; y c13rt4m3nt3, v1v3 J3h0vá y v1v3 tu 4lm4, qu3 4p3n4s h4y un p4s0 3ntr3 mí y l4 mu3rt3. 4 Y J0n4tán d1j0 4 D4v1d: L0 qu3 d3s34r3 tu 4lm4, h4ré p0r t1. 5 Y D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó 4 J0n4tán: H3 4quí qu3 m4ñ4n4 s3rá nu3v4 lun4, y y0 4c0stumbr0 s3nt4rm3 c0n 3l r3y 4 c0m3r; m4s tú d3j4rás qu3 m3 3sc0nd4 3n 3l c4mp0 h4st4 l4 t4rd3 d3l t3rc3r dí4. 6 S1 tu p4dr3 h1c13r3 m3nc1ón d3 mí, d1rás: M3 r0gó much0 qu3 l0 d3j4s3 1r c0rr13nd0 4 B3lén su c1ud4d, p0rqu3 t0d0s l0s d3 su f4m1l14 c3l3br4n 4llá 3l s4cr1f1c10 4nu4l. 7 S1 él d1j3r3: B13n 3stá, 3nt0nc3s t3ndrá p4z tu s13rv0; m4s s1 s3 3n0j4r3, s4b3 qu3 l4 m4ld4d 3stá d3t3rm1n4d4 d3 p4rt3 d3 él. 8 H4rás, pu3s, m1s3r1c0rd14 c0n tu s13rv0, y4 qu3 h4s h3ch0 3ntr4r 4 tu s13rv0 3n p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá c0nt1g0; y s1 h4y m4ld4d 3n mí, mát4m3 tú, pu3s n0 h4y n3c3s1d4d d3 ll3v4rm3 h4st4 tu p4dr3. 9 Y J0n4tán l3 d1j0: Nunc4 t4l t3 suc3d4; 4nt3s b13n, s1 y0 sup13r3 qu3 m1 p4dr3 h4 d3t3rm1n4d0 m4ld4d c0ntr4 t1, ¿n0 t3 l0 4v1s4rí4 y0? 10 D1j0 3nt0nc3s D4v1d 4 J0n4tán: ¿Qu1én m3 d4rá 4v1s0 s1 tu p4dr3 t3 r3sp0nd13r3 ásp3r4m3nt3? 11 Y J0n4tán d1j0 4 D4v1d: V3n, s4lg4m0s 4l c4mp0. Y s4l13r0n 4mb0s 4l c4mp0. 

12 0nt0nc3s d1j0 J0n4tán 4 D4v1d: ¡J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, s34 t3st1g0! Cu4nd0 l3 h4y4 pr3gunt4d0 4 m1 p4dr3 m4ñ4n4 4 3st4 h0r4, 0 3l dí4 t3rc3r0, s1 r3sult4r3 b13n p4r4 c0n D4v1d, 3nt0nc3s 3nv14ré 4 t1 p4r4 h4cért3l0 s4b3r. 13 P3r0 s1 m1 p4dr3 1nt3nt4r3 h4c3rt3 m4l, J3h0vá h4g4 4sí 4 J0n4tán, y 4un l3 4ñ4d4, s1 n0 t3 l0 h1c13r3 s4b3r y t3 3nv14r3 p4r4 qu3 t3 v4y4s 3n p4z. Y 3sté J3h0vá c0nt1g0, c0m0 3stuv0 c0n m1 p4dr3. 14 Y s1 y0 v1v13r3, h4rás c0nm1g0 m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 n0 mu3r4, 15 y n0 4p4rt4rás tu m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 m1 c4s4 p4r4 s13mpr3. Cu4nd0 J3h0vá h4y4 c0rt4d0 un0 p0r un0 l0s 3n3m1g0s d3 D4v1d d3 l4 t13rr4, n0 d3j3s qu3 3l n0mbr3 d3 J0n4tán s34 qu1t4d0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d. 16 4sí h1z0 J0n4tán p4ct0 c0n l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: R3qu1ér4l0 J3h0vá d3 l4 m4n0 d3 l0s 3n3m1g0s d3 D4v1d. 17 Y J0n4tán h1z0 jur4r 4 D4v1d 0tr4 v3z, p0rqu3 l3 4m4b4, pu3s l3 4m4b4 c0m0 4 sí m1sm0. 

18 Lu3g0 l3 d1j0 J0n4tán: M4ñ4n4 3s nu3v4 lun4, y tú s3rás 3ch4d0 d3 m3n0s, p0rqu3 tu 4s13nt0 3st4rá v4cí0. 19 0st4rás, pu3s, tr3s dí4s, y lu3g0 d3sc3nd3rás y v3ndrás 4l lug4r d0nd3 3st4b4s 3sc0nd1d0 3l dí4 qu3 0curr1ó 3st0 m1sm0, y 3sp3r4rás junt0 4 l4 p13dr4 d3 0z3l. 20 Y y0 t1r4ré tr3s s43t4s h4c14 4qu3l l4d0, c0m0 3j3rc1tánd0m3 4l bl4nc0. 21 Lu3g0 3nv14ré 4l cr14d0, d1c1énd0l3: V3, busc4 l4s s43t4s. Y s1 d1j3r3 4l cr14d0: H3 4llí l4s s43t4s más 4cá d3 t1, tóm4l4s; tú v3ndrás, p0rqu3 p4z t13n3s, y n4d4 m4l0 h4y, v1v3 J3h0vá. 22 M4s s1 y0 d1j3r3 4l much4ch0 4sí: H3 4llí l4s s43t4s más 4llá d3 t1; v3t3, p0rqu3 J3h0vá t3 h4 3nv14d0. 23 0n cu4nt0 4l 4sunt0 d3 qu3 tú y y0 h3m0s h4bl4d0, 3sté J3h0vá 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s d0s p4r4 s13mpr3. 

24 D4v1d, pu3s, s3 3sc0nd1ó 3n 3l c4mp0, y cu4nd0 ll3gó l4 nu3v4 lun4, s3 s3ntó 3l r3y 4 c0m3r p4n. 25 Y 3l r3y s3 s3ntó 3n su s1ll4, c0m0 s0lí4, 3n 3l 4s13nt0 junt0 4 l4 p4r3d, y J0n4tán s3 l3v4ntó, y s3 s3ntó 4bn3r 4l l4d0 d3 S4úl, y 3l lug4r d3 D4v1d qu3dó v4cí0. 

26 M4s 4qu3l dí4 S4úl n0 d1j0 n4d4, p0rqu3 s3 d3cí4: L3 h4brá 4c0nt3c1d0 4lg0, y n0 3stá l1mp10; d3 s3gur0 n0 3stá pur1f1c4d0. 27 4l s1gu13nt3 dí4, 3l s3gund0 dí4 d3 l4 nu3v4 lun4, 4c0nt3c1ó t4mb1én qu3 3l 4s13nt0 d3 D4v1d qu3dó v4cí0. Y S4úl d1j0 4 J0n4tán su h1j0: ¿P0r qué n0 h4 v3n1d0 4 c0m3r 3l h1j0 d3 1s4í h0y n1 4y3r? 28 Y J0n4tán r3sp0nd1ó 4 S4úl: D4v1d m3 p1d1ó 3nc4r3c1d4m3nt3 qu3 l3 d3j4s3 1r 4 B3lén, 29 d1c13nd0: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3j3s 1r, p0rqu3 nu3str4 f4m1l14 c3l3br4 s4cr1f1c10 3n l4 c1ud4d, y m1 h3rm4n0 m3 l0 h4 m4nd4d0; p0r l0 t4nt0, s1 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, p3rmít3m3 1r 4h0r4 p4r4 v1s1t4r 4 m1s h3rm4n0s. P0r 3st0, pu3s, n0 h4 v3n1d0 4 l4 m3s4 d3l r3y. 

30 0nt0nc3s s3 3nc3nd1ó l4 1r4 d3 S4úl c0ntr4 J0n4tán, y l3 d1j0: H1j0 d3 l4 p3rv3rs4 y r3b3ld3, ¿4c4s0 n0 sé y0 qu3 tú h4s 3l3g1d0 4l h1j0 d3 1s4í p4r4 c0nfus1ón tuy4, y p4r4 c0nfus1ón d3 l4 v3rgü3nz4 d3 tu m4dr3? 31 P0rqu3 t0d0 3l t13mp0 qu3 3l h1j0 d3 1s4í v1v13r3 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, n1 tú 3st4rás f1rm3, n1 tu r31n0. 0nví4 pu3s, 4h0r4, y trá3m3l0, p0rqu3 h4 d3 m0r1r. 32 Y J0n4tán r3sp0nd1ó 4 su p4dr3 S4úl y l3 d1j0: ¿P0r qué m0r1rá? ¿Qué h4 h3ch0? 33 0nt0nc3s S4úl l3 4rr0jó un4 l4nz4 p4r4 h3r1rl0; d3 d0nd3 3nt3nd1ó J0n4tán qu3 su p4dr3 3st4b4 r3su3lt0 4 m4t4r 4 D4v1d. 34 Y s3 l3v4ntó J0n4tán d3 l4 m3s4 c0n 3x4lt4d4 1r4, y n0 c0m1ó p4n 3l s3gund0 dí4 d3 l4 nu3v4 lun4; p0rqu3 t3ní4 d0l0r 4 c4us4 d3 D4v1d, p0rqu3 su p4dr3 l3 h4bí4 4fr3nt4d0. 

35 4l 0tr0 dí4, d3 m4ñ4n4, s4l1ó J0n4tán 4l c4mp0, 4l t13mp0 s3ñ4l4d0 c0n D4v1d, y un much4ch0 p3qu3ñ0 c0n él. 36 Y d1j0 4l much4ch0: C0rr3 y busc4 l4s s43t4s qu3 y0 t1r4r3. Y cu4nd0 3l much4ch0 1b4 c0rr13nd0, él t1r4b4 l4 s43t4 d3 m0d0 qu3 p4s4r4 más 4llá d3 él. 37 Y ll3g4nd0 3l much4ch0 4d0nd3 3st4b4 l4 s43t4 qu3 J0n4tán h4bí4 t1r4d0, J0n4tán d10 v0c3s tr4s 3l much4ch0, d1c13nd0: ¿N0 3stá l4 s43t4 más 4llá d3 t1? 38 Y v0lv1ó 4 gr1t4r J0n4tán tr4s 3l much4ch0: C0rr3, d4t3 pr1s4, n0 t3 p4r3s. Y 3l much4ch0 d3 J0n4tán r3c0g1ó l4s s43t4s, y v1n0 4 su s3ñ0r. 39 P3r0 n1ngun4 c0s4 3nt3nd1ó 3l much4ch0; s0l4m3nt3 J0n4tán y D4v1d 3nt3ndí4n d3 l0 qu3 s3 tr4t4b4. 40 Lu3g0 d10 J0n4tán sus 4rm4s 4 su much4ch0, y l3 d1j0: V3t3 y llév4l4s 4 l4 c1ud4d. 41 Y lu3g0 qu3 3l much4ch0 s3 hub0 1d0, s3 l3v4ntó D4v1d d3l l4d0 d3l sur, y s3 1ncl1nó tr3s v3c3s p0stránd0s3 h4st4 l4 t13rr4; y b3sánd0s3 3l un0 4l 0tr0, ll0r4r0n 3l un0 c0n 3l 0tr0; y D4v1d ll0ró más. 42 Y J0n4tán d1j0 4 D4v1d: V3t3 3n p4z, p0rqu3 4mb0s h3m0s jur4d0 p0r 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: J3h0vá 3sté 3ntr3 tú y y0, 3ntr3 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 y m1 d3sc3nd3nc14, p4r4 s13mpr3. Y él s3 l3v4ntó y s3 fu3; y J0n4tán 3ntró 3n l4 c1ud4d. 

D4v1d huy3 d3 S4úl

1 S4MU0L 21

1 V1n0 D4v1d 4 N0b, 4l s4c3rd0t3 4h1m3l3c; y s3 s0rpr3nd1ó 4h1m3l3c d3 su 3ncu3ntr0, y l3 d1j0: ¿Cóm0 v13n3s tú s0l0, y n4d13 c0nt1g0? 2 Y r3sp0nd1ó D4v1d 4l s4c3rd0t3 4h1m3l3c: 0l r3y m3 3nc0m3ndó un 4sunt0, y m3 d1j0: N4d13 s3p4 c0s4 4lgun4 d3l 4sunt0 4 qu3 t3 3nví0, y l0 qu3 t3 h3 3nc0m3nd4d0; y y0 l3s s3ñ4lé 4 l0s cr14d0s un c13rt0 lug4r. 3 4h0r4, pu3s, ¿qué t13n3s 4 m4n0? D4m3 c1nc0 p4n3s, 0 l0 qu3 t3ng4s. 4 0l s4c3rd0t3 r3sp0nd1ó 4 D4v1d y d1j0: N0 t3ng0 p4n c0mún 4 l4 m4n0, s0l4m3nt3 t3ng0 p4n s4gr4d0; p3r0 l0 d4ré s1 l0s cr14d0s s3 h4n gu4rd4d0 4 l0 m3n0s d3 muj3r3s. 5 Y D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó 4l s4c3rd0t3, y l3 d1j0: 0n v3rd4d l4s muj3r3s h4n 3st4d0 l3j0s d3 n0s0tr0s 4y3r y 4nt34y3r; cu4nd0 y0 s4lí, y4 l0s v4s0s d3 l0s jóv3n3s 3r4n s4nt0s, 4unqu3 3l v14j3 3s pr0f4n0; ¿cuánt0 más n0 s3rán s4nt0s h0y sus v4s0s? 6 4sí 3l s4c3rd0t3 l3 d10 3l p4n s4gr4d0, p0rqu3 4llí n0 h4bí4 0tr0 p4n s1n0 l0s p4n3s d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón, l0s cu4l3s h4bí4n s1d0 qu1t4d0s d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 p0n3r p4n3s c4l13nt3s 3l dí4 qu3 4quéll0s fu3r0n qu1t4d0s. 

7 Y 3st4b4 4llí 4qu3l dí4 d3t3n1d0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá un0 d3 l0s s13rv0s d3 S4úl, cuy0 n0mbr3 3r4 D03g, 3d0m1t4, 3l pr1nc1p4l d3 l0s p4st0r3s d3 S4úl. 

8 Y D4v1d d1j0 4 4h1m3l3c: ¿N0 t13n3s 4quí 4 m4n0 l4nz4 0 3sp4d4? P0rqu3 n0 t0mé 3n m1 m4n0 m1 3sp4d4 n1 m1s 4rm4s, p0r cu4nt0 l4 0rd3n d3l r3y 3r4 4pr3m14nt3. 9 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 r3sp0nd1ó: L4 3sp4d4 d3 G0l14t 3l f1l1st30, 4l qu3 tú v3nc1st3 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 0l4, 3stá 4quí 3nvu3lt4 3n un v3l0 d3trás d3l 3f0d; s1 qu13r3s t0m4rl4, tóm4l4; p0rqu3 4quí n0 h4y 0tr4 s1n0 3s4. Y d1j0 D4v1d: N1ngun4 c0m0 3ll4; dám3l4. 

10 Y l3v4ntánd0s3 D4v1d 4qu3l dí4, huyó d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 S4úl, y s3 fu3 4 4qu1s r3y d3 G4t. 11 Y l0s s13rv0s d3 4qu1s l3 d1j3r0n: ¿N0 3s ést3 D4v1d, 3l r3y d3 l4 t13rr4? ¿n0 3s ést3 d3 qu13n c4nt4b4n 3n l4s d4nz4s, d1c13nd0: 


H1r1ó S4úl 4 sus m1l3s,

16 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 D4v1d 4c4bó d3 d3c1r 3st4s p4l4br4s 4 S4úl, S4úl d1j0: ¿N0 3s 3st4 l4 v0z tuy4, h1j0 mí0 D4v1d? 14 P3r0 un0 d3 l0s cr14d0s d10 4v1s0 4 4b1g41l muj3r d3 N4b4l, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí D4v1d 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s d3l d3s13rt0 qu3 s4lud4s3n 4 nu3str0 4m0, y él l0s h4 z4h3r1d0. 15 Y 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s h4n s1d0 muy bu3n0s c0n n0s0tr0s, y nunc4 n0s tr4t4r0n m4l, n1 n0s f4ltó n4d4 3n t0d0 3l t13mp0 qu3 4nduv1m0s c0n 3ll0s, cu4nd0 3stáb4m0s 3n 3l c4mp0. 16 Mur0 fu3r0n p4r4 n0s0tr0s d3 dí4 y d3 n0ch3, t0d0s l0s dí4s qu3 h3m0s 3st4d0 c0n 3ll0s 4p4c3nt4nd0 l4s 0v3j4s. 17 4h0r4, pu3s, r3fl3x10n4 y v3 l0 qu3 h4s d3 h4c3r, p0rqu3 3l m4l 3stá y4 r3su3lt0 c0ntr4 nu3str0 4m0 y c0ntr4 t0d4 su c4s4; pu3s él 3s un h0mbr3 t4n p3rv3rs0, qu3 n0 h4y qu13n pu3d4 h4bl4rl3. 

18 0nt0nc3s 4b1g41l t0mó lu3g0 d0sc13nt0s p4n3s, d0s cu3r0s d3 v1n0, c1nc0 0v3j4s gu1s4d4s, c1nc0 m3d1d4s d3 gr4n0 t0st4d0, c13n r4c1m0s d3 uv4s p4s4s, y d0sc13nt0s p4n3s d3 h1g0s s3c0s, y l0 c4rgó t0d0 3n 4sn0s. 19 Y d1j0 4 sus cr14d0s: 1d d3l4nt3 d3 mí, y y0 0s s3gu1ré lu3g0; y n4d4 d3cl4ró 4 su m4r1d0 N4b4l. 20 Y m0nt4nd0 un 4sn0, d3sc3nd1ó p0r un4 p4rt3 s3cr3t4 d3l m0nt3; y h3 4quí D4v1d y sus h0mbr3s v3ní4n fr3nt3 4 3ll4, y 3ll4 l3s s4l1ó 4l 3ncu3ntr0. 21 Y D4v1d h4bí4 d1ch0: C13rt4m3nt3 3n v4n0 h3 gu4rd4d0 t0d0 l0 qu3 ést3 t13n3 3n 3l d3s13rt0, s1n qu3 n4d4 l3 h4y4 f4lt4d0 d3 t0d0 cu4nt0 3s suy0; y él m3 h4 vu3lt0 m4l p0r b13n. 22 4sí h4g4 D10s 4 l0s 3n3m1g0s d3 D4v1d y 4un l3s 4ñ4d4, qu3 d3 4quí 4 m4ñ4n4, d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 fu3r3 suy0 n0 h3 d3 d3j4r c0n v1d4 n1 un v4rón.

1 V1n13r0n l0s z1f30s 4 S4úl 3n G4b44, d1c13nd0: ¿N0 3stá D4v1d 3sc0nd1d0 3n 3l c0ll4d0 d3 H4qu1l4, 4l 0r13nt3 d3l d3s13rt0? 2 S4úl 3nt0nc3s s3 l3v4ntó y d3sc3nd1ó 4l d3s13rt0 d3 Z1f, ll3v4nd0 c0ns1g0 tr3s m1l h0mbr3s 3sc0g1d0s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 busc4r 4 D4v1d 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3 Z1f. 3 Y 4c4mpó S4úl 3n 3l c0ll4d0 d3 H4qu1l4, qu3 3stá 4l 0r13nt3 d3l d3s13rt0, junt0 4l c4m1n0. Y 3st4b4 D4v1d 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y 3nt3nd1ó qu3 S4úl l3 s3guí4 3n 3l d3s13rt0. 4 D4v1d, p0r t4nt0, 3nv1ó 3spí4s, y sup0 c0n c3rt3z4 qu3 S4úl h4bí4 v3n1d0. 5 Y s3 l3v4ntó D4v1d, y v1n0 4l s1t10 d0nd3 S4úl h4bí4 4c4mp4d0; y m1ró D4v1d 3l lug4r d0nd3 d0rmí4n S4úl y 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r, g3n3r4l d3 su 3jérc1t0. Y 3st4b4 S4úl durm13nd0 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0, y 3l pu3bl0 3st4b4 4c4mp4d0 3n d3rr3d0r d3 él. 

6 0nt0nc3s D4v1d d1j0 4 4h1m3l3c h3t30 y 4 4b1s41 h1j0 d3 S4rv14, h3rm4n0 d3 J04b: ¿Qu1én d3sc3nd3rá c0nm1g0 4 S4úl 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0? P3r0 t0m4 4h0r4 l4 l4nz4 qu3 3stá 4 su c4b3c3r4, y l4 v4s1j4 d3 4gu4, y vám0n0s. 12 S3 ll3vó, pu3s, D4v1d l4 l4nz4 y l4 v4s1j4 d3 4gu4 d3 l4 c4b3c3r4 d3 S4úl, y s3 fu3r0n; y n0 hub0 n4d13 qu3 v13s3, n1 3nt3nd13s3, n1 v3l4s3, pu3s t0d0s d0rmí4n; p0rqu3 un pr0fund0 su3ñ0 3nv14d0 d3 J3h0vá h4bí4 c4íd0 s0br3 3ll0s. 

13 0nt0nc3s p4só D4v1d 4l l4d0 0pu3st0, y s3 pus0 3n l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3 4 l0 l3j0s, h4b13nd0 gr4n d1st4nc14 3ntr3 3ll0s. 14 Y d10 v0c3s D4v1d 4l pu3bl0, y 4 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r, d1c13nd0: ¿N0 r3sp0nd3s, 4bn3r? 0nt0nc3s 4bn3r r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: ¿Qu1én 3r3s tú qu3 gr1t4s 4l r3y? 15 Y d1j0 D4v1d 4 4bn3r: ¿N0 3r3s tú un h0mbr3? ¿y qu1én h4y c0m0 tú 3n 1sr43l? ¿P0r qué, pu3s, n0 h4s gu4rd4d0 4l r3y tu s3ñ0r? P0rqu3 un0 d3l pu3bl0 h4 3ntr4d0 4 m4t4r 4 tu s3ñ0r 3l r3y. 16 0st0 qu3 h4s h3ch0 n0 3stá b13n. V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 s01s d1gn0s d3 mu3rt3, p0rqu3 n0 h4bé1s gu4rd4d0 4 vu3str0 s3ñ0r, 4l ung1d0 d3 J3h0vá. 17 Y c0n0c13nd0 S4úl l4 v0z d3 D4v1d, d1j0: ¿N0 3s 3st4 tu v0z, h1j0 mí0 D4v1d? Y D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó: M1 v0z 3s, r3y s3ñ0r mí0. 18 Y d1j0: ¿P0r qué p3rs1gu3 4sí m1 s3ñ0r 4 su s13rv0? ¿Qué h3 h3ch0? ¿Qué m4l h4y 3n m1 m4n0? 19 Ru3g0, pu3s, qu3 3l r3y m1 s3ñ0r 01g4 4h0r4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 su s13rv0. 21 0nt0nc3s d1j0 S4úl: H3 p3c4d0; vuélv3t3, h1j0 mí0 D4v1d, qu3 n1ngún m4l t3 h4ré más, p0rqu3 m1 v1d4 h4 s1d0 3st1m4d4 pr3c10s4 h0y 4 tus 0j0s. 16 L0 ll3vó, pu3s; y h3 4quí qu3 3st4b4n d3sp4rr4m4d0s s0br3 t0d4 4qu3ll4 t13rr4, c0m13nd0 y b3b13nd0 y h4c13nd0 f13st4, p0r t0d0 4qu3l gr4n b0tín qu3 h4bí4n t0m4d0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s y d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 Judá. 17 Y l0s h1r1ó D4v1d d3sd3 4qu3ll4 m4ñ4n4 h4st4 l4 t4rd3 d3l dí4 s1gu13nt3; y n0 3sc4pó d3 3ll0s n1ngun0, s1n0 cu4tr0c13nt0s jóv3n3s qu3 m0nt4r0n s0br3 l0s c4m3ll0s y huy3r0n. 18 Y l1bró D4v1d t0d0 l0 qu3 l0s 4m4l3c1t4s h4bí4n t0m4d0, y 4s1m1sm0 l1b3rtó D4v1d 4 sus d0s muj3r3s. 19 Y n0 l3s f4ltó c0s4 4lgun4, ch1c4 n1 gr4nd3, 4sí d3 h1j0s c0m0 d3 h1j4s, d3l r0b0, y d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 l3s h4bí4n t0m4d0; t0d0 l0 r3cup3ró D4v1d. 20 T0mó t4mb1én D4v1d t0d4s l4s 0v3j4s y 3l g4n4d0 m4y0r; y tr4yénd0l0 t0d0 d3l4nt3, d3cí4n: 0st3 3s 3l b0tín d3 D4v1d. 

21 Y v1n0 D4v1d 4 l0s d0sc13nt0s h0mbr3s qu3 h4bí4n qu3d4d0 c4ns4d0s y n0 h4bí4n p0d1d0 s3gu1r 4 D4v1d, 4 l0s cu4l3s h4bí4n h3ch0 qu3d4r 3n 3l t0rr3nt3 d3 B3s0r; y 3ll0s s4l13r0n 4 r3c1b1r 4 D4v1d y 4l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4. Y cu4nd0 D4v1d ll3gó 4 l4 g3nt3, l3s s4ludó c0n p4z. 22 0nt0nc3s t0d0s l0s m4l0s y p3rv3rs0s d3 3ntr3 l0s qu3 h4bí4n 1d0 c0n D4v1d, r3sp0nd13r0n y d1j3r0n: P0rqu3 n0 fu3r0n c0n n0s0tr0s, n0 l3s d4r3m0s d3l b0tín qu3 h3m0s qu1t4d0, s1n0 4 c4d4 un0 su muj3r y sus h1j0s; qu3 l0s t0m3n y s3 v4y4n. 23 Y D4v1d d1j0: N0 h4gá1s 3s0, h3rm4n0s mí0s, d3 l0 qu3 n0s h4 d4d0 J3h0vá, qu13n n0s h4 gu4rd4d0, y h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n nu3str4 m4n0 4 l0s m3r0d34d0r3s qu3 v1n13r0n c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s. 24 ¿Y qu1én 0s 3scuch4rá 3n 3st3 c4s0? P3r0 4s43l n0 qu1s0 4p4rt4rs3 d3 3n p0s d3 él. 22 Y 4bn3r v0lv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 4s43l: 4párt4t3 d3 3n p0s d3 mí; ¿p0r qué h3 d3 h3r1rt3 h4st4 d3rr1b4rt3? ¿Cóm0 l3v4nt4rí4 y0 3nt0nc3s m1 r0str0 d3l4nt3 d3 J04b tu h3rm4n0? 23 Y n0 qu3r13nd0 él 1rs3, l0 h1r1ó 4bn3r c0n 3l r3g4tón d3 l4 l4nz4 p0r l4 qu1nt4 c0st1ll4, y l3 s4l1ó l4 l4nz4 p0r l4 3sp4ld4, y c4yó 4llí, y mur1ó 3n 4qu3l m1sm0 s1t10. Y t0d0s l0s qu3 v3ní4n p0r 4qu3l lug4r d0nd3 4s43l h4bí4 c4íd0 y 3st4b4 mu3rt0, s3 d3t3ní4n. 

24 M4s J04b y 4b1s41 s1gu13r0n 4 4bn3r; y s3 pus0 3l s0l cu4nd0 ll3g4r0n 4l c0ll4d0 d3 4mm4, qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 Gí4, junt0 4l c4m1n0 d3l d3s13rt0 d3 G4b4ón. 25 Y s3 junt4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín 3n p0s d3 4bn3r, f0rm4nd0 un s0l0 3jérc1t0; 3 h1c13r0n 4lt0 3n l4 cumbr3 d3l c0ll4d0. 26 Y 4bn3r d10 v0c3s 4 J04b, d1c13nd0: ¿C0nsum1rá l4 3sp4d4 p3rp3tu4m3nt3? ¿N0 s4b3s tú qu3 3l f1n4l s3rá 4m4rgur4? ¿H4st4 cuánd0 n0 d1rás 4l pu3bl0 qu3 s3 vu3lv4 d3 p3rs3gu1r 4 sus h3rm4n0s? 27 Y J04b r3sp0nd1ó: V1v3 D10s, qu3 s1 n0 hub13s3s h4bl4d0, 3l pu3bl0 hub13r4 d3j4d0 d3 s3gu1r 4 sus h3rm4n0s d3sd3 3st4 m4ñ4n4. 28 0nt0nc3s J04b t0có 3l cu3rn0, y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 s3 d3tuv0, y n0 p3rs1gu1ó más 4 l0s d3 1sr43l, n1 p3l3ó más. 

29 Y 4bn3r y l0s suy0s c4m1n4r0n p0r 3l 4r4bá t0d4 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, y p4s4nd0 3l J0rdán cruz4r0n p0r t0d0 B1trón y ll3g4r0n 4 M4h4n41m. 30 J04b t4mb1én v0lv1ó d3 p3rs3gu1r 4 4bn3r, y junt4nd0 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, f4lt4r0n d3 l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d d13c1nu3v3 h0mbr3s y 4s43l. 31 M4s l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d h1r13r0n d3 l0s d3 B3nj4mín y d3 l0s d3 4bn3r, 4 tr3sc13nt0s s3s3nt4 h0mbr3s, l0s cu4l3s mur13r0n. 32 T0m4r0n lu3g0 4 4s43l, y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n 3l s3pulcr0 d3 su p4dr3 3n B3lén. Y c4m1n4r0n t0d4 4qu3ll4 n0ch3 J04b y sus h0mbr3s, y l3s 4m4n3c1ó 3n H3brón. 

2 S4MU0L 3

1 Hub0 l4rg4 gu3rr4 3ntr3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl y l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d; p3r0 D4v1d s3 1b4 f0rt4l3c13nd0, y l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl s3 1b4 d3b1l1t4nd0. 

H1j0s d3 D4v1d n4c1d0s 3n H3brón

(1 Cr. 3.1-4)

2 Y n4c13r0n h1j0s 4 D4v1d 3n H3brón; su pr1m0gén1t0 fu3 4mnón, d3 4h1n04m j3zr33l1t4; 3 su s3gund0 Qu1l34b, d3 4b1g41l l4 muj3r d3 N4b4l 3l d3 C4rm3l; 3l t3rc3r0, 4bs4lón h1j0 d3 M44c4, h1j4 d3 T4lm41 r3y d3 G3sur; 4 3l cu4rt0, 4d0ní4s h1j0 d3 H4gu1t; 3l qu1nt0, S3f4tí4s h1j0 d3 4b1t4l; 5 3l s3xt0, 1tr34m, d3 0gl4 muj3r d3 D4v1d. 0st0s l3 n4c13r0n 4 D4v1d 3n H3brón. 

4bn3r p4ct4 c0n D4v1d 3n H3brón

6 C0m0 h4bí4 gu3rr4 3ntr3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl y l4 d3 D4v1d, 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 4bn3r s3 3sf0rz4b4 p0r l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl. 7 Y h4bí4 t3n1d0 S4úl un4 c0ncub1n4 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 R1zp4, h1j4 d3 4j4; y d1j0 1s-b0s3t 4 4bn3r: ¿P0r qué t3 h4s ll3g4d0 4 l4 c0ncub1n4 d3 m1 p4dr3? 8 Y s3 3n0jó 4bn3r 3n gr4n m4n3r4 p0r l4s p4l4br4s d3 1s-b0s3t, y d1j0: ¿S0y y0 c4b3z4 d3 p3rr0 qu3 p3rt3n3zc4 4 Judá? Y0 h3 h3ch0 h0y m1s3r1c0rd14 c0n l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl tu p4dr3, c0n sus h3rm4n0s y c0n sus 4m1g0s, y n0 t3 h3 3ntr3g4d0 3n m4n0 d3 D4v1d; ¿y tú m3 h4c3s h0y c4rg0 d3l p3c4d0 d3 3st4 muj3r? 9 4sí h4g4 D10s 4 4bn3r y 4un l3 4ñ4d4, s1 c0m0 h4 jur4d0 J3h0vá 4 D4v1d, n0 h4g4 y0 4sí c0n él, 10 tr4sl4d4nd0 3l r31n0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl, y c0nf1rm4nd0 3l tr0n0 d3 D4v1d s0br3 1sr43l y s0br3 Judá, d3sd3 D4n h4st4 B33rs3b4. 11 Y él n0 pud0 r3sp0nd3r p4l4br4 4 4bn3r, p0rqu3 l3 t3mí4. 

12 0nt0nc3s 3nv1ó 4bn3r m3ns4j3r0s 4 D4v1d d3 su p4rt3, d1c13nd0: ¿D3 qu1én 3s l4 t13rr4? Y qu3 l3 d1j3s3n: H4z p4ct0 c0nm1g0, y h3 4quí qu3 m1 m4n0 3st4rá c0nt1g0 p4r4 v0lv3r 4 t1 t0d0 1sr43l. 13 Y D4v1d d1j0: B13n; h4ré p4ct0 c0nt1g0, m4s un4 c0s4 t3 p1d0: N0 m3 v3ng4s 4 v3r s1n qu3 pr1m3r0 tr41g4s 4 M1c4l l4 h1j4 d3 S4úl, cu4nd0 v3ng4s 4 v3rm3. 14 D3spués d3 3st0 3nv1ó D4v1d m3ns4j3r0s 4 1s-b0s3t h1j0 d3 S4úl, d1c13nd0: R3st1túy3m3 m1 muj3r M1c4l, l4 cu4l d3sp0sé c0nm1g0 p0r c13n pr3puc10s d3 f1l1st30s. 15 0nt0nc3s 1s-b0s3t 3nv1ó y s3 l4 qu1tó 4 su m4r1d0 P4lt13l h1j0 d3 L41s. 16 Y su m4r1d0 fu3 c0n 3ll4, s1gu1énd0l4 y ll0r4nd0 h4st4 B4hur1m. Y l3 d1j0 4bn3r: 4nd4, vuélv3t3. 0nt0nc3s él s3 v0lv1ó. 

17 Y h4bló 4bn3r c0n l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: H4c3 y4 t13mp0 pr0cur4b41s qu3 D4v1d fu3s3 r3y s0br3 v0s0tr0s. 18 4h0r4, pu3s, h4c3dl0; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 h4bl4d0 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: P0r l4 m4n0 d3 m1 s13rv0 D4v1d l1br4ré 4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l d3 m4n0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y d3 m4n0 d3 t0d0s sus 3n3m1g0s. 19 H4bló t4mb1én 4bn3r 4 l0s d3 B3nj4mín; y fu3 t4mb1én 4bn3r 4 H3brón 4 d3c1r 4 D4v1d t0d0 l0 qu3 p4r3cí4 b13n 4 l0s d3 1sr43l y 4 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 B3nj4mín. 

20 V1n0, pu3s, 4bn3r 4 D4v1d 3n H3brón, y c0n él v31nt3 h0mbr3s; y D4v1d h1z0 b4nqu3t3 4 4bn3r y 4 l0s qu3 c0n él h4bí4n v3n1d0. 21 Y d1j0 4bn3r 4 D4v1d: Y0 m3 l3v4nt4ré 3 1ré, y junt4ré 4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y 4 t0d0 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 h4g4n c0nt1g0 p4ct0, y tú r31n3s c0m0 l0 d3s34 tu c0r4zón. D4v1d d3sp1d1ó lu3g0 4 4bn3r, y él s3 fu3 3n p4z. 

J04b m4t4 4 4bn3r

22 Y h3 4quí qu3 l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d y J04b v3ní4n d3l c4mp0, y tr4í4n c0ns1g0 gr4n b0tín. M4s 4bn3r n0 3st4b4 c0n D4v1d 3n H3brón, pu3s y4 l0 h4bí4 d3sp3d1d0, y él s3 h4bí4 1d0 3n p4z. 23 Y lu3g0 qu3 ll3gó J04b y t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4, fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 J04b, d1c13nd0: 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r h4 v3n1d0 4l r3y, y él l3 h4 d3sp3d1d0, y s3 fu3 3n p4z. 24 0nt0nc3s J04b v1n0 4l r3y, y l3 d1j0: ¿Qué h4s h3ch0? H3 4quí 4bn3r v1n0 4 t1; ¿p0r qué, pu3s, l3 d3j4st3 qu3 s3 fu3s3? 25 Tú c0n0c3s 4 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r. N0 h4 v3n1d0 s1n0 p4r4 3ng4ñ4rt3, y p4r4 3nt3r4rs3 d3 tu s4l1d4 y d3 tu 3ntr4d4, y p4r4 s4b3r t0d0 l0 qu3 tú h4c3s. 

26 Y s4l13nd0 J04b d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 D4v1d, 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s tr4s 4bn3r, l0s cu4l3s l3 h1c13r0n v0lv3r d3sd3 3l p0z0 d3 S1r4, s1n qu3 D4v1d l0 sup13r4. 27 Y cu4nd0 4bn3r v0lv1ó 4 H3brón, J04b l0 ll3vó 4p4rt3 3n m3d10 d3 l4 pu3rt4 p4r4 h4bl4r c0n él 3n s3cr3t0; y 4llí, 3n v3ng4nz4 d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 4s43l su h3rm4n0, l3 h1r1ó p0r l4 qu1nt4 c0st1ll4, y mur1ó. 28 Cu4nd0 D4v1d sup0 d3spués 3st0, d1j0: 1n0c3nt3 s0y y0 y m1 r31n0, d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 s13mpr3, d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r. 29 C41g4 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 J04b, y s0br3 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3; qu3 nunc4 f4lt3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J04b qu13n p4d3zc4 fluj0, n1 l3pr0s0, n1 qu13n 4nd3 c0n bácul0, n1 qu13n mu3r4 4 3sp4d4, n1 qu13n t3ng4 f4lt4 d3 p4n. 30 J04b, pu3s, y 4b1s41 su h3rm4n0, m4t4r0n 4 4bn3r, p0rqu3 él h4bí4 d4d0 mu3rt3 4 4s43l h3rm4n0 d3 3ll0s 3n l4 b4t4ll4 d3 G4b4ón. 

31 0nt0nc3s d1j0 D4v1d 4 J04b, y 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4: R4sg4d vu3str0s v3st1d0s, y c3ñí0s d3 c1l1c10, y h4c3d du3l0 d3l4nt3 d3 4bn3r. Y 3l r3y D4v1d 1b4 d3trás d3l fér3tr0. 32 Y s3pult4r0n 4 4bn3r 3n H3brón; y 4lz4nd0 3l r3y su v0z, ll0ró junt0 4l s3pulcr0 d3 4bn3r; y ll0ró t4mb1én t0d0 3l pu3bl0. 33 Y 3nd3ch4nd0 3l r3y 4l m1sm0 4bn3r, d3cí4: 


¿H4bí4 d3 m0r1r 4bn3r c0m0 mu3r3 un v1ll4n0? 
34 Tus m4n0s n0 3st4b4n 4t4d4s, n1 tus p13s l1g4d0s c0n gr1ll0s; 
C4íst3 c0m0 l0s qu3 c43n d3l4nt3 d3 m4l0s h0mbr3s. 

Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 v0lv1ó 4 ll0r4r s0br3 él. 35 0nt0nc3s t0d0 3l pu3bl0 v1n0 p4r4 p3rsu4d1r 4 D4v1d qu3 c0m13r4, 4nt3s qu3 4c4b4r4 3l dí4. M4s D4v1d juró d1c13nd0: 4sí m3 h4g4 D10s y 4un m3 4ñ4d4, s1 4nt3s qu3 s3 p0ng4 3l s0l gust4r3 y0 p4n, 0 cu4lqu13r4 0tr4 c0s4. 36 T0d0 3l pu3bl0 sup0 3st0, y l3 4gr4dó; pu3s t0d0 l0 qu3 3l r3y h4cí4 4gr4d4b4 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0. 37 Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 y t0d0 1sr43l 3nt3nd1ó 4qu3l dí4, qu3 n0 h4bí4 pr0c3d1d0 d3l r3y 3l m4t4r 4 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r. 38 T4mb1én d1j0 3l r3y 4 sus s13rv0s: ¿N0 s4bé1s qu3 un prínc1p3 y gr4nd3 h4 c4íd0 h0y 3n 1sr43l? 39 Y y0 s0y déb1l h0y, 4unqu3 ung1d0 r3y; y 3st0s h0mbr3s, l0s h1j0s d3 S4rv14, s0n muy dur0s p4r4 mí; J3h0vá dé 3l p4g0 4l qu3 m4l h4c3, c0nf0rm3 4 su m4ld4d. 

1s-b0s3t 3s 4s3s1n4d0

2 S4MU0L 4

1 Lu3g0 qu3 0yó 3l h1j0 d3 S4úl qu3 4bn3r h4bí4 s1d0 mu3rt0 3n H3brón, l4s m4n0s s3 l3 d3b1l1t4r0n, y fu3 4t3m0r1z4d0 t0d0 1sr43l. 2 Y 3l h1j0 d3 S4úl t3ní4 d0s h0mbr3s, c4p1t4n3s d3 b4nd4s d3 m3r0d34d0r3s; 3l n0mbr3 d3 un0 3r4 B44n4, y 3l d3l 0tr0, R3c4b, h1j0s d3 R1món b33r0t1t4, d3 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín (p0rqu3 B33r0t 3r4 t4mb1én c0nt4d0 c0n B3nj4mín, 3 pu3s l0s b33r0t1t4s h4bí4n hu1d0 4 G1t41m, y m0r4n 4llí c0m0 f0r4st3r0s h4st4 h0y). 

4 Y J0n4tán h1j0 d3 S4úl t3ní4 un h1j0 l1s14d0 d3 l0s p13s. T3ní4 c1nc0 4ñ0s d3 3d4d cu4nd0 ll3gó d3 J3zr33l l4 n0t1c14 d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 S4úl y d3 J0n4tán, y su n0dr1z4 l3 t0mó y huyó; y m13ntr4s 1b4 huy3nd0 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3, s3 l3 c4yó 3l n1ñ0 y qu3dó c0j0. Su n0mbr3 3r4 M3f1-b0s3t. 

5 L0s h1j0s, pu3s, d3 R1món b33r0t1t4, R3c4b y B44n4, fu3r0n y 3ntr4r0n 3n 3l m4y0r c4l0r d3l dí4 3n c4s4 d3 1s-b0s3t, 3l cu4l 3st4b4 durm13nd0 l4 s13st4 3n su cám4r4. 6 Y h3 4quí l4 p0rt3r4 d3 l4 c4s4 h4bí4 3st4d0 l1mp14nd0 tr1g0, p3r0 s3 durm1ó; y fu3 4sí c0m0 R3c4b y B44n4 su h3rm4n0 s3 1ntr0duj3r0n 3n l4 c4s4. 7 Cu4nd0 3ntr4r0n 3n l4 c4s4, 1s=b0s3t d0rmí4 s0br3 su l3ch0 3n su cám4r4; y l0 h1r13r0n y l0 m4t4r0n, y l3 c0rt4r0n l4 c4b3z4, y h4b1énd0l4 t0m4d0, c4m1n4r0n t0d4 l4 n0ch3 p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3l 4r4bá. 8 Y tr4j3r0n l4 c4b3z4 d3 1s-b0s3t 4 D4v1d 3n H3brón, y d1j3r0n 4l r3y: H3 4quí l4 c4b3z4 d3 1s-b0s3t h1j0 d3 S4úl tu 3n3m1g0, qu3 pr0cur4b4 m4t4rt3; y J3h0vá h4 v3ng4d0 h0y 4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, d3 S4úl y d3 su l1n4j3. 9 Y D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó 4 R3c4b y 4 su h3rm4n0 B44n4, h1j0s d3 R1món b33r0t1t4, y l3s d1j0: V1v3 J3h0vá qu3 h4 r3d1m1d0 m1 4lm4 d3 t0d4 4ngust14, 10 qu3 cu4nd0 un0 m3 d10 nu3v4s, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí S4úl h4 mu3rt0, 1m4g1nánd0s3 qu3 tr4í4 bu3n4s nu3v4s, y0 l0 pr3ndí, y l3 m4té 3n S1cl4g 3n p4g0 d3 l4 nu3v4. 11 ¿Cuánt0 más 4 l0s m4l0s h0mbr3s qu3 m4t4r0n 4 un h0mbr3 just0 3n su c4s4, y s0br3 su c4m4? 4h0r4, pu3s, ¿n0 h3 d3 d3m4nd4r y0 su s4ngr3 d3 vu3str4s m4n0s, y qu1t4r0s d3 l4 t13rr4? 12 0nt0nc3s D4v1d 0rd3nó 4 sus s3rv1d0r3s, y 3ll0s l0s m4t4r0n, y l3s c0rt4r0n l4s m4n0s y l0s p13s, y l0s c0lg4r0n s0br3 3l 3st4nqu3 3n H3brón. Lu3g0 t0m4r0n l4 c4b3z4 d3 1s- b0s3t, y l4 3nt3rr4r0n 3n 3l s3pulcr0 d3 4bn3r 3n H3brón. 

D4v1d 3s pr0cl4m4d0 r3y d3 1sr43l

(1 Cr. 11.1-3)

2 S4MU0L 5

1 V1n13r0n t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l 4 D4v1d 3n H3brón y h4bl4r0n, d1c13nd0: H3n0s 4quí, hu3s0 tuy0 y c4rn3 tuy4 s0m0s. 2 Y 4un 4nt3s d3 4h0r4, cu4nd0 S4úl r31n4b4 s0br3 n0s0tr0s, 3r4s tú qu13n s4c4b4s 4 1sr43l 4 l4 gu3rr4, y l0 v0lví4s 4 tr43r. 4d3más J3h0vá t3 h4 d1ch0: Tú 4p4c3nt4rás 4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, y tú s3rás prínc1p3 s0br3 1sr43l. 3 V1n13r0n, pu3s, t0d0s l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l 4l r3y 3n H3brón, y 3l r3y D4v1d h1z0 p4ct0 c0n 3ll0s 3n H3brón d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; y ung13r0n 4 D4v1d p0r r3y s0br3 1sr43l. 4 0r4 D4v1d d3 tr31nt4 4ñ0s cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y r31nó cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s. 5 0n H3brón r31nó s0br3 Judá s13t3 4ñ0s y s31s m3s3s, y 3n J3rus4lén r31nó tr31nt4 y tr3s 4ñ0s s0br3 t0d0 1sr43l y Judá. 

D4v1d t0m4 l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3 S10n

(1 Cr. 11.4-9)

6 0nt0nc3s m4rchó 3l r3y c0n sus h0mbr3s 4 J3rus4lén c0ntr4 l0s j3bus30s qu3 m0r4b4n 3n 4qu3ll4 t13rr4; l0s cu4l3s h4bl4r0n 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: Tú n0 3ntr4rás 4cá, pu3s 4un l0s c13g0s y l0s c0j0s t3 3ch4rán (qu3r13nd0 d3c1r: D4v1d n0 pu3d3 3ntr4r 4cá). 7 P3r0 D4v1d t0mó l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3 S10n, l4 cu4l 3s l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d. 8 Y d1j0 D4v1d 4qu3l dí4: T0d0 3l qu3 h13r4 4 l0s j3bus30s, sub4 p0r 3l c4n4l y h13r4 4 l0s c0j0s y c13g0s 4b0rr3c1d0s d3l 4lm4 d3 D4v1d. H1r4m 3nví4 3mb4j4d0r3s 4 D4v1d

(1 Cr. 14.1-2)

1 D4v1d v0lv1ó 4 r3un1r 4 t0d0s l0s 3sc0g1d0s d3 1sr43l, tr31nt4 m1l. 2 Y s3 l3v4ntó D4v1d y p4rt1ó d3 B44l4 d3 Judá c0n t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 t3ní4 c0ns1g0, p4r4 h4c3r p4s4r d3 4llí 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s, s0br3 l4 cu4l 3r4 1nv0c4d0 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, qu3 m0r4 3ntr3 l0s qu3rub1n3s. 3 Pus13r0n 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s s0br3 un c4rr0 nu3v0, y l4 ll3v4r0n d3 l4 c4s4 d3 4b1n4d4b, qu3 3st4b4 3n 3l c0ll4d0; y Uz4 y 4hí0, h1j0s d3 4b1n4d4b, gu14b4n 3l c4rr0 nu3v0. 4 Y cu4nd0 l0 ll3v4b4n d3 l4 c4s4 d3 4b1n4d4b, qu3 3st4b4 3n 3l c0ll4d0, c0n 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s, 4hí0 1b4 d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4. 5 Y D4v1d y t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l d4nz4b4n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá c0n t0d4 cl4s3 d3 1nstrum3nt0s d3 m4d3r4 d3 h4y4; c0n 4rp4s, s4lt3r10s, p4nd3r0s, fl4ut4s y címb4l0s.

12 Fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4l r3y D4v1d, d1c13nd0: J3h0vá h4 b3nd3c1d0 l4 c4s4 d3 0b3d-3d0m y t0d0 l0 qu3 t13n3, 4 c4us4 d3l 4rc4 d3 D10s. 0nt0nc3s D4v1d fu3, y ll3vó c0n 4l3grí4 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s d3 c4s4 d3 0b3d-3d0m 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d. 13 Y cu4nd0 l0s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s h4bí4n 4nd4d0 s31s p4s0s, él s4cr1f1có un bu3y y un c4rn3r0 3ng0rd4d0. 14 Y D4v1d d4nz4b4 c0n t0d4 su fu3rz4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; y 3st4b4 D4v1d v3st1d0 c0n un 3f0d d3 l1n0. 15 4sí D4v1d y t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l c0nducí4n 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá c0n júb1l0 y s0n1d0 d3 tr0mp3t4. 

16 Cu4nd0 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá ll3gó 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 M1c4l h1j4 d3 S4úl m1ró d3sd3 un4 v3nt4n4, y v10 4l r3y D4v1d qu3 s4lt4b4 y d4nz4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; y l3 m3n0spr3c1ó 3n su c0r4zón. 17 M3t13r0n, pu3s, 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, y l4 pus13r0n 3n su lug4r 3n m3d10 d3 un4 t13nd4 qu3 D4v1d l3 h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0; y s4cr1f1có D4v1d h0l0c4ust0s y 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 18 Y cu4nd0 D4v1d h4bí4 4c4b4d0 d3 0fr3c3r l0s h0l0c4ust0s y 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z, b3nd1j0 4l pu3bl0 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 19 Y r3p4rt1ó 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, y 4 t0d4 l4 mult1tud d3 1sr43l, 4sí 4 h0mbr3s c0m0 4 muj3r3s, 4 c4d4 un0 un p4n, y un p3d4z0 d3 c4rn3 y un4 t0rt4 d3 p4s4s. 20 V0lv1ó lu3g0 D4v1d p4r4 b3nd3c1r su c4s4; y s4l13nd0 M1c4l 4 r3c1b1r 4 D4v1d, d1j0: ¡Cuán h0nr4d0 h4 qu3d4d0 h0y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l, d3scubr1énd0s3 h0y d3l4nt3 d3 l4s cr14d4s d3 sus s13rv0s, c0m0 s3 d3scubr3 s1n d3c0r0 un cu4lqu13r4! 21 0nt0nc3s D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó 4 M1c4l: Fu3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, qu13n m3 3l1g1ó 3n pr3f3r3nc14 4 tu p4dr3 y 4 t0d4 tu c4s4, p4r4 c0nst1tu1rm3 p0r prínc1p3 s0br3 3l pu3bl0 d3 J3h0vá, s0br3 1sr43l. P0r t4nt0, d4nz4ré d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 22 Y 4un m3 h4ré más v1l qu3 3st4 v3z, y s3ré b4j0 4 tus 0j0s; p3r0 s3ré h0nr4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 l4s cr14d4s d3 qu13n3s h4s h4bl4d0. 23 Y M1c4l h1j4 d3 S4úl nunc4 tuv0 h1j0s h4st4 3l dí4 d3 su mu3rt3.

1 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 y4 3l r3y h4b1t4b4 3n su c4s4, d3spués qu3 J3h0vá l3 h4bí4 d4d0 r3p0s0 d3 t0d0s sus 3n3m1g0s 3n d3rr3d0r, 2 d1j0 3l r3y 4l pr0f3t4 N4tán: M1r4 4h0r4, y0 h4b1t0 3n c4s4 d3 c3dr0, y 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s 3stá 3ntr3 c0rt1n4s. 3 Y N4tán d1j0 4l r3y: 4nd4, y h4z t0d0 l0 qu3 3stá 3n tu c0r4zón, p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3stá c0nt1g0. 

4 4c0nt3c1ó 4qu3ll4 n0ch3, qu3 v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 N4tán, d1c13nd0: 5 V3 y d1 4 m1 s13rv0 D4v1d: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: ¿Tú m3 h4s d3 3d1f1c4r c4s4 3n qu3 y0 m0r3? 6 C13rt4m3nt3 n0 h3 h4b1t4d0 3n c4s4s d3sd3 3l dí4 3n qu3 s4qué 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 0g1pt0 h4st4 h0y, s1n0 qu3 h3 4nd4d0 3n t13nd4 y 3n t4b3rnácul0. 7 Y 3n t0d0 cu4nt0 h3 4nd4d0 c0n t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, ¿h3 h4bl4d0 y0 p4l4br4 4 4lgun4 d3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, 4 qu13n h4y4 m4nd4d0 4p4c3nt4r 4 m1 pu3bl0 d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: ¿P0r qué n0 m3 h4bé1s 3d1f1c4d0 c4s4 d3 c3dr0? 8 4h0r4, pu3s, d1rás 4sí 4 m1 s13rv0 D4v1d: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: Y0 t3 t0mé d3l r3d1l, d3 d3trás d3 l4s 0v3j4s, p4r4 qu3 fu3s3s prínc1p3 s0br3 m1 pu3bl0, s0br3 1sr43l; 9 y h3 3st4d0 c0nt1g0 3n t0d0 cu4nt0 h4s 4nd4d0, y d3l4nt3 d3 t1 h3 d3stru1d0 4 t0d0s tus 3n3m1g0s, y t3 h3 d4d0 n0mbr3 gr4nd3, c0m0 3l n0mbr3 d3 l0s gr4nd3s qu3 h4y 3n l4 t13rr4. 10 4d3más, y0 f1j4ré lug4r 4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l y l0 pl4nt4ré, p4r4 qu3 h4b1t3 3n su lug4r y nunc4 más s34 r3m0v1d0, n1 l0s 1n1cu0s l3 4fl1j4n más, c0m0 4l pr1nc1p10, 11 d3sd3 3l dí4 3n qu3 pus3 ju3c3s s0br3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l; y 4 t1 t3 d4ré d3sc4ns0 d3 t0d0s tus 3n3m1g0s. 4s1m1sm0 J3h0vá t3 h4c3 s4b3r qu3 él t3 h4rá c4s4. 12 Y cu4nd0 tus dí4s s34n cumpl1d0s, y du3rm4s c0n tus p4dr3s, y0 l3v4nt4ré d3spués d3 t1 4 un0 d3 tu l1n4j3, 3l cu4l pr0c3d3rá d3 tus 3ntr4ñ4s, y 4f1rm4ré su r31n0. 13 0l 3d1f1c4rá c4s4 4 m1 n0mbr3, y y0 4f1rm4ré p4r4 s13mpr3 3l tr0n0 d3 su r31n0. 14 Y0 l3 s3ré 4 él p4dr3, y él m3 s3rá 4 mí h1j0. Y s1 él h1c13r3 m4l, y0 l3 c4st1g4ré c0n v4r4 d3 h0mbr3s, y c0n 4z0t3s d3 h1j0s d3 h0mbr3s; 15 p3r0 m1 m1s3r1c0rd14 n0 s3 4p4rt4rá d3 él c0m0 l4 4p4rté d3 S4úl, 4l cu4l qu1té d3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 16 Y s3rá 4f1rm4d4 tu c4s4 y tu r31n0 p4r4 s13mpr3 d3l4nt3 d3 tu r0str0, y tu tr0n0 s3rá 3st4bl3 3t3rn4m3nt3. 17 C0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s, y c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4 3st4 v1s1ón, 4sí h4bló N4tán 4 D4v1d. 

18 Y 3ntró 3l r3y D4v1d y s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y d1j0: S3ñ0r J3h0vá, ¿qu1én s0y y0, y qué 3s m1 c4s4, p4r4 qu3 tú m3 h4y4s tr4íd0 h4st4 4quí? 19 Y 4un t3 h4 p4r3c1d0 p0c0 3st0, S3ñ0r J3h0vá, pu3s t4mb1én h4s h4bl4d0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu s13rv0 3n l0 p0r v3n1r. ¿0s 4sí c0m0 pr0c3d3 3l h0mbr3, S3ñ0r J3h0vá? 20 ¿Y qué más pu3d3 4ñ4d1r D4v1d h4bl4nd0 c0nt1g0? Pu3s tú c0n0c3s 4 tu s13rv0, S3ñ0r J3h0vá. 21 T0d4s 3st4s gr4nd3z4s h4s h3ch0 p0r tu p4l4br4 y c0nf0rm3 4 tu c0r4zón, h4c1énd0l4s s4b3r 4 tu s13rv0. 22 P0r t4nt0, tú t3 h4s 3ngr4nd3c1d0, J3h0vá D10s; p0r cu4nt0 n0 h4y c0m0 tú, n1 h4y D10s fu3r4 d3 t1, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 h3m0s 0íd0 c0n nu3str0s 0íd0s. 23 ¿Y qu1én c0m0 tu pu3bl0, c0m0 1sr43l, n4c1ón s1ngul4r 3n l4 t13rr4? P0rqu3 fu3 D10s p4r4 r3sc4t4rl0 p0r pu3bl0 suy0, y p4r4 p0n3rl3 n0mbr3, y p4r4 h4c3r gr4nd3z4s 4 su f4v0r, y 0br4s t3rr1bl3s 4 tu t13rr4, p0r 4m0r d3 tu pu3bl0 qu3 r3sc4t4st3 p4r4 t1 d3 0g1pt0, d3 l4s n4c10n3s y d3 sus d10s3s. 24 P0rqu3 tú 3st4bl3c1st3 4 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l p0r pu3bl0 tuy0 p4r4 s13mpr3; y tú, 0h J3h0vá, fu1st3 4 3ll0s p0r D10s. 25 4h0r4 pu3s, J3h0vá D10s, c0nf1rm4 p4r4 s13mpr3 l4 p4l4br4 qu3 h4s h4bl4d0 s0br3 tu s13rv0 y s0br3 su c4s4, y h4z c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 h4s d1ch0. 26 Qu3 s34 3ngr4nd3c1d0 tu n0mbr3 p4r4 s13mpr3, y s3 d1g4: J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 3s D10s s0br3 1sr43l; y qu3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu s13rv0 D4v1d s34 f1rm3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 27 P0rqu3 tú, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l, r3v3l4st3 4l 0íd0 d3 tu s13rv0, d1c13nd0: Y0 t3 3d1f1c4ré c4s4. P0r 3st0 tu s13rv0 h4 h4ll4d0 3n su c0r4zón v4l0r p4r4 h4c3r d3l4nt3 d3 t1 3st4 súpl1c4. 28 4h0r4 pu3s, J3h0vá D10s, tú 3r3s D10s, y tus p4l4br4s s0n v3rd4d, y tú h4s pr0m3t1d0 3st3 b13n 4 tu s13rv0. 29 T3n 4h0r4 4 b13n b3nd3c1r l4 c4s4 d3 tu s13rv0, p4r4 qu3 p3rm4n3zc4 p3rp3tu4m3nt3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, p0rqu3 tú, J3h0vá D10s, l0 h4s d1ch0, y c0n tu b3nd1c1ón s3rá b3nd1t4 l4 c4s4 d3 tu s13rv0 p4r4 s13mpr3.

1 D1j0 D4v1d: ¿H4 qu3d4d0 4lgun0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl, 4 qu13n h4g4 y0 m1s3r1c0rd14 p0r 4m0r d3 J0n4tán? 2 Y h4bí4 un s13rv0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 S1b4, 4l cu4l ll4m4r0n p4r4 qu3 v1n13s3 4 D4v1d. M3f1-b0s3t, d1j0 3l r3y, c0m3rá 4 m1 m3s4, c0m0 un0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3l r3y. 12 Y t3ní4 M3f1-b0s3t un h1j0 p3qu3ñ0, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 M1c4í4. Y 3nv1ó D4v1d sus s13rv0s p4r4 c0ns0l4rl0 p0r su p4dr3. M4s ll3g4d0s l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, 3 l0s prínc1p3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món d1j3r0n 4 H4nún su s3ñ0r: ¿T3 p4r3c3 qu3 p0r h0nr4r D4v1d 4 tu p4dr3 t3 h4 3nv14d0 c0ns0l4d0r3s? ¿N0 h4 3nv14d0 D4v1d sus s13rv0s 4 t1 p4r4 r3c0n0c3r 3 1nsp3cc10n4r l4 c1ud4d, p4r4 d3stru1rl4? 4 0nt0nc3s H4nún t0mó l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d, l3s r4pó l4 m1t4d d3 l4 b4rb4, l3s c0rtó l0s v3st1d0s p0r l4 m1t4d h4st4 l4s n4lg4s, y l0s d3sp1d1ó. 5 Cu4nd0 s3 l3 h1z0 s4b3r 3st0 4 D4v1d, 3nv1ó 4 3nc0ntr4rl3s, p0rqu3 3ll0s 3st4b4n 3n 3xtr3m0 4v3rg0nz4d0s; y 3l r3y m4ndó qu3 l3s d1j3r4n: Qu3d40s 3n J3r1có h4st4 qu3 0s vu3lv4 4 n4c3r l4 b4rb4, y 3nt0nc3s v0lv3d.
