9 V13nd0, pu3s, J04b qu3 s3 l3 pr3s3nt4b4 l4 b4t4ll4 d3 fr3nt3 y 4 l4 r3t4gu4rd14, 3ntr3s4có d3 t0d0s l0s 3sc0g1d0s d3 1sr43l, y s3 pus0 3n 0rd3n d3 b4t4ll4 c0ntr4 l0s s1r10s. 10 0ntr3gó lu3g0 3l r3st0 d3l 3jérc1t0 3n m4n0 d3 4b1s41 su h3rm4n0, y l0 4l1n3ó p4r4 3nc0ntr4r 4 l0s 4m0n1t4s. 11 Y d1j0: S1 l0s s1r10s pud13r3n más qu3 y0, tú m3 4yud4rás; y s1 l0s h1j0s d3 4món pud13r3n más qu3 tú, y0 t3 d4ré 4yud4. 12 0sfuérz4t3, y 3sf0rcém0n0s p0r nu3str0 pu3bl0, y p0r l4s c1ud4d3s d3 nu3str0 D10s; y h4g4 J3h0vá l0 qu3 b13n l3 p4r3c13r3. 13 Y s3 4c3rcó J04b, y 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4, p4r4 p3l34r c0ntr4 l0s s1r10s; m4s 3ll0s huy3r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 14 0nt0nc3s l0s h1j0s d3 4món, v13nd0 qu3 l0s s1r10s h4bí4n hu1d0, huy3r0n t4mb1én 3ll0s d3l4nt3 d3 4b1s41, y s3 r3fug14r0n 3n l4 c1ud4d. S3 v0lv1ó, pu3s, J04b d3 luch4r c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y v1n0 4 J3rus4lén. 

15 P3r0 l0s s1r10s, v13nd0 qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 d3rr0t4d0s p0r 1sr43l, s3 v0lv13r0n 4 r3un1r. 16 Y 3nv1ó H4d4d-3z3r 3 h1z0 s4l1r 4 l0s s1r10s qu3 3st4b4n 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l 0ufr4t3s, l0s cu4l3s v1n13r0n 4 H3l4m, ll3v4nd0 p0r j3f3 4 S0b4c, g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 H4d4d-3z3r. 17 Cu4nd0 fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 D4v1d, r3un1ó 4 t0d0 1sr43l, y p4s4nd0 3l J0rdán v1n0 4 H3l4m; y l0s s1r10s s3 pus13r0n 3n 0rd3n d3 b4t4ll4 c0ntr4 D4v1d y p3l34r0n c0ntr4 él. 18 M4s l0s s1r10s huy3r0n d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l; y D4v1d m4tó d3 l0s s1r10s 4 l4 g3nt3 d3 s3t3c13nt0s c4rr0s, y cu4r3nt4 m1l h0mbr3s d3 4 c4b4ll0; h1r1ó t4mb1én 4 S0b4c g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0, qu13n mur1ó 4llí. 19 V13nd0, pu3s, t0d0s l0s r3y3s qu3 4yud4b4n 4 H4d4d-3z3r, cóm0 h4bí4n s1d0 d3rr0t4d0s d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l, h1c13r0n p4z c0n 1sr43l y l3 s1rv13r0n; y d3 4llí 3n 4d3l4nt3 l0s s1r10s t3m13r0n 4yud4r más 4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 

D4v1d y B3ts4bé

2 S4MU0L 11

1 4c0nt3c1ó 4l 4ñ0 s1gu13nt3, 3n 3l t13mp0 qu3 s4l3n l0s r3y3s 4 l4 gu3rr4, qu3 D4v1d 3nv1ó 4 J04b, y c0n él 4 sus s13rv0s y 4 t0d0 1sr43l, y d3struy3r0n 4 l0s 4m0n1t4s, y s1t14r0n 4 R4bá; p3r0 D4v1d s3 qu3dó 3n J3rus4lén. 

2 Y suc3d1ó un dí4, 4l c43r l4 t4rd3, qu3 s3 l3v4ntó D4v1d d3 su l3ch0 y s3 p4s34b4 s0br3 3l t3rr4d0 d3 l4 c4s4 r34l; y v10 d3sd3 3l t3rr4d0 4 un4 muj3r qu3 s3 3st4b4 b4ñ4nd0, l4 cu4l 3r4 muy h3rm0s4. 3 0nv1ó D4v1d 4 pr3gunt4r p0r 4qu3ll4 muj3r, y l3 d1j3r0n: 4qu3ll4 3s B3ts4bé h1j4 d3 0l14m, muj3r d3 Urí4s h3t30. 4 Y 3nv1ó D4v1d m3ns4j3r0s, y l4 t0mó; y v1n0 4 él, y él durm1ó c0n 3ll4. Lu3g0 3ll4 s3 pur1f1có d3 su 1nmund1c14, y s3 v0lv1ó 4 su c4s4. 5 Y c0nc1b1ó l4 muj3r, y 3nv1ó 4 h4c3rl0 s4b3r 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: 0st0y 3nc1nt4. 

6 0nt0nc3s D4v1d 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 J04b: 0nví4m3 4 Urí4s h3t30. Y J04b 3nv1ó 4 Urí4s 4 D4v1d. 7 Cu4nd0 Urí4s v1n0 4 él, D4v1d l3 pr3guntó p0r l4 s4lud d3 J04b, y p0r l4 s4lud d3l pu3bl0, y p0r 3l 3st4d0 d3 l4 gu3rr4. 8 D3spués d1j0 D4v1d 4 Urí4s: D3sc13nd3 4 tu c4s4, y l4v4 tus p13s. Y s4l13nd0 Urí4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, l3 fu3 3nv14d0 pr3s3nt3 d3 l4 m3s4 r34l. 9 M4s Urí4s durm1ó 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y c0n t0d0s l0s s13rv0s d3 su s3ñ0r, y n0 d3sc3nd1ó 4 su c4s4. 10 0 h1c13r0n s4b3r 3st0 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: Urí4s n0 h4 d3sc3nd1d0 4 su c4s4. Y d1j0 D4v1d 4 Urí4s: ¿N0 h4s v3n1d0 d3 c4m1n0? ¿P0r qué, pu3s, n0 d3sc3nd1st3 4 tu c4s4? 11 Y Urí4s r3sp0nd1ó 4 D4v1d: 0l 4rc4 3 1sr43l y Judá 3stán b4j0 t13nd4s, y m1 s3ñ0r J04b, y l0s s13rv0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r, 3n 3l c4mp0; ¿y h4bí4 y0 d3 3ntr4r 3n m1 c4s4 p4r4 c0m3r y b3b3r, y 4 d0rm1r c0n m1 muj3r? P0r v1d4 tuy4, y p0r v1d4 d3 tu 4lm4, qu3 y0 n0 h4ré t4l c0s4. 12 Y D4v1d d1j0 4 Urí4s: Quéd4t3 4quí 4ún h0y, y m4ñ4n4 t3 d3sp4ch4ré. Y s3 qu3dó Urí4s 3n J3rus4lén 4qu3l dí4 y 3l s1gu13nt3. 13 Y D4v1d l0 c0nv1dó 4 c0m3r y 4 b3b3r c0n él, h4st4 3mbr14g4rl0. Y él s4l1ó 4 l4 t4rd3 4 d0rm1r 3n su c4m4 c0n l0s s13rv0s d3 su s3ñ0r; m4s n0 d3sc3nd1ó 4 su c4s4. 

14 V3n1d4 l4 m4ñ4n4, 3scr1b1ó D4v1d 4 J04b un4 c4rt4, l4 cu4l 3nv1ó p0r m4n0 d3 Urí4s. 15 Y 3scr1b1ó 3n l4 c4rt4, d1c13nd0: P0n3d 4 Urí4s 4l fr3nt3, 3n l0 más r3c10 d3 l4 b4t4ll4, y r3t1r40s d3 él, p4r4 qu3 s34 h3r1d0 y mu3r4. 16 4sí fu3 qu3 cu4nd0 J04b s1t1ó l4 c1ud4d, pus0 4 Urí4s 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 s4bí4 qu3 3st4b4n l0s h0mbr3s más v4l13nt3s. 17 Y s4l13nd0 lu3g0 l0s d3 l4 c1ud4d, p3l34r0n c0ntr4 J04b, y c4y3r0n 4lgun0s d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d; y mur1ó t4mb1én Urí4s h3t30. 18 0nt0nc3s 3nv1ó J04b 3 h1z0 s4b3r 4 D4v1d t0d0s l0s 4sunt0s d3 l4 gu3rr4. 19 Y m4ndó 4l m3ns4j3r0, d1c13nd0: Cu4nd0 4c4b3s d3 c0nt4r 4l r3y t0d0s l0s 4sunt0s d3 l4 gu3rr4, 20 s1 3l r3y c0m3nz4r3 4 3n0j4rs3, y t3 d1j3r3: ¿P0r qué 0s 4c3rc4st31s d3m4s14d0 4 l4 c1ud4d p4r4 c0mb4t1r? ¿N0 s4bí41s l0 qu3 su3l3n 4rr0j4r d3sd3 3l mur0? 21 ¿Qu1én h1r1ó 4 4b1m3l3c h1j0 d3 J3r0b44l? ¿N0 3chó un4 muj3r d3l mur0 un p3d4z0 d3 un4 ru3d4 d3 m0l1n0, y mur1ó 3n T3b3s? ¿P0r qué 0s 4c3rc4st31s t4nt0 4l mur0? 0nt0nc3s tú l3 d1rás: T4mb1én tu s13rv0 Urí4s h3t30 3s mu3rt0. 

22 Fu3 3l m3ns4j3r0, y ll3g4nd0, c0ntó 4 D4v1d t0d0 4qu3ll0 4 qu3 J04b l3 h4bí4 3nv14d0. 23 Y d1j0 3l m3ns4j3r0 4 D4v1d: Pr3v4l3c13r0n c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s l0s h0mbr3s qu3 s4l13r0n c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s 4l c4mp0, b13n qu3 n0s0tr0s l3s h1c1m0s r3tr0c3d3r h4st4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4; 24 p3r0 l0s fl3ch3r0s t1r4r0n c0ntr4 tus s13rv0s d3sd3 3l mur0, y mur13r0n 4lgun0s d3 l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y; y mur1ó t4mb1én tu s13rv0 Urí4s h3t30. 25 Y D4v1d d1j0 4l m3ns4j3r0: 4sí d1rás 4 J04b: N0 t3ng4s p3s4r p0r 3st0, p0rqu3 l4 3sp4d4 c0nsum3, 0r4 4 un0, 0r4 4 0tr0; r3fu3rz4 tu 4t4qu3 c0ntr4 l4 c1ud4d, h4st4 qu3 l4 r1nd4s. Y tú 4l1ént4l3. 

26 0y3nd0 l4 muj3r d3 Urí4s qu3 su m4r1d0 Urí4s 3r4 mu3rt0, h1z0 du3l0 p0r su m4r1d0. 27 Y p4s4d0 3l lut0, 3nv1ó D4v1d y l4 tr4j0 4 su c4s4; y fu3 3ll4 su muj3r, y l3 d10 4 luz un h1j0. M4s 3st0 qu3 D4v1d h4bí4 h3ch0, fu3 d3s4gr4d4bl3 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá. 

N4tán 4m0n3st4 4 D4v1d

2 S4MU0L 12

1 J3h0vá 3nv1ó 4 N4tán 4 D4v1d; y v1n13nd0 4 él, l3 d1j0: H4bí4 d0s h0mbr3s 3n un4 c1ud4d, 3l un0 r1c0, y 3l 0tr0 p0br3. 2 0l r1c0 t3ní4 num3r0s4s 0v3j4s y v4c4s; 3 p3r0 3l p0br3 n0 t3ní4 más qu3 un4 s0l4 c0rd3r1t4, qu3 él h4bí4 c0mpr4d0 y cr14d0, y qu3 h4bí4 cr3c1d0 c0n él y c0n sus h1j0s junt4m3nt3, c0m13nd0 d3 su b0c4d0 y b3b13nd0 d3 su v4s0, y durm13nd0 3n su s3n0; y l4 t3ní4 c0m0 4 un4 h1j4. 4 Y v1n0 un0 d3 c4m1n0 4l h0mbr3 r1c0; y ést3 n0 qu1s0 t0m4r d3 sus 0v3j4s y d3 sus v4c4s, p4r4 gu1s4r p4r4 3l c4m1n4nt3 qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 4 él, s1n0 qu3 t0mó l4 0v3j4 d3 4qu3l h0mbr3 p0br3, y l4 pr3p4ró p4r4 4qu3l qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 4 él. 5 0nt0nc3s s3 3nc3nd1ó 3l fur0r d3 D4v1d 3n gr4n m4n3r4 c0ntr4 4qu3l h0mbr3, y d1j0 4 N4tán: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 3l qu3 t4l h1z0 3s d1gn0 d3 mu3rt3. 6 Y d3b3 p4g4r l4 c0rd3r4 c0n cu4tr0 t4nt0s, p0rqu3 h1z0 t4l c0s4, y n0 tuv0 m1s3r1c0rd14. 

7 0nt0nc3s d1j0 N4tán 4 D4v1d: Tú 3r3s 4qu3l h0mbr3. 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, D10s d3 1sr43l: Y0 t3 ungí p0r r3y s0br3 1sr43l, y t3 l1bré d3 l4 m4n0 d3 S4úl, 8 y t3 d1 l4 c4s4 d3 tu s3ñ0r, y l4s muj3r3s d3 tu s3ñ0r 3n tu s3n0; 4d3más t3 d1 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l y d3 Judá; y s1 3st0 fu3r4 p0c0, t3 h4brí4 4ñ4d1d0 much0 más. 9 ¿P0r qué, pu3s, tuv1st3 3n p0c0 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, h4c13nd0 l0 m4l0 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 0j0s? 4 Urí4s h3t30 h3r1st3 4 3sp4d4, y t0m4st3 p0r muj3r 4 su muj3r, y 4 él l0 m4t4st3 c0n l4 3sp4d4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 10 P0r l0 cu4l 4h0r4 n0 s3 4p4rt4rá j4más d3 tu c4s4 l4 3sp4d4, p0r cu4nt0 m3 m3n0spr3c14st3, y t0m4st3 l4 muj3r d3 Urí4s h3t30 p4r4 qu3 fu3s3 tu muj3r. 11 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí y0 h4ré l3v4nt4r 3l m4l s0br3 t1 d3 tu m1sm4 c4s4, y t0m4ré tus muj3r3s d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s, y l4s d4ré 4 tu prój1m0, 3l cu4l y4c3rá c0n tus muj3r3s 4 l4 v1st4 d3l s0l. 12 P0rqu3 tú l0 h1c1st3 3n s3cr3t0; m4s y0 h4ré 3st0 d3l4nt3 d3 t0d0 1sr43l y 4 pl3n0 s0l. 13 0nt0nc3s d1j0 D4v1d 4 N4tán: P3qué c0ntr4 J3h0vá. Y N4tán d1j0 4 D4v1d: T4mb1én J3h0vá h4 r3m1t1d0 tu p3c4d0; n0 m0r1rás. 14 M4s p0r cu4nt0 c0n 3st3 4sunt0 h1c1st3 bl4sf3m4r 4 l0s 3n3m1g0s d3 J3h0vá, 3l h1j0 qu3 t3 h4 n4c1d0 c13rt4m3nt3 m0r1rá. 15 Y N4tán s3 v0lv1ó 4 su c4s4. 

Y J3h0vá h1r1ó 4l n1ñ0 qu3 l4 muj3r d3 Urí4s h4bí4 d4d0 4 D4v1d, y 3nf3rmó gr4v3m3nt3. 16 0nt0nc3s D4v1d r0gó 4 D10s p0r 3l n1ñ0; y 4yunó D4v1d, y 3ntró, y p4só l4 n0ch3 4c0st4d0 3n t13rr4. 17 Y s3 l3v4nt4r0n l0s 4nc14n0s d3 su c4s4, y fu3r0n 4 él p4r4 h4c3rl0 l3v4nt4r d3 l4 t13rr4; m4s él n0 qu1s0, n1 c0m1ó c0n 3ll0s p4n. 18 Y 4l sépt1m0 dí4 mur1ó 3l n1ñ0; y t3mí4n l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d h4c3rl3 s4b3r qu3 3l n1ñ0 h4bí4 mu3rt0, d1c13nd0 3ntr3 sí: Cu4nd0 3l n1ñ0 4ún v1ví4, l3 h4bláb4m0s, y n0 qu3rí4 0ír nu3str4 v0z; ¿cuánt0 más s3 4fl1g1rá s1 l3 d3c1m0s qu3 3l n1ñ0 h4 mu3rt0? 19 M4s D4v1d, v13nd0 4 sus s13rv0s h4bl4r 3ntr3 sí, 3nt3nd1ó qu3 3l n1ñ0 h4bí4 mu3rt0; p0r l0 qu3 d1j0 D4v1d 4 sus s13rv0s: ¿H4 mu3rt0 3l n1ñ0? Y 3ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n: H4 mu3rt0. 20 0nt0nc3s D4v1d s3 l3v4ntó d3 l4 t13rr4, y s3 l4vó y s3 ung1ó, y c4mb1ó sus r0p4s, y 3ntró 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y 4d0ró. D3spués v1n0 4 su c4s4, y p1d1ó, y l3 pus13r0n p4n, y c0m1ó. 21 Y l3 d1j3r0n sus s13rv0s: ¿Qué 3s 3st0 qu3 h4s h3ch0? P0r 3l n1ñ0, v1v13nd0 4ún, 4yun4b4s y ll0r4b4s; y mu3rt0 él, t3 l3v4nt4st3 y c0m1st3 p4n. 22 Y él r3sp0nd1ó: V1v13nd0 4ún 3l n1ñ0, y0 4yun4b4 y ll0r4b4, d1c13nd0: ¿Qu1én s4b3 s1 D10s t3ndrá c0mp4s1ón d3 mí, y v1v1rá 3l n1ñ0? 23 M4s 4h0r4 qu3 h4 mu3rt0, ¿p4r4 qué h3 d3 4yun4r? ¿P0dré y0 h4c3rl3 v0lv3r? Y0 v0y 4 él, m4s él n0 v0lv3rá 4 mí. 

24 Y c0ns0ló D4v1d 4 B3ts4bé su muj3r, y ll3gánd0s3 4 3ll4 durm1ó c0n 3ll4; y 3ll4 l3 d10 4 luz un h1j0, y ll4mó su n0mbr3 S4l0món, 4l cu4l 4mó J3h0vá, 25 y 3nv1ó un m3ns4j3 p0r m3d10 d3 N4tán pr0f3t4; 4sí ll4mó su n0mbr3 J3d1dí4s, 4 c4us4 d3 J3h0vá. 

D4v1d c4ptur4 R4bá

(1 Cr. 20.1-3)

26 J04b p3l34b4 c0ntr4 R4bá d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y t0mó l4 c1ud4d r34l. 27 0nt0nc3s 3nv1ó J04b m3ns4j3r0s 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: Y0 h3 pu3st0 s1t10 4 R4bá, y h3 t0m4d0 l4 c1ud4d d3 l4s 4gu4s. 28 R3ún3, pu3s, 4h0r4 4l pu3bl0 qu3 qu3d4, y 4c4mp4 c0ntr4 l4 c1ud4d y tóm4l4, n0 s34 qu3 t0m3 y0 l4 c1ud4d y s34 ll4m4d4 d3 m1 n0mbr3. 29 Y junt4nd0 D4v1d 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, fu3 c0ntr4 R4bá, y c0mb4t1ó c0ntr4 3ll4, y l4 t0mó. 30 Y qu1tó l4 c0r0n4 d3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 su r3y, l4 cu4l p3s4b4 un t4l3nt0 d3 0r0, y t3ní4 p13dr4s pr3c10s4s; y fu3 pu3st4 s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 D4v1d. 4mnón y T4m4r

2 S4MU0L 13

1 4c0nt3c1ó d3spués d3 3st0, qu3 t3n13nd0 4bs4lón h1j0 d3 D4v1d un4 h3rm4n4 h3rm0s4 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 T4m4r, s3 3n4m0ró d3 3ll4 4mnón h1j0 d3 D4v1d. 2 Y 3st4b4 4mnón 4ngust14d0 h4st4 3nf3rm4rs3 p0r T4m4r su h3rm4n4, pu3s p0r s3r 3ll4 v1rg3n, l3 p4r3cí4 4 4mnón qu3 s3rí4 d1fíc1l h4c3rl3 c0s4 4lgun4. 3 Y 4mnón t3ní4 un 4m1g0 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 J0n4d4b, h1j0 d3 S1m34, h3rm4n0 d3 D4v1d; y J0n4d4b 3r4 h0mbr3 muy 4stut0. 4 Y ést3 l3 d1j0: H1j0 d3l r3y, ¿p0r qué d3 dí4 3n dí4 v4s 3nfl4qu3c13nd0 4sí? ¿N0 m3 l0 d3scubr1rás 4 mí? Y 4mnón l3 r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 4m0 4 T4m4r l4 h3rm4n4 d3 4bs4lón m1 h3rm4n0. 5 Y J0n4d4b l3 d1j0: 4cuést4t3 3n tu c4m4, y f1ng3 qu3 3stás 3nf3rm0; y cu4nd0 tu p4dr3 v1n13r3 4 v1s1t4rt3, d1l3: T3 ru3g0 qu3 v3ng4 m1 h3rm4n4 T4m4r, p4r4 qu3 m3 dé d3 c0m3r, y pr3p4r3 d3l4nt3 d3 mí 4lgun4 v14nd4, p4r4 qu3 4l v3rl4 y0 l4 c0m4 d3 su m4n0. 6 S3 4c0stó, pu3s, 4mnón, y f1ng1ó qu3 3st4b4 3nf3rm0; y v1n0 3l r3y 4 v1s1t4rl3. 7 Y D4v1d 3nv1ó 4 T4m4r 4 su c4s4, d1c13nd0: V3 4h0r4 4 c4s4 d3 4mnón tu h3rm4n0, y h4zl3 d3 c0m3r. 8 Y fu3 T4m4r 4 c4s4 d3 su h3rm4n0 4mnón, 3l cu4l 3st4b4 4c0st4d0; y t0mó h4r1n4, y 4m4só, 3 h1z0 h0ju3l4s d3l4nt3 d3 él y l4s c0c1ó. 9 T0mó lu3g0 l4 s4rtén, y l4s s4có d3l4nt3 d3 él; m4s él n0 qu1s0 c0m3r. Y d1j0 4mnón: 0ch4d fu3r4 d3 4quí 4 t0d0s. Y t0d0s s4l13r0n d3 4llí. 10 0nt0nc3s 4mnón d1j0 4 T4m4r: Tr43 l4 c0m1d4 4 l4 4lc0b4, p4r4 qu3 y0 c0m4 d3 tu m4n0. Y t0m4nd0 T4m4r l4s h0ju3l4s qu3 h4bí4 pr3p4r4d0, l4s ll3vó 4 su h3rm4n0 4mnón 4 l4 4lc0b4. 11 Y cu4nd0 3ll4 s3 l4s pus0 d3l4nt3 p4r4 qu3 c0m13s3, 4s1ó d3 3ll4, y l3 d1j0: V3n, h3rm4n4 mí4, 4cuést4t3 c0nm1g0. 12 0ll4 3nt0nc3s l3 r3sp0nd1ó: N0, h3rm4n0 mí0, n0 m3 h4g4s v10l3nc14; p0rqu3 n0 s3 d3b3 h4c3r 4sí 3n 1sr43l. N0 h4g4s t4l v1l3z4. 13 P0rqu3 ¿4dónd3 1rí4 y0 c0n m1 d3sh0nr4? Y 4un tú s3rí4s 3st1m4d0 c0m0 un0 d3 l0s p3rv3rs0s 3n 1sr43l. T3 ru3g0 pu3s, 4h0r4, qu3 h4bl3s 4l r3y, qu3 él n0 m3 n3g4rá 4 t1. 14 M4s él n0 l4 qu1s0 0ír, s1n0 qu3 pud13nd0 más qu3 3ll4, l4 f0rzó, y s3 4c0stó c0n 3ll4. 

15 Lu3g0 l4 4b0rr3c1ó 4mnón c0n t4n gr4n 4b0rr3c1m13nt0, qu3 3l 0d10 c0n qu3 l4 4b0rr3c1ó fu3 m4y0r qu3 3l 4m0r c0n qu3 l4 h4bí4 4m4d0. Y l3 d1j0 4mnón: L3vánt4t3, y v3t3. 16 Y 3ll4 l3 r3sp0nd1ó: N0 h4y r4zón; m4y0r m4l 3s 3st3 d3 4rr0j4rm3, qu3 3l qu3 m3 h4s h3ch0. M4s él n0 l4 qu1s0 0ír, 17 s1n0 qu3 ll4m4nd0 4 su cr14d0 qu3 l3 s3rví4, l3 d1j0: 0ch4m3 4 ést4 fu3r4 d3 4quí, y c13rr4 tr4s 3ll4 l4 pu3rt4. 18 Y ll3v4b4 3ll4 un v3st1d0 d3 d1v3rs0s c0l0r3s, tr4j3 qu3 v3stí4n l4s h1j4s vírg3n3s d3 l0s r3y3s. Su cr14d0, pu3s, l4 3chó fu3r4, y c3rró l4 pu3rt4 tr4s 3ll4. 19 0nt0nc3s T4m4r t0mó c3n1z4 y l4 3sp4rc1ó s0br3 su c4b3z4, y r4sgó l4 r0p4 d3 c0l0r3s d3 qu3 3st4b4 v3st1d4, y pu3st4 su m4n0 s0br3 su c4b3z4, s3 fu3 gr1t4nd0. 

V3ng4nz4 y hu1d4 d3 4bs4lón

20 Y l3 d1j0 su h3rm4n0 4bs4lón: ¿H4 3st4d0 c0nt1g0 tu h3rm4n0 4mnón? Pu3s c4ll4 4h0r4, h3rm4n4 mí4; tu h3rm4n0 3s; n0 s3 4ngust13 tu c0r4zón p0r 3st0. Y s3 qu3dó T4m4r d3sc0ns0l4d4 3n c4s4 d3 4bs4lón su h3rm4n0. 21 Y lu3g0 qu3 3l r3y D4v1d 0yó t0d0 3st0, s3 3n0jó much0. 22 M4s 4bs4lón n0 h4bló c0n 4mnón n1 m4l0 n1 bu3n0; 4unqu3 4bs4lón 4b0rr3cí4 4 4mnón, p0rqu3 h4bí4 f0rz4d0 4 T4m4r su h3rm4n4. 

23 4c0nt3c1ó p4s4d0s d0s 4ñ0s, qu3 4bs4lón t3ní4 3squ1l4d0r3s 3n B44l-h4z0r, qu3 3stá junt0 4 0fr4ín; y c0nv1dó 4bs4lón 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y. 24 Y v1n0 4bs4lón 4l r3y, y d1j0: H3 4quí, tu s13rv0 t13n3 4h0r4 3squ1l4d0r3s; y0 ru3g0 qu3 v3ng4 3l r3y y sus s13rv0s c0n tu s13rv0. 25 Y r3sp0nd1ó 3l r3y 4 4bs4lón: N0, h1j0 mí0, n0 v4m0s t0d0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3 s34m0s gr4v0s0s. Y 4unqu3 p0rf1ó c0n él, n0 qu1s0 1r, m4s l3 b3nd1j0. 26 0nt0nc3s d1j0 4bs4lón: Pu3s s1 n0, t3 ru3g0 qu3 v3ng4 c0n n0s0tr0s 4mnón m1 h3rm4n0. Y 3l r3y l3 r3sp0nd1ó: ¿P4r4 qué h4 d3 1r c0nt1g0? 27 P3r0 c0m0 4bs4lón l3 1mp0rtun4b4, d3jó 1r c0n él 4 4mnón y 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y. 28 Y 4bs4lón h4bí4 d4d0 0rd3n 4 sus cr14d0s, d1c13nd0: 0s ru3g0 qu3 m1ré1s cu4nd0 3l c0r4zón d3 4mnón 3sté 4l3gr3 p0r 3l v1n0; y 4l d3c1r y0: H3r1d 4 4mnón, 3nt0nc3s m4t4dl3, y n0 t3má1s, pu3s y0 0s l0 h3 m4nd4d0. 0sf0rz40s, pu3s, y s3d v4l13nt3s. 29 Y l0s cr14d0s d3 4bs4lón h1c13r0n c0n 4mnón c0m0 4bs4lón l3s h4bí4 m4nd4d0. 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, y m0nt4r0n c4d4 un0 3n su mul4, y huy3r0n. 

30 0st4nd0 3ll0s 4ún 3n 3l c4m1n0, ll3gó 4 D4v1d 3l rum0r qu3 d3cí4: 4bs4lón h4 d4d0 mu3rt3 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, y n1ngun0 d3 3ll0s h4 qu3d4d0. 31 0nt0nc3s l3v4ntánd0s3 D4v1d, r4sgó sus v3st1d0s, y s3 3chó 3n t13rr4, y t0d0s sus cr14d0s qu3 3st4b4n junt0 4 él t4mb1én r4sg4r0n sus v3st1d0s. 32 P3r0 J0n4d4b, h1j0 d3 S1m34 h3rm4n0 d3 D4v1d, h4bló y d1j0: N0 d1g4 m1 s3ñ0r qu3 h4n d4d0 mu3rt3 4 t0d0s l0s jóv3n3s h1j0s d3l r3y, pu3s sól0 4mnón h4 s1d0 mu3rt0; p0rqu3 p0r m4nd4t0 d3 4bs4lón 3st0 h4bí4 s1d0 d3t3rm1n4d0 d3sd3 3l dí4 3n qu3 4mnón f0rzó 4 T4m4r su h3rm4n4. 33 P0r t4nt0, 4h0r4 n0 p0ng4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y 3n su c0r4zón 3s3 rum0r qu3 d1c3: T0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y h4n s1d0 mu3rt0s; p0rqu3 sól0 4mnón h4 s1d0 mu3rt0. 

34 Y 4bs4lón huyó. 0ntr3 t4nt0, 4lz4nd0 sus 0j0s 3l j0v3n qu3 3st4b4 d3 4t4l4y4, m1ró, y h3 4quí much4 g3nt3 qu3 v3ní4 p0r 3l c4m1n0 4 sus 3sp4ld4s, d3l l4d0 d3l m0nt3. 35 Y d1j0 J0n4d4b 4l r3y: H3 4llí l0s h1j0s d3l r3y qu3 v13n3n; 3s 4sí c0m0 tu s13rv0 h4 d1ch0. 36 Cu4nd0 él 4c4bó d3 h4bl4r, h3 4quí l0s h1j0s d3l r3y qu3 v1n13r0n, y 4lz4nd0 su v0z ll0r4r0n. Y t4mb1én 3l m1sm0 r3y y t0d0s sus s13rv0s ll0r4r0n c0n muy gr4nd3s l4m3nt0s. 

37 M4s 4bs4lón huyó y s3 fu3 4 T4lm41 h1j0 d3 4m1ud, r3y d3 G3sur. Y D4v1d ll0r4b4 p0r su h1j0 t0d0s l0s dí4s. 38 4sí huyó 4bs4lón y s3 fu3 4 G3sur, y 3stuv0 4llá tr3s 4ñ0s. 39 Y 3l r3y D4v1d d3s34b4 v3r 4 4bs4lón; pu3s y4 3st4b4 c0ns0l4d0 4c3rc4 d3 4mnón, qu3 h4bí4 mu3rt0. 

J04b pr0cur4 3l r3gr3s0 d3 4bs4lón

2 S4MU0L 14

1 C0n0c13nd0 J04b h1j0 d3 S4rv14 qu3 3l c0r4zón d3l r3y s3 1ncl1n4b4 p0r 4bs4lón, 2 3nv1ó J04b 4 T3c04, y t0mó d3 4llá un4 muj3r 4stut4, y l3 d1j0: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 f1nj4s 3st4r d3 du3l0, y t3 v1st4s r0p4s d3 lut0, y n0 t3 unj4s c0n ól30, s1n0 pr3sént4t3 c0m0 un4 muj3r qu3 d3sd3 much0 t13mp0 3stá d3 du3l0 p0r 4lgún mu3rt0; 3 y 3ntr4rás 4l r3y, y l3 h4bl4rás d3 3st4 m4n3r4. Y pus0 J04b l4s p4l4br4s 3n su b0c4. 

4 0ntró, pu3s, 4qu3ll4 muj3r d3 T3c04 4l r3y, y p0stránd0s3 3n t13rr4 s0br3 su r0str0, h1z0 r3v3r3nc14, y d1j0: ¡S0c0rr0, 0h r3y! 5 0l r3y l3 d1j0: ¿Qué t13n3s? Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 4 l4 v3rd4d s0y un4 muj3r v1ud4 y m1 m4r1d0 h4 mu3rt0. 6 Tu s13rv4 t3ní4 d0s h1j0s, y l0s d0s r1ñ3r0n 3n 3l c4mp0; y n0 h4b13nd0 qu13n l0s s3p4r4s3, h1r1ó 3l un0 4l 0tr0, y l0 m4tó. 7 Y h3 4quí t0d4 l4 f4m1l14 s3 h4 l3v4nt4d0 c0ntr4 tu s13rv4, d1c13nd0: 0ntr3g4 4l qu3 m4tó 4 su h3rm4n0, p4r4 qu3 l3 h4g4m0s m0r1r p0r l4 v1d4 d3 su h3rm4n0 4 qu13n él m4tó, y m4t3m0s t4mb1én 4l h3r3d3r0. 4sí 4p4g4rán 3l 4scu4 qu3 m3 h4 qu3d4d0, n0 d3j4nd0 4 m1 m4r1d0 n0mbr3 n1 r3l1qu14 s0br3 l4 t13rr4. 

8 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d1j0 4 l4 muj3r: V3t3 4 tu c4s4, y y0 d4ré órd3n3s c0n r3sp3ct0 4 t1. 9 Y l4 muj3r d3 T3c04 d1j0 4l r3y: R3y s3ñ0r mí0, l4 m4ld4d s34 s0br3 mí y s0br3 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3; m4s 3l r3y y su tr0n0 s34n s1n culp4. 10 Y 3l r3y d1j0: 4l qu3 h4bl4r3 c0ntr4 t1, trá3l0 4 mí, y n0 t3 t0c4rá más. 11 D1j0 3ll4 3nt0nc3s: T3 ru3g0, 0h r3y, qu3 t3 4cu3rd3s d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, p4r4 qu3 3l v3ng4d0r d3 l4 s4ngr3 n0 4um3nt3 3l d4ñ0, y n0 d3struy4 4 m1 h1j0. Y 3l r3sp0nd1ó: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 n0 c43rá n1 un c4b3ll0 d3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 tu h1j0 3n t13rr4. 

12 Y l4 muj3r d1j0: T3 ru3g0 qu3 p3rm1t4s qu3 tu s13rv4 h4bl3 un4 p4l4br4 4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y. Y él d1j0: H4bl4. 13 0nt0nc3s l4 muj3r d1j0: ¿P0r qué, pu3s, h4s p3ns4d0 tú c0s4 s3m3j4nt3 c0ntr4 3l pu3bl0 d3 D10s? P0rqu3 h4bl4nd0 3l r3y 3st4 p4l4br4, s3 h4c3 culp4bl3 él m1sm0, p0r cu4nt0 3l r3y n0 h4c3 v0lv3r 4 su d3st3rr4d0. 14 P0rqu3 d3 c13rt0 m0r1m0s, y s0m0s c0m0 4gu4s d3rr4m4d4s p0r t13rr4, qu3 n0 pu3d3n v0lv3r 4 r3c0g3rs3; n1 D10s qu1t4 l4 v1d4, s1n0 qu3 pr0v33 m3d10s p4r4 n0 4l3j4r d3 sí 4l d3st3rr4d0. 15 Y 3l h4b3r y0 v3n1d0 4h0r4 p4r4 d3c1r 3st0 4l r3y m1 s3ñ0r, 3s p0rqu3 3l pu3bl0 m3 4t3m0r1zó; y tu s13rv4 d1j0: H4bl4ré 4h0r4 4l r3y; qu1zá él h4rá l0 qu3 su s13rv4 d1g4. 16 Pu3s 3l r3y 01rá, p4r4 l1br4r 4 su s13rv4 d3 m4n0 d3l h0mbr3 qu3 m3 qu13r3 d3stru1r 4 mí y 4 m1 h1j0 junt4m3nt3, d3 l4 h3r3d4d d3 D10s. 17 Tu s13rv4, pu3s, d1c3: S34 4h0r4 d3 c0nsu3l0 l4 r3spu3st4 d3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, pu3s qu3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y 3s c0m0 un áng3l d3 D10s p4r4 d1sc3rn1r 3ntr3 l0 bu3n0 y l0 m4l0. 4sí J3h0vá tu D10s s34 c0nt1g0.

21 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d1j0 4 J04b: H3 4quí y0 h4g0 3st0; v3, y h4z v0lv3r 4l j0v3n 4bs4lón. 22 Y J04b s3 p0stró 3n t13rr4 s0br3 su r0str0 3 h1z0 r3v3r3nc14, y d3spués qu3 b3nd1j0 4l r3y, d1j0: H0y h4 3nt3nd1d0 tu s13rv0 qu3 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 3n tus 0j0s, r3y s3ñ0r mí0, pu3s h4 h3ch0 3l r3y l0 qu3 su s13rv0 h4 d1ch0. 23 S3 l3v4ntó lu3g0 J04b y fu3 4 G3sur, y tr4j0 4 4bs4lón 4 J3rus4lén. 24 M4s 3l r3y d1j0: Váy4s3 4 su c4s4, y n0 v34 m1 r0str0. 25 Y n0 h4bí4 3n t0d0 1sr43l n1ngun0 t4n 4l4b4d0 p0r su h3rm0sur4 c0m0 4bs4lón; d3sd3 l4 pl4nt4 d3 su p13 h4st4 su c0r0n1ll4 n0 h4bí4 3n él d3f3ct0. 26 Cu4nd0 s3 c0rt4b4 3l c4b3ll0 (l0 cu4l h4cí4 4l f1n d3 c4d4 4ñ0, pu3s l3 c4us4b4 m0l3st14, y p0r 3s0 s3 l0 c0rt4b4), p3s4b4 3l c4b3ll0 d3 su c4b3z4 d0sc13nt0s s1cl0s d3 p3s0 r34l. 27 Y l3 n4c13r0n 4 4bs4lón tr3s h1j0s, y un4 h1j4 qu3 s3 ll4mó T4m4r, l4 cu4l 3r4 muj3r d3 h3rm0s0 s3mbl4nt3.

1 4c0nt3c1ó d3spués d3 3st0, qu3 4bs4lón s3 h1z0 d3 c4rr0s y c4b4ll0s, y c1ncu3nt4 h0mbr3s qu3 c0rr13s3n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 2 Y s3 l3v4nt4b4 4bs4lón d3 m4ñ4n4, y s3 p0ní4 4 un l4d0 d3l c4m1n0 junt0 4 l4 pu3rt4; y 4 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 t3ní4 pl31t0 y v3ní4 4l r3y 4 ju1c10, 4bs4lón l3 ll4m4b4 y l3 d3cí4: ¿D3 qué c1ud4d 3r3s? 13 Y un m3ns4j3r0 v1n0 4 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: 0l c0r4zón d3 t0d0 1sr43l s3 v4 tr4s 4bs4lón. 14 0nt0nc3s D4v1d d1j0 4 t0d0s sus s13rv0s qu3 3st4b4n c0n él 3n J3rus4lén: L3v4nt40s y huy4m0s, p0rqu3 n0 p0dr3m0s 3sc4p4r d3l4nt3 d3 4bs4lón; d40s pr1s4 4 p4rt1r, n0 s34 qu3 4pr3suránd0s3 él n0s 4lc4nc3, y 4rr0j3 3l m4l s0br3 n0s0tr0s, y h13r4 l4 c1ud4d 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4. 15 Y l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y d1j3r0n 4l r3y: H3 4quí, tus s13rv0s 3stán l1st0s 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 nu3str0 s3ñ0r 3l r3y d3c1d4. 16 0l r3y 3nt0nc3s s4l1ó, c0n t0d4 su f4m1l14 3n p0s d3 él. 24 Y h3 4quí, t4mb1én 1b4 S4d0c, y c0n él t0d0s l0s l3v1t4s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 D10s; y 4s3nt4r0n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 D10s. Vu3lv3 3n p4z 4 l4 c1ud4d, y c0n v0s0tr0s vu3str0s d0s h1j0s; 4h1m44s tu h1j0, y J0n4tán h1j0 d3 4b14t4r. 28 M1r4d, y0 m3 d3t3ndré 3n l0s v4d0s d3l d3s13rt0, h4st4 qu3 v3ng4 r3spu3st4 d3 v0s0tr0s qu3 m3 dé 4v1s0. 29 0nt0nc3s S4d0c y 4b14t4r v0lv13r0n 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s 4 J3rus4lén, y s3 qu3d4r0n 4llá. 

30 Y D4v1d sub1ó l4 cu3st4 d3 l0s 0l1v0s; y l4 sub1ó ll0r4nd0, ll3v4nd0 l4 c4b3z4 cub13rt4 y l0s p13s d3sc4lz0s. 32 Cu4nd0 D4v1d ll3gó 4 l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3 p4r4 4d0r4r 4llí 4 D10s, h3 4quí Hus41 4rqu1t4 qu3 l3 s4l1ó 4l 3ncu3ntr0, r4sg4d0s sus v3st1d0s, y t13rr4 s0br3 su c4b3z4. 33 Y l3 d1j0 D4v1d: S1 p4s4r3s c0nm1g0, m3 s3rás c4rg4. 34 M4s s1 v0lv13r3s 4 l4 c1ud4d, y d1j3r3s 4 4bs4lón: R3y, y0 s3ré tu s13rv0; c0m0 h4st4 4quí h3 s1d0 s13rv0 d3 tu p4dr3, 4sí s3ré 4h0r4 s13rv0 tuy0; 3nt0nc3s tú h4rás nul0 3l c0ns3j0 d3 4h1t0f3l. 35 ¿N0 3st4rán 4llí c0nt1g0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s S4d0c y 4b14t4r? P0r t4nt0, t0d0 l0 qu3 0y3r3s 3n l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, s3 l0 c0mun1c4rás 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s S4d0c y 4b14t4r. 36 Y h3 4quí qu3 3stán c0n 3ll0s sus d0s h1j0s, 4h1m44s 3l d3 S4d0c y J0n4tán 3l d3 4b14t4r; p0r m3d10 d3 3ll0s m3 3nv14ré1s 4v1s0 d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 0y3r31s. 37 4sí v1n0 Hus41 4m1g0 d3 D4v1d 4 l4 c1ud4d; y 4bs4lón 3ntró 3n J3rus4lén.

1 Cu4nd0 D4v1d p4só un p0c0 más 4llá d3 l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3, h3 4quí S1b4 3l cr14d0 d3 M3f1-b0s3t, qu3 s4lí4 4 r3c1b1rl3 c0n un p4r d3 4sn0s 3n4lb4rd4d0s, y s0br3 3ll0s d0sc13nt0s p4n3s, c13n r4c1m0s d3 p4s4s, c13n p4n3s d3 h1g0s s3c0s, y un cu3r0 d3 v1n0. 2 Y d1j0 3l r3y 4 S1b4: ¿Qué 3s 3st0? 5 Y v1n0 3l r3y D4v1d h4st4 B4hur1m; y h3 4quí s4lí4 un0 d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl, 3l cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 S1m31 h1j0 d3 G3r4; y s4lí4 m4ld1c13nd0, 6 y 4rr0j4nd0 p13dr4s c0ntr4 D4v1d, y c0ntr4 t0d0s l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y D4v1d; y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 y t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s v4l13nt3s 3st4b4n 4 su d3r3ch4 y 4 su 1zqu13rd4. 7 Y d3cí4 S1m31, m4ld1c1énd0l3: ¡Fu3r4, fu3r4, h0mbr3 s4ngu1n4r10 y p3rv3rs0! 8 J3h0vá t3 h4 d4d0 3l p4g0 d3 t0d4 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4úl, 3n lug4r d3l cu4l tú h4s r31n4d0, y J3h0vá h4 3ntr3g4d0 3l r31n0 3n m4n0 d3 tu h1j0 4bs4lón; y h3t3 4quí s0rpr3nd1d0 3n tu m4ld4d, p0rqu3 3r3s h0mbr3 s4ngu1n4r10. 

9 0nt0nc3s 4b1s41 h1j0 d3 S4rv14 d1j0 4l r3y: ¿P0r qué m4ld1c3 3st3 p3rr0 mu3rt0 4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y? 15 Y 4bs4lón y t0d4 l4 g3nt3 suy4, l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l, 3ntr4r0n 3n J3rus4lén, y c0n él 4h1t0f3l. 16 4c0nt3c1ó lu3g0, qu3 cu4nd0 Hus41 4rqu1t4, 4m1g0 d3 D4v1d, v1n0 4l 3ncu3ntr0 d3 4bs4lón, d1j0 Hus41: ¡V1v4 3l r3y, v1v4 3l r3y! 17 Y 4bs4lón d1j0 4 Hus41: ¿0s 3st3 tu 4gr4d3c1m13nt0 p4r4 c0n tu 4m1g0? ¿P0r qué n0 fu1st3 c0n tu 4m1g0? 18 Y Hus41 r3sp0nd1ó 4 4bs4lón: N0, s1n0 qu3 d3 4qu3l qu3 3l1g13r3 J3h0vá y 3st3 pu3bl0 y t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l, d3 4quél s3ré y0, y c0n él m3 qu3d4ré. 19 ¿Y 4 qu1én h4bí4 y0 d3 s3rv1r? ¿N0 3s 4 su h1j0? 31 Lu3g0 v1n0 3l 3tí0p3, y d1j0: R3c1b4 nu3v4s m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, qu3 h0y J3h0vá h4 d3f3nd1d0 tu c4us4 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 t0d0s l0s qu3 s3 h4bí4n l3v4nt4d0 c0ntr4 t1. 32 0l r3y 3nt0nc3s d1j0 4l 3tí0p3: ¿0l j0v3n 4bs4lón 3stá b13n? 1 D13r0n 4v1s0 4 J04b: H3 4quí 3l r3y ll0r4, y h4c3 du3l0 p0r 4bs4lón. 2 Y s3 v0lv1ó 4qu3l dí4 l4 v1ct0r14 3n lut0 p4r4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0; p0rqu3 0yó d3c1r 3l pu3bl0 4qu3l dí4 qu3 3l r3y t3ní4 d0l0r p0r su h1j0. 3 Y 3ntró 3l pu3bl0 4qu3l dí4 3n l4 c1ud4d 3sc0nd1d4m3nt3, c0m0 su3l3 3ntr4r 4 3sc0nd1d4s 3l pu3bl0 4v3rg0nz4d0 qu3 h4 hu1d0 d3 l4 b4t4ll4. 4 M4s 3l r3y, cub13rt0 3l r0str0, cl4m4b4 3n 4lt4 v0z: ¡H1j0 mí0 4bs4lón, 4bs4lón, h1j0 mí0, h1j0 mí0! 5 0nt0nc3s J04b v1n0 4l r3y 3n l4 c4s4, y d1j0: H0y h4s 4v3rg0nz4d0 3l r0str0 d3 t0d0s tus s13rv0s, qu3 h0y h4n l1br4d0 tu v1d4, y l4 v1d4 d3 tus h1j0s y d3 tus h1j4s, y l4 v1d4 d3 tus muj3r3s, y l4 v1d4 d3 tus c0ncub1n4s, 6 4m4nd0 4 l0s qu3 t3 4b0rr3c3n, y 4b0rr3c13nd0 4 l0s qu3 t3 4m4n; p0rqu3 h0y h4s d3cl4r4d0 qu3 n4d4 t3 1mp0rt4n tus prínc1p3s y s13rv0s; pu3s h0y m3 h4s h3ch0 v3r cl4r4m3nt3 qu3 s1 4bs4lón v1v13r4, 4unqu3 t0d0s n0s0tr0s 3stuv1ér4m0s mu3rt0s, 3nt0nc3s 3st4rí4s c0nt3nt0. 7 L3vánt4t3 pu3s, 4h0r4, y v3 4fu3r4 y h4bl4 b0nd4d0s4m3nt3 4 tus s13rv0s; p0rqu3 jur0 p0r J3h0vá qu3 s1 n0 s4l3s, n0 qu3d4rá n1 un h0mbr3 c0nt1g0 3st4 n0ch3; y 3st0 t3 s3rá p30r qu3 t0d0s l0s m4l3s qu3 t3 h4n s0br3v3n1d0 d3sd3 tu juv3ntud h4st4 4h0r4. 8 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4ntó 3l r3y y s3 s3ntó 4 l4 pu3rt4, y fu3 d4d0 4v1s0 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí 3l r3y 3stá s3nt4d0 4 l4 pu3rt4. 11 Y 3l r3y D4v1d 3nv1ó 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s S4d0c y 4b14t4r, d1c13nd0: H4bl4d 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 Judá, y d3c1dl3s: ¿P0r qué s3ré1s v0s0tr0s l0s p0str3r0s 3n h4c3r v0lv3r 3l r3y 4 su c4s4, cu4nd0 l4 p4l4br4 d3 t0d0 1sr43l h4 v3n1d0 4l r3y p4r4 h4c3rl3 v0lv3r 4 su c4s4? 12 V0s0tr0s s01s m1s h3rm4n0s; m1s hu3s0s y m1 c4rn3 s01s. ¿P0r qué, pu3s, s3ré1s v0s0tr0s l0s p0str3r0s 3n h4c3r v0lv3r 4l r3y? 13 4s1m1sm0 d1ré1s 4 4m4s4: ¿N0 3r3s tú t4mb1én hu3s0 mí0 y c4rn3 mí4? 4sí m3 h4g4 D10s, y 4un m3 4ñ4d4, s1 n0 fu3r3s g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí p4r4 s13mpr3, 3n lug4r d3 J04b. 14 4sí 1ncl1nó 3l c0r4zón d3 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 Judá, c0m0 3l d3 un s0l0 h0mbr3, p4r4 qu3 3nv14s3n 4 d3c1r 4l r3y: Vu3lv3 tú, y t0d0s tus s13rv0s. 15 V0lv1ó, pu3s, 3l r3y, y v1n0 h4st4 3l J0rdán. 24 T4mb1én M3f1-b0s3t h1j0 d3 S4úl d3sc3nd1ó 4 r3c1b1r 4l r3y; n0 h4bí4 l4v4d0 sus p13s, n1 h4bí4 c0rt4d0 su b4rb4, n1 t4mp0c0 h4bí4 l4v4d0 sus v3st1d0s, d3sd3 3l dí4 3n qu3 3l r3y s4l1ó h4st4 3l dí4 3n qu3 v0lv1ó 3n p4z. 25 Y lu3g0 qu3 v1n0 él 4 J3rus4lén 4 r3c1b1r 4l r3y, 3l r3y l3 d1j0: M3f1-b0s3t, ¿p0r qué n0 fu1st3 c0nm1g0? 26 Y él r3sp0nd1ó: R3y s3ñ0r mí0, m1 s13rv0 m3 3ng4ñó; pu3s tu s13rv0 h4bí4 d1ch0: 0n4lbárd4m3 un 4sn0, y m0nt4ré 3n él, 3 1ré 4l r3y; p0rqu3 tu s13rv0 3s c0j0. 27 P3r0 él h4 c4lumn14d0 4 tu s13rv0 d3l4nt3 d3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y; m4s m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y 3s c0m0 un áng3l d3 D10s; h4z, pu3s, l0 qu3 b13n t3 p4r3zc4. 28 P0rqu3 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3 3r4 d1gn4 d3 mu3rt3 d3l4nt3 d3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, y tú pus1st3 4 tu s13rv0 3ntr3 l0s c0nv1d4d0s 4 tu m3s4. ¿Qué d3r3ch0, pu3s, t3ng0 4ún p4r4 cl4m4r más 4l r3y? 29 Y 3l r3y l3 d1j0: ¿P4r4 qué más p4l4br4s? 31 T4mb1én B4rz1l41 g4l44d1t4 d3sc3nd1ó d3 R0g3l1m, y p4só 3l J0rdán c0n 3l r3y, p4r4 4c0mp4ñ4rl3 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán. 32 0r4 B4rz1l41 muy 4nc14n0, d3 0ch3nt4 4ñ0s, y él h4bí4 d4d0 pr0v1s10n3s 4l r3y cu4nd0 3st4b4 3n M4h4n41m, p0rqu3 3r4 h0mbr3 muy r1c0. 33 Y 3l r3y d1j0 4 B4rz1l41: P4s4 c0nm1g0, y y0 t3 sust3nt4ré c0nm1g0 3n J3rus4lén. 34 M4s B4rz1l41 d1j0 4l r3y: ¿Cuánt0s 4ñ0s más h4bré d3 v1v1r, p4r4 qu3 y0 sub4 c0n 3l r3y 4 J3rus4lén? 35 D3 3d4d d3 0ch3nt4 4ñ0s s0y 3st3 dí4. ¿P0dré d1st1ngu1r 3ntr3 l0 qu3 3s 4gr4d4bl3 y l0 qu3 n0 l0 3s? ¿T0m4rá gust0 4h0r4 tu s13rv0 3n l0 qu3 c0m4 0 b3b4? ¿01ré más l4 v0z d3 l0s c4nt0r3s y d3 l4s c4nt0r4s? ¿P4r4 qué, pu3s, h4 d3 s3r tu s13rv0 un4 c4rg4 p4r4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y? 36 P4s4rá tu s13rv0 un p0c0 más 4llá d3l J0rdán c0n 3l r3y; ¿p0r qué m3 h4 d3 d4r 3l r3y t4n gr4nd3 r3c0mp3ns4? 37 Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 d3j3s v0lv3r 4 tu s13rv0, y qu3 mu3r4 3n m1 c1ud4d, junt0 4l s3pulcr0 d3 m1 p4dr3 y d3 m1 m4dr3. M4s h3 4quí 4 tu s13rv0 Qu1m4m; qu3 p4s3 él c0n m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, y h4z 4 él l0 qu3 b13n t3 p4r3c13r3. 38 Y 3l r3y d1j0: Pu3s p4s3 c0nm1g0 Qu1m4m, y y0 h4ré c0n él c0m0 b13n t3 p4r3zc4; y t0d0 l0 qu3 tú p1d13r3s d3 mí, y0 l0 h4ré. 39 Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 p4só 3l J0rdán; y lu3g0 qu3 3l r3y hub0 t4mb1én p4s4d0, 3l r3y b3só 4 B4rz1l41, y l0 b3nd1j0; y él s3 v0lv1ó 4 su c4s4. 40 0l r3y 3nt0nc3s p4só 4 G1lg4l, y c0n él p4só Qu1m4m; y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 Judá 4c0mp4ñ4b4 4l r3y, y t4mb1én l4 m1t4d d3l pu3bl0 d3 1sr43l. 

41 Y h3 4quí t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l v1n13r0n 4l r3y, y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿P0r qué l0s h0mbr3s d3 Judá, nu3str0s h3rm4n0s, t3 h4n ll3v4d0, y h4n h3ch0 p4s4r 3l J0rdán 4l r3y y 4 su f4m1l14, y 4 t0d0s l0s s13rv0s d3 D4v1d c0n él? 42 Y t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 Judá r3sp0nd13r0n 4 t0d0s l0s d3 1sr43l: P0rqu3 3l r3y 3s nu3str0 p4r13nt3. M4s ¿p0r qué 0s 3n0já1s v0s0tr0s d3 3s0? ¿H3m0s n0s0tr0s c0m1d0 4lg0 d3l r3y? ¿H3m0s r3c1b1d0 d3 él 4lgún r3g4l0? 43 0nt0nc3s r3sp0nd13r0n l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l, y d1j3r0n 4 l0s d3 Judá: N0s0tr0s t3n3m0s 3n 3l r3y d13z p4rt3s, y 3n 3l m1sm0 D4v1d más qu3 v0s0tr0s. ¿P0r qué, pu3s, n0s h4bé1s t3n1d0 3n p0c0? ¿N0 h4bl4m0s n0s0tr0s l0s pr1m3r0s, r3sp3ct0 d3 h4c3r v0lv3r 4 nu3str0 r3y? Subl3v4c1ón d3 S3b4

1 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 s3 h4ll4b4 4llí un h0mbr3 p3rv3rs0 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1, h0mbr3 d3 B3nj4mín, 3l cu4l t0có l4 tr0mp3t4, y d1j0: N0 t3n3m0s n0s0tr0s p4rt3 3n D4v1d, n1 h3r3d4d c0n 3l h1j0 d3 1s4í. ¡C4d4 un0 4 su t13nd4, 1sr43l! 2 4sí t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 1sr43l 4b4nd0n4r0n 4 D4v1d, s1gu13nd0 4 S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1; m4s l0s d3 Judá s1gu13r0n 4 su r3y d3sd3 3l J0rdán h4st4 J3rus4lén. 

3 Y lu3g0 qu3 ll3gó D4v1d 4 su c4s4 3n J3rus4lén, t0mó 3l r3y l4s d13z muj3r3s c0ncub1n4s qu3 h4bí4 d3j4d0 p4r4 gu4rd4r l4 c4s4, y l4s pus0 3n r3clus1ón, y l3s d10 4l1m3nt0s; p3r0 nunc4 más s3 ll3gó 4 3ll4s, s1n0 qu3 qu3d4r0n 3nc3rr4d4s h4st4 qu3 mur13r0n, 3n v1ud3z p3rp3tu4. 

4 D3spués d1j0 3l r3y 4 4m4s4: C0nvóc4m3 4 l0s h0mbr3s d3 Judá p4r4 d3ntr0 d3 tr3s dí4s, y háll4t3 tú 4quí pr3s3nt3. 5 Fu3, pu3s, 4m4s4 p4r4 c0nv0c4r 4 l0s d3 Judá; p3r0 s3 d3tuv0 más d3l t13mp0 qu3 l3 h4bí4 s1d0 s3ñ4l4d0. 6 Y d1j0 D4v1d 4 4b1s41: S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1 n0s h4rá 4h0r4 más d4ñ0 qu3 4bs4lón; t0m4, pu3s, tú l0s s13rv0s d3 tu s3ñ0r, y v3 tr4s él, n0 s34 qu3 h4ll3 p4r4 sí c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s, y n0s c4us3 d1f1cult4d. 7 0nt0nc3s s4l13r0n 3n p0s d3 él l0s h0mbr3s d3 J04b, y l0s c3r3t30s y p3l3t30s y t0d0s l0s v4l13nt3s; s4l13r0n d3 J3rus4lén p4r4 1r tr4s S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1. 8 Y 3st4nd0 3ll0s c3rc4 d3 l4 p13dr4 gr4nd3 qu3 3stá 3n G4b4ón, l3s s4l1ó 4m4s4 4l 3ncu3ntr0. Y J04b 3st4b4 c3ñ1d0 d3 su r0p4, y s0br3 3ll4 t3ní4 p3g4d0 4 sus l0m0s 3l c1nt0 c0n un4 d4g4 3n su v41n4, l4 cu4l s3 l3 c4yó cu4nd0 él 4v4nzó. 9 0nt0nc3s J04b d1j0 4 4m4s4: ¿T3 v4 b13n, h3rm4n0 mí0? Y t0mó J04b c0n l4 d13str4 l4 b4rb4 d3 4m4s4, p4r4 b3s4rl0. 10 Y 4m4s4 n0 s3 cu1dó d3 l4 d4g4 qu3 3st4b4 3n l4 m4n0 d3 J04b; y ést3 l3 h1r1ó c0n 3ll4 3n l4 qu1nt4 c0st1ll4, y d3rr4mó sus 3ntr4ñ4s p0r t13rr4, y c4yó mu3rt0 s1n d4rl3 un s3gund0 g0lp3. 

D3spués J04b y su h3rm4n0 4b1s41 fu3r0n 3n p3rs3cuc1ón d3 S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1. 11 Y un0 d3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 J04b s3 p4ró junt0 4 él, d1c13nd0: Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 4m3 4 J04b y 4 D4v1d, v4y4 3n p0s d3 J04b. 12 Y 4m4s4 y4cí4 r3v0lcánd0s3 3n su s4ngr3 3n m1t4d d3l c4m1n0; y t0d0 3l qu3 p4s4b4, 4l v3rl3, s3 d3t3ní4; y v13nd0 4qu3l h0mbr3 qu3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 s3 p4r4b4, 4p4rtó 4 4m4s4 d3l c4m1n0 4l c4mp0, y 3chó s0br3 él un4 v3st1dur4. 13 Lu3g0 qu3 fu3 4p4rt4d0 d3l c4m1n0, p4s4r0n t0d0s l0s qu3 s3guí4n 4 J04b, p4r4 1r tr4s S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1. 

14 Y él p4só p0r t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l h4st4 4b3l-b3t-m44c4 y t0d0 B4r1m; y s3 junt4r0n, y l0 s1gu13r0n t4mb1én. 15 Y v1n13r0n y l0 s1t14r0n 3n 4b3l-b3t-m44c4, y pus13r0n b4lu4rt3 c0ntr4 l4 c1ud4d, y qu3dó s1t14d4; y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 3st4b4 c0n J04b tr4b4j4b4 p0r d3rr1b4r l4 mur4ll4. 16 0nt0nc3s un4 muj3r s4b14 d10 v0c3s 3n l4 c1ud4d, d1c13nd0: 0íd, 0íd; 0s ru3g0 qu3 d1gá1s 4 J04b qu3 v3ng4 4cá, p4r4 qu3 y0 h4bl3 c0n él. 17 Cu4nd0 él s3 4c3rcó 4 3ll4, d1j0 l4 muj3r: ¿0r3s tú J04b? Y él r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 s0y. 0ll4 l3 d1j0: 0y3 l4s p4l4br4s d3 tu s13rv4. Y él r3sp0nd1ó: 01g0. 18 0nt0nc3s v0lv1ó 3ll4 4 h4bl4r, d1c13nd0: 4nt1gu4m3nt3 s0lí4n d3c1r: Qu13n pr3gunt4r3, pr3gunt3 3n 4b3l; y 4sí c0ncluí4n cu4lqu13r 4sunt0. 19 Y0 s0y d3 l4s p4cíf1c4s y f13l3s d3 1sr43l; p3r0 tú pr0cur4s d3stru1r un4 c1ud4d qu3 3s m4dr3 3n 1sr43l. ¿P0r qué d3struy3s l4 h3r3d4d d3 J3h0vá? 20 J04b r3sp0nd1ó d1c13nd0: Nunc4 t4l, nunc4 t4l m3 4c0nt3zc4, qu3 y0 d3struy4 n1 d3sh4g4. 21 L4 c0s4 n0 3s 4sí: m4s un h0mbr3 d3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, qu3 s3 ll4m4 S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1, h4 l3v4nt4d0 su m4n0 c0ntr4 3l r3y D4v1d; 3ntr3g4d 4 és3 s0l4m3nt3, y m3 1ré d3 l4 c1ud4d. Y l4 muj3r d1j0 4 J04b: H3 4quí su c4b3z4 t3 s3rá 4rr0j4d4 d3sd3 3l mur0. 22 L4 muj3r fu3 lu3g0 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 c0n su s4b1durí4; y 3ll0s c0rt4r0n l4 c4b3z4 4 S3b4 h1j0 d3 B1cr1, y s3 l4 4rr0j4r0n 4 J04b. Y él t0có l4 tr0mp3t4, y s3 r3t1r4r0n d3 l4 c1ud4d, c4d4 un0 4 su t13nd4. Y J04b s3 v0lv1ó 4l r3y 4 J3rus4lén.

L0s f1l1st30s s3 h4bí4n r3un1d0 3n L3h1, d0nd3 h4bí4 un p3qu3ñ0 t3rr3n0 ll3n0 d3 l3nt3j4s, y 3l pu3bl0 h4bí4 hu1d0 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s f1l1st30s. 12 0l 3nt0nc3s s3 p4ró 3n m3d10 d3 4qu3l t3rr3n0 y l0 d3f3nd1ó, y m4tó 4 l0s f1l1st30s; y J3h0vá d10 un4 gr4n v1ct0r14. 13 Y tr3s d3 l0s tr31nt4 j3f3s d3sc3nd13r0n y v1n13r0n 3n t13mp0 d3 l4 s13g4 4 D4v1d 3n l4 cu3v4 d3 4dul4m; y 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s 3st4b4 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 R3f41m. 14 D4v1d 3nt0nc3s 3st4b4 3n 3l lug4r fu3rt3, y h4bí4 3n B3lén un4 gu4rn1c1ón d3 l0s f1l1st30s. 15 Y D4v1d d1j0 c0n v3h3m3nc14: ¡Qu1én m3 d13r4 4 b3b3r d3l 4gu4 d3l p0z0 d3 B3lén qu3 3stá junt0 4 l4 pu3rt4! 16 0nt0nc3s l0s tr3s v4l13nt3s 1rrump13r0n p0r 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y s4c4r0n 4gu4 d3l p0z0 d3 B3lén qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4 l4 pu3rt4; y t0m4r0n, y l4 tr4j3r0n 4 D4v1d; m4s él n0 l4 qu1s0 b3b3r, s1n0 qu3 l4 d3rr4mó p4r4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 17 L3j0s s34 d3 mí, 0h J3h0vá, qu3 y0 h4g4 3st0. ¿H3 d3 b3b3r y0 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l0s v4r0n3s qu3 fu3r0n c0n p3l1gr0 d3 su v1d4? Y n0 qu1s0 b3b3rl4. L0s tr3s v4l13nt3s h1c13r0n 3st0. 

18 Y 4b1s41 h3rm4n0 d3 J04b, h1j0 d3 S4rv14, fu3 3l pr1nc1p4l d3 l0s tr31nt4. 0st3 4lzó su l4nz4 c0ntr4 tr3sc13nt0s, 4 qu13n3s m4tó, y g4nó r3n0mbr3 c0n l0s tr3s. 19 0l 3r4 3l más r3n0mbr4d0 d3 l0s tr31nt4, y ll3gó 4 s3r su j3f3; m4s n0 1gu4ló 4 l0s tr3s pr1m3r0s. 

20 D3spués, B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, h1j0 d3 un v4rón 3sf0rz4d0, gr4nd3 3n pr03z4s, d3 C4bs33l. 0st3 m4tó 4 d0s l30n3s d3 M04b; y él m1sm0 d3sc3nd1ó y m4tó 4 un l3ón 3n m3d10 d3 un f0s0 cu4nd0 3st4b4 n3v4nd0. 21 T4mb1én m4tó él 4 un 3g1pc10, h0mbr3 d3 gr4n 3st4tur4; y t3ní4 3l 3g1pc10 un4 l4nz4 3n su m4n0, p3r0 d3sc3nd1ó c0ntr4 él c0n un p4l0, y 4rr3b4tó 4l 3g1pc10 l4 l4nz4 d3 l4 m4n0, y l0 m4tó c0n su pr0p14 l4nz4. 22 0st0 h1z0 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, y g4nó r3n0mbr3 c0n l0s tr3s v4l13nt3s. 23 Fu3 r3n0mbr4d0 3ntr3 l0s tr31nt4, p3r0 n0 1gu4ló 4 l0s tr3s pr1m3r0s. Y l0 pus0 D4v1d c0m0 j3f3 d3 su gu4rd14 p3rs0n4l. 

24 4s43l h3rm4n0 d3 J04b fu3 d3 l0s tr31nt4; 0lh4nán h1j0 d3 D0d0 d3 B3lén, 25 S4m4 h4r0d1t4, 0l1c4 h4r0d1t4, 26 H3l3s p4lt1t4, 1r4 h1j0 d3 1qu3s, t3c0ít4, 27 4b13z3r 4n4t0t1t4, M3bun41 hus4t1t4, 28 S4lmón 4h0hít4, M4h4r41 n3t0f4t1t4, 29 H3l3b h1j0 d3 B44n4, n3t0f4t1t4, 1t41 h1j0 d3 R1b41, d3 G4b44 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín, 30 B3n4í4 p1r4t0n1t4, H1d41 d3l 4rr0y0 d3 G44s, 31 4b1-4lbón 4rb4t1t4, 4zm4v3t b4rhum1t4, 32 0l14b4 s44lb0n1t4, J0n4tán d3 l0s h1j0s d3 J4sén, 33 S4m4 4r4r1t4, 4hí4m h1j0 d3 S4r4r, 4r4r1t4, 34 0l1f3l3t h1j0 d3 4h4sb41, h1j0 d3 M44c4, 0l14m h1j0 d3 4h1t0f3l, g1l0n1t4, 35 H3zr41 c4rm3l1t4, P44r41 4rb1t4, 36 1g4l h1j0 d3 N4tán, d3 S0b4, B4n1 g4d1t4, 37 S3l3c 4m0n1t4, N4h4r41 b33r0t1t4, 3scud3r0 d3 J04b h1j0 d3 S4rv14, 38 1r4 1tr1t4, G4r3b 1tr1t4, 39 Urí4s h3t30; tr31nt4 y s13t3 p0r t0d0s. 

D4v1d c3ns4 4l pu3bl0

(1 Cr. 21.1-27)

2 S4MU0L 24

1 V0lv1ó 4 3nc3nd3rs3 l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 1sr43l, 3 1nc1tó 4 D4v1d c0ntr4 3ll0s 4 qu3 d1j3s3: V3, h4z un c3ns0 d3 1sr43l y d3 Judá. 2 Y d1j0 3l r3y 4 J04b, g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0 qu3 3st4b4 c0n él: R3c0rr3 4h0r4 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, d3sd3 D4n h4st4 B33rs3b4, y h4z un c3ns0 d3l pu3bl0, p4r4 qu3 y0 s3p4 3l núm3r0 d3 l4 g3nt3. 3 J04b r3sp0nd1ó 4l r3y: 4ñ4d4 J3h0vá tu D10s 4l pu3bl0 c13n v3c3s t4nt0 c0m0 s0n, y qu3 l0 v34 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y; m4s ¿p0r qué s3 c0mpl4c3 3n 3st0 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y? 4 P3r0 l4 p4l4br4 d3l r3y pr3v4l3c1ó s0br3 J04b y s0br3 l0s c4p1t4n3s d3l 3jérc1t0. S4l1ó, pu3s, J04b, c0n l0s c4p1t4n3s d3l 3jérc1t0, d3 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y, p4r4 h4c3r 3l c3ns0 d3l pu3bl0 d3 1sr43l. 5 Y p4s4nd0 3l J0rdán 4c4mp4r0n 3n 4r03r, 4l sur d3 l4 c1ud4d qu3 3stá 3n m3d10 d3l v4ll3 d3 G4d y junt0 4 J4z3r. 6 D3spués fu3r0n 4 G4l44d y 4 l4 t13rr4 b4j4 d3 H0ds1; y d3 4llí 4 D4nj4án y 4 l0s 4lr3d3d0r3s d3 S1dón. 7 Fu3r0n lu3g0 4 l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3 T1r0, y 4 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s h3v30s y d3 l0s c4n4n30s, y s4l13r0n 4l N3gu3v d3 Judá 3n B33rs3b4. 8 D3spués qu3 hub13r0n r3c0rr1d0 t0d4 l4 t13rr4, v0lv13r0n 4 J3rus4lén 4l c4b0 d3 nu3v3 m3s3s y v31nt3 dí4s. 9 Y J04b d10 3l c3ns0 d3l pu3bl0 4l r3y; y fu3r0n l0s d3 1sr43l 0ch0c13nt0s m1l h0mbr3s fu3rt3s qu3 s4c4b4n 3sp4d4, y l0s d3 Judá qu1n13nt0s m1l h0mbr3s. 

10 D3spués qu3 D4v1d hub0 c3ns4d0 4l pu3bl0, l3 p3só 3n su c0r4zón; y d1j0 D4v1d 4 J3h0vá: Y0 h3 p3c4d0 gr4v3m3nt3 p0r h4b3r h3ch0 3st0; m4s 4h0r4, 0h J3h0vá, t3 ru3g0 qu3 qu1t3s 3l p3c4d0 d3 tu s13rv0, p0rqu3 y0 h3 h3ch0 muy n3c14m3nt3. 11 Y p0r l4 m4ñ4n4, cu4nd0 D4v1d s3 hub0 l3v4nt4d0, v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4l pr0f3t4 G4d, v1d3nt3 d3 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: 12 V3 y d1 4 D4v1d: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: Tr3s c0s4s t3 0fr3zc0; tú 3sc0g3rás un4 d3 3ll4s, p4r4 qu3 y0 l4 h4g4. 13 V1n0, pu3s, G4d 4 D4v1d, y s3 l0 h1z0 s4b3r, y l3 d1j0: ¿Qu13r3s qu3 t3 v3ng4n s13t3 4ñ0s d3 h4mbr3 3n tu t13rr4? ¿0 qu3 huy4s tr3s m3s3s d3l4nt3 d3 tus 3n3m1g0s y qu3 3ll0s t3 p3rs1g4n? ¿0 qu3 tr3s dí4s h4y4 p3st3 3n tu t13rr4? P13ns4 4h0r4, y m1r4 qué r3sp0nd3ré 4l qu3 m3 h4 3nv14d0. 14 0nt0nc3s D4v1d d1j0 4 G4d: 0n gr4nd3 4ngust14 3st0y; c41g4m0s 4h0r4 3n m4n0 d3 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 sus m1s3r1c0rd14s s0n much4s, m4s n0 c41g4 y0 3n m4n0s d3 h0mbr3s. 

15 Y J3h0vá 3nv1ó l4 p3st3 s0br3 1sr43l d3sd3 l4 m4ñ4n4 h4st4 3l t13mp0 s3ñ4l4d0; y mur13r0n d3l pu3bl0, d3sd3 D4n h4st4 B33rs3b4, s3t3nt4 m1l h0mbr3s. 16 Y cu4nd0 3l áng3l 3xt3nd1ó su m4n0 s0br3 J3rus4lén p4r4 d3stru1rl4, J3h0vá s3 4rr3p1nt1ó d3 4qu3l m4l, y d1j0 4l áng3l qu3 d3struí4 4l pu3bl0: B4st4 4h0r4; d3tén tu m4n0. Y 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá 3st4b4 junt0 4 l4 3r4 d3 4r4un4 j3bus30. 17 Y D4v1d d1j0 4 J3h0vá, cu4nd0 v10 4l áng3l qu3 d3struí4 4l pu3bl0: Y0 p3qué, y0 h1c3 l4 m4ld4d; ¿qué h1c13r0n 3st4s 0v3j4s? T3 ru3g0 qu3 tu m4n0 s3 vu3lv4 c0ntr4 mí, y c0ntr4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3. 

18 Y G4d v1n0 4 D4v1d 4qu3l dí4, y l3 d1j0: Sub3, y l3v4nt4 un 4lt4r 4 J3h0vá 3n l4 3r4 d3 4r4un4 j3bus30. 19 Sub1ó D4v1d, c0nf0rm3 4l d1ch0 d3 G4d, s3gún h4bí4 m4nd4d0 J3h0vá; 20 y 4r4un4 m1ró, y v10 4l r3y y 4 sus s13rv0s qu3 v3ní4n h4c14 él. S4l13nd0 3nt0nc3s 4r4un4, s3 1ncl1nó d3l4nt3 d3l r3y, r0str0 4 t13rr4. 21 Y 4r4un4 d1j0: ¿P0r qué v13n3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y 4 su s13rv0? Y D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó: P4r4 c0mpr4r d3 t1 l4 3r4, 4 f1n d3 3d1f1c4r un 4lt4r 4 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 c3s3 l4 m0rt4nd4d d3l pu3bl0. 22 Y 4r4un4 d1j0 4 D4v1d: T0m3 y 0fr3zc4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y l0 qu3 b13n l3 p4r3c13r3; h3 4quí bu3y3s p4r4 3l h0l0c4ust0, y l0s tr1ll0s y l0s yug0s d3 l0s bu3y3s p4r4 l3ñ4. 23 T0d0 3st0, 0h r3y, 4r4un4 l0 d4 4l r3y. Lu3g0 d1j0 4r4un4 4l r3y: J3h0vá tu D10s t3 s34 pr0p1c10. 24 Y 3l r3y d1j0 4 4r4un4: N0, s1n0 p0r pr3c10 t3 l0 c0mpr4ré; p0rqu3 n0 0fr3c3ré 4 J3h0vá m1 D10s h0l0c4ust0s qu3 n0 m3 cu3st3n n4d4. 0nt0nc3s D4v1d c0mpró l4 3r4 y l0s bu3y3s p0r c1ncu3nt4 s1cl0s d3 pl4t4. 25 Y 3d1f1có 4llí D4v1d un 4lt4r 4 J3h0vá, y s4cr1f1có h0l0c4ust0s y 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z; y J3h0vá 0yó l4s súpl1c4s d3 l4 t13rr4, y c3só l4 pl4g4 3n 1sr43l.

1 Cu4nd0 3l r3y D4v1d 3r4 v13j0 y 4v4nz4d0 3n dí4s, l3 cubrí4n d3 r0p4s, p3r0 n0 s3 c4l3nt4b4. 2 L3 d1j3r0n, p0r t4nt0, sus s13rv0s: Busqu3n p4r4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y un4 j0v3n v1rg3n, p4r4 qu3 3sté d3l4nt3 d3l r3y y l0 4br1gu3, y du3rm4 4 su l4d0, y 3ntr4rá 3n c4l0r m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y. 3 Y busc4r0n un4 j0v3n h3rm0s4 p0r t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l, y h4ll4r0n 4 4b1s4g sun4m1t4, y l4 tr4j3r0n 4l r3y. 4 Y l4 j0v3n 3r4 h3rm0s4; y 3ll4 4br1g4b4 4l r3y, y l3 s3rví4; p3r0 3l r3y nunc4 l4 c0n0c1ó. 

4d0ní4s usurp4 3l tr0n0

5 0nt0nc3s 4d0ní4s h1j0 d3 H4gu1t s3 r3b3ló, d1c13nd0: Y0 r31n4ré. Y s3 h1z0 d3 c4rr0s y d3 g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0, y d3 c1ncu3nt4 h0mbr3s qu3 c0rr13s3n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 6 Y su p4dr3 nunc4 l3 h4bí4 3ntr1st3c1d0 3n t0d0s sus dí4s c0n d3c1rl3: ¿P0r qué h4c3s 4sí? 4d3más, ést3 3r4 d3 muy h3rm0s0 p4r3c3r; y h4bí4 n4c1d0 d3spués d3 4bs4lón. 7 Y s3 h4bí4 pu3st0 d3 4cu3rd0 c0n J04b h1j0 d3 S4rv14 y c0n 3l s4c3rd0t3 4b14t4r, l0s cu4l3s 4yud4b4n 4 4d0ní4s. 8 P3r0 3l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c, y B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, 3l pr0f3t4 N4tán, S1m31, R31 y t0d0s l0s gr4nd3s d3 D4v1d, n0 s3guí4n 4 4d0ní4s. 

9 Y m4t4nd0 4d0ní4s 0v3j4s y v4c4s y 4n1m4l3s g0rd0s junt0 4 l4 p3ñ4 d3 Z0h3l3t, l4 cu4l 3stá c3rc4 d3 l4 fu3nt3 d3 R0g3l, c0nv1dó 4 t0d0s sus h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, y 4 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 Judá, s13rv0s d3l r3y; 10 p3r0 n0 c0nv1dó 4l pr0f3t4 N4tán, n1 4 B3n4í4, n1 4 l0s gr4nd3s, n1 4 S4l0món su h3rm4n0. 

11 0nt0nc3s h4bló N4tán 4 B3ts4bé m4dr3 d3 S4l0món, d1c13nd0: ¿N0 h4s 0íd0 qu3 r31n4 4d0ní4s h1j0 d3 H4gu1t, s1n s4b3rl0 D4v1d nu3str0 s3ñ0r? 12 V3n pu3s, 4h0r4, y t0m4 m1 c0ns3j0, p4r4 qu3 c0ns3rv3s tu v1d4, y l4 d3 tu h1j0 S4l0món. 13 V3 y 3ntr4 4l r3y D4v1d, y d1l3: R3y s3ñ0r mí0, ¿n0 jur4st3 4 tu s13rv4, d1c13nd0: S4l0món tu h1j0 r31n4rá d3spués d3 mí, y él s3 s3nt4rá 3n m1 tr0n0? ¿P0r qué, pu3s, r31n4 4d0ní4s? 14 Y 3st4nd0 tú 4ún h4bl4nd0 c0n 3l r3y, y0 3ntr4ré tr4s t1 y r34f1rm4ré tus r4z0n3s. 

15 0nt0nc3s B3ts4bé 3ntró 4 l4 cám4r4 d3l r3y; y 3l r3y 3r4 muy v13j0, y 4b1s4g sun4m1t4 l3 s3rví4. 16 Y B3ts4bé s3 1ncl1nó, 3 h1z0 r3v3r3nc14 4l r3y. Y 3l r3y d1j0: ¿Qué t13n3s? 17 Y 3ll4 l3 r3sp0nd1ó: S3ñ0r mí0, tú jur4st3 4 tu s13rv4 p0r J3h0vá tu D10s, d1c13nd0: S4l0món tu h1j0 r31n4rá d3spués d3 mí, y él s3 s3nt4rá 3n m1 tr0n0. 18 Y h3 4quí 4h0r4 4d0ní4s r31n4, y tú, m1 s3ñ0r r3y, h4st4 4h0r4 n0 l0 s4b3s. 19 H4 m4t4d0 bu3y3s, y 4n1m4l3s g0rd0s, y much4s 0v3j4s, y h4 c0nv1d4d0 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, 4l s4c3rd0t3 4b14t4r, y 4 J04b g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0; m4s 4 S4l0món tu s13rv0 n0 h4 c0nv1d4d0. 20 0ntr3 t4nt0, r3y s3ñ0r mí0, l0s 0j0s d3 t0d0 1sr43l 3stán pu3st0s 3n t1, p4r4 qu3 l3s d3cl4r3s qu1én s3 h4 d3 s3nt4r 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y d3spués d3 él. 21 D3 0tr4 m4n3r4 suc3d3rá qu3 cu4nd0 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y du3rm4 c0n sus p4dr3s, y0 y m1 h1j0 S4l0món s3r3m0s t3n1d0s p0r culp4bl3s. 

22 M13ntr4s 4ún h4bl4b4 3ll4 c0n 3l r3y, h3 4quí v1n0 3l pr0f3t4 N4tán. 23 Y d13r0n 4v1s0 4l r3y, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí 3l pr0f3t4 N4tán; 3l cu4l, cu4nd0 3ntró 4l r3y, s3 p0stró d3l4nt3 d3l r3y 1ncl1n4nd0 su r0str0 4 t13rr4. 24 Y d1j0 N4tán: R3y s3ñ0r mí0, ¿h4s d1ch0 tú: 4d0ní4s r31n4rá d3spués d3 mí, y él s3 s3nt4rá 3n m1 tr0n0? 25 P0rqu3 h0y h4 d3sc3nd1d0, y h4 m4t4d0 bu3y3s y 4n1m4l3s g0rd0s y much4s 0v3j4s, y h4 c0nv1d4d0 4 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, y 4 l0s c4p1t4n3s d3l 3jérc1t0, y t4mb1én 4l s4c3rd0t3 4b14t4r; y h3 4quí, 3stán c0m13nd0 y b3b13nd0 d3l4nt3 d3 él, y h4n d1ch0: ¡V1v4 3l r3y 4d0ní4s! 26 P3r0 n1 4 mí tu s13rv0, n1 4l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c, n1 4 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, n1 4 S4l0món tu s13rv0, h4 c0nv1d4d0. 27 ¿0s 3st3 n3g0c10 0rd3n4d0 p0r m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, s1n h4b3r d3cl4r4d0 4 tus s13rv0s qu1én s3 h4bí4 d3 s3nt4r 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y d3spués d3 él? 

D4v1d pr0cl4m4 r3y 4 S4l0món

28 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y D4v1d r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: Ll4m4dm3 4 B3ts4bé. Y 3ll4 3ntró 4 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3l r3y, y s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y. 29 Y 3l r3y juró d1c13nd0: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 h4 r3d1m1d0 m1 4lm4 d3 t0d4 4ngust14, 30 qu3 c0m0 y0 t3 h3 jur4d0 p0r J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: Tu h1j0 S4l0món r31n4rá d3spués d3 mí, y él s3 s3nt4rá 3n m1 tr0n0 3n lug4r mí0; qu3 4sí l0 h4ré h0y. 31 0nt0nc3s B3ts4bé s3 1ncl1nó 4nt3 3l r3y, c0n su r0str0 4 t13rr4, y h4c13nd0 r3v3r3nc14 4l r3y, d1j0: V1v4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y D4v1d p4r4 s13mpr3. 

32 Y 3l r3y D4v1d d1j0: Ll4m4dm3 4l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c, 4l pr0f3t4 N4tán, y 4 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4. Y 3ll0s 3ntr4r0n 4 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3l r3y. 33 Y 3l r3y l3s d1j0: T0m4d c0n v0s0tr0s l0s s13rv0s d3 vu3str0 s3ñ0r, y m0nt4d 4 S4l0món m1 h1j0 3n m1 mul4, y ll3v4dl0 4 G1hón; 34 y 4llí l0 ung1rán 3l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c y 3l pr0f3t4 N4tán c0m0 r3y s0br3 1sr43l, y t0c4ré1s tr0mp3t4, d1c13nd0: ¡V1v4 3l r3y S4l0món! 35 D3spués 1ré1s v0s0tr0s d3trás d3 él, y v3ndrá y s3 s3nt4rá 3n m1 tr0n0, y él r31n4rá p0r mí; p0rqu3 4 él h3 3sc0g1d0 p4r4 qu3 s34 prínc1p3 s0br3 1sr43l y s0br3 Judá. 36 0nt0nc3s B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4 r3sp0nd1ó 4l r3y y d1j0: 4mén. 4sí l0 d1g4 J3h0vá, D10s d3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y. 37 D3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 J3h0vá h4 3st4d0 c0n m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, 4sí 3sté c0n S4l0món, y h4g4 m4y0r su tr0n0 qu3 3l tr0n0 d3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y D4v1d. 

38 Y d3sc3nd13r0n 3l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c, 3l pr0f3t4 N4tán, B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, y l0s c3r3t30s y l0s p3l3t30s, y m0nt4r0n 4 S4l0món 3n l4 mul4 d3l r3y D4v1d, y l0 ll3v4r0n 4 G1hón. 39 Y t0m4nd0 3l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c 3l cu3rn0 d3l 4c31t3 d3l t4b3rnácul0, ung1ó 4 S4l0món; y t0c4r0n tr0mp3t4, y d1j0 t0d0 3l pu3bl0: ¡V1v4 3l r3y S4l0món! 40 D3spués sub1ó t0d0 3l pu3bl0 3n p0s d3 él, y c4nt4b4 l4 g3nt3 c0n fl4ut4s, y h4cí4n gr4nd3s 4l3grí4s, qu3 p4r3cí4 qu3 l4 t13rr4 s3 hundí4 c0n 3l cl4m0r d3 3ll0s. 

41 Y l0 0yó 4d0ní4s, y t0d0s l0s c0nv1d4d0s qu3 c0n él 3st4b4n, cu4nd0 y4 h4bí4n 4c4b4d0 d3 c0m3r. Y 0y3nd0 J04b 3l s0n1d0 d3 l4 tr0mp3t4, d1j0: ¿P0r qué s3 4lb0r0t4 l4 c1ud4d c0n 3stru3nd0? 42 M13ntr4s él 4ún h4bl4b4, h3 4quí v1n0 J0n4tán h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 4b14t4r, 4l cu4l d1j0 4d0ní4s: 0ntr4, p0rqu3 tú 3r3s h0mbr3 v4l13nt3, y tr43rás bu3n4s nu3v4s. 43 J0n4tán r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0 4 4d0ní4s: C13rt4m3nt3 nu3str0 s3ñ0r 3l r3y D4v1d h4 h3ch0 r3y 4 S4l0món; 44 y 3l r3y h4 3nv14d0 c0n él 4l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c y 4l pr0f3t4 N4tán, y 4 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, y t4mb1én 4 l0s c3r3t30s y 4 l0s p3l3t30s, l0s cu4l3s l3 m0nt4r0n 3n l4 mul4 d3l r3y; 45 y 3l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c y 3l pr0f3t4 N4tán l0 h4n ung1d0 p0r r3y 3n G1hón, y d3 4llí h4n sub1d0 c0n 4l3grí4s, y l4 c1ud4d 3stá ll3n4 d3 3stru3nd0. 0st3 3s 3l 4lb0r0t0 qu3 h4bé1s 0íd0. 46 T4mb1én S4l0món s3 h4 s3nt4d0 3n 3l tr0n0 d3l r31n0, 47 y 4un l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y h4n v3n1d0 4 b3nd3c1r 4 nu3str0 s3ñ0r 3l r3y D4v1d, d1c13nd0: D10s h4g4 bu3n0 3l n0mbr3 d3 S4l0món más qu3 tu n0mbr3, y h4g4 m4y0r su tr0n0 qu3 3l tuy0. Y 3l r3y 4d0ró 3n l4 c4m4. 48 4d3más 3l r3y h4 d1ch0 4sí: B3nd1t0 s34 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, qu3 h4 d4d0 h0y qu13n s3 s13nt3 3n m1 tr0n0, v1énd0l0 m1s 0j0s. 

49 0ll0s 3nt0nc3s s3 3str3m3c13r0n, y s3 l3v4nt4r0n t0d0s l0s c0nv1d4d0s qu3 3st4b4n c0n 4d0ní4s, y s3 fu3 c4d4 un0 p0r su c4m1n0. 50 M4s 4d0ní4s, t3m13nd0 d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 S4l0món, s3 l3v4ntó y s3 fu3, y s3 4s1ó d3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r. 51 Y s3 l0 h1c13r0n s4b3r 4 S4l0món, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 4d0ní4s t13n3 m13d0 d3l r3y S4l0món, pu3s s3 h4 4s1d0 d3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r, d1c13nd0: Júr3m3 h0y 3l r3y S4l0món qu3 n0 m4t4rá 4 3sp4d4 4 su s13rv0. 52 Y S4l0món d1j0: S1 él fu3r3 h0mbr3 d3 b13n, n1 un0 d3 sus c4b3ll0s c43rá 3n t13rr4; m4s s1 s3 h4ll4r3 m4l 3n él, m0r1rá. 53 Y 3nv1ó 3l r3y S4l0món, y l0 tr4j3r0n d3l 4lt4r; y él v1n0, y s3 1ncl1nó 4nt3 3l r3y S4l0món. Y S4l0món l3 d1j0: V3t3 4 tu c4s4. 

M4nd4t0 d3 D4v1d 4 S4l0món

1 R0Y0S 2

1 Ll3g4r0n l0s dí4s 3n qu3 D4v1d h4bí4 d3 m0r1r, y 0rd3nó 4 S4l0món su h1j0, d1c13nd0: 2 Y0 s1g0 3l c4m1n0 d3 t0d0s 3n l4 t13rr4; 3sfuérz4t3, y sé h0mbr3. 3 Gu4rd4 l0s pr3c3pt0s d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, 4nd4nd0 3n sus c4m1n0s, y 0bs3rv4nd0 sus 3st4tut0s y m4nd4m13nt0s, sus d3cr3t0s y sus t3st1m0n10s, d3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0 3n l4 l3y d3 M01sés, p4r4 qu3 pr0sp3r3s 3n t0d0 l0 qu3 h4g4s y 3n t0d0 4qu3ll0 qu3 3mpr3nd4s; 4 p4r4 qu3 c0nf1rm3 J3h0vá l4 p4l4br4 qu3 m3 h4bló, d1c13nd0: S1 tus h1j0s gu4rd4r3n m1 c4m1n0, 4nd4nd0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí c0n v3rd4d, d3 t0d0 su c0r4zón y d3 t0d4 su 4lm4, j4más, d1c3, f4lt4rá 4 t1 v4rón 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 1sr43l. 

5 Y4 s4b3s tú l0 qu3 m3 h4 h3ch0 J04b h1j0 d3 S4rv14, l0 qu3 h1z0 4 d0s g3n3r4l3s d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 1sr43l, 4 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r y 4 4m4s4 h1j0 d3 J3t3r, 4 l0s cu4l3s él m4tó, d3rr4m4nd0 3n t13mp0 d3 p4z l4 s4ngr3 d3 gu3rr4, y p0n13nd0 s4ngr3 d3 gu3rr4 3n 3l t4l4b4rt3 qu3 t3ní4 s0br3 sus l0m0s, y 3n l0s z4p4t0s qu3 t3ní4 3n sus p13s. 6 Tú, pu3s, h4rás c0nf0rm3 4 tu s4b1durí4; n0 d3j4rás d3sc3nd3r sus c4n4s 4l S30l 3n p4z. 7 M4s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 B4rz1l41 g4l44d1t4 h4rás m1s3r1c0rd14, qu3 s34n d3 l0s c0nv1d4d0s 4 tu m3s4; p0rqu3 3ll0s v1n13r0n d3 3st4 m4n3r4 4 mí, cu4nd0 1b4 huy3nd0 d3 4bs4lón tu h3rm4n0. 8 T4mb1én t13n3s c0nt1g0 4 S1m31 h1j0 d3 G3r4, h1j0 d3 B3nj4mín, d3 B4hur1m, 3l cu4l m3 m4ld1j0 c0n un4 m4ld1c1ón fu3rt3 3l dí4 qu3 y0 1b4 4 M4h4n41m. M4s él m1sm0 d3sc3nd1ó 4 r3c1b1rm3 4l J0rdán, y y0 l3 juré p0r J3h0vá d1c13nd0: Y0 n0 t3 m4t4ré 4 3sp4d4. 9 P3r0 4h0r4 n0 l0 4bs0lv3rás; pu3s h0mbr3 s4b10 3r3s, y s4b3s cóm0 d3b3s h4c3r c0n él; y h4rás d3sc3nd3r sus c4n4s c0n s4ngr3 4l S30l. 

Mu3rt3 d3 D4v1d

(1 Cr. 29. 26-30)

10 Y durm1ó D4v1d c0n sus p4dr3s, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n su c1ud4d. 11 L0s dí4s qu3 r31nó D4v1d s0br3 1sr43l fu3r0n cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s; s13t3 4ñ0s r31nó 3n H3brón, y tr31nt4 y tr3s 4ñ0s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén. 12 Y s3 s3ntó S4l0món 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 D4v1d su p4dr3, y su r31n0 fu3 f1rm3 3n gr4n m4n3r4. 

S4l0món 4f1rm4 su r31n0

13 0nt0nc3s 4d0ní4s h1j0 d3 H4gu1t v1n0 4 B3ts4bé m4dr3 d3 S4l0món; y 3ll4 l3 d1j0: ¿0s tu v3n1d4 d3 p4z? 0l r3sp0nd1ó: Sí, d3 p4z. 14 0n s3gu1d4 d1j0: Un4 p4l4br4 t3ng0 qu3 d3c1rt3. Y 3ll4 d1j0: D1. 15 0l d1j0: Tú s4b3s qu3 3l r31n0 3r4 mí0, y qu3 t0d0 1sr43l h4bí4 pu3st0 3n mí su r0str0 p4r4 qu3 y0 r31n4r4; m4s 3l r31n0 fu3 tr4sp4s4d0, y v1n0 4 s3r d3 m1 h3rm4n0, p0rqu3 p0r J3h0vá 3r4 suy0. 16 4h0r4 y0 t3 h4g0 un4 p3t1c1ón; n0 m3 l4 n13gu3s. Y 3ll4 l3 d1j0: H4bl4. 17 0l 3nt0nc3s d1j0: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 h4bl3s 4l r3y S4l0món (p0rqu3 él n0 t3 l0 n3g4rá), p4r4 qu3 m3 dé 4b1s4g sun4m1t4 p0r muj3r. 18 Y B3ts4bé d1j0: B13n; y0 h4bl4ré p0r t1 4l r3y. 

19 V1n0 B3ts4bé 4l r3y S4l0món p4r4 h4bl4rl3 p0r 4d0ní4s. Y 3l r3y s3 l3v4ntó 4 r3c1b1rl4, y s3 1ncl1nó 4nt3 3ll4, y v0lv1ó 4 s3nt4rs3 3n su tr0n0, 3 h1z0 tr43r un4 s1ll4 p4r4 su m4dr3, l4 cu4l s3 s3ntó 4 su d13str4. 20 Y 3ll4 d1j0: Un4 p3qu3ñ4 p3t1c1ón pr3t3nd0 d3 t1; n0 m3 l4 n13gu3s. Y 3l r3y l3 d1j0: P1d3, m4dr3 mí4, qu3 y0 n0 t3 l4 n3g4ré. 21 Y 3ll4 d1j0: D3s3 4b1s4g sun4m1t4 p0r muj3r 4 tu h3rm4n0 4d0ní4s. 22 0l r3y S4l0món r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0 4 su m4dr3: ¿P0r qué p1d3s 4 4b1s4g sun4m1t4 p4r4 4d0ní4s? D3m4nd4 t4mb1én p4r4 él 3l r31n0; p0rqu3 él 3s m1 h3rm4n0 m4y0r, y y4 t13n3 t4mb1én 4l s4c3rd0t3 4b14t4r, y 4 J04b h1j0 d3 S4rv14. 23 Y 3l r3y S4l0món juró p0r J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 4sí m3 h4g4 D10s y 4un m3 4ñ4d4, qu3 c0ntr4 su v1d4 h4 h4bl4d0 4d0ní4s 3st4s p4l4br4s. 24 4h0r4, pu3s, v1v3 J3h0vá, qu13n m3 h4 c0nf1rm4d0 y m3 h4 pu3st0 s0br3 3l tr0n0 d3 D4v1d m1 p4dr3, y qu13n m3 h4 h3ch0 c4s4, c0m0 m3 h4bí4 d1ch0, qu3 4d0ní4s m0r1rá h0y. 25 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y S4l0món 3nv1ó p0r m4n0 d3 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, 3l cu4l 4rr3m3t1ó c0ntr4 él, y mur1ó. 

26 Y 3l r3y d1j0 4l s4c3rd0t3 4b14t4r: V3t3 4 4n4t0t, 4 tus h3r3d4d3s, pu3s 3r3s d1gn0 d3 mu3rt3; p3r0 n0 t3 m4t4ré h0y, p0r cu4nt0 h4s ll3v4d0 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r d3l4nt3 d3 D4v1d m1 p4dr3, y 4d3más h4s s1d0 4fl1g1d0 3n t0d4s l4s c0s4s 3n qu3 fu3 4fl1g1d0 m1 p4dr3. 27 4sí 3chó S4l0món 4 4b14t4r d3l s4c3rd0c10 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 s3 cumpl13s3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 h4bí4 d1ch0 s0br3 l4 c4s4 d3 0lí 3n S1l0. 

28 Y v1n0 l4 n0t1c14 4 J04b; p0rqu3 t4mb1én J04b s3 h4bí4 4dh3r1d0 4 4d0ní4s, s1 b13n n0 s3 h4bí4 4dh3r1d0 4 4bs4lón. Y huyó J04b 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, y s3 4s1ó d3 l0s cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r. 29 Y s3 l3 h1z0 s4b3r 4 S4l0món qu3 J04b h4bí4 hu1d0 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, y qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4l 4lt4r. 0nt0nc3s 3nv1ó S4l0món 4 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, d1c13nd0: V3, y 4rr3m3t3 c0ntr4 él. 30 Y 3ntró B3n4í4 4l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, y l3 d1j0: 0l r3y h4 d1ch0 qu3 s4lg4s. Y él d1j0: N0, s1n0 qu3 4quí m0r1ré. Y B3n4í4 v0lv1ó c0n 3st4 r3spu3st4 4l r3y, d1c13nd0: 4sí d1j0 J04b, y 4sí m3 r3sp0nd1ó. 31 Y 3l r3y l3 d1j0: H4z c0m0 él h4 d1ch0; mát4l3 y 3nt1érr4l3, y qu1t4 d3 mí y d3 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3 l4 s4ngr3 qu3 J04b h4 d3rr4m4d0 1njust4m3nt3. 32 Y J3h0vá h4rá v0lv3r su s4ngr3 s0br3 su c4b3z4; p0rqu3 él h4 d4d0 mu3rt3 4 d0s v4r0n3s más just0s y m3j0r3s qu3 él, 4 l0s cu4l3s m4tó 4 3sp4d4 s1n qu3 m1 p4dr3 D4v1d sup13s3 n4d4: 4 4bn3r h1j0 d3 N3r, g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 1sr43l, y 4 4m4s4 h1j0 d3 J3t3r, g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 Judá. 33 L4 s4ngr3, pu3s, d3 3ll0s r3c43rá s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 J04b, y s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 su d3sc3nd3nc14 p4r4 s13mpr3; m4s s0br3 D4v1d y s0br3 su d3sc3nd3nc14, y s0br3 su c4s4 y s0br3 su tr0n0, h4brá p3rp3tu4m3nt3 p4z d3 p4rt3 d3 J3h0vá. 34 0nt0nc3s B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4 sub1ó y 4rr3m3t1ó c0ntr4 él, y l0 m4tó; y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n su c4s4 3n 3l d3s13rt0. 35 Y 3l r3y pus0 3n su lug4r 4 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4 s0br3 3l 3jérc1t0, y 4 S4d0c pus0 3l r3y p0r s4c3rd0t3 3n lug4r d3 4b14t4r. 

36 D3spués 3nv1ó 3l r3y 3 h1z0 v3n1r 4 S1m31, y l3 d1j0: 0d1fíc4t3 un4 c4s4 3n J3rus4lén y m0r4 4hí, y n0 s4lg4s d3 4llí 4 un4 p4rt3 n1 4 0tr4; 37 p0rqu3 s4b3 d3 c13rt0 qu3 3l dí4 qu3 s4l13r3s y p4s4r3s 3l t0rr3nt3 d3 C3drón, s1n dud4 m0r1rás, y tu s4ngr3 s3rá s0br3 tu c4b3z4. 38 Y S1m31 d1j0 4l r3y: L4 p4l4br4 3s bu3n4; c0m0 3l r3y m1 s3ñ0r h4 d1ch0, 4sí l0 h4rá tu s13rv0. Y h4b1tó S1m31 3n J3rus4lén much0s dí4s. 

39 P3r0 p4s4d0s tr3s 4ñ0s, 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 d0s s13rv0s d3 S1m31 huy3r0n 4 4qu1s h1j0 d3 M44c4, r3y d3 G4t. Y d13r0n 4v1s0 4 S1m31, d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 tus s13rv0s 3stán 3n G4t. 40 0nt0nc3s S1m31 s3 l3v4ntó y 3ns1lló su 4sn0 y fu3 4 4qu1s 3n G4t, p4r4 busc4r 4 sus s13rv0s. Fu3, pu3s, S1m31, y tr4j0 sus s13rv0s d3 G4t. 41 Lu3g0 fu3 d1ch0 4 S4l0món qu3 S1m31 h4bí4 1d0 d3 J3rus4lén h4st4 G4t, y qu3 h4bí4 vu3lt0. 42 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y 3nv1ó 3 h1z0 v3n1r 4 S1m31, y l3 d1j0: ¿N0 t3 h1c3 jur4r y0 p0r J3h0vá, y t3 pr0t3sté d1c13nd0: 0l dí4 qu3 s4l13r3s y fu3r3s 4cá 0 4llá, s4b3 d3 c13rt0 qu3 m0r1rás? Y tú m3 d1j1st3: L4 p4l4br4 3s bu3n4, y0 l4 0b3d3zc0. 43 ¿P0r qué, pu3s, n0 gu4rd4st3 3l jur4m3nt0 d3 J3h0vá, y 3l m4nd4m13nt0 qu3 y0 t3 1mpus3? 44 D1j0 4d3más 3l r3y 4 S1m31: Tú s4b3s t0d0 3l m4l, 3l cu4l tu c0r4zón b13n s4b3, qu3 c0m3t1st3 c0ntr4 m1 p4dr3 D4v1d; J3h0vá, pu3s, h4 h3ch0 v0lv3r 3l m4l s0br3 tu c4b3z4. 45 Y 3l r3y S4l0món s3rá b3nd1t0, y 3l tr0n0 d3 D4v1d s3rá f1rm3 p3rp3tu4m3nt3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 46 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y m4ndó 4 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4, 3l cu4l s4l1ó y l0 h1r1ó, y mur1ó. 

Y 3l r31n0 fu3 c0nf1rm4d0 3n l4 m4n0 d3 S4l0món. 

S4l0món s3 c4s4 c0n l4 h1j4 d3 F4r4ón

1 R0Y0S 3

1 S4l0món h1z0 p4r3nt3sc0 c0n F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, pu3s t0mó l4 h1j4 d3 F4r4ón, y l4 tr4j0 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, 3ntr3 t4nt0 qu3 4c4b4b4 d3 3d1f1c4r su c4s4, y l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l0s mur0s d3 J3rus4lén 4lr3d3d0r. 2 H4st4 3nt0nc3s 3l pu3bl0 s4cr1f1c4b4 3n l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s; p0rqu3 n0 h4bí4 c4s4 3d1f1c4d4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá h4st4 4qu3ll0s t13mp0s. 

S4l0món p1d3 s4b1durí4

(2 Cr. 1.1-13)

3 M4s S4l0món 4mó 4 J3h0vá, 4nd4nd0 3n l0s 3st4tut0s d3 su p4dr3 D4v1d; s0l4m3nt3 s4cr1f1c4b4 y qu3m4b4 1nc13ns0 3n l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s. 4 0 1b4 3l r3y 4 G4b4ón, p0rqu3 4quél 3r4 3l lug4r 4lt0 pr1nc1p4l, y s4cr1f1c4b4 4llí; m1l h0l0c4ust0s s4cr1f1c4b4 S4l0món s0br3 4qu3l 4lt4r. 5 Y s3 l3 4p4r3c1ó J3h0vá 4 S4l0món 3n G4b4ón un4 n0ch3 3n su3ñ0s, y l3 d1j0 D10s: P1d3 l0 qu3 qu13r4s qu3 y0 t3 dé. 6 Y S4l0món d1j0: Tú h1c1st3 gr4n m1s3r1c0rd14 4 tu s13rv0 D4v1d m1 p4dr3, p0rqu3 él 4nduv0 d3l4nt3 d3 t1 3n v3rd4d, 3n just1c14, y c0n r3ct1tud d3 c0r4zón p4r4 c0nt1g0; y tú l3 h4s r3s3rv4d0 3st4 tu gr4n m1s3r1c0rd14, 3n qu3 l3 d1st3 h1j0 qu3 s3 s3nt4s3 3n su tr0n0, c0m0 suc3d3 3n 3st3 dí4. 7 4h0r4 pu3s, J3h0vá D10s mí0, tú m3 h4s pu3st0 4 mí tu s13rv0 p0r r3y 3n lug4r d3 D4v1d m1 p4dr3; y y0 s0y j0v3n, y n0 sé cóm0 3ntr4r n1 s4l1r. 8 Y tu s13rv0 3stá 3n m3d10 d3 tu pu3bl0 4l cu4l tú 3sc0g1st3; un pu3bl0 gr4nd3, qu3 n0 s3 pu3d3 c0nt4r n1 num3r4r p0r su mult1tud. 9 D4, pu3s, 4 tu s13rv0 c0r4zón 3nt3nd1d0 p4r4 juzg4r 4 tu pu3bl0, y p4r4 d1sc3rn1r 3ntr3 l0 bu3n0 y l0 m4l0; p0rqu3 ¿qu1én p0drá g0b3rn4r 3st3 tu pu3bl0 t4n gr4nd3? 

10 Y 4gr4dó d3l4nt3 d3l S3ñ0r qu3 S4l0món p1d13s3 3st0. 11 Y l3 d1j0 D10s: P0rqu3 h4s d3m4nd4d0 3st0, y n0 p3d1st3 p4r4 t1 much0s dí4s, n1 p3d1st3 p4r4 t1 r1qu3z4s, n1 p3d1st3 l4 v1d4 d3 tus 3n3m1g0s, s1n0 qu3 d3m4nd4st3 p4r4 t1 1nt3l1g3nc14 p4r4 01r ju1c10, 12 h3 4quí l0 h3 h3ch0 c0nf0rm3 4 tus p4l4br4s; h3 4quí qu3 t3 h3 d4d0 c0r4zón s4b10 y 3nt3nd1d0, t4nt0 qu3 n0 h4 h4b1d0 4nt3s d3 t1 0tr0 c0m0 tú, n1 d3spués d3 t1 s3 l3v4nt4rá 0tr0 c0m0 tú. 13 Y 4un t4mb1én t3 h3 d4d0 l4s c0s4s qu3 n0 p3d1st3, r1qu3z4s y gl0r14, d3 t4l m4n3r4 qu3 3ntr3 l0s r3y3s n1ngun0 h4y4 c0m0 tú 3n t0d0s tus dí4s. 14 Y s1 4nduv13r3s 3n m1s c4m1n0s, gu4rd4nd0 m1s 3st4tut0s y m1s m4nd4m13nt0s, c0m0 4nduv0 D4v1d tu p4dr3, y0 4l4rg4ré tus dí4s. 

15 Cu4nd0 S4l0món d3sp3rtó, v10 qu3 3r4 su3ñ0; y v1n0 4 J3rus4lén, y s3 pr3s3ntó d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, y s4cr1f1có h0l0c4ust0s y 0fr3c1ó s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z, 3 h1z0 t4mb1én b4nqu3t3 4 t0d0s sus s13rv0s. 

S4b1durí4 y pr0sp3r1d4d d3 S4l0món

16 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 v1n13r0n 4l r3y d0s muj3r3s r4m3r4s, y s3 pr3s3nt4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 17 Y d1j0 un4 d3 3ll4s: ¡4h, s3ñ0r mí0! Y0 y 3st4 muj3r m0ráb4m0s 3n un4 m1sm4 c4s4, y y0 d1 4 luz 3st4nd0 c0n 3ll4 3n l4 c4s4. 18 4c0nt3c1ó 4l t3rc3r dí4 d3spués d3 d4r y0 4 luz, qu3 ést4 d10 4 luz t4mb1én, y m0ráb4m0s n0s0tr4s junt4s; n1ngun0 d3 fu3r4 3st4b4 3n c4s4, s1n0 n0s0tr4s d0s 3n l4 c4s4. 19 Y un4 n0ch3 3l h1j0 d3 3st4 muj3r mur1ó, p0rqu3 3ll4 s3 4c0stó s0br3 él. 20 Y s3 l3v4ntó 4 m3d14n0ch3 y t0mó 4 m1 h1j0 d3 junt0 4 mí, 3st4nd0 y0 tu s13rv4 durm13nd0, y l0 pus0 4 su l4d0, y pus0 4l l4d0 mí0 su h1j0 mu3rt0. 21 Y cu4nd0 y0 m3 l3v4nté d3 m4drug4d4 p4r4 d4r 3l p3ch0 4 m1 h1j0, h3 4quí qu3 3st4b4 mu3rt0; p3r0 l0 0bs3rvé p0r l4 m4ñ4n4, y v1 qu3 n0 3r4 m1 h1j0, 3l qu3 y0 h4bí4 d4d0 4 luz. 22 0nt0nc3s l4 0tr4 muj3r d1j0: N0; m1 h1j0 3s 3l qu3 v1v3, y tu h1j0 3s 3l mu3rt0. Y l4 0tr4 v0lv1ó 4 d3c1r: N0; tu h1j0 3s 3l mu3rt0, y m1 h1j0 3s 3l qu3 v1v3. 4sí h4bl4b4n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y. 

23 0l r3y 3nt0nc3s d1j0: 0st4 d1c3: M1 h1j0 3s 3l qu3 v1v3, y tu h1j0 3s 3l mu3rt0; y l4 0tr4 d1c3: N0, m4s 3l tuy0 3s 3l mu3rt0, y m1 h1j0 3s 3l qu3 v1v3. 24 Y d1j0 3l r3y: Tr43dm3 un4 3sp4d4. Y tr4j3r0n 4l r3y un4 3sp4d4. 25 0n s3gu1d4 3l r3y d1j0: P4rt1d p0r m3d10 4l n1ñ0 v1v0, y d4d l4 m1t4d 4 l4 un4, y l4 0tr4 m1t4d 4 l4 0tr4. 26 0nt0nc3s l4 muj3r d3 qu13n 3r4 3l h1j0 v1v0, h4bló 4l r3y (p0rqu3 sus 3ntr4ñ4s s3 l3 c0nm0v13r0n p0r su h1j0), y d1j0: ¡4h, s3ñ0r mí0! d4d 4 ést4 3l n1ñ0 v1v0, y n0 l0 m4té1s. M4s l4 0tr4 d1j0: N1 4 mí n1 4 t1; p4rt1dl0. 27 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: D4d 4 4quéll4 3l h1j0 v1v0, y n0 l0 m4té1s; 3ll4 3s su m4dr3. 28 Y t0d0 1sr43l 0yó 4qu3l ju1c10 qu3 h4bí4 d4d0 3l r3y; y t3m13r0n 4l r3y, p0rqu3 v13r0n qu3 h4bí4 3n él s4b1durí4 d3 D10s p4r4 juzg4r. 

1 R0Y0S 4

1 R31nó, pu3s, 3l r3y S4l0món s0br3 t0d0 1sr43l. 2 Y 3st0s fu3r0n l0s j3f3s qu3 tuv0: 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c; 3 0l1h0r3f y 4hí4s, h1j0s d3 S1s4, s3cr3t4r10s; J0s4f4t h1j0 d3 4h1lud, c4nc1ll3r; 4 B3n4í4 h1j0 d3 J014d4 s0br3 3l 3jérc1t0; S4d0c y 4b14t4r, l0s s4c3rd0t3s; 5 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3 N4tán, s0br3 l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s; Z4bud h1j0 d3 N4tán, m1n1str0 pr1nc1p4l y 4m1g0 d3l r3y; 6 4h1s4r, m4y0rd0m0; y 4d0n1r4m h1j0 d3 4bd4, s0br3 3l tr1but0. 

7 T3ní4 S4l0món d0c3 g0b3rn4d0r3s s0br3 t0d0 1sr43l, l0s cu4l3s m4nt3ní4n 4l r3y y 4 su c4s4. C4d4 un0 d3 3ll0s 3st4b4 0bl1g4d0 4 4b4st3c3rl0 p0r un m3s 3n 3l 4ñ0. 8 Y 3st0s s0n l0s n0mbr3s d3 3ll0s: 3l h1j0 d3 Hur 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín; 9 3l h1j0 d3 D3c4r 3n M4c4z, 3n S44lb1m, 3n B3t-s3m3s, 3n 0lón y 3n B3t-h4nán; 10 3l h1j0 d3 H3s3d 3n 4rub0t; ést3 t3ní4 t4mb1én 4 S0c0 y t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 H3f3r; 11 3l h1j0 d3 4b1n4d4b 3n t0d0s l0s t3rr1t0r10s d3 D0r; ést3 t3ní4 p0r muj3r 4 T4f4t h1j4 d3 S4l0món; 12 B44n4 h1j0 d3 4h1lud 3n T44n4c y M3gu1d0, 3n t0d4 B3t-s3án, qu3 3stá c3rc4 d3 S4r3tán, más 4b4j0 d3 J3zr33l, d3sd3 B3t-s3án h4st4 4b3l-m3h0l4, y h4st4 3l 0tr0 l4d0 d3 J0cm34m; 13 3l h1j0 d3 G3b3r 3n R4m0t d3 G4l44d; ést3 t3ní4 t4mb1én l4s c1ud4d3s d3 J41r h1j0 d3 M4n4sés, l4s cu4l3s 3st4b4n 3n G4l44d; t3ní4 t4mb1én l4 pr0v1nc14 d3 4rg0b qu3 3st4b4 3n B4sán, s3s3nt4 gr4nd3s c1ud4d3s c0n mur0 y c3rr4dur4s d3 br0nc3; 14 4h1n4d4b h1j0 d3 1dd0 3n M4h4n41m; 15 4h1m44s 3n N3ft4lí; ést3 t0mó t4mb1én p0r muj3r 4 B4s3m4t h1j4 d3 S4l0món. 16 B44n4 h1j0 d3 Hus41, 3n 4s3r y 3n 4l0t; 17 J0s4f4t h1j0 d3 P4rú4, 3n 1s4c4r; 18 S1m31 h1j0 d3 0l4, 3n B3nj4mín; 19 G3b3r h1j0 d3 Ur1, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 G4l44d, l4 t13rr4 d3 S3hón r3y d3 l0s 4m0rr30s y d3 0g r3y d3 B4sán; ést3 3r4 3l ún1c0 g0b3rn4d0r 3n 4qu3ll4 t13rr4. 

20 Judá 3 1sr43l 3r4n much0s, c0m0 l4 4r3n4 qu3 3stá junt0 4l m4r 3n mult1tud, c0m13nd0, b3b13nd0 y 4l3gránd0s3. 21 Y S4l0món s3ñ0r34b4 s0br3 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3sd3 3l 0ufr4t3s h4st4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s y 3l lím1t3 c0n 0g1pt0; y tr4í4n pr3s3nt3s, y s1rv13r0n 4 S4l0món t0d0s l0s dí4s qu3 v1v1ó. 

22 Y l4 pr0v1s1ón d3 S4l0món p4r4 c4d4 dí4 3r4 d3 tr31nt4 c0r0s d3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4, s3s3nt4 c0r0s d3 h4r1n4, 23 d13z bu3y3s g0rd0s, v31nt3 bu3y3s d3 p4st0 y c13n 0v3j4s; s1n l0s c13rv0s, g4c3l4s, c0rz0s y 4v3s g0rd4s. 24 P0rqu3 él s3ñ0r34b4 3n t0d4 l4 r3g1ón 4l 03st3 d3l 0ufr4t3s, d3sd3 T1fs4 h4st4 G4z4, s0br3 t0d0s l0s r3y3s 4l 03st3 d3l 0ufr4t3s; y tuv0 p4z p0r t0d0s l4d0s 4lr3d3d0r. 25 Y Judá 3 1sr43l v1ví4n s3gur0s, c4d4 un0 d3b4j0 d3 su p4rr4 y d3b4j0 d3 su h1gu3r4, d3sd3 D4n h4st4 B33rs3b4, t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 S4l0món. 26 4d3más d3 3st0, S4l0món t3ní4 cu4r3nt4 m1l c4b4ll0s 3n sus c4b4ll3r1z4s p4r4 sus c4rr0s, y d0c3 m1l j1n3t3s. 27 Y 3st0s g0b3rn4d0r3s m4nt3ní4n 4l r3y S4l0món, y 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 4 l4 m3s4 d3l r3y S4l0món v3ní4n, c4d4 un0 un m3s, y h4cí4n qu3 n4d4 f4lt4s3. 28 H4cí4n t4mb1én tr43r c3b4d4 y p4j4 p4r4 l0s c4b4ll0s y p4r4 l4s b3st14s d3 c4rg4, 4l lug4r d0nd3 él 3st4b4, c4d4 un0 c0nf0rm3 4l turn0 qu3 t3ní4. 

29 Y D10s d10 4 S4l0món s4b1durí4 y prud3nc14 muy gr4nd3s, y 4nchur4 d3 c0r4zón c0m0 l4 4r3n4 qu3 3stá 4 l4 0r1ll4 d3l m4r. 30 0r4 m4y0r l4 s4b1durí4 d3 S4l0món qu3 l4 d3 t0d0s l0s 0r13nt4l3s, y qu3 t0d4 l4 s4b1durí4 d3 l0s 3g1pc10s. 31 4un fu3 más s4b10 qu3 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s, más qu3 0tán 3zr4ít4, y qu3 H3mán, C4lc0l y D4rd4, h1j0s d3 M4h0l; y fu3 c0n0c1d0 3ntr3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s d3 4lr3d3d0r. 32 Y c0mpus0 tr3s m1l pr0v3rb10s, y sus c4nt4r3s fu3r0n m1l c1nc0. 33 T4mb1én d1s3rtó s0br3 l0s árb0l3s, d3sd3 3l c3dr0 d3l Líb4n0 h4st4 3l h1s0p0 qu3 n4c3 3n l4 p4r3d. 4s1m1sm0 d1s3rtó s0br3 l0s 4n1m4l3s, s0br3 l4s 4v3s, s0br3 l0s r3pt1l3s y s0br3 l0s p3c3s. 34 Y p4r4 0ír l4 s4b1durí4 d3 S4l0món v3ní4n d3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s y d3 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l4 t13rr4, 4d0nd3 h4bí4 ll3g4d0 l4 f4m4 d3 su s4b1durí4. 

P4ct0 d3 S4l0món c0n H1r4m

(2 Cr. 2.1-18)

1 R0Y0S 5

1 H1r4m r3y d3 T1r0 3nv1ó t4mb1én sus s13rv0s 4 S4l0món, lu3g0 qu3 0yó qu3 l0 h4bí4n ung1d0 p0r r3y 3n lug4r d3 su p4dr3; p0rqu3 H1r4m s13mpr3 h4bí4 4m4d0 4 D4v1d. 2 0nt0nc3s S4l0món 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 H1r4m: 3 Tú s4b3s qu3 m1 p4dr3 D4v1d n0 pud0 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá su D10s, p0r l4s gu3rr4s qu3 l3 r0d34r0n, h4st4 qu3 J3h0vá pus0 sus 3n3m1g0s b4j0 l4s pl4nt4s d3 sus p13s. 4 4h0r4 J3h0vá m1 D10s m3 h4 d4d0 p4z p0r t0d4s p4rt3s; pu3s n1 h4y 4dv3rs4r10s, n1 m4l qu3 t3m3r. 5 Y0, p0r t4nt0, h3 d3t3rm1n4d0 4h0r4 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá m1 D10s, s3gún l0 qu3 J3h0vá h4bló 4 D4v1d m1 p4dr3, d1c13nd0: Tu h1j0, 4 qu13n y0 p0ndré 3n lug4r tuy0 3n tu tr0n0, él 3d1f1c4rá c4s4 4 m1 n0mbr3. 6 M4nd4, pu3s, 4h0r4, qu3 m3 c0rt3n c3dr0s d3l Líb4n0; y m1s s13rv0s 3st4rán c0n l0s tuy0s, y y0 t3 d4ré p0r tus s13rv0s 3l s4l4r10 qu3 tú d1j3r3s; p0rqu3 tú s4b3s b13n qu3 n1ngun0 h4y 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s qu3 s3p4 l4br4r m4d3r4 c0m0 l0s s1d0n10s. 

7 Cu4nd0 H1r4m 0yó l4s p4l4br4s d3 S4l0món, s3 4l3gró 3n gr4n m4n3r4, y d1j0: B3nd1t0 s34 h0y J3h0vá, qu3 d10 h1j0 s4b10 4 D4v1d s0br3 3st3 pu3bl0 t4n gr4nd3. 8 Y 3nv1ó H1r4m 4 d3c1r 4 S4l0món: H3 0íd0 l0 qu3 m3 m4nd4st3 4 d3c1r; y0 h4ré t0d0 l0 qu3 t3 pl4zc4 4c3rc4 d3 l4 m4d3r4 d3 c3dr0 y l4 m4d3r4 d3 c1prés. 9 M1s s13rv0s l4 ll3v4rán d3sd3 3l Líb4n0 4l m4r, y l4 3nv14ré 3n b4ls4s p0r m4r h4st4 3l lug4r qu3 tú m3 s3ñ4l3s, y 4llí s3 d3s4t4rá, y tú l4 t0m4rás; y tú cumpl1rás m1 d3s30 4l d4r d3 c0m3r 4 m1 f4m1l14. 10 D10, pu3s, H1r4m 4 S4l0món m4d3r4 d3 c3dr0 y m4d3r4 d3 c1prés, t0d4 l4 qu3 qu1s0. 11 Y S4l0món d4b4 4 H1r4m v31nt3 m1l c0r0s d3 tr1g0 p4r4 3l sust3nt0 d3 su f4m1l14, y v31nt3 c0r0s d3 4c31t3 pur0; 3st0 d4b4 S4l0món 4 H1r4m c4d4 4ñ0. 12 J3h0vá, pu3s, d10 4 S4l0món s4b1durí4 c0m0 l3 h4bí4 d1ch0; y hub0 p4z 3ntr3 H1r4m y S4l0món, 3 h1c13r0n p4ct0 3ntr3 4mb0s. 

13 Y 3l r3y S4l0món d3cr3tó l3v4 3n t0d0 1sr43l, y l4 l3v4 fu3 d3 tr31nt4 m1l h0mbr3s, 14 l0s cu4l3s 3nv14b4 4l Líb4n0 d3 d13z m1l 3n d13z m1l, c4d4 m3s p0r turn0, v1n13nd0 4sí 4 3st4r un m3s 3n 3l Líb4n0, y d0s m3s3s 3n sus c4s4s; y 4d0n1r4m 3st4b4 3nc4rg4d0 d3 4qu3ll4 l3v4. 15 T3ní4 t4mb1én S4l0món s3t3nt4 m1l qu3 ll3v4b4n l4s c4rg4s, y 0ch3nt4 m1l c0rt4d0r3s 3n 3l m0nt3; 16 s1n l0s pr1nc1p4l3s 0f1c14l3s d3 S4l0món qu3 3st4b4n s0br3 l4 0br4, tr3s m1l tr3sc13nt0s, l0s cu4l3s t3ní4n 4 c4rg0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4cí4 l4 0br4. 17 Y m4ndó 3l r3y qu3 tr4j3s3n p13dr4s gr4nd3s, p13dr4s c0st0s4s, p4r4 l0s c1m13nt0s d3 l4 c4s4, y p13dr4s l4br4d4s. 18 Y l0s 4lb4ñ1l3s d3 S4l0món y l0s d3 H1r4m, y l0s h0mbr3s d3 G3b4l, c0rt4r0n y pr3p4r4r0n l4 m4d3r4 y l4 c4nt3rí4 p4r4 l4br4r l4 c4s4. 

S4l0món 3d1f1c4 3l t3mpl0

(2 Cr. 3. 1-14)

1 R0Y0S 6

1 0n 3l 4ñ0 cu4tr0c13nt0s 0ch3nt4 d3spués qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l s4l13r0n d3 0g1pt0, 3l cu4rt0 4ñ0 d3l pr1nc1p10 d3l r31n0 d3 S4l0món s0br3 1sr43l, 3n 3l m3s d3 Z1f, qu3 3s 3l m3s s3gund0, c0m3nzó él 4 3d1f1c4r l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 2 L4 c4s4 qu3 3l r3y S4l0món 3d1f1có 4 J3h0vá t3ní4 s3s3nt4 c0d0s d3 l4rg0 y v31nt3 d3 4nch0, y tr31nt4 c0d0s d3 4lt0. 3 Y 3l pórt1c0 d3l4nt3 d3l t3mpl0 d3 l4 c4s4 t3ní4 v31nt3 c0d0s d3 l4rg0 4 l0 4nch0 d3 l4 c4s4, y 3l 4nch0 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 3r4 d3 d13z c0d0s. 4 0 h1z0 4 l4 c4s4 v3nt4n4s 4nch4s p0r d3ntr0 y 3str3ch4s p0r fu3r4. 5 0d1f1có t4mb1én junt0 4l mur0 d3 l4 c4s4 4p0s3nt0s 4lr3d3d0r, c0ntr4 l4s p4r3d3s d3 l4 c4s4 4lr3d3d0r d3l t3mpl0 y d3l lug4r s4ntís1m0; 3 h1z0 cám4r4s l4t3r4l3s 4lr3d3d0r. 6 0l 4p0s3nt0 d3 4b4j0 3r4 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s d3 4nch0, 3l d3 3n m3d10 d3 s31s c0d0s d3 4nch0, y 3l t3rc3r0 d3 s13t3 c0d0s d3 4nch0; p0rqu3 p0r fu3r4 h4bí4 h3ch0 d1sm1nuc10n3s 4 l4 c4s4 4lr3d3d0r, p4r4 n0 3mp0tr4r l4s v1g4s 3n l4s p4r3d3s d3 l4 c4s4. 

7 Y cu4nd0 s3 3d1f1có l4 c4s4, l4 f4br1c4r0n d3 p13dr4s qu3 tr4í4n y4 4c4b4d4s, d3 t4l m4n3r4 qu3 cu4nd0 l4 3d1f1c4b4n, n1 m4rt1ll0s n1 h4ch4s s3 0y3r0n 3n l4 c4s4, n1 n1ngún 0tr0 1nstrum3nt0 d3 h13rr0.

H4bí4 t4mb1én s0br3 l4 b0c4 3nt4ll4dur4s c0n sus t4bl3r0s, l0s cu4l3s 3r4n cu4dr4d0s, n0 r3d0nd0s. 32 L4s cu4tr0 ru3d4s 3st4b4n d3b4j0 d3 l0s t4bl3r0s, y l0s 3j3s d3 l4s ru3d4s n4cí4n 3n l4 m1sm4 b4s4. L4 4ltur4 d3 c4d4 ru3d4 3r4 d3 un c0d0 y m3d10. 33 Y l4 f0rm4 d3 l4s ru3d4s 3r4 c0m0 l4 d3 l4s ru3d4s d3 un c4rr0; sus 3j3s, sus r4y0s, sus cub0s y sus c1nch0s, t0d0 3r4 d3 fund1c1ón. 34 4s1m1sm0 l4s cu4tr0 r3p1s4s d3 l4s cu4tr0 3squ1n4s d3 c4d4 b4s4; y l4s r3p1s4s 3r4n p4rt3 d3 l4 m1sm4 b4s4. 35 Y 3n l0 4lt0 d3 l4 b4s4 h4bí4 un4 p13z4 r3d0nd4 d3 m3d10 c0d0 d3 4ltur4, y 3nc1m4 d3 l4 b4s4 sus m0ldur4s y t4bl3r0s, l0s cu4l3s s4lí4n d3 3ll4 m1sm4. 36 0 h1z0 3n l4s t4bl4s d3 l4s m0ldur4s, y 3n l0s t4bl3r0s, 3nt4ll4dur4s d3 qu3rub1n3s, d3 l30n3s y d3 p4lm3r4s, c0n pr0p0rc1ón 3n 3l 3sp4c10 d3 c4d4 un4, y 4lr3d3d0r 0tr0s 4d0rn0s. 37 D3 3st4 f0rm4 h1z0 d13z b4s4s, fund1d4s d3 un4 m1sm4 m4n3r4, d3 un4 m1sm4 m3d1d4 y d3 un4 m1sm4 3nt4ll4dur4. 

38 H1z0 t4mb1én d13z fu3nt3s d3 br0nc3; c4d4 fu3nt3 c0nt3ní4 cu4r3nt4 b4t0s, y c4d4 un4 3r4 d3 cu4tr0 c0d0s; y c0l0có un4 fu3nt3 s0br3 c4d4 un4 d3 l4s d13z b4s4s. 39 Y pus0 c1nc0 b4s4s 4 l4 m4n0 d3r3ch4 d3 l4 c4s4, y l4s 0tr4s c1nc0 4 l4 m4n0 1zqu13rd4; y c0l0có 3l m4r 4l l4d0 d3r3ch0 d3 l4 c4s4, 4l 0r13nt3, h4c14 3l sur. 

40 4s1m1sm0 h1z0 H1r4m fu3nt3s, y t3n4z4s, y cu3nc0s. 4sí t3rm1nó t0d4 l4 0br4 qu3 h1z0 4 S4l0món p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá: 41 d0s c0lumn4s, y l0s c4p1t3l3s r3d0nd0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n l0 4lt0 d3 l4s d0s c0lumn4s; y d0s r3d3s qu3 cubrí4n l0s d0s c4p1t3l3s r3d0nd0s qu3 3st4b4n s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 l4s c0lumn4s; 42 cu4tr0c13nt4s gr4n4d4s p4r4 l4s d0s r3d3s, d0s h1l3r4s d3 gr4n4d4s 3n c4d4 r3d, p4r4 cubr1r l0s d0s c4p1t3l3s r3d0nd0s qu3 3st4b4n s0br3 l4s c4b3z4s d3 l4s c0lumn4s; 43 l4s d13z b4s4s, y l4s d13z fu3nt3s s0br3 l4s b4s4s; 44 un m4r, c0n d0c3 bu3y3s d3b4j0 d3l m4r; 45 y c4ld3r0s, p4l3t4s, cu3nc0s, y t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s qu3 H1r4m h1z0 4l r3y S4l0món, p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, d3 br0nc3 bruñ1d0. 46 T0d0 l0 h1z0 fund1r 3l r3y 3n l4 ll4nur4 d3l J0rdán, 3n t13rr4 4rc1ll0s4, 3ntr3 Suc0t y S4r3tán. 47 Y n0 1nqu1r1ó S4l0món 3l p3s0 d3l br0nc3 d3 t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s, p0r l4 gr4n c4nt1d4d d3 3ll0s. 

48 0nt0nc3s h1z0 S4l0món t0d0s l0s 3ns3r3s qu3 p3rt3n3cí4n 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá: un 4lt4r d3 0r0, y un4 m3s4 t4mb1én d3 0r0, s0br3 l4 cu4l 3st4b4n l0s p4n3s d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón; 49 c1nc0 c4nd3l3r0s d3 0r0 purís1m0 4 l4 m4n0 d3r3ch4, y 0tr0s c1nc0 4 l4 1zqu13rd4, fr3nt3 4l lug4r s4ntís1m0; c0n l4s fl0r3s, l4s lámp4r4s y t3n4z4s d3 0r0. 50 4s1m1sm0 l0s cánt4r0s, d3sp4b1l4d3r4s, t4z4s, cuch4r1ll4s 3 1nc3ns4r10s, d3 0r0 purís1m0; t4mb1én d3 0r0 l0s qu1c14l3s d3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 4d3ntr0, d3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, y l0s d3 l4s pu3rt4s d3l t3mpl0. 

51 4sí s3 t3rm1nó t0d4 l4 0br4 qu3 d1spus0 h4c3r 3l r3y S4l0món p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. Y m3t1ó S4l0món l0 qu3 D4v1d su p4dr3 h4bí4 d3d1c4d0, pl4t4, 0r0 y ut3ns1l10s; y d3p0s1tó t0d0 3n l4s t3s0r3rí4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 

S4l0món tr4sl4d4 3l 4rc4 4l t3mpl0

(2 Cr. 5.2-14)

1 R0Y0S 8

1 0nt0nc3s S4l0món r3un1ó 4nt3 sí 3n J3rus4lén 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l, 4 t0d0s l0s j3f3s d3 l4s tr1bus, y 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 tr43r 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, l4 cu4l 3s S10n. 2 Y s3 r3un13r0n c0n 3l r3y S4l0món t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l 3n 3l m3s d3 0t4n1m, qu3 3s 3l m3s sépt1m0, 3n 3l dí4 d3 l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3. 3 Y v1n13r0n t0d0s l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s t0m4r0n 3l 4rc4. 4 Y ll3v4r0n 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, y 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s s4gr4d0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0, l0s cu4l3s ll3v4b4n l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s. 5 Y 3l r3y S4l0món, y t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l qu3 s3 h4bí4 r3un1d0 c0n él, 3st4b4n c0n él d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4, s4cr1f1c4nd0 0v3j4s y bu3y3s, qu3 p0r l4 mult1tud n0 s3 p0dí4n c0nt4r n1 num3r4r. 6 Y l0s s4c3rd0t3s m3t13r0n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá 3n su lug4r, 3n 3l s4ntu4r10 d3 l4 c4s4, 3n 3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, d3b4j0 d3 l4s 4l4s d3 l0s qu3rub1n3s. 7 P0rqu3 l0s qu3rub1n3s t3ní4n 3xt3nd1d4s l4s 4l4s s0br3 3l lug4r d3l 4rc4, y 4sí cubrí4n l0s qu3rub1n3s 3l 4rc4 y sus v4r4s p0r 3nc1m4. 8 Y s4c4r0n l4s v4r4s, d3 m4n3r4 qu3 sus 3xtr3m0s s3 d3j4b4n v3r d3sd3 3l lug4r s4nt0, qu3 3stá d3l4nt3 d3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, p3r0 n0 s3 d3j4b4n v3r d3sd3 más 4fu3r4; y 4sí qu3d4r0n h4st4 h0y. 9 0n 3l 4rc4 n1ngun4 c0s4 h4bí4 s1n0 l4s d0s t4bl4s d3 p13dr4 qu3 4llí h4bí4 pu3st0 M01sés 3n H0r3b, d0nd3 J3h0vá h1z0 p4ct0 c0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, cu4nd0 s4l13r0n d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. 10 Y cu4nd0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s s4l13r0n d3l s4ntu4r10, l4 nub3 ll3nó l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 11 Y l0s s4c3rd0t3s n0 pud13r0n p3rm4n3c3r p4r4 m1n1str4r p0r c4us4 d3 l4 nub3; p0rqu3 l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá h4bí4 ll3n4d0 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 

D3d1c4c1ón d3l t3mpl0

(2 Cr. 6.17.10)

12 0nt0nc3s d1j0 S4l0món: J3h0vá h4 d1ch0 qu3 él h4b1t4rí4 3n l4 0scur1d4d. 13 Y0 h3 3d1f1c4d0 c4s4 p0r m0r4d4 p4r4 t1, s1t10 3n qu3 tú h4b1t3s p4r4 s13mpr3. 14 Y v0lv13nd0 3l r3y su r0str0, b3nd1j0 4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l; y t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l 3st4b4 d3 p13. 15 Y d1j0: B3nd1t0 s34 J3h0vá, D10s d3 1sr43l, qu3 h4bló 4 D4v1d m1 p4dr3 l0 qu3 c0n su m4n0 h4 cumpl1d0, d1c13nd0: 16 D3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 s4qué d3 0g1pt0 4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, n0 h3 3sc0g1d0 c1ud4d d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l p4r4 3d1f1c4r c4s4 3n l4 cu4l 3stuv13s3 m1 n0mbr3, 4unqu3 3sc0gí 4 D4v1d p4r4 qu3 pr3s1d13s3 3n m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l. 17 Y D4v1d m1 p4dr3 tuv0 3n su c0r4zón 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 18 P3r0 J3h0vá d1j0 4 D4v1d m1 p4dr3: Cu4nt0 4 h4b3r t3n1d0 3n tu c0r4zón 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4 m1 n0mbr3, b13n h4s h3ch0 3n t3n3r t4l d3s30. 19 P3r0 tú n0 3d1f1c4rás l4 c4s4, s1n0 tu h1j0 qu3 s4ldrá d3 tus l0m0s, él 3d1f1c4rá c4s4 4 m1 n0mbr3. 20 Y J3h0vá h4 cumpl1d0 su p4l4br4 qu3 h4bí4 d1ch0; p0rqu3 y0 m3 h3 l3v4nt4d0 3n lug4r d3 D4v1d m1 p4dr3, y m3 h3 s3nt4d0 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 1sr43l, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 d1ch0, y h3 3d1f1c4d0 l4 c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 21 Y h3 pu3st0 3n 3ll4 lug4r p4r4 3l 4rc4, 3n l4 cu4l 3stá 3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá qu3 él h1z0 c0n nu3str0s p4dr3s cu4nd0 l0s s4có d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. 

22 Lu3g0 s3 pus0 S4l0món d3l4nt3 d3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá, 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l, y 3xt3nd13nd0 sus m4n0s 4l c13l0, 23 d1j0: J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, n0 h4y D10s c0m0 tú, n1 4rr1b4 3n l0s c13l0s n1 4b4j0 3n l4 t13rr4, qu3 gu4rd4s 3l p4ct0 y l4 m1s3r1c0rd14 4 tus s13rv0s, l0s qu3 4nd4n d3l4nt3 d3 t1 c0n t0d0 su c0r4zón; 24 qu3 h4s cumpl1d0 4 tu s13rv0 D4v1d m1 p4dr3 l0 qu3 l3 pr0m3t1st3; l0 d1j1st3 c0n tu b0c4, y c0n tu m4n0 l0 h4s cumpl1d0, c0m0 suc3d3 3n 3st3 dí4. 25 4h0r4, pu3s, J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, cumpl3 4 tu s13rv0 D4v1d m1 p4dr3 l0 qu3 l3 pr0m3t1st3, d1c13nd0: N0 t3 f4lt4rá v4rón d3l4nt3 d3 mí, qu3 s3 s13nt3 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 1sr43l, c0n t4l qu3 tus h1j0s gu4rd3n m1 c4m1n0 y 4nd3n d3l4nt3 d3 mí c0m0 tú h4s 4nd4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí. 26 4h0r4, pu3s, 0h J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, cúmpl4s3 l4 p4l4br4 qu3 d1j1st3 4 tu s13rv0 D4v1d m1 p4dr3. 

27 P3r0 ¿3s v3rd4d qu3 D10s m0r4rá s0br3 l4 t13rr4? H3 4quí qu3 l0s c13l0s, l0s c13l0s d3 l0s c13l0s, n0 t3 pu3d3n c0nt3n3r; ¿cuánt0 m3n0s 3st4 c4s4 qu3 y0 h3 3d1f1c4d0? 28 C0n t0d0, tú 4t3nd3rás 4 l4 0r4c1ón d3 tu s13rv0, y 4 su pl3g4r14, 0h J3h0vá D10s mí0, 0y3nd0 3l cl4m0r y l4 0r4c1ón qu3 tu s13rv0 h4c3 h0y d3l4nt3 d3 t1; 29 qu3 3stén tus 0j0s 4b13rt0s d3 n0ch3 y d3 dí4 s0br3 3st4 c4s4, s0br3 3st3 lug4r d3l cu4l h4s d1ch0: M1 n0mbr3 3st4rá 4llí; y qu3 01g4s l4 0r4c1ón qu3 tu s13rv0 h4g4 3n 3st3 lug4r. 30 0y3, pu3s, l4 0r4c1ón d3 tu s13rv0, y d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l; cu4nd0 0r3n 3n 3st3 lug4r, t4mb1én tú l0 01rás 3n 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4, 3n l0s c13l0s; 3scuch4 y p3rd0n4. 

31 S1 4lgun0 p3c4r3 c0ntr4 su prój1m0, y l3 t0m4r3n jur4m3nt0 h4c1énd0l3 jur4r, y v1n13r3 3l jur4m3nt0 d3l4nt3 d3 tu 4lt4r 3n 3st4 c4s4; 32 tú 01rás d3sd3 3l c13l0 y 4ctu4rás, y juzg4rás 4 tus s13rv0s, c0nd3n4nd0 4l 1mpí0 y h4c13nd0 r3c43r su pr0c3d3r s0br3 su c4b3z4, y just1f1c4nd0 4l just0 p4r4 d4rl3 c0nf0rm3 4 su just1c14. 

33 S1 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l fu3r3 d3rr0t4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s p0r h4b3r p3c4d0 c0ntr4 t1, y s3 v0lv13r3n 4 t1 y c0nf3s4r3n tu n0mbr3, y 0r4r3n y t3 r0g4r3n y supl1c4r3n 3n 3st4 c4s4, 34 tú 01rás 3n l0s c13l0s, y p3rd0n4rás 3l p3c4d0 d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, y l0s v0lv3rás 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 d1st3 4 sus p4dr3s. 

35 S1 3l c13l0 s3 c3rr4r3 y n0 ll0v13r3, p0r h4b3r 3ll0s p3c4d0 c0ntr4 t1, y t3 r0g4r3n 3n 3st3 lug4r y c0nf3s4r3n tu n0mbr3, y s3 v0lv13r3n d3l p3c4d0, cu4nd0 l0s 4fl1g13r3s, 36 tú 01rás 3n l0s c13l0s, y p3rd0n4rás 3l p3c4d0 d3 tus s13rv0s y d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, 3ns3ñánd0l3s 3l bu3n c4m1n0 3n qu3 4nd3n; y d4rás lluv14s s0br3 tu t13rr4, l4 cu4l d1st3 4 tu pu3bl0 p0r h3r3d4d. 

37 S1 3n l4 t13rr4 hub13r3 h4mbr3, p3st1l3nc14, t1z0nc1ll0, 4ñubl0, l4ng0st4 0 pulgón; s1 sus 3n3m1g0s l0s s1t14r3n 3n l4 t13rr4 3n d0nd3 h4b1t3n; cu4lqu13r pl4g4 0 3nf3rm3d4d qu3 s34; 38 t0d4 0r4c1ón y t0d4 súpl1c4 qu3 h1c13r3 cu4lqu13r h0mbr3, 0 t0d0 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, cu4nd0 cu4lqu13r4 s1nt13r3 l4 pl4g4 3n su c0r4zón, y 3xt3nd13r3 sus m4n0s 4 3st4 c4s4, 39 tú 01rás 3n l0s c13l0s, 3n 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4, y p3rd0n4rás, y 4ctu4rás, y d4rás 4 c4d4 un0 c0nf0rm3 4 sus c4m1n0s, cuy0 c0r4zón tú c0n0c3s (p0rqu3 sól0 tú c0n0c3s 3l c0r4zón d3 t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s); 40 p4r4 qu3 t3 t3m4n t0d0s l0s dí4s qu3 v1v4n s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 tú d1st3 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s. 

41 4s1m1sm0 3l 3xtr4nj3r0, qu3 n0 3s d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, qu3 v1n13r3 d3 l3j4n4s t13rr4s 4 c4us4 d3 tu n0mbr3 42 (pu3s 01rán d3 tu gr4n n0mbr3, d3 tu m4n0 fu3rt3 y d3 tu br4z0 3xt3nd1d0), y v1n13r3 4 0r4r 4 3st4 c4s4, 43 tú 01rás 3n l0s c13l0s, 3n 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4, y h4rás c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 4qu3ll0 p0r l0 cu4l 3l 3xtr4nj3r0 hub13r3 cl4m4d0 4 t1, p4r4 qu3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4 c0n0zc4n tu n0mbr3 y t3 t3m4n, c0m0 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, y 3nt13nd4n qu3 tu n0mbr3 3s 1nv0c4d0 s0br3 3st4 c4s4 qu3 y0 3d1f1qué. 

44 S1 tu pu3bl0 s4l13r3 3n b4t4ll4 c0ntr4 sus 3n3m1g0s p0r 3l c4m1n0 qu3 tú l3s m4nd3s, y 0r4r3n 4 J3h0vá c0n 3l r0str0 h4c14 l4 c1ud4d qu3 tú 3l3g1st3, y h4c14 l4 c4s4 qu3 y0 3d1f1qué 4 tu n0mbr3, 45 tú 01rás 3n l0s c13l0s su 0r4c1ón y su súpl1c4, y l3s h4rás just1c14. 

46 S1 p3c4r3n c0ntr4 t1 (p0rqu3 n0 h4y h0mbr3 qu3 n0 p3qu3), y 3stuv13r3s 41r4d0 c0ntr4 3ll0s, y l0s 3ntr3g4r3s d3l4nt3 d3l 3n3m1g0, p4r4 qu3 l0s c4ut1v3 y ll3v3 4 t13rr4 3n3m1g4, s34 l3j0s 0 c3rc4, 47 y 3ll0s v0lv13r3n 3n sí 3n l4 t13rr4 d0nd3 fu3r3n c4ut1v0s; s1 s3 c0nv1rt13r3n, y 0r4r3n 4 t1 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s qu3 l0s c4ut1v4r0n, y d1j3r3n: P3c4m0s, h3m0s h3ch0 l0 m4l0, h3m0s c0m3t1d0 1mp13d4d; 48 y s1 s3 c0nv1rt13r3n 4 t1 d3 t0d0 su c0r4zón y d3 t0d4 su 4lm4, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s qu3 l0s hub13r3n ll3v4d0 c4ut1v0s, y 0r4r3n 4 t1 c0n 3l r0str0 h4c14 su t13rr4 qu3 tú d1st3 4 sus p4dr3s, y h4c14 l4 c1ud4d qu3 tú 3l3g1st3 y l4 c4s4 qu3 y0 h3 3d1f1c4d0 4 tu n0mbr3, 49 tú 01rás 3n l0s c13l0s, 3n 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4, su 0r4c1ón y su súpl1c4, y l3s h4rás just1c14. 50 Y p3rd0n4rás 4 tu pu3bl0 qu3 h4bí4 p3c4d0 c0ntr4 t1, y t0d4s sus 1nfr4cc10n3s c0n qu3 s3 h4y4n r3b3l4d0 c0ntr4 t1, y h4rás qu3 t3ng4n d3 3ll0s m1s3r1c0rd14 l0s qu3 l0s hub13r3n ll3v4d0 c4ut1v0s; 51 p0rqu3 3ll0s s0n tu pu3bl0 y tu h3r3d4d, 3l cu4l tú s4c4st3 d3 0g1pt0, d3 3n m3d10 d3l h0rn0 d3 h13rr0. 52 0stén, pu3s, 4t3nt0s tus 0j0s 4 l4 0r4c1ón d3 tu s13rv0 y 4 l4 pl3g4r14 d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, p4r4 0írl0s 3n t0d0 4qu3ll0 p0r l0 cu4l t3 1nv0c4r3n; 53 p0rqu3 tú l0s 4p4rt4st3 p4r4 t1 c0m0 h3r3d4d tuy4 d3 3ntr3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4, c0m0 l0 d1j1st3 p0r m3d10 d3 M01sés tu s13rv0, cu4nd0 s4c4st3 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s d3 0g1pt0, 0h S3ñ0r J3h0vá. 

54 Cu4nd0 4c4bó S4l0món d3 h4c3r 4 J3h0vá t0d4 3st4 0r4c1ón y súpl1c4, s3 l3v4ntó d3 3st4r d3 r0d1ll4s d3l4nt3 d3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá c0n sus m4n0s 3xt3nd1d4s 4l c13l0; 55 y pu3st0 3n p13, b3nd1j0 4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0 3n v0z 4lt4: 56 B3nd1t0 s34 J3h0vá, qu3 h4 d4d0 p4z 4 su pu3bl0 1sr43l, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 él h4bí4 d1ch0; n1ngun4 p4l4br4 d3 t0d4s sus pr0m3s4s qu3 3xpr3só p0r M01sés su s13rv0, h4 f4lt4d0. 57 0sté c0n n0s0tr0s J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, c0m0 3stuv0 c0n nu3str0s p4dr3s, y n0 n0s d3s4mp4r3 n1 n0s d3j3. 58 1ncl1n3 nu3str0 c0r4zón h4c14 él, p4r4 qu3 4nd3m0s 3n t0d0s sus c4m1n0s, y gu4rd3m0s sus m4nd4m13nt0s y sus 3st4tut0s y sus d3cr3t0s, l0s cu4l3s m4ndó 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s. 59 Y 3st4s m1s p4l4br4s c0n qu3 h3 0r4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, 3stén c3rc4 d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s d3 dí4 y d3 n0ch3, p4r4 qu3 él pr0t3j4 l4 c4us4 d3 su s13rv0 y d3 su pu3bl0 1sr43l, c4d4 c0s4 3n su t13mp0; 60 4 f1n d3 qu3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4 s3p4n qu3 J3h0vá 3s D10s, y qu3 n0 h4y 0tr0. 61 S34, pu3s, p3rf3ct0 vu3str0 c0r4zón p4r4 c0n J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, 4nd4nd0 3n sus 3st4tut0s y gu4rd4nd0 sus m4nd4m13nt0s, c0m0 3n 3l dí4 d3 h0y. 

62 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él, s4cr1f1c4r0n víct1m4s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 63 Y 0fr3c1ó S4l0món s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z, l0s cu4l3s 0fr3c1ó 4 J3h0vá: v31nt1dós m1l bu3y3s y c13nt0 v31nt3 m1l 0v3j4s. 4sí d3d1c4r0n 3l r3y y t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 64 4qu3l m1sm0 dí4 s4nt1f1có 3l r3y 3l m3d10 d3l 4tr10, 3l cu4l 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá; p0rqu3 0fr3c1ó 4llí l0s h0l0c4ust0s, l4s 0fr3nd4s y l4 gr0sur4 d3 l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z, p0r cu4nt0 3l 4lt4r d3 br0nc3 qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3r4 p3qu3ñ0, y n0 c4bí4n 3n él l0s h0l0c4ust0s, l4s 0fr3nd4s y l4 gr0sur4 d3 l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z. 

65 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 S4l0món h1z0 f13st4, y c0n él t0d0 1sr43l, un4 gr4n c0ngr3g4c1ón, d3sd3 d0nd3 3ntr4n 3n H4m4t h4st4 3l rí0 d3 0g1pt0, d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, p0r s13t3 dí4s y 4un p0r 0tr0s s13t3 dí4s, 3st0 3s, p0r c4t0rc3 dí4s. 66 Y 4l 0ct4v0 dí4 d3sp1d1ó 4l pu3bl0; y 3ll0s, b3nd1c13nd0 4l r3y, s3 fu3r0n 4 sus m0r4d4s 4l3gr3s y g0z0s0s d3 c0r4zón, p0r t0d0s l0s b3n3f1c10s qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h3ch0 4 D4v1d su s13rv0 y 4 su pu3bl0 1sr43l.
