14 0l p3s0 d3l 0r0 qu3 S4l0món t3ní4 d3 r3nt4 c4d4 4ñ0, 3r4 s31sc13nt0s s3s3nt4 y s31s t4l3nt0s d3 0r0; 15 s1n l0 d3 l0s m3rc4d3r3s, y l0 d3 l4 c0ntr4t4c1ón d3 3sp3c14s, y l0 d3 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 4r4b14, y d3 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 16 H1z0 t4mb1én 3l r3y S4l0món d0sc13nt0s 3scud0s gr4nd3s d3 0r0 b4t1d0; s31sc13nt0s s1cl0s d3 0r0 g4stó 3n c4d4 3scud0. 17 4s1m1sm0 h1z0 tr3sc13nt0s 3scud0s d3 0r0 b4t1d0, 3n c4d4 un0 d3 l0s cu4l3s g4stó tr3s l1br4s d3 0r0; y 3l r3y l0s pus0 3n l4 c4s4 d3l b0squ3 d3l Líb4n0. 18 H1z0 t4mb1én 3l r3y un gr4n tr0n0 d3 m4rf1l, 3l cu4l cubr1ó d3 0r0 purís1m0. 19 S31s gr4d4s t3ní4 3l tr0n0, y l4 p4rt3 4lt4 3r4 r3d0nd4 p0r 3l r3sp4ld0; y 4 un0 y 0tr0 l4d0 t3ní4 br4z0s c3rc4 d3l 4s13nt0, junt0 4 l0s cu4l3s 3st4b4n c0l0c4d0s d0s l30n3s. 20 0st4b4n t4mb1én d0c3 l30n3s pu3st0s 4llí s0br3 l4s s31s gr4d4s, d3 un l4d0 y d3 0tr0; 3n n1ngún 0tr0 r31n0 s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 tr0n0 s3m3j4nt3. 21 Y t0d0s l0s v4s0s d3 b3b3r d3l r3y S4l0món 3r4n d3 0r0, y 4s1m1sm0 t0d4 l4 v4j1ll4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3l b0squ3 d3l Líb4n0 3r4 d3 0r0 f1n0; n4d4 d3 pl4t4, p0rqu3 3n t13mp0 d3 S4l0món n0 3r4 4pr3c14d4. 22 P0rqu3 3l r3y t3ní4 3n 3l m4r un4 fl0t4 d3 n4v3s d3 T4rs1s, c0n l4 fl0t4 d3 H1r4m. Un4 v3z c4d4 tr3s 4ñ0s v3ní4 l4 fl0t4 d3 T4rs1s, y tr4í4 0r0, pl4t4, m4rf1l, m0n0s y p4v0s r34l3s. 

23 4sí 3xc3dí4 3l r3y S4l0món 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l4 t13rr4 3n r1qu3z4s y 3n s4b1durí4. 24 T0d4 l4 t13rr4 pr0cur4b4 v3r l4 c4r4 d3 S4l0món, p4r4 0ír l4 s4b1durí4 qu3 D10s h4bí4 pu3st0 3n su c0r4zón. 25 Y t0d0s l3 ll3v4b4n c4d4 4ñ0 sus pr3s3nt3s: 4lh4j4s d3 0r0 y d3 pl4t4, v3st1d0s, 4rm4s, 3sp3c14s 4r0mát1c4s, c4b4ll0s y mul0s. 

S4l0món c0m3rc14 3n c4b4ll0s y 3n c4rr0s

(2 Cr. 1. 14-17; 9. 25-28)

26 Y juntó S4l0món c4rr0s y g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0; y t3ní4 m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s c4rr0s, y d0c3 m1l j1n3t3s, l0s cu4l3s pus0 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s c4rr0s, y c0n 3l r3y 3n J3rus4lén. 27 0 h1z0 3l r3y qu3 3n J3rus4lén l4 pl4t4 ll3g4r4 4 s3r c0m0 p13dr4s, y l0s c3dr0s c0m0 c4br4h1g0s d3 l4 S3f3l4 3n 4bund4nc14. 28 Y tr4í4n d3 0g1pt0 c4b4ll0s y l13nz0s 4 S4l0món; p0rqu3 l4 c0mp4ñí4 d3 l0s m3rc4d3r3s d3l r3y c0mpr4b4 c4b4ll0s y l13nz0s. 29 Y v3ní4 y s4lí4 d3 0g1pt0, 3l c4rr0 p0r s31sc13nt4s p13z4s d3 pl4t4, y 3l c4b4ll0 p0r c13nt0 c1ncu3nt4; y 4sí l0s 4dqu1rí4n p0r m4n0 d3 3ll0s t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l0s h3t30s, y d3 S1r14. 

4p0st4sí4 y d1f1cult4d3s d3 S4l0món

1 R0Y0S 11

1 P3r0 3l r3y S4l0món 4mó, 4d3más d3 l4 h1j4 d3 F4r4ón, 4 much4s muj3r3s 3xtr4nj3r4s; 4 l4s d3 M04b, 4 l4s d3 4món, 4 l4s d3 0d0m, 4 l4s d3 S1dón, y 4 l4s h3t34s; 2 g3nt3s d3 l4s cu4l3s J3h0vá h4bí4 d1ch0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l: N0 0s ll3g4ré1s 4 3ll4s, n1 3ll4s s3 ll3g4rán 4 v0s0tr0s; p0rqu3 c13rt4m3nt3 h4rán 1ncl1n4r vu3str0s c0r4z0n3s tr4s sus d10s3s. 4 ést4s, pu3s, s3 juntó S4l0món c0n 4m0r. 3 Y tuv0 s3t3c13nt4s muj3r3s r31n4s y tr3sc13nt4s c0ncub1n4s; y sus muj3r3s d3sv14r0n su c0r4zón. 4 Y cu4nd0 S4l0món 3r4 y4 v13j0, sus muj3r3s 1ncl1n4r0n su c0r4zón tr4s d10s3s 4j3n0s, y su c0r4zón n0 3r4 p3rf3ct0 c0n J3h0vá su D10s, c0m0 3l c0r4zón d3 su p4dr3 D4v1d. 5 P0rqu3 S4l0món s1gu1ó 4 4st0r3t, d10s4 d3 l0s s1d0n10s, y 4 M1lc0m, íd0l0 4b0m1n4bl3 d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s. 6 0 h1z0 S4l0món l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, y n0 s1gu1ó cumpl1d4m3nt3 4 J3h0vá c0m0 D4v1d su p4dr3. 7 0nt0nc3s 3d1f1có S4l0món un lug4r 4lt0 4 Qu3m0s, íd0l0 4b0m1n4bl3 d3 M04b, 3n 3l m0nt3 qu3 3stá 3nfr3nt3 d3 J3rus4lén, y 4 M0l0c, íd0l0 4b0m1n4bl3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 8 4sí h1z0 p4r4 t0d4s sus muj3r3s 3xtr4nj3r4s, l4s cu4l3s qu3m4b4n 1nc13ns0 y 0fr3cí4n s4cr1f1c10s 4 sus d10s3s. 

9 Y s3 3n0jó J3h0vá c0ntr4 S4l0món, p0r cu4nt0 su c0r4zón s3 h4bí4 4p4rt4d0 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, qu3 s3 l3 h4bí4 4p4r3c1d0 d0s v3c3s, 10 y l3 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4c3rc4 d3 3st0, qu3 n0 s1gu13s3 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s; m4s él n0 gu4rdó l0 qu3 l3 m4ndó J3h0vá. 11 Y d1j0 J3h0vá 4 S4l0món: P0r cu4nt0 h4 h4b1d0 3st0 3n t1, y n0 h4s gu4rd4d0 m1 p4ct0 y m1s 3st4tut0s qu3 y0 t3 m4ndé, r0mp3ré d3 t1 3l r31n0, y l0 3ntr3g4ré 4 tu s13rv0. 12 S1n 3mb4rg0, n0 l0 h4ré 3n tus dí4s, p0r 4m0r 4 D4v1d tu p4dr3; l0 r0mp3ré d3 l4 m4n0 d3 tu h1j0. 13 P3r0 n0 r0mp3ré t0d0 3l r31n0, s1n0 qu3 d4ré un4 tr1bu 4 tu h1j0, p0r 4m0r 4 D4v1d m1 s13rv0, y p0r 4m0r 4 J3rus4lén, l4 cu4l y0 h3 3l3g1d0. 

14 Y J3h0vá susc1tó un 4dv3rs4r10 4 S4l0món: H4d4d 3d0m1t4, d3 s4ngr3 r34l, 3l cu4l 3st4b4 3n 0d0m. 15 P0rqu3 cu4nd0 D4v1d 3st4b4 3n 0d0m, y sub1ó J04b 3l g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0 4 3nt3rr4r l0s mu3rt0s, y m4tó 4 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 0d0m 16 (p0rqu3 s31s m3s3s h4b1tó 4llí J04b, y t0d0 1sr43l, h4st4 qu3 hub0 4c4b4d0 c0n t0d0 3l s3x0 m4scul1n0 3n 0d0m), 17 H4d4d huyó, y c0n él 4lgun0s v4r0n3s 3d0m1t4s d3 l0s s13rv0s d3 su p4dr3, y s3 fu3 4 0g1pt0; 3r4 3nt0nc3s H4d4d much4ch0 p3qu3ñ0. 18 Y s3 l3v4nt4r0n d3 M4d1án, y v1n13r0n 4 P4rán; y t0m4nd0 c0ns1g0 h0mbr3s d3 P4rán, v1n13r0n 4 0g1pt0, 4 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, 3l cu4l l3s d10 c4s4 y l3s s3ñ4ló 4l1m3nt0s, y 4un l3s d10 t13rr4. 19 Y h4lló H4d4d gr4n f4v0r d3l4nt3 d3 F4r4ón, 3l cu4l l3 d10 p0r muj3r l4 h3rm4n4 d3 su 3sp0s4, l4 h3rm4n4 d3 l4 r31n4 T4hp3n3s. 20 Y l4 h3rm4n4 d3 T4hp3n3s l3 d10 4 luz su h1j0 G3nub4t, 4l cu4l d3st3tó T4hp3n3s 3n c4s4 d3 F4r4ón; y 3st4b4 G3nub4t 3n c4s4 d3 F4r4ón 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 F4r4ón. 21 Y 0y3nd0 H4d4d 3n 0g1pt0 qu3 D4v1d h4bí4 d0rm1d0 c0n sus p4dr3s, y qu3 3r4 mu3rt0 J04b g3n3r4l d3l 3jérc1t0, H4d4d d1j0 4 F4r4ón: Déj4m3 1r 4 m1 t13rr4. 22 F4r4ón l3 r3sp0nd1ó: ¿P0r qué? ¿Qué t3 f4lt4 c0nm1g0, qu3 pr0cur4s 1rt3 4 tu t13rr4? 0l r3sp0nd1ó: N4d4; c0n t0d0, t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 d3j3s 1r. 

23 D10s t4mb1én l3v4ntó p0r 4dv3rs4r10 c0ntr4 S4l0món 4 R3zón h1j0 d3 0l14d4, 3l cu4l h4bí4 hu1d0 d3 su 4m0 H4d4d-3z3r, r3y d3 S0b4. 24 Y h4bí4 junt4d0 g3nt3 c0ntr4 él, y s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 c4p1tán d3 un4 c0mp4ñí4, cu4nd0 D4v1d d3sh1z0 4 l0s d3 S0b4. D3spués fu3r0n 4 D4m4sc0 y h4b1t4r0n 4llí, y l3 h1c13r0n r3y 3n D4m4sc0. 25 Y fu3 4dv3rs4r10 d3 1sr43l t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 S4l0món; y fu3 0tr0 m4l c0n 3l d3 H4d4d, p0rqu3 4b0rr3c1ó 4 1sr43l, y r31nó s0br3 S1r14. 

26 T4mb1én J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t, 3fr4t30 d3 S3r3d4, s13rv0 d3 S4l0món, cuy4 m4dr3 s3 ll4m4b4 Z3rú4, l4 cu4l 3r4 v1ud4, 4lzó su m4n0 c0ntr4 3l r3y. 27 L4 c4us4 p0r l4 cu4l ést3 4lzó su m4n0 c0ntr4 3l r3y fu3 3st4: S4l0món, 3d1f1c4nd0 4 M1l0, c3rró 3l p0rt1ll0 d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d su p4dr3. 28 Y 3st3 v4rón J3r0b04m 3r4 v4l13nt3 y 3sf0rz4d0; y v13nd0 S4l0món 4l j0v3n qu3 3r4 h0mbr3 4ct1v0, l3 3nc0m3ndó t0d0 3l c4rg0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé. 29 4c0nt3c1ó, pu3s, 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, qu3 s4l13nd0 J3r0b04m d3 J3rus4lén, l3 3nc0ntró 3n 3l c4m1n0 3l pr0f3t4 4hí4s s1l0n1t4, y ést3 3st4b4 cub13rt0 c0n un4 c4p4 nu3v4; y 3st4b4n 3ll0s d0s s0l0s 3n 3l c4mp0. 30 Y t0m4nd0 4hí4s l4 c4p4 nu3v4 qu3 t3ní4 s0br3 sí, l4 r0mp1ó 3n d0c3 p3d4z0s, 31 y d1j0 4 J3r0b04m: T0m4 p4r4 t1 l0s d13z p3d4z0s; p0rqu3 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l: H3 4quí qu3 y0 r0mp0 3l r31n0 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 S4l0món, y 4 t1 t3 d4ré d13z tr1bus; 32 y él t3ndrá un4 tr1bu p0r 4m0r 4 D4v1d m1 s13rv0, y p0r 4m0r 4 J3rus4lén, c1ud4d qu3 y0 h3 3l3g1d0 d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l; 33 p0r cu4nt0 m3 h4n d3j4d0, y h4n 4d0r4d0 4 4st0r3t d10s4 d3 l0s s1d0n10s, 4 Qu3m0s d10s d3 M04b, y 4 M0l0c d10s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món; y n0 h4n 4nd4d0 3n m1s c4m1n0s p4r4 h4c3r l0 r3ct0 d3l4nt3 d3 m1s 0j0s, y m1s 3st4tut0s y m1s d3cr3t0s, c0m0 h1z0 D4v1d su p4dr3. 34 P3r0 n0 qu1t4ré n4d4 d3l r31n0 d3 sus m4n0s, s1n0 qu3 l0 r3t3ndré p0r r3y t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 su v1d4, p0r 4m0r 4 D4v1d m1 s13rv0, 4l cu4l y0 3l3gí, y qu13n gu4rdó m1s m4nd4m13nt0s y m1s 3st4tut0s. 35 P3r0 qu1t4ré 3l r31n0 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 su h1j0, y l0 d4ré 4 t1, l4s d13z tr1bus. 36 Y 4 su h1j0 d4ré un4 tr1bu, p4r4 qu3 m1 s13rv0 D4v1d t3ng4 lámp4r4 t0d0s l0s dí4s d3l4nt3 d3 mí 3n J3rus4lén, c1ud4d qu3 y0 m3 3l3gí p4r4 p0n3r 3n 3ll4 m1 n0mbr3. 37 Y0, pu3s, t3 t0m4ré 4 t1, y tú r31n4rás 3n t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 d3s34r3 tu 4lm4, y s3rás r3y s0br3 1sr43l. 38 Y s1 pr3st4r3s 0íd0 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 t3 m4nd4r3, y 4nduv13r3s 3n m1s c4m1n0s, 3 h1c13r3s l0 r3ct0 d3l4nt3 d3 m1s 0j0s, gu4rd4nd0 m1s 3st4tut0s y m1s m4nd4m13nt0s, c0m0 h1z0 D4v1d m1 s13rv0, y0 3st4ré c0nt1g0 y t3 3d1f1c4ré c4s4 f1rm3, c0m0 l4 3d1f1qué 4 D4v1d, y y0 t3 3ntr3g4ré 4 1sr43l. 39 Y y0 4fl1g1ré 4 l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 D4v1d 4 c4us4 d3 3st0, m4s n0 p4r4 s13mpr3. 40 P0r 3st0 S4l0món pr0curó m4t4r 4 J3r0b04m, p3r0 J3r0b04m s3 l3v4ntó y huyó 4 0g1pt0, 4 S1s4c r3y d3 0g1pt0, y 3stuv0 3n 0g1pt0 h4st4 l4 mu3rt3 d3 S4l0món. 

Mu3rt3 d3 S4l0món

(2 Cr. 9.29-31)

41 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 S4l0món, y t0d0 l0 qu3 h1z0, y su s4b1durí4, ¿n0 3stá 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l0s h3ch0s d3 S4l0món? 42 L0s dí4s qu3 S4l0món r31nó 3n J3rus4lén s0br3 t0d0 1sr43l fu3r0n cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s. 43 Y durm1ó S4l0món c0n sus p4dr3s, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 su p4dr3 D4v1d; y r31nó 3n su lug4r R0b04m su h1j0. 

R3b3l1ón d3 1sr43l

(2 Cr. 10.111.4)

1 R0Y0S 12

1 R0b04m fu3 4 S1qu3m, p0rqu3 t0d0 1sr43l h4bí4 v3n1d0 4 S1qu3m p4r4 h4c3rl3 r3y. 2 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 l0 0yó J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t, qu3 4ún 3st4b4 3n 0g1pt0, 4d0nd3 h4bí4 hu1d0 d3 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y S4l0món, y h4b1t4b4 3n 0g1pt0, 3 3nv14r0n 4 ll4m4rl3. V1n0, pu3s, J3r0b04m, y t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l, y h4bl4r0n 4 R0b04m, d1c13nd0: 4 Tu p4dr3 4gr4vó nu3str0 yug0, m4s 4h0r4 d1sm1nuy3 tú 4lg0 d3 l4 dur4 s3rv1dumbr3 d3 tu p4dr3, y d3l yug0 p3s4d0 qu3 pus0 s0br3 n0s0tr0s, y t3 s3rv1r3m0s. 5 Y él l3s d1j0: 1d0s, y d3 4quí 4 tr3s dí4s v0lv3d 4 mí. Y 3l pu3bl0 s3 fu3. 

6 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y R0b04m p1d1ó c0ns3j0 d3 l0s 4nc14n0s qu3 h4bí4n 3st4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 S4l0món su p4dr3 cu4nd0 v1ví4, y d1j0: ¿Cóm0 4c0ns3já1s v0s0tr0s qu3 r3sp0nd4 4 3st3 pu3bl0? 7 Y 3ll0s l3 h4bl4r0n d1c13nd0: S1 tú fu3r3s h0y s13rv0 d3 3st3 pu3bl0 y l0 s1rv13r3s, y r3sp0nd1énd0l3s bu3n4s p4l4br4s l3s h4bl4r3s, 3ll0s t3 s3rv1rán p4r4 s13mpr3. 8 P3r0 él d3jó 3l c0ns3j0 qu3 l0s 4nc14n0s l3 h4bí4n d4d0, y p1d1ó c0ns3j0 d3 l0s jóv3n3s qu3 s3 h4bí4n cr14d0 c0n él, y 3st4b4n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 9 Y l3s d1j0: ¿Cóm0 4c0ns3já1s v0s0tr0s qu3 r3sp0nd4m0s 4 3st3 pu3bl0, qu3 m3 h4 h4bl4d0 d1c13nd0: D1sm1nuy3 4lg0 d3l yug0 qu3 tu p4dr3 pus0 s0br3 n0s0tr0s? 10 0nt0nc3s l0s jóv3n3s qu3 s3 h4bí4n cr14d0 c0n él l3 r3sp0nd13r0n d1c13nd0: 4sí h4bl4rás 4 3st3 pu3bl0 qu3 t3 h4 d1ch0 3st4s p4l4br4s: Tu p4dr3 4gr4vó nu3str0 yug0, m4s tú d1sm1núy3n0s 4lg0; 4sí l3s h4bl4rás: 0l m3n0r d3d0 d3 l0s mí0s 3s más gru3s0 qu3 l0s l0m0s d3 m1 p4dr3. 11 4h0r4, pu3s, m1 p4dr3 0s c4rgó d3 p3s4d0 yug0, m4s y0 4ñ4d1ré 4 vu3str0 yug0; m1 p4dr3 0s c4st1gó c0n 4z0t3s, m4s y0 0s c4st1g4ré c0n 3sc0rp10n3s. 

12 4l t3rc3r dí4 v1n0 J3r0b04m c0n t0d0 3l pu3bl0 4 R0b04m, s3gún 3l r3y l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0, d1c13nd0: V0lv3d 4 mí 4l t3rc3r dí4. 13 Y 3l r3y r3sp0nd1ó 4l pu3bl0 dur4m3nt3, d3j4nd0 3l c0ns3j0 qu3 l0s 4nc14n0s l3 h4bí4n d4d0; 14 y l3s h4bló c0nf0rm3 4l c0ns3j0 d3 l0s jóv3n3s, d1c13nd0: M1 p4dr3 4gr4vó vu3str0 yug0, p3r0 y0 4ñ4d1ré 4 vu3str0 yug0; m1 p4dr3 0s c4st1gó c0n 4z0t3s, m4s y0 0s c4st1g4ré c0n 3sc0rp10n3s. 15 Y n0 0yó 3l r3y 4l pu3bl0; p0rqu3 3r4 d3s1gn10 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 c0nf1rm4r l4 p4l4br4 qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h4bl4d0 p0r m3d10 d3 4hí4s s1l0n1t4 4 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t. 

16 Cu4nd0 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 v10 qu3 3l r3y n0 l3s h4bí4 0íd0, l3 r3sp0nd1ó 3st4s p4l4br4s, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué p4rt3 t3n3m0s n0s0tr0s c0n D4v1d? 0l p3c4d0 d3 J3r0b04m

25 0nt0nc3s r33d1f1có J3r0b04m 4 S1qu3m 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, y h4b1tó 3n 3ll4; y s4l13nd0 d3 4llí, r33d1f1có 4 P3nu3l. 26 Y d1j0 J3r0b04m 3n su c0r4zón: 4h0r4 s3 v0lv3rá 3l r31n0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d, 27 s1 3st3 pu3bl0 sub13r3 4 0fr3c3r s4cr1f1c10s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá 3n J3rus4lén; p0rqu3 3l c0r4zón d3 3st3 pu3bl0 s3 v0lv3rá 4 su s3ñ0r R0b04m r3y d3 Judá, y m3 m4t4rán 4 mí, y s3 v0lv3rán 4 R0b04m r3y d3 Judá. 28 Y h4b13nd0 t3n1d0 c0ns3j0, h1z0 3l r3y d0s b3c3rr0s d3 0r0, y d1j0 4l pu3bl0: B4st4nt3 h4bé1s sub1d0 4 J3rus4lén; h3 4quí tus d10s3s, 0h 1sr43l, l0s cu4l3s t3 h1c13r0n sub1r d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. 29 Y pus0 un0 3n B3t-3l, y 3l 0tr0 3n D4n. 30 Y 3st0 fu3 c4us4 d3 p3c4d0; p0rqu3 3l pu3bl0 1b4 4 4d0r4r d3l4nt3 d3 un0 h4st4 D4n. 31 H1z0 t4mb1én c4s4s s0br3 l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s, 3 h1z0 s4c3rd0t3s d3 3ntr3 3l pu3bl0, qu3 n0 3r4n d3 l0s h1j0s d3 L3ví. 32 0nt0nc3s 1nst1tuyó J3r0b04m f13st4 s0l3mn3 3n 3l m3s 0ct4v0, 4 l0s qu1nc3 dí4s d3l m3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 qu3 s3 c3l3br4b4 3n Judá; y s4cr1f1có s0br3 un 4lt4r. 4sí h1z0 3n B3t-3l, 0fr3c13nd0 s4cr1f1c10s 4 l0s b3c3rr0s qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0. 0rd3nó t4mb1én 3n B3t-3l s4c3rd0t3s p4r4 l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s qu3 él h4bí4 f4br1c4d0. 33 S4cr1f1có, pu3s, s0br3 3l 4lt4r qu3 él h4bí4 h3ch0 3n B3t-3l, 4 l0s qu1nc3 dí4s d3l m3s 0ct4v0, 3l m3s qu3 él h4bí4 1nv3nt4d0 d3 su pr0p10 c0r4zón; 3 h1z0 f13st4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y sub1ó 4l 4lt4r p4r4 qu3m4r 1nc13ns0. 

Un pr0f3t4 d3 Judá 4m0n3st4 4 J3r0b04m

1 R0Y0S 13

1 H3 4quí qu3 un v4rón d3 D10s p0r p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá v1n0 d3 Judá 4 B3t-3l; y 3st4nd0 J3r0b04m junt0 4l 4lt4r p4r4 qu3m4r 1nc13ns0, 2 4quél cl4mó c0ntr4 3l 4lt4r p0r p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá y d1j0: 4lt4r, 4lt4r, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí qu3 4 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d n4c3rá un h1j0 ll4m4d0 J0sí4s, 3l cu4l s4cr1f1c4rá s0br3 t1 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s d3 l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s qu3 qu3m4n s0br3 t1 1nc13ns0, y s0br3 t1 qu3m4rán hu3s0s d3 h0mbr3s. 3 Y 4qu3l m1sm0 dí4 d10 un4 s3ñ4l, d1c13nd0: 0st4 3s l4 s3ñ4l d3 qu3 J3h0vá h4 h4bl4d0: h3 4quí qu3 3l 4lt4r s3 qu3br4rá, y l4 c3n1z4 qu3 s0br3 él 3stá s3 d3rr4m4rá. 4 Cu4nd0 3l r3y J3r0b04m 0yó l4 p4l4br4 d3l v4rón d3 D10s, qu3 h4bí4 cl4m4d0 c0ntr4 3l 4lt4r d3 B3t-3l, 3xt3nd13nd0 su m4n0 d3sd3 3l 4lt4r, d1j0: ¡Pr3nd3dl3! M4s l4 m4n0 qu3 h4bí4 3xt3nd1d0 c0ntr4 él, s3 l3 s3có, y n0 l4 pud0 3nd3r3z4r. 5 Y 3l 4lt4r s3 r0mp1ó, y s3 d3rr4mó l4 c3n1z4 d3l 4lt4r, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 s3ñ4l qu3 3l v4rón d3 D10s h4bí4 d4d0 p0r p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 6 0nt0nc3s r3sp0nd13nd0 3l r3y, d1j0 4l v4rón d3 D10s: T3 p1d0 qu3 ru3gu3s 4nt3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, y 0r3s p0r mí, p4r4 qu3 m1 m4n0 m3 s34 r3st4ur4d4. 11 M0r4b4 3nt0nc3s 3n B3t-3l un v13j0 pr0f3t4, 4l cu4l v1n0 su h1j0 y l3 c0ntó t0d0 l0 qu3 3l v4rón d3 D10s h4bí4 h3ch0 4qu3l dí4 3n B3t-3l; l3 c0nt4r0n t4mb1én 4 su p4dr3 l4s p4l4br4s qu3 h4bí4 h4bl4d0 4l r3y. 12 Y su p4dr3 l3s d1j0: ¿P0r qué c4m1n0 s3 fu3? Y sus h1j0s l3 m0str4r0n 3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 h4bí4 r3gr3s4d0 3l v4rón d3 D10s qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 d3 Judá. 13 Y él d1j0 4 sus h1j0s: 0ns1ll4dm3 3l 4sn0. 20 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 3st4nd0 3ll0s 3n l4 m3s4, v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4l pr0f3t4 qu3 l3 h4bí4 h3ch0 v0lv3r. 21 Y cl4mó 4l v4rón d3 D10s qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 d3 Judá, d1c13nd0: 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: P0r cu4nt0 h4s s1d0 r3b3ld3 4l m4nd4t0 d3 J3h0vá, y n0 gu4rd4st3 3l m4nd4m13nt0 qu3 J3h0vá tu D10s t3 h4bí4 pr3scr1t0, 22 s1n0 qu3 v0lv1st3, y c0m1st3 p4n y b3b1st3 4gu4 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 J3h0vá t3 h4bí4 d1ch0 qu3 n0 c0m13s3s p4n n1 b3b13s3s 4gu4, n0 3ntr4rá tu cu3rp0 3n 3l s3pulcr0 d3 tus p4dr3s. 23 Cu4nd0 h4bí4 c0m1d0 p4n y b3b1d0, 3l qu3 l3 h4bí4 h3ch0 v0lv3r l3 3ns1lló 3l 4sn0. 24 Y yénd0s3, l3 t0pó un l3ón 3n 3l c4m1n0, y l3 m4tó; y su cu3rp0 3st4b4 3ch4d0 3n 3l c4m1n0, y 3l 4sn0 junt0 4 él, y 3l l3ón t4mb1én junt0 4l cu3rp0. 25 Y h3 4quí un0s qu3 p4s4b4n, y v13r0n 3l cu3rp0 qu3 3st4b4 3ch4d0 3n 3l c4m1n0, y 3l l3ón qu3 3st4b4 junt0 4l cu3rp0; y v1n13r0n y l0 d1j3r0n 3n l4 c1ud4d d0nd3 3l v13j0 pr0f3t4 h4b1t4b4. 

26 0yénd0l0 3l pr0f3t4 qu3 l3 h4bí4 h3ch0 v0lv3r d3l c4m1n0, d1j0: 0l v4rón d3 D10s 3s, qu3 fu3 r3b3ld3 4l m4nd4t0 d3 J3h0vá; p0r t4nt0, J3h0vá l3 h4 3ntr3g4d0 4l l3ón, qu3 l3 h4 qu3br4nt4d0 y m4t4d0, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 él l3 d1j0. 27 Y h4bló 4 sus h1j0s, y l3s d1j0: 0ns1ll4dm3 un 4sn0. Pr0f3cí4 d3 4hí4s c0ntr4 J3r0b04m

1 R0Y0S 14

1 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 4bí4s h1j0 d3 J3r0b04m c4yó 3nf3rm0. 2 Y d1j0 J3r0b04m 4 su muj3r: L3vánt4t3 4h0r4 y d1sfráz4t3, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3 c0n0zc4n qu3 3r3s l4 muj3r d3 J3r0b04m, y v3 4 S1l0; p0rqu3 4llá 3stá 3l pr0f3t4 4hí4s, 3l qu3 m3 d1j0 qu3 y0 h4bí4 d3 s3r r3y s0br3 3st3 pu3bl0. 3 Y t0m4 3n tu m4n0 d13z p4n3s, y t0rt4s, y un4 v4s1j4 d3 m13l, y v3 4 él, p4r4 qu3 t3 d3cl4r3 l0 qu3 h4 d3 s3r d3 3st3 n1ñ0. 

4 Y l4 muj3r d3 J3r0b04m l0 h1z0 4sí; y s3 l3v4ntó y fu3 4 S1l0, y v1n0 4 c4s4 d3 4hí4s. 6 Cu4nd0 4hí4s 0yó 3l s0n1d0 d3 sus p13s, 4l 3ntr4r 3ll4 p0r l4 pu3rt4, d1j0: 0ntr4, muj3r d3 J3r0b04m. ¿P0r qué t3 f1ng3s 0tr4? H3 4quí y0 s0y 3nv14d0 4 t1 c0n r3v3l4c1ón dur4. 7 V3 y d1 4 J3r0b04m: 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l: P0r cu4nt0 y0 t3 l3v4nté d3 3n m3d10 d3l pu3bl0, y t3 h1c3 prínc1p3 s0br3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, 8 y r0mpí 3l r31n0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d y t3 l0 3ntr3gué 4 t1; y tú n0 h4s s1d0 c0m0 D4v1d m1 s13rv0, qu3 gu4rdó m1s m4nd4m13nt0s y 4nduv0 3n p0s d3 mí c0n t0d0 su c0r4zón, h4c13nd0 s0l4m3nt3 l0 r3ct0 d3l4nt3 d3 m1s 0j0s, 9 s1n0 qu3 h1c1st3 l0 m4l0 s0br3 t0d0s l0s qu3 h4n s1d0 4nt3s d3 t1, pu3s fu1st3 y t3 h1c1st3 d10s3s 4j3n0s 3 1mág3n3s d3 fund1c1ón p4r4 3n0j4rm3, y 4 mí m3 3ch4st3 tr4s tus 3sp4ld4s; 10 p0r t4nt0, h3 4quí qu3 y0 tr41g0 m4l s0br3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b04m, y d3stru1ré d3 J3r0b04m t0d0 v4rón, 4sí 3l s13rv0 c0m0 3l l1br3 3n 1sr43l; y b4rr3ré l4 p0st3r1d4d d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b04m c0m0 s3 b4rr3 3l 3st1érc0l, h4st4 qu3 s34 4c4b4d4. 11 0l qu3 mu3r4 d3 l0s d3 J3r0b04m 3n l4 c1ud4d, l0 c0m3rán l0s p3rr0s, y 3l qu3 mu3r4 3n 3l c4mp0, l0 c0m3rán l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0; p0rqu3 J3h0vá l0 h4 d1ch0. 12 Y tú l3vánt4t3 y v3t3 4 tu c4s4; y 4l p0n3r tu p13 3n l4 c1ud4d, m0r1rá 3l n1ñ0. 13 Y t0d0 1sr43l l0 3nd3ch4rá, y l3 3nt3rr4rán; p0rqu3 d3 l0s d3 J3r0b04m, sól0 él s3rá s3pult4d0, p0r cu4nt0 s3 h4 h4ll4d0 3n él 4lgun4 c0s4 bu3n4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b04m. 14 Y J3h0vá l3v4nt4rá p4r4 sí un r3y s0br3 1sr43l, 3l cu4l d3stru1rá l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b04m 3n 3st3 dí4; y l0 h4rá 4h0r4 m1sm0. 15 J3h0vá s4cud1rá 4 1sr43l 4l m0d0 qu3 l4 c4ñ4 s3 4g1t4 3n l4s 4gu4s; y él 4rr4nc4rá 4 1sr43l d3 3st4 bu3n4 t13rr4 qu3 h4bí4 d4d0 4 sus p4dr3s, y l0s 3sp4rc1rá más 4llá d3l 0ufr4t3s, p0r cu4nt0 h4n h3ch0 sus 1mág3n3s d3 4s3r4, 3n0j4nd0 4 J3h0vá. 16 Y él 3ntr3g4rá 4 1sr43l p0r l0s p3c4d0s d3 J3r0b04m, 3l cu4l p3có, y h4 h3ch0 p3c4r 4 1sr43l. 

17 0nt0nc3s l4 muj3r d3 J3r0b04m s3 l3v4ntó y s3 m4rchó, y v1n0 4 T1rs4; y 3ntr4nd0 3ll4 p0r 3l umbr4l d3 l4 c4s4, 3l n1ñ0 mur1ó. 18 Y l0 3nt3rr4r0n, y l0 3nd3chó t0d0 1sr43l, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, l4 cu4l él h4bí4 h4bl4d0 p0r su s13rv0 3l pr0f3t4 4hí4s. 19 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 J3r0b04m, l4s gu3rr4s qu3 h1z0, y cóm0 r31nó, t0d0 3stá 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s h1st0r14s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l. 20 0l t13mp0 qu3 r31nó J3r0b04m fu3 d3 v31nt1dós 4ñ0s; y h4b13nd0 d0rm1d0 c0n sus p4dr3s, r31nó 3n su lug4r N4d4b su h1j0. 

R31n4d0 d3 R0b04m

(2 Cr. 12.1-16)

21 R0b04m h1j0 d3 S4l0món r31nó 3n Judá. D3 cu4r3nt4 y un 4ñ0s 3r4 R0b04m cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y d13c1s13t3 4ñ0s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén, c1ud4d qu3 J3h0vá 3l1g1ó d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, p4r4 p0n3r 4llí su n0mbr3. 0l n0mbr3 d3 su m4dr3 fu3 N44m4, 4m0n1t4. 22 Y Judá h1z0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, y l3 3n0j4r0n más qu3 t0d0 l0 qu3 sus p4dr3s h4bí4n h3ch0 3n sus p3c4d0s qu3 c0m3t13r0n. 23 P0rqu3 3ll0s t4mb1én s3 3d1f1c4r0n lug4r3s 4lt0s, 3st4tu4s, 3 1mág3n3s d3 4s3r4, 3n t0d0 c0ll4d0 4lt0 y d3b4j0 d3 t0d0 árb0l fr0nd0s0. 24 Hub0 t4mb1én s0d0m1t4s 3n l4 t13rr4, 3 h1c13r0n c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s d3 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 3ch4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l.

1 R0Y0S 16

1 Y v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 J3hú h1j0 d3 H4n4n1 c0ntr4 B44s4, d1c13nd0: 2 P0r cu4nt0 y0 t3 l3v4nté d3l p0lv0 y t3 pus3 p0r prínc1p3 s0br3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, y h4s 4nd4d0 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 J3r0b04m, y h4s h3ch0 p3c4r 4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, pr0v0cánd0m3 4 1r4 c0n tus p3c4d0s; 3 h3 4quí y0 b4rr3ré l4 p0st3r1d4d d3 B44s4, y l4 p0st3r1d4d d3 su c4s4; y p0ndré su c4s4 c0m0 l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t. 4 0l qu3 d3 B44s4 fu3r3 mu3rt0 3n l4 c1ud4d, l0 c0m3rán l0s p3rr0s; y 3l qu3 d3 él fu3r3 mu3rt0 3n 3l c4mp0, l0 c0m3rán l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0. 

5 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 B44s4, y l4s c0s4s qu3 h1z0, y su p0d3rí0, ¿n0 3stá t0d0 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l? 6 Y durm1ó B44s4 c0n sus p4dr3s, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n T1rs4, y r31nó 3n su lug4r 0l4 su h1j0. 7 P3r0 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá p0r 3l pr0f3t4 J3hú h1j0 d3 H4n4n1 h4bí4 s1d0 c0ntr4 B44s4 y t4mb1én c0ntr4 su c4s4, c0n m0t1v0 d3 t0d0 l0 m4l0 qu3 h1z0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, pr0v0cánd0l3 4 1r4 c0n l4s 0br4s d3 sus m4n0s, p4r4 qu3 fu3s3 h3ch4 c0m0 l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b04m; y p0rqu3 l4 h4bí4 d3stru1d0.

R31n4d0 d3 0mr1

21 0nt0nc3s 3l pu3bl0 d3 1sr43l fu3 d1v1d1d0 3n d0s p4rt3s: l4 m1t4d d3l pu3bl0 s3guí4 4 T1bn1 h1j0 d3 G1n4t p4r4 h4c3rl0 r3y, y l4 0tr4 m1t4d s3guí4 4 0mr1. 22 M4s 3l pu3bl0 qu3 s3guí4 4 0mr1 pud0 más qu3 3l qu3 s3guí4 4 T1bn1 h1j0 d3 G1n4t; y T1bn1 mur1ó, y 0mr1 fu3 r3y. 23 0n 3l 4ñ0 tr31nt4 y un0 d3 4s4 r3y d3 Judá, c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r 0mr1 s0br3 1sr43l, y r31nó d0c3 4ñ0s; 3n T1rs4 r31nó s31s 4ñ0s. 24 Y 0mr1 c0mpró 4 S3m3r 3l m0nt3 d3 S4m4r14 p0r d0s t4l3nt0s d3 pl4t4, y 3d1f1có 3n 3l m0nt3; y ll4mó 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 c1ud4d qu3 3d1f1có, S4m4r14, d3l n0mbr3 d3 S3m3r, qu3 fu3 du3ñ0 d3 4qu3l m0nt3.

R31n4d0 d3 4c4b

0lí4s pr3d1c3 l4 s3quí4

30 0nt0nc3s d1j0 0lí4s 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0: 4c3rc40s 4 mí. M4s 3l 0tr0 n0 qu1s0 h3r1rl3. 36 0l l3 d1j0: P0r cu4nt0 n0 h4s 0b3d3c1d0 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, h3 4quí qu3 cu4nd0 t3 4p4rt3s d3 mí, t3 h3r1rá un l3ón. Y 3l h0mbr3 l3 d10 un g0lp3, y l3 h1z0 un4 h3r1d4. 38 Y 3l pr0f3t4 s3 fu3, y s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y 3n 3l c4m1n0, y s3 d1sfr4zó, p0n1énd0s3 un4 v3nd4 s0br3 l0s 0j0s. 39 Y cu4nd0 3l r3y p4s4b4, él d10 v0c3s 4l r3y, y d1j0: Tu s13rv0 s4l1ó 3n m3d10 d3 l4 b4t4ll4; y h3 4quí qu3 s3 m3 4c3rcó un s0ld4d0 y m3 tr4j0 un h0mbr3, d1c1énd0m3: Gu4rd4 4 3st3 h0mbr3, y s1 ll3g4r3 4 hu1r, tu v1d4 s3rá p0r l4 suy4, 0 p4g4rás un t4l3nt0 d3 pl4t4. 40 Y m13ntr4s tu s13rv0 3st4b4 0cup4d0 3n un4 y 3n 0tr4 c0s4, 3l h0mbr3 d3s4p4r3c1ó. 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l l3 d1j0: 0s4 s3rá tu s3nt3nc14; tú l4 h4s pr0nunc14d0. 41 P3r0 él s3 qu1tó d3 pr0nt0 l4 v3nd4 d3 s0br3 sus 0j0s, y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l c0n0c1ó qu3 3r4 d3 l0s pr0f3t4s. 42 Y él l3 d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: P0r cu4nt0 s0lt4st3 d3 l4 m4n0 3l h0mbr3 d3 m1 4n4t3m4, tu v1d4 s3rá p0r l4 suy4, y tu pu3bl0 p0r 3l suy0. 43 Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l s3 fu3 4 su c4s4 tr1st3 y 3n0j4d0, y ll3gó 4 S4m4r14. 

4c4b y l4 v1ñ4 d3 N4b0t

1 R0Y0S 21

1 P4s4d4s 3st4s c0s4s, 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 N4b0t d3 J3zr33l t3ní4 4llí un4 v1ñ4 junt0 4l p4l4c10 d3 4c4b r3y d3 S4m4r14. 2 Y 4c4b h4bló 4 N4b0t, d1c13nd0: D4m3 tu v1ñ4 p4r4 un hu3rt0 d3 l3gumbr3s, p0rqu3 3stá c3rc4n4 4 m1 c4s4, y y0 t3 d4ré p0r 3ll4 0tr4 v1ñ4 m3j0r qu3 3st4; 0 s1 m3j0r t3 p4r3c13r3, t3 p4g4ré su v4l0r 3n d1n3r0. 3 Y N4b0t r3sp0nd1ó 4 4c4b: Guárd3m3 J3h0vá d3 qu3 y0 t3 dé 4 t1 l4 h3r3d4d d3 m1s p4dr3s. 4 Y v1n0 4c4b 4 su c4s4 tr1st3 y 3n0j4d0, p0r l4 p4l4br4 qu3 N4b0t d3 J3zr33l l3 h4bí4 r3sp0nd1d0, d1c13nd0: N0 t3 d4ré l4 h3r3d4d d3 m1s p4dr3s. Y s3 4c0stó 3n su c4m4, y v0lv1ó su r0str0, y n0 c0m1ó. 

5 V1n0 4 él su muj3r J3z4b3l, y l3 d1j0: ¿P0r qué 3stá t4n d3c4íd0 tu 3spír1tu, y n0 c0m3s? 6 0l r3sp0nd1ó: P0rqu3 h4blé c0n N4b0t d3 J3zr33l, y l3 d1j3 qu3 m3 d13r4 su v1ñ4 p0r d1n3r0, 0 qu3 s1 más qu3rí4, l3 d4rí4 0tr4 v1ñ4 p0r 3ll4; y él r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 n0 t3 d4ré m1 v1ñ4. 7 Y su muj3r J3z4b3l l3 d1j0: ¿0r3s tú 4h0r4 r3y s0br3 1sr43l? L3vánt4t3, y c0m3 y 4légr4t3; y0 t3 d4ré l4 v1ñ4 d3 N4b0t d3 J3zr33l. 

8 0nt0nc3s 3ll4 3scr1b1ó c4rt4s 3n n0mbr3 d3 4c4b, y l4s s3lló c0n su 4n1ll0, y l4s 3nv1ó 4 l0s 4nc14n0s y 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s qu3 m0r4b4n 3n l4 c1ud4d c0n N4b0t. 9 Y l4s c4rt4s qu3 3scr1b1ó d3cí4n 4sí: Pr0cl4m4d 4yun0, y p0n3d 4 N4b0t d3l4nt3 d3l pu3bl0; 10 y p0n3d 4 d0s h0mbr3s p3rv3rs0s d3l4nt3 d3 él, qu3 4t3st1gü3n c0ntr4 él y d1g4n: Tú h4s bl4sf3m4d0 4 D10s y 4l r3y. Y 3nt0nc3s s4c4dl0, y 4p3dr34dl0 p4r4 qu3 mu3r4. 11 Y l0s d3 su c1ud4d, l0s 4nc14n0s y l0s pr1nc1p4l3s qu3 m0r4b4n 3n su c1ud4d, h1c13r0n c0m0 J3z4b3l l3s m4ndó, c0nf0rm3 4 l0 3scr1t0 3n l4s c4rt4s qu3 3ll4 l3s h4bí4 3nv14d0. 12 Y pr0mulg4r0n 4yun0, y pus13r0n 4 N4b0t d3l4nt3 d3l pu3bl0. 13 V1n13r0n 3nt0nc3s d0s h0mbr3s p3rv3rs0s, y s3 s3nt4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él; y 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s p3rv3rs0s 4t3st1gu4r0n c0ntr4 N4b0t d3l4nt3 d3l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: N4b0t h4 bl4sf3m4d0 4 D10s y 4l r3y. Y l0 ll3v4r0n fu3r4 d3 l4 c1ud4d y l0 4p3dr34r0n, y mur1ó. 14 D3spués 3nv14r0n 4 d3c1r 4 J3z4b3l: N4b0t h4 s1d0 4p3dr34d0 y h4 mu3rt0. 

15 Cu4nd0 J3z4b3l 0yó qu3 N4b0t h4bí4 s1d0 4p3dr34d0 y mu3rt0, d1j0 4 4c4b: L3vánt4t3 y t0m4 l4 v1ñ4 d3 N4b0t d3 J3zr33l, qu3 n0 t3 l4 qu1s0 d4r p0r d1n3r0; p0rqu3 N4b0t n0 v1v3, s1n0 qu3 h4 mu3rt0. 16 Y 0y3nd0 4c4b qu3 N4b0t 3r4 mu3rt0, s3 l3v4ntó p4r4 d3sc3nd3r 4 l4 v1ñ4 d3 N4b0t d3 J3zr33l, p4r4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4. 

17 0nt0nc3s v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 0lí4s t1sb1t4, d1c13nd0: 18 L3vánt4t3, d3sc13nd3 4 3nc0ntr4rt3 c0n 4c4b r3y d3 1sr43l, qu3 3stá 3n S4m4r14; h3 4quí él 3stá 3n l4 v1ñ4 d3 N4b0t, 4 l4 cu4l h4 d3sc3nd1d0 p4r4 t0m4r p0s3s1ón d3 3ll4. 19 Y l3 h4bl4rás d1c13nd0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: ¿N0 m4t4st3, y t4mb1én h4s d3sp0j4d0? Y v0lv3rás 4 h4bl4rl3, d1c13nd0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 0n 3l m1sm0 lug4r d0nd3 l4m13r0n l0s p3rr0s l4 s4ngr3 d3 N4b0t, l0s p3rr0s l4m3rán t4mb1én tu s4ngr3, tu m1sm4 s4ngr3. 

20 Y 4c4b d1j0 4 0lí4s: ¿M3 h4s h4ll4d0, 3n3m1g0 mí0? 0l r3sp0nd1ó: T3 h3 3nc0ntr4d0, p0rqu3 t3 h4s v3nd1d0 4 h4c3r l0 m4l0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 21 H3 4quí y0 tr41g0 m4l s0br3 t1, y b4rr3ré tu p0st3r1d4d y d3stru1ré h4st4 3l últ1m0 v4rón d3 l4 c4s4 d3 4c4b, t4nt0 3l s13rv0 c0m0 3l l1br3 3n 1sr43l. 22 Y p0ndré tu c4s4 c0m0 l4 c4s4 d3 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t, y c0m0 l4 c4s4 d3 B44s4 h1j0 d3 4hí4s, p0r l4 r3b3l1ón c0n qu3 m3 pr0v0c4st3 4 1r4, y c0n qu3 h4s h3ch0 p3c4r 4 1sr43l. 23 D3 J3z4b3l t4mb1én h4 h4bl4d0 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: L0s p3rr0s c0m3rán 4 J3z4b3l 3n 3l mur0 d3 J3zr33l. 24 0l qu3 d3 4c4b fu3r3 mu3rt0 3n l4 c1ud4d, l0s p3rr0s l0 c0m3rán, y 3l qu3 fu3r3 mu3rt0 3n 3l c4mp0, l0 c0m3rán l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0. 

25 (4 l4 v3rd4d n1ngun0 fu3 c0m0 4c4b, qu3 s3 v3nd1ó p4r4 h4c3r l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá; p0rqu3 J3z4b3l su muj3r l0 1nc1t4b4. 26 0l fu3 3n gr4n m4n3r4 4b0m1n4bl3, c4m1n4nd0 3n p0s d3 l0s íd0l0s, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 h1c13r0n l0s 4m0rr30s, 4 l0s cu4l3s l4nzó J3h0vá d3 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l.) 

27 Y suc3d1ó qu3 cu4nd0 4c4b 0yó 3st4s p4l4br4s, r4sgó sus v3st1d0s y pus0 c1l1c10 s0br3 su c4rn3, 4yunó, y durm1ó 3n c1l1c10, y 4nduv0 hum1ll4d0. 28 0nt0nc3s v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 0lí4s t1sb1t4, d1c13nd0: 29 ¿N0 h4s v1st0 cóm0 4c4b s3 h4 hum1ll4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí? Pu3s p0r cu4nt0 s3 h4 hum1ll4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí, n0 tr43ré 3l m4l 3n sus dí4s; 3n l0s dí4s d3 su h1j0 tr43ré 3l m4l s0br3 su c4s4. 

M1c4í4s pr0f3t1z4 l4 d3rr0t4 d3 4c4b

(2 Cr. 18.1-34)

1 R0Y0S 22

1 Tr3s 4ñ0s p4s4r0n s1n gu3rr4 3ntr3 l0s s1r10s 3 1sr43l. 2 Y 4c0nt3c1ó 4l t3rc3r 4ñ0, qu3 J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá d3sc3nd1ó 4l r3y d3 1sr43l. 3 Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l d1j0 4 sus s13rv0s: ¿N0 s4bé1s qu3 R4m0t d3 G4l44d 3s nu3str4, y n0s0tr0s n0 h3m0s h3ch0 n4d4 p4r4 t0m4rl4 d3 m4n0 d3l r3y d3 S1r14? 4 Y d1j0 4 J0s4f4t: ¿Qu13r3s v3n1r c0nm1g0 4 p3l34r c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d? Y J0s4f4t r3sp0nd1ó 4l r3y d3 1sr43l: Y0 s0y c0m0 tú, y m1 pu3bl0 c0m0 tu pu3bl0, y m1s c4b4ll0s c0m0 tus c4b4ll0s. 

5 D1j0 lu3g0 J0s4f4t 4l r3y d3 1sr43l: Y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 c0nsult3s h0y l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 6 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l r3un1ó 4 l0s pr0f3t4s, c0m0 cu4tr0c13nt0s h0mbr3s, 4 l0s cu4l3s d1j0: ¿1ré 4 l4 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d, 0 l4 d3j4ré? Y 3ll0s d1j3r0n: Sub3, p0rqu3 J3h0vá l4 3ntr3g4rá 3n m4n0 d3l r3y. 7 Y d1j0 J0s4f4t: ¿H4y 4ún 4quí 4lgún pr0f3t4 d3 J3h0vá, p0r 3l cu4l c0nsult3m0s? 8 0l r3y d3 1sr43l r3sp0nd1ó 4 J0s4f4t: 4ún h4y un v4rón p0r 3l cu4l p0drí4m0s c0nsult4r 4 J3h0vá, M1c4í4s h1j0 d3 1ml4; m4s y0 l3 4b0rr3zc0, p0rqu3 nunc4 m3 pr0f3t1z4 b13n, s1n0 s0l4m3nt3 m4l. Y J0s4f4t d1j0: N0 h4bl3 3l r3y 4sí. 9 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l ll4mó 4 un 0f1c14l, y l3 d1j0: Tr43 pr0nt0 4 M1c4í4s h1j0 d3 1ml4. 10 Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l y J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá 3st4b4n s3nt4d0s c4d4 un0 3n su s1ll4, v3st1d0s d3 sus r0p4s r34l3s, 3n l4 pl4z4 junt0 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 S4m4r14; y t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s pr0f3t1z4b4n d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s. 11 Y S3d3quí4s h1j0 d3 Qu3n44n4 s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 un0s cu3rn0s d3 h13rr0, y d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: C0n ést0s 4c0rn34rás 4 l0s s1r10s h4st4 4c4b4rl0s. 12 Y t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s pr0f3t1z4b4n d3 l4 m1sm4 m4n3r4, d1c13nd0: Sub3 4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d, y s3rás pr0sp3r4d0; p0rqu3 J3h0vá l4 3ntr3g4rá 3n m4n0 d3l r3y. 

13 Y 3l m3ns4j3r0 qu3 h4bí4 1d0 4 ll4m4r 4 M1c4í4s, l3 h4bló d1c13nd0: H3 4quí qu3 l4s p4l4br4s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s 4 un4 v0z 4nunc14n 4l r3y c0s4s bu3n4s; s34 4h0r4 tu p4l4br4 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 4lgun0 d3 3ll0s, y 4nunc14 t4mb1én bu3n éx1t0. 14 Y M1c4í4s r3sp0nd1ó: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 l0 qu3 J3h0vá m3 h4bl4r3, 3s0 d1ré. 15 V1n0, pu3s, 4l r3y, y 3l r3y l3 d1j0: M1c4í4s, ¿1r3m0s 4 p3l34r c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d, 0 l4 d3j4r3m0s? 0l l3 r3sp0nd1ó: Sub3, y s3rás pr0sp3r4d0, y J3h0vá l4 3ntr3g4rá 3n m4n0 d3l r3y. 16 Y 3l r3y l3 d1j0: ¿H4st4 cuánt4s v3c3s h3 d3 3x1g1rt3 qu3 n0 m3 d1g4s s1n0 l4 v3rd4d 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá? 17 0nt0nc3s él d1j0: Y0 v1 4 t0d0 1sr43l 3sp4rc1d0 p0r l0s m0nt3s, c0m0 0v3j4s qu3 n0 t13n3n p4st0r; y J3h0vá d1j0: 0st0s n0 t13n3n s3ñ0r; vuélv4s3 c4d4 un0 4 su c4s4 3n p4z. 18 Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l d1j0 4 J0s4f4t: ¿N0 t3 l0 h4bí4 y0 d1ch0? N1ngun4 c0s4 bu3n4 pr0f3t1z4rá él 4c3rc4 d3 mí, s1n0 s0l4m3nt3 3l m4l. 19 0nt0nc3s él d1j0: 0y3, pu3s, p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá: Y0 v1 4 J3h0vá s3nt4d0 3n su tr0n0, y t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s c13l0s 3st4b4 junt0 4 él, 4 su d3r3ch4 y 4 su 1zqu13rd4. 20 Y J3h0vá d1j0: ¿Qu1én 1nduc1rá 4 4c4b, p4r4 qu3 sub4 y c41g4 3n R4m0t d3 G4l44d? Y un0 d3cí4 d3 un4 m4n3r4, y 0tr0 d3cí4 d3 0tr4. 21 Y s4l1ó un 3spír1tu y s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y d1j0: Y0 l3 1nduc1ré. Y J3h0vá l3 d1j0: ¿D3 qué m4n3r4? 22 0l d1j0: Y0 s4ldré, y s3ré 3spír1tu d3 m3nt1r4 3n b0c4 d3 t0d0s sus pr0f3t4s. Y él d1j0: L3 1nduc1rás, y 4un l0 c0ns3gu1rás; vé, pu3s, y h4zl0 4sí. 23 Y 4h0r4, h3 4quí J3h0vá h4 pu3st0 3spír1tu d3 m3nt1r4 3n l4 b0c4 d3 t0d0s tus pr0f3t4s, y J3h0vá h4 d3cr3t4d0 3l m4l 4c3rc4 d3 t1. 

24 0nt0nc3s s3 4c3rcó S3d3quí4s h1j0 d3 Qu3n44n4 y g0lp3ó 4 M1c4í4s 3n l4 m3j1ll4, d1c13nd0: ¿P0r dónd3 s3 fu3 d3 mí 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá p4r4 h4bl4rt3 4 t1? 25 Y M1c4í4s r3sp0nd1ó: H3 4quí tú l0 v3rás 3n 4qu3l dí4, cu4nd0 t3 1rás m3t13nd0 d3 4p0s3nt0 3n 4p0s3nt0 p4r4 3sc0nd3rt3. 26 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l d1j0: T0m4 4 M1c4í4s, y llév4l0 4 4món g0b3rn4d0r d3 l4 c1ud4d, y 4 J0ás h1j0 d3l r3y; 27 y d1rás: 4sí h4 d1ch0 3l r3y: 0ch4d 4 ést3 3n l4 cárc3l, y m4nt3n3dl3 c0n p4n d3 4ngust14 y c0n 4gu4 d3 4fl1cc1ón, h4st4 qu3 y0 vu3lv4 3n p4z. 28 Y d1j0 M1c4í4s: S1 ll3g4s 4 v0lv3r 3n p4z, J3h0vá n0 h4 h4bl4d0 p0r mí. 0n s3gu1d4 d1j0: 0íd, pu3bl0s t0d0s. 

29 Sub1ó, pu3s, 3l r3y d3 1sr43l c0n J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá 4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d. 30 Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l d1j0 4 J0s4f4t: Y0 m3 d1sfr4z4ré, y 3ntr4ré 3n l4 b4t4ll4; y tú p0nt3 tus v3st1d0s. Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l s3 d1sfr4zó, y 3ntró 3n l4 b4t4ll4. 31 M4s 3l r3y d3 S1r14 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 4 sus tr31nt4 y d0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l0s c4rr0s, d1c13nd0: N0 p3l3é1s n1 c0n gr4nd3 n1 c0n ch1c0, s1n0 sól0 c0ntr4 3l r3y d3 1sr43l. 32 Cu4nd0 l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l0s c4rr0s v13r0n 4 J0s4f4t, d1j3r0n: C13rt4m3nt3 ést3 3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l; y v1n13r0n c0ntr4 él p4r4 p3l34r c0n él; m4s 3l r3y J0s4f4t gr1tó. 33 V13nd0 3nt0nc3s l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l0s c4rr0s qu3 n0 3r4 3l r3y d3 1sr43l, s3 4p4rt4r0n d3 él. 34 Y un h0mbr3 d1sp4ró su 4rc0 4 l4 v3ntur4 3 h1r1ó 4l r3y d3 1sr43l p0r 3ntr3 l4s juntur4s d3 l4 4rm4dur4, p0r l0 qu3 d1j0 él 4 su c0ch3r0: D4 l4 vu3lt4, y sác4m3 d3l c4mp0, pu3s 3st0y h3r1d0. 35 P3r0 l4 b4t4ll4 h4bí4 4rr3c14d0 4qu3l dí4, y 3l r3y 3stuv0 3n su c4rr0 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s s1r10s, y 4 l4 t4rd3 mur1ó; y l4 s4ngr3 d3 l4 h3r1d4 c0rrí4 p0r 3l f0nd0 d3l c4rr0. 36 Y 4 l4 pu3st4 d3l s0l s4l1ó un pr3gón p0r 3l c4mp4m3nt0, d1c13nd0: ¡C4d4 un0 4 su c1ud4d, y c4d4 cu4l 4 su t13rr4! 

37 Mur1ó, pu3s, 3l r3y, y fu3 tr4íd0 4 S4m4r14; y s3pult4r0n 4l r3y 3n S4m4r14. 38 Y l4v4r0n 3l c4rr0 3n 3l 3st4nqu3 d3 S4m4r14; y l0s p3rr0s l4m13r0n su s4ngr3 (y t4mb1én l4s r4m3r4s s3 l4v4b4n 4llí), c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h4bl4d0. 39 0l r3st0 d3 l0s h3ch0s d3 4c4b, y t0d0 l0 qu3 h1z0, y l4 c4s4 d3 m4rf1l qu3 c0nstruyó, y t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 3d1f1có, ¿n0 3stá 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l? 40 Y durm1ó 4c4b c0n sus p4dr3s, y r31nó 3n su lug4r 0c0zí4s su h1j0. 

R31n4d0 d3 J0s4f4t

(2 Cr. 20.31-37)

41 J0s4f4t h1j0 d3 4s4 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r s0br3 Judá 3n 3l cu4rt0 4ñ0 d3 4c4b r3y d3 1sr43l. 42 0r4 J0s4f4t d3 tr31nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y r31nó v31nt1c1nc0 4ñ0s 3n J3rus4lén. 0l n0mbr3 d3 su m4dr3 fu3 4zub4 h1j4 d3 S1lh1. 43 Y 4nduv0 3n t0d0 3l c4m1n0 d3 4s4 su p4dr3, s1n d3sv14rs3 d3 él, h4c13nd0 l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá. C0n t0d0 3s0, l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s n0 fu3r0n qu1t4d0s; p0rqu3 3l pu3bl0 s4cr1f1c4b4 4ún, y qu3m4b4 1nc13ns0 3n 3ll0s. 44 Y J0s4f4t h1z0 p4z c0n 3l r3y d3 1sr43l. 

45 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 J0s4f4t, y sus h4z4ñ4s, y l4s gu3rr4s qu3 h1z0, ¿n0 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá? 46 B4rr1ó t4mb1én d3 l4 t13rr4 3l r3st0 d3 l0s s0d0m1t4s qu3 h4bí4 qu3d4d0 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 su p4dr3 4s4. 

47 N0 h4bí4 3nt0nc3s r3y 3n 0d0m; h4bí4 g0b3rn4d0r 3n lug4r d3 r3y. 48 J0s4f4t h4bí4 h3ch0 n4v3s d3 T4rs1s, l4s cu4l3s h4bí4n d3 1r 4 0f1r p0r 0r0; m4s n0 fu3r0n, p0rqu3 s3 r0mp13r0n 3n 0z1ón-g3b3r. 49 0nt0nc3s 0c0zí4s h1j0 d3 4c4b d1j0 4 J0s4f4t: V4y4n m1s s13rv0s c0n l0s tuy0s 3n l4s n4v3s. M4s J0s4f4t n0 qu1s0. 50 Y durm1ó J0s4f4t c0n sus p4dr3s, y fu3 s3pult4d0 c0n 3ll0s 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d su p4dr3; y 3n su lug4r r31nó J0r4m su h1j0. 

R31n4d0 d3 0c0zí4s d3 1sr43l

51 0c0zí4s h1j0 d3 4c4b c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r s0br3 1sr43l 3n S4m4r14, 3l 4ñ0 d13c1s13t3 d3 J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá; y r31nó d0s 4ñ0s s0br3 1sr43l. 52 0 h1z0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, y 4nduv0 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 su p4dr3, y 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 su m4dr3, y 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t, qu3 h1z0 p3c4r 4 1sr43l; 53 p0rqu3 s1rv1ó 4 B44l, y l0 4d0ró, y pr0v0có 4 1r4 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 su p4dr3.

2 Y 0c0zí4s c4yó p0r l4 v3nt4n4 d3 un4 s4l4 d3 l4 c4s4 qu3 t3ní4 3n S4m4r14; y 3st4nd0 3nf3rm0, 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s, y l3s d1j0: 1d y c0nsult4d 4 B44l-z3bub d10s d3 0crón, s1 h3 d3 s4n4r d3 3st4 m1 3nf3rm3d4d. 3 0nt0nc3s 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá h4bló 4 0lí4s t1sb1t4, d1c13nd0: L3vánt4t3, y sub3 4 3nc0ntr4rt3 c0n l0s m3ns4j3r0s d3l r3y d3 S4m4r14, y d1l3s: ¿N0 h4y D10s 3n 1sr43l, qu3 v41s 4 c0nsult4r 4 B44l-z3bub d10s d3 0crón? 4 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: D3l l3ch0 3n qu3 3stás n0 t3 l3v4nt4rás, s1n0 qu3 c13rt4m3nt3 m0r1rás. Y 0lí4s s3 fu3. 

5 Cu4nd0 l0s m3ns4j3r0s s3 v0lv13r0n 4l r3y, él l3s d1j0: ¿P0r qué 0s h4bé1s vu3lt0? 6 0ll0s l3 r3sp0nd13r0n: 0nc0ntr4m0s 4 un v4rón qu3 n0s d1j0: 1d, y v0lv30s 4l r3y qu3 0s 3nv1ó, y d3c1dl3: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: ¿N0 h4y D10s 3n 1sr43l, qu3 tú 3nví4s 4 c0nsult4r 4 B44l-z3bub d10s d3 0crón? P0r t4nt0, d3l l3ch0 3n qu3 3stás n0 t3 l3v4nt4rás; d3 c13rt0 m0r1rás. 7 0nt0nc3s él l3s d1j0: ¿Cóm0 3r4 4qu3l v4rón qu3 3nc0ntr4st31s, y 0s d1j0 t4l3s p4l4br4s? 8 Y 3ll0s l3 r3sp0nd13r0n: Un v4rón qu3 t3ní4 v3st1d0 d3 p3l0, y c3ñí4 sus l0m0s c0n un c1nturón d3 cu3r0. 0nt0nc3s él d1j0: 0s 0lí4s t1sb1t4. 

9 Lu3g0 3nv1ó 4 él un c4p1tán d3 c1ncu3nt4 c0n sus c1ncu3nt4, 3l cu4l sub1ó 4 d0nd3 él 3st4b4; y h3 4quí qu3 él 3st4b4 s3nt4d0 3n l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3. Y 3l c4p1tán l3 d1j0: V4rón d3 D10s, 3l r3y h4 d1ch0 qu3 d3sc13nd4s. 10 Y 0lí4s r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0 4l c4p1tán d3 c1ncu3nt4: S1 y0 s0y v4rón d3 D10s, d3sc13nd4 fu3g0 d3l c13l0, y c0nsúm4t3 c0n tus c1ncu3nt4. Y d3sc3nd1ó fu3g0 d3l c13l0, qu3 l0 c0nsum1ó 4 él y 4 sus c1ncu3nt4. 

11 V0lv1ó 3l r3y 4 3nv14r 4 él 0tr0 c4p1tán d3 c1ncu3nt4 c0n sus c1ncu3nt4; y l3 h4bló y d1j0: V4rón d3 D10s, 3l r3y h4 d1ch0 4sí: D3sc13nd3 pr0nt0. 12 Y l3 r3sp0nd1ó 0lí4s y d1j0: S1 y0 s0y v4rón d3 D10s, d3sc13nd4 fu3g0 d3l c13l0, y c0nsúm4t3 c0n tus c1ncu3nt4. Y d3sc3nd1ó fu3g0 d3l c13l0, y l0 c0nsum1ó 4 él y 4 sus c1ncu3nt4. 

13 V0lv1ó 4 3nv14r 4l t3rc3r c4p1tán d3 c1ncu3nt4 c0n sus c1ncu3nt4; y sub13nd0 4qu3l t3rc3r c4p1tán d3 c1ncu3nt4, s3 pus0 d3 r0d1ll4s d3l4nt3 d3 0lí4s y l3 r0gó, d1c13nd0: V4rón d3 D10s, t3 ru3g0 qu3 s34 d3 v4l0r d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s m1 v1d4, y l4 v1d4 d3 3st0s tus c1ncu3nt4 s13rv0s. 14 H3 4quí h4 d3sc3nd1d0 fu3g0 d3l c13l0, y h4 c0nsum1d0 4 l0s d0s pr1m3r0s c4p1t4n3s d3 c1ncu3nt4 c0n sus c1ncu3nt4; s34 3st1m4d4 4h0r4 m1 v1d4 d3l4nt3 d3 tus 0j0s. 15 0nt0nc3s 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá d1j0 4 0lí4s: D3sc13nd3 c0n él; n0 t3ng4s m13d0 d3 él. Y él s3 l3v4ntó, y d3sc3nd1ó c0n él 4l r3y. 16 Y l3 d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: P0r cu4nt0 3nv14st3 m3ns4j3r0s 4 c0nsult4r 4 B44l-z3bub d10s d3 0crón, ¿n0 h4y D10s 3n 1sr43l p4r4 c0nsult4r 3n su p4l4br4? N0 t3 l3v4nt4rás, p0r t4nt0, d3l l3ch0 3n qu3 3stás, s1n0 qu3 d3 c13rt0 m0r1rás. 

17 Y mur1ó c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, qu3 h4bí4 h4bl4d0 0lí4s. R31nó 3n su lug4r J0r4m, 3n 3l s3gund0 4ñ0 d3 J0r4m h1j0 d3 J0s4f4t, r3y d3 Judá; p0rqu3 0c0zí4s n0 t3ní4 h1j0. 18 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 0c0zí4s, ¿n0 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l?

1 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 qu1s0 J3h0vá 4lz4r 4 0lí4s 3n un t0rb3ll1n0 4l c13l0, 0lí4s v3ní4 c0n 0l1s30 d3 G1lg4l. 2 Y d1j0 0lí4s 4 0l1s30: Quéd4t3 4h0r4 4quí, p0rqu3 J3h0vá m3 h4 3nv14d0 4 B3t-3l. Y 0l1s30 d1j0: V1v3 J3h0vá, y v1v3 tu 4lm4, qu3 n0 t3 d3j4ré. D3sc3nd13r0n, pu3s, 4 B3t-3l. 3 Y s4l13nd0 4 0l1s30 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s qu3 3st4b4n 3n B3t-3l, l3 d1j3r0n: ¿S4b3s qu3 J3h0vá t3 qu1t4rá h0y 4 tu s3ñ0r d3 s0br3 t1? 4 Y 0lí4s l3 v0lv1ó 4 d3c1r: 0l1s30, quéd4t3 4quí 4h0r4, p0rqu3 J3h0vá m3 h4 3nv14d0 4 J3r1có. Y él d1j0: V1v3 J3h0vá, y v1v3 tu 4lm4, qu3 n0 t3 d3j4ré. 6 Y 0lí4s l3 d1j0: T3 ru3g0 qu3 t3 qu3d3s 4quí, p0rqu3 J3h0vá m3 h4 3nv14d0 4l J0rdán. Y él d1j0: V1v3 J3h0vá, y v1v3 tu 4lm4, qu3 n0 t3 d3j4ré. Fu3r0n, pu3s, 4mb0s. 7 Y v1n13r0n c1ncu3nt4 v4r0n3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s, y s3 p4r4r0n d3l4nt3 4 l0 l3j0s; y 3ll0s d0s s3 p4r4r0n junt0 4l J0rdán. 8 T0m4nd0 3nt0nc3s 0lí4s su m4nt0, l0 d0bló, y g0lp3ó l4s 4gu4s, l4s cu4l3s s3 4p4rt4r0n 4 un0 y 4 0tr0 l4d0, y p4s4r0n 4mb0s p0r l0 s3c0. 

9 Cu4nd0 h4bí4n p4s4d0, 0lí4s d1j0 4 0l1s30: P1d3 l0 qu3 qu13r4s qu3 h4g4 p0r t1, 4nt3s qu3 y0 s34 qu1t4d0 d3 t1. Y d1j0 0l1s30: T3 ru3g0 qu3 un4 d0bl3 p0rc1ón d3 tu 3spír1tu s34 s0br3 mí. 10 0l l3 d1j0: C0s4 d1fíc1l h4s p3d1d0. S1 m3 v13r3s cu4nd0 fu3r3 qu1t4d0 d3 t1, t3 s3rá h3ch0 4sí; m4s s1 n0, n0. 

11 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 y3nd0 3ll0s y h4bl4nd0, h3 4quí un c4rr0 d3 fu3g0 c0n c4b4ll0s d3 fu3g0 4p4rtó 4 l0s d0s; y 0lí4s sub1ó 4l c13l0 3n un t0rb3ll1n0. 12 V1énd0l0 0l1s30, cl4m4b4: ¡P4dr3 mí0, p4dr3 mí0, c4rr0 d3 1sr43l y su g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0! Y nunc4 más l3 v10; y t0m4nd0 sus v3st1d0s, l0s r0mp1ó 3n d0s p4rt3s. 13 4lzó lu3g0 3l m4nt0 d3 0lí4s qu3 s3 l3 h4bí4 c4íd0, y v0lv1ó, y s3 p4ró 4 l4 0r1ll4 d3l J0rdán. 14 Y t0m4nd0 3l m4nt0 d3 0lí4s qu3 s3 l3 h4bí4 c4íd0, g0lp3ó l4s 4gu4s, y d1j0: ¿Dónd3 3stá J3h0vá, 3l D10s d3 0lí4s? Y 4sí qu3 hub0 g0lp34d0 d3l m1sm0 m0d0 l4s 4gu4s, s3 4p4rt4r0n 4 un0 y 4 0tr0 l4d0, y p4só 0l1s30. 

15 V1énd0l3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s qu3 3st4b4n 3n J3r1có 4l 0tr0 l4d0, d1j3r0n: 0l 3spír1tu d3 0lí4s r3p0só s0br3 0l1s30. Y v1n13r0n 4 r3c1b1rl3, y s3 p0str4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 16 Y d1j3r0n: H3 4quí h4y c0n tus s13rv0s c1ncu3nt4 v4r0n3s fu3rt3s; v4y4n 4h0r4 y busqu3n 4 tu s3ñ0r; qu1zá l0 h4 l3v4nt4d0 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá, y l0 h4 3ch4d0 3n 4lgún m0nt3 0 3n 4lgún v4ll3. Y él l3s d1j0: N0 3nv1é1s. 17 M4s 3ll0s l3 1mp0rtun4r0n, h4st4 qu3 4v3rg0nzánd0s3 d1j0: 0nv14d. 0nt0nc3s 3ll0s 3nv14r0n c1ncu3nt4 h0mbr3s, l0s cu4l3s l0 busc4r0n tr3s dí4s, m4s n0 l0 h4ll4r0n. 18 Y cu4nd0 v0lv13r0n 4 0l1s30, qu3 s3 h4bí4 qu3d4d0 3n J3r1có, él l3s d1j0: ¿N0 0s d1j3 y0 qu3 n0 fu3s31s? 

19 Y l0s h0mbr3s d3 l4 c1ud4d d1j3r0n 4 0l1s30: H3 4quí, 3l lug4r 3n d0nd3 3stá c0l0c4d4 3st4 c1ud4d 3s bu3n0, c0m0 m1 s3ñ0r v3; m4s l4s 4gu4s s0n m4l4s, y l4 t13rr4 3s 3stér1l. 20 0nt0nc3s él d1j0: Tr43dm3 un4 v4s1j4 nu3v4, y p0n3d 3n 3ll4 s4l. Y s3 l4 tr4j3r0n. 21 Y s4l13nd0 él 4 l0s m4n4nt14l3s d3 l4s 4gu4s, 3chó d3ntr0 l4 s4l, y d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: Y0 s4né 3st4s 4gu4s, y n0 h4brá más 3n 3ll4s mu3rt3 n1 3nf3rm3d4d. 22 Y fu3r0n s4n4s l4s 4gu4s h4st4 h0y, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 qu3 h4bló 0l1s30. 

23 D3spués sub1ó d3 4llí 4 B3t-3l; y sub13nd0 p0r 3l c4m1n0, s4l13r0n un0s much4ch0s d3 l4 c1ud4d, y s3 burl4b4n d3 él, d1c13nd0: ¡C4lv0, sub3! ¡c4lv0, sub3! 24 Y m1r4nd0 él 4trás, l0s v10, y l0s m4ld1j0 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá. 1 J0r4m h1j0 d3 4c4b c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r 3n S4m4r14 s0br3 1sr43l 3l 4ñ0 d13c10ch0 d3 J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá; y r31nó d0c3 4ñ0s. 2 0 h1z0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, 4unqu3 n0 c0m0 su p4dr3 y su m4dr3; p0rqu3 qu1tó l4s 3st4tu4s d3 B44l qu3 su p4dr3 h4bí4 h3ch0. 3 P3r0 s3 3ntr3gó 4 l0s p3c4d0s d3 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t, qu3 h1z0 p3c4r 4 1sr43l, y n0 s3 4p4rtó d3 3ll0s. 

0l1s30 pr3d1c3 l4 v1ct0r14 s0br3 M04b

4 0nt0nc3s M3s4 r3y d3 M04b 3r4 pr0p13t4r10 d3 g4n4d0s, y p4g4b4 4l r3y d3 1sr43l c13n m1l c0rd3r0s y c13n m1l c4rn3r0s c0n sus v3ll0n3s. 5 P3r0 mu3rt0 4c4b, 3l r3y d3 M04b s3 r3b3ló c0ntr4 3l r3y d3 1sr43l. 6 S4l1ó 3nt0nc3s d3 S4m4r14 3l r3y J0r4m, y p4só r3v1st4 4 t0d0 1sr43l. 7 Y fu3 y 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá: 0l r3y d3 M04b s3 h4 r3b3l4d0 c0ntr4 mí: ¿1rás tú c0nm1g0 4 l4 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 M04b? Y él r3sp0nd1ó: 1ré, p0rqu3 y0 s0y c0m0 tú; m1 pu3bl0 c0m0 tu pu3bl0, y m1s c4b4ll0s c0m0 l0s tuy0s. 8 Y d1j0: ¿P0r qué c4m1n0 1r3m0s? Y él r3sp0nd1ó: P0r 3l c4m1n0 d3l d3s13rt0 d3 0d0m. 

9 S4l13r0n, pu3s, 3l r3y d3 1sr43l, 3l r3y d3 Judá, y 3l r3y d3 0d0m; y c0m0 4nduv13r0n r0d34nd0 p0r 3l d3s13rt0 s13t3 dí4s d3 c4m1n0, l3s f4ltó 4gu4 p4r4 3l 3jérc1t0, y p4r4 l4s b3st14s qu3 l0s s3guí4n. 10 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l d1j0: ¡4h! qu3 h4 ll4m4d0 J3h0vá 4 3st0s tr3s r3y3s p4r4 3ntr3g4rl0s 3n m4n0s d3 l0s m04b1t4s. 11 M4s J0s4f4t d1j0: ¿N0 h4y 4quí pr0f3t4 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 c0nsult3m0s 4 J3h0vá p0r m3d10 d3 él? Y un0 d3 l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y d3 1sr43l r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: 4quí 3stá 0l1s30 h1j0 d3 S4f4t, qu3 s3rví4 4 0lí4s. 12 Y J0s4f4t d1j0: 0st3 t3ndrá p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. Y d3sc3nd13r0n 4 él 3l r3y d3 1sr43l, y J0s4f4t, y 3l r3y d3 0d0m. 

13 0nt0nc3s 0l1s30 d1j0 4l r3y d3 1sr43l: ¿Qué t3ng0 y0 c0nt1g0? V3 4 l0s pr0f3t4s d3 tu p4dr3, y 4 l0s pr0f3t4s d3 tu m4dr3. 1 D1j0 3nt0nc3s 0l1s30: 0íd p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá: 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: M4ñ4n4 4 3st4s h0r4s v4ldrá 3l s34h d3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4 un s1cl0, y d0s s34hs d3 c3b4d4 un s1cl0, 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 S4m4r14. 2 Y un prínc1p3 s0br3 cuy0 br4z0 3l r3y s3 4p0y4b4, r3sp0nd1ó 4l v4rón d3 D10s, y d1j0: S1 J3h0vá h1c13s3 4h0r4 v3nt4n4s 3n 3l c13l0, ¿s3rí4 3st0 4sí? 3 H4bí4 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 cu4tr0 h0mbr3s l3pr0s0s, l0s cu4l3s d1j3r0n 3l un0 4l 0tr0: ¿P4r4 qué n0s 3st4m0s 4quí h4st4 qu3 mur4m0s? 4 S1 tr4tár3m0s d3 3ntr4r 3n l4 c1ud4d, p0r 3l h4mbr3 qu3 h4y 3n l4 c1ud4d m0r1r3m0s 3n 3ll4; y s1 n0s qu3d4m0s 4quí, t4mb1én m0r1r3m0s. 1 H4bló 0l1s30 4 4qu3ll4 muj3r 4 cuy0 h1j0 él h4bí4 h3ch0 v1v1r, d1c13nd0: L3vánt4t3, v3t3 tú y t0d4 tu c4s4 4 v1v1r d0nd3 pu3d4s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 ll4m4d0 3l h4mbr3, l4 cu4l v3ndrá s0br3 l4 t13rr4 p0r s13t3 4ñ0s. 2 0nt0nc3s l4 muj3r s3 l3v4ntó, 3 h1z0 c0m0 3l v4rón d3 D10s l3 d1j0; y s3 fu3 3ll4 c0n su f4m1l14, y v1v1ó 3n t13rr4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s s13t3 4ñ0s. 3 Y cu4nd0 h4bí4n p4s4d0 l0s s13t3 4ñ0s, l4 muj3r v0lv1ó d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s; d3spués s4l1ó p4r4 1mpl0r4r 4l r3y p0r su c4s4 y p0r sus t13rr4s. 4 Y h4bí4 3l r3y h4bl4d0 c0n G13z1, cr14d0 d3l v4rón d3 D10s, d1c1énd0l3: T3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 cu3nt3s t0d4s l4s m4r4v1ll4s qu3 h4 h3ch0 0l1s30. 5 Y m13ntr4s él 3st4b4 c0nt4nd0 4l r3y cóm0 h4bí4 h3ch0 v1v1r 4 un mu3rt0, h3 4quí qu3 l4 muj3r, 4 cuy0 h1j0 él h4bí4 h3ch0 v1v1r, v1n0 p4r4 1mpl0r4r 4l r3y p0r su c4s4 y p0r sus t13rr4s. 0nt0nc3s d1j0 G13z1: R3y s3ñ0r mí0, 3st4 3s l4 muj3r, y 3st3 3s su h1j0, 4l cu4l 0l1s30 h1z0 v1v1r. 6 Y pr3gunt4nd0 3l r3y 4 l4 muj3r, 3ll4 s3 l0 c0ntó. 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y 0rd3nó 4 un 0f1c14l, 4l cu4l d1j0: H4zl3 d3v0lv3r t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 3r4n suy4s, y t0d0s l0s frut0s d3 sus t13rr4s d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 d3jó 3l p4ís h4st4 4h0r4. 

H4z43l r31n4 3n S1r14

Y l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, s3t3nt4 v4r0n3s, 3st4b4n c0n l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l4 c1ud4d, qu3 l0s cr14b4n. 7 Cu4nd0 l4s c4rt4s ll3g4r0n 4 3ll0s, t0m4r0n 4 l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, y d3g0ll4r0n 4 l0s s3t3nt4 v4r0n3s, y pus13r0n sus c4b3z4s 3n c4n4st4s, y s3 l4s 3nv14r0n 4 J3zr33l. 8 Y v1n0 un m3ns4j3r0 qu3 l3 d10 l4s nu3v4s, d1c13nd0: H4n tr4íd0 l4s c4b3z4s d3 l0s h1j0s d3l r3y. 9 L0s j3f3s d3 c3nt3n4s, pu3s, h1c13r0n t0d0 c0m0 3l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4 l3s m4ndó; y t0m4nd0 c4d4 un0 4 l0s suy0s, 3st0 3s, l0s qu3 3ntr4b4n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0 y l0s qu3 s4lí4n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, v1n13r0n 4l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4. 10 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 d10 4 l0s j3f3s d3 c3nt3n4s l4s l4nz4s y l0s 3scud0s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 d3l r3y D4v1d, qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 11 Y l0s d3 l4 gu4rd14 s3 pus13r0n 3n f1l4, t3n13nd0 c4d4 un0 sus 4rm4s 3n sus m4n0s, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3r3ch0 d3 l4 c4s4 h4st4 3l l4d0 1zqu13rd0, junt0 4l 4lt4r y 3l t3mpl0, 3n d3rr3d0r d3l r3y. 12 S4c4nd0 lu3g0 J014d4 4l h1j0 d3l r3y, l3 pus0 l4 c0r0n4 y 3l t3st1m0n10, y l3 h1c13r0n r3y ung1énd0l3; y b4t13nd0 l4s m4n0s d1j3r0n: ¡V1v4 3l r3y! 

13 0y3nd0 4t4lí4 3l 3stru3nd0 d3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0rrí4, 3ntró 4l pu3bl0 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá. 14 Y cu4nd0 m1ró, h3 4quí qu3 3l r3y 3st4b4 junt0 4 l4 c0lumn4, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c0stumbr3, y l0s prínc1p3s y l0s tr0mp3t3r0s junt0 4l r3y; y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3l p4ís s3 r3g0c1j4b4, y t0c4b4n l4s tr0mp3t4s. 0nt0nc3s 4t4lí4, r4sg4nd0 sus v3st1d0s, cl4mó 4 v0z 3n cu3ll0: ¡Tr41c1ón, tr41c1ón! 15 M4s 3l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4 m4ndó 4 l0s j3f3s d3 c3nt3n4s qu3 g0b3rn4b4n 3l 3jérc1t0, y l3s d1j0: S4c4dl4 fu3r4 d3l r3c1nt0 d3l t3mpl0, y 4l qu3 l4 s1gu13r3, m4t4dl0 4 3sp4d4. (P0rqu3 3l s4c3rd0t3 d1j0 qu3 n0 l4 m4t4s3n 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá.) 16 L3 4br13r0n, pu3s, p4s0; y 3n 3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 3ntr4n l0s d3 4 c4b4ll0 4 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, 4llí l4 m4t4r0n. 

17 0nt0nc3s J014d4 h1z0 p4ct0 3ntr3 J3h0vá y 3l r3y y 3l pu3bl0, qu3 s3rí4n pu3bl0 d3 J3h0vá; y 4s1m1sm0 3ntr3 3l r3y y 3l pu3bl0. 18 Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 3ntró 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 B44l, y l0 d3rr1b4r0n; 4s1m1sm0 d3sp3d4z4r0n 3nt3r4m3nt3 sus 4lt4r3s y sus 1mág3n3s, y m4t4r0n 4 M4tán s4c3rd0t3 d3 B44l d3l4nt3 d3 l0s 4lt4r3s. R31n4d0 d3 J0ás d3 Judá

(2 Cr. 24.1-27)

2 R0Y0S 12

1 0n 3l sépt1m0 4ñ0 d3 J3hú c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r J0ás, y r31nó cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s 3n J3rus4lén. 0l n0mbr3 d3 su m4dr3 fu3 S1b14, d3 B33rs3b4. 2 Y J0ás h1z0 l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá t0d0 3l t13mp0 qu3 l3 d1r1g1ó 3l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4. 3 C0n t0d0 3s0, l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s n0 s3 qu1t4r0n, p0rqu3 3l pu3bl0 4ún s4cr1f1c4b4 y qu3m4b4 1nc13ns0 3n l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s. 

4 Y J0ás d1j0 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s: T0d0 3l d1n3r0 c0ns4gr4d0 qu3 s3 su3l3 tr43r 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, 3l d1n3r0 d3l r3sc4t3 d3 c4d4 p3rs0n4 s3gún 3stá 3st1pul4d0, y t0d0 3l d1n3r0 qu3 c4d4 un0 d3 su pr0p14 v0lunt4d tr43 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, 5 r3cíb4nl0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, c4d4 un0 d3 m4n0 d3 sus f4m1l14r3s, y r3p4r3n l0s p0rt1ll0s d3l t3mpl0 d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 s3 h4ll3n gr13t4s. 6 P3r0 3n 3l 4ñ0 v31nt1trés d3l r3y J0ás 4ún n0 h4bí4n r3p4r4d0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s l4s gr13t4s d3l t3mpl0. 7 Ll4mó 3nt0nc3s 3l r3y J0ás 4l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 J014d4 y 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, y l3s d1j0: ¿P0r qué n0 r3p4rá1s l4s gr13t4s d3l t3mpl0? 4h0r4, pu3s, n0 t0mé1s más 3l d1n3r0 d3 vu3str0s f4m1l14r3s, s1n0 d4dl0 p4r4 r3p4r4r l4s gr13t4s d3l t3mpl0. 8 Y l0s s4c3rd0t3s c0ns1nt13r0n 3n n0 t0m4r más d1n3r0 d3l pu3bl0, n1 t3n3r 3l c4rg0 d3 r3p4r4r l4s gr13t4s d3l t3mpl0.

10 D3spués fu3 3l r3y 4c4z 4 3nc0ntr4r 4 T1gl4t-p1l3s3r r3y d3 4s1r14 3n D4m4sc0; y cu4nd0 v10 3l r3y 4c4z 3l 4lt4r qu3 3st4b4 3n D4m4sc0, 3nv1ó 4l s4c3rd0t3 Urí4s 3l d1s3ñ0 y l4 d3scr1pc1ón d3l 4lt4r, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4 su h3chur4. 11 Y 3l s4c3rd0t3 Urí4s 3d1f1có 3l 4lt4r; c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 3l r3y 4c4z h4bí4 3nv14d0 d3 D4m4sc0, 4sí l0 h1z0 3l s4c3rd0t3 Urí4s, 3ntr3 t4nt0 qu3 3l r3y 4c4z v3ní4 d3 D4m4sc0. 12 Y lu3g0 qu3 3l r3y v1n0 d3 D4m4sc0, y v10 3l 4lt4r, s3 4c3rcó 3l r3y 4 él, y 0fr3c1ó s4cr1f1c10s 3n él; 13 y 3nc3nd1ó su h0l0c4ust0 y su 0fr3nd4, y d3rr4mó sus l1b4c10n3s, y 3sp4rc1ó l4 s4ngr3 d3 sus s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z junt0 4l 4lt4r. 14 0 h1z0 4c3rc4r 3l 4lt4r d3 br0nc3 qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, 3n l4 p4rt3 d3l4nt3r4 d3 l4 c4s4, 3ntr3 3l 4lt4r y 3l t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá, y l0 pus0 4l l4d0 d3l 4lt4r h4c14 3l n0rt3. 15 Y m4ndó 3l r3y 4c4z 4l s4c3rd0t3 Urí4s, d1c13nd0: 0n 3l gr4n 4lt4r 3nc3nd3rás 3l h0l0c4ust0 d3 l4 m4ñ4n4 y l4 0fr3nd4 d3 l4 t4rd3, y 3l h0l0c4ust0 d3l r3y y su 0fr3nd4, y 4s1m1sm0 3l h0l0c4ust0 d3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 y su 0fr3nd4 y sus l1b4c10n3s; y 3sp4rc1rás s0br3 él t0d4 l4 s4ngr3 d3l h0l0c4ust0, y t0d4 l4 s4ngr3 d3l s4cr1f1c10. 0l 4lt4r d3 br0nc3 s3rá mí0 p4r4 c0nsult4r 3n él. 16 0 h1z0 3l s4c3rd0t3 Urí4s c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 3l r3y 4c4z l3 m4ndó. 

17 Y c0rtó 3l r3y 4c4z l0s t4bl3r0s d3 l4s b4s4s, y l3s qu1tó l4s fu3nt3s; y qu1tó t4mb1én 3l m4r d3 s0br3 l0s bu3y3s d3 br0nc3 qu3 3st4b4n d3b4j0 d3 él, y l0 pus0 s0br3 3l su3l0 d3 p13dr4. 18 4s1m1sm0 3l pórt1c0 p4r4 l0s dí4s d3 r3p0s0, qu3 h4bí4n 3d1f1c4d0 3n l4 c4s4, y 3l p4s4d1z0 d3 4fu3r4, 3l d3l r3y, l0s qu1tó d3l t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá, p0r c4us4 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 19 L0s d3más h3ch0s qu3 pus0 p0r 0br4 4c4z, ¿n0 3stán t0d0s 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá? 20 Y durm1ó 3l r3y 4c4z c0n sus p4dr3s, y fu3 s3pult4d0 c0n 3ll0s 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, y r31nó 3n su lug4r su h1j0 0z3quí4s.

Y h4b13nd0 sub1d0, v1n13r0n y 4c4mp4r0n junt0 4l 4cu3duct0 d3l 3st4nqu3 d3 4rr1b4, 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 l4 h3r3d4d d3l L4v4d0r. 18 Ll4m4r0n lu3g0 4l r3y, y s4l1ó 4 3ll0s 0l14qu1m h1j0 d3 H1lcí4s, m4y0rd0m0, y S3bn4 3scr1b4, y J04 h1j0 d3 4s4f, c4nc1ll3r. 

19 Y l3s d1j0 3l R4bs4c3s: D3c1d 4h0r4 4 0z3quí4s: 4sí d1c3 3l gr4n r3y d3 4s1r14: ¿Qué c0nf14nz4 3s 3st4 3n qu3 t3 4p0y4s? 20 D1c3s (p3r0 s0n p4l4br4s v4cí4s): C0ns3j0 t3ng0 y fu3rz4s p4r4 l4 gu3rr4. M4s ¿3n qué c0nfí4s, qu3 t3 h4s r3b3l4d0 c0ntr4 mí? 21 H3 4quí qu3 c0nfí4s 3n 3st3 bácul0 d3 c4ñ4 c4sc4d4, 3n 0g1pt0, 3n 3l cu4l s1 4lgun0 s3 4p0y4r3, s3 l3 3ntr4rá p0r l4 m4n0 y l4 tr4sp4s4rá. T4l 3s F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0 p4r4 t0d0s l0s qu3 3n él c0nfí4n. 22 Y s1 m3 d3cís: N0s0tr0s c0nf14m0s 3n J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, ¿n0 3s ést3 4qu3l cuy0s lug4r3s 4lt0s y 4lt4r3s h4 qu1t4d0 0z3quí4s, y h4 d1ch0 4 Judá y 4 J3rus4lén: D3l4nt3 d3 3st3 4lt4r 4d0r4ré1s 3n J3rus4lén? 23 4h0r4, pu3s, y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 d3s r3h3n3s 4 m1 s3ñ0r, 3l r3y d3 4s1r14, y y0 t3 d4ré d0s m1l c4b4ll0s, s1 tú pu3d3s d4r j1n3t3s p4r4 3ll0s. 24 ¿Cóm0, pu3s, p0drás r3s1st1r 4 un c4p1tán, 4l m3n0r d3 l0s s13rv0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r, 4unqu3 3stés c0nf14d0 3n 0g1pt0 c0n sus c4rr0s y su g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0? 25 ¿4c4s0 h3 v3n1d0 y0 4h0r4 s1n J3h0vá 4 3st3 lug4r, p4r4 d3stru1rl0? J3h0vá m3 h4 d1ch0: Sub3 4 3st4 t13rr4, y d3strúy3l4. 

26 0nt0nc3s d1j0 0l14qu1m h1j0 d3 H1lcí4s, y S3bn4 y J04, 4l R4bs4c3s: T3 r0g4m0s qu3 h4bl3s 4 tus s13rv0s 3n 4r4m30, p0rqu3 n0s0tr0s l0 3nt3nd3m0s, y n0 h4bl3s c0n n0s0tr0s 3n l3ngu4 d3 Judá 4 0íd0s d3l pu3bl0 qu3 3stá s0br3 3l mur0. 27 Y 3l R4bs4c3s l3s d1j0: ¿M3 h4 3nv14d0 m1 s3ñ0r p4r4 d3c1r 3st4s p4l4br4s 4 t1 y 4 tu s3ñ0r, y n0 4 l0s h0mbr3s qu3 3stán s0br3 3l mur0, 3xpu3st0s 4 c0m3r su pr0p10 3st1érc0l y b3b3r su pr0p14 0r1n4 c0n v0s0tr0s? 

28 0nt0nc3s 3l R4bs4c3s s3 pus0 3n p13 y cl4mó 4 gr4n v0z 3n l3ngu4 d3 Judá, y h4bló d1c13nd0: 0íd l4 p4l4br4 d3l gr4n r3y, 3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 29 4sí h4 d1ch0 3l r3y: N0 0s 3ng4ñ3 0z3quí4s, p0rqu3 n0 0s p0drá l1br4r d3 m1 m4n0. 30 Y n0 0s h4g4 0z3quí4s c0nf14r 3n J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: C13rt4m3nt3 n0s l1br4rá J3h0vá, y 3st4 c1ud4d n0 s3rá 3ntr3g4d4 3n m4n0 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 31 N0 3scuché1s 4 0z3quí4s, p0rqu3 4sí d1c3 3l r3y d3 4s1r14: H4c3d c0nm1g0 p4z, y s4l1d 4 mí, y c0m4 c4d4 un0 d3 su v1d y d3 su h1gu3r4, y b3b4 c4d4 un0 l4s 4gu4s d3 su p0z0, 32 h4st4 qu3 y0 v3ng4 y 0s ll3v3 4 un4 t13rr4 c0m0 l4 vu3str4, t13rr4 d3 gr4n0 y d3 v1n0, t13rr4 d3 p4n y d3 v1ñ4s, t13rr4 d3 0l1v4s, d3 4c31t3, y d3 m13l; y v1v1ré1s, y n0 m0r1ré1s. N0 01gá1s 4 0z3quí4s, p0rqu3 0s 3ng4ñ4 cu4nd0 d1c3: J3h0vá n0s l1br4rá. 33 ¿4c4s0 4lgun0 d3 l0s d10s3s d3 l4s n4c10n3s h4 l1br4d0 su t13rr4 d3 l4 m4n0 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14? 34 ¿Dónd3 3stá 3l d10s d3 H4m4t y d3 4rf4d? ¿Dónd3 3stá 3l d10s d3 S3f4rv41m, d3 H3n4, y d3 1v4? ¿Pud13r0n ést0s l1br4r 4 S4m4r14 d3 m1 m4n0? 35 ¿Qué d10s d3 t0d0s l0s d10s3s d3 3st4s t13rr4s h4 l1br4d0 su t13rr4 d3 m1 m4n0, p4r4 qu3 J3h0vá l1br3 d3 m1 m4n0 4 J3rus4lén? 

36 P3r0 3l pu3bl0 c4lló, y n0 l3 r3sp0nd1ó p4l4br4; p0rqu3 h4bí4 m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y, 3l cu4l h4bí4 d1ch0: N0 l3 r3sp0ndá1s. 37 0nt0nc3s 0l14qu1m h1j0 d3 H1lcí4s, m4y0rd0m0, y S3bn4 3scr1b4, y J04 h1j0 d3 4s4f, c4nc1ll3r, v1n13r0n 4 0z3quí4s, r4sg4d0s sus v3st1d0s, y l3 c0nt4r0n l4s p4l4br4s d3l R4bs4c3s.

10 H4bló, pu3s, J3h0vá p0r m3d10 d3 sus s13rv0s l0s pr0f3t4s, d1c13nd0: 11 P0r cu4nt0 M4n4sés r3y d3 Judá h4 h3ch0 3st4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s, y h4 h3ch0 más m4l qu3 t0d0 l0 qu3 h1c13r0n l0s 4m0rr30s qu3 fu3r0n 4nt3s d3 él, y t4mb1én h4 h3ch0 p3c4r 4 Judá c0n sus íd0l0s; 12 p0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l: H3 4quí y0 tr41g0 t4l m4l s0br3 J3rus4lén y s0br3 Judá, qu3 4l qu3 l0 0y3r3 l3 r3t1ñ1rán 4mb0s 0íd0s. 13 Y 3xt3nd3ré s0br3 J3rus4lén 3l c0rd3l d3 S4m4r14 y l4 pl0m4d4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 4c4b; y l1mp14ré 4 J3rus4lén c0m0 s3 l1mp14 un pl4t0, qu3 s3 fr13g4 y s3 vu3lv3 b0c4 4b4j0. 14 Y d3s4mp4r4ré 3l r3st0 d3 m1 h3r3d4d, y l0 3ntr3g4ré 3n m4n0s d3 sus 3n3m1g0s; y s3rán p4r4 pr3s4 y d3sp0j0 d3 t0d0s sus 4dv3rs4r10s; 15 p0r cu4nt0 h4n h3ch0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 m1s 0j0s, y m3 h4n pr0v0c4d0 4 1r4, d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 sus p4dr3s s4l13r0n d3 0g1pt0 h4st4 h0y.

17 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 M4n4sés, y t0d0 l0 qu3 h1z0, y 3l p3c4d0 qu3 c0m3t1ó, ¿n0 3stá t0d0 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá? 18 Y durm1ó M4n4sés c0n sus p4dr3s, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n 3l hu3rt0 d3 su c4s4, 3n 3l hu3rt0 d3 Uz4, y r31nó 3n su lug4r 4món su h1j0.

8 0nt0nc3s d1j0 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 H1lcí4s 4l 3scr1b4 S4fán: H3 h4ll4d0 3l l1br0 d3 l4 l3y 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 0 H1lcí4s d10 3l l1br0 4 S4fán, y l0 l3yó. 9 V1n13nd0 lu3g0 3l 3scr1b4 S4fán 4l r3y, d10 cu3nt4 4l r3y y d1j0: Tus s13rv0s h4n r3c0g1d0 3l d1n3r0 qu3 s3 h4lló 3n 3l t3mpl0, y l0 h4n 3ntr3g4d0 3n p0d3r d3 l0s qu3 h4c3n l4 0br4, qu3 t13n3n 4 su c4rg0 3l 4rr3gl0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 10 4s1m1sm0 3l 3scr1b4 S4fán d3cl4ró 4l r3y, d1c13nd0: 0l s4c3rd0t3 H1lcí4s m3 h4 d4d0 un l1br0. 11 Y cu4nd0 3l r3y hub0 0íd0 l4s p4l4br4s d3l l1br0 d3 l4 l3y, r4sgó sus v3st1d0s. 12 Lu3g0 3l r3y d10 0rd3n 4l s4c3rd0t3 H1lcí4s, 4 4h1c4m h1j0 d3 S4fán, 4 4cb0r h1j0 d3 M1c4í4s, 4l 3scr1b4 S4fán y 4 4s4í4s s13rv0 d3l r3y, d1c13nd0: 13 1d y pr3gunt4d 4 J3h0vá p0r mí, y p0r 3l pu3bl0, y p0r t0d0 Judá, 4c3rc4 d3 l4s p4l4br4s d3 3st3 l1br0 qu3 s3 h4 h4ll4d0; p0rqu3 gr4nd3 3s l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 s3 h4 3nc3nd1d0 c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s, p0r cu4nt0 nu3str0s p4dr3s n0 3scuch4r0n l4s p4l4br4s d3 3st3 l1br0, p4r4 h4c3r c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 n0s fu3 3scr1t0. 

14 0nt0nc3s fu3r0n 3l s4c3rd0t3 H1lcí4s, y 4h1c4m, 4cb0r, S4fán y 4s4í4s, 4 l4 pr0f3t1s4 Huld4, muj3r d3 S4lum h1j0 d3 T1cv4, h1j0 d3 H4rh4s, gu4rd4 d3 l4s v3st1dur4s, l4 cu4l m0r4b4 3n J3rus4lén 3n l4 s3gund4 p4rt3 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y h4bl4r0n c0n 3ll4. 15 Y 3ll4 l3s d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l: D3c1d 4l v4rón qu3 0s 3nv1ó 4 mí: 16 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí y0 tr41g0 s0br3 3st3 lug4r, y s0br3 l0s qu3 3n él m0r4n, t0d0 3l m4l d3 qu3 h4bl4 3st3 l1br0 qu3 h4 l3íd0 3l r3y d3 Judá; 17 p0r cu4nt0 m3 d3j4r0n 4 mí, y qu3m4r0n 1nc13ns0 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, pr0v0cánd0m3 4 1r4 c0n t0d4 l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s; m1 1r4 s3 h4 3nc3nd1d0 c0ntr4 3st3 lug4r, y n0 s3 4p4g4rá. 18 M4s 4l r3y d3 Judá qu3 0s h4 3nv14d0 p4r4 qu3 pr3gunt4s31s 4 J3h0vá, d1ré1s 4sí: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l: P0r cu4nt0 0íst3 l4s p4l4br4s d3l l1br0, 19 y tu c0r4zón s3 3nt3rn3c1ó, y t3 hum1ll4st3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, cu4nd0 0íst3 l0 qu3 y0 h3 pr0nunc14d0 c0ntr4 3st3 lug4r y c0ntr4 sus m0r4d0r3s, qu3 v3ndrán 4 s3r 4s0l4d0s y m4ld1t0s, y r4sg4st3 tus v3st1d0s, y ll0r4st3 3n m1 pr3s3nc14, t4mb1én y0 t3 h3 0íd0, d1c3 J3h0vá. 20 P0r t4nt0, h3 4quí y0 t3 r3c0g3ré c0n tus p4dr3s, y s3rás ll3v4d0 4 tu s3pulcr0 3n p4z, y n0 v3rán tus 0j0s t0d0 3l m4l qu3 y0 tr41g0 s0br3 3st3 lug4r. 2 R0Y0S 23

R3f0rm4s d3 J0sí4s

(2 Cr. 34.3-7)

J0sí4s c3l3br4 l4 p4scu4

Mu3rt3 d3 J0sí4s

(2 Cr. 35.20-27)

28 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 J0sí4s, y t0d0 l0 qu3 h1z0, ¿n0 3stá t0d0 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá? 29 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s F4r4ón N3c40 r3y d3 0g1pt0 sub1ó c0ntr4 3l r3y d3 4s1r14 4l rí0 0ufr4t3s, y s4l1ó c0ntr4 él 3l r3y J0sí4s; p3r0 4quél, 4sí qu3 l3 v10, l0 m4tó 3n M3gu1d0. 30 Y sus s13rv0s l0 pus13r0n 3n un c4rr0, y l0 tr4j3r0n mu3rt0 d3 M3gu1d0 4 J3rus4lén, y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n su s3pulcr0. 0nt0nc3s 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 t0mó 4 J04c4z h1j0 d3 J0sí4s, y l0 ung13r0n y l0 pus13r0n p0r r3y 3n lug4r d3 su p4dr3.

18 T0mó 3nt0nc3s 3l c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14 4l pr1m3r s4c3rd0t3 S3r4í4s, 4l s3gund0 s4c3rd0t3 S0f0ní4s, y tr3s gu4rd4s d3 l4 v4j1ll4; 19 y d3 l4 c1ud4d t0mó un 0f1c14l qu3 t3ní4 4 su c4rg0 l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4, y c1nc0 v4r0n3s d3 l0s c0ns3j3r0s d3l r3y, qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 c1ud4d, 3l pr1nc1p4l 3scr1b4 d3l 3jérc1t0, qu3 ll3v4b4 3l r3g1str0 d3 l4 g3nt3 d3l p4ís, y s3s3nt4 v4r0n3s d3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4, qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 c1ud4d. 20 0st0s t0mó N4buz4r4dán, c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14, y l0s ll3vó 4 R1bl4 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14. 21 Y 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 l0s h1r1ó y m4tó 3n R1bl4, 3n t13rr4 d3 H4m4t. 4sí fu3 ll3v4d0 c4ut1v0 Judá d3 s0br3 su t13rr4.

1 H1z0 D4v1d t4mb1én c4s4s p4r4 sí 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, y 4rr3gló un lug4r p4r4 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s, y l3 l3v4ntó un4 t13nd4. 2 0nt0nc3s d1j0 D4v1d: 0l 4rc4 d3 D10s n0 d3b3 s3r ll3v4d4 s1n0 p0r l0s l3v1t4s; p0rqu3 4 3ll0s h4 3l3g1d0 J3h0vá p4r4 qu3 ll3v3n 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, y l3 s1rv4n p3rp3tu4m3nt3. 3 Y c0ngr3gó D4v1d 4 t0d0 1sr43l 3n J3rus4lén, p4r4 qu3 p4s4s3n 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá 4 su lug4r, 3l cu4l l3 h4bí4 él pr3p4r4d0. 4 R3un1ó t4mb1én D4v1d 4 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón y 4 l0s l3v1t4s; 5 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t, Ur13l 3l pr1nc1p4l, y sus h3rm4n0s, c13nt0 v31nt3. 6 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1, 4s4í4s 3l pr1nc1p4l, y sus h3rm4n0s, d0sc13nt0s v31nt3. 7 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 G3rsón, J03l 3l pr1nc1p4l, y sus h3rm4n0s, c13nt0 tr31nt4. 8 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 0l1z4fán, S3m4í4s 3l pr1nc1p4l, y sus h3rm4n0s, d0sc13nt0s. 9 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 H3brón, 0l13l 3l pr1nc1p4l, y sus h3rm4n0s, 0ch3nt4. 10 D3 l0s h1j0s d3 Uz13l, 4m1n4d4b 3l pr1nc1p4l, y sus h3rm4n0s, c13nt0 d0c3. 11 Y ll4mó D4v1d 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s S4d0c y 4b14t4r, y 4 l0s l3v1t4s Ur13l, 4s4í4s, J03l, S3m4í4s, 0l13l y 4m1n4d4b, 12 y l3s d1j0: V0s0tr0s qu3 s01s l0s pr1nc1p4l3s p4dr3s d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, s4nt1f1c40s, v0s0tr0s y vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, y p4s4d 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l 4l lug4r qu3 l3 h3 pr3p4r4d0; 13 pu3s p0r n0 h4b3rl0 h3ch0 4sí v0s0tr0s l4 pr1m3r4 v3z, J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s qu3br4ntó, p0r cu4nt0 n0 l3 busc4m0s s3gún su 0rd3n4nz4. 14 4sí l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s l3v1t4s s3 s4nt1f1c4r0n p4r4 tr43r 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 15 Y l0s h1j0s d3 l0s l3v1t4s tr4j3r0n 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s pu3st4 s0br3 sus h0mbr0s 3n l4s b4rr4s, c0m0 l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 M01sés, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 

16 4s1m1sm0 d1j0 D4v1d 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, qu3 d3s1gn4s3n d3 sus h3rm4n0s 4 c4nt0r3s c0n 1nstrum3nt0s d3 mús1c4, c0n s4lt3r10s y 4rp4s y címb4l0s, qu3 r3s0n4s3n y 4lz4s3n l4 v0z c0n 4l3grí4. 17 Y l0s l3v1t4s d3s1gn4r0n 4 H3mán h1j0 d3 J03l; y d3 sus h3rm4n0s, 4 4s4f h1j0 d3 B3r3quí4s; y d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1 y d3 sus h3rm4n0s, 4 0tán h1j0 d3 Cus4í4s. 18 Y c0n 3ll0s 4 sus h3rm4n0s d3l s3gund0 0rd3n, 4 Z4c4rí4s, J44z13l, S3m1r4m0t, J3h13l, Un1, 0l14b, B3n4í4, M44sí4s, M4t4tí4s, 0l1f3l3hu, M1cní4s, 0b3d-3d0m y J313l, l0s p0rt3r0s. 19 4sí H3mán, 4s4f y 0tán, qu3 3r4n c4nt0r3s, s0n4b4n címb4l0s d3 br0nc3. 20 Y Z4c4rí4s, 4z13l, S3m1r4m0t, J3h13l, Un1, 0l14b, M44sí4s y B3n4í4, c0n s4lt3r10s s0br3 4l4m0t. 21 M4t4tí4s, 0l1f3l3hu, M1cní4s, 0b3d-3d0m, J313l y 4z4zí4s t3ní4n 4rp4s 4f1n4d4s 3n l4 0ct4v4 p4r4 d1r1g1r. 22 Y Qu3n4ní4s, pr1nc1p4l d3 l0s l3v1t4s 3n l4 mús1c4, fu3 pu3st0 p4r4 d1r1g1r 3l c4nt0, p0rqu3 3r4 3nt3nd1d0 3n 3ll0. 23 B3r3quí4s y 0lc4n4 3r4n p0rt3r0s d3l 4rc4. 24 Y S3b4ní4s, J0s4f4t, N4t4n43l, 4m4s41, Z4c4rí4s, B3n4í4 y 0l13z3r, s4c3rd0t3s, t0c4b4n l4s tr0mp3t4s d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 D10s; 0b3d-3d0m y J3hí4s 3r4n t4mb1én p0rt3r0s d3l 4rc4. 

25 D4v1d, pu3s, y l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l y l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 m1ll4r3s, fu3r0n 4 tr43r 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, d3 c4s4 d3 0b3d-3d0m, c0n 4l3grí4. 26 Y 4yud4nd0 D10s 4 l0s l3v1t4s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, s4cr1f1c4r0n s13t3 n0v1ll0s y s13t3 c4rn3r0s. 27 Y D4v1d 1b4 v3st1d0 d3 l1n0 f1n0, y t4mb1én t0d0s l0s l3v1t4s qu3 ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4, y 4s1m1sm0 l0s c4nt0r3s; y Qu3n4ní4s 3r4 m43str0 d3 c4nt0 3ntr3 l0s c4nt0r3s. Ll3v4b4 t4mb1én D4v1d s0br3 sí un 3f0d d3 l1n0. 28 D3 3st4 m4n3r4 ll3v4b4 t0d0 1sr43l 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, c0n júb1l0 y s0n1d0 d3 b0c1n4s y tr0mp3t4s y címb4l0s, y 4l s0n d3 s4lt3r10s y 4rp4s. 29 P3r0 cu4nd0 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá ll3gó 4 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, M1c4l, h1j4 d3 S4úl, m1r4nd0 p0r un4 v3nt4n4, v10 4l r3y D4v1d qu3 s4lt4b4 y d4nz4b4; y l0 m3n0spr3c1ó 3n su c0r4zón.

1 4sí tr4j3r0n 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s, y l4 pus13r0n 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13nd4 qu3 D4v1d h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0 p4r4 3ll4; y 0fr3c13r0n h0l0c4ust0s y s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z d3l4nt3 d3 D10s. 2 Y cu4nd0 D4v1d 4c4bó d3 0fr3c3r 3l h0l0c4ust0 y l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z, b3nd1j0 4l pu3bl0 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá. 3 Y r3p4rt1ó 4 t0d0 1sr43l, 4sí 4 h0mbr3s c0m0 4 muj3r3s, 4 c4d4 un0 un4 t0rt4 d3 p4n, un4 p13z4 d3 c4rn3, y un4 t0rt4 d3 p4s4s. 

4 Y pus0 d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá m1n1str0s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, p4r4 qu3 r3c0rd4s3n y c0nf3s4s3n y l04s3n 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l: 5 4s4f 3l pr1m3r0; 3l s3gund0 d3spués d3 él, Z4c4rí4s; J313l, S3m1r4m0t, J3h13l, M4t4tí4s, 0l14b, B3n4í4, 0b3d-3d0m y J313l, c0n sus 1nstrum3nt0s d3 s4lt3r10s y 4rp4s; p3r0 4s4f s0n4b4 l0s címb4l0s. 6 T4mb1én l0s s4c3rd0t3s B3n4í4 y J4h4z13l s0n4b4n c0nt1nu4m3nt3 l4s tr0mp3t4s d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 D10s. 

S4lm0 d3 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s d3 D4v1d

(S4l. 105.1-15; 96.1-13; 106.47-48)

Sus ju1c10s 3stán 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4.

Y d3 l4 p4l4br4 qu3 él m4ndó p4r4 m1l g3n3r4c10n3s; 
16 D3l p4ct0 qu3 c0nc3rtó c0n 4br4h4m, 
Y d3 su jur4m3nt0 4 1s44c;

Y 4 1sr43l p0r p4ct0 s3mp1t3rn0,

P0rc1ón d3 tu h3r3d4d. 
19 Cu4nd0 3ll0s 3r4n p0c0s 3n núm3r0, 
P0c0s y f0r4st3r0s 3n 3ll4, 
20 Y 4nd4b4n d3 n4c1ón 3n n4c1ón, 
Y d3 un r31n0 4 0tr0 pu3bl0,

4nt3s p0r 4m0r d3 3ll0s c4st1gó 4 l0s r3y3s.

N1 h4gá1s m4l 4 m1s pr0f3t4s.

Y 3n t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s sus m4r4v1ll4s. 
25 P0rqu3 gr4nd3 3s J3h0vá, y d1gn0 d3 supr3m4 4l4b4nz4, 
Y d3 s3r t3m1d0 s0br3 t0d0s l0s d10s3s.

M4s J3h0vá h1z0 l0s c13l0s.

P0d3r y 4l3grí4 3n su m0r4d4.

D4d 4 J3h0vá gl0r14 y p0d3r. 
29 D4d 4 J3h0vá l4 h0nr4 d3b1d4 4 su n0mbr3; 
Tr43d 0fr3nd4, y v3n1d d3l4nt3 d3 él; 
P0str40s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 3n l4 h3rm0sur4 d3 l4 s4nt1d4d. 
30 T3m3d 3n su pr3s3nc14, t0d4 l4 t13rr4; 
0l mund0 s3rá 4ún 3st4bl3c1d0, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 c0nmu3v4.

35 Y d3c1d: Sálv4n0s, 0h D10s, s4lv4c1ón nu3str4;

D3 3t3rn1d4d 4 3t3rn1d4d.

L0s l3v1t4s 3nc4rg4d0s d3l 4rc4

37 Y d3jó 4llí, d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, 4 4s4f y 4 sus h3rm4n0s, p4r4 qu3 m1n1str4s3n d3 c0nt1nu0 d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4, c4d4 c0s4 3n su dí4; 38 y 4 0b3d-3d0m y 4 sus s3s3nt4 y 0ch0 h3rm4n0s; y 4 0b3d-3d0m h1j0 d3 J3dutún y 4 H0s4 c0m0 p0rt3r0s. 39 4s1m1sm0 4l s4c3rd0t3 S4d0c, y 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s sus h3rm4n0s, d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá 3n 3l lug4r 4lt0 qu3 3st4b4 3n G4b4ón, 40 p4r4 qu3 s4cr1f1c4s3n c0nt1nu4m3nt3, 4 m4ñ4n4 y t4rd3, h0l0c4ust0s 4 J3h0vá 3n 3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0 3n l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá, qu3 él pr3scr1b1ó 4 1sr43l; 41 y c0n 3ll0s 4 H3mán, 4 J3dutún y 4 l0s 0tr0s 3sc0g1d0s d3cl4r4d0s p0r sus n0mbr3s, p4r4 gl0r1f1c4r 4 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 3s 3t3rn4 su m1s3r1c0rd14. 42 C0n 3ll0s 4 H3mán y 4 J3dutún c0n tr0mp3t4s y címb4l0s p4r4 l0s qu3 t0c4b4n, y c0n 0tr0s 1nstrum3nt0s d3 mús1c4 d3 D10s; y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 J3dutún p4r4 p0rt3r0s. 

43 Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 s3 fu3 c4d4 un0 4 su c4s4; y D4v1d s3 v0lv1ó p4r4 b3nd3c1r su c4s4. 

P4ct0 d3 D10s c0n D4v1d

(2 S. 7.1-29)

1 CRÓN1C4S 17

1 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 m0r4nd0 D4v1d 3n su c4s4, d1j0 D4v1d 4l pr0f3t4 N4tán: H3 4quí y0 h4b1t0 3n c4s4 d3 c3dr0, y 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá d3b4j0 d3 c0rt1n4s. 2 Y N4tán d1j0 4 D4v1d: H4z t0d0 l0 qu3 3stá 3n tu c0r4zón, p0rqu3 D10s 3stá c0nt1g0. 

3 0n 4qu3ll4 m1sm4 n0ch3 v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 D10s 4 N4tán, d1c13nd0: 4 V3 y d1 4 D4v1d m1 s13rv0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: Tú n0 m3 3d1f1c4rás c4s4 3n qu3 h4b1t3. 5 P0rqu3 n0 h3 h4b1t4d0 3n c4s4 4lgun4 d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 s4qué 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l h4st4 h0y; 4nt3s 3stuv3 d3 t13nd4 3n t13nd4, y d3 t4b3rnácul0 3n t4b3rnácul0. 6 P0r d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 4nduv3 c0n t0d0 1sr43l, ¿h4blé un4 p4l4br4 4 4lgun0 d3 l0s ju3c3s d3 1sr43l, 4 l0s cu4l3s m4ndé qu3 4p4c3nt4s3n 4 m1 pu3bl0, p4r4 d3c1rl3s: ¿P0r qué n0 m3 3d1f1cá1s un4 c4s4 d3 c3dr0? 7 P0r t4nt0, 4h0r4 d1rás 4 m1 s13rv0 D4v1d: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: Y0 t3 t0mé d3l r3d1l, d3 d3trás d3 l4s 0v3j4s, p4r4 qu3 fu3s3s prínc1p3 s0br3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l; 8 y h3 3st4d0 c0nt1g0 3n t0d0 cu4nt0 h4s 4nd4d0, y h3 c0rt4d0 4 t0d0s tus 3n3m1g0s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, y t3 h4ré gr4n n0mbr3, c0m0 3l n0mbr3 d3 l0s gr4nd3s 3n l4 t13rr4. 9 4s1m1sm0 h3 d1spu3st0 lug4r p4r4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, y l0 h3 pl4nt4d0 p4r4 qu3 h4b1t3 3n él y n0 s34 más r3m0v1d0; n1 l0s h1j0s d3 1n1qu1d4d l0 c0nsum1rán más, c0m0 4nt3s, 10 y d3sd3 3l t13mp0 qu3 pus3 l0s ju3c3s s0br3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l; m4s hum1ll4ré 4 t0d0s tus 3n3m1g0s. T3 h4g0 s4b3r, 4d3más, qu3 J3h0vá t3 3d1f1c4rá c4s4. 11 Y cu4nd0 tus dí4s s34n cumpl1d0s p4r4 1rt3 c0n tus p4dr3s, l3v4nt4ré d3sc3nd3nc14 d3spués d3 t1, 4 un0 d3 3ntr3 tus h1j0s, y 4f1rm4ré su r31n0. 12 0l m3 3d1f1c4rá c4s4, y y0 c0nf1rm4ré su tr0n0 3t3rn4m3nt3. 13 Y0 l3 s3ré p0r p4dr3, y él m3 s3rá p0r h1j0; y n0 qu1t4ré d3 él m1 m1s3r1c0rd14, c0m0 l4 qu1té d3 4qu3l qu3 fu3 4nt3s d3 t1; 14 s1n0 qu3 l0 c0nf1rm4ré 3n m1 c4s4 y 3n m1 r31n0 3t3rn4m3nt3, y su tr0n0 s3rá f1rm3 p4r4 s13mpr3. 15 C0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s, y c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4 3st4 v1s1ón, 4sí h4bló N4tán 4 D4v1d. 

16 Y 3ntró 3l r3y D4v1d y 3stuv0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y d1j0: J3h0vá D10s, ¿qu1én s0y y0, y cuál 3s m1 c4s4, p4r4 qu3 m3 h4y4s tr4íd0 h4st4 3st3 lug4r? 17 Y 4un 3st0, 0h D10s, t3 h4 p4r3c1d0 p0c0, pu3s qu3 h4s h4bl4d0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu s13rv0 p4r4 t13mp0 más l3j4n0, y m3 h4s m1r4d0 c0m0 4 un h0mbr3 3xc3l3nt3, 0h J3h0vá D10s. 18 ¿Qué más pu3d3 4ñ4d1r D4v1d p1d13nd0 d3 t1 p4r4 gl0r1f1c4r 4 tu s13rv0? M4s tú c0n0c3s 4 tu s13rv0. 19 0h J3h0vá, p0r 4m0r d3 tu s13rv0 y s3gún tu c0r4zón, h4s h3ch0 t0d4 3st4 gr4nd3z4, p4r4 h4c3r n0t0r14s t0d4s tus gr4nd3z4s. 20 J3h0vá, n0 h4y s3m3j4nt3 4 t1, n1 h4y D10s s1n0 tú, s3gún t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h3m0s 0íd0 c0n nu3str0s 0íd0s. 21 ¿Y qué pu3bl0 h4y 3n l4 t13rr4 c0m0 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, cuy0 D10s fu3s3 y s3 r3d1m13s3 un pu3bl0, p4r4 h4c3rt3 n0mbr3 c0n gr4nd3z4s y m4r4v1ll4s, 3ch4nd0 4 l4s n4c10n3s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 tu pu3bl0, qu3 tú r3sc4t4st3 d3 0g1pt0? 22 Tú h4s c0nst1tu1d0 4 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l p0r pu3bl0 tuy0 p4r4 s13mpr3; y tú, J3h0vá, h4s v3n1d0 4 s3r su D10s. 23 4h0r4 pu3s, J3h0vá, l4 p4l4br4 qu3 h4s h4bl4d0 4c3rc4 d3 tu s13rv0 y d3 su c4s4, s34 f1rm3 p4r4 s13mpr3, y h4z c0m0 h4s d1ch0. 24 P3rm4n3zc4, pu3s, y s34 3ngr4nd3c1d0 tu n0mbr3 p4r4 s13mpr3, 4 f1n d3 qu3 s3 d1g4: J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l, 3s D10s p4r4 1sr43l. 1 R3un1ó D4v1d 3n J3rus4lén 4 t0d0s l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 1sr43l, l0s j3f3s d3 l4s tr1bus, l0s j3f3s d3 l4s d1v1s10n3s qu3 s3rví4n 4l r3y, l0s j3f3s d3 m1ll4r3s y d3 c3nt3n4s, l0s 4dm1n1str4d0r3s d3 t0d4 l4 h4c13nd4 y p0s3s1ón d3l r3y y d3 sus h1j0s, y l0s 0f1c14l3s y l0s más p0d3r0s0s y v4l13nt3s d3 sus h0mbr3s. 2 Y l3v4ntánd0s3 3l r3y D4v1d, pu3st0 3n p13 d1j0: 0ídm3, h3rm4n0s mí0s, y pu3bl0 mí0. Y0 t3ní4 3l pr0pós1t0 d3 3d1f1c4r un4 c4s4 3n l4 cu4l r3p0s4r4 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá, y p4r4 3l 3str4d0 d3 l0s p13s d3 nu3str0 D10s; y h4bí4 y4 pr3p4r4d0 t0d0 p4r4 3d1f1c4r. 3 M4s D10s m3 d1j0: Tú n0 3d1f1c4rás c4s4 4 m1 n0mbr3, p0rqu3 3r3s h0mbr3 d3 gu3rr4, y h4s d3rr4m4d0 much4 s4ngr3. 4 P3r0 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l m3 3l1g1ó d3 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 p4dr3, p4r4 qu3 p3rp3tu4m3nt3 fu3s3 r3y s0br3 1sr43l; p0rqu3 4 Judá 3sc0g1ó p0r c4ud1ll0, y d3 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá 4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 m1 p4dr3; y d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 m1 p4dr3 s3 4gr4dó d3 mí p4r4 p0n3rm3 p0r r3y s0br3 t0d0 1sr43l. 5 Y d3 3ntr3 t0d0s m1s h1j0s (p0rqu3 J3h0vá m3 h4 d4d0 much0s h1j0s), 3l1g1ó 4 m1 h1j0 S4l0món p4r4 qu3 s3 s13nt3 3n 3l tr0n0 d3l r31n0 d3 J3h0vá s0br3 1sr43l. 6 Y m3 h4 d1ch0: S4l0món tu h1j0, él 3d1f1c4rá m1 c4s4 y m1s 4tr10s; p0rqu3 4 ést3 h3 3sc0g1d0 p0r h1j0, y y0 l3 s3ré 4 él p0r p4dr3. 7 4s1m1sm0 y0 c0nf1rm4ré su r31n0 p4r4 s13mpr3, s1 él s3 3sf0rz4r3 4 p0n3r p0r 0br4 m1s m4nd4m13nt0s y m1s d3cr3t0s, c0m0 3n 3st3 dí4. 8 4h0r4, pu3s, 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 t0d0 1sr43l, c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 J3h0vá, y 3n 0íd0s d3 nu3str0 D10s, gu4rd4d 3 1nqu1r1d t0d0s l0s pr3c3pt0s d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, p4r4 qu3 p0s3á1s l4 bu3n4 t13rr4, y l4 d3jé1s 3n h3r3nc14 4 vu3str0s h1j0s d3spués d3 v0s0tr0s p3rp3tu4m3nt3. 

9 Y tú, S4l0món, h1j0 mí0, r3c0n0c3 4l D10s d3 tu p4dr3, y sírv3l3 c0n c0r4zón p3rf3ct0 y c0n án1m0 v0lunt4r10; p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3scudr1ñ4 l0s c0r4z0n3s d3 t0d0s, y 3nt13nd3 t0d0 1nt3nt0 d3 l0s p3ns4m13nt0s. S1 tú l3 busc4r3s, l0 h4ll4rás; m4s s1 l0 d3j4r3s, él t3 d3s3ch4rá p4r4 s13mpr3. 10 M1r4, pu3s, 4h0r4, qu3 J3h0vá t3 h4 3l3g1d0 p4r4 qu3 3d1f1qu3s c4s4 p4r4 3l s4ntu4r10; 3sfuérz4t3, y h4zl4. 

11 Y D4v1d d10 4 S4l0món su h1j0 3l pl4n0 d3l pórt1c0 d3l t3mpl0 y sus c4s4s, sus t3s0r3rí4s, sus 4p0s3nt0s, sus cám4r4s y l4 c4s4 d3l pr0p1c14t0r10. 12 4s1m1sm0 3l pl4n0 d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 t3ní4 3n m3nt3 p4r4 l0s 4tr10s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 t0d4s l4s cám4r4s 4lr3d3d0r, p4r4 l4s t3s0r3rí4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, y p4r4 l4s t3s0r3rí4s d3 l4s c0s4s s4nt1f1c4d4s. 13 T4mb1én p4r4 l0s grup0s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y d3 l0s l3v1t4s, p4r4 t0d4 l4 0br4 d3l m1n1st3r10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y p4r4 t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3l m1n1st3r10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 14 Y d10 0r0 3n p3s0 p4r4 l4s c0s4s d3 0r0, p4r4 t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 c4d4 s3rv1c10, y pl4t4 3n p3s0 p4r4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s d3 pl4t4, p4r4 t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 c4d4 s3rv1c10. 15 0r0 3n p3s0 p4r4 l0s c4nd3l3r0s d3 0r0, y p4r4 sus lámp4r4s; 3n p3s0 3l 0r0 p4r4 c4d4 c4nd3l3r0 y sus lámp4r4s; y p4r4 l0s c4nd3l3r0s d3 pl4t4, pl4t4 3n p3s0 p4r4 c4d4 c4nd3l3r0 y sus lámp4r4s, c0nf0rm3 4l s3rv1c10 d3 c4d4 c4nd3l3r0. 16 4s1m1sm0 d10 0r0 3n p3s0 p4r4 l4s m3s4s d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón, p4r4 c4d4 m3s4; d3l m1sm0 m0d0 pl4t4 p4r4 l4s m3s4s d3 pl4t4. 17 T4mb1én 0r0 pur0 p4r4 l0s g4rf10s, p4r4 l0s l3br1ll0s, p4r4 l4s c0p4s y p4r4 l4s t4z4s d3 0r0; p4r4 c4d4 t4z4 p0r p3s0; y p4r4 l4s t4z4s d3 pl4t4, p0r p3s0 p4r4 c4d4 t4z4. 18 4d3más, 0r0 pur0 3n p3s0 p4r4 3l 4lt4r d3l 1nc13ns0, y p4r4 3l c4rr0 d3 l0s qu3rub1n3s d3 0r0, qu3 c0n l4s 4l4s 3xt3nd1d4s cubrí4n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá. 19 T0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, d1j0 D4v1d, m3 fu3r0n tr4z4d4s p0r l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá, qu3 m3 h1z0 3nt3nd3r t0d4s l4s 0br4s d3l d1s3ñ0. 

20 D1j0 4d3más D4v1d 4 S4l0món su h1j0: 4ním4t3 y 3sfuérz4t3, y m4n0s 4 l4 0br4; n0 t3m4s, n1 d3sm4y3s, p0rqu3 J3h0vá D10s, m1 D10s, 3st4rá c0nt1g0; él n0 t3 d3j4rá n1 t3 d3s4mp4r4rá, h4st4 qu3 4c4b3s t0d4 l4 0br4 p4r4 3l s3rv1c10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 21 H3 4quí l0s grup0s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y d3 l0s l3v1t4s, p4r4 t0d0 3l m1n1st3r10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, 3st4rán c0nt1g0 3n t0d4 l4 0br4; 4s1m1sm0 t0d0s l0s v0lunt4r10s 3 1nt3l1g3nt3s p4r4 t0d4 f0rm4 d3 s3rv1c10, y l0s prínc1p3s, y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 p4r4 3j3cut4r t0d4s tus órd3n3s. 

1 CRÓN1C4S 29

1 D3spués d1j0 3l r3y D4v1d 4 t0d4 l4 4s4mbl34: S0l4m3nt3 4 S4l0món m1 h1j0 h4 3l3g1d0 D10s; él 3s j0v3n y t13rn0 d3 3d4d, y l4 0br4 gr4nd3; p0rqu3 l4 c4s4 n0 3s p4r4 h0mbr3, s1n0 p4r4 J3h0vá D10s. 2 Y0 c0n t0d4s m1s fu3rz4s h3 pr3p4r4d0 p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 D10s, 0r0 p4r4 l4s c0s4s d3 0r0, pl4t4 p4r4 l4s c0s4s d3 pl4t4, br0nc3 p4r4 l4s d3 br0nc3, h13rr0 p4r4 l4s d3 h13rr0, y m4d3r4 p4r4 l4s d3 m4d3r4; y p13dr4s d3 ón1c3, p13dr4s pr3c10s4s, p13dr4s n3gr4s, p13dr4s d3 d1v3rs0s c0l0r3s, y t0d4 cl4s3 d3 p13dr4s pr3c10s4s, y p13dr4s d3 márm0l 3n 4bund4nc14. 3 4d3más d3 3st0, p0r cu4nt0 t3ng0 m1 4f3ct0 3n l4 c4s4 d3 m1 D10s, y0 gu4rd0 3n m1 t3s0r0 p4rt1cul4r 0r0 y pl4t4 qu3, 4d3más d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h3 pr3p4r4d0 p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3l s4ntu4r10, h3 d4d0 p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 D10s: 4 tr3s m1l t4l3nt0s d3 0r0, d3 0r0 d3 0f1r, y s13t3 m1l t4l3nt0s d3 pl4t4 r3f1n4d4 p4r4 cubr1r l4s p4r3d3s d3 l4s c4s4s; 5 0r0, pu3s, p4r4 l4s c0s4s d3 0r0, y pl4t4 p4r4 l4s c0s4s d3 pl4t4, y p4r4 t0d4 l4 0br4 d3 l4s m4n0s d3 l0s 4rtíf1c3s. ¿Y qu1én qu13r3 h4c3r h0y 0fr3nd4 v0lunt4r14 4 J3h0vá? 

6 0nt0nc3s l0s j3f3s d3 f4m1l14, y l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, j3f3s d3 m1ll4r3s y d3 c3nt3n4s, c0n l0s 4dm1n1str4d0r3s d3 l4 h4c13nd4 d3l r3y, 0fr3c13r0n v0lunt4r14m3nt3. 7 Y d13r0n p4r4 3l s3rv1c10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s c1nc0 m1l t4l3nt0s y d13z m1l dr4cm4s d3 0r0, d13z m1l t4l3nt0s d3 pl4t4, d13c10ch0 m1l t4l3nt0s d3 br0nc3, y c1nc0 m1l t4l3nt0s d3 h13rr0. 8 Y t0d0 3l qu3 t3ní4 p13dr4s pr3c10s4s l4s d10 p4r4 3l t3s0r0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, 3n m4n0 d3 J3h13l g3rs0n1t4. 9 Y s3 4l3gró 3l pu3bl0 p0r h4b3r c0ntr1bu1d0 v0lunt4r14m3nt3; p0rqu3 d3 t0d0 c0r4zón 0fr3c13r0n 4 J3h0vá v0lunt4r14m3nt3. 

10 4s1m1sm0 s3 4l3gró much0 3l r3y D4v1d, y b3nd1j0 4 J3h0vá d3l4nt3 d3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón; y d1j0 D4v1d: B3nd1t0 s34s tú, 0h J3h0vá, D10s d3 1sr43l nu3str0 p4dr3, d3sd3 3l s1gl0 y h4st4 3l s1gl0. 11 Tuy4 3s, 0h J3h0vá, l4 m4gn1f1c3nc14 y 3l p0d3r, l4 gl0r14, l4 v1ct0r14 y 3l h0n0r; p0rqu3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 3stán 3n l0s c13l0s y 3n l4 t13rr4 s0n tuy4s. Tuy0, 0h J3h0vá, 3s 3l r31n0, y tú 3r3s 3xc3ls0 s0br3 t0d0s. 12 L4s r1qu3z4s y l4 gl0r14 pr0c3d3n d3 t1, y tú d0m1n4s s0br3 t0d0; 3n tu m4n0 3stá l4 fu3rz4 y 3l p0d3r, y 3n tu m4n0 3l h4c3r gr4nd3 y 3l d4r p0d3r 4 t0d0s. 13 4h0r4 pu3s, D10s nu3str0, n0s0tr0s 4l4b4m0s y l04m0s tu gl0r10s0 n0mbr3. 

14 P0rqu3 ¿qu1én s0y y0, y qu1én 3s m1 pu3bl0, p4r4 qu3 pud1és3m0s 0fr3c3r v0lunt4r14m3nt3 c0s4s s3m3j4nt3s? Pu3s t0d0 3s tuy0, y d3 l0 r3c1b1d0 d3 tu m4n0 t3 d4m0s. 15 P0rqu3 n0s0tr0s, 3xtr4nj3r0s y 4dv3n3d1z0s s0m0s d3l4nt3 d3 t1, c0m0 t0d0s nu3str0s p4dr3s; y nu3str0s dí4s s0br3 l4 t13rr4, cu4l s0mbr4 qu3 n0 dur4. 16 0h J3h0vá D10s nu3str0, t0d4 3st4 4bund4nc14 qu3 h3m0s pr3p4r4d0 p4r4 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4 tu s4nt0 n0mbr3, d3 tu m4n0 3s, y t0d0 3s tuy0. 17 Y0 sé, D10s mí0, qu3 tú 3scudr1ñ4s l0s c0r4z0n3s, y qu3 l4 r3ct1tud t3 4gr4d4; p0r 3s0 y0 c0n r3ct1tud d3 m1 c0r4zón v0lunt4r14m3nt3 t3 h3 0fr3c1d0 t0d0 3st0, y 4h0r4 h3 v1st0 c0n 4l3grí4 qu3 tu pu3bl0, r3un1d0 4quí 4h0r4, h4 d4d0 p4r4 t1 3sp0ntán34m3nt3. 18 J3h0vá, D10s d3 4br4h4m, d3 1s44c y d3 1sr43l nu3str0s p4dr3s, c0ns3rv4 p3rp3tu4m3nt3 3st4 v0lunt4d d3l c0r4zón d3 tu pu3bl0, y 3nc4m1n4 su c0r4zón 4 t1. 19 4s1m1sm0 d4 4 m1 h1j0 S4l0món c0r4zón p3rf3ct0, p4r4 qu3 gu4rd3 tus m4nd4m13nt0s, tus t3st1m0n10s y tus 3st4tut0s, y p4r4 qu3 h4g4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s, y t3 3d1f1qu3 l4 c4s4 p4r4 l4 cu4l y0 h3 h3ch0 pr3p4r4t1v0s. 

20 D3spués d1j0 D4v1d 4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón: B3nd3c1d 4h0r4 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s. 0nt0nc3s t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón b3nd1j0 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 sus p4dr3s, 3 1ncl1nánd0s3 4d0r4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá y d3l r3y. 21 Y s4cr1f1c4r0n víct1m4s 4 J3h0vá, y 0fr3c13r0n 4 J3h0vá h0l0c4ust0s 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3; m1l b3c3rr0s, m1l c4rn3r0s, m1l c0rd3r0s c0n sus l1b4c10n3s, y much0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4rt3 d3 t0d0 1sr43l. 22 Y c0m13r0n y b3b13r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá 4qu3l dí4 c0n gr4n g0z0; y d13r0n p0r s3gund4 v3z l4 1nv3st1dur4 d3l r31n0 4 S4l0món h1j0 d3 D4v1d, y 4nt3 J3h0vá l3 ung13r0n p0r prínc1p3, y 4 S4d0c p0r s4c3rd0t3. 

23 Y s3 s3ntó S4l0món p0r r3y 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 J3h0vá 3n lug4r d3 D4v1d su p4dr3, y fu3 pr0sp3r4d0; y l3 0b3d3c1ó t0d0 1sr43l. 24 Y t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s y p0d3r0s0s, y t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3l r3y D4v1d, pr3st4r0n h0m3n4j3 4l r3y S4l0món. 25 Y J3h0vá 3ngr4nd3c1ó 3n 3xtr3m0 4 S4l0món 4 0j0s d3 t0d0 1sr43l, y l3 d10 t4l gl0r14 3n su r31n0, cu4l n1ngún r3y l4 tuv0 4nt3s d3 él 3n 1sr43l. 

Mu3rt3 d3 D4v1d

(1 R. 2.10-12)

26 4sí r31nó D4v1d h1j0 d3 1s4í s0br3 t0d0 1sr43l. 27 0l t13mp0 qu3 r31nó s0br3 1sr43l fu3 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s. S13t3 4ñ0s r31nó 3n H3brón, y tr31nt4 y tr3s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén. 28 Y mur1ó 3n bu3n4 v3j3z, ll3n0 d3 dí4s, d3 r1qu3z4s y d3 gl0r14; y r31nó 3n su lug4r S4l0món su h1j0. 29 Y l0s h3ch0s d3l r3y D4v1d, pr1m3r0s y p0str3r0s, 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4s crón1c4s d3 S4mu3l v1d3nt3, 3n l4s crón1c4s d3l pr0f3t4 N4tán, y 3n l4s crón1c4s d3 G4d v1d3nt3, 30 c0n t0d0 l0 r3l4t1v0 4 su r31n4d0, y su p0d3r, y l0s t13mp0s qu3 p4s4r0n s0br3 él, y s0br3 1sr43l y s0br3 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 4qu3ll4s t13rr4s.
