S3gund0 l1br0 d3 Crón1c4s 



S4l0món p1d3 s4b1durí4

2 Crón1c4s 1
(1 R. 3.3-15)

1 S4l0món h1j0 d3 D4v1d fu3 4f1rm4d0 3n su r31n0, y J3h0vá su D10s 3st4b4 c0n él, y l0 3ngr4nd3c1ó s0br3m4n3r4. 
2 Y c0nv0có S4l0món 4 t0d0 1sr43l, 4 j3f3s d3 m1ll4r3s y d3 c3nt3n4s, 4 ju3c3s, y 4 t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s d3 t0d0 1sr43l, j3f3s d3 f4m1l14s. 
3 Y fu3 S4l0món, y c0n él t0d4 3st4 4s4mbl34, 4l lug4r 4lt0 qu3 h4bí4 3n G4b4ón; p0rqu3 4llí 3st4b4 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón d3 D10s, qu3 M01sés s13rv0 d3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h3ch0 3n 3l d3s13rt0. 

4 P3r0 D4v1d h4bí4 tr4íd0 3l 4rc4 d3 D10s d3 Qu1r14t-j34r1m 4l lug4r qu3 él l3 h4bí4 pr3p4r4d0; p0rqu3 él l3 h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0 un4 t13nd4 3n J3rus4lén. 
5 4s1m1sm0 3l 4lt4r d3 br0nc3 qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 B3z4l33l h1j0 d3 Ur1, h1j0 d3 Hur, 3st4b4 4llí d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, 4l cu4l fu3 4 c0nsult4r S4l0món c0n 4qu3ll4 4s4mbl34. 
6 Sub1ó, pu3s, S4l0món 4llá d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, 4l 4lt4r d3 br0nc3 qu3 3st4b4 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y 0fr3c1ó s0br3 él m1l h0l0c4ust0s.
 
7 Y 4qu3ll4 n0ch3 4p4r3c1ó D10s 4 S4l0món y l3 d1j0: Píd3m3 l0 qu3 qu13r4s qu3 y0 t3 dé. 
8 Y S4l0món d1j0 4 D10s: Tú h4s t3n1d0 c0n D4v1d m1 p4dr3 gr4n m1s3r1c0rd14, y 4 mí m3 h4s pu3st0 p0r r3y 3n lug4r suy0. 
9 C0nfírm3s3 pu3s, 4h0r4, 0h J3h0vá D10s, tu p4l4br4 d4d4 4 D4v1d m1 p4dr3; p0rqu3 tú m3 h4s pu3st0 p0r r3y s0br3 un pu3bl0 num3r0s0 c0m0 3l p0lv0 d3 l4 t13rr4. 
10 D4m3 4h0r4 s4b1durí4 y c13nc14, p4r4 pr3s3nt4rm3 d3l4nt3 d3 3st3 pu3bl0; p0rqu3 ¿qu1én p0drá g0b3rn4r 4 3st3 tu pu3bl0 t4n gr4nd3? 
11 Y d1j0 D10s 4 S4l0món: P0r cu4nt0 hub0 3s0 3n tu c0r4zón, y n0 p3d1st3 r1qu3z4s, b13n3s 0 gl0r14, n1 l4 v1d4 d3 l0s qu3 t3 qu13r3n m4l, n1 p3d1st3 much0s dí4s, s1n0 qu3 h4s p3d1d0 p4r4 t1 s4b1durí4 y c13nc14 p4r4 g0b3rn4r 4 m1 pu3bl0, s0br3 3l cu4l t3 h3 pu3st0 p0r r3y, 
12 s4b1durí4 y c13nc14 t3 s0n d4d4s; y t4mb1én t3 d4ré r1qu3z4s, b13n3s y gl0r14, c0m0 nunc4 tuv13r0n l0s r3y3s qu3 h4n s1d0 4nt3s d3 t1, n1 t3ndrán l0s qu3 v3ng4n d3spués d3 t1. 
13 Y d3sd3 3l lug4r 4lt0 qu3 3st4b4 3n G4b4ón, d3l4nt3 d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, v0lv1ó S4l0món 4 J3rus4lén, y r31nó s0br3 1sr43l. 



S4l0món c0m3rc14 3n c4b4ll0s y 3n c4rr0s
(1 R. 10.26-29; 2 Cr. 9:25-28)

14 Y juntó S4l0món c4rr0s y g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0; y tuv0 m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s c4rr0s y d0c3 m1l j1n3t3s, l0s cu4l3s pus0 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s c4rr0s y c0n 3l r3y 3n J3rus4lén. 
15 Y 4cumuló 3l r3y pl4t4 y 0r0 3n J3rus4lén c0m0 p13dr4s, y c3dr0 c0m0 c4br4h1g0s d3 l4 S3f3l4 3n 4bund4nc14. 
16 Y l0s m3rc4d3r3s d3l r3y c0mpr4b4n p0r c0ntr4t0 c4b4ll0s y l13nz0s f1n0s d3 0g1pt0 p4r4 S4l0món. 
17 Y subí4n y c0mpr4b4n 3n 0g1pt0 un c4rr0 p0r s31sc13nt4s p13z4s d3 pl4t4, y un c4b4ll0 p0r c13nt0 c1ncu3nt4; y 4sí c0mpr4b4n p0r m3d10 d3 3ll0s p4r4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l0s h3t30s, y p4r4 l0s r3y3s d3 S1r14. 



P4ct0 d3 S4l0món c0n H1r4m

2 Crón1c4s 2
(1 R. 5.1-18; 7.13-14)

1 D3t3rm1nó, pu3s, S4l0món 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá, y c4s4 p4r4 su r31n0. 
2 Y d3s1gnó S4l0món s3t3nt4 m1l h0mbr3s qu3 ll3v4s3n c4rg4s, y 0ch3nt4 m1l h0mbr3s qu3 c0rt4s3n 3n l0s m0nt3s, y tr3s m1l s31sc13nt0s qu3 l0s v1g1l4s3n. 

3 Y 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r S4l0món 4 H1r4m r3y d3 T1r0: H4z c0nm1g0 c0m0 h1c1st3 c0n D4v1d m1 p4dr3, 3nv1ánd0l3 c3dr0s p4r4 qu3 3d1f1c4r4 p4r4 sí c4s4 3n qu3 m0r4s3. 
4 H3 4quí, y0 t3ng0 qu3 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá m1 D10s, p4r4 c0ns4grárs3l4, p4r4 qu3m4r 1nc13ns0 4r0mát1c0 d3l4nt3 d3 él, y p4r4 l4 c0l0c4c1ón c0nt1nu4 d3 l0s p4n3s d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón, y p4r4 h0l0c4ust0s 4 m4ñ4n4 y t4rd3, 3n l0s dí4s d3 r3p0s0, nu3v4s lun4s, y f3st1v1d4d3s d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s; l0 cu4l h4 d3 s3r p3rp3tu0 3n 1sr43l. 
5 Y l4 c4s4 qu3 t3ng0 qu3 3d1f1c4r, h4 d3 s3r gr4nd3; p0rqu3 3l D10s nu3str0 3s gr4nd3 s0br3 t0d0s l0s d10s3s. 

6 M4s, ¿qu1én s3rá c4p4z d3 3d1f1c4rl3 c4s4, s13nd0 qu3 l0s c13l0s y l0s c13l0s d3 l0s c13l0s n0 pu3d3n c0nt3n3rl0? ¿Qu1én, pu3s, s0y y0 p4r4 qu3 l3 3d1f1qu3 c4s4, s1n0 t4n sól0 p4r4 qu3m4r 1nc13ns0 d3l4nt3 d3 él? 
7 0nví4m3, pu3s, 4h0r4 un h0mbr3 háb1l qu3 s3p4 tr4b4j4r 3n 0r0, 3n pl4t4, 3n br0nc3, 3n h13rr0, 3n púrpur4, 3n gr4n4 y 3n 4zul, y qu3 s3p4 3sculp1r c0n l0s m43str0s qu3 3stán c0nm1g0 3n Judá y 3n J3rus4lén, l0s cu4l3s d1spus0 m1 p4dr3. 
8 0nví4m3 t4mb1én m4d3r4 d3l Líb4n0: c3dr0, c1prés y sánd4l0; p0rqu3 y0 sé qu3 tus s13rv0s s4b3n c0rt4r m4d3r4 3n 3l Líb4n0; y h3 4quí, m1s s13rv0s 1rán c0n l0s tuy0s, 
9 p4r4 qu3 m3 pr3p4r3n much4 m4d3r4, p0rqu3 l4 c4s4 qu3 t3ng0 qu3 3d1f1c4r h4 d3 s3r gr4nd3 y p0rt3nt0s4. 
10 Y h3 4quí, p4r4 l0s tr4b4j4d0r3s tus s13rv0s, c0rt4d0r3s d3 m4d3r4, h3 d4d0 v31nt3 m1l c0r0s d3 tr1g0 3n gr4n0, v31nt3 m1l c0r0s d3 c3b4d4, v31nt3 m1l b4t0s d3 v1n0, y v31nt3 m1l b4t0s d3 4c31t3. 

11 0nt0nc3s H1r4m r3y d3 T1r0 r3sp0nd1ó p0r 3scr1t0 qu3 3nv1ó 4 S4l0món: P0rqu3 J3h0vá 4mó 4 su pu3bl0, t3 h4 pu3st0 p0r r3y s0br3 3ll0s. 
12 4d3más d3cí4 H1r4m: B3nd1t0 s34 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l, qu3 h1z0 l0s c13l0s y l4 t13rr4, y qu3 d10 4l r3y D4v1d un h1j0 s4b10, 3nt3nd1d0, cu3rd0 y prud3nt3, qu3 3d1f1qu3 c4s4 4 J3h0vá, y c4s4 p4r4 su r31n0. 
13 Y0, pu3s, t3 h3 3nv14d0 un h0mbr3 háb1l y 3nt3nd1d0, H1r4m-4b1,  
14 h1j0 d3 un4 muj3r d3 l4s h1j4s d3 D4n, m4s su p4dr3 fu3 d3 T1r0; 3l cu4l s4b3 tr4b4j4r 3n 0r0, pl4t4, br0nc3 y h13rr0, 3n p13dr4 y 3n m4d3r4, 3n Púrpur4 y 3n 4zul, 3n l1n0 y 3n c4rm3sí; 4s1m1sm0 s4b3 3sculp1r t0d4 cl4s3 d3 f1gur4s, y s4c4r t0d4 f0rm4 d3 d1s3ñ0 qu3 s3 l3 p1d4, c0n tus h0mbr3s p3r1t0s, y c0n l0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r D4v1d tu p4dr3. 
15 4h0r4, pu3s, 3nví3 m1 s3ñ0r 4 sus s13rv0s 3l tr1g0 y c3b4d4, y 4c31t3 y v1n0, qu3 h4 d1ch0; 
16 y n0s0tr0s c0rt4r3m0s 3n 3l Líb4n0 l4 m4d3r4 qu3 n3c3s1t3s, y t3 l4 tr43r3m0s 3n b4ls4s p0r 3l m4r h4st4 J0p3, y tú l4 h4rás ll3v4r h4st4 J3rus4lén. 

17 Y c0ntó S4l0món t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s 3xtr4nj3r0s qu3 h4bí4 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l, d3spués d3 h4b3rl0s y4 c0nt4d0 D4v1d su p4dr3, y fu3r0n h4ll4d0s c13nt0 c1ncu3nt4 y tr3s m1l s31sc13nt0s. 
18 Y s3ñ4ló d3 3ll0s s3t3nt4 m1l p4r4 ll3v4r c4rg4s, y 0ch3nt4 m1l c4nt3r0s 3n l4 m0nt4ñ4, y tr3s m1l s31sc13nt0s p0r c4p4t4c3s p4r4 h4c3r tr4b4j4r 4l pu3bl0. 



S4l0món 3d1f1c4 3l t3mpl0

2 Crón1c4s 3
(1 R. 6.1-38)

1 C0m3nzó S4l0món 4 3d1f1c4r l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá 3n J3rus4lén, 3n 3l m0nt3 M0r14h, qu3 h4bí4 s1d0 m0str4d0 4 D4v1d su p4dr3, 3n 3l lug4r qu3 D4v1d h4bí4 pr3p4r4d0 3n l4 3r4 d3 0rnán j3bus30. 
2 Y c0m3nzó 4 3d1f1c4r 3n 3l m3s s3gund0, 4 l0s d0s dí4s d3l m3s, 3n 3l cu4rt0 4ñ0 d3 su r31n4d0. 
3 0st4s s0n l4s m3d1d4s qu3 d10 S4l0món 4 l0s c1m13nt0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s. L4 pr1m3r4, l4 l0ng1tud, d3 s3s3nt4 c0d0s, y l4 4nchur4 d3 v31nt3 c0d0s. 

4 0l pórt1c0 qu3 3st4b4 4l fr3nt3 d3l 3d1f1c10 3r4 d3 v31nt3 c0d0s d3 l4rg0, 1gu4l 4l 4nch0 d3 l4 c4s4, y su 4ltur4 d3 c13nt0 v31nt3 c0d0s; y l0 cubr1ó p0r d3ntr0 d3 0r0 pur0. 
5 Y t3chó 3l cu3rp0 m4y0r d3l 3d1f1c10 c0n m4d3r4 d3 c1prés, l4 cu4l cubr1ó d3 0r0 f1n0, 3 h1z0 r34lz4r 3n 3ll4 p4lm3r4s y c4d3n4s. 
6 Cubr1ó t4mb1én l4 c4s4 d3 p13dr4s pr3c10s4s p4r4 0rn4m3nt0; y 3l 0r0 3r4 0r0 d3 P4rv41m. 
7 4sí qu3 cubr1ó l4 c4s4, sus v1g4s, sus umbr4l3s, sus p4r3d3s y sus pu3rt4s, c0n 0r0; y 3sculp1ó qu3rub1n3s 3n l4s p4r3d3s. 

8 H1z0 4s1m1sm0 3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, cuy4 l0ng1tud 3r4 d3 v31nt3 c0d0s s3gún 3l 4nch0 d3l fr3nt3 d3 l4 c4s4, y su 4nchur4 d3 v31nt3 c0d0s; y l0 cubr1ó d3 0r0 f1n0 qu3 4sc3ndí4 4 s31sc13nt0s t4l3nt0s. 
9 Y 3l p3s0 d3 l0s cl4v0s 3r4 d3 un0 h4st4 c1ncu3nt4 s1cl0s d3 0r0.  Cubr1ó t4mb1én d3 0r0 l0s 4p0s3nt0s. 
10 Y d3ntr0 d3l lug4r s4ntís1m0 h1z0 d0s qu3rub1n3s d3 m4d3r4, l0s cu4l3s fu3r0n cub13rt0s d3 0r0. 
11 L4 l0ng1tud d3 l4s 4l4s d3 l0s qu3rub1n3s 3r4 d3 v31nt3 c0d0s; p0rqu3 un4 4l4 3r4 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s, l4 cu4l ll3g4b4 h4st4 l4 p4r3d d3 l4 c4s4, y l4 0tr4 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s, l4 cu4l t0c4b4 3l 4l4 d3l 0tr0 qu3rubín. 
12 D3 l4 m1sm4 m4n3r4 un4 4l4 d3l 0tr0 qu3rubín 3r4 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s, l4 cu4l ll3g4b4 h4st4 l4 p4r3d d3 l4 c4s4, y l4 0tr4 3r4 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s, qu3 t0c4b4 3l 4l4 d3l 0tr0 qu3rubín. 
13 0st0s qu3rub1n3s t3ní4n l4s 4l4s 3xt3nd1d4s p0r v31nt3 c0d0s, y 3st4b4n 3n p13 c0n l0s r0str0s h4c14 l4 c4s4. 
14 H1z0 t4mb1én 3l v3l0 d3 4zul, púrpur4, c4rm3sí y l1n0, 3 h1z0 r34lz4r qu3rub1n3s 3n él. 



L4s d0s c0lumn4s
(1 R. 7.15-22)

15 D3l4nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 h1z0 d0s c0lumn4s d3 tr31nt4 y c1nc0 c0d0s d3 4ltur4 c4d4 un4, c0n sus c4p1t3l3s 3nc1m4, d3 c1nc0 c0d0s. 
16 H1z0 4s1m1sm0 c4d3n4s 3n 3l s4ntu4r10, y l4s pus0 s0br3 l0s c4p1t3l3s d3 l4s c0lumn4s; 3 h1z0 c13n gr4n4d4s, l4s cu4l3s pus0 3n l4s c4d3n4s. 
17 Y c0l0có l4s c0lumn4s d3l4nt3 d3l t3mpl0, un4 4 l4 m4n0 d3r3ch4, y 0tr4 4 l4 1zqu13rd4; y 4 l4 d3 l4 m4n0 d3r3ch4 ll4mó J4quín, y 4 l4 d3 l4 1zqu13rd4, B04z. 



M0b1l14r10 d3l t3mpl0

2 Crón1c4s 4
(1 R. 7.23-51)

1 H1z0 4d3más un 4lt4r d3 br0nc3 d3 v31nt3 c0d0s d3 l0ng1tud, v31nt3 c0d0s d3 4nchur4, y d13z c0d0s d3 4ltur4. 
2 T4mb1én h1z0 un m4r d3 fund1c1ón, 3l cu4l t3ní4 d13z c0d0s d3 un b0rd3 4l 0tr0, 3nt3r4m3nt3 r3d0nd0; su 4ltur4 3r4 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s, y un c0rdón d3 tr31nt4 c0d0s d3 l4rg0 l0 c3ñí4 4lr3d3d0r. 
3 Y d3b4j0 d3l m4r h4bí4 f1gur4s d3 c4l4b4z4s qu3 l0 c1rcund4b4n, d13z 3n c4d4 c0d0 4lr3d3d0r; 3r4n d0s h1l3r4s d3 c4l4b4z4s fund1d4s junt4m3nt3 c0n 3l m4r. 
4 0st4b4 4s3nt4d0 s0br3 d0c3 bu3y3s, tr3s d3 l0s cu4l3s m1r4b4n 4l n0rt3, tr3s 4l 0cc1d3nt3, tr3s 4l sur, y tr3s 4l 0r13nt3; y 3l m4r d3sc4ns4b4 s0br3 3ll0s, y l4s 4nc4s d3 3ll0s 3st4b4n h4c14 4d3ntr0. 
5 Y t3ní4 d3 gru3s0 un p4lm0 m3n0r, y 3l b0rd3 t3ní4 l4 f0rm4 d3l b0rd3 d3 un cál1z, 0 d3 un4 fl0r d3 l1s. Y l3 c4bí4n tr3s m1l b4t0s. 

6 H1z0 t4mb1én d13z fu3nt3s, y pus0 c1nc0 4 l4 d3r3ch4 y c1nc0 4 l4 1zqu13rd4, p4r4 l4v4r y l1mp14r 3n 3ll4s l0 qu3 s3 0fr3cí4 3n h0l0c4ust0; p3r0 3l m4r 3r4 p4r4 qu3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s s3 l4v4r4n 3n él. 
7 H1z0 4s1m1sm0 d13z c4nd3l3r0s d3 0r0 s3gún su f0rm4, l0s cu4l3s pus0 3n 3l t3mpl0, c1nc0 4 l4 d3r3ch4 y c1nc0 4 l4 1zqu13rd4. 
8 4d3más h1z0 d13z m3s4s y l4s pus0 3n 3l t3mpl0, c1nc0 4 l4 d3r3ch4 y c1nc0 4 l4 1zqu13rd4; 1gu4lm3nt3 h1z0 c13n t4z0n3s d3 0r0. 

9 T4mb1én h1z0 3l 4tr10 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, y 3l gr4n 4tr10, y l4s p0rt4d4s d3l 4tr10, y cubr1ó d3 br0nc3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 3ll4s. 
10 Y c0l0có 3l m4r 4l l4d0 d3r3ch0, h4c14 3l sur3st3 d3 l4 c4s4. 
11 H1r4m t4mb1én h1z0 c4ld3r0s, y p4l4s, y t4z0n3s; y 4c4bó H1r4m l4 0br4 qu3 h4cí4 4l r3y S4l0món p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s. 

12 D0s c0lumn4s, y l0s c0rd0n3s, l0s c4p1t3l3s s0br3 l4s c4b3z4s d3 l4s d0s c0lumn4s, y d0s r3d3s p4r4 cubr1r l4s d0s 3sf3r4s d3 l0s c4p1t3l3s qu3 3st4b4n 3nc1m4 d3 l4s c0lumn4s; 
13 cu4tr0c13nt4s gr4n4d4s 3n l4s d0s r3d3s, d0s h1l3r4s d3 gr4n4d4s 3n c4d4 r3d, p4r4 qu3 cubr13s3n l4s d0s 3sf3r4s d3 l0s c4p1t3l3s qu3 3st4b4n 3nc1m4 d3 l4s c0lumn4s. 
14 H1z0 t4mb1én l4s b4s4s, s0br3 l4s cu4l3s c0l0có l4s fu3nt3s; 
15 un m4r, y l0s d0c3 bu3y3s d3b4j0 d3 él; 
16 y c4ld3r0s, p4l4s y g4rf10s; d3 br0nc3 muy f1n0 h1z0 t0d0s sus 3ns3r3s H1r4m-4b1 4l r3y S4l0món p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 
17 L0s fund1ó 3l r3y 3n l0s ll4n0s d3l J0rdán, 3n t13rr4 4rc1ll0s4, 3ntr3 Suc0t y S3r3d4t4. 
18 Y S4l0món h1z0 t0d0s 3st0s 3ns3r3s 3n núm3r0 t4n gr4nd3, qu3 n0 pud0 s4b3rs3 3l p3s0 d3l br0nc3. 
19 4sí h1z0 S4l0món t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, y 3l 4lt4r d3 0r0, y l4s m3s4s s0br3 l4s cu4l3s s3 p0ní4n l0s p4n3s d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón; 
20 4s1m1sm0 l0s c4nd3l3r0s y sus lámp4r4s, d3 0r0 pur0, p4r4 qu3 l4s 3nc3nd13s3n d3l4nt3 d3l lug4r s4ntís1m0 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 0rd3n4nz4. 

21 L4s fl0r3s, l4mp4r1ll4s y t3n4z4s s3 h1c13r0n d3 0r0, d3 0r0 f1nís1m0; 
22 t4mb1én l4s d3sp4b1l4d3r4s, l0s l3br1ll0s, l4s cuch4r4s y l0s 1nc3ns4r10s 3r4n d3 0r0 pur0. Y d3 0r0 t4mb1én l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 c4s4, sus pu3rt4s 1nt3r10r3s p4r4 3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, y l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3l t3mpl0. 



2 Crón1c4s 5

1 4c4b4d4 t0d4 l4 0br4 qu3 h1z0 S4l0món p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, m3t1ó S4l0món l4s c0s4s qu3 D4v1d su p4dr3 h4bí4 d3d1c4d0; y pus0 l4 pl4t4, y 3l 0r0, y t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s, 3n l0s t3s0r0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s. 



S4l0món tr4sl4d4 3l 4rc4 d3l t3mpl0
(1 R. 8.1-11)

2 0nt0nc3s S4l0món r3un1ó 3n J3rus4lén 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l y 4 t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4s tr1bus, l0s j3f3s d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 tr4j3s3n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, qu3 3s S10n. 
3 Y s3 c0ngr3g4r0n c0n 3l r3y t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 d3l m3s sépt1m0. 
4 V1n13r0n, pu3s, t0d0s l0s 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l, y l0s l3v1t4s t0m4r0n 3l 4rc4; 
5 y ll3v4r0n 3l 4rc4, y 3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 r3un1ón, y t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3l s4ntu4r10 qu3 3st4b4n 3n 3l t4b3rnácul0; l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s l3v1t4s l0s ll3v4r0n. 

6 Y 3l r3y S4l0món, y t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l qu3 s3 h4bí4 r3un1d0 c0n él d3l4nt3 d3l 4rc4, s4cr1f1c4r0n 0v3j4s y bu3y3s, qu3 p0r s3r t4nt0s n0 s3 pud13r0n c0nt4r n1 num3r4r. 
7 Y l0s s4c3rd0t3s m3t13r0n 3l 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá 3n su lug4r, 3n 3l s4ntu4r10 d3 l4 c4s4, 3n 3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, b4j0 l4s 4l4s d3 l0s qu3rub1n3s; 
8 pu3s l0s qu3rub1n3s 3xt3ndí4n l4s 4l4s s0br3 3l lug4r d3l 4rc4, y l0s qu3rub1n3s cubrí4n p0r 3nc1m4 4sí 3l 4rc4 c0m0 sus b4rr4s. 
9 0 h1c13r0n s4l1r l4s b4rr4s, d3 m0d0 qu3 s3 v13s3n l4s c4b3z4s d3 l4s b4rr4s d3l 4rc4 d3l4nt3 3l lug4r s4ntís1m0, m4s n0 s3 v3í4n d3sd3 fu3r4; y 4llí 3stán h4st4 h0y. 

10 0n 3l 4rc4 n0 h4bí4 más qu3 l4s d0s t4bl4s qu3 M01sés h4bí4 pu3st0 3n H0r3b, c0n l4s cu4l3s J3h0vá h4bí4 h3ch0 p4ct0 c0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, cu4nd0 s4l13r0n d3 0g1pt0. 

11 Y cu4nd0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s s4l13r0n d3l s4ntu4r10 (p0rqu3 t0d0s l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 s3 h4ll4r0n h4bí4n s1d0 s4nt1f1c4d0s, y n0 gu4rd4b4n sus turn0s; 
12 y l0s l3v1t4s c4nt0r3s, t0d0s l0s d3 4s4f, l0s d3 H3mán y l0s d3 J3dutún, junt4m3nt3 c0n sus h1j0s y sus h3rm4n0s, v3st1d0s d3 l1n0 f1n0, 3st4b4n c0n címb4l0s y s4lt3r10s y 4rp4s 4l 0r13nt3 d3l 4lt4r; y c0n 3ll0s c13nt0 v31nt3 s4c3rd0t3s qu3 t0c4b4n tr0mp3t4s),
13 cu4nd0 s0n4b4n, pu3s, l4s tr0mp3t4s, y c4nt4b4n t0d0s 4 un4, p4r4 4l4b4r y d4r gr4c14s 4 J3h0vá, y 4 m3d1d4 qu3 4lz4b4n l4 v0z c0n tr0mp3t4s y címb4l0s y 0tr0s 1nstrum3nt0s d3 mús1c4, y 4l4b4b4n 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: P0rqu3 él 3s bu3n0, p0rqu3 su m1s3r1c0rd14 3s p4r4 s13mpr3; 3nt0nc3s l4 c4s4 s3 ll3nó d3 un4 nub3, l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 
14 Y n0 p0dí4n l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3st4r 4llí p4r4 m1n1str4r, p0r c4us4 d3 l4 nub3; p0rqu3 l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá h4bí4 ll3n4d0 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s. 



D3d1c4c1ón d3l t3mpl0

2 Crón1c4s 6
(1 R. 8.12-66)

1 0nt0nc3s d1j0 S4l0món: J3h0vá h4 d1ch0 qu3 él h4b1t4rí4 3n l4 0scur1d4d. 
2 Y0, pu3s, h3 3d1f1c4d0 un4 c4s4 d3 m0r4d4 p4r4 t1, y un4 h4b1t4c1ón 3n qu3 m0r3s p4r4 s13mpr3. 
3 Y v0lv13nd0 3l r3y su r0str0, b3nd1j0 4 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l; y t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l 3st4b4 3n p13. 

4 Y él d1j0: B3nd1t0 s34 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, qu13n c0n su m4n0 h4 cumpl1d0 l0 qu3 pr0m3t1ó c0n su b0c4 4 D4v1d m1 p4dr3, d1c13nd0: 
5 D3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 s4qué 4 m1 pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, n1ngun4 c1ud4d h3 3l3g1d0 d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l p4r4 3d1f1c4r c4s4 d0nd3 3stuv13s3 m1 n0mbr3, n1 h3 3sc0g1d0 v4rón qu3 fu3s3 prínc1p3 s0br3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l. 
6 Más 4 J3rus4lén h3 3l3g1d0 p4r4 qu3 3n 3ll4 3sté m1 n0mbr3, y 4 D4v1d h3 3l3g1d0 p4r4 qu3 3sté s0br3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l. 

7 Y D4v1d m1 p4dr3 tuv0 3n su c0r4zón 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 
8 M4s J3h0vá d1j0 4 D4v1d m1 p4dr3: R3sp3ct0 4 h4b3r t3n1d0 3n tu c0r4zón d3s30 d3 3d1f1c4r c4s4 4 m1 n0mbr3, b13n h4s h3ch0 3n h4b3r t3n1d0 3st0 3n tu c0r4zón. 
9 P3r0 tú n0 3d1f1c4rás l4 c4s4, s1n0 tu h1j0 qu3 s4ldrá d3 tus l0m0s, él 3d1f1c4rá c4s4 4 m1 n0mbr3. 
10 Y J3h0vá h4 cumpl1d0 su p4l4br4 qu3 h4bí4 d1ch0, pu3s m3 l3v4nté y0 3n lug4r d3 D4v1d m1 p4dr3, y m3 h3 s3nt4d0 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 1sr43l, c0m0 J3h0vá h4bí4 d1ch0, y h3 3d1f1c4d0 c4s4 4l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 
11 Y 3n 3ll4 h3 pu3st0 3l 4rc4, 3n l4 cu4l 3stá 3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá qu3 c3l3bró c0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

12 S3 pus0 lu3g0 S4l0món d3l4nt3 d3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá, 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l, y 3xt3nd1ó sus m4n0s. 
13 P0rqu3 S4l0món h4bí4 h3ch0 un 3str4d0 d3 br0nc3 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s d3 l4rg0, d3 c1nc0 c0d0s d3 4nch0 y d3 4ltur4 d3 tr3s c0d0s, y l0 h4bí4 pu3st0 3n m3d10 d3l 4tr10; y s3 pus0 s0br3 él, s3 4rr0d1lló d3l4nt3 d3 t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 1sr43l, y 3xt3nd1ó sus m4n0s 4l c13l0, y d1j0:
14 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, n0 h4y D10s s3m3j4nt3 4 t1 3n 3l c13l0 n1 3n l4 t13rr4, qu3 gu4rd4s 3l p4ct0 y l4 m1s3r1c0rd14 c0n tus s13rv0s qu3 c4m1n4n d3l4nt3 d3 t1 d3 t0d0 su c0r4zón; 
15 qu3 h4s gu4rd4d0 4 tu s13rv0 D4v1d m1 p4dr3 l0 qu3 l3 pr0m3t1st3; tú l0 d1j1st3 c0n tu b0c4, y c0n tu m4n0 l0 h4s cumpl1d0, c0m0 s3 v3 3n 3st3 dí4. 

16 4h0r4, pu3s, J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, cumpl3 4 tu s13rv0 D4v1d m1 p4dr3 l0 qu3 l3 h4s pr0m3t1d0, d1c13nd0: N0 f4lt4rá d3 t1 v4rón d3l4nt3 d3 mí, qu3 s3 s13nt3 3n 3l tr0n0 d3 1sr43l, c0n t4l qu3 tus h1j0s gu4rd3n su c4m1n0, 4nd4nd0 3n m1 l3y, c0m0 tú h4s 4nd4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí. 
17 4h0r4, pu3s, 0h J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, cúmpl4s3 tu p4l4br4 qu3 d1j1st3 4 tu s13rv0 D4v1d. 
18 M4s ¿3s v3rd4d qu3 D10s h4b1t4rá c0n 3l h0mbr3 3n l4 t13rr4? H3 4quí, l0s c13l0s y l0s c13l0s d3 l0s c13l0s n0 t3 pu3d3n c0nt3n3r; ¿cuánt0 m3n0s 3st4 c4s4 qu3 h3 3d1f1c4d0? 

19 M4s tú m1r4rás 4 l4 0r4c1ón d3 tu s13rv0, y 4 su ru3g0, 0h J3h0vá D10s mí0, p4r4 0ír 3l cl4m0r y l4 0r4c1ón c0n qu3 tu s13rv0 0r4 d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 
20 Qu3 tus 0j0s 3stén 4b13rt0s s0br3 3st4 c4s4 d3 dí4 y d3 n0ch3, s0br3 3l lug4r d3l cu4l d1j1st3: M1 n0mbr3 3st4rá 4llí; qu3 01g4s l4 0r4c1ón c0n qu3 tu s13rv0 0r4 3n 3st3 lug4r. 

21 4s1m1sm0 qu3 01g4s 3l ru3g0 d3 tu s13rv0, y d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, cu4nd0 3n 3st3 lug4r h1c13r3n 0r4c1ón, qu3 tú 01rás d3sd3 l0s c13l0s, d3sd3 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4; qu3 01g4s y p3rd0n3s. 
22 S1 4lgun0 p3c4r3 c0ntr4 su prój1m0, y s3 l3 3x1g13r3 jur4m3nt0, y v1n13r3 4 jur4r 4nt3 tu 4lt4r 3n 3st4 c4s4, 

23 tu 01rás d3sd3 l0s c13l0s, y 4ctu4rás, y juzg4rás 4 tus s13rv0s, d4nd0 l4 p4g4 4l 1mpí0, h4c13nd0 r3c43r su pr0c3d3r s0br3 su c4b3z4, y just1f1c4nd0 4l just0 4l d4rl3 c0nf0rm3 4 su just1c14. 
24 S1 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l fu3r3 d3rr0t4d0 d3l4nt3 d3l 3n3m1g0 p0r h4b3r pr3v4r1c4d0 c0ntr4 t1, y s3 c0nv1rt13r3, y c0nf3s4r3 tu n0mbr3, y r0g4r3 d3l4nt3 t1 3n 3st4 c4s4, 
25 tú 01rás d3sd3 l0s c13l0s, y p3rd0n4rás 3l p3c4d0 d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, y l3s h4rás v0lv3r 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 d1st3 4 3ll0s y 4 sus p4dr3s. 

26 S1 l0s c13l0s s3 c3rr4r3n y n0 hub13r3 lluv14s, p0r h4b3r p3c4d0 c0ntr4 t1, s1 0r4r3n 4 t1 h4c14 3st3 lug4r, y c0nf3s4r3n tu n0mbr3, y s3 c0nv1rt13r3n d3 sus p3c4d0s, cu4nd0 l0s 4fl1g13r3s, 
27 tú l0s 01rás 3n l0s c13l0s, y p3rd0n4rás 3l p3c4d0 d3 tus s13rv0s y d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, y l3s 3ns3ñ4rás 3l bu3n c4m1n0 p4r4 qu3 4nd3n 3n él, y d4rás lluv14 s0br3 tu t13rr4, qu3 d1st3 p0r h3r3d4d 4 tu pu3bl0. 
28 S1 hub13r3 h4mbr3 3n l4 t13rr4, 0 s1 hub13r3 p3st1l3nc14, s1 hub13r3 t1z0nc1ll0 0 4ñubl0, l4ng0st4 0 pulgón; 0 s1 l0s s1t14r3n sus 3n3m1g0s 3n l4 t13rr4 3n d0nd3 m0r3n; cu4lqu13r4 pl4g4 0 3nf3rm3d4d qu3 s34; 

29 t0d4 0r4c1ón y t0d0 ru3g0 qu3 h1c13r3 cu4lqu13r h0mbr3, 0 t0d0 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, cu4lqu13r4 qu3 c0n0c13r3 su ll4g4 y su d0l0r 3n su c0r4zón, s1 3xt3nd13r3 sus m4n0s h4c14 3st4 c4s4, 
30 tú 01rás d3sd3 l0s c13l0s, d3sd3 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4, y p3rd0n4rás, y d4rás 4 c4d4 un0 c0nf0rm3 4 sus c4m1n0s, h4b13nd0 c0n0c1d0 su c0r4zón; p0rqu3 sól0 tú c0n0c3s 3l c0r4zón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s; 
31 p4r4 qu3 t3 t3m4n y 4nd3n 3n tus c4m1n0s, t0d0s l0s dí4s qu3 v1v13r3n s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 tú d1st3 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s. 

32 Y t4mb1én 4l 3xtr4nj3r0 qu3 n0 fu3r3 d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, qu3 hub13r3 v3n1d0 d3 l3j4n4s t13rr4s 4 c4us4 d3 tu gr4n n0mbr3 y d3 tu m4n0 p0d3r0s4, y d3 tu br4z0 3xt3nd1d0, s1 v1n13r3 y 0r4r3 h4c14 3st4 c4s4, 
33 tú 01rás d3sd3 l0s c13l0s, d3sd3 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4, y h4rás c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s p0r l4s cu4l3s hub13r3 cl4m4d0 4 t1 3l 3xtr4nj3r0; p4r4 qu3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4 c0n0zc4n tu n0mbr3, y t3 t3m4n 4sí c0m0 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, y s3p4n qu3 tu n0mbr3 3s 1nv0c4d0 s0br3 3st4 c4s4 qu3 y0 h3 3d1f1c4d0. 

34 S1 tu pu3bl0 s4l13r3 4 l4 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 sus 3n3m1g0s p0r 3l c4m1n0 qu3 tú l3s 3nv14r3s, y 0r4r3n 4 t1 h4c14 3st4 c1ud4d qu3 tú 3l3g1st3, h4c14 l4 c4s4 qu3 h3 3d1f1c4d0 4 tu n0mbr3, 
35 tú 01rás d3sd3 l0s c13l0s su 0r4c1ón y su ru3g0, y 4mp4r4rás su c4us4. 
36 S1 p3c4r3n c0ntr4 t1 (pu3s n0 h4y h0mbr3 qu3 n0 p3qu3), y t3 3n0j4r3s c0ntr4 3ll0s, y l0s 3ntr3g4r3s d3l4nt3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, p4r4 qu3 l0s qu3 l0s t0m4r3n l0s ll3v3n c4ut1v0s 4 t13rr4 d3 3n3m1g0s, l3j0s 0 c3rc4, 
37 y 3ll0s v0lv13r3n 3n sí 3n l4 t13rr4 d0nd3 fu3r3n ll3v4d0s c4ut1v0s; s1 s3 c0nv1rt13r3n, y 0r4r3n 4 t1 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 su c4ut1v1d4d, y d1j3r3n: P3c4m0s, h3m0s h3ch0 1n1cu4m3nt3, 1mpí4m3nt3 h3m0s h3ch0; 

38 s1 s3 c0nv1rt13r3n 4 t1 d3 t0d0 su c0r4zón y d3 t0d4 su 4lm4 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 su c4ut1v1d4d, d0nd3 l0s hub13r3n ll3v4d0 c4ut1v0s, y 0r4r3n h4c14 l4 t13rr4 qu3 tú d1st3 4 sus p4dr3s, h4c14 l4 c1ud4d qu3 tú 3l3g1st3, y h4c14 l4 c4s4 qu3 h3 3d1f1c4d0 4 tu n0mbr3; 
39  tú 01rás d3sd3 l0s c13l0s, d3sd3 3l lug4r d3 tu m0r4d4, su 0r4c1ón y su ru3g0, y 4mp4r4rás su c4us4, y p3rd0n4rás 4 tu pu3bl0 qu3 p3có c0ntr4 t1. 

40 4h0r4, pu3s, 0h D10s mí0, t3 ru3g0 qu3 3stén 4b13rt0s tus 0j0s y 4t3nt0s tus 0íd0s 4 l4 0r4c1ón 3n 3st3 lug4r. 
41 0h J3h0vá D10s, l3vánt4t3 4h0r4 p4r4 h4b1t4r 3n tu r3p0s0, tú y 3l 4rc4 d3 tu p0d3r; 0h J3h0vá D10s, s34n v3st1d0s d3 s4lv4c1ón tus s4c3rd0t3s, y tus s4nt0s s3 r3g0c1j3n 3n tu b0nd4d. 
42 J3h0vá D10s, n0 r3ch4c3s 4 tu ung1d0; 4cuérd4t3 d3 tus m1s3r1c0rd14s p4r4 c0n D4v1d tu s13rv0. 



2 Crón1c4s 7

1 Cu4nd0 S4l0món 4c4bó d3 0r4r, d3sc3nd1ó fu3g0 d3 l0s c13l0s, y c0nsum1ó 3l h0l0c4ust0 y l4s víct1m4s; y l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá ll3nó l4 c4s4. 
2 Y n0 p0dí4n 3ntr4r l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá h4bí4 ll3n4d0 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 

3 Cu4nd0 v13r0n t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3sc3nd3r 3l fu3g0 y l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá s0br3 l4 c4s4, s3 p0str4r0n s0br3 sus r0str0s 3n 3l p4v1m3nt0 y 4d0r4r0n, y 4l4b4r0n 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: P0rqu3 él 3s bu3n0, y su m1s3r1c0rd14 3s p4r4 s13mpr3. 
4 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 s4cr1f1c4r0n víct1m4s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 
5 Y 0fr3c1ó 3l r3y S4l0món 3n s4cr1f1c10 v31nt1dós m1l bu3y3s, y c13nt0 v31nt3 m1l 0v3j4s; y 4sí d3d1c4r0n l4 c4s4 d3 D10s 3l r3y y t0d0 3l pu3bl0. 

6 Y l0s s4c3rd0t3s d3s3mp3ñ4b4n su m1n1st3r10; t4mb1én l0s l3v1t4s, c0n l0s 1nstrum3nt0s d3 mús1c4 d3 J3h0vá, l0s cu4l3s h4bí4 h3ch0 3l r3y D4v1d p4r4 4l4b4r 4 J3h0vá p0rqu3 su m1s3r1c0rd14 3s p4r4 s13mpr3, cu4nd0 D4v1d 4l4b4b4 p0r m3d10 d3 3ll0s. 4s1m1sm0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s t0c4b4n tr0mp3t4s d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, y t0d0 1sr43l 3st4b4 3n p13. 
7 T4mb1én S4l0món c0ns4gró l4 p4rt3 c3ntr4l d3l 4tr10 qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, p0r cu4nt0 h4bí4 0fr3c1d0 4llí l0s h0l0c4ust0s, y l4 gr0sur4 d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z; p0rqu3 3n 3l 4lt4r d3 br0nc3 qu3 S4l0món h4bí4 h3ch0 n0 p0dí4n c4b3r l0s h0l0c4ust0s, l4s 0fr3nd4s y l4s gr0sur4s. 

8 0nt0nc3s h1z0 S4l0món f13st4 s13t3 dí4s, y c0n él t0d0 1sr43l, un4 gr4n c0ngr3g4c1ón, d3sd3 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 H4m4t h4st4 3l 4rr0y0 d3 0g1pt0. 
9 4l 0ct4v0 dí4 h1c13r0n s0l3mn3 4s4mbl34, p0rqu3 h4bí4n h3ch0 l4 d3d1c4c1ón d3l 4lt4r 3n s13t3 dí4s, y h4bí4n c3l3br4d0 l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 p0r s13t3 dí4s. 
10 Y 4 l0s v31nt1trés dí4s d3l m3s sépt1m0 3nv1ó 4l pu3bl0 4 sus h0g4r3s, 4l3gr3s y g0z0s0s d3 c0r4zón p0r l0s b3n3f1c10s qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 h3ch0 4 D4v1d y 4 S4l0món, y 4 su pu3bl0 1sr43l. 



P4ct0 d3 D10s c0n S4l0món
(1 R. 9.1-9)

11 T3rm1nó, pu3s, S4l0món l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l4 c4s4 d3l r3y; y t0d0 l0 qu3 S4l0món s3 pr0pus0 h4c3r 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y 3n su pr0p14 c4s4, fu3 pr0sp3r4d0. 
12 Y 4p4r3c1ó J3h0vá 4 S4l0món d3 n0ch3, y l3 d1j0: Y0 h3 0íd0 tu 0r4c1ón, y h3 3l3g1d0 p4r4 mí 3st3 lug4r p0r c4s4 d3 s4cr1f1c10. 
13 S1 y0 c3rr4r3 l0s c13l0s p4r4 qu3 n0 h4y4 lluv14, y s1 m4nd4r3 4 l4 l4ng0st4 qu3 c0nsum4 l4 t13rr4, 0 s1 3nv14r3 p3st1l3nc14 4 m1 pu3bl0; 

14 s1 s3 hum1ll4r3 m1 pu3bl0, s0br3 3l cu4l m1 n0mbr3 3s 1nv0c4d0, y 0r4r3n, y busc4r3n m1 r0str0, y s3 c0nv1rt13r3n d3 sus m4l0s c4m1n0s; 3nt0nc3s y0 01ré d3sd3 l0s c13l0s, y p3rd0n4ré sus p3c4d0s, y s4n4ré su t13rr4. 
15 4h0r4 3st4rán 4b13rt0s m1s 0j0s y 4t3nt0s m1s 0íd0s 4 l4 0r4c1ón 3n 3st3 lug4r; 
16 p0rqu3 4h0r4 h3 3l3g1d0 y s4nt1f1c4d0 3st4 c4s4, p4r4 qu3 3sté 3n 3ll4 m1 n0mbr3 p4r4 s13mpr3; y m1s 0j0s y m1 c0r4zón 3st4rán 4hí p4r4 s13mpr3. 

17 Y s1 tú 4nduv13r3s d3l4nt3 d3 mí c0m0 4nduv0 D4v1d tu p4dr3, 3 h1c13r3s t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 y0 t3 h3 m4nd4d0, y gu4rd4r3s m1s 3st4tut0s y m1s d3cr3t0s, 
18 y0 c0nf1rm4ré 3l tr0n0 d3 tu r31n0, c0m0 p4cté c0n D4v1d tu p4dr3, d1c13nd0: N0 t3 f4lt4rá v4rón qu3 g0b13rn3 3n 1sr43l. 

19 M4s s1 v0s0tr0s 0s v0lv13r31s, y d3j4r31s m1s 3st4tut0s y m4nd4m13nt0s qu3 h3 pu3st0 d3l4nt3 d3 v0s0tr0s, y fu3r31s y s1rv13r31s 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, y l0s 4d0r4r31s, 
20 y0 0s 4rr4nc4ré d3 m1 t13rr4 qu3 0s h3 d4d0; y 3st4 c4s4 qu3 h3 s4nt1f1c4d0 4 m1 n0mbr3, y0 l4 4rr0j4ré d3 m1 pr3s3nc14, y l4 p0ndré p0r burl4 y 3sc4rn10 d3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s. 
21 Y 3st4 c4s4 qu3 3s t4n 3xc3ls4, s3rá 3sp4nt0 4 t0d0 3l qu3 p4s4r3, y d1rá: ¿P0r qué h4 h3ch0 4sí J3h0vá 4 3st4 t13rr4 y 4 3st4 c4s4? 
22 Y s3 r3sp0nd3rá: P0r cu4nt0 d3j4r0n 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 sus p4dr3s, qu3 l0s s4có d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, y h4n 4br4z4d0 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, y l0s 4d0r4r0n y s1rv13r0n; p0r 3s0 él h4 tr4íd0 t0d0 3st3 m4l s0br3 3ll0s.

2 Crón1c4s 8
(1 R. 9.10-28)

1 D3spués d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s, dur4nt3 l0s cu4l3s S4l0món h4bí4 3d1f1c4d0 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá y su pr0p14 c4s4,

4 Y 3d1f1có 4 T4dm0r 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 4pr0v1s10n4m13nt0 qu3 3d1f1có 3n H4m4t. 
5 4s1m1sm0 r33d1f1có 4 B3t-h0rón l4 d3 4rr1b4 y 4 B3t-h0rón l4 d3 4b4j0, c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s, c0n mur0s, pu3rt4s y b4rr4s;

7 Y 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4bí4 qu3d4d0 d3 l0s h3t30s, 4m0rr30s, f3r3z30s, h3v30s y j3bus30s, qu3 n0 3r4n d3 1sr43l, 
8 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s qu3 h4bí4n qu3d4d0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3spués d3 3ll0s, 4 l0s cu4l3s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l n0 d3struy3r0n d3l t0d0, h1z0 S4l0món tr1but4r10s h4st4 h0y. 

9 P3r0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l n0 pus0 S4l0món s13rv0s 3n su 0br4; p0rqu3 3r4n h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4, y sus 0f1c14l3s y sus c4p1t4n3s, y c0m4nd4nt3s d3 sus c4rr0s, y su g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0.

11 Y p4só S4l0món 4 l4 h1j4 d3 F4r4ón, d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d 4 l4 c4s4 qu3 él h4bí4 3d1f1c4d0 p4r4 3ll4; p0rqu3 d1j0: M1 muj3r n0 m0r4rá 3n l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d r3y d3 1sr43l, p0rqu3 4qu3ll4s h4b1t4c10n3s d0nd3 h4 3ntr4d0 3l 4rc4 d3 J3h0vá, s0n s4gr4d4s. 

12 0nt0nc3s 0fr3c1ó S4l0món h0l0c4ust0s 4 J3h0vá s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá qu3 él h4bí4 3d1f1c4d0 d3l4nt3 d3l pórt1c0, 
13 p4r4 qu3 0fr3c13s3n c4d4 c0s4 3n su dí4, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4m13nt0 d3 M01sés, 3n l0s dí4s d3 r3p0s0, 3n l4s nu3v4s lun4s, y 3n l4s f13st4s s0l3mn3s tr3s v3c3s 3n 3l 4ñ0, 3st0 3s, 3n l4 f13st4 d3 l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4, 3n l4 f13st4 d3 l4s s3m4n4s y 3n l4 f13st4 d3 l0s t4b3rnácul0s. 

14 Y c0nst1tuyó l0s turn0s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3n sus 0f1c10s, c0nf0rm3 4 l0 0rd3n4d0 p0r D4v1d su p4dr3, y l0s l3v1t4s 3n sus c4rg0s, p4r4 qu3 4l4b4s3n y m1n1str4s3n d3l4nt3 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, c4d4 c0s4 3n su dí4; 4s1m1sm0 l0s p0rt3r0s p0r su 0rd3n 4 c4d4 pu3rt4; p0rqu3 4sí l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 D4v1d, v4rón d3 D10s. 

15 Y n0 s3 4p4rt4r0n d3l m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y, 3n cu4nt0 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s l3v1t4s, y l0s t3s0r0s, y t0d0 n3g0c10; 
16 p0rqu3 t0d4 l4 0br4 d3 S4l0món 3st4b4 pr3p4r4d4 d3sd3 3l dí4 3n qu3 s3 pus13r0n l0s c1m13nt0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá h4st4 qu3 fu3 t3rm1n4d4, h4st4 qu3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá fu3 4c4b4d4 t0t4lm3nt3. 

17 0nt0nc3s S4l0món fu3 4 0z1ón-g3b3r y 4 0l0t, 4 l4 c0st4 d3l m4r 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0d0m. 
18 P0rqu3 H1r4m l3 h4bí4 3nv14d0 n4v3s p0r m4n0 d3 sus s13rv0s, y m4r1n3r0s d13str0s 3n 3l m4r, l0s cu4l3s fu3r0n c0n l0s s13rv0s d3 S4l0món 4 0f1r, y t0m4r0n d3 4llá cu4tr0c13nt0s c1ncu3nt4 t4l3nt0s d3 0r0, y l0s tr4j3r0n 4l r3y S4l0món.

2 Crón1c4s 9
(1 R. 10.1-13)

1 0y3nd0 l4 r31n4 d3 S4bá l4 f4m4 d3 S4l0món, v1n0 4 J3rus4lén c0n un séqu1t0 muy gr4nd3, c0n c4m3ll0s c4rg4d0s d3 3sp3c14s 4r0mát1c4s, 0r0 3n 4bund4nc14, y p13dr4s pr3c10s4s, p4r4 pr0b4r 4 S4l0món c0n pr3gunt4s d1fíc1l3s. Y lu3g0 qu3 v1n0 4 S4l0món, h4bló c0n él d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 3n su c0r4zón t3ní4. 
2 P3r0 S4l0món l3 r3sp0nd1ó 4 t0d4s sus pr3gunt4s, y n4d4 hub0 qu3 S4l0món n0 l3 c0nt3st4s3. 

3 Y v13nd0 l4 r31n4 d3 S4bá l4 s4b1durí4 d3 S4l0món, y l4 c4s4 qu3 h4bí4 3d1f1c4d0,

5 Y d1j0 4l r3y: V3rd4d 3s l0 qu3 h4bí4 0íd0 3n m1 t13rr4 4c3rc4 d3 tus c0s4s y d3 tu s4b1durí4; 
6 p3r0 y0 n0 cr3í4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 3ll0s, h4st4 qu3 h3 v3n1d0, y m1s 0j0s h4n v1st0; y h3 4quí qu3 n1 4un l4 m1t4d d3 l4 gr4nd3z4 d3 tu s4b1durí4 m3 h4bí4 s1d0 d1ch4; p0rqu3 tú sup3r4s l4 f4m4 qu3 y0 h4bí4 0íd0. 
7 B13n4v3ntur4d0s tus h0mbr3s, y d1ch0s0s 3st0s s13rv0s tuy0s qu3 3stán s13mpr3 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, y 0y3n tu s4b1durí4. 
8 B3nd1t0 s34 J3h0vá tu D10s, 3l cu4l s3 h4 4gr4d4d0 d3 t1 p4r4 p0n3rt3 s0br3 su tr0n0 c0m0 r3y p4r4 J3h0vá tu D10s; p0r cu4nt0 tu D10s 4mó 4 1sr43l p4r4 4f1rm4rl0 p3rp3tu4m3nt3, p0r 3s0 t3 h4 pu3st0 p0r r3y s0br3 3ll0s, p4r4 qu3 h4g4s ju1c10 y just1c14. 
9 Y d10 4l r3y c13nt0 v31nt3 t4l3nt0s d3 0r0, y gr4n c4nt1d4d d3 3sp3c14s 4r0mát1c4s, y p13dr4s pr3c10s4s; nunc4 hub0 t4l3s 3sp3c14s 4r0mát1c4s c0m0 l4s qu3 d10 l4 r31n4 d3 S4bá 4l r3y S4l0món. 

10 T4mb1én l0s s13rv0s d3 H1r4m y l0s s13rv0s d3 S4l0món, qu3 h4bí4n tr4íd0 3l 0r0 d3 0f1r, tr4j3r0n m4d3r4 d3 sánd4l0, y p13dr4s pr3c10s4s. 
11 Y d3 l4 m4d3r4 d3 sánd4l0 3l r3y h1z0 gr4d4s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá y 3n l4s c4s4s r34l3s, y 4rp4s y s4lt3r10s p4r4 l0s c4nt0r3s; nunc4 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 Judá s3 h4bí4 v1st0 m4d3r4 s3m3j4nt3. 
12 Y 3l r3y S4l0món d10 4 l4 r31n4 d3 S4bá t0d0 l0 qu3 3ll4 qu1s0 y l3 p1d1ó, más d3 l0 qu3 3ll4 h4bí4 tr4íd0 4l r3y. D3spués 3ll4 s3 v0lv1ó y s3 fu3 4 su t13rr4 c0n sus s13rv0s. 



R1qu3z4s y f4m4 d3 S4l0món

20 T0d4 l4 v4j1ll4 d3l r3y S4l0món 3r4 d3 0r0, y t0d4 l4 v4j1ll4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3l b0squ3 d3l Líb4n0, d3 0r0 pur0. 0n l0s dí4s d3 S4l0món l4 pl4t4 n0 3r4 4pr3c14d4. 
21 P0rqu3 l4 fl0t4 d3l r3y 1b4 4 T4rs1s c0n l0s s13rv0s d3 H1r4m, y c4d4 tr3s 4ñ0s s0lí4n v3n1r l4s n4v3s d3 T4rs1s, y tr4í4n 0r0, pl4t4, m4rf1l, m0n0s y p4v0s r34l3s. 

22 Y 3xc3d1ó 3l r3y S4l0món 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l4 t13rr4 3n r1qu3z4 y 3n s4b1durí4. 
23 Y t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l4 t13rr4 pr0cur4b4n v3r 3l r0str0 d3 S4l0món, p4r4 0ír l4 s4b1durí4 qu3 D10s 3l h4bí4 d4d0. 
24 C4d4 un0 d3 ést0s tr4í4 su pr3s3nt3, 4lh4j4s d3 pl4t4, 4lh4j4s d3 0r0, v3st1d0s, 4rm4s, p3rfum3s, c4b4ll0s y mul0s, t0d0s l0s 4ñ0s. 

25 Tuv0 t4mb1én S4l0món cu4tr0 m1l c4b4ll3r1z4s p4r4 sus c4b4ll0s y c4rr0s, y d0c3 m1l j1n3t3s, l0s cu4l3s pus0 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s c4rr0s, y c0n 3l r3y 3n J3rus4lén. 
26 Y tuv0 d0m1n10 s0br3 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3sd3 3l 0ufr4t3s h4st4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y h4st4 l4 fr0nt3r4 d3 0g1pt0. 
27 Y 4cumuló 3l r3y pl4t4 3n J3rus4lén c0m0 p13dr4s, y c3dr0s c0m0 l0s c4br4h1g0s d3 l4 S3f3l4 3n 4bund4nc14. 
28 Tr4í4n t4mb1én c4b4ll0s p4r4 S4l0món, d3 0g1pt0 y d3 t0d0s l0s p4ís3s. 



Mu3rt3 d3 S4l0món
(1 R. 11.41-43)

R3b3l1ón d3 1sr43l

2 Crón1c4s 10
(1 R. 12.1-24)

1 R0b04m fu3 4 S1qu3m, p0rqu3 3n S1qu3m s3 h4bí4 r3un1d0 t0d0 1sr43l p4r4 h4c3rl0 r3y. 
2 Y cu4nd0 l0 0yó J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t, 3l cu4l 3st4b4 3n 0g1pt0, 4d0nd3 h4bí4 hu1d0 4 c4us4 d3l r3y S4l0món, v0lv1ó d3 0g1pt0. 
3 Y 3nv14r0n y l3 ll4m4r0n. V1n0, pu3s, J3r0b04m, y t0d0 1sr43l, y h4bl4r0n 4 R0b04m, d1c13nd0: 

4 Tu p4dr3 4gr4vó nu3str0 yug0; 4h0r4 4l1v14 4lg0 d3 l4 dur4 s3rv1dumbr3 y d3l p3s4d0 yug0 c0n qu3 tu p4dr3 n0s 4pr3m1ó, y t3 s3rv1r3m0s. 
5 Y él l3s d1j0: V0lv3d 4 mí d3 4quí 4 tr3s dí4s. Y 3l pu3bl0 s3 fu3. 

6 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y R0b04m t0mó c0ns3j0 c0n l0s 4nc14n0s qu3 h4bí4n 3st4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 S4l0món su p4dr3 cu4nd0 v1ví4, y l3s d1j0: ¿Cóm0 4c0ns3já1s v0s0tr0s qu3 r3sp0nd4 4 3st3 pu3bl0? 
7 Y 3ll0s l3 c0nt3st4r0n d1c13nd0: S1 t3 c0nduj3r3s hum4n4m3nt3 c0n 3st3 pu3bl0, y l3s 4gr4d4r3s, y l3s h4bl4r3s bu3n4s p4l4br4s, 3ll0s t3 s3rv1rán s13mpr3. 

8 Más él, d3j4nd0 3l c0ns3j0 qu3 l3 d13r0n l0s 4nc14n0s, t0mó c0ns3j0 c0n l0s jóv3n3s qu3 s3 h4bí4n cr14d0 c0n él, y qu3 3st4b4n 4 su s3rv1c10. 
9 Y l3s d1j0: ¿Qué 4c0ns3já1s v0s0tr0s qu3 r3sp0nd4m0s 4 3st3 pu3bl0, qu3 m3 h4 h4bl4d0, d1c13nd0: 4l1v14 4lg0 d3l yug0 qu3 tu p4dr3 pus0 s0br3 n0s0tr0s? 
10 0nt0nc3s l0s jóv3n3s qu3 s3 h4bí4n cr14d0 c0n él, l3 c0nt3st4r0n: 4sí d1rás 4l pu3bl0 qu3 t3 h4 h4bl4d0 d1c13nd0: Tu p4dr3 4gr4vó nu3str0 yug0, m4s tú d1sm1nuy3 nu3str4 c4rg4. 4sí l3s d1rás: M1 d3d0 más p3qu3ñ0 3s más gru3s0 qu3 l0s l0m0s d3 m1 p4dr3. 
11 4sí qu3, s1 m1 p4dr3 0s c4rgó d3 yug0 p3s4d0, y0 4ñ4d1ré 4 vu3str0 yug0; m1 p4dr3 0s c4st1gó c0n 4z0t3s, y y0 c0n 3sc0rp10n3s. 

12 V1n0, pu3s, J3r0b04m c0n t0d0 3l pu3bl0 4 R0b04m 4l t3rc3r dí4, s3gún 3l r3y l3s h4bí4 h4bl4d0 d1c13nd0: V0lv3d 4 mí d3 4quí 4 tr3s dí4s. 
13 Y 3l r3y l3s r3sp0nd1ó ásp3r4m3nt3; pu3s d3jó 3l r3y R0b04m 3l c0ns3j0 d3 l0s 4nc14n0s, 
14 y l3s h4bló c0nf0rm3 4l c0ns3j0 d3 l0s jóv3n3s, d1c13nd0: M1 p4dr3 h1z0 p3s4d0 vu3str0 yug0, p3r0 y0 4ñ4d1ré 4 vu3str0 yug0; m1 p4dr3 0s c4st1gó c0n 4z0t3s, m4s y0 c0n 3sc0rp10n3s.
15 Y n0 3scuchó 3l r3y 4l pu3bl0; p0rqu3 l4 c4us4 3r4 d3 D10s, p4r4 qu3 J3h0vá cumpl13r4 l4 p4l4br4 qu3 h4bí4 h4bl4d0 p0r 4hí4s s1l0n1t4 4 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 N4b4t. 

16 Y v13nd0 t0d0 1sr43l qu3 3l r3y n0 l3s h4bí4 0íd0, r3sp0nd1ó 3l pu3bl0 4l r3y, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué p4rt3 t3n3m0s n0s0tr0s c0n D4v1d? N0 t3n3m0s h3r3nc14 3n 3l h1j0 d3 1s4í. ¡1sr43l, c4d4 un0 4 sus t13nd4s! ¡D4v1d, m1r4 4h0r4 p0r tu c4s4! 4sí s3 fu3 t0d0 1sr43l 4 sus t13nd4s. 
17 M4s r31nó R0b04m s0br3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá. 

18 0nv1ó lu3g0 3l r3y R0b04m 4 4d0r4m, qu3 t3ní4 c4rg0 d3 l0s tr1but0s; p3r0 l3 4p3dr34r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y mur1ó. 0nt0nc3s s3 4pr3suró 3l r3y R0b04m, y sub13nd0 3n su c4rr0 huyó 4 J3rus4lén. 
19 4sí s3 4p4rtó 1sr43l d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d h4st4 h0y. 



2 Crón1c4s 11

1 Cu4nd0 v1n0 R0b04m 4 J3rus4lén, r3un1ó d3 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá y d3 B3nj4mín 4 c13nt0 0ch3nt4 m1l h0mbr3s 3sc0g1d0s d3 gu3rr4, p4r4 p3l34r c0ntr4 1sr43l y h4c3r v0lv3r 3l r31n0 4 R0b04m.

11 R3f0rzó t4mb1én l4s f0rt4l3z4s, y pus0 3n 3ll4s c4p1t4n3s, y pr0v1s10n3s, v1n0 y 4c31t3;

16 Tr4s 4qu3ll0s 4cud13r0n t4mb1én d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l l0s qu3 h4bí4n pu3st0 su c0r4zón 3n busc4r 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l; y v1n13r0n 4 J3rus4lén p4r4 0fr3c3r s4cr1f1c10s 4 J3h0vá, 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s.

18 Y t0mó R0b04m p0r muj3r 4 M4h4l4t h1j4 d3 J3r1m0t, h1j0 d3 D4v1d, y d3 4b1h41l h1j4 d3 0l14b, h1j0 d3 1s4í,

S1s4c 1nv4d3 Judá

2 Crón1c4s 12
(1 R. 14.21-31)

1 Cu4nd0 R0b04m h4bí4 c0ns0l1d4d0 3l r31n0, d3jó l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá, y t0d0 1sr43l c0n él. 
2 Y p0r cu4nt0 s3 h4bí4n r3b3l4d0 c0ntr4 J3h0vá, 3n 3l qu1nt0 4ñ0 d3l r3y R0b04m sub1ó S1s4c r3y d3 0g1pt0 c0ntr4 J3rus4lén, 
3 c0n m1l d0sc13nt0s c4rr0s, y c0n s3s3nt4 m1l h0mbr3s d3 4 c4b4ll0; m4s 3l pu3bl0 qu3 v3ní4 c0n él d3 0g1pt0, 3st0 3s, d3 l1b10s, suqu13n0s y 3tí0p3s, n0 t3ní4 núm3r0.

5 0nt0nc3s v1n0 3l pr0f3t4 S3m4í4s 4 R0b04m y 4 l0s prínc1p3s d3 Judá, qu3 3st4b4n r3un1d0s 3n J3rus4lén p0r c4us4 d3 S1s4c, y l3s d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: V0s0tr0s m3 h4bé1s d3j4d0, y y0 t4mb1én 0s h3 d3j4d0 3n m4n0s d3 S1s4c.
6 Y l0s prínc1p3s d3 1sr43l y 3l r3y s3 hum1ll4r0n, y d1j3r0n: Just0 3s J3h0vá. 
7 Y cu4nd0 J3h0vá v10 qu3 s3 h4bí4n hum1ll4d0, v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 S3m4í4s, d1c13nd0: S3 h4n hum1ll4d0; n0 l0s d3stru1ré; 4nt3s l0s s4lv4ré 3n br3v3, y n0 s3 d3rr4m4rá m1 1r4 c0ntr4 J3rus4lén p0r m4n0 d3 S1s4c. 
8 P3r0 s3rán sus s13rv0s, p4r4 qu3 s3p4n l0 qu3 3s s3rv1rm3 4 mí, y qué 3s s3rv1r 4 l0s r31n0s d3 l4s n4c10n3s. 

9 Sub1ó, pu3s, S1s4c r3y d3 0g1pt0 4 J3rus4lén, y t0mó l0s t3s0r0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l0s t3s0r0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y; t0d0 l0 ll3vó, y t0mó l0s 3scud0s d3 0r0 qu3 S4l0món h4bí4 h3ch0. 
10 Y 3n lug4r d3 3ll0s h1z0 3l r3y R0b04m 3scud0s d3 br0nc3, y l0s 3ntr3gó 4 l0s j3f3s d3 l4 gu4rd14, l0s cu4l3s cust0d14b4n l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y. 
11 Cu4nd0 3l r3y 1b4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, v3ní4n l0s d3 l4 gu4rd14 y l0s ll3v4b4n, y d3spués l0s v0lví4n 4 l4 cám4r4 d3 l4 gu4rd14. 

12 Y cu4nd0 él s3 hum1lló, l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá s3 4p4rtó d3 él, p4r4 n0 d3stru1rl0 d3l t0d0; y t4mb1én 3n Judá l4s c0s4s fu3r0n b13n. 
13 F0rt4l3c1d0, pu3s, R0b04m, r31nó 3n J3rus4lén; y 3r4 R0b04m d3 cu4r3nt4 y un 4ñ0s cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y d13c1s13t3 4ñ0s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén, c1ud4d qu3 3sc0g1ó J3h0vá d3 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l p4r4 p0n3r 3n 3ll4 su n0mbr3. Y 3l n0mbr3 d3 l4 m4dr3 d3 R0b04m fu3 N44m4 4m0n1t4. 

14 0 h1z0 l0 m4l0, p0rqu3 n0 d1spus0 su c0r4zón p4r4 busc4r 4 J3h0vá.

2 Crón1c4s 13
(1 R. 15.1-8)

1 4 l0s d13c10ch0 4ñ0s d3l r3y J3r0b04m, r31nó 4bí4s s0br3 Judá,

8 Y 4h0r4 v0s0tr0s tr4tá1s d3 r3s1st1r 4l r31n0 d3 J3h0vá 3n m4n0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 D4v1d, p0rqu3 s01s much0s, y t3né1s c0n v0s0tr0s l0s b3c3rr0s d3 0r0 qu3 J3r0b04m 0s h1z0 p0r d10s3s. 

9 ¿N0 h4bé1s 4rr0j4d0 v0s0tr0s 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s d3 J3h0vá, 4 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón y 4 l0s l3v1t4s, y 0s h4bé1s d3s1gn4d0 s4c3rd0t3s 4 l4 m4n3r4 d3 l0s pu3bl0s d3 0tr4s t13rr4s, p4r4 qu3 cu4lqu13r4 v3ng4 4 c0ns4gr4rs3 c0n un b3c3rr0 y s13t3 c4rn3r0s, y 4sí s34 s4c3rd0t3 d3 l0s qu3 n0 s0n d10s3s? 
10 M4s 3n cu4nt0 4 n0s0tr0s, J3h0vá 3s nu3str0 D10s, y n0 l3 h3m0s d3j4d0; y l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 m1n1str4n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá s0n l0s h1j0s d3 44rón, y l0s qu3 3stán 3n l4 0br4 s0n l3v1t4s. 
11 l0s cu4l3s qu3m4n p4r4 J3h0vá l0s h0l0c4ust0s c4d4 m4ñ4n4 y c4d4 t4rd3, y 3l 1nc13ns0 4r0mát1c0; y p0n3n l0s p4n3s s0br3 l4 m3s4 l1mp14, y 3l c4nd3l3r0 d3 0r0 c0n sus lámp4r4s p4r4 qu3 4rd4n c4d4 t4rd3; p0rqu3 n0s0tr0s gu4rd4m0s l4 0rd3n4nz4 d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, m4s v0s0tr0s l3 h4bé1s d3j4d0. 
12 Y h3 4quí D10s 3stá c0n n0s0tr0s p0r j3f3, y sus s4c3rd0t3s c0n l4s tr0mp3t4s d3l júb1l0 p4r4 qu3 su3n3n c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s. 0h h1j0s d3 1sr43l, n0 p3l3é1s c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s, p0rqu3 n0 pr0sp3r4ré1s. 

13 P3r0 J3r0b04m h1z0 t3nd3r un4 3mb0sc4d4 p4r4 v3n1r 4 3ll0s p0r l4 3sp4ld4; y 3st4nd0 4sí d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, l4 3mb0sc4d4 3st4b4 4 3sp4ld4s d3 Judá. 
14 Y cu4nd0 m1ró Judá, h3 4quí qu3 t3ní4 b4t4ll4 p0r d3l4nt3 y 4 l4s 3sp4ld4s; p0r l0 qu3 cl4m4r0n 4 J3h0vá, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s t0c4r0n l4s tr0mp3t4s. 

15 0nt0nc3s l0s d3 Judá gr1t4r0n c0n fu3rz4; y 4sí qu3 3ll0s 4lz4r0n 3l gr1t0, D10s d3sb4r4tó 4 J3r0b04m y 4 t0d0 1sr43l d3l4nt3 d3 4bí4s y d3 Judá; 
16 y huy3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3l4nt3 d3 Judá, y D10s l0s 3ntr3gó 3n sus m4n0s. 
17 Y 4bí4s y su g3nt3 h1c13r0n 3n 3ll0s un4 gr4n m4t4nz4, y c4y3r0n h3r1d0s d3 1sr43l qu1n13nt0s m1l h0mbr3s 3sc0g1d0s. 
18 4sí fu3r0n hum1ll4d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, y l0s h1j0s d3 Judá pr3v4l3c13r0n, p0rqu3 s3 4p0y4b4n 3n J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s. 

19 Y s1gu1ó 4bí4s 4 J3r0b04m, y l3 t0mó 4lgun4s c1ud4d3s, 4 B3t-3l c0n sus 4ld34s, 4 J3s4n4 c0n sus 4ld34s, y 4 0fr4ín c0n sus 4ld34s. 
20 Y nunc4 más tuv0 J3r0b04m p0d3r 3n l0s dí4s d3 4bí4s; y J3h0vá l0 h1r1ó, y mur1ó.

R31n4d0 d3 4s4

2 Crón1c4s 14
(1 R. 15.9-12)

1 Durm1ó 4bí4s c0n sus p4dr3s, y fu3 s3pult4d0 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d; y r31nó 3n su lug4r su h1j0 4s4, 3n cuy0s dí4s tuv0 s0s13g0 3l p4ís p0r d13z 4ñ0s. 
2 0 h1z0 4s4 l0 bu3n0 y l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá su D10s. 
3 P0rqu3 qu1tó l0s 4lt4r3s d3l cult0 3xtr4ñ0, y l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s; qu3bró l4s 1mág3n3s, y d3struyó l0s símb0l0s d3 4s3r4; 
4 y m4ndó 4 Judá qu3 busc4s3 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s, y pus13s3 p0r 0br4 l4 l3y y l0s m4nd4m13nt0s. 

5 Qu1tó 4s1m1sm0 d3 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s y l4s 1mág3n3s; y 3stuv0 3l r31n0 3n p4z b4j0 su r31n4d0. 
6 Y 3d1f1có c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s 3n Judá, p0r cu4nt0 h4bí4 p4z 3n l4 t13rr4, y n0 h4bí4 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 él 3n 4qu3ll0s t13mp0s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá l3 h4bí4 d4d0 p4z. 
7 D1j0, p0r t4nt0, 4 Judá: 0d1f1qu3m0s 3st4s c1ud4d3s, y c3rquém0sl4s d3 mur0s c0n t0rr3s, pu3rt4s y b4rr4s, y4 qu3 l4 t13rr4 3s nu3str4; p0rqu3 h3m0s busc4d0 4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s; l3 h3m0s busc4d0, y él n0s h4 d4d0 p4z p0r t0d4s p4rt3s. 0d1f1c4r0n, pu3s, y fu3r0n pr0sp3r4d0s. 

8 Tuv0 t4mb1én 4s4 3jérc1t0 qu3 tr4í4 3scud0s y l4nz4s; d3 Judá tr3sc13nt0s m1l, y d3 B3nj4mín d0sc13nt0s 0ch3nt4 m1l qu3 tr4í4n 3scud0s y 3nt3s4b4n 4rc0s, t0d0s h0mbr3s d13str0s. 
9 Y s4l1ó c0ntr4 3ll0s Z3r4 3tí0p3 c0n un 3jérc1t0 d3 un m1llón d3 h0mbr3s y tr3sc13nt0s c4rr0s; y v1n0 h4st4 M4r3s4. 
10 0nt0nc3s s4l1ó 4s4 c0ntr4 él, y 0rd3n4r0n l4 b4t4ll4 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 S3f4t4 junt0 4 M4r3s4. 

11 Y cl4mó 4s4 4 J3h0vá su D10s, y d1j0: ¡0h J3h0vá, p4r4 t1 n0 h4y d1f3r3nc14 4lgun4 3n d4r 4yud4 4l p0d3r0s0 0 4l qu3 n0 t13n3 fu3rz4s! 4yúd4n0s, 0h J3h0vá D10s nu3str0, p0rqu3 3n t1 n0s 4p0y4m0s, y 3n tu n0mbr3 v3n1m0s c0ntr4 3st3 3jérc1t0. 0h J3h0vá, tú 3r3s nu3str0 D10s; n0 pr3v4l3zc4 c0ntr4 t1 3l h0mbr3.
12 Y J3h0vá d3sh1z0 4 l0s 3tí0p3s d3l4nt3 d3 4s4 y d3l4nt3 d3 Judá; y huy3r0n l0s 3tí0p3s. 

13 Y 4s4, y 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4, l0s p3rs1gu13r0n h4st4 G3r4r; y c4y3r0n l0s 3tí0p3s h4st4 n0 qu3d4r 3n 3ll0s 4l13nt0, p0rqu3 fu3r0n d3sh3ch0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá y d3 su 3jérc1t0. Y l3s t0m4r0n muy gr4nd3 b0tín. 

14 4t4c4r0n t4mb1én t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s 4lr3d3d0r d3 G3r4r, p0rqu3 3l t3rr0r d3 J3h0vá c4yó s0br3 3ll4s; y s4qu34r0n t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s, p0rqu3 h4bí4 3n 3ll4s gr4n b0tín. 
15 4s1m1sm0 4t4c4r0n l4s c4b4ñ4s d3 l0s qu3 t3ní4n g4n4d0, y s3 ll3v4r0n much4s 0v3j4s y c4m3ll0s, y v0lv13r0n 4 J3rus4lén. 



R3f0rm4s r3l1g10s4s d3 4s4

2 Crón1c4s 15
(1 R. 15.13-15)

1 V1n0 3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s s0br3 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3 0d3d,

3 Much0s dí4s h4 3st4d0 1sr43l s1n v3rd4d3r0 D10s y s1n s4c3rd0t3 qu3 3ns3ñ4r4, y s1n l3y;

5 0n 4qu3ll0s t13mp0s n0 hub0 p4z, n1 p4r4 3l qu3 3ntr4b4 n1 p4r4 3l qu3 s4lí4, s1n0 much4s 4fl1cc10n3s s0br3 t0d0s l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 l4s t13rr4s.

7 P3r0 3sf0rz40s v0s0tr0s, y n0 d3sf4ll3zc4n vu3str4s m4n0s, pu3s h4y r3c0mp3ns4 p4r4 vu3str4 0br4. 

8 Cu4nd0 0yó 4s4 l4s p4l4br4s y l4 pr0f3cí4 d3l pr0f3t4 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3 0d3d, c0bró án1m0, y qu1tó l0s íd0l0s 4b0m1n4bl3s d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 Judá y d3 B3nj4mín, y d3 l4s c1ud4d3s qu3 él h4bí4 t0m4d0 3n l4 p4rt3 m0nt4ñ0s4 d3 0fr4ín; y r3p4ró 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3l pórt1c0 d3 J3h0vá. 

9 D3spués r3un1ó 4 t0d0 Judá y B3nj4mín, y c0n 3ll0s l0s f0r4st3r0s d3 0fr4ín, d3 M4n4sés y d3 S1m3ón; p0rqu3 much0s d3 1sr43l s3 h4bí4n p4s4d0 4 él, v13nd0 qu3 J3h0vá su D10s 3st4b4 c0n él. 
10 S3 r3un13r0n, pu3s, 3n J3rus4lén, 3n 3l m3s t3rc3r0 d3l 4ñ0 d3c1m0qu1nt0 d3l r31n4d0 d3 4s4. 
11 Y 3n 4qu3l m1sm0 dí4 s4cr1f1c4r0n p4r4 J3h0vá, d3l b0tín qu3 h4bí4n tr4íd0, s3t3c13nt0s bu3y3s y s13t3 m1l 0v3j4s. 

12 0nt0nc3s pr0m3t13r0n s0l3mn3m3nt3 qu3 busc4rí4n 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s, d3 t0d0 su c0r4zón y d3 t0d4 su 4lm4; 
13 y qu3 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 n0 busc4s3 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l, mur13s3, gr4nd3 0 p3qu3ñ0, h0mbr3 0 muj3r. 

14 Y jur4r0n 4 J3h0vá c0n gr4n v0z y júb1l0, 4l s0n d3 tr0mp3t4s y d3 b0c1n4s. 
15 T0d0s l0s d3 Judá s3 4l3gr4r0n d3 3st3 jur4m3nt0; p0rqu3 d3 t0d0 su c0r4zón l0 jur4b4n, y d3 t0d4 su v0lunt4d l0 busc4b4n, y fu3 h4ll4d0 d3 3ll0s; y J3h0vá l3s d10 p4z p0r t0d4s p4rt3s. 
16 Y 4un 4 M44c4 m4dr3 d3l r3y 4s4, él m1sm0 l4 d3pus0 d3 su d1gn1d4d, p0rqu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 un4 1m4g3n d3 4s3r4; y 4s4 d3struyó l4 1m4g3n, y l4 d3sm3nuzó, y l4 qu3mó junt0 4l t0rr3nt3 d3 C3drón. 

17 C0n t0d0 3st0, l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s n0 3r4n qu1t4d0s d3 1sr43l, 4unqu3 3l c0r4zón d3 4s4 fu3 p3rf3ct0 3n t0d0s sus dí4s. 
18 Y tr4j0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s l0 qu3 su p4dr3 h4bí4 d3d1c4d0, y l0 qu3 él h4bí4 c0ns4gr4d0, pl4t4, 0r0 y ut3ns1l10s. 

19 Y n0 hub0 más gu3rr4 h4st4 l0s tr31nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s d3l r31n4d0 d3 4s4. 



4l14nz4 d3 4s4 c0n B3n-4d4d

2 Crón1c4s 16
(1 R. 15.16-22)

1 0n 3l 4ñ0 tr31nt4 y s31s d3l r31n4d0 d3 4s4, sub1ó B44s4 r3y d3 1sr43l  c0ntr4 Judá, y f0rt1f1có 4 R4má, p4r4 n0 d3j4r s4l1r n1 3ntr4r 4 n1ngun0 4l r3y 4s4, r3y d3 Judá. 
2 0nt0nc3s s4có 4s4 l4 pl4t4 y 3l 0r0 d3 l0s t3s0r0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá y d3 l4 c4s4 r34l y 3nv1ó 4 B3n-4d4d r3y d3 S1r14, qu3 3st4b4 3n D4m4sc0, d1c13nd0: 

3 H4y4 4l14nz4 3ntr3 tú y y0, c0m0 l4 hub0 3ntr3 tu p4dr3 y m1 p4dr3; h3 4quí y0 t3 h3 3nv14d0 pl4t4 y 0r0, p4r4 qu3 v3ng4s y d3sh4g4s l4 4l14nz4 qu3 t13n3s c0n B44s4 r3y d3 1sr43l, 4 f1n d3 qu3 s3 r3t1r3 d3 mí. 
4 Y c0ns1nt1ó B3n-4d4d c0n 3l r3y 4s4, y 3nv1ó l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 sus 3jérc1t0s c0ntr4 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 1sr43l; y c0nqu1st4r0n 1jón, D4n, 4b3l-m41m y t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 4pr0v1s10n4m13nt0 d3 N3ft4lí. 
5 0y3nd0 3st0 B44s4, c3só d3 3d1f1c4r 4 R4má, y 4b4nd0nó su 0br4. 

6 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y 4s4 t0mó 4 t0d0 Judá, y s3 ll3v4r0n d3 R4má l4 p13dr4 y l4 m4d3r4 c0n qu3 B44s4 3d1f1c4b4, y c0n 3ll4s 3d1f1có 4 G3b4 y M1zp4. 
7 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 v1n0 3l v1d3nt3 H4n4n1 4 4s4 r3y d3 Judá, y l3 d1j0: P0r cu4nt0 t3 h4s 4p0y4d0 3n 3l r3y d3 S1r14, y n0 t3 4p0y4st3 3n J3h0vá tu D10s, p0r 3s0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3l r3y d3 S1r14 h4 3sc4p4d0 d3 tus m4n0s. 
8 L0s 3tí0p3s y l0s l1b10s, ¿n0 3r4n un 3jérc1t0 num3r0sís1m0, c0n c4rr0s y much4 g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0? C0n t0d0, p0rqu3 t3 4p0y4st3 3n J3h0vá, él l0s 3ntr3gó 3n tus m4n0s. 

9 P0rqu3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá c0nt3mpl4n t0d4 l4 t13rr4, p4r4 m0str4r su p0d3r 4 f4v0r d3 l0s qu3 t13n3n c0r4zón p3rf3ct0 p4r4 c0n él. L0c4m3nt3 h4s h3ch0 3n 3st0; p0rqu3 d3 4quí 3n 4d3l4nt3 h4brá más gu3rr4 c0ntr4 t1. 
10 0nt0nc3s s3 3n0jó 4s4 c0ntr4 3l v1d3nt3 y l0 3chó 3n l4 cárc3l, p0rqu3 s3 3nc0l3r1zó gr4nd3m3nt3 4 c4us4 d3 3st0. Y 0pr1m1ó 4s4 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 4 4lgun0s d3l pu3bl0. 



Mu3rt3 d3 4s4
(1 R. 15.23-24)

11 M4s h3 4quí l0s h3ch0s d3 4s4, pr1m3r0s y p0str3r0s, 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá y d3 1sr43l. 
12 0n 3l 4ñ0 tr31nt4 y nu3v3 d3 su r31n4d0, 4s4 3nf3rmó gr4v3m3nt3 d3 l0s p13s, y 3n su 3nf3rm3d4d n0 buscó 4 J3h0vá, s1n0 4 l0s méd1c0s. 
13 Y durm1ó 4s4 c0n sus p4dr3s, y mur1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 cu4r3nt4 y un0 d3 su r31n4d0. 
14 Y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n l0s s3pulcr0s qu3 él h4bí4 h3ch0 p4r4 sí 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d; y l0 pus13r0n 3n un 4t4úd, 3l cu4l ll3n4r0n d3 p3rfum3s y d1v3rs4s 3sp3c14s 4r0mát1c4s, pr3p4r4d4s p0r 3xp3rt0s p3rfum1st4s; 3 h1c13r0n un gr4n fu3g0 3n su h0n0r. 



R31n4d0 d3 J0s4f4t

2 Crón1c4s 17

1 R31nó 3n su lug4r J0s4f4t su h1j0, 3l cu4l s3 h1z0 fu3rt3 c0ntr4 1sr43l. 
2 Pus0 3jérc1t0s 3n t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s d3 Judá, y c0l0có g3nt3 d3 gu4rn1c1ón 3n t13rr4 d3 Judá, y 4s1m1sm0 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 0fr4ín qu3 su p4dr3 4s4 h4bí4 t0m4d0. 
3 Y J3h0vá 3stuv0 c0n J0s4f4t, p0rqu3 4nduv0 3n l0s pr1m3r0s c4m1n0s d3 D4v1d su p4dr3, y n0 buscó 4 l0s b44l3s, 

4 s1n0 qu3 buscó 4l D10s d3 su p4dr3, y 4nduv0 3n sus m4nd4m13nt0s, y n0 s3gún l4s 0br4s d3 1sr43l. 
5 J3h0vá, p0r t4nt0, c0nf1rmó 3l r31n0 3n su m4n0, y t0d0 Judá d10 4 J0s4f4t pr3s3nt3s; y tuv0 r1qu3z4s y gl0r14 3n 4bund4nc14. 
6 Y s3 4n1mó su c0r4zón 3n l0s c4m1n0s d3 J3h0vá, y qu1tó l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s y l4s 1mág3n3s d3 4s3r4 d3 3n m3d10 d3 Judá. 

7 4l t3rc3r 4ñ0 d3 su r31n4d0 3nv1ó sus prínc1p3s B3n-h41l, 4bdí4s, Z4c4rí4s, N4t4n43l y M1c4í4s, p4r4 qu3 3ns3ñ4s3n 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá; 
8 y c0n 3ll0s 4 l0s l3v1t4s S3m4í4s, N3t4ní4s, Z3b4dí4s, 4s43l, S3m1r4m0t, J0n4tán, 4d0ní4s, T0bí4s y T0b4d0ní4s; y c0n 3ll0s 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s 0l1s4m4 y J0r4m. 
9 Y 3ns3ñ4r0n 3n Judá, t3n13nd0 c0ns1g0 3l l1br0 d3 l4 L3y d3 J3h0vá, y r3c0rr13r0n t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá 3ns3ñ4nd0 4l pu3bl0. 

10 Y c4yó 3l p4v0r d3 J3h0vá s0br3 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 l4s t13rr4s qu3 3st4b4n 4lr3d3d0r d3 Judá, y n0 0s4r0n h4c3r gu3rr4 c0ntr4 J0s4f4t. 
11 Y tr4í4n d3 l0s f1l1st30s pr3s3nt3s 4 J0s4f4t, y tr1but0s d3 pl4t4. L0s ár4b3s t4mb1én l3 tr4j3r0n g4n4d0s: s13t3 m1l s3t3c13nt0s c4rn3r0s y s13t3 m1l s3t3c13nt0s m4ch0s c4brí0s. 

12 1b4, pu3s, J0s4f4t 3ngr4nd3c1énd0s3 much0; y 3d1f1có 3n Judá f0rt4l3z4s y c1ud4d3s d3 4pr0v1s10n4m13nt0. 
13 Tuv0 much4s pr0v1s10n3s 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, y h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4 muy v4l13nt3s 3n J3rus4lén. 

14 Y 3st3 3s 3l núm3r0 d3 3ll0s s3gún sus c4s4s p4t3rn4s: d3 l0s j3f3s d3 l0s m1ll4r3s d3 Judá, 3l g3n3r4l 4dn4s, y c0n él tr3sc13nt0s m1l h0mbr3s muy 3sf0rz4d0s. 
15 D3spués d3 él, 3l j3f3 J0h4nán, y c0n él d0sc13nt0s 0ch3nt4 m1l. 
16 Tr4s ést3, 4m4sí4s h1j0 d3 Z1cr1, 3l cu4l s3 h4bí4 0fr3c1d0 v0lunt4r14m3nt3 4 J3h0vá, y c0n él d0sc13nt0s m1l h0mbr3s v4l13nt3s. 
17 D3 B3nj4mín, 0l14d4, h0mbr3 muy v4l3r0s0, y c0n él d0sc13nt0s m1l 4rm4d0s d3 4rc0 y 3scud0. 
18 Tr4s ést3, J0z4b4d, y c0n él c13nt0 0ch3nt4 m1l d1spu3st0s p4r4 l4 gu3rr4. 
19 0st0s 3r4n s13rv0s d3l r3y, s1n l0s qu3 3l r3y h4bí4 pu3st0 3n l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s 3n t0d0 Judá. 



M1c4í4s pr0f3t1z4 l4 d3rr0t4 d3 4c4b

2 Crón1c4s 18
(1 R. 22.1-40)

1 T3ní4, pu3s, J0s4f4t r1qu3z4s y gl0r14 3n 4bund4nc14; y c0ntr4j0 p4r3nt3sc0 c0n 4c4b. 
2 Y d3spués d3 4lgun0s 4ñ0s d3sc3nd1ó 4 S4m4r14 p4r4 v1s1t4r 4 4c4b; p0r l0 qu3 4c4b m4tó much4s 0v3j4s y bu3y3s p4r4 él y p4r4 l4 g3nt3 qu3 c0n él v3ní4, y l3 p3rsu4d1ó qu3 fu3s3 c0n él c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d. 
3 Y d1j0 4c4b r3y d3 1sr43l 4 J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá: ¿Qu13r3s v3n1r c0nm1g0 c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d? Y él r3sp0nd1ó: Y0 s0y c0m0 tú, y m1 pu3bl0 c0m0 tu pu3bl0; 1r3m0s c0nt1g0 4 l4 gu3rr4. 

4 4d3más d1j0 J0s4f4t 4l r3y d3 1sr43l: T3 ru3g0 qu3 c0nsult3s h0y l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 
5 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l r3un1ó 4 cu4tr0c13nt0s pr0f3t4s, y l3s pr3guntó: ¿1r3m0s 4 l4 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d, 0 m3 3st4ré qu13t0? Y 3ll0s d1j3r0n: Sub3, p0rqu3 D10s l0s 3ntr3g4rá 3n m4n0 d3l r3y. 
6 P3r0 J0s4f4t d1j0: ¿H4y 4ún 4quí 4lgún pr0f3t4 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 p0r m3d10 d3 él pr3gunt3m0s? 

7 0l r3y d3 1sr43l r3sp0nd1ó 4 J0s4f4t: 4ún h4y 4quí un h0mbr3 p0r 3l cu4l p0d3m0s pr3gunt4r 4 J3h0vá; m4s y0 l3 4b0rr3zc0, p0rqu3 nunc4 m3 pr0f3t1z4 c0s4 bu3n4, s1n0 s13mpr3 m4l. 0st3 3s M1c4í4s h1j0 d3 1ml4. Y r3sp0nd1ó J0s4f4t: N0 h4bl3 4sí 3l r3y. 
8 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l ll4mó 4 un 0f1c14l, y l3 d1j0: H4z v3n1r lu3g0 4 M1c4í4s h1j0 d3 1ml4. 
9 Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l y J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá 3st4b4n s3nt4d0s c4d4 un0 3n su tr0n0, v3st1d0s c0n sus r0p4s r34l3s, 3n l4 pl4z4 junt0 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 S4m4r14, y t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s pr0f3t1z4b4n d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s. 

10 Y S3d3quí4s h1j0 d3 Qu3n44n4 s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 cu3rn0s d3 h13rr0, y d3cí4: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: C0n 3st0s 4c0rn34rás 4 l0s s1r10s h4st4 d3stru1rl0s p0r c0mpl3t0. 
11 D3 3st4 m4n3r4 pr0f3t1z4b4n t4mb1én t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s, d1c13nd0: Sub3 c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d, y s3rás pr0sp3r4d0; p0rqu3 J3h0vá l4 3ntr3g4rá 3n m4n0 d3l r3y. 

12 Y 3l m3ns4j3r0 qu3 h4bí4 1d0 4 ll4m4r 4 M1c4í4s, l3 h4bló d1c13nd0: H3 4quí l4s p4l4br4s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s 4 un4 v0z 4nunc14n 4l r3y c0s4s bu3n4s; y0, pu3s, t3 ru3g0 qu3 tu p4l4br4 s34 c0m0 l4 d3 un0 d3 3ll0s, qu3 h4bl3s b13n. 
13 D1j0 M1c4í4s: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 l0 qu3 m1 D10s m3 d1j3r3, 3s0 h4bl4ré. Y v1n0 4l r3y. 
14 y 3l r3y l3 d1j0: M1c4í4s, ¿1r3m0s 4 p3l34r c0ntr4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d, 0 m3 3st4ré qu13t0? 0l R3sp0nd1ó: Sub1d, y s3ré1s pr0sp3r4d0s, pu3s s3rán 3ntr3g4d0s 3n vu3str4s m4n0s. 
15 0l r3y l3 d1j0: ¿H4st4 cuánt4s v3c3s t3 c0njur4ré p0r 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá qu3 n0 m3 h4bl3s s1n0 l4 v3rd4d? 

16 0nt0nc3s M1c4í4s d1j0: H3 v1st0 4 t0d0 1sr43l d3rr4m4d0 p0r l0s m0nt3s c0m0 0v3j4s s1n p4st0r; y d1j0 J3h0vá: 0st0s n0 t13n3n s3ñ0r; vuélv4s3 c4d4 un0 3n p4z 4 su c4s4. 
17 Y 3l r3y d3 1sr43l d1j0 4 J0s4f4t: ¿N0 t3 h4bí4 y0 d1ch0 qu3 n0 m3 pr0f3t1z4rí4 b13n, s1n0 m4l? 
18 0nt0nc3s él d1j0: 0íd, pu3s, p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá: Y0 h3 v1st0 4 J3h0vá s3nt4d0 3n su tr0n0, y t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s c13l0s 3st4b4 4 su m4n0 d3r3ch4 y 4 su 1zqu13rd4. 

19 Y J3h0vá pr3guntó: ¿Qu1én 1nduc1rá 4 4c4b r3y d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 sub4 y c41g4 3n R4m0t d3 G4l44d? Y un0 d3cí4 4sí, y 0tr0 d3cí4 d3 0tr4 m4n3r4. 
20 0nt0nc3s s4l1ó un 3spír1tu qu3 s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá y d1j0: Y0 l3 1nduc1ré. Y J3h0vá l3 d1j0: ¿D3 qué m0d0? 
21 Y él d1j0: S4ldré y s3ré 3spír1tu d3 m3nt1r4 3n l4 b0c4 d3 t0d0s sus pr0f3t4s. Y J3h0vá d1j0: Tú l3 1nduc1rás, y l0 l0gr4rás; 4nd4 y h4zl0 4sí. 
22 Y 4h0r4, h3 4quí J3h0vá h4 pu3st0 3spír1tu d3 m3nt1r4 3n l4 b0c4 d3 3st0s tus pr0f3t4s; pu3s J3h0vá h4 h4bl4d0 3l m4l c0n c0ntr4 t1. 

23 0nt0nc3s S3d3quí4s h1j0 d3 Qu3n44n4 s3 l3 4c3rcó y g0lp3ó 4 M1c4í4s 3n l4 m3j1ll4, y d1j0: ¿P0r qué c4m1n0 s3 fu3 d3 mí 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá p4r4 h4bl4rt3 4 t1? 
24 Y M1c4í4s r3sp0nd1ó: H3 4quí tú l0 v3rás 4qu3l dí4, cu4nd0 3ntr3s d3 cám4r4 3n cám4r4 p4r4 3sc0nd3rt3. 

25 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l d1j0: T0m4d 4 M1c4í4s, y ll3v4dl0 4 4món g0b3rn4d0r d3 l4 c1ud4d, y 4 J0ás h1j0 d3l r3y, 
26 y d3c1dl3s: 0l r3y h4 d1ch0 4sí: P0n3d 4 ést3 3n l4 cárc3l, y sust3nt4dl3 c0n p4n d3 4fl1cc1ón y 4gu4 d3 4ngust14, h4st4 qu3 y0 vu3lv4 3n p4z. 
27 Y M1c4í4s d1j0: S1 tú v0lv13r3s 3n p4z, J3h0vá n0 h4 h4bl4d0 p0r mí. D1j0 4d3más: 0íd, pu3bl0s t0d0s. 

28 Sub13r0n, pu3s, 3l r3y d3 1sr43l, y J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá, 4 R4m0t d3 G4l44d. 
29 Y d1j0 3l r3y d3 1sr43l 4 J0s4f4t: Y0 m3 d1sfr4z4ré p4r4 3ntr4r 3n l4 b4t4ll4, p3r0 tú víst3t3 tus r0p4s r34l3s. Y s3 d1sfr4zó 3l r3y d3 1sr43l, y 3ntró 3n l4 b4t4ll4. 
30 H4bí4 3l r3y d3 S1r14 m4nd4d0 4 l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l0s c4rr0s qu3 t3ní4 c0ns1g0, d1c13nd0: N0 p3l3é1s c0n ch1c0 n1 c0n gr4nd3, s1n0 sól0 c0n 3l r3y d3 1sr43l. 
31 Cu4nd0 l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l0s c4rr0s v13r0n 4 J0s4f4t, d1j3r0n: 0st3 3s 3l r3y d3 1sr43l. Y l0 r0d34r0n p4r4 p3l34r; m4s J0s4f4t cl4mó, y J3h0vá l0 4yudó, y l0s 4p4rtó D10s d3 él; 
32 pu3s v13nd0 l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l0s c4rr0s qu3 n0 3r4 3l r3y d3 1sr43l, d3s1st13r0n d3 4c0s4rl3. 

33 M4s d1sp4r4nd0 un0 3l 4rc0 4 l4 v3ntur4, h1r1ó 4l r3y d3 1sr43l 3ntr3 l4s juntur4s y 3l c0s3l3t3. 0l 3nt0nc3s d1j0 4l c0ch3r0: Vu3lv3 l4s r13nd4s, y sác4m3 d3l c4mp0, p0rqu3 3st0y m4l h3r1d0. 
34 Y 4rr3c1ó 4 b4t4ll4 4qu3l dí4, p0r l0 qu3 3stuv0 3l r3y d3 1sr43l 3n p13 3n 3l c4rr0 3nfr3nt3 d3 l0s s1r10s h4st4 l4 t4rd3; y mur1ó 4l p0n3rs3 3l s0l. 



0l pr0f3t4 J3hú 4m0n3st4 4 J0s4f4t

2 Crón1c4s 19

1 J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá v0lv1ó 3n p4z 4 su c4s4 3n J3rus4lén. 
2 Y l3 s4l1ó 4l 3ncu3ntr0 3l v1d3nt3 J3hú h1j0 d3 H4n4n1, y d1j0 4l r3y J0s4f4t: ¿4l 1mpí0 d4s 4yud4, y 4m4s 4 l0s qu3 4b0rr3c3n 4 J3h0vá? Pu3s h4 s4l1d0 d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá 1r4 c0ntr4 t1 p0r 3st0. 
3 P3r0 s3 h4n h4ll4d0 3n t1 bu3n4s c0s4s, p0r cu4nt0 h4s qu1t4d0 d3 l4 t13rr4 l4s 1mág3n3s d3 4s3r4, y h4s d1spu3st0 tu c0r4zón p4r4 busc4r 4 D10s. 



J0s4f4t n0mbr4 ju3c3s

4 H4b1tó, pu3s, J0s4f4t 3n J3rus4lén; p3r0 d4b4 vu3lt4 y s4lí4 4l pu3bl0, d3sd3 B33rs3b4 h4st4 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín, y l0s c0nducí4 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s. 
5 Y pus0 ju3c3s 3n t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s d3 Judá, p0r t0d0s l0s lug4r3s. 

6 Y d1j0 4 l0s ju3c3s: M1r4d l0 qu3 h4cé1s; p0rqu3 n0 juzgá1s 3n lug4r d3 h0mbr3, s1n0 3n lug4r d3 J3h0vá, 3l cu4l 3stá c0n v0s0tr0s cu4nd0 juzgá1s. 
7 S34, pu3s, c0n v0s0tr0s 3l t3m0r d3 J3h0vá; m1r4d l0 qu3 h4cé1s, p0rqu3 c0n J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0 h4y 1njust1c14, n1 4c3pc1ón d3 p3rs0n4s, n1 4dm1s1ón d3 c0h3ch0. 

8 Pus0 t4mb1én J0s4f4t 3n J3rus4lén 4 4lgun0s d3 l0s l3v1t4s y s4c3rd0t3s, y d3 l0s p4dr3s d3 f4m1l14s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 3l ju1c10 d3 J3h0vá y p4r4 l4s c4us4s. Y v0lv13r0n 4 J3rus4lén. 
9 Y l3s m4ndó d1c13nd0: Pr0c3d3ré1s 4s1m1sm0 c0n t3m0r d3 J3h0vá, c0n v3rd4d, y c0n c0r4zón ínt3gr0. 
10 0n cu4lqu13r c4us4 qu3 v1n13r3 4 v0s0tr0s d3 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n l4s c1ud4d3s, 3n c4us4s d3 s4ngr3, 3ntr3 l3y y pr3c3pt0,  3st4tut0s y d3cr3t0s, l3s 4m0n3st4ré1s qu3 n0 p3qu3n c0ntr4 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 n0 v3ng4 1r4 s0br3 v0s0tr0s y s0br3 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s. H4c13nd0 4sí, n0 p3c4ré1s. 
11 Y h3 4quí, 3l s4c3rd0t3 4m4rí4s s3rá 3l qu3 0s pr3s1d4 3n t0d0 4sunt0 d3 J3h0vá, y Z3b4dí4s h1j0 d3 1sm43l, prínc1p3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá, 3n t0d0s l0s n3g0c10s d3l r3y; t4mb1én l0s l3v1t4s s3rán 0f1c14l3s 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 v0s0tr0s. 0sf0rz40s, pu3s, p4r4 h4c3rl0, y J3h0vá 3st4rá c0n 3l bu3n0. 



V1ct0r14 s0br3 M04b y 4món

2 Crón1c4s 20

1 P4s4d4s 3st4s c0s4s, 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 M04b y d3 4món, y c0n 3ll0s 0tr0s d3 l0s 4m0n1t4s, v1n13r0n c0ntr4 J0s4f4t 4 l4 gu3rr4. 
2 Y 4cud13r0n 4lgun0s y d13r0n 4v1s0 4 J0s4f4t, d1c13nd0: C0ntr4 t1 v13n3 un4 gr4n mult1tud d3l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l m4r, y d3 S1r14; y h3 4quí 3stán 3n H4z3z0n-t4m4r, qu3 3s 0n-g4d1. 
3 0nt0nc3s él tuv0 t3m0r; y J0s4f4t hum1lló su r0str0 p4r4 c0nsult4r 4 J3h0vá, 3 h1z0 pr3g0n4r 4yun0 4 t0d0 Judá. 
4 Y s3 r3un13r0n l0s d3 Judá p4r4 p3d1r s0c0rr0 4 J3h0vá; y t4mb1én d3 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá v1n13r0n 4 p3d1r 4yud4 4 J3h0vá. 

5 0nt0nc3s J0s4f4t s3 pus0 d3 p13 3n l4 4s4mbl34 d3 Judá y d3 J3rus4lén, 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, d3l4nt3 d3l 4tr10 nu3v0; 
6 y d1j0: J3h0vá D10s d3 nu3str0s p4dr3s, ¿n0 3r3s tú D10s 3n l0s c13l0s, y t13n3s d0m1n10 s0br3 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 l4s n4c10n3s? ¿N0 3stá 3n tu m4n0 t4l fu3rz4 y p0d3r, qu3 n0 h4y qu13n t3 r3s1st4? 
7 D10s nu3str0, ¿n0 3ch4st3 tú l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 3st4 t13rr4 d3l4nt3 d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l, y l4 d1st3 4 l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 4br4h4m tu 4m1g0 p4r4 s13mpr3? 
8 Y 3ll0s h4n h4b1t4d0 3n 3ll4, y t3 h4n 3d1f1c4d0 3n 3ll4 s4ntu4r10 4 tu n0mbr3, d1c13nd0: 

9 S1 m4l v1n13r3 s0br3 n0s0tr0s, 0 3sp4d4 d3 c4st1g0, 0 p3st1l3nc14, 0 h4mbr3, n0s pr3s3nt4r3m0s d3l4nt3 d3 3st4 c4s4, y d3l4nt3 d3 t1 (p0rqu3 tu n0mbr3 3stá 3n 3st4 c4s4), y 4 c4us4 d3 nu3str4s tr1bul4c10n3s cl4m4r3m0s 4 t1, y tú n0s 01rás y s4lv4rás. 
10 4h0r4, pu3s, h3 4quí l0s h1j0s d3 4món y d3 M04b, y l0s d3l m0nt3 d3 S31r, 4 cuy4 t13rr4 n0 qu1s1st3 qu3 p4s4s3 1sr43l cu4nd0 v3ní4 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, s1n0 qu3 s3 4p4rt4s3 d3 3ll0s, y n0 l0s d3struy3s3; 
11 h3 4quí 3ll0s n0s d4n 3l p4g0 v1n13nd0 4 4rr0j4rn0s d3 l4 h3r3d4d qu3 tú n0s d1st3 3n p0s3s1ón. 

12 ¡0h D10s nu3str0! ¿n0 l0s juzg4rás tú? P0rqu3 3n n0s0tr0s n0 h4y fu3rz4 c0ntr4 t4n gr4nd3 mult1tud qu3 v13n3 c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s; n0 s4b3m0s qué h4c3r, y 4 t1 v0lv3m0s nu3str0s 0j0s.
13 Y t0d0 Judá 3st4b4 3n p13 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, c0n sus n1ñ0s y sus muj3r3s y sus h1j0s. 

14 Y 3st4b4 4llí J4h4z13l h1j0 d3 Z4c4rí4s, h1j0 d3 B3n4í4, h1j0 d3 J313l, h1j0 d3 M4t4ní4s, l3v1t4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4s4f, s0br3 3l cu4l v1n0 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá 3n m3d10 d3 l4 r3un1ón; 
15 y d1j0: 0íd, Judá t0d0, y v0s0tr0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén, y tú, r3y J0s4f4t. J3h0vá 0s d1c3 4sí: N0 t3má1s n1 0s 4m3dr3nté1s d3l4nt3 d3 3st4 mult1tud t4n gr4nd3, p0rqu3 n0 3s vu3str4 l4 gu3rr4, s1n0 d3 D10s. 
16 M4ñ4n4 d3sc3nd3ré1s c0ntr4 3ll0s; h3 4quí qu3 3ll0s sub1rán p0r l4 cu3st4 d3 S1s, y l0s h4ll4ré1s junt0 4l 4rr0y0, 4nt3s d3l d3s13rt0 d3 J3ru3l. 

17  N0 h4brá p4r4 qu3 p3l3é1s v0s0tr0s 3n 3st3 c4s0; p4r40s, 3st4d qu13t0s, y v3d l4 s4lv4c1ón d3 J3h0vá c0n v0s0tr0s. 0h Judá y J3rus4lén, n0 t3má1s n1 d3sm4yé1s; s4l1d m4ñ4n4 c0ntr4 3ll0s, p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3st4rá c0n v0s0tr0s.
18 0nt0nc3s J0s4f4t s3 1ncl1nó r0str0 4 t13rr4, y 4s1m1sm0 t0d0 Judá y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén s3 p0str4r0n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y 4d0r4r0n 4 J3h0vá. 

19 Y s3 l3v4nt4r0n l0s l3v1t4s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t y d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C0ré, p4r4 4l4b4r 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l c0n fu3rt3 y 4lt4 v0z. 
20 Y cu4nd0 s3 l3v4nt4r0n p0r l4 m4ñ4n4, s4l13r0n 4l d3s13rt0 d3 T3c04. Y m13ntr4s 3ll0s S4lí4n, J0s4f4t, 3st4nd0 3n p13, d1j0: 0ídm3, Judá y m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén. Cr33d 3n J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y 3st4ré1s s3gur0s; cr33d 4 sus pr0f3t4s, y s3ré1s pr0sp3r4d0s. 
21 Y h4b1d0 c0ns3j0 c0n 3l pu3bl0, pus0 4 4lgun0s qu3 c4nt4s3n y 4l4b4s3n 4 J3h0vá, v3st1d0s d3 0rn4m3nt0s s4gr4d0s, m13ntr4s s4lí4 l4 g3nt3 4rm4d4, y qu3 d1j3s3n: Gl0r1f1c4d 4 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 su m1s3r1c0rd14 3s p4r4 s13mpr3. 

22 Y cu4nd0 c0m3nz4r0n 4 3nt0n4r c4nt0s d3 4l4b4nz4, J3h0vá pus0 c0ntr4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, d3 M04b y d3l m0nt3 d3 S31r, l4s 3mb0sc4d4s d3 3ll0s m1sm0s qu3 v3ní4n c0ntr4 Judá, y s3 m4t4r0n l0s un0s 4 l0s 0tr0s. 
23 P0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món y M04b s3 l3v4nt4r0n c0ntr4 l0s d3l m0nt3 d3 S31r p4r4 m4t4rl0s y d3stru1rl0s; y cu4nd0 hub13r0n 4c4b4d0 c0n l0s d3l m0nt3 d3 S31r, c4d4 cu4l 4yudó 4 l4 d3strucc1ón d3 su c0mp4ñ3r0. 
24 Y lu3g0 qu3 v1n0 Judá 4 l4 t0rr3 d3l d3s13rt0, m1r4r0n h4c14 l4 mult1tud, y h3 4quí y4cí4n 3ll0s 3n t13rr4 mu3rt0s, pu3s n1ngun0 h4bí4 3sc4p4d0. 
25 V1n13nd0 3nt0nc3s J0s4f4t y su pu3bl0 4 d3sp0j4rl0s, h4ll4r0n 3ntr3 l0s c4dáv3r3s much4s r1qu3z4s, 4sí v3st1d0s c0m0 4lh4j4s pr3c10s4s, qu3 t0m4r0n p4r4 sí, t4nt0s, qu3 n0 l0s p0dí4n ll3v4r; tr3s dí4s 3stuv13r0n r3c0g13nd0 3l b0tín, p0rqu3 3r4 much0. 

26 Y 4l cu4rt0 dí4 s3 junt4r0n 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 B3r4c4; p0rqu3 4llí b3nd1j3r0n 4 J3h0vá, y p0r 3st0 ll4m4r0n 3l n0mbr3 d3 4qu3l p4r4j3 3l v4ll3 d3 B3r4c4, h4st4 h0y. 
27 Y t0d0 Judá y l0s d3 J3rus4lén, y J0s4f4t 4 l4 c4b3z4 d3 3ll0s, v0lv13r0n p4r4 r3gr3s4r 4 J3rus4lén g0z0s0s, p0rqu3 J3h0vá l3s h4bí4 d4d0 g0z0 l1bránd0l0s d3 sus 3n3m1g0s. 

28 Y v1n13r0n 4 J3rus4lén c0n s4lt3r10s, 4rp4s y tr0mp3t4s, 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 
29 Y 3l p4v0r d3 D10s c4yó s0br3 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 4qu3ll4 t13rr4, cu4nd0 0y3r0n qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 p3l34d0 c0ntr4 l0s 3n3m1g0s d3 1sr43l. 
30 Y 3l r31n0 d3 J0s4f4t tuv0 p4z, p0rqu3 su D10s l3 d10 p4z p0r t0d4s p4rt3s. 



R3sum3n d3l r31n4d0 d3 J0s4f4t
(1 R. 22.41-50)

31 4sí r31nó J0s4f4t s0br3 Judá; d3 tr31nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s 3r4 cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y r31nó v31nt1c1nc0 4ñ0s 3n J3rus4lén. 0l n0mbr3 d3 su m4dr3 fu3 4zub4, h1j4 d3 S1lh1. 
32 Y 4nduv0 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 4s4 su p4dr3, s1n 4p4rt4rs3 d3 él, h4c13nd0 l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá. 
33 C0n t0d0 3s0, l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s n0 fu3r0n qu1t4d0s; pu3s 3l pu3bl0 4ún n0 h4bí4 3nd3r3z4d0 su c0r4zón 4l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s. 
34 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 J0s4f4t, pr1m3r0s y p0str3r0s, h3 4quí 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3hú h1j0 d3 H4n4n1, d3l cu4l s3 h4c3 m3nc1ón 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l. 

35 P4s4d4s 3st4s c0s4s, J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá tr4bó 4m1st4d c0n 0c0zí4s r3y d3 1sr43l, 3l cu4l 3r4 d4d0 4 l4 1mp13d4d, 
36 3 h1z0 c0n él c0mp4ñí4 p4r4 c0nstru1r n4v3s qu3 fu3s3n 4 T4rs1s; y c0nstruy3r0n l4s n4v3s 3n 0z1ón-g3b3r. 
37 0nt0nc3s 0l13z3r h1j0 d3 D0d4v4, d3 M4r3s4, pr0f3t1zó c0ntr4 J0s4f4t, d1c13nd0: P0r cu4nt0 h4s h3ch0 c0mp4ñí4 c0n 0c0zí4s, J3h0vá d3stru1rá tus 0br4s. Y l4s n4v3s s3 r0mp13r0n, y n0 pud13r0n 1r 4 T4rs1s. 



R31n4d0 d3 J0r4m d3 Judá

2 Crón1c4s 21
(2 R. 8.16-24)

1 Durm1ó J0s4f4t c0n sus p4dr3s, y l0 s3pult4r0n c0n sus p4dr3s 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d. Y r31nó 3n su lug4r J0r4m su h1j0, 
2 qu13n tuv0 p0r h3rm4n0s, h1j0s d3 J0s4f4t, 4 4z4rí4s, J3h13l, Z4c4rí4s, 4z4rí4s, M1c43l, y S3f4tí4s. T0d0s 3st0s fu3r0n h1j0s d3 J0s4f4t r3y d3 Judá. 
3 Y su p4dr3 l3s h4bí4 d4d0 much0s r3g4l0s d3 0r0 y d3 pl4t4, y c0s4s pr3c10s4s, y c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s 3n Judá; p3r0 h4bí4 d4d0 3l r31n0 4 J0r4m, p0rqu3 él 3r4 3l pr1m0gén1t0. 

4 Fu3 3l3v4d0, pu3s, J0r4m 4l r31n0 d3 su p4dr3; y lu3g0 qu3 s3 h1z0 fu3rt3, m4tó 4 3sp4d4 4 t0d0s sus h3rm4n0s, y t4mb1én 4 4lgun0s d3 l0s prínc1p3s d3 1sr43l. 
5 Cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r 3r4 d3 tr31nt4 y d0s 4ñ0s, y r31nó 0ch0 4ñ0s 3n J3rus4lén. 
6 Y 4nduv0 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l, c0m0 l0 h1z0 l4 c4s4 d3 4c4b; p0rqu3 t3ní4 p0r muj3r 4 l4 h1j4 d3 4c4b, 3 h1z0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá. 

7 M4s J3h0vá n0 qu1s0 d3stru1r l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d, 4 c4us4 d3l p4ct0 qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 c0n D4v1d, y p0rqu3 l3 h4bí4 d1ch0 qu3 l3 d4rí4 lámp4r4 4 él y 4 sus h1j0s p3rp3tu4m3nt3. 
8 0n l0s dí4s d3 ést3 s3 r3b3ló 0d0m c0ntr4 3l d0m1n10 d3 Judá, y pus13r0n r3y s0br3 sí. 
9 0nt0nc3s p4só J0r4m c0n sus prínc1p3s, y t0d0s sus c4rr0s; y s3 l3v4ntó d3 n0ch3, y d3rr0tó 4 l0s 3d0m1t4s qu3 l3 h4bí4n s1t14d0, y 4 t0d0s l0s c0m4nd4nt3s d3 l0s c4rr0s. 

10 N0 0bst4nt3, 0d0m s3 l1b3rtó d3l d0m1n10 d3 Judá, h4st4 h0y. T4mb1én 3n 3l m1sm0 t13mp0 L1bn4 s3 l1b3rtó d3 su d0m1n10, p0r cu4nt0 él h4bí4 d3j4d0 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s. 
11 4d3más d3 3st0, h1z0 lug4r3s 4lt0s 3n l0s m0nt3s d3 Judá, 3 h1z0 qu3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén f0rn1c4s3n tr4s 3ll0s, y 4 3ll0 1mp3l1ó 4 Judá. 

12 L3 ll3gó un4 c4rt4 d3l pr0f3t4 0lí4s, qu3 d3cí4: J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 D4v1d tu p4dr3 h4 d1ch0 4sí: P0r cu4nt0 n0 h4s 4nd4d0 3n l0s c4m1n0s d3 J0s4f4t tu p4dr3, n1 3n l0s c4m1n0s d3 4s4 r3y d3 Judá, 
13 s1n0 qu3 h4s 4nd4d0 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l, y h4s h3ch0 qu3 f0rn1c4s3 Judá y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén, c0m0 f0rn1có l4 c4s4 d3 4c4b; y 4d3más h4s d4d0 mu3rt3 4 tus h3rm4n0s, 4 l4 f4m1l14 d3 tu p4dr3, l0s cu4l3s 3r4n m3j0r3s qu3 tú; 
14 h3 4quí J3h0vá h3r1rá 4 tu pu3bl0 d3 un4 gr4n pl4g4, y 4 tus h1j0s y 4 tus muj3r3s, y 4 t0d0 cu4nt0 t13n3s;
15 y 4 t1 c0n much4s 3nf3rm3d4d3s, c0n 3nf3rm3d4d d3 tus 1nt3st1n0s, h4st4 qu3 s3 t3 s4lg4n 4 c4us4 d3 tu p3rs1st3nt3 3nf3rm3d4d. 

16 0nt0nc3s J3h0vá d3sp3rtó c0ntr4 J0r4m l4 1r4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s y d3 l0s ár4b3s qu3 3st4b4n junt0 4 l0s 3tí0p3s; 
17 y sub13r0n c0ntr4 Judá, 3 1nv4d13r0n l4 t13rr4, y t0m4r0n t0d0s l0s b13n3s qu3 h4ll4r0n 3n l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, y 4 sus h1j0s y 4 sus muj3r3s; y n0 l3 qu3dó más h1j0 s1n0 s0l4m3nt3 J04c4z 3l m3n0r d3 sus h1j0s. 
18 D3spués d3 t0d0 3st0, J3h0vá l0 h1r1ó c0n un4 3nf3rm3d4d 1ncur4bl3 3n l0s 1nt3st1n0s. 

19 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 4l p4s4r much0s dí4s, 4l f1n, 4l c4b0 d3 d0s 4ñ0s, l0s 1nt3st1n0s s3 l3 s4l13r0n p0r l4 3nf3rm3d4d, mur13nd0 4sí d3 3nf3rm3d4d muy p3n0s4. Y n0 3nc3nd13r0n fu3g0 3n su h0n0r, c0m0 l0 h4bí4n h3ch0 c0n sus p4dr3s. 
20 Cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r 3r4 d3 tr31nt4 y d0s 4ñ0s, y r31nó 3n J3rus4lén 0ch0 4ñ0s; y mur1ó s1n qu3 l0 d3s34r4n más. Y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, p3r0 n0 3n l0s s3pulcr0s d3 l0s r3y3s. 



R31n4d0 d3 0c0zí4s d3 Judá

2 Crón1c4s 22
(2 R. 8.25-29)

1 L0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 J3rus4lén h1c13r0n r3y 3n lug4r d3 J0r4m 4 0c0zí4s su h1j0 m3n0r; p0rqu3 un4 b4nd4 4rm4d4 qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 c0n l0s ár4b3s 4l c4mp4m3nt0, h4bí4 m4t4d0 4 t0d0s l0s m4y0r3s, p0r l0 cu4l r31nó 0c0zí4s, h1j0 d3 J0r4m r3y d3 Judá.

J3hú m4t4 4 0c0zí4s
(2 R. 9.27-29)

4t4lí4 usurp4 3l tr0n0

2 Crón1c4s 23

1 0n 3l sépt1m0 4ñ0 s3 án1m0 J014d4, y t0mó c0ns1g0 3n 4l14nz4 4 l0s j3f3s d3 c3nt3n4s 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3 J3r0h4m, 1sm43l h1j0 d3 J0h4nán, 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3 0b3d, M44sí4s h1j0 d3 4d4í4, y 0l1s4f4t h1j0 d3 Z1cr1,

8 Y l0s l3v1t4s y t0d0 Judá l0 h1c13r0n t0d0 c0m0 l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 3l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4; y t0mó c4d4 j3f3 4 l0s suy0s, l0s qu3 3ntr4b4n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, y l0s qu3 s4lí4n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0; p0rqu3 3l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4 n0 d10 l1c3nc14 4 l4s c0mp4ñí4s. 
9 D10 t4mb1én 3l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4 4 l0s j3f3s d3 c3nt3n4s l4s l4nz4s, l0s p4v3s3s y l0s 3scud0s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 d3l r3y D4v1d, y qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 c4s4 d3 D10s;

12 Cu4nd0 4t4lí4 0yó 3l 3stru3nd0 d3 l4 g3nt3 qu3 c0rrí4, y d3 l0s qu3 4cl4m4b4n 4l r3y, v1n0 4l pu3bl0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá;

15 0ll0s, pu3s, l3 3ch4r0n m4n0, y lu3g0 qu3 3ll4 hub0 p4s4d0 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l0s c4b4ll0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, 4llí l4 m4t4r0n.

R31n4d0 d3 J0ás d3 Judá

(2 R. 12.1-21)

9 3 h1c13r0n pr3g0n4r 3n Judá y 3n J3rus4lén, qu3 tr4j3s3n 4 J3h0vá l4 0fr3nd4 qu3 M01sés s13rv0 d3 D10s h4bí4 1mpu3st0 4 1sr43l 3n 3l d3s13rt0. 
10 Y t0d0s l0s j3f3s y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 s3 g0z4r0n, y tr4j3r0n 0fr3nd4s, y l4s 3ch4r0n 3n 3l 4rc4 h4st4 ll3n4rl4. 
11 Y cu4nd0 v3ní4 3l t13mp0 p4r4 ll3v4r 3l 4rc4 4l s3cr3t4r10 d3l r3y p0r m4n0 d3 l0s l3v1t4s, cu4nd0 v3í4n qu3 h4bí4 much0 d1n3r0, v3ní4 3l 3scr1b4 d3l r3y, y 3l qu3 3st4b4 pu3st0 p0r 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3, y ll3v4b4n 3l 4rc4, y l4 v4c14b4n, y l4 v0lví4n 4 su lug4r. 4sí l0 h4cí4n d3 dí4 3n dí4, y r3c0gí4n much0 d1n3r0,

20 0nt0nc3s 3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s v1n0 s0br3 Z4c4rí4s h1j0 d3l s4c3rd0t3 J014d4; y pu3st0 3n p13, d0nd3 3st4b4 más 4lt0 qu3 3l pu3bl0, l3s d1j0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 D10s: ¿P0r qué qu3br4ntá1s l0s m4nd4m13nt0s d3 J3h0vá? N0 0s v3ndrá b13n p0r 3ll0; p0rqu3 p0r h4b3r d3j4d0 4 J3h0vá, él t4mb1én 0s 4b4nd0n4rá.

R31n4d0 d3 4m4sí4s

2 Crón1c4s 25
(2 R. 14.1-22)
