2 H1z0 él l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, 4unqu3 n0 d3 p3rf3ct0 c0r4zón. 
3 Y lu3g0 qu3 fu3 c0nf1rm4d0 3n 3l r31n0, m4tó 4 l0s s13rv0s qu3 h4bí4n m4t4d0 4l r3y su p4dr3. 

4 P3r0 n0 m4tó 4 l0s h1j0s d3 3ll0s, s3gún l0 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0 3n l4 l3y, 3n 3l l1br0 d3 M01sés, d0nd3 J3h0vá m4ndó d1c13nd0: N0 m0r1rán l0s p4dr3s p0r l0s h1j0s, n1 l0s h1j0s p0r l0s p4dr3s; m4s c4d4 un0 m0r1rá p0r su p3c4d0. 
5 R3un1ó lu3g0 4m4sí4s 4 Judá, y c0n 4rr3gl0 4 l4s f4m1l14s l3s pus0 j3f3s d3 m1ll4r3s y d3 c3nt3n4s s0br3 t0d0 Judá y B3nj4mín. D3spués pus0 3n l1st4 4 t0d0s l0s d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, y fu3r0n h4ll4d0s tr3sc13nt0s m1l 3sc0g1d0s p4r4 s4l1r 4 l4 gu3rr4, qu3 t3ní4n l4nz4 y 3scud0. 
6 Y d3 1sr43l t0mó 4 su3ld0 p0r c13n t4l3nt0s d3 pl4t4, 4 c13n m1l h0mbr3s v4l13nt3s. 

7 M4s un v4rón d3 D10s v1n0 4 él y l3 d1j0: R3y, n0 v4y4 c0nt1g0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 1sr43l; p0rqu3 J3h0vá n0 3stá c0n 1sr43l, n1 c0n t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín. 
8 P3r0 s1 v4s 4sí, s1 l0 h4c3s, y t3 3sfu3rz4s p4r4 p3l34r, D10s t3 h4rá c43r d3l4nt3 d3 l0s 3n3m1g0s; p0rqu3 3n D10s 3stá 3l p0d3r, 0 p4r4 4yud4r, 0 p4r4 d3rr1b4r. 
9 Y 4m4sí4s d1j0 4l v4rón d3 D10s: ¿Qué, pu3s, s3 h4rá d3 l0s c13n t4l3nt0s qu3 h3 d4d0 4l 3jérc1t0 d3 1sr43l? Y 3l v4rón d3 D10s r3sp0nd1ó: J3h0vá pu3d3 d4rt3 much0 más qu3 3st0. 

10 0nt0nc3s 4m4sí4s 4p4rtó 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l4 g3nt3 qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 4 él d3 0fr4ín, p4r4 qu3 s3 fu3s3n 4 sus c4s4s; y 3ll0s s3 3n0j4r0n gr4nd3m3nt3 c0ntr4 Judá, y v0lv13r0n 4 sus c4s4s 3nc0l3r1z4d0s. 
11 0sf0rzánd0s3 3nt0nc3s 4m4sí4s, s4có 4 su pu3bl0, y v1n0 4l V4ll3 d3 l4 S4l, y m4tó d3 l0s h1j0s d3 S31r d13z m1l. 
12 Y l0s h1j0s d3 Judá t0m4r0n v1v0s 4 0tr0s d13z m1l, l0s cu4l3s ll3v4r0n 4 l4 cumbr3 d3 un p3ñ4sc0, y d3 4llí l0s d3sp3ñ4r0n, y t0d0s s3 h1c13r0n p3d4z0s. 

13 M4s l0s d3l 3jérc1t0 qu3 4m4sí4s h4bí4 d3sp3d1d0, p4r4 qu3 n0 fu3s3n c0n él 4 l4 gu3rr4, 1nv4d13r0n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, d3sd3 S4m4r14 h4st4 B3t-h0rón, y m4t4r0n 4 tr3s m1l d3 3ll0s, y t0m4r0n gr4n d3sp0j0. 
14 V0lv13nd0 lu3g0 4m4sí4s d3 l4 m4t4nz4 d3 l0s 3d0m1t4s, tr4j0 t4mb1én c0ns1g0 l0s d10s3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 S31r, y l0s pus0 4nt3 sí p0r d10s3s, y l0s 4d0ró, y l3s qu3mó 1nc13ns0. 

15 P0r 3st0 s3 3nc3nd1ó l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 4m4sí4s, y 3nv1ó 4 él un pr0f3t4, qu3 l3 d1j0: ¿P0r qué h4s busc4d0 l0s d10s3s d3 0tr4 n4c1ón, qu3 n0 l1br4r0n 4 su pu3bl0 d3 tus m4n0s? 
16 Y h4blánd0l3 3l pr0f3t4 3st4s c0s4s, él l3 r3sp0nd1ó: ¿T3 h4n pu3st0 4 t1 p0r c0ns3j3r0 d3l r3y? Déj4t3 d3 3s0. ¿P0r qué qu13r3s qu3 t3 m4t3n? Y cu4nd0 t3rm1nó d3 h4bl4r, 3l pr0f3t4 d1j0 lu3g0: Y0 sé qu3 D10s h4 d3cr3t4d0 d3stru1rt3, p0rqu3 h4s h3ch0 3st0, y n0 0b3d3c1st3 m1 c0ns3j0. 

17 Y 4m4sí4s r3y d3 Judá, d3spués d3 t0m4r c0ns3j0, 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 J0ás h1j0 d3 J04c4z, h1j0 d3 J3hú, r3y d3 1sr43l: V3n, y v3ám0n0s c4r4 4 c4r4. 
18 0nt0nc3s J0ás r3y d3 1sr43l 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 4m4sí4s r3y d3 Judá: 0l c4rd0 qu3 3st4b4 3n 3l Líb4n0 3nv1ó 4l c3dr0 qu3 3st4b4 3n 3l Líb4n0, d1c13nd0: D4 tu h1j4 4 m1 h1j0 p0r muj3r. Y h3 4quí qu3 l4s f13r4s qu3 3st4b4n 3n 3l Líb4n0 p4s4r0n, y h0ll4r0n 3l c4rd0. 

19 Tú d1c3s: H3 4quí h3 d3rr0t4d0 4 0d0m; y tu c0r4zón s3 3n4lt3c3 p4r4 gl0r14rt3. Quéd4t3 4h0r4 3n tu c4s4. ¿P4r4 qué pr0v0c4s un m4l 3n qu3 pu3d4s c43r tú y Judá c0nt1g0? 
20 M4s 4m4sí4s n0 qu1s0 0ír; p0rqu3 3r4 l4 v0lunt4d d3 D10s, qu3 l0s qu3rí4 3ntr3g4r 3n m4n0s d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, p0r cu4nt0 h4bí4n busc4d0 l0s d10s3s d3 0d0m. 

21 Sub1ó, pu3s, J0ás r3y d3 1sr43l, y s3 v13r0n c4r4 4 c4r4 él y 4m4sí4s r3y d3 Judá 3n l4 b4t4ll4 d3 B3t-s3m3s, l4 cu4l 3s d3 Judá. 
22 P3r0 c4yó Judá d3l4nt3 d3 1sr43l, y huyó c4d4 un0 4 su c4s4. 
23 Y J0ás r3y d3 1sr43l 4pr3só 3n B3t-s3m3s 4 4m4sí4s r3y d3 Judá, h1j0 d3 J0ás, h1j0 d3 J04c4z, y l0 ll3vó 4 J3rus4lén; y d3rr1bó 3l mur0 d3 J3rus4lén d3sd3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 0fr4ín h4st4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l ángul0, un tr4m0 d3 cu4tr0c13nt0s c0d0s. 
24 4s1m1sm0 t0mó t0d0 3l 0r0 y l4 pl4t4, y t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s qu3 s3 h4ll4r0n 3n l4 c4s4 d3 D10s 3n c4s4 d3 0b3d-3d0m, y l0s t3s0r0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, y l0s h1j0s d3 l0s n0bl3s; d3spués v0lv1ó 4 S4m4r14. 

25 Y v1v1ó 4m4sí4s h1j0 d3 J0ás, r3y d3 Judá, qu1nc3 4ñ0s d3spués d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 J0ás h1j0 d3 J04c4z, r3y d3 1sr43l. 
26 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 4m4sí4s, pr1m3r0s y p0str3r0s, ¿n0 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá y d3 1sr43l? 

27 D3sd3 3l t13mp0 3n qu3 4m4sí4s s3 4p4rtó d3 J3h0vá, 3mp3z4r0n 4 c0nsp1r4r c0ntr4 él 3n J3rus4lén; y h4b13nd0 él hu1d0 4 L4qu1s, 3nv14r0n tr4s él 4 L4qu1s, y 4llá l0 m4t4r0n; 
28 y l0 tr4j3r0n 3n c4b4ll0s, y l0 s3pult4r0n c0n sus p4dr3s 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 Judá. 



R31n4d0 d3 Uzí4s

2 Crón1c4s 26
(2 R. 15.1-7)

1 0nt0nc3s t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 Judá t0mó 4 Uzí4s, 3l cu4l t3ní4 d13c1sé1s 4ñ0s d3 3d4d, y l0 pus13r0n p0r r3y 3n lug4r d3 4m4sí4s su p4dr3. 
2 Uzí4s 3d1f1có 4 0l0t, y l4 r3st1tuyó 4 Judá d3spués qu3 3l r3y 4m4sí4s durm1ó c0n sus p4dr3s. 
3 D3 d13c1sé1s 4ñ0s 3r4 Uzí4s cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y c1ncu3nt4 y d0s 4ñ0s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén. 0l n0mbr3 d3 su m4dr3 fu3 J3c0lí4s, d3 J3rus4lén. 

4 0 h1z0 l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 4m4sí4s su p4dr3. 
5 Y p3rs1st1ó 3n busc4r 4 D10s 3n l0s dí4s d3 Z4c4rí4s, 3nt3nd1d0 3n v1s10n3s d3 D10s; y 3n 3st0s dí4s 3n qu3 buscó 4 J3h0vá, él l3 pr0sp3ró. 

6 Y s4l1ó y p3l3ó c0ntr4 l0s f1l1st30s, y r0mp1ó 3l mur0 d3 G4t, y 3l mur0 d3 J4bn14, y 3l mur0 d3 4sd0d; y 3d1f1có c1ud4d3s 3n 4sd0d, y 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s. 
7 D10s l3 d10 4yud4 c0ntr4 l0s f1l1st30s, y c0ntr4 l0s ár4b3s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n Gur-b44l, y c0ntr4 l0s 4m0n1t4s. 
8 Y d13r0n l0s 4m0n1t4s pr3s3nt3s 4 Uzí4s, y s3 d1vulgó su f4m4 h4st4 l4 fr0nt3r4 d3 0g1pt0; p0rqu3 s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 4lt4m3nt3 p0d3r0s0. 

9 0d1f1có t4mb1én Uzí4s t0rr3s 3n J3rus4lén, junt0 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l ángul0, y junt0 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l v4ll3, y junt0 4 l4s 3squ1n4s; y l4s f0rt1f1có. 
10 4s1m1sm0 3d1f1có t0rr3s 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y 4br1ó much4s c1st3rn4s; p0rqu3 tuv0 much0s g4n4d0s, 4sí 3n l4 S3f3l4 c0m0 3n l4s v3g4s, y v1ñ4s y l4br4nz4s, 4sí 3n l0s m0nt3s c0m0 3n l0s ll4n0s fért1l3s; p0rqu3 3r4 4m1g0 d3 l4 4gr1cultur4. 

11 Tuv0 t4mb1én Uzí4s un 3jérc1t0 d3 gu3rr3r0s, l0s cu4l3s s4lí4n 4 l4 gu3rr4 3n d1v1s10n3s, d3 4cu3rd0 c0n l4 l1st4 h3ch4 p0r m4n0 d3 J313l 3scr1b4, y d3 M44sí4s g0b3rn4d0r, y d3 H4n4ní4s, un0 d3 l0s j3f3s d3l r3y. 
12 T0d0 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s j3f3s d3 f4m1l14, v4l13nt3s y 3sf0rz4d0s, 3r4 d0s m1l s31sc13nt0s. 
13 Y b4j0 l4 m4n0 d3 ést0s 3st4b4 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 gu3rr4, d3 tr3sc13nt0s s13t3 m1l qu1n13nt0s gu3rr3r0s p0d3r0s0s y fu3rt3s, p4r4 4yud4r 4l r3y c0ntr4 l0s 3n3m1g0s. 

14 Y Uzí4s pr3p4ró p4r4 t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 3scud0s, l4nz4s, y3lm0s, c0s3l3t3s, 4rc0s, y h0nd4s p4r4 t1r4r p13dr4s. 
15 0 h1z0 3n J3rus4lén máqu1n4s 1nv3nt4d4s p0r 1ng3n13r0s, p4r4 qu3 3stuv13s3n 3n l4s t0rr3s y 3n l0s b4lu4rt3s, p4r4 4rr0j4r s43t4s y gr4nd3s p13dr4s. Y su f4m4 s3 3xt3nd1ó l3j0s, p0rqu3 fu3 4yud4d0 m4r4v1ll0s4m3nt3, h4st4 h4c3rs3 p0d3r0s0. 

16 M4s cu4nd0 y4 3r4 fu3rt3 su c0r4zón s3 3n4lt3c1ó p4r4 su ru1n4; p0rqu3 s3 r3b3ló c0ntr4 J3h0vá su D10s, 3ntr4nd0 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 qu3m4r 1nc13ns0 3n 3l 4lt4r d3l 1nc13ns0. 
17 Y 3ntró tr4s él 3l s4c3rd0t3 4z4rí4s, y c0n él 0ch3nt4 s4c3rd0t3s d3 J3h0vá, v4r0n3s v4l13nt3s. 
18 Y s3 pus13r0n c0ntr4 3l r3y Uzí4s, y l3 d1j3r0n: N0 t3 c0rr3sp0nd3 4 t1, 0h Uzí4s, 3l qu3m4r 1nc13ns0 4 J3h0vá, s1n0 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s h1j0s d3 44rón, qu3 s0n c0ns4gr4d0s p4r4 qu3m4rl0. S4l d3l s4ntu4r10, p0rqu3 h4s pr3v4r1c4d0, y n0 t3 s3rá p4r4 gl0r14 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá D10s. 
19 0nt0nc3s Uzí4s, t3n13nd0 3n l4 m4n0 un 1nc3ns4r10 p4r4 0fr3c3r 1nc13ns0, s3 ll3nó d3 1r4; y 3n su 1r4 c0ntr4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, l4 l3pr4 l3 br0tó 3n l4 fr3nt3, d3l4nt3 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, junt0 4l 4lt4r d3l 1nc13ns0. 

20 Y l3 m1ró 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 4z4rí4s, y t0d0s l0s s4c3rd0t3s, y h3 4quí l4 l3pr4 3st4b4 3n su fr3nt3; y l3 h1c13r0n s4l1r 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3 d3 4qu3l lug4r; y él t4mb1én s3 d10 pr1s4 4 s4l1r, p0rqu3 J3h0vá l0 h4bí4 h3r1d0. 
21 4sí 3l r3y Uzí4s fu3 l3pr0s0 h4st4 3l dí4 d3 su mu3rt3, y h4b1tó l3pr0s0 3n un4 c4s4 4p4rt4d4, p0r l0 cu4l fu3 3xclu1d0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá; y J0t4m su h1j0 tuv0 c4rg0 d3 l4 c4s4 r34l, g0b3rn4nd0 4l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4. 
22 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 Uzí4s, pr1m3r0s y p0str3r0s, fu3r0n 3scr1t0s p0r 3l pr0f3t4 1s4í4s, h1j0 d3 4m0z. 
23 Y durm1ó Uzí4s c0n sus p4dr3s, y l0 s3pult4r0n c0n sus p4dr3s 3n 3l c4mp0 d3 l0s s3pulcr0s r34l3s; p0rqu3 d1j3r0n: L3pr0s0 3s. Y r31nó J0t4m su h1j0 3n lug4r suy0. 



R31n4d0 d3 J0t4m

2 Crón1c4s 27
(2 R. 15.32-38)

1 D3 v31nt1c1nc0 4ñ0s 3r4 J0t4m cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y d13c1sé1s 4ñ0s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén. 0l n0mbr3 d3 su m4dr3 fu3 J3rus4, h1j4 d3 S4d0c. 
2 0 h1z0 l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 Uzí4s su p4dr3, s4lv0 qu3 n0 3ntró 3n 3l s4ntu4r10 d3 J3h0vá. P3r0 3l pu3bl0 c0nt1nu4b4 c0rr0mp1énd0s3. 
3 0d1f1có él l4 pu3rt4 m4y0r d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y s0br3 3l mur0 d3 l4 f0rt4l3z4 3d1f1có much0. 
4 4d3más 3d1f1có c1ud4d3s 3n l4s m0nt4ñ4s d3 Judá, y c0nstruyó f0rt4l3z4s y t0rr3s 3n l0s b0squ3s. 

5 T4mb1én tuv0 él gu3rr4 c0n 3l r3y d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, 4 l0s cu4l3s v3nc1ó; y l3 d13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 4món 3n 4qu3l 4ñ0 c13n t4l3nt0s d3 pl4t4, d13z m1l c0r0s d3 tr1g0, y d13z m1l c0r0s d3 c3b4d4. 0st0 l3 d13r0n l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y l0 m1sm0 3n 3l s3gund0 4ñ0 y 3n 3l t3rc3r0. 

6 4sí qu3 J0t4m s3 h1z0 fu3rt3, p0rqu3 pr3p4ró sus c4m1n0s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá su D10s. 

7 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 J0t4m, y t0d4s sus gu3rr4s, y sus c4m1n0s, h3 4quí 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l y d3 Judá. 
8 Cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r 3r4 d3 v31nt1c1nc0 4ñ0s, y d13c1sé1s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén.
9 Y durm1ó J0t4m c0n sus p4dr3s, y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d; y r31nó 3n su lug4r 4c4z su h1j0. 



R31n4d0 d3 4c4z

2 Crón1c4s 28
(2 R. 16.1-20)

1 D3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 3r4 4c4z cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 4 r31n4r, y d13c1sé1s 4ñ0s r31nó 3n J3rus4lén: m4s n0 h1z0 l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, c0m0 D4v1d su p4dr3. 
2 4nt3s 4nduv0 3n l0s c4m1n0s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l, y 4d3más h1z0 1mág3n3s fund1d4s 4 l0s b44l3s. 
3 Qu3mó t4mb1én 1nc13ns0 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 H1n0m, 3 h1z0 p4s4r 4 sus h1j0s p0r fu3g0, c0nf0rm3 4 l4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s d3 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 4rr0j4d0 d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 
4 4s1m1sm0 s4cr1f1có y qu3mó 1nc13ns0 3n l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s, 3n l0s c0ll4d0s, y d3b4j0 d3 t0d0 árb0l fr0nd0s0. 

5 P0r l0 cu4l J3h0vá su D10s l0 3ntr3gó 3n m4n0s d3l r3y d3 l0s s1r10s, l0s cu4l3s l0 d3rr0t4r0n, y l3 t0m4r0n gr4n núm3r0 d3 pr1s10n3r0s qu3 ll3v4r0n 4 D4m4sc0. Fu3 t4mb1én 3ntr3g4d0 3n m4n0s d3l r3y d3 1sr43l, 3l cu4l l0 b4t1ó c0n gr4n m0rt4nd4d. 
6 P0rqu3 P3k4 h1j0 d3 R3m4lí4s m4tó 3n Judá 3n un dí4 c13nt0 v31nt3 m1l h0mbr3s v4l13nt3s, p0r cu4nt0 h4bí4n d3j4d0 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s. 

7 4s1m1sm0 Z1cr1, h0mbr3 p0d3r0s0 d3 0fr4ín, m4tó 4 M44sí4s h1j0 d3l r3y, 4 4zr1c4m su m4y0rd0m0, y 4 0lc4n4, s3gund0 d3spués d3l r3y. 
8 T4mb1én l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l t0m4r0n c4ut1v0s d3 sus h3rm4n0s 4 d0sc13nt0s m1l, muj3r3s, much4ch0s y much4ch4s, 4d3más d3 h4b3r t0m4d0 d3 3ll0s much0 b0tín qu3 ll3v4r0n 4 S4m4r14. 

9 H4bí4 3nt0nc3s 4llí un pr0f3t4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 0d3d, 3l cu4l s4l1ó d3l4nt3 d3l 3jérc1t0 cu4nd0 3ntr4b4 3n S4m4r14, y l3s d1j0: H3 4quí, J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s, p0r 3l 3n0j0 c0ntr4 Judá, l0s h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n vu3str4s m4n0s; y v0s0tr0s l0s h4bé1s m4t4d0 c0n 1r4 qu3 h4 ll3g4d0 h4st4 3l c13l0. 

10 Y 4h0r4 h4bé1s d3t3rm1n4d0 suj3t4r 4 v0s0tr0s 4 Judá y 4 J3rus4lén c0m0 s13rv0s y s13rv4s; m4s ¿n0 h4bé1s p3c4d0 v0s0tr0s c0ntr4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s? 
11 0ídm3, pu3s, 4h0r4, y d3v0lv3d 4 l0s c4ut1v0s qu3 h4bé1s t0m4d0 d3 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3stá 41r4d0 c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s. 

12 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n 4lgun0s v4r0n3s d3 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0fr4ín, 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3 J0h4nán, B3r3quí4s h1j0 d3 M3s1l3m0t, 0z3quí4s h1j0 d3 S4lum, y 4m4s4 h1j0 d3 H4dl41, c0ntr4 l0s qu3 v3ní4n d3 l4 gu3rr4.  
13 Y l3s d1j3r0n: N0 tr41gá1s 4quí 4 l0s c4ut1v0s, p0rqu3 3l p3c4d0 c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3st4rá s0br3 n0s0tr0s. V0s0tr0s tr4tá1s d3 4ñ4d1r s0br3 nu3str0s p3c4d0s y s0br3 nu3str4s culp4s, s13nd0 muy gr4nd3 nu3str0 d3l1t0, y 3l 4rd0r d3 l4 1r4 c0ntr4 1sr43l. 

14 0nt0nc3s 3l 3jérc1t0 d3jó 4 l0s c4ut1v0s y 3l b0tín d3l4nt3 d3 l0s prínc1p3s y d3 t0d4 l4 mult1tud. 
15 Y s3 l3v4nt4r0n l0s v4r0n3s n0mbr4d0s, y t0m4r0n 4 l0s c4ut1v0s, y d3l d3sp0j0 v1st13r0n 4 l0s qu3 d3 3ll0s 3st4b4n d3snud0s; l0s v1st13r0n, l0s c4lz4r0n, y l3s d13r0n d3 c0m3r y d3 b3b3r, l0s ung13r0n, y c0nduj3r0n 3n 4sn0s 4 t0d0s l0s déb1l3s, y l0s ll3v4r0n h4st4 J3r1có, c1ud4d d3 l4s p4lm3r4s, c3rc4 d3 sus h3rm4n0s; y 3ll0s v0lv13r0n 4 S4m4r14. 

16 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 3nv1ó 4 p3d1r 3l r3y 4c4z 4 l0s r3y3s d3 4s1r14 qu3 l3 4yud4s3n. 
17 P0rqu3 t4mb1én l0s 3d0m1t4s h4bí4n v3n1d0 y 4t4c4d0 4 l0s d3 Judá, y h4bí4n ll3v4d0 c4ut1v0s. 
18 4s1m1sm0 l0s f1l1st30s s3 h4bí4n 3xt3nd1d0 p0r l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 S3f3l4 y d3l N3gu3v d3 Judá, y h4bí4n t0m4d0 B3t-s3m3s, 4j4lón, G3d3r0t, S0c0 c0n sus 4ld34s, T1mn4 t4mb1én c0n sus 4ld34s, y G1mz0 c0n sus 4ld34s; y h4b1t4b4n 3n 3ll4s. 
19 P0rqu3 J3h0vá h4bí4 hum1ll4d0 4 Judá p0r c4us4 d3 4c4z r3y d3 1sr43l, p0r cu4nt0 él h4bí4 4ctu4d0 d3s3nfr3n4d4m3nt3 3n Judá, y h4bí4 pr3v4r1c4d0 gr4v3m3nt3 c0ntr4 J3h0vá. 

20 T4mb1én v1n0 c0ntr4 él T1gl4t-p1l3s3r r3y d3 l0s 4s1r10s, qu13n l0 r3duj0 4 3str3ch3z, y n0 l0 f0rt4l3c1ó. 
21 N0 0bst4nt3 qu3 d3sp0jó 4c4z l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l4 c4s4 r34l, y l4s d3 l0s prínc1p3s, p4r4 d4r 4l r3y d3 l0s 4s1r10s, ést3 n0 l3 4yudó. 

22 4d3más 3l r3y 4c4z 3n 3l t13mp0 qu3 4qu3l l3 4pur4b4, 4ñ4d1ó m4y0r p3c4d0 c0ntr4 J3h0vá; 
23 p0rqu3 0fr3c1ó s4cr1f1c10s 4 l0s d10s3s d3 D4m4sc0 qu3 l3 h4bí4n d3rr0t4d0, y d1j0: Pu3s qu3 l0s d10s3s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 S1r14 l3s 4yud4n, y0 t4mb1én 0fr3c3ré s4cr1f1c10s 4 3ll0s p4r4 qu3 m3 4yud3n; b13n qu3 fu3r0n ést0s su ru1n4, y l4 d3 t0d0 1sr43l. 
24 4d3más d3 3s0 r3c0g1ó 4c4z l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, y l0s qu3bró, y c3rró l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y s3 h1z0 4lt4r3s 3n J3rus4lén 3n t0d0s l0s r1nc0n3s. 

25 H1z0 t4mb1én lug4r3s 4lt0s 3n t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, p4r4 qu3m4r 1nc13ns0 4 l0s d10s3s 4j3n0s, pr0v0c4nd0 4sí 4 1r4 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s.

R31n4d0 d3 0z3quí4s

2 Crón1c4s 29
(2 R. 18.1-3)

1 C0m3nzó 4 r31n4r 0z3quí4s s13nd0 d3 v31nt1c1nc0 4ñ0s, y r31nó v31nt1nu3v3 4ñ0s 3n J3rus4lén. 0l n0mbr3 d3 su m4dr3 fu3 4bí4s, h1j4 d3 Z4c4rí4s. 
2 0 h1z0 l0 r3ct0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 D4v1d su p4dr3.



0z3quí4s r3st4bl3c3 3l cult0 d3l t3mpl0 

3 0n 3l pr1m3r 4ñ0 d3 su r31n4d0, 3n 3l m3s pr1m3r0, 4br1ó l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l4s r3p4ró.

5 Y l3s d1j0: ¡0ídm3, l3v1t4s! S4nt1f1c40s 4h0r4, y s4nt1f1c4d l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s, y s4c4d d3l s4ntu4r10 l4 1nmund1c14. 

6 P0rqu3 nu3str0s p4dr3s s3 h4n r3b3l4d0, y h4n h3ch0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s; p0rqu3 l3 d3j4r0n, y 4p4rt4r0n sus r0str0s d3l t4b3rnácul0 d3 J3h0vá, y l3 v0lv13r0n l4s 3sp4ld4s. 
7 Y 4un c3rr4r0n l4s pu3rt4s d3l pórt1c0, y 4p4g4r0n l4s lámp4r4s; n0 qu3m4r0n 1nc13ns0, n1 s4cr1f1c4r0n h0l0c4ust0 3n 3l s4ntu4r10 4l D10s d3 1sr43l. 
8 P0r t4nt0, l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá h4 v3n1d0 s0br3 Judá y J3rus4lén, y l0s h4 3ntr3g4d0 4 turb4c1ón, 4 3x3cr4c1ón y 4 3sc4rn10, c0m0 v31s v0s0tr0s c0n vu3str0s 0j0s. 

9 Y h3 4quí nu3str0s p4dr3s h4n c4íd0 4 3sp4d4, y nu3str0s h1j0s, nu3str4s h1j4s y nu3str4s muj3r3s fu3r0n ll3v4d0s c4ut1v0s p0r 3st0. 
10 4h0r4, pu3s, y0 h3 d3t3rm1n4d0 h4c3r p4ct0 c0n J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 4p4rt3 d3 n0s0tr0s 3l 4rd0r d3 su 1r4. 

11 H1j0s mí0s, n0 0s 3ng4ñé1s 4h0r4, p0rqu3 J3h0vá 0s h4 3sc0g1d0 4 v0s0tr0s p4r4 qu3 3sté1s d3l4nt3 d3 él y l3 s1rvá1s, y s3á1s sus m1n1str0s, y l3 qu3mé1s 1nc13ns0. 
12 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n l0s l3v1t4s M4h4t h1j0 d3 4m4s41 y J03l h1j0 d3 4z4rí4s, d3 l0s h1j0s d3 C04t; d3 l0s h1j0s d3 M3r4r1, C1s h1j0 d3 4bd1 y 4z4rí4s h1j0 d3 J3h4l3l3l; d3 l0s h1j0s d3 G3rsón, J04 h1j0 d3 Z1m4 y 0dén h1j0 d3 J04;
13 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 0l1z4fán, S1mr1 y J313l; d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4s4f, Z4c4rí4s y M4t4ní4s; 
14 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 H3mán, J3h13l y S1m31; y d3 l0s h1j0s d3 J3dutún, S3m4í4s y Uz13l. 

15 0st0s r3un13r0n 4 sus h3rm4n0s, y s3 s4nt1f1c4r0n, y 3ntr4r0n, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y y l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 l1mp14r l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 
16 Y 3ntr4nd0 l0s s4c3rd0t3s d3ntr0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 l1mp14rl4, s4c4r0n t0d4 l4 1nmund1c14 qu3 h4ll4r0n 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá, 4l 4tr10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá; y d3 4llí l0s l3v1t4s l4 ll3v4r0n fu3r4 4l t0rr3nt3 d3 C3drón. 
17 C0m3nz4r0n 4 s4nt1f1c4rs3 3l dí4 pr1m3r0 d3l m3s pr1m3r0, y 4 l0s 0ch0
d3l m1sm0 m3s v1n13r0n 4l pórt1c0 d3 J3h0vá; y s4nt1f1c4r0n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá 3n 0ch0 dí4s, y 3n 3l dí4 d13c1sé1s d3l m3s pr1m3r0 t3rm1n4r0n. 

18 0nt0nc3s v1n13r0n 4l r3y 0z3quí4s y l3 d1j3r0n: Y4 h3m0s l1mp14d0 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, 3l 4lt4r d3l h0l0c4ust0, y t0d0s sus 1nstrum3nt0s, y l4 m3s4 d3 l4 pr0p0s1c1ón c0n t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s. 
19 4s1m1sm0 h3m0s pr3p4r4d0 y s4nt1f1c4d0 t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s qu3 3n su 1nf1d3l1d4d h4bí4 d3s3ch4d0 3l r3y 4c4z, cu4nd0 r31n4b4; y h3 4quí 3stán d3l4nt3 d3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá. 
20 Y l3v4ntánd0s3 d3 m4ñ4n4, 3l r3y 0z3quí4s r3un1ó l0s pr1nc1p4l3s d3 l4 c1ud4d, y sub1ó 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 

21 Y pr3s3nt4r0n s13t3 n0v1ll0s, s13t3 c4rn3r0s, s13t3 c0rd3r0s y s13t3 m4ch0s c4brí0s p4r4 3xp14c1ón p0r 3l r31n0, p0r 3l s4ntu4r10 y p0r Judá. Y d1j0 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s h1j0s d3 44rón qu3 l0s 0fr3c13s3n s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá. 
22 M4t4r0n, pu3s, l0s n0v1ll0s, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s r3c1b13r0n l4 s4ngr3, y l4 3sp4rc13r0n s0br3 3l 4lt4r; m4t4r0n lu3g0 l0s c4rn3r0s, y 3sp4rc13r0n l4 s4ngr3 s0br3 3l 4lt4r; 4s1m1sm0 m4t4r0n l0s c0rd3r0s, y 3sp4rc13r0n l4 s4ngr3 s0br3 3l 4lt4r. 

23 D3spués h1c13r0n 4c3rc4r d3l4nt3 d3l r3y y d3 l4 mult1tud l0s m4ch0s c4brí0s p4r4 l4 3xp14c1ón, y pus13r0n s0br3 3ll0s sus m4n0s; 
24 y l0s s4c3rd0t3s l0s m4t4r0n, 3 h1c13r0n 0fr3nd4 d3 3xp14c1ón c0n l4 s4ngr3 d3 3ll0s s0br3 3l 4lt4r, p4r4 r3c0nc1l14r 4 t0d0 1sr43l; p0rqu3 p0r t0d0 1sr43l m4ndó 3l r3y h4c3r 3l h0l0c4ust0 y l4 3xp14c1ón. 
25 Pus0 t4mb1én l3v1t4s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá c0n címb4l0s, s4lt3r10s y 4rp4s, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4m13nt0 d3 D4v1d, d3 G4d v1d3nt3 d3l r3y, y d3l pr0f3t4 N4tán, p0rqu3 4qu3l m4nd4m13nt0 pr0c3dí4 d3 J3h0vá p0r m3d10 d3 sus pr0f3t4s. 
26 Y l0s l3v1t4s 3st4b4n c0n l0s 1nstrum3nt0s d3 D4v1d, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s c0n tr0mp3t4s. 

27 0nt0nc3s m4ndó 0z3quí4s s4cr1f1c4r 3l h0l0c4ust0 3n 3l 4lt4r; y cu4nd0 c0m3nzó 3l h0l0c4ust0, c0m3nzó t4mb1én 3l cánt1c0 d3 J3h0vá, c0n l4s tr0mp3t4s y l0s 1nstrum3nt0s d3 D4v1d r3y d3 1sr43l. 
28 Y t0d4 l4 mult1tud 4d0r4b4, y l0s c4nt0r3s c4nt4b4n, y l0s tr0mp3t3r0s s0n4b4n l4s tr0mp3t4s; t0d0 3st0 duró h4st4 c0nsum1rs3 3l h0l0c4ust0. 
29 Y cu4nd0 4c4b4r0n d3 0fr3c3r, s3 1ncl1nó 3l r3y, y t0d0s l0s qu3 c0n él 3st4b4n, y 4d0r4r0n. 

30 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y 0z3quí4s y l0s prínc1p3s d1j3r0n 4 l0s l3v1t4s qu3 4l4b4s3n 4 J3h0vá c0n l4s p4l4br4s d3 D4v1d y d3 4s4f v1d3nt3; y 3ll0s 4l4b4r0n c0n gr4n 4l3grí4, y s3 1ncl1n4r0n y 4d0r4r0n. 
31 Y r3sp0nd13nd0 0z3quí4s, d1j0: V0s0tr0s 0s h4bé1s c0ns4gr4d0 4h0r4 4 J3h0vá; 4c3rc40s, pu3s, y pr3s3nt4d s4cr1f1c10s y 4l4b4nz4s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. Y l4 mult1tud pr3s3ntó s4cr1f1c10s y 4l4b4nz4s; y t0d0s l0s g3n3r0s0s d3 c0r4zón tr4j3r0n h0l0c4ust0s. 

32 Y fu3 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s h0l0c4ust0s qu3 tr4j0 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón, s3t3nt4 bu3y3s, c13n c4rn3r0s y d0sc13nt0s c0rd3r0s, t0d0 p4r4 3l h0l0c4ust0 d3 J3h0vá. 
33 Y l4s 0fr3nd4s fu3r0n s31sc13nt0s bu3y3s y tr3s m1l 0v3j4s. 
34 M4s l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3r4n p0c0s, y n0 b4st4b4n p4r4 d3s0ll4r l0s h0l0c4ust0s; y 4sí sus h3rm4n0s l0s l3v1t4s l3s 4yud4r0n h4st4 qu3 4c4b4r0n l4 0br4, y h4st4 qu3 l0s d3más s4c3rd0t3s s3 s4nt1f1c4r0n; p0rqu3 l0s l3v1t4s fu3r0n más r3ct0s d3 c0r4zón p4r4 s4nt1f1c4rs3 qu3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s. 

35 4sí, pu3s, hub0 4bund4nc14 d3 h0l0c4ust0s, c0n gr0sur4 d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z, y l1b4c10n3s p4r4 c4d4 h0l0c4ust0. Y qu3dó r3st4bl3c1d0 3l s3rv1c10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 
36  Y s3 4l3gró 0z3quí4s c0n t0d0 3l pu3bl0, d3 qu3 D10s hub13s3 pr3p4r4d0 3l pu3bl0; p0rqu3 l4 c0s4 fu3 h3ch4 ráp1d4m3nt3. 



0z3quí4s c3l3br4 l4 p4scu4

2 Crón1c4s 30

1 0nv1ó d3spués 0z3quí4s p0r t0d0 1sr43l y Judá, y 3scr1b1ó c4rt4s 4 0fr4ín y 4 M4n4sés, p4r4 qu3 v1n13s3n 4 J3rus4lén 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 c3l3br4r l4 p4scu4 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 
2 Y 3l r3y h4bí4 t0m4d0 c0ns3j0 c0n sus prínc1p3s, y c0n t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón 3n J3rus4lén, p4r4 c3l3br4r l4 p4scu4 3n 3l m3s s3gund0; 
3 p0rqu3 3nt0nc3s n0 l4 p0dí4n c3l3br4r, p0r cu4nt0 n0 h4bí4 suf1c13nt3s s4c3rd0t3s s4nt1f1c4d0s, n1 3l pu3bl0 s3 h4bí4 r3un1d0 3n J3rus4lén. 

4 0st0 4gr4dó 4l r3y y 4 t0d4 l4 mult1tud. 
5 Y d3t3rm1n4r0n h4c3r p4s4r pr3gón p0r t0d0 1sr43l, d3sd3 B33rs3b4 h4st4 D4n, p4r4 qu3 v1n13s3n 4 c3l3br4r l4 p4scu4 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, 3n J3rus4lén; p0rqu3 3n much0 t13mp0 n0 l4 h4bí4n c3l3br4d0 4l m0d0 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0. 

6 Fu3r0n, pu3s, c0rr30s c0n c4rt4s d3 m4n0 d3l r3y y d3 sus prínc1p3s p0r t0d0 1sr43l y Judá, c0m0 3l r3y l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0, y d3cí4n: H1j0s d3 1sr43l, v0lv30s 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 4br4h4m, d3 1s44c y d3 1sr43l, y él s3 v0lv3rá 4l r3m4n3nt3 qu3 h4 qu3d4d0 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 4s1r14. 
7 N0 s3á1s c0m0 vu3str0s p4dr3s y c0m0 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, qu3 s3 r3b3l4r0n c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s, y él l0s 3ntr3gó 4 d3s0l4c1ón, c0m0 v0s0tr0s v31s. 
8 N0 3ndur3zcá1s, pu3s, 4h0r4 vu3str4 c3rv1z c0m0 vu3str0s p4dr3s; s0m3t30s 4 J3h0vá, y v3n1d 4 su s4ntu4r10, 3l cu4l él h4 s4nt1f1c4d0 p4r4 s13mpr3; y s3rv1d 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y 3l 4rd0r d3 su 1r4 s3 4p4rt4rá d3 v0s0tr0s. 

9 P0rqu3 s1 0s v0lv13r31s 4 J3h0vá, vu3str0s h3rm4n0s y vu3str0s h1j0s h4ll4rán m1s3r1c0rd14 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s qu3 l0s t13n3n c4ut1v0s, y v0lv3rán 4 3st4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s 3s cl3m3nt3 y m1s3r1c0rd10s0, y n0 4p4rt4rá d3 v0s0tr0s su r0str0, s1 v0s0tr0s 0s v0lv13r31s 4 él. 

10 P4s4r0n, pu3s, l0s c0rr30s d3 c1ud4d 3n c1ud4d p0r l4 t13rr4 d3 0fr4ín y M4n4sés, h4st4 Z4bulón; m4s s3 r3í4n y burl4b4n d3 3ll0s. 
11 C0n t0d0 3s0, 4lgun0s h0mbr3s d3 4s3r, d3 M4n4sés y d3 Z4bulón s3 hum1ll4r0n y v1n13r0n 4 J3rus4lén. 
12 0n Judá t4mb1én 3stuv0 l4 m4n0 d3 D10s p4r4 d4rl3s un s0l0 c0r4zón p4r4 cumpl1r 3l m3ns4j3 d3l r3y y d3 l0s prínc1p3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 
13 Y s3 r3un1ó 3n J3rus4lén much4 g3nt3 p4r4 c3l3br4r l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 d3 l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4 3n 3l m3s s3gund0, un4 v4st4 r3un1ón. 

14 Y l3v4ntánd0s3, qu1t4r0n l0s 4lt4r3s qu3 h4bí4 3n J3rus4lén; qu1t4r0n t4mb1én t0d0s l0s 4lt4r3s d3 1nc13ns0, y l0s 3ch4r0n 4l t0rr3nt3 d3 C3drón. 
15 0nt0nc3s s4cr1f1c4r0n l4 p4scu4, 4 l0s c4t0rc3 dí4s d3l m3s s3gund0; y l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s l3v1t4s ll3n0s d3 v3rgü3nz4 s3 s4nt1f1c4r0n, y tr4j3r0n l0s h0l0c4ust0s 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 
16 Y t0m4r0n su lug4r 3n l0s turn0s d3 c0stumbr3, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y d3 M01sés v4rón d3 D10s; y l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3sp4rcí4n l4 s4ngr3 qu3 r3c1bí4n d3 m4n0s d3 l0s l3v1t4s. 

17 P0rqu3 h4bí4 much0s 3n l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón qu3 n0 3st4b4n s4nt1f1c4d0s, y p0r 3s0 l0s l3v1t4s s4cr1f1c4b4n l4 p4scu4 p0r t0d0s l0s qu3 n0 s3 h4bí4n pur1f1c4d0, p4r4 s4nt1f1c4rl0s 4 J3h0vá. 
18 P0rqu3 un4 gr4n mult1tud d3l pu3bl0 d3 0fr4ín y M4n4sés, y d3 1s4c4r y Z4bulón, n0 s3 h4bí4n pur1f1c4d0, y c0m13r0n l4 p4scu4 n0 c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0. M4s 0z3quí4s 0ró p0r 3ll0s, d1c13nd0: J3h0vá, qu3 3s bu3n0, s34 pr0p1c10 4 t0d0 4qu3l qu3 h4 pr3p4r4d0 su c0r4zón p4r4 busc4r 4 D10s, 
19 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s, 4unqu3 n0 3sté pur1f1c4d0 s3gún l0s r1t0s d3 pur1f1c4c1ón d3l s4ntu4r10. 

20 Y 0yó J3h0vá 4 0z3quí4s, y s4nó 4l pu3bl0. 

21 4sí l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 3st4b4n 3n J3rus4lén c3l3br4r0n l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 d3 l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4 p0r s13t3 dí4s c0n gr4nd3 g0z0; y gl0r1f1c4b4n 4 J3h0vá t0d0s l0s dí4s l0s l3v1t4s y l0s s4c3rd0t3s, c4nt4nd0 c0n 1nstrum3nt0s r3s0n4nt3s 4 J3h0vá. 
22 Y h4bló 0z3quí4s 4l c0r4zón d3 t0d0s l0s l3v1t4s qu3 t3ní4n bu3n4 1nt3l1g3nc14 3n 3l s3rv1c10 d3 J3h0vá. Y c0m13r0n d3 l0 s4cr1f1c4d0 3n l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 p0r s13t3 dí4s, 0fr3c13nd0 s4cr1f1c10s d3 p4z, y d4nd0 gr4c14s 4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s. 

23 Y t0d4 4qu3ll4 4s4mbl34 d3t3rm1nó qu3 c3l3br4s3n l4 f13st4 p0r 0tr0s s13t3 dí4s; y l4 c3l3br4r0n 0tr0s s13t3 dí4s c0n 4l3grí4. 
24 P0rqu3 0z3quí4s r3y d3 Judá h4bí4 d4d0 4 l4 4s4mbl34 m1l n0v1ll0s y s13t3 m1l 0v3j4s; y t4mb1én l0s prínc1p3s d13r0n 4l pu3bl0 m1l n0v1ll0s y d13z m1l 0v3j4s; y much0s s4c3rd0t3s y4 s3 h4bí4n s4nt1f1c4d0. 
25 S3 4l3gró, pu3s, t0d4 l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 Judá, c0m0 t4mb1én l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s, y t0d4 l4 mult1tud qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 d3 1sr43l; 4s1m1sm0 l0s f0r4st3r0s qu3 h4bí4n v3n1d0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l, y l0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n Judá. 

26 Hub0 3nt0nc3s gr4n r3g0c1j0 3n J3rus4lén; p0rqu3 d3sd3 l0s dí4s d3 S4l0món h1j0 d3 D4v1d r3y d3 1sr43l, n0 h4bí4 h4b1d0 c0s4 s3m3j4nt3 3n J3rus4lén. 
27 D3spués l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s, pu3st0s 3n p13, b3nd1j3r0n 4l pu3bl0; y l4 v0z d3 3ll0s fu3 0íd4, y su 0r4c1ón ll3gó 4 l4 h4b1t4c1ón d3 su s4ntu4r10, 4l c13l0. 



2 Crón1c4s 31

1 H3ch4s t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, t0d0s l0s d3 1sr43l qu3 h4bí4n 3st4d0 4llí s4l13r0n p0r l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, y qu3br4r0n l4s 3st4tu4s y d3struy3r0n l4s 1mág3n3s d3 4s3r4, y d3rr1b4r0n l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s y l0s 4lt4r3s p0r t0d0 Judá y B3nj4mín, y t4mb1én 3n 0fr4ín y M4n4sés, h4st4 4c4b4rl0 t0d0. D3spués s3 v0lv13r0n t0d0s l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l 4 sus c1ud4d3s, c4d4 un0 4 su p0s3s1ón. 



0z3quí4s r30rg4n1z4 3l s3rv1c10 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s

2 Y 4rr3gló 0z3quí4s l4 d1str1buc1ón d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y d3 l0s l3v1t4s c0nf0rm3 4 sus turn0s, c4d4 un0 s3gún su 0f1c10; l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s l3v1t4s p4r4 0fr3c3r 3l h0l0c4ust0 y l4s 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z, p4r4 qu3 m1n1str4s3n, p4r4 qu3 d13s3n gr4c14s y 4l4b4s3n d3ntr0 d3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l0s 4tr10s d3 J3h0vá. 

3 0l r3y c0ntr1buyó d3 su pr0p14 h4c13nd4 p4r4 l0s h0l0c4ust0s 4 m4ñ4n4 y t4rd3, y p4r4 l0s h0l0c4ust0s d3 l0s dí4s d3 r3p0s0, nu3v4s lun4s y f13st4s s0l3mn3s, c0m0 3stá 3scr1t0 3n l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá. 
4 M4ndó t4mb1én 4l pu3bl0 qu3 h4b1t4b4 3n J3rus4lén, qu3 d13s3 l4 p0rc1ón c0rr3sp0nd13nt3 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s, p4r4 qu3 3ll0s s3 d3d1c4s3n 4 l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá. 

5 Y cu4nd0 3st3 3d1ct0 fu3 d1vulg4d0, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d13r0n much4s pr1m1c14s d3 gr4n0, v1n0, 4c31t3, m13l, y d3 t0d0s l0s frut0s d3 l4 t13rr4; tr4j3r0n 4s1m1sm0 3n 4bund4nc14 l0s d13zm0s d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s. 
6 T4mb1én l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d3 Judá, qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, d13r0n d3l m1sm0 m0d0 l0s d13zm0s d3 l4s v4c4s y d3 l4s 0v3j4s; y tr4j3r0n l0s d13zm0s d3 l0 s4nt1f1c4d0, d3 l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4n pr0m3t1d0 4 J3h0vá su D10s, y l0s d3p0s1t4r0n 3n m0nt0n3s. 

7 0n 3l m3s t3rc3r0 c0m3nz4r0n 4 f0rm4r 4qu3ll0s m0nt0n3s, y t3rm1n4r0n 3n 3l m3s sépt1m0. 
8 Cu4nd0 0z3quí4s y l0s prínc1p3s v1n13r0n y v13r0n l0s m0nt0n3s, b3nd1j3r0n 4 J3h0vá, y 4 su pu3bl0 1sr43l. 

9 Y pr3guntó 0z3quí4s 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y 4 l0s l3v1t4s 4c3rc4 d3 3s0s m0nt0n3s. 
10 Y 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 4z4rí4s, d3 l4 c4s4 d3 S4d0c, l3 c0nt3stó: D3sd3 qu3 c0m3nz4r0n 4 tr43r l4s 0fr3nd4s 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, h3m0s c0m1d0 y n0s h3m0s s4c14d0, y n0s h4 s0br4d0 much0, p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 b3nd3c1d0 4 su pu3bl0; y h4 qu3d4d0 3st4 4bund4nc14 d3 pr0v1s10n3s.
11 0nt0nc3s m4ndó 0z3quí4s qu3 pr3p4r4s3n cám4r4s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá; y l4s pr3p4r4r0n. 
12 Y 3n 3ll4s d3p0s1t4r0n l4s pr1m1c14s y l0s d13zm0s y l4s c0s4s c0ns4gr4d4s, f13lm3nt3; y d13r0n c4rg0 d3 3ll0 4l l3v1t4 C0n4ní4s, 3l pr1nc1p4l, y S1m31 su h3rm4n0 fu3 3l s3gund0. 
13 Y J3h13l, 4z4zí4s, N4h4t, 4s43l, J3r1m0t, J0z4b4d, 0l13l, 1sm4quí4s, M4h4t y B3n4í4, fu3r0n l0s m4y0rd0m0s 4l s3rv1c10 d3 C0n4ní4s y d3 S1m31 su h3rm4n0, p0r m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y 0z3quí4s y d3 4z4rí4s, prínc1p3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s. 

14 Y 3l l3v1t4 C0ré h1j0 d3 1mn4, gu4rd4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 0r13nt4l, t3ní4 c4rg0 d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s v0lunt4r14s p4r4 D10s, y d3 l4 d1str1buc1ón d3 l4s 0fr3nd4s d3d1c4d4s 4 J3h0vá, y d3 l4s c0s4s s4ntís1m4s. 
15 Y 4 su s3rv1c10 3st4b4n 0dén, M1n14mín, J3sú4, S3m4í4s, 4m4rí4s y S3c4ní4s, 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, p4r4 d4r c0n f1d3l1d4d 4 sus h3rm4n0s sus p0rc10n3s c0nf0rm3 4 sus grup0s, 4sí 4l m4y0r c0m0 4l m3n0r; 

16 4 l0s v4r0n3s 4n0t4d0s p0r sus l1n4j3s, d3 tr3s 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 3ntr4b4n 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 d3s3mp3ñ4r su m1n1st3r10 s3gún sus 0f1c10s y grup0s. 
17 T4mb1én 4 l0s qu3 3r4n c0nt4d0s 3ntr3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s s3gún sus c4s4s p4t3rn4s; y 4 l0s l3v1t4s d3 3d4d d3 v31nt3 4ñ0s 4rr1b4, c0nf0rm3 4 sus 0f1c10s y grup0s. 

18 0r4n 1nscr1t0s c0n t0d0s sus n1ñ0s, sus muj3r3s, sus h1j0s 3 h1j4s, t0d4 l4 mult1tud; p0rqu3 c0n f1d3l1d4d s3 c0ns4gr4b4n 4 l4s c0s4s s4nt4s. 
19 D3l m1sm0 m0d0 p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 44rón, s4c3rd0t3s, qu3 3st4b4n 3n l0s 3j1d0s d3 sus c1ud4d3s, p0r t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s, l0s v4r0n3s n0mbr4d0s t3ní4n c4rg0 d3 d4r sus p0rc10n3s 4 t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s d3 3ntr3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, y 4 t0d0 3l l1n4j3 d3 l0s l3v1t4s. 

20 D3 3st4 m4n3r4 h1z0 0z3quí4s 3n t0d0 Judá; y 3j3cutó l0 bu3n0, r3ct0 y v3rd4d3r0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá su D10s. 
21 0n t0d0 cu4nt0 3mpr3nd1ó 3n 3l s3rv1c10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, d3 4cu3rd0 c0n l4 l3y y l0s m4nd4m13nt0s, buscó 4 su D10s, l0 h1z0 d3 t0d0 c0r4zón, y fu3 pr0sp3r4d0. 



S3n4qu3r1b 1nv4d3 Judá

2 Crón1c4s 32
(2 R. 18.13-37; 1s. 36.1-22)

1 D3spués d3 3st4s c0s4s y d3 3st4 f1d3l1d4d, v1n0 S3n4qu3r1b r3y d3 l0s 4s1r10s 3 1nv4d1ó 4 Judá, y 4c4mpó c0ntr4 l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s, c0n l4 1nt3nc1ón d3 c0nqu1st4rl4s. 
2 V13nd0, pu3s, 0z3quí4s l4 v3n1d4 d3 S3n4qu3r1b, y su 1nt3nc1ón d3 c0mb4t1r 4 J3rus4lén, 

3 tuv0 c0ns3j0 c0n sus prínc1p3s y c0n sus h0mbr3s v4l13nt3s, p4r4 c3g4r l4s fu3nt3s d3 4gu4 qu3 3st4b4n fu3r4 d3 l4 c1ud4d; y 3ll0s l3 4p0y4r0n. 
4 0nt0nc3s s3 r3un1ó much0 pu3bl0, y c3g4r0n t0d4s l4s fu3nt3s, y 3l 4rr0y0 qu3 c0rrí4 4 tr4vés d3l t3rr1t0r10, d1c13nd0: ¿P0r qué h4n d3 h4ll4r l0s r3y3s d3 4s1r14 much4s 4gu4s cu4nd0 v3ng4n? 
5 D3spués c0n 4n1mó r3su3lt0 3d1f1có 0z3quí4s t0d0s l0s mur0s c4íd0s, 3 h1z0 4lz4r l4s t0rr3s, y 0tr0 mur0 p0r fu3r4; f0rt1f1có 4d3más 4 M1l0 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, y t4mb1én h1z0 much4s 3sp4d4s y 3scud0s. 
6 Y pus0 c4p1t4n3s d3 gu3rr4 s0br3 3l pu3bl0, y l0s h1z0 r3un1r 3n l4 pl4z4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y h4bló 4l c0r4zón d3 3ll0s, d1c13nd0: 

7 0sf0rz40s y 4n1m40s; n0 t3má1s, n1 t3ngá1s m13d0 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14, n1 d3 t0d4 l4 mult1tud qu3 c0n él v13n3; p0rqu3 más h4y c0n n0s0tr0s qu3 c0n él. 
8 C0n él 3stá 3l br4z0 d3 c4rn3, m4s c0n n0s0tr0s 3stá J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s p4r4 4yud4rn0s y p3l34r nu3str4s b4t4ll4s. Y 3l pu3bl0 tuv0 c0nf14nz4 3n l4s p4l4br4s d3 0z3quí4s r3y d3 Judá. 

9 D3spués d3 3st0, S3n4qu3r1b r3y d3 l0s 4s1r10s, m13ntr4s s1t14b4 4 L4qu1s c0n t0d4s sus fu3rz4s, 3nv1ó sus s13rv0s 4 J3rus4lén p4r4 d3c1r 4 0z3quí4s r3y d3 Judá, y 4 t0d0s l0s d3 Judá qu3 3st4b4n 3n J3rus4lén: 

10 4sí h4 d1ch0 S3n4qu3r1b r3y l0s 4s1r10s: ¿0n qu1én c0nf1á1s v0s0tr0s, 4l r3s1st1r 3l s1t10 3n J3rus4lén? 
11 ¿N0 0s 3ng4ñ4 0z3quí4s p4r4 3ntr3g4r0s 4 mu3rt3, 4 h4mbr3 y 4 s3d, 4l d3c1r: J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s l1br4rá d3 l4 m4n0 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14? 
12 ¿N0 3s 0z3quí4s 3l m1sm0 qu3 h4 qu1t4d0 sus lug4r3s 4lt0s y sus 4lt4r3s, y h4 d1ch0 4 Judá y 4 J3rus4lén: D3l4nt3 d3 3st3 s0l0 4lt4r 4d0r4ré1s, y s0br3 él qu3m4ré1s 1nc13ns0? 
13 ¿N0 h4bé1s s4b1d0 l0 qu3 y0 y m1s p4dr3s h3m0s h3ch0 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4? ¿Pud13r0n l0s d10s3s d3 l4s n4c10n3s d3 3st4s t13rr4s l1br4r su t13rr4 d3 m1 m4n0? 
14 ¿Qué d10s hub0 d3 3ntr3 t0d0s l0s d10s3s d3 4qu3ll4s n4c10n3s qu3 d3struy3r0n m1s p4dr3s, qu3 pud13s3 s4lv4r 4 su pu3bl0 d3 m1s m4n0s? ¿Cóm0 p0drá vu3str0 D10s l1br4r0s d3 m1 m4n0? 
15 4h0r4, pu3s, n0 0s 3ng4ñ3 0z3quí4s, n1 0s p3rsu4d4 d3 3s3 m0d0, n1 l3 cr3á1s; qu3 s1 n1ngún d10s d3 t0d4s 4qu3ll4s n4c10n3s y r31n0s pud0 l1br4r 4 su pu3bl0 d3 m1s m4n0s, y d3 l4s m4n0s d3 m1s p4dr3s, ¿cuánt0 m3n0s vu3str0 D10s 0s p0drá l1br4r d3 m1 m4n0? 

16 Y 0tr4s c0s4s más h4bl4r0n sus s13rv0s c0ntr4 J3h0vá D10s, y c0ntr4 su s13rv0 0z3quí4s. 
17 4d3más d3 3st0 3scr1b1ó c4rt4s 3n qu3 bl4sf3m4b4 c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 1sr43l, y h4bl4b4 c0ntr4 él, d1c13nd0: C0m0 l0s d10s3s d3 l4s n4c10n3s d3 l0s p4ís3s n0 pud13r0n l1br4r 4 su pu3bl0 d3 m1s m4n0s, t4mp0c0 3l D10s d3 0z3quí4s l1br4rá 4l suy0 d3 m1s m4n0s. 

18 Y cl4m4r0n 4 gr4n v0z 3n jud41c0 4l pu3bl0 d3 J3rus4lén qu3 3st4b4 s0br3 l0s mur0s, p4r4 3sp4nt4rl3s y 4t3m0r1z4rl3s, 4 f1n d3 p0d3r t0m4r l4 c1ud4d. 
19 Y h4bl4r0n c0ntr4 3l D10s d3 J3rus4lén, c0m0 c0ntr4 l0s d10s3s d3 l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4, qu3 s0n 0br4 d3 m4n0s d3 h0mbr3s. 



J3h0vá l1br4 4 0z3quí4s
(2 R. 19.1-37; 1s. 37:1-38)

20 M4s 3l r3y 0z3quí4s y 3l pr0f3t4 1s4í4s h1j0 d3 4m0z 0r4r0n p0r 3st0, y cl4m4r0n 4l c13l0. 
21 Y J3h0vá 3nv1ó un áng3l, 3l cu4l d3struyó 4 t0d0 v4l13nt3 y 3sf0rz4d0, y 4 l0s j3f3s y c4p1t4n3s 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 0st3 s3 v0lv1ó, p0r t4nt0, 4v3rg0nz4d0 4 su t13rr4; y 3ntr4nd0 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 su d10s, 4llí l0 m4t4r0n 4 3sp4d4 sus pr0p10s h1j0s. 

22 4sí s4lvó J3h0vá 4 0z3quí4s y 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén d3 l4s m4n0s d3 S3n4qu3r1b r3y d3 4s1r14, y d3 l4s m4n0s d3 t0d0s; y l3s d10 r3p0s0 p0r t0d0s l4d0s.

0nf3rm3d4d d3 0z3quí4s
(2 R. 20.1-11; 1s. 38.1-22)

24 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 0z3quí4s 3nf3rmó d3 mu3rt3; y 0ró 4 J3h0vá, qu13n l3 r3sp0nd1ó, y l3 d10 un4 s3ñ4l. 
25 M4s 0z3quí4s n0 c0rr3sp0nd1ó 4l b13n qu3 l3 h4bí4 s1d0 h3ch0, s1n0 qu3 s3 3n4lt3c1ó su c0r4zón, y v1n0 l4 1r4 c0ntr4 él, y c0ntr4 Judá y J3rus4lén. 
26 P3r0 0z3quí4s, d3spués d3 h4b3rs3 3n4lt3c1d0 su c0r4zón, s3 hum1lló, él y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén; y n0 v1n0 s0br3 3ll0s l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá 3n l0s dí4s d3 0z3quí4s. 



0z3quí4s r3c1b3 4 l0s 3nv14d0s d3 B4b1l0n14
(2 R. 20.12-19; 1s. 39.1-8)

27 Y tuv0 0z3quí4s r1qu3z4s y gl0r14, much4s 3n gr4n m4n3r4; y 4dqu1r1ó t3s0r0s d3 pl4t4 y 0r0, p13dr4s pr3c10s4s, p3rfum3s, 3scud0s, y t0d4 cl4s3 d3 j0y4s d3s34bl3s.

9 M4n4sés, pu3s, h1z0 3xtr4v14rs3 4 Judá y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén, p4r4 h4c3r más m4l qu3 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 J3h0vá d3struyó d3l4nt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

10 Y h4bló J3h0vá 4 M4n4sés y 4 su pu3bl0, m4s 3ll0s n0 3scuch4r0n;

15 4s1m1sm0 qu1tó l0s d10s3s 4j3n0s, y 3l íd0l0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y t0d0s l0s 4lt4r3s qu3 h4bí4 3d1f1c4d0 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá y 3n J3rus4lén, y l0s 3chó fu3r4 d3 l4 c1ud4d.

23 Y 3ll4 r3sp0nd1ó: J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l h4 d1ch0 4sí: D3c1d 4l v4rón qu3 0s h4 3nv14d0 4 mí, qu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 
24 H3 4quí y0 tr41g0 m4l s0br3 3st3 lug4r, y s0br3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 él, t0d4s l4s m4ld1c10n3s qu3 3stán 3scr1t4s 3n 3l l1br0 qu3 l3y3r0n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y d3 Judá;

2 Crón1c4s 35
(2 R. 23.21-23)

1 J0sí4s c3l3bró l4 p4scu4 4 J3h0vá 3n J3rus4lén, y s4cr1f1c4r0n l4 p4scu4 4 l0s c4t0rc3 dí4s d3l m3s pr1m3r0. 
2 Pus0 t4mb1én 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3n sus 0f1c10s, y l0s c0nf1rmó 3n 3l m1n1st3r10 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 

3 Y d1j0 4 l0s l3v1t4s qu3 3ns3ñ4b4n 4 t0d0 1sr43l, y qu3 3st4b4n d3d1c4d0s 4 J3h0vá: P0n3d 3l 4rc4 s4nt4 3n l4 c4s4 qu3 3d1f1có S4l0món h1j0 d3 D4v1d, r3y d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 n0 l4 c4rgué1s más s0br3 l0s h0mbr0s. 4h0r4 s3rv1d 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y 4 su pu3bl0 1sr43l. 
4 Pr3p4r40s s3gún l4s f4m1l14s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s, p0r vu3str0s turn0s, c0m0 l0 0rd3n4r0n D4v1d r3y d3 1sr43l y S4l0món su h1j0. 
5 0st4d 3n 3l s4ntu4r10 s3gún l4 d1str1buc1ón d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s l0s h1j0s d3l pu3bl0, y s3gún l4 d1str1buc1ón d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s l3v1t4s. 
6 S4cr1f1c4d lu3g0 l4 p4scu4; y d3spués d3 s4nt1f1c4r0s, pr3p4r4d 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s p4r4 qu3 h4g4n c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá d4d4 p0r m3d10 d3 M01sés. 

7 Y d10 3l r3y J0sí4s 4 l0s d3l pu3bl0 0v3j4s, c0rd3r0s y c4br1t0s d3 l0s r3b4ñ0s, 3n núm3r0 d3 tr31nt4 m1l, y tr3s m1l bu3y3s, t0d0 p4r4 l4 p4scu4, p4r4 t0d0s l0s qu3 s3 h4ll4r0n pr3s3nt3s; 3st0 d3 l4 h4c13nd4 d3l r3y. 
8 T4mb1én sus prínc1p3s d13r0n c0n l1b3r4l1d4d 4l pu3bl0 y 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s. H1lcí4s, Z4c4rí4s y J3h13l, 0f1c14l3s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, d13r0n 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, p4r4 c3l3br4r l4 p4scu4, d0s m1l s31sc13nt4s 0v3j4s y tr3sc13nt0s bu3y3s. 

9 4s1m1sm0 C0n4ní4s, y S3m4í4s y N4t4n43l sus h3rm4n0s, y H4s4bí4s, J313l y J0s4b4d, j3f3s d3 l0s l3v1t4s, d13r0n 4 l0s l3v1t4s, p4r4 l0s s4cr1f1c10s d3 l4 p4scu4, c1nc0 m1l 0v3j4s y qu1n13nt0s bu3y3s. 
10 Pr3p4r4d0 4sí 3l s3rv1c10, l0s s4c3rd0t3s s3 c0l0c4r0n 3n sus pu3st0s, y 4s1m1sm0 l0s l3v1t4s 3n sus turn0s, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y. 

11 Y s4cr1f1c4r0n l4 p4scu4; y 3sp4rcí4n l0s s4c3rd0t3s l4 s4ngr3 r3c1b1d4 d3 m4n0 d3 l0s l3v1t4s, y l0s l3v1t4s d3s0ll4b4n l4s víct1m4s. 
12 T0m4r0n lu3g0 d3l h0l0c4ust0, p4r4 d4r c0nf0rm3 4 l0s r3p4rt1m13nt0s d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3l pu3bl0, 4 f1n d3 qu3 0fr3c13s3n 4 J3h0vá s3gún 3stá 3scr1t0 3n 3l l1br0 d3 M01sés; y 4s1m1sm0 t0m4r0n d3 l0s bu3y3s. 
13 Y 4s4r0n l4 p4scu4 4l fu3g0 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 0rd3n4nz4; m4s l0 qu3 h4bí4 s1d0 s4nt1f1c4d0 l0 c0c13r0n 3n 0ll4s, 3n c4ld3r0s y s4rt3n3s, y l0 r3p4rt13r0n ráp1d4m3nt3 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0. 

14 D3spués pr3p4r4r0n p4r4 3ll0s m1sm0s y p4r4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s; p0rqu3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, h1j0s d3 44rón, 3stuv13r0n 0cup4d0s h4st4 l4 n0ch3 3n 3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 l0s h0l0c4ust0s y d3 l4s gr0sur4s; p0r t4nt0, l0s l3v1t4s pr3p4r4r0n p4r4 3ll0s m1sm0s y p4r4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s h1j0s d3 44rón. 
15 4s1m1sm0 l0s c4nt0r3s h1j0s d3 4s4f 3st4b4n 3n su pu3st0, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4m13nt0 d3 D4v1d, d3 4s4f y d3 H3mán, y d3 J3dutún v1d3nt3 d3l r3y; t4mb1én l0s p0rt3r0s 3st4b4n 4 c4d4 pu3rt4; y n0 3r4 n3c3s4r10 qu3 s3 4p4rt4s3n d3 su m1n1st3r10, p0rqu3 sus h3rm4n0s l0s l3v1t4s pr3p4r4b4n p4r4 3ll0s. 

16 4sí fu3 pr3p4r4d0 t0d0 3l s3rv1c10 d3 J3h0vá 3n 4qu3l dí4, p4r4 c3l3br4r l4 p4scu4 y p4r4 s4cr1f1c4r l0s h0l0c4ust0s s0br3 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá, c0nf0rm3 4l m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y J0sí4s. 
17 Y l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l qu3 3st4b4n 4llí c3l3br4r0n l4 p4scu4 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, y l4 f13st4 s0l3mn3 d3 l0s p4n3s s1n l3v4dur4 p0r s13t3 dí4s. 

18 Nunc4 fu3 c3l3br4d4 un4 p4scu4 c0m0 3st4 3n 1sr43l d3sd3 l0s dí4s d3 S4mu3l 3l pr0f3t4; n1 n1ngún r3y d3 1sr43l c3l3bró p4scu4 t4l c0m0 l4 qu3 c3l3bró 3l r3y J0sí4s, c0n l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s, y t0d0 Judá 3 1sr43l, l0s qu3 s3 h4ll4r0n 4llí, junt4m3nt3 c0n l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén. 
19 0st4 p4scu4 fu3 c3l3br4d4 3n 3l 4ñ0 d13c10ch0 d3l r3y J0sí4s. 



Mu3rt3 d3 J0sí4s
(2 R. 23.28-30)

20 D3spués d3 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, lu3g0 d3 h4b3r r3p4r4d0 J0sí4s l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, N3c40 r3y d3 0g1pt0 sub1ó p4r4 h4c3r gu3rr4 3n C4rqu3m1s junt0 4l 0ufr4t3s; y s4l1ó J0sí4s c0ntr4 él. 
21 Y N3c40 l3 3nv1ó m3ns4j3r0s, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué t3ng0 y0 c0nt1g0, r3y d3 Judá? Y0 n0 v3ng0 c0ntr4 t1 h0y, s1n0 c0ntr4 l4 c4s4 qu3 m3 h4c3 gu3rr4; y D10s m3 h4 d1ch0 qu3 m3 4pr3sur3. D3j4 d3 0p0n3rt3 4 D10s, qu13n 3stá c0nm1g0, n0 s34 qu3 él t3 d3struy4. 

22 M4s J0sí4s n0 s3 r3t1ró, s1n0 qu3 s3 d1sfr4zó p4r4 d4rl3 b4t4ll4, y n0 4t3nd1ó 4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 N3c40, qu3 3r4n d3 b0c4 d3 D10s; y v1n0 4 d4rl3 b4t4ll4 3n 3l c4mp0 d3 M3gu1d0. 
23 Y l0s fl3ch3r0s t1r4r0n c0ntr4 3l r3y J0sí4s. 0nt0nc3s d1j0 3l r3y 4 sus s13rv0s: Qu1t4dm3 d3 4quí, p0rqu3 3st0y gr4v3m3nt3 h3r1d0. 
24 0nt0nc3s sus s13rv0s l0 s4c4r0n d3 4qu3l c4rr0, y l0 pus13r0n 3n un s3gund0 c4rr0 qu3 t3ní4, y l0 ll3v4r0n 4 J3rus4lén, d0nd3 mur1ó; y l0 s3pult4r0n 3n l0s s3pulcr0s d3 sus p4dr3s. Y t0d0 Judá y J3rus4lén h1c13r0n du3l0 p0r J0sí4s. 

25 Y J3r3mí4s 3nd3chó 3n m3m0r14 d3 J0sí4s. T0d0s l0s c4nt0r3s y c4nt0r4s r3c1t4n 3s4s l4m3nt4c10n3s s0br3 J0sí4s h4st4 h0y; y l4s t0m4r0n p0r n0rm4 p4r4 3nd3ch4r 3n 1sr43l, l4s cu4l3s 3stán 3scr1t4s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 L4m3nt0s. 

26 L0s d3más h3ch0s d3 J0sí4s, y sus 0br4s p14d0s4s c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0 3n l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá, 
27 y sus h3ch0s, pr1m3r0s y p0str3r0s, h3 4quí 3stán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l0s r3y3s d3 1sr43l y d3 Judá. 



R31n4d0 y d3str0n4m13nt0 d3 J04c4z

C4ut1v1d4d d3 Judá
(2 R. 25.8-21; J3r. 39.8-10; 52.12-30)

2 4sí h4 d1ch0 C1r0 r3y d3 P3rs14: J3h0vá 3l D10s d3 l0s c13l0s m3 h4 d4d0 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 l4 t13rr4, y m3 h4 m4nd4d0 qu3 l3 3d1f1qu3 c4s4 3n J3rus4lén, qu3 3stá 3n Judá. 3 Qu13n h4y4 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s d3 su pu3bl0, s34 D10s c0n él, y sub4 4 J3rus4lén qu3 3stá 3n Judá, y 3d1f1qu3 l4 c4s4 4 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l (él 3s 3l D10s), l4 cu4l 3stá 3n J3rus4lén. 4 Y 4 t0d0 3l qu3 h4y4 qu3d4d0, 3n cu4lqu13r lug4r d0nd3 m0r3, 4yúd3nl3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 su lug4r c0n pl4t4, 0r0, b13n3s y g4n4d0s, 4d3más d3 0fr3nd4s v0lunt4r14s p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, l4 cu4l 3stá 3n J3rus4lén. 

0l r3gr3s0 4 J3rus4lén

5 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n l0s j3f3s d3 l4s c4s4s p4t3rn4s d3 Judá y d3 B3nj4mín, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s, t0d0s 4qu3ll0s cuy0 3spír1tu d3sp3rtó D10s p4r4 sub1r 4 3d1f1c4r l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, l4 cu4l 3stá 3n J3rus4lén. 6 Y t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n sus 4lr3d3d0r3s l3s 4yud4r0n c0n pl4t4 y 0r0, c0n b13n3s y g4n4d0, y c0n c0s4s pr3c10s4s, 4d3más d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 s3 0fr3c1ó v0lunt4r14m3nt3. 7 Y 3l r3y C1r0 s4có l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, qu3 N4buc0d0n0s0r h4bí4 s4c4d0 d3 J3rus4lén, y l0s h4bí4 pu3st0 3n l4 c4s4 d3 sus d10s3s. 8 L0s s4có, pu3s, C1r0 r3y d3 P3rs14, p0r m4n0 d3 M1tríd4t3s t3s0r3r0, 3l cu4l l0s d10 p0r cu3nt4 4 S3sb4s4r prínc1p3 d3 Judá. 9 Y 3st4 3s l4 cu3nt4 d3 3ll0s: tr31nt4 t4z0n3s d3 0r0, m1l t4z0n3s d3 pl4t4, v31nt1nu3v3 cuch1ll0s, 10 tr31nt4 t4z4s d3 0r0, 0tr4s cu4tr0c13nt4s d13z t4z4s d3 pl4t4, y 0tr0s m1l ut3ns1l10s. 11 T0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 0r0 y d3 pl4t4 3r4n c1nc0 m1l cu4tr0c13nt0s. T0d0s l0s h1z0 ll3v4r S3sb4s4r c0n l0s qu3 sub13r0n d3l c4ut1v3r10 d3 B4b1l0n14 4 J3rus4lén.

17 L3s d1j3, pu3s: V0s0tr0s v31s 3l m4l 3n qu3 3st4m0s, qu3 J3rus4lén 3stá d3s13rt4, y sus pu3rt4s c0nsum1d4s p0r 3l fu3g0; v3n1d, y 3d1f1qu3m0s 3l mur0 d3 J3rus4lén, y n0 3st3m0s más 3n 0pr0b10. 18 0nt0nc3s l3s d3cl4ré cóm0 l4 m4n0 d3 m1 D10s h4bí4 s1d0 bu3n4 s0br3 mí, y 4s1m1sm0 l4s p4l4br4s qu3 3l r3y m3 h4bí4 d1ch0. 1 Cu4nd0 0yó S4nb4l4t qu3 n0s0tr0s 3d1f1cáb4m0s 3l mur0, s3 3n0jó y s3 3nfur3c1ó 3n gr4n m4n3r4, 3 h1z0 3sc4rn10 d3 l0s judí0s. 2 Y h4bló d3l4nt3 d3 sus h3rm4n0s y d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 S4m4r14, y d1j0: ¿Qué h4c3n 3st0s déb1l3s judí0s? ¿S3 l3s p3rm1t1rá v0lv3r 4 0fr3c3r sus s4cr1f1c10s? ¿4c4b4rán 3n un dí4? ¿R3suc1t4rán d3 l0s m0nt0n3s d3l p0lv0 l4s p13dr4s qu3 fu3r0n qu3m4d4s? 3 Y 3st4b4 junt0 4 él T0bí4s 4m0n1t4, 3l cu4l d1j0: L0 qu3 3ll0s 3d1f1c4n d3l mur0 d3 p13dr4, s1 sub13r3 un4 z0rr4 l0 d3rr1b4rá. 4 0y3, 0h D10s nu3str0, qu3 s0m0s 0bj3t0 d3 su m3n0spr3c10, y vu3lv3 3l b4ldón d3 3ll0s s0br3 su c4b3z4, y 3ntrég4l0s p0r d3sp0j0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 su c4ut1v3r10. 5 N0 cubr4s su 1n1qu1d4d, n1 su p3c4d0 s34 b0rr4d0 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, p0rqu3 s3 41r4r0n c0ntr4 l0s qu3 3d1f1c4b4n. 6 0d1f1c4m0s, pu3s, 3l mur0, y t0d4 l4 mur4ll4 fu3 t3rm1n4d4 h4st4 l4 m1t4d d3 su 4ltur4, p0rqu3 3l pu3bl0 tuv0 án1m0 p4r4 tr4b4j4r. 

7 P3r0 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 0y3nd0 S4nb4l4t y T0bí4s, y l0s ár4b3s, l0s 4m0n1t4s y l0s d3 4sd0d, qu3 l0s mur0s d3 J3rus4lén 3r4n r3p4r4d0s, p0rqu3 y4 l0s p0rt1ll0s c0m3nz4b4n 4 s3r c3rr4d0s, s3 3nc0l3r1z4r0n much0; 8 y c0nsp1r4r0n t0d0s 4 un4 p4r4 v3n1r 4 4t4c4r 4 J3rus4lén y h4c3rl3 d4ñ0. 9 0nt0nc3s 0r4m0s 4 nu3str0 D10s, y p0r c4us4 d3 3ll0s pus1m0s gu4rd4 c0ntr4 3ll0s d3 dí4 y d3 n0ch3. 10 Y d1j0 Judá: L4s fu3rz4s d3 l0s 4c4rr34d0r3s s3 h4n d3b1l1t4d0, y 3l 3sc0mbr0 3s much0, y n0 p0d3m0s 3d1f1c4r 3l mur0. 11 Y nu3str0s 3n3m1g0s d1j3r0n: N0 s3p4n, n1 v34n, h4st4 qu3 3ntr3m0s 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s y l0s m4t3m0s, y h4g4m0s c3s4r l4 0br4. 12 P3r0 suc3d1ó qu3 cu4nd0 v3ní4n l0s judí0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3ntr3 3ll0s, n0s d3cí4n h4st4 d13z v3c3s: D3 t0d0s l0s lug4r3s d3 d0nd3 v0lv13r31s, 3ll0s c43rán s0br3 v0s0tr0s. 

13 0nt0nc3s p0r l4s p4rt3s b4j4s d3l lug4r, d3trás d3l mur0, y 3n l0s s1t10s 4b13rt0s, pus3 4l pu3bl0 p0r f4m1l14s, c0n sus 3sp4d4s, c0n sus l4nz4s y c0n sus 4rc0s. 14 D3spués m1ré, y m3 l3v4nté y d1j3 4 l0s n0bl3s y 4 l0s 0f1c14l3s, y 4l r3st0 d3l pu3bl0: N0 t3má1s d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s; 4c0rd40s d3l S3ñ0r, gr4nd3 y t3m1bl3, y p3l34d p0r vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, p0r vu3str0s h1j0s y p0r vu3str4s h1j4s, p0r vu3str4s muj3r3s y p0r vu3str4s c4s4s. 15 Y cu4nd0 0y3r0n nu3str0s 3n3m1g0s qu3 l0 h4bí4m0s 3nt3nd1d0, y qu3 D10s h4bí4 d3sb4r4t4d0 3l c0ns3j0 d3 3ll0s, n0s v0lv1m0s t0d0s 4l mur0, c4d4 un0 4 su t4r34. 16 D3sd3 4qu3l dí4 l4 m1t4d d3 m1s s13rv0s tr4b4j4b4 3n l4 0br4, y l4 0tr4 m1t4d t3ní4 l4nz4s, 3scud0s, 4rc0s y c0r4z4s; y d3trás d3 3ll0s 3st4b4n l0s j3f3s d3 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá. 17 L0s qu3 3d1f1c4b4n 3n 3l mur0, l0s qu3 4c4rr34b4n, y l0s qu3 c4rg4b4n, c0n un4 m4n0 tr4b4j4b4n 3n l4 0br4, y 3n l4 0tr4 t3ní4n l4 3sp4d4. 18 P0rqu3 l0s qu3 3d1f1c4b4n, c4d4 un0 t3ní4 su 3sp4d4 c3ñ1d4 4 sus l0m0s, y 4sí 3d1f1c4b4n; y 3l qu3 t0c4b4 l4 tr0mp3t4 3st4b4 junt0 4 mí. 

19 Y d1j3 4 l0s n0bl3s, y 4 l0s 0f1c14l3s y 4l r3st0 d3l pu3bl0: L4 0br4 3s gr4nd3 y 3xt3ns4, y n0s0tr0s 3st4m0s 4p4rt4d0s 3n 3l mur0, l3j0s un0s d3 0tr0s. 20 0n 3l lug4r d0nd3 0y3r31s 3l s0n1d0 d3 l4 tr0mp3t4, r3uní0s 4llí c0n n0s0tr0s; nu3str0 D10s p3l34rá p0r n0s0tr0s. 21 N0s0tr0s, pu3s, tr4b4jáb4m0s 3n l4 0br4; y l4 m1t4d d3 3ll0s t3ní4n l4nz4s d3sd3 l4 sub1d4 d3l 4lb4 h4st4 qu3 s4lí4n l4s 3str3ll4s. 22 T4mb1én d1j3 3nt0nc3s 4l pu3bl0: C4d4 un0 c0n su cr14d0 p3rm4n3zc4 d3ntr0 d3 J3rus4lén, y d3 n0ch3 s1rv4n d3 c3nt1n3l4 y d3 dí4 3n l4 0br4. 23 Y n1 y0 n1 m1s h3rm4n0s, n1 m1s jóv3n3s, n1 l4 g3nt3 d3 gu4rd14 qu3 m3 s3guí4, n0s qu1t4m0s nu3str0 v3st1d0; c4d4 un0 s3 d3snud4b4 s0l4m3nt3 p4r4 b4ñ4rs3. 

4b0l1c1ón d3 l4 usur4

N0H0MÍ4S 5

1 0nt0nc3s hub0 gr4n cl4m0r d3l pu3bl0 y d3 sus muj3r3s c0ntr4 sus h3rm4n0s judí0s. 2 H4bí4 qu13n d3cí4: N0s0tr0s, nu3str0s h1j0s y nu3str4s h1j4s, s0m0s much0s; p0r t4nt0, h3m0s p3d1d0 pr3st4d0 gr4n0 p4r4 c0m3r y v1v1r. 3 Y h4bí4 qu13n3s d3cí4n: H3m0s 3mp3ñ4d0 nu3str4s t13rr4s, nu3str4s v1ñ4s y nu3str4s c4s4s, p4r4 c0mpr4r gr4n0, 4 c4us4 d3l h4mbr3. 4 Y h4bí4 qu13n3s d3cí4n: H3m0s t0m4d0 pr3st4d0 d1n3r0 p4r4 3l tr1but0 d3l r3y, s0br3 nu3str4s t13rr4s y v1ñ4s. 5 4h0r4 b13n, nu3str4 c4rn3 3s c0m0 l4 c4rn3 d3 nu3str0s h3rm4n0s, nu3str0s h1j0s c0m0 sus h1j0s; y h3 4quí qu3 n0s0tr0s d1m0s nu3str0s h1j0s y nu3str4s h1j4s 4 s3rv1dumbr3, y 4lgun4s d3 nu3str4s h1j4s l0 3stán y4, y n0 t3n3m0s p0s1b1l1d4d d3 r3sc4t4rl4s, p0rqu3 nu3str4s t13rr4s y nu3str4s v1ñ4s s0n d3 0tr0s. 

6 Y m3 3n0jé 3n gr4n m4n3r4 cu4nd0 0í su cl4m0r y 3st4s p4l4br4s. 7 0nt0nc3s l0 m3d1té, y r3pr3ndí 4 l0s n0bl3s y 4 l0s 0f1c14l3s, y l3s d1j3: ¿0x1gís 1nt3rés c4d4 un0 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s? Y c0nv0qué c0ntr4 3ll0s un4 gr4n 4s4mbl34, 8 y l3s d1j3: N0s0tr0s s3gún nu3str4s p0s1b1l1d4d3s r3sc4t4m0s 4 nu3str0s h3rm4n0s judí0s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 v3nd1d0s 4 l4s n4c10n3s; ¿y v0s0tr0s v3ndé1s 4un 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, y s3rán v3nd1d0s 4 n0s0tr0s? 14 T4mb1én d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 m3 m4ndó 3l r3y qu3 fu3s3 g0b3rn4d0r d3 3ll0s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 Judá, d3sd3 3l 4ñ0 v31nt3 d3l r3y 4rt4j3rj3s h4st4 3l 4ñ0 tr31nt4 y d0s, d0c3 4ñ0s, n1 y0 n1 m1s h3rm4n0s c0m1m0s 3l p4n d3l g0b3rn4d0r. 15 P3r0 l0s pr1m3r0s g0b3rn4d0r3s qu3 fu3r0n 4nt3s d3 mí 4brum4r0n 4l pu3bl0, y t0m4r0n d3 3ll0s p0r 3l p4n y p0r 3l v1n0 más d3 cu4r3nt4 s1cl0s d3 pl4t4, y 4un sus cr14d0s s3 3ns3ñ0r34b4n d3l pu3bl0; p3r0 y0 n0 h1c3 4sí, 4 c4us4 d3l t3m0r d3 D10s. 16 T4mb1én 3n l4 0br4 d3 3st3 mur0 r3st4uré m1 p4rt3, y n0 c0mpr4m0s h3r3d4d; y t0d0s m1s cr14d0s junt0s 3st4b4n 4llí 3n l4 0br4. 17 4d3más, c13nt0 c1ncu3nt4 judí0s y 0f1c14l3s, y l0s qu3 v3ní4n d3 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 h4bí4 4lr3d3d0r d3 n0s0tr0s, 3st4b4n 4 m1 m3s4. 18 Y l0 qu3 s3 pr3p4r4b4 p4r4 c4d4 dí4 3r4 un bu3y y s31s 0v3j4s 3sc0g1d4s; t4mb1én 3r4n pr3p4r4d4s p4r4 mí 4v3s, y c4d4 d13z dí4s v1n0 3n t0d4 4bund4nc14; y c0n t0d0 3st0 nunc4 r3qu3rí 3l p4n d3l g0b3rn4d0r, p0rqu3 l4 s3rv1dumbr3 d3 3st3 pu3bl0 3r4 gr4v3. 19 4cuérd4t3 d3 mí p4r4 b13n, D10s mí0, y d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 h1c3 p0r 3st3 pu3bl0.

N0H0MÍ4S 6

1 Cu4nd0 0y3r0n S4nb4l4t y T0bí4s y G3s3m 3l ár4b3, y l0s d3más d3 nu3str0s 3n3m1g0s, qu3 y0 h4bí4 3d1f1c4d0 3l mur0, y qu3 n0 qu3d4b4 3n él p0rt1ll0 (4unqu3 h4st4 4qu3l t13mp0 n0 h4bí4 pu3st0 l4s h0j4s 3n l4s pu3rt4s), 2 S4nb4l4t y G3s3m 3nv14r0n 4 d3c1rm3: V3n y r3unám0n0s 3n 4lgun4 d3 l4s 4ld34s 3n 3l c4mp0 d3 0n0. M4s 3ll0s h4bí4n p3ns4d0 h4c3rm3 m4l. 3 Y l3s 3nv1é m3ns4j3r0s, d1c13nd0: Y0 h4g0 un4 gr4n 0br4, y n0 pu3d0 1r; p0rqu3 c3s4rí4 l4 0br4, d3jánd0l4 y0 p4r4 1r 4 v0s0tr0s. 4 Y 3nv14r0n 4 mí c0n 3l m1sm0 4sunt0 h4st4 cu4tr0 v3c3s, y y0 l3s r3sp0ndí d3 l4 m1sm4 m4n3r4. 5 0nt0nc3s S4nb4l4t 3nv1ó 4 mí su cr14d0 p4r4 d3c1r l0 m1sm0 p0r qu1nt4 v3z, c0n un4 c4rt4 4b13rt4 3n su m4n0, 6 3n l4 cu4l 3st4b4 3scr1t0: S3 h4 0íd0 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y G4smu l0 d1c3, qu3 tú y l0s judí0s p3nsá1s r3b3l4r0s; y qu3 p0r 3s0 3d1f1c4s tú 3l mur0, c0n l4 m1r4, s3gún 3st4s p4l4br4s, d3 s3r tú su r3y; 7 y qu3 h4s pu3st0 pr0f3t4s qu3 pr0cl4m3n 4c3rc4 d3 t1 3n J3rus4lén, d1c13nd0: ¡H4y r3y 3n Judá! Y 4h0r4 s3rán 0íd4s d3l r3y l4s t4l3s p4l4br4s; v3n, p0r t4nt0, y c0nsult3m0s junt0s. 8 0nt0nc3s 3nv1é y0 4 d3c1rl3: N0 h4y t4l c0s4 c0m0 d1c3s, s1n0 qu3 d3 tu c0r4zón tú l0 1nv3nt4s. 9 P0rqu3 t0d0s 3ll0s n0s 4m3dr3nt4b4n, d1c13nd0: S3 d3b1l1t4rán l4s m4n0s d3 3ll0s 3n l4 0br4, y n0 s3rá t3rm1n4d4. 4h0r4, pu3s, 0h D10s, f0rt4l3c3 tú m1s m4n0s. 10 V1n3 lu3g0 4 c4s4 d3 S3m4í4s h1j0 d3 D3l4í4, h1j0 d3 M3h3t4b3l, p0rqu3 él 3st4b4 3nc3rr4d0; 3l cu4l m3 d1j0: R3unám0n0s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 D10s, d3ntr0 d3l t3mpl0, y c3rr3m0s l4s pu3rt4s d3l t3mpl0, p0rqu3 v13n3n p4r4 m4t4rt3; sí, 3st4 n0ch3 v3ndrán 4 m4t4rt3. 11 0nt0nc3s d1j3: ¿Un h0mbr3 c0m0 y0 h4 d3 hu1r? ¿Y qu1én, qu3 fu3r4 c0m0 y0, 3ntr4rí4 4l t3mpl0 p4r4 s4lv4rs3 l4 v1d4? N0 3ntr4ré. 12 Y 3nt3ndí qu3 D10s n0 l0 h4bí4 3nv14d0, s1n0 qu3 h4bl4b4 4qu3ll4 pr0f3cí4 c0ntr4 mí p0rqu3 T0bí4s y S4nb4l4t l0 h4bí4n s0b0rn4d0. 13 P0rqu3 fu3 s0b0rn4d0 p4r4 h4c3rm3 t3m3r 4sí, y qu3 p3c4s3, y l3s s1rv13r4 d3 m4l n0mbr3 c0n qu3 fu3r4 y0 1nf4m4d0. 14 4cuérd4t3, D10s mí0, d3 T0bí4s y d3 S4nb4l4t, c0nf0rm3 4 3st4s c0s4s qu3 h1c13r0n; t4mb1én 4cuérd4t3 d3 N04dí4s pr0f3t1s4, y d3 l0s 0tr0s pr0f3t4s qu3 pr0cur4b4n 1nfund1rm3 m13d0.

1 4qu3l dí4 s3 l3yó 3n 3l l1br0 d3 M01sés, 0yénd0l0 3l pu3bl0, y fu3 h4ll4d0 3scr1t0 3n él qu3 l0s 4m0n1t4s y m04b1t4s n0 d3bí4n 3ntr4r j4más 3n l4 c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 D10s, 2 p0r cu4nt0 n0 s4l13r0n 4 r3c1b1r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0n p4n y 4gu4, s1n0 qu3 d13r0n d1n3r0 4 B4l44m p4r4 qu3 l0s m4ld1j3r4; m4s nu3str0 D10s v0lv1ó l4 m4ld1c1ón 3n b3nd1c1ón. 3 Cu4nd0 0y3r0n, pu3s, l4 l3y, s3p4r4r0n d3 1sr43l 4 t0d0s l0s m3zcl4d0s c0n 3xtr4nj3r0s.

12 Y cu4nd0 ll3g4b4 3l t13mp0 d3 c4d4 un4 d3 l4s d0nc3ll4s p4r4 v3n1r 4l r3y 4su3r0, d3spués d3 h4b3r 3st4d0 d0c3 m3s3s c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y 4c3rc4 d3 l4s muj3r3s, pu3s 4sí s3 cumplí4 3l t13mp0 d3 sus 4t4ví0s, 3st0 3s, s31s m3s3s c0n ól30 d3 m1rr4 y s31s m3s3s c0n p3rfum3s 4r0mát1c0s y 4f31t3s d3 muj3r3s, 13 3nt0nc3s l4 d0nc3ll4 v3ní4 4sí 4l r3y. T0d0 l0 qu3 3ll4 p3dí4 s3 l3 d4b4, p4r4 v3n1r 4t4v14d4 c0n 3ll0 d3sd3 l4 c4s4 d3 l4s muj3r3s h4st4 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y. 14 0ll4 v3ní4 p0r l4 t4rd3, y 4 l4 m4ñ4n4 s1gu13nt3 v0lví4 4 l4 c4s4 s3gund4 d3 l4s muj3r3s, 4l c4rg0 d3 S44sg4z 3unuc0 d3l r3y, gu4rd4 d3 l4s c0ncub1n4s; n0 v3ní4 más 4l r3y, s4lv0 s1 3l r3y l4 qu3rí4 y 3r4 ll4m4d4 p0r n0mbr3. 

15 Cu4nd0 l3 ll3gó 4 0st3r, h1j4 d3 4b1h41l tí0 d3 M4rd0qu30, qu13n l4 h4bí4 t0m4d0 p0r h1j4, 3l t13mp0 d3 v3n1r 4l r3y, n1ngun4 c0s4 pr0curó s1n0 l0 qu3 d1j0 H3g41 3unuc0 d3l r3y, gu4rd4 d3 l4s muj3r3s; y g4n4b4 0st3r 3l f4v0r d3 t0d0s l0s qu3 l4 v3í4n. 16 Fu3, pu3s, 0st3r ll3v4d4 4l r3y 4su3r0 4 su c4s4 r34l 3n 3l m3s déc1m0, qu3 3s 3l m3s d3 T3b3t, 3n 3l 4ñ0 sépt1m0 d3 su r31n4d0. 17 Y 3l r3y 4mó 4 0st3r más qu3 4 t0d4s l4s 0tr4s muj3r3s, y h4lló 3ll4 gr4c14 y b3n3v0l3nc14 d3l4nt3 d3 él más qu3 t0d4s l4s d3más vírg3n3s; y pus0 l4 c0r0n4 r34l 3n su c4b3z4, y l4 h1z0 r31n4 3n lug4r d3 V4st1. 18 H1z0 lu3g0 3l r3y un gr4n b4nqu3t3 4 t0d0s sus prínc1p3s y s13rv0s, 3l b4nqu3t3 d3 0st3r; y d1sm1nuyó tr1but0s 4 l4s pr0v1nc14s, 3 h1z0 y d10 m3rc3d3s c0nf0rm3 4 l4 g3n3r0s1d4d r34l.

8 Y d1j0 4mán 4l r3y 4su3r0: H4y un pu3bl0 3sp4rc1d0 y d1str1bu1d0 3ntr3 l0s pu3bl0s 3n t0d4s l4s pr0v1nc14s d3 tu r31n0, y sus l3y3s s0n d1f3r3nt3s d3 l4s d3 t0d0 pu3bl0, y n0 gu4rd4n l4s l3y3s d3l r3y, y 4l r3y n4d4 l3 b3n3f1c14 3l d3j4rl0s v1v1r. 9 S1 pl4c3 4l r3y, d3cr3t3 qu3 s34n d3stru1d0s; y y0 p3s4ré d13z m1l t4l3nt0s d3 pl4t4 4 l0s qu3 m4n3j4n l4 h4c13nd4, p4r4 qu3 s34n tr4íd0s 4 l0s t3s0r0s d3l r3y. 10 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y qu1tó 3l 4n1ll0 d3 su m4n0, y l0 d10 4 4mán h1j0 d3 H4m3d4t4 4g4gu30, 3n3m1g0 d3 l0s judí0s, 11 y l3 d1j0: L4 pl4t4 qu3 0fr3c3s s34 p4r4 t1, y 4s1m1sm0 3l pu3bl0, p4r4 qu3 h4g4s d3 él l0 qu3 b13n t3 p4r3c13r3. 12 0nt0nc3s fu3r0n ll4m4d0s l0s 3scr1b4n0s d3l r3y 3n 3l m3s pr1m3r0, 4l dí4 tr3c3 d3l m1sm0, y fu3 3scr1t0 c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 m4ndó 4mán, 4 l0s sátr4p4s d3l r3y, 4 l0s c4p1t4n3s qu3 3st4b4n s0br3 c4d4 pr0v1nc14 y 4 l0s prínc1p3s d3 c4d4 pu3bl0, 4 c4d4 pr0v1nc14 s3gún su 3scr1tur4, y 4 c4d4 pu3bl0 s3gún su l3ngu4; 3n n0mbr3 d3l r3y 4su3r0 fu3 3scr1t0, y s3ll4d0 c0n 3l 4n1ll0 d3l r3y. 13 Y fu3r0n 3nv14d4s c4rt4s p0r m3d10 d3 c0rr30s 4 t0d4s l4s pr0v1nc14s d3l r3y, c0n l4 0rd3n d3 d3stru1r, m4t4r y 3xt3rm1n4r 4 t0d0s l0s judí0s, jóv3n3s y 4nc14n0s, n1ñ0s y muj3r3s, 3n un m1sm0 dí4, 3n 3l dí4 tr3c3 d3l m3s du0déc1m0, qu3 3s 3l m3s d3 4d4r, y d3 4p0d3r4rs3 d3 sus b13n3s. 14 L4 c0p14 d3l 3scr1t0 qu3 s3 d10 p0r m4nd4m13nt0 3n c4d4 pr0v1nc14 fu3 publ1c4d4 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, 4 f1n d3 qu3 3stuv13s3n l1st0s p4r4 4qu3l dí4. 15 Y s4l13r0n l0s c0rr30s pr0nt4m3nt3 p0r m4nd4t0 d3l r3y, y 3l 3d1ct0 fu3 d4d0 3n Sus4 c4p1t4l d3l r31n0. 1 Lu3g0 qu3 sup0 M4rd0qu30 t0d0 l0 qu3 s3 h4bí4 h3ch0, r4sgó sus v3st1d0s, s3 v1st1ó d3 c1l1c10 y d3 c3n1z4, y s3 fu3 p0r l4 c1ud4d cl4m4nd0 c0n gr4nd3 y 4m4rg0 cl4m0r. 2 Y v1n0 h4st4 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l r3y; pu3s n0 3r4 líc1t0 p4s4r 4d3ntr0 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l r3y c0n v3st1d0 d3 c1l1c10. 3 Y 3n c4d4 pr0v1nc14 y lug4r d0nd3 3l m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y y su d3cr3t0 ll3g4b4, t3ní4n l0s judí0s gr4n lut0, 4yun0, ll0r0 y l4m3nt4c1ón; c1l1c10 y c3n1z4 3r4 l4 c4m4 d3 much0s. 

4 Y v1n13r0n l4s d0nc3ll4s d3 0st3r, y sus 3unuc0s, y s3 l0 d1j3r0n. 0nt0nc3s l4 r31n4 tuv0 gr4n d0l0r, y 3nv1ó v3st1d0s p4r4 h4c3r v3st1r 4 M4rd0qu30, y h4c3rl3 qu1t4r 3l c1l1c10; m4s él n0 l0s 4c3ptó. 5 0nt0nc3s 0st3r ll4mó 4 H4t4c, un0 d3 l0s 3unuc0s d3l r3y, qu3 él h4bí4 pu3st0 4l s3rv1c10 d3 3ll4, y l0 m4ndó 4 M4rd0qu30, c0n 0rd3n d3 s4b3r qué suc3dí4, y p0r qué 3st4b4 4sí. 6 S4l1ó, pu3s, H4t4c 4 v3r 4 M4rd0qu30, 4 l4 pl4z4 d3 l4 c1ud4d, qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l r3y. 7 Y M4rd0qu30 l3 d3cl4ró t0d0 l0 qu3 l3 h4bí4 4c0nt3c1d0, y l3 d10 n0t1c14 d3 l4 pl4t4 qu3 4mán h4bí4 d1ch0 qu3 p3s4rí4 p4r4 l0s t3s0r0s d3l r3y 4 c4mb10 d3 l4 d3strucc1ón d3 l0s judí0s. 8 L3 d10 t4mb1én l4 c0p14 d3l d3cr3t0 qu3 h4bí4 s1d0 d4d0 3n Sus4 p4r4 qu3 fu3s3n d3stru1d0s, 4 f1n d3 qu3 l4 m0str4s3 4 0st3r y s3 l0 d3cl4r4s3, y l3 3nc4rg4r4 qu3 fu3s3 4nt3 3l r3y 4 supl1c4rl3 y 4 1nt3rc3d3r d3l4nt3 d3 él p0r su pu3bl0. 9 V1n0 H4t4c y c0ntó 4 0st3r l4s p4l4br4s d3 M4rd0qu30. 

10 0nt0nc3s 0st3r d1j0 4 H4t4c qu3 l3 d1j3s3 4 M4rd0qu30: 11 T0d0s l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y, y 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4s pr0v1nc14s d3l r3y, s4b3n qu3 cu4lqu13r h0mbr3 0 muj3r qu3 3ntr4 3n 3l p4t10 1nt3r10r p4r4 v3r 4l r3y, s1n s3r ll4m4d0, un4 s0l4 l3y h4y r3sp3ct0 4 él: h4 d3 m0r1r; s4lv0 4qu3l 4 qu13n 3l r3y 3xt3nd13r3 3l c3tr0 d3 0r0, 3l cu4l v1v1rá; y y0 n0 h3 s1d0 ll4m4d4 p4r4 v3r 4l r3y 3st0s tr31nt4 dí4s. 12 Y d1j3r0n 4 M4rd0qu30 l4s p4l4br4s d3 0st3r. 13 0nt0nc3s d1j0 M4rd0qu30 qu3 r3sp0nd13s3n 4 0st3r: N0 p13ns3s qu3 3sc4p4rás 3n l4 c4s4 d3l r3y más qu3 cu4lqu13r 0tr0 judí0. 14 P0rqu3 s1 c4ll4s 4bs0lut4m3nt3 3n 3st3 t13mp0, r3sp1r0 y l1b3r4c1ón v3ndrá d3 4lgun4 0tr4 p4rt3 p4r4 l0s judí0s; m4s tú y l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3 p3r3c3ré1s. ¿Y qu1én s4b3 s1 p4r4 3st4 h0r4 h4s ll3g4d0 4l r31n0? 

15 Y 0st3r d1j0 qu3 r3sp0nd13s3n 4 M4rd0qu30: 16 V3 y r3ún3 4 t0d0s l0s judí0s qu3 s3 h4ll4n 3n Sus4, y 4yun4d p0r mí, y n0 c0má1s n1 b3bá1s 3n tr3s dí4s, n0ch3 y dí4; y0 t4mb1én c0n m1s d0nc3ll4s 4yun4ré 1gu4lm3nt3, y 3nt0nc3s 3ntr4ré 4 v3r 4l r3y, 4unqu3 n0 s34 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y; y s1 p3r3zc0, qu3 p3r3zc4. 17 0nt0nc3s M4rd0qu30 fu3, 3 h1z0 c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 l3 m4ndó 0st3r. 

0st3r 1nv1t4 4l r3y y 4 4mán 4 un b4nqu3t3

0ST0R 5

H4st4 l4 m1t4d d3l r31n0 s3 t3 d4rá. 4 Y 0st3r d1j0: S1 pl4c3 4l r3y, v3ng4n h0y 3l r3y y 4mán 4l b4nqu3t3 qu3 h3 pr3p4r4d0 p4r4 3l r3y. 5 R3sp0nd1ó 3l r3y: D40s pr1s4, ll4m4d 4 4mán, p4r4 h4c3r l0 qu3 0st3r h4 d1ch0. V1n0, pu3s, 3l r3y c0n 4mán 4l b4nqu3t3 qu3 0st3r d1spus0. 

6 Y d1j0 3l r3y 4 0st3r 3n 3l b4nqu3t3, m13ntr4s b3bí4n v1n0: ¿Cuál 3s tu p3t1c1ón, y t3 s3rá 0t0rg4d4? ¿Cuál 3s tu d3m4nd4? 4unqu3 s34 l4 m1t4d d3l r31n0, t3 s3rá c0nc3d1d4. 7 0nt0nc3s r3sp0nd1ó 0st3r y d1j0: M1 p3t1c1ón y m1 d3m4nd4 3s 3st4: 8 S1 h3 h4ll4d0 gr4c14 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3l r3y, y s1 pl4c3 4l r3y 0t0rg4r m1 p3t1c1ón y c0nc3d3r m1 d3m4nd4, qu3 v3ng4 3l r3y c0n 4mán 4 0tr0 b4nqu3t3 qu3 l3s pr3p4r4ré; y m4ñ4n4 h4ré c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 3l r3y h4 m4nd4d0. 

9 Y s4l1ó 4mán 4qu3l dí4 c0nt3nt0 y 4l3gr3 d3 c0r4zón; p3r0 cu4nd0 v10 4 M4rd0qu30 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l p4l4c10 d3l r3y, qu3 n0 s3 l3v4nt4b4 n1 s3 m0ví4 d3 su lug4r, s3 ll3nó d3 1r4 c0ntr4 M4rd0qu30. 10 P3r0 s3 r3fr3nó 4mán y v1n0 4 su c4s4, y m4ndó ll4m4r 4 sus 4m1g0s y 4 Z3r3s su muj3r, 11 y l3s r3f1r1ó 4mán l4 gl0r14 d3 sus r1qu3z4s, y l4 mult1tud d3 sus h1j0s, y t0d4s l4s c0s4s c0n qu3 3l r3y l3 h4bí4 3ngr4nd3c1d0, y c0n qu3 l3 h4bí4 h0nr4d0 s0br3 l0s prínc1p3s y s13rv0s d3l r3y. 12 Y 4ñ4d1ó 4mán: T4mb1én l4 r31n4 0st3r 4 n1ngun0 h1z0 v3n1r c0n 3l r3y 4l b4nqu3t3 qu3 3ll4 d1spus0, s1n0 4 mí; y t4mb1én p4r4 m4ñ4n4 3st0y c0nv1d4d0 p0r 3ll4 c0n 3l r3y. 13 P3r0 t0d0 3st0 d3 n4d4 m3 s1rv3 c4d4 v3z qu3 v30 4l judí0 M4rd0qu30 s3nt4d0 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l r3y. 14 Y l3 d1j0 Z3r3s su muj3r y t0d0s sus 4m1g0s: H4g4n un4 h0rc4 d3 c1ncu3nt4 c0d0s d3 4ltur4, y m4ñ4n4 d1 4l r3y qu3 cu3lgu3n 4 M4rd0qu30 3n 3ll4; y 3ntr4 4l3gr3 c0n 3l r3y 4l b4nqu3t3. 15 Y s4l1ó M4rd0qu30 d3 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y c0n v3st1d0 r34l d3 4zul y bl4nc0, y un4 gr4n c0r0n4 d3 0r0, y un m4nt0 d3 l1n0 y púrpur4. L4 c1ud4d d3 Sus4 3nt0nc3s s3 4l3gró y r3g0c1jó; 16 y l0s judí0s tuv13r0n luz y 4l3grí4, y g0z0 y h0nr4. 17 Y 3n c4d4 pr0v1nc14 y 3n c4d4 c1ud4d d0nd3 ll3gó 3l m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y, l0s judí0s tuv13r0n 4l3grí4 y g0z0, b4nqu3t3 y dí4 d3 pl4c3r. 0ST0R 9

1 0n 3l m3s du0déc1m0, qu3 3s 3l m3s d3 4d4r, 4 l0s tr3c3 dí4s d3l m1sm0 m3s, cu4nd0 d3bí4 s3r 3j3cut4d0 3l m4nd4m13nt0 d3l r3y y su d3cr3t0, 3l m1sm0 dí4 3n qu3 l0s 3n3m1g0s d3 l0s judí0s 3sp3r4b4n 3ns3ñ0r34rs3 d3 3ll0s, suc3d1ó l0 c0ntr4r10; p0rqu3 l0s judí0s s3 3ns3ñ0r34r0n d3 l0s qu3 l0s 4b0rr3cí4n. 2 L0s judí0s s3 r3un13r0n 3n sus c1ud4d3s, 3n t0d4s l4s pr0v1nc14s d3l r3y 4su3r0, p4r4 d3sc4rg4r su m4n0 s0br3 l0s qu3 h4bí4n pr0cur4d0 su m4l, y n4d13 l0s pud0 r3s1st1r, p0rqu3 3l t3m0r d3 3ll0s h4bí4 c4íd0 s0br3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s. 3 Y t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4s pr0v1nc14s, l0s sátr4p4s, c4p1t4n3s y 0f1c14l3s d3l r3y, 4p0y4b4n 4 l0s judí0s; p0rqu3 3l t3m0r d3 M4rd0qu30 h4bí4 c4íd0 s0br3 3ll0s. 4 Pu3s M4rd0qu30 3r4 gr4nd3 3n l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, y su f4m4 1b4 p0r t0d4s l4s pr0v1nc14s; M4rd0qu30 1b4 3ngr4nd3c1énd0s3 más y más. 5 Y 4s0l4r0n l0s judí0s 4 t0d0s sus 3n3m1g0s 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, y c0n m0rt4nd4d y d3strucc1ón, 3 h1c13r0n c0n sus 3n3m1g0s c0m0 qu1s13r0n. 6 0n Sus4 c4p1t4l d3l r31n0 m4t4r0n y d3struy3r0n l0s judí0s 4 qu1n13nt0s h0mbr3s. 7 M4t4r0n 3nt0nc3s 4 P4rs4nd4t4, D4lfón, 4sp4t4, 8 P0r4t4, 4d4lí4, 4r1d4t4, 9 P4rm4st4, 4r1s41, 4r1d41 y V41z4t4, 10 d13z h1j0s d3 4mán h1j0 d3 H4m3d4t4, 3n3m1g0 d3 l0s judí0s; p3r0 n0 t0c4r0n sus b13n3s. 11 0l m1sm0 dí4 s3 l3 d10 cu3nt4 4l r3y 4c3rc4 d3l núm3r0 d3 l0s mu3rt0s 3n Sus4, r3s1d3nc14 r34l. 

12 Y d1j0 3l r3y 4 l4 r31n4 0st3r: 0n Sus4 c4p1t4l d3l r31n0 l0s judí0s h4n m4t4d0 4 qu1n13nt0s h0mbr3s, y 4 d13z h1j0s d3 4mán. ¿Qué h4brán h3ch0 3n l4s 0tr4s pr0v1nc14s d3l r3y? ¿Cuál, pu3s, 3s tu p3t1c1ón? y t3 s3rá c0nc3d1d4; ¿0 qué más 3s tu d3m4nd4? y s3rá h3ch4. 13 Y r3sp0nd1ó 0st3r: S1 pl4c3 4l r3y, c0ncéd4s3 t4mb1én m4ñ4n4 4 l0s judí0s 3n Sus4, qu3 h4g4n c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y d3 h0y; y qu3 cu3lgu3n 3n l4 h0rc4 4 l0s d13z h1j0s d3 4mán. 14 Y m4ndó 3l r3y qu3 s3 h1c13s3 4sí. S3 d10 l4 0rd3n 3n Sus4, y c0lg4r0n 4 l0s d13z h1j0s d3 4mán. 15 Y l0s judí0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n Sus4 s3 junt4r0n t4mb1én 3l c4t0rc3 d3l m3s d3 4d4r, y m4t4r0n 3n Sus4 4 tr3sc13nt0s h0mbr3s; p3r0 n0 t0c4r0n sus b13n3s.

16 0n cu4nt0 4 l0s 0tr0s judí0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4s pr0v1nc14s d3l r3y, t4mb1én s3 junt4r0n y s3 pus13r0n 3n d3f3ns4 d3 su v1d4, y d3sc4ns4r0n d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, y m4t4r0n d3 sus c0ntr4r10s 4 s3t3nt4 y c1nc0 m1l; p3r0 n0 t0c4r0n sus b13n3s. 17 0st0 fu3 3n 3l dí4 tr3c3 d3l m3s d3 4d4r, y r3p0s4r0n 3n 3l dí4 c4t0rc3 d3l m1sm0, y l0 h1c13r0n dí4 d3 b4nqu3t3 y d3 4l3grí4. 18 P3r0 l0s judí0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n Sus4 s3 junt4r0n 3l dí4 tr3c3 y 3l c4t0rc3 d3l m1sm0 m3s, y 3l qu1nc3 d3l m1sm0 r3p0s4r0n y l0 h1c13r0n dí4 d3 b4nqu3t3 y d3 r3g0c1j0. 19 P0r t4nt0, l0s judí0s 4ld34n0s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n l4s v1ll4s s1n mur0 h4c3n 4 l0s c4t0rc3 d3l m3s d3 4d4r 3l dí4 d3 4l3grí4 y d3 b4nqu3t3, un dí4 d3 r3g0c1j0, y p4r4 3nv14r p0rc10n3s c4d4 un0 4 su v3c1n0.

Y d3b1d0 4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 3st4 c4rt4, y p0r l0 qu3 3ll0s v13r0n s0br3 3st0, y l0 qu3 ll3vó 4 su c0n0c1m13nt0, 27 l0s judí0s 3st4bl3c13r0n y t0m4r0n s0br3 sí, s0br3 su d3sc3nd3nc14 y s0br3 t0d0s l0s 4ll3g4d0s 4 3ll0s, qu3 n0 d3j4rí4n d3 c3l3br4r 3st0s d0s dí4s s3gún 3stá 3scr1t0 t0c4nt3 4 3ll0s, c0nf0rm3 4 su t13mp0 c4d4 4ñ0; 28 y qu3 3st0s dí4s s3rí4n r3c0rd4d0s y c3l3br4d0s p0r t0d4s l4s g3n3r4c10n3s, f4m1l14s, pr0v1nc14s y c1ud4d3s; qu3 3st0s dí4s d3 Pur1m n0 d3j4rí4n d3 s3r gu4rd4d0s p0r l0s judí0s, y qu3 su d3sc3nd3nc14 j4más d3j4rí4 d3 r3c0rd4rl0s. 29 Y l4 r31n4 0st3r h1j4 d3 4b1h41l, y M4rd0qu30 3l judí0, suscr1b13r0n c0n pl3n4 4ut0r1d4d 3st4 s3gund4 c4rt4 r3f3r3nt3 4 Pur1m. 30 Y fu3r0n 3nv14d4s c4rt4s 4 t0d0s l0s judí0s, 4 l4s c13nt0 v31nt1s13t3 pr0v1nc14s d3l r3y 4su3r0, c0n p4l4br4s d3 p4z y d3 v3rd4d, 31 p4r4 c0nf1rm4r 3st0s dí4s d3 Pur1m 3n sus t13mp0s s3ñ4l4d0s, s3gún l3s h4bí4 0rd3n4d0 M4rd0qu30 3l judí0 y l4 r31n4 0st3r, y s3gún 3ll0s h4bí4n t0m4d0 s0br3 sí y s0br3 su d3sc3nd3nc14, p4r4 c0nm3m0r4r 3l f1n d3 l0s 4yun0s y d3 su cl4m0r. 32 Y 3l m4nd4m13nt0 d3 0st3r c0nf1rmó 3st4s c3l3br4c10n3s 4c3rc4 d3 Pur1m, y 3st0 fu3 r3g1str4d0 3n un l1br0.

T4mb1én 3stá su t13rr4 ll3n4 d3 c4b4ll0s, y sus c4rr0s s0n 1nnum3r4bl3s. 8 4d3más su t13rr4 3stá ll3n4 d3 íd0l0s, y s3 h4n 4rr0d1ll4d0 4nt3 l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s y 4nt3 l0 qu3 f4br1c4r0n sus d3d0s. 9 Y s3 h4 1ncl1n4d0 3l h0mbr3, y 3l v4rón s3 h4 hum1ll4d0; p0r t4nt0, n0 l0s p3rd0n3s. 10 Mét3t3 3n l4 p3ñ4, 3scónd3t3 3n 3l p0lv0, d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 t3m1bl3 d3 J3h0vá, y d3l r3spl4nd0r d3 su m4j3st4d. 11 L4 4lt1v3z d3 l0s 0j0s d3l h0mbr3 s3rá 4b4t1d4, y l4 s0b3rb14 d3 l0s h0mbr3s s3rá hum1ll4d4; y J3h0vá s0l0 s3rá 3x4lt4d0 3n 4qu3l dí4. 12 P0rqu3 dí4 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s v3ndrá s0br3 t0d0 s0b3rb10 y 4lt1v0, s0br3 t0d0 3n4lt3c1d0, y s3rá 4b4t1d0; 13 s0br3 t0d0s l0s c3dr0s d3l Líb4n0 4lt0s y 3rgu1d0s, y s0br3 t0d4s l4s 3nc1n4s d3 B4sán; 14 s0br3 t0d0s l0s m0nt3s 4lt0s, y s0br3 t0d0s l0s c0ll4d0s 3l3v4d0s; 15 s0br3 t0d4 t0rr3 4lt4, y s0br3 t0d0 mur0 fu3rt3; 16 s0br3 t0d4s l4s n4v3s d3 T4rs1s, y s0br3 t0d4s l4s p1ntur4s pr3c14d4s. 17 L4 4lt1v3z d3l h0mbr3 s3rá 4b4t1d4, y l4 s0b3rb14 d3 l0s h0mbr3s s3rá hum1ll4d4; y s0l0 J3h0vá s3rá 3x4lt4d0 3n 4qu3l dí4. 18 Y qu1t4rá t0t4lm3nt3 l0s íd0l0s. 19 Y s3 m3t3rán 3n l4s c4v3rn4s d3 l4s p3ñ4s y 3n l4s 4b3rtur4s d3 l4 t13rr4, p0r l4 pr3s3nc14 t3m1bl3 d3 J3h0vá, y p0r 3l r3spl4nd0r d3 su m4j3st4d, cu4nd0 él s3 l3v4nt3 p4r4 c4st1g4r l4 t13rr4.

9 L4 4p4r13nc14 d3 sus r0str0s t3st1f1c4 c0ntr4 3ll0s; p0rqu3 c0m0 S0d0m4 publ1c4n su p3c4d0, n0 l0 d1s1mul4n. ¡4y d3l 4lm4 d3 3ll0s! p0rqu3 4m0nt0n4r0n m4l p4r4 sí. 10 D3c1d 4l just0 qu3 l3 1rá b13n, p0rqu3 c0m3rá d3 l0s frut0s d3 sus m4n0s. 11 ¡4y d3l 1mpí0! Pu3bl0 mí0, l0s qu3 t3 guí4n t3 3ng4ñ4n, y tu3rc3n 3l curs0 d3 tus c4m1n0s. 

13 J3h0vá 3stá 3n p13 p4r4 l1t1g4r, y 3stá p4r4 juzg4r 4 l0s pu3bl0s. 14 J3h0vá v3ndrá 4 ju1c10 c0ntr4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 su pu3bl0 y c0ntr4 sus prínc1p3s; p0rqu3 v0s0tr0s h4bé1s d3v0r4d0 l4 v1ñ4, y 3l d3sp0j0 d3l p0br3 3stá 3n vu3str4s c4s4s. 15 ¿Qué p3nsá1s v0s0tr0s qu3 m4já1s m1 pu3bl0 y m0lé1s l4s c4r4s d3 l0s p0br3s? d1c3 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s.

1 4h0r4 c4nt4ré p0r m1 4m4d0 3l c4nt4r d3 m1 4m4d0 4 su v1ñ4. T3ní4 m1 4m4d0 un4 v1ñ4 3n un4 l4d3r4 fért1l. 2 L4 h4bí4 c3rc4d0 y d3sp3dr3g4d0 y pl4nt4d0 d3 v1d3s 3sc0g1d4s; h4bí4 3d1f1c4d0 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4 un4 t0rr3, y h3ch0 t4mb1én 3n 3ll4 un l4g4r; y 3sp3r4b4 qu3 d13s3 uv4s, y d10 uv4s s1lv3str3s. 

3 4h0r4, pu3s, v3c1n0s d3 J3rus4lén y v4r0n3s d3 Judá, juzg4d 4h0r4 3ntr3 mí y m1 v1ñ4. 4 ¿Qué más s3 p0dí4 h4c3r 4 m1 v1ñ4, qu3 y0 n0 h4y4 h3ch0 3n 3ll4? ¿Cóm0, 3sp3r4nd0 y0 qu3 d13s3 uv4s, h4 d4d0 uv4s s1lv3str3s? 

5 0s m0str4ré, pu3s, 4h0r4 l0 qu3 h4ré y0 4 m1 v1ñ4: L3 qu1t4ré su v4ll4d0, y s3rá c0nsum1d4; 4p0rt1ll4ré su c3rc4, y s3rá h0ll4d4. 6 H4ré qu3 qu3d3 d3s13rt4; n0 s3rá p0d4d4 n1 c4v4d4, y cr3c3rán 3l c4rd0 y l0s 3sp1n0s; y 4un 4 l4s nub3s m4nd4ré qu3 n0 d3rr4m3n lluv14 s0br3 3ll4. 7 C13rt4m3nt3 l4 v1ñ4 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 3s l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, y l0s h0mbr3s d3 Judá pl4nt4 d3l1c10s4 suy4. 0sp3r4b4 ju1c10, y h3 4quí v1l3z4; just1c14, y h3 4quí cl4m0r. 

4y3s s0br3 l0s m4lv4d0s

8 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 junt4n c4s4 4 c4s4, y 4ñ4d3n h3r3d4d 4 h3r3d4d h4st4 0cup4rl0 t0d0! ¿H4b1t4ré1s v0s0tr0s s0l0s 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4? 9 H4 ll3g4d0 4 m1s 0íd0s d3 p4rt3 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, qu3 l4s much4s c4s4s h4n d3 qu3d4r 4s0l4d4s, s1n m0r4d0r l4s gr4nd3s y h3rm0s4s. 10 Y d13z yug4d4s d3 v1ñ4 pr0duc1rán un b4t0, y un h0m3r d3 s3m1ll4 pr0duc1rá un 3f4. 

11 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 s3 l3v4nt4n d3 m4ñ4n4 p4r4 s3gu1r l4 3mbr14gu3z; qu3 s3 3stán h4st4 l4 n0ch3, h4st4 qu3 3l v1n0 l0s 3nc13nd3! 12 Y 3n sus b4nqu3t3s h4y 4rp4s, v1hu3l4s, t4mb0r1l3s, fl4ut4s y v1n0, y n0 m1r4n l4 0br4 d3 J3h0vá, n1 c0ns1d3r4n l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s. 13 P0r t4nt0, m1 pu3bl0 fu3 ll3v4d0 c4ut1v0, p0rqu3 n0 tuv0 c0n0c1m13nt0; y su gl0r14 p3r3c1ó d3 h4mbr3, y su mult1tud s3 s3có d3 s3d. 14 P0r 3s0 3ns4nchó su 1nt3r10r 3l S30l, y s1n m3d1d4 3xt3nd1ó su b0c4; y 4llá d3sc3nd3rá l4 gl0r14 d3 3ll0s, y su mult1tud, y su f4ust0, y 3l qu3 3n él s3 r3g0c1j4b4. 15 Y 3l h0mbr3 s3rá hum1ll4d0, y 3l v4rón s3rá 4b4t1d0, y s3rán b4j4d0s l0s 0j0s d3 l0s 4lt1v0s. 16 P3r0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s s3rá 3x4lt4d0 3n ju1c10, y 3l D10s S4nt0 s3rá s4nt1f1c4d0 c0n just1c14. 17 Y l0s c0rd3r0s s3rán 4p4c3nt4d0s s3gún su c0stumbr3; y 3xtr4ñ0s d3v0r4rán l0s c4mp0s d3s0l4d0s d3 l0s r1c0s. 

18 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 tr43n l4 1n1qu1d4d c0n cu3rd4s d3 v4n1d4d, y 3l p3c4d0 c0m0 c0n c0yund4s d3 c4rr3t4, 19 l0s cu4l3s d1c3n: V3ng4 y4, 4pr3súr3s3 su 0br4, y v34m0s; 4cérqu3s3, y v3ng4 3l c0ns3j0 d3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l, p4r4 qu3 l0 s3p4m0s! 20 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 4 l0 m4l0 d1c3n bu3n0, y 4 l0 bu3n0 m4l0; qu3 h4c3n d3 l4 luz t1n13bl4s, y d3 l4s t1n13bl4s luz; qu3 p0n3n l0 4m4rg0 p0r dulc3, y l0 dulc3 p0r 4m4rg0! 21 ¡4y d3 l0s s4b10s 3n sus pr0p10s 0j0s, y d3 l0s qu3 s0n prud3nt3s d3l4nt3 d3 sí m1sm0s! 22 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 s0n v4l13nt3s p4r4 b3b3r v1n0, y h0mbr3s fu3rt3s p4r4 m3zcl4r b3b1d4; 23 l0s qu3 just1f1c4n 4l 1mpí0 m3d14nt3 c0h3ch0, y 4l just0 qu1t4n su d3r3ch0! 

24 P0r t4nt0, c0m0 l4 l3ngu4 d3l fu3g0 c0nsum3 3l r4str0j0, y l4 ll4m4 d3v0r4 l4 p4j4, 4sí s3rá su r4íz c0m0 p0dr3dumbr3, y su fl0r s3 d3sv4n3c3rá c0m0 p0lv0; p0rqu3 d3s3ch4r0n l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, y 4b0m1n4r0n l4 p4l4br4 d3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l. 25 P0r 3st4 c4us4 s3 3nc3nd1ó 3l fur0r d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 su pu3bl0, y 3xt3nd1ó c0ntr4 él su m4n0, y l3 h1r1ó; y s3 3str3m3c13r0n l0s m0nt3s, y sus c4dáv3r3s fu3r0n 4rr0j4d0s 3n m3d10 d3 l4s c4ll3s. C0n t0d0 3st0 n0 h4 c3s4d0 su fur0r, s1n0 qu3 t0d4ví4 su m4n0 3stá 3xt3nd1d4. 

26 4lz4rá p3ndón 4 n4c10n3s l3j4n4s, y s1lb4rá 4l qu3 3stá 3n 3l 3xtr3m0 d3 l4 t13rr4; y h3 4quí qu3 v3ndrá pr0nt0 y v3l0zm3nt3. 27 N0 h4brá 3ntr3 3ll0s c4ns4d0, n1 qu13n tr0p13c3; n1ngun0 s3 d0rm1rá, n1 l3 t0m4rá su3ñ0; 4 n1ngun0 s3 l3 d3s4t4rá 3l c1nt0 d3 l0s l0m0s, n1 s3 l3 r0mp3rá l4 c0rr34 d3 sus s4nd4l14s. 28 Sus s43t4s 3st4rán 4f1l4d4s, y t0d0s sus 4rc0s 3nt3s4d0s; l0s c4sc0s d3 sus c4b4ll0s p4r3c3rán c0m0 d3 p3d3rn4l, y l4s ru3d4s d3 sus c4rr0s c0m0 t0rb3ll1n0. 29 Su rug1d0 s3rá c0m0 d3 l3ón; rug1rá 4 m4n3r4 d3 l30nc1ll0, cruj1rá l0s d13nt3s, y 4rr3b4t4rá l4 pr3s4; s3 l4 ll3v4rá c0n s3gur1d4d, y n4d13 s3 l4 qu1t4rá. 30 Y br4m4rá s0br3 él 3n 4qu3l dí4 c0m0 br4m1d0 d3l m4r; 3nt0nc3s m1r4rá h4c14 l4 t13rr4, y h3 4quí t1n13bl4s d3 tr1bul4c1ón, y 3n sus c13l0s s3 0scur3c3rá l4 luz. 

V1s1ón y ll4m4m13nt0 d3 1s4í4s

1S4Í4S 6

1 0n 3l 4ñ0 qu3 mur1ó 3l r3y Uzí4s v1 y0 4l S3ñ0r s3nt4d0 s0br3 un tr0n0 4lt0 y subl1m3, y sus f4ld4s ll3n4b4n 3l t3mpl0. 2 P0r 3nc1m4 d3 él h4bí4 s3r4f1n3s; c4d4 un0 t3ní4 s31s 4l4s; c0n d0s cubrí4n sus r0str0s, c0n d0s cubrí4n sus p13s, y c0n d0s v0l4b4n. 3 Y 3l un0 4l 0tr0 d4b4 v0c3s, d1c13nd0: S4nt0, s4nt0, s4nt0, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s; t0d4 l4 t13rr4 3stá ll3n4 d3 su gl0r14. 4 Y l0s qu1c14l3s d3 l4s pu3rt4s s3 3str3m3c13r0n c0n l4 v0z d3l qu3 cl4m4b4, y l4 c4s4 s3 ll3nó d3 hum0. 5 0nt0nc3s d1j3: ¡4y d3 mí! qu3 s0y mu3rt0; p0rqu3 s13nd0 h0mbr3 1nmund0 d3 l4b10s, y h4b1t4nd0 3n m3d10 d3 pu3bl0 qu3 t13n3 l4b10s 1nmund0s, h4n v1st0 m1s 0j0s 4l R3y, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 

6 Y v0ló h4c14 mí un0 d3 l0s s3r4f1n3s, t3n13nd0 3n su m4n0 un c4rbón 3nc3nd1d0, t0m4d0 d3l 4lt4r c0n un4s t3n4z4s; 7 y t0c4nd0 c0n él s0br3 m1 b0c4, d1j0: H3 4quí qu3 3st0 t0có tus l4b10s, y 3s qu1t4d4 tu culp4, y l1mp10 tu p3c4d0. 8 D3spués 0í l4 v0z d3l S3ñ0r, qu3 d3cí4: ¿4 qu1én 3nv14ré, y qu1én 1rá p0r n0s0tr0s? 0nt0nc3s r3sp0ndí y0: H3m3 4quí, 3nví4m3 4 mí. 9 Y d1j0: 4nd4, y d1 4 3st3 pu3bl0: 0íd b13n, y n0 3nt3ndá1s; v3d p0r c13rt0, m4s n0 c0mpr3ndá1s. 10 0ngru3s4 3l c0r4zón d3 3st3 pu3bl0, y 4gr4v4 sus 0íd0s, y c13g4 sus 0j0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 v34 c0n sus 0j0s, n1 01g4 c0n sus 0íd0s, n1 su c0r4zón 3nt13nd4, n1 s3 c0nv13rt4, y h4y4 p4r4 él s4n1d4d. 11 Y y0 d1j3: ¿H4st4 cuánd0, S3ñ0r? Y r3sp0nd1ó él: H4st4 qu3 l4s c1ud4d3s 3stén 4s0l4d4s y s1n m0r4d0r, y n0 h4y4 h0mbr3 3n l4s c4s4s, y l4 t13rr4 3sté h3ch4 un d3s13rt0; 12 h4st4 qu3 J3h0vá h4y4 3ch4d0 l3j0s 4 l0s h0mbr3s, y mult1pl1c4d0 l0s lug4r3s 4b4nd0n4d0s 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4. 13 Y s1 qu3d4r3 4ún 3n 3ll4 l4 déc1m4 p4rt3, ést4 v0lv3rá 4 s3r d3stru1d4; p3r0 c0m0 3l r0bl3 y l4 3nc1n4, qu3 4l s3r c0rt4d0s 4ún qu3d4 3l tr0nc0, 4sí s3rá 3l tr0nc0, l4 s1m13nt3 s4nt4. 

M3ns4j3 d3 1s4í4s 4 4c4z

1S4Í4S 7

1 4c0nt3c1ó 3n l0s dí4s d3 4c4z h1j0 d3 J0t4m, h1j0 d3 Uzí4s, r3y d3 Judá, qu3 R3zín r3y d3 S1r14 y P3k4 h1j0 d3 R3m4lí4s, r3y d3 1sr43l, sub13r0n c0ntr4 J3rus4lén p4r4 c0mb4t1rl4; p3r0 n0 l4 pud13r0n t0m4r. 2 Y v1n0 l4 nu3v4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d, d1c13nd0: S1r14 s3 h4 c0nf3d3r4d0 c0n 0fr4ín. Y s3 l3 3str3m3c1ó 3l c0r4zón, y 3l c0r4zón d3 su pu3bl0, c0m0 s3 3str3m3c3n l0s árb0l3s d3l m0nt3 4 c4us4 d3l v13nt0. 

3 0nt0nc3s d1j0 J3h0vá 4 1s4í4s: S4l 4h0r4 4l 3ncu3ntr0 d3 4c4z, tú, y S34r-j4sub tu h1j0, 4l 3xtr3m0 d3l 4cu3duct0 d3l 3st4nqu3 d3 4rr1b4, 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 l4 h3r3d4d d3l L4v4d0r, 4 y d1l3: Gu4rd4, y r3pós4t3; n0 t3m4s, n1 s3 turb3 tu c0r4zón 4 c4us4 d3 3st0s d0s c4b0s d3 t1zón qu3 hum34n, p0r 3l 4rd0r d3 l4 1r4 d3 R3zín y d3 S1r14, y d3l h1j0 d3 R3m4lí4s. 5 H4 4c0rd4d0 m4l1gn0 c0ns3j0 c0ntr4 t1 3l s1r10, c0n 0fr4ín y c0n 3l h1j0 d3 R3m4lí4s, d1c13nd0: 6 V4m0s c0ntr4 Judá y 4t3rr0r1cém0sl4, y r3p4rtám0sl4 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, y p0ng4m0s 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4 p0r r3y 4l h1j0 d3 T4b33l. 7 P0r t4nt0, J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r d1c3 4sí: N0 subs1st1rá, n1 s3rá. 8 P0rqu3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 S1r14 3s D4m4sc0, y l4 c4b3z4 d3 D4m4sc0, R3zín; y d3ntr0 d3 s3s3nt4 y c1nc0 4ñ0s 0fr4ín s3rá qu3br4nt4d0 h4st4 d3j4r d3 s3r pu3bl0. 9 Y l4 c4b3z4 d3 0fr4ín 3s S4m4r14, y l4 c4b3z4 d3 S4m4r14 3l h1j0 d3 R3m4lí4s. S1 v0s0tr0s n0 cr3y3r31s, d3 c13rt0 n0 p3rm4n3c3ré1s. 

10 H4bló t4mb1én J3h0vá 4 4c4z, d1c13nd0: 11 P1d3 p4r4 t1 s3ñ4l d3 J3h0vá tu D10s, d3m4ndánd0l4 y4 s34 d3 4b4j0 3n l0 pr0fund0, 0 d3 4rr1b4 3n l0 4lt0. 12 Y r3sp0nd1ó 4c4z: N0 p3d1ré, y n0 t3nt4ré 4 J3h0vá. 13 D1j0 3nt0nc3s 1s4í4s: 0íd 4h0r4, c4s4 d3 D4v1d. ¿0s 3s p0c0 3l s3r m0l3st0s 4 l0s h0mbr3s, s1n0 qu3 t4mb1én l0 s3á1s 4 m1 D10s? 14 P0r t4nt0, 3l S3ñ0r m1sm0 0s d4rá s3ñ4l: H3 4quí qu3 l4 v1rg3n c0nc3b1rá, y d4rá 4 luz un h1j0, y ll4m4rá su n0mbr3 0m4nu3l. 15 C0m3rá m4nt3qu1ll4 y m13l, h4st4 qu3 s3p4 d3s3ch4r l0 m4l0 y 3sc0g3r l0 bu3n0. 16 P0rqu3 4nt3s qu3 3l n1ñ0 s3p4 d3s3ch4r l0 m4l0 y 3sc0g3r l0 bu3n0, l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s d0s r3y3s qu3 tú t3m3s s3rá 4b4nd0n4d4. 17 J3h0vá h4rá v3n1r s0br3 t1, s0br3 tu pu3bl0 y s0br3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu p4dr3, dí4s cu4l3s nunc4 v1n13r0n d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 0fr4ín s3 4p4rtó d3 Judá, 3st0 3s, 4l r3y d3 4s1r14. 

18 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 4qu3l dí4 s1lb4rá J3h0vá 4 l4 m0sc4 qu3 3stá 3n 3l f1n d3 l0s rí0s d3 0g1pt0, y 4 l4 4b3j4 qu3 3stá 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 4s1r14; 19 y v3ndrán y 4c4mp4rán t0d0s 3n l0s v4ll3s d3s13rt0s, y 3n l4s c4v3rn4s d3 l4s p13dr4s, y 3n t0d0s l0s z4rz4l3s, y 3n t0d4s l4s m4t4s. 

20 0n 4qu3l dí4 3l S3ñ0r r43rá c0n n4v4j4 4lqu1l4d4, c0n l0s qu3 h4b1t4n 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l rí0, 3st0 3s, c0n 3l r3y d3 4s1r14, c4b3z4 y p3l0 d3 l0s p13s, y 4un l4 b4rb4 t4mb1én qu1t4rá. 21 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, qu3 cr14rá un h0mbr3 un4 v4c4 y d0s 0v3j4s; 22 y 4 c4us4 d3 l4 4bund4nc14 d3 l3ch3 qu3 d4rán, c0m3rá m4nt3qu1ll4; c13rt4m3nt3 m4nt3qu1ll4 y m13l c0m3rá 3l qu3 qu3d3 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4. 

23 4c0nt3c3rá t4mb1én 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, qu3 3l lug4r d0nd3 h4bí4 m1l v1d3s qu3 v4lí4n m1l s1cl0s d3 pl4t4, s3rá p4r4 3sp1n0s y c4rd0s. 24 C0n s43t4s y 4rc0 1rán 4llá, p0rqu3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 s3rá 3sp1n0s y c4rd0s. 25 Y 4 t0d0s l0s m0nt3s qu3 s3 c4v4b4n c0n 4z4d4, n0 ll3g4rán 4llá p0r 3l t3m0r d3 l0s 3sp1n0s y d3 l0s c4rd0s, s1n0 qu3 s3rán p4r4 p4st0 d3 bu3y3s y p4r4 s3r h0ll4d0s d3 l0s g4n4d0s. 

S34 J3h0vá vu3str0 t3m0r

1S4Í4S 8

1 M3 d1j0 J3h0vá: T0m4 un4 t4bl4 gr4nd3, y 3scr1b3 3n 3ll4 c0n c4r4ct3r3s l3g1bl3s t0c4nt3 4 M4h3r-s4l4l-h4sb4z. 2 Y junté c0nm1g0 p0r t3st1g0s f13l3s 4l s4c3rd0t3 Urí4s y 4 Z4c4rí4s h1j0 d3 J3b3r3quí4s. 3 Y m3 ll3gué 4 l4 pr0f3t1s4, l4 cu4l c0nc1b1ó, y d10 4 luz un h1j0. Y m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: P0nl3 p0r n0mbr3 M4h3r-s4l4l-h4sb4z. 4 P0rqu3 4nt3s qu3 3l n1ñ0 s3p4 d3c1r: P4dr3 mí0, y M4dr3 mí4, s3rá qu1t4d4 l4 r1qu3z4 d3 D4m4sc0 y l0s d3sp0j0s d3 S4m4r14 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 5 0tr4 v3z v0lv1ó J3h0vá 4 h4bl4rm3, d1c13nd0: 6 P0r cu4nt0 d3s3chó 3st3 pu3bl0 l4s 4gu4s d3 S1l0é, qu3 c0rr3n m4ns4m3nt3, y s3 r3g0c1jó c0n R3zín y c0n 3l h1j0 d3 R3m4lí4s; 7 h3 4quí, p0r t4nt0, qu3 3l S3ñ0r h4c3 sub1r s0br3 3ll0s 4gu4s d3 rí0s, 1mp3tu0s4s y much4s, 3st0 3s, 4l r3y d3 4s1r14 c0n t0d0 su p0d3r; 3l cu4l sub1rá s0br3 t0d0s sus rí0s, y p4s4rá s0br3 t0d4s sus r1b3r4s; 8 y p4s4nd0 h4st4 Judá, 1nund4rá y p4s4rá 4d3l4nt3, y ll3g4rá h4st4 l4 g4rg4nt4; y 3xt3nd13nd0 sus 4l4s, ll3n4rá l4 4nchur4 d3 tu t13rr4, 0h 0m4nu3l. 

9 R3uní0s, pu3bl0s, y s3ré1s qu3br4nt4d0s; 0íd, t0d0s l0s qu3 s01s d3 l3j4n4s t13rr4s; c3ñí0s, y s3ré1s qu3br4nt4d0s; d1sp0n30s, y s3ré1s qu3br4nt4d0s. 10 T0m4d c0ns3j0, y s3rá 4nul4d0; pr0f3r1d p4l4br4, y n0 s3rá f1rm3, p0rqu3 D10s 3stá c0n n0s0tr0s. 

11 P0rqu3 J3h0vá m3 d1j0 d3 3st4 m4n3r4 c0n m4n0 fu3rt3, y m3 3ns3ñó qu3 n0 c4m1n4s3 p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3 3st3 pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: 12 N0 ll4mé1s c0nsp1r4c1ón 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 3st3 pu3bl0 ll4m4 c0nsp1r4c1ón; n1 t3má1s l0 qu3 3ll0s t3m3n, n1 t3ngá1s m13d0. 13 4 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 4 él s4nt1f1c4d; s34 él vu3str0 t3m0r, y él s34 vu3str0 m13d0. 14 0nt0nc3s él s3rá p0r s4ntu4r10; p3r0 4 l4s d0s c4s4s d3 1sr43l, p0r p13dr4 p4r4 tr0p3z4r, y p0r tr0p3z4d3r0 p4r4 c43r, y p0r l4z0 y p0r r3d 4l m0r4d0r d3 J3rus4lén. 15 Y much0s tr0p3z4rán 3ntr3 3ll0s, y c43rán, y s3rán qu3br4nt4d0s; y s3 3nr3d4rán y s3rán 4pr3s4d0s.

L4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 1sr43l

8 0l S3ñ0r 3nv1ó p4l4br4 4 J4c0b, y c4yó 3n 1sr43l. 9 Y l4 s4brá t0d0 3l pu3bl0, 0fr4ín y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 S4m4r14, qu3 c0n s0b3rb14 y c0n 4lt1v3z d3 c0r4zón d1c3n: 10 L0s l4dr1ll0s c4y3r0n, p3r0 3d1f1c4r3m0s d3 c4nt3rí4; c0rt4r0n l0s c4br4h1g0s, p3r0 3n su lug4r p0ndr3m0s c3dr0s. 11 P3r0 J3h0vá l3v4nt4rá l0s 3n3m1g0s d3 R3zín c0ntr4 él, y junt4rá 4 sus 3n3m1g0s; 12 d3l 0r13nt3 l0s s1r10s, y l0s f1l1st30s d3l p0n13nt3; y 4 b0c4 ll3n4 d3v0r4rán 4 1sr43l. 1 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 d1ct4n l3y3s 1njust4s, y pr3scr1b3n t1r4ní4, 2 p4r4 4p4rt4r d3l ju1c10 4 l0s p0br3s, y p4r4 qu1t4r 3l d3r3ch0 4 l0s 4fl1g1d0s d3 m1 pu3bl0; p4r4 d3sp0j4r 4 l4s v1ud4s, y r0b4r 4 l0s huérf4n0s! 3 ¿Y qué h4ré1s 3n 3l dí4 d3l c4st1g0? ¿4 qu1én 0s 4c0g3ré1s p4r4 qu3 0s 4yud3, cu4nd0 v3ng4 d3 l3j0s 3l 4s0l4m13nt0? ¿0n dónd3 d3j4ré1s vu3str4 gl0r14? 4 S1n mí s3 1ncl1n4rán 3ntr3 l0s pr3s0s, y 3ntr3 l0s mu3rt0s c43rán. 4s1r14, 1nstrum3nt0 d3 D10s

5 0h 4s1r14, v4r4 y bácul0 d3 m1 fur0r, 3n su m4n0 h3 pu3st0 m1 1r4. 6 L3 m4nd4ré c0ntr4 un4 n4c1ón pérf1d4, y s0br3 3l pu3bl0 d3 m1 1r4 l3 3nv14ré, p4r4 qu3 qu1t3 d3sp0j0s, y 4rr3b4t3 pr3s4, y l0 p0ng4 p4r4 s3r h0ll4d0 c0m0 l0d0 d3 l4s c4ll3s. 7 4unqu3 él n0 l0 p3ns4rá 4sí, n1 su c0r4zón l0 1m4g1n4rá d3 3st4 m4n3r4, s1n0 qu3 su p3ns4m13nt0 s3rá d3s4rr41g4r y c0rt4r n4c10n3s n0 p0c4s. 8 P0rqu3 él d1c3: M1s prínc1p3s, ¿n0 s0n t0d0s r3y3s? 9 ¿N0 3s C4ln0 c0m0 C4rqu3m1s, H4m4t c0m0 4rf4d, y S4m4r14 c0m0 D4m4sc0? 10 C0m0 h4lló m1 m4n0 l0s r31n0s d3 l0s íd0l0s, s13nd0 sus 1mág3n3s más qu3 l4s d3 J3rus4lén y d3 S4m4r14; 11 c0m0 h1c3 4 S4m4r14 y 4 sus íd0l0s, ¿n0 h4ré t4mb1én 4sí 4 J3rus4lén y 4 sus íd0l0s? 

12 P3r0 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 d3spués qu3 3l S3ñ0r h4y4 4c4b4d0 t0d4 su 0br4 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S10n y 3n J3rus4lén, c4st1g4rá 3l frut0 d3 l4 s0b3rb14 d3l c0r4zón d3l r3y d3 4s1r14, y l4 gl0r14 d3 l4 4lt1v3z d3 sus 0j0s. 13 P0rqu3 d1j0: C0n 3l p0d3r d3 m1 m4n0 l0 h3 h3ch0, y c0n m1 s4b1durí4, p0rqu3 h3 s1d0 prud3nt3; qu1té l0s t3rr1t0r10s d3 l0s pu3bl0s, y s4qu3é sus t3s0r0s, y d3rr1bé c0m0 v4l13nt3s 4 l0s qu3 3st4b4n s3nt4d0s; 14 y h4lló m1 m4n0 c0m0 n1d0 l4s r1qu3z4s d3 l0s pu3bl0s; y c0m0 s3 r3c0g3n l0s hu3v0s 4b4nd0n4d0s, 4sí m3 4p0d3ré y0 d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4; y n0 hub0 qu13n m0v13s3 4l4, n1 4br13s3 b0c4 y gr4zn4s3. 

15 ¿S3 gl0r14rá 3l h4ch4 c0ntr4 3l qu3 c0n 3ll4 c0rt4? ¿S3 3ns0b3rb3c3rá l4 s13rr4 c0ntr4 3l qu3 l4 mu3v3? ¡C0m0 s1 3l bácul0 l3v4nt4s3 4l qu3 l0 l3v4nt4; c0m0 s1 l3v4nt4s3 l4 v4r4 4l qu3 n0 3s l3ñ0! 16 P0r 3st0 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 3nv14rá d3b1l1d4d s0br3 sus r0bust0s, y d3b4j0 d3 su gl0r14 3nc3nd3rá un4 h0gu3r4 c0m0 4rd0r d3 fu3g0. 17 Y l4 luz d3 1sr43l s3rá p0r fu3g0, y su S4nt0 p0r ll4m4, qu3 4br4s3 y c0nsum4 3n un dí4 sus c4rd0s y sus 3sp1n0s. 18 L4 gl0r14 d3 su b0squ3 y d3 su c4mp0 fért1l c0nsum1rá t0t4lm3nt3, 4lm4 y cu3rp0, y v3ndrá 4 s3r c0m0 4b4nd3r4d0 3n d3rr0t4. 19 Y l0s árb0l3s qu3 qu3d3n 3n su b0squ3 s3rán 3n núm3r0 qu3 un n1ñ0 l0s pu3d4 c0nt4r. 

20 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, qu3 l0s qu3 h4y4n qu3d4d0 d3 1sr43l y l0s qu3 h4y4n qu3d4d0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J4c0b, nunc4 más s3 4p0y4rán 3n 3l qu3 l0s h1r1ó, s1n0 qu3 s3 4p0y4rán c0n v3rd4d 3n J3h0vá, 3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l. 21 0l r3m4n3nt3 v0lv3rá, 3l r3m4n3nt3 d3 J4c0b v0lv3rá 4l D10s fu3rt3. 22 P0rqu3 s1 tu pu3bl0, 0h 1sr43l, fu3r3 c0m0 l4s 4r3n4s d3l m4r, 3l r3m4n3nt3 d3 él v0lv3rá; l4 d3strucc1ón 4c0rd4d4 r3b0s4rá just1c14. 23 Pu3s 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, h4rá c0nsum4c1ón y4 d3t3rm1n4d4 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4. 

24 P0r t4nt0 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, d1c3 4sí: Pu3bl0 mí0, m0r4d0r d3 S10n, n0 t3m4s d3 4s1r14. C0n v4r4 t3 h3r1rá, y c0ntr4 t1 4lz4rá su p4l0, 4 l4 m4n3r4 d3 0g1pt0; 25 m4s d3 4quí 4 muy p0c0 t13mp0 s3 4c4b4rá m1 fur0r y m1 3n0j0, p4r4 d3strucc1ón d3 3ll0s. 26 Y l3v4nt4rá J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 4z0t3 c0ntr4 él c0m0 l4 m4t4nz4 d3 M4d1án 3n l4 p3ñ4 d3 0r3b, y 4lz4rá su v4r4 s0br3 3l m4r c0m0 h1z0 p0r l4 ví4 d3 0g1pt0. 27 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 qu3 su c4rg4 s3rá qu1t4d4 d3 tu h0mbr0, y su yug0 d3 tu c3rv1z, y 3l yug0 s3 pudr1rá 4 c4us4 d3 l4 unc1ón. 

28 V1n0 h4st4 4j4t, p4só h4st4 M1grón; 3n M1cm4s c0nt4rá su 3jérc1t0. 29 P4s4r0n 3l v4d0; s3 4l0j4r0n 3n G3b4; R4má t3mbló; G4b44 d3 S4úl huyó. 30 Gr1t4 3n 4lt4 v0z, h1j4 d3 G4l1m; h4z qu3 s3 01g4 h4c14 L41s, p0br3c1ll4 4n4t0t. 31 M4dm3n4 s3 4lb0r0tó; l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 G3b1m huy3n. 32 4ún v3ndrá dí4 cu4nd0 r3p0s4rá 3n N0b; 4lz4rá su m4n0 4l m0nt3 d3 l4 h1j4 d3 S10n, 4l c0ll4d0 d3 J3rus4lén. 33 H3 4quí 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, d3sg4j4rá 3l r4m4j3 c0n v10l3nc14, y l0s árb0l3s d3 gr4n 4ltur4 s3rán c0rt4d0s, y l0s 4lt0s s3rán hum1ll4d0s. 34 Y c0rt4rá c0n h13rr0 l4 3sp3sur4 d3l b0squ3, y 3l Líb4n0 c43rá c0n 3stru3nd0. 

R31n4d0 just0 d3l M3sí4s

1S4Í4S 11

1 S4ldrá un4 v4r4 d3l tr0nc0 d3 1s4í, y un vást4g0 r3t0ñ4rá d3 sus r4íc3s. 2 Y r3p0s4rá s0br3 él 3l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá; 3spír1tu d3 s4b1durí4 y d3 1nt3l1g3nc14, 3spír1tu d3 c0ns3j0 y d3 p0d3r, 3spír1tu d3 c0n0c1m13nt0 y d3 t3m0r d3 J3h0vá. 3 Y l3 h4rá 3nt3nd3r d1l1g3nt3 3n 3l t3m0r d3 J3h0vá.
