12 P0r t4nt0, 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, ll4mó 3n 3st3 dí4 4 ll4nt0 y 4 3nd3ch4s, 4 r4p4rs3 3l c4b3ll0 y 4 v3st1r c1l1c10; 13 y h3 4quí g0z0 y 4l3grí4, m4t4nd0 v4c4s y d3g0ll4nd0 0v3j4s, c0m13nd0 c4rn3 y b3b13nd0 v1n0, d1c13nd0: C0m4m0s y b3b4m0s, p0rqu3 m4ñ4n4 m0r1r3m0s. 14 0st0 fu3 r3v3l4d0 4 m1s 0íd0s d3 p4rt3 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: Qu3 3st3 p3c4d0 n0 0s s3rá p3rd0n4d0 h4st4 qu3 murá1s, d1c3 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s.

15 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s d1c3 4sí: V3, 3ntr4 4 3st3 t3s0r3r0, 4 S3bn4 3l m4y0rd0m0, y d1l3: 16 ¿Qué t13n3s tú 4quí, 0 4 qu1én t13n3s 4quí, qu3 l4br4st3 4quí s3pulcr0 p4r4 t1, c0m0 3l qu3 3n lug4r 4lt0 l4br4 su s3pultur4, 0 3l qu3 3sculp3 p4r4 sí m0r4d4 3n un4 p3ñ4? 17 H3 4quí qu3 J3h0vá t3 tr4nsp0rt4rá 3n dur0 c4ut1v3r10, y d3 c13rt0 t3 cubr1rá 3l r0str0. 18 T3 3ch4rá 4 r0d4r c0n ímp3tu, c0m0 4 b0l4 p0r t13rr4 3xt3ns4; 4llá m0r1rás, y 4llá 3st4rán l0s c4rr0s d3 tu gl0r14, 0h v3rgü3nz4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 tu s3ñ0r. 19 Y t3 4rr0j4ré d3 tu lug4r, y d3 tu pu3st0 t3 3mpuj4ré. 20 0n 4qu3l dí4 ll4m4ré 4 m1 s13rv0 0l14qu1m h1j0 d3 H1lcí4s, 21 y l0 v3st1ré d3 tus v3st1dur4s, y l0 c3ñ1ré d3 tu t4l4b4rt3, y 3ntr3g4ré 3n sus m4n0s tu p0t3st4d; y s3rá p4dr3 4l m0r4d0r d3 J3rus4lén, y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá. 22 Y p0ndré l4 ll4v3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d s0br3 su h0mbr0; y 4br1rá, y n4d13 c3rr4rá; c3rr4rá, y n4d13 4br1rá. 23 Y l0 h1nc4ré c0m0 cl4v0 3n lug4r f1rm3; y s3rá p0r 4s13nt0 d3 h0nr4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3. 24 C0lg4rán d3 él t0d4 l4 h0nr4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 su p4dr3, l0s h1j0s y l0s n13t0s, t0d0s l0s v4s0s m3n0r3s, d3sd3 l4s t4z4s h4st4 t0d4 cl4s3 d3 j4rr0s. 25 0n 4qu3l dí4, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 3l cl4v0 h1nc4d0 3n lug4r f1rm3 s3rá qu1t4d0; s3rá qu3br4d0 y c43rá, y l4 c4rg4 qu3 s0br3 él s3 pus0 s3 3ch4rá 4 p3rd3r; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4bló. 

Pr0f3cí4 s0br3 T1r0

1S4Í4S 23

1 Pr0f3cí4 s0br3 T1r0. 4ull4d, n4v3s d3 T4rs1s, p0rqu3 d3stru1d4 3s T1r0 h4st4 n0 qu3d4r c4s4, n1 4 d0nd3 3ntr4r; d3sd3 l4 t13rr4 d3 Qu1t1m l3s 3s r3v3l4d0. 2 C4ll4d, m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 c0st4, m3rc4d3r3s d3 S1dón, qu3 p4s4nd0 3l m4r t3 4b4st3cí4n. 3 Su pr0v1s1ón pr0c3dí4 d3 l4s s3m3nt3r4s qu3 cr3c3n c0n l4s much4s 4gu4s d3l N1l0, d3 l4 m13s d3l rí0. Fu3 t4mb1én 3mp0r10 d3 l4s n4c10n3s. 4 4v3rgüénz4t3, S1dón, p0rqu3 3l m4r, l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3l m4r h4bló, d1c13nd0: Nunc4 3stuv3 d3 p4rt0, n1 d1 4 luz, n1 cr1é jóv3n3s, n1 l3v4nté vírg3n3s. 5 Cu4nd0 ll3gu3 l4 n0t1c14 4 0g1pt0, t3ndrán d0l0r d3 l4s nu3v4s d3 T1r0. 6 P4s40s 4 T4rs1s; 4ull4d, m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 c0st4. 7 ¿N0 3r4 ést4 vu3str4 c1ud4d 4l3gr3, c0n much0s dí4s d3 4nt1gü3d4d? Sus p13s l4 ll3v4rán 4 m0r4r l3j0s. 8 ¿Qu1én d3cr3tó 3st0 s0br3 T1r0, l4 qu3 r3p4rtí4 c0r0n4s, cuy0s n3g0c14nt3s 3r4n prínc1p3s, cuy0s m3rc4d3r3s 3r4n l0s n0bl3s d3 l4 t13rr4? 9 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s l0 d3cr3tó, p4r4 3nv1l3c3r l4 s0b3rb14 d3 t0d4 gl0r14, y p4r4 4b4t1r 4 t0d0s l0s 1lustr3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 10 P4s4 cu4l rí0 d3 tu t13rr4, 0h h1j4 d3 T4rs1s, p0rqu3 n0 t3ndrás y4 más p0d3r. 11 0xt3nd1ó su m4n0 s0br3 3l m4r, h1z0 t3mbl4r l0s r31n0s; J3h0vá m4ndó r3sp3ct0 4 C4n4án, qu3 sus f0rt4l3z4s s34n d3stru1d4s. 12 Y d1j0: N0 t3 4l3gr4rás más, 0h 0pr1m1d4 v1rg3n h1j4 d3 S1dón. L3vánt4t3 p4r4 p4s4r 4 Qu1t1m, y 4un 4llí n0 t3ndrás r3p0s0. 13 M1r4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s c4ld30s. 0st3 pu3bl0 n0 3x1stí4; 4s1r14 l4 fundó p4r4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l d3s13rt0. L3v4nt4r0n sus f0rt4l3z4s, 3d1f1c4r0n sus p4l4c10s; él l4 c0nv1rt1ó 3n ru1n4s. 14 4ull4d, n4v3s d3 T4rs1s, p0rqu3 d3stru1d4 3s vu3str4 f0rt4l3z4. 15 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l dí4, qu3 T1r0 s3rá pu3st4 3n 0lv1d0 p0r s3t3nt4 4ñ0s, c0m0 dí4s d3 un r3y. D3spués d3 l0s s3t3nt4 4ñ0s, c4nt4rá T1r0 c4nc1ón c0m0 d3 r4m3r4. 16 T0m4 4rp4, y r0d34 l4 c1ud4d, 0h r4m3r4 0lv1d4d4; h4z bu3n4 m3l0dí4, r31t3r4 l4 c4nc1ón, p4r4 qu3 s34s r3c0rd4d4. 17 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 4l f1n d3 l0s s3t3nt4 4ñ0s v1s1t4rá J3h0vá 4 T1r0; y v0lv3rá 4 c0m3rc14r, y 0tr4 v3z f0rn1c4rá c0n t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3l mund0 s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4. 18 P3r0 sus n3g0c10s y g4n4nc14s s3rán c0ns4gr4d0s 4 J3h0vá; n0 s3 gu4rd4rán n1 s3 4t3s0r4rán, p0rqu3 sus g4n4nc14s s3rán p4r4 l0s qu3 3stuv13r3n d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 c0m4n h4st4 s4c14rs3, y v1st4n 3splénd1d4m3nt3. 

0l ju1c10 d3 J3h0vá s0br3 l4 t13rr4

1S4Í4S 24

1 H3 4quí qu3 J3h0vá v4cí4 l4 t13rr4 y l4 d3snud4, y tr4st0rn4 su f4z, y h4c3 3sp4rc1r 4 sus m0r4d0r3s. 2 Y suc3d3rá 4sí c0m0 4l pu3bl0, t4mb1én 4l s4c3rd0t3; c0m0 4l s13rv0, 4sí 4 su 4m0; c0m0 4 l4 cr14d4, 4 su 4m4; c0m0 4l qu3 c0mpr4, 4l qu3 v3nd3; c0m0 4l qu3 pr3st4, 4l qu3 t0m4 pr3st4d0; c0m0 4l qu3 d4 4 l0gr0, 4sí 4l qu3 l0 r3c1b3. 3 L4 t13rr4 s3rá 3nt3r4m3nt3 v4c14d4, y c0mpl3t4m3nt3 s4qu34d4; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 pr0nunc14d0 3st4 p4l4br4. 

4 S3 d3struyó, c4yó l4 t13rr4; 3nf3rmó, c4yó 3l mund0; 3nf3rm4r0n l0s 4lt0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4. 5 Y l4 t13rr4 s3 c0nt4m1nó b4j0 sus m0r4d0r3s; p0rqu3 tr4sp4s4r0n l4s l3y3s, f4ls34r0n 3l d3r3ch0, qu3br4nt4r0n 3l p4ct0 s3mp1t3rn0. 6 P0r 3st4 c4us4 l4 m4ld1c1ón c0nsum1ó l4 t13rr4, y sus m0r4d0r3s fu3r0n 4s0l4d0s; p0r 3st4 c4us4 fu3r0n c0nsum1d0s l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 l4 t13rr4, y d1sm1nuy3r0n l0s h0mbr3s. 7 S3 p3rd1ó 3l v1n0, 3nf3rmó l4 v1d, g1m13r0n t0d0s l0s qu3 3r4n 4l3gr3s d3 c0r4zón. 8 C3só 3l r3g0c1j0 d3 l0s p4nd3r0s, s3 4c4bó 3l 3stru3nd0 d3 l0s qu3 s3 4l3gr4n, c3só l4 4l3grí4 d3l 4rp4. 9 N0 b3b3rán v1n0 c0n c4nt4r; l4 s1dr4 l3s s3rá 4m4rg4 4 l0s qu3 l4 b3b13r3n. 10 Qu3br4nt4d4 3stá l4 c1ud4d p0r l4 v4n1d4d; t0d4 c4s4 s3 h4 c3rr4d0, p4r4 qu3 n0 3ntr3 n4d13. 11 H4y cl4m0r3s p0r f4lt4 d3 v1n0 3n l4s c4ll3s; t0d0 g0z0 s3 0scur3c1ó, s3 d3st3rró l4 4l3grí4 d3 l4 t13rr4. 12 L4 c1ud4d qu3dó d3s0l4d4, y c0n ru1n4 fu3 d3rr1b4d4 l4 pu3rt4. 13 P0rqu3 4sí s3rá 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4, 3n m3d10 d3 l0s pu3bl0s, c0m0 0l1v0 s4cud1d0, c0m0 r3busc0s d3spués d3 l4 v3nd1m14. 

14 0st0s 4lz4rán su v0z, c4nt4rán g0z0s0s p0r l4 gr4nd3z4 d3 J3h0vá; d3sd3 3l m4r d4rán v0c3s. 15 Gl0r1f1c4d p0r 3st0 4 J3h0vá 3n l0s v4ll3s; 3n l4s 0r1ll4s d3l m4r s34 n0mbr4d0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l. 16 D3 l0 p0str3r0 d3 l4 t13rr4 0ím0s cánt1c0s: Gl0r14 4l just0. Y y0 d1j3: ¡M1 d3sd1ch4, m1 d3sd1ch4, 4y d3 mí! Pr3v4r1c4d0r3s h4n pr3v4r1c4d0; y h4n pr3v4r1c4d0 c0n pr3v4r1c4c1ón d3 d3sl34l3s. 

17 T3rr0r, f0s0 y r3d s0br3 t1, 0h m0r4d0r d3 l4 t13rr4. 18 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 3l qu3 huy3r3 d3 l4 v0z d3l t3rr0r c43rá 3n 3l f0s0; y 3l qu3 s4l13r3 d3 3n m3d10 d3l f0s0 s3rá pr3s0 3n l4 r3d; p0rqu3 d3 l0 4lt0 s3 4br1rán v3nt4n4s, y t3mbl4rán l0s c1m13nt0s d3 l4 t13rr4. 19 S3rá qu3br4nt4d4 d3l t0d0 l4 t13rr4, 3nt3r4m3nt3 d3sm3nuz4d4 s3rá l4 t13rr4, 3n gr4n m4n3r4 s3rá l4 t13rr4 c0nm0v1d4. 20 T3mbl4rá l4 t13rr4 c0m0 un 3br10, y s3rá r3m0v1d4 c0m0 un4 ch0z4; y s3 4gr4v4rá s0br3 3ll4 su p3c4d0, y c43rá, y nunc4 más s3 l3v4nt4rá. 

21 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l dí4, qu3 J3h0vá c4st1g4rá 4l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s c13l0s 3n l0 4lt0, y 4 l0s r3y3s d3 l4 t13rr4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4. 22 Y s3rán 4m0nt0n4d0s c0m0 s3 4m0nt0n4 4 l0s 3nc4rc3l4d0s 3n m4zm0rr4, y 3n pr1s1ón qu3d4rán 3nc3rr4d0s, y s3rán c4st1g4d0s d3spués d3 much0s dí4s. 23 L4 lun4 s3 4v3rg0nz4rá, y 3l s0l s3 c0nfund1rá, cu4nd0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s r31n3 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S10n y 3n J3rus4lén, y d3l4nt3 d3 sus 4nc14n0s s34 gl0r10s0. 

Cánt1c0 d3 4l4b4nz4 p0r 3l f4v0r d3 J3h0vá

1S4Í4S 25

1 J3h0vá, tú 3r3s m1 D10s; t3 3x4lt4ré, 4l4b4ré tu n0mbr3, p0rqu3 h4s h3ch0 m4r4v1ll4s; tus c0ns3j0s 4nt1gu0s s0n v3rd4d y f1rm3z4. 2 P0rqu3 c0nv3rt1st3 l4 c1ud4d 3n m0ntón, l4 c1ud4d f0rt1f1c4d4 3n ru1n4; 3l 4lcáz4r d3 l0s 3xtr4ñ0s p4r4 qu3 n0 s34 c1ud4d, n1 nunc4 j4más s34 r33d1f1c4d0. 3 P0r 3st0 t3 d4rá gl0r14 3l pu3bl0 fu3rt3, t3 t3m3rá l4 c1ud4d d3 g3nt3s r0bust4s. 4 P0rqu3 fu1st3 f0rt4l3z4 4l p0br3, f0rt4l3z4 4l m3n3st3r0s0 3n su 4fl1cc1ón, r3fug10 c0ntr4 3l turb1ón, s0mbr4 c0ntr4 3l c4l0r; p0rqu3 3l ímp3tu d3 l0s v10l3nt0s 3s c0m0 turb1ón c0ntr4 3l mur0. 5 C0m0 3l c4l0r 3n lug4r s3c0, 4sí hum1ll4rás 3l 0rgull0 d3 l0s 3xtr4ñ0s; y c0m0 c4l0r d3b4j0 d3 nub3 h4rás m4rch1t4r 3l r3nu3v0 d3 l0s r0bust0s. 

6 Y J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s h4rá 3n 3st3 m0nt3 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s b4nqu3t3 d3 m4nj4r3s sucul3nt0s, b4nqu3t3 d3 v1n0s r3f1n4d0s, d3 gru3s0s tuét4n0s y d3 v1n0s pur1f1c4d0s. 7 Y d3stru1rá 3n 3st3 m0nt3 l4 cub13rt4 c0n qu3 3stán cub13rt0s t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, y 3l v3l0 qu3 3nvu3lv3 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s. 8 D3stru1rá 4 l4 mu3rt3 p4r4 s13mpr3; y 3njug4rá J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r t0d4 lágr1m4 d3 t0d0s l0s r0str0s; y qu1t4rá l4 4fr3nt4 d3 su pu3bl0 d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 J3h0vá l0 h4 d1ch0. 

9 Y s3 d1rá 3n 4qu3l dí4: H3 4quí, ést3 3s nu3str0 D10s, l3 h3m0s 3sp3r4d0, y n0s s4lv4rá; ést3 3s J3h0vá 4 qu13n h3m0s 3sp3r4d0, n0s g0z4r3m0s y n0s 4l3gr4r3m0s 3n su s4lv4c1ón. 

10 P0rqu3 l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá r3p0s4rá 3n 3st3 m0nt3; p3r0 M04b s3rá h0ll4d0 3n su m1sm0 s1t10, c0m0 3s h0ll4d4 l4 p4j4 3n 3l mul4d4r. 11 Y 3xt3nd3rá su m4n0 p0r 3n m3d10 d3 él, c0m0 l4 3xt13nd3 3l n4d4d0r p4r4 n4d4r; y 4b4t1rá su s0b3rb14 y l4 d3str3z4 d3 sus m4n0s; 12 Y 4b4t1rá l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3 tus 4lt0s mur0s; l4 hum1ll4rá y l4 3ch4rá 4 t13rr4, h4st4 3l p0lv0. 

Cánt1c0 d3 c0nf14nz4 3n l4 pr0t3cc1ón d3 J3h0vá

1S4Í4S 26

1 0n 4qu3l dí4 c4nt4rán 3st3 cánt1c0 3n t13rr4 d3 Judá: Fu3rt3 c1ud4d t3n3m0s; s4lv4c1ón pus0 D10s p0r mur0s y 4nt3mur0. 2 4br1d l4s pu3rt4s, y 3ntr4rá l4 g3nt3 just4, gu4rd4d0r4 d3 v3rd4d3s. 3 Tú gu4rd4rás 3n c0mpl3t4 p4z 4 4qu3l cuy0 p3ns4m13nt0 3n t1 p3rs3v3r4; p0rqu3 3n t1 h4 c0nf14d0. 4 C0nf14d 3n J3h0vá p3rp3tu4m3nt3, p0rqu3 3n J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r 3stá l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3 l0s s1gl0s. 5 P0rqu3 d3rr1bó 4 l0s qu3 m0r4b4n 3n lug4r subl1m3; hum1lló 4 l4 c1ud4d 3x4lt4d4, l4 hum1lló h4st4 l4 t13rr4, l4 d3rr1bó h4st4 3l p0lv0. 6 L4 h0ll4rá p13, l0s p13s d3l 4fl1g1d0, l0s p4s0s d3 l0s m3n3st3r0s0s. 

7 0l c4m1n0 d3l just0 3s r3ct1tud; tú, qu3 3r3s r3ct0, p3s4s 3l c4m1n0 d3l just0. 8 T4mb1én 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 tus ju1c10s, 0h J3h0vá, t3 h3m0s 3sp3r4d0; tu n0mbr3 y tu m3m0r14 s0n 3l d3s30 d3 nu3str4 4lm4. 9 C0n m1 4lm4 t3 h3 d3s34d0 3n l4 n0ch3, y 3n t4nt0 qu3 m3 dur3 3l 3spír1tu d3ntr0 d3 mí, m4drug4ré 4 busc4rt3; p0rqu3 lu3g0 qu3 h4y ju1c10s tuy0s 3n l4 t13rr4, l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l mund0 4pr3nd3n just1c14. 10 S3 m0str4rá p13d4d 4l m4lv4d0, y n0 4pr3nd3rá just1c14; 3n t13rr4 d3 r3ct1tud h4rá 1n1qu1d4d, y n0 m1r4rá 4 l4 m4j3st4d d3 J3h0vá. 11 J3h0vá, tu m4n0 3stá 4lz4d4, p3r0 3ll0s n0 v3n; v3rán 4l f1n, y s3 4v3rg0nz4rán l0s qu3 3nv1d14n 4 tu pu3bl0; y 4 tus 3n3m1g0s fu3g0 l0s c0nsum1rá. 12 J3h0vá, tú n0s d4rás p4z, p0rqu3 t4mb1én h1c1st3 3n n0s0tr0s t0d4s nu3str4s 0br4s. 13 J3h0vá D10s nu3str0, 0tr0s s3ñ0r3s fu3r4 d3 t1 s3 h4n 3ns3ñ0r34d0 d3 n0s0tr0s; p3r0 3n t1 s0l4m3nt3 n0s 4c0rd4r3m0s d3 tu n0mbr3. 14 Mu3rt0s s0n, n0 v1v1rán; h4n f4ll3c1d0, n0 r3suc1t4rán; p0rqu3 l0s c4st1g4st3, y d3stru1st3 y d3sh1c1st3 t0d0 su r3cu3rd0. 15 4um3nt4st3 3l pu3bl0, 0h J3h0vá, 4um3nt4st3 3l pu3bl0; t3 h1c1st3 gl0r10s0; 3ns4nch4st3 t0d0s l0s c0nf1n3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 

16 J3h0vá, 3n l4 tr1bul4c1ón t3 busc4r0n; d3rr4m4r0n 0r4c1ón cu4nd0 l0s c4st1g4st3. 17 C0m0 l4 muj3r 3nc1nt4 cu4nd0 s3 4c3rc4 3l 4lumbr4m13nt0 g1m3 y d4 gr1t0s 3n sus d0l0r3s, 4sí h3m0s s1d0 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, 0h J3h0vá. 18 C0nc3b1m0s, tuv1m0s d0l0r3s d3 p4rt0, d1m0s 4 luz v13nt0; n1ngun4 l1b3r4c1ón h1c1m0s 3n l4 t13rr4, n1 c4y3r0n l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l mund0. 19 Tus mu3rt0s v1v1rán; sus c4dáv3r3s r3suc1t4rán. ¡D3sp3rt4d y c4nt4d, m0r4d0r3s d3l p0lv0! p0rqu3 tu r0cí0 3s cu4l r0cí0 d3 h0rt4l1z4s, y l4 t13rr4 d4rá sus mu3rt0s. 

20 4nd4, pu3bl0 mí0, 3ntr4 3n tus 4p0s3nt0s, c13rr4 tr4s t1 tus pu3rt4s; 3scónd3t3 un p0qu1t0, p0r un m0m3nt0, 3n t4nt0 qu3 p4s4 l4 1nd1gn4c1ón. 21 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 J3h0vá s4l3 d3 su lug4r p4r4 c4st1g4r 4l m0r4d0r d3 l4 t13rr4 p0r su m4ld4d c0ntr4 él; y l4 t13rr4 d3scubr1rá l4 s4ngr3 d3rr4m4d4 s0br3 3ll4, y n0 3ncubr1rá y4 más 4 sus mu3rt0s. 

L1b3r4c1ón y r3gr3s0 d3 1sr43l

1S4Í4S 27

1 0n 4qu3l dí4 J3h0vá c4st1g4rá c0n su 3sp4d4 dur4, gr4nd3 y fu3rt3 4l l3v14tán s3rp13nt3 v3l0z, y 4l l3v14tán s3rp13nt3 t0rtu0s4; y m4t4rá 4l dr4gón qu3 3stá 3n 3l m4r. 

2 0n 4qu3l dí4 c4nt4d 4c3rc4 d3 l4 v1ñ4 d3l v1n0 r0j0. 3 Y0 J3h0vá l4 gu4rd0, c4d4 m0m3nt0 l4 r3g4ré; l4 gu4rd4ré d3 n0ch3 y d3 dí4, p4r4 qu3 n4d13 l4 d4ñ3. 4 N0 h4y 3n0j0 3n mí. ¿Qu1én p0ndrá c0ntr4 mí 3n b4t4ll4 3sp1n0s y c4rd0s? Y0 l0s h0ll4ré, l0s qu3m4ré 4 un4. 5 ¿0 f0rz4rá 4lgu13n m1 f0rt4l3z4? H4g4 c0nm1g0 p4z; sí, h4g4 p4z c0nm1g0. 

6 Dí4s v3ndrán cu4nd0 J4c0b 3ch4rá r4íc3s, fl0r3c3rá y 3ch4rá r3nu3v0s 1sr43l, y l4 f4z d3l mund0 ll3n4rá d3 frut0. 7 ¿4c4s0 h4 s1d0 h3r1d0 c0m0 qu13n l0 h1r1ó, 0 h4 s1d0 mu3rt0 c0m0 l0s qu3 l0 m4t4r0n? 8 C0n m3d1d4 l0 c4st1g4rás 3n sus vást4g0s. 0l l0s r3mu3v3 c0n su r3c10 v13nt0 3n 3l dí4 d3l 41r3 s0l4n0. 9 D3 3st4 m4n3r4, pu3s, s3rá p3rd0n4d4 l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 J4c0b, y 3st3 s3rá t0d0 3l frut0, l4 r3m0c1ón d3 su p3c4d0; cu4nd0 h4g4 t0d4s l4s p13dr4s d3l 4lt4r c0m0 p13dr4s d3 c4l d3sm3nuz4d4s, y n0 s3 l3v4nt3n l0s símb0l0s d3 4s3r4 n1 l4s 1mág3n3s d3l s0l. 10 P0rqu3 l4 c1ud4d f0rt1f1c4d4 s3rá d3s0l4d4, l4 c1ud4d h4b1t4d4 s3rá 4b4nd0n4d4 y d3j4d4 c0m0 un d3s13rt0; 4llí p4st4rá 3l b3c3rr0, 4llí t3ndrá su m4j4d4, y 4c4b4rá sus r4m4s. 11 Cu4nd0 sus r4m4s s3 s3qu3n, s3rán qu3br4d4s; muj3r3s v3ndrán 4 3nc3nd3rl4s; p0rqu3 4qu3l n0 3s pu3bl0 d3 3nt3nd1m13nt0; p0r t4nt0, su H4c3d0r n0 t3ndrá d3 él m1s3r1c0rd14, n1 s3 c0mp4d3c3rá d3 él 3l qu3 l0 f0rmó. 

12 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l dí4, qu3 tr1ll4rá J3h0vá d3sd3 3l rí0 0ufr4t3s h4st4 3l t0rr3nt3 d3 0g1pt0, y v0s0tr0s, h1j0s d3 1sr43l, s3ré1s r3un1d0s un0 4 un0. 13 4c0nt3c3rá t4mb1én 3n 4qu3l dí4, qu3 s3 t0c4rá c0n gr4n tr0mp3t4, y v3ndrán l0s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 3sp4rc1d0s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 4s1r14, y l0s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 d3st3rr4d0s 4 0g1pt0, y 4d0r4rán 4 J3h0vá 3n 3l m0nt3 s4nt0, 3n J3rus4lén. 

C0nd3n4c1ón d3 0fr4ín

1S4Í4S 28

1 ¡4y d3 l4 c0r0n4 d3 s0b3rb14 d3 l0s 3br10s d3 0fr4ín, y d3 l4 fl0r c4duc4 d3 l4 h3rm0sur4 d3 su gl0r14, qu3 3stá s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l v4ll3 fért1l d3 l0s 4turd1d0s d3l v1n0! 2 H3 4quí, J3h0vá t13n3 un0 qu3 3s fu3rt3 y p0d3r0s0; c0m0 turb1ón d3 gr4n1z0 y c0m0 t0rb3ll1n0 tr4st0rn4d0r, c0m0 ímp3tu d3 r3c14s 4gu4s qu3 1nund4n, c0n fu3rz4 d3rr1b4 4 t13rr4. 3 C0n l0s p13s s3rá p1s0t34d4 l4 c0r0n4 d3 s0b3rb14 d3 l0s 3br10s d3 0fr4ín. 4 Y s3rá l4 fl0r c4duc4 d3 l4 h3rm0sur4 d3 su gl0r14 qu3 3stá s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3l v4ll3 fért1l, c0m0 l4 frut4 t3mpr4n4, l4 pr1m3r4 d3l v3r4n0, l4 cu4l, 4p3n4s l4 v3 3l qu3 l4 m1r4, s3 l4 tr4g4 t4n lu3g0 c0m0 l4 t13n3 4 m4n0. 

5 0n 4qu3l dí4 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s s3rá p0r c0r0n4 d3 gl0r14 y d14d3m4 d3 h3rm0sur4 4l r3m4n3nt3 d3 su pu3bl0; 6 y p0r 3spír1tu d3 ju1c10 4l qu3 s3 s13nt4 3n ju1c10, y p0r fu3rz4s 4 l0s qu3 r3ch4c3n l4 b4t4ll4 3n l4 pu3rt4. 

7 P3r0 t4mb1én ést0s 3rr4r0n c0n 3l v1n0, y c0n s1dr4 s3 3nt0nt3c13r0n; 3l s4c3rd0t3 y 3l pr0f3t4 3rr4r0n c0n s1dr4, fu3r0n tr4st0rn4d0s p0r 3l v1n0; s3 4turd13r0n c0n l4 s1dr4, 3rr4r0n 3n l4 v1s1ón, tr0p3z4r0n 3n 3l ju1c10. 8 P0rqu3 t0d4 m3s4 3stá ll3n4 d3 vóm1t0 y suc13d4d, h4st4 n0 h4b3r lug4r l1mp10. 9 ¿4 qu1én s3 3ns3ñ4rá c13nc14, 0 4 qu1én s3 h4rá 3nt3nd3r d0ctr1n4? ¿4 l0s d3st3t4d0s? ¿4 l0s 4rr4nc4d0s d3 l0s p3ch0s? 10 P0rqu3 m4nd4m13nt0 tr4s m4nd4m13nt0, m4nd4t0 s0br3 m4nd4t0, r3nglón tr4s r3nglón, lín34 s0br3 lín34, un p0qu1t0 4llí, 0tr0 p0qu1t0 4llá; 11 p0rqu3 3n l3ngu4 d3 t4rt4mud0s, y 3n 3xtr4ñ4 l3ngu4 h4bl4rá 4 3st3 pu3bl0, 12 4 l0s cu4l3s él d1j0: 0st3 3s 3l r3p0s0; d4d r3p0s0 4l c4ns4d0; y 3st3 3s 3l r3fr1g3r10; m4s n0 qu1s13r0n 01r. 13 L4 p4l4br4, pu3s, d3 J3h0vá l3s s3rá m4nd4m13nt0 tr4s m4nd4m13nt0, m4nd4t0 s0br3 m4nd4t0, r3nglón tr4s r3nglón, lín34 s0br3 lín34, un p0qu1t0 4llí, 0tr0 p0qu1t0 4llá; h4st4 qu3 v4y4n y c41g4n d3 3sp4ld4s, y s34n qu3br4nt4d0s, 3nl4z4d0s y pr3s0s. 

4m0n3st4c1ón 4 J3rus4lén

14 P0r t4nt0, v4r0n3s burl4d0r3s qu3 g0b3rná1s 4 3st3 pu3bl0 qu3 3stá 3n J3rus4lén, 0íd l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 15 P0r cu4nt0 h4bé1s d1ch0: P4ct0 t3n3m0s h3ch0 c0n l4 mu3rt3, 3 h1c1m0s c0nv3n10 c0n 3l S30l; cu4nd0 p4s3 3l turb1ón d3l 4z0t3, n0 ll3g4rá 4 n0s0tr0s, p0rqu3 h3m0s pu3st0 nu3str0 r3fug10 3n l4 m3nt1r4, y 3n l4 f4ls3d4d n0s 3sc0nd3r3m0s; 16 p0r t4nt0, J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r d1c3 4sí: H3 4quí qu3 y0 h3 pu3st0 3n S10n p0r fund4m3nt0 un4 p13dr4, p13dr4 pr0b4d4, 4ngul4r, pr3c10s4, d3 c1m13nt0 3st4bl3; 3l qu3 cr3y3r3, n0 s3 4pr3sur3. 17 Y 4just4ré 3l ju1c10 4 c0rd3l, y 4 n1v3l l4 just1c14; y gr4n1z0 b4rr3rá 3l r3fug10 d3 l4 m3nt1r4, y 4gu4s 4rr0ll4rán 3l 3sc0ndr1j0. 18 Y s3rá 4nul4d0 vu3str0 p4ct0 c0n l4 mu3rt3, y vu3str0 c0nv3n10 c0n 3l S30l n0 s3rá f1rm3; cu4nd0 p4s3 3l turb1ón d3l 4z0t3, s3ré1s d3 él p1s0t34d0s. 19 Lu3g0 qu3 c0m13nc3 4 p4s4r, él 0s 4rr3b4t4rá; p0rqu3 d3 m4ñ4n4 3n m4ñ4n4 p4s4rá, d3 dí4 y d3 n0ch3; y s3rá c13rt4m3nt3 3sp4nt0 3l 3nt3nd3r l0 0íd0. 20 L4 c4m4 s3rá c0rt4 p4r4 p0d3r 3st1r4rs3, y l4 m4nt4 3str3ch4 p4r4 p0d3r 3nv0lv3rs3. 21 P0rqu3 J3h0vá s3 l3v4nt4rá c0m0 3n 3l m0nt3 P3r4z1m, c0m0 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 G4b4ón s3 3n0j4rá; p4r4 h4c3r su 0br4, su 3xtr4ñ4 0br4, y p4r4 h4c3r su 0p3r4c1ón, su 3xtr4ñ4 0p3r4c1ón. 22 4h0r4, pu3s, n0 0s burlé1s, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 4pr13t3n más vu3str4s 4t4dur4s; p0rqu3 d3strucc1ón y4 d3t3rm1n4d4 s0br3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 h3 0íd0 d3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 

23 0st4d 4t3nt0s, y 0íd m1 v0z; 4t3nd3d, y 0íd m1 d1ch0. 24 0l qu3 4r4 p4r4 s3mbr4r, ¿4r4rá t0d0 3l dí4? ¿R0mp3rá y qu3br4rá l0s t3rr0n3s d3 l4 t13rr4? 25 Cu4nd0 h4 1gu4l4d0 su sup3rf1c13, ¿n0 d3rr4m4 3l 3n3ld0, s13mbr4 3l c0m1n0, p0n3 3l tr1g0 3n h1l3r4s, y l4 c3b4d4 3n 3l lug4r s3ñ4l4d0, y l4 4v3n4 3n su b0rd3 4pr0p14d0? 26 P0rqu3 su D10s l3 1nstruy3, y l3 3ns3ñ4 l0 r3ct0; 27 qu3 3l 3n3ld0 n0 s3 tr1ll4 c0n tr1ll0, n1 s0br3 3l c0m1n0 s3 p4s4 ru3d4 d3 c4rr3t4; s1n0 qu3 c0n un p4l0 s3 s4cud3 3l 3n3ld0, y 3l c0m1n0 c0n un4 v4r4. 28 0l gr4n0 s3 tr1ll4; p3r0 n0 l0 tr1ll4rá p4r4 s13mpr3, n1 l0 c0mpr1m3 c0n l4 ru3d4 d3 su c4rr3t4, n1 l0 qu3br4nt4 c0n l0s d13nt3s d3 su tr1ll0. 29 T4mb1én 3st0 s4l1ó d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, p4r4 h4c3r m4r4v1ll0s0 3l c0ns3j0 y 3ngr4nd3c3r l4 s4b1durí4. 

4r13l y sus 3n3m1g0s

1S4Í4S 29

1 ¡4y d3 4r13l, d3 4r13l, c1ud4d d0nd3 h4b1tó D4v1d! 4ñ4d1d un 4ñ0 4 0tr0, l4s f13st4s s1g4n su curs0. 2 M4s y0 p0ndré 4 4r13l 3n 4pr3tur4, y s3rá d3sc0ns0l4d4 y tr1st3; y s3rá 4 mí c0m0 4r13l. 3 P0rqu3 4c4mp4ré c0ntr4 t1 4lr3d3d0r, y t3 s1t14ré c0n c4mp4m3nt0s, y l3v4nt4ré c0ntr4 t1 b4lu4rt3s. 4 0nt0nc3s s3rás hum1ll4d4, h4bl4rás d3sd3 l4 t13rr4, y tu h4bl4 s4ldrá d3l p0lv0; y s3rá tu v0z d3 l4 t13rr4 c0m0 l4 d3 un f4nt4sm4, y tu h4bl4 susurr4rá d3sd3 3l p0lv0. 5 Y l4 much3dumbr3 d3 tus 3n3m1g0s s3rá c0m0 p0lv0 m3nud0, y l4 mult1tud d3 l0s fu3rt3s c0m0 t4m0 qu3 p4s4; y s3rá r3p3nt1n4m3nt3, 3n un m0m3nt0. 6 P0r J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s s3rás v1s1t4d4 c0n tru3n0s, c0n t3rr3m0t0s y c0n gr4n ru1d0, c0n t0rb3ll1n0 y t3mp3st4d, y ll4m4 d3 fu3g0 c0nsum1d0r. 7 Y s3rá c0m0 su3ñ0 d3 v1s1ón n0cturn4 l4 mult1tud d3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s qu3 p3l34n c0ntr4 4r13l, y t0d0s l0s qu3 p3l34n c0ntr4 3ll4 y su f0rt4l3z4, y l0s qu3 l4 p0n3n 3n 4pr3tur4. 8 Y l3s suc3d3rá c0m0 3l qu3 t13n3 h4mbr3 y su3ñ4, y l3 p4r3c3 qu3 c0m3, p3r0 cu4nd0 d3sp13rt4, su 3stóm4g0 3stá v4cí0; 0 c0m0 3l qu3 t13n3 s3d y su3ñ4, y l3 p4r3c3 qu3 b3b3, p3r0 cu4nd0 d3sp13rt4, s3 h4ll4 c4ns4d0 y s3d13nt0; 4sí s3rá l4 mult1tud d3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s qu3 p3l34rán c0ntr4 3l m0nt3 d3 S10n. 

C3gu3r4 3 h1p0cr3sí4 d3 1sr43l

9 D3t3n30s y m4r4v1ll40s; 0fusc40s y c3g40s; 3mbr14g40s, y n0 d3 v1n0; t4mb4l34d, y n0 d3 s1dr4. 10 P0rqu3 J3h0vá d3rr4mó s0br3 v0s0tr0s 3spír1tu d3 su3ñ0, y c3rró l0s 0j0s d3 vu3str0s pr0f3t4s, y pus0 v3l0 s0br3 l4s c4b3z4s d3 vu3str0s v1d3nt3s. 11 Y 0s s3rá t0d4 v1s1ón c0m0 p4l4br4s d3 l1br0 s3ll4d0, 3l cu4l s1 d13r3n 4l qu3 s4b3 l33r, y l3 d1j3r3n: L33 4h0r4 3st0; él d1rá: N0 pu3d0, p0rqu3 3stá s3ll4d0. 12 Y s1 s3 d13r3 3l l1br0 4l qu3 n0 s4b3 l33r, d1c1énd0l3: L33 4h0r4 3st0; él d1rá: N0 sé l33r. 13 D1c3, pu3s, 3l S3ñ0r: P0rqu3 3st3 pu3bl0 s3 4c3rc4 4 mí c0n su b0c4, y c0n sus l4b10s m3 h0nr4, p3r0 su c0r4zón 3stá l3j0s d3 mí, y su t3m0r d3 mí n0 3s más qu3 un m4nd4m13nt0 d3 h0mbr3s qu3 l3s h4 s1d0 3ns3ñ4d0; 14 p0r t4nt0, h3 4quí qu3 nu3v4m3nt3 3xc1t4ré y0 l4 4dm1r4c1ón d3 3st3 pu3bl0 c0n un pr0d1g10 gr4nd3 y 3sp4nt0s0; p0rqu3 p3r3c3rá l4 s4b1durí4 d3 sus s4b10s, y s3 d3sv4n3c3rá l4 1nt3l1g3nc14 d3 sus 3nt3nd1d0s. 

15 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 s3 3sc0nd3n d3 J3h0vá, 3ncubr13nd0 3l c0ns3j0, y sus 0br4s 3stán 3n t1n13bl4s, y d1c3n: ¿Qu1én n0s v3, y qu1én n0s c0n0c3? 16 Vu3str4 p3rv3rs1d4d c13rt4m3nt3 s3rá r3put4d4 c0m0 3l b4rr0 d3l 4lf4r3r0. ¿4c4s0 l4 0br4 d1rá d3 su h4c3d0r: N0 m3 h1z0? ¿D1rá l4 v4s1j4 d3 4qu3l qu3 l4 h4 f0rm4d0: N0 3nt3nd1ó? 

R3d3nc1ón d3 1sr43l

17 ¿N0 s3 c0nv3rt1rá d3 4quí 4 muy p0c0 t13mp0 3l Líb4n0 3n c4mp0 fructíf3r0, y 3l c4mp0 fért1l s3rá 3st1m4d0 p0r b0squ3? 18 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 l0s s0rd0s 01rán l4s p4l4br4s d3l l1br0, y l0s 0j0s d3 l0s c13g0s v3rán 3n m3d10 d3 l4 0scur1d4d y d3 l4s t1n13bl4s. 19 0nt0nc3s l0s hum1ld3s cr3c3rán 3n 4l3grí4 3n J3h0vá, y 4un l0s más p0br3s d3 l0s h0mbr3s s3 g0z4rán 3n 3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l. 20 P0rqu3 3l v10l3nt0 s3rá 4c4b4d0, y 3l 3sc4rn3c3d0r s3rá c0nsum1d0; s3rán d3stru1d0s t0d0s l0s qu3 s3 d3sv3l4n p4r4 h4c3r 1n1qu1d4d, 21 l0s qu3 h4c3n p3c4r 4l h0mbr3 3n p4l4br4; l0s qu3 4rm4n l4z0 4l qu3 r3pr3ndí4 3n l4 pu3rt4, y p3rv13rt3n l4 c4us4 d3l just0 c0n v4n1d4d. 

22 P0r t4nt0, J3h0vá, qu3 r3d1m1ó 4 4br4h4m, d1c3 4sí 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J4c0b: N0 s3rá 4h0r4 4v3rg0nz4d0 J4c0b, n1 su r0str0 s3 p0ndrá pál1d0; 23 p0rqu3 v3rá 4 sus h1j0s, 0br4 d3 m1s m4n0s 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s, qu3 s4nt1f1c4rán m1 n0mbr3; y s4nt1f1c4rán 4l S4nt0 d3 J4c0b, y t3m3rán 4l D10s d3 1sr43l. 24 Y l0s 3xtr4v14d0s d3 3spír1tu 4pr3nd3rán 1nt3l1g3nc14, y l0s murmur4d0r3s 4pr3nd3rán d0ctr1n4. 

L4 fut1l1d4d d3 c0nf14r 3n 0g1pt0

1S4Í4S 30

1 ¡4y d3 l0s h1j0s qu3 s3 4p4rt4n, d1c3 J3h0vá, p4r4 t0m4r c0ns3j0, y n0 d3 mí; p4r4 c0b1j4rs3 c0n cub13rt4, y n0 d3 m1 3spír1tu, 4ñ4d13nd0 p3c4d0 4 p3c4d0! 2 Qu3 s3 4p4rt4n p4r4 d3sc3nd3r 4 0g1pt0, y n0 h4n pr3gunt4d0 d3 m1 b0c4; p4r4 f0rt4l3c3rs3 c0n l4 fu3rz4 d3 F4r4ón, y p0n3r su 3sp3r4nz4 3n l4 s0mbr4 d3 0g1pt0. 3 P3r0 l4 fu3rz4 d3 F4r4ón s3 0s c4mb14rá 3n v3rgü3nz4, y 3l 4mp4r0 3n l4 s0mbr4 d3 0g1pt0 3n c0nfus1ón. 4 Cu4nd0 3stén sus prínc1p3s 3n Z0án, y sus 3mb4j4d0r3s ll3gu3n 4 H4n3s, 5 t0d0s s3 4v3rg0nz4rán d3l pu3bl0 qu3 n0 l3s 4pr0v3ch4, n1 l0s s0c0rr3, n1 l3s tr43 pr0v3ch0; 4nt3s l3s s3rá p4r4 v3rgü3nz4 y 4un p4r4 0pr0b10. 

6 Pr0f3cí4 s0br3 l4s b3st14s d3l N3gu3v: P0r t13rr4 d3 tr1bul4c1ón y d3 4ngust14, d3 d0nd3 s4l3n l4 l30n4 y 3l l3ón, l4 víb0r4 y l4 s3rp13nt3 qu3 vu3l4, ll3v4n s0br3 l0m0s d3 4sn0s sus r1qu3z4s, y sus t3s0r0s s0br3 j0r0b4s d3 c4m3ll0s, 4 un pu3bl0 qu3 n0 l3s s3rá d3 pr0v3ch0. 7 C13rt4m3nt3 0g1pt0 3n v4n0 3 1nút1lm3nt3 d4rá 4yud4; p0r t4nt0 y0 l3 d1 v0c3s, qu3 su f0rt4l3z4 s3rí4 3st4rs3 qu13t0s. 

8 V3, pu3s, 4h0r4, y 3scr1b3 3st4 v1s1ón 3n un4 t4bl4 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, y r3gístr4l4 3n un l1br0, p4r4 qu3 qu3d3 h4st4 3l dí4 p0str3r0, 3t3rn4m3nt3 y p4r4 s13mpr3. 9 P0rqu3 3st3 pu3bl0 3s r3b3ld3, h1j0s m3nt1r0s0s, h1j0s qu3 n0 qu1s13r0n 0ír l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá; 10 qu3 d1c3n 4 l0s v1d3nt3s: N0 v3á1s; y 4 l0s pr0f3t4s: N0 n0s pr0f3t1cé1s l0 r3ct0, d3c1dn0s c0s4s h4l4gü3ñ4s, pr0f3t1z4d m3nt1r4s; 11 d3j4d 3l c4m1n0, 4p4rt40s d3 l4 s3nd4, qu1t4d d3 nu3str4 pr3s3nc14 4l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l. 12 P0r t4nt0, 3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l d1c3 4sí: P0rqu3 d3s3ch4st31s 3st4 p4l4br4, y c0nf14st31s 3n v10l3nc14 y 3n 1n1qu1d4d, y 3n 3ll0 0s h4bé1s 4p0y4d0; 13 p0r t4nt0, 0s s3rá 3st3 p3c4d0 c0m0 gr13t4 qu3 4m3n4z4 ru1n4, 3xt3nd1énd0s3 3n un4 p4r3d 3l3v4d4, cuy4 c4íd4 v13n3 súb1t4 y r3p3nt1n4m3nt3. 14 Y s3 qu3br4rá c0m0 s3 qu13br4 un v4s0 d3 4lf4r3r0, qu3 s1n m1s3r1c0rd14 l0 h4c3n p3d4z0s; t4nt0, qu3 3ntr3 l0s p3d4z0s n0 s3 h4ll4 t13st0 p4r4 tr43r fu3g0 d3l h0g4r, 0 p4r4 s4c4r 4gu4 d3l p0z0.

0l ju1c10 d3 J3h0vá s0br3 4s1r14

27 H3 4quí qu3 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá v13n3 d3 l3j0s; su r0str0 3nc3nd1d0, y c0n ll4m4s d3 fu3g0 d3v0r4d0r; sus l4b10s ll3n0s d3 1r4, y su l3ngu4 c0m0 fu3g0 qu3 c0nsum3. 28 Su 4l13nt0, cu4l t0rr3nt3 qu3 1nund4; ll3g4rá h4st4 3l cu3ll0, p4r4 z4r4nd34r 4 l4s n4c10n3s c0n cr1b4 d3 d3strucc1ón; y 3l fr3n0 3st4rá 3n l4s qu1j4d4s d3 l0s pu3bl0s, h4c1énd0l3s 3rr4r.

1 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4 0g1pt0 p0r 4yud4, y c0nfí4n 3n c4b4ll0s; y su 3sp3r4nz4 p0n3n 3n c4rr0s, p0rqu3 s0n much0s, y 3n j1n3t3s, p0rqu3 s0n v4l13nt3s; y n0 m1r4n 4l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l, n1 busc4n 4 J3h0vá! 2 P3r0 él t4mb1én 3s s4b10, y tr43rá 3l m4l, y n0 r3t1r4rá sus p4l4br4s. S3 l3v4nt4rá, pu3s, c0ntr4 l4 c4s4 d3 l0s m4l1gn0s, y c0ntr4 3l 4ux1l10 d3 l0s qu3 h4c3n 1n1qu1d4d. 3 Y l0s 3g1pc10s h0mbr3s s0n, y n0 D10s; y sus c4b4ll0s c4rn3, y n0 3spír1tu; d3 m4n3r4 qu3 4l 3xt3nd3r J3h0vá su m4n0, c43rá 3l 4yud4d0r y c43rá 3l 4yud4d0, y t0d0s 3ll0s d3sf4ll3c3rán 4 un4.

1S4Í4S 32

1 H3 4quí qu3 p4r4 just1c14 r31n4rá un r3y, y prínc1p3s pr3s1d1rán 3n ju1c10. 2 Y s3rá 4qu3l v4rón c0m0 3sc0nd3d3r0 c0ntr4 3l v13nt0, y c0m0 r3fug10 c0ntr4 3l turb1ón; c0m0 4rr0y0s d3 4gu4s 3n t13rr4 d3 s3qu3d4d, c0m0 s0mbr4 d3 gr4n p3ñ4sc0 3n t13rr4 c4lur0s4. 3 N0 s3 0fusc4rán 3nt0nc3s l0s 0j0s d3 l0s qu3 v3n, y l0s 0íd0s d3 l0s 0y3nt3s 01rán 4t3nt0s. 4 Y 3l c0r4zón d3 l0s n3c10s 3nt3nd3rá p4r4 s4b3r, y l4 l3ngu4 d3 l0s t4rt4mud0s h4bl4rá ráp1d4 y cl4r4m3nt3. 5 0l ru1n nunc4 más s3rá ll4m4d0 g3n3r0s0, n1 3l tr4mp0s0 s3rá ll4m4d0 3splénd1d0. 6 P0rqu3 3l ru1n h4bl4rá ru1nd4d3s, y su c0r4zón f4br1c4rá 1n1qu1d4d, p4r4 c0m3t3r 1mp13d4d y p4r4 h4bl4r 3sc4rn10 c0ntr4 J3h0vá, d3j4nd0 v4cí4 3l 4lm4 h4mbr13nt4, y qu1t4nd0 l4 b3b1d4 4l s3d13nt0. 7 L4s 4rm4s d3l tr4mp0s0 s0n m4l4s; tr4m4 1ntr1g4s 1n1cu4s p4r4 3nr3d4r 4 l0s s1mpl3s c0n p4l4br4s m3nt1r0s4s, y p4r4 h4bl4r 3n ju1c10 c0ntr4 3l p0br3. 8 P3r0 3l g3n3r0s0 p3ns4rá g3n3r0s1d4d3s, y p0r g3n3r0s1d4d3s s3rá 3x4lt4d0.

9 Muj3r3s 1nd0l3nt3s, l3v4nt40s, 0íd m1 v0z; h1j4s c0nf14d4s, 3scuch4d m1 r4zón. 10 D3 4quí 4 4lg0 más d3 un 4ñ0 t3ndré1s 3sp4nt0, 0h c0nf14d4s; p0rqu3 l4 v3nd1m14 f4lt4rá, y l4 c0s3ch4 n0 v3ndrá. 11 T3mbl4d, 0h 1nd0l3nt3s; turb40s, 0h c0nf14d4s; d3sp0j40s, d3snud40s, c3ñ1d l0s l0m0s c0n c1l1c10. 12 G0lp3ánd0s3 3l p3ch0 l4m3nt4rán p0r l0s c4mp0s d3l31t0s0s, p0r l4 v1d fért1l. 13 S0br3 l4 t13rr4 d3 m1 pu3bl0 sub1rán 3sp1n0s y c4rd0s, y 4un s0br3 t0d4s l4s c4s4s 3n qu3 h4y 4l3grí4 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 4l3grí4. 14 P0rqu3 l0s p4l4c10s qu3d4rán d3s13rt0s, l4 mult1tud d3 l4 c1ud4d c3s4rá; l4s t0rr3s y f0rt4l3z4s s3 v0lv3rán cu3v4s p4r4 s13mpr3, d0nd3 d3sc4ns3n 4sn0s m0nt3s3s, y g4n4d0s h4g4n m4j4d4; 15 h4st4 qu3 s0br3 n0s0tr0s s34 d3rr4m4d0 3l 0spír1tu d3 l0 4lt0, y 3l d3s13rt0 s3 c0nv13rt4 3n c4mp0 fért1l, y 3l c4mp0 fért1l s34 3st1m4d0 p0r b0squ3. 16 Y h4b1t4rá 3l ju1c10 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y 3n 3l c4mp0 fért1l m0r4rá l4 just1c14. 17 Y 3l 3f3ct0 d3 l4 just1c14 s3rá p4z; y l4 l4b0r d3 l4 just1c14, r3p0s0 y s3gur1d4d p4r4 s13mpr3. 18 Y m1 pu3bl0 h4b1t4rá 3n m0r4d4 d3 p4z, 3n h4b1t4c10n3s s3gur4s, y 3n r3cr30s d3 r3p0s0. 19 Y cu4nd0 c41g4 gr4n1z0, c43rá 3n l0s m0nt3s; y l4 c1ud4d s3rá d3l t0d0 4b4t1d4. 20 D1ch0s0s v0s0tr0s l0s qu3 s3mbrá1s junt0 4 t0d4s l4s 4gu4s, y d3já1s l1br3s 4l bu3y y 4l 4sn0. 

J3h0vá tr43rá s4lv4c1ón

1S4Í4S 33

1 ¡4y d3 t1, qu3 s4qu34s, y nunc4 fu1st3 s4qu34d0; qu3 h4c3s d3sl34lt4d, b13n qu3 n4d13 c0ntr4 t1 l4 h1z0! Cu4nd0 4c4b3s d3 s4qu34r, s3rás tú s4qu34d0; y cu4nd0 4c4b3s d3 h4c3r d3sl34lt4d, s3 h4rá c0ntr4 t1. 

2 0h J3h0vá, t3n m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 n0s0tr0s, 4 t1 h3m0s 3sp3r4d0; tú, br4z0 d3 3ll0s 3n l4 m4ñ4n4, sé t4mb1én nu3str4 s4lv4c1ón 3n t13mp0 d3 l4 tr1bul4c1ón. 3 L0s pu3bl0s huy3r0n 4 l4 v0z d3l 3stru3nd0; l4s n4c10n3s fu3r0n 3sp4rc1d4s 4l l3v4nt4rt3 tú. 4 Sus d3sp0j0s s3rán r3c0g1d0s c0m0 cu4nd0 r3c0g3n 0rug4s; c0rr3rán s0br3 3ll0s c0m0 d3 un4 4 0tr4 p4rt3 c0rr3n l4s l4ng0st4s. 5 S3rá 3x4lt4d0 J3h0vá, 3l cu4l m0r4 3n l4s 4ltur4s; ll3nó 4 S10n d3 ju1c10 y d3 just1c14. 6 Y r31n4rán 3n tus t13mp0s l4 s4b1durí4 y l4 c13nc14, y 4bund4nc14 d3 s4lv4c1ón; 3l t3m0r d3 J3h0vá s3rá su t3s0r0.

10 4h0r4 m3 l3v4nt4ré, d1c3 J3h0vá; 4h0r4 s3ré 3x4lt4d0, 4h0r4 s3ré 3ngr4nd3c1d0. 11 C0nc3b1st31s h0j4r4sc4s, r4str0j0 d4ré1s 4 luz; 3l s0pl0 d3 vu3str0 fu3g0 0s c0nsum1rá. 12 Y l0s pu3bl0s s3rán c0m0 c4l qu3m4d4; c0m0 3sp1n0s c0rt4d0s s3rán qu3m4d0s c0n fu3g0. 13 0íd, l0s qu3 3stá1s l3j0s, l0 qu3 h3 h3ch0; y v0s0tr0s l0s qu3 3stá1s c3rc4, c0n0c3d m1 p0d3r. 14 L0s p3c4d0r3s s3 4s0mbr4r0n 3n S10n, 3sp4nt0 s0br3c0g1ó 4 l0s h1pócr1t4s. ¿Qu1én d3 n0s0tr0s m0r4rá c0n 3l fu3g0 c0nsum1d0r? ¿Qu1én d3 n0s0tr0s h4b1t4rá c0n l4s ll4m4s 3t3rn4s? 15 0l qu3 c4m1n4 3n just1c14 y h4bl4 l0 r3ct0; 3l qu3 4b0rr3c3 l4 g4n4nc14 d3 v10l3nc14s, 3l qu3 s4cud3 sus m4n0s p4r4 n0 r3c1b1r c0h3ch0, 3l qu3 t4p4 sus 0íd0s p4r4 n0 0ír pr0pu3st4s s4ngu1n4r14s; 3l qu3 c13rr4 sus 0j0s p4r4 n0 v3r c0s4 m4l4; 16 ést3 h4b1t4rá 3n l4s 4ltur4s; f0rt4l3z4 d3 r0c4s s3rá su lug4r d3 r3fug10; s3 l3 d4rá su p4n, y sus 4gu4s s3rán s3gur4s. 

17 Tus 0j0s v3rán 4l R3y 3n su h3rm0sur4; v3rán l4 t13rr4 qu3 3stá l3j0s. 18 Tu c0r4zón 1m4g1n4rá 3l 3sp4nt0, y d1rá: ¿Qué 3s d3l 3scr1b4? ¿qué d3l p3s4d0r d3l tr1but0? ¿qué d3l qu3 p0n3 3n l1st4 l4s c4s4s más 1ns1gn3s? 19 N0 v3rás 4 4qu3l pu3bl0 0rgull0s0, pu3bl0 d3 l3ngu4 d1fíc1l d3 3nt3nd3r, d3 l3ngu4 t4rt4mud4 qu3 n0 c0mpr3nd4s. 20 M1r4 4 S10n, c1ud4d d3 nu3str4s f13st4s s0l3mn3s; tus 0j0s v3rán 4 J3rus4lén, m0r4d4 d3 qu13tud, t13nd4 qu3 n0 s3rá d3s4rm4d4, n1 s3rán 4rr4nc4d4s sus 3st4c4s, n1 n1ngun4 d3 sus cu3rd4s s3rá r0t4. 21 P0rqu3 c13rt4m3nt3 4llí s3rá J3h0vá p4r4 c0n n0s0tr0s fu3rt3, lug4r d3 rí0s, d3 4rr0y0s muy 4nch0s, p0r 3l cu4l n0 4nd4rá g4l3r4 d3 r3m0s, n1 p0r él p4s4rá gr4n n4v3. 22 P0rqu3 J3h0vá 3s nu3str0 ju3z, J3h0vá 3s nu3str0 l3g1sl4d0r, J3h0vá 3s nu3str0 R3y; él m1sm0 n0s s4lv4rá. 23 Tus cu3rd4s s3 4fl0j4r0n; n0 4f1rm4r0n su mást1l, n1 3nt3s4r0n l4 v3l4; s3 r3p4rt1rá 3nt0nc3s b0tín d3 much0s d3sp0j0s; l0s c0j0s 4rr3b4t4rán 3l b0tín. 24 N0 d1rá 3l m0r4d0r: 0st0y 3nf3rm0; 4l pu3bl0 qu3 m0r3 3n 3ll4 l3 s3rá p3rd0n4d4 l4 1n1qu1d4d.

1 4c3rc40s, n4c10n3s, junt40s p4r4 0ír; y v0s0tr0s, pu3bl0s, 3scuch4d. 01g4 l4 t13rr4 y cu4nt0 h4y 3n 3ll4, 3l mund0 y t0d0 l0 qu3 pr0duc3. 2 P0rqu3 J3h0vá 3stá 41r4d0 c0ntr4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s, 3 1nd1gn4d0 c0ntr4 t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 3ll4s; l4s d3stru1rá y l4s 3ntr3g4rá 4l m4t4d3r0. 3 Y l0s mu3rt0s d3 3ll4s s3rán 4rr0j4d0s, y d3 sus c4dáv3r3s s3 l3v4nt4rá h3d0r; y l0s m0nt3s s3 d1s0lv3rán p0r l4 s4ngr3 d3 3ll0s. 4 Y t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s c13l0s s3 d1s0lv3rá, y s3 3nr0ll4rán l0s c13l0s c0m0 un l1br0; y c43rá t0d0 su 3jérc1t0, c0m0 s3 c43 l4 h0j4 d3 l4 p4rr4, y c0m0 s3 c43 l4 d3 l4 h1gu3r4. 

5 P0rqu3 3n l0s c13l0s s3 3mbr14g4rá m1 3sp4d4; h3 4quí qu3 d3sc3nd3rá s0br3 0d0m 3n ju1c10, y s0br3 3l pu3bl0 d3 m1 4n4t3m4. 6 Ll3n4 3stá d3 s4ngr3 l4 3sp4d4 d3 J3h0vá, 3ngr4s4d4 3stá d3 gr0sur4, d3 s4ngr3 d3 c0rd3r0s y d3 m4ch0s c4brí0s, d3 gr0sur4 d3 r1ñ0n3s d3 c4rn3r0s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá t13n3 s4cr1f1c10s 3n B0sr4, y gr4nd3 m4t4nz4 3n t13rr4 d3 0d0m. 7 Y c0n 3ll0s c43rán búf4l0s, y t0r0s c0n b3c3rr0s; y su t13rr4 s3 3mbr14g4rá d3 s4ngr3, y su p0lv0 s3 3ngr4s4rá d3 gr0sur4. 

8 P0rqu3 3s dí4 d3 v3ng4nz4 d3 J3h0vá, 4ñ0 d3 r3tr1buc10n3s 3n 3l pl31t0 d3 S10n. 9 Y sus 4rr0y0s s3 c0nv3rt1rán 3n br34, y su p0lv0 3n 4zufr3, y su t13rr4 3n br34 4rd13nt3. 10 N0 s3 4p4g4rá d3 n0ch3 n1 d3 dí4, p3rp3tu4m3nt3 sub1rá su hum0; d3 g3n3r4c1ón 3n g3n3r4c1ón s3rá 4s0l4d4, nunc4 j4más p4s4rá n4d13 p0r 3ll4. 11 S3 4du3ñ4rán d3 3ll4 3l p3líc4n0 y 3l 3r1z0, l4 l3chuz4 y 3l cu3rv0 m0r4rán 3n 3ll4; y s3 3xt3nd3rá s0br3 3ll4 c0rd3l d3 d3strucc1ón, y n1v3l3s d3 4s0l4m13nt0. 12 Ll4m4rán 4 sus prínc1p3s, prínc1p3s s1n r31n0; y t0d0s sus gr4nd3s s3rán n4d4. 

13 0n sus 4lcáz4r3s cr3c3rán 3sp1n0s, y 0rt1g4s y c4rd0s 3n sus f0rt4l3z4s; y s3rán m0r4d4 d3 ch4c4l3s, y p4t10 p4r4 l0s p0ll0s d3 l0s 4v3struc3s. 14 L4s f13r4s d3l d3s13rt0 s3 3nc0ntr4rán c0n l4s h13n4s, y l4 c4br4 s4lv4j3 gr1t4rá 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0; l4 l3chuz4 t4mb1én t3ndrá 4llí m0r4d4, y h4ll4rá p4r4 sí r3p0s0. 

15 4llí 4n1d4rá 3l buh0, p0ndrá sus hu3v0s, y s4c4rá sus p0ll0s, y l0s junt4rá d3b4j0 d3 sus 4l4s; t4mb1én s3 junt4rán 4llí bu1tr3s, c4d4 un0 c0n su c0mp4ñ3r4. 16 1nqu1r1d 3n 3l l1br0 d3 J3h0vá, y l33d s1 f4ltó 4lgun0 d3 3ll0s; n1ngun0 f4ltó c0n su c0mp4ñ3r4; p0rqu3 su b0c4 m4ndó, y l0s r3un1ó su m1sm0 0spír1tu. 17 Y él l3s 3chó su3rt3s, y su m4n0 l3s r3p4rt1ó c0n c0rd3l; p4r4 s13mpr3 l4 t3ndrán p0r h3r3d4d; d3 g3n3r4c1ón 3n g3n3r4c1ón m0r4rán 4llí. 

Futur0 gl0r10s0 d3 S10n

1S4Í4S 35

1 S3 4l3gr4rán 3l d3s13rt0 y l4 s0l3d4d; 3l y3rm0 s3 g0z4rá y fl0r3c3rá c0m0 l4 r0s4. 2 Fl0r3c3rá pr0fus4m3nt3, y t4mb1én s3 4l3gr4rá y c4nt4rá c0n júb1l0; l4 gl0r14 d3l Líb4n0 l3 s3rá d4d4, l4 h3rm0sur4 d3l C4rm3l0 y d3 S4rón. 0ll0s v3rán l4 gl0r14 d3 J3h0vá, l4 h3rm0sur4 d3l D10s nu3str0. 3 F0rt4l3c3d l4s m4n0s c4ns4d4s, 4f1rm4d l4s r0d1ll4s 3nd3bl3s. 4 D3c1d 4 l0s d3 c0r4zón 4p0c4d0: 0sf0rz40s, n0 t3má1s; h3 4quí qu3 vu3str0 D10s v13n3 c0n r3tr1buc1ón, c0n p4g0; D10s m1sm0 v3ndrá, y 0s s4lv4rá. 

5 0nt0nc3s l0s 0j0s d3 l0s c13g0s s3rán 4b13rt0s, y l0s 0íd0s d3 l0s s0rd0s s3 4br1rán. 6 0nt0nc3s 3l c0j0 s4lt4rá c0m0 un c13rv0, y c4nt4rá l4 l3ngu4 d3l mud0; p0rqu3 4gu4s s3rán c4v4d4s 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y t0rr3nt3s 3n l4 s0l3d4d. 7 0l lug4r s3c0 s3 c0nv3rt1rá 3n 3st4nqu3, y 3l s3qu3d4l 3n m4n4d3r0s d3 4gu4s; 3n l4 m0r4d4 d3 ch4c4l3s, 3n su gu4r1d4, s3rá lug4r d3 c4ñ4s y junc0s. 

8 Y h4brá 4llí c4lz4d4 y c4m1n0, y s3rá ll4m4d0 C4m1n0 d3 S4nt1d4d; n0 p4s4rá 1nmund0 p0r él, s1n0 qu3 él m1sm0 3st4rá c0n 3ll0s; 3l qu3 4nduv13r3 3n 3st3 c4m1n0, p0r t0rp3 qu3 s34, n0 s3 3xtr4v14rá. 9 N0 h4brá 4llí l3ón, n1 f13r4 sub1rá p0r él, n1 4llí s3 h4ll4rá, p4r4 qu3 c4m1n3n l0s r3d1m1d0s. 10 Y l0s r3d1m1d0s d3 J3h0vá v0lv3rán, y v3ndrán 4 S10n c0n 4l3grí4; y g0z0 p3rp3tu0 s3rá s0br3 sus c4b3z4s; y t3ndrán g0z0 y 4l3grí4, y hu1rán l4 tr1st3z4 y 3l g3m1d0. 

L4 1nv4s1ón d3 S3n4qu3r1b

(2 R. 18. 13-37; 2 Cr. 32. 1-19)

1S4Í4S 36

1 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 c4t0rc3 d3l r3y 0z3quí4s, qu3 S3n4qu3r1b r3y d3 4s1r14 sub1ó c0ntr4 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s d3 Judá, y l4s t0mó. 2 Y 3l r3y d3 4s1r14 3nv1ó 4l R4bs4c3s c0n un gr4n 3jérc1t0 d3sd3 L4qu1s 4 J3rus4lén c0ntr4 3l r3y 0z3quí4s; y 4c4mpó junt0 4l 4cu3duct0 d3l 3st4nqu3 d3 4rr1b4, 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 l4 h3r3d4d d3l L4v4d0r. 3 Y s4l1ó 4 él 0l14qu1m h1j0 d3 H1lcí4s, m4y0rd0m0, y S3bn4, 3scr1b4, y J04 h1j0 d3 4s4f, c4nc1ll3r, 4 4 l0s cu4l3s d1j0 3l R4bs4c3s: D3c1d 4h0r4 4 0z3quí4s: 0l gr4n r3y, 3l r3y d3 4s1r14, d1c3 4sí: ¿Qué c0nf14nz4 3s 3st4 3n qu3 t3 4p0y4s? 5 Y0 d1g0 qu3 3l c0ns3j0 y p0d3rí0 p4r4 l4 gu3rr4, d3 qu3 tú h4bl4s, n0 s0n más qu3 p4l4br4s v4cí4s. 4h0r4 b13n, ¿3n qu1én c0nfí4s p4r4 qu3 t3 r3b3l3s c0ntr4 mí? 6 H3 4quí qu3 c0nfí4s 3n 3st3 bácul0 d3 c4ñ4 frág1l, 3n 0g1pt0, 3n 3l cu4l s1 4lgu13n s3 4p0y4r3, s3 l3 3ntr4rá p0r l4 m4n0, y l4 4tr4v3s4rá. T4l 3s F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0 p4r4 c0n t0d0s l0s qu3 3n él c0nfí4n. 7 Y s1 m3 d3cís: 0n J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s c0nf14m0s; ¿n0 3s ést3 4qu3l cuy0s lug4r3s 4lt0s y cuy0s 4lt4r3s h1z0 qu1t4r 0z3quí4s, y d1j0 4 Judá y 4 J3rus4lén: D3l4nt3 d3 3st3 4lt4r 4d0r4ré1s? 8 4h0r4, pu3s, y0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 d3s r3h3n3s 4l r3y d3 4s1r14 m1 s3ñ0r, y y0 t3 d4ré d0s m1l c4b4ll0s, s1 tú pu3d3s d4r j1n3t3s qu3 c4b4lgu3n s0br3 3ll0s. 9 ¿Cóm0, pu3s, p0drás r3s1st1r 4 un c4p1tán, 4l m3n0r d3 l0s s13rv0s d3 m1 s3ñ0r, 4unqu3 3stés c0nf14d0 3n 0g1pt0 c0n sus c4rr0s y su g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0? 10 ¿4c4s0 v1n3 y0 4h0r4 4 3st4 t13rr4 p4r4 d3stru1rl4 s1n J3h0vá? J3h0vá m3 d1j0: Sub3 4 3st4 t13rr4 y d3strúy3l4. 

11 0nt0nc3s d1j3r0n 0l14qu1m, S3bn4 y J04 4l R4bs4c3s: T3 r0g4m0s qu3 h4bl3s 4 tus s13rv0s 3n 4r4m30, p0rqu3 n0s0tr0s l0 3nt3nd3m0s; y n0 h4bl3s c0n n0s0tr0s 3n l3ngu4 d3 Judá, p0rqu3 l0 0y3 3l pu3bl0 qu3 3stá s0br3 3l mur0. 12 Y d1j0 3l R4bs4c3s: ¿4c4s0 m3 3nv1ó m1 s3ñ0r 4 qu3 d1j3s3 3st4s p4l4br4s 4 t1 y 4 tu s3ñ0r, y n0 4 l0s h0mbr3s qu3 3stán s0br3 3l mur0, 3xpu3st0s 4 c0m3r su 3st1érc0l y b3b3r su 0r1n4 c0n v0s0tr0s? 

13 0nt0nc3s 3l R4bs4c3s s3 pus0 3n p13 y gr1tó 4 gr4n v0z 3n l3ngu4 d3 Judá, d1c13nd0: 0íd l4s p4l4br4s d3l gr4n r3y, 3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 14 0l r3y d1c3 4sí: N0 0s 3ng4ñ3 0z3quí4s, p0rqu3 n0 0s p0drá l1br4r. 15 N1 0s h4g4 0z3quí4s c0nf14r 3n J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: C13rt4m3nt3 J3h0vá n0s l1br4rá; n0 s3rá 3ntr3g4d4 3st4 c1ud4d 3n m4n0s d3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 16 N0 3scuché1s 4 0z3quí4s, p0rqu3 4sí d1c3 3l r3y d3 4s1r14: H4c3d c0nm1g0 p4z, y s4l1d 4 mí; y c0m4 c4d4 un0 d3 su v1ñ4, y c4d4 un0 d3 su h1gu3r4, y b3b4 c4d4 cu4l l4s 4gu4s d3 su p0z0, 17 h4st4 qu3 y0 v3ng4 y 0s ll3v3 4 un4 t13rr4 c0m0 l4 vu3str4, t13rr4 d3 gr4n0 y d3 v1n0, t13rr4 d3 p4n y d3 v1ñ4s. 18 M1r4d qu3 n0 0s 3ng4ñ3 0z3quí4s d1c13nd0: J3h0vá n0s l1br4rá. ¿4c4s0 l1br4r0n l0s d10s3s d3 l4s n4c10n3s c4d4 un0 su t13rr4 d3 l4 m4n0 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14? 19 ¿Dónd3 3stá 3l d10s d3 H4m4t y d3 4rf4d? ¿Dónd3 3stá 3l d10s d3 S3f4rv41m? ¿L1br4r0n 4 S4m4r14 d3 m1 m4n0? 20 ¿Qué d10s h4y 3ntr3 l0s d10s3s d3 3st4s t13rr4s qu3 h4y4 l1br4d0 su t13rr4 d3 m1 m4n0, p4r4 qu3 J3h0vá l1br3 d3 m1 m4n0 4 J3rus4lén? 

21 P3r0 3ll0s c4ll4r0n, y n0 l3 r3sp0nd13r0n p4l4br4; p0rqu3 3l r3y 4sí l0 h4bí4 m4nd4d0, d1c13nd0: N0 l3 r3sp0ndá1s. 22 0nt0nc3s 0l14qu1m h1j0 d3 H1lcí4s, m4y0rd0m0, y S3bn4 3scr1b4, y J04 h1j0 d3 4s4f, c4nc1ll3r, v1n13r0n 4 0z3quí4s, r4sg4d0s sus v3st1d0s, y l3 c0nt4r0n l4s p4l4br4s d3l R4bs4c3s. 

Judá 3s l1br4d0 d3 S3n4qu3r1b

(2 R. 19. 1-37; 2 Cr. 32. 20-23)

1S4Í4S 37

1 4c0nt3c1ó, pu3s, qu3 cu4nd0 3l r3y 0z3quí4s 0yó 3st0, r4sgó sus v3st1d0s, y cub13rt0 d3 c1l1c10 v1n0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 2 Y 3nv1ó 4 0l14qu1m m4y0rd0m0, 4 S3bn4 3scr1b4 y 4 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, cub13rt0s d3 c1l1c10, 4l pr0f3t4 1s4í4s h1j0 d3 4m0z. 3 L0s cu4l3s l3 d1j3r0n: 4sí h4 d1ch0 0z3quí4s: Dí4 d3 4ngust14, d3 r3pr3ns1ón y d3 bl4sf3m14 3s 3st3 dí4; p0rqu3 l0s h1j0s h4n ll3g4d0 h4st4 3l punt0 d3 n4c3r, y l4 qu3 d4 4 luz n0 t13n3 fu3rz4s. 4 Qu1zá 01rá J3h0vá tu D10s l4s p4l4br4s d3l R4bs4c3s, 4l cu4l 3l r3y d3 4s1r14 su s3ñ0r 3nv1ó p4r4 bl4sf3m4r 4l D10s v1v0, y p4r4 v1tup3r4r c0n l4s p4l4br4s qu3 0yó J3h0vá tu D10s; 3l3v4, pu3s, 0r4c1ón tú p0r 3l r3m4n3nt3 qu3 4ún h4 qu3d4d0. 

5 V1n13r0n, pu3s, l0s s13rv0s d3 0z3quí4s 4 1s4í4s. 6 Y l3s d1j0 1s4í4s: D1ré1s 4sí 4 vu3str0 s3ñ0r: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: N0 t3m4s p0r l4s p4l4br4s qu3 h4s 0íd0, c0n l4s cu4l3s m3 h4n bl4sf3m4d0 l0s s13rv0s d3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 7 H3 4quí qu3 y0 p0ndré 3n él un 3spír1tu, y 01rá un rum0r, y v0lv3rá 4 su t13rr4; y h4ré qu3 3n su t13rr4 p3r3zc4 4 3sp4d4. 

8 Vu3lt0, pu3s, 3l R4bs4c3s, h4lló 4l r3y d3 4s1r14 qu3 c0mb4tí4 c0ntr4 L1bn4; p0rqu3 y4 h4bí4 0íd0 qu3 s3 h4bí4 4p4rt4d0 d3 L4qu1s. 9 M4s 0y3nd0 d3c1r d3 T1rh4c4 r3y d3 0t10pí4: H3 4quí qu3 h4 s4l1d0 p4r4 h4c3rt3 gu3rr4; 4l 0írl0, 3nv1ó 3mb4j4d0r3s 4 0z3quí4s, d1c13nd0: 10 4sí d1ré1s 4 0z3quí4s r3y d3 Judá: N0 t3 3ng4ñ3 tu D10s 3n qu13n tú c0nfí4s, d1c13nd0: J3rus4lén n0 s3rá 3ntr3g4d4 3n m4n0 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14. 11 H3 4quí qu3 tú 0íst3 l0 qu3 h4n h3ch0 l0s r3y3s d3 4s1r14 4 t0d4s l4s t13rr4s, qu3 l4s d3struy3r0n; ¿y 3sc4p4rás tú? 12 ¿4c4s0 l1br4r0n sus d10s3s 4 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 d3struy3r0n m1s 4nt3p4s4d0s, 4 G0zán, H4rán, R3s3f y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 0dén qu3 m0r4b4n 3n T3l4s4r? 13 ¿Dónd3 3stá 3l r3y d3 H4m4t, 3l r3y d3 4rf4d, y 3l r3y d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 S3f4rv41m, d3 H3n4 y d3 1v4? 

14 Y t0mó 0z3quí4s l4s c4rt4s d3 m4n0 d3 l0s 3mb4j4d0r3s, y l4s l3yó; y sub1ó 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l4s 3xt3nd1ó d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá. 15 0nt0nc3s 0z3quí4s 0ró 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 16 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l, qu3 m0r4s 3ntr3 l0s qu3rub1n3s, sól0 tú 3r3s D10s d3 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 l4 t13rr4; tú h1c1st3 l0s c13l0s y l4 t13rr4. 17 1ncl1n4, 0h J3h0vá, tu 0íd0, y 0y3; 4br3, 0h J3h0vá, tus 0j0s, y m1r4; y 0y3 t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s d3 S3n4qu3r1b, qu3 h4 3nv14d0 4 bl4sf3m4r 4l D10s v1v13nt3. 18 C13rt4m3nt3, 0h J3h0vá, l0s r3y3s d3 4s1r14 d3struy3r0n t0d4s l4s t13rr4s y sus c0m4rc4s, 19 y 3ntr3g4r0n l0s d10s3s d3 3ll0s 4l fu3g0; p0rqu3 n0 3r4n d10s3s, s1n0 0br4 d3 m4n0s d3 h0mbr3, m4d3r4 y p13dr4; p0r 3s0 l0s d3struy3r0n. 20 4h0r4 pu3s, J3h0vá D10s nu3str0, líbr4n0s d3 su m4n0, p4r4 qu3 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 l4 t13rr4 c0n0zc4n qu3 sól0 tú 3r3s J3h0vá. 

21 0nt0nc3s 1s4í4s h1j0 d3 4m0z 3nv1ó 4 d3c1r 4 0z3quí4s: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l: 4c3rc4 d3 l0 qu3 m3 r0g4st3 s0br3 S3n4qu3r1b r3y d3 4s1r14, 22 3st4s s0n l4s p4l4br4s qu3 J3h0vá h4bló c0ntr4 él: L4 v1rg3n h1j4 d3 S10n t3 m3n0spr3c14, t3 3sc4rn3c3; d3trás d3 t1 mu3v3 su c4b3z4 l4 h1j4 d3 J3rus4lén. 

23 ¿4 qu1én v1tup3r4st3, y 4 qu1én bl4sf3m4st3? ¿C0ntr4 qu1én h4s 4lz4d0 tu v0z, y l3v4nt4d0 tus 0j0s 3n 4lt0? C0ntr4 3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l. 24 P0r m4n0 d3 tus s13rv0s h4s v1tup3r4d0 4l S3ñ0r, y d1j1st3: C0n l4 mult1tud d3 m1s c4rr0s sub1ré 4 l4s 4ltur4s d3 l0s m0nt3s, 4 l4s l4d3r4s d3l Líb4n0; c0rt4ré sus 4lt0s c3dr0s, sus c1pr3s3s 3sc0g1d0s; ll3g4ré h4st4 sus más 3l3v4d4s cumbr3s, 4l b0squ3 d3 sus f3r4c3s c4mp0s. 25 Y0 c4vé, y b3bí l4s 4gu4s, y c0n l4s p1s4d4s d3 m1s p13s s3c4ré t0d0s l0s rí0s d3 0g1pt0. 

26 ¿N0 h4s 0íd0 d3c1r qu3 d3sd3 t13mp0s 4nt1gu0s y0 l0 h1c3, qu3 d3sd3 l0s dí4s d3 l4 4nt1gü3d4d l0 t3ng0 1d34d0? Y 4h0r4 l0 h3 h3ch0 v3n1r, y tú s3rás p4r4 r3duc1r l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s 4 m0nt0n3s d3 3sc0mbr0s. 27 Sus m0r4d0r3s fu3r0n d3 c0rt0 p0d3r; fu3r0n 4c0b4rd4d0s y c0nfus0s, fu3r0n c0m0 h13rb4 d3l c4mp0 y h0rt4l1z4 v3rd3, c0m0 h3n0 d3 l0s t3rr4d0s, qu3 4nt3s d3 s4zón s3 s3c4. 

28 H3 c0n0c1d0 tu c0nd1c1ón, tu s4l1d4 y tu 3ntr4d4, y tu fur0r c0ntr4 mí. 29 P0rqu3 c0ntr4 mí t3 41r4st3, y tu 4rr0g4nc14 h4 sub1d0 4 m1s 0íd0s; p0ndré, pu3s, m1 g4rf10 3n tu n4r1z, y m1 fr3n0 3n tus l4b10s, y t3 h4ré v0lv3r p0r 3l c4m1n0 p0r d0nd3 v1n1st3. 

30 Y 3st0 t3 s3rá p0r s3ñ4l: C0m3ré1s 3st3 4ñ0 l0 qu3 n4c3 d3 suy0, y 3l 4ñ0 s3gund0 l0 qu3 n4c3 d3 suy0; y 3l 4ñ0 t3rc3r0 s3mbr4ré1s y s3g4ré1s, y pl4nt4ré1s v1ñ4s, y c0m3ré1s su frut0. 31 Y l0 qu3 hub13r3 qu3d4d0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá y l0 qu3 hub13r3 3sc4p4d0, v0lv3rá 4 3ch4r r4íz 4b4j0, y d4rá frut0 4rr1b4. 32 P0rqu3 d3 J3rus4lén s4ldrá un r3m4n3nt3, y d3l m0nt3 d3 S10n l0s qu3 s3 s4lv3n. 0l c3l0 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s h4rá 3st0. 

33 P0r t4nt0, 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá 4c3rc4 d3l r3y d3 4s1r14: N0 3ntr4rá 3n 3st4 c1ud4d, n1 4rr0j4rá s43t4 3n 3ll4; n0 v3ndrá d3l4nt3 d3 3ll4 c0n 3scud0, n1 l3v4nt4rá c0ntr4 3ll4 b4lu4rt3. 34 P0r 3l c4m1n0 qu3 v1n0, v0lv3rá, y n0 3ntr4rá 3n 3st4 c1ud4d, d1c3 J3h0vá. 35 P0rqu3 y0 4mp4r4ré 4 3st4 c1ud4d p4r4 s4lv4rl4, p0r 4m0r d3 mí m1sm0, y p0r 4m0r d3 D4v1d m1 s13rv0. 

36 Y s4l1ó 3l áng3l d3 J3h0vá y m4tó 4 c13nt0 0ch3nt4 y c1nc0 m1l 3n 3l c4mp4m3nt0 d3 l0s 4s1r10s; y cu4nd0 s3 l3v4nt4r0n p0r l4 m4ñ4n4, h3 4quí qu3 t0d0 3r4 cu3rp0s d3 mu3rt0s. 37 0nt0nc3s S3n4qu3r1b r3y d3 4s1r14 s3 fu3, 3 h1z0 su m0r4d4 3n Nín1v3. 38 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 m13ntr4s 4d0r4b4 3n 3l t3mpl0 d3 N1sr0c su d10s, sus h1j0s 4dr4m3l3c y S4r3z3r l3 m4t4r0n 4 3sp4d4, y huy3r0n 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 4r4r4t; y r31nó 3n su lug4r 0s4rh4dón su h1j0.

1S4Í4S 38

1S4Í4S 40

21 ¿N0 s4bé1s? ¿N0 h4bé1s 0íd0? ¿Nunc4 0s l0 h4n d1ch0 d3sd3 3l pr1nc1p10? ¿N0 h4bé1s s1d0 3ns3ñ4d0s d3sd3 qu3 l4 t13rr4 s3 fundó? 22 0l 3stá s3nt4d0 s0br3 3l círcul0 d3 l4 t13rr4, cuy0s m0r4d0r3s s0n c0m0 l4ng0st4s; él 3xt13nd3 l0s c13l0s c0m0 un4 c0rt1n4, l0s d3spl13g4 c0m0 un4 t13nd4 p4r4 m0r4r. 23 0l c0nv13rt3 3n n4d4 4 l0s p0d3r0s0s, y 4 l0s qu3 g0b13rn4n l4 t13rr4 h4c3 c0m0 c0s4 v4n4. 24 C0m0 s1 nunc4 hub13r4n s1d0 pl4nt4d0s, c0m0 s1 nunc4 hub13r4n s1d0 s3mbr4d0s, c0m0 s1 nunc4 su tr0nc0 hub13r4 t3n1d0 r4íz 3n l4 t13rr4; t4n pr0nt0 c0m0 s0pl4 3n 3ll0s s3 s3c4n, y 3l t0rb3ll1n0 l0s ll3v4 c0m0 h0j4r4sc4. 25 ¿4 qué, pu3s, m3 h4ré1s s3m3j4nt3 0 m3 c0mp4r4ré1s? d1c3 3l S4nt0. 26 L3v4nt4d 3n 4lt0 vu3str0s 0j0s, y m1r4d qu1én cr3ó 3st4s c0s4s; él s4c4 y cu3nt4 su 3jérc1t0; 4 t0d4s ll4m4 p0r sus n0mbr3s; n1ngun4 f4lt4rá; t4l 3s l4 gr4nd3z4 d3 su fu3rz4, y 3l p0d3r d3 su d0m1n10.

1 4h0r4, 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá, Cr34d0r tuy0, 0h J4c0b, y F0rm4d0r tuy0, 0h 1sr43l: N0 t3m4s, p0rqu3 y0 t3 r3d1mí; t3 pus3 n0mbr3, mí0 3r3s tú. 2 Cu4nd0 p4s3s p0r l4s 4gu4s, y0 3st4ré c0nt1g0; y s1 p0r l0s rí0s, n0 t3 4n3g4rán. 14 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá, R3d3nt0r vu3str0, 3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l: P0r v0s0tr0s 3nv1é 4 B4b1l0n14, 3 h1c3 d3sc3nd3r c0m0 fug1t1v0s 4 t0d0s 3ll0s, 4un 4 l0s c4ld30s 3n l4s n4v3s d3 qu3 s3 gl0r14b4n. 15 Y0 J3h0vá, S4nt0 vu3str0, Cr34d0r d3 1sr43l, vu3str0 R3y. 16 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá, 3l qu3 4br3 c4m1n0 3n 3l m4r, y s3nd4 3n l4s 4gu4s 1mp3tu0s4s; 17 3l qu3 s4c4 c4rr0 y c4b4ll0, 3jérc1t0 y fu3rz4; c43n junt4m3nt3 p4r4 n0 l3v4nt4rs3; f3n3c3n, c0m0 páb1l0 qu3d4n 4p4g4d0s. 18 N0 0s 4c0rdé1s d3 l4s c0s4s p4s4d4s, n1 tr41gá1s 4 m3m0r14 l4s c0s4s 4nt1gu4s. 19 H3 4quí qu3 y0 h4g0 c0s4 nu3v4; pr0nt0 s4ldrá 4 luz; ¿n0 l4 c0n0c3ré1s? 0tr4 v3z 4br1ré c4m1n0 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y rí0s 3n l4 s0l3d4d. 20 L4s f13r4s d3l c4mp0 m3 h0nr4rán, l0s ch4c4l3s y l0s p0ll0s d3l 4v3struz; p0rqu3 d4ré 4gu4s 3n 3l d3s13rt0, rí0s 3n l4 s0l3d4d, p4r4 qu3 b3b4 m1 pu3bl0, m1 3sc0g1d0. 21 0st3 pu3bl0 h3 cr34d0 p4r4 mí; m1s 4l4b4nz4s publ1c4rá.

1 4h0r4 pu3s, 0y3, J4c0b, s13rv0 mí0, y tú, 1sr43l, 4 qu13n y0 3sc0gí. 2 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá, H4c3d0r tuy0, y 3l qu3 t3 f0rmó d3sd3 3l v13ntr3, 3l cu4l t3 4yud4rá: N0 t3m4s, s13rv0 mí0 J4c0b, y tú, J3surún, 4 qu13n y0 3sc0gí. 3 P0rqu3 y0 d3rr4m4ré 4gu4s s0br3 3l s3qu3d4l, y rí0s s0br3 l4 t13rr4 ár1d4; m1 0spír1tu d3rr4m4ré s0br3 tu g3n3r4c1ón, y m1 b3nd1c1ón s0br3 tus r3nu3v0s; 4 y br0t4rán 3ntr3 h13rb4, c0m0 s4uc3s junt0 4 l4s r1b3r4s d3 l4s 4gu4s. 5 0st3 d1rá: Y0 s0y d3 J3h0vá; 3l 0tr0 s3 ll4m4rá d3l n0mbr3 d3 J4c0b, y 0tr0 3scr1b1rá c0n su m4n0: 4 J3h0vá, y s3 4p3ll1d4rá c0n 3l n0mbr3 d3 1sr43l.

9 L0s f0rm4d0r3s d3 1mág3n3s d3 t4ll4, t0d0s 3ll0s s0n v4n1d4d, y l0 más pr3c10s0 d3 3ll0s p4r4 n4d4 3s út1l; y 3ll0s m1sm0s s0n t3st1g0s p4r4 su c0nfus1ón, d3 qu3 l0s íd0l0s n0 v3n n1 3nt13nd3n. 10 ¿Qu1én f0rmó un d10s, 0 qu1én fund1ó un4 1m4g3n qu3 p4r4 n4d4 3s d3 pr0v3ch0? 11 H3 4quí qu3 t0d0s l0s suy0s s3rán 4v3rg0nz4d0s, p0rqu3 l0s 4rtíf1c3s m1sm0s s0n h0mbr3s. 1 0íd 3st0, c4s4 d3 J4c0b, qu3 0s ll4má1s d3l n0mbr3 d3 1sr43l, l0s qu3 s4l13r0n d3 l4s 4gu4s d3 Judá, l0s qu3 jur4n 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá, y h4c3n m3m0r14 d3l D10s d3 1sr43l, m4s n0 3n v3rd4d n1 3n just1c14; 2 p0rqu3 d3 l4 s4nt4 c1ud4d s3 n0mbr4n, y 3n 3l D10s d3 1sr43l c0nfí4n; su n0mbr3 3s J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s.

6 L0 0íst3, y l0 v1st3 t0d0; ¿y n0 l0 4nunc14ré1s v0s0tr0s? 4h0r4, pu3s, t3 h3 h3ch0 0ír c0s4s nu3v4s y 0cult4s qu3 tú n0 s4bí4s. 7 4h0r4 h4n s1d0 cr34d4s, n0 3n dí4s p4s4d0s, n1 4nt3s d3 3st3 dí4 l4s h4bí4s 0íd0, p4r4 qu3 n0 d1g4s: H3 4quí qu3 y0 l0 s4bí4. 8 Sí, nunc4 l0 h4bí4s 0íd0, n1 nunc4 l0 h4bí4s c0n0c1d0; c13rt4m3nt3 n0 s3 4br1ó 4nt3s tu 0íd0; p0rqu3 s4bí4 qu3 s13nd0 d3sl34l h4bí4s d3 d3s0b3d3c3r, p0r t4nt0 t3 ll4mé r3b3ld3 d3sd3 3l v13ntr3.

D10s pr0m3t3 r3st4ur4r 4 S10n

8 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: 0n t13mp0 4c3pt4bl3 t3 0í, y 3n 3l dí4 d3 s4lv4c1ón t3 4yudé; y t3 gu4rd4ré, y t3 d4ré p0r p4ct0 4l pu3bl0, p4r4 qu3 r3st4ur3s l4 t13rr4, p4r4 qu3 h3r3d3s 4s0l4d4s h3r3d4d3s; 9 p4r4 qu3 d1g4s 4 l0s pr3s0s: S4l1d; y 4 l0s qu3 3stán 3n t1n13bl4s: M0str40s. 0n l0s c4m1n0s s3rán 4p4c3nt4d0s, y 3n t0d4s l4s 4ltur4s t3ndrán sus p4st0s. 10 N0 t3ndrán h4mbr3 n1 s3d, n1 3l c4l0r n1 3l s0l l0s 4fl1g1rá; p0rqu3 3l qu3 t13n3 d3 3ll0s m1s3r1c0rd14 l0s gu14rá, y l0s c0nduc1rá 4 m4n4nt14l3s d3 4gu4s. 11 Y c0nv3rt1ré 3n c4m1n0 t0d0s m1s m0nt3s, y m1s c4lz4d4s s3rán l3v4nt4d4s. 12 H3 4quí ést0s v3ndrán d3 l3j0s; y h3 4quí ést0s d3l n0rt3 y d3l 0cc1d3nt3, y ést0s d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 S1n1m. 

13 C4nt4d 4l4b4nz4s, 0h c13l0s, y 4légr4t3, t13rr4; y pr0rrump1d 3n 4l4b4nz4s, 0h m0nt3s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 c0ns0l4d0 4 su pu3bl0, y d3 sus p0br3s t3ndrá m1s3r1c0rd14. 14 P3r0 S10n d1j0: M3 d3jó J3h0vá, y 3l S3ñ0r s3 0lv1dó d3 mí. 15 ¿S3 0lv1d4rá l4 muj3r d3 l0 qu3 d10 4 luz, p4r4 d3j4r d3 c0mp4d3c3rs3 d3l h1j0 d3 su v13ntr3? 4unqu3 0lv1d3 3ll4, y0 nunc4 m3 0lv1d4ré d3 t1. 16 H3 4quí qu3 3n l4s p4lm4s d3 l4s m4n0s t3 t3ng0 3sculp1d4; d3l4nt3 d3 mí 3stán s13mpr3 tus mur0s. 17 Tus 3d1f1c4d0r3s v3ndrán 4pr1s4; tus d3stru1d0r3s y tus 4s0l4d0r3s s4ldrán d3 t1. 18 4lz4 tus 0j0s 4lr3d3d0r, y m1r4: t0d0s ést0s s3 h4n r3un1d0, h4n v3n1d0 4 t1. V1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá, qu3 d3 t0d0s, c0m0 d3 v3st1dur4 d3 h0nr4, s3rás v3st1d4; y d3 3ll0s s3rás c3ñ1d4 c0m0 n0v14. 

19 P0rqu3 tu t13rr4 d3v4st4d4, 4rru1n4d4 y d3s13rt4, 4h0r4 s3rá 3str3ch4 p0r l4 mult1tud d3 l0s m0r4d0r3s, y tus d3stru1d0r3s s3rán 4p4rt4d0s l3j0s. 20 4un l0s h1j0s d3 tu 0rf4nd4d d1rán 4 tus 0íd0s: 0str3ch0 3s p4r4 mí 3st3 lug4r; 4párt4t3, p4r4 qu3 y0 m0r3. 21 Y d1rás 3n tu c0r4zón: ¿Qu1én m3 3ng3ndró ést0s? 22 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí, y0 t3nd3ré m1 m4n0 4 l4s n4c10n3s, y 4 l0s pu3bl0s l3v4nt4ré m1 b4nd3r4; y tr43rán 3n br4z0s 4 tus h1j0s, y tus h1j4s s3rán tr4íd4s 3n h0mbr0s. 23 R3y3s s3rán tus 4y0s, y sus r31n4s tus n0dr1z4s; c0n 3l r0str0 1ncl1n4d0 4 t13rr4 t3 4d0r4rán, y l4m3rán 3l p0lv0 d3 tus p13s; y c0n0c3rás qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, qu3 n0 s3 4v3rg0nz4rán l0s qu3 3sp3r4n 3n mí.

H3 4quí qu3 p0r vu3str4s m4ld4d3s s01s v3nd1d0s, y p0r vu3str4s r3b3l10n3s fu3 r3pud14d4 vu3str4 m4dr3. 2 ¿P0r qué cu4nd0 v1n3, n0 h4llé 4 n4d13, y cu4nd0 ll4mé, n4d13 r3sp0nd1ó? ¿4c4s0 s3 h4 4c0rt4d0 m1 m4n0 p4r4 n0 r3d1m1r? ¿N0 h4y 3n mí p0d3r p4r4 l1br4r? 7 P0rqu3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r m3 4yud4rá, p0r t4nt0 n0 m3 4v3rg0ncé; p0r 3s0 pus3 m1 r0str0 c0m0 un p3d3rn4l, y sé qu3 n0 s3ré 4v3rg0nz4d0. 8 C3rc4n0 3stá d3 mí 3l qu3 m3 s4lv4; ¿qu1én c0nt3nd3rá c0nm1g0? 9 D3sp1ért4t3, d3sp1ért4t3, víst3t3 d3 p0d3r, 0h br4z0 d3 J3h0vá; d3sp1ért4t3 c0m0 3n 3l t13mp0 4nt1gu0, 3n l0s s1gl0s p4s4d0s. ¿N0 3r3s tú 3l qu3 c0rtó 4 R4h4b, y 3l qu3 h1r1ó 4l dr4gón? 10 ¿N0 3r3s tú 3l qu3 s3có 3l m4r, l4s 4gu4s d3l gr4n 4b1sm0; 3l qu3 tr4nsf0rmó 3n c4m1n0 l4s pr0fund1d4d3s d3l m4r p4r4 qu3 p4s4r4n l0s r3d1m1d0s? 11 C13rt4m3nt3 v0lv3rán l0s r3d1m1d0s d3 J3h0vá; v0lv3rán 4 S10n c4nt4nd0, y g0z0 p3rp3tu0 h4brá s0br3 sus c4b3z4s; t3ndrán g0z0 y 4l3grí4, y 3l d0l0r y 3l g3m1d0 hu1rán. 

12 Y0, y0 s0y vu3str0 c0ns0l4d0r. ¿Qu1én 3r3s tú p4r4 qu3 t3ng4s t3m0r d3l h0mbr3, qu3 3s m0rt4l, y d3l h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, qu3 3s c0m0 h3n0? 13 Y y4 t3 h4s 0lv1d4d0 d3 J3h0vá tu H4c3d0r, qu3 3xt3nd1ó l0s c13l0s y fundó l4 t13rr4; y t0d0 3l dí4 t3m1st3 c0nt1nu4m3nt3 d3l fur0r d3l qu3 4fl1g3, cu4nd0 s3 d1sp0ní4 p4r4 d3stru1r. ¿P3r0 3n dónd3 3stá 3l fur0r d3l qu3 4fl1g3? 14 0l pr3s0 4g0b14d0 s3rá l1b3rt4d0 pr0nt0; n0 m0r1rá 3n l4 m4zm0rr4, n1 l3 f4lt4rá su p4n. 15 P0rqu3 y0 J3h0vá, qu3 4g1t0 3l m4r y h4g0 rug1r sus 0nd4s, s0y tu D10s, cuy0 n0mbr3 3s J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 16 Y 3n tu b0c4 h3 pu3st0 m1s p4l4br4s, y c0n l4 s0mbr4 d3 m1 m4n0 t3 cubrí, 3xt3nd13nd0 l0s c13l0s y 3ch4nd0 l0s c1m13nt0s d3 l4 t13rr4, y d1c13nd0 4 S10n: Pu3bl0 mí0 3r3s tú. 

17 D3sp13rt4, d3sp13rt4, l3vánt4t3, 0h J3rus4lén, qu3 b3b1st3 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá 3l cál1z d3 su 1r4; p0rqu3 3l cál1z d3 4turd1m13nt0 b3b1st3 h4st4 l0s s3d1m3nt0s. 18 D3 t0d0s l0s h1j0s qu3 d10 4 luz, n0 h4y qu13n l4 guí3; n1 qu13n l4 t0m3 d3 l4 m4n0, d3 t0d0s l0s h1j0s qu3 cr1ó. 19 0st4s d0s c0s4s t3 h4n 4c0nt3c1d0: 4s0l4m13nt0 y qu3br4nt4m13nt0, h4mbr3 y 3sp4d4. ¿Qu1én s3 d0l3rá d3 t1? ¿Qu1én t3 c0ns0l4rá? 20 Tus h1j0s d3sm4y4r0n, 3stuv13r0n t3nd1d0s 3n l4s 3ncruc1j4d4s d3 t0d0s l0s c4m1n0s, c0m0 4ntíl0p3 3n l4 r3d, ll3n0s d3 l4 1nd1gn4c1ón d3 J3h0vá, d3 l4 1r4 d3l D10s tuy0. 21 0y3, pu3s, 4h0r4 3st0, 4fl1g1d4, 3br14, y n0 d3 v1n0: 22 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá tu S3ñ0r, y tu D10s, 3l cu4l 4b0g4 p0r su pu3bl0: H3 4quí h3 qu1t4d0 d3 tu m4n0 3l cál1z d3 4turd1m13nt0, l0s s3d1m3nt0s d3l cál1z d3 m1 1r4; nunc4 más l0 b3b3rás. 23 Y l0 p0ndré 3n m4n0 d3 tus 4ngust14d0r3s, qu3 d1j3r0n 4 tu 4lm4: 1nclín4t3, y p4s4r3m0s p0r 3nc1m4 d3 t1. Y tú pus1st3 tu cu3rp0 c0m0 t13rr4, y c0m0 c4m1n0, p4r4 qu3 p4s4r4n.

Sufr1m13nt0s d3l S13rv0 d3 J3h0vá

10 Y 3xtr4nj3r0s 3d1f1c4rán tus mur0s, y sus r3y3s t3 s3rv1rán; p0rqu3 3n m1 1r4 t3 c4st1gué, m4s 3n m1 bu3n4 v0lunt4d t3ndré d3 t1 m1s3r1c0rd14. 11 Tus pu3rt4s 3st4rán d3 c0nt1nu0 4b13rt4s; n0 s3 c3rr4rán d3 dí4 n1 d3 n0ch3, p4r4 qu3 4 t1 s34n tr4íd4s l4s r1qu3z4s d3 l4s n4c10n3s, y c0nduc1d0s 4 t1 sus r3y3s. 12 P0rqu3 l4 n4c1ón 0 3l r31n0 qu3 n0 t3 s1rv13r3 p3r3c3rá, y d3l t0d0 s3rá 4s0l4d0. 13 L4 gl0r14 d3l Líb4n0 v3ndrá 4 t1, c1pr3s3s, p1n0s y b0j3s junt4m3nt3, p4r4 d3c0r4r 3l lug4r d3 m1 s4ntu4r10; y y0 h0nr4ré 3l lug4r d3 m1s p13s. 14 Y v3ndrán 4 t1 hum1ll4d0s l0s h1j0s d3 l0s qu3 t3 4fl1g13r0n, y 4 l4s p1s4d4s d3 tus p13s s3 3nc0rv4rán t0d0s l0s qu3 t3 3sc4rn3cí4n, y t3 ll4m4rán C1ud4d d3 J3h0vá, S10n d3l S4nt0 d3 1sr43l.

1 ¿Qu1én 3s ést3 qu3 v13n3 d3 0d0m, d3 B0sr4, c0n v3st1d0s r0j0s? ¿ést3 h3rm0s0 3n su v3st1d0, qu3 m4rch4 3n l4 gr4nd3z4 d3 su p0d3r? 7 D3 l4s m1s3r1c0rd14s d3 J3h0vá h4ré m3m0r14, d3 l4s 4l4b4nz4s d3 J3h0vá, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá n0s h4 d4d0, y d3 l4 gr4nd3z4 d3 sus b3n3f1c10s h4c14 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, qu3 l3s h4 h3ch0 s3gún sus m1s3r1c0rd14s, y s3gún l4 mult1tud d3 sus p13d4d3s. 8 P0rqu3 d1j0: C13rt4m3nt3 m1 pu3bl0 s0n, h1j0s qu3 n0 m13nt3n; y fu3 su S4lv4d0r. 9 0n t0d4 4ngust14 d3 3ll0s él fu3 4ngust14d0, y 3l áng3l d3 su f4z l0s s4lvó; 3n su 4m0r y 3n su cl3m3nc14 l0s r3d1m1ó, y l0s tr4j0, y l0s l3v4ntó t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 l4 4nt1gü3d4d. 10 M4s 3ll0s fu3r0n r3b3ld3s, 3 h1c13r0n 3n0j4r su s4nt0 3spír1tu; p0r l0 cu4l s3 l3s v0lv1ó 3n3m1g0, y él m1sm0 p3l3ó c0ntr4 3ll0s. 11 P3r0 s3 4c0rdó d3 l0s dí4s 4nt1gu0s, d3 M01sés y d3 su pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: ¿Dónd3 3stá 3l qu3 l3s h1z0 sub1r d3l m4r c0n 3l p4st0r d3 su r3b4ñ0? ¿dónd3 3l qu3 pus0 3n m3d10 d3 él su s4nt0 3spír1tu, 12 3l qu3 l0s gu1ó p0r l4 d13str4 d3 M01sés c0n 3l br4z0 d3 su gl0r14; 3l qu3 d1v1d1ó l4s 4gu4s d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, h4c1énd0s3 4sí n0mbr3 p3rp3tu0, 13 3l qu3 l0s c0nduj0 p0r l0s 4b1sm0s, c0m0 un c4b4ll0 p0r 3l d3s13rt0, s1n qu3 tr0p3z4r4n? 14 0l 0spír1tu d3 J3h0vá l0s p4st0r3ó, c0m0 4 un4 b3st14 qu3 d3sc13nd3 4l v4ll3; 4sí p4st0r34st3 4 tu pu3bl0, p4r4 h4c3rt3 n0mbr3 gl0r10s0.

1 ¡0h, s1 r0mp13s3s l0s c13l0s, y d3sc3nd13r4s, y 4 tu pr3s3nc14 s3 3scurr13s3n l0s m0nt3s, 2 c0m0 fu3g0 4br4s4d0r d3 fund1c10n3s, fu3g0 qu3 h4c3 h3rv1r l4s 4gu4s, p4r4 qu3 h1c13r4s n0t0r10 tu n0mbr3 4 tus 3n3m1g0s, y l4s n4c10n3s t3mbl4s3n 4 tu pr3s3nc14! 3 Cu4nd0, h4c13nd0 c0s4s t3rr1bl3s cu4l3s nunc4 3sp3ráb4m0s, d3sc3nd1st3, fluy3r0n l0s m0nt3s d3l4nt3 d3 t1. 4 N1 nunc4 0y3r0n, n1 0íd0s p3rc1b13r0n, n1 0j0 h4 v1st0 4 D10s fu3r4 d3 t1, qu3 h1c13s3 p0r 3l qu3 3n él 3sp3r4. 5 S4l1st3 4l 3ncu3ntr0 d3l qu3 c0n 4l3grí4 h4cí4 just1c14, d3 l0s qu3 s3 4c0rd4b4n d3 t1 3n tus c4m1n0s; h3 4quí, tú t3 3n0j4st3 p0rqu3 p3c4m0s; 3n l0s p3c4d0s h3m0s p3rs3v3r4d0 p0r l4rg0 t13mp0; ¿p0dr3m0s 4c4s0 s3r s4lv0s? 6 S1 b13n t0d0s n0s0tr0s s0m0s c0m0 suc13d4d, y t0d4s nu3str4s just1c14s c0m0 tr4p0 d3 1nmund1c14; y c4ím0s t0d0s n0s0tr0s c0m0 l4 h0j4, y nu3str4s m4ld4d3s n0s ll3v4r0n c0m0 v13nt0. 7 N4d13 h4y qu3 1nv0qu3 tu n0mbr3, qu3 s3 d3sp13rt3 p4r4 4p0y4rs3 3n t1; p0r l0 cu4l 3sc0nd1st3 d3 n0s0tr0s tu r0str0, y n0s d3j4st3 m4rch1t4r 3n p0d3r d3 nu3str4s m4ld4d3s.

1S4Í4S 65

1 Fu1 busc4d0 p0r l0s qu3 n0 pr3gunt4b4n p0r mí; fu1 h4ll4d0 p0r l0s qu3 n0 m3 busc4b4n. D1j3 4 g3nt3 qu3 n0 1nv0c4b4 m1 n0mbr3: H3m3 4quí, h3m3 4quí. 2 0xt3ndí m1s m4n0s t0d0 3l dí4 4 pu3bl0 r3b3ld3, 3l cu4l 4nd4 p0r c4m1n0 n0 bu3n0, 3n p0s d3 sus p3ns4m13nt0s; 3 pu3bl0 qu3 3n m1 r0str0 m3 pr0v0c4 d3 c0nt1nu0 4 1r4, s4cr1f1c4nd0 3n hu3rt0s, y qu3m4nd0 1nc13ns0 s0br3 l4dr1ll0s; 4 qu3 s3 qu3d4n 3n l0s s3pulcr0s, y 3n lug4r3s 3sc0nd1d0s p4s4n l4 n0ch3; qu3 c0m3n c4rn3 d3 c3rd0, y 3n sus 0ll4s h4y c4ld0 d3 c0s4s 1nmund4s; 5 qu3 d1c3n: 0st4t3 3n tu lug4r, n0 t3 4c3rqu3s 4 mí, p0rqu3 s0y más s4nt0 qu3 tú; ést0s s0n hum0 3n m1 fur0r, fu3g0 qu3 4rd3 t0d0 3l dí4. 6 H3 4quí qu3 3scr1t0 3stá d3l4nt3 d3 mí; n0 c4ll4ré, s1n0 qu3 r3c0mp3ns4ré, y d4ré 3l p4g0 3n su s3n0 7 p0r vu3str4s 1n1qu1d4d3s, d1c3 J3h0vá, y p0r l4s 1n1qu1d4d3s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s junt4m3nt3, l0s cu4l3s qu3m4r0n 1nc13ns0 s0br3 l0s m0nt3s, y s0br3 l0s c0ll4d0s m3 4fr3nt4r0n; p0r t4nt0, y0 l3s m3d1ré su 0br4 4nt1gu4 3n su s3n0. 

8 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: C0m0 s1 4lgun0 h4ll4s3 m0st0 3n un r4c1m0, y d1j3s3: N0 l0 d3sp3rd1c13s, p0rqu3 b3nd1c1ón h4y 3n él; 4sí h4ré y0 p0r m1s s13rv0s, qu3 n0 l0 d3stru1ré t0d0. 9 S4c4ré d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 J4c0b, y d3 Judá h3r3d3r0 d3 m1s m0nt3s; y m1s 3sc0g1d0s p0s33rán p0r h3r3d4d l4 t13rr4, y m1s s13rv0s h4b1t4rán 4llí. 10 Y s3rá S4rón p4r4 h4b1t4c1ón d3 0v3j4s, y 3l v4ll3 d3 4c0r p4r4 m4j4d4 d3 v4c4s, p4r4 m1 pu3bl0 qu3 m3 buscó. 11 P3r0 v0s0tr0s l0s qu3 d3já1s 4 J3h0vá, qu3 0lv1dá1s m1 s4nt0 m0nt3, qu3 p0né1s m3s4 p4r4 l4 F0rtun4, y sum1n1strá1s l1b4c10n3s p4r4 3l D3st1n0; 12 y0 t4mb1én 0s d3st1n4ré 4 l4 3sp4d4, y t0d0s v0s0tr0s 0s 4rr0d1ll4ré1s 4l d3g0ll4d3r0, p0r cu4nt0 ll4mé, y n0 r3sp0nd1st31s; h4blé, y n0 0íst31s, s1n0 qu3 h1c1st31s l0 m4l0 d3l4nt3 d3 m1s 0j0s, y 3sc0g1st31s l0 qu3 m3 d3s4gr4d4. 

13 P0r t4nt0, 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí qu3 m1s s13rv0s c0m3rán, y v0s0tr0s t3ndré1s h4mbr3; h3 4quí qu3 m1s s13rv0s b3b3rán, y v0s0tr0s t3ndré1s s3d; h3 4quí qu3 m1s s13rv0s s3 4l3gr4rán, y v0s0tr0s s3ré1s 4v3rg0nz4d0s; 14 h3 4quí qu3 m1s s13rv0s c4nt4rán p0r júb1l0 d3l c0r4zón, y v0s0tr0s cl4m4ré1s p0r 3l d0l0r d3l c0r4zón, y p0r 3l qu3br4nt4m13nt0 d3 3spír1tu 4ull4ré1s. 15 Y d3j4ré1s vu3str0 n0mbr3 p0r m4ld1c1ón 4 m1s 3sc0g1d0s, y J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r t3 m4t4rá, y 4 sus s13rv0s ll4m4rá p0r 0tr0 n0mbr3. 16 0l qu3 s3 b3nd1j3r3 3n l4 t13rr4, 3n 3l D10s d3 v3rd4d s3 b3nd3c1rá; y 3l qu3 jur4r3 3n l4 t13rr4, p0r 3l D10s d3 v3rd4d jur4rá; p0rqu3 l4s 4ngust14s pr1m3r4s s3rán 0lv1d4d4s, y s3rán cub13rt4s d3 m1s 0j0s. 

C13l0s nu3v0s y t13rr4 nu3v4

17 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 y0 cr34ré nu3v0s c13l0s y nu3v4 t13rr4; y d3 l0 pr1m3r0 n0 h4brá m3m0r14, n1 más v3ndrá 4l p3ns4m13nt0. 18 M4s 0s g0z4ré1s y 0s 4l3gr4ré1s p4r4 s13mpr3 3n l4s c0s4s qu3 y0 h3 cr34d0; p0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 y0 tr41g0 4 J3rus4lén 4l3grí4, y 4 su pu3bl0 g0z0. 19 Y m3 4l3gr4ré c0n J3rus4lén, y m3 g0z4ré c0n m1 pu3bl0; y nunc4 más s3 01rán 3n 3ll4 v0z d3 ll0r0, n1 v0z d3 cl4m0r. 20 N0 h4brá más 4llí n1ñ0 qu3 mu3r4 d3 p0c0s dí4s, n1 v13j0 qu3 sus dí4s n0 cumpl4; p0rqu3 3l n1ñ0 m0r1rá d3 c13n 4ñ0s, y 3l p3c4d0r d3 c13n 4ñ0s s3rá m4ld1t0. 21 0d1f1c4rán c4s4s, y m0r4rán 3n 3ll4s; pl4nt4rán v1ñ4s, y c0m3rán 3l frut0 d3 3ll4s. 22 N0 3d1f1c4rán p4r4 qu3 0tr0 h4b1t3, n1 pl4nt4rán p4r4 qu3 0tr0 c0m4; p0rqu3 s3gún l0s dí4s d3 l0s árb0l3s s3rán l0s dí4s d3 m1 pu3bl0, y m1s 3sc0g1d0s d1sfrut4rán l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s. 23 N0 tr4b4j4rán 3n v4n0, n1 d4rán 4 luz p4r4 m4ld1c1ón; p0rqu3 s0n l1n4j3 d3 l0s b3nd1t0s d3 J3h0vá, y sus d3sc3nd13nt3s c0n 3ll0s. 24 Y 4nt3s qu3 cl4m3n, r3sp0nd3ré y0; m13ntr4s 4ún h4bl4n, y0 h4bré 0íd0. 25 0l l0b0 y 3l c0rd3r0 s3rán 4p4c3nt4d0s junt0s, y 3l l3ón c0m3rá p4j4 c0m0 3l bu3y; y 3l p0lv0 s3rá 3l 4l1m3nt0 d3 l4 s3rp13nt3. N0 4fl1g1rán, n1 h4rán m4l 3n t0d0 m1 s4nt0 m0nt3, d1j0 J3h0vá. 

L0s ju1c10s d3 J3h0vá y l4 futur4 pr0sp3r1d4d d3 S10n

1S4Í4S 66

1 J3h0vá d1j0 4sí: 0l c13l0 3s m1 tr0n0, y l4 t13rr4 3str4d0 d3 m1s p13s; ¿dónd3 3stá l4 c4s4 qu3 m3 h4bré1s d3 3d1f1c4r, y dónd3 3l lug4r d3 m1 r3p0s0? 2 M1 m4n0 h1z0 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, y 4sí t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s fu3r0n, d1c3 J3h0vá; p3r0 m1r4ré 4 4qu3l qu3 3s p0br3 y hum1ld3 d3 3spír1tu, y qu3 t13mbl4 4 m1 p4l4br4. 

3 0l qu3 s4cr1f1c4 bu3y 3s c0m0 s1 m4t4s3 4 un h0mbr3; 3l qu3 s4cr1f1c4 0v3j4, c0m0 s1 d3g0ll4s3 un p3rr0; 3l qu3 h4c3 0fr3nd4, c0m0 s1 0fr3c13s3 s4ngr3 d3 c3rd0; 3l qu3 qu3m4 1nc13ns0, c0m0 s1 b3nd1j3s3 4 un íd0l0. Y p0rqu3 3sc0g13r0n sus pr0p10s c4m1n0s, y su 4lm4 4mó sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s, 4 t4mb1én y0 3sc0g3ré p4r4 3ll0s 3sc4rn10s, y tr43ré s0br3 3ll0s l0 qu3 t3m13r0n; p0rqu3 ll4mé, y n4d13 r3sp0nd1ó; h4blé, y n0 0y3r0n, s1n0 qu3 h1c13r0n l0 m4l0 d3l4nt3 d3 m1s 0j0s, y 3sc0g13r0n l0 qu3 m3 d3s4gr4d4. 

5 0íd p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, v0s0tr0s l0s qu3 t3mblá1s 4 su p4l4br4: Vu3str0s h3rm4n0s qu3 0s 4b0rr3c3n, y 0s 3ch4n fu3r4 p0r c4us4 d3 m1 n0mbr3, d1j3r0n: J3h0vá s34 gl0r1f1c4d0. P3r0 él s3 m0str4rá p4r4 4l3grí4 vu3str4, y 3ll0s s3rán c0nfund1d0s. 

6 V0z d3 4lb0r0t0 d3 l4 c1ud4d, v0z d3l t3mpl0, v0z d3 J3h0vá qu3 d4 3l p4g0 4 sus 3n3m1g0s. 

7 4nt3s qu3 3stuv13s3 d3 p4rt0, d10 4 luz; 4nt3s qu3 l3 v1n13s3n d0l0r3s, d10 4 luz h1j0. 8 ¿Qu1én 0yó c0s4 s3m3j4nt3? ¿qu1én v10 t4l c0s4? ¿C0nc3b1rá l4 t13rr4 3n un dí4? ¿N4c3rá un4 n4c1ón d3 un4 v3z? Pu3s 3n cu4nt0 S10n 3stuv0 d3 p4rt0, d10 4 luz sus h1j0s. 9 Y0 qu3 h4g0 d4r 4 luz, ¿n0 h4ré n4c3r? d1j0 J3h0vá. Y0 qu3 h4g0 3ng3ndr4r, ¿1mp3d1ré 3l n4c1m13nt0? d1c3 tu D10s. 

10 4l3gr40s c0n J3rus4lén, y g0z40s c0n 3ll4, t0d0s l0s qu3 l4 4má1s; ll3n40s c0n 3ll4 d3 g0z0, t0d0s l0s qu3 0s 3nlutá1s p0r 3ll4; 11 p4r4 qu3 m4mé1s y 0s s4c1é1s d3 l0s p3ch0s d3 sus c0ns0l4c10n3s; p4r4 qu3 b3bá1s, y 0s d3l31té1s c0n 3l r3spl4nd0r d3 su gl0r14. 

12 P0rqu3 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá: H3 4quí qu3 y0 3xt13nd0 s0br3 3ll4 p4z c0m0 un rí0, y l4 gl0r14 d3 l4s n4c10n3s c0m0 t0rr3nt3 qu3 s3 d3sb0rd4; y m4m4ré1s, y 3n l0s br4z0s s3ré1s tr4íd0s, y s0br3 l4s r0d1ll4s s3ré1s m1m4d0s. 13 C0m0 4qu3l 4 qu13n c0nsu3l4 su m4dr3, 4sí 0s c0ns0l4ré y0 4 v0s0tr0s, y 3n J3rus4lén t0m4ré1s c0nsu3l0. 14 Y v3ré1s, y s3 4l3gr4rá vu3str0 c0r4zón, y vu3str0s hu3s0s r3v3rd3c3rán c0m0 l4 h13rb4; y l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá p4r4 c0n sus s13rv0s s3rá c0n0c1d4, y s3 3n0j4rá c0ntr4 sus 3n3m1g0s. 15 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 J3h0vá v3ndrá c0n fu3g0, y sus c4rr0s c0m0 t0rb3ll1n0, p4r4 d3sc4rg4r su 1r4 c0n fur0r, y su r3pr3ns1ón c0n ll4m4 d3 fu3g0. 16 P0rqu3 J3h0vá juzg4rá c0n fu3g0 y c0n su 3sp4d4 4 t0d0 h0mbr3; y l0s mu3rt0s d3 J3h0vá s3rán mult1pl1c4d0s. 

17 L0s qu3 s3 s4nt1f1c4n y l0s qu3 s3 pur1f1c4n 3n l0s hu3rt0s, un0s tr4s 0tr0s, l0s qu3 c0m3n c4rn3 d3 c3rd0 y 4b0m1n4c1ón y r4tón, junt4m3nt3 s3rán t4l4d0s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

18 P0rqu3 y0 c0n0zc0 sus 0br4s y sus p3ns4m13nt0s; t13mp0 v3ndrá p4r4 junt4r 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s y l3ngu4s; y v3ndrán, y v3rán m1 gl0r14. 19 Y p0ndré 3ntr3 3ll0s s3ñ4l, y 3nv14ré d3 l0s 3sc4p4d0s d3 3ll0s 4 l4s n4c10n3s, 4 T4rs1s, 4 Fut y Lud qu3 d1sp4r4n 4rc0, 4 Tub4l y 4 J4ván, 4 l4s c0st4s l3j4n4s qu3 n0 0y3r0n d3 mí, n1 v13r0n m1 gl0r14; y publ1c4rán m1 gl0r14 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s. 20 Y tr43rán 4 t0d0s vu3str0s h3rm4n0s d3 3ntr3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s, p0r 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá, 3n c4b4ll0s, 3n c4rr0s, 3n l1t3r4s, 3n mul0s y 3n c4m3ll0s, 4 m1 s4nt0 m0nt3 d3 J3rus4lén, d1c3 J3h0vá, 4l m0d0 qu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l tr43n l4 0fr3nd4 3n ut3ns1l10s l1mp10s 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 21 Y t0m4ré t4mb1én d3 3ll0s p4r4 s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

22 P0rqu3 c0m0 l0s c13l0s nu3v0s y l4 nu3v4 t13rr4 qu3 y0 h4g0 p3rm4n3c3rán d3l4nt3 d3 mí, d1c3 J3h0vá, 4sí p3rm4n3c3rá vu3str4 d3sc3nd3nc14 y vu3str0 n0mbr3. 23 Y d3 m3s 3n m3s, y d3 dí4 d3 r3p0s0 3n dí4 d3 r3p0s0, v3ndrán t0d0s 4 4d0r4r d3l4nt3 d3 mí, d1j0 J3h0vá. 

24 Y s4ldrán, y v3rán l0s c4dáv3r3s d3 l0s h0mbr3s qu3 s3 r3b3l4r0n c0ntr4 mí; p0rqu3 su gus4n0 nunc4 m0r1rá, n1 su fu3g0 s3 4p4g4rá, y s3rán 4b0m1n4bl3s 4 t0d0 h0mbr3.
