J0R0MÍ4S 

Ll4m4m13nt0 y m1s1ón d3 J3r3mí4s

J0R0MÍ4S 1

1 L4s p4l4br4s d3 J3r3mí4s h1j0 d3 H1lcí4s, d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s qu3 3stuv13r0n 3n 4n4t0t, 3n t13rr4 d3 B3nj4mín. 2 P4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 l3 v1n0 3n l0s dí4s d3 J0sí4s h1j0 d3 4món, r3y d3 Judá, 3n 3l 4ñ0 d3c1m0t3rc3r0 d3 su r31n4d0. 3 L3 v1n0 t4mb1én 3n dí4s d3 J04c1m h1j0 d3 J0sí4s, r3y d3 Judá, h4st4 3l f1n d3l 4ñ0 undéc1m0 d3 S3d3quí4s h1j0 d3 J0sí4s, r3y d3 Judá, h4st4 l4 c4ut1v1d4d d3 J3rus4lén 3n 3l m3s qu1nt0. 

4 V1n0, pu3s, p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 mí, d1c13nd0: 5 4nt3s qu3 t3 f0rm4s3 3n 3l v13ntr3 t3 c0n0cí, y 4nt3s qu3 n4c13s3s t3 s4nt1f1qué, t3 d1 p0r pr0f3t4 4 l4s n4c10n3s. 6 Y y0 d1j3: ¡4h! ¡4h, S3ñ0r J3h0vá! H3 4quí, n0 sé h4bl4r, p0rqu3 s0y n1ñ0. 7 Y m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: N0 d1g4s: S0y un n1ñ0; p0rqu3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 t3 3nví3 1rás tú, y d1rás t0d0 l0 qu3 t3 m4nd3. 8 N0 t3m4s d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, p0rqu3 c0nt1g0 3st0y p4r4 l1br4rt3, d1c3 J3h0vá. 9 Y 3xt3nd1ó J3h0vá su m4n0 y t0có m1 b0c4, y m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí h3 pu3st0 m1s p4l4br4s 3n tu b0c4. 10 M1r4 qu3 t3 h3 pu3st0 3n 3st3 dí4 s0br3 n4c10n3s y s0br3 r31n0s, p4r4 4rr4nc4r y p4r4 d3stru1r, p4r4 4rru1n4r y p4r4 d3rr1b4r, p4r4 3d1f1c4r y p4r4 pl4nt4r. 11 L4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá v1n0 4 mí, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué v3s tú, J3r3mí4s? Y d1j3: V30 un4 v4r4 d3 4lm3ndr0. 12 Y m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: B13n h4s v1st0; p0rqu3 y0 4pr3sur0 m1 p4l4br4 p4r4 p0n3rl4 p0r 0br4. 

13 V1n0 4 mí l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá p0r s3gund4 v3z, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué v3s tú? Y d1j3: V30 un4 0ll4 qu3 h13rv3; y su f4z 3stá h4c14 3l n0rt3. 14 M3 d1j0 J3h0vá: D3l n0rt3 s3 s0lt4rá 3l m4l s0br3 t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 3st4 t13rr4. 15 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 y0 c0nv0c0 4 t0d4s l4s f4m1l14s d3 l0s r31n0s d3l n0rt3, d1c3 J3h0vá; y v3ndrán, y p0ndrá c4d4 un0 su c4mp4m3nt0 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 J3rus4lén, y junt0 4 t0d0s sus mur0s 3n d3rr3d0r, y c0ntr4 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá. 16 Y 4 c4us4 d3 t0d4 su m4ld4d, pr0f3r1ré m1s ju1c10s c0ntr4 l0s qu3 m3 d3j4r0n, 3 1nc3ns4r0n 4 d10s3s 3xtr4ñ0s, y l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s 4d0r4r0n. 17 Tú, pu3s, c1ñ3 tus l0m0s, l3vánt4t3, y hábl4l3s t0d0 cu4nt0 t3 m4nd3; n0 t3m4s d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3 h4g4 y0 qu3br4nt4r d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s. 18 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 y0 t3 h3 pu3st0 3n 3st3 dí4 c0m0 c1ud4d f0rt1f1c4d4, c0m0 c0lumn4 d3 h13rr0, y c0m0 mur0 d3 br0nc3 c0ntr4 t0d4 3st4 t13rr4, c0ntr4 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá, sus prínc1p3s, sus s4c3rd0t3s, y 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4. 19 Y p3l34rán c0ntr4 t1, p3r0 n0 t3 v3nc3rán; p0rqu3 y0 3st0y c0nt1g0, d1c3 J3h0vá, p4r4 l1br4rt3. 

J3h0vá y l4 4p0st4sí4 d3 1sr43l

J0R0MÍ4S 2

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 4nd4 y cl4m4 4 l0s 0íd0s d3 J3rus4lén, d1c13nd0: 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá: M3 h3 4c0rd4d0 d3 t1, d3 l4 f1d3l1d4d d3 tu juv3ntud, d3l 4m0r d3 tu d3sp0s0r10, cu4nd0 4nd4b4s 3n p0s d3 mí 3n 3l d3s13rt0, 3n t13rr4 n0 s3mbr4d4. 3 S4nt0 3r4 1sr43l 4 J3h0vá, pr1m1c14s d3 sus nu3v0s frut0s. T0d0s l0s qu3 l3 d3v0r4b4n 3r4n culp4bl3s; m4l v3ní4 s0br3 3ll0s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

4 0íd l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, c4s4 d3 J4c0b, y t0d4s l4s f4m1l14s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. 5 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: ¿Qué m4ld4d h4ll4r0n 3n mí vu3str0s p4dr3s, qu3 s3 4l3j4r0n d3 mí, y s3 fu3r0n tr4s l4 v4n1d4d y s3 h1c13r0n v4n0s? 6 Y n0 d1j3r0n: ¿Dónd3 3stá J3h0vá, qu3 n0s h1z0 sub1r d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, qu3 n0s c0nduj0 p0r 3l d3s13rt0, p0r un4 t13rr4 d3s13rt4 y d3sp0bl4d4, p0r t13rr4 s3c4 y d3 s0mbr4 d3 mu3rt3, p0r un4 t13rr4 p0r l4 cu4l n0 p4só v4rón, n1 4llí h4b1tó h0mbr3? 7 Y 0s 1ntr0duj3 3n t13rr4 d3 4bund4nc14, p4r4 qu3 c0m13s31s su frut0 y su b13n; p3r0 3ntr4st31s y c0nt4m1n4st31s m1 t13rr4, 3 h1c1st31s 4b0m1n4bl3 m1 h3r3d4d. 8 L0s s4c3rd0t3s n0 d1j3r0n: ¿Dónd3 3stá J3h0vá? y l0s qu3 t3ní4n l4 l3y n0 m3 c0n0c13r0n; y l0s p4st0r3s s3 r3b3l4r0n c0ntr4 mí, y l0s pr0f3t4s pr0f3t1z4r0n 3n n0mbr3 d3 B44l, y 4nduv13r0n tr4s l0 qu3 n0 4pr0v3ch4. 

9 P0r t4nt0, c0nt3nd3ré 4ún c0n v0s0tr0s, d1j0 J3h0vá, y c0n l0s h1j0s d3 vu3str0s h1j0s pl31t34ré. 10 P0rqu3 p4s4d 4 l4s c0st4s d3 Qu1t1m y m1r4d; y 3nv14d 4 C3d4r, y c0ns1d3r4d cu1d4d0s4m3nt3, y v3d s1 s3 h4 h3ch0 c0s4 s3m3j4nt3 4 3st4. 11 ¿4c4s0 4lgun4 n4c1ón h4 c4mb14d0 sus d10s3s, 4unqu3 3ll0s n0 s0n d10s3s? S1n 3mb4rg0, m1 pu3bl0 h4 tr0c4d0 su gl0r14 p0r l0 qu3 n0 4pr0v3ch4. 12 0sp4nt40s, c13l0s, s0br3 3st0, y h0rr0r1z40s; d3s0l40s 3n gr4n m4n3r4, d1j0 J3h0vá. 13 P0rqu3 d0s m4l3s h4 h3ch0 m1 pu3bl0: m3 d3j4r0n 4 mí, fu3nt3 d3 4gu4 v1v4, y c4v4r0n p4r4 sí c1st3rn4s, c1st3rn4s r0t4s qu3 n0 r3t13n3n 4gu4. 

14 ¿0s 1sr43l s13rv0? ¿3s 3scl4v0? ¿P0r qué h4 v3n1d0 4 s3r pr3s4? 15 L0s c4ch0rr0s d3l l3ón rug13r0n c0ntr4 él, 4lz4r0n su v0z, y 4s0l4r0n su t13rr4; qu3m4d4s 3stán sus c1ud4d3s, s1n m0r4d0r. 16 4un l0s h1j0s d3 M3nf1s y d3 T4fn3s t3 qu3br4nt4r0n l4 c0r0n1ll4. 17 ¿N0 t3 4c4rr3ó 3st0 3l h4b3r d3j4d0 4 J3h0vá tu D10s, cu4nd0 t3 c0nducí4 p0r 3l c4m1n0? 18 4h0r4, pu3s, ¿qué t13n3s tú 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 0g1pt0, p4r4 qu3 b3b4s 4gu4 d3l N1l0? ¿Y qué t13n3s tú 3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 4s1r14, p4r4 qu3 b3b4s 4gu4 d3l 0ufr4t3s? 19 Tu m4ld4d t3 c4st1g4rá, y tus r3b3ldí4s t3 c0nd3n4rán; s4b3, pu3s, y v3 cuán m4l0 y 4m4rg0 3s 3l h4b3r d3j4d0 tú 4 J3h0vá tu D10s, y f4lt4r m1 t3m0r 3n t1, d1c3 3l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 

20 P0rqu3 d3sd3 muy 4trás r0mp1st3 tu yug0 y tus 4t4dur4s, y d1j1st3: N0 s3rv1ré. C0n t0d0 3s0, s0br3 t0d0 c0ll4d0 4lt0 y d3b4j0 d3 t0d0 árb0l fr0nd0s0 t3 3ch4b4s c0m0 r4m3r4. 21 T3 pl4nté d3 v1d 3sc0g1d4, s1m13nt3 v3rd4d3r4 t0d4 3ll4; ¿cóm0, pu3s, t3 m3 h4s vu3lt0 s4rm13nt0 d3 v1d 3xtr4ñ4? 22 4unqu3 t3 l4v3s c0n l3jí4, y 4m0nt0n3s j4bón s0br3 t1, l4 m4nch4 d3 tu p3c4d0 p3rm4n3c3rá 4ún d3l4nt3 d3 mí, d1j0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 23 ¿Cóm0 pu3d3s d3c1r: N0 s0y 1nmund4, nunc4 4nduv3 tr4s l0s b44l3s? M1r4 tu pr0c3d3r 3n 3l v4ll3, c0n0c3 l0 qu3 h4s h3ch0, dr0m3d4r14 l1g3r4 qu3 tu3rc3 su c4m1n0, 24 4sn4 m0ntés 4c0stumbr4d4 4l d3s13rt0, qu3 3n su 4rd0r 0lf4t34 3l v13nt0. D3 su lujur14, ¿qu1én l4 d3t3ndrá? T0d0s l0s qu3 l4 busc4r3n n0 s3 f4t1g4rán, p0rqu3 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 su c3l0 l4 h4ll4rán. 25 Gu4rd4 tus p13s d3 4nd4r d3sc4lz0s, y tu g4rg4nt4 d3 l4 s3d. M4s d1j1st3: N0 h4y r3m3d10 3n n1ngun4 m4n3r4, p0rqu3 4 3xtr4ñ0s h3 4m4d0, y tr4s 3ll0s h3 d3 1r. 

26 C0m0 s3 4v3rgü3nz4 3l l4drón cu4nd0 3s d3scub13rt0, 4sí s3 4v3rg0nz4rá l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, 3ll0s, sus r3y3s, sus prínc1p3s, sus s4c3rd0t3s y sus pr0f3t4s, 27 qu3 d1c3n 4 un l3ñ0: M1 p4dr3 3r3s tú; y 4 un4 p13dr4: Tú m3 h4s 3ng3ndr4d0. P0rqu3 m3 v0lv13r0n l4 c3rv1z, y n0 3l r0str0; y 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 su c4l4m1d4d d1c3n: L3vánt4t3, y líbr4n0s. 28 ¿Y dónd3 3stán tus d10s3s qu3 h1c1st3 p4r4 t1? L3vánt3ns3 3ll0s, 4 v3r s1 t3 p0drán l1br4r 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 tu 4fl1cc1ón; p0rqu3 s3gún 3l núm3r0 d3 tus c1ud4d3s, 0h Judá, fu3r0n tus d10s3s. 

29 ¿P0r qué p0rfí4s c0nm1g0? T0d0s v0s0tr0s pr3v4r1c4st31s c0ntr4 mí, d1c3 J3h0vá. 30 0n v4n0 h3 4z0t4d0 4 vu3str0s h1j0s; n0 h4n r3c1b1d0 c0rr3cc1ón. Vu3str4 3sp4d4 d3v0ró 4 vu3str0s pr0f3t4s c0m0 l3ón d3str0z4d0r. 31 ¡0h g3n3r4c1ón! 4t3nd3d v0s0tr0s 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. ¿H3 s1d0 y0 un d3s13rt0 p4r4 1sr43l, 0 t13rr4 d3 t1n13bl4s? ¿P0r qué h4 d1ch0 m1 pu3bl0: S0m0s l1br3s; nunc4 más v3ndr3m0s 4 t1? 32 ¿S3 0lv1d4 l4 v1rg3n d3 su 4t4ví0, 0 l4 d3sp0s4d4 d3 sus g4l4s? P3r0 m1 pu3bl0 s3 h4 0lv1d4d0 d3 mí p0r 1nnum3r4bl3s dí4s. 

33 ¿P0r qué 4d0rn4s tu c4m1n0 p4r4 h4ll4r 4m0r? 4un 4 l4s m4lv4d4s 3ns3ñ4st3 tus c4m1n0s. 34 4un 3n tus f4ld4s s3 h4lló l4 s4ngr3 d3 l0s p0br3s, d3 l0s 1n0c3nt3s. N0 l0s h4ll4st3 3n n1ngún d3l1t0; s1n 3mb4rg0, 3n t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s d1c3s: 35 S0y 1n0c3nt3, d3 c13rt0 su 1r4 s3 4p4rtó d3 mí. H3 4quí y0 3ntr4ré 3n ju1c10 c0nt1g0, p0rqu3 d1j1st3: N0 h3 p3c4d0. 36 ¿P4r4 qué d1scurr3s t4nt0, c4mb14nd0 tus c4m1n0s? T4mb1én s3rás 4v3rg0nz4d4 d3 0g1pt0, c0m0 fu1st3 4v3rg0nz4d4 d3 4s1r14. 37 T4mb1én d3 4llí s4ldrás c0n tus m4n0s s0br3 tu c4b3z4, p0rqu3 J3h0vá d3s3chó 4 4qu3ll0s 3n qu13n3s tú c0nf14b4s, y n0 pr0sp3r4rás p0r 3ll0s. 

J0R0MÍ4S 3

1 D1c3n: S1 4lgun0 d3j4r3 4 su muj3r, y yénd0s3 ést4 d3 él s3 junt4r3 4 0tr0 h0mbr3, ¿v0lv3rá 4 3ll4 más? ¿N0 s3rá t4l t13rr4 d3l t0d0 4m4nc1ll4d4? Tú, pu3s, h4s f0rn1c4d0 c0n much0s 4m1g0s; m4s ¡vuélv3t3 4 mí! d1c3 J3h0vá. 2 4lz4 tus 0j0s 4 l4s 4ltur4s, y v3 3n qué lug4r n0 t3 h4y4s pr0st1tu1d0. Junt0 4 l0s c4m1n0s t3 s3nt4b4s p4r4 3ll0s c0m0 ár4b3 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y c0n tus f0rn1c4c10n3s y c0n tu m4ld4d h4s c0nt4m1n4d0 l4 t13rr4. 3 P0r 3st4 c4us4 l4s 4gu4s h4n s1d0 d3t3n1d4s, y f4ltó l4 lluv14 t4rdí4; y h4s t3n1d0 fr3nt3 d3 r4m3r4, y n0 qu1s1st3 t3n3r v3rgü3nz4. 4 4 l0 m3n0s d3sd3 4h0r4, ¿n0 m3 ll4m4rás 4 mí, P4dr3 mí0, gu14d0r d3 m1 juv3ntud? 5 ¿Gu4rd4rá su 3n0j0 p4r4 s13mpr3? ¿0t3rn4m3nt3 l0 gu4rd4rá? H3 4quí qu3 h4s h4bl4d0 y h3ch0 cu4nt4s m4ld4d3s pud1st3. 

J3h0vá 3xh0rt4 4 1sr43l y 4 Judá 4l 4rr3p3nt1m13nt0

6 M3 d1j0 J3h0vá 3n dí4s d3l r3y J0sí4s: ¿H4s v1st0 l0 qu3 h4 h3ch0 l4 r3b3ld3 1sr43l? 0ll4 s3 v4 s0br3 t0d0 m0nt3 4lt0 y d3b4j0 d3 t0d0 árb0l fr0nd0s0, y 4llí f0rn1c4. 7 Y d1j3: D3spués d3 h4c3r t0d0 3st0, s3 v0lv3rá 4 mí; p3r0 n0 s3 v0lv1ó, y l0 v10 su h3rm4n4 l4 r3b3ld3 Judá. 8 0ll4 v10 qu3 p0r h4b3r f0rn1c4d0 l4 r3b3ld3 1sr43l, y0 l4 h4bí4 d3sp3d1d0 y d4d0 c4rt4 d3 r3pud10; p3r0 n0 tuv0 t3m0r l4 r3b3ld3 Judá su h3rm4n4, s1n0 qu3 t4mb1én fu3 3ll4 y f0rn1có. 9 Y suc3d1ó qu3 p0r juzg4r 3ll4 c0s4 l1v14n4 su f0rn1c4c1ón, l4 t13rr4 fu3 c0nt4m1n4d4, y 4dult3ró c0n l4 p13dr4 y c0n 3l l3ñ0. 10 C0n t0d0 3st0, su h3rm4n4 l4 r3b3ld3 Judá n0 s3 v0lv1ó 4 mí d3 t0d0 c0r4zón, s1n0 f1ng1d4m3nt3, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

11 Y m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: H4 r3sult4d0 just4 l4 r3b3ld3 1sr43l 3n c0mp4r4c1ón c0n l4 d3sl34l Judá. 12 V3 y cl4m4 3st4s p4l4br4s h4c14 3l n0rt3, y d1: Vuélv3t3, 0h r3b3ld3 1sr43l, d1c3 J3h0vá; n0 h4ré c43r m1 1r4 s0br3 t1, p0rqu3 m1s3r1c0rd10s0 s0y y0, d1c3 J3h0vá, n0 gu4rd4ré p4r4 s13mpr3 3l 3n0j0. 13 R3c0n0c3, pu3s, tu m4ld4d, p0rqu3 c0ntr4 J3h0vá tu D10s h4s pr3v4r1c4d0, y f0rn1c4st3 c0n l0s 3xtr4ñ0s d3b4j0 d3 t0d0 árb0l fr0nd0s0, y n0 0íst3 m1 v0z, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

14 C0nv3rtí0s, h1j0s r3b3ld3s, d1c3 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 y0 s0y vu3str0 3sp0s0; y 0s t0m4ré un0 d3 c4d4 c1ud4d, y d0s d3 c4d4 f4m1l14, y 0s 1ntr0duc1ré 3n S10n; 15 y 0s d4ré p4st0r3s s3gún m1 c0r4zón, qu3 0s 4p4c13nt3n c0n c13nc14 y c0n 1nt3l1g3nc14. 16 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 cu4nd0 0s mult1pl1qué1s y cr3zcá1s 3n l4 t13rr4, 3n 3s0s dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, n0 s3 d1rá más: 4rc4 d3l p4ct0 d3 J3h0vá; n1 v3ndrá 4l p3ns4m13nt0, n1 s3 4c0rd4rán d3 3ll4, n1 l4 3ch4rán d3 m3n0s, n1 s3 h4rá 0tr4. 17 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 ll4m4rán 4 J3rus4lén: Tr0n0 d3 J3h0vá, y t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s v3ndrán 4 3ll4 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá 3n J3rus4lén; n1 4nd4rán más tr4s l4 dur3z4 d3 su m4lv4d0 c0r4zón. 18 0n 4qu3ll0s t13mp0s 1rán d3 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, y v3ndrán junt4m3nt3 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3l n0rt3 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 h1c3 h3r3d4r 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s. 

19 Y0 pr3gunt4b4: ¿Cóm0 0s p0ndré p0r h1j0s, y 0s d4ré l4 t13rr4 d3s34bl3, l4 r1c4 h3r3d4d d3 l4s n4c10n3s? Y d1j3: M3 ll4m4ré1s: P4dr3 mí0, y n0 0s 4p4rt4ré1s d3 3n p0s d3 mí. 20 P3r0 c0m0 l4 3sp0s4 1nf13l 4b4nd0n4 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0, 4sí pr3v4r1c4st31s c0ntr4 mí, 0h c4s4 d3 1sr43l, d1c3 J3h0vá. 21 V0z fu3 0íd4 s0br3 l4s 4ltur4s, ll4nt0 d3 l0s ru3g0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; p0rqu3 h4n t0rc1d0 su c4m1n0, d3 J3h0vá su D10s s3 h4n 0lv1d4d0. 22 C0nv3rtí0s, h1j0s r3b3ld3s, y s4n4ré vu3str4s r3b3l10n3s. H3 4quí n0s0tr0s v3n1m0s 4 t1, p0rqu3 tú 3r3s J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s. 23 C13rt4m3nt3 v4n1d4d s0n l0s c0ll4d0s, y 3l bull1c10 s0br3 l0s m0nt3s; c13rt4m3nt3 3n J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s 3stá l4 s4lv4c1ón d3 1sr43l. 

24 C0nfus1ón c0nsum1ó 3l tr4b4j0 d3 nu3str0s p4dr3s d3sd3 nu3str4 juv3ntud; sus 0v3j4s, sus v4c4s, sus h1j0s y sus h1j4s. 25 Y4c3m0s 3n nu3str4 c0nfus1ón, y nu3str4 4fr3nt4 n0s cubr3; p0rqu3 p3c4m0s c0ntr4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, n0s0tr0s y nu3str0s p4dr3s, d3sd3 nu3str4 juv3ntud y h4st4 3st3 dí4, y n0 h3m0s 3scuch4d0 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s. 

J0R0MÍ4S 4

1 S1 t3 v0lv13r3s, 0h 1sr43l, d1c3 J3h0vá, vuélv3t3 4 mí. Y s1 qu1t4r3s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 mí tus 4b0m1n4c10n3s, y n0 4nduv13r3s d3 4cá p4r4 4llá, 2 y jur4r3s: V1v3 J3h0vá, 3n v3rd4d, 3n ju1c10 y 3n just1c14, 3nt0nc3s l4s n4c10n3s s3rán b3nd1t4s 3n él, y 3n él s3 gl0r14rán. 3 P0rqu3 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá 4 t0d0 v4rón d3 Judá y d3 J3rus4lén: 4r4d c4mp0 p4r4 v0s0tr0s, y n0 s3mbré1s 3ntr3 3sp1n0s. 4 C1rcunc1d40s 4 J3h0vá, y qu1t4d 3l pr3puc10 d3 vu3str0 c0r4zón, v4r0n3s d3 Judá y m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén; n0 s34 qu3 m1 1r4 s4lg4 c0m0 fu3g0, y s3 3nc13nd4 y n0 h4y4 qu13n l4 4p4gu3, p0r l4 m4ld4d d3 vu3str4s 0br4s. 

Judá 3s 4m3n4z4d4 d3 1nv4s1ón

5 4nunc14d 3n Judá, y pr0cl4m4d 3n J3rus4lén, y d3c1d: T0c4d tr0mp3t4 3n l4 t13rr4; pr3g0n4d, junt40s, y d3c1d: R3uní0s, y 3ntrém0n0s 3n l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s. 6 4lz4d b4nd3r4 3n S10n, hu1d, n0 0s d3t3ngá1s; p0rqu3 y0 h4g0 v3n1r m4l d3l n0rt3, y qu3br4nt4m13nt0 gr4nd3. 7 0l l3ón sub3 d3 l4 3sp3sur4, y 3l d3stru1d0r d3 n4c10n3s 3stá 3n m4rch4, y h4 s4l1d0 d3 su lug4r p4r4 p0n3r tu t13rr4 3n d3s0l4c1ón; tus c1ud4d3s qu3d4rán 4s0l4d4s y s1n m0r4d0r. 8 P0r 3st0 v3stí0s d3 c1l1c10, 3nd3ch4d y 4ull4d; p0rqu3 l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá n0 s3 h4 4p4rt4d0 d3 n0s0tr0s. 

9 0n 4qu3l dí4, d1c3 J3h0vá, d3sf4ll3c3rá 3l c0r4zón d3l r3y y 3l c0r4zón d3 l0s prínc1p3s, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3st4rán 4tón1t0s, y s3 m4r4v1ll4rán l0s pr0f3t4s. 10 Y d1j3: ¡4y, 4y, J3h0vá D10s! V3rd4d3r4m3nt3 3n gr4n m4n3r4 h4s 3ng4ñ4d0 4 3st3 pu3bl0 y 4 J3rus4lén, d1c13nd0: P4z t3ndré1s; pu3s l4 3sp4d4 h4 v3n1d0 h4st4 3l 4lm4. 

11 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 s3 d1rá 4 3st3 pu3bl0 y 4 J3rus4lén: V13nt0 s3c0 d3 l4s 4ltur4s d3l d3s13rt0 v1n0 4 l4 h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0, n0 p4r4 4v3nt4r, n1 p4r4 l1mp14r. 12 V13nt0 más v3h3m3nt3 qu3 3st3 v3ndrá 4 mí; y 4h0r4 y0 pr0nunc14ré ju1c10s c0ntr4 3ll0s. 

13 H3 4quí qu3 sub1rá c0m0 nub3, y su c4rr0 c0m0 t0rb3ll1n0; más l1g3r0s s0n sus c4b4ll0s qu3 l4s águ1l4s. ¡4y d3 n0s0tr0s, p0rqu3 3ntr3g4d0s s0m0s 4 d3sp0j0! 14 L4v4 tu c0r4zón d3 m4ld4d, 0h J3rus4lén, p4r4 qu3 s34s s4lv4. ¿H4st4 cuánd0 p3rm1t1rás 3n m3d10 d3 t1 l0s p3ns4m13nt0s d3 1n1qu1d4d? 15 P0rqu3 un4 v0z tr43 l4s nu3v4s d3sd3 D4n, y h4c3 0ír l4 c4l4m1d4d d3sd3 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín. 16 D3c1d 4 l4s n4c10n3s: H3 4quí, h4c3d 0ír s0br3 J3rus4lén: Gu4rd4s v13n3n d3 t13rr4 l3j4n4, y l4nz4rán su v0z c0ntr4 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá. 17 C0m0 gu4rd4s d3 c4mp0 3stuv13r0n 3n d3rr3d0r d3 3ll4, p0rqu3 s3 r3b3ló c0ntr4 mí, d1c3 J3h0vá. 18 Tu c4m1n0 y tus 0br4s t3 h1c13r0n 3st0; 3st4 3s tu m4ld4d, p0r l0 cu4l 4m4rgur4 p3n3tr4rá h4st4 tu c0r4zón. 

19 ¡M1s 3ntr4ñ4s, m1s 3ntr4ñ4s! M3 du3l3n l4s f1br4s d3 m1 c0r4zón; m1 c0r4zón s3 4g1t4 d3ntr0 d3 mí; n0 c4ll4ré; p0rqu3 s0n1d0 d3 tr0mp3t4 h4s 0íd0, 0h 4lm4 mí4, pr3gón d3 gu3rr4. 20 Qu3br4nt4m13nt0 s0br3 qu3br4nt4m13nt0 3s 4nunc14d0; p0rqu3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 3s d3stru1d4; d3 r3p3nt3 s0n d3stru1d4s m1s t13nd4s, 3n un m0m3nt0 m1s c0rt1n4s. 21 ¿H4st4 cuánd0 h3 d3 v3r b4nd3r4, h3 d3 0ír s0n1d0 d3 tr0mp3t4? 22 P0rqu3 m1 pu3bl0 3s n3c10, n0 m3 c0n0c13r0n; s0n h1j0s 1gn0r4nt3s y n0 s0n 3nt3nd1d0s; s4b10s p4r4 h4c3r 3l m4l, p3r0 h4c3r 3l b13n n0 sup13r0n. 

23 M1ré 4 l4 t13rr4, y h3 4quí qu3 3st4b4 4s0l4d4 y v4cí4; y 4 l0s c13l0s, y n0 h4bí4 3n 3ll0s luz. 24 M1ré 4 l0s m0nt3s, y h3 4quí qu3 t3mbl4b4n, y t0d0s l0s c0ll4d0s fu3r0n d3stru1d0s. 25 M1ré, y n0 h4bí4 h0mbr3, y t0d4s l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 s3 h4bí4n 1d0. 26 M1ré, y h3 4quí 3l c4mp0 fért1l 3r4 un d3s13rt0, y t0d4s sus c1ud4d3s 3r4n 4s0l4d4s d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, d3l4nt3 d3l 4rd0r d3 su 1r4. 

27 P0rqu3 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: T0d4 l4 t13rr4 s3rá 4s0l4d4; p3r0 n0 l4 d3stru1ré d3l t0d0. 28 P0r 3st0 s3 3nlut4rá l4 t13rr4, y l0s c13l0s 4rr1b4 s3 0scur3c3rán, p0rqu3 h4blé, l0 p3nsé, y n0 m3 4rr3p3ntí, n1 d3s1st1ré d3 3ll0. 29 4l 3stru3nd0 d3 l4 g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0 y d3 l0s fl3ch3r0s huyó t0d4 l4 c1ud4d; 3ntr4r0n 3n l4s 3sp3sur4s d3 l0s b0squ3s, y sub13r0n 4 l0s p3ñ4sc0s; t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s fu3r0n 4b4nd0n4d4s, y n0 qu3dó 3n 3ll4s m0r4d0r 4lgun0. 30 Y tú, d3stru1d4, ¿qué h4rás? 4unqu3 t3 v1st4s d3 gr4n4, 4unqu3 t3 4d0rn3s c0n 4t4ví0s d3 0r0, 4unqu3 p1nt3s c0n 4nt1m0n10 tus 0j0s, 3n v4n0 t3 3ng4l4n4s; t3 m3n0spr3c14rán tus 4m4nt3s, busc4rán tu v1d4. 31 P0rqu3 0í un4 v0z c0m0 d3 muj3r qu3 3stá d3 p4rt0, 4ngust14 c0m0 d3 pr1m3r1z4; v0z d3 l4 h1j4 d3 S10n qu3 l4m3nt4 y 3xt13nd3 sus m4n0s, d1c13nd0: ¡4y 4h0r4 d3 mí! qu3 m1 4lm4 d3sm4y4 4 c4us4 d3 l0s 4s3s1n0s. 

1mp13d4d d3 J3rus4lén y d3 Judá

J0R0MÍ4S 5

1 R3c0rr3d l4s c4ll3s d3 J3rus4lén, y m1r4d 4h0r4, 3 1nf0rm40s; busc4d 3n sus pl4z4s 4 v3r s1 h4llá1s h0mbr3, s1 h4y 4lgun0 qu3 h4g4 just1c14, qu3 busqu3 v3rd4d; y y0 l4 p3rd0n4ré. 2 4unqu3 d1g4n: V1v3 J3h0vá, jur4n f4ls4m3nt3. 3 0h J3h0vá, ¿n0 m1r4n tus 0j0s 4 l4 v3rd4d? L0s 4z0t4st3, y n0 l3s d0l1ó; l0s c0nsum1st3, y n0 qu1s13r0n r3c1b1r c0rr3cc1ón; 3ndur3c13r0n sus r0str0s más qu3 l4 p13dr4, n0 qu1s13r0n c0nv3rt1rs3. 

4 P3r0 y0 d1j3: C13rt4m3nt3 ést0s s0n p0br3s, h4n 3nl0qu3c1d0, pu3s n0 c0n0c3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 J3h0vá, 3l ju1c10 d3 su D10s. 5 1ré 4 l0s gr4nd3s, y l3s h4bl4ré; p0rqu3 3ll0s c0n0c3n 3l c4m1n0 d3 J3h0vá, 3l ju1c10 d3 su D10s. P3r0 3ll0s t4mb1én qu3br4r0n 3l yug0, r0mp13r0n l4s c0yund4s. 

6 P0r t4nt0, 3l l3ón d3 l4 s3lv4 l0s m4t4rá, l0s d3stru1rá 3l l0b0 d3l d3s13rt0, 3l l30p4rd0 4c3ch4rá sus c1ud4d3s; cu4lqu13r4 qu3 d3 3ll4s s4l13r3 s3rá 4rr3b4t4d0; p0rqu3 sus r3b3l10n3s s3 h4n mult1pl1c4d0, s3 h4n 4um3nt4d0 sus d3sl34lt4d3s. 

7 ¿Cóm0 t3 h3 d3 p3rd0n4r p0r 3st0? Sus h1j0s m3 d3j4r0n, y jur4r0n p0r l0 qu3 n0 3s D10s. L0s s4c1é, y 4dult3r4r0n, y 3n c4s4 d3 r4m3r4s s3 junt4r0n 3n c0mp4ñí4s. 8 C0m0 c4b4ll0s b13n 4l1m3nt4d0s, c4d4 cu4l r3l1nch4b4 tr4s l4 muj3r d3 su prój1m0. 9 ¿N0 h4bí4 d3 c4st1g4r 3st0? d1j0 J3h0vá. D3 un4 n4c1ón c0m0 3st4, ¿n0 s3 h4bí4 d3 v3ng4r m1 4lm4? 10 0sc4l4d sus mur0s y d3stru1d, p3r0 n0 d3l t0d0; qu1t4d l4s 4lm3n4s d3 sus mur0s, p0rqu3 n0 s0n d3 J3h0vá. 11 P0rqu3 r3su3lt4m3nt3 s3 r3b3l4r0n c0ntr4 mí l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l y l4 c4s4 d3 Judá, d1c3 J3h0vá. 12 N3g4r0n 4 J3h0vá, y d1j3r0n: 0l n0 3s, y n0 v3ndrá m4l s0br3 n0s0tr0s, n1 v3r3m0s 3sp4d4 n1 h4mbr3; 13 4nt3s l0s pr0f3t4s s3rán c0m0 v13nt0, p0rqu3 n0 h4y 3n 3ll0s p4l4br4; 4sí s3 h4rá 4 3ll0s. 

14 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá D10s d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: P0rqu3 d1j3r0n 3st4 p4l4br4, h3 4quí y0 p0ng0 m1s p4l4br4s 3n tu b0c4 p0r fu3g0, y 4 3st3 pu3bl0 p0r l3ñ4, y l0s c0nsum1rá. 15 H3 4quí y0 tr41g0 s0br3 v0s0tr0s g3nt3 d3 l3j0s, 0h c4s4 d3 1sr43l, d1c3 J3h0vá; g3nt3 r0bust4, g3nt3 4nt1gu4, g3nt3 cuy4 l3ngu4 1gn0r4rás, y n0 3nt3nd3rás l0 qu3 h4bl4r3. 16 Su 4lj4b4 c0m0 s3pulcr0 4b13rt0, t0d0s v4l13nt3s. 17 Y c0m3rá tu m13s y tu p4n, c0m3rá 4 tus h1j0s y 4 tus h1j4s; c0m3rá tus 0v3j4s y tus v4c4s, c0m3rá tus v1ñ4s y tus h1gu3r4s, y 4 3sp4d4 c0nv3rt1rá 3n n4d4 tus c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s 3n qu3 c0nfí4s. 

18 N0 0bst4nt3, 3n 4qu3ll0s dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, n0 0s d3stru1ré d3l t0d0. 19 Y cu4nd0 d1j3r3n: ¿P0r qué J3h0vá 3l D10s nu3str0 h1z0 c0n n0s0tr0s t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s?, 3nt0nc3s l3s d1rás: D3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 m3 d3j4st31s 4 mí, y s3rv1st31s 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s 3n vu3str4 t13rr4, 4sí s3rv1ré1s 4 3xtr4ñ0s 3n t13rr4 4j3n4. 

20 4nunc14d 3st0 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J4c0b, y h4c3d qu3 3st0 s3 01g4 3n Judá, d1c13nd0: 21 0íd 4h0r4 3st0, pu3bl0 n3c10 y s1n c0r4zón, qu3 t13n3 0j0s y n0 v3, qu3 t13n3 0íd0s y n0 0y3: 22 ¿4 mí n0 m3 t3m3ré1s? d1c3 J3h0vá. ¿N0 0s 4m3dr3nt4ré1s 4nt3 mí, qu3 pus3 4r3n4 p0r térm1n0 4l m4r, p0r 0rd3n4c1ón 3t3rn4 l4 cu4l n0 qu3br4nt4rá? S3 l3v4nt4rán t3mp3st4d3s, m4s n0 pr3v4l3c3rán; br4m4rán sus 0nd4s, m4s n0 l0 p4s4rán. 23 N0 0bst4nt3, 3st3 pu3bl0 t13n3 c0r4zón f4ls0 y r3b3ld3; s3 4p4rt4r0n y s3 fu3r0n. 24 Y n0 d1j3r0n 3n su c0r4zón: T3m4m0s 4h0r4 4 J3h0vá D10s nu3str0, qu3 d4 lluv14 t3mpr4n4 y t4rdí4 3n su t13mp0, y n0s gu4rd4 l0s t13mp0s 3st4bl3c1d0s d3 l4 s13g4. 25 Vu3str4s 1n1qu1d4d3s h4n 3st0rb4d0 3st4s c0s4s, y vu3str0s p3c4d0s 4p4rt4r0n d3 v0s0tr0s 3l b13n. 26 P0rqu3 fu3r0n h4ll4d0s 3n m1 pu3bl0 1mpí0s; 4c3ch4b4n c0m0 qu13n p0n3 l4z0s, pus13r0n tr4mp4 p4r4 c4z4r h0mbr3s. 27 C0m0 j4ul4 ll3n4 d3 páj4r0s, 4sí 3stán sus c4s4s ll3n4s d3 3ng4ñ0; 4sí s3 h1c13r0n gr4nd3s y r1c0s. 28 S3 3ng0rd4r0n y s3 pus13r0n lustr0s0s, y s0br3p4s4r0n l0s h3ch0s d3l m4l0; n0 juzg4r0n l4 c4us4, l4 c4us4 d3l huérf4n0; c0n t0d0, s3 h1c13r0n prósp3r0s, y l4 c4us4 d3 l0s p0br3s n0 juzg4r0n. 29 ¿N0 c4st1g4ré 3st0? d1c3 J3h0vá; ¿y d3 t4l g3nt3 n0 s3 v3ng4rá m1 4lm4? 

30 C0s4 3sp4nt0s4 y f34 3s h3ch4 3n l4 t13rr4; 31 l0s pr0f3t4s pr0f3t1z4r0n m3nt1r4, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s d1r1gí4n p0r m4n0s d3 3ll0s; y m1 pu3bl0 4sí l0 qu1s0. ¿Qué, pu3s, h4ré1s cu4nd0 ll3gu3 3l f1n? 

0l ju1c10 c0ntr4 J3rus4lén y Judá

J0R0MÍ4S 6

1 Hu1d, h1j0s d3 B3nj4mín, d3 3n m3d10 d3 J3rus4lén, y t0c4d b0c1n4 3n T3c04, y 4lz4d p0r s3ñ4l hum0 s0br3 B3t-h4qu3r3m; p0rqu3 d3l n0rt3 s3 h4 v1st0 m4l, y qu3br4nt4m13nt0 gr4nd3. 2 D3stru1ré 4 l4 b3ll4 y d3l1c4d4 h1j4 d3 S10n. 3 C0ntr4 3ll4 v3ndrán p4st0r3s y sus r3b4ñ0s; junt0 4 3ll4 pl4nt4rán sus t13nd4s 4lr3d3d0r; c4d4 un0 4p4c3nt4rá 3n su lug4r. 4 4nunc14d gu3rr4 c0ntr4 3ll4; l3v4nt40s y 4s4ltém0sl4 4 m3d10dí4. ¡4y d3 n0s0tr0s! qu3 v4 c4y3nd0 y4 3l dí4, qu3 l4s s0mbr4s d3 l4 t4rd3 s3 h4n 3xt3nd1d0. 5 L3v4nt40s y 4s4lt3m0s d3 n0ch3, y d3struy4m0s sus p4l4c10s. 

6 P0rqu3 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: C0rt4d árb0l3s, y l3v4nt4d v4ll4d0 c0ntr4 J3rus4lén; 3st4 3s l4 c1ud4d qu3 h4 d3 s3r c4st1g4d4; t0d4 3ll4 3stá ll3n4 d3 v10l3nc14. 7 C0m0 l4 fu3nt3 nunc4 c3s4 d3 m4n4r sus 4gu4s, 4sí 3ll4 nunc4 c3s4 d3 m4n4r su m4ld4d; 1njust1c14 y r0b0 s3 0y3n 3n 3ll4; c0nt1nu4m3nt3 3n m1 pr3s3nc14, 3nf3rm3d4d y h3r1d4. 8 C0rríg3t3, J3rus4lén, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 4p4rt3 m1 4lm4 d3 t1, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3 c0nv13rt4 3n d3s13rt0, 3n t13rr4 1nh4b1t4d4. 

9 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: D3l t0d0 r3busc4rán c0m0 4 v1d 3l r3st0 d3 1sr43l; vu3lv3 tu m4n0 c0m0 v3nd1m14d0r 3ntr3 l0s s4rm13nt0s. 10 ¿4 qu1én h4bl4ré y 4m0n3st4ré, p4r4 qu3 01g4n? H3 4quí qu3 sus 0íd0s s0n 1nc1rcunc1s0s, y n0 pu3d3n 3scuch4r; h3 4quí qu3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá l3s 3s c0s4 v3rg0nz0s4, n0 l4 4m4n. 11 P0r t4nt0, 3st0y ll3n0 d3 l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá, 3st0y c4ns4d0 d3 c0nt3n3rm3; l4 d3rr4m4ré s0br3 l0s n1ñ0s 3n l4 c4ll3, y s0br3 l4 r3un1ón d3 l0s jóv3n3s 1gu4lm3nt3; p0rqu3 s3rá pr3s0 t4nt0 3l m4r1d0 c0m0 l4 muj3r, t4nt0 3l v13j0 c0m0 3l muy 4nc14n0. 12 Y sus c4s4s s3rán tr4sp4s4d4s 4 0tr0s, sus h3r3d4d3s y t4mb1én sus muj3r3s; p0rqu3 3xt3nd3ré m1 m4n0 s0br3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4, d1c3 J3h0vá. 13 P0rqu3 d3sd3 3l más ch1c0 d3 3ll0s h4st4 3l más gr4nd3, c4d4 un0 s1gu3 l4 4v4r1c14; y d3sd3 3l pr0f3t4 h4st4 3l s4c3rd0t3, t0d0s s0n 3ng4ñ4d0r3s. 14 Y cur4n l4 h3r1d4 d3 m1 pu3bl0 c0n l1v14nd4d, d1c13nd0: P4z, p4z; y n0 h4y p4z. 15 ¿S3 h4n 4v3rg0nz4d0 d3 h4b3r h3ch0 4b0m1n4c1ón? C13rt4m3nt3 n0 s3 h4n 4v3rg0nz4d0, n1 4un s4b3n t3n3r v3rgü3nz4; p0r t4nt0, c43rán 3ntr3 l0s qu3 c41g4n; cu4nd0 l0s c4st1gu3 c43rán, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

16 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: P4r40s 3n l0s c4m1n0s, y m1r4d, y pr3gunt4d p0r l4s s3nd4s 4nt1gu4s, cuál s34 3l bu3n c4m1n0, y 4nd4d p0r él, y h4ll4ré1s d3sc4ns0 p4r4 vu3str4 4lm4. M4s d1j3r0n: N0 4nd4r3m0s. 17 Pus3 t4mb1én s0br3 v0s0tr0s 4t4l4y4s, qu3 d1j3s3n: 0scuch4d 4l s0n1d0 d3 l4 tr0mp3t4. Y d1j3r0n 3ll0s: N0 3scuch4r3m0s. 18 P0r t4nt0, 0íd, n4c10n3s, y 3nt3nd3d, 0h c0ngr3g4c1ón, l0 qu3 suc3d3rá. 19 0y3, t13rr4: H3 4quí y0 tr41g0 m4l s0br3 3st3 pu3bl0, 3l frut0 d3 sus p3ns4m13nt0s; p0rqu3 n0 3scuch4r0n m1s p4l4br4s, y 4b0rr3c13r0n m1 l3y. 20 ¿P4r4 qué 4 mí 3st3 1nc13ns0 d3 S4bá, y l4 bu3n4 c4ñ4 0l0r0s4 d3 t13rr4 l3j4n4? Vu3str0s h0l0c4ust0s n0 s0n 4c3pt4bl3s, n1 vu3str0s s4cr1f1c10s m3 4gr4d4n. 21 P0r t4nt0, J3h0vá d1c3 3st0: H3 4quí y0 p0ng0 4 3st3 pu3bl0 tr0p13z0s, y c43rán 3n 3ll0s l0s p4dr3s y l0s h1j0s junt4m3nt3; 3l v3c1n0 y su c0mp4ñ3r0 p3r3c3rán. 

22 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí qu3 v13n3 pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3l n0rt3, y un4 n4c1ón gr4nd3 s3 l3v4nt4rá d3 l0s c0nf1n3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 23 4rc0 y j4b4l1n4 3mpuñ4rán; cru3l3s s0n, y n0 t3ndrán m1s3r1c0rd14; su 3stru3nd0 br4m4 c0m0 3l m4r, y m0nt4rán 4 c4b4ll0 c0m0 h0mbr3s d1spu3st0s p4r4 l4 gu3rr4, c0ntr4 t1, 0h h1j4 d3 S10n. 24 Su f4m4 0ím0s, y nu3str4s m4n0s s3 d3sc0yunt4r0n; s3 4p0d3ró d3 n0s0tr0s 4ngust14, d0l0r c0m0 d3 muj3r qu3 3stá d3 p4rt0. 25 N0 s4lg4s 4l c4mp0, n1 4nd3s p0r 3l c4m1n0; p0rqu3 3sp4d4 d3 3n3m1g0 y t3m0r h4y p0r t0d4s p4rt3s. 26 H1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0, cíñ3t3 d3 c1l1c10, y r3vuélc4t3 3n c3n1z4; p0nt3 lut0 c0m0 p0r h1j0 ún1c0, ll4nt0 d3 4m4rgur4s; p0rqu3 pr0nt0 v3ndrá s0br3 n0s0tr0s 3l d3stru1d0r. 

27 P0r f0rt4l3z4 t3 h3 pu3st0 3n m1 pu3bl0, p0r t0rr3; c0n0c3rás, pu3s, y 3x4m1n4rás 3l c4m1n0 d3 3ll0s. 28 T0d0s 3ll0s s0n r3b3ld3s, p0rf14d0s, 4nd4n ch1sm34nd0; s0n br0nc3 y h13rr0; t0d0s 3ll0s s0n c0rrupt0r3s. 29 S3 qu3mó 3l fu3ll3, p0r 3l fu3g0 s3 h4 c0nsum1d0 3l pl0m0; 3n v4n0 fund1ó 3l fund1d0r, pu3s l4 3sc0r14 n0 s3 h4 4rr4nc4d0. 30 Pl4t4 d3s3ch4d4 l0s ll4m4rán, p0rqu3 J3h0vá l0s d3s3chó. 

M3j0r4d vu3str0s c4m1n0s y vu3str4s 0br4s

J0R0MÍ4S 7

1 P4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 v1n0 4 J3r3mí4s, d1c13nd0: 2 P0nt3 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y pr0cl4m4 4llí 3st4 p4l4br4, y d1: 0íd p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, t0d0 Judá, l0s qu3 3ntrá1s p0r 3st4s pu3rt4s p4r4 4d0r4r 4 J3h0vá. 3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: M3j0r4d vu3str0s c4m1n0s y vu3str4s 0br4s, y 0s h4ré m0r4r 3n 3st3 lug4r. 4 N0 f1é1s 3n p4l4br4s d3 m3nt1r4, d1c13nd0: T3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá, t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá, t3mpl0 d3 J3h0vá 3s 3st3. 

5 P3r0 s1 m3j0r4r31s cumpl1d4m3nt3 vu3str0s c4m1n0s y vu3str4s 0br4s; s1 c0n v3rd4d h1c13r31s just1c14 3ntr3 3l h0mbr3 y su prój1m0, 6 y n0 0pr1m13r31s 4l 3xtr4nj3r0, 4l huérf4n0 y 4 l4 v1ud4, n1 3n 3st3 lug4r d3rr4m4r31s l4 s4ngr3 1n0c3nt3, n1 4nduv13r31s 3n p0s d3 d10s3s 4j3n0s p4r4 m4l vu3str0, 7 0s h4ré m0r4r 3n 3st3 lug4r, 3n l4 t13rr4 qu3 d1 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s p4r4 s13mpr3. 

8 H3 4quí, v0s0tr0s c0nf1á1s 3n p4l4br4s d3 m3nt1r4, qu3 n0 4pr0v3ch4n. 9 Hurt4nd0, m4t4nd0, 4dult3r4nd0, jur4nd0 3n f4ls0, 3 1nc3ns4nd0 4 B44l, y 4nd4nd0 tr4s d10s3s 3xtr4ñ0s qu3 n0 c0n0c1st31s, 10 ¿v3ndré1s y 0s p0ndré1s d3l4nt3 d3 mí 3n 3st4 c4s4 s0br3 l4 cu4l 3s 1nv0c4d0 m1 n0mbr3, y d1ré1s: L1br4d0s s0m0s; p4r4 s3gu1r h4c13nd0 t0d4s 3st4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s? 11 ¿0s cu3v4 d3 l4dr0n3s d3l4nt3 d3 vu3str0s 0j0s 3st4 c4s4 s0br3 l4 cu4l 3s 1nv0c4d0 m1 n0mbr3? H3 4quí qu3 t4mb1én y0 l0 v30, d1c3 J3h0vá. 12 4nd4d 4h0r4 4 m1 lug4r 3n S1l0, d0nd3 h1c3 m0r4r m1 n0mbr3 4l pr1nc1p10, y v3d l0 qu3 l3 h1c3 p0r l4 m4ld4d d3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l. 13 4h0r4, pu3s, p0r cu4nt0 v0s0tr0s h4bé1s h3ch0 t0d4s 3st4s 0br4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, y 4unqu3 0s h4blé d3sd3 t3mpr4n0 y s1n c3s4r, n0 0íst31s, y 0s ll4mé, y n0 r3sp0nd1st31s; 14 h4ré t4mb1én 4 3st4 c4s4 s0br3 l4 cu4l 3s 1nv0c4d0 m1 n0mbr3, 3n l4 qu3 v0s0tr0s c0nf1á1s, y 4 3st3 lug4r qu3 d1 4 v0s0tr0s y 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s, c0m0 h1c3 4 S1l0. 15 0s 3ch4ré d3 m1 pr3s3nc14, c0m0 3ché 4 t0d0s vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, 4 t0d4 l4 g3n3r4c1ón d3 0fr4ín. 

16 Tú, pu3s, n0 0r3s p0r 3st3 pu3bl0, n1 l3v4nt3s p0r 3ll0s cl4m0r n1 0r4c1ón, n1 m3 ru3gu3s; p0rqu3 n0 t3 01ré. 17 ¿N0 v3s l0 qu3 ést0s h4c3n 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá y 3n l4s c4ll3s d3 J3rus4lén? 18 L0s h1j0s r3c0g3n l4 l3ñ4, l0s p4dr3s 3nc13nd3n 3l fu3g0, y l4s muj3r3s 4m4s4n l4 m4s4, p4r4 h4c3r t0rt4s 4 l4 r31n4 d3l c13l0 y p4r4 h4c3r 0fr3nd4s 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, p4r4 pr0v0c4rm3 4 1r4. 19 ¿M3 pr0v0c4rán 3ll0s 4 1r4? d1c3 J3h0vá. ¿N0 0br4n más b13n 3ll0s m1sm0s su pr0p14 c0nfus1ón? 20 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí qu3 m1 fur0r y m1 1r4 s3 d3rr4m4rán s0br3 3st3 lug4r, s0br3 l0s h0mbr3s, s0br3 l0s 4n1m4l3s, s0br3 l0s árb0l3s d3l c4mp0 y s0br3 l0s frut0s d3 l4 t13rr4; s3 3nc3nd3rán, y n0 s3 4p4g4rán. 

C4st1g0 d3 l4 r3b3l1ón d3 Judá

21 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: 4ñ4d1d vu3str0s h0l0c4ust0s s0br3 vu3str0s s4cr1f1c10s, y c0m3d l4 c4rn3. 22 P0rqu3 n0 h4blé y0 c0n vu3str0s p4dr3s, n1 n4d4 l3s m4ndé 4c3rc4 d3 h0l0c4ust0s y d3 víct1m4s 3l dí4 qu3 l0s s4qué d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. 23 M4s 3st0 l3s m4ndé, d1c13nd0: 0scuch4d m1 v0z, y s3ré 4 v0s0tr0s p0r D10s, y v0s0tr0s m3 s3ré1s p0r pu3bl0; y 4nd4d 3n t0d0 c4m1n0 qu3 0s m4nd3, p4r4 qu3 0s v4y4 b13n. 24 Y n0 0y3r0n n1 1ncl1n4r0n su 0íd0; 4nt3s c4m1n4r0n 3n sus pr0p10s c0ns3j0s, 3n l4 dur3z4 d3 su c0r4zón m4lv4d0, y fu3r0n h4c14 4trás y n0 h4c14 4d3l4nt3, 25 d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 vu3str0s p4dr3s s4l13r0n d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 h4st4 h0y. Y 0s 3nv1é t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s m1s s13rv0s, 3nv1ánd0l0s d3sd3 t3mpr4n0 y s1n c3s4r; 26 p3r0 n0 m3 0y3r0n n1 1ncl1n4r0n su 0íd0, s1n0 qu3 3ndur3c13r0n su c3rv1z, 3 h1c13r0n p30r qu3 sus p4dr3s. 

27 Tú, pu3s, l3s d1rás t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s, p3r0 n0 t3 01rán; l0s ll4m4rás, y n0 t3 r3sp0nd3rán. 28 L3s d1rás, p0r t4nt0: 0st4 3s l4 n4c1ón qu3 n0 3scuchó l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá su D10s, n1 4dm1t1ó c0rr3cc1ón; p3r3c1ó l4 v3rd4d, y d3 l4 b0c4 d3 3ll0s fu3 c0rt4d4. 

29 C0rt4 tu c4b3ll0, y 4rrój4l0, y l3v4nt4 ll4nt0 s0br3 l4s 4ltur4s; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 4b0rr3c1d0 y d3j4d0 l4 g3n3r4c1ón 0bj3t0 d3 su 1r4. 

30 P0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá h4n h3ch0 l0 m4l0 4nt3 m1s 0j0s, d1c3 J3h0vá; pus13r0n sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s 3n l4 c4s4 s0br3 l4 cu4l fu3 1nv0c4d0 m1 n0mbr3, 4m4nc1llánd0l4. 31 Y h4n 3d1f1c4d0 l0s lug4r3s 4lt0s d3 T0f3t, qu3 3stá 3n 3l v4ll3 d3l h1j0 d3 H1n0m, p4r4 qu3m4r 4l fu3g0 4 sus h1j0s y 4 sus h1j4s, c0s4 qu3 y0 n0 l3s m4ndé, n1 sub1ó 3n m1 c0r4zón. 32 P0r t4nt0, h3 4quí v3ndrán dí4s, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 n0 s3 d1g4 más, T0f3t, n1 v4ll3 d3l h1j0 d3 H1n0m, s1n0 V4ll3 d3 l4 M4t4nz4; y s3rán 3nt3rr4d0s 3n T0f3t, p0r n0 h4b3r lug4r. 33 Y s3rán l0s cu3rp0s mu3rt0s d3 3st3 pu3bl0 p4r4 c0m1d4 d3 l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 y d3 l4s b3st14s d3 l4 t13rr4; y n0 h4brá qu13n l4s 3sp4nt3. 34 Y h4ré c3s4r d3 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, y d3 l4s c4ll3s d3 J3rus4lén, l4 v0z d3 g0z0 y l4 v0z d3 4l3grí4, l4 v0z d3l 3sp0s0 y l4 v0z d3 l4 3sp0s4; p0rqu3 l4 t13rr4 s3rá d3s0l4d4. 

J0R0MÍ4S 8

1 0n 4qu3l t13mp0, d1c3 J3h0vá, s4c4rán l0s hu3s0s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá, y l0s hu3s0s d3 sus prínc1p3s, y l0s hu3s0s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, y l0s hu3s0s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s, y l0s hu3s0s d3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén, fu3r4 d3 sus s3pulcr0s; 2 y l0s 3sp4rc1rán 4l s0l y 4 l4 lun4 y 4 t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3l c13l0, 4 qu13n3s 4m4r0n y 4 qu13n3s s1rv13r0n, 3n p0s d3 qu13n3s 4nduv13r0n, 4 qu13n3s pr3gunt4r0n, y 4nt3 qu13n3s s3 p0str4r0n. N0 s3rán r3c0g1d0s n1 3nt3rr4d0s; s3rán c0m0 3st1érc0l s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4. 3 Y 3sc0g3rá l4 mu3rt3 4nt3s qu3 l4 v1d4 t0d0 3l r3st0 qu3 qu3d3 d3 3st4 m4l4 g3n3r4c1ón, 3n t0d0s l0s lug4r3s 4d0nd3 4rr0j3 y0 4 l0s qu3 qu3d3n, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 

4 L3s d1rás 4s1m1sm0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 0l qu3 c43, ¿n0 s3 l3v4nt4? 0l qu3 s3 d3sví4, ¿n0 vu3lv3 4l c4m1n0? 5 ¿P0r qué 3s 3st3 pu3bl0 d3 J3rus4lén r3b3ld3 c0n r3b3ldí4 p3rp3tu4? 4br4z4r0n 3l 3ng4ñ0, y n0 h4n qu3r1d0 v0lv3rs3. 6 0scuché y 0í; n0 h4bl4n r3ct4m3nt3, n0 h4y h0mbr3 qu3 s3 4rr3p13nt4 d3 su m4l, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué h3 h3ch0? C4d4 cu4l s3 v0lv1ó 4 su pr0p14 c4rr3r4, c0m0 c4b4ll0 qu3 4rr3m3t3 c0n ímp3tu 4 l4 b4t4ll4. 7 4un l4 c1gü3ñ4 3n 3l c13l0 c0n0c3 su t13mp0, y l4 tórt0l4 y l4 grull4 y l4 g0l0ndr1n4 gu4rd4n 3l t13mp0 d3 su v3n1d4; p3r0 m1 pu3bl0 n0 c0n0c3 3l ju1c10 d3 J3h0vá. 

8 ¿Cóm0 d3cís: N0s0tr0s s0m0s s4b10s, y l4 l3y d3 J3h0vá 3stá c0n n0s0tr0s? C13rt4m3nt3 l4 h4 c4mb14d0 3n m3nt1r4 l4 plum4 m3nt1r0s4 d3 l0s 3scr1b4s. 9 L0s s4b10s s3 4v3rg0nz4r0n, s3 3sp4nt4r0n y fu3r0n c0nst3rn4d0s; h3 4quí qu3 4b0rr3c13r0n l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá; ¿y qué s4b1durí4 t13n3n? 10 P0r t4nt0, d4ré 4 0tr0s sus muj3r3s, y sus c4mp0s 4 qu13n3s l0s c0nqu1st3n; p0rqu3 d3sd3 3l más p3qu3ñ0 h4st4 3l más gr4nd3 c4d4 un0 s1gu3 l4 4v4r1c14; d3sd3 3l pr0f3t4 h4st4 3l s4c3rd0t3 t0d0s h4c3n 3ng4ñ0. 11 Y cur4r0n l4 h3r1d4 d3 l4 h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0 c0n l1v14nd4d, d1c13nd0: P4z, p4z; y n0 h4y p4z. 12 ¿S3 h4n 4v3rg0nz4d0 d3 h4b3r h3ch0 4b0m1n4c1ón? C13rt4m3nt3 n0 s3 h4n 4v3rg0nz4d0 3n l0 más mín1m0, n1 sup13r0n 4v3rg0nz4rs3; c43rán, p0r t4nt0, 3ntr3 l0s qu3 c41g4n; cu4nd0 l0s c4st1gu3 c43rán, d1c3 J3h0vá. 13 L0s c0rt4ré d3l t0d0, d1c3 J3h0vá. N0 qu3d4rán uv4s 3n l4 v1d, n1 h1g0s 3n l4 h1gu3r4, y s3 c43rá l4 h0j4; y l0 qu3 l3s h3 d4d0 p4s4rá d3 3ll0s. 

14 ¿P0r qué n0s 3st4m0s s3nt4d0s? R3uní0s, y 3ntr3m0s 3n l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s, y p3r3zc4m0s 4llí; p0rqu3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s h4 d3st1n4d0 4 p3r3c3r, y n0s h4 d4d0 4 b3b3r 4gu4s d3 h13l, p0rqu3 p3c4m0s c0ntr4 J3h0vá. 15 0sp3r4m0s p4z, y n0 hub0 b13n; dí4 d3 cur4c1ón, y h3 4quí turb4c1ón. 16 D3sd3 D4n s3 0yó 3l buf1d0 d3 sus c4b4ll0s; 4l s0n1d0 d3 l0s r3l1nch0s d3 sus c0rc3l3s t3mbló t0d4 l4 t13rr4; y v1n13r0n y d3v0r4r0n l4 t13rr4 y su 4bund4nc14, 4 l4 c1ud4d y 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 3ll4. 17 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 y0 3nví0 s0br3 v0s0tr0s s3rp13nt3s, ásp1d3s c0ntr4 l0s cu4l3s n0 h4y 3nc4nt4m13nt0, y 0s m0rd3rán, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

L4m3nt0 s0br3 Judá y J3rus4lén

18 4 c4us4 d3 m1 fu3rt3 d0l0r, m1 c0r4zón d3sf4ll3c3 3n mí. 19 H3 4quí v0z d3l cl4m0r d3 l4 h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0, qu3 v13n3 d3 l4 t13rr4 l3j4n4: ¿N0 3stá J3h0vá 3n S10n? ¿N0 3stá 3n 3ll4 su R3y? ¿P0r qué m3 h1c13r0n 41r4r c0n sus 1mág3n3s d3 t4ll4, c0n v4n1d4d3s 4j3n4s? 20 P4só l4 s13g4, t3rm1nó 3l v3r4n0, y n0s0tr0s n0 h3m0s s1d0 s4lv0s. 21 Qu3br4nt4d0 3st0y p0r 3l qu3br4nt4m13nt0 d3 l4 h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0; 3nt3n3br3c1d0 3st0y, 3sp4nt0 m3 h4 4rr3b4t4d0. 

22 ¿N0 h4y báls4m0 3n G4l44d? ¿N0 h4y 4llí méd1c0? ¿P0r qué, pu3s, n0 hub0 m3d1c1n4 p4r4 l4 h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0? 

J0R0MÍ4S 9

1 ¡0h, s1 m1 c4b3z4 s3 h1c13s3 4gu4s, y m1s 0j0s fu3nt3s d3 lágr1m4s, p4r4 qu3 ll0r3 dí4 y n0ch3 l0s mu3rt0s d3 l4 h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0! 2 ¡0h, qu1én m3 d13s3 3n 3l d3s13rt0 un 4lb3rgu3 d3 c4m1n4nt3s, p4r4 qu3 d3j4s3 4 m1 pu3bl0, y d3 3ll0s m3 4p4rt4s3! P0rqu3 t0d0s 3ll0s s0n 4dúlt3r0s, c0ngr3g4c1ón d3 pr3v4r1c4d0r3s. 3 H1c13r0n qu3 su l3ngu4 l4nz4r4 m3nt1r4 c0m0 un 4rc0, y n0 s3 f0rt4l3c13r0n p4r4 l4 v3rd4d 3n l4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 d3 m4l 3n m4l pr0c3d13r0n, y m3 h4n d3sc0n0c1d0, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

4 Guárd3s3 c4d4 un0 d3 su c0mp4ñ3r0, y 3n n1ngún h3rm4n0 t3ng4 c0nf14nz4; p0rqu3 t0d0 h3rm4n0 3ng4ñ4 c0n f4l4c14, y t0d0 c0mp4ñ3r0 4nd4 c4lumn14nd0. 5 Y c4d4 un0 3ng4ñ4 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0, y n1ngun0 h4bl4 v3rd4d; 4c0stumbr4r0n su l3ngu4 4 h4bl4r m3nt1r4, s3 0cup4n d3 4ctu4r p3rv3rs4m3nt3. 6 Su m0r4d4 3stá 3n m3d10 d3l 3ng4ñ0; p0r muy 3ng4ñ4d0r3s n0 qu1s13r0n c0n0c3rm3, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

7 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: H3 4quí qu3 y0 l0s r3f1n4ré y l0s pr0b4ré; p0rqu3 ¿qué más h3 d3 h4c3r p0r l4 h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0? 8 S43t4 4f1l4d4 3s l4 l3ngu4 d3 3ll0s; 3ng4ñ0 h4bl4; c0n su b0c4 d1c3 p4z 4 su 4m1g0, y d3ntr0 d3 sí p0n3 sus 4s3ch4nz4s. 9 ¿N0 l0s h3 d3 c4st1g4r p0r 3st4s c0s4s? d1c3 J3h0vá. D3 t4l n4c1ón, ¿n0 s3 v3ng4rá m1 4lm4? 

10 P0r l0s m0nt3s l3v4nt4ré ll0r0 y l4m3nt4c1ón, y ll4nt0 p0r l0s p4st1z4l3s d3l d3s13rt0; p0rqu3 fu3r0n d3s0l4d0s h4st4 n0 qu3d4r qu13n p4s3, n1 0írs3 br4m1d0 d3 g4n4d0; d3sd3 l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 h4st4 l4s b3st14s d3 l4 t13rr4 huy3r0n, y s3 fu3r0n. 11 R3duc1ré 4 J3rus4lén 4 un m0ntón d3 ru1n4s, m0r4d4 d3 ch4c4l3s; y c0nv3rt1ré l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá 3n d3s0l4c1ón 3n qu3 n0 qu3d3 m0r4d0r. 

4m3n4z4 d3 ru1n4 y 3x1l10

12 ¿Qu1én 3s v4rón s4b10 qu3 3nt13nd4 3st0? ¿y 4 qu1én h4bló l4 b0c4 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 pu3d4 d3cl4r4rl0? ¿P0r qué c4us4 l4 t13rr4 h4 p3r3c1d0, h4 s1d0 4s0l4d4 c0m0 d3s13rt0, h4st4 n0 h4b3r qu13n p4s3? 13 D1j0 J3h0vá: P0rqu3 d3j4r0n m1 l3y, l4 cu4l d1 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, y n0 0b3d3c13r0n 4 m1 v0z, n1 c4m1n4r0n c0nf0rm3 4 3ll4; 14 4nt3s s3 fu3r0n tr4s l4 1m4g1n4c1ón d3 su c0r4zón, y 3n p0s d3 l0s b44l3s, s3gún l3s 3ns3ñ4r0n sus p4dr3s. 15 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: H3 4quí qu3 4 3st3 pu3bl0 y0 l3s d4ré 4 c0m3r 4j3nj0, y l3s d4ré 4 b3b3r 4gu4s d3 h13l. 16 Y l0s 3sp4rc1ré 3ntr3 n4c10n3s qu3 n1 3ll0s n1 sus p4dr3s c0n0c13r0n; y 3nv14ré 3sp4d4 3n p0s d3 3ll0s, h4st4 qu3 l0s 4c4b3. 

17 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: C0ns1d3r4d, y ll4m4d pl4ñ1d3r4s qu3 v3ng4n; busc4d 4 l4s háb1l3s 3n su 0f1c10; 18 y d3ns3 pr1s4, y l3v4nt3n ll4nt0 p0r n0s0tr0s, y d3shág4ns3 nu3str0s 0j0s 3n lágr1m4s, y nu3str0s párp4d0s s3 d3st1l3n 3n 4gu4s. 19 P0rqu3 d3 S10n fu3 0íd4 v0z d3 3nd3ch4: ¡Cóm0 h3m0s s1d0 d3stru1d0s! 0n gr4n m4n3r4 h3m0s s1d0 4v3rg0nz4d0s, p0rqu3 4b4nd0n4m0s l4 t13rr4, p0rqu3 h4n d3stru1d0 nu3str4s m0r4d4s. 

20 0íd, pu3s, 0h muj3r3s, p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, y vu3str0 0íd0 r3c1b4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 su b0c4: 0ns3ñ4d 3nd3ch4s 4 vu3str4s h1j4s, y l4m3nt4c1ón c4d4 un4 4 su 4m1g4. 21 P0rqu3 l4 mu3rt3 h4 sub1d0 p0r nu3str4s v3nt4n4s, h4 3ntr4d0 3n nu3str0s p4l4c10s, p4r4 3xt3rm1n4r 4 l0s n1ñ0s d3 l4s c4ll3s, 4 l0s jóv3n3s d3 l4s pl4z4s. 22 H4bl4: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: L0s cu3rp0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s mu3rt0s c43rán c0m0 3st1érc0l s0br3 l4 f4z d3l c4mp0, y c0m0 m4n0j0 tr4s 3l s3g4d0r, qu3 n0 h4y qu13n l0 r3c0j4.

J0R0MÍ4S 13

1 4sí m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: V3 y cómpr4t3 un c1nt0 d3 l1n0, y cíñ3l0 s0br3 tus l0m0s, y n0 l0 m3t4s 3n 4gu4. 2 Y c0mpré 3l c1nt0 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, y l0 pus3 s0br3 m1s l0m0s. 3 V1n0 4 mí s3gund4 v3z p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 4 T0m4 3l c1nt0 qu3 c0mpr4st3, qu3 3stá s0br3 tus l0m0s, y l3vánt4t3 y v3t3 4l 0ufr4t3s, y 3scónd3l0 4llá 3n l4 h3nd1dur4 d3 un4 p3ñ4. 5 Fu1, pu3s, y l0 3sc0ndí junt0 4l 0ufr4t3s, c0m0 J3h0vá m3 m4ndó. 6 Y suc3d1ó qu3 d3spués d3 much0s dí4s m3 d1j0 J3h0vá: L3vánt4t3 y v3t3 4l 0ufr4t3s, y t0m4 d3 4llí 3l c1nt0 qu3 t3 m4ndé 3sc0nd3r 4llá. 7 0nt0nc3s fu1 4l 0ufr4t3s, y c4vé, y t0mé 3l c1nt0 d3l lug4r d0nd3 l0 h4bí4 3sc0nd1d0; y h3 4quí qu3 3l c1nt0 s3 h4bí4 p0dr1d0; p4r4 n1ngun4 c0s4 3r4 bu3n0. 

8 Y v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 9 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 4sí h4ré p0dr1r l4 s0b3rb14 d3 Judá, y l4 much4 s0b3rb14 d3 J3rus4lén. 10 0st3 pu3bl0 m4l0, qu3 n0 qu13r3 0ír m1s p4l4br4s, qu3 4nd4 3n l4s 1m4g1n4c10n3s d3 su c0r4zón, y qu3 v4 3n p0s d3 d10s3s 4j3n0s p4r4 s3rv1rl3s, y p4r4 p0str4rs3 4nt3 3ll0s, v3ndrá 4 s3r c0m0 3st3 c1nt0, qu3 p4r4 n1ngun4 c0s4 3s bu3n0. 11 P0rqu3 c0m0 3l c1nt0 s3 junt4 4 l0s l0m0s d3l h0mbr3, 4sí h1c3 junt4r 4 mí t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l y t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá, d1c3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 m3 fu3s3n p0r pu3bl0 y p0r f4m4, p0r 4l4b4nz4 y p0r h0nr4; p3r0 n0 3scuch4r0n. 

L4 s3ñ4l d3 l4s t1n4j4s ll3n4s

12 L3s d1rás, pu3s, 3st4 p4l4br4: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, D10s d3 1sr43l: T0d4 t1n4j4 s3 ll3n4rá d3 v1n0. Y 3ll0s t3 d1rán: ¿N0 s4b3m0s qu3 t0d4 t1n4j4 s3 ll3n4rá d3 v1n0? 13 0nt0nc3s l3s d1rás: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí qu3 y0 ll3n0 d3 3mbr14gu3z 4 t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 3st4 t13rr4, y 4 l0s r3y3s d3 l4 3st1rp3 d3 D4v1d qu3 s3 s13nt4n s0br3 su tr0n0, 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y pr0f3t4s, y 4 t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén; 14 y l0s qu3br4nt4ré 3l un0 c0ntr4 3l 0tr0, l0s p4dr3s c0n l0s h1j0s 1gu4lm3nt3, d1c3 J3h0vá; n0 p3rd0n4ré, n1 t3ndré p13d4d n1 m1s3r1c0rd14, p4r4 n0 d3stru1rl0s. 

Judá s3rá ll3v4d4 3n c4ut1v3r10

15 0scuch4d y 0íd; n0 0s 3nv4n3zcá1s, pu3s J3h0vá h4 h4bl4d0. 16 D4d gl0r14 4 J3h0vá D10s vu3str0, 4nt3s qu3 h4g4 v3n1r t1n13bl4s, y 4nt3s qu3 vu3str0s p13s tr0p13c3n 3n m0nt3s d3 0scur1d4d, y 3sp3ré1s luz, y 0s l4 vu3lv4 3n s0mbr4 d3 mu3rt3 y t1n13bl4s. 17 M4s s1 n0 0y3r31s 3st0, 3n s3cr3t0 ll0r4rá m1 4lm4 4 c4us4 d3 vu3str4 s0b3rb14; y ll0r4nd0 4m4rg4m3nt3 s3 d3sh4rán m1s 0j0s 3n lágr1m4s, p0rqu3 3l r3b4ñ0 d3 J3h0vá fu3 h3ch0 c4ut1v0. 

18 D1 4l r3y y 4 l4 r31n4: Hum1ll40s, s3nt40s 3n t13rr4; p0rqu3 l4 c0r0n4 d3 vu3str4 gl0r14 h4 c4íd0 d3 vu3str4s c4b3z4s. 19 L4s c1ud4d3s d3l N3gu3v fu3r0n c3rr4d4s, y n0 hub0 qu13n l4s 4br13s3; t0d4 Judá fu3 tr4nsp0rt4d4, ll3v4d4 3n c4ut1v3r10 fu3 t0d4 3ll4. 20 4lz4d vu3str0s 0j0s, y v3d 4 l0s qu3 v13n3n d3l n0rt3. ¿Dónd3 3stá 3l r3b4ñ0 qu3 t3 fu3 d4d0, tu h3rm0s4 gr3y? 21 ¿Qué d1rás cu4nd0 él p0ng4 c0m0 c4b3z4 s0br3 t1 4 4qu3ll0s 4 qu13n3s tú 3ns3ñ4st3 4 s3r tus 4m1g0s? ¿N0 t3 d4rán d0l0r3s c0m0 d3 muj3r qu3 3stá d3 p4rt0? 22 S1 d1j3r3s 3n tu c0r4zón: ¿P0r qué m3 h4 s0br3v3n1d0 3st0? P0r l4 3n0rm1d4d d3 tu m4ld4d fu3r0n d3scub13rt4s tus f4ld4s, fu3r0n d3snud4d0s tus c4lc4ñ4r3s. 23 ¿Mud4rá 3l 3tí0p3 su p13l, y 3l l30p4rd0 sus m4nch4s? 4sí t4mb1én, ¿p0dré1s v0s0tr0s h4c3r b13n, 3st4nd0 h4b1tu4d0s 4 h4c3r m4l? 24 P0r t4nt0, y0 l0s 3sp4rc1ré 4l v13nt0 d3l d3s13rt0, c0m0 t4m0 qu3 p4s4. 25 0st4 3s tu su3rt3, l4 p0rc1ón qu3 y0 h3 m3d1d0 p4r4 t1, d1c3 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 t3 0lv1d4st3 d3 mí y c0nf14st3 3n l4 m3nt1r4. 26 Y0, pu3s, d3scubr1ré t4mb1én tus f4ld4s d3l4nt3 d3 tu r0str0, y s3 m4n1f3st4rá tu 1gn0m1n14, 27 tus 4dult3r10s, tus r3l1nch0s, l4 m4ld4d d3 tu f0rn1c4c1ón s0br3 l0s c0ll4d0s; 3n 3l c4mp0 v1 tus 4b0m1n4c10n3s. ¡4y d3 t1, J3rus4lén! ¿N0 s3rás 4l f1n l1mp14? ¿Cuánt0 t4rd4rás tú 3n pur1f1c4rt3? 

M3ns4j3 c0n m0t1v0 d3 l4 s3quí4

J0R0MÍ4S 14

1 P4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 v1n0 4 J3r3mí4s, c0n m0t1v0 d3 l4 s3quí4. 2 S3 3nlutó Judá, y sus pu3rt4s s3 d3sp0bl4r0n; s3 s3nt4r0n tr1st3s 3n t13rr4, y sub1ó 3l cl4m0r d3 J3rus4lén. 3 L0s n0bl3s 3nv14r0n sus cr14d0s 4l 4gu4; v1n13r0n 4 l4s l4gun4s, y n0 h4ll4r0n 4gu4; v0lv13r0n c0n sus v4s1j4s v4cí4s; s3 4v3rg0nz4r0n, s3 c0nfund13r0n, y cubr13r0n sus c4b3z4s. 4 P0rqu3 s3 r3squ3br4jó l4 t13rr4 p0r n0 h4b3r ll0v1d0 3n 3l p4ís, 3stán c0nfus0s l0s l4br4d0r3s, cubr13r0n sus c4b3z4s. 5 4un l4s c13rv4s 3n l0s c4mp0s p4rí4n y d3j4b4n l4 crí4, p0rqu3 n0 h4bí4 h13rb4. 6 Y l0s 4sn0s m0nt3s3s s3 p0ní4n 3n l4s 4ltur4s, 4sp1r4b4n 3l v13nt0 c0m0 ch4c4l3s; sus 0j0s s3 0fusc4r0n p0rqu3 n0 h4bí4 h13rb4. 

7 4unqu3 nu3str4s 1n1qu1d4d3s t3st1f1c4n c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s, 0h J3h0vá, 4ctú4 p0r 4m0r d3 tu n0mbr3; p0rqu3 nu3str4s r3b3l10n3s s3 h4n mult1pl1c4d0, c0ntr4 t1 h3m0s p3c4d0. 8 0h 3sp3r4nz4 d3 1sr43l, Gu4rd4d0r suy0 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 l4 4fl1cc1ón, ¿p0r qué t3 h4s h3ch0 c0m0 f0r4st3r0 3n l4 t13rr4, y c0m0 c4m1n4nt3 qu3 s3 r3t1r4 p4r4 p4s4r l4 n0ch3? 9 ¿P0r qué 3r3s c0m0 h0mbr3 4tón1t0, y c0m0 v4l13nt3 qu3 n0 pu3d3 l1br4r? S1n 3mb4rg0, tú 3stás 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, 0h J3h0vá, y s0br3 n0s0tr0s 3s 1nv0c4d0 tu n0mbr3; n0 n0s d3s4mp4r3s. 

10 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 4c3rc4 d3 3st3 pu3bl0: S3 d3l31t4r0n 3n v4g4r, y n0 d13r0n r3p0s0 4 sus p13s; p0r t4nt0, J3h0vá n0 s3 4gr4d4 d3 3ll0s; s3 4c0rd4rá 4h0r4 d3 su m4ld4d, y c4st1g4rá sus p3c4d0s. 

11 M3 d1j0 J3h0vá: N0 ru3gu3s p0r 3st3 pu3bl0 p4r4 b13n. 12 Cu4nd0 4yun3n, y0 n0 01ré su cl4m0r, y cu4nd0 0fr3zc4n h0l0c4ust0 y 0fr3nd4 n0 l0 4c3pt4ré, s1n0 qu3 l0s c0nsum1ré c0n 3sp4d4, c0n h4mbr3 y c0n p3st1l3nc14. 

13 Y y0 d1j3: ¡4h! ¡4h, S3ñ0r J3h0vá! H3 4quí qu3 l0s pr0f3t4s l3s d1c3n: N0 v3ré1s 3sp4d4, n1 h4brá h4mbr3 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, s1n0 qu3 3n 3st3 lug4r 0s d4ré p4z v3rd4d3r4. 14 M3 d1j0 3nt0nc3s J3h0vá: F4ls4m3nt3 pr0f3t1z4n l0s pr0f3t4s 3n m1 n0mbr3; n0 l0s 3nv1é, n1 l3s m4ndé, n1 l3s h4blé; v1s1ón m3nt1r0s4, 4d1v1n4c1ón, v4n1d4d y 3ng4ñ0 d3 su c0r4zón 0s pr0f3t1z4n. 15 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá s0br3 l0s pr0f3t4s qu3 pr0f3t1z4n 3n m1 n0mbr3, l0s cu4l3s y0 n0 3nv1é, y qu3 d1c3n: N1 3sp4d4 n1 h4mbr3 h4brá 3n 3st4 t13rr4; c0n 3sp4d4 y c0n h4mbr3 s3rán c0nsum1d0s 3s0s pr0f3t4s. 16 Y 3l pu3bl0 4 qu13n pr0f3t1z4n s3rá 3ch4d0 3n l4s c4ll3s d3 J3rus4lén p0r h4mbr3 y p0r 3sp4d4, y n0 h4brá qu13n l0s 3nt13rr3 4 3ll0s, 4 sus muj3r3s, 4 sus h1j0s y 4 sus h1j4s; y s0br3 3ll0s d3rr4m4ré su m4ld4d. 

17 L3s d1rás, pu3s, 3st4 p4l4br4: D3rr4m3n m1s 0j0s lágr1m4s n0ch3 y dí4, y n0 c3s3n; p0rqu3 d3 gr4n qu3br4nt4m13nt0 3s qu3br4nt4d4 l4 v1rg3n h1j4 d3 m1 pu3bl0, d3 pl4g4 muy d0l0r0s4. 18 S1 s4lg0 4l c4mp0, h3 4quí mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4; y s1 3ntr0 3n l4 c1ud4d, h3 4quí 3nf3rm0s d3 h4mbr3; p0rqu3 t4nt0 3l pr0f3t4 c0m0 3l s4c3rd0t3 4nduv13r0n v4g4nd0 3n l4 t13rr4, y n0 3nt3nd13r0n. 

19 ¿H4s d3s3ch4d0 3nt3r4m3nt3 4 Judá? ¿H4 4b0rr3c1d0 tu 4lm4 4 S10n? ¿P0r qué n0s h1c1st3 h3r1r s1n qu3 h4y4 r3m3d10? 0sp3r4m0s p4z, y n0 hub0 b13n; t13mp0 d3 cur4c1ón, y h3 4quí turb4c1ón. 20 R3c0n0c3m0s, 0h J3h0vá, nu3str4 1mp13d4d, l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 nu3str0s p4dr3s; p0rqu3 c0ntr4 t1 h3m0s p3c4d0. 21 P0r 4m0r d3 tu n0mbr3 n0 n0s d3s3ch3s, n1 d3sh0nr3s tu gl0r10s0 tr0n0; 4cuérd4t3, n0 1nv4l1d3s tu p4ct0 c0n n0s0tr0s. 22 ¿H4y 3ntr3 l0s íd0l0s d3 l4s n4c10n3s qu13n h4g4 ll0v3r? ¿y d4rán l0s c13l0s lluv14s? ¿N0 3r3s tú, J3h0vá, nu3str0 D10s? 0n t1, pu3s, 3sp3r4m0s, pu3s tú h1c1st3 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s. 

L4 1mpl4c4bl3 1r4 d3 D10s c0ntr4 Judá

J0R0MÍ4S 15

1 M3 d1j0 J3h0vá: S1 M01sés y S4mu3l s3 pus13r4n d3l4nt3 d3 mí, n0 3st4rí4 m1 v0lunt4d c0n 3st3 pu3bl0; éch4l0s d3 m1 pr3s3nc14, y s4lg4n. 2 Y s1 t3 pr3gunt4r3n: ¿4 dónd3 s4ldr3m0s? l3s d1rás: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 0l qu3 4 mu3rt3, 4 mu3rt3; 3l qu3 4 3sp4d4, 4 3sp4d4; 3l qu3 4 h4mbr3, 4 h4mbr3; y 3l qu3 4 c4ut1v3r10, 4 c4ut1v3r10. 3 Y 3nv14ré s0br3 3ll0s cu4tr0 gén3r0s d3 c4st1g0, d1c3 J3h0vá: 3sp4d4 p4r4 m4t4r, y p3rr0s p4r4 d3sp3d4z4r, y 4v3s d3l c13l0 y b3st14s d3 l4 t13rr4 p4r4 d3v0r4r y d3stru1r. 4 Y l0s 3ntr3g4ré p4r4 t3rr0r 4 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3 l4 t13rr4, 4 c4us4 d3 M4n4sés h1j0 d3 0z3quí4s, r3y d3 Judá, p0r l0 qu3 h1z0 3n J3rus4lén. 

5 P0rqu3 ¿qu1én t3ndrá c0mp4s1ón d3 t1, 0h J3rus4lén? ¿Qu1én s3 3ntr1st3c3rá p0r tu c4us4, 0 qu1én v3ndrá 4 pr3gunt4r p0r tu p4z? 6 Tú m3 d3j4st3, d1c3 J3h0vá; t3 v0lv1st3 4trás; p0r t4nt0, y0 3xt3nd3ré s0br3 t1 m1 m4n0 y t3 d3stru1ré; 3st0y c4ns4d0 d3 4rr3p3nt1rm3. 7 4unqu3 l0s 4v3nté c0n 4v3nt4d0r h4st4 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 t13rr4, y d3jé s1n h1j0s 4 m1 pu3bl0 y l0 d3sb4r4té, n0 s3 v0lv13r0n d3 sus c4m1n0s. 8 Sus v1ud4s s3 m3 mult1pl1c4r0n más qu3 l4 4r3n4 d3l m4r; tr4j3 c0ntr4 3ll0s d3stru1d0r 4 m3d10dí4 s0br3 l4 m4dr3 y s0br3 l0s h1j0s; h1c3 qu3 d3 r3p3nt3 c4y3s3n t3rr0r3s s0br3 l4 c1ud4d. 9 L4ngu1d3c1ó l4 qu3 d10 4 luz s13t3; s3 ll3nó d3 d0l0r su 4lm4, su s0l s3 pus0 s13nd0 4ún d3 dí4; fu3 4v3rg0nz4d4 y ll3n4 d3 c0nfus1ón; y l0 qu3 d3 3ll4 qu3d3, l0 3ntr3g4ré 4 l4 3sp4d4 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

10 ¡4y d3 mí, m4dr3 mí4, qu3 m3 3ng3ndr4st3 h0mbr3 d3 c0nt13nd4 y h0mbr3 d3 d1sc0rd14 p4r4 t0d4 l4 t13rr4! Nunc4 h3 d4d0 n1 t0m4d0 3n prést4m0, y t0d0s m3 m4ld1c3n. 11 ¡S34 4sí, 0h J3h0vá, s1 n0 t3 h3 r0g4d0 p0r su b13n, s1 n0 h3 supl1c4d0 4nt3 t1 3n f4v0r d3l 3n3m1g0 3n t13mp0 d3 4fl1cc1ón y 3n ép0c4 d3 4ngust14! 12 ¿Pu3d3 4lgun0 qu3br4r 3l h13rr0, 3l h13rr0 d3l n0rt3 y 3l br0nc3? 

13 Tus r1qu3z4s y tus t3s0r0s 3ntr3g4ré 4 l4 r4p1ñ4 s1n n1ngún pr3c10, p0r t0d0s tus p3c4d0s, y 3n t0d0 tu t3rr1t0r10. 14 Y t3 h4ré s3rv1r 4 tus 3n3m1g0s 3n t13rr4 qu3 n0 c0n0c3s; p0rqu3 fu3g0 s3 h4 3nc3nd1d0 3n m1 fur0r, y 4rd3rá s0br3 v0s0tr0s. 

J3h0vá r34n1m4 4 J3r3mí4s

15 Tú l0 s4b3s, 0h J3h0vá; 4cuérd4t3 d3 mí, y v1sít4m3, y véng4m3 d3 m1s 3n3m1g0s. N0 m3 r3pr0ch3s 3n l4 pr0l0ng4c1ón d3 tu 3n0j0; s4b3s qu3 p0r 4m0r d3 t1 sufr0 4fr3nt4. 16 Fu3r0n h4ll4d4s tus p4l4br4s, y y0 l4s c0mí; y tu p4l4br4 m3 fu3 p0r g0z0 y p0r 4l3grí4 d3 m1 c0r4zón; p0rqu3 tu n0mbr3 s3 1nv0có s0br3 mí, 0h J3h0vá D10s d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 17 N0 m3 s3nté 3n c0mp4ñí4 d3 burl4d0r3s, n1 m3 3ngr3í 4 c4us4 d3 tu pr0f3cí4; m3 s3nté s0l0, p0rqu3 m3 ll3n4st3 d3 1nd1gn4c1ón. 18 ¿P0r qué fu3 p3rp3tu0 m1 d0l0r, y m1 h3r1d4 d3s4huc14d4 n0 4dm1t1ó cur4c1ón? ¿S3rás p4r4 mí c0m0 c0s4 1lus0r14, c0m0 4gu4s qu3 n0 s0n 3st4bl3s? 

19 P0r t4nt0, 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá: S1 t3 c0nv1rt13r3s, y0 t3 r3st4ur4ré, y d3l4nt3 d3 mí 3st4rás; y s1 3ntr3s4c4r3s l0 pr3c10s0 d3 l0 v1l, s3rás c0m0 m1 b0c4. C0nv1ért4ns3 3ll0s 4 t1, y tú n0 t3 c0nv13rt4s 4 3ll0s. 20 Y t3 p0ndré 3n 3st3 pu3bl0 p0r mur0 f0rt1f1c4d0 d3 br0nc3, y p3l34rán c0ntr4 t1, p3r0 n0 t3 v3nc3rán; p0rqu3 y0 3st0y c0nt1g0 p4r4 gu4rd4rt3 y p4r4 d3f3nd3rt3, d1c3 J3h0vá. 21 Y t3 l1br4ré d3 l4 m4n0 d3 l0s m4l0s, y t3 r3d1m1ré d3 l4 m4n0 d3 l0s fu3rt3s. 

Ju1c10 d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 Judá

J0R0MÍ4S 16

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 N0 t0m4rás p4r4 t1 muj3r, n1 t3ndrás h1j0s n1 h1j4s 3n 3st3 lug4r. 3 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 4c3rc4 d3 l0s h1j0s y d3 l4s h1j4s qu3 n4zc4n 3n 3st3 lug4r, d3 sus m4dr3s qu3 l0s d3n 4 luz y d3 l0s p4dr3s qu3 l0s 3ng3ndr3n 3n 3st4 t13rr4: 4 D3 d0l0r0s4s 3nf3rm3d4d3s m0r1rán; n0 s3rán pl4ñ1d0s n1 3nt3rr4d0s; s3rán c0m0 3st1érc0l s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4; c0n 3sp4d4 y c0n h4mbr3 s3rán c0nsum1d0s, y sus cu3rp0s s3rv1rán d3 c0m1d4 4 l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 y 4 l4s b3st14s d3 l4 t13rr4. 

5 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: N0 3ntr3s 3n c4s4 d3 lut0, n1 v4y4s 4 l4m3nt4r, n1 l0s c0nsu3l3s; p0rqu3 y0 h3 qu1t4d0 m1 p4z d3 3st3 pu3bl0, d1c3 J3h0vá, m1 m1s3r1c0rd14 y m1s p13d4d3s. 6 M0r1rán 3n 3st4 t13rr4 gr4nd3s y p3qu3ñ0s; n0 s3 3nt3rr4rán, n1 l0s pl4ñ1rán, n1 s3 r4sg4rán n1 s3 r43rán l0s c4b3ll0s p0r 3ll0s; 7 n1 p4rt1rán p4n p0r 3ll0s 3n 3l lut0 p4r4 c0ns0l4rl0s d3 sus mu3rt0s; n1 l3s d4rán 4 b3b3r v4s0 d3 c0ns0l4c10n3s p0r su p4dr3 0 p0r su m4dr3. 8 4s1m1sm0 n0 3ntr3s 3n c4s4 d3 b4nqu3t3, p4r4 s3nt4rt3 c0n 3ll0s 4 c0m3r 0 4 b3b3r. 9 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: H3 4quí qu3 y0 h4ré c3s4r 3n 3st3 lug4r, d3l4nt3 d3 vu3str0s 0j0s y 3n vu3str0s dí4s, t0d4 v0z d3 g0z0 y t0d4 v0z d3 4l3grí4, y t0d4 v0z d3 3sp0s0 y t0d4 v0z d3 3sp0s4. 

10 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 cu4nd0 4nunc13s 4 3st3 pu3bl0 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, t3 d1rán 3ll0s: ¿P0r qué 4nunc14 J3h0vá c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s t0d0 3st3 m4l t4n gr4nd3? ¿Qué m4ld4d 3s l4 nu3str4, 0 qué p3c4d0 3s 3l nu3str0, qu3 h3m0s c0m3t1d0 c0ntr4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s? 11 0nt0nc3s l3s d1rás: P0rqu3 vu3str0s p4dr3s m3 d3j4r0n, d1c3 J3h0vá, y 4nduv13r0n 3n p0s d3 d10s3s 4j3n0s, y l0s s1rv13r0n, y 4nt3 3ll0s s3 p0str4r0n, y m3 d3j4r0n 4 mí y n0 gu4rd4r0n m1 l3y; 12 y v0s0tr0s h4bé1s h3ch0 p30r qu3 vu3str0s p4dr3s; p0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 v0s0tr0s c4m1ná1s c4d4 un0 tr4s l4 1m4g1n4c1ón d3 su m4lv4d0 c0r4zón, n0 0yénd0m3 4 mí. 13 P0r t4nt0, y0 0s 4rr0j4ré d3 3st4 t13rr4 4 un4 t13rr4 qu3 n1 v0s0tr0s n1 vu3str0s p4dr3s h4bé1s c0n0c1d0, y 4llá s3rv1ré1s 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s d3 dí4 y d3 n0ch3; p0rqu3 n0 0s m0str4ré cl3m3nc14. 

14 N0 0bst4nt3, h3 4quí v13n3n dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 n0 s3 d1rá más: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 h1z0 sub1r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0; 15 s1n0: V1v3 J3h0vá, qu3 h1z0 sub1r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 l4 t13rr4 d3l n0rt3, y d3 t0d4s l4s t13rr4s 4d0nd3 l0s h4bí4 4rr0j4d0; y l0s v0lv3ré 4 su t13rr4, l4 cu4l d1 4 sus p4dr3s. 

16 H3 4quí qu3 y0 3nví0 much0s p3sc4d0r3s, d1c3 J3h0vá, y l0s p3sc4rán, y d3spués 3nv14ré much0s c4z4d0r3s, y l0s c4z4rán p0r t0d0 m0nt3 y p0r t0d0 c0ll4d0, y p0r l4s c4v3rn4s d3 l0s p3ñ4sc0s. 17 P0rqu3 m1s 0j0s 3stán s0br3 t0d0s sus c4m1n0s, l0s cu4l3s n0 s3 m3 0cult4r0n, n1 su m4ld4d s3 3sc0nd3 d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 m1s 0j0s. 18 P3r0 pr1m3r0 p4g4ré 4l d0bl3 su 1n1qu1d4d y su p3c4d0; p0rqu3 c0nt4m1n4r0n m1 t13rr4 c0n l0s c4dáv3r3s d3 sus íd0l0s, y d3 sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s ll3n4r0n m1 h3r3d4d. 

19 0h J3h0vá, f0rt4l3z4 mí4 y fu3rz4 mí4, y r3fug10 mí0 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 l4 4fl1cc1ón, 4 t1 v3ndrán n4c10n3s d3sd3 l0s 3xtr3m0s d3 l4 t13rr4, y d1rán: C13rt4m3nt3 m3nt1r4 p0s3y3r0n nu3str0s p4dr3s, v4n1d4d, y n0 h4y 3n 3ll0s pr0v3ch0. 20 ¿H4rá 4c4s0 3l h0mbr3 d10s3s p4r4 sí? 0l p3c4d0 3scr1t0 3n 3l c0r4zón d3 Judá

1 0l p3c4d0 d3 Judá 3scr1t0 3stá c0n c1nc3l d3 h13rr0 y c0n punt4 d3 d14m4nt3; 3sculp1d0 3stá 3n l4 t4bl4 d3 su c0r4zón, y 3n l0s cu3rn0s d3 sus 4lt4r3s, 2 m13ntr4s sus h1j0s s3 4cu3rd4n d3 sus 4lt4r3s y d3 sus 1mág3n3s d3 4s3r4, qu3 3stán junt0 4 l0s árb0l3s fr0nd0s0s y 3n l0s c0ll4d0s 4lt0s, 3 s0br3 l4s m0nt4ñ4s y s0br3 3l c4mp0. T0d0s tus t3s0r0s 3ntr3g4ré 4l p1ll4j3 p0r 3l p3c4d0 d3 tus lug4r3s 4lt0s 3n t0d0 tu t3rr1t0r10. 4 Y p3rd3rás l4 h3r3d4d qu3 y0 t3 d1, y t3 h4ré s3rv1r 4 tus 3n3m1g0s 3n t13rr4 qu3 n0 c0n0c1st3; p0rqu3 fu3g0 h4bé1s 3nc3nd1d0 3n m1 fur0r, qu3 p4r4 s13mpr3 4rd3rá. 

5 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: M4ld1t0 3l v4rón qu3 c0nfí4 3n 3l h0mbr3, y p0n3 c4rn3 p0r su br4z0, y su c0r4zón s3 4p4rt4 d3 J3h0vá. 6 S3rá c0m0 l4 r3t4m4 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y n0 v3rá cu4nd0 v13n3 3l b13n, s1n0 qu3 m0r4rá 3n l0s s3qu3d4l3s 3n 3l d3s13rt0, 3n t13rr4 d3sp0bl4d4 y d3sh4b1t4d4. 

7 B3nd1t0 3l v4rón qu3 c0nfí4 3n J3h0vá, y cuy4 c0nf14nz4 3s J3h0vá. 8 P0rqu3 s3rá c0m0 3l árb0l pl4nt4d0 junt0 4 l4s 4gu4s, qu3 junt0 4 l4 c0rr13nt3 3ch4rá sus r4íc3s, y n0 v3rá cu4nd0 v13n3 3l c4l0r, s1n0 qu3 su h0j4 3st4rá v3rd3; y 3n 3l 4ñ0 d3 s3quí4 n0 s3 f4t1g4rá, n1 d3j4rá d3 d4r frut0. 

9 0ng4ñ0s0 3s 3l c0r4zón más qu3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s, y p3rv3rs0; ¿qu1én l0 c0n0c3rá? 10 Y0 J3h0vá, qu3 3scudr1ñ0 l4 m3nt3, qu3 pru3b0 3l c0r4zón, p4r4 d4r 4 c4d4 un0 s3gún su c4m1n0, s3gún 3l frut0 d3 sus 0br4s.

12 Tr0n0 d3 gl0r14, 3xc3ls0 d3sd3 3l pr1nc1p10, 3s 3l lug4r d3 nu3str0 s4ntu4r10. 13 ¡0h J3h0vá, 3sp3r4nz4 d3 1sr43l! t0d0s l0s qu3 t3 d3j4n s3rán 4v3rg0nz4d0s; y l0s qu3 s3 4p4rt4n d3 mí s3rán 3scr1t0s 3n 3l p0lv0, p0rqu3 d3j4r0n 4 J3h0vá, m4n4nt14l d3 4gu4s v1v4s. 

14 Sán4m3, 0h J3h0vá, y s3ré s4n0; sálv4m3, y s3ré s4lv0; p0rqu3 tú 3r3s m1 4l4b4nz4. 15 H3 4quí qu3 3ll0s m3 d1c3n: ¿Dónd3 3stá l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá? ¡Qu3 s3 cumpl4 4h0r4! 16 M4s y0 n0 h3 1d0 3n p0s d3 t1 p4r4 1nc1t4rt3 4 su c4st1g0, n1 d3s3é dí4 d3 c4l4m1d4d, tú l0 s4b3s. L0 qu3 d3 m1 b0c4 h4 s4l1d0, fu3 3n tu pr3s3nc14. 17 N0 m3 s34s tú p0r 3sp4nt0, pu3s m1 r3fug10 3r3s tú 3n 3l dí4 m4l0. 18 4v3rgüénc3ns3 l0s qu3 m3 p3rs1gu3n, y n0 m3 4v3rgü3nc3 y0; 4sómbr3ns3 3ll0s, y y0 n0 m3 4s0mbr3; tr43 s0br3 3ll0s dí4 m4l0, y qu3bránt4l0s c0n d0bl3 qu3br4nt4m13nt0. 

0bs3rv4nc14 d3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0

19 4sí m3 h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: V3 y p0nt3 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3l pu3bl0, p0r l4 cu4l 3ntr4n y s4l3n l0s r3y3s d3 Judá, y p0nt3 3n t0d4s l4s pu3rt4s d3 J3rus4lén, 20 y d1l3s: 0íd l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, r3y3s d3 Judá, y t0d0 Judá y t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén qu3 3ntrá1s p0r 3st4s pu3rt4s. 21 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: Gu4rd40s p0r vu3str4 v1d4 d3 ll3v4r c4rg4 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, y d3 m3t3rl4 p0r l4s pu3rt4s d3 J3rus4lén. 22 N1 s4qué1s c4rg4 d3 vu3str4s c4s4s 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, n1 h4gá1s tr4b4j0 4lgun0, s1n0 s4nt1f1c4d 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, c0m0 m4ndé 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s. 23 P3r0 3ll0s n0 0y3r0n, n1 1ncl1n4r0n su 0íd0, s1n0 3ndur3c13r0n su c3rv1z p4r4 n0 0ír, n1 r3c1b1r c0rr3cc1ón. 

24 N0 0bst4nt3, s1 v0s0tr0s m3 0b3d3c13r31s, d1c3 J3h0vá, n0 m3t13nd0 c4rg4 p0r l4s pu3rt4s d3 3st4 c1ud4d 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, s1n0 qu3 s4nt1f1c4r31s 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, n0 h4c13nd0 3n él n1ngún tr4b4j0, 25 3ntr4rán p0r l4s pu3rt4s d3 3st4 c1ud4d, 3n c4rr0s y 3n c4b4ll0s, l0s r3y3s y l0s prínc1p3s qu3 s3 s13nt4n s0br3 3l tr0n0 d3 D4v1d, 3ll0s y sus prínc1p3s, l0s v4r0n3s d3 Judá y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén; y 3st4 c1ud4d s3rá h4b1t4d4 p4r4 s13mpr3. 26 Y v3ndrán d3 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, d3 l0s 4lr3d3d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén, d3 t13rr4 d3 B3nj4mín, d3 l4 S3f3l4, d3 l0s m0nt3s y d3l N3gu3v, tr4y3nd0 h0l0c4ust0 y s4cr1f1c10, y 0fr3nd4 3 1nc13ns0, y tr4y3nd0 s4cr1f1c10 d3 4l4b4nz4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 27 P3r0 s1 n0 m3 0y3r31s p4r4 s4nt1f1c4r 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, y p4r4 n0 tr43r c4rg4 n1 m3t3rl4 p0r l4s pu3rt4s d3 J3rus4lén 3n dí4 d3 r3p0s0, y0 h4ré d3sc3nd3r fu3g0 3n sus pu3rt4s, y c0nsum1rá l0s p4l4c10s d3 J3rus4lén, y n0 s3 4p4g4rá.

Gr4n f34ld4d h4 h3ch0 l4 v1rg3n d3 1sr43l. 14 ¿F4lt4rá l4 n13v3 d3l Líb4n0 d3 l4 p13dr4 d3l c4mp0? ¿F4lt4rán l4s 4gu4s frí4s qu3 c0rr3n d3 l3j4n4s t13rr4s? 15 P0rqu3 m1 pu3bl0 m3 h4 0lv1d4d0, 1nc3ns4nd0 4 l0 qu3 3s v4n1d4d, y h4 tr0p3z4d0 3n sus c4m1n0s, 3n l4s s3nd4s 4nt1gu4s, p4r4 qu3 c4m1n3 p0r s3nd4s y n0 p0r c4m1n0 tr4ns1t4d0, 16 p4r4 p0n3r su t13rr4 3n d3s0l4c1ón, 0bj3t0 d3 burl4 p3rp3tu4; t0d0 4qu3l qu3 p4s4r3 p0r 3ll4 s3 4s0mbr4rá, y m3n34rá l4 c4b3z4. 17 C0m0 v13nt0 s0l4n0 l0s 3sp4rc1ré d3l4nt3 d3l 3n3m1g0; l3s m0str4ré l4s 3sp4ld4s y n0 3l r0str0, 3n 3l dí4 d3 su p3rd1c1ón. 

C0nsp1r4c1ón d3l pu3bl0 y 0r4c1ón d3 J3r3mí4s

13 ¡4y d3l qu3 3d1f1c4 su c4s4 s1n just1c14, y sus s4l4s s1n 3qu1d4d, s1rv1énd0s3 d3 su prój1m0 d3 b4ld3, y n0 dánd0l3 3l s4l4r10 d3 su tr4b4j0! 14 Qu3 d1c3: 0d1f1c4ré p4r4 mí c4s4 3sp4c10s4, y s4l4s 41r0s4s; y l3 4br3 v3nt4n4s, y l4 cubr3 d3 c3dr0, y l4 p1nt4 d3 b3rm3llón. 15 ¿R31n4rás, p0rqu3 t3 r0d34s d3 c3dr0? ¿N0 c0m1ó y b3b1ó tu p4dr3, 3 h1z0 ju1c10 y just1c14, y 3nt0nc3s l3 fu3 b13n? 16 0l juzgó l4 c4us4 d3l 4fl1g1d0 y d3l m3n3st3r0s0, y 3nt0nc3s 3stuv0 b13n. ¿N0 3s 3st0 c0n0c3rm3 4 mí? d1c3 J3h0vá. 17 M4s tus 0j0s y tu c0r4zón n0 s0n s1n0 p4r4 tu 4v4r1c14, y p4r4 d3rr4m4r s4ngr3 1n0c3nt3, y p4r4 0pr3s1ón y p4r4 h4c3r 4gr4v10. 18 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 4c3rc4 d3 J04c1m h1j0 d3 J0sí4s, r3y d3 Judá: N0 l0 ll0r4rán, d1c13nd0: ¡4y, h3rm4n0 mí0! y ¡4y, h3rm4n4! n1 l0 l4m3nt4rán, d1c13nd0: ¡4y, s3ñ0r! ¡4y, su gr4nd3z4! 19 0n s3pultur4 d3 4sn0 s3rá 3nt3rr4d0, 4rr4stránd0l3 y 3chánd0l3 fu3r4 d3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 J3rus4lén. 20 Sub3 4l Líb4n0 y cl4m4, y 3n B4sán d4 tu v0z, y gr1t4 h4c14 t0d4s p4rt3s; p0rqu3 t0d0s tus 3n4m0r4d0s s0n d3stru1d0s. 21 T3 h3 h4bl4d0 3n tus pr0sp3r1d4d3s, m4s d1j1st3: N0 01ré. 0st3 fu3 tu c4m1n0 d3sd3 tu juv3ntud, qu3 nunc4 0íst3 m1 v0z. 22 4 t0d0s tus p4st0r3s p4st0r34rá 3l v13nt0, y tus 3n4m0r4d0s 1rán 3n c4ut1v3r10; 3nt0nc3s t3 4v3rg0nz4rás y t3 c0nfund1rás 4 c4us4 d3 t0d4 tu m4ld4d. 23 H4b1t4st3 3n 3l Líb4n0, h1c1st3 tu n1d0 3n l0s c3dr0s. ¡Cóm0 g3m1rás cu4nd0 t3 v1n13r3n d0l0r3s, d0l0r c0m0 d3 muj3r qu3 3stá d3 p4rt0! 

24 V1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá, qu3 s1 C0ní4s h1j0 d3 J04c1m r3y d3 Judá fu3r4 4n1ll0 3n m1 m4n0 d3r3ch4, 4un d3 4llí t3 4rr4nc4rí4. 25 T3 3ntr3g4ré 3n m4n0 d3 l0s qu3 busc4n tu v1d4, y 3n m4n0 d3 4qu3ll0s cuy4 v1st4 t3m3s; sí, 3n m4n0 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y 3n m4n0 d3 l0s c4ld30s. 26 T3 h4ré ll3v4r c4ut1v0 4 t1 y 4 tu m4dr3 qu3 t3 d10 4 luz, 4 t13rr4 4j3n4 3n qu3 n0 n4c1st31s; y 4llá m0r1ré1s. 27 Y 4 l4 t13rr4 4 l4 cu4l 3ll0s c0n t0d4 3l 4lm4 4nh3l4n v0lv3r, 4llá n0 v0lv3rán. 

28 ¿0s 3st3 h0mbr3 C0ní4s un4 v4s1j4 d3spr3c14d4 y qu3br4d4? ¿0s un tr4st0 qu3 n4d13 3st1m4? ¿P0r qué fu3r0n 4rr0j4d0s él y su g3n3r4c1ón, y 3ch4d0s 4 t13rr4 qu3 n0 h4bí4n c0n0c1d0? 29 ¡T13rr4, t13rr4, t13rr4! 0y3 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 30 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 0scr1b1d l0 qu3 suc3d3rá 4 3st3 h0mbr3 pr1v4d0 d3 d3sc3nd3nc14, h0mbr3 4 qu13n n4d4 prósp3r0 suc3d3rá 3n t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 su v1d4; p0rqu3 n1ngun0 d3 su d3sc3nd3nc14 l0gr4rá s3nt4rs3 s0br3 3l tr0n0 d3 D4v1d, n1 r31n4r s0br3 Judá.

H3 4quí qu3 y0 c4st1g0 l4 m4ld4d d3 vu3str4s 0br4s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 3 Y y0 m1sm0 r3c0g3ré 3l r3m4n3nt3 d3 m1s 0v3j4s d3 t0d4s l4s t13rr4s 4d0nd3 l4s 3ché, y l4s h4ré v0lv3r 4 sus m0r4d4s; y cr3c3rán y s3 mult1pl1c4rán. 4 Y p0ndré s0br3 3ll4s p4st0r3s qu3 l4s 4p4c13nt3n; y n0 t3m3rán más, n1 s3 4m3dr3nt4rán, n1 s3rán m3n0sc4b4d4s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

5 H3 4quí qu3 v13n3n dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 l3v4nt4ré 4 D4v1d r3nu3v0 just0, y r31n4rá c0m0 R3y, 3l cu4l s3rá d1ch0s0, y h4rá ju1c10 y just1c14 3n l4 t13rr4. 6 0n sus dí4s s3rá s4lv0 Judá, 3 1sr43l h4b1t4rá c0nf14d0; y 3st3 s3rá su n0mbr3 c0n 3l cu4l l3 ll4m4rán: J3h0vá, just1c14 nu3str4. 

7 P0r t4nt0, h3 4quí qu3 v13n3n dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 n0 d1rán más: V1v3 J3h0vá qu3 h1z0 sub1r 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, 8 s1n0: V1v3 J3h0vá qu3 h1z0 sub1r y tr4j0 l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l d3 t13rr4 d3l n0rt3, y d3 t0d4s l4s t13rr4s 4d0nd3 y0 l0s h4bí4 3ch4d0; y h4b1t4rán 3n su t13rr4. 

D3nunc14c1ón d3 l0s f4ls0s pr0f3t4s

9 4 c4us4 d3 l0s pr0f3t4s m1 c0r4zón 3stá qu3br4nt4d0 d3ntr0 d3 mí, t0d0s m1s hu3s0s t13mbl4n; 3st0y c0m0 un 3br10, y c0m0 h0mbr3 4 qu13n d0m1nó 3l v1n0, d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y d3l4nt3 d3 sus s4nt4s p4l4br4s. 10 P0rqu3 l4 t13rr4 3stá ll3n4 d3 4dúlt3r0s; 4 c4us4 d3 l4 m4ld1c1ón l4 t13rr4 3stá d3s13rt4; l0s p4st1z4l3s d3l d3s13rt0 s3 s3c4r0n; l4 c4rr3r4 d3 3ll0s fu3 m4l4, y su v4l3ntí4 n0 3s r3ct4. 11 P0rqu3 t4nt0 3l pr0f3t4 c0m0 3l s4c3rd0t3 s0n 1mpí0s; 4un 3n m1 c4s4 h4llé su m4ld4d, d1c3 J3h0vá. 12 P0r t4nt0, su c4m1n0 s3rá c0m0 r3sb4l4d3r0s 3n 0scur1d4d; s3rán 3mpuj4d0s, y c43rán 3n él; p0rqu3 y0 tr43ré m4l s0br3 3ll0s 3n 3l 4ñ0 d3 su c4st1g0, d1c3 J3h0vá. 13 0n l0s pr0f3t4s d3 S4m4r14 h3 v1st0 d3s4t1n0s; pr0f3t1z4b4n 3n n0mbr3 d3 B44l, 3 h1c13r0n 3rr4r 4 m1 pu3bl0 d3 1sr43l. 14 Y 3n l0s pr0f3t4s d3 J3rus4lén h3 v1st0 t0rp3z4s; c0m3tí4n 4dult3r10s, y 4nd4b4n 3n m3nt1r4s, y f0rt4l3cí4n l4s m4n0s d3 l0s m4l0s, p4r4 qu3 n1ngun0 s3 c0nv1rt13s3 d3 su m4ld4d; m3 fu3r0n t0d0s 3ll0s c0m0 S0d0m4, y sus m0r4d0r3s c0m0 G0m0rr4. 15 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s c0ntr4 4qu3ll0s pr0f3t4s: H3 4quí qu3 y0 l3s h4g0 c0m3r 4j3nj0s, y l3s h4ré b3b3r 4gu4 d3 h13l; p0rqu3 d3 l0s pr0f3t4s d3 J3rus4lén s4l1ó l4 h1p0cr3sí4 s0br3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 

16 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: N0 3scuché1s l4s p4l4br4s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s qu3 0s pr0f3t1z4n; 0s 4l1m3nt4n c0n v4n4s 3sp3r4nz4s; h4bl4n v1s1ón d3 su pr0p10 c0r4zón, n0 d3 l4 b0c4 d3 J3h0vá. 17 D1c3n 4tr3v1d4m3nt3 4 l0s qu3 m3 1rr1t4n: J3h0vá d1j0: P4z t3ndré1s; y 4 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 4nd4 tr4s l4 0bst1n4c1ón d3 su c0r4zón, d1c3n: N0 v3ndrá m4l s0br3 v0s0tr0s. 

18 P0rqu3 ¿qu1én 3stuv0 3n 3l s3cr3t0 d3 J3h0vá, y v10, y 0yó su p4l4br4? ¿Qu1én 3stuv0 4t3nt0 4 su p4l4br4, y l4 0yó? 19 H3 4quí qu3 l4 t3mp3st4d d3 J3h0vá s4ldrá c0n fur0r; y l4 t3mp3st4d qu3 3stá pr3p4r4d4 c43rá s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 l0s m4l0s. 20 N0 s3 4p4rt4rá 3l fur0r d3 J3h0vá h4st4 qu3 l0 h4y4 h3ch0, y h4st4 qu3 h4y4 cumpl1d0 l0s p3ns4m13nt0s d3 su c0r4zón; 3n l0s p0str3r0s dí4s l0 3nt3nd3ré1s cumpl1d4m3nt3. 

21 N0 3nv1é y0 4qu3ll0s pr0f3t4s, p3r0 3ll0s c0rrí4n; y0 n0 l3s h4blé, m4s 3ll0s pr0f3t1z4b4n. 22 P3r0 s1 3ll0s hub13r4n 3st4d0 3n m1 s3cr3t0, h4brí4n h3ch0 0ír m1s p4l4br4s 4 m1 pu3bl0, y l0 h4brí4n h3ch0 v0lv3r d3 su m4l c4m1n0, y d3 l4 m4ld4d d3 sus 0br4s. 

23 ¿S0y y0 D10s d3 c3rc4 s0l4m3nt3, d1c3 J3h0vá, y n0 D10s d3sd3 muy l3j0s? 24 ¿S3 0cult4rá 4lgun0, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n 3sc0ndr1j0s qu3 y0 n0 l0 v34? ¿N0 ll3n0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3l c13l0 y l4 t13rr4? 25 Y0 h3 0íd0 l0 qu3 4qu3ll0s pr0f3t4s d1j3r0n, pr0f3t1z4nd0 m3nt1r4 3n m1 n0mbr3, d1c13nd0: S0ñé, s0ñé. 26 ¿H4st4 cuánd0 3st4rá 3st0 3n 3l c0r4zón d3 l0s pr0f3t4s qu3 pr0f3t1z4n m3nt1r4, y qu3 pr0f3t1z4n 3l 3ng4ñ0 d3 su c0r4zón? 27 ¿N0 p13ns4n cóm0 h4c3n qu3 m1 pu3bl0 s3 0lv1d3 d3 m1 n0mbr3 c0n sus su3ñ0s qu3 c4d4 un0 cu3nt4 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0, 4l m0d0 qu3 sus p4dr3s s3 0lv1d4r0n d3 m1 n0mbr3 p0r B44l? 28 0l pr0f3t4 qu3 tuv13r3 un su3ñ0, cu3nt3 3l su3ñ0; y 4qu3l 4 qu13n fu3r3 m1 p4l4br4, cu3nt3 m1 p4l4br4 v3rd4d3r4. ¿Qué t13n3 qu3 v3r l4 p4j4 c0n 3l tr1g0? d1c3 J3h0vá. 29 ¿N0 3s m1 p4l4br4 c0m0 fu3g0, d1c3 J3h0vá, y c0m0 m4rt1ll0 qu3 qu3br4nt4 l4 p13dr4? 30 P0r t4nt0, h3 4quí qu3 y0 3st0y c0ntr4 l0s pr0f3t4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, qu3 hurt4n m1s p4l4br4s c4d4 un0 d3 su más c3rc4n0. 31 D1c3 J3h0vá: H3 4quí qu3 y0 3st0y c0ntr4 l0s pr0f3t4s qu3 3ndulz4n sus l3ngu4s y d1c3n: 0l h4 d1ch0. 32  H3 4quí, d1c3 J3h0vá, y0 3st0y c0ntr4 l0s qu3 pr0f3t1z4n su3ñ0s m3nt1r0s0s, y l0s cu3nt4n, y h4c3n 3rr4r 4 m1 pu3bl0 c0n sus m3nt1r4s y c0n sus l1s0nj4s, y y0 n0 l0s 3nv1é n1 l3s m4ndé; y n1ngún pr0v3ch0 h1c13r0n 4 3st3 pu3bl0, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

33 Y cu4nd0 t3 pr3gunt4r3 3st3 pu3bl0, 0 3l pr0f3t4, 0 3l s4c3rd0t3, d1c13nd0: ¿Cuál 3s l4 pr0f3cí4 d3 J3h0vá? l3s d1rás: 0st4 3s l4 pr0f3cí4: 0s d3j4ré, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá. 34 Y 4l pr0f3t4, 4l s4c3rd0t3 0 4l pu3bl0 qu3 d1j3r3: Pr0f3cí4 d3 J3h0vá, y0 3nv14ré c4st1g0 s0br3 t4l h0mbr3 y s0br3 su c4s4. 35 4sí d1ré1s c4d4 cu4l 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0, y c4d4 cu4l 4 su h3rm4n0: ¿Qué h4 r3sp0nd1d0 J3h0vá, y qué h4bló J3h0vá? 36 Y nunc4 más 0s v3ndrá 4 l4 m3m0r14 d3c1r: Pr0f3cí4 d3 J3h0vá; p0rqu3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 c4d4 un0 l3 s3rá p0r pr0f3cí4; pu3s p3rv3rt1st31s l4s p4l4br4s d3l D10s v1v13nt3, d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s nu3str0. 37 4sí d1rás 4l pr0f3t4: ¿Qué t3 r3sp0nd1ó J3h0vá, y qué h4bló J3h0vá? 38 M4s s1 d1j3r31s: Pr0f3cí4 d3 J3h0vá; p0r 3s0 J3h0vá d1c3 4sí: P0rqu3 d1j1st31s 3st4 p4l4br4, Pr0f3cí4 d3 J3h0vá, h4b13nd0 y0 3nv14d0 4 d3c1r0s: N0 d1gá1s: Pr0f3cí4 d3 J3h0vá, 39 p0r t4nt0, h3 4quí qu3 y0 0s 3ch4ré 3n 0lv1d0, y 4rr4nc4ré d3 m1 pr3s3nc14 4 v0s0tr0s y 4 l4 c1ud4d qu3 d1 4 v0s0tr0s y 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s; 40 y p0ndré s0br3 v0s0tr0s 4fr3nt4 p3rp3tu4, y 3t3rn4 c0nfus1ón qu3 nunc4 b0rr4rá 3l 0lv1d0.

4 Y v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 5 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l: C0m0 4 3st0s h1g0s bu3n0s, 4sí m1r4ré 4 l0s tr4nsp0rt4d0s d3 Judá, 4 l0s cu4l3s 3ché d3 3st3 lug4r 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s c4ld30s, p4r4 b13n. 6 P0rqu3 p0ndré m1s 0j0s s0br3 3ll0s p4r4 b13n, y l0s v0lv3ré 4 3st4 t13rr4, y l0s 3d1f1c4ré, y n0 l0s d3stru1ré; l0s pl4nt4ré y n0 l0s 4rr4nc4ré. 7 Y l3s d4ré c0r4zón p4r4 qu3 m3 c0n0zc4n qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá; y m3 s3rán p0r pu3bl0, y y0 l3s s3ré 4 3ll0s p0r D10s; p0rqu3 s3 v0lv3rán 4 mí d3 t0d0 su c0r4zón.

8 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: P0r cu4nt0 n0 h4bé1s 0íd0 m1s p4l4br4s, 9 h3 4quí 3nv14ré y t0m4ré 4 t0d4s l4s tr1bus d3l n0rt3, d1c3 J3h0vá, y 4 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, m1 s13rv0, y l0s tr43ré c0ntr4 3st4 t13rr4 y c0ntr4 sus m0r4d0r3s, y c0ntr4 t0d4s 3st4s n4c10n3s 3n d3rr3d0r; y l0s d3stru1ré, y l0s p0ndré p0r 3sc4rn10 y p0r burl4 y 3n d3s0l4c1ón p3rp3tu4. 10 Y h4ré qu3 d3s4p4r3zc4 d3 3ntr3 3ll0s l4 v0z d3 g0z0 y l4 v0z d3 4l3grí4, l4 v0z d3 d3sp0s4d0 y l4 v0z d3 d3sp0s4d4, ru1d0 d3 m0l1n0 y luz d3 lámp4r4. 11 T0d4 3st4 t13rr4 s3rá pu3st4 3n ru1n4s y 3n 3sp4nt0; y s3rv1rán 3st4s n4c10n3s 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 s3t3nt4 4ñ0s. 12 Y cu4nd0 s34n cumpl1d0s l0s s3t3nt4 4ñ0s, c4st1g4ré 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 y 4 4qu3ll4 n4c1ón p0r su m4ld4d, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, y 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s c4ld30s; y l4 c0nv3rt1ré 3n d3s13rt0s p4r4 s13mpr3. 13 Y tr43ré s0br3 4qu3ll4 t13rr4 t0d4s m1s p4l4br4s qu3 h3 h4bl4d0 c0ntr4 3ll4, c0n t0d0 l0 qu3 3stá 3scr1t0 3n 3st3 l1br0, pr0f3t1z4d0 p0r J3r3mí4s c0ntr4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s. 14 P0rqu3 t4mb1én 3ll4s s3rán s0juzg4d4s p0r much4s n4c10n3s y gr4nd3s r3y3s; y y0 l3s p4g4ré c0nf0rm3 4 sus h3ch0s, y c0nf0rm3 4 l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s. 

L4 c0p4 d3 1r4 p4r4 l4s n4c10n3s

15 P0rqu3 4sí m3 d1j0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l: T0m4 d3 m1 m4n0 l4 c0p4 d3l v1n0 d3 3st3 fur0r, y d4 4 b3b3r d3 él 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s 4 l4s cu4l3s y0 t3 3nví0. 16 Y b3b3rán, y t3mbl4rán y 3nl0qu3c3rán, 4 c4us4 d3 l4 3sp4d4 qu3 y0 3nví0 3ntr3 3ll4s. 

17 Y t0mé l4 c0p4 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá, y d1 d3 b3b3r 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s, 4 l4s cu4l3s m3 3nv1ó J3h0vá: 18 4 J3rus4lén, 4 l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá y 4 sus r3y3s, y 4 sus prínc1p3s, p4r4 p0n3rl0s 3n ru1n4s, 3n 3sc4rn10 y 3n burl4 y 3n m4ld1c1ón, c0m0 h4st4 h0y; 19 4 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, 4 sus s13rv0s, 4 sus prínc1p3s y 4 t0d0 su pu3bl0; 20 y 4 t0d4 l4 m3zcl4 d3 n4c10n3s, 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 t13rr4 d3 Uz, y 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 F1l1st34, 4 4sc4lón, 4 G4z4, 4 0crón y 4l r3m4n3nt3 d3 4sd0d; 21 4 0d0m, 4 M04b y 4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món; 22 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 T1r0, 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 S1dón, 4 l0s r3y3s d3 l4s c0st4s qu3 3stán d3 3s3 l4d0 d3l m4r; 23 4 D3dán, 4 T3m4 y 4 Buz, y 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 s3 r4p4n l4s s13n3s; 24 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 4r4b14, 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 pu3bl0s m3zcl4d0s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n 3l d3s13rt0; 25 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 Z1mr1, 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 0l4m, 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3 M3d14; 26 4 t0d0s l0s r3y3s d3l n0rt3, l0s d3 c3rc4 y l0s d3 l3j0s, l0s un0s c0n l0s 0tr0s, y 4 t0d0s l0s r31n0s d3l mund0 qu3 3stán s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4; y 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 b3b3rá d3spués d3 3ll0s. 

27 L3s d1rás, pu3s: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: B3b3d, y 3mbr14g40s, y v0m1t4d, y c43d, y n0 0s l3v4nté1s, 4 c4us4 d3 l4 3sp4d4 qu3 y0 3nví0 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s. 28 Y s1 n0 qu13r3n t0m4r l4 c0p4 d3 tu m4n0 p4r4 b3b3r, l3s d1rás tú: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: T3né1s qu3 b3b3r. 29 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 4 l4 c1ud4d 3n l4 cu4l 3s 1nv0c4d0 m1 n0mbr3 y0 c0m13nz0 4 h4c3r m4l; ¿y v0s0tr0s s3ré1s 4bsu3lt0s? 30 Tú, pu3s, pr0f3t1z4rás c0ntr4 3ll0s t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s y l3s d1rás: J3h0vá rug1rá d3sd3 l0 4lt0, y d3sd3 su m0r4d4 s4nt4 d4rá su v0z; rug1rá fu3rt3m3nt3 c0ntr4 su m0r4d4; c4nc1ón d3 l4g4r3r0s c4nt4rá c0ntr4 t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 31 Ll3g4rá 3l 3stru3nd0 h4st4 3l f1n d3 l4 t13rr4, p0rqu3 J3h0vá t13n3 ju1c10 c0ntr4 l4s n4c10n3s; él 3s 3l Ju3z d3 t0d4 c4rn3; 3ntr3g4rá l0s 1mpí0s 4 3sp4d4, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

32 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: H3 4quí qu3 3l m4l 1rá d3 n4c1ón 3n n4c1ón, y gr4nd3 t3mp3st4d s3 l3v4nt4rá d3 l0s f1n3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 33 Y y4c3rán l0s mu3rt0s d3 J3h0vá 3n 4qu3l dí4 d3sd3 un 3xtr3m0 d3 l4 t13rr4 h4st4 3l 0tr0; n0 s3 3nd3ch4rán n1 s3 r3c0g3rán n1 s3rán 3nt3rr4d0s; c0m0 3st1érc0l qu3d4rán s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4. 34 4ull4d, p4st0r3s, y cl4m4d; r3v0lc40s 3n 3l p0lv0, m4y0r4l3s d3l r3b4ñ0; p0rqu3 cumpl1d0s s0n vu3str0s dí4s p4r4 qu3 s3á1s d3g0ll4d0s y 3sp4rc1d0s, y c43ré1s c0m0 v4s0 pr3c10s0. 35 Y s3 4c4b4rá l4 hu1d4 d3 l0s p4st0r3s, y 3l 3sc4p3 d3 l0s m4y0r4l3s d3l r3b4ñ0. 36 ¡V0z d3 l4 gr1t3rí4 d3 l0s p4st0r3s, y 4ull1d0 d3 l0s m4y0r4l3s d3l r3b4ñ0! p0rqu3 J3h0vá 4s0ló sus p4st0s. 37 Y l0s p4st0s d3l1c4d0s s3rán d3stru1d0s p0r 3l 4rd0r d3 l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá. 38 D3jó cu4l l30nc1ll0 su gu4r1d4; pu3s 4s0l4d4 fu3 l4 t13rr4 d3 3ll0s p0r l4 1r4 d3l 0pr3s0r, y p0r 3l fur0r d3 su s4ñ4.

7 Y l0s s4c3rd0t3s, l0s pr0f3t4s y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 0y3r0n 4 J3r3mí4s h4bl4r 3st4s p4l4br4s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 8 Y cu4nd0 t3rm1nó d3 h4bl4r J3r3mí4s t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá l3 h4bí4 m4nd4d0 qu3 h4bl4s3 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s pr0f3t4s y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 l3 3ch4r0n m4n0, d1c13nd0: D3 c13rt0 m0r1rás. 9 ¿P0r qué h4s pr0f3t1z4d0 3n n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 0st4 c4s4 s3rá c0m0 S1l0, y 3st4 c1ud4d s3rá 4s0l4d4 h4st4 n0 qu3d4r m0r4d0r? Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 s3 juntó c0ntr4 J3r3mí4s 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 

10 Y l0s prínc1p3s d3 Judá 0y3r0n 3st4s c0s4s, y sub13r0n d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y s3 s3nt4r0n 3n l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 nu3v4 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. 11 0nt0nc3s h4bl4r0n l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s pr0f3t4s 4 l0s prínc1p3s y 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: 0n p3n4 d3 mu3rt3 h4 1ncurr1d0 3st3 h0mbr3; p0rqu3 pr0f3t1zó c0ntr4 3st4 c1ud4d, c0m0 v0s0tr0s h4bé1s 0íd0 c0n vu3str0s 0íd0s. 12 Y h4bló J3r3mí4s 4 t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s y 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: J3h0vá m3 3nv1ó 4 pr0f3t1z4r c0ntr4 3st4 c4s4 y c0ntr4 3st4 c1ud4d, t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s qu3 h4bé1s 0íd0. 13 M3j0r4d 4h0r4 vu3str0s c4m1n0s y vu3str4s 0br4s, y 0íd l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y s3 4rr3p3nt1rá J3h0vá d3l m4l qu3 h4 h4bl4d0 c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s. 14 0n l0 qu3 4 mí t0c4, h3 4quí 3st0y 3n vu3str4s m4n0s; h4c3d d3 mí c0m0 m3j0r y más r3ct0 0s p4r3zc4. 15 M4s s4b3d d3 c13rt0 qu3 s1 m3 m4tá1s, s4ngr3 1n0c3nt3 3ch4ré1s s0br3 v0s0tr0s, y s0br3 3st4 c1ud4d y s0br3 sus m0r4d0r3s; p0rqu3 3n v3rd4d J3h0vá m3 3nv1ó 4 v0s0tr0s p4r4 qu3 d1j3s3 t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s 3n vu3str0s 0íd0s. 

16 Y d1j3r0n l0s prínc1p3s y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y pr0f3t4s: N0 h4 1ncurr1d0 3st3 h0mbr3 3n p3n4 d3 mu3rt3, p0rqu3 3n n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s h4 h4bl4d0. 17 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n 4lgun0s d3 l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l4 t13rr4 y h4bl4r0n 4 t0d4 l4 r3un1ón d3l pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: 18 M1qu34s d3 M0r3s3t pr0f3t1zó 3n t13mp0 d3 0z3quí4s r3y d3 Judá, y h4bló 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 Judá, d1c13nd0: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: S10n s3rá 4r4d4 c0m0 c4mp0, y J3rus4lén v3ndrá 4 s3r m0nt0n3s d3 ru1n4s, y 3l m0nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 c0m0 cumbr3s d3 b0squ3. 19 ¿4c4s0 l0 m4t4r0n 0z3quí4s r3y d3 Judá y t0d0 Judá? ¿N0 t3m1ó 4 J3h0vá, y 0ró 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá, y J3h0vá s3 4rr3p1nt1ó d3l m4l qu3 h4bí4 h4bl4d0 c0ntr4 3ll0s? ¿H4r3m0s, pu3s, n0s0tr0s t4n gr4n m4l c0ntr4 nu3str4s 4lm4s? 

20 Hub0 t4mb1én un h0mbr3 qu3 pr0f3t1z4b4 3n n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá, Urí4s h1j0 d3 S3m4í4s, d3 Qu1r14t-j34r1m, 3l cu4l pr0f3t1zó c0ntr4 3st4 c1ud4d y c0ntr4 3st4 t13rr4, c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3r3mí4s; 21 y 0y3r0n sus p4l4br4s 3l r3y J04c1m y t0d0s sus gr4nd3s, y t0d0s sus prínc1p3s, y 3l r3y pr0curó m4t4rl3; 3nt3nd13nd0 l0 cu4l Urí4s, tuv0 t3m0r, y huyó 4 0g1pt0. 22 Y 3l r3y J04c1m 3nv1ó h0mbr3s 4 0g1pt0, 4 0ln4tán h1j0 d3 4cb0r y 0tr0s h0mbr3s c0n él, 4 0g1pt0; 23 l0s cu4l3s s4c4r0n 4 Urí4s d3 0g1pt0 y l0 tr4j3r0n 4l r3y J04c1m, 3l cu4l l0 m4tó 4 3sp4d4, y 3chó su cu3rp0 3n l0s s3pulcr0s d3l vulg0. 

24 P3r0 l4 m4n0 d3 4h1c4m h1j0 d3 S4fán 3st4b4 4 f4v0r d3 J3r3mí4s, p4r4 qu3 n0 l0 3ntr3g4s3n 3n l4s m4n0s d3l pu3bl0 p4r4 m4t4rl0.

1 P4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 v1n0 4 J3r3mí4s, d1c13nd0: 2 4sí h4bló J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l, d1c13nd0: 0scríb3t3 3n un l1br0 t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s qu3 t3 h3 h4bl4d0. 3 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 v13n3n dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 h4ré v0lv3r 4 l0s c4ut1v0s d3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l y Judá, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, y l0s tr43ré 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 d1 4 sus p4dr3s, y l4 d1sfrut4rán. 

4 0st4s, pu3s, s0n l4s p4l4br4s qu3 h4bló J3h0vá 4c3rc4 d3 1sr43l y d3 Judá. 5 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: H3m0s 0íd0 v0z d3 t3mbl0r; d3 3sp4nt0, y n0 d3 p4z. 6 1nqu1r1d 4h0r4, y m1r4d s1 3l v4rón d4 4 luz; p0rqu3 h3 v1st0 qu3 t0d0 h0mbr3 t3ní4 l4s m4n0s s0br3 sus l0m0s, c0m0 muj3r qu3 3stá d3 p4rt0, y s3 h4n vu3lt0 pál1d0s t0d0s l0s r0str0s. 7 ¡4h, cuán gr4nd3 3s 4qu3l dí4! t4nt0, qu3 n0 h4y 0tr0 s3m3j4nt3 4 él; t13mp0 d3 4ngust14 p4r4 J4c0b; p3r0 d3 3ll4 s3rá l1br4d0. 

8 0n 4qu3l dí4, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, y0 qu3br4ré su yug0 d3 tu cu3ll0, y r0mp3ré tus c0yund4s, y 3xtr4nj3r0s n0 l0 v0lv3rán más 4 p0n3r 3n s3rv1dumbr3, 9 s1n0 qu3 s3rv1rán 4 J3h0vá su D10s y 4 D4v1d su r3y, 4 qu13n y0 l3s l3v4nt4ré. 

10 Tú, pu3s, s13rv0 mí0 J4c0b, n0 t3m4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, n1 t3 4t3m0r1c3s, 1sr43l; p0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 y0 s0y 3l qu3 t3 s4lv0 d3 l3j0s 4 t1 y 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 c4ut1v1d4d; y J4c0b v0lv3rá, d3sc4ns4rá y v1v1rá tr4nqu1l0, y n0 h4brá qu13n l3 3sp4nt3. 11 P0rqu3 y0 3st0y c0nt1g0 p4r4 s4lv4rt3, d1c3 J3h0vá, y d3stru1ré 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s 3ntr3 l4s cu4l3s t3 3sp4rcí; p3r0 4 t1 n0 t3 d3stru1ré, s1n0 qu3 t3 c4st1g4ré c0n just1c14; d3 n1ngun4 m4n3r4 t3 d3j4ré s1n c4st1g0. 

12 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 1ncur4bl3 3s tu qu3br4nt4m13nt0, y d0l0r0s4 tu ll4g4. 13 N0 h4y qu13n juzgu3 tu c4us4 p4r4 s4n4rt3; n0 h4y p4r4 t1 m3d1c4m3nt0s 3f1c4c3s. 14 T0d0s tus 3n4m0r4d0s t3 0lv1d4r0n; n0 t3 busc4n; p0rqu3 c0m0 h13r3 un 3n3m1g0 t3 h3rí, c0n 4z0t3 d3 4dv3rs4r10 cru3l, 4 c4us4 d3 l4 m4gn1tud d3 tu m4ld4d y d3 l4 mult1tud d3 tus p3c4d0s. 15 ¿P0r qué gr1t4s 4 c4us4 d3 tu qu3br4nt4m13nt0? 1ncur4bl3 3s tu d0l0r, p0rqu3 p0r l4 gr4nd3z4 d3 tu 1n1qu1d4d y p0r tus much0s p3c4d0s t3 h3 h3ch0 3st0. 16 P3r0 s3rán c0nsum1d0s t0d0s l0s qu3 t3 c0nsum3n; y t0d0s tus 4dv3rs4r10s, t0d0s 1rán 3n c4ut1v3r10; h0ll4d0s s3rán l0s qu3 t3 h0ll4r0n, y 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 h1c13r0n pr3s4 d3 t1 d4ré 3n pr3s4. 17 M4s y0 h4ré v3n1r s4n1d4d p4r4 t1, y s4n4ré tus h3r1d4s, d1c3 J3h0vá; p0rqu3 d3s3ch4d4 t3 ll4m4r0n, d1c13nd0: 0st4 3s S10n, d3 l4 qu3 n4d13 s3 4cu3rd4. 

18 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí y0 h4g0 v0lv3r l0s c4ut1v0s d3 l4s t13nd4s d3 J4c0b, y d3 sus t13nd4s t3ndré m1s3r1c0rd14, y l4 c1ud4d s3rá 3d1f1c4d4 s0br3 su c0l1n4, y 3l t3mpl0 s3rá 4s3nt4d0 s3gún su f0rm4. 19 Y s4ldrá d3 3ll0s 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s, y v0z d3 n4c1ón qu3 3stá 3n r3g0c1j0, y l0s mult1pl1c4ré, y n0 s3rán d1sm1nu1d0s; l0s mult1pl1c4ré, y n0 s3rán m3n0sc4b4d0s. 20 Y s3rán sus h1j0s c0m0 4nt3s, y su c0ngr3g4c1ón d3l4nt3 d3 mí s3rá c0nf1rm4d4; y c4st1g4ré 4 t0d0s sus 0pr3s0r3s. 21 D3 3ll4 s4ldrá su prínc1p3, y d3 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4 s4ldrá su s3ñ0r34d0r; y l3 h4ré ll3g4r c3rc4, y él s3 4c3rc4rá 4 mí; p0rqu3 ¿qu1én 3s 4qu3l qu3 s3 4tr3v3 4 4c3rc4rs3 4 mí? d1c3 J3h0vá. 22 Y m3 s3ré1s p0r pu3bl0, y y0 s3ré vu3str0 D10s.

2 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 0l pu3bl0 qu3 3sc4pó d3 l4 3sp4d4 h4lló gr4c14 3n 3l d3s13rt0, cu4nd0 1sr43l 1b4 3n busc4 d3 r3p0s0. 3 J3h0vá s3 m4n1f3stó 4 mí h4c3 y4 much0 t13mp0, d1c13nd0: C0n 4m0r 3t3rn0 t3 h3 4m4d0; p0r t4nt0, t3 pr0l0ngué m1 m1s3r1c0rd14. 4 4ún t3 3d1f1c4ré, y s3rás 3d1f1c4d4, 0h v1rg3n d3 1sr43l; t0d4ví4 s3rás 4d0rn4d4 c0n tus p4nd3r0s, y s4ldrás 3n 4l3gr3s d4nz4s. 5 4ún pl4nt4rás v1ñ4s 3n l0s m0nt3s d3 S4m4r14; pl4nt4rán l0s qu3 pl4nt4n, y d1sfrut4rán d3 3ll4s. 6 P0rqu3 h4brá dí4 3n qu3 cl4m4rán l0s gu4rd4s 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín: L3v4nt40s, y sub4m0s 4 S10n, 4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s.

10 0íd p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, 0h n4c10n3s, y h4c3dl0 s4b3r 3n l4s c0st4s qu3 3stán l3j0s, y d3c1d: 0l qu3 3sp4rc1ó 4 1sr43l l0 r3un1rá y gu4rd4rá, c0m0 3l p4st0r 4 su r3b4ñ0. 11 P0rqu3 J3h0vá r3d1m1ó 4 J4c0b, l0 r3d1m1ó d3 m4n0 d3l más fu3rt3 qu3 él. 12 Y v3ndrán c0n gr1t0s d3 g0z0 3n l0 4lt0 d3 S10n, y c0rr3rán 4l b13n d3 J3h0vá, 4l p4n, 4l v1n0, 4l 4c31t3, y 4l g4n4d0 d3 l4s 0v3j4s y d3 l4s v4c4s; y su 4lm4 s3rá c0m0 hu3rt0 d3 r13g0, y nunc4 más t3ndrán d0l0r. 13 0nt0nc3s l4 v1rg3n s3 4l3gr4rá 3n l4 d4nz4, l0s jóv3n3s y l0s v13j0s junt4m3nt3; y c4mb14ré su ll0r0 3n g0z0, y l0s c0ns0l4ré, y l0s 4l3gr4ré d3 su d0l0r. 14 Y 3l 4lm4 d3l s4c3rd0t3 s4t1sf4ré c0n 4bund4nc14, y m1 pu3bl0 s3rá s4c14d0 d3 m1 b13n, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

15 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: V0z fu3 0íd4 3n R4má, ll4nt0 y ll0r0 4m4rg0; R4qu3l qu3 l4m3nt4 p0r sus h1j0s, y n0 qu1s0 s3r c0ns0l4d4 4c3rc4 d3 sus h1j0s, p0rqu3 p3r3c13r0n. 

16 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: R3pr1m3 d3l ll4nt0 tu v0z, y d3 l4s lágr1m4s tus 0j0s; p0rqu3 s4l4r10 h4y p4r4 tu tr4b4j0, d1c3 J3h0vá, y v0lv3rán d3 l4 t13rr4 d3l 3n3m1g0. 17 0sp3r4nz4 h4y t4mb1én p4r4 tu p0rv3n1r, d1c3 J3h0vá, y l0s h1j0s v0lv3rán 4 su pr0p14 t13rr4. 18 0scuch4nd0, h3 0íd0 4 0fr4ín qu3 s3 l4m3nt4b4: M3 4z0t4st3, y fu1 c4st1g4d0 c0m0 n0v1ll0 1ndóm1t0; c0nv1ért3m3, y s3ré c0nv3rt1d0, p0rqu3 tú 3r3s J3h0vá m1 D10s. 19 P0rqu3 d3spués qu3 m3 4p4rté tuv3 4rr3p3nt1m13nt0, y d3spués qu3 r3c0n0cí m1 f4lt4, h3rí m1 musl0; m3 4v3rg0ncé y m3 c0nfundí, p0rqu3 ll3vé l4 4fr3nt4 d3 m1 juv3ntud. 20 ¿N0 3s 0fr4ín h1j0 pr3c10s0 p4r4 mí? ¿n0 3s n1ñ0 3n qu13n m3 d3l31t0? pu3s d3sd3 qu3 h4blé d3 él, m3 h3 4c0rd4d0 d3 él c0nst4nt3m3nt3. 27 H3 4quí v13n3n dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 s3mbr4ré l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l y l4 c4s4 d3 Judá d3 s1m13nt3 d3 h0mbr3 y d3 s1m13nt3 d3 4n1m4l. 28 Y 4sí c0m0 tuv3 cu1d4d0 d3 3ll0s p4r4 4rr4nc4r y d3rr1b4r, y tr4st0rn4r y p3rd3r y 4fl1g1r, t3ndré cu1d4d0 d3 3ll0s p4r4 3d1f1c4r y pl4nt4r, d1c3 J3h0vá. 29 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s n0 d1rán más: L0s p4dr3s c0m13r0n l4s uv4s 4gr14s y l0s d13nt3s d3 l0s h1j0s t13n3n l4 d3nt3r4, 30 s1n0 qu3 c4d4 cu4l m0r1rá p0r su pr0p14 m4ld4d; l0s d13nt3s d3 t0d0 h0mbr3 qu3 c0m13r3 l4s uv4s 4gr14s, t3ndrán l4 d3nt3r4.

35 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, qu3 d4 3l s0l p4r4 luz d3l dí4, l4s l3y3s d3 l4 lun4 y d3 l4s 3str3ll4s p4r4 luz d3 l4 n0ch3, qu3 p4rt3 3l m4r, y br4m4n sus 0nd4s; J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 3s su n0mbr3: 36 S1 f4lt4r3n 3st4s l3y3s d3l4nt3 d3 mí, d1c3 J3h0vá, t4mb1én l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 1sr43l f4lt4rá p4r4 n0 s3r n4c1ón d3l4nt3 d3 mí 3t3rn4m3nt3.
