6 D1j0 J3r3mí4s: P4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá v1n0 4 mí, d1c13nd0: 7 H3 4quí qu3 H4n4m33l h1j0 d3 S4lum tu tí0 v13n3 4 t1, d1c13nd0: Cómpr4m3 m1 h3r3d4d qu3 3stá 3n 4n4t0t; p0rqu3 tú t13n3s d3r3ch0 4 3ll4 p4r4 c0mpr4rl4. 8 Y v1n0 4 mí H4n4m33l h1j0 d3 m1 tí0, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, 4l p4t10 d3 l4 cárc3l, y m3 d1j0: C0mpr4 4h0r4 m1 h3r3d4d, qu3 3stá 3n 4n4t0t 3n t13rr4 d3 B3nj4mín, p0rqu3 tuy0 3s 3l d3r3ch0 d3 l4 h3r3nc14, y 4 t1 c0rr3sp0nd3 3l r3sc4t3; cómpr4l4 p4r4 t1. 0nt0nc3s c0n0cí qu3 3r4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 

9 Y c0mpré l4 h3r3d4d d3 H4n4m33l, h1j0 d3 m1 tí0, l4 cu4l 3st4b4 3n 4n4t0t, y l3 p3sé 3l d1n3r0; d13c1s13t3 s1cl0s d3 pl4t4. 10 Y 3scr1bí l4 c4rt4 y l4 s3llé, y l4 h1c3 c3rt1f1c4r c0n t3st1g0s, y p3sé 3l d1n3r0 3n b4l4nz4. 11 T0mé lu3g0 l4 c4rt4 d3 v3nt4, s3ll4d4 s3gún 3l d3r3ch0 y c0stumbr3, y l4 c0p14 4b13rt4. 12 Y d1 l4 c4rt4 d3 v3nt4 4 B4ruc h1j0 d3 N3rí4s, h1j0 d3 M44sí4s, d3l4nt3 d3 H4n4m33l 3l h1j0 d3 m1 tí0, y d3l4nt3 d3 l0s t3st1g0s qu3 h4bí4n suscr1t0 l4 c4rt4 d3 v3nt4, d3l4nt3 d3 t0d0s l0s judí0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n 3l p4t10 d3 l4 cárc3l. 13 Y d1 0rd3n 4 B4ruc d3l4nt3 d3 3ll0s, d1c13nd0: 14 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: T0m4 3st4s c4rt4s, 3st4 c4rt4 d3 v3nt4 s3ll4d4, y 3st4 c4rt4 4b13rt4, y p0nl4s 3n un4 v4s1j4 d3 b4rr0, p4r4 qu3 s3 c0ns3rv3n much0s dí4s. 

15 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: 4ún s3 c0mpr4rán c4s4s, h3r3d4d3s y v1ñ4s 3n 3st4 t13rr4. 16 Y d3spués qu3 d1 l4 c4rt4 d3 v3nt4 4 B4ruc h1j0 d3 N3rí4s, 0ré 4 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 17 ¡0h S3ñ0r J3h0vá! h3 4quí qu3 tú h1c1st3 3l c13l0 y l4 t13rr4 c0n tu gr4n p0d3r, y c0n tu br4z0 3xt3nd1d0, n1 h4y n4d4 qu3 s34 d1fíc1l p4r4 t1; 18 qu3 h4c3s m1s3r1c0rd14 4 m1ll4r3s, y c4st1g4s l4 m4ld4d d3 l0s p4dr3s 3n sus h1j0s d3spués d3 3ll0s; D10s gr4nd3, p0d3r0s0, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 3s su n0mbr3; 19 gr4nd3 3n c0ns3j0, y m4gníf1c0 3n h3ch0s; p0rqu3 tus 0j0s 3stán 4b13rt0s s0br3 t0d0s l0s c4m1n0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s, p4r4 d4r 4 c4d4 un0 s3gún sus c4m1n0s, y s3gún 3l frut0 d3 sus 0br4s. 20 Tú h1c1st3 s3ñ4l3s y p0rt3nt0s 3n t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 h4st4 3st3 dí4, y 3n 1sr43l, y 3ntr3 l0s h0mbr3s; y t3 h4s h3ch0 n0mbr3, c0m0 s3 v3 3n 3l dí4 d3 h0y. 21 Y s4c4st3 4 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 c0n s3ñ4l3s y p0rt3nt0s, c0n m4n0 fu3rt3 y br4z0 3xt3nd1d0, y c0n t3rr0r gr4nd3; 22 y l3s d1st3 3st4 t13rr4, d3 l4 cu4l jur4st3 4 sus p4dr3s qu3 s3 l4 d4rí4s, l4 t13rr4 qu3 fluy3 l3ch3 y m13l; 23 y 3ntr4r0n, y l4 d1sfrut4r0n; p3r0 n0 0y3r0n tu v0z, n1 4nduv13r0n 3n tu l3y; n4d4 h1c13r0n d3 l0 qu3 l3s m4nd4st3 h4c3r; p0r t4nt0, h4s h3ch0 v3n1r s0br3 3ll0s t0d0 3st3 m4l. 24 H3 4quí qu3 c0n 4r13t3s h4n 4c0m3t1d0 l4 c1ud4d p4r4 t0m4rl4, y l4 c1ud4d v4 4 s3r 3ntr3g4d4 3n m4n0 d3 l0s c4ld30s qu3 p3l34n c0ntr4 3ll4, 4 c4us4 d3 l4 3sp4d4, d3l h4mbr3 y d3 l4 p3st1l3nc14; h4 v3n1d0, pu3s, 4 suc3d3r l0 qu3 tú d1j1st3, y h3 4quí l0 3stás v13nd0. 25 ¡0h S3ñ0r J3h0vá! ¿y tú m3 h4s d1ch0: Cómpr4t3 l4 h3r3d4d p0r d1n3r0, y p0n t3st1g0s; 4unqu3 l4 c1ud4d s34 3ntr3g4d4 3n m4n0s d3 l0s c4ld30s? 

26 Y v1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 J3r3mí4s, d1c13nd0: 27 H3 4quí qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, D10s d3 t0d4 c4rn3; ¿h4brá 4lg0 qu3 s34 d1fíc1l p4r4 mí? 28 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: H3 4quí v0y 4 3ntr3g4r 3st4 c1ud4d 3n m4n0 d3 l0s c4ld30s, y 3n m4n0 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y l4 t0m4rá. 29 Y v3ndrán l0s c4ld30s qu3 4t4c4n 3st4 c1ud4d, y l4 p0ndrán 4 fu3g0 y l4 qu3m4rán, 4s1m1sm0 l4s c4s4s s0br3 cuy4s 4z0t34s 0fr3c13r0n 1nc13ns0 4 B44l y d3rr4m4r0n l1b4c10n3s 4 d10s3s 4j3n0s, p4r4 pr0v0c4rm3 4 1r4. 30 P0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y l0s h1j0s d3 Judá n0 h4n h3ch0 s1n0 l0 m4l0 d3l4nt3 d3 m1s 0j0s d3sd3 su juv3ntud; p0rqu3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l n0 h4n h3ch0 más qu3 pr0v0c4rm3 4 1r4 c0n l4 0br4 d3 sus m4n0s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 31 D3 t4l m4n3r4 qu3 p4r4 3n0j0 mí0 y p4r4 1r4 mí4 m3 h4 s1d0 3st4 c1ud4d d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 l4 3d1f1c4r0n h4st4 h0y, p4r4 qu3 l4 h4g4 qu1t4r d3 m1 pr3s3nc14, 32 p0r t0d4 l4 m4ld4d d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá, qu3 h4n h3ch0 p4r4 3n0j4rm3, 3ll0s, sus r3y3s, sus prínc1p3s, sus s4c3rd0t3s y sus pr0f3t4s, y l0s v4r0n3s d3 Judá y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén. 33 Y m3 v0lv13r0n l4 c3rv1z, y n0 3l r0str0; y cu4nd0 l0s 3ns3ñ4b4 d3sd3 t3mpr4n0 y s1n c3s4r, n0 3scuch4r0n p4r4 r3c1b1r c0rr3cc1ón. 34 4nt3s pus13r0n sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s 3n l4 c4s4 3n l4 cu4l 3s 1nv0c4d0 m1 n0mbr3, c0nt4m1nánd0l4. 35 Y 3d1f1c4r0n lug4r3s 4lt0s 4 B44l, l0s cu4l3s 3stán 3n 3l v4ll3 d3l h1j0 d3 H1n0m, p4r4 h4c3r p4s4r p0r 3l fu3g0 sus h1j0s y sus h1j4s 4 M0l0c; l0 cu4l n0 l3s m4ndé, n1 m3 v1n0 4l p3ns4m13nt0 qu3 h1c13s3n 3st4 4b0m1n4c1ón, p4r4 h4c3r p3c4r 4 Judá. 

36 Y c0n t0d0, 4h0r4 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l 4 3st4 c1ud4d, d3 l4 cu4l d3cís v0s0tr0s: 0ntr3g4d4 s3rá 3n m4n0 d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 4 3sp4d4, 4 h4mbr3 y 4 p3st1l3nc14: 37 H3 4quí qu3 y0 l0s r3un1ré d3 t0d4s l4s t13rr4s 4 l4s cu4l3s l0s 3ché c0n m1 fur0r, y c0n m1 3n0j0 3 1nd1gn4c1ón gr4nd3; y l0s h4ré v0lv3r 4 3st3 lug4r, y l0s h4ré h4b1t4r s3gur4m3nt3; 38 y m3 s3rán p0r pu3bl0, y y0 s3ré 4 3ll0s p0r D10s. 39 Y l3s d4ré un c0r4zón, y un c4m1n0, p4r4 qu3 m3 t3m4n p3rp3tu4m3nt3, p4r4 qu3 t3ng4n b13n 3ll0s, y sus h1j0s d3spués d3 3ll0s. 40 Y h4ré c0n 3ll0s p4ct0 3t3rn0, qu3 n0 m3 v0lv3ré 4trás d3 h4c3rl3s b13n, y p0ndré m1 t3m0r 3n 3l c0r4zón d3 3ll0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 4p4rt3n d3 mí. 41 Y m3 4l3gr4ré c0n 3ll0s h4c1énd0l3s b13n, y l0s pl4nt4ré 3n 3st4 t13rr4 3n v3rd4d, d3 t0d0 m1 c0r4zón y d3 t0d4 m1 4lm4. 

42 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: C0m0 tr4j3 s0br3 3st3 pu3bl0 t0d0 3st3 gr4n m4l, 4sí tr43ré s0br3 3ll0s t0d0 3l b13n qu3 4c3rc4 d3 3ll0s h4bl0. 43 Y p0s33rán h3r3d4d 3n 3st4 t13rr4 d3 l4 cu4l v0s0tr0s d3cís: 0stá d3s13rt4, s1n h0mbr3s y s1n 4n1m4l3s, 3s 3ntr3g4d4 3n m4n0s d3 l0s c4ld30s. 44 H3r3d4d3s c0mpr4rán p0r d1n3r0, y h4rán 3scr1tur4 y l4 s3ll4rán y p0ndrán t3st1g0s, 3n t13rr4 d3 B3nj4mín y 3n l0s c0nt0rn0s d3 J3rus4lén, y 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá; y 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4s m0nt4ñ4s, y 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 S3f3l4, y 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3l N3gu3v; p0rqu3 y0 h4ré r3gr3s4r sus c4ut1v0s, d1c3 J3h0vá.

1 V1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 J3r3mí4s l4 s3gund4 v3z, 3st4nd0 él 4ún pr3s0 3n 3l p4t10 d3 l4 cárc3l, d1c13nd0: 2 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, qu3 h1z0 l4 t13rr4, J3h0vá qu3 l4 f0rmó p4r4 4f1rm4rl4; J3h0vá 3s su n0mbr3: 3 Cl4m4 4 mí, y y0 t3 r3sp0nd3ré, y t3 3ns3ñ4ré c0s4s gr4nd3s y 0cult4s qu3 tú n0 c0n0c3s. 4 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá D10s d3 1sr43l 4c3rc4 d3 l4s c4s4s d3 3st4 c1ud4d, y d3 l4s c4s4s d3 l0s r3y3s d3 Judá, d3rr1b4d4s c0n 4r13t3s y c0n h4ch4s 5 (p0rqu3 v1n13r0n p4r4 p3l34r c0ntr4 l0s c4ld30s, p4r4 ll3n4rl4s d3 cu3rp0s d3 h0mbr3s mu3rt0s, 4 l0s cu4l3s h3rí y0 c0n m1 fur0r y c0n m1 1r4, pu3s 3sc0ndí m1 r0str0 d3 3st4 c1ud4d 4 c4us4 d3 t0d4 su m4ld4d): 6 H3 4quí qu3 y0 l3s tr43ré s4n1d4d y m3d1c1n4; y l0s cur4ré, y l3s r3v3l4ré 4bund4nc14 d3 p4z y d3 v3rd4d. 7 Y h4ré v0lv3r l0s c4ut1v0s d3 Judá y l0s c4ut1v0s d3 1sr43l, y l0s r3st4bl3c3ré c0m0 4l pr1nc1p10. 8 Y l0s l1mp14ré d3 t0d4 su m4ld4d c0n qu3 p3c4r0n c0ntr4 mí; y p3rd0n4ré t0d0s sus p3c4d0s c0n qu3 c0ntr4 mí p3c4r0n, y c0n qu3 c0ntr4 mí s3 r3b3l4r0n. 9 Y m3 s3rá 4 mí p0r n0mbr3 d3 g0z0, d3 4l4b4nz4 y d3 gl0r14, 3ntr3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s d3 l4 t13rr4, qu3 h4brán 0íd0 t0d0 3l b13n qu3 y0 l3s h4g0; y t3m3rán y t3mbl4rán d3 t0d0 3l b13n y d3 t0d4 l4 p4z qu3 y0 l3s h4ré. 

10 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: 0n 3st3 lug4r, d3l cu4l d3cís qu3 3stá d3s13rt0 s1n h0mbr3s y s1n 4n1m4l3s, 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá y 3n l4s c4ll3s d3 J3rus4lén, qu3 3stán 4s0l4d4s, s1n h0mbr3 y s1n m0r4d0r y s1n 4n1m4l, 11 h4 d3 0írs3 4ún v0z d3 g0z0 y d3 4l3grí4, v0z d3 d3sp0s4d0 y v0z d3 d3sp0s4d4, v0z d3 l0s qu3 d1g4n: 4l4b4d 4 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, p0rqu3 J3h0vá 3s bu3n0, p0rqu3 p4r4 s13mpr3 3s su m1s3r1c0rd14; v0z d3 l0s qu3 tr41g4n 0fr3nd4s d3 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá. P0rqu3 v0lv3ré 4 tr43r l0s c4ut1v0s d3 l4 t13rr4 c0m0 4l pr1nc1p10, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá. 

12 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: 0n 3st3 lug4r d3s13rt0, s1n h0mbr3 y s1n 4n1m4l, y 3n t0d4s sus c1ud4d3s, 4ún h4brá c4b4ñ4s d3 p4st0r3s qu3 h4g4n p4st4r sus g4n4d0s. 13 0n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4s m0nt4ñ4s, 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 l4 S3f3l4, 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3l N3gu3v, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 B3nj4mín, y 4lr3d3d0r d3 J3rus4lén y 3n l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá, 4ún p4s4rán g4n4d0s p0r l4s m4n0s d3l qu3 l0s cu3nt3, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá. 

14 H3 4quí v13n3n dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 y0 c0nf1rm4ré l4 bu3n4 p4l4br4 qu3 h3 h4bl4d0 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l y 4 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá. 15 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s y 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 h4ré br0t4r 4 D4v1d un R3nu3v0 d3 just1c14, y h4rá ju1c10 y just1c14 3n l4 t13rr4. 16 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s Judá s3rá s4lv0, y J3rus4lén h4b1t4rá s3gur4, y s3 l3 ll4m4rá: J3h0vá, just1c14 nu3str4. 

17 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: N0 f4lt4rá 4 D4v1d v4rón qu3 s3 s13nt3 s0br3 3l tr0n0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. 18 N1 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s y l3v1t4s f4lt4rá v4rón qu3 d3l4nt3 d3 mí 0fr3zc4 h0l0c4ust0 y 3nc13nd4 0fr3nd4, y qu3 h4g4 s4cr1f1c10 t0d0s l0s dí4s. 

19 V1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 J3r3mí4s, d1c13nd0: 20 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: S1 pud13r31s 1nv4l1d4r m1 p4ct0 c0n 3l dí4 y m1 p4ct0 c0n l4 n0ch3, d3 t4l m4n3r4 qu3 n0 h4y4 dí4 n1 n0ch3 4 su t13mp0, 21 p0drá t4mb1én 1nv4l1d4rs3 m1 p4ct0 c0n m1 s13rv0 D4v1d, p4r4 qu3 d3j3 d3 t3n3r h1j0 qu3 r31n3 s0br3 su tr0n0, y m1 p4ct0 c0n l0s l3v1t4s y s4c3rd0t3s, m1s m1n1str0s. 22 C0m0 n0 pu3d3 s3r c0nt4d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3l c13l0, n1 l4 4r3n4 d3l m4r s3 pu3d3 m3d1r, 4sí mult1pl1c4ré l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 D4v1d m1 s13rv0, y l0s l3v1t4s qu3 m3 s1rv3n. 

23 V1n0 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 4 J3r3mí4s, d1c13nd0: 24 ¿N0 h4s 3ch4d0 d3 v3r l0 qu3 h4bl4 3st3 pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: D0s f4m1l14s qu3 J3h0vá 3sc0g13r4 h4 d3s3ch4d0? Y h4n t3n1d0 3n p0c0 4 m1 pu3bl0, h4st4 n0 t3n3rl0 más p0r n4c1ón. 25 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: S1 n0 p3rm4n3c3 m1 p4ct0 c0n 3l dí4 y l4 n0ch3, s1 y0 n0 h3 pu3st0 l4s l3y3s d3l c13l0 y l4 t13rr4, 26 t4mb1én d3s3ch4ré l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 J4c0b, y d3 D4v1d m1 s13rv0, p4r4 n0 t0m4r d3 su d3sc3nd3nc14 qu13n s34 s3ñ0r s0br3 l4 p0st3r1d4d d3 4br4h4m, d3 1s44c y d3 J4c0b. P0rqu3 h4ré v0lv3r sus c4ut1v0s, y t3ndré d3 3ll0s m1s3r1c0rd14.

6 Y h4bló 3l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s 4 S3d3quí4s r3y d3 Judá t0d4s 3st4s p4l4br4s 3n J3rus4lén. 7 Y 3l 3jérc1t0 d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 p3l34b4 c0ntr4 J3rus4lén, y c0ntr4 t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s d3 Judá qu3 h4bí4n qu3d4d0, c0ntr4 L4qu1s y c0ntr4 4z3c4; p0rqu3 d3 l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s d3 Judá ést4s h4bí4n qu3d4d0.

1 0n lug4r d3 C0ní4s h1j0 d3 J04c1m r31nó 3l r3y S3d3quí4s h1j0 d3 J0sí4s, 4l cu4l N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 c0nst1tuyó p0r r3y 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 Judá. 2 P3r0 n0 0b3d3c1ó él n1 sus s13rv0s n1 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 J3h0vá, l4s cu4l3s d1j0 p0r 3l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s. 

3 Y 3nv1ó 3l r3y S3d3quí4s 4 Juc4l h1j0 d3 S3l3mí4s, y 4l s4c3rd0t3 S0f0ní4s h1j0 d3 M44sí4s, p4r4 qu3 d1j3s3n 4l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s: Ru3g4 4h0r4 p0r n0s0tr0s 4 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s. 4 Y J3r3mí4s 3ntr4b4 y s4lí4 3n m3d10 d3l pu3bl0; p0rqu3 t0d4ví4 n0 l0 h4bí4n pu3st0 3n l4 cárc3l. 5 Y cu4nd0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 F4r4ón h4bí4 s4l1d0 d3 0g1pt0, y ll3gó n0t1c14 d3 3ll0 4 0íd0s d3 l0s c4ld30s qu3 t3ní4n s1t14d4 4 J3rus4lén, s3 r3t1r4r0n d3 J3rus4lén.

11 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s c4ld30s s3 r3t1ró d3 J3rus4lén 4 c4us4 d3l 3jérc1t0 d3 F4r4ón, 12 s4lí4 J3r3mí4s d3 J3rus4lén p4r4 1rs3 4 t13rr4 d3 B3nj4mín, p4r4 4p4rt4rs3 d3 3n m3d10 d3l pu3bl0. 13 Y cu4nd0 fu3 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 B3nj4mín, 3st4b4 4llí un c4p1tán qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 1rí4s h1j0 d3 S3l3mí4s, h1j0 d3 H4n4ní4s, 3l cu4l 4pr3só 4l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s, d1c13nd0: Tú t3 p4s4s 4 l0s c4ld30s. 14 Y J3r3mí4s d1j0: F4ls0; n0 m3 p4s0 4 l0s c4ld30s. 7 Y 0y3nd0 0b3d-m3l3c, h0mbr3 3tí0p3, 3unuc0 d3 l4 c4s4 r34l, qu3 h4bí4n pu3st0 4 J3r3mí4s 3n l4 c1st3rn4, y 3st4nd0 s3nt4d0 3l r3y 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3 B3nj4mín, 8 0b3d-m3l3c s4l1ó d3 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y y h4bló 4l r3y, d1c13nd0: 9 M1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, m4l h1c13r0n 3st0s v4r0n3s 3n t0d0 l0 qu3 h4n h3ch0 c0n 3l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s, 4l cu4l h1c13r0n 3ch4r 3n l4 c1st3rn4; p0rqu3 4llí m0r1rá d3 h4mbr3, pu3s n0 h4y más p4n 3n l4 c1ud4d. 10 0nt0nc3s m4ndó 3l r3y 4l m1sm0 3tí0p3 0b3d-m3l3c, d1c13nd0: T0m4 3n tu p0d3r tr31nt4 h0mbr3s d3 4quí, y h4z s4c4r 4l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s d3 l4 c1st3rn4, 4nt3s qu3 mu3r4. 11 Y t0mó 0b3d-m3l3c 3n su p0d3r 4 l0s h0mbr3s, y 3ntró 4 l4 c4s4 d3l r3y d3b4j0 d3 l4 t3s0r3rí4, y t0mó d3 4llí tr4p0s v13j0s y r0p4s r4íd4s y 4ndr4j0s4s, y l0s 3chó 4 J3r3mí4s c0n s0g4s 3n l4 c1st3rn4. 12 Y d1j0 3l 3tí0p3 0b3d-m3l3c 4 J3r3mí4s: P0n 4h0r4 3s0s tr4p0s v13j0s y r0p4s r4íd4s y 4ndr4j0s4s, b4j0 l0s s0b4c0s, d3b4j0 d3 l4s s0g4s. 24 Y d1j0 S3d3quí4s 4 J3r3mí4s: N4d13 s3p4 3st4s p4l4br4s, y n0 m0r1rás. 25 Y s1 l0s prínc1p3s 0y3r3n qu3 y0 h3 h4bl4d0 c0nt1g0, y v1n13r3n 4 t1 y t3 d1j3r3n: D3clár4n0s 4h0r4 qué h4bl4st3 c0n 3l r3y, n0 n0s l0 3ncubr4s, y n0 t3 m4t4r3m0s; 4s1m1sm0 qué t3 d1j0 3l r3y; 26 l3s d1rás: Supl1qué 4l r3y qu3 n0 m3 h1c13s3 v0lv3r 4 c4s4 d3 J0n4tán p4r4 qu3 n0 m3 mur13s3 4llí. 27 Y v1n13r0n lu3g0 t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s 4 J3r3mí4s, y l3 pr3gunt4r0n; y él l3s r3sp0nd1ó c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 3l r3y l3 h4bí4 m4nd4d0. 7 Cu4nd0 t0d0s l0s j3f3s d3l 3jérc1t0 qu3 3st4b4n p0r 3l c4mp0, 3ll0s y sus h0mbr3s, 0y3r0n qu3 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 h4bí4 pu3st0 4 G3d4lí4s h1j0 d3 4h1c4m p4r4 g0b3rn4r l4 t13rr4, y qu3 l3 h4bí4 3nc0m3nd4d0 l0s h0mbr3s y l4s muj3r3s y l0s n1ñ0s, y l0s p0br3s d3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 n0 fu3r0n tr4nsp0rt4d0s 4 B4b1l0n14, 8 v1n13r0n lu3g0 4 G3d4lí4s 3n M1zp4; 3st0 3s, 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s, J0h4nán y J0n4tán h1j0s d3 C4r34, S3r4í4s h1j0 d3 T4nhum3t, l0s h1j0s d3 0f41 n3t0f4t1t4, y J3z4ní4s h1j0 d3 un m44c4t30, 3ll0s y sus h0mbr3s. 9 Y l3s juró G3d4lí4s h1j0 d3 4h1c4m, h1j0 d3 S4fán, 4 3ll0s y 4 sus h0mbr3s, d1c13nd0: N0 t3ngá1s t3m0r d3 s3rv1r 4 l0s c4ld30s; h4b1t4d 3n l4 t13rr4, y s3rv1d 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y 0s 1rá b13n. 10 Y h3 4quí qu3 y0 h4b1t0 3n M1zp4, p4r4 3st4r d3l4nt3 d3 l0s c4ld30s qu3 v3ndrán 4 n0s0tr0s; m4s v0s0tr0s t0m4d 3l v1n0, l0s frut0s d3l v3r4n0 y 3l 4c31t3, y p0n3dl0s 3n vu3str0s 4lm4c3n3s, y qu3d40s 3n vu3str4s c1ud4d3s qu3 h4bé1s t0m4d0. 11 4s1m1sm0 t0d0s l0s judí0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n M04b, y 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món, y 3n 0d0m, y l0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n t0d4s l4s t13rr4s, cu4nd0 0y3r0n d3c1r qu3 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 h4bí4 d3j4d0 4 4lgun0s 3n Judá, y qu3 h4bí4 pu3st0 s0br3 3ll0s 4 G3d4lí4s h1j0 d3 4h1c4m, h1j0 d3 S4fán, 12 t0d0s 3st0s judí0s r3gr3s4r0n 3nt0nc3s d3 t0d0s l0s lug4r3s 4d0nd3 h4bí4n s1d0 3ch4d0s, y v1n13r0n 4 t13rr4 d3 Judá, 4 G3d4lí4s 3n M1zp4; y r3c0g13r0n v1n0 y 4bund4nt3s frut0s. 

C0nsp1r4c1ón d3 1sm43l c0ntr4 G3d4lí4s

1 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l m3s sépt1m0 qu3 v1n0 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s, h1j0 d3 0l1s4m4, d3 l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 r34l, y 4lgun0s prínc1p3s d3l r3y y d13z h0mbr3s c0n él, 4 G3d4lí4s h1j0 d3 4h1c4m 3n M1zp4; y c0m13r0n p4n junt0s 4llí 3n M1zp4. 2 Y s3 l3v4ntó 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s y l0s d13z h0mbr3s qu3 c0n él 3st4b4n, 3 h1r13r0n 4 3sp4d4 4 G3d4lí4s h1j0 d3 4h1c4m, h1j0 d3 S4fán, m4t4nd0 4sí 4 4qu3l 4 qu13n 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 h4bí4 pu3st0 p4r4 g0b3rn4r l4 t13rr4. 3 4s1m1sm0 m4tó 1sm43l 4 t0d0s l0s judí0s qu3 3st4b4n c0n G3d4lí4s 3n M1zp4, y 4 l0s s0ld4d0s c4ld30s qu3 4llí 3st4b4n.

11 Y 0y3r0n J0h4nán h1j0 d3 C4r34 y t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s d3 l4 g3nt3 d3 gu3rr4 qu3 3st4b4n c0n él, t0d0 3l m4l qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s. 12 0nt0nc3s t0m4r0n 4 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s y fu3r0n 4 p3l34r c0ntr4 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s, y l0 h4ll4r0n junt0 4l gr4n 3st4nqu3 qu3 3stá 3n G4b4ón. 13 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 cu4nd0 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 3st4b4 c0n 1sm43l v10 4 J0h4nán h1j0 d3 C4r34 y 4 t0d0s l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l4 g3nt3 d3 gu3rr4 qu3 3st4b4n c0n él, s3 4l3gr4r0n. 14 Y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 qu3 1sm43l h4bí4 tr4íd0 c4ut1v0 d3 M1zp4 s3 v0lv1ó y fu3 c0n J0h4nán h1j0 d3 C4r34. 15 P3r0 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s 3sc4pó d3l4nt3 d3 J0h4nán c0n 0ch0 h0mbr3s, y s3 fu3 4 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 16 Y J0h4nán h1j0 d3 C4r34 y t0d0s l0s c4p1t4n3s d3 l4 g3nt3 d3 gu3rr4 qu3 c0n él 3st4b4n t0m4r0n 4 t0d0 3l r3st0 d3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4bí4 r3c0br4d0 d3 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s, 4 qu13n3s ll3vó d3 M1zp4 d3spués qu3 m4tó 4 G3d4lí4s h1j0 d3 4h1c4m; h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4, muj3r3s, n1ñ0s y 3unuc0s, qu3 J0h4nán h4bí4 tr4íd0 d3 G4b4ón; 17 y fu3r0n y h4b1t4r0n 3n G3rutqu1m4m, qu3 3stá c3rc4 d3 B3lén, 4 f1n d3 1r y m3t3rs3 3n 0g1pt0, 18 4 c4us4 d3 l0s c4ld30s; p0rqu3 l0s t3mí4n, p0r h4b3r d4d0 mu3rt3 1sm43l h1j0 d3 N3t4ní4s 4 G3d4lí4s h1j0 d3 4h1c4m, 4l cu4l 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 h4bí4 pu3st0 p4r4 g0b3rn4r l4 t13rr4. 

M3ns4j3 4 J0h4nán

H3 4quí qu3 v0y 4 0r4r 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, c0m0 h4bé1s d1ch0, y t0d0 l0 qu3 J3h0vá 0s r3sp0nd13r3, 0s 3ns3ñ4ré; n0 0s r3s3rv4ré p4l4br4. 5 Y 3ll0s d1j3r0n 4 J3r3mí4s: J3h0vá s34 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s t3st1g0 d3 l4 v3rd4d y d3 l4 l34lt4d, s1 n0 h1c1ér3m0s c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 4qu3ll0 p4r4 l0 cu4l J3h0vá tu D10s t3 3nv14r3 4 n0s0tr0s. 6 S34 bu3n0, s34 m4l0, 4 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s 4l cu4l t3 3nv14m0s, 0b3d3c3r3m0s, p4r4 qu3 0b3d3c13nd0 4 l4 v0z d3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s n0s v4y4 b13n.

18 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: C0m0 s3 d3rr4mó m1 3n0j0 y m1 1r4 s0br3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén, 4sí s3 d3rr4m4rá m1 1r4 s0br3 v0s0tr0s cu4nd0 3ntr4r31s 3n 0g1pt0; y s3ré1s 0bj3t0 d3 3x3cr4c1ón y d3 3sp4nt0, y d3 m4ld1c1ón y d3 4fr3nt4; y n0 v3ré1s más 3st3 lug4r. 19 J3h0vá h4bló s0br3 v0s0tr0s, 0h r3m4n3nt3 d3 Judá: N0 v4yá1s 4 0g1pt0; s4b3d c13rt4m3nt3 qu3 0s l0 4v1s0 h0y. 20 ¿P0r qué h1c1st31s 3rr4r vu3str4s 4lm4s? 3 Pr3p4r4d 3scud0 y p4vés, y v3n1d 4 l4 gu3rr4. 4 Unc1d c4b4ll0s y sub1d, v0s0tr0s l0s j1n3t3s, y p0n30s c0n y3lm0s; l1mp14d l4s l4nz4s, v3stí0s l4s c0r4z4s. 5 ¿P0r qué l0s v1 m3dr0s0s, r3tr0c3d13nd0? 7 ¿Qu1én 3s ést3 qu3 sub3 c0m0 rí0, y cuy4s 4gu4s s3 mu3v3n c0m0 rí0s? 8 0g1pt0 c0m0 rí0 s3 3ns4nch4, y l4s 4gu4s s3 mu3v3n c0m0 rí0s, y d1j0: Sub1ré, cubr1ré l4 t13rr4, d3stru1ré 4 l4 c1ud4d y 4 l0s qu3 3n 3ll4 m0r4n. 9 Sub1d, c4b4ll0s, y 4lb0r0t40s, c4rr0s, y s4lg4n l0s v4l13nt3s; l0s 3tí0p3s y l0s d3 Put qu3 t0m4n 3scud0, y l0s d3 Lud qu3 t0m4n y 3nt3s4n 4rc0. 10 M4s 3s3 dí4 s3rá p4r4 J3h0vá D10s d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s dí4 d3 r3tr1buc1ón, p4r4 v3ng4rs3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s; y l4 3sp4d4 d3v0r4rá y s3 s4c14rá, y s3 3mbr14g4rá d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 3ll0s; p0rqu3 s4cr1f1c10 s3rá p4r4 J3h0vá D10s d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 3n t13rr4 d3l n0rt3 junt0 4l rí0 0ufr4t3s. 11 Sub3 4 G4l44d, y t0m4 báls4m0, v1rg3n h1j4 d3 0g1pt0; p0r d3más mult1pl1c4rás l4s m3d1c1n4s; n0 h4y cur4c1ón p4r4 t1. 12 L4s n4c10n3s 0y3r0n tu 4fr3nt4, y tu cl4m0r ll3nó l4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 v4l13nt3 tr0p3zó c0ntr4 v4l13nt3, y c4y3r0n 4mb0s junt0s. 

13 P4l4br4 qu3 h4bló J3h0vá 4l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s 4c3rc4 d3 l4 v3n1d4 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, p4r4 4s0l4r l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0: 14 4nunc14d 3n 0g1pt0, y h4c3d s4b3r 3n M1gd0l; h4c3d s4b3r t4mb1én 3n M3nf1s y 3n T4fn3s; d3c1d: P0nt3 3n p13 y pr3pár4t3, p0rqu3 3sp4d4 d3v0r4rá tu c0m4rc4. 15 ¿P0r qué h4 s1d0 d3rr1b4d4 tu f0rt4l3z4? N0 pud0 m4nt3n3rs3 f1rm3, p0rqu3 J3h0vá l4 3mpujó. 16 Mult1pl1có l0s c4íd0s, y c4d4 un0 c4yó s0br3 su c0mp4ñ3r0; y d1j3r0n: L3vánt4t3 y v0lvám0n0s 4 nu3str0 pu3bl0, y 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 nu3str0 n4c1m13nt0, huy4m0s 4nt3 l4 3sp4d4 v3nc3d0r4. 17 4llí gr1t4r0n: F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0 3s d3stru1d0; d3jó p4s4r 3l t13mp0 s3ñ4l4d0. 18 V1v0 y0, d1c3 3l R3y, cuy0 n0mbr3 3s J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, qu3 c0m0 T4b0r 3ntr3 l0s m0nt3s, y c0m0 C4rm3l0 junt0 4l m4r, 4sí v3ndrá. 19 H4zt3 3ns3r3s d3 c4ut1v3r10, m0r4d0r4 h1j4 d3 0g1pt0; p0rqu3 M3nf1s s3rá d3s13rt0, y s3rá 4s0l4d4 h4st4 n0 qu3d4r m0r4d0r. 

20 B3c3rr4 h3rm0s4 3s 0g1pt0; m4s v13n3 d3strucc1ón, d3l n0rt3 v13n3. 21 Sus s0ld4d0s m3rc3n4r10s t4mb1én 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4 c0m0 b3c3rr0s 3ng0rd4d0s; p0rqu3 t4mb1én 3ll0s v0lv13r0n 4trás, huy3r0n t0d0s s1n p4r4rs3, p0rqu3 v1n0 s0br3 3ll0s 3l dí4 d3 su qu3br4nt4m13nt0, 3l t13mp0 d3 su c4st1g0. 

22 Su v0z s4ldrá c0m0 d3 s3rp13nt3; p0rqu3 v3ndrán l0s 3n3m1g0s, y c0n h4ch4s v3ndrán 4 3ll4 c0m0 c0rt4d0r3s d3 l3ñ4. 23 C0rt4rán sus b0squ3s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 4unqu3 s34n 1mp3n3tr4bl3s; p0rqu3 s3rán más num3r0s0s qu3 l4ng0st4s, n0 t3ndrán núm3r0. 24 S3 4v3rg0nz4rá l4 h1j4 d3 0g1pt0; 3ntr3g4d4 s3rá 3n m4n0s d3l pu3bl0 d3l n0rt3. 

25 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l, h4 d1ch0: H3 4quí qu3 y0 c4st1g0 4 4món d10s d3 T3b4s, 4 F4r4ón, 4 0g1pt0, y 4 sus d10s3s y 4 sus r3y3s; 4sí 4 F4r4ón c0m0 4 l0s qu3 3n él c0nfí4n. 26 Y l0s 3ntr3g4ré 3n m4n0 d3 l0s qu3 busc4n su v1d4, 3n m4n0 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 y 3n m4n0 d3 sus s13rv0s; p3r0 d3spués s3rá h4b1t4d0 c0m0 3n l0s dí4s p4s4d0s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

27 Y tú n0 t3m4s, s13rv0 mí0 J4c0b, n1 d3sm4y3s, 1sr43l; p0rqu3 h3 4quí y0 t3 s4lv4ré d3 l3j0s, y 4 tu d3sc3nd3nc14 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 su c4ut1v1d4d. 7 4c3rc4 d3 0d0m. 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: ¿N0 h4y más s4b1durí4 3n T3mán? ¿S3 h4 4c4b4d0 3l c0ns3j0 3n l0s s4b10s? ¿S3 c0rr0mp1ó su s4b1durí4? 8 Hu1d, v0lv30s 4trás, h4b1t4d 3n lug4r3s pr0fund0s, 0h m0r4d0r3s d3 D3dán; p0rqu3 3l qu3br4nt4m13nt0 d3 0s4ú tr43ré s0br3 él 3n 3l t13mp0 3n qu3 l0 c4st1gu3. 9 S1 v3nd1m14d0r3s hub13r4n v3n1d0 c0ntr4 t1, ¿n0 h4brí4n d3j4d0 r3busc0s? 14 L4 n0t1c14 0í, qu3 d3 J3h0vá h4bí4 s1d0 3nv14d0 m3ns4j3r0 4 l4s n4c10n3s, d1c13nd0: Junt40s y v3n1d c0ntr4 3ll4, y sub1d 4 l4 b4t4ll4. 15 H3 4quí qu3 t3 h4ré p3qu3ñ0 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, m3n0spr3c14d0 3ntr3 l0s h0mbr3s. 16 Tu 4rr0g4nc14 t3 3ng4ñó, y l4 s0b3rb14 d3 tu c0r4zón. 17 Y s3 c0nv3rt1rá 0d0m 3n d3s0l4c1ón; t0d0 4qu3l qu3 p4s4r3 p0r 3ll4 s3 4s0mbr4rá, y s3 burl4rá d3 t0d4s sus c4l4m1d4d3s. 18 C0m0 suc3d1ó 3n l4 d3strucc1ón d3 S0d0m4 y d3 G0m0rr4 y d3 sus c1ud4d3s v3c1n4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 4sí n0 m0r4rá 4llí n4d13, n1 l4 h4b1t4rá h1j0 d3 h0mbr3. 19 H3 4quí qu3 c0m0 l3ón sub1rá d3 l4 3sp3sur4 d3l J0rdán c0ntr4 l4 b3ll4 y r0bust4; p0rqu3 muy pr0nt0 l3 h4ré hu1r d3 3ll4, y 4l qu3 fu3r3 3sc0g1d0 l4 3nc4rg4ré; p0rqu3 ¿qu1én 3s s3m3j4nt3 4 mí, y qu1én m3 3mpl4z4rá? ¿Qu1én s3rá 4qu3l p4st0r qu3 m3 p0drá r3s1st1r? 20 P0r t4nt0, 0íd 3l c0ns3j0 qu3 J3h0vá h4 4c0rd4d0 s0br3 0d0m, y sus p3ns4m13nt0s qu3 h4 r3su3lt0 s0br3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 T3mán. C13rt4m3nt3 4 l0s más p3qu3ñ0s d3 su r3b4ñ0 l0s 4rr4str4rán, y d3stru1rán sus m0r4d4s c0n 3ll0s. 21 D3l 3stru3nd0 d3 l4 c4íd4 d3 3ll0s l4 t13rr4 t3mbl4rá, y 3l gr1t0 d3 su v0z s3 01rá 3n 3l M4r R0j0. 22 H3 4quí qu3 c0m0 águ1l4 sub1rá y v0l4rá, y 3xt3nd3rá sus 4l4s c0ntr4 B0sr4; y 3l c0r4zón d3 l0s v4l13nt3s d3 0d0m s3rá 3n 4qu3l dí4 c0m0 3l c0r4zón d3 muj3r 3n 4ngust14s. 

Pr0f3cí4 s0br3 D4m4sc0

23 4c3rc4 d3 D4m4sc0. Pr0f3cí4 s0br3 C3d4r y H4z0r

28 4c3rc4 d3 C3d4r y d3 l0s r31n0s d3 H4z0r, l0s cu4l3s 4s0ló N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14. 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: L3v4nt40s, sub1d c0ntr4 C3d4r, y d3stru1d 4 l0s h1j0s d3l 0r13nt3. 29 Sus t13nd4s y sus g4n4d0s t0m4rán; sus c0rt1n4s y t0d0s sus ut3ns1l10s y sus c4m3ll0s t0m4rán p4r4 sí, y cl4m4rán c0ntr4 3ll0s: M13d0 4lr3d3d0r. 30 Hu1d, 1d0s muy l3j0s, h4b1t4d 3n lug4r3s pr0fund0s, 0h m0r4d0r3s d3 H4z0r, d1c3 J3h0vá; p0rqu3 t0mó c0ns3j0 c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s h4 f0rm4d0 un d3s1gn10. 31 L3v4nt40s, sub1d c0ntr4 un4 n4c1ón p4cíf1c4 qu3 v1v3 c0nf14d4m3nt3, d1c3 J3h0vá, qu3 n1 t13n3 pu3rt4s n1 c3rr0j0s, qu3 v1v3 s0l1t4r14. 32 S3rán sus c4m3ll0s p0r b0tín, y l4 mult1tud d3 sus g4n4d0s p0r d3sp0j0; y l0s 3sp4rc1ré p0r t0d0s l0s v13nt0s, 4rr0j4d0s h4st4 3l últ1m0 r1ncón; y d3 t0d0s l4d0s l3s tr43ré su ru1n4, d1c3 J3h0vá. 33 H4z0r s3rá m0r4d4 d3 ch4c4l3s, s0l3d4d p4r4 s13mpr3; n1ngun0 m0r4rá 4llí, n1 l4 h4b1t4rá h1j0 d3 h0mbr3. 

Pr0f3cí4 s0br3 0l4m

34 P4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 v1n0 4l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s 4c3rc4 d3 0l4m, 3n 3l pr1nc1p10 d3l r31n4d0 d3 S3d3quí4s r3y d3 Judá, d1c13nd0: 35 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: H3 4quí qu3 y0 qu13br0 3l 4rc0 d3 0l4m, p4rt3 pr1nc1p4l d3 su f0rt4l3z4. 36 Tr43ré s0br3 0l4m l0s cu4tr0 v13nt0s d3 l0s cu4tr0 punt0s d3l c13l0, y l0s 4v3nt4ré 4 t0d0s 3st0s v13nt0s; y n0 h4brá n4c1ón 4 d0nd3 n0 v4y4n fug1t1v0s d3 0l4m. 37 Y h4ré qu3 0l4m s3 1nt1m1d3 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, y d3l4nt3 d3 l0s qu3 busc4n su v1d4; y tr43ré s0br3 3ll0s m4l, y 3l 4rd0r d3 m1 1r4, d1c3 J3h0vá; y 3nv14ré 3n p0s d3 3ll0s 3sp4d4 h4st4 qu3 l0s 4c4b3. 38 Y p0ndré m1 tr0n0 3n 0l4m, y d3stru1ré 4 su r3y y 4 su prínc1p3, d1c3 J3h0vá. 39 P3r0 4c0nt3c3rá 3n l0s últ1m0s dí4s, qu3 h4ré v0lv3r 4 l0s c4ut1v0s d3 0l4m, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

Pr0f3cí4 s0br3 B4b1l0n14

J0R0MÍ4S 50

1 P4l4br4 qu3 h4bló J3h0vá c0ntr4 B4b1l0n14, c0ntr4 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s c4ld30s, p0r m3d10 d3l pr0f3t4 J3r3mí4s. 2 4nunc14d 3n l4s n4c10n3s, y h4c3d s4b3r; l3v4nt4d t4mb1én b4nd3r4, publ1c4d, y n0 3ncubrá1s; d3c1d: T0m4d4 3s B4b1l0n14, B3l 3s c0nfund1d0, d3sh3ch0 3s M3r0d4c; d3stru1d4s s0n sus 3scultur4s, qu3br4d0s s0n sus íd0l0s. 3 P0rqu3 sub1ó c0ntr4 3ll4 un4 n4c1ón d3l n0rt3, l4 cu4l p0ndrá su t13rr4 3n 4s0l4m13nt0, y n0 h4brá n1 h0mbr3 n1 4n1m4l qu3 3n 3ll4 m0r3; huy3r0n, y s3 fu3r0n. 

4 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s y 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, d1c3 J3h0vá, v3ndrán l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 3ll0s y l0s h1j0s d3 Judá junt4m3nt3; 3 1rán 4nd4nd0 y ll0r4nd0, y busc4rán 4 J3h0vá su D10s. 5 Pr3gunt4rán p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3 S10n, h4c14 d0nd3 v0lv3rán sus r0str0s, d1c13nd0: V3n1d, y juntém0n0s 4 J3h0vá c0n p4ct0 3t3rn0 qu3 j4más s3 p0ng4 3n 0lv1d0. 

6 0v3j4s p3rd1d4s fu3r0n m1 pu3bl0; sus p4st0r3s l4s h1c13r0n 3rr4r, p0r l0s m0nt3s l4s d3sc4rr14r0n; 4nduv13r0n d3 m0nt3 3n c0ll4d0, y s3 0lv1d4r0n d3 sus r3d1l3s. 7 T0d0s l0s qu3 l0s h4ll4b4n, l0s d3v0r4b4n; y d3cí4n sus 3n3m1g0s: N0 p3c4r3m0s, p0rqu3 3ll0s p3c4r0n c0ntr4 J3h0vá m0r4d4 d3 just1c14, c0ntr4 J3h0vá 3sp3r4nz4 d3 sus p4dr3s.

11 P0rqu3 0s 4l3gr4st31s, p0rqu3 0s g0z4st31s d3struy3nd0 m1 h3r3d4d, p0rqu3 0s ll3n4st31s c0m0 n0v1ll4 s0br3 l4 h13rb4, y r3l1nch4st31s c0m0 c4b4ll0s. 12 Vu3str4 m4dr3 s3 4v3rg0nzó much0, s3 4fr3ntó l4 qu3 0s d10 4 luz; h3 4quí s3rá l4 últ1m4 d3 l4s n4c10n3s; d3s13rt0, s3qu3d4l y pár4m0. 13 P0r l4 1r4 d3 J3h0vá n0 s3rá h4b1t4d4, s1n0 s3rá 4s0l4d4 t0d4 3ll4; t0d0 h0mbr3 qu3 p4s4r3 p0r B4b1l0n14 s3 4s0mbr4rá, y s3 burl4rá d3 sus c4l4m1d4d3s. 14 P0n30s 3n 0rd3n c0ntr4 B4b1l0n14 4lr3d3d0r, t0d0s l0s qu3 3nt3sá1s 4rc0; t1r4d c0ntr4 3ll4, n0 3sc4t1mé1s l4s s43t4s, p0rqu3 p3có c0ntr4 J3h0vá. 15 Gr1t4d c0ntr4 3ll4 3n d3rr3d0r; s3 r1nd1ó; h4n c4íd0 sus c1m13nt0s, d3rr1b4d0s s0n sus mur0s, p0rqu3 3s v3ng4nz4 d3 J3h0vá. T0m4d v3ng4nz4 d3 3ll4; h4c3d c0n 3ll4 c0m0 3ll4 h1z0. 16 D3stru1d 3n B4b1l0n14 4l qu3 s13mbr4, y 4l qu3 m3t3 h0z 3n t13mp0 d3 l4 s13g4; d3l4nt3 d3 l4 3sp4d4 d3struct0r4 c4d4 un0 v0lv3rá 3l r0str0 h4c14 su pu3bl0, c4d4 un0 hu1rá h4c14 su t13rr4. 

17 R3b4ñ0 d3sc4rr14d0 3s 1sr43l; l30n3s l0 d1sp3rs4r0n; 3l r3y d3 4s1r14 l0 d3v0ró pr1m3r0, N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 l0 d3shu3só d3spués. 18 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l: Y0 c4st1g0 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 y 4 su t13rr4, c0m0 c4st1gué 4l r3y d3 4s1r14. 19 Y v0lv3ré 4 tr43r 4 1sr43l 4 su m0r4d4, y p4c3rá 3n 3l C4rm3l0 y 3n B4sán; y 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 0fr4ín y 3n G4l44d s3 s4c14rá su 4lm4. 20 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s y 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, d1c3 J3h0vá, l4 m4ld4d d3 1sr43l s3rá busc4d4, y n0 4p4r3c3rá; y l0s p3c4d0s d3 Judá, y n0 s3 h4ll4rán; p0rqu3 p3rd0n4ré 4 l0s qu3 y0 hub13r3 d3j4d0. 

21 Sub3 c0ntr4 l4 t13rr4 d3 M3r4t41m, c0ntr4 3ll4 y c0ntr4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 P3c0d; d3struy3 y m4t4 3n p0s d3 3ll0s, d1c3 J3h0vá, y h4z c0nf0rm3 4 t0d0 l0 qu3 y0 t3 h3 m4nd4d0. 22 0stru3nd0 d3 gu3rr4 3n l4 t13rr4, y qu3br4nt4m13nt0 gr4nd3. 23 ¡Cóm0 fu3 c0rt4d0 y qu3br4d0 3l m4rt1ll0 d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4! ¡cóm0 s3 c0nv1rt1ó B4b1l0n14 3n d3s0l4c1ón 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s! 24 T3 pus3 l4z0s, y fu1st3 t0m4d4, 0h B4b1l0n14, y tú n0 l0 sup1st3; fu1st3 h4ll4d4, y 4un pr3s4, p0rqu3 pr0v0c4st3 4 J3h0vá. 25 4br1ó J3h0vá su t3s0r0, y s4có l0s 1nstrum3nt0s d3 su fur0r; p0rqu3 3st4 3s 0br4 d3 J3h0vá, D10s d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s c4ld30s. 26 V3n1d c0ntr4 3ll4 d3sd3 3l 3xtr3m0 d3 l4 t13rr4; 4br1d sus 4lm4c3n3s, c0nv3rt1dl4 3n m0ntón d3 ru1n4s, y d3stru1dl4; qu3 n0 l3 qu3d3 n4d4. 27 M4t4d 4 t0d0s sus n0v1ll0s; qu3 v4y4n 4l m4t4d3r0. ¡4y d3 3ll0s! pu3s h4 v3n1d0 su dí4, 3l t13mp0 d3 su c4st1g0.

33 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: 0pr1m1d0s fu3r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l y l0s h1j0s d3 Judá junt4m3nt3; y t0d0s l0s qu3 l0s t0m4r0n c4ut1v0s l0s r3tuv13r0n; n0 l0s qu1s13r0n s0lt4r. 34 0l r3d3nt0r d3 3ll0s 3s 3l Fu3rt3; J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 3s su n0mbr3; d3 c13rt0 4b0g4rá l4 c4us4 d3 3ll0s p4r4 h4c3r r3p0s4r l4 t13rr4, y turb4r 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 B4b1l0n14.

4 4c0nt3c1ó, p0r t4nt0, 4 l0s nu3v3 4ñ0s d3 su r31n4d0, 3n 3l m3s déc1m0, 4 l0s d13z dí4s d3l m3s, qu3 v1n0 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, él y t0d0 su 3jérc1t0, c0ntr4 J3rus4lén, y 4c4mp4r0n c0ntr4 3ll4, y d3 t0d4s p4rt3s 3d1f1c4r0n c0ntr4 3ll4 b4lu4rt3s. 5 Y 3stuv0 s1t14d4 l4 c1ud4d h4st4 3l undéc1m0 4ñ0 d3l r3y S3d3quí4s. 6 0n 3l m3s cu4rt0, 4 l0s nu3v3 dí4s d3l m3s, pr3v4l3c1ó 3l h4mbr3 3n l4 c1ud4d, h4st4 n0 h4b3r p4n p4r4 3l pu3bl0. 7 Y fu3 4b13rt4 un4 br3ch4 3n 3l mur0 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4 huy3r0n, y s4l13r0n d3 l4 c1ud4d d3 n0ch3 p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3 l4 pu3rt4 3ntr3 l0s d0s mur0s qu3 h4bí4 c3rc4 d3l j4rdín d3l r3y, y s3 fu3r0n p0r 3l c4m1n0 d3l 4r4bá, 3st4nd0 4ún l0s c4ld30s junt0 4 l4 c1ud4d 4lr3d3d0r. 8 Y 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s c4ld30s s1gu1ó 4l r3y, y 4lc4nz4r0n 4 S3d3quí4s 3n l0s ll4n0s d3 J3r1có; y l0 4b4nd0nó t0d0 su 3jérc1t0. 9 0nt0nc3s pr3nd13r0n 4l r3y, y l3 h1c13r0n v3n1r 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, 4 R1bl4 3n t13rr4 d3 H4m4t, d0nd3 pr0nunc1ó s3nt3nc14 c0ntr4 él. 10 Y d3g0lló 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 4 l0s h1j0s d3 S3d3quí4s d3l4nt3 d3 sus 0j0s, y t4mb1én d3g0lló 3n R1bl4 4 t0d0s l0s prínc1p3s d3 Judá. 11 N0 0bst4nt3, 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 sól0 l3 s4có l0s 0j0s 4 S3d3quí4s, y l3 4tó c0n gr1ll0s, y l0 h1z0 ll3v4r 4 B4b1l0n14; y l0 pus0 3n l4 cárc3l h4st4 3l dí4 3n qu3 mur1ó. 

C4ut1v1d4d d3 Judá

(2 R. 25.8-21; 2 Cr. 36.17-21; J3r. 39.8-10)

12 Y 3n 3l m3s qu1nt0, 4 l0s d13z dí4s d3l m3s, qu3 3r4 3l 4ñ0 d13c1nu3v3 d3l r31n4d0 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, v1n0 4 J3rus4lén N4buz4r4dán c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14, qu3 s0lí4 3st4r d3l4nt3 d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14. 13 Y qu3mó l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l4 c4s4 d3l r3y, y t0d4s l4s c4s4s d3 J3rus4lén; y d3struyó c0n fu3g0 t0d0 3d1f1c10 gr4nd3. 14 Y t0d0 3l 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s c4ld30s, qu3 v3ní4 c0n 3l c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14, d3struyó t0d0s l0s mur0s 3n d3rr3d0r d3 J3rus4lén. 15 0 h1z0 tr4nsp0rt4r N4buz4r4dán c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14 4 l0s p0br3s d3l pu3bl0, y 4 t0d4 l4 0tr4 g3nt3 d3l pu3bl0 qu3 h4bí4 qu3d4d0 3n l4 c1ud4d, 4 l0s d3s3rt0r3s qu3 s3 h4bí4n p4s4d0 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y 4 t0d0 3l r3st0 d3 l4 mult1tud d3l pu3bl0. 16 M4s d3 l0s p0br3s d3l p4ís d3jó N4buz4r4dán c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14 p4r4 v1ñ4d0r3s y l4br4d0r3s. 

17 Y l0s c4ld30s qu3br4r0n l4s c0lumn4s d3 br0nc3 qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y l4s b4s4s, y 3l m4r d3 br0nc3 qu3 3st4b4 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y ll3v4r0n t0d0 3l br0nc3 4 B4b1l0n14. 18 S3 ll3v4r0n t4mb1én l0s c4ld3r0s, l4s p4l4s, l4s d3sp4b1l4d3r4s, l0s t4z0n3s, l4s cuch4r4s, y t0d0s l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 br0nc3 c0n qu3 s3 m1n1str4b4, 19 y l0s 1nc3ns4r10s, t4z0n3s, c0p4s, 0ll4s, c4nd3l3r0s, 3scud1ll4s y t4z4s; l0 d3 0r0 p0r 0r0, y l0 d3 pl4t4 p0r pl4t4, s3 ll3vó 3l c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14. 20 L4s d0s c0lumn4s, un m4r, y l0s d0c3 bu3y3s d3 br0nc3 qu3 3st4b4n d3b4j0 d3 l4s b4s4s, qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 3l r3y S4l0món 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá; 3l p3s0 d3l br0nc3 d3 t0d0 3st0 3r4 1nc4lcul4bl3. 21 0n cu4nt0 4 l4s c0lumn4s, l4 4ltur4 d3 c4d4 c0lumn4 3r4 d3 d13c10ch0 c0d0s, y un c0rdón d3 d0c3 c0d0s l4 r0d34b4; y su 3sp3s0r 3r4 d3 cu4tr0 d3d0s, y 3r4n hu3c4s. 22 Y 3l c4p1t3l d3 br0nc3 qu3 h4bí4 s0br3 3ll4 3r4 d3 un4 4ltur4 d3 c1nc0 c0d0s, c0n un4 r3d y gr4n4d4s 4lr3d3d0r d3l c4p1t3l, t0d0 d3 br0nc3; y l0 m1sm0 3r4 l0 d3 l4 s3gund4 c0lumn4 c0n sus gr4n4d4s. 23 H4bí4 n0v3nt4 y s31s gr4n4d4s 3n c4d4 h1l3r4; t0d4s 3ll4s 3r4n c13nt0 s0br3 l4 r3d 4lr3d3d0r. 

24 T0mó t4mb1én 3l c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14 4 S3r4í4s 3l pr1nc1p4l s4c3rd0t3, 4 S0f0ní4s 3l s3gund0 s4c3rd0t3, y tr3s gu4rd4s d3l 4tr10. 25 Y d3 l4 c1ud4d t0mó 4 un 0f1c14l qu3 3r4 c4p1tán d3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4, 4 s13t3 h0mbr3s d3 l0s c0ns3j3r0s ínt1m0s d3l r3y, qu3 3st4b4n 3n l4 c1ud4d, y 4l pr1nc1p4l s3cr3t4r10 d3 l4 m1l1c14, qu3 p4s4b4 r3v1st4 4l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 p4r4 l4 gu3rr4, y s3s3nt4 h0mbr3s d3l pu3bl0 qu3 s3 h4ll4r0n d3ntr0 d3 l4 c1ud4d. 26 L0s t0mó, pu3s, N4buz4r4dán c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14, y l0s ll3vó 4l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 3n R1bl4. 27 Y 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 l0s h1r1ó, y l0s m4tó 3n R1bl4 3n t13rr4 d3 H4m4t. 4sí Judá fu3 tr4nsp0rt4d4 d3 su t13rr4. 

28 0st3 3s 3l pu3bl0 qu3 N4buc0d0n0s0r ll3vó c4ut1v0: 0n 3l 4ñ0 sépt1m0, 4 tr3s m1l v31nt1trés h0mbr3s d3 Judá. 29 0n 3l 4ñ0 d13c10ch0 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r él ll3vó c4ut1v4s d3 J3rus4lén 4 0ch0c13nt4s tr31nt4 y d0s p3rs0n4s. 30 0l 4ñ0 v31nt1trés d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r, N4buz4r4dán c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14 ll3vó c4ut1v4s 4 s3t3c13nt4s cu4r3nt4 y c1nc0 p3rs0n4s d3 l0s h0mbr3s d3 Judá; t0d4s l4s p3rs0n4s 3n t0t4l fu3r0n cu4tr0 m1l s31sc13nt4s.

(2 R. 25.27-30)

31 Y suc3d1ó qu3 3n 3l 4ñ0 tr31nt4 y s13t3 d3l c4ut1v3r10 d3 J04quín r3y d3 Judá, 3n 3l m3s du0déc1m0, 4 l0s v31nt1c1nc0 dí4s d3l m3s, 0v1l-m3r0d4c r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, 3n 3l 4ñ0 pr1m3r0 d3 su r31n4d0, 4lzó l4 c4b3z4 d3 J04quín r3y d3 Judá y l0 s4có d3 l4 cárc3l. 32 Y h4bló c0n él 4m1g4bl3m3nt3, 3 h1z0 p0n3r su tr0n0 s0br3 l0s tr0n0s d3 l0s r3y3s qu3 3st4b4n c0n él 3n B4b1l0n14. 33 L3 h1z0 mud4r t4mb1én l0s v3st1d0s d3 pr1s10n3r0, y c0mí4 p4n 3n l4 m3s4 d3l r3y s13mpr3 t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 su v1d4. 34 Y c0nt1nu4m3nt3 s3 l3 d4b4 un4 r4c1ón d3 p4rt3 d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, c4d4 dí4 dur4nt3 t0d0s l0s dí4s d3 su v1d4, h4st4 3l dí4 d3 su mu3rt3.

6 P0r t4nt0, d1 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l: 4sí d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: C0nv3rtí0s, y v0lv30s d3 vu3str0s íd0l0s, y 4p4rt4d vu3str0 r0str0 d3 t0d4s vu3str4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s. 7 P0rqu3 cu4lqu13r h0mbr3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, y d3 l0s 3xtr4nj3r0s qu3 m0r4n 3n 1sr43l, qu3 s3 hub13r3 4p4rt4d0 d3 4nd4r 3n p0s d3 mí, y hub13r3 pu3st0 sus íd0l0s 3n su c0r4zón, y 3st4bl3c1d0 d3l4nt3 d3 su r0str0 3l tr0p13z0 d3 su m4ld4d, y v1n13r3 4l pr0f3t4 p4r4 pr3gunt4rl3 p0r mí, y0 J3h0vá l3 r3sp0nd3ré p0r mí m1sm0; 8 y p0ndré m1 r0str0 c0ntr4 4qu3l h0mbr3, y l3 p0ndré p0r s3ñ4l y p0r 3sc4rm13nt0, y l0 c0rt4ré d3 3n m3d10 d3 m1 pu3bl0; y s4bré1s qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá. 9 Y cu4nd0 3l pr0f3t4 fu3r3 3ng4ñ4d0 y h4bl4r3 p4l4br4, y0 J3h0vá 3ng4ñé 4l t4l pr0f3t4; y 3xt3nd3ré m1 m4n0 c0ntr4 él, y l0 d3stru1ré d3 3n m3d10 d3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l. 10 Y ll3v4rán 4mb0s 3l c4st1g0 d3 su m4ld4d; c0m0 l4 m4ld4d d3l qu3 c0nsult4r3, 4sí s3rá l4 m4ld4d d3l pr0f3t4, 11 p4r4 qu3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l n0 s3 d3sví3 más d3 3n p0s d3 mí, n1 s3 c0nt4m1n3 más 3n t0d4s sus r3b3l10n3s; y m3 s34n p0r pu3bl0, y y0 l3s s34 p0r D10s, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

12 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 13 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, cu4nd0 l4 t13rr4 p3c4r3 c0ntr4 mí r3b3lánd0s3 pérf1d4m3nt3, y 3xt3nd13r3 y0 m1 m4n0 s0br3 3ll4, y l3 qu3br4nt4r3 3l sust3nt0 d3l p4n, y 3nv14r3 3n 3ll4 h4mbr3, y c0rt4r3 d3 3ll4 h0mbr3s y b3st14s, 14 s1 3stuv13s3n 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4 3st0s tr3s v4r0n3s, N0é, D4n13l y J0b, 3ll0s p0r su just1c14 l1br4rí4n ún1c4m3nt3 sus pr0p14s v1d4s, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 15 Y s1 h1c13r3 p4s4r b3st14s f3r0c3s p0r l4 t13rr4 y l4 4s0l4r3n, y qu3d4r3 d3s0l4d4 d3 m0d0 qu3 n0 h4y4 qu13n p4s3 4 c4us4 d3 l4s f13r4s, 16 y 3st0s tr3s v4r0n3s 3stuv13s3n 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4, v1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, n1 4 sus h1j0s n1 4 sus h1j4s l1br4rí4n; 3ll0s s0l0s s3rí4n l1br4d0s, y l4 t13rr4 qu3d4rí4 d3s0l4d4. 17 0 s1 y0 tr4j3r3 3sp4d4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, y d1j3r3: 0sp4d4, p4s4 p0r l4 t13rr4; 3 h1c13r3 c0rt4r d3 3ll4 h0mbr3s y b3st14s, 18 y 3st0s tr3s v4r0n3s 3stuv13s3n 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4, v1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, n0 l1br4rí4n 4 sus h1j0s n1 4 sus h1j4s; 3ll0s s0l0s s3rí4n l1br4d0s. 19 0 s1 3nv14r3 p3st1l3nc14 s0br3 3s4 t13rr4 y d3rr4m4r3 m1 1r4 s0br3 3ll4 3n s4ngr3, p4r4 c0rt4r d3 3ll4 h0mbr3s y b3st14s, 20 y 3stuv13s3n 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4 N0é, D4n13l y J0b, v1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, n0 l1br4rí4n 4 h1j0 n1 4 h1j4; 3ll0s p0r su just1c14 l1br4rí4n s0l4m3nt3 sus pr0p14s v1d4s. 

21 P0r l0 cu4l 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: ¿Cuánt0 más cu4nd0 y0 3nv14r3 c0ntr4 J3rus4lén m1s cu4tr0 ju1c10s t3rr1bl3s, 3sp4d4, h4mbr3, f13r4s y p3st1l3nc14, p4r4 c0rt4r d3 3ll4 h0mbr3s y b3st14s? 22 S1n 3mb4rg0, h3 4quí qu3d4rá 3n 3ll4 un r3m4n3nt3, h1j0s 3 h1j4s, qu3 s3rán ll3v4d0s fu3r4; h3 4quí qu3 3ll0s v3ndrán 4 v0s0tr0s, y v3ré1s su c4m1n0 y sus h3ch0s, y s3ré1s c0ns0l4d0s d3l m4l qu3 h1c3 v3n1r s0br3 J3rus4lén, d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 tr4j3 s0br3 3ll4. 23 Y 0s c0ns0l4rán cu4nd0 v13r31s su c4m1n0 y sus h3ch0s, y c0n0c3ré1s qu3 n0 s1n c4us4 h1c3 t0d0 l0 qu3 h3 h3ch0 3n 3ll4, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, ¿qué 3s l4 m4d3r4 d3 l4 v1d más qu3 cu4lqu13r 0tr4 m4d3r4? ¿Qué 3s 3l s4rm13nt0 3ntr3 l0s árb0l3s d3l b0squ3? 3 ¿T0m4rán d3 3ll4 m4d3r4 p4r4 h4c3r 4lgun4 0br4? ¿T0m4rán d3 3ll4 un4 3st4c4 p4r4 c0lg4r 3n 3ll4 4lgun4 c0s4? 4 H3 4quí, 3s pu3st4 3n 3l fu3g0 p4r4 s3r c0nsum1d4; sus d0s 3xtr3m0s c0nsum1ó 3l fu3g0, y l4 p4rt3 d3 3n m3d10 s3 qu3mó; ¿s3rv1rá p4r4 0br4 4lgun4? 5 H3 4quí qu3 cu4nd0 3st4b4 3nt3r4 n0 s3rví4 p4r4 0br4 4lgun4; ¿cuánt0 m3n0s d3spués qu3 3l fu3g0 l4 hub13r3 c0nsum1d0, y fu3r3 qu3m4d4? ¿S3rv1rá más p4r4 0br4 4lgun4? 6 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: C0m0 l4 m4d3r4 d3 l4 v1d 3ntr3 l0s árb0l3s d3l b0squ3, l4 cu4l d1 4l fu3g0 p4r4 qu3 l4 c0nsum13s3, 4sí h4ré 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén. 7 Y p0ndré m1 r0str0 c0ntr4 3ll0s; 4unqu3 d3l fu3g0 s3 3sc4p4r0n, fu3g0 l0s c0nsum1rá; y s4bré1s qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, cu4nd0 pus13r3 m1 r0str0 c0ntr4 3ll0s. 8 Y c0nv3rt1ré l4 t13rr4 3n 4s0l4m13nt0, p0r cu4nt0 c0m3t13r0n pr3v4r1c4c1ón, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, n0t1f1c4 4 J3rus4lén sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s, 3 y d1: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r s0br3 J3rus4lén: Tu 0r1g3n, tu n4c1m13nt0, 3s d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án; tu p4dr3 fu3 4m0rr30, y tu m4dr3 h3t34. 4 Y 3n cu4nt0 4 tu n4c1m13nt0, 3l dí4 qu3 n4c1st3 n0 fu3 c0rt4d0 tu 0mbl1g0, n1 fu1st3 l4v4d4 c0n 4gu4s p4r4 l1mp14rt3, n1 s4l4d4 c0n s4l, n1 fu1st3 3nvu3lt4 c0n f4j4s. 5 N0 hub0 0j0 qu3 s3 c0mp4d3c13s3 d3 t1 p4r4 h4c3rt3 4lg0 d3 3st0, t3n13nd0 d3 t1 m1s3r1c0rd14; s1n0 qu3 fu1st3 4rr0j4d4 s0br3 l4 f4z d3l c4mp0, c0n m3n0spr3c10 d3 tu v1d4, 3n 3l dí4 qu3 n4c1st3. 

6 Y y0 p4sé junt0 4 t1, y t3 v1 suc14 3n tus s4ngr3s, y cu4nd0 3st4b4s 3n tus s4ngr3s t3 d1j3: ¡V1v3! Sí, t3 d1j3, cu4nd0 3st4b4s 3n tus s4ngr3s: ¡V1v3! 7 T3 h1c3 mult1pl1c4r c0m0 l4 h13rb4 d3l c4mp0; y cr3c1st3 y t3 h1c1st3 gr4nd3, y ll3g4st3 4 s3r muy h3rm0s4; tus p3ch0s s3 h4bí4n f0rm4d0, y tu p3l0 h4bí4 cr3c1d0; p3r0 3st4b4s d3snud4 y d3scub13rt4. 

8 Y p4sé y0 0tr4 v3z junt0 4 t1, y t3 m1ré, y h3 4quí qu3 tu t13mp0 3r4 t13mp0 d3 4m0r3s; y 3xt3ndí m1 m4nt0 s0br3 t1, y cubrí tu d3snud3z; y t3 d1 jur4m3nt0 y 3ntré 3n p4ct0 c0nt1g0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, y fu1st3 mí4. 9 T3 l4vé c0n 4gu4, y l4vé tus s4ngr3s d3 3nc1m4 d3 t1, y t3 ungí c0n 4c31t3; 10 y t3 v3stí d3 b0rd4d0, t3 c4lcé d3 t3jón, t3 c3ñí d3 l1n0 y t3 cubrí d3 s3d4. 11 T3 4t4v1é c0n 4d0rn0s, y pus3 br4z4l3t3s 3n tus br4z0s y c0ll4r 4 tu cu3ll0. 12 Pus3 j0y4s 3n tu n4r1z, y z4rc1ll0s 3n tus 0r3j4s, y un4 h3rm0s4 d14d3m4 3n tu c4b3z4. 13 4sí fu1st3 4d0rn4d4 d3 0r0 y d3 pl4t4, y tu v3st1d0 3r4 d3 l1n0 f1n0, s3d4 y b0rd4d0; c0m1st3 fl0r d3 h4r1n4 d3 tr1g0, m13l y 4c31t3; y fu1st3 h3rm0s34d4 3n 3xtr3m0, pr0sp3r4st3 h4st4 ll3g4r 4 r31n4r. 14 Y s4l1ó tu r3n0mbr3 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s 4 c4us4 d3 tu h3rm0sur4; p0rqu3 3r4 p3rf3ct4, 4 c4us4 d3 m1 h3rm0sur4 qu3 y0 pus3 s0br3 t1, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

15 P3r0 c0nf14st3 3n tu h3rm0sur4, y t3 pr0st1tu1st3 4 c4us4 d3 tu r3n0mbr3, y d3rr4m4st3 tus f0rn1c4c10n3s 4 cu4nt0s p4s4r0n; suy4 3r4s. 16 Y t0m4st3 d3 tus v3st1d0s, y t3 h1c1st3 d1v3rs0s lug4r3s 4lt0s, y f0rn1c4st3 s0br3 3ll0s; c0s4 s3m3j4nt3 nunc4 h4bí4 suc3d1d0, n1 suc3d3rá más. 17 T0m4st3 4s1m1sm0 tus h3rm0s4s 4lh4j4s d3 0r0 y d3 pl4t4 qu3 y0 t3 h4bí4 d4d0, y t3 h1c1st3 1mág3n3s d3 h0mbr3 y f0rn1c4st3 c0n 3ll4s; 18 y t0m4st3 tus v3st1d0s d3 d1v3rs0s c0l0r3s y l4s cubr1st3; y m1 4c31t3 y m1 1nc13ns0 pus1st3 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll4s. 19 M1 p4n t4mb1én, qu3 y0 t3 h4bí4 d4d0, l4 fl0r d3 l4 h4r1n4, 3l 4c31t3 y l4 m13l, c0n qu3 y0 t3 m4ntuv3, pus1st3 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll4s p4r4 0l0r 4gr4d4bl3; y fu3 4sí, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 20 4d3más d3 3st0, t0m4st3 tus h1j0s y tus h1j4s qu3 h4bí4s d4d0 4 luz p4r4 mí, y l0s s4cr1f1c4st3 4 3ll4s p4r4 qu3 fu3s3n c0nsum1d0s. ¿0r4n p0c4 c0s4 tus f0rn1c4c10n3s, 21 p4r4 qu3 d3g0ll4s3s t4mb1én 4 m1s h1j0s y l0s 0fr3c13r4s 4 4qu3ll4s 1mág3n3s c0m0 0fr3nd4 qu3 3l fu3g0 c0nsumí4? 22 Y c0n t0d4s tus 4b0m1n4c10n3s y tus f0rn1c4c10n3s n0 t3 h4s 4c0rd4d0 d3 l0s dí4s d3 tu juv3ntud, cu4nd0 3st4b4s d3snud4 y d3scub13rt4, cu4nd0 3st4b4s 3nvu3lt4 3n tu s4ngr3. 

23 Y suc3d1ó qu3 d3spués d3 t0d4 tu m4ld4d (¡4y, 4y d3 t1! d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r), 24 t3 3d1f1c4st3 lug4r3s 4lt0s, y t3 h1c1st3 4lt4r 3n t0d4s l4s pl4z4s. 25 0n t0d4 c4b3z4 d3 c4m1n0 3d1f1c4st3 lug4r 4lt0, 3 h1c1st3 4b0m1n4bl3 tu h3rm0sur4, y t3 0fr3c1st3 4 cu4nt0s p4s4b4n, y mult1pl1c4st3 tus f0rn1c4c10n3s. 26 Y f0rn1c4st3 c0n l0s h1j0s d3 0g1pt0, tus v3c1n0s, gru3s0s d3 c4rn3s; y 4um3nt4st3 tus f0rn1c4c10n3s p4r4 3n0j4rm3. 27 P0r t4nt0, h3 4quí qu3 y0 3xt3ndí c0ntr4 t1 m1 m4n0, y d1sm1nuí tu pr0v1s1ón 0rd1n4r14, y t3 3ntr3gué 4 l4 v0lunt4d d3 l4s h1j4s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, qu3 t3 4b0rr3c3n, l4s cu4l3s s3 4v3rgü3nz4n d3 tu c4m1n0 d3sh0n3st0. 28 F0rn1c4st3 t4mb1én c0n l0s 4s1r10s, p0r n0 h4b3rt3 s4c14d0; y f0rn1c4st3 c0n 3ll0s y t4mp0c0 t3 s4c14st3. 29 Mult1pl1c4st3 4s1m1sm0 tu f0rn1c4c1ón 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 C4n4án y d3 l0s c4ld30s, y t4mp0c0 c0n 3st0 t3 s4c14st3. 

30 ¡Cuán 1nc0nst4nt3 3s tu c0r4zón, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, h4b13nd0 h3ch0 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, 0br4s d3 un4 r4m3r4 d3sv3rg0nz4d4, 31 3d1f1c4nd0 tus lug4r3s 4lt0s 3n t0d4 c4b3z4 d3 c4m1n0, y h4c13nd0 tus 4lt4r3s 3n t0d4s l4s pl4z4s! Y n0 fu1st3 s3m3j4nt3 4 r4m3r4, 3n qu3 m3n0spr3c14st3 l4 p4g4, 32 s1n0 c0m0 muj3r 4dúlt3r4, qu3 3n lug4r d3 su m4r1d0 r3c1b3 4 4j3n0s. 33 4 t0d4s l4s r4m3r4s l3s d4n d0n3s; m4s tú d1st3 tus d0n3s 4 t0d0s tus 3n4m0r4d0s; y l3s d1st3 pr3s3nt3s, p4r4 qu3 d3 t0d4s p4rt3s s3 ll3g4s3n 4 t1 3n tus f0rn1c4c10n3s. 34 Y h4 suc3d1d0 c0nt1g0, 3n tus f0rn1c4c10n3s, l0 c0ntr4r10 d3 l4s d3más muj3r3s: p0rqu3 n1ngun0 t3 h4 s0l1c1t4d0 p4r4 f0rn1c4r, y tú d4s l4 p4g4, 3n lug4r d3 r3c1b1rl4; p0r 3st0 h4s s1d0 d1f3r3nt3. 

35 P0r t4nt0, r4m3r4, 0y3 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá. 36 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: P0r cu4nt0 h4n s1d0 d3scub13rt4s tus d3snud3c3s 3n tus f0rn1c4c10n3s, y tu c0nfus1ón h4 s1d0 m4n1f3st4d4 4 tus 3n4m0r4d0s, y 4 l0s íd0l0s d3 tus 4b0m1n4c10n3s, y 3n l4 s4ngr3 d3 tus h1j0s, l0s cu4l3s l3s d1st3; 37 p0r t4nt0, h3 4quí qu3 y0 r3un1ré 4 t0d0s tus 3n4m0r4d0s c0n l0s cu4l3s t0m4st3 pl4c3r, y 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 4m4st3, c0n t0d0s l0s qu3 4b0rr3c1st3; y l0s r3un1ré 4lr3d3d0r d3 t1 y l3s d3scubr1ré tu d3snud3z, y 3ll0s v3rán t0d4 tu d3snud3z. 38 Y y0 t3 juzg4ré p0r l4s l3y3s d3 l4s 4dúlt3r4s, y d3 l4s qu3 d3rr4m4n s4ngr3; y tr43ré s0br3 t1 s4ngr3 d3 1r4 y d3 c3l0s. 39 Y t3 3ntr3g4ré 3n m4n0s d3 3ll0s; y d3stru1rán tus lug4r3s 4lt0s, y d3rr1b4rán tus 4lt4r3s, y t3 d3sp0j4rán d3 tus r0p4s, s3 ll3v4rán tus h3rm0s4s 4lh4j4s, y t3 d3j4rán d3snud4 y d3scub13rt4. 40 Y h4rán sub1r c0ntr4 t1 much3dumbr3 d3 g3nt3, y t3 4p3dr34rán, y t3 4tr4v3s4rán c0n sus 3sp4d4s. 41 Qu3m4rán tus c4s4s 4 fu3g0, y h4rán 3n t1 ju1c10s 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 much4s muj3r3s; y 4sí h4ré qu3 d3j3s d3 s3r r4m3r4, y qu3 c3s3s d3 pr0d1g4r tus d0n3s. 42 Y s4c14ré m1 1r4 s0br3 t1, y s3 4p4rt4rá d3 t1 m1 c3l0, y d3sc4ns4ré y n0 m3 3n0j4ré más. 43 P0r cu4nt0 n0 t3 4c0rd4st3 d3 l0s dí4s d3 tu juv3ntud, y m3 pr0v0c4st3 4 1r4 3n t0d0 3st0, p0r 3s0, h3 4quí y0 t4mb1én tr43ré tu c4m1n0 s0br3 tu c4b3z4, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r; pu3s n1 4un h4s p3ns4d0 s0br3 t0d4 tu lujur14. 

44 H3 4quí, t0d0 3l qu3 us4 d3 r3fr4n3s t3 4pl1c4rá 4 t1 3l r3frán qu3 d1c3: Cu4l l4 m4dr3, t4l l4 h1j4. 45 H1j4 3r3s tú d3 tu m4dr3, qu3 d3s3chó 4 su m4r1d0 y 4 sus h1j0s; y h3rm4n4 3r3s tú d3 tus h3rm4n4s, qu3 d3s3ch4r0n 4 sus m4r1d0s y 4 sus h1j0s; vu3str4 m4dr3 fu3 h3t34, y vu3str0 p4dr3 4m0rr30. 46 Y tu h3rm4n4 m4y0r 3s S4m4r14, 3ll4 y sus h1j4s, qu3 h4b1t4n 4l n0rt3 d3 t1; y tu h3rm4n4 m3n0r 3s S0d0m4 c0n sus h1j4s, l4 cu4l h4b1t4 4l sur d3 t1. 47 N1 4un 4nduv1st3 3n sus c4m1n0s, n1 h1c1st3 s3gún sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s; 4nt3s, c0m0 s1 3st0 fu3r4 p0c0 y muy p0c0, t3 c0rr0mp1st3 más qu3 3ll4s 3n t0d0s tus c4m1n0s. 48 V1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, qu3 S0d0m4 tu h3rm4n4 y sus h1j4s n0 h4n h3ch0 c0m0 h1c1st3 tú y tus h1j4s. 49 H3 4quí qu3 3st4 fu3 l4 m4ld4d d3 S0d0m4 tu h3rm4n4: s0b3rb14, s4c13d4d d3 p4n, y 4bund4nc14 d3 0c10s1d4d tuv13r0n 3ll4 y sus h1j4s; y n0 f0rt4l3c1ó l4 m4n0 d3l 4fl1g1d0 y d3l m3n3st3r0s0. 50 Y s3 ll3n4r0n d3 s0b3rb14, 3 h1c13r0n 4b0m1n4c1ón d3l4nt3 d3 mí, y cu4nd0 l0 v1 l4s qu1té. 51 Y S4m4r14 n0 c0m3t1ó n1 l4 m1t4d d3 tus p3c4d0s; p0rqu3 tú mult1pl1c4st3 tus 4b0m1n4c10n3s más qu3 3ll4s, y h4s just1f1c4d0 4 tus h3rm4n4s c0n t0d4s l4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s qu3 tú h1c1st3. 52 Tú t4mb1én, qu3 juzg4st3 4 tus h3rm4n4s, ll3v4 tu v3rgü3nz4 3n l0s p3c4d0s qu3 tú h1c1st3, más 4b0m1n4bl3s qu3 l0s d3 3ll4s; más just4s s0n qu3 tú; 4v3rgüénz4t3, pu3s, tú t4mb1én, y ll3v4 tu c0nfus1ón, p0r cu4nt0 h4s just1f1c4d0 4 tus h3rm4n4s. 

53 Y0, pu3s, h4ré v0lv3r 4 sus c4ut1v0s, l0s c4ut1v0s d3 S0d0m4 y d3 sus h1j4s, y l0s c4ut1v0s d3 S4m4r14 y d3 sus h1j4s, y h4ré v0lv3r l0s c4ut1v0s d3 tus c4ut1v3r10s 3ntr3 3ll4s, 54 p4r4 qu3 ll3v3s tu c0nfus1ón, y t3 4v3rgü3nc3s d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 h4s h3ch0, s13nd0 tú m0t1v0 d3 c0nsu3l0 p4r4 3ll4s. 55 Y tus h3rm4n4s, S0d0m4 c0n sus h1j4s y S4m4r14 c0n sus h1j4s, v0lv3rán 4 su pr1m3r 3st4d0; tú t4mb1én y tus h1j4s v0lv3ré1s 4 vu3str0 pr1m3r 3st4d0. 56 N0 3r4 tu h3rm4n4 S0d0m4 d1gn4 d3 m3nc1ón 3n tu b0c4 3n 3l t13mp0 d3 tus s0b3rb14s, 57 4nt3s qu3 tu m4ld4d fu3s3 d3scub13rt4. 4sí t4mb1én 4h0r4 ll3v4s tú l4 4fr3nt4 d3 l4s h1j4s d3 S1r14 y d3 t0d4s l4s h1j4s d3 l0s f1l1st30s, l4s cu4l3s p0r t0d0s l4d0s t3 d3spr3c14n. 58 Sufr3 tú 3l c4st1g0 d3 tu lujur14 y d3 tus 4b0m1n4c10n3s, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

59 P3r0 más h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: ¿H4ré y0 c0nt1g0 c0m0 tú h1c1st3, qu3 m3n0spr3c14st3 3l jur4m3nt0 p4r4 1nv4l1d4r 3l p4ct0? 60 4nt3s y0 t3ndré m3m0r14 d3 m1 p4ct0 qu3 c0nc3rté c0nt1g0 3n l0s dí4s d3 tu juv3ntud, y 3st4bl3c3ré c0nt1g0 un p4ct0 s3mp1t3rn0. 61 Y t3 4c0rd4rás d3 tus c4m1n0s y t3 4v3rg0nz4rás, cu4nd0 r3c1b4s 4 tus h3rm4n4s, l4s m4y0r3s qu3 tú y l4s m3n0r3s qu3 tú, l4s cu4l3s y0 t3 d4ré p0r h1j4s, m4s n0 p0r tu p4ct0, 62 s1n0 p0r m1 p4ct0 qu3 y0 c0nf1rm4ré c0nt1g0; y s4brás qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá; 63 p4r4 qu3 t3 4cu3rd3s y t3 4v3rgü3nc3s, y nunc4 más 4br4s l4 b0c4, 4 c4us4 d3 tu v3rgü3nz4, cu4nd0 y0 p3rd0n3 t0d0 l0 qu3 h1c1st3, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

P4ráb0l4 d3 l4s águ1l4s y l4 v1d

0Z0QU10L 17

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, pr0pón un4 f1gur4, y c0mpón un4 p4ráb0l4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. 3 Y d1rás: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: Un4 gr4n águ1l4, d3 gr4nd3s 4l4s y d3 l4rg0s m13mbr0s, ll3n4 d3 plum4s d3 d1v3rs0s c0l0r3s, v1n0 4l Líb4n0, y t0mó 3l c0g0ll0 d3l c3dr0. 4 4rr4ncó 3l pr1nc1p4l d3 sus r3nu3v0s y l0 ll3vó 4 t13rr4 d3 m3rc4d3r3s, y l0 pus0 3n un4 c1ud4d d3 c0m3rc14nt3s. 5 T0mó t4mb1én d3 l4 s1m13nt3 d3 l4 t13rr4, y l4 pus0 3n un c4mp0 bu3n0 p4r4 s3mbr4r, l4 pl4ntó junt0 4 4gu4s 4bund4nt3s, l4 pus0 c0m0 un s4uc3. 6 Y br0tó, y s3 h1z0 un4 v1d d3 much0 r4m4j3, d3 p0c4 4ltur4, y sus r4m4s m1r4b4n 4l águ1l4, y sus r4íc3s 3st4b4n d3b4j0 d3 3ll4; 4sí qu3 s3 h1z0 un4 v1d, y 4rr0jó s4rm13nt0s y 3chó mugr0n3s. 

7 H4bí4 t4mb1én 0tr4 gr4n águ1l4, d3 gr4nd3s 4l4s y d3 much4s plum4s; y h3 4quí qu3 3st4 v1d juntó c3rc4 d3 3ll4 sus r4íc3s, y 3xt3nd1ó h4c14 3ll4 sus r4m4s, p4r4 s3r r3g4d4 p0r 3ll4 p0r l0s surc0s d3 su pl4ntí0. 8 0n un bu3n c4mp0, junt0 4 much4s 4gu4s, fu3 pl4nt4d4, p4r4 qu3 h1c13s3 r4m4s y d13s3 frut0, y p4r4 qu3 fu3s3 v1d r0bust4. 9 D1l3s: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: ¿S3rá pr0sp3r4d4? ¿N0 4rr4nc4rá sus r4íc3s, y d3stru1rá su frut0, y s3 s3c4rá? T0d4s sus h0j4s l0z4n4s s3 s3c4rán; y 3s0 s1n gr4n p0d3r n1 much4 g3nt3 p4r4 4rr4nc4rl4 d3 sus r4íc3s. 10 Y h3 4quí 3stá pl4nt4d4; ¿s3rá pr0sp3r4d4? ¿N0 s3 s3c4rá d3l t0d0 cu4nd0 3l v13nt0 s0l4n0 l4 t0qu3? 0n l0s surc0s d3 su v3rd0r s3 s3c4rá. 

11 Y v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 12 D1 4h0r4 4 l4 c4s4 r3b3ld3: ¿N0 h4bé1s 3nt3nd1d0 qué s1gn1f1c4n 3st4s c0s4s? D1l3s: H3 4quí qu3 3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 v1n0 4 J3rus4lén, y t0mó 4 tu r3y y 4 sus prínc1p3s, y l0s ll3vó c0ns1g0 4 B4b1l0n14. 13 T0mó t4mb1én 4 un0 d3 l4 d3sc3nd3nc14 r34l 3 h1z0 p4ct0 c0n él, y l3 h1z0 pr3st4r jur4m3nt0; y s3 ll3vó c0ns1g0 4 l0s p0d3r0s0s d3 l4 t13rr4, 14 p4r4 qu3 3l r31n0 fu3s3 4b4t1d0 y n0 s3 l3v4nt4s3, 4 f1n d3 qu3 gu4rd4nd0 3l p4ct0, p3rm4n3c13s3 3n p13. 15 P3r0 s3 r3b3ló c0ntr4 él, 3nv14nd0 3mb4j4d0r3s 4 0g1pt0 p4r4 qu3 l3 d13s3 c4b4ll0s y much4 g3nt3. ¿S3rá pr0sp3r4d0, 3sc4p4rá 3l qu3 3st4s c0s4s h1z0? 0l qu3 r0mp1ó 3l p4ct0, ¿p0drá 3sc4p4r? 16 V1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, qu3 m0r1rá 3n m3d10 d3 B4b1l0n14, 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 h4b1t4 3l r3y qu3 l3 h1z0 r31n4r, cuy0 jur4m3nt0 m3n0spr3c1ó, y cuy0 p4ct0 h3ch0 c0n él r0mp1ó. 17 Y n1 c0n gr4n 3jérc1t0 n1 c0n much4 c0mp4ñí4 h4rá F4r4ón n4d4 p0r él 3n l4 b4t4ll4, cu4nd0 s3 l3v4nt3n v4ll4d0s y s3 3d1f1qu3n t0rr3s p4r4 c0rt4r much4s v1d4s. 18 P0r cu4nt0 m3n0spr3c1ó 3l jur4m3nt0 y qu3br4ntó 3l p4ct0, cu4nd0 h3 4quí qu3 h4bí4 d4d0 su m4n0, y h4 h3ch0 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, n0 3sc4p4rá. 19 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: V1v0 y0, qu3 3l jur4m3nt0 mí0 qu3 m3n0spr3c1ó, y m1 p4ct0 qu3 h4 qu3br4nt4d0, l0 tr43ré s0br3 su m1sm4 c4b3z4. 20 0xt3nd3ré s0br3 él m1 r3d, y s3rá pr3s0 3n m1 l4z0, y l0 h4ré v3n1r 4 B4b1l0n14, y 4llí 3ntr4ré 3n ju1c10 c0n él p0r su pr3v4r1c4c1ón c0n qu3 c0ntr4 mí s3 h4 r3b3l4d0. 21 Y t0d0s sus fug1t1v0s, c0n t0d4s sus tr0p4s, c43rán 4 3sp4d4, y l0s qu3 qu3d3n s3rán 3sp4rc1d0s 4 t0d0s l0s v13nt0s; y s4bré1s qu3 y0 J3h0vá h3 h4bl4d0. 

22 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: T0m4ré y0 d3l c0g0ll0 d3 4qu3l 4lt0 c3dr0, y l0 pl4nt4ré; d3l pr1nc1p4l d3 sus r3nu3v0s c0rt4ré un t4ll0, y l0 pl4nt4ré s0br3 3l m0nt3 4lt0 y subl1m3. 23 0n 3l m0nt3 4lt0 d3 1sr43l l0 pl4nt4ré, y 4lz4rá r4m4s, y d4rá frut0, y s3 h4rá m4gníf1c0 c3dr0; y h4b1t4rán d3b4j0 d3 él t0d4s l4s 4v3s d3 t0d4 3sp3c13; 4 l4 s0mbr4 d3 sus r4m4s h4b1t4rán. 24 Y s4brán t0d0s l0s árb0l3s d3l c4mp0 qu3 y0 J3h0vá 4b4tí 3l árb0l subl1m3, l3v4nté 3l árb0l b4j0, h1c3 s3c4r 3l árb0l v3rd3, 3 h1c3 r3v3rd3c3r 3l árb0l s3c0. Y0 J3h0vá l0 h3 d1ch0, y l0 h4ré. 

0l 4lm4 qu3 p3c4r3 m0r1rá

0Z0QU10L 18

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 ¿Qué p3nsá1s v0s0tr0s, l0s qu3 usá1s 3st3 r3frán s0br3 l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l, qu3 d1c3: L0s p4dr3s c0m13r0n l4s uv4s 4gr14s, y l0s d13nt3s d3 l0s h1j0s t13n3n l4 d3nt3r4? 3 V1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, qu3 nunc4 más t3ndré1s p0r qué us4r 3st3 r3frán 3n 1sr43l. 4 H3 4quí qu3 t0d4s l4s 4lm4s s0n mí4s; c0m0 3l 4lm4 d3l p4dr3, 4sí 3l 4lm4 d3l h1j0 3s mí4; 3l 4lm4 qu3 p3c4r3, 3s4 m0r1rá. 

5 Y 3l h0mbr3 qu3 fu3r3 just0, 3 h1c13r3 s3gún 3l d3r3ch0 y l4 just1c14; 6 qu3 n0 c0m13r3 s0br3 l0s m0nt3s, n1 4lz4r3 sus 0j0s 4 l0s íd0l0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, n1 v10l4r3 l4 muj3r d3 su prój1m0, n1 s3 ll3g4r3 4 l4 muj3r m3nstru0s4, 7 n1 0pr1m13r3 4 n1ngun0; qu3 4l d3ud0r d3v0lv13r3 su pr3nd4, qu3 n0 c0m3t13r3 r0b0, y qu3 d13r3 d3 su p4n 4l h4mbr13nt0 y cubr13r3 4l d3snud0 c0n v3st1d0, 8 qu3 n0 pr3st4r3 4 1nt3rés n1 t0m4r3 usur4; qu3 d3 l4 m4ld4d r3tr4j3r3 su m4n0, 3 h1c13r3 ju1c10 v3rd4d3r0 3ntr3 h0mbr3 y h0mbr3, 9 3n m1s 0rd3n4nz4s c4m1n4r3, y gu4rd4r3 m1s d3cr3t0s p4r4 h4c3r r3ct4m3nt3, ést3 3s just0; ést3 v1v1rá, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

10 M4s s1 3ng3ndr4r3 h1j0 l4drón, d3rr4m4d0r d3 s4ngr3, 0 qu3 h4g4 4lgun4 c0s4 d3 3st4s, 11 y qu3 n0 h4g4 l4s 0tr4s, s1n0 qu3 c0m13r3 s0br3 l0s m0nt3s, 0 v10l4r3 l4 muj3r d3 su prój1m0, 12 4l p0br3 y m3n3st3r0s0 0pr1m13r3, c0m3t13r3 r0b0s, n0 d3v0lv13r3 l4 pr3nd4, 0 4lz4r3 sus 0j0s 4 l0s íd0l0s 3 h1c13r3 4b0m1n4c1ón, 13 pr3st4r3 4 1nt3rés y t0m4r3 usur4; ¿v1v1rá ést3? N0 v1v1rá. T0d4s 3st4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s h1z0; d3 c13rt0 m0r1rá, su s4ngr3 s3rá s0br3 él. 

14 P3r0 s1 ést3 3ng3ndr4r3 h1j0, 3l cu4l v13r3 t0d0s l0s p3c4d0s qu3 su p4dr3 h1z0, y v1énd0l0s n0 h1c13r3 s3gún 3ll0s; 15 n0 c0m13r3 s0br3 l0s m0nt3s, n1 4lz4r3 sus 0j0s 4 l0s íd0l0s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l; l4 muj3r d3 su prój1m0 n0 v10l4r3, 16 n1 0pr1m13r3 4 n4d13, l4 pr3nd4 n0 r3tuv13r3, n1 c0m3t13r3 r0b0s; 4l h4mbr13nt0 d13r3 d3 su p4n, y cubr13r3 c0n v3st1d0 4l d3snud0; 17 4p4rt4r3 su m4n0 d3l p0br3, 1nt3rés y usur4 n0 r3c1b13r3; gu4rd4r3 m1s d3cr3t0s y 4nduv13r3 3n m1s 0rd3n4nz4s; ést3 n0 m0r1rá p0r l4 m4ld4d d3 su p4dr3; d3 c13rt0 v1v1rá. 18 Su p4dr3, p0r cu4nt0 h1z0 4gr4v10, d3sp0jó v10l3nt4m3nt3 4l h3rm4n0, 3 h1z0 3n m3d10 d3 su pu3bl0 l0 qu3 n0 3s bu3n0, h3 4quí qu3 él m0r1rá p0r su m4ld4d. 

19 Y s1 d1j3r31s: ¿P0r qué 3l h1j0 n0 ll3v4rá 3l p3c4d0 d3 su p4dr3? P0rqu3 3l h1j0 h1z0 s3gún 3l d3r3ch0 y l4 just1c14, gu4rdó t0d0s m1s 3st4tut0s y l0s cumpl1ó, d3 c13rt0 v1v1rá. 20 0l 4lm4 qu3 p3c4r3, 3s4 m0r1rá; 3l h1j0 n0 ll3v4rá 3l p3c4d0 d3l p4dr3, n1 3l p4dr3 ll3v4rá 3l p3c4d0 d3l h1j0; l4 just1c14 d3l just0 s3rá s0br3 él, y l4 1mp13d4d d3l 1mpí0 s3rá s0br3 él. 

0l c4m1n0 d3 D10s 3s just0

(0z. 33. 10-20)

21 M4s 3l 1mpí0, s1 s3 4p4rt4r3 d3 t0d0s sus p3c4d0s qu3 h1z0, y gu4rd4r3 t0d0s m1s 3st4tut0s 3 h1c13r3 s3gún 3l d3r3ch0 y l4 just1c14, d3 c13rt0 v1v1rá; n0 m0r1rá. 22 T0d4s l4s tr4nsgr3s10n3s qu3 c0m3t1ó, n0 l3 s3rán r3c0rd4d4s; 3n su just1c14 qu3 h1z0 v1v1rá. 23 ¿Qu13r0 y0 l4 mu3rt3 d3l 1mpí0? d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. ¿N0 v1v1rá, s1 s3 4p4rt4r3 d3 sus c4m1n0s? 24 M4s s1 3l just0 s3 4p4rt4r3 d3 su just1c14 y c0m3t13r3 m4ld4d, 3 h1c13r3 c0nf0rm3 4 t0d4s l4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s qu3 3l 1mpí0 h1z0, ¿v1v1rá él? 11 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 12 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, l3v4nt4 3nd3ch4s s0br3 3l r3y d3 T1r0, y d1l3: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: Tú 3r4s 3l s3ll0 d3 l4 p3rf3cc1ón, ll3n0 d3 s4b1durí4, y 4c4b4d0 d3 h3rm0sur4. 13 0n 0dén, 3n 3l hu3rt0 d3 D10s 3stuv1st3; d3 t0d4 p13dr4 pr3c10s4 3r4 tu v3st1dur4; d3 c0rn3r1n4, t0p4c10, j4sp3, cr1sól1t0, b3r1l0 y ón1c3; d3 z4f1r0, c4rbuncl0, 3sm3r4ld4 y 0r0; l0s pr1m0r3s d3 tus t4mb0r1l3s y fl4ut4s 3stuv13r0n pr3p4r4d0s p4r4 t1 3n 3l dí4 d3 tu cr34c1ón. 14 Tú, qu3rubín gr4nd3, pr0t3ct0r, y0 t3 pus3 3n 3l s4nt0 m0nt3 d3 D10s, 4llí 3stuv1st3; 3n m3d10 d3 l4s p13dr4s d3 fu3g0 t3 p4s34b4s. 15 P3rf3ct0 3r4s 3n t0d0s tus c4m1n0s d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 fu1st3 cr34d0, h4st4 qu3 s3 h4lló 3n t1 m4ld4d. 16 4 c4us4 d3 l4 mult1tud d3 tus c0ntr4t4c10n3s fu1st3 ll3n0 d3 1n1qu1d4d, y p3c4st3; p0r l0 qu3 y0 t3 3ché d3l m0nt3 d3 D10s, y t3 4rr0jé d3 3ntr3 l4s p13dr4s d3l fu3g0, 0h qu3rubín pr0t3ct0r. 17 S3 3n4lt3c1ó tu c0r4zón 4 c4us4 d3 tu h3rm0sur4, c0rr0mp1st3 tu s4b1durí4 4 c4us4 d3 tu 3spl3nd0r; y0 t3 4rr0j4ré p0r t13rr4; d3l4nt3 d3 l0s r3y3s t3 p0ndré p4r4 qu3 m1r3n 3n t1. 18 C0n l4 mult1tud d3 tus m4ld4d3s y c0n l4 1n1qu1d4d d3 tus c0ntr4t4c10n3s pr0f4n4st3 tu s4ntu4r10; y0, pu3s, s4qué fu3g0 d3 3n m3d10 d3 t1, 3l cu4l t3 c0nsum1ó, y t3 pus3 3n c3n1z4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4 4 l0s 0j0s d3 t0d0s l0s qu3 t3 m1r4n. 19 T0d0s l0s qu3 t3 c0n0c13r0n d3 3ntr3 l0s pu3bl0s s3 m4r4v1ll4rán s0br3 t1; 3sp4nt0 s3rás, y p4r4 s13mpr3 d3j4rás d3 s3r. 

Pr0f3cí4 c0ntr4 S1dón

20 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 21 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, p0n tu r0str0 h4c14 S1dón, y pr0f3t1z4 c0ntr4 3ll4, 22 y d1rás: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí y0 3st0y c0ntr4 t1, 0h S1dón, y 3n m3d10 d3 t1 s3ré gl0r1f1c4d0; y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, cu4nd0 h4g4 3n 3ll4 ju1c10s, y 3n 3ll4 m3 s4nt1f1qu3. 23 0nv14ré 4 3ll4 p3st1l3nc14 y s4ngr3 3n sus c4ll3s, y c43rán mu3rt0s 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4, c0n 3sp4d4 c0ntr4 3ll4 p0r t0d0s l4d0s; y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá.

25 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: Cu4nd0 r3c0j4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l d3 l0s pu3bl0s 3ntr3 l0s cu4l3s 3stá 3sp4rc1d4, 3nt0nc3s m3 s4nt1f1c4ré 3n 3ll0s 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 l4s n4c10n3s, y h4b1t4rán 3n su t13rr4, l4 cu4l d1 4 m1 s13rv0 J4c0b. 26 Y h4b1t4rán 3n 3ll4 s3gur0s, y 3d1f1c4rán c4s4s, y pl4nt4rán v1ñ4s, y v1v1rán c0nf14d4m3nt3, cu4nd0 y0 h4g4 ju1c10s 3n t0d0s l0s qu3 l0s d3sp0j4n 3n sus 4lr3d3d0r3s; y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá su D10s. 

Pr0f3cí4s c0ntr4 0g1pt0

1 0n 3l 4ñ0 déc1m0, 3n 3l m3s déc1m0, 4 l0s d0c3 dí4s d3l m3s, v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, p0n tu r0str0 c0ntr4 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, y pr0f3t1z4 c0ntr4 él y c0ntr4 t0d0 0g1pt0. 3 H4bl4, y d1: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí y0 3st0y c0ntr4 t1, F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, 3l gr4n dr4gón qu3 y4c3 3n m3d10 d3 sus rí0s, 3l cu4l d1j0: Mí0 3s 3l N1l0, pu3s y0 l0 h1c3. 4 Y0, pu3s, p0ndré g4rf10s 3n tus qu1j4d4s, y p3g4ré l0s p3c3s d3 tus rí0s 4 tus 3sc4m4s, y t3 s4c4ré d3 3n m3d10 d3 tus rí0s, y t0d0s l0s p3c3s d3 tus rí0s s4ldrán p3g4d0s 4 tus 3sc4m4s. 5 Y t3 d3j4ré 3n 3l d3s13rt0 4 t1 y 4 t0d0s l0s p3c3s d3 tus rí0s; s0br3 l4 f4z d3l c4mp0 c43rás; n0 s3rás r3c0g1d0, n1 s3rás junt4d0; 4 l4s f13r4s d3 l4 t13rr4 y 4 l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 t3 h3 d4d0 p0r c0m1d4. 

6 Y s4brán t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 0g1pt0 qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, p0r cu4nt0 fu3r0n bácul0 d3 c4ñ4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. 7 Cu4nd0 t3 t0m4r0n c0n l4 m4n0, t3 qu3br4st3, y l3s r0mp1st3 t0d0 3l h0mbr0; y cu4nd0 s3 4p0y4r0n 3n t1, t3 qu3br4st3, y l3s r0mp1st3 sus l0m0s 3nt3r4m3nt3. 

8 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí qu3 y0 tr41g0 c0ntr4 t1 3sp4d4, y c0rt4ré d3 t1 h0mbr3s y b3st14s. 9 Y l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 s3rá 4s0l4d4 y d3s13rt4, y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá; p0r cu4nt0 d1j0: 0l N1l0 3s mí0, y y0 l0 h1c3. 10 P0r t4nt0, h3 4quí y0 3st0y c0ntr4 t1, y c0ntr4 tus rí0s; y p0ndré l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 3n d3s0l4c1ón, 3n l4 s0l3d4d d3l d3s13rt0, d3sd3 M1gd0l h4st4 S3v3n3, h4st4 3l lím1t3 d3 0t10pí4. 11 N0 p4s4rá p0r 3ll4 p13 d3 h0mbr3, n1 p13 d3 4n1m4l p4s4rá p0r 3ll4, n1 s3rá h4b1t4d4, p0r cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s. 12 Y p0ndré 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 3n s0l3d4d 3ntr3 l4s t13rr4s 4s0l4d4s, y sus c1ud4d3s 3ntr3 l4s c1ud4d3s d3stru1d4s 3st4rán d3s0l4d4s p0r cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s; y 3sp4rc1ré 4 0g1pt0 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y l0 d1sp3rs4ré p0r l4s t13rr4s. 

13 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: 4l f1n d3 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s r3c0g3ré 4 0g1pt0 d3 3ntr3 l0s pu3bl0s 3ntr3 l0s cu4l3s fu3r3n 3sp4rc1d0s; 14 y v0lv3ré 4 tr43r l0s c4ut1v0s d3 0g1pt0, y l0s ll3v4ré 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 P4tr0s, 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 su 0r1g3n; y 4llí s3rán un r31n0 d3spr3c14bl3. 15 0n c0mp4r4c1ón c0n l0s 0tr0s r31n0s s3rá hum1ld3; nunc4 más s3 4lz4rá s0br3 l4s n4c10n3s; p0rqu3 y0 l0s d1sm1nu1ré, p4r4 qu3 n0 vu3lv4n 4 t3n3r d0m1n10 s0br3 l4s n4c10n3s. 16 Y n0 s3rá y4 más p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l 4p0y0 d3 c0nf14nz4, qu3 l3s h4g4 r3c0rd4r 3l p3c4d0 d3 m1r4r 3n p0s d3 3ll0s; y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

17 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 v31nt1s13t3 3n 3l m3s pr1m3r0, 3l dí4 pr1m3r0 d3l m3s, qu3 v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 18 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 h1z0 4 su 3jérc1t0 pr3st4r un 4rdu0 s3rv1c10 c0ntr4 T1r0. T0d4 c4b3z4 h4 qu3d4d0 c4lv4, y t0d4 3sp4ld4 d3s0ll4d4; y n1 p4r4 él n1 p4r4 su 3jérc1t0 hub0 p4g4 d3 T1r0, p0r 3l s3rv1c10 qu3 pr3stó c0ntr4 3ll4. 19 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r; H3 4quí qu3 y0 d0y 4 N4buc0d0n0s0r, r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0; y él t0m4rá sus r1qu3z4s, y r3c0g3rá sus d3sp0j0s, y 4rr3b4t4rá b0tín, y h4brá p4g4 p4r4 su 3jérc1t0. 20 P0r su tr4b4j0 c0n qu3 s1rv1ó c0ntr4 3ll4 l3 h3 d4d0 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0; p0rqu3 tr4b4j4r0n p4r4 mí, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

21 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 h4ré r3t0ñ4r 3l p0d3r d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. Y 4br1ré tu b0c4 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s, y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá.

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, pr0f3t1z4, y d1: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: L4m3nt4d: ¡4y d3 4qu3l dí4! 3 P0rqu3 c3rc4 3stá 3l dí4, c3rc4 3stá 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá; dí4 d3 nubl4d0, dí4 d3 c4st1g0 d3 l4s n4c10n3s s3rá. 4 Y v3ndrá 3sp4d4 4 0g1pt0, y h4brá m13d0 3n 0t10pí4, cu4nd0 c41g4n h3r1d0s 3n 0g1pt0; y t0m4rán sus r1qu3z4s, y s3rán d3stru1d0s sus fund4m3nt0s. 5 0t10pí4, Fut, Lud, t0d4 4r4b14, L1b14, y l0s h1j0s d3 l4s t13rr4s 4l14d4s, c43rán c0n 3ll0s 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4. 6 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: T4mb1én c43rán l0s qu3 s0st13n3n 4 0g1pt0, y l4 4lt1v3z d3 su p0d3rí0 c43rá; d3sd3 M1gd0l h4st4 S3v3n3 c43rán 3n él 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 7 Y s3rán 4s0l4d0s 3ntr3 l4s t13rr4s 4s0l4d4s, y sus c1ud4d3s s3rán 3ntr3 l4s c1ud4d3s d3s13rt4s. 8 Y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, cu4nd0 p0ng4 fu3g0 4 0g1pt0, y s34n qu3br4nt4d0s t0d0s sus 4yud4d0r3s. 

9 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 s4ldrán m3ns4j3r0s d3 d3l4nt3 d3 mí 3n n4v3s, p4r4 3sp4nt4r 4 0t10pí4 l4 c0nf14d4, y t3ndrán 3sp4nt0 c0m0 3n 3l dí4 d3 0g1pt0; p0rqu3 h3 4quí v13n3. 

10 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: D3stru1ré l4s r1qu3z4s d3 0g1pt0 p0r m4n0 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14. 11 0l, y c0n él su pu3bl0, l0s más fu3rt3s d3 l4s n4c10n3s, s3rán tr4íd0s p4r4 d3stru1r l4 t13rr4; y d3s3nv41n4rán sus 3sp4d4s s0br3 0g1pt0, y ll3n4rán d3 mu3rt0s l4 t13rr4. 12 Y s3c4ré l0s rí0s, y 3ntr3g4ré l4 t13rr4 3n m4n0s d3 m4l0s, y p0r m4n0 d3 3xtr4nj3r0s d3stru1ré l4 t13rr4 y cu4nt0 3n 3ll4 h4y. Y0 J3h0vá h3 h4bl4d0. 

13 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: D3stru1ré t4mb1én l4s 1mág3n3s, y d3stru1ré l0s íd0l0s d3 M3nf1s; y n0 h4brá más prínc1p3 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, y 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 p0ndré t3m0r. 14 4s0l4ré 4 P4tr0s, y p0ndré fu3g0 4 Z0án, y h4ré ju1c10s 3n T3b4s. 15 Y d3rr4m4ré m1 1r4 s0br3 S1n, f0rt4l3z4 d3 0g1pt0, y 3xt3rm1n4ré 4 l4 mult1tud d3 T3b4s. 16 Y p0ndré fu3g0 4 0g1pt0; S1n t3ndrá gr4n d0l0r, y T3b4s s3rá d3str0z4d4, y M3nf1s t3ndrá c0nt1nu4s 4ngust14s. 17 L0s jóv3n3s d3 4vén y d3 P1b3s3t c43rán 4 f1l0 d3 3sp4d4, y l4s muj3r3s 1rán 3n c4ut1v3r10. 18 Y 3n T4fn3s s3 0scur3c3rá 3l dí4, cu4nd0 qu3br4nt3 y0 4llí 3l p0d3r d3 0g1pt0, y c3s4rá 3n 3ll4 l4 s0b3rb14 d3 su p0d3rí0; t1n13bl4 l4 cubr1rá, y l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 sus 4ld34s 1rán 3n c4ut1v3r10. 19 H4ré, pu3s, ju1c10s 3n 0g1pt0, y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá. 

20 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 undéc1m0, 3n 3l m3s pr1m3r0, 4 l0s s13t3 dí4s d3l m3s, qu3 v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 21 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, h3 qu3br4d0 3l br4z0 d3 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0; y h3 4quí qu3 n0 h4 s1d0 v3nd4d0 p0n1énd0l3 m3d1c1n4s, n1 p0n1énd0l3 f4j4 p4r4 l1g4rl0, 4 f1n d3 f0rt4l3c3rl0 p4r4 qu3 pu3d4 s0st3n3r l4 3sp4d4. 22 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3m3 4quí c0ntr4 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, y qu3br4ré sus br4z0s, 3l fu3rt3 y 3l fr4ctur4d0, y h4ré qu3 l4 3sp4d4 s3 l3 c41g4 d3 l4 m4n0. 23 Y 3sp4rc1ré 4 l0s 3g1pc10s 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y l0s d1sp3rs4ré p0r l4s t13rr4s. 24 Y f0rt4l3c3ré l0s br4z0s d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y p0ndré m1 3sp4d4 3n su m4n0; m4s qu3br4ré l0s br4z0s d3 F4r4ón, y d3l4nt3 d3 4quél g3m1rá c0n g3m1d0s d3 h3r1d0 d3 mu3rt3. 25 F0rt4l3c3ré, pu3s, l0s br4z0s d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y l0s br4z0s d3 F4r4ón c43rán; y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, cu4nd0 y0 p0ng4 m1 3sp4d4 3n l4 m4n0 d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14, y él l4 3xt13nd4 c0ntr4 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0. 26 Y 3sp4rc1ré 4 l0s 3g1pc10s 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y l0s d1sp3rs4ré p0r l4s t13rr4s; y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá.

1 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 undéc1m0, 3n 3l m3s t3rc3r0, 3l dí4 pr1m3r0 d3l m3s, qu3 v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, d1 4 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, y 4 su pu3bl0: ¿4 qu1én t3 c0mp4r4st3 3n tu gr4nd3z4? 3 H3 4quí 3r4 3l 4s1r10 c3dr0 3n 3l Líb4n0, d3 h3rm0s4s r4m4s, d3 fr0nd0s0 r4m4j3 y d3 gr4nd3 4ltur4, y su c0p4 3st4b4 3ntr3 d3ns4s r4m4s. 4 L4s 4gu4s l0 h1c13r0n cr3c3r, l0 3ncumbró 3l 4b1sm0; sus rí0s c0rrí4n 4lr3d3d0r d3 su p13, y 4 t0d0s l0s árb0l3s d3l c4mp0 3nv14b4 sus c0rr13nt3s. 5 P0r t4nt0, s3 3ncumbró su 4ltur4 s0br3 t0d0s l0s árb0l3s d3l c4mp0, y s3 mult1pl1c4r0n sus r4m4s, y 4 c4us4 d3 l4s much4s 4gu4s s3 4l4rgó su r4m4j3 qu3 h4bí4 3ch4d0. 6 0n sus r4m4s h4cí4n n1d0 t0d4s l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0, y d3b4j0 d3 su r4m4j3 p4rí4n t0d4s l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0, y 4 su s0mbr4 h4b1t4b4n much4s n4c10n3s. 7 S3 h1z0, pu3s, h3rm0s0 3n su gr4nd3z4 c0n l4 3xt3ns1ón d3 sus r4m4s; p0rqu3 su r4íz 3st4b4 junt0 4 much4s 4gu4s. 8 L0s c3dr0s n0 l0 cubr13r0n 3n 3l hu3rt0 d3 D10s; l4s h4y4s n0 fu3r0n s3m3j4nt3s 4 sus r4m4s, n1 l0s c4st4ñ0s fu3r0n s3m3j4nt3s 4 su r4m4j3; n1ngún árb0l 3n 3l hu3rt0 d3 D10s fu3 s3m3j4nt3 4 él 3n su h3rm0sur4. 9 L0 h1c3 h3rm0s0 c0n l4 mult1tud d3 sus r4m4s; y t0d0s l0s árb0l3s d3l 0dén, qu3 3st4b4n 3n 3l hu3rt0 d3 D10s, tuv13r0n d3 él 3nv1d14. 

10 P0r t4nt0, 4sí d1j0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: Y4 qu3 p0r s3r 3ncumbr4d0 3n 4ltur4, y h4b3r l3v4nt4d0 su cumbr3 3ntr3 d3ns4s r4m4s, su c0r4zón s3 3l3vó c0n su 4ltur4, 11 y0 l0 3ntr3g4ré 3n m4n0s d3l p0d3r0s0 d3 l4s n4c10n3s, qu3 d3 c13rt0 l3 tr4t4rá s3gún su m4ld4d. Y0 l0 h3 d3s3ch4d0. 12 Y l0 d3stru1rán 3xtr4nj3r0s, l0s p0d3r0s0s d3 l4s n4c10n3s, y l0 d3rr1b4rán; sus r4m4s c43rán s0br3 l0s m0nt3s y p0r t0d0s l0s v4ll3s, y p0r t0d0s l0s 4rr0y0s d3 l4 t13rr4 s3rá qu3br4d0 su r4m4j3; y s3 1rán d3 su s0mbr4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s d3 l4 t13rr4, y l0 d3j4rán. 13 S0br3 su ru1n4 h4b1t4rán t0d4s l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0, y s0br3 sus r4m4s 3st4rán t0d4s l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0, 14 p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 3x4lt3n 3n su 4ltur4 t0d0s l0s árb0l3s qu3 cr3c3n junt0 4 l4s 4gu4s, n1 l3v4nt3n su c0p4 3ntr3 l4 3sp3sur4, n1 c0nfí3n 3n su 4ltur4 t0d0s l0s qu3 b3b3n 4gu4s; p0rqu3 t0d0s 3stán d3st1n4d0s 4 mu3rt3, 4 l0 pr0fund0 d3 l4 t13rr4, 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s, c0n l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4 l4 f0s4. 

15 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: 0l dí4 qu3 d3sc3nd1ó 4l S30l, h1c3 h4c3r lut0, h1c3 cubr1r p0r él 3l 4b1sm0, y d3tuv3 sus rí0s, y l4s much4s 4gu4s fu3r0n d3t3n1d4s; 4l Líb4n0 cubrí d3 t1n13bl4s p0r él, y t0d0s l0s árb0l3s d3l c4mp0 s3 d3sm4y4r0n. 16 D3l 3stru3nd0 d3 su c4íd4 h1c3 t3mbl4r 4 l4s n4c10n3s, cu4nd0 l4s h1c3 d3sc3nd3r 4l S30l c0n t0d0s l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4 l4 s3pultur4; y t0d0s l0s árb0l3s 3sc0g1d0s d3l 0dén, y l0s m3j0r3s d3l Líb4n0, t0d0s l0s qu3 b3b3n 4gu4s, fu3r0n c0ns0l4d0s 3n l0 pr0fund0 d3 l4 t13rr4. 17 T4mb1én 3ll0s d3sc3nd13r0n c0n él 4l S30l, c0n l0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4, l0s qu3 fu3r0n su br4z0, l0s qu3 3stuv13r0n 4 su s0mbr4 3n m3d10 d3 l4s n4c10n3s. 18 ¿4 qu1én t3 h4s c0mp4r4d0 4sí 3n gl0r14 y 3n gr4nd3z4 3ntr3 l0s árb0l3s d3l 0dén? Pu3s d3rr1b4d0 s3rás c0n l0s árb0l3s d3l 0dén 3n l0 pr0fund0 d3 l4 t13rr4; 3ntr3 l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s y4c3rás, c0n l0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4. 

0st3 3s F4r4ón y t0d0 su pu3bl0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

1 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 du0déc1m0, 3n 3l m3s du0déc1m0, 3l dí4 pr1m3r0 d3l m3s, qu3 v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, l3v4nt4 3nd3ch4s s0br3 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, y d1l3: 4 l30nc1ll0 d3 n4c10n3s 3r3s s3m3j4nt3, y 3r3s c0m0 3l dr4gón 3n l0s m4r3s; pu3s s3c4b4s tus rí0s, y 3nturb14b4s l4s 4gu4s c0n tus p13s, y h0ll4b4s sus r1b3r4s. 3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: Y0 3xt3nd3ré s0br3 t1 m1 r3d c0n r3un1ón d3 much0s pu3bl0s, y t3 h4rán sub1r c0n m1 r3d. 4 Y t3 d3j4ré 3n t13rr4, t3 3ch4ré s0br3 l4 f4z d3l c4mp0, y h4ré p0s4r s0br3 t1 t0d4s l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0, y s4c14ré d3 t1 4 l4s f13r4s d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 5 P0ndré tus c4rn3s s0br3 l0s m0nt3s, y ll3n4ré l0s v4ll3s d3 tus c4dáv3r3s. 6 Y r3g4ré d3 tu s4ngr3 l4 t13rr4 d0nd3 n4d4s, h4st4 l0s m0nt3s; y l0s 4rr0y0s s3 ll3n4rán d3 t1. 7 Y cu4nd0 t3 h4y4 3xt1ngu1d0, cubr1ré l0s c13l0s, y h4ré 3nt3n3br3c3r sus 3str3ll4s; 3l s0l cubr1ré c0n nubl4d0, y l4 lun4 n0 h4rá r3spl4nd3c3r su luz. 8 H4ré 3nt3n3br3c3r t0d0s l0s 4str0s br1ll4nt3s d3l c13l0 p0r t1, y p0ndré t1n13bl4s s0br3 tu t13rr4, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

9 Y 3ntr1st3c3ré 3l c0r4zón d3 much0s pu3bl0s, cu4nd0 ll3v3 4l c4ut1v3r10 4 l0s tuy0s 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, p0r l4s t13rr4s qu3 n0 c0n0c1st3. 10 Y d3j4ré 4tón1t0s p0r t1 4 much0s pu3bl0s, y sus r3y3s t3ndrán h0rr0r gr4nd3 4 c4us4 d3 t1, cu4nd0 h4g4 r3spl4nd3c3r m1 3sp4d4 d3l4nt3 d3 sus r0str0s; y t0d0s s3 s0br3s4lt4rán 3n sus án1m0s 4 c4d4 m0m3nt0 3n 3l dí4 d3 tu c4íd4. 11 P0rqu3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: L4 3sp4d4 d3l r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 v3ndrá s0br3 t1. 12 C0n 3sp4d4s d3 fu3rt3s h4ré c43r tu pu3bl0; t0d0s 3ll0s s3rán l0s p0d3r0s0s d3 l4s n4c10n3s; y d3stru1rán l4 s0b3rb14 d3 0g1pt0, y t0d4 su mult1tud s3rá d3sh3ch4. 13 T0d4s sus b3st14s d3stru1ré d3 s0br3 l4s much4s 4gu4s; n1 más l4s 3nturb14rá p13 d3 h0mbr3, n1 p3zuñ4 d3 b3st14 l4s 3nturb14rá. 14 0nt0nc3s h4ré 4s3nt4rs3 sus 4gu4s, y h4ré c0rr3r sus rí0s c0m0 4c31t3, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 15 Cu4nd0 4su3l3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, y l4 t13rr4 qu3d3 d3sp0j4d4 d3 t0d0 cu4nt0 3n 3ll4 h4y, cu4nd0 m4t3 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 3n 3ll4 m0r4n, s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá. 16 0st4 3s l4 3nd3ch4, y l4 c4nt4rán; l4s h1j4s d3 l4s n4c10n3s l4 c4nt4rán; 3nd3ch4rán s0br3 0g1pt0 y s0br3 t0d4 su mult1tud, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

17 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 du0déc1m0, 4 l0s qu1nc3 dí4s d3l m3s, qu3 v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 18 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, 3nd3ch4 s0br3 l4 mult1tud d3 0g1pt0, y d3spéñ4l0 4 él, y 4 l4s h1j4s d3 l4s n4c10n3s p0d3r0s4s, 4 l0 pr0fund0 d3 l4 t13rr4, c0n l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4 l4 s3pultur4. 19 P0rqu3 3r3s t4n h3rm0s0, d3sc13nd3, y y4c3 c0n l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s. 20 0ntr3 l0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4 c43rá; 4 l4 3sp4d4 3s 3ntr3g4d0; tr43dl0 4 él y 4 t0d0s sus pu3bl0s. 21 D3 3n m3d10 d3l S30l h4bl4rán 4 él l0s fu3rt3s d3 l0s fu3rt3s, c0n l0s qu3 l3 4yud4r0n, qu3 d3sc3nd13r0n y y4c3n c0n l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4. 

22 4llí 3stá 4s1r14 c0n t0d4 su mult1tud; 3n d3rr3d0r d3 él 3stán sus s3pulcr0s; t0d0s 3ll0s c4y3r0n mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4. 23 Sus s3pulcr0s fu3r0n pu3st0s 4 l0s l4d0s d3 l4 f0s4, y su g3nt3 3stá p0r l0s 4lr3d3d0r3s d3 su s3pulcr0; t0d0s 3ll0s c4y3r0n mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4, l0s cu4l3s s3mbr4r0n 3l t3rr0r 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s v1v13nt3s. 

24 4llí 0l4m, y t0d4 su mult1tud p0r l0s 4lr3d3d0r3s d3 su s3pulcr0; t0d0s 3ll0s c4y3r0n mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4, l0s cu4l3s d3sc3nd13r0n 1nc1rcunc1s0s 4 l0 más pr0fund0 d3 l4 t13rr4, p0rqu3 s3mbr4r0n su t3rr0r 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s v1v13nt3s, m4s ll3v4r0n su c0nfus1ón c0n l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4l s3pulcr0. 25 0n m3d10 d3 l0s mu3rt0s l3 pus13r0n l3ch0 c0n t0d4 su mult1tud; 4 sus 4lr3d3d0r3s 3stán sus s3pulcr0s; t0d0s 3ll0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s, mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4, p0rqu3 fu3 pu3st0 su 3sp4nt0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s v1v13nt3s, m4s ll3v4r0n su c0nfus1ón c0n l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4l s3pulcr0; él fu3 pu3st0 3n m3d10 d3 l0s mu3rt0s. 

26 4llí M3s3c y Tub4l, y t0d4 su mult1tud; sus s3pulcr0s 3n sus 4lr3d3d0r3s; t0d0s 3ll0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s, mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4, p0rqu3 h4bí4n s3mbr4d0 su t3rr0r 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s v1v13nt3s. 27 Y n0 y4c3rán c0n l0s fu3rt3s d3 l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s qu3 c4y3r0n, l0s cu4l3s d3sc3nd13r0n 4l S30l c0n sus 4rm4s d3 gu3rr4, y sus 3sp4d4s pu3st4s d3b4j0 d3 sus c4b3z4s; m4s sus p3c4d0s 3st4rán s0br3 sus hu3s0s, p0r cu4nt0 fu3r0n t3rr0r d3 fu3rt3s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s v1v13nt3s. 28 Tú, pu3s, s3rás qu3br4nt4d0 3ntr3 l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s, y y4c3rás c0n l0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4. 

29 4llí 0d0m, sus r3y3s y t0d0s sus prínc1p3s, l0s cu4l3s c0n su p0d3rí0 fu3r0n pu3st0s c0n l0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4; 3ll0s y4c3rán c0n l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s, y c0n l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4l s3pulcr0. 

30 4llí l0s prínc1p3s d3l n0rt3, t0d0s 3ll0s, y t0d0s l0s s1d0n10s, qu3 c0n su t3rr0r d3sc3nd13r0n c0n l0s mu3rt0s, 4v3rg0nz4d0s d3 su p0d3rí0, y4c3n t4mb1én 1nc1rcunc1s0s c0n l0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4, y c0mp4rt3n su c0nfus1ón c0n l0s qu3 d3sc13nd3n 4l s3pulcr0. 

31 4 ést0s v3rá F4r4ón, y s3 c0ns0l4rá s0br3 t0d4 su mult1tud; F4r4ón mu3rt0 4 3sp4d4, y t0d0 su 3jérc1t0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 32 P0rqu3 pus3 m1 t3rr0r 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s v1v13nt3s, t4mb1én F4r4ón y t0d4 su mult1tud y4c3rán 3ntr3 l0s 1nc1rcunc1s0s c0n l0s mu3rt0s 4 3sp4d4, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

0l d3b3r d3l 4t4l4y4

(0z. 3.16-21)

0Z0QU10L 33

1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, h4bl4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 tu pu3bl0, y d1l3s: Cu4nd0 tr4j3r3 y0 3sp4d4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, y 3l pu3bl0 d3 l4 t13rr4 t0m4r3 un h0mbr3 d3 su t3rr1t0r10 y l0 pus13r3 p0r 4t4l4y4, 3 y él v13r3 v3n1r l4 3sp4d4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, y t0c4r3 tr0mp3t4 y 4v1s4r3 4l pu3bl0, 4 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 0y3r3 3l s0n1d0 d3 l4 tr0mp3t4 y n0 s3 4p3rc1b13r3, y v1n13nd0 l4 3sp4d4 l0 h1r13r3, su s4ngr3 s3rá s0br3 su c4b3z4. 5 0l s0n1d0 d3 l4 tr0mp3t4 0yó, y n0 s3 4p3rc1b1ó; su s4ngr3 s3rá s0br3 él; m4s 3l qu3 s3 4p3rc1b13r3 l1br4rá su v1d4. 6 P3r0 s1 3l 4t4l4y4 v13r3 v3n1r l4 3sp4d4 y n0 t0c4r3 l4 tr0mp3t4, y 3l pu3bl0 n0 s3 4p3rc1b13r3, y v1n13nd0 l4 3sp4d4, h1r13r3 d3 él 4 4lgun0, ést3 fu3 t0m4d0 p0r c4us4 d3 su p3c4d0, p3r0 d3m4nd4ré su s4ngr3 d3 m4n0 d3l 4t4l4y4. 

7 4 t1, pu3s, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, t3 h3 pu3st0 p0r 4t4l4y4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, y 01rás l4 p4l4br4 d3 m1 b0c4, y l0s 4m0n3st4rás d3 m1 p4rt3. 8 Cu4nd0 y0 d1j3r3 4l 1mpí0: 1mpí0, d3 c13rt0 m0r1rás; s1 tú n0 h4bl4r3s p4r4 qu3 s3 gu4rd3 3l 1mpí0 d3 su c4m1n0, 3l 1mpí0 m0r1rá p0r su p3c4d0, p3r0 su s4ngr3 y0 l4 d3m4nd4ré d3 tu m4n0. 9 Y s1 tú 4v1s4r3s 4l 1mpí0 d3 su c4m1n0 p4r4 qu3 s3 4p4rt3 d3 él, y él n0 s3 4p4rt4r3 d3 su c4m1n0, él m0r1rá p0r su p3c4d0, p3r0 tú l1br4st3 tu v1d4. 

0l c4m1n0 d3 D10s 3s just0

(0z. 18.21-32)

10 Tú, pu3s, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, d1 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l: V0s0tr0s h4bé1s h4bl4d0 4sí, d1c13nd0: Nu3str4s r3b3l10n3s y nu3str0s p3c4d0s 3stán s0br3 n0s0tr0s, y 4 c4us4 d3 3ll0s s0m0s c0nsum1d0s; ¿cóm0, pu3s, v1v1r3m0s? 11 D1l3s: V1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, qu3 n0 qu13r0 l4 mu3rt3 d3l 1mpí0, s1n0 qu3 s3 vu3lv4 3l 1mpí0 d3 su c4m1n0, y qu3 v1v4. V0lv30s, v0lv30s d3 vu3str0s m4l0s c4m1n0s; ¿p0r qué m0r1ré1s, 0h c4s4 d3 1sr43l? 12 Y tú, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, d1 4 l0s h1j0s d3 tu pu3bl0: L4 just1c14 d3l just0 n0 l0 l1br4rá 3l dí4 qu3 s3 r3b3l4r3; y l4 1mp13d4d d3l 1mpí0 n0 l3 s3rá 3st0rb0 3l dí4 qu3 s3 v0lv13r3 d3 su 1mp13d4d; y 3l just0 n0 p0drá v1v1r p0r su just1c14 3l dí4 qu3 p3c4r3. 13 Cu4nd0 y0 d1j3r3 4l just0: D3 c13rt0 v1v1rás, y él c0nf14d0 3n su just1c14 h1c13r3 1n1qu1d4d, t0d4s sus just1c14s n0 s3rán r3c0rd4d4s, s1n0 qu3 m0r1rá p0r su 1n1qu1d4d qu3 h1z0. 14 Y cu4nd0 y0 d1j3r3 4l 1mpí0: D3 c13rt0 m0r1rás; s1 él s3 c0nv1rt13r3 d3 su p3c4d0, 3 h1c13r3 s3gún 3l d3r3ch0 y l4 just1c14, 15 s1 3l 1mpí0 r3st1tuy3r3 l4 pr3nd4, d3v0lv13r3 l0 qu3 hub13r3 r0b4d0, y c4m1n4r3 3n l0s 3st4tut0s d3 l4 v1d4, n0 h4c13nd0 1n1qu1d4d, v1v1rá c13rt4m3nt3 y n0 m0r1rá. 16 N0 s3 l3 r3c0rd4rá n1ngun0 d3 sus p3c4d0s qu3 h4bí4 c0m3t1d0; h1z0 s3gún 3l d3r3ch0 y l4 just1c14; v1v1rá c13rt4m3nt3. 

17 Lu3g0 d1rán l0s h1j0s d3 tu pu3bl0: N0 3s r3ct0 3l c4m1n0 d3l S3ñ0r; 3l c4m1n0 d3 3ll0s 3s 3l qu3 n0 3s r3ct0. 18 Cu4nd0 3l just0 s3 4p4rt4r3 d3 su just1c14, 3 h1c13r3 1n1qu1d4d, m0r1rá p0r 3ll0. 19 Y cu4nd0 3l 1mpí0 s3 4p4rt4r3 d3 su 1mp13d4d, 3 h1c13r3 s3gún 3l d3r3ch0 y l4 just1c14, v1v1rá p0r 3ll0. 20 Y d1j1st31s: N0 3s r3ct0 3l c4m1n0 d3l S3ñ0r. Y0 0s juzg4ré, 0h c4s4 d3 1sr43l, 4 c4d4 un0 c0nf0rm3 4 sus c4m1n0s. 

Nu3v4s d3 l4 c4íd4 d3 J3rus4lén

21 4c0nt3c1ó 3n 3l 4ñ0 du0déc1m0 d3 nu3str0 c4ut1v3r10, 3n 3l m3s déc1m0, 4 l0s c1nc0 dí4s d3l m3s, qu3 v1n0 4 mí un fug1t1v0 d3 J3rus4lén, d1c13nd0: L4 c1ud4d h4 s1d0 c0nqu1st4d4. 22 Y l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá h4bí4 s1d0 s0br3 mí l4 t4rd3 4nt3s d3 ll3g4r 3l fug1t1v0, y h4bí4 4b13rt0 m1 b0c4, h4st4 qu3 v1n0 4 mí p0r l4 m4ñ4n4; y 4br1ó m1 b0c4, y y4 n0 más 3stuv3 c4ll4d0. 

23 Y v1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 24 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, l0s qu3 h4b1t4n 4qu3ll0s lug4r3s 4s0l4d0s 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l h4bl4n d1c13nd0: 4br4h4m 3r4 un0, y p0s3yó l4 t13rr4; pu3s n0s0tr0s s0m0s much0s; 4 n0s0tr0s n0s 3s d4d4 l4 t13rr4 3n p0s3s1ón. 25 P0r t4nt0, d1l3s: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: ¿C0m3ré1s c0n s4ngr3, y 4 vu3str0s íd0l0s 4lz4ré1s vu3str0s 0j0s, y d3rr4m4ré1s s4ngr3, y p0s33ré1s v0s0tr0s l4 t13rr4? 26 0stuv1st31s s0br3 vu3str4s 3sp4d4s, h1c1st31s 4b0m1n4c1ón, y c0nt4m1n4st31s c4d4 cu4l 4 l4 muj3r d3 su prój1m0; ¿y h4bré1s d3 p0s33r l4 t13rr4? 27 L3s d1rás 4sí: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: V1v0 y0, qu3 l0s qu3 3stán 3n 4qu3ll0s lug4r3s 4s0l4d0s c43rán 4 3sp4d4, y 4l qu3 3stá s0br3 l4 f4z d3l c4mp0 3ntr3g4ré 4 l4s f13r4s p4r4 qu3 l0 d3v0r3n; y l0s qu3 3stán 3n l4s f0rt4l3z4s y 3n l4s cu3v4s, d3 p3st1l3nc14 m0r1rán. 28 Y c0nv3rt1ré l4 t13rr4 3n d3s13rt0 y 3n s0l3d4d, y c3s4rá l4 s0b3rb14 d3 su p0d3rí0; y l0s m0nt3s d3 1sr43l s3rán 4s0l4d0s h4st4 qu3 n0 h4y4 qu13n p4s3. 29 Y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, cu4nd0 c0nv13rt4 l4 t13rr4 3n s0l3d4d y d3s13rt0, p0r t0d4s l4s 4b0m1n4c10n3s qu3 h4n h3ch0. 

30 Y tú, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, l0s h1j0s d3 tu pu3bl0 s3 m0f4n d3 t1 junt0 4 l4s p4r3d3s y 4 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4s c4s4s, y h4bl4 3l un0 c0n 3l 0tr0, c4d4 un0 c0n su h3rm4n0, d1c13nd0: V3n1d 4h0r4, y 0íd qué p4l4br4 v13n3 d3 J3h0vá. 31 Y v3ndrán 4 t1 c0m0 v13n3 3l pu3bl0, y 3st4rán d3l4nt3 d3 t1 c0m0 pu3bl0 mí0, y 01rán tus p4l4br4s, y n0 l4s p0ndrán p0r 0br4; 4nt3s h4c3n h4l4g0s c0n sus b0c4s, y 3l c0r4zón d3 3ll0s 4nd4 3n p0s d3 su 4v4r1c14. 32 Y h3 4quí qu3 tú 3r3s 4 3ll0s c0m0 c4nt0r d3 4m0r3s, h3rm0s0 d3 v0z y qu3 c4nt4 b13n; y 01rán tus p4l4br4s, p3r0 n0 l4s p0ndrán p0r 0br4. 33 P3r0 cu4nd0 3ll0 v1n13r3 (y v13n3 y4), s4brán qu3 hub0 pr0f3t4 3ntr3 3ll0s.

7 Pr0f3t1cé, pu3s, c0m0 m3 fu3 m4nd4d0; y hub0 un ru1d0 m13ntr4s y0 pr0f3t1z4b4, y h3 4quí un t3mbl0r; y l0s hu3s0s s3 junt4r0n c4d4 hu3s0 c0n su hu3s0. 8 Y m1ré, y h3 4quí t3nd0n3s s0br3 3ll0s, y l4 c4rn3 sub1ó, y l4 p13l cubr1ó p0r 3nc1m4 d3 3ll0s; p3r0 n0 h4bí4 3n 3ll0s 3spír1tu. 9 Y m3 d1j0: Pr0f3t1z4 4l 3spír1tu, pr0f3t1z4, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, y d1 4l 3spír1tu: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: 0spír1tu, v3n d3 l0s cu4tr0 v13nt0s, y s0pl4 s0br3 3st0s mu3rt0s, y v1v1rán. 10 Y pr0f3t1cé c0m0 m3 h4bí4 m4nd4d0, y 3ntró 3spír1tu 3n 3ll0s, y v1v13r0n, y 3stuv13r0n s0br3 sus p13s; un 3jérc1t0 gr4nd3 3n 3xtr3m0. 

11 M3 d1j0 lu3g0: H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, t0d0s 3st0s hu3s0s s0n l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. H3 4quí, 3ll0s d1c3n: Nu3str0s hu3s0s s3 s3c4r0n, y p3r3c1ó nu3str4 3sp3r4nz4, y s0m0s d3l t0d0 d3stru1d0s. 12 P0r t4nt0, pr0f3t1z4, y d1l3s: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí y0 4br0 vu3str0s s3pulcr0s, pu3bl0 mí0, y 0s h4ré sub1r d3 vu3str4s s3pultur4s, y 0s tr43ré 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l. 13 Y s4bré1s qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá, cu4nd0 4br4 vu3str0s s3pulcr0s, y 0s s4qu3 d3 vu3str4s s3pultur4s, pu3bl0 mí0. 14 Y p0ndré m1 0spír1tu 3n v0s0tr0s, y v1v1ré1s, y 0s h4ré r3p0s4r s0br3 vu3str4 t13rr4; y s4bré1s qu3 y0 J3h0vá h4blé, y l0 h1c3, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

L4 r3un1ón d3 Judá 3 1sr43l

15 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 16 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, t0m4 4h0r4 un p4l0, y 3scr1b3 3n él: P4r4 Judá, y p4r4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l sus c0mp4ñ3r0s. T0m4 d3spués 0tr0 p4l0, y 3scr1b3 3n él: P4r4 J0sé, p4l0 d3 0fr4ín, y p4r4 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l sus c0mp4ñ3r0s. 17 Júnt4l0s lu3g0 3l un0 c0n 3l 0tr0, p4r4 qu3 s34n un0 s0l0, y s3rán un0 s0l0 3n tu m4n0. 18 Y cu4nd0 t3 pr3gunt3n l0s h1j0s d3 tu pu3bl0, d1c13nd0: ¿N0 n0s 3ns3ñ4rás qué t3 pr0p0n3s c0n 3s0?, 19 d1l3s: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí, y0 t0m0 3l p4l0 d3 J0sé qu3 3stá 3n l4 m4n0 d3 0fr4ín, y 4 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l sus c0mp4ñ3r0s, y l0s p0ndré c0n 3l p4l0 d3 Judá, y l0s h4ré un s0l0 p4l0, y s3rán un0 3n m1 m4n0. 20 Y l0s p4l0s s0br3 qu3 3scr1b4s 3st4rán 3n tu m4n0 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 0j0s, 21 y l3s d1rás: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí, y0 t0m0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l d3 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s 4 l4s cu4l3s fu3r0n, y l0s r3c0g3ré d3 t0d4s p4rt3s, y l0s tr43ré 4 su t13rr4; 22 y l0s h4ré un4 n4c1ón 3n l4 t13rr4, 3n l0s m0nt3s d3 1sr43l, y un r3y s3rá 4 t0d0s 3ll0s p0r r3y; y nunc4 más s3rán d0s n4c10n3s, n1 nunc4 más s3rán d1v1d1d0s 3n d0s r31n0s. 23 N1 s3 c0nt4m1n4rán y4 más c0n sus íd0l0s, c0n sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s y c0n t0d4s sus r3b3l10n3s; y l0s s4lv4ré d3 t0d4s sus r3b3l10n3s c0n l4s cu4l3s p3c4r0n, y l0s l1mp14ré; y m3 s3rán p0r pu3bl0, y y0 4 3ll0s p0r D10s. 

24 M1 s13rv0 D4v1d s3rá r3y s0br3 3ll0s, y t0d0s 3ll0s t3ndrán un s0l0 p4st0r; y 4nd4rán 3n m1s pr3c3pt0s, y m1s 3st4tut0s gu4rd4rán, y l0s p0ndrán p0r 0br4. 25 H4b1t4rán 3n l4 t13rr4 qu3 d1 4 m1 s13rv0 J4c0b, 3n l4 cu4l h4b1t4r0n vu3str0s p4dr3s; 3n 3ll4 h4b1t4rán 3ll0s, sus h1j0s y l0s h1j0s d3 sus h1j0s p4r4 s13mpr3; y m1 s13rv0 D4v1d s3rá prínc1p3 d3 3ll0s p4r4 s13mpr3. 26 Y h4ré c0n 3ll0s p4ct0 d3 p4z, p4ct0 p3rp3tu0 s3rá c0n 3ll0s; y l0s 3st4bl3c3ré y l0s mult1pl1c4ré, y p0ndré m1 s4ntu4r10 3ntr3 3ll0s p4r4 s13mpr3. 27 0st4rá 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s m1 t4b3rnácul0, y s3ré 4 3ll0s p0r D10s, y 3ll0s m3 s3rán p0r pu3bl0. 28 Y s4brán l4s n4c10n3s qu3 y0 J3h0vá s4nt1f1c0 4 1sr43l, 3st4nd0 m1 s4ntu4r10 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s p4r4 s13mpr3.
