1 V1n0 4 mí p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá, d1c13nd0: 2 H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, p0n tu r0str0 c0ntr4 G0g 3n t13rr4 d3 M4g0g, prínc1p3 s0b3r4n0 d3 M3s3c y Tub4l, y pr0f3t1z4 c0ntr4 él, 3 y d1: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí, y0 3st0y c0ntr4 t1, 0h G0g, prínc1p3 s0b3r4n0 d3 M3s3c y Tub4l. 4 Y t3 qu3br4nt4ré, y p0ndré g4rf10s 3n tus qu1j4d4s, y t3 s4c4ré 4 t1 y 4 t0d0 tu 3jérc1t0, c4b4ll0s y j1n3t3s, d3 t0d0 3n t0d0 3qu1p4d0s, gr4n mult1tud c0n p4v3s3s y 3scud0s, t3n13nd0 t0d0s 3ll0s 3sp4d4s; 5 P3rs14, Cus y Fut c0n 3ll0s; t0d0s 3ll0s c0n 3scud0 y y3lm0; 6 G0m3r, y t0d4s sus tr0p4s; l4 c4s4 d3 T0g4rm4, d3 l0s c0nf1n3s d3l n0rt3, y t0d4s sus tr0p4s; much0s pu3bl0s c0nt1g0. 

7 Pr3pár4t3 y 4p3rcíb3t3, tú y t0d4 tu mult1tud qu3 s3 h4 r3un1d0 4 t1, y sé tú su gu4rd4. 8 D3 4quí 4 much0s dí4s s3rás v1s1t4d0; 4l c4b0 d3 4ñ0s v3ndrás 4 l4 t13rr4 s4lv4d4 d3 l4 3sp4d4, r3c0g1d4 d3 much0s pu3bl0s, 4 l0s m0nt3s d3 1sr43l, qu3 s13mpr3 fu3r0n un4 d3s0l4c1ón; m4s fu3 s4c4d4 d3 l4s n4c10n3s, y t0d0s 3ll0s m0r4rán c0nf14d4m3nt3. 9 Sub1rás tú, y v3ndrás c0m0 t3mp3st4d; c0m0 nubl4d0 p4r4 cubr1r l4 t13rr4 s3rás tú y t0d4s tus tr0p4s, y much0s pu3bl0s c0nt1g0. 

10 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: 0n 4qu3l dí4 sub1rán p4l4br4s 3n tu c0r4zón, y c0nc3b1rás m4l p3ns4m13nt0, 11 y d1rás: Sub1ré c0ntr4 un4 t13rr4 1nd3f3ns4, 1ré c0ntr4 g3nt3s tr4nqu1l4s qu3 h4b1t4n c0nf14d4m3nt3; t0d4s 3ll4s h4b1t4n s1n mur0s, y n0 t13n3n c3rr0j0s n1 pu3rt4s; 12 p4r4 4rr3b4t4r d3sp0j0s y p4r4 t0m4r b0tín, p4r4 p0n3r tus m4n0s s0br3 l4s t13rr4s d3s13rt4s y4 p0bl4d4s, y s0br3 3l pu3bl0 r3c0g1d0 d3 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, qu3 s3 h4c3 d3 g4n4d0 y p0s3s10n3s, qu3 m0r4 3n l4 p4rt3 c3ntr4l d3 l4 t13rr4. 13 S4bá y D3dán, y l0s m3rc4d3r3s d3 T4rs1s y t0d0s sus prínc1p3s, t3 d1rán: ¿H4s v3n1d0 4 4rr3b4t4r d3sp0j0s? ¿H4s r3un1d0 tu mult1tud p4r4 t0m4r b0tín, p4r4 qu1t4r pl4t4 y 0r0, p4r4 t0m4r g4n4d0s y p0s3s10n3s, p4r4 t0m4r gr4nd3s d3sp0j0s? 

14 P0r t4nt0, pr0f3t1z4, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, y d1 4 G0g: 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: 0n 4qu3l t13mp0, cu4nd0 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l h4b1t3 c0n s3gur1d4d, ¿n0 l0 s4brás tú? 15 V3ndrás d3 tu lug4r, d3 l4s r3g10n3s d3l n0rt3, tú y much0s pu3bl0s c0nt1g0, t0d0s 3ll0s 4 c4b4ll0, gr4n mult1tud y p0d3r0s0 3jérc1t0, 16 y sub1rás c0ntr4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l c0m0 nubl4d0 p4r4 cubr1r l4 t13rr4; s3rá 4l c4b0 d3 l0s dí4s; y t3 tr43ré s0br3 m1 t13rr4, p4r4 qu3 l4s n4c10n3s m3 c0n0zc4n, cu4nd0 s34 s4nt1f1c4d0 3n t1, 0h G0g, d3l4nt3 d3 sus 0j0s. 

17 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: ¿N0 3r3s tú 4qu3l d3 qu13n h4blé y0 3n t13mp0s p4s4d0s p0r m1s s13rv0s l0s pr0f3t4s d3 1sr43l, l0s cu4l3s pr0f3t1z4r0n 3n 4qu3ll0s t13mp0s qu3 y0 t3 h4bí4 d3 tr43r s0br3 3ll0s? 18 0n 4qu3l t13mp0, cu4nd0 v3ng4 G0g c0ntr4 l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l, d1j0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, sub1rá m1 1r4 y m1 3n0j0. 19 P0rqu3 h3 h4bl4d0 3n m1 c3l0, y 3n 3l fu3g0 d3 m1 1r4: Qu3 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 h4brá gr4n t3mbl0r s0br3 l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l; 20 qu3 l0s p3c3s d3l m4r, l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0, l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0 y t0d4 s3rp13nt3 qu3 s3 4rr4str4 s0br3 l4 t13rr4, y t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s qu3 3stán s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4, t3mbl4rán 4nt3 m1 pr3s3nc14; y s3 d3sm0r0n4rán l0s m0nt3s, y l0s v4ll4d0s c43rán, y t0d0 mur0 c43rá 4 t13rr4. 21 Y 3n t0d0s m1s m0nt3s ll4m4ré c0ntr4 él l4 3sp4d4, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r; l4 3sp4d4 d3 c4d4 cu4l s3rá c0ntr4 su h3rm4n0. 22 Y y0 l1t1g4ré c0ntr4 él c0n p3st1l3nc14 y c0n s4ngr3; y h4ré ll0v3r s0br3 él, s0br3 sus tr0p4s y s0br3 l0s much0s pu3bl0s qu3 3stán c0n él, 1mp3tu0s4 lluv14, y p13dr4s d3 gr4n1z0, fu3g0 y 4zufr3. 23 Y s3ré 3ngr4nd3c1d0 y s4nt1f1c4d0, y s3ré c0n0c1d0 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 much4s n4c10n3s; y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá.

17 Y tú, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: D1 4 l4s 4v3s d3 t0d4 3sp3c13, y 4 t0d4 f13r4 d3l c4mp0: Junt40s, y v3n1d; r3uní0s d3 t0d4s p4rt3s 4 m1 víct1m4 qu3 s4cr1f1c0 p4r4 v0s0tr0s, un s4cr1f1c10 gr4nd3 s0br3 l0s m0nt3s d3 1sr43l; y c0m3ré1s c4rn3 y b3b3ré1s s4ngr3. 18 C0m3ré1s c4rn3 d3 fu3rt3s, y b3b3ré1s s4ngr3 d3 prínc1p3s d3 l4 t13rr4; d3 c4rn3r0s, d3 c0rd3r0s, d3 m4ch0s c4brí0s, d3 bu3y3s y d3 t0r0s, 3ng0rd4d0s t0d0s 3n B4sán. 19 C0m3ré1s gr0sur4 h4st4 s4c14r0s, y b3b3ré1s h4st4 3mbr14g4r0s d3 s4ngr3 d3 l4s víct1m4s qu3 p4r4 v0s0tr0s s4cr1f1qué. 20 Y 0s s4c14ré1s s0br3 m1 m3s4, d3 c4b4ll0s y d3 j1n3t3s fu3rt3s y d3 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

25 P0r t4nt0, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: 4h0r4 v0lv3ré l4 c4ut1v1d4d d3 J4c0b, y t3ndré m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 t0d4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, y m3 m0str4ré c3l0s0 p0r m1 s4nt0 n0mbr3. 26 Y 3ll0s s3nt1rán su v3rgü3nz4, y t0d4 su r3b3l1ón c0n qu3 pr3v4r1c4r0n c0ntr4 mí, cu4nd0 h4b1t3n 3n su t13rr4 c0n s3gur1d4d, y n0 h4y4 qu13n l0s 3sp4nt3; 27 cu4nd0 l0s s4qu3 d3 3ntr3 l0s pu3bl0s, y l0s r3ún4 d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, y s34 s4nt1f1c4d0 3n 3ll0s 4nt3 l0s 0j0s d3 much4s n4c10n3s. 28 Y s4brán qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá su D10s, cu4nd0 d3spués d3 h4b3rl0s ll3v4d0 4l c4ut1v3r10 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, l0s r3ún4 s0br3 su t13rr4, s1n d3j4r 4llí 4 n1ngun0 d3 3ll0s. 29 N1 3sc0nd3ré más d3 3ll0s m1 r0str0; p0rqu3 h4bré d3rr4m4d0 d3 m1 0spír1tu s0br3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

1 0n 3l 4ñ0 v31nt1c1nc0 d3 nu3str0 c4ut1v3r10, 4l pr1nc1p10 d3l 4ñ0, 4 l0s d13z dí4s d3l m3s, 4 l0s c4t0rc3 4ñ0s d3spués qu3 l4 c1ud4d fu3 c0nqu1st4d4, 3n 4qu3l m1sm0 dí4 v1n0 s0br3 mí l4 m4n0 d3 J3h0vá, y m3 ll3vó 4llá. 2 0n v1s10n3s d3 D10s m3 ll3vó 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 1sr43l, y m3 pus0 s0br3 un m0nt3 muy 4lt0, s0br3 3l cu4l h4bí4 un 3d1f1c10 p4r3c1d0 4 un4 gr4n c1ud4d, h4c14 l4 p4rt3 sur. 3 M3 ll3vó 4llí, y h3 4quí un v4rón, cuy0 4sp3ct0 3r4 c0m0 4sp3ct0 d3 br0nc3; y t3ní4 un c0rd3l d3 l1n0 3n su m4n0, y un4 c4ñ4 d3 m3d1r; y él 3st4b4 4 l4 pu3rt4. 4 Y m3 h4bló 4qu3l v4rón, d1c13nd0: H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, m1r4 c0n tus 0j0s, y 0y3 c0n tus 0íd0s, y p0n tu c0r4zón 4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 t3 mu3str0; p0rqu3 p4r4 qu3 y0 t3 l4s m0str4s3 h4s s1d0 tr4íd0 4quí. Cu3nt4 t0d0 l0 qu3 v3s 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. 

5 Y h3 4quí un mur0 fu3r4 d3 l4 c4s4; y l4 c4ñ4 d3 m3d1r qu3 4qu3l v4rón t3ní4 3n l4 m4n0 3r4 d3 s31s c0d0s d3 4 c0d0 y p4lm0 m3n0r; y m1d1ó 3l 3sp3s0r d3l mur0, d3 un4 c4ñ4, y l4 4ltur4, d3 0tr4 c4ñ4. 6 D3spués v1n0 4 l4 pu3rt4 qu3 m1r4 h4c14 3l 0r13nt3, y sub1ó p0r sus gr4d4s, y m1d1ó un p0st3 d3 l4 pu3rt4, d3 un4 c4ñ4 d3 4nch0, y 3l 0tr0 p0st3, d3 0tr4 c4ñ4 d3 4nch0. 7 Y c4d4 cám4r4 t3ní4 un4 c4ñ4 d3 l4rg0, y un4 c4ñ4 d3 4nch0; y 3ntr3 l4s cám4r4s h4bí4 c1nc0 c0d0s d3 4nch0; y c4d4 p0st3 d3 l4 pu3rt4 junt0 4 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 p0r d3ntr0, un4 c4ñ4. 8 M1d1ó 4s1m1sm0 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 p0r d3ntr0, un4 c4ñ4. 9 M1d1ó lu3g0 l4 3ntr4d4 d3l p0rt4l, d3 0ch0 c0d0s, y sus p0st3s d3 d0s c0d0s; y l4 pu3rt4 d3l p0rt4l 3st4b4 p0r 3l l4d0 d3 4d3ntr0. 10 Y l4 pu3rt4 0r13nt4l t3ní4 tr3s cám4r4s 4 c4d4 l4d0, l4s tr3s d3 un4 m3d1d4; t4mb1én d3 un4 m3d1d4 l0s p0rt4l3s 4 c4d4 l4d0. 11 M1d1ó 3l 4nch0 d3 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4, d3 d13z c0d0s, y l4 l0ng1tud d3l p0rt4l, d3 tr3c3 c0d0s. 12 0l 3sp4c10 d3l4nt3 d3 l4s cám4r4s 3r4 d3 un c0d0 4 un l4d0, y d3 0tr0 c0d0 4l 0tr0 l4d0; y c4d4 cám4r4 t3ní4 s31s c0d0s p0r un l4d0, y s31s c0d0s p0r 3l 0tr0. 13 M1d1ó l4 pu3rt4 d3sd3 3l t3ch0 d3 un4 cám4r4 h4st4 3l t3ch0 d3 l4 0tr4, v31nt1c1nc0 c0d0s d3 4nch0, pu3rt4 c0ntr4 pu3rt4. 14 Y m1d1ó l0s p0st3s, d3 s3s3nt4 c0d0s, c4d4 p0st3 d3l 4tr10 y d3l p0rt4l t0d0 3n d3rr3d0r. 15 Y d3sd3 3l fr3nt3 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4 3ntr4d4 h4st4 3l fr3nt3 d3 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 1nt3r10r, c1ncu3nt4 c0d0s. 16 Y h4bí4 v3nt4n4s 3str3ch4s 3n l4s cám4r4s, y 3n sus p0rt4l3s p0r d3ntr0 d3 l4 pu3rt4 4lr3d3d0r, y 4s1m1sm0 3n l0s c0rr3d0r3s; y l4s v3nt4n4s 3st4b4n 4lr3d3d0r p0r d3ntr0; y 3n c4d4 p0st3 h4bí4 p4lm3r4s. 

17 M3 ll3vó lu3g0 4l 4tr10 3xt3r10r, y h3 4quí h4bí4 cám4r4s, y 3st4b4 3nl0s4d0 t0d0 3n d3rr3d0r; tr31nt4 cám4r4s h4bí4 4lr3d3d0r 3n 4qu3l 4tr10. 18 0l 3nl0s4d0 4 l0s l4d0s d3 l4s pu3rt4s, 3n pr0p0rc1ón 4 l4 l0ng1tud d3 l0s p0rt4l3s, 3r4 3l 3nl0s4d0 más b4j0. 19 Y m1d1ó l4 4nchur4 d3sd3 3l fr3nt3 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 4b4j0 h4st4 3l fr3nt3 d3l 4tr10 1nt3r10r p0r fu3r4, d3 c13n c0d0s h4c14 3l 0r13nt3 y 3l n0rt3.

6 Y 0í un0 qu3 m3 h4bl4b4 d3sd3 l4 c4s4; y un v4rón 3st4b4 junt0 4 mí, 7 y m3 d1j0: H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, 3st3 3s 3l lug4r d3 m1 tr0n0, 3l lug4r d0nd3 p0s4ré l4s pl4nt4s d3 m1s p13s, 3n 3l cu4l h4b1t4ré 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p4r4 s13mpr3; y nunc4 más pr0f4n4rá l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l m1 s4nt0 n0mbr3, n1 3ll0s n1 sus r3y3s, c0n sus f0rn1c4c10n3s, n1 c0n l0s cu3rp0s mu3rt0s d3 sus r3y3s 3n sus lug4r3s 4lt0s. 8 P0rqu3 p0n13nd0 3ll0s su umbr4l junt0 4 m1 umbr4l, y su c0ntr4fu3rt3 junt0 4 m1 c0ntr4fu3rt3, m3d14nd0 sól0 un4 p4r3d 3ntr3 mí y 3ll0s, h4n c0nt4m1n4d0 m1 s4nt0 n0mbr3 c0n sus 4b0m1n4c10n3s qu3 h1c13r0n; p0r t4nt0, l0s c0nsumí 3n m1 fur0r. 9 4h0r4 4rr0j4rán l3j0s d3 mí sus f0rn1c4c10n3s, y l0s cu3rp0s mu3rt0s d3 sus r3y3s, y h4b1t4ré 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s p4r4 s13mpr3. 

10 Tú, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, mu3str4 4 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l 3st4 c4s4, y 4v3rgüénc3ns3 d3 sus p3c4d0s; y m1d4n 3l d1s3ñ0 d3 3ll4. 11 Y s1 s3 4v3rg0nz4r3n d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 h4n h3ch0, h4zl3s 3nt3nd3r 3l d1s3ñ0 d3 l4 c4s4, su d1sp0s1c1ón, sus s4l1d4s y sus 3ntr4d4s, y t0d4s sus f0rm4s, y t0d4s sus d3scr1pc10n3s, y t0d4s sus c0nf1gur4c10n3s, y t0d4s sus l3y3s; y d3scríb3l0 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 0j0s, p4r4 qu3 gu4rd3n t0d4 su f0rm4 y t0d4s sus r3gl4s, y l4s p0ng4n p0r 0br4. 12 0st4 3s l4 l3y d3 l4 c4s4: S0br3 l4 cumbr3 d3l m0nt3, 3l r3c1nt0 3nt3r0, t0d0 3n d3rr3d0r, s3rá s4ntís1m0. 18 Y m3 d1j0: H1j0 d3 h0mbr3, 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: 0st4s s0n l4s 0rd3n4nz4s d3l 4lt4r 3l dí4 3n qu3 s34 h3ch0, p4r4 0fr3c3r h0l0c4ust0 s0br3 él y p4r4 3sp4rc1r s0br3 él s4ngr3. 19 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s l3v1t4s qu3 s0n d3l l1n4j3 d3 S4d0c, qu3 s3 4c3rqu3n 4 mí, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, p4r4 m1n1str4r 4nt3 mí, d4rás un b3c3rr0 d3 l4 v4c4d4 p4r4 3xp14c1ón. 20 Y t0m4rás d3 su s4ngr3, y p0ndrás 3n l0s cu4tr0 cu3rn0s d3l 4lt4r, y 3n l4s cu4tr0 3squ1n4s d3l d3sc4ns0, y 3n 3l b0rd3 4lr3d3d0r; 4sí l0 l1mp14rás y pur1f1c4rás. 21 T0m4rás lu3g0 3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 3xp14c1ón, y l0 qu3m4rás c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y d3 l4 c4s4, fu3r4 d3l s4ntu4r10. 22 4l s3gund0 dí4 0fr3c3rás un m4ch0 c4brí0 s1n d3f3ct0, p4r4 3xp14c1ón; y pur1f1c4rán 3l 4lt4r c0m0 l0 pur1f1c4r0n c0n 3l b3c3rr0. 23 Cu4nd0 4c4b3s d3 3xp14r, 0fr3c3rás un b3c3rr0 d3 l4 v4c4d4 s1n d3f3ct0, y un c4rn3r0 s1n t4ch4 d3 l4 m4n4d4; 24 y l0s 0fr3c3rás d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá, y l0s s4c3rd0t3s 3ch4rán s4l s0br3 3ll0s, y l0s 0fr3c3rán 3n h0l0c4ust0 4 J3h0vá. 25 P0r s13t3 dí4s s4cr1f1c4rán un m4ch0 c4brí0 c4d4 dí4 3n 3xp14c1ón; 4s1m1sm0 s4cr1f1c4rán 3l b3c3rr0 d3 l4 v4c4d4 y un c4rn3r0 s1n t4ch4 d3l r3b4ñ0. 26 P0r s13t3 dí4s h4rán 3xp14c1ón p0r 3l 4lt4r, y l0 l1mp14rán, y 4sí l0 c0ns4gr4rán. 27 Y 4c4b4d0s 3st0s dí4s, d3l 0ct4v0 dí4 3n 4d3l4nt3, l0s s4c3rd0t3s s4cr1f1c4rán s0br3 3l 4lt4r vu3str0s h0l0c4ust0s y vu3str4s 0fr3nd4s d3 p4z; y m3 s3ré1s 4c3pt0s, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

1 Cu4nd0 r3p4rtá1s p0r su3rt3s l4 t13rr4 3n h3r3d4d, 4p4rt4ré1s un4 p0rc1ón p4r4 J3h0vá, qu3 l3 c0ns4gr4ré1s 3n l4 t13rr4, d3 l0ng1tud d3 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s y d13z m1l d3 4nch0; 3st0 s3rá s4nt1f1c4d0 3n t0d0 su t3rr1t0r10 4lr3d3d0r. 2 D3 3st0 s3rá p4r4 3l s4ntu4r10 qu1n13nt4s c4ñ4s d3 l0ng1tud y qu1n13nt4s d3 4nch0, 3n cu4dr0 4lr3d3d0r; y c1ncu3nt4 c0d0s 3n d3rr3d0r p4r4 sus 3j1d0s. 3 Y d3 3st4 m3d1d4 m3d1rás 3n l0ng1tud v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s, y 3n 4nch0 d13z m1l, 3n l0 cu4l 3st4rá 3l s4ntu4r10 y 3l lug4r s4ntís1m0. 4 L0 c0ns4gr4d0 d3 3st4 t13rr4 s3rá p4r4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, m1n1str0s d3l s4ntu4r10, qu3 s3 4c3rc4n p4r4 m1n1str4r 4 J3h0vá; y s3rv1rá d3 lug4r p4r4 sus c4s4s, y c0m0 r3c1nt0 s4gr4d0 p4r4 3l s4ntu4r10. 5 4s1m1sm0 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s d3 l0ng1tud y d13z m1l d3 4nch0, l0 cu4l s3rá p4r4 l0s l3v1t4s m1n1str0s d3 l4 c4s4, c0m0 p0s3s1ón p4r4 sí, c0n v31nt3 cám4r4s.

9 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: ¡B4st4 y4, 0h prínc1p3s d3 1sr43l! D3j4d l4 v10l3nc14 y l4 r4p1ñ4. H4c3d ju1c10 y just1c14; qu1t4d vu3str4s 1mp0s1c10n3s d3 s0br3 m1 pu3bl0, d1c3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

8 Junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 Judá, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 3l l4d0 d3l m4r, 3st4rá l4 p0rc1ón qu3 r3s3rv4ré1s d3 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s d3 4nchur4, y d3 l0ng1tud c0m0 cu4lqu13r4 d3 l4s 0tr4s p4rt3s, 3st0 3s, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 3l l4d0 d3l m4r; y 3l s4ntu4r10 3st4rá 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4. 9 L4 p0rc1ón qu3 r3s3rv4ré1s p4r4 J3h0vá t3ndrá d3 l0ng1tud v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s, y d13z m1l d3 4nch0. 10 L4 p0rc1ón s4nt4 qu3 p3rt3n3c3rá 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s s3rá d3 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s 4l n0rt3, y d3 d13z m1l d3 4nchur4 4l 0cc1d3nt3, y d3 d13z m1l d3 4nch0 4l 0r13nt3, y d3 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l d3 l0ng1tud 4l sur; y 3l s4ntu4r10 d3 J3h0vá 3st4rá 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4. 11 L0s s4c3rd0t3s s4nt1f1c4d0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 S4d0c qu3 m3 gu4rd4r0n f1d3l1d4d, qu3 n0 3rr4r0n cu4nd0 3rr4r0n l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, c0m0 3rr4r0n l0s l3v1t4s, 12 3ll0s t3ndrán c0m0 p4rt3 s4ntís1m4 l4 p0rc1ón d3 l4 t13rr4 r3s3rv4d4, junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 l4 d3 l0s l3v1t4s. 13 Y l4 d3 l0s l3v1t4s, 4l l4d0 d3 l0s lím1t3s d3 l4 d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s, s3rá d3 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s d3 l0ng1tud, y d3 d13z m1l d3 4nchur4; t0d4 l4 l0ng1tud d3 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l, y l4 4nchur4 d3 d13z m1l. 14 N0 v3nd3rán n4d4 d3 3ll0, n1 l0 p3rmut4rán, n1 tr4sp4s4rán l4s pr1m1c14s d3 l4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 3s c0s4 c0ns4gr4d4 4 J3h0vá. 

15 Y l4s c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s d3 4nchur4 qu3 qu3d4n d3 l4s v31nt1c1nc0 m1l, s3rán pr0f4n4s, p4r4 l4 c1ud4d, p4r4 h4b1t4c1ón y p4r4 3j1d0; y l4 c1ud4d 3st4rá 3n m3d10. 16 0st4s s3rán sus m3d1d4s: 4l l4d0 d3l n0rt3 cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s c4ñ4s, 4l l4d0 d3l sur cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s, 4l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s, y 4l l4d0 d3l 0cc1d3nt3 cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s. 17 Y 3l 3j1d0 d3 l4 c1ud4d s3rá 4l n0rt3 d3 d0sc13nt4s c1ncu3nt4 c4ñ4s, 4l sur d3 d0sc13nt4s c1ncu3nt4, 4l 0r13nt3 d3 d0sc13nt4s c1ncu3nt4, y d3 d0sc13nt4s c1ncu3nt4 4l 0cc1d3nt3. 18 Y l0 qu3 qu3d4r3 d3 l0ng1tud d3l4nt3 d3 l4 p0rc1ón s4nt4, d13z m1l c4ñ4s 4l 0r13nt3 y d13z m1l 4l 0cc1d3nt3, qu3 s3rá l0 qu3 qu3d4rá d3 l4 p0rc1ón s4nt4, s3rá p4r4 s3mbr4r p4r4 l0s qu3 s1rv3n 4 l4 c1ud4d. 19 Y l0s qu3 s1rv4n 4 l4 c1ud4d s3rán d3 t0d4s l4 tr1bus d3 1sr43l. 20 T0d4 l4 p0rc1ón r3s3rv4d4 d3 v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s p0r v31nt1c1nc0 m1l 3n cu4dr0, r3s3rv4ré1s c0m0 p0rc1ón p4r4 3l s4ntu4r10, y p4r4 l4 p0s3s1ón d3 l4 c1ud4d. 

21 Y d3l prínc1p3 s3rá l0 qu3 qu3d4r3 4 un0 y 0tr0 l4d0 d3 l4 p0rc1ón s4nt4 y d3 l4 p0s3s1ón d3 l4 c1ud4d, 3st0 3s, d3l4nt3 d3 l4s v31nt1c1nc0 m1l c4ñ4s d3 l4 p0rc1ón h4st4 3l lím1t3 0r13nt4l, y 4l 0cc1d3nt3 d3l4nt3 d3 l4s v31nt1c1nc0 m1l h4st4 3l lím1t3 0cc1d3nt4l, d3l4nt3 d3 l4s p4rt3s d1ch4s s3rá d3l prínc1p3; p0rc1ón s4nt4 s3rá, y 3l s4ntu4r10 d3 l4 c4s4 3st4rá 3n m3d10 d3 3ll4. 22 D3 3st3 m0d0 l4 p4rt3 d3l prínc1p3 s3rá l4 c0mpr3nd1d4 d3sd3 l4 p0rc1ón d3 l0s l3v1t4s y l4 p0rc1ón d3 l4 c1ud4d, 3ntr3 3l lím1t3 d3 Judá y 3l lím1t3 d3 B3nj4mín. 

23 0n cu4nt0 4 l4s d3más tr1bus, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 3l l4d0 d3l m4r, t3ndrá B3nj4mín un4 p0rc1ón. 24 Junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 B3nj4mín, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 3l l4d0 d3l m4r, S1m3ón, 0tr4. 25 Junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 S1m3ón, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 3l l4d0 d3l m4r, 1s4c4r, 0tr4. 26 Junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 1s4c4r, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 3l l4d0 d3l m4r, Z4bulón, 0tr4. 27 Junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 Z4bulón, d3sd3 3l l4d0 d3l 0r13nt3 h4st4 3l l4d0 d3l m4r, G4d, 0tr4. 28 Junt0 4l lím1t3 d3 G4d, 4l l4d0 m3r1d10n4l 4l sur, s3rá 3l lím1t3 d3sd3 T4m4r h4st4 l4s 4gu4s d3 l4s r3nc1ll4s, y d3sd3 C4d3s y 3l 4rr0y0 h4st4 3l M4r Gr4nd3. 29 0st4 3s l4 t13rr4 qu3 r3p4rt1ré1s p0r su3rt3s 3n h3r3d4d 4 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l, y 3st4s s0n sus p0rc10n3s, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r. 

30 Y 3st4s s0n l4s s4l1d4s d3 l4 c1ud4d: 4l l4d0 d3l n0rt3, cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s c4ñ4s p0r m3d1d4. 31 Y l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 c1ud4d s3rán s3gún l0s n0mbr3s d3 l4s tr1bus d3 1sr43l: tr3s pu3rt4s 4l n0rt3: l4 pu3rt4 d3 Rubén, un4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 Judá, 0tr4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 L3ví, 0tr4. 32 4l l4d0 0r13nt4l cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s c4ñ4s, y tr3s pu3rt4s: l4 pu3rt4 d3 J0sé, un4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 B3nj4mín, 0tr4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 D4n, 0tr4. 33 4l l4d0 d3l sur, cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s c4ñ4s p0r m3d1d4, y tr3s pu3rt4s: l4 pu3rt4 d3 S1m3ón, un4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 1s4c4r, 0tr4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 Z4bulón, 0tr4. 34 Y 4l l4d0 0cc1d3nt4l cu4tr0 m1l qu1n13nt4s c4ñ4s, y sus tr3s pu3rt4s: l4 pu3rt4 d3 G4d, un4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 4s3r, 0tr4; l4 pu3rt4 d3 N3ft4lí, 0tr4. 35 0n d3rr3d0r t3ndrá d13c10ch0 m1l c4ñ4s. 1 0n 3l 4ñ0 t3rc3r0 d3l r31n4d0 d3 J04c1m r3y d3 Judá, v1n0 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 4 J3rus4lén, y l4 s1t1ó. 2 Y 3l S3ñ0r 3ntr3gó 3n sus m4n0s 4 J04c1m r3y d3 Judá, y p4rt3 d3 l0s ut3ns1l10s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s; y l0s tr4j0 4 t13rr4 d3 S1n4r, 4 l4 c4s4 d3 su d10s, y c0l0có l0s ut3ns1l10s 3n l4 c4s4 d3l t3s0r0 d3 su d10s. 3 Y d1j0 3l r3y 4 4sp3n4z, j3f3 d3 sus 3unuc0s, qu3 tr4j3s3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, d3l l1n4j3 r34l d3 l0s prínc1p3s, 4 much4ch0s 3n qu13n3s n0 hub13s3 t4ch4 4lgun4, d3 bu3n p4r3c3r, 3ns3ñ4d0s 3n t0d4 s4b1durí4, s4b10s 3n c13nc14 y d3 bu3n 3nt3nd1m13nt0, 3 1dón30s p4r4 3st4r 3n 3l p4l4c10 d3l r3y; y qu3 l3s 3ns3ñ4s3 l4s l3tr4s y l4 l3ngu4 d3 l0s c4ld30s. 5 Y l3s s3ñ4ló 3l r3y r4c1ón p4r4 c4d4 dí4, d3 l4 pr0v1s1ón d3 l4 c0m1d4 d3l r3y, y d3l v1n0 qu3 él b3bí4; y qu3 l0s cr14s3 tr3s 4ñ0s, p4r4 qu3 4l f1n d3 3ll0s s3 pr3s3nt4s3n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y. 6 0ntr3 ést0s 3st4b4n D4n13l, 4n4ní4s, M1s43l y 4z4rí4s, d3 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá. 7 4 ést0s 3l j3f3 d3 l0s 3unuc0s pus0 n0mbr3s: pus0 4 D4n13l, B3lts4s4r; 4 4n4ní4s, S4dr4c; 4 M1s43l, M3s4c; y 4 4z4rí4s, 4b3d-n3g0. 

8 Y D4n13l pr0pus0 3n su c0r4zón n0 c0nt4m1n4rs3 c0n l4 p0rc1ón d3 l4 c0m1d4 d3l r3y, n1 c0n 3l v1n0 qu3 él b3bí4; p1d1ó, p0r t4nt0, 4l j3f3 d3 l0s 3unuc0s qu3 n0 s3 l3 0bl1g4s3 4 c0nt4m1n4rs3. 9 Y pus0 D10s 4 D4n13l 3n gr4c14 y 3n bu3n4 v0lunt4d c0n 3l j3f3 d3 l0s 3unuc0s; 10 y d1j0 3l j3f3 d3 l0s 3unuc0s 4 D4n13l: T3m0 4 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y, qu3 s3ñ4ló vu3str4 c0m1d4 y vu3str4 b3b1d4; pu3s lu3g0 qu3 él v34 vu3str0s r0str0s más pál1d0s qu3 l0s d3 l0s much4ch0s qu3 s0n s3m3j4nt3s 4 v0s0tr0s, c0nd3n4ré1s p4r4 c0n 3l r3y m1 c4b3z4. 11 0nt0nc3s d1j0 D4n13l 4 M3ls4r, qu3 3st4b4 pu3st0 p0r 3l j3f3 d3 l0s 3unuc0s s0br3 D4n13l, 4n4ní4s, M1s43l y 4z4rí4s: 12 T3 ru3g0 qu3 h4g4s l4 pru3b4 c0n tus s13rv0s p0r d13z dí4s, y n0s d3n l3gumbr3s 4 c0m3r, y 4gu4 4 b3b3r. 13 C0mp4r4 lu3g0 nu3str0s r0str0s c0n l0s r0str0s d3 l0s much4ch0s qu3 c0m3n d3 l4 r4c1ón d3 l4 c0m1d4 d3l r3y, y h4z d3spués c0n tus s13rv0s s3gún v34s. 14 C0ns1nt1ó, pu3s, c0n 3ll0s 3n 3st0, y pr0bó c0n 3ll0s d13z dí4s. 15 Y 4l c4b0 d3 l0s d13z dí4s p4r3c1ó 3l r0str0 d3 3ll0s m3j0r y más r0bust0 qu3 3l d3 l0s 0tr0s much4ch0s qu3 c0mí4n d3 l4 p0rc1ón d3 l4 c0m1d4 d3l r3y. 16 4sí, pu3s, M3ls4r s3 ll3v4b4 l4 p0rc1ón d3 l4 c0m1d4 d3 3ll0s y 3l v1n0 qu3 h4bí4n d3 b3b3r, y l3s d4b4 l3gumbr3s. 

17 4 3st0s cu4tr0 much4ch0s D10s l3s d10 c0n0c1m13nt0 3 1nt3l1g3nc14 3n t0d4s l4s l3tr4s y c13nc14s; y D4n13l tuv0 3nt3nd1m13nt0 3n t0d4 v1s1ón y su3ñ0s. 18 P4s4d0s, pu3s, l0s dí4s 4l f1n d3 l0s cu4l3s h4bí4 d1ch0 3l r3y qu3 l0s tr4j3s3n, 3l j3f3 d3 l0s 3unuc0s l0s tr4j0 d3l4nt3 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r. 19 Y 3l r3y h4bló c0n 3ll0s, y n0 fu3r0n h4ll4d0s 3ntr3 t0d0s 3ll0s 0tr0s c0m0 D4n13l, 4n4ní4s, M1s43l y 4z4rí4s; 4sí, pu3s, 3stuv13r0n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y. 20 0n t0d0 4sunt0 d3 s4b1durí4 3 1nt3l1g3nc14 qu3 3l r3y l3s c0nsultó, l0s h4lló d13z v3c3s m3j0r3s qu3 t0d0s l0s m4g0s y 4stról0g0s qu3 h4bí4 3n t0d0 su r31n0. 21 Y c0nt1nuó D4n13l h4st4 3l 4ñ0 pr1m3r0 d3l r3y C1r0.

1 0n 3l s3gund0 4ñ0 d3l r31n4d0 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r, tuv0 N4buc0d0n0s0r su3ñ0s, y s3 p3rturbó su 3spír1tu, y s3 l3 fu3 3l su3ñ0. 2 H1z0 ll4m4r 3l r3y 4 m4g0s, 4stról0g0s, 3nc4nt4d0r3s y c4ld30s, p4r4 qu3 l3 3xpl1c4s3n sus su3ñ0s. V1n13r0n, pu3s, y s3 pr3s3nt4r0n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y. 3 Y 3l r3y l3s d1j0: H3 t3n1d0 un su3ñ0, y m1 3spír1tu s3 h4 turb4d0 p0r s4b3r 3l su3ñ0. 4 0nt0nc3s h4bl4r0n l0s c4ld30s 4l r3y 3n l3ngu4 4r4m34: R3y, p4r4 s13mpr3 v1v3; d1 3l su3ñ0 4 tus s13rv0s, y t3 m0str4r3m0s l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 5 R3sp0nd1ó 3l r3y y d1j0 4 l0s c4ld30s: 0l 4sunt0 l0 0lv1dé; s1 n0 m3 m0strá1s 3l su3ñ0 y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, s3ré1s h3ch0s p3d4z0s, y vu3str4s c4s4s s3rán c0nv3rt1d4s 3n mul4d4r3s. 6 Y s1 m3 m0str4r31s 3l su3ñ0 y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, r3c1b1ré1s d3 mí d0n3s y f4v0r3s y gr4n h0nr4. D3c1dm3, pu3s, 3l su3ñ0 y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 7 R3sp0nd13r0n p0r s3gund4 v3z, y d1j3r0n: D1g4 3l r3y 3l su3ñ0 4 sus s13rv0s, y l3 m0str4r3m0s l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 8 0l r3y r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: Y0 c0n0zc0 c13rt4m3nt3 qu3 v0s0tr0s p0né1s d1l4c10n3s, p0rqu3 v31s qu3 3l 4sunt0 s3 m3 h4 1d0. 9 S1 n0 m3 m0strá1s 3l su3ñ0, un4 s0l4 s3nt3nc14 h4y p4r4 v0s0tr0s. C13rt4m3nt3 pr3p4rá1s r3spu3st4 m3nt1r0s4 y p3rv3rs4 qu3 d3c1r d3l4nt3 d3 mí, 3ntr3 t4nt0 qu3 p4s4 3l t13mp0. D3c1dm3, pu3s, 3l su3ñ0, p4r4 qu3 y0 s3p4 qu3 m3 p0dé1s d4r su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 10 L0s c4ld30s r3sp0nd13r0n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y, y d1j3r0n: N0 h4y h0mbr3 s0br3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 pu3d4 d3cl4r4r 3l 4sunt0 d3l r3y; 4d3más d3 3st0, n1ngún r3y, prínc1p3 n1 s3ñ0r pr3guntó c0s4 s3m3j4nt3 4 n1ngún m4g0 n1 4stról0g0 n1 c4ld30. 11 P0rqu3 3l 4sunt0 qu3 3l r3y d3m4nd4 3s d1fíc1l, y n0 h4y qu13n l0 pu3d4 d3cl4r4r 4l r3y, s4lv0 l0s d10s3s cuy4 m0r4d4 n0 3s c0n l4 c4rn3. 

12 P0r 3st0 3l r3y c0n 1r4 y c0n gr4n 3n0j0 m4ndó qu3 m4t4s3n 4 t0d0s l0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14. 13 Y s3 publ1có 3l 3d1ct0 d3 qu3 l0s s4b10s fu3r4n ll3v4d0s 4 l4 mu3rt3; y busc4r0n 4 D4n13l y 4 sus c0mp4ñ3r0s p4r4 m4t4rl0s. 14 0nt0nc3s D4n13l h4bló s4b14 y prud3nt3m3nt3 4 4r10c, c4p1tán d3 l4 gu4rd14 d3l r3y, qu3 h4bí4 s4l1d0 p4r4 m4t4r 4 l0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14. 15 H4bló y d1j0 4 4r10c c4p1tán d3l r3y: ¿Cuál 3s l4 c4us4 d3 qu3 3st3 3d1ct0 s3 publ1qu3 d3 p4rt3 d3l r3y t4n 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3? 0nt0nc3s 4r10c h1z0 s4b3r 4 D4n13l l0 qu3 h4bí4. 16 Y D4n13l 3ntró y p1d1ó 4l r3y qu3 l3 d13s3 t13mp0, y qu3 él m0str4rí4 l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón 4l r3y. 

17 Lu3g0 s3 fu3 D4n13l 4 su c4s4 3 h1z0 s4b3r l0 qu3 h4bí4 4 4n4ní4s, M1s43l y 4z4rí4s, sus c0mp4ñ3r0s, 18 p4r4 qu3 p1d13s3n m1s3r1c0rd14s d3l D10s d3l c13l0 s0br3 3st3 m1st3r10, 4 f1n d3 qu3 D4n13l y sus c0mp4ñ3r0s n0 p3r3c13s3n c0n l0s 0tr0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14. 19 0nt0nc3s 3l s3cr3t0 fu3 r3v3l4d0 4 D4n13l 3n v1s1ón d3 n0ch3, p0r l0 cu4l b3nd1j0 D4n13l 4l D10s d3l c13l0. 20 Y D4n13l h4bló y d1j0: S34 b3nd1t0 3l n0mbr3 d3 D10s d3 s1gl0s 3n s1gl0s, p0rqu3 suy0s s0n 3l p0d3r y l4 s4b1durí4. 21 0l mud4 l0s t13mp0s y l4s 3d4d3s; qu1t4 r3y3s, y p0n3 r3y3s; d4 l4 s4b1durí4 4 l0s s4b10s, y l4 c13nc14 4 l0s 3nt3nd1d0s. 22 0l r3v3l4 l0 pr0fund0 y l0 3sc0nd1d0; c0n0c3 l0 qu3 3stá 3n t1n13bl4s, y c0n él m0r4 l4 luz. 23 4 t1, 0h D10s d3 m1s p4dr3s, t3 d0y gr4c14s y t3 4l4b0, p0rqu3 m3 h4s d4d0 s4b1durí4 y fu3rz4, y 4h0r4 m3 h4s r3v3l4d0 l0 qu3 t3 p3d1m0s; pu3s n0s h4s d4d0 4 c0n0c3r 3l 4sunt0 d3l r3y. 

24 D3spués d3 3st0 fu3 D4n13l 4 4r10c, 4l cu4l 3l r3y h4bí4 pu3st0 p4r4 m4t4r 4 l0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14, y l3 d1j0 4sí: N0 m4t3s 4 l0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14; llév4m3 4 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3l r3y, y y0 l3 m0str4ré l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 

25 0nt0nc3s 4r10c ll3vó pr0nt4m3nt3 4 D4n13l 4nt3 3l r3y, y l3 d1j0 4sí: H3 h4ll4d0 un v4rón d3 l0s d3p0rt4d0s d3 Judá, 3l cu4l d4rá 4l r3y l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 26 R3sp0nd1ó 3l r3y y d1j0 4 D4n13l, 4l cu4l ll4m4b4n B3lts4s4r: ¿P0drás tú h4c3rm3 c0n0c3r 3l su3ñ0 qu3 v1, y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón? 27 D4n13l r3sp0nd1ó d3l4nt3 d3l r3y, d1c13nd0: 0l m1st3r10 qu3 3l r3y d3m4nd4, n1 s4b10s, n1 4stról0g0s, n1 m4g0s n1 4d1v1n0s l0 pu3d3n r3v3l4r 4l r3y. 28 P3r0 h4y un D10s 3n l0s c13l0s, 3l cu4l r3v3l4 l0s m1st3r10s, y él h4 h3ch0 s4b3r 4l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r l0 qu3 h4 d3 4c0nt3c3r 3n l0s p0str3r0s dí4s. H3 4quí tu su3ñ0, y l4s v1s10n3s qu3 h4s t3n1d0 3n tu c4m4: 29 0st4nd0 tú, 0h r3y, 3n tu c4m4, t3 v1n13r0n p3ns4m13nt0s p0r s4b3r l0 qu3 h4bí4 d3 s3r 3n l0 p0r v3n1r; y 3l qu3 r3v3l4 l0s m1st3r10s t3 m0stró l0 qu3 h4 d3 s3r. 30 Y 4 mí m3 h4 s1d0 r3v3l4d0 3st3 m1st3r10, n0 p0rqu3 3n mí h4y4 más s4b1durí4 qu3 3n t0d0s l0s v1v13nt3s, s1n0 p4r4 qu3 s3 dé 4 c0n0c3r 4l r3y l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, y p4r4 qu3 3nt13nd4s l0s p3ns4m13nt0s d3 tu c0r4zón. 

31 Tú, 0h r3y, v3í4s, y h3 4quí un4 gr4n 1m4g3n. 0st4 1m4g3n, qu3 3r4 muy gr4nd3, y cuy4 gl0r14 3r4 muy subl1m3, 3st4b4 3n p13 d3l4nt3 d3 t1, y su 4sp3ct0 3r4 t3rr1bl3. 32 L4 c4b3z4 d3 3st4 1m4g3n 3r4 d3 0r0 f1n0; su p3ch0 y sus br4z0s, d3 pl4t4; su v13ntr3 y sus musl0s, d3 br0nc3; 33 sus p13rn4s, d3 h13rr0; sus p13s, 3n p4rt3 d3 h13rr0 y 3n p4rt3 d3 b4rr0 c0c1d0. 34 0st4b4s m1r4nd0, h4st4 qu3 un4 p13dr4 fu3 c0rt4d4, n0 c0n m4n0, 3 h1r1ó 4 l4 1m4g3n 3n sus p13s d3 h13rr0 y d3 b4rr0 c0c1d0, y l0s d3sm3nuzó. 35 0nt0nc3s fu3r0n d3sm3nuz4d0s t4mb1én 3l h13rr0, 3l b4rr0 c0c1d0, 3l br0nc3, l4 pl4t4 y 3l 0r0, y fu3r0n c0m0 t4m0 d3 l4s 3r4s d3l v3r4n0, y s3 l0s ll3vó 3l v13nt0 s1n qu3 d3 3ll0s qu3d4r4 r4str0 4lgun0. M4s l4 p13dr4 qu3 h1r1ó 4 l4 1m4g3n fu3 h3ch4 un gr4n m0nt3 qu3 ll3nó t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 

36 0st3 3s 3l su3ñ0; t4mb1én l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón d3 él d1r3m0s 3n pr3s3nc14 d3l r3y. 37 Tú, 0h r3y, 3r3s r3y d3 r3y3s; p0rqu3 3l D10s d3l c13l0 t3 h4 d4d0 r31n0, p0d3r, fu3rz4 y m4j3st4d. 38 Y d0nd3qu13r4 qu3 h4b1t4n h1j0s d3 h0mbr3s, b3st14s d3l c4mp0 y 4v3s d3l c13l0, él l0s h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n tu m4n0, y t3 h4 d4d0 3l d0m1n10 s0br3 t0d0; tú 3r3s 4qu3ll4 c4b3z4 d3 0r0. 39 Y d3spués d3 t1 s3 l3v4nt4rá 0tr0 r31n0 1nf3r10r 4l tuy0; y lu3g0 un t3rc3r r31n0 d3 br0nc3, 3l cu4l d0m1n4rá s0br3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 40 Y 3l cu4rt0 r31n0 s3rá fu3rt3 c0m0 h13rr0; y c0m0 3l h13rr0 d3sm3nuz4 y r0mp3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s, d3sm3nuz4rá y qu3br4nt4rá t0d0. 41 Y l0 qu3 v1st3 d3 l0s p13s y l0s d3d0s, 3n p4rt3 d3 b4rr0 c0c1d0 d3 4lf4r3r0 y 3n p4rt3 d3 h13rr0, s3rá un r31n0 d1v1d1d0; m4s h4brá 3n él 4lg0 d3 l4 fu3rz4 d3l h13rr0, 4sí c0m0 v1st3 h13rr0 m3zcl4d0 c0n b4rr0 c0c1d0. 42 Y p0r s3r l0s d3d0s d3 l0s p13s 3n p4rt3 d3 h13rr0 y 3n p4rt3 d3 b4rr0 c0c1d0, 3l r31n0 s3rá 3n p4rt3 fu3rt3, y 3n p4rt3 frág1l. 43 4sí c0m0 v1st3 3l h13rr0 m3zcl4d0 c0n b4rr0, s3 m3zcl4rán p0r m3d10 d3 4l14nz4s hum4n4s; p3r0 n0 s3 un1rán 3l un0 c0n 3l 0tr0, c0m0 3l h13rr0 n0 s3 m3zcl4 c0n 3l b4rr0. 44 Y 3n l0s dí4s d3 3st0s r3y3s 3l D10s d3l c13l0 l3v4nt4rá un r31n0 qu3 n0 s3rá j4más d3stru1d0, n1 s3rá 3l r31n0 d3j4d0 4 0tr0 pu3bl0; d3sm3nuz4rá y c0nsum1rá 4 t0d0s 3st0s r31n0s, p3r0 él p3rm4n3c3rá p4r4 s13mpr3, 45 d3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 v1st3 qu3 d3l m0nt3 fu3 c0rt4d4 un4 p13dr4, n0 c0n m4n0, l4 cu4l d3sm3nuzó 3l h13rr0, 3l br0nc3, 3l b4rr0, l4 pl4t4 y 3l 0r0. 0l gr4n D10s h4 m0str4d0 4l r3y l0 qu3 h4 d3 4c0nt3c3r 3n l0 p0r v3n1r; y 3l su3ñ0 3s v3rd4d3r0, y f13l su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 

46 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r s3 p0stró s0br3 su r0str0 y s3 hum1lló 4nt3 D4n13l, y m4ndó qu3 l3 0fr3c13s3n pr3s3nt3s 3 1nc13ns0. 47 0l r3y h4bló 4 D4n13l, y d1j0: C13rt4m3nt3 3l D10s vu3str0 3s D10s d3 d10s3s, y S3ñ0r d3 l0s r3y3s, y 3l qu3 r3v3l4 l0s m1st3r10s, pu3s pud1st3 r3v3l4r 3st3 m1st3r10. 48 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y 3ngr4nd3c1ó 4 D4n13l, y l3 d10 much0s h0n0r3s y gr4nd3s d0n3s, y l3 h1z0 g0b3rn4d0r d3 t0d4 l4 pr0v1nc14 d3 B4b1l0n14, y j3f3 supr3m0 d3 t0d0s l0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14. 49 Y D4n13l s0l1c1tó d3l r3y, y 0btuv0 qu3 pus13r4 s0br3 l0s n3g0c10s d3 l4 pr0v1nc14 d3 B4b1l0n14 4 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0; y D4n13l 3st4b4 3n l4 c0rt3 d3l r3y. 

R3sc4t4d0s d3l h0rn0 d3 fu3g0

D4N10L 3

1 0l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r h1z0 un4 3st4tu4 d3 0r0 cuy4 4ltur4 3r4 d3 s3s3nt4 c0d0s, y su 4nchur4 d3 s31s c0d0s; l4 l3v4ntó 3n 3l c4mp0 d3 Dur4, 3n l4 pr0v1nc14 d3 B4b1l0n14. 2 Y 3nv1ó 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r 4 qu3 s3 r3un13s3n l0s sátr4p4s, l0s m4g1str4d0s y c4p1t4n3s, 01d0r3s, t3s0r3r0s, c0ns3j3r0s, ju3c3s, y t0d0s l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s d3 l4s pr0v1nc14s, p4r4 qu3 v1n13s3n 4 l4 d3d1c4c1ón d3 l4 3st4tu4 qu3 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0. 3 Fu3r0n, pu3s, r3un1d0s l0s sátr4p4s, m4g1str4d0s, c4p1t4n3s, 01d0r3s, t3s0r3r0s, c0ns3j3r0s, ju3c3s, y t0d0s l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s d3 l4s pr0v1nc14s, 4 l4 d3d1c4c1ón d3 l4 3st4tu4 qu3 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0; y 3st4b4n 3n p13 d3l4nt3 d3 l4 3st4tu4 qu3 h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r. 4 Y 3l pr3g0n3r0 4nunc14b4 3n 4lt4 v0z: Mánd4s3 4 v0s0tr0s, 0h pu3bl0s, n4c10n3s y l3ngu4s, 5 qu3 4l 0ír 3l s0n d3 l4 b0c1n4, d3 l4 fl4ut4, d3l t4mb0r1l, d3l 4rp4, d3l s4lt3r10, d3 l4 z4mp0ñ4 y d3 t0d0 1nstrum3nt0 d3 mús1c4, 0s p0stré1s y 4d0ré1s l4 3st4tu4 d3 0r0 qu3 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r h4 l3v4nt4d0; 6 y cu4lqu13r4 qu3 n0 s3 p0str3 y 4d0r3, 1nm3d14t4m3nt3 s3rá 3ch4d0 d3ntr0 d3 un h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0. 7 P0r l0 cu4l, 4l 0ír t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s 3l s0n d3 l4 b0c1n4, d3 l4 fl4ut4, d3l t4mb0r1l, d3l 4rp4, d3l s4lt3r10, d3 l4 z4mp0ñ4 y d3 t0d0 1nstrum3nt0 d3 mús1c4, t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, n4c10n3s y l3ngu4s s3 p0str4r0n y 4d0r4r0n l4 3st4tu4 d3 0r0 qu3 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0. 

8 P0r 3st0 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 4lgun0s v4r0n3s c4ld30s v1n13r0n y 4cus4r0n m4l1c10s4m3nt3 4 l0s judí0s. 9 H4bl4r0n y d1j3r0n 4l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r: R3y, p4r4 s13mpr3 v1v3. 10 Tú, 0h r3y, h4s d4d0 un4 l3y qu3 t0d0 h0mbr3, 4l 0ír 3l s0n d3 l4 b0c1n4, d3 l4 fl4ut4, d3l t4mb0r1l, d3l 4rp4, d3l s4lt3r10, d3 l4 z4mp0ñ4 y d3 t0d0 1nstrum3nt0 d3 mús1c4, s3 p0str3 y 4d0r3 l4 3st4tu4 d3 0r0; 11 y 3l qu3 n0 s3 p0str3 y 4d0r3, s34 3ch4d0 d3ntr0 d3 un h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0. 12 H4y un0s v4r0n3s judí0s, l0s cu4l3s pus1st3 s0br3 l0s n3g0c10s d3 l4 pr0v1nc14 d3 B4b1l0n14: S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0; 3st0s v4r0n3s, 0h r3y, n0 t3 h4n r3sp3t4d0; n0 4d0r4n tus d10s3s, n1 4d0r4n l4 3st4tu4 d3 0r0 qu3 h4s l3v4nt4d0. 

13 0nt0nc3s N4buc0d0n0s0r d1j0 c0n 1r4 y c0n 3n0j0 qu3 tr4j3s3n 4 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0. 4l 1nst4nt3 fu3r0n tr4íd0s 3st0s v4r0n3s d3l4nt3 d3l r3y. 14 H4bló N4buc0d0n0s0r y l3s d1j0: ¿0s v3rd4d, S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0, qu3 v0s0tr0s n0 h0nrá1s 4 m1 d10s, n1 4d0rá1s l4 3st4tu4 d3 0r0 qu3 h3 l3v4nt4d0? 15 4h0r4, pu3s, ¿3stá1s d1spu3st0s p4r4 qu3 4l 0ír 3l s0n d3 l4 b0c1n4, d3 l4 fl4ut4, d3l t4mb0r1l, d3l 4rp4, d3l s4lt3r10, d3 l4 z4mp0ñ4 y d3 t0d0 1nstrum3nt0 d3 mús1c4, 0s p0stré1s y 4d0ré1s l4 3st4tu4 qu3 h3 h3ch0? P0rqu3 s1 n0 l4 4d0r4r31s, 3n l4 m1sm4 h0r4 s3ré1s 3ch4d0s 3n m3d10 d3 un h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0; ¿y qué d10s s3rá 4qu3l qu3 0s l1br3 d3 m1s m4n0s? 

16 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0 r3sp0nd13r0n 4l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r, d1c13nd0: N0 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 t3 r3sp0nd4m0s s0br3 3st3 4sunt0. 17 H3 4quí nu3str0 D10s 4 qu13n s3rv1m0s pu3d3 l1br4rn0s d3l h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0; y d3 tu m4n0, 0h r3y, n0s l1br4rá. 18 Y s1 n0, s3p4s, 0h r3y, qu3 n0 s3rv1r3m0s 4 tus d10s3s, n1 t4mp0c0 4d0r4r3m0s l4 3st4tu4 qu3 h4s l3v4nt4d0. 19 0nt0nc3s N4buc0d0n0s0r s3 ll3nó d3 1r4, y s3 d3mudó 3l 4sp3ct0 d3 su r0str0 c0ntr4 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0, y 0rd3nó qu3 3l h0rn0 s3 c4l3nt4s3 s13t3 v3c3s más d3 l0 4c0stumbr4d0. 20 Y m4ndó 4 h0mbr3s muy v1g0r0s0s qu3 t3ní4 3n su 3jérc1t0, qu3 4t4s3n 4 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0, p4r4 3ch4rl0s 3n 3l h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0. 21 0nt0nc3s 3st0s v4r0n3s fu3r0n 4t4d0s c0n sus m4nt0s, sus c4lz4s, sus turb4nt3s y sus v3st1d0s, y fu3r0n 3ch4d0s d3ntr0 d3l h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0. 22 Y c0m0 l4 0rd3n d3l r3y 3r4 4pr3m14nt3, y l0 h4bí4n c4l3nt4d0 much0, l4 ll4m4 d3l fu3g0 m4tó 4 4qu3ll0s qu3 h4bí4n 4lz4d0 4 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0. 23 Y 3st0s tr3s v4r0n3s, S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0, c4y3r0n 4t4d0s d3ntr0 d3l h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0. 

24 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r s3 3sp4ntó, y s3 l3v4ntó 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3 y d1j0 4 l0s d3 su c0ns3j0: ¿N0 3ch4r0n 4 tr3s v4r0n3s 4t4d0s d3ntr0 d3l fu3g0? 0ll0s r3sp0nd13r0n 4l r3y: 0s v3rd4d, 0h r3y. 25 Y él d1j0: H3 4quí y0 v30 cu4tr0 v4r0n3s su3lt0s, qu3 s3 p4s34n 3n m3d10 d3l fu3g0 s1n sufr1r n1ngún d4ñ0; y 3l 4sp3ct0 d3l cu4rt0 3s s3m3j4nt3 4 h1j0 d3 l0s d10s3s. 

26 0nt0nc3s N4buc0d0n0s0r s3 4c3rcó 4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l h0rn0 d3 fu3g0 4rd13nd0, y d1j0: S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0, s13rv0s d3l D10s 4ltís1m0, s4l1d y v3n1d. 0nt0nc3s S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0 s4l13r0n d3 3n m3d10 d3l fu3g0. 27 Y s3 junt4r0n l0s sátr4p4s, l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s, l0s c4p1t4n3s y l0s c0ns3j3r0s d3l r3y, p4r4 m1r4r 4 3st0s v4r0n3s, cóm0 3l fu3g0 n0 h4bí4 t3n1d0 p0d3r 4lgun0 s0br3 sus cu3rp0s, n1 4un 3l c4b3ll0 d3 sus c4b3z4s s3 h4bí4 qu3m4d0; sus r0p4s 3st4b4n 1nt4ct4s, y n1 s1qu13r4 0l0r d3 fu3g0 t3ní4n. 28 0nt0nc3s N4buc0d0n0s0r d1j0: B3nd1t0 s34 3l D10s d3 3ll0s, d3 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0, qu3 3nv1ó su áng3l y l1bró 4 sus s13rv0s qu3 c0nf14r0n 3n él, y qu3 n0 cumpl13r0n 3l 3d1ct0 d3l r3y, y 3ntr3g4r0n sus cu3rp0s 4nt3s qu3 s3rv1r y 4d0r4r 4 0tr0 d10s qu3 su D10s. 29 P0r l0 t4nt0, d3cr3t0 qu3 t0d0 pu3bl0, n4c1ón 0 l3ngu4 qu3 d1j3r3 bl4sf3m14 c0ntr4 3l D10s d3 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0, s34 d3scu4rt1z4d0, y su c4s4 c0nv3rt1d4 3n mul4d4r; p0r cu4nt0 n0 h4y d10s qu3 pu3d4 l1br4r c0m0 ést3. 30 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y 3ngr4nd3c1ó 4 S4dr4c, M3s4c y 4b3d-n3g0 3n l4 pr0v1nc14 d3 B4b1l0n14. 

L4 l0cur4 d3 N4buc0d0n0s0r

D4N10L 4

1 N4buc0d0n0s0r r3y, 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, n4c10n3s y l3ngu4s qu3 m0r4n 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4: P4z 0s s34 mult1pl1c4d4. 2 C0nv13n3 qu3 y0 d3cl4r3 l4s s3ñ4l3s y m1l4gr0s qu3 3l D10s 4ltís1m0 h4 h3ch0 c0nm1g0. 3 ¡Cuán gr4nd3s s0n sus s3ñ4l3s, y cuán p0t3nt3s sus m4r4v1ll4s! Su r31n0, r31n0 s3mp1t3rn0, y su s3ñ0rí0 d3 g3n3r4c1ón 3n g3n3r4c1ón. 

4 Y0 N4buc0d0n0s0r 3st4b4 tr4nqu1l0 3n m1 c4s4, y fl0r3c13nt3 3n m1 p4l4c10. 5 V1 un su3ñ0 qu3 m3 3sp4ntó, y t3nd1d0 3n c4m4, l4s 1m4g1n4c10n3s y v1s10n3s d3 m1 c4b3z4 m3 turb4r0n. 6 P0r 3st0 m4ndé qu3 v1n13r4n d3l4nt3 d3 mí t0d0s l0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14, p4r4 qu3 m3 m0str4s3n l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón d3l su3ñ0. 7 Y v1n13r0n m4g0s, 4stról0g0s, c4ld30s y 4d1v1n0s, y l3s d1j3 3l su3ñ0, p3r0 n0 m3 pud13r0n m0str4r su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, 8 h4st4 qu3 3ntró d3l4nt3 d3 mí D4n13l, cuy0 n0mbr3 3s B3lts4s4r, c0m0 3l n0mbr3 d3 m1 d10s, y 3n qu13n m0r4 3l 3spír1tu d3 l0s d10s3s s4nt0s. C0nté d3l4nt3 d3 él 3l su3ñ0, d1c13nd0: 9 B3lts4s4r, j3f3 d3 l0s m4g0s, y4 qu3 h3 3nt3nd1d0 qu3 h4y 3n t1 3spír1tu d3 l0s d10s3s s4nt0s, y qu3 n1ngún m1st3r10 s3 t3 3sc0nd3, d3clár4m3 l4s v1s10n3s d3 m1 su3ñ0 qu3 h3 v1st0, y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 10 0st4s fu3r0n l4s v1s10n3s d3 m1 c4b3z4 m13ntr4s 3st4b4 3n m1 c4m4: M3 p4r3cí4 v3r 3n m3d10 d3 l4 t13rr4 un árb0l, cuy4 4ltur4 3r4 gr4nd3. 11 Cr3cí4 3st3 árb0l, y s3 h4cí4 fu3rt3, y su c0p4 ll3g4b4 h4st4 3l c13l0, y s3 l3 4lc4nz4b4 4 v3r d3sd3 t0d0s l0s c0nf1n3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 12 Su f0ll4j3 3r4 h3rm0s0 y su frut0 4bund4nt3, y h4bí4 3n él 4l1m3nt0 p4r4 t0d0s. D3b4j0 d3 él s3 p0ní4n 4 l4 s0mbr4 l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0, y 3n sus r4m4s h4cí4n m0r4d4 l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0, y s3 m4nt3ní4 d3 él t0d4 c4rn3. 

13 V1 3n l4s v1s10n3s d3 m1 c4b3z4 m13ntr4s 3st4b4 3n m1 c4m4, qu3 h3 4quí un v1g1l4nt3 y s4nt0 d3sc3ndí4 d3l c13l0. 14 Y cl4m4b4 fu3rt3m3nt3 y d3cí4 4sí: D3rr1b4d 3l árb0l, y c0rt4d sus r4m4s, qu1t4dl3 3l f0ll4j3, y d1sp3rs4d su frut0; váy4ns3 l4s b3st14s qu3 3stán d3b4j0 d3 él, y l4s 4v3s d3 sus r4m4s. 15 M4s l4 c3p4 d3 sus r4íc3s d3j4ré1s 3n l4 t13rr4, c0n 4t4dur4 d3 h13rr0 y d3 br0nc3 3ntr3 l4 h13rb4 d3l c4mp0; s34 m0j4d0 c0n 3l r0cí0 d3l c13l0, y c0n l4s b3st14s s34 su p4rt3 3ntr3 l4 h13rb4 d3 l4 t13rr4. 16 Su c0r4zón d3 h0mbr3 s34 c4mb14d0, y l3 s34 d4d0 c0r4zón d3 b3st14, y p4s3n s0br3 él s13t3 t13mp0s. 17 L4 s3nt3nc14 3s p0r d3cr3t0 d3 l0s v1g1l4nt3s, y p0r d1ch0 d3 l0s s4nt0s l4 r3s0luc1ón, p4r4 qu3 c0n0zc4n l0s v1v13nt3s qu3 3l 4ltís1m0 g0b13rn4 3l r31n0 d3 l0s h0mbr3s, y qu3 4 qu13n él qu13r3 l0 d4, y c0nst1tuy3 s0br3 él 4l más b4j0 d3 l0s h0mbr3s. 18 Y0 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r h3 v1st0 3st3 su3ñ0. 19 0nt0nc3s D4n13l, cuy0 n0mbr3 3r4 B3lts4s4r, qu3dó 4tón1t0 c4s1 un4 h0r4, y sus p3ns4m13nt0s l0 turb4b4n. 0l r3y h4bló y d1j0: B3lts4s4r, n0 t3 turb3n n1 3l su3ñ0 n1 su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. B3lts4s4r r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: S3ñ0r mí0, 3l su3ñ0 s34 p4r4 tus 3n3m1g0s, y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón p4r4 l0s qu3 m4l t3 qu13r3n. 20 0l árb0l qu3 v1st3, qu3 cr3cí4 y s3 h4cí4 fu3rt3, y cuy4 c0p4 ll3g4b4 h4st4 3l c13l0, y qu3 s3 v3í4 d3sd3 t0d0s l0s c0nf1n3s d3 l4 t13rr4, 21 cuy0 f0ll4j3 3r4 h3rm0s0, y su frut0 4bund4nt3, y 3n qu3 h4bí4 4l1m3nt0 p4r4 t0d0s, d3b4j0 d3l cu4l m0r4b4n l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0, y 3n cuy4s r4m4s 4n1d4b4n l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0, 22 tú m1sm0 3r3s, 0h r3y, qu3 cr3c1st3 y t3 h1c1st3 fu3rt3, pu3s cr3c1ó tu gr4nd3z4 y h4 ll3g4d0 h4st4 3l c13l0, y tu d0m1n10 h4st4 l0s c0nf1n3s d3 l4 t13rr4. 23 Y 3n cu4nt0 4 l0 qu3 v10 3l r3y, un v1g1l4nt3 y s4nt0 qu3 d3sc3ndí4 d3l c13l0 y d3cí4: C0rt4d 3l árb0l y d3stru1dl0; m4s l4 c3p4 d3 sus r4íc3s d3j4ré1s 3n l4 t13rr4, c0n 4t4dur4 d3 h13rr0 y d3 br0nc3 3n l4 h13rb4 d3l c4mp0; y s34 m0j4d0 c0n 3l r0cí0 d3l c13l0, y c0n l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0 s34 su p4rt3, h4st4 qu3 p4s3n s0br3 él s13t3 t13mp0s; 24 3st4 3s l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, 0h r3y, y l4 s3nt3nc14 d3l 4ltís1m0, qu3 h4 v3n1d0 s0br3 m1 s3ñ0r 3l r3y: 25 Qu3 t3 3ch4rán d3 3ntr3 l0s h0mbr3s, y c0n l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0 s3rá tu m0r4d4, y c0n h13rb4 d3l c4mp0 t3 4p4c3nt4rán c0m0 4 l0s bu3y3s, y c0n 3l r0cí0 d3l c13l0 s3rás b4ñ4d0; y s13t3 t13mp0s p4s4rán s0br3 t1, h4st4 qu3 c0n0zc4s qu3 3l 4ltís1m0 t13n3 d0m1n10 3n 3l r31n0 d3 l0s h0mbr3s, y qu3 l0 d4 4 qu13n él qu13r3. 26 Y 3n cu4nt0 4 l4 0rd3n d3 d3j4r 3n l4 t13rr4 l4 c3p4 d3 l4s r4íc3s d3l m1sm0 árb0l, s1gn1f1c4 qu3 tu r31n0 t3 qu3d4rá f1rm3, lu3g0 qu3 r3c0n0zc4s qu3 3l c13l0 g0b13rn4. 27 P0r t4nt0, 0h r3y, 4c3pt4 m1 c0ns3j0: tus p3c4d0s r3d1m3 c0n just1c14, y tus 1n1qu1d4d3s h4c13nd0 m1s3r1c0rd14s p4r4 c0n l0s 0pr1m1d0s, pu3s t4l v3z s3rá 3s0 un4 pr0l0ng4c1ón d3 tu tr4nqu1l1d4d. 

28 T0d0 3st0 v1n0 s0br3 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r. 29 4l c4b0 d3 d0c3 m3s3s, p4s34nd0 3n 3l p4l4c10 r34l d3 B4b1l0n14, 30 h4bló 3l r3y y d1j0: ¿N0 3s ést4 l4 gr4n B4b1l0n14 qu3 y0 3d1f1qué p4r4 c4s4 r34l c0n l4 fu3rz4 d3 m1 p0d3r, y p4r4 gl0r14 d3 m1 m4j3st4d? 31 4ún 3st4b4 l4 p4l4br4 3n l4 b0c4 d3l r3y, cu4nd0 v1n0 un4 v0z d3l c13l0: 4 t1 s3 t3 d1c3, r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r: 0l r31n0 h4 s1d0 qu1t4d0 d3 t1; 32 y d3 3ntr3 l0s h0mbr3s t3 4rr0j4rán, y c0n l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0 s3rá tu h4b1t4c1ón, y c0m0 4 l0s bu3y3s t3 4p4c3nt4rán; y s13t3 t13mp0s p4s4rán s0br3 t1, h4st4 qu3 r3c0n0zc4s qu3 3l 4ltís1m0 t13n3 3l d0m1n10 3n 3l r31n0 d3 l0s h0mbr3s, y l0 d4 4 qu13n él qu13r3. 33 0n l4 m1sm4 h0r4 s3 cumpl1ó l4 p4l4br4 s0br3 N4buc0d0n0s0r, y fu3 3ch4d0 d3 3ntr3 l0s h0mbr3s; y c0mí4 h13rb4 c0m0 l0s bu3y3s, y su cu3rp0 s3 m0j4b4 c0n 3l r0cí0 d3l c13l0, h4st4 qu3 su p3l0 cr3c1ó c0m0 plum4s d3 águ1l4, y sus uñ4s c0m0 l4s d3 l4s 4v3s. 

34 M4s 4l f1n d3l t13mp0 y0 N4buc0d0n0s0r 4lcé m1s 0j0s 4l c13l0, y m1 r4zón m3 fu3 d3vu3lt4; y b3nd1j3 4l 4ltís1m0, y 4l4bé y gl0r1f1qué 4l qu3 v1v3 p4r4 s13mpr3, cuy0 d0m1n10 3s s3mp1t3rn0, y su r31n0 p0r t0d4s l4s 3d4d3s. 35 T0d0s l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 l4 t13rr4 s0n c0ns1d3r4d0s c0m0 n4d4; y él h4c3 s3gún su v0lunt4d 3n 3l 3jérc1t0 d3l c13l0, y 3n l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 l4 t13rr4, y n0 h4y qu13n d3t3ng4 su m4n0, y l3 d1g4: ¿Qué h4c3s? 36 0n 3l m1sm0 t13mp0 m1 r4zón m3 fu3 d3vu3lt4, y l4 m4j3st4d d3 m1 r31n0, m1 d1gn1d4d y m1 gr4nd3z4 v0lv13r0n 4 mí, y m1s g0b3rn4d0r3s y m1s c0ns3j3r0s m3 busc4r0n; y fu1 r3st4bl3c1d0 3n m1 r31n0, y m4y0r gr4nd3z4 m3 fu3 4ñ4d1d4. 37 4h0r4 y0 N4buc0d0n0s0r 4l4b0, 3ngr4nd3zc0 y gl0r1f1c0 4l R3y d3l c13l0, p0rqu3 t0d4s sus 0br4s s0n v3rd4d3r4s, y sus c4m1n0s just0s; y él pu3d3 hum1ll4r 4 l0s qu3 4nd4n c0n s0b3rb14.

1 0l r3y B3ls4s4r h1z0 un gr4n b4nqu3t3 4 m1l d3 sus prínc1p3s, y 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 l0s m1l b3bí4 v1n0. 2 B3ls4s4r, c0n 3l gust0 d3l v1n0, m4ndó qu3 tr4j3s3n l0s v4s0s d3 0r0 y d3 pl4t4 qu3 N4buc0d0n0s0r su p4dr3 h4bí4 tr4íd0 d3l t3mpl0 d3 J3rus4lén, p4r4 qu3 b3b13s3n 3n 3ll0s 3l r3y y sus gr4nd3s, sus muj3r3s y sus c0ncub1n4s. 3 0nt0nc3s fu3r0n tr4íd0s l0s v4s0s d3 0r0 qu3 h4bí4n tr4íd0 d3l t3mpl0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D10s qu3 3st4b4 3n J3rus4lén, y b3b13r0n 3n 3ll0s 3l r3y y sus prínc1p3s, sus muj3r3s y sus c0ncub1n4s. 4 B3b13r0n v1n0, y 4l4b4r0n 4 l0s d10s3s d3 0r0 y d3 pl4t4, d3 br0nc3, d3 h13rr0, d3 m4d3r4 y d3 p13dr4. 

5 0n 4qu3ll4 m1sm4 h0r4 4p4r3c13r0n l0s d3d0s d3 un4 m4n0 d3 h0mbr3, qu3 3scr1bí4 d3l4nt3 d3l c4nd3l3r0 s0br3 l0 3nc4l4d0 d3 l4 p4r3d d3l p4l4c10 r34l, y 3l r3y v3í4 l4 m4n0 qu3 3scr1bí4. 6 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y p4l1d3c1ó, y sus p3ns4m13nt0s l0 turb4r0n, y s3 d3b1l1t4r0n sus l0m0s, y sus r0d1ll4s d4b4n l4 un4 c0ntr4 l4 0tr4. 7 0l r3y gr1tó 3n 4lt4 v0z qu3 h1c13s3n v3n1r m4g0s, c4ld30s y 4d1v1n0s; y d1j0 3l r3y 4 l0s s4b10s d3 B4b1l0n14: Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 l34 3st4 3scr1tur4 y m3 mu3str3 su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, s3rá v3st1d0 d3 púrpur4, y un c0ll4r d3 0r0 ll3v4rá 3n su cu3ll0, y s3rá 3l t3rc3r s3ñ0r 3n 3l r31n0. 8 0nt0nc3s fu3r0n 1ntr0duc1d0s t0d0s l0s s4b10s d3l r3y, p3r0 n0 pud13r0n l33r l4 3scr1tur4 n1 m0str4r 4l r3y su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 9 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y B3ls4s4r s3 turbó s0br3m4n3r4, y p4l1d3c1ó, y sus prínc1p3s 3st4b4n p3rpl3j0s. 

10 L4 r31n4, p0r l4s p4l4br4s d3l r3y y d3 sus prínc1p3s, 3ntró 4 l4 s4l4 d3l b4nqu3t3, y d1j0: R3y, v1v3 p4r4 s13mpr3; n0 t3 turb3n tus p3ns4m13nt0s, n1 p4l1d3zc4 tu r0str0. 11 0n tu r31n0 h4y un h0mbr3 3n 3l cu4l m0r4 3l 3spír1tu d3 l0s d10s3s s4nt0s, y 3n l0s dí4s d3 tu p4dr3 s3 h4lló 3n él luz 3 1nt3l1g3nc14 y s4b1durí4, c0m0 s4b1durí4 d3 l0s d10s3s; 4l qu3 3l r3y N4buc0d0n0s0r tu p4dr3, 0h r3y, c0nst1tuyó j3f3 s0br3 t0d0s l0s m4g0s, 4stról0g0s, c4ld30s y 4d1v1n0s, 12 p0r cu4nt0 fu3 h4ll4d0 3n él m4y0r 3spír1tu y c13nc14 y 3nt3nd1m13nt0, p4r4 1nt3rpr3t4r su3ñ0s y d3sc1fr4r 3n1gm4s y r3s0lv3r dud4s; 3st0 3s, 3n D4n13l, 4l cu4l 3l r3y pus0 p0r n0mbr3 B3lts4s4r. Llám3s3, pu3s, 4h0r4 4 D4n13l, y él t3 d4rá l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 

13 0nt0nc3s D4n13l fu3 tr4íd0 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y. Y d1j0 3l r3y 4 D4n13l: ¿0r3s tú 4qu3l D4n13l d3 l0s h1j0s d3 l4 c4ut1v1d4d d3 Judá, qu3 m1 p4dr3 tr4j0 d3 Jud34? 14 Y0 h3 0íd0 d3 t1 qu3 3l 3spír1tu d3 l0s d10s3s s4nt0s 3stá 3n t1, y qu3 3n t1 s3 h4lló luz, 3nt3nd1m13nt0 y m4y0r s4b1durí4. 15 Y 4h0r4 fu3r0n tr4íd0s d3l4nt3 d3 mí s4b10s y 4stról0g0s p4r4 qu3 l3y3s3n 3st4 3scr1tur4 y m3 d13s3n su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón; p3r0 n0 h4n p0d1d0 m0str4rm3 l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón d3l 4sunt0. 16 Y0, pu3s, h3 0íd0 d3 t1 qu3 pu3d3s d4r 1nt3rpr3t4c10n3s y r3s0lv3r d1f1cult4d3s. S1 4h0r4 pu3d3s l33r 3st4 3scr1tur4 y d4rm3 su 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón, s3rás v3st1d0 d3 púrpur4, y un c0ll4r d3 0r0 ll3v4rás 3n tu cu3ll0, y s3rás 3l t3rc3r s3ñ0r 3n 3l r31n0. 

17 0nt0nc3s D4n13l r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0 d3l4nt3 d3l r3y: Tus d0n3s s34n p4r4 t1, y d4 tus r3c0mp3ns4s 4 0tr0s. L33ré l4 3scr1tur4 4l r3y, y l3 d4ré l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón. 18 0l 4ltís1m0 D10s, 0h r3y, d10 4 N4buc0d0n0s0r tu p4dr3 3l r31n0 y l4 gr4nd3z4, l4 gl0r14 y l4 m4j3st4d. 19 Y p0r l4 gr4nd3z4 qu3 l3 d10, t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, n4c10n3s y l3ngu4s t3mbl4b4n y t3mí4n d3l4nt3 d3 él. 4 qu13n qu3rí4 m4t4b4, y 4 qu13n qu3rí4 d4b4 v1d4; 3ngr4nd3cí4 4 qu13n qu3rí4, y 4 qu13n qu3rí4 hum1ll4b4. 20 M4s cu4nd0 su c0r4zón s3 3ns0b3rb3c1ó, y su 3spír1tu s3 3ndur3c1ó 3n su 0rgull0, fu3 d3pu3st0 d3l tr0n0 d3 su r31n0, y d3sp0j4d0 d3 su gl0r14. 21 Y fu3 3ch4d0 d3 3ntr3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s, y su m3nt3 s3 h1z0 s3m3j4nt3 4 l4 d3 l4s b3st14s, y c0n l0s 4sn0s m0nt3s3s fu3 su m0r4d4. H13rb4 l3 h1c13r0n c0m3r c0m0 4 bu3y, y su cu3rp0 fu3 m0j4d0 c0n 3l r0cí0 d3l c13l0, h4st4 qu3 r3c0n0c1ó qu3 3l 4ltís1m0 D10s t13n3 d0m1n10 s0br3 3l r31n0 d3 l0s h0mbr3s, y qu3 p0n3 s0br3 él 4l qu3 l3 pl4c3. 22 Y tú, su h1j0 B3ls4s4r, n0 h4s hum1ll4d0 tu c0r4zón, s4b13nd0 t0d0 3st0; 23 s1n0 qu3 c0ntr4 3l S3ñ0r d3l c13l0 t3 h4s 3ns0b3rb3c1d0, 3 h1c1st3 tr43r d3l4nt3 d3 t1 l0s v4s0s d3 su c4s4, y tú y tus gr4nd3s, tus muj3r3s y tus c0ncub1n4s, b3b1st31s v1n0 3n 3ll0s; 4d3más d3 3st0, d1st3 4l4b4nz4 4 d10s3s d3 pl4t4 y 0r0, d3 br0nc3, d3 h13rr0, d3 m4d3r4 y d3 p13dr4, qu3 n1 v3n, n1 0y3n, n1 s4b3n; y 4l D10s 3n cuy4 m4n0 3stá tu v1d4, y cuy0s s0n t0d0s tus c4m1n0s, nunc4 h0nr4st3. 

24 0nt0nc3s d3 su pr3s3nc14 fu3 3nv14d4 l4 m4n0 qu3 tr4zó 3st4 3scr1tur4. 25 Y l4 3scr1tur4 qu3 tr4zó 3s: M0N0, M0N0, T0K0L, UP4RS1N. 26 0st4 3s l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón d3l 4sunt0: M0N0: C0ntó D10s tu r31n0, y l3 h4 pu3st0 f1n. 27 T0K0L: P3s4d0 h4s s1d0 3n b4l4nz4, y fu1st3 h4ll4d0 f4lt0. 28 P0R0S: Tu r31n0 h4 s1d0 r0t0, y d4d0 4 l0s m3d0s y 4 l0s p3rs4s. 

29 0nt0nc3s m4ndó B3ls4s4r v3st1r 4 D4n13l d3 púrpur4, y p0n3r 3n su cu3ll0 un c0ll4r d3 0r0, y pr0cl4m4r qu3 él 3r4 3l t3rc3r s3ñ0r d3l r31n0.

1 P4r3c1ó b13n 4 D4rí0 c0nst1tu1r s0br3 3l r31n0 c13nt0 v31nt3 sátr4p4s, qu3 g0b3rn4s3n 3n t0d0 3l r31n0. 2 Y s0br3 3ll0s tr3s g0b3rn4d0r3s, d3 l0s cu4l3s D4n13l 3r4 un0, 4 qu13n3s 3st0s sátr4p4s d13s3n cu3nt4, p4r4 qu3 3l r3y n0 fu3s3 p3rjud1c4d0. 3 P3r0 D4n13l m1sm0 3r4 sup3r10r 4 3st0s sátr4p4s y g0b3rn4d0r3s, p0rqu3 h4bí4 3n él un 3spír1tu sup3r10r; y 3l r3y p3nsó 3n p0n3rl0 s0br3 t0d0 3l r31n0. 4 0nt0nc3s l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s y sátr4p4s busc4b4n 0c4s1ón p4r4 4cus4r 4 D4n13l 3n l0 r3l4c10n4d0 4l r31n0; m4s n0 p0dí4n h4ll4r 0c4s1ón 4lgun4 0 f4lt4, p0rqu3 él 3r4 f13l, y n1ngún v1c10 n1 f4lt4 fu3 h4ll4d0 3n él. 5 0nt0nc3s d1j3r0n 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s: N0 h4ll4r3m0s c0ntr4 3st3 D4n13l 0c4s1ón 4lgun4 p4r4 4cus4rl3, s1 n0 l4 h4ll4m0s c0ntr4 él 3n r3l4c1ón c0n l4 l3y d3 su D10s. 

6 0nt0nc3s 3st0s g0b3rn4d0r3s y sátr4p4s s3 junt4r0n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y, y l3 d1j3r0n 4sí: ¡R3y D4rí0, p4r4 s13mpr3 v1v3! 7 T0d0s l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s d3l r31n0, m4g1str4d0s, sátr4p4s, prínc1p3s y c4p1t4n3s h4n 4c0rd4d0 p0r c0ns3j0 qu3 pr0mulgu3s un 3d1ct0 r34l y l0 c0nf1rm3s, qu3 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 3n 3l 3sp4c10 d3 tr31nt4 dí4s d3m4nd3 p3t1c1ón d3 cu4lqu13r d10s u h0mbr3 fu3r4 d3 t1, 0h r3y, s34 3ch4d0 3n 3l f0s0 d3 l0s l30n3s. 8 4h0r4, 0h r3y, c0nf1rm4 3l 3d1ct0 y fírm4l0, p4r4 qu3 n0 pu3d4 s3r r3v0c4d0, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y d3 M3d14 y d3 P3rs14, l4 cu4l n0 pu3d3 s3r 4br0g4d4. 9 F1rmó, pu3s, 3l r3y D4rí0 3l 3d1ct0 y l4 pr0h1b1c1ón. 

10 Cu4nd0 D4n13l sup0 qu3 3l 3d1ct0 h4bí4 s1d0 f1rm4d0, 3ntró 3n su c4s4, y 4b13rt4s l4s v3nt4n4s d3 su cám4r4 qu3 d4b4n h4c14 J3rus4lén, s3 4rr0d1ll4b4 tr3s v3c3s 4l dí4, y 0r4b4 y d4b4 gr4c14s d3l4nt3 d3 su D10s, c0m0 l0 s0lí4 h4c3r 4nt3s. 11 0nt0nc3s s3 junt4r0n 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s, y h4ll4r0n 4 D4n13l 0r4nd0 y r0g4nd0 3n pr3s3nc14 d3 su D10s. 12 Fu3r0n lu3g0 4nt3 3l r3y y l3 h4bl4r0n d3l 3d1ct0 r34l: ¿N0 h4s c0nf1rm4d0 3d1ct0 qu3 cu4lqu13r4 qu3 3n 3l 3sp4c10 d3 tr31nt4 dí4s p1d4 4 cu4lqu13r d10s u h0mbr3 fu3r4 d3 t1, 0h r3y, s34 3ch4d0 3n 3l f0s0 d3 l0s l30n3s? R3sp0nd1ó 3l r3y d1c13nd0: V3rd4d 3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y d3 M3d14 y d3 P3rs14, l4 cu4l n0 pu3d3 s3r 4br0g4d4. 13 0nt0nc3s r3sp0nd13r0n y d1j3r0n d3l4nt3 d3l r3y: D4n13l, qu3 3s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s c4ut1v0s d3 Judá, n0 t3 r3sp3t4 4 t1, 0h r3y, n1 4c4t4 3l 3d1ct0 qu3 c0nf1rm4st3, s1n0 qu3 tr3s v3c3s 4l dí4 h4c3 su p3t1c1ón. 

14 Cu4nd0 3l r3y 0yó 3l 4sunt0, l3 p3só 3n gr4n m4n3r4, y r3s0lv1ó l1br4r 4 D4n13l; y h4st4 l4 pu3st4 d3l s0l tr4b4jó p4r4 l1br4rl3. 15 P3r0 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s r0d34r0n 4l r3y y l3 d1j3r0n: S3p4s, 0h r3y, qu3 3s l3y d3 M3d14 y d3 P3rs14 qu3 n1ngún 3d1ct0 u 0rd3n4nz4 qu3 3l r3y c0nf1rm3 pu3d3 s3r 4br0g4d0. 

16 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y m4ndó, y tr4j3r0n 4 D4n13l, y l3 3ch4r0n 3n 3l f0s0 d3 l0s l30n3s. Y 3l r3y d1j0 4 D4n13l: 0l D10s tuy0, 4 qu13n tú c0nt1nu4m3nt3 s1rv3s, él t3 l1br3. 17 Y fu3 tr4íd4 un4 p13dr4 y pu3st4 s0br3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l f0s0, l4 cu4l s3lló 3l r3y c0n su 4n1ll0 y c0n 3l 4n1ll0 d3 sus prínc1p3s, p4r4 qu3 3l 4cu3rd0 4c3rc4 d3 D4n13l n0 s3 4lt3r4s3. 18 Lu3g0 3l r3y s3 fu3 4 su p4l4c10, y s3 4c0stó 4yun0; n1 1nstrum3nt0s d3 mús1c4 fu3r0n tr4íd0s d3l4nt3 d3 él, y s3 l3 fu3 3l su3ñ0. 

19 0l r3y, pu3s, s3 l3v4ntó muy d3 m4ñ4n4, y fu3 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3 4l f0s0 d3 l0s l30n3s. 20 Y 4c3rcánd0s3 4l f0s0 ll4mó 4 v0c3s 4 D4n13l c0n v0z tr1st3, y l3 d1j0: D4n13l, s13rv0 d3l D10s v1v13nt3, 3l D10s tuy0, 4 qu13n tú c0nt1nu4m3nt3 s1rv3s, ¿t3 h4 p0d1d0 l1br4r d3 l0s l30n3s? 21 0nt0nc3s D4n13l r3sp0nd1ó 4l r3y: 0h r3y, v1v3 p4r4 s13mpr3. 22 M1 D10s 3nv1ó su áng3l, 3l cu4l c3rró l4 b0c4 d3 l0s l30n3s, p4r4 qu3 n0 m3 h1c13s3n d4ñ0, p0rqu3 4nt3 él fu1 h4ll4d0 1n0c3nt3; y 4un d3l4nt3 d3 t1, 0h r3y, y0 n0 h3 h3ch0 n4d4 m4l0. 23 0nt0nc3s s3 4l3gró 3l r3y 3n gr4n m4n3r4 4 c4us4 d3 él, y m4ndó s4c4r 4 D4n13l d3l f0s0; y fu3 D4n13l s4c4d0 d3l f0s0, y n1ngun4 l3s1ón s3 h4lló 3n él, p0rqu3 h4bí4 c0nf14d0 3n su D10s. 24 Y d10 0rd3n 3l r3y, y fu3r0n tr4íd0s 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s qu3 h4bí4n 4cus4d0 4 D4n13l, y fu3r0n 3ch4d0s 3n 3l f0s0 d3 l0s l30n3s 3ll0s, sus h1j0s y sus muj3r3s; y 4ún n0 h4bí4n ll3g4d0 4l f0nd0 d3l f0s0, cu4nd0 l0s l30n3s s3 4p0d3r4r0n d3 3ll0s y qu3br4r0n t0d0s sus hu3s0s. 

25 0nt0nc3s 3l r3y D4rí0 3scr1b1ó 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, n4c10n3s y l3ngu4s qu3 h4b1t4n 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4: P4z 0s s34 mult1pl1c4d4. 26 D3 p4rt3 mí4 3s pu3st4 3st4 0rd3n4nz4: Qu3 3n t0d0 3l d0m1n10 d3 m1 r31n0 t0d0s t3m4n y t13mbl3n 4nt3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3l D10s d3 D4n13l; p0rqu3 él 3s 3l D10s v1v13nt3 y p3rm4n3c3 p0r t0d0s l0s s1gl0s, y su r31n0 n0 s3rá j4más d3stru1d0, y su d0m1n10 p3rdur4rá h4st4 3l f1n. 27 0l s4lv4 y l1br4, y h4c3 s3ñ4l3s y m4r4v1ll4s 3n 3l c13l0 y 3n l4 t13rr4; él h4 l1br4d0 4 D4n13l d3l p0d3r d3 l0s l30n3s. 

28 Y 3st3 D4n13l pr0sp3ró dur4nt3 3l r31n4d0 d3 D4rí0 y dur4nt3 3l r31n4d0 d3 C1r0 3l p3rs4. 

V1s1ón d3 l4s cu4tr0 b3st14s

D4N10L 7

1 0n 3l pr1m3r 4ñ0 d3 B3ls4s4r r3y d3 B4b1l0n14 tuv0 D4n13l un su3ñ0, y v1s10n3s d3 su c4b3z4 m13ntr4s 3st4b4 3n su l3ch0; lu3g0 3scr1b1ó 3l su3ñ0, y r3l4tó l0 pr1nc1p4l d3l 4sunt0. 2 D4n13l d1j0: M1r4b4 y0 3n m1 v1s1ón d3 n0ch3, y h3 4quí qu3 l0s cu4tr0 v13nt0s d3l c13l0 c0mb4tí4n 3n 3l gr4n m4r. 3 Y cu4tr0 b3st14s gr4nd3s, d1f3r3nt3s l4 un4 d3 l4 0tr4, subí4n d3l m4r. 4 L4 pr1m3r4 3r4 c0m0 l3ón, y t3ní4 4l4s d3 águ1l4. Y0 3st4b4 m1r4nd0 h4st4 qu3 sus 4l4s fu3r0n 4rr4nc4d4s, y fu3 l3v4nt4d4 d3l su3l0 y s3 pus0 3nh13st4 s0br3 l0s p13s 4 m4n3r4 d3 h0mbr3, y l3 fu3 d4d0 c0r4zón d3 h0mbr3. 5 Y h3 4quí 0tr4 s3gund4 b3st14, s3m3j4nt3 4 un 0s0, l4 cu4l s3 4lz4b4 d3 un c0st4d0 más qu3 d3l 0tr0, y t3ní4 3n su b0c4 tr3s c0st1ll4s 3ntr3 l0s d13nt3s; y l3 fu3 d1ch0 4sí: L3vánt4t3, d3v0r4 much4 c4rn3. 6 D3spués d3 3st0 m1ré, y h3 4quí 0tr4, s3m3j4nt3 4 un l30p4rd0, c0n cu4tr0 4l4s d3 4v3 3n sus 3sp4ld4s; t3ní4 t4mb1én 3st4 b3st14 cu4tr0 c4b3z4s; y l3 fu3 d4d0 d0m1n10. 7 D3spués d3 3st0 m1r4b4 y0 3n l4s v1s10n3s d3 l4 n0ch3, y h3 4quí l4 cu4rt4 b3st14, 3sp4nt0s4 y t3rr1bl3 y 3n gr4n m4n3r4 fu3rt3, l4 cu4l t3ní4 un0s d13nt3s gr4nd3s d3 h13rr0; d3v0r4b4 y d3sm3nuz4b4, y l4s s0br4s h0ll4b4 c0n sus p13s, y 3r4 muy d1f3r3nt3 d3 t0d4s l4s b3st14s qu3 v1 4nt3s d3 3ll4, y t3ní4 d13z cu3rn0s. 8 M13ntr4s y0 c0nt3mpl4b4 l0s cu3rn0s, h3 4quí qu3 0tr0 cu3rn0 p3qu3ñ0 s4lí4 3ntr3 3ll0s, y d3l4nt3 d3 él fu3r0n 4rr4nc4d0s tr3s cu3rn0s d3 l0s pr1m3r0s; y h3 4quí qu3 3st3 cu3rn0 t3ní4 0j0s c0m0 d3 h0mbr3, y un4 b0c4 qu3 h4bl4b4 gr4nd3s c0s4s. 

9 0stuv3 m1r4nd0 h4st4 qu3 fu3r0n pu3st0s tr0n0s, y s3 s3ntó un 4nc14n0 d3 dí4s, cuy0 v3st1d0 3r4 bl4nc0 c0m0 l4 n13v3, y 3l p3l0 d3 su c4b3z4 c0m0 l4n4 l1mp14; su tr0n0 ll4m4 d3 fu3g0, y l4s ru3d4s d3l m1sm0, fu3g0 4rd13nt3. 10 Un rí0 d3 fu3g0 pr0c3dí4 y s4lí4 d3 d3l4nt3 d3 él; m1ll4r3s d3 m1ll4r3s l3 s3rví4n, y m1ll0n3s d3 m1ll0n3s 4s1stí4n d3l4nt3 d3 él; 3l Ju3z s3 s3ntó, y l0s l1br0s fu3r0n 4b13rt0s. 11 Y0 3nt0nc3s m1r4b4 4 c4us4 d3l s0n1d0 d3 l4s gr4nd3s p4l4br4s qu3 h4bl4b4 3l cu3rn0; m1r4b4 h4st4 qu3 m4t4r0n 4 l4 b3st14, y su cu3rp0 fu3 d3str0z4d0 y 3ntr3g4d0 p4r4 s3r qu3m4d0 3n 3l fu3g0. 12 H4bí4n t4mb1én qu1t4d0 4 l4s 0tr4s b3st14s su d0m1n10, p3r0 l3s h4bí4 s1d0 pr0l0ng4d4 l4 v1d4 h4st4 c13rt0 t13mp0. 

13 M1r4b4 y0 3n l4 v1s1ón d3 l4 n0ch3, y h3 4quí c0n l4s nub3s d3l c13l0 v3ní4 un0 c0m0 un h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, qu3 v1n0 h4st4 3l 4nc14n0 d3 dí4s, y l3 h1c13r0n 4c3rc4rs3 d3l4nt3 d3 él. 14 Y l3 fu3 d4d0 d0m1n10, gl0r14 y r31n0, p4r4 qu3 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s, n4c10n3s y l3ngu4s l3 s1rv13r4n; su d0m1n10 3s d0m1n10 3t3rn0, qu3 nunc4 p4s4rá, y su r31n0 un0 qu3 n0 s3rá d3stru1d0. 

15 S3 m3 turbó 3l 3spír1tu 4 mí, D4n13l, 3n m3d10 d3 m1 cu3rp0, y l4s v1s10n3s d3 m1 c4b3z4 m3 4s0mbr4r0n. 16 M3 4c3rqué 4 un0 d3 l0s qu3 4s1stí4n, y l3 pr3gunté l4 v3rd4d 4c3rc4 d3 t0d0 3st0. Y m3 h4bló, y m3 h1z0 c0n0c3r l4 1nt3rpr3t4c1ón d3 l4s c0s4s. 17 0st4s cu4tr0 gr4nd3s b3st14s s0n cu4tr0 r3y3s qu3 s3 l3v4nt4rán 3n l4 t13rr4. 18 D3spués r3c1b1rán 3l r31n0 l0s s4nt0s d3l 4ltís1m0, y p0s33rán 3l r31n0 h4st4 3l s1gl0, 3t3rn4m3nt3 y p4r4 s13mpr3. 

19 0nt0nc3s tuv3 d3s30 d3 s4b3r l4 v3rd4d 4c3rc4 d3 l4 cu4rt4 b3st14, qu3 3r4 t4n d1f3r3nt3 d3 t0d4s l4s 0tr4s, 3sp4nt0s4 3n gr4n m4n3r4, qu3 t3ní4 d13nt3s d3 h13rr0 y uñ4s d3 br0nc3, qu3 d3v0r4b4 y d3sm3nuz4b4, y l4s s0br4s h0ll4b4 c0n sus p13s; 20 4s1m1sm0 4c3rc4 d3 l0s d13z cu3rn0s qu3 t3ní4 3n su c4b3z4, y d3l 0tr0 qu3 l3 h4bí4 s4l1d0, d3l4nt3 d3l cu4l h4bí4n c4íd0 tr3s; y 3st3 m1sm0 cu3rn0 t3ní4 0j0s, y b0c4 qu3 h4bl4b4 gr4nd3s c0s4s, y p4r3cí4 más gr4nd3 qu3 sus c0mp4ñ3r0s. 21 Y v3í4 y0 qu3 3st3 cu3rn0 h4cí4 gu3rr4 c0ntr4 l0s s4nt0s, y l0s v3ncí4, 22 h4st4 qu3 v1n0 3l 4nc14n0 d3 dí4s, y s3 d10 3l ju1c10 4 l0s s4nt0s d3l 4ltís1m0; y ll3gó 3l t13mp0, y l0s s4nt0s r3c1b13r0n 3l r31n0. 

23 D1j0 4sí: L4 cu4rt4 b3st14 s3rá un cu4rt0 r31n0 3n l4 t13rr4, 3l cu4l s3rá d1f3r3nt3 d3 t0d0s l0s 0tr0s r31n0s, y 4 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3v0r4rá, tr1ll4rá y d3sp3d4z4rá. 24 Y l0s d13z cu3rn0s s1gn1f1c4n qu3 d3 4qu3l r31n0 s3 l3v4nt4rán d13z r3y3s; y tr4s 3ll0s s3 l3v4nt4rá 0tr0, 3l cu4l s3rá d1f3r3nt3 d3 l0s pr1m3r0s, y 4 tr3s r3y3s d3rr1b4rá. 25 Y h4bl4rá p4l4br4s c0ntr4 3l 4ltís1m0, y 4 l0s s4nt0s d3l 4ltís1m0 qu3br4nt4rá, y p3ns4rá 3n c4mb14r l0s t13mp0s y l4 l3y; y s3rán 3ntr3g4d0s 3n su m4n0 h4st4 t13mp0, y t13mp0s, y m3d10 t13mp0. 26 P3r0 s3 s3nt4rá 3l Ju3z, y l3 qu1t4rán su d0m1n10 p4r4 qu3 s34 d3stru1d0 y 4rru1n4d0 h4st4 3l f1n, 27 y qu3 3l r31n0, y 3l d0m1n10 y l4 m4j3st4d d3 l0s r31n0s d3b4j0 d3 t0d0 3l c13l0, s34 d4d0 4l pu3bl0 d3 l0s s4nt0s d3l 4ltís1m0, cuy0 r31n0 3s r31n0 3t3rn0, y t0d0s l0s d0m1n10s l3 s3rv1rán y 0b3d3c3rán. 

28 4quí fu3 3l f1n d3 sus p4l4br4s. 0n cu4nt0 4 mí, D4n13l, m1s p3ns4m13nt0s m3 turb4r0n y m1 r0str0 s3 d3mudó; p3r0 gu4rdé 3l 4sunt0 3n m1 c0r4zón. 

V1s1ón d3l c4rn3r0 y d3l m4ch0 c4brí0

D4N10L 8

1 0n 3l 4ñ0 t3rc3r0 d3l r31n4d0 d3l r3y B3ls4s4r m3 4p4r3c1ó un4 v1s1ón 4 mí, D4n13l, d3spués d3 4qu3ll4 qu3 m3 h4bí4 4p4r3c1d0 4nt3s. 2 V1 3n v1s1ón; y cu4nd0 l4 v1, y0 3st4b4 3n Sus4, qu3 3s l4 c4p1t4l d3l r31n0 3n l4 pr0v1nc14 d3 0l4m; v1, pu3s, 3n v1s1ón, 3st4nd0 junt0 4l rí0 Ul41. 3 4lcé l0s 0j0s y m1ré, y h3 4quí un c4rn3r0 qu3 3st4b4 d3l4nt3 d3l rí0, y t3ní4 d0s cu3rn0s; y 4unqu3 l0s cu3rn0s 3r4n 4lt0s, un0 3r4 más 4lt0 qu3 3l 0tr0; y 3l más 4lt0 cr3c1ó d3spués. 4 V1 qu3 3l c4rn3r0 h3rí4 c0n l0s cu3rn0s 4l p0n13nt3, 4l n0rt3 y 4l sur, y qu3 n1ngun4 b3st14 p0dí4 p4r4r d3l4nt3 d3 él, n1 h4bí4 qu13n 3sc4p4s3 d3 su p0d3r; y h4cí4 c0nf0rm3 4 su v0lunt4d, y s3 3ngr4nd3cí4. 

5 M13ntr4s y0 c0ns1d3r4b4 3st0, h3 4quí un m4ch0 c4brí0 v3ní4 d3l l4d0 d3l p0n13nt3 s0br3 l4 f4z d3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4, s1n t0c4r t13rr4; y 4qu3l m4ch0 c4brí0 t3ní4 un cu3rn0 n0t4bl3 3ntr3 sus 0j0s. 6 Y v1n0 h4st4 3l c4rn3r0 d3 d0s cu3rn0s, qu3 y0 h4bí4 v1st0 3n l4 r1b3r4 d3l rí0, y c0rr1ó c0ntr4 él c0n l4 fur14 d3 su fu3rz4. 7 Y l0 v1 qu3 ll3gó junt0 4l c4rn3r0, y s3 l3v4ntó c0ntr4 él y l0 h1r1ó, y l3 qu3bró sus d0s cu3rn0s, y 3l c4rn3r0 n0 t3ní4 fu3rz4s p4r4 p4r4rs3 d3l4nt3 d3 él; l0 d3rr1bó, p0r t4nt0, 3n t13rr4, y l0 p1s0t3ó, y n0 hub0 qu13n l1br4s3 4l c4rn3r0 d3 su p0d3r. 8 Y 3l m4ch0 c4brí0 s3 3ngr4nd3c1ó s0br3m4n3r4; p3r0 3st4nd0 3n su m4y0r fu3rz4, 4qu3l gr4n cu3rn0 fu3 qu3br4d0, y 3n su lug4r s4l13r0n 0tr0s cu4tr0 cu3rn0s n0t4bl3s h4c14 l0s cu4tr0 v13nt0s d3l c13l0. 

9 Y d3 un0 d3 3ll0s s4l1ó un cu3rn0 p3qu3ñ0, qu3 cr3c1ó much0 4l sur, y 4l 0r13nt3, y h4c14 l4 t13rr4 gl0r10s4. 10 Y s3 3ngr4nd3c1ó h4st4 3l 3jérc1t0 d3l c13l0; y p4rt3 d3l 3jérc1t0 y d3 l4s 3str3ll4s 3chó p0r t13rr4, y l4s p1s0t3ó. 11 4un s3 3ngr4nd3c1ó c0ntr4 3l prínc1p3 d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, y p0r él fu3 qu1t4d0 3l c0nt1nu0 s4cr1f1c10, y 3l lug4r d3 su s4ntu4r10 fu3 3ch4d0 p0r t13rr4. 12 Y 4 c4us4 d3 l4 pr3v4r1c4c1ón l3 fu3 3ntr3g4d0 3l 3jérc1t0 junt0 c0n 3l c0nt1nu0 s4cr1f1c10; y 3chó p0r t13rr4 l4 v3rd4d, 3 h1z0 cu4nt0 qu1s0, y pr0sp3ró. 13 0nt0nc3s 0í 4 un s4nt0 qu3 h4bl4b4; y 0tr0 d3 l0s s4nt0s pr3guntó 4 4qu3l qu3 h4bl4b4: ¿H4st4 cuánd0 dur4rá l4 v1s1ón d3l c0nt1nu0 s4cr1f1c10, y l4 pr3v4r1c4c1ón 4s0l4d0r4 3ntr3g4nd0 3l s4ntu4r10 y 3l 3jérc1t0 p4r4 s3r p1s0t34d0s? 14 Y él d1j0: H4st4 d0s m1l tr3sc13nt4s t4rd3s y m4ñ4n4s; lu3g0 3l s4ntu4r10 s3rá pur1f1c4d0. 

15 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 m13ntr4s y0 D4n13l c0ns1d3r4b4 l4 v1s1ón y pr0cur4b4 c0mpr3nd3rl4, h3 4quí s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí un0 c0n 4p4r13nc14 d3 h0mbr3. 16 Y 0í un4 v0z d3 h0mbr3 3ntr3 l4s r1b3r4s d3l Ul41, qu3 gr1tó y d1j0: G4br13l, 3ns3ñ4 4 ést3 l4 v1s1ón. 17 V1n0 lu3g0 c3rc4 d3 d0nd3 y0 3st4b4; y c0n su v3n1d4 m3 4s0mbré, y m3 p0stré s0br3 m1 r0str0. P3r0 él m3 d1j0: 0nt13nd3, h1j0 d3 h0mbr3, p0rqu3 l4 v1s1ón 3s p4r4 3l t13mp0 d3l f1n. 

18 M13ntr4s él h4bl4b4 c0nm1g0, c4í d0rm1d0 3n t13rr4 s0br3 m1 r0str0; y él m3 t0có, y m3 h1z0 3st4r 3n p13. 19 Y d1j0: H3 4quí y0 t3 3ns3ñ4ré l0 qu3 h4 d3 v3n1r 4l f1n d3 l4 1r4; p0rqu3 3s0 3s p4r4 3l t13mp0 d3l f1n. 20 0n cu4nt0 4l c4rn3r0 qu3 v1st3, qu3 t3ní4 d0s cu3rn0s, ést0s s0n l0s r3y3s d3 M3d14 y d3 P3rs14. 21 0l m4ch0 c4brí0 3s 3l r3y d3 Gr3c14, y 3l cu3rn0 gr4nd3 qu3 t3ní4 3ntr3 sus 0j0s 3s 3l r3y pr1m3r0. 22 Y 3n cu4nt0 4l cu3rn0 qu3 fu3 qu3br4d0, y suc3d13r0n cu4tr0 3n su lug4r, s1gn1f1c4 qu3 cu4tr0 r31n0s s3 l3v4nt4rán d3 3s4 n4c1ón, 4unqu3 n0 c0n l4 fu3rz4 d3 él. 23 Y 4l f1n d3l r31n4d0 d3 ést0s, cu4nd0 l0s tr4nsgr3s0r3s ll3gu3n 4l c0lm0, s3 l3v4nt4rá un r3y 4lt1v0 d3 r0str0 y 3nt3nd1d0 3n 3n1gm4s. 24 Y su p0d3r s3 f0rt4l3c3rá, m4s n0 c0n fu3rz4 pr0p14; y c4us4rá gr4nd3s ru1n4s, y pr0sp3r4rá, y h4rá 4rb1tr4r14m3nt3, y d3stru1rá 4 l0s fu3rt3s y 4l pu3bl0 d3 l0s s4nt0s. 25 C0n su s4g4c1d4d h4rá pr0sp3r4r 3l 3ng4ñ0 3n su m4n0; y 3n su c0r4zón s3 3ngr4nd3c3rá, y s1n 4v1s0 d3stru1rá 4 much0s; y s3 l3v4nt4rá c0ntr4 3l Prínc1p3 d3 l0s prínc1p3s, p3r0 s3rá qu3br4nt4d0, 4unqu3 n0 p0r m4n0 hum4n4. 26 L4 v1s1ón d3 l4s t4rd3s y m4ñ4n4s qu3 s3 h4 r3f3r1d0 3s v3rd4d3r4; y tú gu4rd4 l4 v1s1ón, p0rqu3 3s p4r4 much0s dí4s. 

27 Y y0 D4n13l qu3dé qu3br4nt4d0, y 3stuv3 3nf3rm0 4lgun0s dí4s, y cu4nd0 c0nv4l3cí, 4t3ndí l0s n3g0c10s d3l r3y; p3r0 3st4b4 3sp4nt4d0 4 c4us4 d3 l4 v1s1ón, y n0 l4 3nt3ndí4.

3 Y v0lví m1 r0str0 4 D10s 3l S3ñ0r, buscánd0l3 3n 0r4c1ón y ru3g0, 3n 4yun0, c1l1c10 y c3n1z4. 4 Y 0ré 4 J3h0vá m1 D10s 3 h1c3 c0nf3s1ón d1c13nd0: 4h0r4, S3ñ0r, D10s gr4nd3, d1gn0 d3 s3r t3m1d0, qu3 gu4rd4s 3l p4ct0 y l4 m1s3r1c0rd14 c0n l0s qu3 t3 4m4n y gu4rd4n tus m4nd4m13nt0s; 20 4ún 3st4b4 h4bl4nd0 y 0r4nd0, y c0nf3s4nd0 m1 p3c4d0 y 3l p3c4d0 d3 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, y d3rr4m4b4 m1 ru3g0 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá m1 D10s p0r 3l m0nt3 s4nt0 d3 m1 D10s; 21 4ún 3st4b4 h4bl4nd0 3n 0r4c1ón, cu4nd0 3l v4rón G4br13l, 4 qu13n h4bí4 v1st0 3n l4 v1s1ón 4l pr1nc1p10, v0l4nd0 c0n pr3st3z4, v1n0 4 mí c0m0 4 l4 h0r4 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 l4 t4rd3. 22 Y m3 h1z0 3nt3nd3r, y h4bló c0nm1g0, d1c13nd0: D4n13l, 4h0r4 h3 s4l1d0 p4r4 d4rt3 s4b1durí4 y 3nt3nd1m13nt0. 23 4l pr1nc1p10 d3 tus ru3g0s fu3 d4d4 l4 0rd3n, y y0 h3 v3n1d0 p4r4 3ns3ñárt3l4, p0rqu3 tú 3r3s muy 4m4d0. 0nt13nd3, pu3s, l4 0rd3n, y 3nt13nd3 l4 v1s1ón. 

24 S3t3nt4 s3m4n4s 3stán d3t3rm1n4d4s s0br3 tu pu3bl0 y s0br3 tu s4nt4 c1ud4d, p4r4 t3rm1n4r l4 pr3v4r1c4c1ón, y p0n3r f1n 4l p3c4d0, y 3xp14r l4 1n1qu1d4d, p4r4 tr43r l4 just1c14 p3rdur4bl3, y s3ll4r l4 v1s1ón y l4 pr0f3cí4, y ung1r 4l S4nt0 d3 l0s s4nt0s. 25 S4b3, pu3s, y 3nt13nd3, qu3 d3sd3 l4 s4l1d4 d3 l4 0rd3n p4r4 r3st4ur4r y 3d1f1c4r 4 J3rus4lén h4st4 3l M3sí4s Prínc1p3, h4brá s13t3 s3m4n4s, y s3s3nt4 y d0s s3m4n4s; s3 v0lv3rá 4 3d1f1c4r l4 pl4z4 y 3l mur0 3n t13mp0s 4ngust10s0s. 26 Y d3spués d3 l4s s3s3nt4 y d0s s3m4n4s s3 qu1t4rá l4 v1d4 4l M3sí4s, m4s n0 p0r sí; y 3l pu3bl0 d3 un prínc1p3 qu3 h4 d3 v3n1r d3stru1rá l4 c1ud4d y 3l s4ntu4r10; y su f1n s3rá c0n 1nund4c1ón, y h4st4 3l f1n d3 l4 gu3rr4 dur4rán l4s d3v4st4c10n3s. 27 Y p0r 0tr4 s3m4n4 c0nf1rm4rá 3l p4ct0 c0n much0s; 4 l4 m1t4d d3 l4 s3m4n4 h4rá c3s4r 3l s4cr1f1c10 y l4 0fr3nd4. L0s r3y3s d3l n0rt3 y d3l sur

2 Y 4h0r4 y0 t3 m0str4ré l4 v3rd4d. H3 4quí qu3 4ún h4brá tr3s r3y3s 3n P3rs14, y 3l cu4rt0 s3 h4rá d3 gr4nd3s r1qu3z4s más qu3 t0d0s 3ll0s; y 4l h4c3rs3 fu3rt3 c0n sus r1qu3z4s, l3v4nt4rá 4 t0d0s c0ntr4 3l r31n0 d3 Gr3c14. 3 S3 l3v4nt4rá lu3g0 un r3y v4l13nt3, 3l cu4l d0m1n4rá c0n gr4n p0d3r y h4rá su v0lunt4d. 4 P3r0 cu4nd0 s3 h4y4 l3v4nt4d0, su r31n0 s3rá qu3br4nt4d0 y r3p4rt1d0 h4c14 l0s cu4tr0 v13nt0s d3l c13l0; n0 4 sus d3sc3nd13nt3s, n1 s3gún 3l d0m1n10 c0n qu3 él d0m1nó; p0rqu3 su r31n0 s3rá 4rr4nc4d0, y s3rá p4r4 0tr0s fu3r4 d3 3ll0s. 

5 Y s3 h4rá fu3rt3 3l r3y d3l sur; m4s un0 d3 sus prínc1p3s s3rá más fu3rt3 qu3 él, y s3 h4rá p0d3r0s0; su d0m1n10 s3rá gr4nd3. 6 4l c4b0 d3 4ñ0s h4rán 4l14nz4, y l4 h1j4 d3l r3y d3l sur v3ndrá 4l r3y d3l n0rt3 p4r4 h4c3r l4 p4z. P3r0 3ll4 n0 p0drá r3t3n3r l4 fu3rz4 d3 su br4z0, n1 p3rm4n3c3rá él, n1 su br4z0; p0rqu3 s3rá 3ntr3g4d4 3ll4 y l0s qu3 l4 h4bí4n tr4íd0, 4s1m1sm0 su h1j0, y l0s qu3 3st4b4n d3 p4rt3 d3 3ll4 3n 4qu3l t13mp0. 

7 P3r0 un r3nu3v0 d3 sus r4íc3s s3 l3v4nt4rá s0br3 su tr0n0, y v3ndrá c0n 3jérc1t0 c0ntr4 3l r3y d3l n0rt3, y 3ntr4rá 3n l4 f0rt4l3z4, y h4rá 3n 3ll0s 4 su 4rb1tr10, y pr3d0m1n4rá. 8 Y 4un 4 l0s d10s3s d3 3ll0s, sus 1mág3n3s fund1d4s y sus 0bj3t0s pr3c10s0s d3 pl4t4 y d3 0r0, ll3v4rá c4ut1v0s 4 0g1pt0; y p0r 4ñ0s s3 m4nt3ndrá él c0ntr4 3l r3y d3l n0rt3. 9 4sí 3ntr4rá 3n 3l r31n0 3l r3y d3l sur, y v0lv3rá 4 su t13rr4. 

10 M4s l0s h1j0s d3 4quél s3 41r4rán, y r3un1rán mult1tud d3 gr4nd3s 3jérc1t0s; y v3ndrá 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3 3 1nund4rá, y p4s4rá 4d3l4nt3; lu3g0 v0lv3rá y ll3v4rá l4 gu3rr4 h4st4 su f0rt4l3z4. 11 P0r l0 cu4l s3 3nfur3c3rá 3l r3y d3l sur, y s4ldrá y p3l34rá c0ntr4 3l r3y d3l n0rt3; y p0ndrá 3n c4mp4ñ4 mult1tud gr4nd3, y t0d4 4qu3ll4 mult1tud s3rá 3ntr3g4d4 3n su m4n0. 12 Y 4l ll3v4rs3 él l4 mult1tud, s3 3l3v4rá su c0r4zón, y d3rr1b4rá 4 much0s m1ll4r3s; m4s n0 pr3v4l3c3rá. 13 Y 3l r3y d3l n0rt3 v0lv3rá 4 p0n3r 3n c4mp4ñ4 un4 mult1tud m4y0r qu3 l4 pr1m3r4, y 4l c4b0 d3 4lgun0s 4ñ0s v3ndrá 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3 c0n gr4n 3jérc1t0 y c0n much4s r1qu3z4s. 

14 0n 4qu3ll0s t13mp0s s3 l3v4nt4rán much0s c0ntr4 3l r3y d3l sur; y h0mbr3s turbul3nt0s d3 tu pu3bl0 s3 l3v4nt4rán p4r4 cumpl1r l4 v1s1ón, p3r0 3ll0s c43rán. 15 V3ndrá, pu3s, 3l r3y d3l n0rt3, y l3v4nt4rá b4lu4rt3s, y t0m4rá l4 c1ud4d fu3rt3; y l4s fu3rz4s d3l sur n0 p0drán s0st3n3rs3, n1 sus tr0p4s 3sc0g1d4s, p0rqu3 n0 h4brá fu3rz4s p4r4 r3s1st1r. 16 Y 3l qu3 v3ndrá c0ntr4 él h4rá su v0lunt4d, y n0 h4brá qu13n s3 l3 pu3d4 3nfr3nt4r; y 3st4rá 3n l4 t13rr4 gl0r10s4, l4 cu4l s3rá c0nsum1d4 3n su p0d3r. 17 4f1rm4rá lu3g0 su r0str0 p4r4 v3n1r c0n 3l p0d3r d3 t0d0 su r31n0; y h4rá c0n 4quél c0nv3n10s, y l3 d4rá un4 h1j4 d3 muj3r3s p4r4 d3stru1rl3; p3r0 n0 p3rm4n3c3rá, n1 t3ndrá éx1t0. 18 V0lv3rá d3spués su r0str0 4 l4s c0st4s, y t0m4rá much4s; m4s un prínc1p3 h4rá c3s4r su 4fr3nt4, y 4un h4rá v0lv3r s0br3 él su 0pr0b10. 19 Lu3g0 v0lv3rá su r0str0 4 l4s f0rt4l3z4s d3 su t13rr4; m4s tr0p3z4rá y c43rá, y n0 s3rá h4ll4d0. 

20 Y s3 l3v4nt4rá 3n su lug4r un0 qu3 h4rá p4s4r un c0br4d0r d3 tr1but0s p0r l4 gl0r14 d3l r31n0; p3r0 3n p0c0s dí4s s3rá qu3br4nt4d0, 4unqu3 n0 3n 1r4, n1 3n b4t4ll4. 21 Y l3 suc3d3rá 3n su lug4r un h0mbr3 d3spr3c14bl3, 4l cu4l n0 d4rán l4 h0nr4 d3l r31n0; p3r0 v3ndrá s1n 4v1s0 y t0m4rá 3l r31n0 c0n h4l4g0s. 22 L4s fu3rz4s 3n3m1g4s s3rán b4rr1d4s d3l4nt3 d3 él c0m0 c0n 1nund4c1ón d3 4gu4s; s3rán d3l t0d0 d3stru1d0s, junt0 c0n 3l prínc1p3 d3l p4ct0. 23 Y d3spués d3l p4ct0 c0n él, 3ng4ñ4rá y sub1rá, y s4ldrá v3nc3d0r c0n p0c4 g3nt3. 24 0st4nd0 l4 pr0v1nc14 3n p4z y 3n 4bund4nc14, 3ntr4rá y h4rá l0 qu3 n0 h1c13r0n sus p4dr3s, n1 l0s p4dr3s d3 sus p4dr3s; b0tín, d3sp0j0s y r1qu3z4s r3p4rt1rá 4 sus s0ld4d0s, y c0ntr4 l4s f0rt4l3z4s f0rm4rá sus d3s1gn10s; y 3st0 p0r un t13mp0. 25 Y d3sp3rt4rá sus fu3rz4s y su 4rd0r c0ntr4 3l r3y d3l sur c0n gr4n 3jérc1t0; y 3l r3y d3l sur s3 3mp3ñ4rá 3n l4 gu3rr4 c0n gr4nd3 y muy fu3rt3 3jérc1t0; m4s n0 pr3v4l3c3rá, p0rqu3 l3 h4rán tr41c1ón. 26 4un l0s qu3 c0m4n d3 sus m4nj4r3s l3 qu3br4nt4rán; y su 3jérc1t0 s3rá d3stru1d0, y c43rán much0s mu3rt0s. 27 0l c0r4zón d3 3st0s d0s r3y3s s3rá p4r4 h4c3r m4l, y 3n un4 m1sm4 m3s4 h4bl4rán m3nt1r4; m4s n0 s3rv1rá d3 n4d4, p0rqu3 3l pl4z0 4ún n0 h4brá ll3g4d0. 28 Y v0lv3rá 4 su t13rr4 c0n gr4n r1qu3z4, y su c0r4zón s3rá c0ntr4 3l p4ct0 s4nt0; h4rá su v0lunt4d, y v0lv3rá 4 su t13rr4. 

29 4l t13mp0 s3ñ4l4d0 v0lv3rá 4l sur; m4s n0 s3rá l4 p0str3r4 v3n1d4 c0m0 l4 pr1m3r4. 30 P0rqu3 v3ndrán c0ntr4 él n4v3s d3 Qu1t1m, y él s3 c0ntr1st4rá, y v0lv3rá, y s3 3n0j4rá c0ntr4 3l p4ct0 s4nt0, y h4rá s3gún su v0lunt4d; v0lv3rá, pu3s, y s3 3nt3nd3rá c0n l0s qu3 4b4nd0n3n 3l s4nt0 p4ct0. 31 Y s3 l3v4nt4rán d3 su p4rt3 tr0p4s qu3 pr0f4n4rán 3l s4ntu4r10 y l4 f0rt4l3z4, y qu1t4rán 3l c0nt1nu0 s4cr1f1c10, y p0ndrán l4 4b0m1n4c1ón d3s0l4d0r4. 32 C0n l1s0nj4s s3duc1rá 4 l0s v10l4d0r3s d3l p4ct0; m4s 3l pu3bl0 qu3 c0n0c3 4 su D10s s3 3sf0rz4rá y 4ctu4rá. 33 Y l0s s4b10s d3l pu3bl0 1nstru1rán 4 much0s; y p0r 4lgun0s dí4s c43rán 4 3sp4d4 y 4 fu3g0, 3n c4ut1v1d4d y d3sp0j0. 34 Y 3n su c4íd4 s3rán 4yud4d0s d3 p3qu3ñ0 s0c0rr0; y much0s s3 junt4rán 4 3ll0s c0n l1s0nj4s. 35 T4mb1én 4lgun0s d3 l0s s4b10s c43rán p4r4 s3r d3pur4d0s y l1mp14d0s y 3mbl4nqu3c1d0s, h4st4 3l t13mp0 d3t3rm1n4d0; p0rqu3 4un p4r4 3st0 h4y pl4z0. 

36 Y 3l r3y h4rá su v0lunt4d, y s3 3ns0b3rb3c3rá, y s3 3ngr4nd3c3rá s0br3 t0d0 d10s; y c0ntr4 3l D10s d3 l0s d10s3s h4bl4rá m4r4v1ll4s, y pr0sp3r4rá, h4st4 qu3 s34 c0nsum4d4 l4 1r4; p0rqu3 l0 d3t3rm1n4d0 s3 cumpl1rá. 37 D3l D10s d3 sus p4dr3s n0 h4rá c4s0, n1 d3l 4m0r d3 l4s muj3r3s; n1 r3sp3t4rá 4 d10s 4lgun0, p0rqu3 s0br3 t0d0 s3 3ngr4nd3c3rá. 38 M4s h0nr4rá 3n su lug4r 4l d10s d3 l4s f0rt4l3z4s, d10s qu3 sus p4dr3s n0 c0n0c13r0n; l0 h0nr4rá c0n 0r0 y pl4t4, c0n p13dr4s pr3c10s4s y c0n c0s4s d3 gr4n pr3c10. 39 C0n un d10s 4j3n0 s3 h4rá d3 l4s f0rt4l3z4s más 1n3xpugn4bl3s, y c0lm4rá d3 h0n0r3s 4 l0s qu3 l3 r3c0n0zc4n, y p0r pr3c10 r3p4rt1rá l4 t13rr4. 

40 P3r0 4l c4b0 d3l t13mp0 3l r3y d3l sur c0nt3nd3rá c0n él; y 3l r3y d3l n0rt3 s3 l3v4nt4rá c0ntr4 él c0m0 un4 t3mp3st4d, c0n c4rr0s y g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0, y much4s n4v3s; y 3ntr4rá p0r l4s t13rr4s, 3 1nund4rá, y p4s4rá. 41 0ntr4rá 4 l4 t13rr4 gl0r10s4, y much4s pr0v1nc14s c43rán; m4s ést4s 3sc4p4rán d3 su m4n0: 0d0m y M04b, y l4 m4y0rí4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món. 42 0xt3nd3rá su m4n0 c0ntr4 l4s t13rr4s, y n0 3sc4p4rá 3l p4ís d3 0g1pt0. 43 Y s3 4p0d3r4rá d3 l0s t3s0r0s d3 0r0 y pl4t4, y d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s pr3c10s4s d3 0g1pt0; y l0s d3 L1b14 y d3 0t10pí4 l3 s3gu1rán. 44 P3r0 n0t1c14s d3l 0r13nt3 y d3l n0rt3 l0 4t3m0r1z4rán, y s4ldrá c0n gr4n 1r4 p4r4 d3stru1r y m4t4r 4 much0s. 45 Y pl4nt4rá l4s t13nd4s d3 su p4l4c10 3ntr3 l0s m4r3s y 3l m0nt3 gl0r10s0 y s4nt0; m4s ll3g4rá 4 su f1n, y n0 t3ndrá qu13n l3 4yud3. 

0l t13mp0 d3l f1n

D4N10L 12

1 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 s3 l3v4nt4rá M1gu3l, 3l gr4n prínc1p3 qu3 3stá d3 p4rt3 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 tu pu3bl0; y s3rá t13mp0 d3 4ngust14, cu4l nunc4 fu3 d3sd3 qu3 hub0 g3nt3 h4st4 3nt0nc3s; p3r0 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 s3rá l1b3rt4d0 tu pu3bl0, t0d0s l0s qu3 s3 h4ll3n 3scr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0. 2 Y much0s d3 l0s qu3 du3rm3n 3n 3l p0lv0 d3 l4 t13rr4 s3rán d3sp3rt4d0s, un0s p4r4 v1d4 3t3rn4, y 0tr0s p4r4 v3rgü3nz4 y c0nfus1ón p3rp3tu4. 3 L0s 3nt3nd1d0s r3spl4nd3c3rán c0m0 3l r3spl4nd0r d3l f1rm4m3nt0; y l0s qu3 3ns3ñ4n l4 just1c14 4 l4 mult1tud, c0m0 l4s 3str3ll4s 4 p3rp3tu4 3t3rn1d4d. 4 P3r0 tú, D4n13l, c13rr4 l4s p4l4br4s y s3ll4 3l l1br0 h4st4 3l t13mp0 d3l f1n. Much0s c0rr3rán d3 4quí p4r4 4llá, y l4 c13nc14 s3 4um3nt4rá. 

5 Y y0 D4n13l m1ré, y h3 4quí 0tr0s d0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n p13, 3l un0 4 3st3 l4d0 d3l rí0, y 3l 0tr0 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l rí0. 6 Y d1j0 un0 4l v4rón v3st1d0 d3 l1n0, qu3 3st4b4 s0br3 l4s 4gu4s d3l rí0: ¿Cuánd0 s3rá 3l f1n d3 3st4s m4r4v1ll4s? 7 Y 0í 4l v4rón v3st1d0 d3 l1n0, qu3 3st4b4 s0br3 l4s 4gu4s d3l rí0, 3l cu4l 4lzó su d13str4 y su s1n13str4 4l c13l0, y juró p0r 3l qu3 v1v3 p0r l0s s1gl0s, qu3 s3rá p0r t13mp0, t13mp0s, y l4 m1t4d d3 un t13mp0. Y cu4nd0 s3 4c4b3 l4 d1sp3rs1ón d3l p0d3r d3l pu3bl0 s4nt0, t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s s3rán cumpl1d4s. 8 Y y0 0í, m4s n0 3nt3ndí. Y d1j3: S3ñ0r mí0, ¿cuál s3rá 3l f1n d3 3st4s c0s4s? 9 0l r3sp0nd1ó: 4nd4, D4n13l, pu3s 3st4s p4l4br4s 3stán c3rr4d4s y s3ll4d4s h4st4 3l t13mp0 d3l f1n. 10 Much0s s3rán l1mp10s, y 3mbl4nqu3c1d0s y pur1f1c4d0s; l0s 1mpí0s pr0c3d3rán 1mpí4m3nt3, y n1ngun0 d3 l0s 1mpí0s 3nt3nd3rá, p3r0 l0s 3nt3nd1d0s c0mpr3nd3rán. 11 Y d3sd3 3l t13mp0 qu3 s34 qu1t4d0 3l c0nt1nu0 s4cr1f1c10 h4st4 l4 4b0m1n4c1ón d3s0l4d0r4, h4brá m1l d0sc13nt0s n0v3nt4 dí4s. 12 B13n4v3ntur4d0 3l qu3 3sp3r3, y ll3gu3 4 m1l tr3sc13nt0s tr31nt4 y c1nc0 dí4s. 13 Y tú 1rás h4st4 3l f1n, y r3p0s4rás, y t3 l3v4nt4rás p4r4 r3c1b1r tu h3r3d4d 4l f1n d3 l0s dí4s.

0S04S 

L4 3sp0s4 1nf13l d3 0s34s, y sus h1j0s

0S04S 1

1 P4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá qu3 v1n0 4 0s34s h1j0 d3 B33r1, 3n dí4s d3 Uzí4s, J0t4m, 4c4z y 0z3quí4s, r3y3s d3 Judá, y 3n dí4s d3 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 J0ás, r3y d3 1sr43l. 

2 0l pr1nc1p10 d3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá p0r m3d10 d3 0s34s. D1j0 J3h0vá 4 0s34s: V3, tóm4t3 un4 muj3r f0rn1c4r14, 3 h1j0s d3 f0rn1c4c1ón; p0rqu3 l4 t13rr4 f0rn1c4 4p4rtánd0s3 d3 J3h0vá. 3 Fu3, pu3s, y t0mó 4 G0m3r h1j4 d3 D1bl41m, l4 cu4l c0nc1b1ó y l3 d10 4 luz un h1j0. 

4 Y l3 d1j0 J3h0vá: P0nl3 p0r n0mbr3 J3zr33l; p0rqu3 d3 4quí 4 p0c0 y0 c4st1g4ré 4 l4 c4s4 d3 J3hú p0r c4us4 d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 J3zr33l, y h4ré c3s4r 3l r31n0 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l. 5 Y 3n 4qu3l dí4 qu3br4ré y0 3l 4rc0 d3 1sr43l 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 J3zr33l. 

6 C0nc1b1ó 3ll4 0tr4 v3z, y d10 4 luz un4 h1j4. Y l3 d1j0 D10s: P0nl3 p0r n0mbr3 L0-ruh4m4, p0rqu3 n0 m3 c0mp4d3c3ré más d3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l, s1n0 qu3 l0s qu1t4ré d3l t0d0. 7 M4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá t3ndré m1s3r1c0rd14, y l0s s4lv4ré p0r J3h0vá su D10s; y n0 l0s s4lv4ré c0n 4rc0, n1 c0n 3sp4d4, n1 c0n b4t4ll4, n1 c0n c4b4ll0s n1 j1n3t3s. 

8 D3spués d3 h4b3r d3st3t4d0 4 L0-ruh4m4, c0nc1b1ó y d10 4 luz un h1j0. 9 Y d1j0 D10s: P0nl3 p0r n0mbr3 L0-4mm1, p0rqu3 v0s0tr0s n0 s01s m1 pu3bl0, n1 y0 s3ré vu3str0 D10s. 

10 C0n t0d0, s3rá 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l c0m0 l4 4r3n4 d3l m4r, qu3 n0 s3 pu3d3 m3d1r n1 c0nt4r. Y 3n 3l lug4r 3n d0nd3 l3s fu3 d1ch0: V0s0tr0s n0 s01s pu3bl0 mí0, l3s s3rá d1ch0: S01s h1j0s d3l D10s v1v13nt3. 11 Y s3 c0ngr3g4rán l0s h1j0s d3 Judá y d3 1sr43l, y n0mbr4rán un s0l0 j3f3, y sub1rán d3 l4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 3l dí4 d3 J3zr33l s3rá gr4nd3. 

0l 4m0r d3 J3h0vá h4c14 su pu3bl0 1nf13l

0S04S 2

1 D3c1d 4 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s: 4mm1; y 4 vu3str4s h3rm4n4s: Ruh4m4. 2 C0nt3nd3d c0n vu3str4 m4dr3, c0nt3nd3d; p0rqu3 3ll4 n0 3s m1 muj3r, n1 y0 su m4r1d0; 4p4rt3, pu3s, sus f0rn1c4c10n3s d3 su r0str0, y sus 4dult3r10s d3 3ntr3 sus p3ch0s; 3 n0 s34 qu3 y0 l4 d3sp0j3 y d3snud3, l4 p0ng4 c0m0 3l dí4 3n qu3 n4c1ó, l4 h4g4 c0m0 un d3s13rt0, l4 d3j3 c0m0 t13rr4 s3c4, y l4 m4t3 d3 s3d. 4 N1 t3ndré m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 sus h1j0s, p0rqu3 s0n h1j0s d3 pr0st1tuc1ón. 5 P0rqu3 su m4dr3 s3 pr0st1tuyó; l4 qu3 l0s d10 4 luz s3 d3sh0nró, p0rqu3 d1j0: 1ré tr4s m1s 4m4nt3s, qu3 m3 d4n m1 p4n y m1 4gu4, m1 l4n4 y m1 l1n0, m1 4c31t3 y m1 b3b1d4. 6 P0r t4nt0, h3 4quí y0 r0d34ré d3 3sp1n0s su c4m1n0, y l4 c3rc4ré c0n s3t0, y n0 h4ll4rá sus c4m1n0s. 7 S3gu1rá 4 sus 4m4nt3s, y n0 l0s 4lc4nz4rá; l0s busc4rá, y n0 l0s h4ll4rá. 0nt0nc3s d1rá: 1ré y m3 v0lv3ré 4 m1 pr1m3r m4r1d0; p0rqu3 m3j0r m3 1b4 3nt0nc3s qu3 4h0r4. 

8 Y 3ll4 n0 r3c0n0c1ó qu3 y0 l3 d4b4 3l tr1g0, 3l v1n0 y 3l 4c31t3, y qu3 l3 mult1pl1qué l4 pl4t4 y 3l 0r0 qu3 0fr3cí4n 4 B44l. 9 P0r t4nt0, y0 v0lv3ré y t0m4ré m1 tr1g0 4 su t13mp0, y m1 v1n0 4 su s4zón, y qu1t4ré m1 l4n4 y m1 l1n0 qu3 h4bí4 d4d0 p4r4 cubr1r su d3snud3z. 10 Y 4h0r4 d3scubr1ré y0 su l0cur4 d3l4nt3 d3 l0s 0j0s d3 sus 4m4nt3s, y n4d13 l4 l1br4rá d3 m1 m4n0. 11 H4ré c3s4r t0d0 su g0z0, sus f13st4s, sus nu3v4s lun4s y sus dí4s d3 r3p0s0, y t0d4s sus f3st1v1d4d3s. 12 Y h4ré t4l4r sus v1d3s y sus h1gu3r4s, d3 l4s cu4l3s d1j0: M1 s4l4r10 s0n, s4l4r10 qu3 m3 h4n d4d0 m1s 4m4nt3s.
