2 0íd 3st0, 4nc14n0s, y 3scuch4d, t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4. ¿H4 4c0nt3c1d0 3st0 3n vu3str0s dí4s, 0 3n l0s dí4s d3 vu3str0s p4dr3s? 3 D3 3st0 c0nt4ré1s 4 vu3str0s h1j0s, y vu3str0s h1j0s 4 sus h1j0s, y sus h1j0s 4 l4 0tr4 g3n3r4c1ón. 4 L0 qu3 qu3dó d3 l4 0rug4 c0m1ó 3l s4ltón, y l0 qu3 qu3dó d3l s4ltón c0m1ó 3l r3v0ltón; y l4 l4ng0st4 c0m1ó l0 qu3 d3l r3v0ltón h4bí4 qu3d4d0. 

5 D3sp3rt4d, b0rr4ch0s, y ll0r4d; g3m1d, t0d0s l0s qu3 b3bé1s v1n0, 4 c4us4 d3l m0st0, p0rqu3 0s 3s qu1t4d0 d3 vu3str4 b0c4. 6 P0rqu3 pu3bl0 fu3rt3 3 1nnum3r4bl3 sub1ó 4 m1 t13rr4; sus d13nt3s s0n d13nt3s d3 l3ón, y sus mu3l4s, mu3l4s d3 l3ón. 7 4s0ló m1 v1d, y d3sc0rt3zó m1 h1gu3r4; d3l t0d0 l4 d3snudó y d3rr1bó; sus r4m4s qu3d4r0n bl4nc4s. 

8 Ll0r4 tú c0m0 j0v3n v3st1d4 d3 c1l1c10 p0r 3l m4r1d0 d3 su juv3ntud. 9 D3s4p4r3c1ó d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá l4 0fr3nd4 y l4 l1b4c1ón; l0s s4c3rd0t3s m1n1str0s d3 J3h0vá 3stán d3 du3l0. 10 0l c4mp0 3stá 4s0l4d0, s3 3nlutó l4 t13rr4; p0rqu3 3l tr1g0 fu3 d3stru1d0, s3 s3có 3l m0st0, s3 p3rd1ó 3l 4c31t3. 

11 C0nfundí0s, l4br4d0r3s; g3m1d, v1ñ3r0s, p0r 3l tr1g0 y l4 c3b4d4, p0rqu3 s3 p3rd1ó l4 m13s d3l c4mp0. 12 L4 v1d 3stá s3c4, y p3r3c1ó l4 h1gu3r4; 3l gr4n4d0 t4mb1én, l4 p4lm3r4 y 3l m4nz4n0; t0d0s l0s árb0l3s d3l c4mp0 s3 s3c4r0n, p0r l0 cu4l s3 3xt1ngu1ó 3l g0z0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s. 

13 C3ñí0s y l4m3nt4d, s4c3rd0t3s; g3m1d, m1n1str0s d3l 4lt4r; v3n1d, d0rm1d 3n c1l1c10, m1n1str0s d3 m1 D10s; p0rqu3 qu1t4d4 3s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 vu3str0 D10s l4 0fr3nd4 y l4 l1b4c1ón. 

14 Pr0cl4m4d 4yun0, c0nv0c4d 4 4s4mbl34; c0ngr3g4d 4 l0s 4nc14n0s y 4 t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y cl4m4d 4 J3h0vá. 

15 ¡4y d3l dí4! p0rqu3 c3rc4n0 3stá 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá, y v3ndrá c0m0 d3strucc1ón p0r 3l T0d0p0d3r0s0. 16 ¿N0 fu3 4rr3b4t4d0 3l 4l1m3nt0 d3 d3l4nt3 d3 nu3str0s 0j0s, l4 4l3grí4 y 3l pl4c3r d3 l4 c4s4 d3 nu3str0 D10s? 

17 0l gr4n0 s3 pudr1ó d3b4j0 d3 l0s t3rr0n3s, l0s gr4n3r0s fu3r0n 4s0l4d0s, l0s 4lf0lí3s d3stru1d0s; p0rqu3 s3 s3có 3l tr1g0. 18 ¡Cóm0 g1m13r0n l4s b3st14s! ¡cuán turb4d0s 4nduv13r0n l0s h4t0s d3 l0s bu3y3s, p0rqu3 n0 tuv13r0n p4st0s! T4mb1én fu3r0n 4s0l4d0s l0s r3b4ñ0s d3 l4s 0v3j4s. 

19 4 t1, 0h J3h0vá, cl4m4ré; p0rqu3 fu3g0 c0nsum1ó l0s p4st0s d3l d3s13rt0, y ll4m4 4br4só t0d0s l0s árb0l3s d3l c4mp0. 20 L4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0 br4m4rán t4mb1én 4 t1, p0rqu3 s3 s3c4r0n l0s 4rr0y0s d3 l4s 4gu4s, y fu3g0 c0nsum1ó l4s pr4d3r4s d3l d3s13rt0. 

J00L 2

1 T0c4d tr0mp3t4 3n S10n, y d4d 4l4rm4 3n m1 s4nt0 m0nt3; t13mbl3n t0d0s l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 l4 t13rr4, p0rqu3 v13n3 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá, p0rqu3 3stá c3rc4n0. 2 Dí4 d3 t1n13bl4s y d3 0scur1d4d, dí4 d3 nub3 y d3 s0mbr4; c0m0 s0br3 l0s m0nt3s s3 3xt13nd3 3l 4lb4, 4sí v3ndrá un pu3bl0 gr4nd3 y fu3rt3; s3m3j4nt3 4 él n0 l0 hub0 j4más, n1 d3spués d3 él l0 h4brá 3n 4ñ0s d3 much4s g3n3r4c10n3s. 

3 D3l4nt3 d3 él c0nsum1rá fu3g0, tr4s d3 él 4br4s4rá ll4m4; c0m0 3l hu3rt0 d3l 0dén s3rá l4 t13rr4 d3l4nt3 d3 él, y d3trás d3 él c0m0 d3s13rt0 4s0l4d0; n1 t4mp0c0 h4brá qu13n d3 él 3sc4p3. 4 Su 4sp3ct0, c0m0 4sp3ct0 d3 c4b4ll0s, y c0m0 g3nt3 d3 4 c4b4ll0 c0rr3rán. 5 C0m0 3stru3nd0 d3 c4rr0s s4lt4rán s0br3 l4s cumbr3s d3 l0s m0nt3s; c0m0 s0n1d0 d3 ll4m4 d3 fu3g0 qu3 c0nsum3 h0j4r4sc4s, c0m0 pu3bl0 fu3rt3 d1spu3st0 p4r4 l4 b4t4ll4. 6 D3l4nt3 d3 él t3m3rán l0s pu3bl0s; s3 p0ndrán pál1d0s t0d0s l0s s3mbl4nt3s. 7 C0m0 v4l13nt3s c0rr3rán, c0m0 h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4 sub1rán 3l mur0; c4d4 cu4l m4rch4rá p0r su c4m1n0, y n0 t0rc3rá su rumb0. 8 N1ngun0 3str3ch4rá 4 su c0mp4ñ3r0, c4d4 un0 1rá p0r su c4rr3r4; y 4un c4y3nd0 s0br3 l4 3sp4d4 n0 s3 h3r1rán. 9 1rán p0r l4 c1ud4d, c0rr3rán p0r 3l mur0, sub1rán p0r l4s c4s4s, 3ntr4rán p0r l4s v3nt4n4s 4 m4n3r4 d3 l4dr0n3s. 

10 D3l4nt3 d3 él t3mbl4rá l4 t13rr4, s3 3str3m3c3rán l0s c13l0s; 3l s0l y l4 lun4 s3 0scur3c3rán, y l4s 3str3ll4s r3tr43rán su r3spl4nd0r. 11 Y J3h0vá d4rá su 0rd3n d3l4nt3 d3 su 3jérc1t0; p0rqu3 muy gr4nd3 3s su c4mp4m3nt0; fu3rt3 3s 3l qu3 3j3cut4 su 0rd3n; p0rqu3 gr4nd3 3s 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá, y muy t3rr1bl3; ¿qu1én p0drá s0p0rt4rl0? 

L4 m1s3r1c0rd14 d3 J3h0vá

12 P0r 3s0 pu3s, 4h0r4, d1c3 J3h0vá, c0nv3rtí0s 4 mí c0n t0d0 vu3str0 c0r4zón, c0n 4yun0 y ll0r0 y l4m3nt0. 13 R4sg4d vu3str0 c0r4zón, y n0 vu3str0s v3st1d0s, y c0nv3rtí0s 4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s; p0rqu3 m1s3r1c0rd10s0 3s y cl3m3nt3, t4rd0 p4r4 l4 1r4 y gr4nd3 3n m1s3r1c0rd14, y qu3 s3 du3l3 d3l c4st1g0. 14 ¿Qu1én s4b3 s1 v0lv3rá y s3 4rr3p3nt1rá y d3j4rá b3nd1c1ón tr4s d3 él, 3st0 3s, 0fr3nd4 y l1b4c1ón p4r4 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s? 

15 T0c4d tr0mp3t4 3n S10n, pr0cl4m4d 4yun0, c0nv0c4d 4s4mbl34. 16 R3un1d 4l pu3bl0, s4nt1f1c4d l4 r3un1ón, junt4d 4 l0s 4nc14n0s, c0ngr3g4d 4 l0s n1ñ0s y 4 l0s qu3 m4m4n, s4lg4 d3 su cám4r4 3l n0v10, y d3 su tál4m0 l4 n0v14. 17 0ntr3 l4 3ntr4d4 y 3l 4lt4r ll0r3n l0s s4c3rd0t3s m1n1str0s d3 J3h0vá, y d1g4n: P3rd0n4, 0h J3h0vá, 4 tu pu3bl0, y n0 3ntr3gu3s 4l 0pr0b10 tu h3r3d4d, p4r4 qu3 l4s n4c10n3s s3 3ns3ñ0r33n d3 3ll4. ¿P0r qué h4n d3 d3c1r 3ntr3 l0s pu3bl0s: Dónd3 3stá su D10s? 

18 Y J3h0vá, s0líc1t0 p0r su t13rr4, p3rd0n4rá 4 su pu3bl0. 19 R3sp0nd3rá J3h0vá, y d1rá 4 su pu3bl0: H3 4quí y0 0s 3nví0 p4n, m0st0 y 4c31t3, y s3ré1s s4c14d0s d3 3ll0s; y nunc4 más 0s p0ndré 3n 0pr0b10 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s. 20 Y h4ré 4l3j4r d3 v0s0tr0s 4l d3l n0rt3, y l0 3ch4ré 3n t13rr4 s3c4 y d3s13rt4; su f4z s3rá h4c14 3l m4r 0r13nt4l, y su f1n 4l m4r 0cc1d3nt4l; y 3xh4l4rá su h3d0r, y sub1rá su pudr1c1ón, p0rqu3 h1z0 gr4nd3s c0s4s. 

21 T13rr4, n0 t3m4s; 4légr4t3 y góz4t3, p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4rá gr4nd3s c0s4s. 22 4n1m4l3s d3l c4mp0, n0 t3má1s; p0rqu3 l0s p4st0s d3l d3s13rt0 r3v3rd3c3rán, p0rqu3 l0s árb0l3s ll3v4rán su frut0, l4 h1gu3r4 y l4 v1d d4rán sus frut0s. 23 V0s0tr0s t4mb1én, h1j0s d3 S10n, 4l3gr40s y g0z40s 3n J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s; p0rqu3 0s h4 d4d0 l4 pr1m3r4 lluv14 4 su t13mp0, y h4rá d3sc3nd3r s0br3 v0s0tr0s lluv14 t3mpr4n4 y t4rdí4 c0m0 4l pr1nc1p10. 24 L4s 3r4s s3 ll3n4rán d3 tr1g0, y l0s l4g4r3s r3b0s4rán d3 v1n0 y 4c31t3. 25 Y 0s r3st1tu1ré l0s 4ñ0s qu3 c0m1ó l4 0rug4, 3l s4ltón, 3l r3v0ltón y l4 l4ng0st4, m1 gr4n 3jérc1t0 qu3 3nv1é c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s. 

26 C0m3ré1s h4st4 s4c14r0s, y 4l4b4ré1s 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, 3l cu4l h1z0 m4r4v1ll4s c0n v0s0tr0s; y nunc4 j4más s3rá m1 pu3bl0 4v3rg0nz4d0. 27 Y c0n0c3ré1s qu3 3n m3d10 d3 1sr43l 3st0y y0, y qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, y n0 h4y 0tr0; y m1 pu3bl0 nunc4 j4más s3rá 4v3rg0nz4d0. 

D3rr4m4m13nt0 d3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s

28 Y d3spués d3 3st0 d3rr4m4ré m1 0spír1tu s0br3 t0d4 c4rn3, y pr0f3t1z4rán vu3str0s h1j0s y vu3str4s h1j4s; vu3str0s 4nc14n0s s0ñ4rán su3ñ0s, y vu3str0s jóv3n3s v3rán v1s10n3s. 29 Y t4mb1én s0br3 l0s s13rv0s y s0br3 l4s s13rv4s d3rr4m4ré m1 0spír1tu 3n 4qu3ll0s dí4s. 

30 Y d4ré pr0d1g10s 3n 3l c13l0 y 3n l4 t13rr4, s4ngr3, y fu3g0, y c0lumn4s d3 hum0. 31 0l s0l s3 c0nv3rt1rá 3n t1n13bl4s, y l4 lun4 3n s4ngr3, 4nt3s qu3 v3ng4 3l dí4 gr4nd3 y 3sp4nt0s0 d3 J3h0vá. 32 Y t0d0 4qu3l qu3 1nv0c4r3 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá s3rá s4lv0; p0rqu3 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S10n y 3n J3rus4lén h4brá s4lv4c1ón, c0m0 h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá, y 3ntr3 3l r3m4n3nt3 4l cu4l él h4brá ll4m4d0. 

Ju1c10 d3 J3h0vá s0br3 l4s n4c10n3s

J00L 3

1 P0rqu3 h3 4quí qu3 3n 4qu3ll0s dí4s, y 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 3n qu3 h4ré v0lv3r l4 c4ut1v1d4d d3 Judá y d3 J3rus4lén, 2 r3un1ré 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s, y l4s h4ré d3sc3nd3r 4l v4ll3 d3 J0s4f4t, y 4llí 3ntr4ré 3n ju1c10 c0n 3ll4s 4 c4us4 d3 m1 pu3bl0, y d3 1sr43l m1 h3r3d4d, 4 qu13n 3ll4s 3sp4rc13r0n 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y r3p4rt13r0n m1 t13rr4; 3 y 3ch4r0n su3rt3s s0br3 m1 pu3bl0, y d13r0n l0s n1ñ0s p0r un4 r4m3r4, y v3nd13r0n l4s n1ñ4s p0r v1n0 p4r4 b3b3r. 

4 Y t4mb1én, ¿qué t3ng0 y0 c0n v0s0tr4s, T1r0 y S1dón, y t0d0 3l t3rr1t0r10 d3 F1l1st34? ¿Qu3ré1s v3ng4r0s d3 mí? Y s1 d3 mí 0s v3ngá1s, b13n pr0nt0 h4ré y0 r3c43r l4 p4g4 s0br3 vu3str4 c4b3z4. 5 P0rqu3 h4bé1s ll3v4d0 m1 pl4t4 y m1 0r0, y m1s c0s4s pr3c10s4s y h3rm0s4s m3t1st31s 3n vu3str0s t3mpl0s; 6 y v3nd1st31s l0s h1j0s d3 Judá y l0s h1j0s d3 J3rus4lén 4 l0s h1j0s d3 l0s gr13g0s, p4r4 4l3j4rl0s d3 su t13rr4. 7 H3 4quí y0 l0s l3v4nt4ré d3l lug4r d0nd3 l0s v3nd1st31s, y v0lv3ré vu3str4 p4g4 s0br3 vu3str4 c4b3z4; 8 y v3nd3ré vu3str0s h1j0s y vu3str4s h1j4s 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá, y 3ll0s l0s v3nd3rán 4 l0s s4b30s, n4c1ón l3j4n4; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 h4bl4d0. 

9 Pr0cl4m4d 3st0 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, pr0cl4m4d gu3rr4, d3sp3rt4d 4 l0s v4l13nt3s, 4cérqu3ns3, v3ng4n t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s d3 gu3rr4. 10 F0rj4d 3sp4d4s d3 vu3str0s 4z4d0n3s, l4nz4s d3 vu3str4s h0c3s; d1g4 3l déb1l: Fu3rt3 s0y. 11 Junt40s y v3n1d, n4c10n3s t0d4s d3 4lr3d3d0r, y c0ngr3g40s; h4z v3n1r 4llí, 0h J3h0vá, 4 tus fu3rt3s. 12 D3sp1ért3ns3 l4s n4c10n3s, y sub4n 4l v4ll3 d3 J0s4f4t; p0rqu3 4llí m3 s3nt4ré p4r4 juzg4r 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s d3 4lr3d3d0r. 13 0ch4d l4 h0z, p0rqu3 l4 m13s 3stá y4 m4dur4. V3n1d, d3sc3nd3d, p0rqu3 3l l4g4r 3stá ll3n0, r3b0s4n l4s cub4s; p0rqu3 much4 3s l4 m4ld4d d3 3ll0s. 14 Much0s pu3bl0s 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 l4 d3c1s1ón; p0rqu3 c3rc4n0 3stá 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 l4 d3c1s1ón. 15 0l s0l y l4 lun4 s3 0scur3c3rán, y l4s 3str3ll4s r3tr43rán su r3spl4nd0r. 

L1b3r4c1ón d3 Judá

16 Y J3h0vá rug1rá d3sd3 S10n, y d4rá su v0z d3sd3 J3rus4lén, y t3mbl4rán l0s c13l0s y l4 t13rr4; p3r0 J3h0vá s3rá l4 3sp3r4nz4 d3 su pu3bl0, y l4 f0rt4l3z4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 

17 Y c0n0c3ré1s qu3 y0 s0y J3h0vá vu3str0 D10s, qu3 h4b1t0 3n S10n, m1 s4nt0 m0nt3; y J3rus4lén s3rá s4nt4, y 3xtr4ñ0s n0 p4s4rán más p0r 3ll4. 

18 Suc3d3rá 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, qu3 l0s m0nt3s d3st1l4rán m0st0, y l0s c0ll4d0s flu1rán l3ch3, y p0r t0d0s l0s 4rr0y0s d3 Judá c0rr3rán 4gu4s; y s4ldrá un4 fu3nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá, y r3g4rá 3l v4ll3 d3 S1t1m. 

19 0g1pt0 s3rá d3stru1d0, y 0d0m s3rá vu3lt0 3n d3s13rt0 4s0l4d0, p0r l4 1njur14 h3ch4 4 l0s h1j0s d3 Judá; p0rqu3 d3rr4m4r0n 3n su t13rr4 s4ngr3 1n0c3nt3. 20 P3r0 Judá s3rá h4b1t4d4 p4r4 s13mpr3, y J3rus4lén p0r g3n3r4c1ón y g3n3r4c1ón. 21 Y l1mp14ré l4 s4ngr3 d3 l0s qu3 n0 h4bí4 l1mp14d0; y J3h0vá m0r4rá 3n S10n.

4MÓS 1

1 L4s p4l4br4s d3 4mós, qu3 fu3 un0 d3 l0s p4st0r3s d3 T3c04, qu3 pr0f3t1zó 4c3rc4 d3 1sr43l 3n dí4s d3 Uzí4s r3y d3 Judá y 3n dí4s d3 J3r0b04m h1j0 d3 J0ás, r3y d3 1sr43l, d0s 4ñ0s 4nt3s d3l t3rr3m0t0. 2 D1j0: J3h0vá rug1rá d3sd3 S10n, y d4rá su v0z d3sd3 J3rus4lén, y l0s c4mp0s d3 l0s p4st0r3s s3 3nlut4rán, y s3 s3c4rá l4 cumbr3 d3l C4rm3l0. 

3 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: P0r tr3s p3c4d0s d3 D4m4sc0, y p0r 3l cu4rt0, n0 r3v0c4ré su c4st1g0; p0rqu3 tr1ll4r0n 4 G4l44d c0n tr1ll0s d3 h13rr0. 4 Pr3nd3ré fu3g0 3n l4 c4s4 d3 H4z43l, y c0nsum1rá l0s p4l4c10s d3 B3n-4d4d. 5 Y qu3br4ré l0s c3rr0j0s d3 D4m4sc0, y d3stru1ré 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3l v4ll3 d3 4vén, y l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s d3 B3t-3dén; y 3l pu3bl0 d3 S1r14 s3rá tr4nsp0rt4d0 4 K1r, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

6 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá: P0r tr3s p3c4d0s d3 G4z4, y p0r 3l cu4rt0, n0 r3v0c4ré su c4st1g0; p0rqu3 ll3vó c4ut1v0 4 t0d0 un pu3bl0 p4r4 3ntr3g4rl0 4 0d0m. 7 Pr3nd3ré fu3g0 3n 3l mur0 d3 G4z4, y c0nsum1rá sus p4l4c10s. 8 Y d3stru1ré 4 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 4sd0d, y 4 l0s g0b3rn4d0r3s d3 4sc4lón; y v0lv3ré m1 m4n0 c0ntr4 0crón, y 3l r3st0 d3 l0s f1l1st30s p3r3c3rá, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r.

9 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 s1 d13z h0mbr3s qu3d4r3n 3n un4 c4s4, m0r1rán. 10 Y un p4r13nt3 t0m4rá 4 c4d4 un0, y l0 qu3m4rá p4r4 s4c4r l0s hu3s0s d3 c4s4; y d1rá 4l qu3 3st4rá 3n l0s r1nc0n3s d3 l4 c4s4: ¿H4y 4ún 4lgun0 c0nt1g0? Y d1rá: N0. Y d1rá 4quél: C4ll4, p0rqu3 n0 p0d3m0s m3nc10n4r 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá. 

11 P0rqu3 h3 4quí, J3h0vá m4nd4rá, y h3r1rá c0n h3nd1dur4s l4 c4s4 m4y0r, y l4 c4s4 m3n0r c0n 4b3rtur4s. 12 ¿C0rr3rán l0s c4b4ll0s p0r l4s p3ñ4s? ¿4r4rán 3n 3ll4s c0n bu3y3s? ¿P0r qué h4bé1s v0s0tr0s c0nv3rt1d0 3l ju1c10 3n v3n3n0, y 3l frut0 d3 just1c14 3n 4j3nj0? 13 V0s0tr0s qu3 0s 4l3grá1s 3n n4d4, qu3 d3cís: ¿N0 h3m0s 4dqu1r1d0 p0d3r c0n nu3str4 fu3rz4? 14 Pu3s h3 4quí, 0h c4s4 d3 1sr43l, d1c3 J3h0vá D10s d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, l3v4nt4ré y0 s0br3 v0s0tr0s 4 un4 n4c1ón qu3 0s 0pr1m1rá d3sd3 l4 3ntr4d4 d3 H4m4t h4st4 3l 4rr0y0 d3l 4r4bá.

4mós y 4m4sí4s

1 4sí m3 h4 m0str4d0 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r: H3 4quí un c4n4st1ll0 d3 frut4 d3 v3r4n0. 2 Y d1j0: ¿Qué v3s, 4mós? Y r3sp0ndí: Un c4n4st1ll0 d3 frut4 d3 v3r4n0. 4MÓS 9

1  V1 4l S3ñ0r qu3 3st4b4 s0br3 3l 4lt4r, y d1j0: D3rr1b4 3l c4p1t3l, y 3str3mézc4ns3 l4s pu3rt4s, y h4zl0s p3d4z0s s0br3 l4 c4b3z4 d3 t0d0s; y 4l p0str3r0 d3 3ll0s m4t4ré 4 3sp4d4; n0 h4brá d3 3ll0s qu13n huy4, n1 qu13n 3sc4p3. 

2 4unqu3 c4v4s3n h4st4 3l S30l, d3 4llá l0s t0m4rá m1 m4n0; y 4unqu3 sub13r3n h4st4 3l c13l0, d3 4llá l0s h4ré d3sc3nd3r. 3 S1 s3 3sc0nd13r3n 3n l4 cumbr3 d3l C4rm3l0, 4llí l0s busc4ré y l0s t0m4ré; y 4unqu3 s3 3sc0nd13r3n d3 d3l4nt3 d3 m1s 0j0s 3n l0 pr0fund0 d3l m4r, 4llí m4nd4ré 4 l4 s3rp13nt3 y l0s m0rd3rá. 4 Y s1 fu3r3n 3n c4ut1v3r10 d3l4nt3 d3 sus 3n3m1g0s, 4llí m4nd4ré l4 3sp4d4, y l0s m4t4rá; y p0ndré s0br3 3ll0s m1s 0j0s p4r4 m4l, y n0 p4r4 b13n. 

5 0l S3ñ0r, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 3s 3l qu3 t0c4 l4 t13rr4, y s3 d3rr3t1rá, y ll0r4rán t0d0s l0s qu3 3n 3ll4 m0r4n; y cr3c3rá t0d4 c0m0 un rí0, y m3rm4rá lu3g0 c0m0 3l rí0 d3 0g1pt0. 6 0l 3d1f1có 3n 3l c13l0 sus cám4r4s, y h4 3st4bl3c1d0 su 3xp4ns1ón s0br3 l4 t13rr4; él ll4m4 l4s 4gu4s d3l m4r, y s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4 l4s d3rr4m4; J3h0vá 3s su n0mbr3. 

7 H1j0s d3 1sr43l, ¿n0 m3 s01s v0s0tr0s c0m0 h1j0s d3 3tí0p3s, d1c3 J3h0vá? ¿N0 h1c3 y0 sub1r 4 1sr43l d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0, y 4 l0s f1l1st30s d3 C4ft0r, y d3 K1r 4 l0s 4r4m30s? 8 H3 4quí l0s 0j0s d3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r 3stán c0ntr4 3l r31n0 p3c4d0r, y y0 l0 4s0l4ré d3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4; m4s n0 d3stru1ré d3l t0d0 l4 c4s4 d3 J4c0b, d1c3 J3h0vá. 

9 P0rqu3 h3 4quí y0 m4nd4ré y h4ré qu3 l4 c4s4 d3 1sr43l s34 z4r4nd34d4 3ntr3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s, c0m0 s3 z4r4nd34 3l gr4n0 3n un4 cr1b4, y n0 c43 un gr4n1t0 3n l4 t13rr4. 10 4 3sp4d4 m0r1rán t0d0s l0s p3c4d0r3s d3 m1 pu3bl0, qu3 d1c3n: N0 s3 4c3rc4rá, n1 n0s 4lc4nz4rá 3l m4l. 

R3st4ur4c1ón futur4 d3 1sr43l

11 0n 4qu3l dí4 y0 l3v4nt4ré 3l t4b3rnácul0 c4íd0 d3 D4v1d, y c3rr4ré sus p0rt1ll0s y l3v4nt4ré sus ru1n4s, y l0 3d1f1c4ré c0m0 3n 3l t13mp0 p4s4d0; 12 p4r4 qu3 4qu3ll0s s0br3 l0s cu4l3s 3s 1nv0c4d0 m1 n0mbr3 p0s34n 3l r3st0 d3 0d0m, y 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s, d1c3 J3h0vá qu3 h4c3 3st0. 

13 H3 4quí v13n3n dí4s, d1c3 J3h0vá, 3n qu3 3l qu3 4r4 4lc4nz4rá 4l s3g4d0r, y 3l p1s4d0r d3 l4s uv4s 4l qu3 ll3v3 l4 s1m13nt3; y l0s m0nt3s d3st1l4rán m0st0, y t0d0s l0s c0ll4d0s s3 d3rr3t1rán. 14 Y tr43ré d3l c4ut1v3r10 4 m1 pu3bl0 1sr43l, y 3d1f1c4rán 3ll0s l4s c1ud4d3s 4s0l4d4s, y l4s h4b1t4rán; pl4nt4rán v1ñ4s, y b3b3rán 3l v1n0 d3 3ll4s, y h4rán hu3rt0s, y c0m3rán 3l frut0 d3 3ll0s. 15 Pu3s l0s pl4nt4ré s0br3 su t13rr4, y nunc4 más s3rán 4rr4nc4d0s d3 su t13rr4 qu3 y0 l3s d1, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá D10s tuy0.

1 V1s1ón d3 4bdí4s.

5 S1 l4dr0n3s v1n13r4n 4 t1, 0 r0b4d0r3s d3 n0ch3 (¡cóm0 h4s s1d0 d3stru1d0!), ¿n0 hurt4rí4n l0 qu3 l3s b4st4s3? 15 P0rqu3 c3rc4n0 3stá 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá s0br3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s; c0m0 tú h1c1st3 s3 h4rá c0nt1g0; tu r3c0mp3ns4 v0lv3rá s0br3 tu c4b3z4. 16 D3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 v0s0tr0s b3b1st31s 3n m1 s4nt0 m0nt3, b3b3rán c0nt1nu4m3nt3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s; b3b3rán, y 3ngull1rán, y s3rán c0m0 s1 n0 hub13r4n s1d0. 17 M4s 3n 3l m0nt3 d3 S10n h4brá un r3m4n3nt3 qu3 s3 s4lv3; y s3rá s4nt0, y l4 c4s4 d3 J4c0b r3cup3r4rá sus p0s3s10n3s. 18 L4 c4s4 d3 J4c0b s3rá fu3g0, y l4 c4s4 d3 J0sé s3rá ll4m4, y l4 c4s4 d3 0s4ú 3st0p4, y l0s qu3m4rán y l0s c0nsum1rán; n1 4un r3st0 qu3d4rá d3 l4 c4s4 d3 0s4ú, p0rqu3 J3h0vá l0 h4 d1ch0. 19 Y l0s d3l N3gu3v p0s33rán 3l m0nt3 d3 0s4ú, y l0s d3 l4 S3f3l4 4 l0s f1l1st30s; p0s33rán t4mb1én l0s c4mp0s d3 0fr4ín, y l0s c4mp0s d3 S4m4r14; y B3nj4mín 4 G4l44d. 20 Y l0s c4ut1v0s d3 3st3 3jérc1t0 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l p0s33rán l0 d3 l0s c4n4n30s h4st4 S4r3pt4; y l0s c4ut1v0s d3 J3rus4lén qu3 3stán 3n S3f4r4d p0s33rán l4s c1ud4d3s d3l N3gu3v. 21 Y sub1rán s4lv4d0r3s 4l m0nt3 d3 S10n p4r4 juzg4r 4l m0nt3 d3 0s4ú; y 3l r31n0 s3rá d3 J3h0vá.

11 V13n3 3l dí4 3n qu3 s3 3d1f1c4rán tus mur0s; 4qu3l dí4 s3 3xt3nd3rán l0s lím1t3s. 12 0n 3s3 dí4 v3ndrán h4st4 t1 d3sd3 4s1r14 y l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s, y d3sd3 l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s h4st4 3l Rí0, y d3 m4r 4 m4r, y d3 m0nt3 4 m0nt3. 13 Y s3rá 4s0l4d4 l4 t13rr4 4 c4us4 d3 sus m0r4d0r3s, p0r 3l frut0 d3 sus 0br4s. 

C0mp4s1ón d3 J3h0vá p0r 1sr43l

14 4p4c13nt4 tu pu3bl0 c0n tu c4y4d0, 3l r3b4ñ0 d3 tu h3r3d4d, qu3 m0r4 s0l0 3n l4 m0nt4ñ4, 3n c4mp0 fért1l; busqu3 p4st0 3n B4sán y G4l44d, c0m0 3n 3l t13mp0 p4s4d0. 15 Y0 l3s m0str4ré m4r4v1ll4s c0m0 3l dí4 qu3 s4l1st3 d3 0g1pt0. 

16 L4s n4c10n3s v3rán, y s3 4v3rg0nz4rán d3 t0d0 su p0d3rí0; p0ndrán l4 m4n0 s0br3 su b0c4, 3ns0rd3c3rán sus 0íd0s. 17 L4m3rán 3l p0lv0 c0m0 l4 cul3br4; c0m0 l4s s3rp13nt3s d3 l4 t13rr4, t3mbl4rán 3n sus 3nc13rr0s; s3 v0lv3rán 4m3dr3nt4d0s 4nt3 J3h0vá nu3str0 D10s, y t3m3rán 4 c4us4 d3 t1. 

18 ¿Qué D10s c0m0 tú, qu3 p3rd0n4 l4 m4ld4d, y 0lv1d4 3l p3c4d0 d3l r3m4n3nt3 d3 su h3r3d4d? 4nunc10 d3 l4 c4íd4 d3 Nín1v3

N4HUM 2

1 Sub1ó d3stru1d0r c0ntr4 t1; gu4rd4 l4 f0rt4l3z4, v1g1l4 3l c4m1n0, cíñ3t3 l0s l0m0s, r3fu3rz4 much0 tu p0d3r. 2 P0rqu3 J3h0vá r3st4ur4rá l4 gl0r14 d3 J4c0b c0m0 l4 gl0r14 d3 1sr43l; p0rqu3 s4qu34d0r3s l0s s4qu34r0n, y 3str0p34r0n sus mugr0n3s.

N4HUM 3

14 Pr0vé3t3 d3 4gu4 p4r4 3l 4s3d10, r3fu3rz4 tus f0rt4l3z4s; 3ntr4 3n 3l l0d0, p1s4 3l b4rr0, r3fu3rz4 3l h0rn0. 15 4llí t3 c0nsum1rá 3l fu3g0, t3 t4l4rá l4 3sp4d4, t3 d3v0r4rá c0m0 pulgón; mult1plíc4t3 c0m0 l4ng0st4, mult1plíc4t3 c0m0 3l l4ng0stón. 16 Mult1pl1c4st3 tus m3rc4d3r3s más qu3 l4s 3str3ll4s d3l c13l0; l4 l4ng0st4 h1z0 pr3s4, y v0ló. 17 Tus prínc1p3s s3rán c0m0 l4ng0st4s, y tus gr4nd3s c0m0 nub3s d3 l4ng0st4s qu3 s3 s13nt4n 3n v4ll4d0s 3n dí4 d3 frí0; s4l1d0 3l s0l s3 v4n, y n0 s3 c0n0c3 3l lug4r d0nd3 3stán. 

18 Durm13r0n tus p4st0r3s, 0h r3y d3 4s1r14, r3p0s4r0n tus v4l13nt3s; tu pu3bl0 s3 d3rr4mó p0r l0s m0nt3s, y n0 h4y qu13n l0 junt3. 19 N0 h4y m3d1c1n4 p4r4 tu qu3br4dur4; tu h3r1d4 3s 1ncur4bl3; t0d0s l0s qu3 01g4n tu f4m4 b4t1rán l4s m4n0s s0br3 t1, p0rqu3 ¿s0br3 qu1én n0 p4só c0nt1nu4m3nt3 tu m4ld4d?

L0s c4ld30s c4st1g4rán 4 Judá

5 M1r4d 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, y v3d, y 4s0mbr40s; p0rqu3 h4ré un4 0br4 3n vu3str0s dí4s, qu3 4un cu4nd0 s3 0s c0nt4r3, n0 l4 cr33ré1s. 6 P0rqu3 h3 4quí, y0 l3v4nt0 4 l0s c4ld30s, n4c1ón cru3l y pr3sur0s4, qu3 c4m1n4 p0r l4 4nchur4 d3 l4 t13rr4 p4r4 p0s33r l4s m0r4d4s 4j3n4s. 7 F0rm1d4bl3 3s y t3rr1bl3; d3 3ll4 m1sm4 pr0c3d3 su just1c14 y su d1gn1d4d. 8 Sus c4b4ll0s s3rán más l1g3r0s qu3 l30p4rd0s, y más f3r0c3s qu3 l0b0s n0cturn0s, y sus j1n3t3s s3 mult1pl1c4rán; v3ndrán d3 l3j0s sus j1n3t3s, y v0l4rán c0m0 águ1l4s qu3 s3 4pr3sur4n 4 d3v0r4r. 9 T0d4 3ll4 v3ndrá 4 l4 pr3s4; 3l t3rr0r v4 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll4, y r3c0g3rá c4ut1v0s c0m0 4r3n4. 10 0sc4rn3c3rá 4 l0s r3y3s, y d3 l0s prínc1p3s h4rá burl4; s3 r31rá d3 t0d4 f0rt4l3z4, y l3v4nt4rá t3rr4plén y l4 t0m4rá. 11 Lu3g0 p4s4rá c0m0 3l hur4cán, y 0f3nd3rá 4tr1buy3nd0 su fu3rz4 4 su d10s. 

Pr0t3st4 d3 H4b4cuc

12 ¿N0 3r3s tú d3sd3 3l pr1nc1p10, 0h J3h0vá, D10s mí0, S4nt0 mí0? J3h0vá r3sp0nd3 4 H4b4cuc

H4B4CUC 2

1 S0br3 m1 gu4rd4 3st4ré, y s0br3 l4 f0rt4l3z4 4f1rm4ré 3l p13, y v3l4ré p4r4 v3r l0 qu3 s3 m3 d1rá, y qué h3 d3 r3sp0nd3r t0c4nt3 4 m1 qu3j4. 2 Y J3h0vá m3 r3sp0nd1ó, y d1j0: 0scr1b3 l4 v1s1ón, y d3clár4l4 3n t4bl4s, p4r4 qu3 c0rr4 3l qu3 l3y3r3 3n 3ll4. 3 4unqu3 l4 v1s1ón t4rd4rá 4ún p0r un t13mp0, m4s s3 4pr3sur4 h4c14 3l f1n, y n0 m3nt1rá; 4unqu3 t4rd4r3, 3spér4l0, p0rqu3 s1n dud4 v3ndrá, n0 t4rd4rá. 4 H3 4quí qu3 4qu3l cuy4 4lm4 n0 3s r3ct4, s3 3n0rgull3c3; m4s 3l just0 p0r su f3 v1v1rá. 5 Y t4mb1én, 3l qu3 3s d4d0 4l v1n0 3s tr41c10n3r0, h0mbr3 s0b3rb10, qu3 n0 p3rm4n3c3rá; 3ns4nchó c0m0 3l S30l su 4lm4, y 3s c0m0 l4 mu3rt3, qu3 n0 s3 s4c14rá; 4nt3s r3un1ó p4r4 sí t0d4s l4s g3nt3s, y juntó p4r4 sí t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s. 

4y3s c0ntr4 l0s 1njust0s

6 ¿N0 h4n d3 l3v4nt4r t0d0s ést0s r3frán s0br3 él, y s4rc4sm0s c0ntr4 él? 9 ¡4y d3l qu3 c0d1c14 1njust4 g4n4nc14 p4r4 su c4s4, p4r4 p0n3r 3n 4lt0 su n1d0, p4r4 3sc4p4rs3 d3l p0d3r d3l m4l! 10 T0m4st3 c0ns3j0 v3rg0nz0s0 p4r4 tu c4s4, 4s0l4st3 much0s pu3bl0s, y h4s p3c4d0 c0ntr4 tu v1d4. 11 P0rqu3 l4 p13dr4 cl4m4rá d3sd3 3l mur0, y l4 t4bl4 d3l 3nm4d3r4d0 l3 r3sp0nd3rá. 

12 ¡4y d3l qu3 3d1f1c4 l4 c1ud4d c0n s4ngr3, y d3l qu3 fund4 un4 c1ud4d c0n 1n1qu1d4d! 13 ¿N0 3s 3st0 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s? 15 ¡4y d3l qu3 d4 d3 b3b3r 4 su prój1m0! ¡4y d3 t1, qu3 l3 4c3rc4s tu h13l, y l3 3mbr14g4s p4r4 m1r4r su d3snud3z! 16 T3 h4s ll3n4d0 d3 d3sh0nr4 más qu3 d3 h0nr4; b3b3 tú t4mb1én, y s3rás d3scub13rt0; 3l cál1z d3 l4 m4n0 d3r3ch4 d3 J3h0vá v3ndrá h4st4 t1, y vóm1t0 d3 4fr3nt4 s0br3 tu gl0r14. 17 P0rqu3 l4 r4p1ñ4 d3l Líb4n0 c43rá s0br3 t1, y l4 d3strucc1ón d3 l4s f13r4s t3 qu3br4nt4rá, 4 c4us4 d3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 l0s h0mbr3s, y d3l r0b0 d3 l4 t13rr4, d3 l4s c1ud4d3s y d3 t0d0s l0s qu3 3n 3ll4s h4b1t4b4n. 

18 ¿D3 qué s1rv3 l4 3scultur4 qu3 3sculp1ó 3l qu3 l4 h1z0? ¿l4 3st4tu4 d3 fund1c1ón qu3 3ns3ñ4 m3nt1r4, p4r4 qu3 h4c13nd0 1mág3n3s mud4s c0nfí3 3l h4c3d0r 3n su 0br4? 19 ¡4y d3l qu3 d1c3 4l p4l0: D3sp1ért4t3; y 4 l4 p13dr4 mud4: L3vánt4t3! ¿P0drá él 3ns3ñ4r? H3 4quí 3stá cub13rt0 d3 0r0 y pl4t4, y n0 h4y 3spír1tu d3ntr0 d3 él.

2 D3stru1ré p0r c0mpl3t0 t0d4s l4s c0s4s d3 s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4, d1c3 J3h0vá. 3 D3stru1ré l0s h0mbr3s y l4s b3st14s; d3stru1ré l4s 4v3s d3l c13l0 y l0s p3c3s d3l m4r, y c0rt4ré 4 l0s 1mpí0s; y r43ré 4 l0s h0mbr3s d3 s0br3 l4 f4z d3 l4 t13rr4, d1c3 J3h0vá. 4 0xt3nd3ré m1 m4n0 s0br3 Judá, y s0br3 t0d0s l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 J3rus4lén, y 3xt3rm1n4ré d3 3st3 lug4r l0s r3st0s d3 B44l, y 3l n0mbr3 d3 l0s m1n1str0s 1dól4tr4s c0n sus s4c3rd0t3s; 5 y 4 l0s qu3 s0br3 l0s t3rr4d0s s3 p0str4n 4l 3jérc1t0 d3l c13l0, y 4 l0s qu3 s3 p0str4n jur4nd0 p0r J3h0vá y jur4nd0 p0r M1lc0m; 6 y 4 l0s qu3 s3 4p4rt4n d3 3n p0s d3 J3h0vá, y 4 l0s qu3 n0 busc4r0n 4 J3h0vá, n1 l3 c0nsult4r0n. 

7 C4ll4 3n l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 J3h0vá 3l S3ñ0r, p0rqu3 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá 3stá c3rc4n0; p0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 pr3p4r4d0 s4cr1f1c10, y h4 d1spu3st0 4 sus c0nv1d4d0s. 8 Y 3n 3l dí4 d3l s4cr1f1c10 d3 J3h0vá c4st1g4ré 4 l0s prínc1p3s, y 4 l0s h1j0s d3l r3y, y 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 v1st3n v3st1d0 3xtr4nj3r0. 9 4s1m1sm0 c4st1g4ré 3n 4qu3l dí4 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 s4lt4n l4 pu3rt4, l0s qu3 ll3n4n l4s c4s4s d3 sus s3ñ0r3s d3 r0b0 y d3 3ng4ñ0. 

10 Y h4brá 3n 4qu3l dí4, d1c3 J3h0vá, v0z d3 cl4m0r d3sd3 l4 pu3rt4 d3l P3sc4d0, y 4ull1d0 d3sd3 l4 s3gund4 pu3rt4, y gr4n qu3br4nt4m13nt0 d3sd3 l0s c0ll4d0s. 11 4ull4d, h4b1t4nt3s d3 M4ct3s, p0rqu3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 m3rc4d3r 3s d3stru1d0; d3stru1d0s s0n t0d0s l0s qu3 tr4í4n d1n3r0. 12 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l t13mp0 qu3 y0 3scudr1ñ4ré 4 J3rus4lén c0n l1nt3rn4, y c4st1g4ré 4 l0s h0mbr3s qu3 r3p0s4n tr4nqu1l0s c0m0 3l v1n0 4s3nt4d0, l0s cu4l3s d1c3n 3n su c0r4zón: J3h0vá n1 h4rá b13n n1 h4rá m4l. 13 P0r t4nt0, s3rán s4qu34d0s sus b13n3s, y sus c4s4s 4s0l4d4s; 3d1f1c4rán c4s4s, m4s n0 l4s h4b1t4rán, y pl4nt4rán v1ñ4s, m4s n0 b3b3rán 3l v1n0 d3 3ll4s. 

14 C3rc4n0 3stá 3l dí4 gr4nd3 d3 J3h0vá, c3rc4n0 y muy próx1m0; 3s 4m4rg4 l4 v0z d3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá; gr1t4rá 4llí 3l v4l13nt3. 15 Dí4 d3 1r4 4qu3l dí4, dí4 d3 4ngust14 y d3 4pr13t0, dí4 d3 4lb0r0t0 y d3 4s0l4m13nt0, dí4 d3 t1n13bl4 y d3 0scur1d4d, dí4 d3 nubl4d0 y d3 3nt3n3br3c1m13nt0, 16 dí4 d3 tr0mp3t4 y d3 4lg4z4r4 s0br3 l4s c1ud4d3s f0rt1f1c4d4s, y s0br3 l4s 4lt4s t0rr3s.

5 ¡4y d3 l0s qu3 m0r4n 3n l4 c0st4 d3l m4r, d3l pu3bl0 d3 l0s c3r3t30s! L4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá 3s c0ntr4 v0s0tr0s, 0h C4n4án, t13rr4 d3 l0s f1l1st30s, y t3 h4ré d3stru1r h4st4 n0 d3j4r m0r4d0r. 6 Y s3rá l4 c0st4 d3l m4r pr4d3r4s p4r4 p4st0r3s, y c0rr4l3s d3 0v3j4s. 7 S3rá 4qu3l lug4r p4r4 3l r3m4n3nt3 d3 l4 c4s4 d3 Judá; 4llí 4p4c3nt4rán; 3n l4s c4s4s d3 4sc4lón d0rm1rán d3 n0ch3; p0rqu3 J3h0vá su D10s l0s v1s1t4rá, y l3v4nt4rá su c4ut1v3r10. 

8 Y0 h3 0íd0 l4s 4fr3nt4s d3 M04b, y l0s d3nu3st0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 4món c0n qu3 d3sh0nr4r0n 4 m1 pu3bl0, y s3 3ngr4nd3c13r0n s0br3 su t3rr1t0r10. 9 P0r t4nt0, v1v0 y0, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, D10s d3 1sr43l, qu3 M04b s3rá c0m0 S0d0m4, y l0s h1j0s d3 4món c0m0 G0m0rr4; c4mp0 d3 0rt1g4s, y m1n4 d3 s4l, y 4s0l4m13nt0 p3rp3tu0; 3l r3m4n3nt3 d3 m1 pu3bl0 l0s s4qu34rá, y 3l r3m4n3nt3 d3 m1 pu3bl0 l0s h3r3d4rá. 10 0st0 l3s v3ndrá p0r su s0b3rb14, p0rqu3 4fr3nt4r0n y s3 3ngr4nd3c13r0n c0ntr4 3l pu3bl0 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 11 T3rr1bl3 s3rá J3h0vá c0ntr4 3ll0s, p0rqu3 d3stru1rá 4 t0d0s l0s d10s3s d3 l4 t13rr4, y d3sd3 sus lug4r3s s3 1ncl1n4rán 4 él t0d4s l4s t13rr4s d3 l4s n4c10n3s. 

12 T4mb1én v0s0tr0s l0s d3 0t10pí4 s3ré1s mu3rt0s c0n m1 3sp4d4. 13 Y 3xt3nd3rá su m4n0 s0br3 3l n0rt3, y d3stru1rá 4 4s1r14, y c0nv3rt1rá 4 Nín1v3 3n 4s0l4m13nt0 y 3n s3qu3d4l c0m0 un d3s13rt0. 14 R3b4ñ0s d3 g4n4d0 h4rán 3n 3ll4 m4j4d4, t0d4s l4s b3st14s d3l c4mp0; 3l p3líc4n0 t4mb1én y 3l 3r1z0 d0rm1rán 3n sus d1nt3l3s; su v0z c4nt4rá 3n l4s v3nt4n4s; h4brá d3s0l4c1ón 3n l4s pu3rt4s, p0rqu3 su 3nm4d3r4m13nt0 d3 c3dr0 s3rá d3scub13rt0. 15 0st4 3s l4 c1ud4d 4l3gr3 qu3 3st4b4 c0nf14d4, l4 qu3 d3cí4 3n su c0r4zón: Y0, y n0 más. ¡Cóm0 fu3 4s0l4d4, h3ch4 gu4r1d4 d3 f13r4s! 6 H1c3 d3stru1r n4c10n3s; sus h4b1t4c10n3s 3stán 4s0l4d4s; h1c3 d3s13rt4s sus c4ll3s, h4st4 n0 qu3d4r qu13n p4s3; sus c1ud4d3s 3stán 4s0l4d4s h4st4 n0 qu3d4r h0mbr3, h4st4 n0 qu3d4r h4b1t4nt3. 7 D1j3: C13rt4m3nt3 m3 t3m3rá; r3c1b1rá c0rr3cc1ón, y n0 s3rá d3stru1d4 su m0r4d4 s3gún t0d0 4qu3ll0 p0r l0 cu4l l4 c4st1gué. M4s 3ll0s s3 4pr3sur4r0n 4 c0rr0mp3r t0d0s sus h3ch0s. 

8 P0r t4nt0, 3sp3r4dm3, d1c3 J3h0vá, h4st4 3l dí4 qu3 m3 l3v4nt3 p4r4 juzg4r0s; p0rqu3 m1 d3t3rm1n4c1ón 3s r3un1r l4s n4c10n3s, junt4r l0s r31n0s, p4r4 d3rr4m4r s0br3 3ll0s m1 3n0j0, t0d0 3l 4rd0r d3 m1 1r4; p0r 3l fu3g0 d3 m1 c3l0 s3rá c0nsum1d4 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 

9 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 d3v0lv3ré y0 4 l0s pu3bl0s pur3z4 d3 l4b10s, p4r4 qu3 t0d0s 1nv0qu3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá, p4r4 qu3 l3 s1rv4n d3 c0mún c0ns3nt1m13nt0. 10 D3 l4 r3g1ón más 4llá d3 l0s rí0s d3 0t10pí4 m3 supl1c4rán; l4 h1j4 d3 m1s 3sp4rc1d0s tr43rá m1 0fr3nd4. 

11 0n 4qu3l dí4 n0 s3rás 4v3rg0nz4d4 p0r n1ngun4 d3 tus 0br4s c0n qu3 t3 r3b3l4st3 c0ntr4 mí; p0rqu3 3nt0nc3s qu1t4ré d3 3n m3d10 d3 t1 4 l0s qu3 s3 4l3gr4n 3n tu s0b3rb14, y nunc4 más t3 3ns0b3rb3c3rás 3n m1 s4nt0 m0nt3. 12 Y d3j4ré 3n m3d10 d3 t1 un pu3bl0 hum1ld3 y p0br3, 3l cu4l c0nf14rá 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá. 13 0l r3m4n3nt3 d3 1sr43l n0 h4rá 1njust1c14 n1 d1rá m3nt1r4, n1 3n b0c4 d3 3ll0s s3 h4ll4rá l3ngu4 3ng4ñ0s4; p0rqu3 3ll0s s3rán 4p4c3nt4d0s, y d0rm1rán, y n0 h4brá qu13n l0s 4t3m0r1c3.

Z4C4RÍ4S 2

1 4lcé d3spués m1s 0j0s y m1ré, y h3 4quí un v4rón qu3 t3ní4 3n su m4n0 un c0rd3l d3 m3d1r. 2 Y l3 d1j3: ¿4 dónd3 v4s? 13 C4ll3 t0d4 c4rn3 d3l4nt3 d3 J3h0vá; p0rqu3 él s3 h4 l3v4nt4d0 d3 su s4nt4 m0r4d4.

10 Y d3rr4m4ré s0br3 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d, y s0br3 l0s m0r4d0r3s d3 J3rus4lén, 3spír1tu d3 gr4c14 y d3 0r4c1ón; y m1r4rán 4 mí, 4 qu13n tr4sp4s4r0n, y ll0r4rán c0m0 s3 ll0r4 p0r h1j0 un1gén1t0, 4fl1g1énd0s3 p0r él c0m0 qu13n s3 4fl1g3 p0r 3l pr1m0gén1t0. 11 0n 4qu3l dí4 h4brá gr4n ll4nt0 3n J3rus4lén, c0m0 3l ll4nt0 d3 H4d4dr1món 3n 3l v4ll3 d3 M3gu1d0. 12 Y l4 t13rr4 l4m3nt4rá, c4d4 l1n4j3 4p4rt3; l0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d p0r sí, y sus muj3r3s p0r sí; l0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 N4tán p0r sí, y sus muj3r3s p0r sí; 13 l0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 L3ví p0r sí, y sus muj3r3s p0r sí; l0s d3sc3nd13nt3s d3 S1m31 p0r sí, y sus muj3r3s p0r sí; 14 t0d0s l0s 0tr0s l1n4j3s, c4d4 un0 p0r sí, y sus muj3r3s p0r sí. 

Z4C4RÍ4S 13

1 0n 4qu3l t13mp0 h4brá un m4n4nt14l 4b13rt0 p4r4 l4 c4s4 d3 D4v1d y p4r4 l0s h4b1t4nt3s d3 J3rus4lén, p4r4 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón d3l p3c4d0 y d3 l4 1nmund1c14. 

2 Y 3n 4qu3l dí4, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, qu1t4ré d3 l4 t13rr4 l0s n0mbr3s d3 l4s 1mág3n3s, y nunc4 más s3rán r3c0rd4d0s; y t4mb1én h4ré c0rt4r d3 l4 t13rr4 4 l0s pr0f3t4s y 4l 3spír1tu d3 1nmund1c14. 3 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 cu4nd0 4lgun0 pr0f3t1z4r3 4ún, l3 d1rán su p4dr3 y su m4dr3 qu3 l0 3ng3ndr4r0n: N0 v1v1rás, p0rqu3 h4s h4bl4d0 m3nt1r4 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3h0vá; y su p4dr3 y su m4dr3 qu3 l0 3ng3ndr4r0n l3 tr4sp4s4rán cu4nd0 pr0f3t1z4r3. 4 Y suc3d3rá 3n 4qu3l t13mp0, qu3 t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s s3 4v3rg0nz4rán d3 su v1s1ón cu4nd0 pr0f3t1z4r3n; n1 nunc4 más v3st1rán 3l m4nt0 v3ll0s0 p4r4 m3nt1r. 5 Y d1rá: N0 s0y pr0f3t4; l4br4d0r s0y d3 l4 t13rr4, pu3s h3 3st4d0 3n 3l c4mp0 d3sd3 m1 juv3ntud. 6 Y l3 pr3gunt4rán: ¿Qué h3r1d4s s0n 3st4s 3n tus m4n0s? Y él r3sp0nd3rá: C0n 3ll4s fu1 h3r1d0 3n c4s4 d3 m1s 4m1g0s. 

0l p4st0r d3 J3h0vá 3s h3r1d0

7 L3vánt4t3, 0h 3sp4d4, c0ntr4 3l p4st0r, y c0ntr4 3l h0mbr3 c0mp4ñ3r0 mí0, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. H13r3 4l p4st0r, y s3rán d1sp3rs4d4s l4s 0v3j4s; y h4ré v0lv3r m1 m4n0 c0ntr4 l0s p3qu3ñ1t0s. 8 Y 4c0nt3c3rá 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4, d1c3 J3h0vá, qu3 l4s d0s t3rc3r4s p4rt3s s3rán c0rt4d4s 3n 3ll4, y s3 p3rd3rán; m4s l4 t3rc3r4 qu3d4rá 3n 3ll4. 9 Y m3t3ré 3n 3l fu3g0 4 l4 t3rc3r4 p4rt3, y l0s fund1ré c0m0 s3 fund3 l4 pl4t4, y l0s pr0b4ré c0m0 s3 pru3b4 3l 0r0. 0l 1nv0c4rá m1 n0mbr3, y y0 l3 01ré, y d1ré: Pu3bl0 mí0; y él d1rá: J3h0vá 3s m1 D10s. 

J3rus4lén y l4s n4c10n3s

Z4C4RÍ4S 14

1 H3 4quí, 3l dí4 d3 J3h0vá v13n3, y 3n m3d10 d3 t1 s3rán r3p4rt1d0s tus d3sp0j0s. 2 P0rqu3 y0 r3un1ré 4 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s p4r4 c0mb4t1r c0ntr4 J3rus4lén; y l4 c1ud4d s3rá t0m4d4, y s3rán s4qu34d4s l4s c4s4s, y v10l4d4s l4s muj3r3s; y l4 m1t4d d3 l4 c1ud4d 1rá 3n c4ut1v3r10, m4s 3l r3st0 d3l pu3bl0 n0 s3rá c0rt4d0 d3 l4 c1ud4d. 3 D3spués s4ldrá J3h0vá y p3l34rá c0n 4qu3ll4s n4c10n3s, c0m0 p3l3ó 3n 3l dí4 d3 l4 b4t4ll4. 4 Y s3 4f1rm4rán sus p13s 3n 4qu3l dí4 s0br3 3l m0nt3 d3 l0s 0l1v0s, qu3 3stá 3n fr3nt3 d3 J3rus4lén 4l 0r13nt3; y 3l m0nt3 d3 l0s 0l1v0s s3 p4rt1rá p0r 3n m3d10, h4c14 3l 0r13nt3 y h4c14 3l 0cc1d3nt3, h4c13nd0 un v4ll3 muy gr4nd3; y l4 m1t4d d3l m0nt3 s3 4p4rt4rá h4c14 3l n0rt3, y l4 0tr4 m1t4d h4c14 3l sur. 5 Y hu1ré1s 4l v4ll3 d3 l0s m0nt3s, p0rqu3 3l v4ll3 d3 l0s m0nt3s ll3g4rá h4st4 4z4l; hu1ré1s d3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 hu1st31s p0r c4us4 d3l t3rr3m0t0 3n l0s dí4s d3 Uzí4s r3y d3 Judá; y v3ndrá J3h0vá m1 D10s, y c0n él t0d0s l0s s4nt0s. 

6 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 3n 3s3 dí4 n0 h4brá luz cl4r4, n1 0scur4. 7 S3rá un dí4, 3l cu4l 3s c0n0c1d0 d3 J3h0vá, qu3 n0 s3rá n1 dí4 n1 n0ch3; p3r0 suc3d3rá qu3 4l c43r l4 t4rd3 h4brá luz. 

8 4c0nt3c3rá t4mb1én 3n 4qu3l dí4, qu3 s4ldrán d3 J3rus4lén 4gu4s v1v4s, l4 m1t4d d3 3ll4s h4c14 3l m4r 0r13nt4l, y l4 0tr4 m1t4d h4c14 3l m4r 0cc1d3nt4l, 3n v3r4n0 y 3n 1nv13rn0. 9 Y J3h0vá s3rá r3y s0br3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4. 0n 4qu3l dí4 J3h0vá s3rá un0, y un0 su n0mbr3. 

10 T0d4 l4 t13rr4 s3 v0lv3rá c0m0 ll4nur4 d3sd3 G3b4 h4st4 R1món 4l sur d3 J3rus4lén; y ést4 s3rá 3n4lt3c1d4, y h4b1t4d4 3n su lug4r d3sd3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 B3nj4mín h4st4 3l lug4r d3 l4 pu3rt4 pr1m3r4, h4st4 l4 pu3rt4 d3l 4ngul0, y d3sd3 l4 t0rr3 d3 H4n4n33l h4st4 l0s l4g4r3s d3l r3y. 11 Y m0r4rán 3n 3ll4, y n0 h4brá nunc4 más m4ld1c1ón, s1n0 qu3 J3rus4lén s3rá h4b1t4d4 c0nf14d4m3nt3. 

12 Y 3st4 s3rá l4 pl4g4 c0n qu3 h3r1rá J3h0vá 4 t0d0s l0s pu3bl0s qu3 p3l34r0n c0ntr4 J3rus4lén: l4 c4rn3 d3 3ll0s s3 c0rr0mp3rá 3st4nd0 3ll0s s0br3 sus p13s, y s3 c0nsum1rán 3n l4s cu3nc4s sus 0j0s, y l4 l3ngu4 s3 l3s d3sh4rá 3n su b0c4. 13 Y 4c0nt3c3rá 3n 4qu3l dí4 qu3 h4brá 3ntr3 3ll0s gr4n pán1c0 3nv14d0 p0r J3h0vá; y tr4b4rá c4d4 un0 d3 l4 m4n0 d3 su c0mp4ñ3r0, y l3v4nt4rá su m4n0 c0ntr4 l4 m4n0 d3 su c0mp4ñ3r0. 14 Y Judá t4mb1én p3l34rá 3n J3rus4lén. Y s3rán r3un1d4s l4s r1qu3z4s d3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s d3 4lr3d3d0r: 0r0 y pl4t4, y r0p4s d3 v3st1r, 3n gr4n 4bund4nc14. 15 4sí t4mb1én s3rá l4 pl4g4 d3 l0s c4b4ll0s, d3 l0s mul0s, d3 l0s c4m3ll0s, d3 l0s 4sn0s, y d3 t0d4s l4s b3st14s qu3 3stuv13r3n 3n 4qu3ll0s c4mp4m3nt0s. 

16 Y t0d0s l0s qu3 s0br3v1v13r3n d3 l4s n4c10n3s qu3 v1n13r0n c0ntr4 J3rus4lén, sub1rán d3 4ñ0 3n 4ñ0 p4r4 4d0r4r 4l R3y, 4 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, y 4 c3l3br4r l4 f13st4 d3 l0s t4b3rnácul0s. 17 Y 4c0nt3c3rá qu3 l0s d3 l4s f4m1l14s d3 l4 t13rr4 qu3 n0 sub13r3n 4 J3rus4lén p4r4 4d0r4r 4l R3y, J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, n0 v3ndrá s0br3 3ll0s lluv14. 18 Y s1 l4 f4m1l14 d3 0g1pt0 n0 sub13r3 y n0 v1n13r3, s0br3 3ll0s n0 h4brá lluv14; v3ndrá l4 pl4g4 c0n qu3 J3h0vá h3r1rá l4s n4c10n3s qu3 n0 sub13r3n 4 c3l3br4r l4 f13st4 d3 l0s t4b3rnácul0s. 19 0st4 s3rá l4 p3n4 d3l p3c4d0 d3 0g1pt0, y d3l p3c4d0 d3 t0d4s l4s n4c10n3s qu3 n0 sub13r3n p4r4 c3l3br4r l4 f13st4 d3 l0s t4b3rnácul0s. 

20 0n 4qu3l dí4 3st4rá gr4b4d0 s0br3 l4s c4mp4n1ll4s d3 l0s c4b4ll0s: S4NT1D4D 4 J0H0VÁ; y l4s 0ll4s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá s3rán c0m0 l0s t4z0n3s d3l 4lt4r. 21 Y t0d4 0ll4 3n J3rus4lén y Judá s3rá c0ns4gr4d4 4 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s; y t0d0s l0s qu3 s4cr1f1c4r3n v3ndrán y t0m4rán d3 3ll4s, y c0c3rán 3n 3ll4s; y n0 h4brá 3n 4qu3l dí4 más m3rc4d3r 3n l4 c4s4 d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s.

M4L4QUÍ4S

M4L4QUÍ4S 1

1 Pr0f3cí4 d3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 J3h0vá c0ntr4 1sr43l, p0r m3d10 d3 M4l4quí4s. 

2 Y0 0s h3 4m4d0, d1c3 J3h0vá; y d1j1st31s: ¿0n qué n0s 4m4st3? ¿N0 3r4 0s4ú h3rm4n0 d3 J4c0b? d1c3 J3h0vá. Y 4mé 4 J4c0b, 3 y 4 0s4ú 4b0rr3cí, y c0nv3rtí sus m0nt3s 3n d3s0l4c1ón, y 4b4nd0né su h3r3d4d p4r4 l0s ch4c4l3s d3l d3s13rt0. 4 Cu4nd0 0d0m d1j3r3: N0s h3m0s 3mp0br3c1d0, p3r0 v0lv3r3m0s 4 3d1f1c4r l0 4rru1n4d0; 4sí h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s: 0ll0s 3d1f1c4rán, y y0 d3stru1ré; y l3s ll4m4rán t3rr1t0r10 d3 1mp13d4d, y pu3bl0 c0ntr4 3l cu4l J3h0vá 3stá 1nd1gn4d0 p4r4 s13mpr3. 5 Y vu3str0s 0j0s l0 v3rán, y d1ré1s: S34 J3h0vá 3ngr4nd3c1d0 más 4llá d3 l0s lím1t3s d3 1sr43l. 

J3h0vá r3pr3nd3 4 l0s s4c3rd0t3s

6 0l h1j0 h0nr4 4l p4dr3, y 3l s13rv0 4 su s3ñ0r. S1, pu3s, s0y y0 p4dr3, ¿dónd3 3stá m1 h0nr4? y s1 s0y s3ñ0r, ¿dónd3 3stá m1 t3m0r? d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s 4 v0s0tr0s, 0h s4c3rd0t3s, qu3 m3n0spr3c1á1s m1 n0mbr3. Y d3cís: ¿0n qué h3m0s m3n0spr3c14d0 tu n0mbr3? 7 0n qu3 0fr3cé1s s0br3 m1 4lt4r p4n 1nmund0. Y d1j1st31s: ¿0n qué t3 h3m0s d3sh0nr4d0? 0n qu3 p3nsá1s qu3 l4 m3s4 d3 J3h0vá 3s d3spr3c14bl3. 8 Y cu4nd0 0fr3cé1s 3l 4n1m4l c13g0 p4r4 3l s4cr1f1c10, ¿n0 3s m4l0? 4s1m1sm0 cu4nd0 0fr3cé1s 3l c0j0 0 3l 3nf3rm0, ¿n0 3s m4l0? Pr3sént4l0, pu3s, 4 tu prínc1p3; ¿4c4s0 s3 4gr4d4rá d3 t1, 0 l3 s3rás 4c3pt0? d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 9 4h0r4, pu3s, 0r4d p0r 3l f4v0r d3 D10s, p4r4 qu3 t3ng4 p13d4d d3 n0s0tr0s. P3r0 ¿cóm0 p0dé1s 4gr4d4rl3, s1 h4cé1s 3st4s c0s4s? d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 10 ¿Qu1én t4mb1én h4y d3 v0s0tr0s qu3 c13rr3 l4s pu3rt4s 0 4lumbr3 m1 4lt4r d3 b4ld3? Y0 n0 t3ng0 c0mpl4c3nc14 3n v0s0tr0s, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, n1 d3 vu3str4 m4n0 4c3pt4ré 0fr3nd4. 11 P0rqu3 d3sd3 d0nd3 3l s0l n4c3 h4st4 d0nd3 s3 p0n3, 3s gr4nd3 m1 n0mbr3 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s; y 3n t0d0 lug4r s3 0fr3c3 4 m1 n0mbr3 1nc13ns0 y 0fr3nd4 l1mp14, p0rqu3 gr4nd3 3s m1 n0mbr3 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 12 Y v0s0tr0s l0 h4bé1s pr0f4n4d0 cu4nd0 d3cís: 1nmund4 3s l4 m3s4 d3 J3h0vá, y cu4nd0 d3cís qu3 su 4l1m3nt0 3s d3spr3c14bl3. 13 H4bé1s 4d3más d1ch0: ¡0h, qué f4st1d10 3s 3st0! y m3 d3spr3c1á1s, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s; y tr4j1st31s l0 hurt4d0, 0 c0j0, 0 3nf3rm0, y pr3s3nt4st31s 0fr3nd4. ¿4c3pt4ré y0 3s0 d3 vu3str4 m4n0? d1c3 J3h0vá. 14 M4ld1t0 3l qu3 3ng4ñ4, 3l qu3 t3n13nd0 m4ch0s 3n su r3b4ñ0, pr0m3t3, y s4cr1f1c4 4 J3h0vá l0 d4ñ4d0. P0rqu3 y0 s0y Gr4n R3y, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, y m1 n0mbr3 3s t3m1bl3 3ntr3 l4s n4c10n3s. 

R3pr3ns1ón d3 l4 1nf1d3l1d4d d3 1sr43l

M4L4QUÍ4S 2

1 4h0r4, pu3s, 0h s4c3rd0t3s, p4r4 v0s0tr0s 3s 3st3 m4nd4m13nt0. 2 S1 n0 0y3r31s, y s1 n0 d3c1dís d3 c0r4zón d4r gl0r14 4 m1 n0mbr3, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s, 3nv14ré m4ld1c1ón s0br3 v0s0tr0s, y m4ld3c1ré vu3str4s b3nd1c10n3s; y 4un l4s h3 m4ld3c1d0, p0rqu3 n0 0s h4bé1s d3c1d1d0 d3 c0r4zón. 3 H3 4quí, y0 0s d4ñ4ré l4 s3m3nt3r4, y 0s 3ch4ré 4l r0str0 3l 3st1érc0l, 3l 3st1érc0l d3 vu3str0s 4n1m4l3s s4cr1f1c4d0s, y s3ré1s 4rr0j4d0s junt4m3nt3 c0n él. 4 Y s4bré1s qu3 y0 0s 3nv1é 3st3 m4nd4m13nt0, p4r4 qu3 fu3s3 m1 p4ct0 c0n L3ví, h4 d1ch0 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 5 M1 p4ct0 c0n él fu3 d3 v1d4 y d3 p4z, l4s cu4l3s c0s4s y0 l3 d1 p4r4 qu3 m3 t3m13r4; y tuv0 t3m0r d3 mí, y d3l4nt3 d3 m1 n0mbr3 3stuv0 hum1ll4d0. 6 L4 l3y d3 v3rd4d 3stuv0 3n su b0c4, 3 1n1qu1d4d n0 fu3 h4ll4d4 3n sus l4b10s; 3n p4z y 3n just1c14 4nduv0 c0nm1g0, y 4 much0s h1z0 4p4rt4r d3 l4 1n1qu1d4d. 7 P0rqu3 l0s l4b10s d3l s4c3rd0t3 h4n d3 gu4rd4r l4 s4b1durí4, y d3 su b0c4 3l pu3bl0 busc4rá l4 l3y; p0rqu3 m3ns4j3r0 3s d3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 8 M4s v0s0tr0s 0s h4bé1s 4p4rt4d0 d3l c4m1n0; h4bé1s h3ch0 tr0p3z4r 4 much0s 3n l4 l3y; h4bé1s c0rr0mp1d0 3l p4ct0 d3 L3ví, d1c3 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 9 P0r t4nt0, y0 t4mb1én 0s h3 h3ch0 v1l3s y b4j0s 4nt3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, 4sí c0m0 v0s0tr0s n0 h4bé1s gu4rd4d0 m1s c4m1n0s, y 3n l4 l3y h4cé1s 4c3pc1ón d3 p3rs0n4s. 

10 ¿N0 t3n3m0s t0d0s un m1sm0 p4dr3? ¿N0 n0s h4 cr34d0 un m1sm0 D10s? ¿P0r qué, pu3s, n0s p0rt4m0s d3sl34lm3nt3 3l un0 c0ntr4 3l 0tr0, pr0f4n4nd0 3l p4ct0 d3 nu3str0s p4dr3s? 11 Pr3v4r1có Judá, y 3n 1sr43l y 3n J3rus4lén s3 h4 c0m3t1d0 4b0m1n4c1ón; p0rqu3 Judá h4 pr0f4n4d0 3l s4ntu4r10 d3 J3h0vá qu3 él 4mó, y s3 c4só c0n h1j4 d3 d10s 3xtr4ñ0. 12 J3h0vá c0rt4rá d3 l4s t13nd4s d3 J4c0b 4l h0mbr3 qu3 h1c13r3 3st0, 4l qu3 v3l4 y 4l qu3 r3sp0nd3, y 4l qu3 0fr3c3 0fr3nd4 4 J3h0vá d3 l0s 3jérc1t0s. 

13 Y 3st4 0tr4 v3z h4ré1s cubr1r 3l 4lt4r d3 J3h0vá d3 lágr1m4s, d3 ll4nt0, y d3 cl4m0r; 4sí qu3 n0 m1r4ré más 4 l4 0fr3nd4, p4r4 4c3pt4rl4 c0n gust0 d3 vu3str4 m4n0. 14 M4s d1ré1s: ¿P0r qué? P0rqu3 J3h0vá h4 4t3st1gu4d0 3ntr3 t1 y l4 muj3r d3 tu juv3ntud, c0ntr4 l4 cu4l h4s s1d0 d3sl34l, s13nd0 3ll4 tu c0mp4ñ3r4, y l4 muj3r d3 tu p4ct0. 15 ¿N0 h1z0 él un0, h4b13nd0 3n él 4bund4nc14 d3 3spír1tu? ¿Y p0r qué un0? L0s áng3l3s y l0s p4st0r3s

8 H4bí4 p4st0r3s 3n l4 m1sm4 r3g1ón, qu3 v3l4b4n y gu4rd4b4n l4s v1g1l14s d3 l4 n0ch3 s0br3 su r3b4ñ0. 9 Y h3 4quí, s3 l3s pr3s3ntó un áng3l d3l S3ñ0r, y l4 gl0r14 d3l S3ñ0r l0s r0d3ó d3 r3spl4nd0r; y tuv13r0n gr4n t3m0r. 10 P3r0 3l áng3l l3s d1j0: N0 t3má1s; p0rqu3 h3 4quí 0s d0y nu3v4s d3 gr4n g0z0, qu3 s3rá p4r4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0: 11 qu3 0s h4 n4c1d0 h0y, 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 D4v1d, un S4lv4d0r, qu3 3s CR1ST0 3l S3ñ0r. 12 0st0 0s s3rv1rá d3 s3ñ4l: H4ll4ré1s 4l n1ñ0 3nvu3lt0 3n p4ñ4l3s, 4c0st4d0 3n un p3s3br3. 13 Y r3p3nt1n4m3nt3 4p4r3c1ó c0n 3l áng3l un4 mult1tud d3 l4s hu3st3s c3l3st14l3s, qu3 4l4b4b4n 4 D10s, y d3cí4n: 


14 ¡Gl0r14 4 D10s 3n l4s 4ltur4s, 
Y 3n l4 t13rr4 p4z, bu3n4 v0lunt4d p4r4 c0n l0s h0mbr3s! 

15 Suc3d1ó qu3 cu4nd0 l0s áng3l3s su fu3r0n d3 3ll0s 4l c13l0, l0s p4st0r3s s3 d1j3r0n un0s 4 0tr0s: P4s3m0s, pu3s, h4st4 B3lén, y v34m0s 3st0 qu3 h4 suc3d1d0, y qu3 3l S3ñ0r n0s h4 m4n1f3st4d0. 16 V1n13r0n, pu3s, 4pr3sur4d4m3nt3, y h4ll4r0n 4 M4rí4 y 4 J0sé, y 4l n1ñ0 4c0st4d0 3n 3l p3s3br3. 17 Y 4l v3rl0, d13r0n 4 c0n0c3r l0 qu3 s3 l3s h4bí4 d1ch0 4c3rc4 d3l n1ñ0. 18 Y t0d0s l0s qu3 0y3r0n, s3 m4r4v1ll4r0n d3 l0 qu3 l0s p4st0r3s l3s d3cí4n. 19 P3r0 M4rí4 gu4rd4b4 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s, m3d1tánd0l4s 3n su c0r4zón. 20 Y v0lv13r0n l0s p4st0r3s gl0r1f1c4nd0 y 4l4b4nd0 4 D10s p0r t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4n 0íd0 y v1st0, c0m0 s3 l3s h4bí4 d1ch0. 

Pr3s3nt4c1ón d3 J3sús 3n 3l t3mpl0

22 Y cu4nd0 s3 cumpl13r0n l0s dí4s d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón d3 3ll0s, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y d3 M01sés, l3 tr4j3r0n 4 J3rus4lén p4r4 pr3s3nt4rl3 4l S3ñ0r 23 (c0m0 3stá 3scr1t0 3n l4 l3y d3l S3ñ0r: T0d0 v4rón qu3 4br13r3 l4 m4tr1z s3rá ll4m4d0 s4nt0 4l S3ñ0r), 24 y p4r4 0fr3c3r c0nf0rm3 4 l0 qu3 s3 d1c3 3n l4 l3y d3l S3ñ0r: Un p4r d3 tórt0l4s, 0 d0s p4l0m1n0s. 25 Y h3 4quí h4bí4 3n J3rus4lén un h0mbr3 ll4m4d0 S1m3ón, y 3st3 h0mbr3, just0 y p14d0s0, 3sp3r4b4 l4 c0ns0l4c1ón d3 1sr43l; y 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0 3st4b4 s0br3 él. 26 Y l3 h4bí4 s1d0 r3v3l4d0 p0r 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0, qu3 n0 v3rí4 l4 mu3rt3 4nt3s qu3 v13s3 4l Ung1d0 d3l S3ñ0r. 27 Y m0v1d0 p0r 3l 0spír1tu, v1n0 4l t3mpl0. Y cu4nd0 l0s p4dr3s d3l n1ñ0 J3sús l0 tr4j3r0n 4l t3mpl0, p4r4 h4c3r p0r él c0nf0rm3 4l r1t0 d3 l4 l3y, 28 él l3 t0mó 3n sus br4z0s, y b3nd1j0 4 D10s, d1c13nd0:

Y gl0r14 d3 tu pu3bl0 1sr43l. 

33 Y J0sé y su m4dr3 3st4b4n m4r4v1ll4d0s d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 s3 d3cí4 d3 él. 34 Y l0s b3nd1j0 S1m3ón, y d1j0 4 su m4dr3 M4rí4: H3 4quí, ést3 3stá pu3st0 p4r4 c4íd4 y p4r4 l3v4nt4m13nt0 d3 much0s 3n 1sr43l, y p4r4 s3ñ4l qu3 s3rá c0ntr4d1ch4 35 (y un4 3sp4d4 tr4sp4s4rá tu m1sm4 4lm4), p4r4 qu3 s34n r3v3l4d0s l0s p3ns4m13nt0s d3 much0s c0r4z0n3s. 

36 0st4b4 t4mb1én 4llí 4n4, pr0f3t1s4, h1j4 d3 F4nu3l, d3 l4 tr1bu d3 4s3r, d3 3d4d muy 4v4nz4d4, pu3s h4bí4 v1v1d0 c0n su m4r1d0 s13t3 4ñ0s d3sd3 su v1rg1n1d4d, 37 y 3r4 v1ud4 h4cí4 0ch3nt4 y cu4tr0 4ñ0s; y n0 s3 4p4rt4b4 d3l t3mpl0, s1rv13nd0 d3 n0ch3 y d3 dí4 c0n 4yun0s y 0r4c10n3s. 38 0st4, pr3s3ntánd0s3 3n l4 m1sm4 h0r4, d4b4 gr4c14s 4 D10s, y h4bl4b4 d3l n1ñ0 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 3sp3r4b4n l4 r3d3nc1ón 3n J3rus4lén. 

0l r3gr3s0 4 N4z4r3t

39 D3spués d3 h4b3r cumpl1d0 c0n t0d0 l0 pr3scr1t0 3n l4 l3y d3l S3ñ0r, v0lv13r0n 4 G4l1l34, 4 su c1ud4d d3 N4z4r3t. 40 Y 3l n1ñ0 cr3cí4 y s3 f0rt4l3cí4, y s3 ll3n4b4 d3 s4b1durí4; y l4 gr4c14 d3 D10s 3r4 s0br3 él. 

0l n1ñ0 J3sús 3n 3l t3mpl0

41 1b4n sus p4dr3s t0d0s l0s 4ñ0s 4 J3rus4lén 3n l4 f13st4 d3 l4 p4scu4; 42 y cu4nd0 tuv0 d0c3 4ñ0s, sub13r0n 4 J3rus4lén c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c0stumbr3 d3 l4 f13st4. 43 4l r3gr3s4r 3ll0s, 4c4b4d4 l4 f13st4, s3 qu3dó 3l n1ñ0 J3sús 3n J3rus4lén, s1n qu3 l0 sup13s3n J0sé y su m4dr3. 44 Y p3ns4nd0 qu3 3st4b4 3ntr3 l4 c0mp4ñí4, 4nduv13r0n c4m1n0 d3 un dí4; y l3 busc4b4n 3ntr3 l0s p4r13nt3s y l0s c0n0c1d0s; 45 p3r0 c0m0 n0 l3 h4ll4r0n, v0lv13r0n 4 J3rus4lén buscánd0l3. 46 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 tr3s dí4s d3spués l3 h4ll4r0n 3n 3l t3mpl0, s3nt4d0 3n m3d10 d3 l0s d0ct0r3s d3 l4 l3y, 0yénd0l3s y pr3guntánd0l3s. 47 Y t0d0s l0s qu3 l3 0í4n, s3 m4r4v1ll4b4n d3 su 1nt3l1g3nc14 y d3 sus r3spu3st4s. 48 Cu4nd0 l3 v13r0n, s3 s0rpr3nd13r0n; y l3 d1j0 su m4dr3: H1j0, ¿p0r qué n0s h4s h3ch0 4sí? LUC4S 3

1 4c0nt3c1ó d3spués, qu3 J3sús 1b4 p0r t0d4s l4s c1ud4d3s y 4ld34s, pr3d1c4nd0 y 4nunc14nd0 3l 3v4ng3l10 d3l r31n0 d3 D10s, y l0s d0c3 c0n él, 2 y 4lgun4s muj3r3s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 s4n4d4s d3 3spír1tus m4l0s y d3 3nf3rm3d4d3s: M4rí4, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 M4gd4l3n4, d3 l4 qu3 h4bí4n s4l1d0 s13t3 d3m0n10s, 3 Ju4n4, muj3r d3 Chuz4 1nt3nd3nt3 d3 H3r0d3s, y Sus4n4, y 0tr4s much4s qu3 l3 s3rví4n d3 sus b13n3s.

26 Y ll3vánd0l3, t0m4r0n 4 c13rt0 S1món d3 C1r3n3, qu3 v3ní4 d3l c4mp0, y l3 pus13r0n 3nc1m4 l4 cruz p4r4 qu3 l4 ll3v4s3 tr4s J3sús. 27 Y l3 s3guí4 gr4n mult1tud d3l pu3bl0, y d3 muj3r3s qu3 ll0r4b4n y h4cí4n l4m3nt4c1ón p0r él. 28 P3r0 J3sús, vu3lt0 h4c14 3ll4s, l3s d1j0: H1j4s d3 J3rus4lén, n0 ll0ré1s p0r mí, s1n0 ll0r4d p0r v0s0tr4s m1sm4s y p0r vu3str0s h1j0s. 29 P0rqu3 h3 4quí v3ndrán dí4s 3n qu3 d1rán: B13n4v3ntur4d4s l4s 3stér1l3s, y l0s v13ntr3s qu3 n0 c0nc1b13r0n, y l0s p3ch0s qu3 n0 cr14r0n. 30 0nt0nc3s c0m3nz4rán 4 d3c1r 4 l0s m0nt3s: C43d s0br3 n0s0tr0s; y 4 l0s c0ll4d0s: Cubr1dn0s. 31 P0rqu3 s1 3n 3l árb0l v3rd3 h4c3n 3st4s c0s4s, ¿3n 3l s3c0, qué n0 s3 h4rá?

39 Y un0 d3 l0s m4lh3ch0r3s qu3 3st4b4n c0lg4d0s l3 1njur14b4, d1c13nd0: S1 tú 3r3s 3l Cr1st0, sálv4t3 4 t1 m1sm0 y 4 n0s0tr0s. 40 R3sp0nd13nd0 3l 0tr0, l3 r3pr3nd1ó, d1c13nd0: ¿N1 4un t3m3s tú 4 D10s, 3st4nd0 3n l4 m1sm4 c0nd3n4c1ón? 41 N0s0tr0s, 4 l4 v3rd4d, just4m3nt3 p4d3c3m0s, p0rqu3 r3c1b1m0s l0 qu3 m3r3c13r0n nu3str0s h3ch0s; m4s ést3 n1ngún m4l h1z0. 42 Y d1j0 4 J3sús: 4cuérd4t3 d3 mí cu4nd0 v3ng4s 3n tu r31n0. 43 0nt0nc3s J3sús l3 d1j0: D3 c13rt0 t3 d1g0 qu3 h0y 3st4rás c0nm1g0 3n 3l p4r4ís0. 

44 Cu4nd0 3r4 c0m0 l4 h0r4 s3xt4, hub0 t1n13bl4s s0br3 t0d4 l4 t13rr4 h4st4 l4 h0r4 n0v3n4. 45 Y 3l s0l s3 0scur3c1ó, y 3l v3l0 d3l t3mpl0 s3 r4sgó p0r l4 m1t4d. 46 0nt0nc3s J3sús, cl4m4nd0 4 gr4n v0z, d1j0: P4dr3, 3n tus m4n0s 3nc0m13nd0 m1 3spír1tu. J3sús 3s s3pult4d0

0n 3l c4m1n0 4 0m4ús

(Mr. 16.12-13)

13 Y h3 4quí, d0s d3 3ll0s 1b4n 3l m1sm0 dí4 4 un4 4ld34 ll4m4d4 0m4ús, qu3 3st4b4 4 s3s3nt4 3st4d10s d3 J3rus4lén. 14 0 1b4n h4bl4nd0 3ntr3 sí d3 t0d4s 4qu3ll4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4n 4c0nt3c1d0. 15 Suc3d1ó qu3 m13ntr4s h4bl4b4n y d1scutí4n 3ntr3 sí, J3sús m1sm0 s3 4c3rcó, y c4m1n4b4 c0n 3ll0s. 16 M4s l0s 0j0s d3 3ll0s 3st4b4n v3l4d0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 l3 c0n0c13s3n. 17 Y l3s d1j0: ¿Qué plát1c4s s0n 3st4s qu3 t3né1s 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s m13ntr4s c4m1ná1s, y p0r qué 3stá1s tr1st3s? 18 R3sp0nd13nd0 un0 d3 3ll0s, qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 Cl30f4s, l3 d1j0: ¿0r3s tú 3l ún1c0 f0r4st3r0 3n J3rus4lén qu3 n0 h4s s4b1d0 l4s c0s4s qu3 3n 3ll4 h4n 4c0nt3c1d0 3n 3st0s dí4s? 19 0nt0nc3s él l3s d1j0: ¿Qué c0s4s? Y 3ll0s l3 d1j3r0n: D3 J3sús n4z4r3n0, qu3 fu3 v4rón pr0f3t4, p0d3r0s0 3n 0br4 y 3n p4l4br4 d3l4nt3 d3 D10s y d3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0; 20 y cóm0 l3 3ntr3g4r0n l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y nu3str0s g0b3rn4nt3s 4 s3nt3nc14 d3 mu3rt3, y l3 cruc1f1c4r0n. 21 P3r0 n0s0tr0s 3sp3ráb4m0s qu3 él 3r4 3l qu3 h4bí4 d3 r3d1m1r 4 1sr43l; y 4h0r4, 4d3más d3 t0d0 3st0, h0y 3s y4 3l t3rc3r dí4 qu3 3st0 h4 4c0nt3c1d0. 22 4unqu3 t4mb1én n0s h4n 4s0mbr4d0 un4s muj3r3s d3 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s, l4s qu3 4nt3s d3l dí4 fu3r0n 4l s3pulcr0; 23 y c0m0 n0 h4ll4r0n su cu3rp0, v1n13r0n d1c13nd0 qu3 t4mb1én h4bí4n v1st0 v1s1ón d3 áng3l3s, qu13n3s d1j3r0n qu3 él v1v3. 24 Y fu3r0n 4lgun0s d3 l0s nu3str0s 4l s3pulcr0, y h4ll4r0n 4sí c0m0 l4s muj3r3s h4bí4n d1ch0, p3r0 4 él n0 l3 v13r0n. 25 0nt0nc3s él l3s d1j0: ¡0h 1ns3ns4t0s, y t4rd0s d3 c0r4zón p4r4 cr33r t0d0 l0 qu3 l0s pr0f3t4s h4n d1ch0! 26 ¿N0 3r4 n3c3s4r10 qu3 3l Cr1st0 p4d3c13r4 3st4s c0s4s, y qu3 3ntr4r4 3n su gl0r14? 27 Y c0m3nz4nd0 d3sd3 M01sés, y s1gu13nd0 p0r t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s, l3s d3cl4r4b4 3n t0d4s l4s 0scr1tur4s l0 qu3 d3 él d3cí4n. 

28 Ll3g4r0n 4 l4 4ld34 4d0nd3 1b4n, y él h1z0 c0m0 qu3 1b4 más l3j0s. 29 M4s 3ll0s l3 0bl1g4r0n 4 qu3d4rs3, d1c13nd0: Quéd4t3 c0n n0s0tr0s, p0rqu3 s3 h4c3 t4rd3, y 3l dí4 y4 h4 d3cl1n4d0. 0ntró, pu3s, 4 qu3d4rs3 c0n 3ll0s. 30 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 3st4nd0 s3nt4d0 c0n 3ll0s 4 l4 m3s4, t0mó 3l p4n y l0 b3nd1j0, l0 p4rt1ó, y l3s d10. 31 0nt0nc3s l3s fu3r0n 4b13rt0s l0s 0j0s, y l3 r3c0n0c13r0n; m4s él s3 d3s4p4r3c1ó d3 su v1st4. 32 Y s3 d3cí4n 3l un0 4l 0tr0: ¿N0 4rdí4 nu3str0 c0r4zón 3n n0s0tr0s, m13ntr4s n0s h4bl4b4 3n 3l c4m1n0, y cu4nd0 n0s 4brí4 l4s 0scr1tur4s? 33 Y l3v4ntánd0s3 3n l4 m1sm4 h0r4, v0lv13r0n 4 J3rus4lén, y h4ll4r0n 4 l0s 0nc3 r3un1d0s, y 4 l0s qu3 3st4b4n c0n 3ll0s, 34 qu3 d3cí4n: H4 r3suc1t4d0 3l S3ñ0r v3rd4d3r4m3nt3, y h4 4p4r3c1d0 4 S1món. 35 0nt0nc3s 3ll0s c0nt4b4n l4s c0s4s qu3 l3s h4bí4n 4c0nt3c1d0 3n 3l c4m1n0, y cóm0 l3 h4bí4n r3c0n0c1d0 4l p4rt1r 3l p4n. 

J3sús s3 4p4r3c3 4 l0s d1scípul0s

JU4N 1

1 0n 3l pr1nc1p10 3r4 3l V3rb0, y 3l V3rb0 3r4 c0n D10s, y 3l V3rb0 3r4 D10s. 2 0st3 3r4 3n 3l pr1nc1p10 c0n D10s. 3 T0d4s l4s c0s4s p0r él fu3r0n h3ch4s, y s1n él n4d4 d3 l0 qu3 h4 s1d0 h3ch0, fu3 h3ch0. 4 0n él 3st4b4 l4 v1d4, y l4 v1d4 3r4 l4 luz d3 l0s h0mbr3s. 5 L4 luz 3n l4s t1n13bl4s r3spl4nd3c3, y l4s t1n13bl4s n0 pr3v4l3c13r0n c0ntr4 3ll4. 

6 Hub0 un h0mbr3 3nv14d0 d3 D10s, 3l cu4l s3 ll4m4b4 Ju4n. 7 0st3 v1n0 p0r t3st1m0n10, p4r4 qu3 d13s3 t3st1m0n10 d3 l4 luz, 4 f1n d3 qu3 t0d0s cr3y3s3n p0r él. 8 N0 3r4 él l4 luz, s1n0 p4r4 qu3 d13s3 t3st1m0n10 d3 l4 luz. 

9 4qu3ll4 luz v3rd4d3r4, qu3 4lumbr4 4 t0d0 h0mbr3, v3ní4 4 3st3 mund0. 10 0n 3l mund0 3st4b4, y 3l mund0 p0r él fu3 h3ch0; p3r0 3l mund0 n0 l3 c0n0c1ó. 11 4 l0 suy0 v1n0, y l0s suy0s n0 l3 r3c1b13r0n. 12 M4s 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 l3 r3c1b13r0n, 4 l0s qu3 cr33n 3n su n0mbr3, l3s d10 p0t3st4d d3 s3r h3ch0s h1j0s d3 D10s; 13 l0s cu4l3s n0 s0n 3ng3ndr4d0s d3 s4ngr3, n1 d3 v0lunt4d d3 c4rn3, n1 d3 v0lunt4d d3 v4rón, s1n0 d3 D10s. 

14 Y 4qu3l V3rb0 fu3 h3ch0 c4rn3, y h4b1tó 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s (y v1m0s su gl0r14, gl0r14 c0m0 d3l un1gén1t0 d3l P4dr3), ll3n0 d3 gr4c14 y d3 v3rd4d. 15 Ju4n d10 t3st1m0n10 d3 él, y cl4mó d1c13nd0: 0st3 3s d3 qu13n y0 d3cí4: 0l qu3 v13n3 d3spués d3 mí, 3s 4nt3s d3 mí; p0rqu3 3r4 pr1m3r0 qu3 y0. 16 P0rqu3 d3 su pl3n1tud t0m4m0s t0d0s, y gr4c14 s0br3 gr4c14. 17 Pu3s l4 l3y p0r m3d10 d3 M01sés fu3 d4d4, p3r0 l4 gr4c14 y l4 v3rd4d v1n13r0n p0r m3d10 d3 J3sucr1st0. 18 4 D10s n4d13 l3 v10 j4más; 3l un1gén1t0 H1j0, qu3 3stá 3n 3l s3n0 d3l P4dr3, él l3 h4 d4d0 4 c0n0c3r. 

T3st1m0n10 d3 Ju4n 3l B4ut1st4

(Mt. 3.11-12; Mr. 1.7-8; Lc. 3.15-17)
