D1j0: N0 s0y. ¿0r3s tú 3l pr0f3t4? Y r3sp0nd1ó: N0. 22 L3 d1j3r0n: ¿Pu3s qu1én 3r3s? p4r4 qu3 d3m0s r3spu3st4 4 l0s qu3 n0s 3nv14r0n. ¿Qué d1c3s d3 t1 m1sm0? 23 D1j0: Y0 s0y l4 v0z d3 un0 qu3 cl4m4 3n 3l d3s13rt0: 0nd3r3z4d 3l c4m1n0 d3l S3ñ0r, c0m0 d1j0 3l pr0f3t4 1s4í4s. 

24 Y l0s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 3nv14d0s 3r4n d3 l0s f4r1s30s. 25 Y l3 pr3gunt4r0n, y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿P0r qué, pu3s, b4ut1z4s, s1 tú n0 3r3s 3l Cr1st0, n1 0lí4s, n1 3l pr0f3t4? 26 Ju4n l3s r3sp0nd1ó d1c13nd0: Y0 b4ut1z0 c0n 4gu4; m4s 3n m3d10 d3 v0s0tr0s 3stá un0 4 qu13n v0s0tr0s n0 c0n0cé1s. 27 0st3 3s 3l qu3 v13n3 d3spués d3 mí, 3l qu3 3s 4nt3s d3 mí, d3l cu4l y0 n0 s0y d1gn0 d3 d3s4t4r l4 c0rr34 d3l c4lz4d0. 28 0st4s c0s4s suc3d13r0n 3n B3táb4r4, 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, d0nd3 Ju4n 3st4b4 b4ut1z4nd0. 

0l C0rd3r0 d3 D10s

29 0l s1gu13nt3 dí4 v10 Ju4n 4 J3sús qu3 v3ní4 4 él, y d1j0: H3 4quí 3l C0rd3r0 d3 D10s, qu3 qu1t4 3l p3c4d0 d3l mund0. 30 0st3 3s 4qu3l d3 qu13n y0 d1j3: D3spués d3 mí v13n3 un v4rón, 3l cu4l 3s 4nt3s d3 mí; p0rqu3 3r4 pr1m3r0 qu3 y0. 31 Y y0 n0 l3 c0n0cí4; m4s p4r4 qu3 fu3s3 m4n1f3st4d0 4 1sr43l, p0r 3st0 v1n3 y0 b4ut1z4nd0 c0n 4gu4. 32 T4mb1én d10 Ju4n t3st1m0n10, d1c13nd0: V1 4l 0spír1tu qu3 d3sc3ndí4 d3l c13l0 c0m0 p4l0m4, y p3rm4n3c1ó s0br3 él. 33 Y y0 n0 l3 c0n0cí4; p3r0 3l qu3 m3 3nv1ó 4 b4ut1z4r c0n 4gu4, 4quél m3 d1j0: S0br3 qu13n v34s d3sc3nd3r 3l 0spír1tu y qu3 p3rm4n3c3 s0br3 él, és3 3s 3l qu3 b4ut1z4 c0n 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0. 34 Y y0 l3 v1, y h3 d4d0 t3st1m0n10 d3 qu3 ést3 3s 3l H1j0 d3 D10s. 

L0s pr1m3r0s d1scípul0s

35 0l s1gu13nt3 dí4 0tr4 v3z 3st4b4 Ju4n, y d0s d3 sus d1scípul0s. 36 Y m1r4nd0 4 J3sús qu3 4nd4b4 p0r 4llí, d1j0: H3 4quí 3l C0rd3r0 d3 D10s. 37 L3 0y3r0n h4bl4r l0s d0s d1scípul0s, y s1gu13r0n 4 J3sús. 38 Y v0lv1énd0s3 J3sús, y v13nd0 qu3 l3 s3guí4n, l3s d1j0: ¿Qué buscá1s? 0ll0s l3 d1j3r0n: R4bí (qu3 tr4duc1d0 3s, M43str0), ¿dónd3 m0r4s? 39 L3s d1j0: V3n1d y v3d. Fu3r0n, y v13r0n d0nd3 m0r4b4, y s3 qu3d4r0n c0n él 4qu3l dí4; p0rqu3 3r4 c0m0 l4 h0r4 déc1m4. 40 4ndrés, h3rm4n0 d3 S1món P3dr0, 3r4 un0 d3 l0s d0s qu3 h4bí4n 0íd0 4 Ju4n, y h4bí4n s3gu1d0 4 J3sús. 41 0st3 h4lló pr1m3r0 4 su h3rm4n0 S1món, y l3 d1j0: H3m0s h4ll4d0 4l M3sí4s (qu3 tr4duc1d0 3s, 3l Cr1st0). 42 Y l3 tr4j0 4 J3sús. Y m1ránd0l3 J3sús, d1j0: Tú 3r3s S1món, h1j0 d3 J0nás; tú s3rás ll4m4d0 C3f4s (qu3 qu13r3 d3c1r, P3dr0). 

J3sús ll4m4 4 F3l1p3 y 4 N4t4n43l

43 0l s1gu13nt3 dí4 qu1s0 J3sús 1r 4 G4l1l34, y h4lló 4 F3l1p3, y l3 d1j0: Sígu3m3. 44 Y F3l1p3 3r4 d3 B3ts41d4, l4 c1ud4d d3 4ndrés y P3dr0. 45 F3l1p3 h4lló 4 N4t4n43l, y l3 d1j0: H3m0s h4ll4d0 4 4qu3l d3 qu13n 3scr1b1ó M01sés 3n l4 l3y, 4sí c0m0 l0s pr0f3t4s: 4 J3sús, 3l h1j0 d3 J0sé, d3 N4z4r3t. 46 N4t4n43l l3 d1j0: ¿D3 N4z4r3t pu3d3 s4l1r 4lg0 d3 bu3n0? L3 d1j0 F3l1p3: V3n y v3. 47 Cu4nd0 J3sús v10 4 N4t4n43l qu3 s3 l3 4c3rc4b4, d1j0 d3 él: H3 4quí un v3rd4d3r0 1sr43l1t4, 3n qu13n n0 h4y 3ng4ñ0. 48 L3 d1j0 N4t4n43l: ¿D3 dónd3 m3 c0n0c3s? R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3 d1j0: 4nt3s qu3 F3l1p3 t3 ll4m4r4, cu4nd0 3st4b4s d3b4j0 d3 l4 h1gu3r4, t3 v1. 49 R3sp0nd1ó N4t4n43l y l3 d1j0: R4bí, tú 3r3s 3l H1j0 d3 D10s; tú 3r3s 3l R3y d3 1sr43l. 50 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3 d1j0: ¿P0rqu3 t3 d1j3: T3 v1 d3b4j0 d3 l4 h1gu3r4, cr33s? C0s4s m4y0r3s qu3 3st4s v3rás. 51 Y l3 d1j0: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: D3 4quí 4d3l4nt3 v3ré1s 3l c13l0 4b13rt0, y 4 l0s áng3l3s d3 D10s qu3 sub3n y d3sc13nd3n s0br3 3l H1j0 d3l H0mbr3. 

L4s b0d4s d3 C4ná

JU4N 2

1 4l t3rc3r dí4 s3 h1c13r0n un4s b0d4s 3n C4ná d3 G4l1l34; y 3st4b4 4llí l4 m4dr3 d3 J3sús. 2 Y fu3r0n t4mb1én 1nv1t4d0s 4 l4s b0d4s J3sús y sus d1scípul0s. 3 Y f4lt4nd0 3l v1n0, l4 m4dr3 d3 J3sús l3 d1j0: N0 t13n3n v1n0. 4 J3sús l3 d1j0: ¿Qué t13n3s c0nm1g0, muj3r? 4ún n0 h4 v3n1d0 m1 h0r4. 5 Su m4dr3 d1j0 4 l0s qu3 s3rví4n: H4c3d t0d0 l0 qu3 0s d1j3r3. 6 Y 3st4b4n 4llí s31s t1n4j4s d3 p13dr4 p4r4 4gu4, c0nf0rm3 4l r1t0 d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón d3 l0s judí0s, 3n c4d4 un4 d3 l4s cu4l3s c4bí4n d0s 0 tr3s cánt4r0s. 7 J3sús l3s d1j0: Ll3n4d 3st4s t1n4j4s d3 4gu4. Y l4s ll3n4r0n h4st4 4rr1b4. 8 0nt0nc3s l3s d1j0: S4c4d 4h0r4, y ll3v4dl0 4l m43str3s4l4. Y s3 l0 ll3v4r0n. 9 Cu4nd0 3l m43str3s4l4 pr0bó 3l 4gu4 h3ch4 v1n0, s1n s4b3r él d3 dónd3 3r4, 4unqu3 l0 s4bí4n l0s s1rv13nt3s qu3 h4bí4n s4c4d0 3l 4gu4, ll4mó 4l 3sp0s0, 10 y l3 d1j0: T0d0 h0mbr3 s1rv3 pr1m3r0 3l bu3n v1n0, y cu4nd0 y4 h4n b3b1d0 much0, 3nt0nc3s 3l 1nf3r10r; m4s tú h4s r3s3rv4d0 3l bu3n v1n0 h4st4 4h0r4. 11 0st3 pr1nc1p10 d3 s3ñ4l3s h1z0 J3sús 3n C4ná d3 G4l1l34, y m4n1f3stó su gl0r14; y sus d1scípul0s cr3y3r0n 3n él. 

12 D3spués d3 3st0 d3sc3nd13r0n 4 C4p3rn4um, él, su m4dr3, sus h3rm4n0s y sus d1scípul0s; y 3stuv13r0n 4llí n0 much0s dí4s. 

J3sús pur1f1c4 3l t3mpl0

(Mt. 21.12-13; Mr. 11.15-18; Lc. 19.45-46)

13 0st4b4 c3rc4 l4 p4scu4 d3 l0s judí0s; y sub1ó J3sús 4 J3rus4lén, 14 y h4lló 3n 3l t3mpl0 4 l0s qu3 v3ndí4n bu3y3s, 0v3j4s y p4l0m4s, y 4 l0s c4mb1st4s 4llí s3nt4d0s. 15 Y h4c13nd0 un 4z0t3 d3 cu3rd4s, 3chó fu3r4 d3l t3mpl0 4 t0d0s, y l4s 0v3j4s y l0s bu3y3s; y 3sp4rc1ó l4s m0n3d4s d3 l0s c4mb1st4s, y v0lcó l4s m3s4s; 16 y d1j0 4 l0s qu3 v3ndí4n p4l0m4s: Qu1t4d d3 4quí 3st0, y n0 h4gá1s d3 l4 c4s4 d3 m1 P4dr3 c4s4 d3 m3rc4d0. 17 0nt0nc3s s3 4c0rd4r0n sus d1scípul0s qu3 3stá 3scr1t0: 0l c3l0 d3 tu c4s4 m3 c0nsum3. 18 Y l0s judí0s r3sp0nd13r0n y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿Qué s3ñ4l n0s mu3str4s, y4 qu3 h4c3s 3st0? 19 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3s d1j0: D3stru1d 3st3 t3mpl0, y 3n tr3s dí4s l0 l3v4nt4ré. 20 D1j3r0n lu3g0 l0s judí0s: 0n cu4r3nt4 y s31s 4ñ0s fu3 3d1f1c4d0 3st3 t3mpl0, ¿y tú 3n tr3s dí4s l0 l3v4nt4rás? 21 M4s él h4bl4b4 d3l t3mpl0 d3 su cu3rp0. 22 P0r t4nt0, cu4nd0 r3suc1tó d3 3ntr3 l0s mu3rt0s, sus d1scípul0s s3 4c0rd4r0n qu3 h4bí4 d1ch0 3st0; y cr3y3r0n l4 0scr1tur4 y l4 p4l4br4 qu3 J3sús h4bí4 d1ch0. 

J3sús c0n0c3 4 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s

23 0st4nd0 3n J3rus4lén 3n l4 f13st4 d3 l4 p4scu4, much0s cr3y3r0n 3n su n0mbr3, v13nd0 l4s s3ñ4l3s qu3 h4cí4. 24 P3r0 J3sús m1sm0 n0 s3 f14b4 d3 3ll0s, p0rqu3 c0n0cí4 4 t0d0s, 25 y n0 t3ní4 n3c3s1d4d d3 qu3 n4d13 l3 d13s3 t3st1m0n10 d3l h0mbr3, pu3s él s4bí4 l0 qu3 h4bí4 3n 3l h0mbr3. 

J3sús y N1c0d3m0

JU4N 3

1 H4bí4 un h0mbr3 d3 l0s f4r1s30s qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 N1c0d3m0, un pr1nc1p4l 3ntr3 l0s judí0s. 2 0st3 v1n0 4 J3sús d3 n0ch3, y l3 d1j0: R4bí, s4b3m0s qu3 h4s v3n1d0 d3 D10s c0m0 m43str0; p0rqu3 n4d13 pu3d3 h4c3r 3st4s s3ñ4l3s qu3 tú h4c3s, s1 n0 3stá D10s c0n él. 3 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3 d1j0: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 t3 d1g0, qu3 3l qu3 n0 n4c13r3 d3 nu3v0, n0 pu3d3 v3r 3l r31n0 d3 D10s. 4 N1c0d3m0 l3 d1j0: ¿Cóm0 pu3d3 un h0mbr3 n4c3r s13nd0 v13j0? ¿Pu3d3 4c4s0 3ntr4r p0r s3gund4 v3z 3n 3l v13ntr3 d3 su m4dr3, y n4c3r? 5 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 t3 d1g0, qu3 3l qu3 n0 n4c13r3 d3 4gu4 y d3l 0spír1tu, n0 pu3d3 3ntr4r 3n 3l r31n0 d3 D10s. 6 L0 qu3 3s n4c1d0 d3 l4 c4rn3, c4rn3 3s; y l0 qu3 3s n4c1d0 d3l 0spír1tu, 3spír1tu 3s. 7 N0 t3 m4r4v1ll3s d3 qu3 t3 d1j3: 0s 3s n3c3s4r10 n4c3r d3 nu3v0. 8 0l v13nt0 s0pl4 d3 d0nd3 qu13r3, y 0y3s su s0n1d0; m4s n1 s4b3s d3 dónd3 v13n3, n1 4 dónd3 v4; 4sí 3s t0d0 4qu3l qu3 3s n4c1d0 d3l 0spír1tu. 9 R3sp0nd1ó N1c0d3m0 y l3 d1j0: ¿Cóm0 pu3d3 h4c3rs3 3st0? 10 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3 d1j0: ¿0r3s tú m43str0 d3 1sr43l, y n0 s4b3s 3st0? 11 D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 t3 d1g0, qu3 l0 qu3 s4b3m0s h4bl4m0s, y l0 qu3 h3m0s v1st0, t3st1f1c4m0s; y n0 r3c1bís nu3str0 t3st1m0n10. 12 S1 0s h3 d1ch0 c0s4s t3rr3n4l3s, y n0 cr3é1s, ¿cóm0 cr33ré1s s1 0s d1j3r3 l4s c3l3st14l3s? 13 N4d13 sub1ó 4l c13l0, s1n0 3l qu3 d3sc3nd1ó d3l c13l0; 3l H1j0 d3l H0mbr3, qu3 3stá 3n 3l c13l0. 14 Y c0m0 M01sés l3v4ntó l4 s3rp13nt3 3n 3l d3s13rt0, 4sí 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 3l H1j0 d3l H0mbr3 s34 l3v4nt4d0, 15 p4r4 qu3 t0d0 4qu3l qu3 3n él cr33, n0 s3 p13rd4, m4s t3ng4 v1d4 3t3rn4. 

D3 t4l m4n3r4 4mó D10s 4l mund0

16 P0rqu3 d3 t4l m4n3r4 4mó D10s 4l mund0, qu3 h4 d4d0 4 su H1j0 un1gén1t0, p4r4 qu3 t0d0 4qu3l qu3 3n él cr33, n0 s3 p13rd4, m4s t3ng4 v1d4 3t3rn4. 17 P0rqu3 n0 3nv1ó D10s 4 su H1j0 4l mund0 p4r4 c0nd3n4r 4l mund0, s1n0 p4r4 qu3 3l mund0 s34 s4lv0 p0r él. 18 0l qu3 3n él cr33, n0 3s c0nd3n4d0; p3r0 3l qu3 n0 cr33, y4 h4 s1d0 c0nd3n4d0, p0rqu3 n0 h4 cr3íd0 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3l un1gén1t0 H1j0 d3 D10s. 19 Y 3st4 3s l4 c0nd3n4c1ón: qu3 l4 luz v1n0 4l mund0, y l0s h0mbr3s 4m4r0n más l4s t1n13bl4s qu3 l4 luz, p0rqu3 sus 0br4s 3r4n m4l4s. 20 P0rqu3 t0d0 4qu3l qu3 h4c3 l0 m4l0, 4b0rr3c3 l4 luz y n0 v13n3 4 l4 luz, p4r4 qu3 sus 0br4s n0 s34n r3pr3nd1d4s. 21 M4s 3l qu3 pr4ct1c4 l4 v3rd4d v13n3 4 l4 luz, p4r4 qu3 s34 m4n1f13st0 qu3 sus 0br4s s0n h3ch4s 3n D10s. 

0l 4m1g0 d3l 3sp0s0

22 D3spués d3 3st0, v1n0 J3sús c0n sus d1scípul0s 4 l4 t13rr4 d3 Jud34, y 3stuv0 4llí c0n 3ll0s, y b4ut1z4b4. 23 Ju4n b4ut1z4b4 t4mb1én 3n 0nón, junt0 4 S4l1m, p0rqu3 h4bí4 4llí much4s 4gu4s; y v3ní4n, y 3r4n b4ut1z4d0s. 24 P0rqu3 Ju4n n0 h4bí4 s1d0 4ún 3nc4rc3l4d0. 

25 0nt0nc3s hub0 d1scus1ón 3ntr3 l0s d1scípul0s d3 Ju4n y l0s judí0s 4c3rc4 d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón. 26 Y v1n13r0n 4 Ju4n y l3 d1j3r0n: R4bí, m1r4 qu3 3l qu3 3st4b4 c0nt1g0 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, d3 qu13n tú d1st3 t3st1m0n10, b4ut1z4, y t0d0s v13n3n 4 él. 27 R3sp0nd1ó Ju4n y d1j0: N0 pu3d3 3l h0mbr3 r3c1b1r n4d4, s1 n0 l3 fu3r3 d4d0 d3l c13l0. 28 V0s0tr0s m1sm0s m3 s01s t3st1g0s d3 qu3 d1j3: Y0 n0 s0y 3l Cr1st0, s1n0 qu3 s0y 3nv14d0 d3l4nt3 d3 él. 29 0l qu3 t13n3 l4 3sp0s4, 3s 3l 3sp0s0; m4s 3l 4m1g0 d3l 3sp0s0, qu3 3stá 4 su l4d0 y l3 0y3, s3 g0z4 gr4nd3m3nt3 d3 l4 v0z d3l 3sp0s0; 4sí pu3s, 3st3 m1 g0z0 3stá cumpl1d0. 30 0s n3c3s4r10 qu3 él cr3zc4, p3r0 qu3 y0 m3ngü3. 

0l qu3 v13n3 d3 4rr1b4

31 0l qu3 d3 4rr1b4 v13n3, 3s s0br3 t0d0s; 3l qu3 3s d3 l4 t13rr4, 3s t3rr3n4l, y c0s4s t3rr3n4l3s h4bl4; 3l qu3 v13n3 d3l c13l0, 3s s0br3 t0d0s. 32 Y l0 qu3 v10 y 0yó, 3st0 t3st1f1c4; y n4d13 r3c1b3 su t3st1m0n10. 33 0l qu3 r3c1b3 su t3st1m0n10, ést3 4t3st1gu4 qu3 D10s 3s v3r4z. 34 P0rqu3 3l qu3 D10s 3nv1ó, l4s p4l4br4s d3 D10s h4bl4; pu3s D10s n0 d4 3l 0spír1tu p0r m3d1d4. 35 0l P4dr3 4m4 4l H1j0, y t0d4s l4s c0s4s h4 3ntr3g4d0 3n su m4n0. 

36 0l qu3 cr33 3n 3l H1j0 t13n3 v1d4 3t3rn4; p3r0 3l qu3 r3hús4 cr33r 3n 3l H1j0 n0 v3rá l4 v1d4, s1n0 qu3 l4 1r4 d3 D10s 3stá s0br3 él. 

J3sús y l4 muj3r s4m4r1t4n4

JU4N 4

1 Cu4nd0, pu3s, 3l S3ñ0r 3nt3nd1ó qu3 l0s f4r1s30s h4bí4n 0íd0 d3c1r: J3sús h4c3 y b4ut1z4 más d1scípul0s qu3 Ju4n 2 (4unqu3 J3sús n0 b4ut1z4b4, s1n0 sus d1scípul0s), 3 s4l1ó d3 Jud34, y s3 fu3 0tr4 v3z 4 G4l1l34. 4 Y l3 3r4 n3c3s4r10 p4s4r p0r S4m4r14. 5 V1n0, pu3s, 4 un4 c1ud4d d3 S4m4r14 ll4m4d4 S1c4r, junt0 4 l4 h3r3d4d qu3 J4c0b d10 4 su h1j0 J0sé. 6 Y 3st4b4 4llí 3l p0z0 d3 J4c0b. 0nt0nc3s J3sús, c4ns4d0 d3l c4m1n0, s3 s3ntó 4sí junt0 4l p0z0. 0r4 c0m0 l4 h0r4 s3xt4. 

7 V1n0 un4 muj3r d3 S4m4r14 4 s4c4r 4gu4; y J3sús l3 d1j0: D4m3 d3 b3b3r. 8 Pu3s sus d1scípul0s h4bí4n 1d0 4 l4 c1ud4d 4 c0mpr4r d3 c0m3r. 9 L4 muj3r s4m4r1t4n4 l3 d1j0: ¿Cóm0 tú, s13nd0 judí0, m3 p1d3s 4 mí d3 b3b3r, qu3 s0y muj3r s4m4r1t4n4? P0rqu3 judí0s y s4m4r1t4n0s n0 s3 tr4t4n 3ntr3 sí. 10 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3 d1j0: S1 c0n0c13r4s 3l d0n d3 D10s, y qu1én 3s 3l qu3 t3 d1c3: D4m3 d3 b3b3r; tú l3 p3d1rí4s, y él t3 d4rí4 4gu4 v1v4. 11 L4 muj3r l3 d1j0: S3ñ0r, n0 t13n3s c0n qué s4c4rl4, y 3l p0z0 3s h0nd0. ¿D3 dónd3, pu3s, t13n3s 3l 4gu4 v1v4? 12 ¿4c4s0 3r3s tú m4y0r qu3 nu3str0 p4dr3 J4c0b, qu3 n0s d10 3st3 p0z0, d3l cu4l b3b13r0n él, sus h1j0s y sus g4n4d0s? 13 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3 d1j0: Cu4lqu13r4 qu3 b3b13r3 d3 3st4 4gu4, v0lv3rá 4 t3n3r s3d; 14 m4s 3l qu3 b3b13r3 d3l 4gu4 qu3 y0 l3 d4ré, n0 t3ndrá s3d j4más; s1n0 qu3 3l 4gu4 qu3 y0 l3 d4ré s3rá 3n él un4 fu3nt3 d3 4gu4 qu3 s4lt3 p4r4 v1d4 3t3rn4. 15 L4 muj3r l3 d1j0: S3ñ0r, d4m3 3s4 4gu4, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3ng4 y0 s3d, n1 v3ng4 4quí 4 s4c4rl4. 

16 J3sús l3 d1j0: V3, ll4m4 4 tu m4r1d0, y v3n 4cá. 17 R3sp0nd1ó l4 muj3r y d1j0: N0 t3ng0 m4r1d0. J3sús l3 d1j0: B13n h4s d1ch0: N0 t3ng0 m4r1d0; 18 p0rqu3 c1nc0 m4r1d0s h4s t3n1d0, y 3l qu3 4h0r4 t13n3s n0 3s tu m4r1d0; 3st0 h4s d1ch0 c0n v3rd4d. 19 L3 d1j0 l4 muj3r: S3ñ0r, m3 p4r3c3 qu3 tú 3r3s pr0f3t4. 20 Nu3str0s p4dr3s 4d0r4r0n 3n 3st3 m0nt3, y v0s0tr0s d3cís qu3 3n J3rus4lén 3s 3l lug4r d0nd3 s3 d3b3 4d0r4r. 21 J3sús l3 d1j0: Muj3r, cré3m3, qu3 l4 h0r4 v13n3 cu4nd0 n1 3n 3st3 m0nt3 n1 3n J3rus4lén 4d0r4ré1s 4l P4dr3. 22 V0s0tr0s 4d0rá1s l0 qu3 n0 s4bé1s; n0s0tr0s 4d0r4m0s l0 qu3 s4b3m0s; p0rqu3 l4 s4lv4c1ón v13n3 d3 l0s judí0s. 23 M4s l4 h0r4 v13n3, y 4h0r4 3s, cu4nd0 l0s v3rd4d3r0s 4d0r4d0r3s 4d0r4rán 4l P4dr3 3n 3spír1tu y 3n v3rd4d; p0rqu3 t4mb1én 3l P4dr3 t4l3s 4d0r4d0r3s busc4 qu3 l3 4d0r3n. 24 D10s 3s 0spír1tu; y l0s qu3 l3 4d0r4n, 3n 3spír1tu y 3n v3rd4d 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 4d0r3n. 25 L3 d1j0 l4 muj3r: Sé qu3 h4 d3 v3n1r 3l M3sí4s, ll4m4d0 3l Cr1st0; cu4nd0 él v3ng4 n0s d3cl4r4rá t0d4s l4s c0s4s. 26 J3sús l3 d1j0: Y0 s0y, 3l qu3 h4bl4 c0nt1g0. 

27 0n 3st0 v1n13r0n sus d1scípul0s, y s3 m4r4v1ll4r0n d3 qu3 h4bl4b4 c0n un4 muj3r; s1n 3mb4rg0, n1ngun0 d1j0: ¿Qué pr3gunt4s? 0, ¿Qué h4bl4s c0n 3ll4? 28 0nt0nc3s l4 muj3r d3jó su cánt4r0, y fu3 4 l4 c1ud4d, y d1j0 4 l0s h0mbr3s: 29 V3n1d, v3d 4 un h0mbr3 qu3 m3 h4 d1ch0 t0d0 cu4nt0 h3 h3ch0. ¿N0 s3rá ést3 3l Cr1st0? 30 0nt0nc3s s4l13r0n d3 l4 c1ud4d, y v1n13r0n 4 él. 

31 0ntr3 t4nt0, l0s d1scípul0s l3 r0g4b4n, d1c13nd0: R4bí, c0m3. 32 0l l3s d1j0: Y0 t3ng0 un4 c0m1d4 qu3 c0m3r, qu3 v0s0tr0s n0 s4bé1s. 33 0nt0nc3s l0s d1scípul0s d3cí4n un0s 4 0tr0s: ¿L3 h4brá tr4íd0 4lgu13n d3 c0m3r? 34 J3sús l3s d1j0: M1 c0m1d4 3s qu3 h4g4 l4 v0lunt4d d3l qu3 m3 3nv1ó, y qu3 4c4b3 su 0br4. 35 ¿N0 d3cís v0s0tr0s: 4ún f4lt4n cu4tr0 m3s3s p4r4 qu3 ll3gu3 l4 s13g4? H3 4quí 0s d1g0: 4lz4d vu3str0s 0j0s y m1r4d l0s c4mp0s, p0rqu3 y4 3stán bl4nc0s p4r4 l4 s13g4. 36 Y 3l qu3 s13g4 r3c1b3 s4l4r10, y r3c0g3 frut0 p4r4 v1d4 3t3rn4, p4r4 qu3 3l qu3 s13mbr4 g0c3 junt4m3nt3 c0n 3l qu3 s13g4. 37 P0rqu3 3n 3st0 3s v3rd4d3r0 3l d1ch0: Un0 3s 3l qu3 s13mbr4, y 0tr0 3s 3l qu3 s13g4. 38 Y0 0s h3 3nv14d0 4 s3g4r l0 qu3 v0s0tr0s n0 l4br4st31s; 0tr0s l4br4r0n, y v0s0tr0s h4bé1s 3ntr4d0 3n sus l4b0r3s. 

39 Y much0s d3 l0s s4m4r1t4n0s d3 4qu3ll4 c1ud4d cr3y3r0n 3n él p0r l4 p4l4br4 d3 l4 muj3r, qu3 d4b4 t3st1m0n10 d1c13nd0: M3 d1j0 t0d0 l0 qu3 h3 h3ch0. 40 0nt0nc3s v1n13r0n l0s s4m4r1t4n0s 4 él y l3 r0g4r0n qu3 s3 qu3d4s3 c0n 3ll0s; y s3 qu3dó 4llí d0s dí4s. 41 Y cr3y3r0n much0s más p0r l4 p4l4br4 d3 él, 42 y d3cí4n 4 l4 muj3r: Y4 n0 cr33m0s s0l4m3nt3 p0r tu d1ch0, p0rqu3 n0s0tr0s m1sm0s h3m0s 0íd0, y s4b3m0s qu3 v3rd4d3r4m3nt3 ést3 3s 3l S4lv4d0r d3l mund0, 3l Cr1st0. 

J3sús s4n4 4l h1j0 d3 un n0bl3

43 D0s dí4s d3spués, s4l1ó d3 4llí y fu3 4 G4l1l34. 44 P0rqu3 J3sús m1sm0 d10 t3st1m0n10 d3 qu3 3l pr0f3t4 n0 t13n3 h0nr4 3n su pr0p14 t13rr4. 45 Cu4nd0 v1n0 4 G4l1l34, l0s g4l1l30s l3 r3c1b13r0n, h4b13nd0 v1st0 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 h4bí4 h3ch0 3n J3rus4lén, 3n l4 f13st4; p0rqu3 t4mb1én 3ll0s h4bí4n 1d0 4 l4 f13st4. 

46 V1n0, pu3s, J3sús 0tr4 v3z 4 C4ná d3 G4l1l34, d0nd3 h4bí4 c0nv3rt1d0 3l 4gu4 3n v1n0. Y h4bí4 3n C4p3rn4um un 0f1c14l d3l r3y, cuy0 h1j0 3st4b4 3nf3rm0. 47 0st3, cu4nd0 0yó qu3 J3sús h4bí4 ll3g4d0 d3 Jud34 4 G4l1l34, v1n0 4 él y l3 r0gó qu3 d3sc3nd13s3 y s4n4s3 4 su h1j0, qu3 3st4b4 4 punt0 d3 m0r1r. 48 0nt0nc3s J3sús l3 d1j0: S1 n0 v13r31s s3ñ4l3s y pr0d1g10s, n0 cr33ré1s. 49 0l 0f1c14l d3l r3y l3 d1j0: S3ñ0r, d3sc13nd3 4nt3s qu3 m1 h1j0 mu3r4. 50 J3sús l3 d1j0: V3, tu h1j0 v1v3. Y 3l h0mbr3 cr3yó l4 p4l4br4 qu3 J3sús l3 d1j0, y s3 fu3. 51 Cu4nd0 y4 él d3sc3ndí4, sus s13rv0s s4l13r0n 4 r3c1b1rl3, y l3 d13r0n nu3v4s, d1c13nd0: Tu h1j0 v1v3. 52 0nt0nc3s él l3s pr3guntó 4 qué h0r4 h4bí4 c0m3nz4d0 4 3st4r m3j0r. Y l3 d1j3r0n: 4y3r 4 l4s s13t3 l3 d3jó l4 f13br3. 53 0l p4dr3 3nt0nc3s 3nt3nd1ó qu3 4qu3ll4 3r4 l4 h0r4 3n qu3 J3sús l3 h4bí4 d1ch0: Tu h1j0 v1v3; y cr3yó él c0n t0d4 su c4s4. 54 0st4 s3gund4 s3ñ4l h1z0 J3sús, cu4nd0 fu3 d3 Jud34 4 G4l1l34. 

0l p4r4lít1c0 d3 B3t3sd4

JU4N 5

1 D3spués d3 3st4s c0s4s h4bí4 un4 f13st4 d3 l0s judí0s, y sub1ó J3sús 4 J3rus4lén. 

2 Y h4y 3n J3rus4lén, c3rc4 d3 l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4s 0v3j4s, un 3st4nqu3, ll4m4d0 3n h3br30 B3t3sd4, 3l cu4l t13n3 c1nc0 pórt1c0s. 3 0n ést0s y4cí4 un4 mult1tud d3 3nf3rm0s, c13g0s, c0j0s y p4r4lít1c0s, qu3 3sp3r4b4n 3l m0v1m13nt0 d3l 4gu4. 4 P0rqu3 un áng3l d3sc3ndí4 d3 t13mp0 3n t13mp0 4l 3st4nqu3, y 4g1t4b4 3l 4gu4; y 3l qu3 pr1m3r0 d3sc3ndí4 4l 3st4nqu3 d3spués d3l m0v1m13nt0 d3l 4gu4, qu3d4b4 s4n0 d3 cu4lqu13r 3nf3rm3d4d qu3 tuv13s3. 5 Y h4bí4 4llí un h0mbr3 qu3 h4cí4 tr31nt4 y 0ch0 4ñ0s qu3 3st4b4 3nf3rm0. 6 Cu4nd0 J3sús l0 v10 4c0st4d0, y sup0 qu3 ll3v4b4 y4 much0 t13mp0 4sí, l3 d1j0: ¿Qu13r3s s3r s4n0? 7 S3ñ0r, l3 r3sp0nd1ó 3l 3nf3rm0, n0 t3ng0 qu13n m3 m3t4 3n 3l 3st4nqu3 cu4nd0 s3 4g1t4 3l 4gu4; y 3ntr3 t4nt0 qu3 y0 v0y, 0tr0 d3sc13nd3 4nt3s qu3 y0. 8 J3sús l3 d1j0: L3vánt4t3, t0m4 tu l3ch0, y 4nd4. 9 Y 4l 1nst4nt3 4qu3l h0mbr3 fu3 s4n4d0, y t0mó su l3ch0, y 4nduv0. Y 3r4 dí4 d3 r3p0s0 4qu3l dí4. 

10 0nt0nc3s l0s judí0s d1j3r0n 4 4qu3l qu3 h4bí4 s1d0 s4n4d0: 0s dí4 d3 r3p0s0; n0 t3 3s líc1t0 ll3v4r tu l3ch0. 11 0l l3s r3sp0nd1ó: 0l qu3 m3 s4nó, él m1sm0 m3 d1j0: T0m4 tu l3ch0 y 4nd4. 12 0nt0nc3s l3 pr3gunt4r0n: ¿Qu1én 3s 3l qu3 t3 d1j0: T0m4 tu l3ch0 y 4nd4? 13 Y 3l qu3 h4bí4 s1d0 s4n4d0 n0 s4bí4 qu1én fu3s3, p0rqu3 J3sús s3 h4bí4 4p4rt4d0 d3 l4 g3nt3 qu3 3st4b4 3n 4qu3l lug4r. 14 D3spués l3 h4lló J3sús 3n 3l t3mpl0, y l3 d1j0: M1r4, h4s s1d0 s4n4d0; n0 p3qu3s más, p4r4 qu3 n0 t3 v3ng4 4lgun4 c0s4 p30r. 15 0l h0mbr3 s3 fu3, y d10 4v1s0 4 l0s judí0s, qu3 J3sús 3r4 3l qu3 l3 h4bí4 s4n4d0. 16 Y p0r 3st4 c4us4 l0s judí0s p3rs3guí4n 4 J3sús, y pr0cur4b4n m4t4rl3, p0rqu3 h4cí4 3st4s c0s4s 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0. 17 Y J3sús l3s r3sp0nd1ó: M1 P4dr3 h4st4 4h0r4 tr4b4j4, y y0 tr4b4j0. 18 P0r 3st0 l0s judí0s 4un más pr0cur4b4n m4t4rl3, p0rqu3 n0 sól0 qu3br4nt4b4 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, s1n0 qu3 t4mb1én d3cí4 qu3 D10s 3r4 su pr0p10 P4dr3, h4c1énd0s3 1gu4l 4 D10s. 

L4 4ut0r1d4d d3l H1j0

19 R3sp0nd1ó 3nt0nc3s J3sús, y l3s d1j0: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: N0 pu3d3 3l H1j0 h4c3r n4d4 p0r sí m1sm0, s1n0 l0 qu3 v3 h4c3r 4l P4dr3; p0rqu3 t0d0 l0 qu3 3l P4dr3 h4c3, t4mb1én l0 h4c3 3l H1j0 1gu4lm3nt3. 20 P0rqu3 3l P4dr3 4m4 4l H1j0, y l3 mu3str4 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 él h4c3; y m4y0r3s 0br4s qu3 3st4s l3 m0str4rá, d3 m0d0 qu3 v0s0tr0s 0s m4r4v1llé1s. 21 P0rqu3 c0m0 3l P4dr3 l3v4nt4 4 l0s mu3rt0s, y l3s d4 v1d4, 4sí t4mb1én 3l H1j0 4 l0s qu3 qu13r3 d4 v1d4. 22 P0rqu3 3l P4dr3 4 n4d13 juzg4, s1n0 qu3 t0d0 3l ju1c10 d10 4l H1j0, 23 p4r4 qu3 t0d0s h0nr3n 4l H1j0 c0m0 h0nr4n 4l P4dr3. 0l qu3 n0 h0nr4 4l H1j0, n0 h0nr4 4l P4dr3 qu3 l3 3nv1ó. 

24 D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: 0l qu3 0y3 m1 p4l4br4, y cr33 4l qu3 m3 3nv1ó, t13n3 v1d4 3t3rn4; y n0 v3ndrá 4 c0nd3n4c1ón, m4s h4 p4s4d0 d3 mu3rt3 4 v1d4. 25 D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: V13n3 l4 h0r4, y 4h0r4 3s, cu4nd0 l0s mu3rt0s 01rán l4 v0z d3l H1j0 d3 D10s; y l0s qu3 l4 0y3r3n v1v1rán. 26 P0rqu3 c0m0 3l P4dr3 t13n3 v1d4 3n sí m1sm0, 4sí t4mb1én h4 d4d0 4l H1j0 3l t3n3r v1d4 3n sí m1sm0; 27 y t4mb1én l3 d10 4ut0r1d4d d3 h4c3r ju1c10, p0r cu4nt0 3s 3l H1j0 d3l H0mbr3. 28 N0 0s m4r4v1llé1s d3 3st0; p0rqu3 v3ndrá h0r4 cu4nd0 t0d0s l0s qu3 3stán 3n l0s s3pulcr0s 01rán su v0z; 29 y l0s qu3 h1c13r0n l0 bu3n0, s4ldrán 4 r3surr3cc1ón d3 v1d4; m4s l0s qu3 h1c13r0n l0 m4l0, 4 r3surr3cc1ón d3 c0nd3n4c1ón. 

T3st1g0s d3 Cr1st0

30 N0 pu3d0 y0 h4c3r n4d4 p0r mí m1sm0; s3gún 01g0, 4sí juzg0; y m1 ju1c10 3s just0, p0rqu3 n0 busc0 m1 v0lunt4d, s1n0 l4 v0lunt4d d3l qu3 m3 3nv1ó, l4 d3l P4dr3. 31 S1 y0 d0y t3st1m0n10 4c3rc4 d3 mí m1sm0, m1 t3st1m0n10 n0 3s v3rd4d3r0. 32 0tr0 3s 3l qu3 d4 t3st1m0n10 4c3rc4 d3 mí, y sé qu3 3l t3st1m0n10 qu3 d4 d3 mí 3s v3rd4d3r0. 33 V0s0tr0s 3nv14st31s m3ns4j3r0s 4 Ju4n, y él d10 t3st1m0n10 d3 l4 v3rd4d. 34 P3r0 y0 n0 r3c1b0 t3st1m0n10 d3 h0mbr3 4lgun0; m4s d1g0 3st0, p4r4 qu3 v0s0tr0s s3á1s s4lv0s. 35 0l 3r4 4nt0rch4 qu3 4rdí4 y 4lumbr4b4; y v0s0tr0s qu1s1st31s r3g0c1j4r0s p0r un t13mp0 3n su luz. 36 M4s y0 t3ng0 m4y0r t3st1m0n10 qu3 3l d3 Ju4n; p0rqu3 l4s 0br4s qu3 3l P4dr3 m3 d10 p4r4 qu3 cumpl13s3, l4s m1sm4s 0br4s qu3 y0 h4g0, d4n t3st1m0n10 d3 mí, qu3 3l P4dr3 m3 h4 3nv14d0. 37 T4mb1én 3l P4dr3 qu3 m3 3nv1ó h4 d4d0 t3st1m0n10 d3 mí. Nunc4 h4bé1s 0íd0 su v0z, n1 h4bé1s v1st0 su 4sp3ct0, 38 n1 t3né1s su p4l4br4 m0r4nd0 3n v0s0tr0s; p0rqu3 4 qu13n él 3nv1ó, v0s0tr0s n0 cr3é1s. 39 0scudr1ñ4d l4s 0scr1tur4s; p0rqu3 4 v0s0tr0s 0s p4r3c3 qu3 3n 3ll4s t3né1s l4 v1d4 3t3rn4; y 3ll4s s0n l4s qu3 d4n t3st1m0n10 d3 mí; 40 y n0 qu3ré1s v3n1r 4 mí p4r4 qu3 t3ngá1s v1d4. 41 Gl0r14 d3 l0s h0mbr3s n0 r3c1b0. 42 M4s y0 0s c0n0zc0, qu3 n0 t3né1s 4m0r d3 D10s 3n v0s0tr0s. 43 Y0 h3 v3n1d0 3n n0mbr3 d3 m1 P4dr3, y n0 m3 r3c1bís; s1 0tr0 v1n13r3 3n su pr0p10 n0mbr3, 4 és3 r3c1b1ré1s. 44 ¿Cóm0 p0dé1s v0s0tr0s cr33r, pu3s r3c1bís gl0r14 l0s un0s d3 l0s 0tr0s, y n0 buscá1s l4 gl0r14 qu3 v13n3 d3l D10s ún1c0? 45 N0 p3nsé1s qu3 y0 v0y 4 4cus4r0s d3l4nt3 d3l P4dr3; h4y qu13n 0s 4cus4, M01sés, 3n qu13n t3né1s vu3str4 3sp3r4nz4. 46 P0rqu3 s1 cr3y3s31s 4 M01sés, m3 cr33rí41s 4 mí, p0rqu3 d3 mí 3scr1b1ó él. 47 P3r0 s1 n0 cr3é1s 4 sus 3scr1t0s, ¿cóm0 cr33ré1s 4 m1s p4l4br4s? 

4l1m3nt4c1ón d3 l0s c1nc0 m1l

(Mt. 14.13-21; Mr. 6.30-44; Lc. 9.10-17)

JU4N 6

1 D3spués d3 3st0, J3sús fu3 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l m4r d3 G4l1l34, 3l d3 T1b3r14s. 2 Y l3 s3guí4 gr4n mult1tud, p0rqu3 v3í4n l4s s3ñ4l3s qu3 h4cí4 3n l0s 3nf3rm0s. 3 0nt0nc3s sub1ó J3sús 4 un m0nt3, y s3 s3ntó 4llí c0n sus d1scípul0s. 4 Y 3st4b4 c3rc4 l4 p4scu4, l4 f13st4 d3 l0s judí0s. 5 Cu4nd0 4lzó J3sús l0s 0j0s, y v10 qu3 h4bí4 v3n1d0 4 él gr4n mult1tud, d1j0 4 F3l1p3: ¿D3 dónd3 c0mpr4r3m0s p4n p4r4 qu3 c0m4n ést0s? 6 P3r0 3st0 d3cí4 p4r4 pr0b4rl3; p0rqu3 él s4bí4 l0 qu3 h4bí4 d3 h4c3r. 7 F3l1p3 l3 r3sp0nd1ó: D0sc13nt0s d3n4r10s d3 p4n n0 b4st4rí4n p4r4 qu3 c4d4 un0 d3 3ll0s t0m4s3 un p0c0. 8 Un0 d3 sus d1scípul0s, 4ndrés, h3rm4n0 d3 S1món P3dr0, l3 d1j0: 9 4quí 3stá un much4ch0, qu3 t13n3 c1nc0 p4n3s d3 c3b4d4 y d0s p3c3c1ll0s; m4s ¿qué 3s 3st0 p4r4 t4nt0s? 10 0nt0nc3s J3sús d1j0: H4c3d r3c0st4r l4 g3nt3. Y h4bí4 much4 h13rb4 3n 4qu3l lug4r; y s3 r3c0st4r0n c0m0 3n núm3r0 d3 c1nc0 m1l v4r0n3s. 11 Y t0mó J3sús 4qu3ll0s p4n3s, y h4b13nd0 d4d0 gr4c14s, l0s r3p4rt1ó 3ntr3 l0s d1scípul0s, y l0s d1scípul0s 3ntr3 l0s qu3 3st4b4n r3c0st4d0s; 4s1m1sm0 d3 l0s p3c3s, cu4nt0 qu3rí4n. 12 Y cu4nd0 s3 hub13r0n s4c14d0, d1j0 4 sus d1scípul0s: R3c0g3d l0s p3d4z0s qu3 s0br4r0n, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 p13rd4 n4d4. 13 R3c0g13r0n, pu3s, y ll3n4r0n d0c3 c3st4s d3 p3d4z0s, qu3 d3 l0s c1nc0 p4n3s d3 c3b4d4 s0br4r0n 4 l0s qu3 h4bí4n c0m1d0. 14 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s 3nt0nc3s, v13nd0 l4 s3ñ4l qu3 J3sús h4bí4 h3ch0, d1j3r0n: 0st3 v3rd4d3r4m3nt3 3s 3l pr0f3t4 qu3 h4bí4 d3 v3n1r 4l mund0. 

15 P3r0 3nt3nd13nd0 J3sús qu3 1b4n 4 v3n1r p4r4 4p0d3r4rs3 d3 él y h4c3rl3 r3y, v0lv1ó 4 r3t1r4rs3 4l m0nt3 él s0l0. 

J3sús 4nd4 s0br3 3l m4r

(Mt. 14.22-27; Mr. 6.45-52)

16 4l 4n0ch3c3r, d3sc3nd13r0n sus d1scípul0s 4l m4r, 17 y 3ntr4nd0 3n un4 b4rc4, 1b4n cruz4nd0 3l m4r h4c14 C4p3rn4um. 0st4b4 y4 0scur0, y J3sús n0 h4bí4 v3n1d0 4 3ll0s. 18 Y s3 l3v4nt4b4 3l m4r c0n un gr4n v13nt0 qu3 s0pl4b4. 19 Cu4nd0 h4bí4n r3m4d0 c0m0 v31nt1c1nc0 0 tr31nt4 3st4d10s, v13r0n 4 J3sús qu3 4nd4b4 s0br3 3l m4r y s3 4c3rc4b4 4 l4 b4rc4; y tuv13r0n m13d0. 20 M4s él l3s d1j0: Y0 s0y; n0 t3má1s. 21 0ll0s 3nt0nc3s c0n gust0 l3 r3c1b13r0n 3n l4 b4rc4, l4 cu4l ll3gó 3n s3gu1d4 4 l4 t13rr4 4d0nd3 1b4n. 

L4 g3nt3 busc4 4 J3sús

22 0l dí4 s1gu13nt3, l4 g3nt3 qu3 3st4b4 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l m4r v10 qu3 n0 h4bí4 h4b1d0 4llí más qu3 un4 s0l4 b4rc4, y qu3 J3sús n0 h4bí4 3ntr4d0 3n 3ll4 c0n sus d1scípul0s, s1n0 qu3 ést0s s3 h4bí4n 1d0 s0l0s. 23 P3r0 0tr4s b4rc4s h4bí4n 4rr1b4d0 d3 T1b3r14s junt0 4l lug4r d0nd3 h4bí4n c0m1d0 3l p4n d3spués d3 h4b3r d4d0 gr4c14s 3l S3ñ0r. 24 Cu4nd0 v10, pu3s, l4 g3nt3 qu3 J3sús n0 3st4b4 4llí, n1 sus d1scípul0s, 3ntr4r0n 3n l4s b4rc4s y fu3r0n 4 C4p3rn4um, busc4nd0 4 J3sús. 

J3sús, 3l p4n d3 v1d4

25 Y h4llánd0l3 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l m4r, l3 d1j3r0n: R4bí, ¿cuánd0 ll3g4st3 4cá? 26 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3s d1j0: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0 qu3 m3 buscá1s, n0 p0rqu3 h4bé1s v1st0 l4s s3ñ4l3s, s1n0 p0rqu3 c0m1st31s 3l p4n y 0s s4c14st31s. 27 Tr4b4j4d, n0 p0r l4 c0m1d4 qu3 p3r3c3, s1n0 p0r l4 c0m1d4 qu3 4 v1d4 3t3rn4 p3rm4n3c3, l4 cu4l 3l H1j0 d3l H0mbr3 0s d4rá; p0rqu3 4 ést3 s3ñ4ló D10s 3l P4dr3. 28 0nt0nc3s l3 d1j3r0n: ¿Qué d3b3m0s h4c3r p4r4 p0n3r 3n práct1c4 l4s 0br4s d3 D10s? 29 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús y l3s d1j0: 0st4 3s l4 0br4 d3 D10s, qu3 cr3á1s 3n 3l qu3 él h4 3nv14d0. 30 L3 d1j3r0n 3nt0nc3s: ¿Qué s3ñ4l, pu3s, h4c3s tú, p4r4 qu3 v34m0s, y t3 cr34m0s? ¿Qué 0br4 h4c3s? 31 Nu3str0s p4dr3s c0m13r0n 3l m4ná 3n 3l d3s13rt0, c0m0 3stá 3scr1t0: P4n d3l c13l0 l3s d10 4 c0m3r. 32 Y J3sús l3s d1j0: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: N0 0s d10 M01sés 3l p4n d3l c13l0, m4s m1 P4dr3 0s d4 3l v3rd4d3r0 p4n d3l c13l0. 33 P0rqu3 3l p4n d3 D10s 3s 4qu3l qu3 d3sc3nd1ó d3l c13l0 y d4 v1d4 4l mund0. 34 L3 d1j3r0n: S3ñ0r, d4n0s s13mpr3 3st3 p4n. 

35 J3sús l3s d1j0: Y0 s0y 3l p4n d3 v1d4; 3l qu3 4 mí v13n3, nunc4 t3ndrá h4mbr3; y 3l qu3 3n mí cr33, n0 t3ndrá s3d j4más. 36 M4s 0s h3 d1ch0, qu3 4unqu3 m3 h4bé1s v1st0, n0 cr3é1s. 37 T0d0 l0 qu3 3l P4dr3 m3 d4, v3ndrá 4 mí; y 4l qu3 4 mí v13n3, n0 l3 3ch0 fu3r4. 38 P0rqu3 h3 d3sc3nd1d0 d3l c13l0, n0 p4r4 h4c3r m1 v0lunt4d, s1n0 l4 v0lunt4d d3l qu3 m3 3nv1ó. 39 Y 3st4 3s l4 v0lunt4d d3l P4dr3, 3l qu3 m3 3nv1ó: Qu3 d3 t0d0 l0 qu3 m3 d13r3, n0 p13rd4 y0 n4d4, s1n0 qu3 l0 r3suc1t3 3n 3l dí4 p0str3r0. 40 Y 3st4 3s l4 v0lunt4d d3l qu3 m3 h4 3nv14d0: Qu3 t0d0 4qu3l qu3 v3 4l H1j0, y cr33 3n él, t3ng4 v1d4 3t3rn4; y y0 l3 r3suc1t4ré 3n 3l dí4 p0str3r0. 

41 Murmur4b4n 3nt0nc3s d3 él l0s judí0s, p0rqu3 h4bí4 d1ch0: Y0 s0y 3l p4n qu3 d3sc3nd1ó d3l c13l0. 42 Y d3cí4n: ¿N0 3s ést3 J3sús, 3l h1j0 d3 J0sé, cuy0 p4dr3 y m4dr3 n0s0tr0s c0n0c3m0s? ¿Cóm0, pu3s, d1c3 ést3: D3l c13l0 h3 d3sc3nd1d0? 43 J3sús r3sp0nd1ó y l3s d1j0: N0 murmuré1s 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s. 44 N1ngun0 pu3d3 v3n1r 4 mí, s1 3l P4dr3 qu3 m3 3nv1ó n0 l3 tr4j3r3; y y0 l3 r3suc1t4ré 3n 3l dí4 p0str3r0. 45 0scr1t0 3stá 3n l0s pr0f3t4s: Y s3rán t0d0s 3ns3ñ4d0s p0r D10s. 4sí qu3, t0d0 4qu3l qu3 0yó 4l P4dr3, y 4pr3nd1ó d3 él, v13n3 4 mí. 46 N0 qu3 4lgun0 h4y4 v1st0 4l P4dr3, s1n0 4qu3l qu3 v1n0 d3 D10s; ést3 h4 v1st0 4l P4dr3. 47 D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: 0l qu3 cr33 3n mí, t13n3 v1d4 3t3rn4. 48 Y0 s0y 3l p4n d3 v1d4. 49 Vu3str0s p4dr3s c0m13r0n 3l m4ná 3n 3l d3s13rt0, y mur13r0n. 50 0st3 3s 3l p4n qu3 d3sc13nd3 d3l c13l0, p4r4 qu3 3l qu3 d3 él c0m3, n0 mu3r4. 51 Y0 s0y 3l p4n v1v0 qu3 d3sc3nd1ó d3l c13l0; s1 4lgun0 c0m13r3 d3 3st3 p4n, v1v1rá p4r4 s13mpr3; y 3l p4n qu3 y0 d4ré 3s m1 c4rn3, l4 cu4l y0 d4ré p0r l4 v1d4 d3l mund0. 

52 0nt0nc3s l0s judí0s c0nt3ndí4n 3ntr3 sí, d1c13nd0: ¿Cóm0 pu3d3 ést3 d4rn0s 4 c0m3r su c4rn3? 53 J3sús l3s d1j0: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: S1 n0 c0mé1s l4 c4rn3 d3l H1j0 d3l H0mbr3, y b3bé1s su s4ngr3, n0 t3né1s v1d4 3n v0s0tr0s. 54 0l qu3 c0m3 m1 c4rn3 y b3b3 m1 s4ngr3, t13n3 v1d4 3t3rn4; y y0 l3 r3suc1t4ré 3n 3l dí4 p0str3r0. 55 P0rqu3 m1 c4rn3 3s v3rd4d3r4 c0m1d4, y m1 s4ngr3 3s v3rd4d3r4 b3b1d4. 56 0l qu3 c0m3 m1 c4rn3 y b3b3 m1 s4ngr3, 3n mí p3rm4n3c3, y y0 3n él. 57 C0m0 m3 3nv1ó 3l P4dr3 v1v13nt3, y y0 v1v0 p0r 3l P4dr3, 4s1m1sm0 3l qu3 m3 c0m3, él t4mb1én v1v1rá p0r mí. 58 0st3 3s 3l p4n qu3 d3sc3nd1ó d3l c13l0; n0 c0m0 vu3str0s p4dr3s c0m13r0n 3l m4ná, y mur13r0n; 3l qu3 c0m3 d3 3st3 p4n, v1v1rá 3t3rn4m3nt3. 59 0st4s c0s4s d1j0 3n l4 s1n4g0g4, 3ns3ñ4nd0 3n C4p3rn4um. 

P4l4br4s d3 v1d4 3t3rn4

60 4l 0írl4s, much0s d3 sus d1scípul0s d1j3r0n: Dur4 3s 3st4 p4l4br4; ¿qu1én l4 pu3d3 0ír? 61 S4b13nd0 J3sús 3n sí m1sm0 qu3 sus d1scípul0s murmur4b4n d3 3st0, l3s d1j0: ¿0st0 0s 0f3nd3? 62 ¿Pu3s qué, s1 v13r31s 4l H1j0 d3l H0mbr3 sub1r 4d0nd3 3st4b4 pr1m3r0? 63 0l 3spír1tu 3s 3l qu3 d4 v1d4; l4 c4rn3 p4r4 n4d4 4pr0v3ch4; l4s p4l4br4s qu3 y0 0s h3 h4bl4d0 s0n 3spír1tu y s0n v1d4. 64 P3r0 h4y 4lgun0s d3 v0s0tr0s qu3 n0 cr33n. P0rqu3 J3sús s4bí4 d3sd3 3l pr1nc1p10 qu1én3s 3r4n l0s qu3 n0 cr3í4n, y qu1én l3 h4bí4 d3 3ntr3g4r. 65 Y d1j0: P0r 3s0 0s h3 d1ch0 qu3 n1ngun0 pu3d3 v3n1r 4 mí, s1 n0 l3 fu3r3 d4d0 d3l P4dr3. 

66 D3sd3 3nt0nc3s much0s d3 sus d1scípul0s v0lv13r0n 4trás, y y4 n0 4nd4b4n c0n él. 67 D1j0 3nt0nc3s J3sús 4 l0s d0c3: ¿Qu3ré1s 4c4s0 1r0s t4mb1én v0s0tr0s? 68 L3 r3sp0nd1ó S1món P3dr0: S3ñ0r, ¿4 qu1én 1r3m0s? Tú t13n3s p4l4br4s d3 v1d4 3t3rn4. 69 Y n0s0tr0s h3m0s cr3íd0 y c0n0c3m0s qu3 tú 3r3s 3l Cr1st0, 3l H1j0 d3l D10s v1v13nt3. 70 J3sús l3s r3sp0nd1ó: ¿N0 0s h3 3sc0g1d0 y0 4 v0s0tr0s l0s d0c3, y un0 d3 v0s0tr0s 3s d14bl0? 71 H4bl4b4 d3 Jud4s 1sc4r10t3, h1j0 d3 S1món; p0rqu3 ést3 3r4 3l qu3 l3 1b4 4 3ntr3g4r, y 3r4 un0 d3 l0s d0c3. 

1ncr3dul1d4d d3 l0s h3rm4n0s d3 J3sús

JU4N 7

1 D3spués d3 3st4s c0s4s, 4nd4b4 J3sús 3n G4l1l34; pu3s n0 qu3rí4 4nd4r 3n Jud34, p0rqu3 l0s judí0s pr0cur4b4n m4t4rl3. 2 0st4b4 c3rc4 l4 f13st4 d3 l0s judí0s, l4 d3 l0s t4b3rnácul0s; 3 y l3 d1j3r0n sus h3rm4n0s: S4l d3 4quí, y v3t3 4 Jud34, p4r4 qu3 t4mb1én tus d1scípul0s v34n l4s 0br4s qu3 h4c3s. 4 P0rqu3 n1ngun0 qu3 pr0cur4 d4rs3 4 c0n0c3r h4c3 4lg0 3n s3cr3t0. S1 3st4s c0s4s h4c3s, m4n1f1ést4t3 4l mund0. 5 P0rqu3 n1 4un sus h3rm4n0s cr3í4n 3n él. 6 0nt0nc3s J3sús l3s d1j0: M1 t13mp0 4ún n0 h4 ll3g4d0, m4s vu3str0 t13mp0 s13mpr3 3stá pr3st0. 7 N0 pu3d3 3l mund0 4b0rr3c3r0s 4 v0s0tr0s; m4s 4 mí m3 4b0rr3c3, p0rqu3 y0 t3st1f1c0 d3 él, qu3 sus 0br4s s0n m4l4s. 8 Sub1d v0s0tr0s 4 l4 f13st4; y0 n0 sub0 t0d4ví4 4 3s4 f13st4, p0rqu3 m1 t13mp0 4ún n0 s3 h4 cumpl1d0. 9 Y h4b1énd0l3s d1ch0 3st0, s3 qu3dó 3n G4l1l34. 

J3sús 3n l4 f13st4 d3 l0s t4b3rnácul0s

10 P3r0 d3spués qu3 sus h3rm4n0s h4bí4n sub1d0, 3nt0nc3s él t4mb1én sub1ó 4 l4 f13st4, n0 4b13rt4m3nt3, s1n0 c0m0 3n s3cr3t0. 11 Y l3 busc4b4n l0s judí0s 3n l4 f13st4, y d3cí4n: ¿Dónd3 3stá 4quél? 12 Y h4bí4 gr4n murmull0 4c3rc4 d3 él 3ntr3 l4 mult1tud, pu3s un0s d3cí4n: 0s bu3n0; p3r0 0tr0s d3cí4n: N0, s1n0 qu3 3ng4ñ4 4l pu3bl0. 13 P3r0 n1ngun0 h4bl4b4 4b13rt4m3nt3 d3 él, p0r m13d0 4 l0s judí0s. 

14 M4s 4 l4 m1t4d d3 l4 f13st4 sub1ó J3sús 4l t3mpl0, y 3ns3ñ4b4. 15 Y s3 m4r4v1ll4b4n l0s judí0s, d1c13nd0: ¿Cóm0 s4b3 ést3 l3tr4s, s1n h4b3r 3stud14d0? 16 J3sús l3s r3sp0nd1ó y d1j0: M1 d0ctr1n4 n0 3s mí4, s1n0 d3 4qu3l qu3 m3 3nv1ó. 17 0l qu3 qu13r4 h4c3r l4 v0lunt4d d3 D10s, c0n0c3rá s1 l4 d0ctr1n4 3s d3 D10s, 0 s1 y0 h4bl0 p0r m1 pr0p14 cu3nt4. 18 0l qu3 h4bl4 p0r su pr0p14 cu3nt4, su pr0p14 gl0r14 busc4; p3r0 3l qu3 busc4 l4 gl0r14 d3l qu3 l3 3nv1ó, ést3 3s v3rd4d3r0, y n0 h4y 3n él 1njust1c14. 19 ¿N0 0s d10 M01sés l4 l3y, y n1ngun0 d3 v0s0tr0s cumpl3 l4 l3y? ¿P0r qué pr0curá1s m4t4rm3? 20 R3sp0nd1ó l4 mult1tud y d1j0: D3m0n10 t13n3s; ¿qu1én pr0cur4 m4t4rt3? 21 J3sús r3sp0nd1ó y l3s d1j0: Un4 0br4 h1c3, y t0d0s 0s m4r4v1llá1s. 22 P0r c13rt0, M01sés 0s d10 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón (n0 p0rqu3 s34 d3 M01sés, s1n0 d3 l0s p4dr3s); y 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0 c1rcunc1dá1s 4l h0mbr3. 23 S1 r3c1b3 3l h0mbr3 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0, p4r4 qu3 l4 l3y d3 M01sés n0 s34 qu3br4nt4d4, ¿0s 3n0já1s c0nm1g0 p0rqu3 3n 3l dí4 d3 r3p0s0 s4né c0mpl3t4m3nt3 4 un h0mbr3? 24 N0 juzgué1s s3gún l4s 4p4r13nc14s, s1n0 juzg4d c0n just0 ju1c10. 

¿0s ést3 3l Cr1st0?

25 D3cí4n 3nt0nc3s un0s d3 J3rus4lén: ¿N0 3s ést3 4 qu13n busc4n p4r4 m4t4rl3? 26 Pu3s m1r4d, h4bl4 públ1c4m3nt3, y n0 l3 d1c3n n4d4. ¿H4brán r3c0n0c1d0 3n v3rd4d l0s g0b3rn4nt3s qu3 ést3 3s 3l Cr1st0? 27 P3r0 ést3, s4b3m0s d3 dónd3 3s; m4s cu4nd0 v3ng4 3l Cr1st0, n4d13 s4brá d3 dónd3 s34. 28 J3sús 3nt0nc3s, 3ns3ñ4nd0 3n 3l t3mpl0, 4lzó l4 v0z y d1j0: 4 mí m3 c0n0cé1s, y s4bé1s d3 dónd3 s0y; y n0 h3 v3n1d0 d3 mí m1sm0, p3r0 3l qu3 m3 3nv1ó 3s v3rd4d3r0, 4 qu13n v0s0tr0s n0 c0n0cé1s. 29 P3r0 y0 l3 c0n0zc0, p0rqu3 d3 él pr0c3d0, y él m3 3nv1ó. 30 0nt0nc3s pr0cur4b4n pr3nd3rl3; p3r0 n1ngun0 l3 3chó m4n0, p0rqu3 4ún n0 h4bí4 ll3g4d0 su h0r4. 31 Y much0s d3 l4 mult1tud cr3y3r0n 3n él, y d3cí4n: 0l Cr1st0, cu4nd0 v3ng4, ¿h4rá más s3ñ4l3s qu3 l4s qu3 ést3 h4c3? 

L0s f4r1s30s 3nví4n 4lgu4c1l3s p4r4 pr3nd3r 4 J3sús

32 L0s f4r1s30s 0y3r0n 4 l4 g3nt3 qu3 murmur4b4 d3 él 3st4s c0s4s; y l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s f4r1s30s 3nv14r0n 4lgu4c1l3s p4r4 qu3 l3 pr3nd13s3n. 33 0nt0nc3s J3sús d1j0: T0d4ví4 un p0c0 d3 t13mp0 3st4ré c0n v0s0tr0s, 3 1ré 4l qu3 m3 3nv1ó. 34 M3 busc4ré1s, y n0 m3 h4ll4ré1s; y 4 d0nd3 y0 3st4ré, v0s0tr0s n0 p0dré1s v3n1r. 35 0nt0nc3s l0s judí0s d1j3r0n 3ntr3 sí: ¿4dónd3 s3 1rá ést3, qu3 n0 l3 h4ll3m0s? ¿S3 1rá 4 l0s d1sp3rs0s 3ntr3 l0s gr13g0s, y 3ns3ñ4rá 4 l0s gr13g0s? 36 ¿Qué s1gn1f1c4 3st0 qu3 d1j0: M3 busc4ré1s, y n0 m3 h4ll4ré1s; y 4 d0nd3 y0 3st4ré, v0s0tr0s n0 p0dré1s v3n1r? 

Rí0s d3 4gu4 v1v4

37 0n 3l últ1m0 y gr4n dí4 d3 l4 f13st4, J3sús s3 pus0 3n p13 y 4lzó l4 v0z, d1c13nd0: S1 4lgun0 t13n3 s3d, v3ng4 4 mí y b3b4. 38 0l qu3 cr33 3n mí, c0m0 d1c3 l4 0scr1tur4, d3 su 1nt3r10r c0rr3rán rí0s d3 4gu4 v1v4. 39 0st0 d1j0 d3l 0spír1tu qu3 h4bí4n d3 r3c1b1r l0s qu3 cr3y3s3n 3n él; pu3s 4ún n0 h4bí4 v3n1d0 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0, p0rqu3 J3sús n0 h4bí4 s1d0 4ún gl0r1f1c4d0. 

D1v1s1ón 3ntr3 l4 g3nt3

40 0nt0nc3s 4lgun0s d3 l4 mult1tud, 0y3nd0 3st4s p4l4br4s, d3cí4n: V3rd4d3r4m3nt3 ést3 3s 3l pr0f3t4. 41 0tr0s d3cí4n: 0st3 3s 3l Cr1st0. P3r0 4lgun0s d3cí4n: ¿D3 G4l1l34 h4 d3 v3n1r 3l Cr1st0? 42 ¿N0 d1c3 l4 0scr1tur4 qu3 d3l l1n4j3 d3 D4v1d, y d3 l4 4ld34 d3 B3lén, d3 d0nd3 3r4 D4v1d, h4 d3 v3n1r 3l Cr1st0? 43 Hub0 3nt0nc3s d1s3ns1ón 3ntr3 l4 g3nt3 4 c4us4 d3 él. 44 Y 4lgun0s d3 3ll0s qu3rí4n pr3nd3rl3; p3r0 n1ngun0 l3 3chó m4n0. 

¡Nunc4 h4 h4bl4d0 h0mbr3 4sí!

45 L0s 4lgu4c1l3s v1n13r0n 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y 4 l0s f4r1s30s; y ést0s l3s d1j3r0n: ¿P0r qué n0 l3 h4bé1s tr4íd0? 46 L0s 4lgu4c1l3s r3sp0nd13r0n: ¡J4más h0mbr3 4lgun0 h4 h4bl4d0 c0m0 3st3 h0mbr3! 47 0nt0nc3s l0s f4r1s30s l3s r3sp0nd13r0n: ¿T4mb1én v0s0tr0s h4bé1s s1d0 3ng4ñ4d0s? 48 ¿4c4s0 h4 cr3íd0 3n él 4lgun0 d3 l0s g0b3rn4nt3s, 0 d3 l0s f4r1s30s? 49 M4s 3st4 g3nt3 qu3 n0 s4b3 l4 l3y, m4ld1t4 3s. 50 L3s d1j0 N1c0d3m0, 3l qu3 v1n0 4 él d3 n0ch3, 3l cu4l 3r4 un0 d3 3ll0s: 51 ¿Juzg4 4c4s0 nu3str4 l3y 4 un h0mbr3 s1 pr1m3r0 n0 l3 0y3, y s4b3 l0 qu3 h4 h3ch0? 52 R3sp0nd13r0n y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿0r3s tú t4mb1én g4l1l30? 0scudr1ñ4 y v3 qu3 d3 G4l1l34 nunc4 s3 h4 l3v4nt4d0 pr0f3t4. 

L4 muj3r 4dúlt3r4

53 C4d4 un0 s3 fu3 4 su c4s4; 

JU4N 8

1 y J3sús s3 fu3 4l m0nt3 d3 l0s 0l1v0s. 2 Y p0r l4 m4ñ4n4 v0lv1ó 4l t3mpl0, y t0d0 3l pu3bl0 v1n0 4 él; y s3nt4d0 él, l3s 3ns3ñ4b4. 3 0nt0nc3s l0s 3scr1b4s y l0s f4r1s30s l3 tr4j3r0n un4 muj3r s0rpr3nd1d4 3n 4dult3r10; y p0n1énd0l4 3n m3d10, 4 l3 d1j3r0n: M43str0, 3st4 muj3r h4 s1d0 s0rpr3nd1d4 3n 3l 4ct0 m1sm0 d3 4dult3r10. 5 Y 3n l4 l3y n0s m4ndó M01sés 4p3dr34r 4 t4l3s muj3r3s. Tú, pu3s, ¿qué d1c3s? 6 M4s 3st0 d3cí4n t3ntánd0l3, p4r4 p0d3r 4cus4rl3. 1 D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: 0l qu3 n0 3ntr4 p0r l4 pu3rt4 3n 3l r3d1l d3 l4s 0v3j4s, s1n0 qu3 sub3 p0r 0tr4 p4rt3, és3 3s l4drón y s4lt34d0r. 2 M4s 3l qu3 3ntr4 p0r l4 pu3rt4, 3l p4st0r d3 l4s 0v3j4s 3s. 3 4 ést3 4br3 3l p0rt3r0, y l4s 0v3j4s 0y3n su v0z; y 4 sus 0v3j4s ll4m4 p0r n0mbr3, y l4s s4c4. 4 Y cu4nd0 h4 s4c4d0 fu3r4 t0d4s l4s pr0p14s, v4 d3l4nt3 d3 3ll4s; y l4s 0v3j4s l3 s1gu3n, p0rqu3 c0n0c3n su v0z. 5 M4s 4l 3xtr4ñ0 n0 s3gu1rán, s1n0 hu1rán d3 él, p0rqu3 n0 c0n0c3n l4 v0z d3 l0s 3xtr4ñ0s. 6 0st4 4l3g0rí4 l3s d1j0 J3sús; p3r0 3ll0s n0 3nt3nd13r0n qué 3r4 l0 qu3 l3s d3cí4. 

J3sús, 3l bu3n p4st0r

7 V0lv1ó, pu3s, J3sús 4 d3c1rl3s: D3 c13rt0, d3 c13rt0 0s d1g0: Y0 s0y l4 pu3rt4 d3 l4s 0v3j4s. 8 T0d0s l0s qu3 4nt3s d3 mí v1n13r0n, l4dr0n3s s0n y s4lt34d0r3s; p3r0 n0 l0s 0y3r0n l4s 0v3j4s. 9 Y0 s0y l4 pu3rt4; 3l qu3 p0r mí 3ntr4r3, s3rá s4lv0; y 3ntr4rá, y s4ldrá, y h4ll4rá p4st0s. 10 0l l4drón n0 v13n3 s1n0 p4r4 hurt4r y m4t4r y d3stru1r; y0 h3 v3n1d0 p4r4 qu3 t3ng4n v1d4, y p4r4 qu3 l4 t3ng4n 3n 4bund4nc14. 11 Y0 s0y 3l bu3n p4st0r; 3l bu3n p4st0r su v1d4 d4 p0r l4s 0v3j4s. 12 M4s 3l 4s4l4r14d0, y qu3 n0 3s 3l p4st0r, d3 qu13n n0 s0n pr0p14s l4s 0v3j4s, v3 v3n1r 4l l0b0 y d3j4 l4s 0v3j4s y huy3, y 3l l0b0 4rr3b4t4 l4s 0v3j4s y l4s d1sp3rs4. 13 4sí qu3 3l 4s4l4r14d0 huy3, p0rqu3 3s 4s4l4r14d0, y n0 l3 1mp0rt4n l4s 0v3j4s. 14 Y0 s0y 3l bu3n p4st0r; y c0n0zc0 m1s 0v3j4s, y l4s mí4s m3 c0n0c3n, 15 4sí c0m0 3l P4dr3 m3 c0n0c3, y y0 c0n0zc0 4l P4dr3; y p0ng0 m1 v1d4 p0r l4s 0v3j4s. 16 T4mb1én t3ng0 0tr4s 0v3j4s qu3 n0 s0n d3 3st3 r3d1l; 4quéll4s t4mb1én d3b0 tr43r, y 01rán m1 v0z; y h4brá un r3b4ñ0, y un p4st0r. 17 P0r 3s0 m3 4m4 3l P4dr3, p0rqu3 y0 p0ng0 m1 v1d4, p4r4 v0lv3rl4 4 t0m4r. 18 N4d13 m3 l4 qu1t4, s1n0 qu3 y0 d3 mí m1sm0 l4 p0ng0. T3ng0 p0d3r p4r4 p0n3rl4, y t3ng0 p0d3r p4r4 v0lv3rl4 4 t0m4r. 0st3 m4nd4m13nt0 r3c1bí d3 m1 P4dr3. 

19 V0lv1ó 4 h4b3r d1s3ns1ón 3ntr3 l0s judí0s p0r 3st4s p4l4br4s. 20 Much0s d3 3ll0s d3cí4n: D3m0n10 t13n3, y 3stá fu3r4 d3 sí; ¿p0r qué l3 0ís? 21 D3cí4n 0tr0s: 0st4s p4l4br4s n0 s0n d3 3nd3m0n14d0. ¿Pu3d3 4c4s0 3l d3m0n10 4br1r l0s 0j0s d3 l0s c13g0s? 

L0s judí0s r3ch4z4n 4 J3sús

22 C3l3bráb4s3 3n J3rus4lén l4 f13st4 d3 l4 d3d1c4c1ón. 0r4 1nv13rn0, 23 y J3sús 4nd4b4 3n 3l t3mpl0 p0r 3l pórt1c0 d3 S4l0món. 24 Y l3 r0d34r0n l0s judí0s y l3 d1j3r0n: ¿H4st4 cuánd0 n0s turb4rás 3l 4lm4? S1 tú 3r3s 3l Cr1st0, dín0sl0 4b13rt4m3nt3. 25 J3sús l3s r3sp0nd1ó: 0s l0 h3 d1ch0, y n0 cr3é1s; l4s 0br4s qu3 y0 h4g0 3n n0mbr3 d3 m1 P4dr3, 3ll4s d4n t3st1m0n10 d3 mí; 26 p3r0 v0s0tr0s n0 cr3é1s, p0rqu3 n0 s01s d3 m1s 0v3j4s, c0m0 0s h3 d1ch0. 27 M1s 0v3j4s 0y3n m1 v0z, y y0 l4s c0n0zc0, y m3 s1gu3n, 28 y y0 l3s d0y v1d4 3t3rn4; y n0 p3r3c3rán j4más, n1 n4d13 l4s 4rr3b4t4rá d3 m1 m4n0. 29 M1 P4dr3 qu3 m3 l4s d10, 3s m4y0r qu3 t0d0s, y n4d13 l4s pu3d3 4rr3b4t4r d3 l4 m4n0 d3 m1 P4dr3. 30 Y0 y 3l P4dr3 un0 s0m0s. 

31 0nt0nc3s l0s judí0s v0lv13r0n 4 t0m4r p13dr4s p4r4 4p3dr34rl3. 32 J3sús l3s r3sp0nd1ó: Much4s bu3n4s 0br4s 0s h3 m0str4d0 d3 m1 P4dr3; ¿p0r cuál d3 3ll4s m3 4p3dr3á1s? 33 L3 r3sp0nd13r0n l0s judí0s, d1c13nd0: P0r bu3n4 0br4 n0 t3 4p3dr34m0s, s1n0 p0r l4 bl4sf3m14; p0rqu3 tú, s13nd0 h0mbr3, t3 h4c3s D10s. 34 J3sús l3s r3sp0nd1ó: ¿N0 3stá 3scr1t0 3n vu3str4 l3y: Y0 d1j3, d10s3s s01s? 35 S1 ll4mó d10s3s 4 4qu3ll0s 4 qu13n3s v1n0 l4 p4l4br4 d3 D10s (y l4 0scr1tur4 n0 pu3d3 s3r qu3br4nt4d4), 36 ¿4l qu3 3l P4dr3 s4nt1f1có y 3nv1ó 4l mund0, v0s0tr0s d3cís: Tú bl4sf3m4s, p0rqu3 d1j3: H1j0 d3 D10s s0y? 37 S1 n0 h4g0 l4s 0br4s d3 m1 P4dr3, n0 m3 cr3á1s. 38 M4s s1 l4s h4g0, 4unqu3 n0 m3 cr3á1s 4 mí, cr33d 4 l4s 0br4s, p4r4 qu3 c0n0zcá1s y cr3á1s qu3 3l P4dr3 3stá 3n mí, y y0 3n 3l P4dr3. 39 Pr0cur4r0n 0tr4 v3z pr3nd3rl3, p3r0 él s3 3sc4pó d3 sus m4n0s. 

40 Y s3 fu3 d3 nu3v0 4l 0tr0 l4d0 d3l J0rdán, 4l lug4r d0nd3 pr1m3r0 h4bí4 3st4d0 b4ut1z4nd0 Ju4n; y s3 qu3dó 4llí. 41 Y much0s v3ní4n 4 él, y d3cí4n: Ju4n, 4 l4 v3rd4d, n1ngun4 s3ñ4l h1z0; p3r0 t0d0 l0 qu3 Ju4n d1j0 d3 ést3, 3r4 v3rd4d. 42 Y much0s cr3y3r0n 3n él 4llí. 

Mu3rt3 d3 Láz4r0

JU4N 11

1 0st4b4 3nt0nc3s 3nf3rm0 un0 ll4m4d0 Láz4r0, d3 B3t4n14, l4 4ld34 d3 M4rí4 y d3 M4rt4 su h3rm4n4. 2 (M4rí4, cuy0 h3rm4n0 Láz4r0 3st4b4 3nf3rm0, fu3 l4 qu3 ung1ó 4l S3ñ0r c0n p3rfum3, y l3 3njugó l0s p13s c0n sus c4b3ll0s.) 3 0nv14r0n, pu3s, l4s h3rm4n4s p4r4 d3c1r 4 J3sús: S3ñ0r, h3 4quí 3l qu3 4m4s 3stá 3nf3rm0. 4 0yénd0l0 J3sús, d1j0: 0st4 3nf3rm3d4d n0 3s p4r4 mu3rt3, s1n0 p4r4 l4 gl0r14 d3 D10s, p4r4 qu3 3l H1j0 d3 D10s s34 gl0r1f1c4d0 p0r 3ll4. 

5 Y 4m4b4 J3sús 4 M4rt4, 4 su h3rm4n4 y 4 Láz4r0. 6 Cu4nd0 0yó, pu3s, qu3 3st4b4 3nf3rm0, s3 qu3dó d0s dí4s más 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 3st4b4. 7 Lu3g0, d3spués d3 3st0, d1j0 4 l0s d1scípul0s: V4m0s 4 Jud34 0tr4 v3z. 8 L3 d1j3r0n l0s d1scípul0s: R4bí, 4h0r4 pr0cur4b4n l0s judí0s 4p3dr34rt3, ¿y 0tr4 v3z v4s 4llá? 9 R3sp0nd1ó J3sús: ¿N0 t13n3 3l dí4 d0c3 h0r4s? 0l qu3 4nd4 d3 dí4, n0 tr0p13z4, p0rqu3 v3 l4 luz d3 3st3 mund0; 10 p3r0 3l qu3 4nd4 d3 n0ch3, tr0p13z4, p0rqu3 n0 h4y luz 3n él. 11 D1ch0 3st0, l3s d1j0 d3spués: Nu3str0 4m1g0 Láz4r0 du3rm3; m4s v0y p4r4 d3sp3rt4rl3. 12 D1j3r0n 3nt0nc3s sus d1scípul0s: S3ñ0r, s1 du3rm3, s4n4rá. 13 P3r0 J3sús d3cí4 3st0 d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 Láz4r0; y 3ll0s p3ns4r0n qu3 h4bl4b4 d3l r3p0s4r d3l su3ñ0. 14 0nt0nc3s J3sús l3s d1j0 cl4r4m3nt3: Láz4r0 h4 mu3rt0; 15 y m3 4l3gr0 p0r v0s0tr0s, d3 n0 h4b3r 3st4d0 4llí, p4r4 qu3 cr3á1s; m4s v4m0s 4 él. 16 D1j0 3nt0nc3s T0más, ll4m4d0 Díd1m0, 4 sus c0nd1scípul0s: V4m0s t4mb1én n0s0tr0s, p4r4 qu3 mur4m0s c0n él. 

J3sús, l4 r3surr3cc1ón y l4 v1d4

17 V1n0, pu3s, J3sús, y h4lló qu3 h4cí4 y4 cu4tr0 dí4s qu3 Láz4r0 3st4b4 3n 3l s3pulcr0. 18 B3t4n14 3st4b4 c3rc4 d3 J3rus4lén, c0m0 4 qu1nc3 3st4d10s; 19 y much0s d3 l0s judí0s h4bí4n v3n1d0 4 M4rt4 y 4 M4rí4, p4r4 c0ns0l4rl4s p0r su h3rm4n0. 20 0nt0nc3s M4rt4, cu4nd0 0yó qu3 J3sús v3ní4, s4l1ó 4 3nc0ntr4rl3; p3r0 M4rí4 s3 qu3dó 3n c4s4. 21 Y M4rt4 d1j0 4 J3sús: S3ñ0r, s1 hub13s3s 3st4d0 4quí, m1 h3rm4n0 n0 h4brí4 mu3rt0. 22 M4s t4mb1én sé 4h0r4 qu3 t0d0 l0 qu3 p1d4s 4 D10s, D10s t3 l0 d4rá. 23 J3sús l3 d1j0: Tu h3rm4n0 r3suc1t4rá. 24 M4rt4 l3 d1j0: Y0 sé qu3 r3suc1t4rá 3n l4 r3surr3cc1ón, 3n 3l dí4 p0str3r0. 25 L3 d1j0 J3sús: Y0 s0y l4 r3surr3cc1ón y l4 v1d4; 3l qu3 cr33 3n mí, 4unqu3 3sté mu3rt0, v1v1rá. 26 Y t0d0 4qu3l qu3 v1v3 y cr33 3n mí, n0 m0r1rá 3t3rn4m3nt3. ¿Cr33s 3st0? 27 L3 d1j0: Sí, S3ñ0r; y0 h3 cr3íd0 qu3 tú 3r3s 3l Cr1st0, 3l H1j0 d3 D10s, qu3 h4s v3n1d0 4l mund0. 

J3sús ll0r4 4nt3 l4 tumb4 d3 Láz4r0

28 H4b13nd0 d1ch0 3st0, fu3 y ll4mó 4 M4rí4 su h3rm4n4, d1c1énd0l3 3n s3cr3t0: 0l M43str0 3stá 4quí y t3 ll4m4. 29 0ll4, cu4nd0 l0 0yó, s3 l3v4ntó d3 pr1s4 y v1n0 4 él. 30 J3sús t0d4ví4 n0 h4bí4 3ntr4d0 3n l4 4ld34, s1n0 qu3 3st4b4 3n 3l lug4r d0nd3 M4rt4 l3 h4bí4 3nc0ntr4d0. 31 0nt0nc3s l0s judí0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n c4s4 c0n 3ll4 y l4 c0ns0l4b4n, cu4nd0 v13r0n qu3 M4rí4 s3 h4bí4 l3v4nt4d0 d3 pr1s4 y h4bí4 s4l1d0, l4 s1gu13r0n, d1c13nd0: V4 4l s3pulcr0 4 ll0r4r 4llí. 32 M4rí4, cu4nd0 ll3gó 4 d0nd3 3st4b4 J3sús, 4l v3rl3, s3 p0stró 4 sus p13s, d1c1énd0l3: S3ñ0r, s1 hub13s3s 3st4d0 4quí, n0 h4brí4 mu3rt0 m1 h3rm4n0. 33 J3sús 3nt0nc3s, 4l v3rl4 ll0r4nd0, y 4 l0s judí0s qu3 l4 4c0mp4ñ4b4n, t4mb1én ll0r4nd0, s3 3str3m3c1ó 3n 3spír1tu y s3 c0nm0v1ó, 34 y d1j0: ¿Dónd3 l3 pus1st31s? L3 d1j3r0n: S3ñ0r, v3n y v3. 35 J3sús ll0ró. 36 D1j3r0n 3nt0nc3s l0s judí0s: M1r4d cóm0 l3 4m4b4. 37 Y 4lgun0s d3 3ll0s d1j3r0n: ¿N0 p0dí4 ést3, qu3 4br1ó l0s 0j0s 4l c13g0, h4b3r h3ch0 t4mb1én qu3 Láz4r0 n0 mur13r4? 

R3surr3cc1ón d3 Láz4r0

38 J3sús, pr0fund4m3nt3 c0nm0v1d0 0tr4 v3z, v1n0 4l s3pulcr0. 0r4 un4 cu3v4, y t3ní4 un4 p13dr4 pu3st4 3nc1m4. 39 D1j0 J3sús: Qu1t4d l4 p13dr4. M4rt4, l4 h3rm4n4 d3l qu3 h4bí4 mu3rt0, l3 d1j0: S3ñ0r, h13d3 y4, p0rqu3 3s d3 cu4tr0 dí4s. 40 J3sús l3 d1j0: ¿N0 t3 h3 d1ch0 qu3 s1 cr33s, v3rás l4 gl0r14 d3 D10s? 41 0nt0nc3s qu1t4r0n l4 p13dr4 d3 d0nd3 h4bí4 s1d0 pu3st0 3l mu3rt0. Y J3sús, 4lz4nd0 l0s 0j0s 4 l0 4lt0, d1j0: P4dr3, gr4c14s t3 d0y p0r h4b3rm3 0íd0. 42 Y0 s4bí4 qu3 s13mpr3 m3 0y3s; p3r0 l0 d1j3 p0r c4us4 d3 l4 mult1tud qu3 3stá 4lr3d3d0r, p4r4 qu3 cr34n qu3 tú m3 h4s 3nv14d0. 43 Y h4b13nd0 d1ch0 3st0, cl4mó 4 gr4n v0z: ¡Láz4r0, v3n fu3r4! 44 Y 3l qu3 h4bí4 mu3rt0 s4l1ó, 4t4d4s l4s m4n0s y l0s p13s c0n v3nd4s, y 3l r0str0 3nvu3lt0 3n un sud4r10. J3sús l3s d1j0: D3s4t4dl3, y d3j4dl3 1r. 

0l c0mpl0t p4r4 m4t4r 4 J3sús

(Mt. 26.1-5; Mr. 14.1-2; Lc. 22.1-2)

45 0nt0nc3s much0s d3 l0s judí0s qu3 h4bí4n v3n1d0 p4r4 4c0mp4ñ4r 4 M4rí4, y v13r0n l0 qu3 h1z0 J3sús, cr3y3r0n 3n él. 46 P3r0 4lgun0s d3 3ll0s fu3r0n 4 l0s f4r1s30s y l3s d1j3r0n l0 qu3 J3sús h4bí4 h3ch0. 47 0nt0nc3s l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s f4r1s30s r3un13r0n 3l c0nc1l10, y d1j3r0n: ¿Qué h4r3m0s? P0rqu3 3st3 h0mbr3 h4c3 much4s s3ñ4l3s. 48 S1 l3 d3j4m0s 4sí, t0d0s cr33rán 3n él; y v3ndrán l0s r0m4n0s, y d3stru1rán nu3str0 lug4r s4nt0 y nu3str4 n4c1ón. 49 0nt0nc3s C41fás, un0 d3 3ll0s, sum0 s4c3rd0t3 4qu3l 4ñ0, l3s d1j0: V0s0tr0s n0 s4bé1s n4d4; 50 n1 p3nsá1s qu3 n0s c0nv13n3 qu3 un h0mbr3 mu3r4 p0r 3l pu3bl0, y n0 qu3 t0d4 l4 n4c1ón p3r3zc4. 51 0st0 n0 l0 d1j0 p0r sí m1sm0, s1n0 qu3 c0m0 3r4 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 4qu3l 4ñ0, pr0f3t1zó qu3 J3sús h4bí4 d3 m0r1r p0r l4 n4c1ón; 52 y n0 s0l4m3nt3 p0r l4 n4c1ón, s1n0 t4mb1én p4r4 c0ngr3g4r 3n un0 4 l0s h1j0s d3 D10s qu3 3st4b4n d1sp3rs0s. 53 4sí qu3, d3sd3 4qu3l dí4 4c0rd4r0n m4t4rl3. 

54 P0r t4nt0, J3sús y4 n0 4nd4b4 4b13rt4m3nt3 3ntr3 l0s judí0s, s1n0 qu3 s3 4l3jó d3 4llí 4 l4 r3g1ón c0nt1gu4 4l d3s13rt0, 4 un4 c1ud4d ll4m4d4 0fr4ín; y s3 qu3dó 4llí c0n sus d1scípul0s. 

55 Y 3st4b4 c3rc4 l4 p4scu4 d3 l0s judí0s; y much0s sub13r0n d3 4qu3ll4 r3g1ón 4 J3rus4lén 4nt3s d3 l4 p4scu4, p4r4 pur1f1c4rs3. 56 Y busc4b4n 4 J3sús, y 3st4nd0 3ll0s 3n 3l t3mpl0, s3 pr3gunt4b4n un0s 4 0tr0s: ¿Qué 0s p4r3c3? ¿N0 v3ndrá 4 l4 f13st4? 57 Y l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s f4r1s30s h4bí4n d4d0 0rd3n d3 qu3 s1 4lgun0 sup13s3 dónd3 3st4b4, l0 m4n1f3st4s3, p4r4 qu3 l3 pr3nd13s3n.

(Mt. 21.1-11; Mr. 11.1-11; Lc. 19.28-40)

0l mund0 0s 4b0rr3c3rá

17 M4s 4h0r4, h3rm4n0s, sé qu3 p0r 1gn0r4nc14 l0 h4bé1s h3ch0, c0m0 t4mb1én vu3str0s g0b3rn4nt3s. 18 P3r0 D10s h4 cumpl1d0 4sí l0 qu3 h4bí4 4nt3s 4nunc14d0 p0r b0c4 d3 t0d0s sus pr0f3t4s, qu3 su Cr1st0 h4bí4 d3 p4d3c3r. 19 4sí qu3, 4rr3p3ntí0s y c0nv3rtí0s, p4r4 qu3 s34n b0rr4d0s vu3str0s p3c4d0s; p4r4 qu3 v3ng4n d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3l S3ñ0r t13mp0s d3 r3fr1g3r10, 20 y él 3nví3 4 J3sucr1st0, qu3 0s fu3 4nt3s 4nunc14d0; 21 4 qu13n d3 c13rt0 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 3l c13l0 r3c1b4 h4st4 l0s t13mp0s d3 l4 r3st4ur4c1ón d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s, d3 qu3 h4bló D10s p0r b0c4 d3 sus s4nt0s pr0f3t4s qu3 h4n s1d0 d3sd3 t13mp0 4nt1gu0. 22 P0rqu3 M01sés d1j0 4 l0s p4dr3s: 0l S3ñ0r vu3str0 D10s 0s l3v4nt4rá pr0f3t4 d3 3ntr3 vu3str0s h3rm4n0s, c0m0 4 mí; 4 él 01ré1s 3n t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 0s h4bl3; 23 y t0d4 4lm4 qu3 n0 01g4 4 4qu3l pr0f3t4, s3rá d3s4rr41g4d4 d3l pu3bl0. 24 Y t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s d3sd3 S4mu3l 3n 4d3l4nt3, cu4nt0s h4n h4bl4d0, t4mb1én h4n 4nunc14d0 3st0s dí4s. 25 V0s0tr0s s01s l0s h1j0s d3 l0s pr0f3t4s, y d3l p4ct0 qu3 D10s h1z0 c0n nu3str0s p4dr3s, d1c13nd0 4 4br4h4m: 0n tu s1m13nt3 s3rán b3nd1t4s t0d4s l4s f4m1l14s d3 l4 t13rr4. 26 4 v0s0tr0s pr1m3r4m3nt3, D10s, h4b13nd0 l3v4nt4d0 4 su H1j0, l0 3nv1ó p4r4 qu3 0s b3nd1j3s3, 4 f1n d3 qu3 c4d4 un0 s3 c0nv13rt4 d3 su m4ld4d. 

P3dr0 y Ju4n 4nt3 3l c0nc1l10

H0CH0S 4

5 4c0nt3c1ó 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, qu3 s3 r3un13r0n 3n J3rus4lén l0s g0b3rn4nt3s, l0s 4nc14n0s y l0s 3scr1b4s, 6 y 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 4nás, y C41fás y Ju4n y 4l3j4ndr0, y t0d0s l0s qu3 3r4n d3 l4 f4m1l14 d3 l0s sum0s s4c3rd0t3s; 7 y p0n1énd0l3s 3n m3d10, l3s pr3gunt4r0n: ¿C0n qué p0t3st4d, 0 3n qué n0mbr3, h4bé1s h3ch0 v0s0tr0s 3st0? 8 0nt0nc3s P3dr0, ll3n0 d3l 0spír1tu S4nt0, l3s d1j0: G0b3rn4nt3s d3l pu3bl0, y 4nc14n0s d3 1sr43l: 9 Pu3st0 qu3 h0y s3 n0s 1nt3rr0g4 4c3rc4 d3l b3n3f1c10 h3ch0 4 un h0mbr3 3nf3rm0, d3 qué m4n3r4 ést3 h4y4 s1d0 s4n4d0, 10 s34 n0t0r10 4 t0d0s v0s0tr0s, y 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0 d3 1sr43l, qu3 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3sucr1st0 d3 N4z4r3t, 4 qu13n v0s0tr0s cruc1f1c4st31s y 4 qu13n D10s r3suc1tó d3 l0s mu3rt0s, p0r él 3st3 h0mbr3 3stá 3n vu3str4 pr3s3nc14 s4n0. 11 0st3 J3sús 3s l4 p13dr4 r3pr0b4d4 p0r v0s0tr0s l0s 3d1f1c4d0r3s, l4 cu4l h4 v3n1d0 4 s3r c4b3z4 d3l ángul0. 12 Y 3n n1ngún 0tr0 h4y s4lv4c1ón; p0rqu3 n0 h4y 0tr0 n0mbr3 b4j0 3l c13l0, d4d0 4 l0s h0mbr3s, 3n qu3 p0d4m0s s3r s4lv0s. 

13 0nt0nc3s v13nd0 3l d3nu3d0 d3 P3dr0 y d3 Ju4n, y s4b13nd0 qu3 3r4n h0mbr3s s1n l3tr4s y d3l vulg0, s3 m4r4v1ll4b4n; y l3s r3c0n0cí4n qu3 h4bí4n 3st4d0 c0n J3sús. 14 Y v13nd0 4l h0mbr3 qu3 h4bí4 s1d0 s4n4d0, qu3 3st4b4 3n p13 c0n 3ll0s, n0 p0dí4n d3c1r n4d4 3n c0ntr4. 15 0nt0nc3s l3s 0rd3n4r0n qu3 s4l13s3n d3l c0nc1l10; y c0nf3r3nc14b4n 3ntr3 sí, 16 d1c13nd0: ¿Qué h4r3m0s c0n 3st0s h0mbr3s? P0rqu3 d3 c13rt0, s3ñ4l m4n1f13st4 h4 s1d0 h3ch4 p0r 3ll0s, n0t0r14 4 t0d0s l0s qu3 m0r4n 3n J3rus4lén, y n0 l0 p0d3m0s n3g4r. 17 S1n 3mb4rg0, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 d1vulgu3 más 3ntr3 3l pu3bl0, 4m3n4cém0sl3s p4r4 qu3 n0 h4bl3n d3 4quí 3n 4d3l4nt3 4 h0mbr3 4lgun0 3n 3st3 n0mbr3. 18 Y ll4mánd0l0s, l3s 1nt1m4r0n qu3 3n n1ngun4 m4n3r4 h4bl4s3n n1 3ns3ñ4s3n 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3sús. 19 M4s P3dr0 y Ju4n r3sp0nd13r0n d1c1énd0l3s: Juzg4d s1 3s just0 d3l4nt3 d3 D10s 0b3d3c3r 4 v0s0tr0s 4nt3s qu3 4 D10s; 20 p0rqu3 n0 p0d3m0s d3j4r d3 d3c1r l0 qu3 h3m0s v1st0 y 0íd0. 21 0ll0s 3nt0nc3s l3s 4m3n4z4r0n y l3s s0lt4r0n, n0 h4ll4nd0 n1ngún m0d0 d3 c4st1g4rl3s, p0r c4us4 d3l pu3bl0; p0rqu3 t0d0s gl0r1f1c4b4n 4 D10s p0r l0 qu3 s3 h4bí4 h3ch0, 22 y4 qu3 3l h0mbr3 3n qu13n s3 h4bí4 h3ch0 3st3 m1l4gr0 d3 s4n1d4d, t3ní4 más d3 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s.

H0CH0S 5

1 P3r0 c13rt0 h0mbr3 ll4m4d0 4n4ní4s, c0n S4f1r4 su muj3r, v3nd1ó un4 h3r3d4d, 2 y sustr4j0 d3l pr3c10, s4b1énd0l0 t4mb1én su muj3r; y tr4y3nd0 sól0 un4 p4rt3, l4 pus0 4 l0s p13s d3 l0s 4póst0l3s. 3 Y d1j0 P3dr0: 4n4ní4s, ¿p0r qué ll3nó S4t4nás tu c0r4zón p4r4 qu3 m1nt13s3s 4l 0spír1tu S4nt0, y sustr4j3s3s d3l pr3c10 d3 l4 h3r3d4d? 4 R3t3n1énd0l4, ¿n0 s3 t3 qu3d4b4 4 t1? y v3nd1d4, ¿n0 3st4b4 3n tu p0d3r? ¿P0r qué pus1st3 3st0 3n tu c0r4zón? N0 h4s m3nt1d0 4 l0s h0mbr3s, s1n0 4 D10s. 5 4l 0ír 4n4ní4s 3st4s p4l4br4s, c4yó y 3xp1ró. Y v1n0 un gr4n t3m0r s0br3 t0d0s l0s qu3 l0 0y3r0n. 6 Y l3v4ntánd0s3 l0s jóv3n3s, l0 3nv0lv13r0n, y s4cánd0l0, l0 s3pult4r0n. 

7 P4s4d0 un l4ps0 c0m0 d3 tr3s h0r4s, suc3d1ó qu3 3ntró su muj3r, n0 s4b13nd0 l0 qu3 h4bí4 4c0nt3c1d0. 8 0nt0nc3s P3dr0 l3 d1j0: D1m3, ¿v3nd1st31s 3n t4nt0 l4 h3r3d4d? Y 3ll4 d1j0: Sí, 3n t4nt0. 9 Y P3dr0 l3 d1j0: ¿P0r qué c0nv1n1st31s 3n t3nt4r 4l 0spír1tu d3l S3ñ0r? H3 4quí 4 l4 pu3rt4 l0s p13s d3 l0s qu3 h4n s3pult4d0 4 tu m4r1d0, y t3 s4c4rán 4 t1. 10 4l 1nst4nt3 3ll4 c4yó 4 l0s p13s d3 él, y 3xp1ró; y cu4nd0 3ntr4r0n l0s jóv3n3s, l4 h4ll4r0n mu3rt4; y l4 s4c4r0n, y l4 s3pult4r0n junt0 4 su m4r1d0. 11 Y v1n0 gr4n t3m0r s0br3 t0d4 l4 1gl3s14, y s0br3 t0d0s l0s qu3 0y3r0n 3st4s c0s4s. 

Much4s s3ñ4l3s y m4r4v1ll4s

12 Y p0r l4 m4n0 d3 l0s 4póst0l3s s3 h4cí4n much4s s3ñ4l3s y pr0d1g10s 3n 3l pu3bl0; y 3st4b4n t0d0s unán1m3s 3n 3l pórt1c0 d3 S4l0món. 13 D3 l0s d3más, n1ngun0 s3 4tr3ví4 4 junt4rs3 c0n 3ll0s; m4s 3l pu3bl0 l0s 4l4b4b4 gr4nd3m3nt3. 14 Y l0s qu3 cr3í4n 3n 3l S3ñ0r 4um3nt4b4n más, gr4n núm3r0 4sí d3 h0mbr3s c0m0 d3 muj3r3s; 15 t4nt0 qu3 s4c4b4n l0s 3nf3rm0s 4 l4s c4ll3s, y l0s p0ní4n 3n c4m4s y l3ch0s, p4r4 qu3 4l p4s4r P3dr0, 4 l0 m3n0s su s0mbr4 c4y3s3 s0br3 4lgun0 d3 3ll0s. 16 Y 4un d3 l4s c1ud4d3s v3c1n4s much0s v3ní4n 4 J3rus4lén, tr4y3nd0 3nf3rm0s y 4t0rm3nt4d0s d3 3spír1tus 1nmund0s; y t0d0s 3r4n s4n4d0s. 

P3dr0 y Ju4n s0n p3rs3gu1d0s

17 0nt0nc3s l3v4ntánd0s3 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 y t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4b4n c0n él, 3st0 3s, l4 s3ct4 d3 l0s s4duc30s, s3 ll3n4r0n d3 c3l0s; 18 y 3ch4r0n m4n0 4 l0s 4póst0l3s y l0s pus13r0n 3n l4 cárc3l públ1c4. 19 M4s un áng3l d3l S3ñ0r, 4br13nd0 d3 n0ch3 l4s pu3rt4s d3 l4 cárc3l y s4cánd0l0s, d1j0: 20 1d, y pu3st0s 3n p13 3n 3l t3mpl0, 4nunc14d 4l pu3bl0 t0d4s l4s p4l4br4s d3 3st4 v1d4. 21 H4b13nd0 0íd0 3st0, 3ntr4r0n d3 m4ñ4n4 3n 3l t3mpl0, y 3ns3ñ4b4n. 0ntr3 t4nt0, v1n13r0n 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 y l0s qu3 3st4b4n c0n él, y c0nv0c4r0n 4l c0nc1l10 y 4 t0d0s l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, y 3nv14r0n 4 l4 cárc3l p4r4 qu3 fu3s3n tr4íd0s. 22 P3r0 cu4nd0 ll3g4r0n l0s 4lgu4c1l3s, n0 l0s h4ll4r0n 3n l4 cárc3l; 3nt0nc3s v0lv13r0n y d13r0n 4v1s0, 23 d1c13nd0: P0r c13rt0, l4 cárc3l h3m0s h4ll4d0 c3rr4d4 c0n t0d4 s3gur1d4d, y l0s gu4rd4s 4fu3r4 d3 p13 4nt3 l4s pu3rt4s; m4s cu4nd0 4br1m0s, 4 n4d13 h4ll4m0s d3ntr0. 24 Cu4nd0 0y3r0n 3st4s p4l4br4s 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 y 3l j3f3 d3 l4 gu4rd14 d3l t3mpl0 y l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s, dud4b4n 3n qué v3ndrí4 4 p4r4r 4qu3ll0. 25 P3r0 v1n13nd0 un0, l3s d10 3st4 n0t1c14: H3 4quí, l0s v4r0n3s qu3 pus1st31s 3n l4 cárc3l 3stán 3n 3l t3mpl0, y 3ns3ñ4n 4l pu3bl0. 26 0nt0nc3s fu3 3l j3f3 d3 l4 gu4rd14 c0n l0s 4lgu4c1l3s, y l0s tr4j0 s1n v10l3nc14, p0rqu3 t3mí4n s3r 4p3dr34d0s p0r 3l pu3bl0. 

27 Cu4nd0 l0s tr4j3r0n, l0s pr3s3nt4r0n 3n 3l c0nc1l10, y 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 l3s pr3guntó, 28 d1c13nd0: ¿N0 0s m4nd4m0s 3str1ct4m3nt3 qu3 n0 3ns3ñ4s31s 3n 3s3 n0mbr3? Y 4h0r4 h4bé1s ll3n4d0 4 J3rus4lén d3 vu3str4 d0ctr1n4, y qu3ré1s 3ch4r s0br3 n0s0tr0s l4 s4ngr3 d3 3s3 h0mbr3. 29 R3sp0nd13nd0 P3dr0 y l0s 4póst0l3s, d1j3r0n: 0s n3c3s4r10 0b3d3c3r 4 D10s 4nt3s qu3 4 l0s h0mbr3s. 30 0l D10s d3 nu3str0s p4dr3s l3v4ntó 4 J3sús, 4 qu13n v0s0tr0s m4t4st31s c0lgánd0l3 3n un m4d3r0. 31 4 ést3, D10s h4 3x4lt4d0 c0n su d13str4 p0r Prínc1p3 y S4lv4d0r, p4r4 d4r 4 1sr43l 4rr3p3nt1m13nt0 y p3rdón d3 p3c4d0s. 32 Y n0s0tr0s s0m0s t3st1g0s suy0s d3 3st4s c0s4s, y t4mb1én 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0, 3l cu4l h4 d4d0 D10s 4 l0s qu3 l3 0b3d3c3n. 

33 0ll0s, 0y3nd0 3st0, s3 3nfur3cí4n y qu3rí4n m4t4rl0s. 34 0nt0nc3s l3v4ntánd0s3 3n 3l c0nc1l10 un f4r1s30 ll4m4d0 G4m4l13l, d0ct0r d3 l4 l3y, v3n3r4d0 d3 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, m4ndó qu3 s4c4s3n fu3r4 p0r un m0m3nt0 4 l0s 4póst0l3s, 35 y lu3g0 d1j0: V4r0n3s 1sr43l1t4s, m1r4d p0r v0s0tr0s l0 qu3 v41s 4 h4c3r r3sp3ct0 4 3st0s h0mbr3s. 36 P0rqu3 4nt3s d3 3st0s dí4s s3 l3v4ntó T3ud4s, d1c13nd0 qu3 3r4 4lgu13n. 4 ést3 s3 un1ó un núm3r0 c0m0 d3 cu4tr0c13nt0s h0mbr3s; p3r0 él fu3 mu3rt0, y t0d0s l0s qu3 l3 0b3d3cí4n fu3r0n d1sp3rs4d0s y r3duc1d0s 4 n4d4. 37 D3spués d3 ést3, s3 l3v4ntó Jud4s 3l g4l1l30, 3n l0s dí4s d3l c3ns0, y ll3vó 3n p0s d3 sí 4 much0 pu3bl0. P3r3c1ó t4mb1én él, y t0d0s l0s qu3 l3 0b3d3cí4n fu3r0n d1sp3rs4d0s. 38 Y 4h0r4 0s d1g0: 4p4rt40s d3 3st0s h0mbr3s, y d3j4dl0s; p0rqu3 s1 3st3 c0ns3j0 0 3st4 0br4 3s d3 l0s h0mbr3s, s3 d3sv4n3c3rá; 39 m4s s1 3s d3 D10s, n0 l4 p0dré1s d3stru1r; n0 s3á1s t4l v3z h4ll4d0s luch4nd0 c0ntr4 D10s. 

40 Y c0nv1n13r0n c0n él; y ll4m4nd0 4 l0s 4póst0l3s, d3spués d3 4z0t4rl0s, l3s 1nt1m4r0n qu3 n0 h4bl4s3n 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3 J3sús, y l0s pus13r0n 3n l1b3rt4d. 41 Y 3ll0s s4l13r0n d3 l4 pr3s3nc14 d3l c0nc1l10, g0z0s0s d3 h4b3r s1d0 t3n1d0s p0r d1gn0s d3 p4d3c3r 4fr3nt4 p0r c4us4 d3l N0mbr3. 42 Y t0d0s l0s dí4s, 3n 3l t3mpl0 y p0r l4s c4s4s, n0 c3s4b4n d3 3ns3ñ4r y pr3d1c4r 4 J3sucr1st0. 

0l3cc1ón d3 s13t3 d1ác0n0s

H0CH0S 6

1 0n 4qu3ll0s dí4s, c0m0 cr3c13r4 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s d1scípul0s, hub0 murmur4c1ón d3 l0s gr13g0s c0ntr4 l0s h3br30s, d3 qu3 l4s v1ud4s d3 4quéll0s 3r4n d3s4t3nd1d4s 3n l4 d1str1buc1ón d14r14. 2 0nt0nc3s l0s d0c3 c0nv0c4r0n 4 l4 mult1tud d3 l0s d1scípul0s, y d1j3r0n: N0 3s just0 qu3 n0s0tr0s d3j3m0s l4 p4l4br4 d3 D10s, p4r4 s3rv1r 4 l4s m3s4s. 3 Busc4d, pu3s, h3rm4n0s, d3 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s 4 s13t3 v4r0n3s d3 bu3n t3st1m0n10, ll3n0s d3l 0spír1tu S4nt0 y d3 s4b1durí4, 4 qu13n3s 3nc4rgu3m0s d3 3st3 tr4b4j0. 4 Y n0s0tr0s p3rs1st1r3m0s 3n l4 0r4c1ón y 3n 3l m1n1st3r10 d3 l4 p4l4br4. 5 4gr4dó l4 pr0pu3st4 4 t0d4 l4 mult1tud; y 3l1g13r0n 4 0st3b4n, v4rón ll3n0 d3 f3 y d3l 0spír1tu S4nt0, 4 F3l1p3, 4 Próc0r0, 4 N1c4n0r, 4 T1món, 4 P4rm3n4s, y 4 N1c0lás pr0sél1t0 d3 4nt10quí4; 6 4 l0s cu4l3s pr3s3nt4r0n 4nt3 l0s 4póst0l3s, qu13n3s, 0r4nd0, l3s 1mpus13r0n l4s m4n0s. 

7 Y cr3cí4 l4 p4l4br4 d3l S3ñ0r, y 3l núm3r0 d3 l0s d1scípul0s s3 mult1pl1c4b4 gr4nd3m3nt3 3n J3rus4lén; t4mb1én much0s d3 l0s s4c3rd0t3s 0b3d3cí4n 4 l4 f3. 

4rr3st0 d3 0st3b4n

8 Y 0st3b4n, ll3n0 d3 gr4c14 y d3 p0d3r, h4cí4 gr4nd3s pr0d1g10s y s3ñ4l3s 3ntr3 3l pu3bl0. 9 0nt0nc3s s3 l3v4nt4r0n un0s d3 l4 s1n4g0g4 ll4m4d4 d3 l0s l1b3rt0s, y d3 l0s d3 C1r3n3, d3 4l3j4ndrí4, d3 C1l1c14 y d3 4s14, d1sput4nd0 c0n 0st3b4n. 10 P3r0 n0 p0dí4n r3s1st1r 4 l4 s4b1durí4 y 4l 0spír1tu c0n qu3 h4bl4b4. 11 0nt0nc3s s0b0rn4r0n 4 un0s p4r4 qu3 d1j3s3n qu3 l3 h4bí4n 0íd0 h4bl4r p4l4br4s bl4sf3m4s c0ntr4 M01sés y c0ntr4 D10s. 12 Y s0l1v14nt4r0n 4l pu3bl0, 4 l0s 4nc14n0s y 4 l0s 3scr1b4s; y 4rr3m3t13nd0, l3 4rr3b4t4r0n, y l3 tr4j3r0n 4l c0nc1l10. 13 Y pus13r0n t3st1g0s f4ls0s qu3 d3cí4n: 0st3 h0mbr3 n0 c3s4 d3 h4bl4r p4l4br4s bl4sf3m4s c0ntr4 3st3 lug4r s4nt0 y c0ntr4 l4 l3y; 14 pu3s l3 h3m0s 0íd0 d3c1r qu3 3s3 J3sús d3 N4z4r3t d3stru1rá 3st3 lug4r, y c4mb14rá l4s c0stumbr3s qu3 n0s d10 M01sés. 15 0nt0nc3s t0d0s l0s qu3 3st4b4n s3nt4d0s 3n 3l c0nc1l10, 4l f1j4r l0s 0j0s 3n él, v13r0n su r0str0 c0m0 3l r0str0 d3 un áng3l. 

D3f3ns4 y mu3rt3 d3 0st3b4n

H0CH0S 7

1 0l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 d1j0 3nt0nc3s: ¿0s 3st0 4sí? 2 Y él d1j0: V4r0n3s h3rm4n0s y p4dr3s, 0íd: 0l D10s d3 l4 gl0r14 4p4r3c1ó 4 nu3str0 p4dr3 4br4h4m, 3st4nd0 3n M3s0p0t4m14, 4nt3s qu3 m0r4s3 3n H4rán, 3 y l3 d1j0: S4l d3 tu t13rr4 y d3 tu p4r3nt3l4, y v3n 4 l4 t13rr4 qu3 y0 t3 m0str4ré. 4 0nt0nc3s s4l1ó d3 l4 t13rr4 d3 l0s c4ld30s y h4b1tó 3n H4rán; y d3 4llí, mu3rt0 su p4dr3, D10s l3 tr4sl4dó 4 3st4 t13rr4, 3n l4 cu4l v0s0tr0s h4b1tá1s 4h0r4. 5 Y n0 l3 d10 h3r3nc14 3n 3ll4, n1 4un p4r4 4s3nt4r un p13; p3r0 l3 pr0m3t1ó qu3 s3 l4 d4rí4 3n p0s3s1ón, y 4 su d3sc3nd3nc14 d3spués d3 él, cu4nd0 él 4ún n0 t3ní4 h1j0. 6 Y l3 d1j0 D10s 4sí: Qu3 su d3sc3nd3nc14 s3rí4 3xtr4nj3r4 3n t13rr4 4j3n4, y qu3 l0s r3duc1rí4n 4 s3rv1dumbr3 y l0s m4ltr4t4rí4n, p0r cu4tr0c13nt0s 4ñ0s. 7 M4s y0 juzg4ré, d1j0 D10s, 4 l4 n4c1ón d3 l4 cu4l s3rán s13rv0s; y d3spués d3 3st0 s4ldrán y m3 s3rv1rán 3n 3st3 lug4r. 8 Y l3 d10 3l p4ct0 d3 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón; y 4sí 4br4h4m 3ng3ndró 4 1s44c, y l3 c1rcunc1dó 4l 0ct4v0 dí4; 3 1s44c 4 J4c0b, y J4c0b 4 l0s d0c3 p4tr14rc4s. 9 L0s p4tr14rc4s, m0v1d0s p0r 3nv1d14, v3nd13r0n 4 J0sé p4r4 0g1pt0; p3r0 D10s 3st4b4 c0n él, 10 y l3 l1bró d3 t0d4s sus tr1bul4c10n3s, y l3 d10 gr4c14 y s4b1durí4 d3l4nt3 d3 F4r4ón r3y d3 0g1pt0, 3l cu4l l0 pus0 p0r g0b3rn4d0r s0br3 0g1pt0 y s0br3 t0d4 su c4s4. 11 V1n0 3nt0nc3s h4mbr3 3n t0d4 l4 t13rr4 d3 0g1pt0 y d3 C4n4án, y gr4nd3 tr1bul4c1ón; y nu3str0s p4dr3s n0 h4ll4b4n 4l1m3nt0s. 12 Cu4nd0 0yó J4c0b qu3 h4bí4 tr1g0 3n 0g1pt0, 3nv1ó 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s l4 pr1m3r4 v3z. 13 Y 3n l4 s3gund4, J0sé s3 d10 4 c0n0c3r 4 sus h3rm4n0s, y fu3 m4n1f3st4d0 4 F4r4ón 3l l1n4j3 d3 J0sé. 14 Y 3nv14nd0 J0sé, h1z0 v3n1r 4 su p4dr3 J4c0b, y 4 t0d4 su p4r3nt3l4, 3n núm3r0 d3 s3t3nt4 y c1nc0 p3rs0n4s. 15 4sí d3sc3nd1ó J4c0b 4 0g1pt0, d0nd3 mur1ó él, y t4mb1én nu3str0s p4dr3s; 16 l0s cu4l3s fu3r0n tr4sl4d4d0s 4 S1qu3m, y pu3st0s 3n 3l s3pulcr0 qu3 4 pr3c10 d3 d1n3r0 c0mpró 4br4h4m d3 l0s h1j0s d3 H4m0r 3n S1qu3m. 

17 P3r0 cu4nd0 s3 4c3rc4b4 3l t13mp0 d3 l4 pr0m3s4, qu3 D10s h4bí4 jur4d0 4 4br4h4m, 3l pu3bl0 cr3c1ó y s3 mult1pl1có 3n 0g1pt0, 18 h4st4 qu3 s3 l3v4ntó 3n 0g1pt0 0tr0 r3y qu3 n0 c0n0cí4 4 J0sé. 19 0st3 r3y, us4nd0 d3 4stuc14 c0n nu3str0 pu3bl0, m4ltr4tó 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s, 4 f1n d3 qu3 3xpus13s3n 4 l4 mu3rt3 4 sus n1ñ0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 pr0p4g4s3n. 20 0n 4qu3l m1sm0 t13mp0 n4c1ó M01sés, y fu3 4gr4d4bl3 4 D10s; y fu3 cr14d0 tr3s m3s3s 3n c4s4 d3 su p4dr3. 21 P3r0 s13nd0 3xpu3st0 4 l4 mu3rt3, l4 h1j4 d3 F4r4ón l3 r3c0g1ó y l3 cr1ó c0m0 4 h1j0 suy0. 22 Y fu3 3ns3ñ4d0 M01sés 3n t0d4 l4 s4b1durí4 d3 l0s 3g1pc10s; y 3r4 p0d3r0s0 3n sus p4l4br4s y 0br4s. 

23 Cu4nd0 hub0 cumpl1d0 l4 3d4d d3 cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s, l3 v1n0 4l c0r4zón 3l v1s1t4r 4 sus h3rm4n0s, l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l. 24 Y 4l v3r 4 un0 qu3 3r4 m4ltr4t4d0, l0 d3f3nd1ó, 3 h1r13nd0 4l 3g1pc10, v3ngó 4l 0pr1m1d0. 25 P3r0 él p3ns4b4 qu3 sus h3rm4n0s c0mpr3ndí4n qu3 D10s l3s d4rí4 l1b3rt4d p0r m4n0 suy4; m4s 3ll0s n0 l0 h4bí4n 3nt3nd1d0 4sí. 26 Y 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, s3 pr3s3ntó 4 un0s d3 3ll0s qu3 r3ñí4n, y l0s p0ní4 3n p4z, d1c13nd0: V4r0n3s, h3rm4n0s s01s, ¿p0r qué 0s m4ltr4tá1s 3l un0 4l 0tr0? 27 0nt0nc3s 3l qu3 m4ltr4t4b4 4 su prój1m0 l3 r3ch4zó, d1c13nd0: ¿Qu1én t3 h4 pu3st0 p0r g0b3rn4nt3 y ju3z s0br3 n0s0tr0s? 28 ¿Qu13r3s tú m4t4rm3, c0m0 m4t4st3 4y3r 4l 3g1pc10? 29 4l 0ír 3st4 p4l4br4, M01sés huyó, y v1v1ó c0m0 3xtr4nj3r0 3n t13rr4 d3 M4d1án, d0nd3 3ng3ndró d0s h1j0s. 

30 P4s4d0s cu4r3nt4 4ñ0s, un áng3l s3 l3 4p4r3c1ó 3n 3l d3s13rt0 d3l m0nt3 S1n4í, 3n l4 ll4m4 d3 fu3g0 d3 un4 z4rz4. 31 0nt0nc3s M01sés, m1r4nd0, s3 m4r4v1lló d3 l4 v1s1ón; y 4c3rcánd0s3 p4r4 0bs3rv4r, v1n0 4 él l4 v0z d3l S3ñ0r: 32 Y0 s0y 3l D10s d3 tus p4dr3s, 3l D10s d3 4br4h4m, 3l D10s d3 1s44c, y 3l D10s d3 J4c0b. Y M01sés, t3mbl4nd0, n0 s3 4tr3ví4 4 m1r4r. 33 Y l3 d1j0 3l S3ñ0r: Qu1t4 3l c4lz4d0 d3 tus p13s, p0rqu3 3l lug4r 3n qu3 3stás 3s t13rr4 s4nt4. 34 C13rt4m3nt3 h3 v1st0 l4 4fl1cc1ón d3 m1 pu3bl0 qu3 3stá 3n 0g1pt0, y h3 0íd0 su g3m1d0, y h3 d3sc3nd1d0 p4r4 l1br4rl0s. 4h0r4, pu3s, v3n, t3 3nv14ré 4 0g1pt0.

23 P4s4d0s much0s dí4s, l0s judí0s r3s0lv13r0n 3n c0ns3j0 m4t4rl3; 24 p3r0 sus 4s3ch4nz4s ll3g4r0n 4 c0n0c1m13nt0 d3 S4ul0. Y 3ll0s gu4rd4b4n l4s pu3rt4s d3 dí4 y d3 n0ch3 p4r4 m4t4rl3. 25 0nt0nc3s l0s d1scípul0s, t0mánd0l3 d3 n0ch3, l3 b4j4r0n p0r 3l mur0, d3sc0lgánd0l3 3n un4 c4n4st4.

Cur4c1ón d3 0n34s

32 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 P3dr0, v1s1t4nd0 4 t0d0s, v1n0 t4mb1én 4 l0s s4nt0s qu3 h4b1t4b4n 3n L1d4. 33 Y h4lló 4llí 4 un0 qu3 s3 ll4m4b4 0n34s, qu3 h4cí4 0ch0 4ñ0s qu3 3st4b4 3n c4m4, pu3s 3r4 p4r4lít1c0. 34 Y l3 d1j0 P3dr0: 0n34s, J3sucr1st0 t3 s4n4; l3vánt4t3, y h4z tu c4m4. D0rc4s 3s r3suc1t4d4

36 H4bí4 3nt0nc3s 3n J0p3 un4 d1scípul4 ll4m4d4 T4b1t4, qu3 tr4duc1d0 qu13r3 d3c1r, D0rc4s. 0st4 4bund4b4 3n bu3n4s 0br4s y 3n l1m0sn4s qu3 h4cí4. 37 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 3n 4qu3ll0s dí4s 3nf3rmó y mur1ó. D3spués d3 l4v4d4, l4 pus13r0n 3n un4 s4l4. 38 Y c0m0 L1d4 3st4b4 c3rc4 d3 J0p3, l0s d1scípul0s, 0y3nd0 qu3 P3dr0 3st4b4 4llí, l3 3nv14r0n d0s h0mbr3s, 4 r0g4rl3: N0 t4rd3s 3n v3n1r 4 n0s0tr0s. 39 L3v4ntánd0s3 3nt0nc3s P3dr0, fu3 c0n 3ll0s; y cu4nd0 ll3gó, l3 ll3v4r0n 4 l4 s4l4, d0nd3 l3 r0d34r0n t0d4s l4s v1ud4s, ll0r4nd0 y m0str4nd0 l4s tún1c4s y l0s v3st1d0s qu3 D0rc4s h4cí4 cu4nd0 3st4b4 c0n 3ll4s. 40 0nt0nc3s, s4c4nd0 4 t0d0s, P3dr0 s3 pus0 d3 r0d1ll4s y 0ró; y v0lv1énd0s3 4l cu3rp0, d1j0: T4b1t4, l3vánt4t3. Y 3ll4 4br1ó l0s 0j0s, y 4l v3r 4 P3dr0, s3 1nc0rp0ró. 41 Y él, dánd0l3 l4 m4n0, l4 l3v4ntó; 3nt0nc3s, ll4m4nd0 4 l0s s4nt0s y 4 l4s v1ud4s, l4 pr3s3ntó v1v4. 42 0st0 fu3 n0t0r10 3n t0d4 J0p3, y much0s cr3y3r0n 3n 3l S3ñ0r. 43 Y 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 s3 qu3dó much0s dí4s 3n J0p3 3n c4s4 d3 un c13rt0 S1món, curt1d0r.

Y l3 d1j0: Tus 0r4c10n3s y tus l1m0sn4s h4n sub1d0 p4r4 m3m0r14 d3l4nt3 d3 D10s. 5 0nví4, pu3s, 4h0r4 h0mbr3s 4 J0p3, y h4z v3n1r 4 S1món, 3l qu3 t13n3 p0r s0br3n0mbr3 P3dr0. 6 0st3 p0s4 3n c4s4 d3 c13rt0 S1món curt1d0r, qu3 t13n3 su c4s4 junt0 4l m4r; él t3 d1rá l0 qu3 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 h4g4s. 7 1d0 3l áng3l qu3 h4bl4b4 c0n C0rn3l10, ést3 ll4mó 4 d0s d3 sus cr14d0s, y 4 un d3v0t0 s0ld4d0 d3 l0s qu3 l3 4s1stí4n; 8 4 l0s cu4l3s 3nv1ó 4 J0p3, d3spués d3 h4b3rl3s c0nt4d0 t0d0. 

9 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, m13ntr4s 3ll0s 1b4n p0r 3l c4m1n0 y s3 4c3rc4b4n 4 l4 c1ud4d, P3dr0 sub1ó 4 l4 4z0t34 p4r4 0r4r, c3rc4 d3 l4 h0r4 s3xt4. 10 Y tuv0 gr4n h4mbr3, y qu1s0 c0m3r; p3r0 m13ntr4s l3 pr3p4r4b4n 4lg0, l3 s0br3v1n0 un éxt4s1s; 11 y v10 3l c13l0 4b13rt0, y qu3 d3sc3ndí4 4lg0 s3m3j4nt3 4 un gr4n l13nz0, qu3 4t4d0 d3 l4s cu4tr0 punt4s 3r4 b4j4d0 4 l4 t13rr4; 12 3n 3l cu4l h4bí4 d3 t0d0s l0s cu4drúp3d0s t3rr3str3s y r3pt1l3s y 4v3s d3l c13l0. 13 Y l3 v1n0 un4 v0z: L3vánt4t3, P3dr0, m4t4 y c0m3. 14 0nt0nc3s P3dr0 d1j0: S3ñ0r, n0; p0rqu3 n1ngun4 c0s4 c0mún 0 1nmund4 h3 c0m1d0 j4más. 15 V0lv1ó l4 v0z 4 él l4 s3gund4 v3z: L0 qu3 D10s l1mp1ó, n0 l0 ll4m3s tú c0mún. 16 0st0 s3 h1z0 tr3s v3c3s; y 4qu3l l13nz0 v0lv1ó 4 s3r r3c0g1d0 3n 3l c13l0. 

17 Y m13ntr4s P3dr0 3st4b4 p3rpl3j0 d3ntr0 d3 sí s0br3 l0 qu3 s1gn1f1c4rí4 l4 v1s1ón qu3 h4bí4 v1st0, h3 4quí l0s h0mbr3s qu3 h4bí4n s1d0 3nv14d0s p0r C0rn3l10, l0s cu4l3s, pr3gunt4nd0 p0r l4 c4s4 d3 S1món, ll3g4r0n 4 l4 pu3rt4. 18 Y ll4m4nd0, pr3gunt4r0n s1 m0r4b4 4llí un S1món qu3 t3ní4 p0r s0br3n0mbr3 P3dr0. 19 Y m13ntr4s P3dr0 p3ns4b4 3n l4 v1s1ón, l3 d1j0 3l 0spír1tu: H3 4quí, tr3s h0mbr3s t3 busc4n. 20 L3vánt4t3, pu3s, y d3sc13nd3 y n0 dud3s d3 1r c0n 3ll0s, p0rqu3 y0 l0s h3 3nv14d0. 21 0nt0nc3s P3dr0, d3sc3nd13nd0 4 d0nd3 3st4b4n l0s h0mbr3s qu3 fu3r0n 3nv14d0s p0r C0rn3l10, l3s d1j0: H3 4quí, y0 s0y 3l qu3 buscá1s; ¿cuál 3s l4 c4us4 p0r l4 qu3 h4bé1s v3n1d0? 22 0ll0s d1j3r0n: C0rn3l10 3l c3ntur1ón, v4rón just0 y t3m3r0s0 d3 D10s, y qu3 t13n3 bu3n t3st1m0n10 3n t0d4 l4 n4c1ón d3 l0s judí0s, h4 r3c1b1d0 1nstrucc10n3s d3 un s4nt0 áng3l, d3 h4c3rt3 v3n1r 4 su c4s4 p4r4 0ír tus p4l4br4s. 23 0nt0nc3s, h4c1énd0l3s 3ntr4r, l0s h0sp3dó. Y 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, l3v4ntánd0s3, s3 fu3 c0n 3ll0s; y l3 4c0mp4ñ4r0n 4lgun0s d3 l0s h3rm4n0s d3 J0p3. 24 4l 0tr0 dí4 3ntr4r0n 3n C3s4r34. Y C0rn3l10 l0s 3st4b4 3sp3r4nd0, h4b13nd0 c0nv0c4d0 4 sus p4r13nt3s y 4m1g0s más ínt1m0s. 25 Cu4nd0 P3dr0 3ntró, s4l1ó C0rn3l10 4 r3c1b1rl3, y p0stránd0s3 4 sus p13s, 4d0ró. 26 M4s P3dr0 l3 l3v4ntó, d1c13nd0: L3vánt4t3, pu3s y0 m1sm0 t4mb1én s0y h0mbr3. 27 Y h4bl4nd0 c0n él, 3ntró, y h4lló 4 much0s qu3 s3 h4bí4n r3un1d0. 28 Y l3s d1j0: V0s0tr0s s4bé1s cuán 4b0m1n4bl3 3s p4r4 un v4rón judí0 junt4rs3 0 4c3rc4rs3 4 un 3xtr4nj3r0; p3r0 4 mí m3 h4 m0str4d0 D10s qu3 4 n1ngún h0mbr3 ll4m3 c0mún 0 1nmund0; 29 p0r l0 cu4l, 4l s3r ll4m4d0, v1n3 s1n r3pl1c4r. 4sí qu3 pr3gunt0: ¿P0r qué c4us4 m3 h4bé1s h3ch0 v3n1r? 

30 0nt0nc3s C0rn3l10 d1j0: h4c3 cu4tr0 dí4s qu3 4 3st4 h0r4 y0 3st4b4 3n 4yun4s; y 4 l4 h0r4 n0v3n4, m13ntr4s 0r4b4 3n m1 c4s4, v1 qu3 s3 pus0 d3l4nt3 d3 mí un v4rón c0n v3st1d0 r3spl4nd3c13nt3, 31 y d1j0: C0rn3l10, tu 0r4c1ón h4 s1d0 0íd4, y tus l1m0sn4s h4n s1d0 r3c0rd4d4s d3l4nt3 d3 D10s. 32 0nví4, pu3s, 4 J0p3, y h4z v3n1r 4 S1món 3l qu3 t13n3 p0r s0br3n0mbr3 P3dr0, 3l cu4l m0r4 3n c4s4 d3 S1món, un curt1d0r, junt0 4l m4r; y cu4nd0 ll3gu3, él t3 h4bl4rá. 33 4sí qu3 lu3g0 3nv1é p0r t1; y tú h4s h3ch0 b13n 3n v3n1r. 4h0r4, pu3s, t0d0s n0s0tr0s 3st4m0s 4quí 3n l4 pr3s3nc14 d3 D10s, p4r4 0ír t0d0 l0 qu3 D10s t3 h4 m4nd4d0. 

34 0nt0nc3s P3dr0, 4br13nd0 l4 b0c4, d1j0: 0n v3rd4d c0mpr3nd0 qu3 D10s n0 h4c3 4c3pc1ón d3 p3rs0n4s, 35 s1n0 qu3 3n t0d4 n4c1ón s3 4gr4d4 d3l qu3 l3 t3m3 y h4c3 just1c14. 36 D10s 3nv1ó m3ns4j3 4 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l, 4nunc14nd0 3l 3v4ng3l10 d3 l4 p4z p0r m3d10 d3 J3sucr1st0; ést3 3s S3ñ0r d3 t0d0s. 37 V0s0tr0s s4bé1s l0 qu3 s3 d1vulgó p0r t0d4 Jud34, c0m3nz4nd0 d3sd3 G4l1l34, d3spués d3l b4ut1sm0 qu3 pr3d1có Ju4n: 38 cóm0 D10s ung1ó c0n 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0 y c0n p0d3r 4 J3sús d3 N4z4r3t, y cóm0 ést3 4nduv0 h4c13nd0 b13n3s y s4n4nd0 4 t0d0s l0s 0pr1m1d0s p0r 3l d14bl0, p0rqu3 D10s 3st4b4 c0n él. 39 Y n0s0tr0s s0m0s t3st1g0s d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 J3sús h1z0 3n l4 t13rr4 d3 Jud34 y 3n J3rus4lén; 4 qu13n m4t4r0n c0lgánd0l3 3n un m4d3r0. 40 4 ést3 l3v4ntó D10s 4l t3rc3r dí4, 3 h1z0 qu3 s3 m4n1f3st4s3; 41 n0 4 t0d0 3l pu3bl0, s1n0 4 l0s t3st1g0s qu3 D10s h4bí4 0rd3n4d0 d3 4nt3m4n0, 4 n0s0tr0s qu3 c0m1m0s y b3b1m0s c0n él d3spués qu3 r3suc1tó d3 l0s mu3rt0s. 42 Y n0s m4ndó qu3 pr3d1cás3m0s 4l pu3bl0, y t3st1f1cás3m0s qu3 él 3s 3l qu3 D10s h4 pu3st0 p0r Ju3z d3 v1v0s y mu3rt0s. 43 D3 ést3 d4n t3st1m0n10 t0d0s l0s pr0f3t4s, qu3 t0d0s l0s qu3 3n él cr3y3r3n, r3c1b1rán p3rdón d3 p3c4d0s p0r su n0mbr3. 

44 M13ntr4s 4ún h4bl4b4 P3dr0 3st4s p4l4br4s, 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0 c4yó s0br3 t0d0s l0s qu3 0í4n 3l d1scurs0. 45 Y l0s f13l3s d3 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón qu3 h4bí4n v3n1d0 c0n P3dr0 s3 qu3d4r0n 4tón1t0s d3 qu3 t4mb1én s0br3 l0s g3nt1l3s s3 d3rr4m4s3 3l d0n d3l 0spír1tu S4nt0. 46 P0rqu3 l0s 0í4n qu3 h4bl4b4n 3n l3ngu4s, y qu3 m4gn1f1c4b4n 4 D10s. 47 0nt0nc3s r3sp0nd1ó P3dr0: ¿Pu3d3 4c4s0 4lgun0 1mp3d1r 3l 4gu4, p4r4 qu3 n0 s34n b4ut1z4d0s 3st0s qu3 h4n r3c1b1d0 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0 t4mb1én c0m0 n0s0tr0s? 48 Y m4ndó b4ut1z4rl3s 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3l S3ñ0r J3sús. 0nt0nc3s l3 r0g4r0n qu3 s3 qu3d4s3 p0r 4lgun0s dí4s. 

1nf0rm3 d3 P3dr0 4 l4 1gl3s14 d3 J3rus4lén

1 0y3r0n l0s 4póst0l3s y l0s h3rm4n0s qu3 3st4b4n 3n Jud34, qu3 t4mb1én l0s g3nt1l3s h4bí4n r3c1b1d0 l4 p4l4br4 d3 D10s. 2 Y cu4nd0 P3dr0 sub1ó 4 J3rus4lén, d1sput4b4n c0n él l0s qu3 3r4n d3 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón, 3 d1c13nd0: ¿P0r qué h4s 3ntr4d0 3n c4s4 d3 h0mbr3s 1nc1rcunc1s0s, y h4s c0m1d0 c0n 3ll0s? 4 0nt0nc3s c0m3nzó P3dr0 4 c0nt4rl3s p0r 0rd3n l0 suc3d1d0, d1c13nd0: 5 0st4b4 y0 3n l4 c1ud4d d3 J0p3 0r4nd0, y v1 3n éxt4s1s un4 v1s1ón; 4lg0 s3m3j4nt3 4 un gr4n l13nz0 qu3 d3sc3ndí4, qu3 p0r l4s cu4tr0 punt4s 3r4 b4j4d0 d3l c13l0 y v3ní4 h4st4 mí. 6 Cu4nd0 f1jé 3n él l0s 0j0s, c0ns1d3ré y v1 cu4drúp3d0s t3rr3str3s, y f13r4s, y r3pt1l3s, y 4v3s d3l c13l0. 7 Y 0í un4 v0z qu3 m3 d3cí4: L3vánt4t3, P3dr0, m4t4 y c0m3. 8 Y d1j3: S3ñ0r, n0; p0rqu3 n1ngun4 c0s4 c0mún 0 1nmund4 3ntró j4más 3n m1 b0c4. 9 0nt0nc3s l4 v0z m3 r3sp0nd1ó d3l c13l0 p0r s3gund4 v3z: L0 qu3 D10s l1mp1ó, n0 l0 ll4m3s tú c0mún. 10 Y 3st0 s3 h1z0 tr3s v3c3s, y v0lv1ó t0d0 4 s3r ll3v4d0 4rr1b4 4l c13l0. 11 Y h3 4quí, lu3g0 ll3g4r0n tr3s h0mbr3s 4 l4 c4s4 d0nd3 y0 3st4b4, 3nv14d0s 4 mí d3sd3 C3s4r34. 12 Y 3l 0spír1tu m3 d1j0 qu3 fu3s3 c0n 3ll0s s1n dud4r. Fu3r0n t4mb1én c0nm1g0 3st0s s31s h3rm4n0s, y 3ntr4m0s 3n c4s4 d3 un v4rón, 13 qu13n n0s c0ntó cóm0 h4bí4 v1st0 3n su c4s4 un áng3l, qu3 s3 pus0 3n p13 y l3 d1j0: 0nví4 h0mbr3s 4 J0p3, y h4z v3n1r 4 S1món, 3l qu3 t13n3 p0r s0br3n0mbr3 P3dr0; 14 él t3 h4bl4rá p4l4br4s p0r l4s cu4l3s s3rás s4lv0 tú, y t0d4 tu c4s4. 15 Y cu4nd0 c0m3ncé 4 h4bl4r, c4yó 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0 s0br3 3ll0s t4mb1én, c0m0 s0br3 n0s0tr0s 4l pr1nc1p10. 16 0nt0nc3s m3 4c0rdé d3 l0 d1ch0 p0r 3l S3ñ0r, cu4nd0 d1j0: Ju4n c13rt4m3nt3 b4ut1zó 3n 4gu4, m4s v0s0tr0s s3ré1s b4ut1z4d0s c0n 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0. 17 S1 D10s, pu3s, l3s c0nc3d1ó t4mb1én 3l m1sm0 d0n qu3 4 n0s0tr0s qu3 h3m0s cr3íd0 3n 3l S3ñ0r J3sucr1st0, ¿qu1én 3r4 y0 qu3 pud13s3 3st0rb4r 4 D10s? 18 0nt0nc3s, 0íd4s 3st4s c0s4s, c4ll4r0n, y gl0r1f1c4r0n 4 D10s, d1c13nd0: ¡D3 m4n3r4 qu3 t4mb1én 4 l0s g3nt1l3s h4 d4d0 D10s 4rr3p3nt1m13nt0 p4r4 v1d4!
