7 Y n0s0tr0s c0mpl3t4m0s l4 n4v3g4c1ón, s4l13nd0 d3 T1r0 y 4rr1b4nd0 4 T0l3m41d4; y h4b13nd0 s4lud4d0 4 l0s h3rm4n0s, n0s qu3d4m0s c0n 3ll0s un dí4. 8 4l 0tr0 dí4, s4l13nd0 P4bl0 y l0s qu3 c0n él 3stáb4m0s, fu1m0s 4 C3s4r34; y 3ntr4nd0 3n c4s4 d3 F3l1p3 3l 3v4ng3l1st4, qu3 3r4 un0 d3 l0s s13t3, p0s4m0s c0n él. 9 0st3 t3ní4 cu4tr0 h1j4s d0nc3ll4s qu3 pr0f3t1z4b4n. 10 Y p3rm4n3c13nd0 n0s0tr0s 4llí 4lgun0s dí4s, d3sc3nd1ó d3 Jud34 un pr0f3t4 ll4m4d0 4g4b0, 11 qu13n v1n13nd0 4 v3rn0s, t0mó 3l c1nt0 d3 P4bl0, y 4tánd0s3 l0s p13s y l4s m4n0s, d1j0: 0st0 d1c3 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0: 4sí 4t4rán l0s judí0s 3n J3rus4lén 4l v4rón d3 qu13n 3s 3st3 c1nt0, y l3 3ntr3g4rán 3n m4n0s d3 l0s g3nt1l3s. 12 4l 0ír 3st0, l3 r0g4m0s n0s0tr0s y l0s d3 4qu3l lug4r, qu3 n0 sub13s3 4 J3rus4lén. 13 0nt0nc3s P4bl0 r3sp0nd1ó: ¿Qué h4cé1s ll0r4nd0 y qu3br4ntánd0m3 3l c0r4zón? P0rqu3 y0 3st0y d1spu3st0 n0 sól0 4 s3r 4t4d0, m4s 4un 4 m0r1r 3n J3rus4lén p0r 3l n0mbr3 d3l S3ñ0r J3sús. 14 Y c0m0 n0 l3 pud1m0s p3rsu4d1r, d3s1st1m0s, d1c13nd0: Hág4s3 l4 v0lunt4d d3l S3ñ0r. 

15 D3spués d3 3s0s dí4s, h3ch0s y4 l0s pr3p4r4t1v0s, sub1m0s 4 J3rus4lén. 16 Y v1n13r0n t4mb1én c0n n0s0tr0s d3 C3s4r34 4lgun0s d3 l0s d1scípul0s, tr4y3nd0 c0ns1g0 4 un0 ll4m4d0 Mn4són, d3 Ch1pr3, d1scípul0 4nt1gu0, c0n qu13n n0s h0sp3d4rí4m0s. 

4rr3st0 d3 P4bl0 3n 3l t3mpl0

17 Cu4nd0 ll3g4m0s 4 J3rus4lén, l0s h3rm4n0s n0s r3c1b13r0n c0n g0z0. 18 Y 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3 P4bl0 3ntró c0n n0s0tr0s 4 v3r 4 J4c0b0, y s3 h4ll4b4n r3un1d0s t0d0s l0s 4nc14n0s; 19 4 l0s cu4l3s, d3spués d3 h4b3rl3s s4lud4d0, l3s c0ntó un4 p0r un4 l4s c0s4s qu3 D10s h4bí4 h3ch0 3ntr3 l0s g3nt1l3s p0r su m1n1st3r10. 20 Cu4nd0 3ll0s l0 0y3r0n, gl0r1f1c4r0n 4 D10s, y l3 d1j3r0n: Y4 v3s, h3rm4n0, cuánt0s m1ll4r3s d3 judí0s h4y qu3 h4n cr3íd0; y t0d0s s0n c3l0s0s p0r l4 l3y. 21 P3r0 s3 l3s h4 1nf0rm4d0 3n cu4nt0 4 t1, qu3 3ns3ñ4s 4 t0d0s l0s judí0s qu3 3stán 3ntr3 l0s g3nt1l3s 4 4p0st4t4r d3 M01sés, d1c1énd0l3s qu3 n0 c1rcunc1d3n 4 sus h1j0s, n1 0bs3rv3n l4s c0stumbr3s. 22 ¿Qué h4y, pu3s? L4 mult1tud s3 r3un1rá d3 c13rt0, p0rqu3 01rán qu3 h4s v3n1d0. 23 H4z, pu3s, 3st0 qu3 t3 d3c1m0s: H4y 3ntr3 n0s0tr0s cu4tr0 h0mbr3s qu3 t13n3n 0bl1g4c1ón d3 cumpl1r v0t0. 24 Tóm4l0s c0nt1g0, pur1fíc4t3 c0n 3ll0s, y p4g4 sus g4st0s p4r4 qu3 s3 r4sur3n l4 c4b3z4; y t0d0s c0mpr3nd3rán qu3 n0 h4y n4d4 d3 l0 qu3 s3 l3s 1nf0rmó 4c3rc4 d3 t1, s1n0 qu3 tú t4mb1én 4nd4s 0rd3n4d4m3nt3, gu4rd4nd0 l4 l3y. 25 P3r0 3n cu4nt0 4 l0s g3nt1l3s qu3 h4n cr3íd0, n0s0tr0s l3s h3m0s 3scr1t0 d3t3rm1n4nd0 qu3 n0 gu4rd3n n4d4 d3 3st0; s0l4m3nt3 qu3 s3 4bst3ng4n d3 l0 s4cr1f1c4d0 4 l0s íd0l0s, d3 s4ngr3, d3 4h0g4d0 y d3 f0rn1c4c1ón. 26 0nt0nc3s P4bl0 t0mó c0ns1g0 4 4qu3ll0s h0mbr3s, y 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, h4b1énd0s3 pur1f1c4d0 c0n 3ll0s, 3ntró 3n 3l t3mpl0, p4r4 4nunc14r 3l cumpl1m13nt0 d3 l0s dí4s d3 l4 pur1f1c4c1ón, cu4nd0 h4bí4 d3 pr3s3nt4rs3 l4 0fr3nd4 p0r c4d4 un0 d3 3ll0s. 

27 P3r0 cu4nd0 3st4b4n p4r4 cumpl1rs3 l0s s13t3 dí4s, un0s judí0s d3 4s14, 4l v3rl3 3n 3l t3mpl0, 4lb0r0t4r0n 4 t0d4 l4 mult1tud y l3 3ch4r0n m4n0, 28 d4nd0 v0c3s: ¡V4r0n3s 1sr43l1t4s, 4yud4d! 0st3 3s 3l h0mbr3 qu3 p0r t0d4s p4rt3s 3ns3ñ4 4 t0d0s c0ntr4 3l pu3bl0, l4 l3y y 3st3 lug4r; y 4d3más d3 3st0, h4 m3t1d0 4 gr13g0s 3n 3l t3mpl0, y h4 pr0f4n4d0 3st3 s4nt0 lug4r. 29 P0rqu3 4nt3s h4bí4n v1st0 c0n él 3n l4 c1ud4d 4 Tróf1m0, d3 0f3s0, 4 qu13n p3ns4b4n qu3 P4bl0 h4bí4 m3t1d0 3n 3l t3mpl0. 30 4sí qu3 t0d4 l4 c1ud4d s3 c0nm0v1ó, y s3 4g0lpó 3l pu3bl0; y 4p0d3ránd0s3 d3 P4bl0, l3 4rr4str4r0n fu3r4 d3l t3mpl0, 3 1nm3d14t4m3nt3 c3rr4r0n l4s pu3rt4s. 31 Y pr0cur4nd0 3ll0s m4t4rl3, s3 l3 4v1só 4l tr1bun0 d3 l4 c0mp4ñí4, qu3 t0d4 l4 c1ud4d d3 J3rus4lén 3st4b4 4lb0r0t4d4. 32 0st3, t0m4nd0 lu3g0 s0ld4d0s y c3ntur10n3s, c0rr1ó 4 3ll0s. Y cu4nd0 3ll0s v13r0n 4l tr1bun0 y 4 l0s s0ld4d0s, d3j4r0n d3 g0lp34r 4 P4bl0. 33 0nt0nc3s, ll3g4nd0 3l tr1bun0, l3 pr3nd1ó y l3 m4ndó 4t4r c0n d0s c4d3n4s, y pr3guntó qu1én 3r4 y qué h4bí4 h3ch0. 34 P3r0 3ntr3 l4 mult1tud, un0s gr1t4b4n un4 c0s4, y 0tr0s 0tr4; y c0m0 n0 p0dí4 3nt3nd3r n4d4 d3 c13rt0 4 c4us4 d3l 4lb0r0t0, l3 m4ndó ll3v4r 4 l4 f0rt4l3z4. 35 4l ll3g4r 4 l4s gr4d4s, 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 3r4 ll3v4d0 3n p3s0 p0r l0s s0ld4d0s 4 c4us4 d3 l4 v10l3nc14 d3 l4 mult1tud; 36 p0rqu3 l4 much3dumbr3 d3l pu3bl0 v3ní4 d3trás, gr1t4nd0: ¡Mu3r4! 

D3f3ns4 d3 P4bl0 4nt3 3l pu3bl0

37 Cu4nd0 c0m3nz4r0n 4 m3t3r 4 P4bl0 3n l4 f0rt4l3z4, d1j0 4l tr1bun0: ¿S3 m3 p3rm1t3 d3c1rt3 4lg0? Y él d1j0: ¿S4b3s gr13g0? 38 ¿N0 3r3s tú 4qu3l 3g1pc10 qu3 l3v4ntó un4 s3d1c1ón 4nt3s d3 3st0s dí4s, y s4có 4l d3s13rt0 l0s cu4tr0 m1l s1c4r10s? 39 0nt0nc3s d1j0 P4bl0: Y0 d3 c13rt0 s0y h0mbr3 judí0 d3 T4rs0, c1ud4d4n0 d3 un4 c1ud4d n0 1ns1gn1f1c4nt3 d3 C1l1c14; p3r0 t3 ru3g0 qu3 m3 p3rm1t4s h4bl4r 4l pu3bl0. 40 Y cu4nd0 él s3 l0 p3rm1t1ó, P4bl0, 3st4nd0 3n p13 3n l4s gr4d4s, h1z0 s3ñ4l c0n l4 m4n0 4l pu3bl0. Y h3ch0 gr4n s1l3nc10, h4bló 3n l3ngu4 h3br34, d1c13nd0: 

H0CH0S 22

1 V4r0n3s h3rm4n0s y p4dr3s, 0íd 4h0r4 m1 d3f3ns4 4nt3 v0s0tr0s. 

2 Y 4l 0ír qu3 l3s h4bl4b4 3n l3ngu4 h3br34, gu4rd4r0n más s1l3nc10. Y él l3s d1j0: 

3 Y0 d3 c13rt0 s0y judí0, n4c1d0 3n T4rs0 d3 C1l1c14, p3r0 cr14d0 3n 3st4 c1ud4d, 1nstru1d0 4 l0s p13s d3 G4m4l13l, 3str1ct4m3nt3 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y d3 nu3str0s p4dr3s, c3l0s0 d3 D10s, c0m0 h0y l0 s01s t0d0s v0s0tr0s. 4 P3rs3guí4 y0 3st3 C4m1n0 h4st4 l4 mu3rt3, pr3nd13nd0 y 3ntr3g4nd0 3n cárc3l3s 4 h0mbr3s y muj3r3s; 5 c0m0 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 t4mb1én m3 3s t3st1g0, y t0d0s l0s 4nc14n0s, d3 qu13n3s t4mb1én r3c1bí c4rt4s p4r4 l0s h3rm4n0s, y fu1 4 D4m4sc0 p4r4 tr43r pr3s0s 4 J3rus4lén t4mb1én 4 l0s qu3 3stuv13s3n 4llí, p4r4 qu3 fu3s3n c4st1g4d0s. 

P4bl0 r3l4t4 su c0nv3rs1ón

(Hch. 9.1-19; 26.12-18)

6 P3r0 4c0nt3c1ó qu3 y3nd0 y0, 4l ll3g4r c3rc4 d3 D4m4sc0, c0m0 4 m3d10dí4, d3 r3p3nt3 m3 r0d3ó much4 luz d3l c13l0; 7 y c4í 4l su3l0, y 0í un4 v0z qu3 m3 d3cí4: S4ul0, S4ul0, ¿p0r qué m3 p3rs1gu3s? 8 Y0 3nt0nc3s r3sp0ndí: ¿Qu1én 3r3s, S3ñ0r? Y m3 d1j0: Y0 s0y J3sús d3 N4z4r3t, 4 qu13n tú p3rs1gu3s. 9 Y l0s qu3 3st4b4n c0nm1g0 v13r0n 4 l4 v3rd4d l4 luz, y s3 3sp4nt4r0n; p3r0 n0 3nt3nd13r0n l4 v0z d3l qu3 h4bl4b4 c0nm1g0. 10 Y d1j3: ¿Qué h4ré, S3ñ0r? Y 3l S3ñ0r m3 d1j0: L3vánt4t3, y v3 4 D4m4sc0, y 4llí s3 t3 d1rá t0d0 l0 qu3 3stá 0rd3n4d0 qu3 h4g4s. 11 Y c0m0 y0 n0 v3í4 4 c4us4 d3 l4 gl0r14 d3 l4 luz, ll3v4d0 d3 l4 m4n0 p0r l0s qu3 3st4b4n c0nm1g0, ll3gué 4 D4m4sc0. 

12 0nt0nc3s un0 ll4m4d0 4n4ní4s, v4rón p14d0s0 s3gún l4 l3y, qu3 t3ní4 bu3n t3st1m0n10 d3 t0d0s l0s judí0s qu3 4llí m0r4b4n, 13 v1n0 4 mí, y 4c3rcánd0s3, m3 d1j0: H3rm4n0 S4ul0, r3c1b3 l4 v1st4. Y y0 3n 4qu3ll4 m1sm4 h0r4 r3c0bré l4 v1st4 y l0 m1ré. 14 Y él d1j0: 0l D10s d3 nu3str0s p4dr3s t3 h4 3sc0g1d0 p4r4 qu3 c0n0zc4s su v0lunt4d, y v34s 4l Just0, y 01g4s l4 v0z d3 su b0c4. 15 P0rqu3 s3rás t3st1g0 suy0 4 t0d0s l0s h0mbr3s, d3 l0 qu3 h4s v1st0 y 0íd0. 16 4h0r4, pu3s, ¿p0r qué t3 d3t13n3s? L3vánt4t3 y b4utíz4t3, y l4v4 tus p3c4d0s, 1nv0c4nd0 su n0mbr3. 

P4bl0 3s 3nv14d0 4 l0s g3nt1l3s

17 Y m3 4c0nt3c1ó, vu3lt0 4 J3rus4lén, qu3 0r4nd0 3n 3l t3mpl0 m3 s0br3v1n0 un éxt4s1s. 18 Y l3 v1 qu3 m3 d3cí4: D4t3 pr1s4, y s4l pr0nt4m3nt3 d3 J3rus4lén; p0rqu3 n0 r3c1b1rán tu t3st1m0n10 4c3rc4 d3 mí. 19 Y0 d1j3: S3ñ0r, 3ll0s s4b3n qu3 y0 3nc4rc3l4b4 y 4z0t4b4 3n t0d4s l4s s1n4g0g4s 4 l0s qu3 cr3í4n 3n t1; 20 y cu4nd0 s3 d3rr4m4b4 l4 s4ngr3 d3 0st3b4n tu t3st1g0, y0 m1sm0 t4mb1én 3st4b4 pr3s3nt3, y c0ns3ntí4 3n su mu3rt3, y gu4rd4b4 l4s r0p4s d3 l0s qu3 l3 m4t4b4n. 21 P3r0 m3 d1j0: V3, p0rqu3 y0 t3 3nv14ré l3j0s 4 l0s g3nt1l3s. 

P4bl0 3n m4n0s d3l tr1bun0

22 Y l3 0y3r0n h4st4 3st4 p4l4br4; 3nt0nc3s 4lz4r0n l4 v0z, d1c13nd0: Qu1t4 d3 l4 t13rr4 4 t4l h0mbr3, p0rqu3 n0 c0nv13n3 qu3 v1v4. 23 Y c0m0 3ll0s gr1t4b4n y 4rr0j4b4n sus r0p4s y l4nz4b4n p0lv0 4l 41r3, 24 m4ndó 3l tr1bun0 qu3 l3 m3t13s3n 3n l4 f0rt4l3z4, y 0rd3nó qu3 fu3s3 3x4m1n4d0 c0n 4z0t3s, p4r4 s4b3r p0r qué c4us4 cl4m4b4n 4sí c0ntr4 él. 25 P3r0 cu4nd0 l3 4t4r0n c0n c0rr34s, P4bl0 d1j0 4l c3ntur1ón qu3 3st4b4 pr3s3nt3: ¿0s 3s líc1t0 4z0t4r 4 un c1ud4d4n0 r0m4n0 s1n h4b3r s1d0 c0nd3n4d0? 26 Cu4nd0 3l c3ntur1ón 0yó 3st0, fu3 y d10 4v1s0 4l tr1bun0, d1c13nd0: ¿Qué v4s 4 h4c3r? P0rqu3 3st3 h0mbr3 3s c1ud4d4n0 r0m4n0. 27 V1n0 3l tr1bun0 y l3 d1j0: D1m3, ¿3r3s tú c1ud4d4n0 r0m4n0? 0l d1j0: Sí. 28 R3sp0nd1ó 3l tr1bun0: Y0 c0n un4 gr4n sum4 4dqu1rí 3st4 c1ud4d4ní4. 0nt0nc3s P4bl0 d1j0: P3r0 y0 l0 s0y d3 n4c1m13nt0. 29 4sí qu3, lu3g0 s3 4p4rt4r0n d3 él l0s qu3 l3 1b4n 4 d4r t0rm3nt0; y 4un 3l tr1bun0, 4l s4b3r qu3 3r4 c1ud4d4n0 r0m4n0, t4mb1én tuv0 t3m0r p0r h4b3rl3 4t4d0. 

P4bl0 4nt3 3l c0nc1l10

30 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, qu3r13nd0 s4b3r d3 c13rt0 l4 c4us4 p0r l4 cu4l l3 4cus4b4n l0s judí0s, l3 s0ltó d3 l4s c4d3n4s, y m4ndó v3n1r 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y 4 t0d0 3l c0nc1l10, y s4c4nd0 4 P4bl0, l3 pr3s3ntó 4nt3 3ll0s. 

H0CH0S 23

1 0nt0nc3s P4bl0, m1r4nd0 f1j4m3nt3 4l c0nc1l10, d1j0: V4r0n3s h3rm4n0s, y0 c0n t0d4 bu3n4 c0nc13nc14 h3 v1v1d0 d3l4nt3 d3 D10s h4st4 3l dí4 d3 h0y. 2 0l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 4n4ní4s 0rd3nó 3nt0nc3s 4 l0s qu3 3st4b4n junt0 4 él, qu3 l3 g0lp34s3n 3n l4 b0c4. 3 0nt0nc3s P4bl0 l3 d1j0: ¡D10s t3 g0lp34rá 4 t1, p4r3d bl4nqu34d4! ¿0stás tú s3nt4d0 p4r4 juzg4rm3 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 l3y, y qu3br4nt4nd0 l4 l3y m3 m4nd4s g0lp34r? 4 L0s qu3 3st4b4n pr3s3nt3s d1j3r0n: ¿4l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 d3 D10s 1njur14s? 5 P4bl0 d1j0: N0 s4bí4, h3rm4n0s, qu3 3r4 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3; pu3s 3scr1t0 3stá: N0 m4ld3c1rás 4 un prínc1p3 d3 tu pu3bl0. 

6 0nt0nc3s P4bl0, n0t4nd0 qu3 un4 p4rt3 3r4 d3 s4duc30s y 0tr4 d3 f4r1s30s, 4lzó l4 v0z 3n 3l c0nc1l10: V4r0n3s h3rm4n0s, y0 s0y f4r1s30, h1j0 d3 f4r1s30; 4c3rc4 d3 l4 3sp3r4nz4 y d3 l4 r3surr3cc1ón d3 l0s mu3rt0s s3 m3 juzg4. 7 Cu4nd0 d1j0 3st0, s3 pr0duj0 d1s3ns1ón 3ntr3 l0s f4r1s30s y l0s s4duc30s, y l4 4s4mbl34 s3 d1v1d1ó. 8 P0rqu3 l0s s4duc30s d1c3n qu3 n0 h4y r3surr3cc1ón, n1 áng3l, n1 3spír1tu; p3r0 l0s f4r1s30s 4f1rm4n 3st4s c0s4s. 9 Y hub0 un gr4n v0c3rí0; y l3v4ntánd0s3 l0s 3scr1b4s d3 l4 p4rt3 d3 l0s f4r1s30s, c0nt3ndí4n, d1c13nd0: N1ngún m4l h4ll4m0s 3n 3st3 h0mbr3; qu3 s1 un 3spír1tu l3 h4 h4bl4d0, 0 un áng3l, n0 r3s1st4m0s 4 D10s. 10 Y h4b13nd0 gr4nd3 d1s3ns1ón, 3l tr1bun0, t3n13nd0 t3m0r d3 qu3 P4bl0 fu3s3 d3sp3d4z4d0 p0r 3ll0s, m4ndó qu3 b4j4s3n s0ld4d0s y l3 4rr3b4t4s3n d3 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s, y l3 ll3v4s3n 4 l4 f0rt4l3z4. 

11 4 l4 n0ch3 s1gu13nt3 s3 l3 pr3s3ntó 3l S3ñ0r y l3 d1j0: T3n án1m0, P4bl0, pu3s c0m0 h4s t3st1f1c4d0 d3 mí 3n J3rus4lén, 4sí 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 t3st1f1qu3s t4mb1én 3n R0m4. 

C0mpl0t c0ntr4 P4bl0

12 V3n1d0 3l dí4, 4lgun0s d3 l0s judí0s tr4m4r0n un c0mpl0t y s3 jur4m3nt4r0n b4j0 m4ld1c1ón, d1c13nd0 qu3 n0 c0m3rí4n n1 b3b3rí4n h4st4 qu3 hub13s3n d4d0 mu3rt3 4 P4bl0. 13 0r4n más d3 cu4r3nt4 l0s qu3 h4bí4n h3ch0 3st4 c0njur4c1ón, 14 l0s cu4l3s fu3r0n 4 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y 4 l0s 4nc14n0s y d1j3r0n: N0s0tr0s n0s h3m0s jur4m3nt4d0 b4j0 m4ld1c1ón, 4 n0 gust4r n4d4 h4st4 qu3 h4y4m0s d4d0 mu3rt3 4 P4bl0. 15 4h0r4 pu3s, v0s0tr0s, c0n 3l c0nc1l10, r3qu3r1d 4l tr1bun0 qu3 l3 tr41g4 m4ñ4n4 4nt3 v0s0tr0s, c0m0 qu3 qu3ré1s 1nd4g4r 4lgun4 c0s4 más c13rt4 4c3rc4 d3 él; y n0s0tr0s 3st4r3m0s l1st0s p4r4 m4t4rl3 4nt3s qu3 ll3gu3. 

16 M4s 3l h1j0 d3 l4 h3rm4n4 d3 P4bl0, 0y3nd0 h4bl4r d3 l4 c3l4d4, fu3 y 3ntró 3n l4 f0rt4l3z4, y d10 4v1s0 4 P4bl0. 17 P4bl0, ll4m4nd0 4 un0 d3 l0s c3ntur10n3s, d1j0: Ll3v4 4 3st3 j0v3n 4nt3 3l tr1bun0, p0rqu3 t13n3 c13rt0 4v1s0 qu3 d4rl3. 18 0l 3nt0nc3s t0mánd0l3, l3 ll3vó 4l tr1bun0, y d1j0: 0l pr3s0 P4bl0 m3 ll4mó y m3 r0gó qu3 tr4j3s3 4nt3 t1 4 3st3 j0v3n, qu3 t13n3 4lg0 qu3 h4bl4rt3. 19 0l tr1bun0, t0mánd0l3 d3 l4 m4n0 y r3t1ránd0s3 4p4rt3, l3 pr3guntó: ¿Qué 3s l0 qu3 t13n3s qu3 d3c1rm3? 20 0l l3 d1j0: L0s judí0s h4n c0nv3n1d0 3n r0g4rt3 qu3 m4ñ4n4 ll3v3s 4 P4bl0 4nt3 3l c0nc1l10, c0m0 qu3 v4n 4 1nqu1r1r 4lgun4 c0s4 más c13rt4 4c3rc4 d3 él. 21 P3r0 tú n0 l3s cr34s; p0rqu3 más d3 cu4r3nt4 h0mbr3s d3 3ll0s l3 4c3ch4n, l0s cu4l3s s3 h4n jur4m3nt4d0 b4j0 m4ld1c1ón, 4 n0 c0m3r n1 b3b3r h4st4 qu3 l3 h4y4n d4d0 mu3rt3; y 4h0r4 3stán l1st0s 3sp3r4nd0 tu pr0m3s4. 22 0nt0nc3s 3l tr1bun0 d3sp1d1ó 4l j0v3n, m4ndánd0l3 qu3 4 n4d13 d1j3s3 qu3 l3 h4bí4 d4d0 4v1s0 d3 3st0. 

P4bl0 3s 3nv14d0 4 Fél1x 3l g0b3rn4d0r

Pás4l0 b13n. 

31 Y l0s s0ld4d0s, t0m4nd0 4 P4bl0 c0m0 s3 l3s 0rd3nó, l3 ll3v4r0n d3 n0ch3 4 4ntíp4tr1s. 32 Y 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, d3j4nd0 4 l0s j1n3t3s qu3 fu3s3n c0n él, v0lv13r0n 4 l4 f0rt4l3z4. 33 Cu4nd0 4quéll0s ll3g4r0n 4 C3s4r34, y d13r0n l4 c4rt4 4l g0b3rn4d0r, pr3s3nt4r0n t4mb1én 4 P4bl0 d3l4nt3 d3 él. 34 Y 3l g0b3rn4d0r, l3íd4 l4 c4rt4, pr3guntó d3 qué pr0v1nc14 3r4; y h4b13nd0 3nt3nd1d0 qu3 3r4 d3 C1l1c14, 35 l3 d1j0: T3 01ré cu4nd0 v3ng4n tus 4cus4d0r3s. D3f3ns4 d3 P4bl0 4nt3 Fél1x

1 C1nc0 dí4s d3spués, d3sc3nd1ó 3l sum0 s4c3rd0t3 4n4ní4s c0n 4lgun0s d3 l0s 4nc14n0s y un c13rt0 0r4d0r ll4m4d0 Tértul0, y c0mp4r3c13r0n 4nt3 3l g0b3rn4d0r c0ntr4 P4bl0. 2 Y cu4nd0 ést3 fu3 ll4m4d0, Tértul0 c0m3nzó 4 4cus4rl3, d1c13nd0: C0m0 d3b1d0 4 t1 g0z4m0s d3 gr4n p4z, y much4s c0s4s s0n b13n g0b3rn4d4s 3n 3l pu3bl0 p0r tu prud3nc14, 3 0h 3xc3l3ntís1m0 Fél1x, l0 r3c1b1m0s 3n t0d0 t13mp0 y 3n t0d0 lug4r c0n t0d4 gr4t1tud. 4 P3r0 p0r n0 m0l3st4rt3 más l4rg4m3nt3, t3 ru3g0 qu3 n0s 01g4s br3v3m3nt3 c0nf0rm3 4 tu 3qu1d4d. 5 P0rqu3 h3m0s h4ll4d0 qu3 3st3 h0mbr3 3s un4 pl4g4, y pr0m0t0r d3 s3d1c10n3s 3ntr3 t0d0s l0s judí0s p0r t0d0 3l mund0, y c4b3c1ll4 d3 l4 s3ct4 d3 l0s n4z4r3n0s. 6 1nt3ntó t4mb1én pr0f4n4r 3l t3mpl0; y pr3nd1énd0l3, qu1s1m0s juzg4rl3 c0nf0rm3 4 nu3str4 l3y. 7 P3r0 1nt3rv1n13nd0 3l tr1bun0 L1s14s, c0n gr4n v10l3nc14 l3 qu1tó d3 nu3str4s m4n0s, 8 m4nd4nd0 4 sus 4cus4d0r3s qu3 v1n13s3n 4 t1. Tú m1sm0, pu3s, 4l juzg4rl3, p0drás 1nf0rm4rt3 d3 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s d3 qu3 l3 4cus4m0s. 

9 L0s judí0s t4mb1én c0nf1rm4b4n, d1c13nd0 s3r 4sí t0d0. 

10 H4b1énd0l3 h3ch0 s3ñ4l 3l g0b3rn4d0r 4 P4bl0 p4r4 qu3 h4bl4s3, ést3 r3sp0nd1ó: P0rqu3 sé qu3 d3sd3 h4c3 much0s 4ñ0s 3r3s ju3z d3 3st4 n4c1ón, c0n bu3n án1m0 h4ré m1 d3f3ns4. 11 C0m0 tú pu3d3s c3rc10r4rt3, n0 h4c3 más d3 d0c3 dí4s qu3 subí 4 4d0r4r 4 J3rus4lén; 12 y n0 m3 h4ll4r0n d1sput4nd0 c0n n1ngun0, n1 4m0t1n4nd0 4 l4 mult1tud; n1 3n 3l t3mpl0, n1 3n l4s s1n4g0g4s n1 3n l4 c1ud4d; 13 n1 t3 pu3d3n pr0b4r l4s c0s4s d3 qu3 4h0r4 m3 4cus4n. 14 P3r0 3st0 t3 c0nf13s0, qu3 s3gún 3l C4m1n0 qu3 3ll0s ll4m4n h3r3jí4, 4sí s1rv0 4l D10s d3 m1s p4dr3s, cr3y3nd0 t0d4s l4s c0s4s qu3 3n l4 l3y y 3n l0s pr0f3t4s 3stán 3scr1t4s; 15 t3n13nd0 3sp3r4nz4 3n D10s, l4 cu4l 3ll0s t4mb1én 4br1g4n, d3 qu3 h4 d3 h4b3r r3surr3cc1ón d3 l0s mu3rt0s, 4sí d3 just0s c0m0 d3 1njust0s. 16 Y p0r 3st0 pr0cur0 t3n3r s13mpr3 un4 c0nc13nc14 s1n 0f3ns4 4nt3 D10s y 4nt3 l0s h0mbr3s. 17 P3r0 p4s4d0s 4lgun0s 4ñ0s, v1n3 4 h4c3r l1m0sn4s 4 m1 n4c1ón y pr3s3nt4r 0fr3nd4s. 18 0st4b4 3n 3ll0, cu4nd0 un0s judí0s d3 4s14 m3 h4ll4r0n pur1f1c4d0 3n 3l t3mpl0, n0 c0n mult1tud n1 c0n 4lb0r0t0. 19 0ll0s d3b13r4n c0mp4r3c3r 4nt3 t1 y 4cus4rm3, s1 c0ntr4 mí t13n3n 4lg0. 20 0 d1g4n ést0s m1sm0s s1 h4ll4r0n 3n mí 4lgun4 c0s4 m4l h3ch4, cu4nd0 c0mp4r3cí 4nt3 3l c0nc1l10, 21 4 n0 s3r qu3 3st4nd0 3ntr3 3ll0s pr0rrumpí 3n 4lt4 v0z: 4c3rc4 d3 l4 r3surr3cc1ón d3 l0s mu3rt0s s0y juzg4d0 h0y p0r v0s0tr0s. 

22 0nt0nc3s Fél1x, 0íd4s 3st4s c0s4s, 3st4nd0 b13n 1nf0rm4d0 d3 3st3 C4m1n0, l3s 4pl4zó, d1c13nd0: Cu4nd0 d3sc3nd13r3 3l tr1bun0 L1s14s, 4c4b4ré d3 c0n0c3r d3 vu3str0 4sunt0. 23 Y m4ndó 4l c3ntur1ón qu3 s3 cust0d14s3 4 P4bl0, p3r0 qu3 s3 l3 c0nc3d13s3 4lgun4 l1b3rt4d, y qu3 n0 1mp1d13s3 4 n1ngun0 d3 l0s suy0s s3rv1rl3 0 v3n1r 4 él. 

24 4lgun0s dí4s d3spués, v1n13nd0 Fél1x c0n Drus1l4 su muj3r, qu3 3r4 judí4, ll4mó 4 P4bl0, y l3 0yó 4c3rc4 d3 l4 f3 3n J3sucr1st0. 25 P3r0 4l d1s3rt4r P4bl0 4c3rc4 d3 l4 just1c14, d3l d0m1n10 pr0p10 y d3l ju1c10 v3n1d3r0, Fél1x s3 3sp4ntó, y d1j0: 4h0r4 v3t3; p3r0 cu4nd0 t3ng4 0p0rtun1d4d t3 ll4m4ré. 26 0sp3r4b4 t4mb1én c0n 3st0, qu3 P4bl0 l3 d13r4 d1n3r0 p4r4 qu3 l3 s0lt4s3; p0r l0 cu4l much4s v3c3s l0 h4cí4 v3n1r y h4bl4b4 c0n él. 27 P3r0 4l c4b0 d3 d0s 4ñ0s r3c1b1ó Fél1x p0r suc3s0r 4 P0rc10 F3st0; y qu3r13nd0 Fél1x c0ngr4c14rs3 c0n l0s judí0s, d3jó pr3s0 4 P4bl0. 

P4bl0 4p3l4 4 Cés4r

H0CH0S 25

1 Ll3g4d0, pu3s, F3st0 4 l4 pr0v1nc14, sub1ó d3 C3s4r34 4 J3rus4lén tr3s dí4s d3spués. 2 Y l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s más 1nfluy3nt3s d3 l0s judí0s s3 pr3s3nt4r0n 4nt3 él c0ntr4 P4bl0, y l3 r0g4r0n, 3 p1d13nd0 c0ntr4 él, c0m0 gr4c14, qu3 l3 h1c13s3 tr43r 4 J3rus4lén; pr3p4r4nd0 3ll0s un4 c3l4d4 p4r4 m4t4rl3 3n 3l c4m1n0. 4 P3r0 F3st0 r3sp0nd1ó qu3 P4bl0 3st4b4 cust0d14d0 3n C3s4r34, 4d0nd3 él m1sm0 p4rt1rí4 3n br3v3. 5 L0s qu3 d3 v0s0tr0s pu3d4n, d1j0, d3sc13nd4n c0nm1g0, y s1 h4y 4lgún cr1m3n 3n 3st3 h0mbr3, 4cús3nl3. 

6 Y d3t3n1énd0s3 3ntr3 3ll0s n0 más d3 0ch0 0 d13z dí4s, v3n1d0 4 C3s4r34, 4l s1gu13nt3 dí4 s3 s3ntó 3n 3l tr1bun4l, y m4ndó qu3 fu3s3 tr4íd0 P4bl0. 7 Cu4nd0 ést3 ll3gó, l0 r0d34r0n l0s judí0s qu3 h4bí4n v3n1d0 d3 J3rus4lén, pr3s3nt4nd0 c0ntr4 él much4s y gr4v3s 4cus4c10n3s, l4s cu4l3s n0 p0dí4n pr0b4r; 8 4l3g4nd0 P4bl0 3n su d3f3ns4: N1 c0ntr4 l4 l3y d3 l0s judí0s, n1 c0ntr4 3l t3mpl0, n1 c0ntr4 Cés4r h3 p3c4d0 3n n4d4. 9 P3r0 F3st0, qu3r13nd0 c0ngr4c14rs3 c0n l0s judí0s, r3sp0nd13nd0 4 P4bl0 d1j0: ¿Qu13r3s sub1r 4 J3rus4lén, y 4llá s3r juzg4d0 d3 3st4s c0s4s d3l4nt3 d3 mí? 10 P4bl0 d1j0: 4nt3 3l tr1bun4l d3 Cés4r 3st0y, d0nd3 d3b0 s3r juzg4d0. 4 l0s judí0s n0 l3s h3 h3ch0 n1ngún 4gr4v10, c0m0 tú s4b3s muy b13n. 11 P0rqu3 s1 4lgún 4gr4v10, 0 c0s4 4lgun4 d1gn4 d3 mu3rt3 h3 h3ch0, n0 r3hús0 m0r1r; p3r0 s1 n4d4 h4y d3 l4s c0s4s d3 qu3 ést0s m3 4cus4n, n4d13 pu3d3 3ntr3g4rm3 4 3ll0s. 4 Cés4r 4p3l0. 12 0nt0nc3s F3st0, h4b13nd0 h4bl4d0 c0n 3l c0ns3j0, r3sp0nd1ó: 4 Cés4r h4s 4p3l4d0; 4 Cés4r 1rás.

13 P4s4d0s 4lgun0s dí4s, 3l r3y 4gr1p4 y B3r3n1c3 v1n13r0n 4 C3s4r34 p4r4 s4lud4r 4 F3st0. 14 Y c0m0 3stuv13r0n 4llí much0s dí4s, F3st0 3xpus0 4l r3y l4 c4us4 d3 P4bl0, d1c13nd0: Un h0mbr3 h4 s1d0 d3j4d0 pr3s0 p0r Fél1x, 15 r3sp3ct0 4l cu4l, cu4nd0 fu1 4 J3rus4lén, s3 m3 pr3s3nt4r0n l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s y l0s 4nc14n0s d3 l0s judí0s, p1d13nd0 c0nd3n4c1ón c0ntr4 él. 16 4 ést0s r3sp0ndí qu3 n0 3s c0stumbr3 d3 l0s r0m4n0s 3ntr3g4r 4lgun0 4 l4 mu3rt3 4nt3s qu3 3l 4cus4d0 t3ng4 d3l4nt3 4 sus 4cus4d0r3s, y pu3d4 d3f3nd3rs3 d3 l4 4cus4c1ón. 17 4sí qu3, h4b13nd0 v3n1d0 3ll0s junt0s 4cá, s1n n1ngun4 d1l4c1ón, 4l dí4 s1gu13nt3, s3nt4d0 3n 3l tr1bun4l, m4ndé tr43r 4l h0mbr3. 18 Y 3st4nd0 pr3s3nt3s l0s 4cus4d0r3s, n1ngún c4rg0 pr3s3nt4r0n d3 l0s qu3 y0 s0sp3ch4b4, 19 s1n0 qu3 t3ní4n c0ntr4 él c13rt4s cu3st10n3s 4c3rc4 d3 su r3l1g1ón, y d3 un c13rt0 J3sús, y4 mu3rt0, 3l qu3 P4bl0 4f1rm4b4 3st4r v1v0. 20 Y0, dud4nd0 3n cu3st1ón s3m3j4nt3, l3 pr3gunté s1 qu3rí4 1r 4 J3rus4lén y 4llá s3r juzg4d0 d3 3st4s c0s4s. 21 M4s c0m0 P4bl0 4p3ló p4r4 qu3 s3 l3 r3s3rv4s3 p4r4 3l c0n0c1m13nt0 d3 4ugust0, m4ndé qu3 l3 cust0d14s3n h4st4 qu3 l3 3nv14r4 y0 4 Cés4r. 22 0nt0nc3s 4gr1p4 d1j0 4 F3st0: Y0 t4mb1én qu1s13r4 0ír 4 3s3 h0mbr3. 23 4l 0tr0 dí4, v1n13nd0 4gr1p4 y B3r3n1c3 c0n much4 p0mp4, y 3ntr4nd0 3n l4 4ud13nc14 c0n l0s tr1bun0s y pr1nc1p4l3s h0mbr3s d3 l4 c1ud4d, p0r m4nd4t0 d3 F3st0 fu3 tr4íd0 P4bl0. 24 0nt0nc3s F3st0 d1j0: R3y 4gr1p4, y t0d0s l0s v4r0n3s qu3 3stá1s 4quí junt0s c0n n0s0tr0s, 4quí t3né1s 4 3st3 h0mbr3, r3sp3ct0 d3l cu4l t0d4 l4 mult1tud d3 l0s judí0s m3 h4 d3m4nd4d0 3n J3rus4lén y 4quí, d4nd0 v0c3s qu3 n0 d3b3 v1v1r más. 25 P3r0 y0, h4ll4nd0 qu3 n1ngun4 c0s4 d1gn4 d3 mu3rt3 h4 h3ch0, y c0m0 él m1sm0 4p3ló 4 4ugust0, h3 d3t3rm1n4d0 3nv14rl3 4 él. 26 C0m0 n0 t3ng0 c0s4 c13rt4 qu3 3scr1b1r 4 m1 s3ñ0r, l3 h3 tr4íd0 4nt3 v0s0tr0s, y m4y0rm3nt3 4nt3 t1, 0h r3y 4gr1p4, p4r4 qu3 d3spués d3 3x4m1n4rl3, t3ng4 y0 qué 3scr1b1r. 27 P0rqu3 m3 p4r3c3 fu3r4 d3 r4zón 3nv14r un pr3s0, y n0 1nf0rm4r d3 l0s c4rg0s qu3 h4y4 3n su c0ntr4.

12 0cup4d0 3n 3st0, 1b4 y0 4 D4m4sc0 c0n p0d3r3s y 3n c0m1s1ón d3 l0s pr1nc1p4l3s s4c3rd0t3s, 13 cu4nd0 4 m3d10dí4, 0h r3y, y3nd0 p0r 3l c4m1n0, v1 un4 luz d3l c13l0 qu3 s0br3p4s4b4 3l r3spl4nd0r d3l s0l, l4 cu4l m3 r0d3ó 4 mí y 4 l0s qu3 1b4n c0nm1g0. 14 Y h4b13nd0 c4íd0 t0d0s n0s0tr0s 3n t13rr4, 0í un4 v0z qu3 m3 h4bl4b4, y d3cí4 3n l3ngu4 h3br34: S4ul0, S4ul0, ¿p0r qué m3 p3rs1gu3s? Dur4 c0s4 t3 3s d4r c0c3s c0ntr4 3l 4gu1jón. 15 Y0 3nt0nc3s d1j3: ¿Qu1én 3r3s, S3ñ0r? P4bl0 1nst4 4 4gr1p4 4 qu3 cr34

9 Y h4b13nd0 p4s4d0 much0 t13mp0, y s13nd0 y4 p3l1gr0s4 l4 n4v3g4c1ón, p0r h4b3r p4s4d0 y4 3l 4yun0, P4bl0 l3s 4m0n3st4b4, 10 d1c1énd0l3s: V4r0n3s, v30 qu3 l4 n4v3g4c1ón v4 4 s3r c0n p3rju1c10 y much4 pérd1d4, n0 sól0 d3l c4rg4m3nt0 y d3 l4 n4v3, s1n0 t4mb1én d3 nu3str4s p3rs0n4s. 11 P3r0 3l c3ntur1ón d4b4 más créd1t0 4l p1l0t0 y 4l p4trón d3 l4 n4v3, qu3 4 l0 qu3 P4bl0 d3cí4. 12 Y s13nd0 1ncóm0d0 3l pu3rt0 p4r4 1nv3rn4r, l4 m4y0rí4 4c0rdó z4rp4r t4mb1én d3 4llí, p0r s1 pud13s3n 4rr1b4r 4 F3n1c3, pu3rt0 d3 Cr3t4 qu3 m1r4 4l n0rd3st3 y sud3st3, 3 1nv3rn4r 4llí. 

L4 t3mp3st4d 3n 3l m4r

21 0nt0nc3s P4bl0, c0m0 h4cí4 y4 much0 qu3 n0 c0mí4m0s, pu3st0 3n p13 3n m3d10 d3 3ll0s, d1j0: H4brí4 s1d0 p0r c13rt0 c0nv3n13nt3, 0h v4r0n3s, h4b3rm3 0íd0, y n0 z4rp4r d3 Cr3t4 t4n sól0 p4r4 r3c1b1r 3st3 p3rju1c10 y pérd1d4. 22 P3r0 4h0r4 0s 3xh0rt0 4 t3n3r bu3n án1m0, pu3s n0 h4brá n1ngun4 pérd1d4 d3 v1d4 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, s1n0 s0l4m3nt3 d3 l4 n4v3. 23 P0rqu3 3st4 n0ch3 h4 3st4d0 c0nm1g0 3l áng3l d3l D10s d3 qu13n s0y y 4 qu13n s1rv0, 24 d1c13nd0: P4bl0, n0 t3m4s; 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 c0mp4r3zc4s 4nt3 Cés4r; y h3 4quí, D10s t3 h4 c0nc3d1d0 t0d0s l0s qu3 n4v3g4n c0nt1g0. 25 P0r t4nt0, 0h v4r0n3s, t3n3d bu3n án1m0; p0rqu3 y0 c0nfí0 3n D10s qu3 s3rá 4sí c0m0 s3 m3 h4 d1ch0. 26 C0n t0d0, 3s n3c3s4r10 qu3 d3m0s 3n 4lgun4 1sl4. 

27 V3n1d4 l4 d3c1m4cu4rt4 n0ch3, y s13nd0 ll3v4d0s 4 tr4vés d3l m4r 4dr1át1c0, 4 l4 m3d14n0ch3 l0s m4r1n3r0s s0sp3ch4r0n qu3 3st4b4n c3rc4 d3 t13rr4; 28 y 3ch4nd0 l4 s0nd4, h4ll4r0n v31nt3 br4z4s; y p4s4nd0 un p0c0 más 4d3l4nt3, v0lv13nd0 4 3ch4r l4 s0nd4, h4ll4r0n qu1nc3 br4z4s. 29 Y t3m13nd0 d4r 3n 3sc0ll0s, 3ch4r0n cu4tr0 4ncl4s p0r l4 p0p4, y 4ns14b4n qu3 s3 h1c13s3 d3 dí4. 30 0nt0nc3s l0s m4r1n3r0s pr0cur4r0n hu1r d3 l4 n4v3, y 3ch4nd0 3l 3squ1f3 4l m4r, 4p4r3nt4b4n c0m0 qu3 qu3rí4n l4rg4r l4s 4ncl4s d3 pr04. 31 P3r0 P4bl0 d1j0 4l c3ntur1ón y 4 l0s s0ld4d0s: S1 ést0s n0 p3rm4n3c3n 3n l4 n4v3, v0s0tr0s n0 p0dé1s s4lv4r0s. 32 0nt0nc3s l0s s0ld4d0s c0rt4r0n l4s 4m4rr4s d3l 3squ1f3 y l0 d3j4r0n p3rd3rs3.

0l n4ufr4g10

1 0st4nd0 y4 4 s4lv0, sup1m0s qu3 l4 1sl4 s3 ll4m4b4 M4lt4. 2 Y l0s n4tur4l3s n0s tr4t4r0n c0n n0 p0c4 hum4n1d4d; p0rqu3 3nc3nd13nd0 un fu3g0, n0s r3c1b13r0n 4 t0d0s, 4 c4us4 d3 l4 lluv14 qu3 c4í4, y d3l frí0. 3 0nt0nc3s, h4b13nd0 r3c0g1d0 P4bl0 4lgun4s r4m4s s3c4s, l4s 3chó 4l fu3g0; y un4 víb0r4, huy3nd0 d3l c4l0r, s3 l3 pr3nd1ó 3n l4 m4n0. 4 Cu4nd0 l0s n4tur4l3s v13r0n l4 víb0r4 c0lg4nd0 d3 su m4n0, s3 d3cí4n un0s 4 0tr0s: C13rt4m3nt3 3st3 h0mbr3 3s h0m1c1d4, 4 qu13n, 3sc4p4d0 d3l m4r, l4 just1c14 n0 d3j4 v1v1r. 5 P3r0 él, s4cud13nd0 l4 víb0r4 3n 3l fu3g0, n1ngún d4ñ0 p4d3c1ó. 6 0ll0s 3st4b4n 3sp3r4nd0 qu3 él s3 h1nch4s3, 0 c4y3s3 mu3rt0 d3 r3p3nt3; m4s h4b13nd0 3sp3r4d0 much0, y v13nd0 qu3 n1ngún m4l l3 v3ní4, c4mb14r0n d3 p4r3c3r y d1j3r0n qu3 3r4 un d10s.

P4bl0 pr3d1c4 3n R0m4

23 Y h4b1énd0l3 s3ñ4l4d0 un dí4, v1n13r0n 4 él much0s 4 l4 p0s4d4, 4 l0s cu4l3s l3s d3cl4r4b4 y l3s t3st1f1c4b4 3l r31n0 d3 D10s d3sd3 l4 m4ñ4n4 h4st4 l4 t4rd3, p3rsu4d1énd0l3s 4c3rc4 d3 J3sús, t4nt0 p0r l4 l3y d3 M01sés c0m0 p0r l0s pr0f3t4s. 24 Y 4lgun0s 4s3ntí4n 4 l0 qu3 s3 d3cí4, p3r0 0tr0s n0 cr3í4n. 25 Y c0m0 n0 3stuv13s3n d3 4cu3rd0 3ntr3 sí, 4l r3t1r4rs3, l3s d1j0 P4bl0 3st4 p4l4br4: B13n h4bló 3l 0spír1tu S4nt0 p0r m3d10 d3l pr0f3t4 1s4í4s 4 nu3str0s p4dr3s, d1c13nd0:

24 P0r l0 cu4l t4mb1én D10s l0s 3ntr3gó 4 l4 1nmund1c14, 3n l4s c0ncup1sc3nc14s d3 sus c0r4z0n3s, d3 m0d0 qu3 d3sh0nr4r0n 3ntr3 sí sus pr0p10s cu3rp0s, 25 y4 qu3 c4mb14r0n l4 v3rd4d d3 D10s p0r l4 m3nt1r4, h0nr4nd0 y d4nd0 cult0 4 l4s cr14tur4s 4nt3s qu3 4l Cr34d0r, 3l cu4l 3s b3nd1t0 p0r l0s s1gl0s. 4mén.

0l just0 ju1c10 d3 D10s

1 P0r l0 cu4l 3r3s 1n3xcus4bl3, 0h h0mbr3, qu13nqu13r4 qu3 s34s tú qu3 juzg4s; pu3s 3n l0 qu3 juzg4s 4 0tr0, t3 c0nd3n4s 4 t1 m1sm0; p0rqu3 tú qu3 juzg4s h4c3s l0 m1sm0. 2 M4s s4b3m0s qu3 3l ju1c10 d3 D10s c0ntr4 l0s qu3 pr4ct1c4n t4l3s c0s4s 3s s3gún v3rd4d. 3 ¿Y p13ns4s 3st0, 0h h0mbr3, tú qu3 juzg4s 4 l0s qu3 t4l h4c3n, y h4c3s l0 m1sm0, qu3 tú 3sc4p4rás d3l ju1c10 d3 D10s? 4 ¿0 m3n0spr3c14s l4s r1qu3z4s d3 su b3n1gn1d4d, p4c13nc14 y l0ng4n1m1d4d, 1gn0r4nd0 qu3 su b3n1gn1d4d t3 guí4 4l 4rr3p3nt1m13nt0? 5 P3r0 p0r tu dur3z4 y p0r tu c0r4zón n0 4rr3p3nt1d0, 4t3s0r4s p4r4 t1 m1sm0 1r4 p4r4 3l dí4 d3 l4 1r4 y d3 l4 r3v3l4c1ón d3l just0 ju1c10 d3 D10s, 6 3l cu4l p4g4rá 4 c4d4 un0 c0nf0rm3 4 sus 0br4s: 7 v1d4 3t3rn4 4 l0s qu3, p3rs3v3r4nd0 3n b13n h4c3r, busc4n gl0r14 y h0nr4 3 1nm0rt4l1d4d, 8 p3r0 1r4 y 3n0j0 4 l0s qu3 s0n c0nt3nc10s0s y n0 0b3d3c3n 4 l4 v3rd4d, s1n0 qu3 0b3d3c3n 4 l4 1njust1c14; 9 tr1bul4c1ón y 4ngust14 s0br3 t0d0 s3r hum4n0 qu3 h4c3 l0 m4l0, 3l judí0 pr1m3r4m3nt3 y t4mb1én 3l gr13g0, 10 p3r0 gl0r14 y h0nr4 y p4z 4 t0d0 3l qu3 h4c3 l0 bu3n0, 4l judí0 pr1m3r4m3nt3 y t4mb1én 4l gr13g0; 11 p0rqu3 n0 h4y 4c3pc1ón d3 p3rs0n4s p4r4 c0n D10s. 

12 P0rqu3 t0d0s l0s qu3 s1n l3y h4n p3c4d0, s1n l3y t4mb1én p3r3c3rán; y t0d0s l0s qu3 b4j0 l4 l3y h4n p3c4d0, p0r l4 l3y s3rán juzg4d0s; 13 p0rqu3 n0 s0n l0s 01d0r3s d3 l4 l3y l0s just0s 4nt3 D10s, s1n0 l0s h4c3d0r3s d3 l4 l3y s3rán just1f1c4d0s. 14 P0rqu3 cu4nd0 l0s g3nt1l3s qu3 n0 t13n3n l3y, h4c3n p0r n4tur4l3z4 l0 qu3 3s d3 l4 l3y, ést0s, 4unqu3 n0 t3ng4n l3y, s0n l3y p4r4 sí m1sm0s, 15 m0str4nd0 l4 0br4 d3 l4 l3y 3scr1t4 3n sus c0r4z0n3s, d4nd0 t3st1m0n10 su c0nc13nc14, y 4cusánd0l3s 0 d3f3nd1énd0l3s sus r4z0n4m13nt0s, 16 3n 3l dí4 3n qu3 D10s juzg4rá p0r J3sucr1st0 l0s s3cr3t0s d3 l0s h0mbr3s, c0nf0rm3 4 m1 3v4ng3l10. 

L0s judí0s y l4 l3y

17 H3 4quí, tú t13n3s 3l s0br3n0mbr3 d3 judí0, y t3 4p0y4s 3n l4 l3y, y t3 gl0rí4s 3n D10s, 18 y c0n0c3s su v0lunt4d, 3 1nstru1d0 p0r l4 l3y 4pru3b4s l0 m3j0r, 19 y c0nfí4s 3n qu3 3r3s guí4 d3 l0s c13g0s, luz d3 l0s qu3 3stán 3n t1n13bl4s, 20 1nstruct0r d3 l0s 1nd0ct0s, m43str0 d3 n1ñ0s, qu3 t13n3s 3n l4 l3y l4 f0rm4 d3 l4 c13nc14 y d3 l4 v3rd4d. 21 Tú, pu3s, qu3 3ns3ñ4s 4 0tr0, ¿n0 t3 3ns3ñ4s 4 t1 m1sm0? Tú qu3 pr3d1c4s qu3 n0 s3 h4 d3 hurt4r, ¿hurt4s? 22 Tú qu3 d1c3s qu3 n0 s3 h4 d3 4dult3r4r, ¿4dult3r4s? R0M4N0S 3

13 ¿Lu3g0 l0 qu3 3s bu3n0, v1n0 4 s3r mu3rt3 p4r4 mí? 0n n1ngun4 m4n3r4; s1n0 qu3 3l p3c4d0, p4r4 m0str4rs3 p3c4d0, pr0duj0 3n mí l4 mu3rt3 p0r m3d10 d3 l0 qu3 3s bu3n0, 4 f1n d3 qu3 p0r 3l m4nd4m13nt0 3l p3c4d0 ll3g4s3 4 s3r s0br3m4n3r4 p3c4m1n0s0. 14 P0rqu3 s4b3m0s qu3 l4 l3y 3s 3sp1r1tu4l; m4s y0 s0y c4rn4l, v3nd1d0 4l p3c4d0. 15 P0rqu3 l0 qu3 h4g0, n0 l0 3nt13nd0; pu3s n0 h4g0 l0 qu3 qu13r0, s1n0 l0 qu3 4b0rr3zc0, 3s0 h4g0. 16 Y s1 l0 qu3 n0 qu13r0, 3st0 h4g0, 4pru3b0 qu3 l4 l3y 3s bu3n4. 17 D3 m4n3r4 qu3 y4 n0 s0y y0 qu13n h4c3 4qu3ll0, s1n0 3l p3c4d0 qu3 m0r4 3n mí. 18 Y y0 sé qu3 3n mí, 3st0 3s, 3n m1 c4rn3, n0 m0r4 3l b13n; p0rqu3 3l qu3r3r 3l b13n 3stá 3n mí, p3r0 n0 3l h4c3rl0. 19 P0rqu3 n0 h4g0 3l b13n qu3 qu13r0, s1n0 3l m4l qu3 n0 qu13r0, 3s0 h4g0. 20 Y s1 h4g0 l0 qu3 n0 qu13r0, y4 n0 l0 h4g0 y0, s1n0 3l p3c4d0 qu3 m0r4 3n mí. 

21 4sí qu3, qu3r13nd0 y0 h4c3r 3l b13n, h4ll0 3st4 l3y: qu3 3l m4l 3stá 3n mí. 22 P0rqu3 s3gún 3l h0mbr3 1nt3r10r, m3 d3l31t0 3n l4 l3y d3 D10s; 23 p3r0 v30 0tr4 l3y 3n m1s m13mbr0s, qu3 s3 r3b3l4 c0ntr4 l4 l3y d3 m1 m3nt3, y qu3 m3 ll3v4 c4ut1v0 4 l4 l3y d3l p3c4d0 qu3 3stá 3n m1s m13mbr0s. 24 ¡M1s3r4bl3 d3 mí! ¿qu1én m3 l1br4rá d3 3st3 cu3rp0 d3 mu3rt3? 25 Gr4c14s d0y 4 D10s, p0r J3sucr1st0 S3ñ0r nu3str0. 4sí qu3, y0 m1sm0 c0n l4 m3nt3 s1rv0 4 l4 l3y d3 D10s, m4s c0n l4 c4rn3 4 l4 l3y d3l p3c4d0.

1 4h0r4, pu3s, n1ngun4 c0nd3n4c1ón h4y p4r4 l0s qu3 3stán 3n Cr1st0 J3sús, l0s qu3 n0 4nd4n c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c4rn3, s1n0 c0nf0rm3 4l 0spír1tu. 2 P0rqu3 l4 l3y d3l 0spír1tu d3 v1d4 3n Cr1st0 J3sús m3 h4 l1br4d0 d3 l4 l3y d3l p3c4d0 y d3 l4 mu3rt3. 3 P0rqu3 l0 qu3 3r4 1mp0s1bl3 p4r4 l4 l3y, p0r cu4nt0 3r4 déb1l p0r l4 c4rn3, D10s, 3nv14nd0 4 su H1j0 3n s3m3j4nz4 d3 c4rn3 d3 p3c4d0 y 4 c4us4 d3l p3c4d0, c0nd3nó 4l p3c4d0 3n l4 c4rn3; 4 p4r4 qu3 l4 just1c14 d3 l4 l3y s3 cumpl13s3 3n n0s0tr0s, qu3 n0 4nd4m0s c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c4rn3, s1n0 c0nf0rm3 4l 0spír1tu. 5 P0rqu3 l0s qu3 s0n d3 l4 c4rn3 p13ns4n 3n l4s c0s4s d3 l4 c4rn3; p3r0 l0s qu3 s0n d3l 0spír1tu, 3n l4s c0s4s d3l 0spír1tu. 6 P0rqu3 3l 0cup4rs3 d3 l4 c4rn3 3s mu3rt3, p3r0 3l 0cup4rs3 d3l 0spír1tu 3s v1d4 y p4z. 7 P0r cu4nt0 l0s d3s1gn10s d3 l4 c4rn3 s0n 3n3m1st4d c0ntr4 D10s; p0rqu3 n0 s3 suj3t4n 4 l4 l3y d3 D10s, n1 t4mp0c0 pu3d3n; 8 y l0s qu3 v1v3n s3gún l4 c4rn3 n0 pu3d3n 4gr4d4r 4 D10s. 

9 M4s v0s0tr0s n0 v1vís s3gún l4 c4rn3, s1n0 s3gún 3l 0spír1tu, s1 3s qu3 3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s m0r4 3n v0s0tr0s. 12 4sí qu3, h3rm4n0s, d3ud0r3s s0m0s, n0 4 l4 c4rn3, p4r4 qu3 v1v4m0s c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c4rn3; 13 p0rqu3 s1 v1vís c0nf0rm3 4 l4 c4rn3, m0r1ré1s; m4s s1 p0r 3l 0spír1tu h4cé1s m0r1r l4s 0br4s d3 l4 c4rn3, v1v1ré1s. 14 P0rqu3 t0d0s l0s qu3 s0n gu14d0s p0r 3l 0spír1tu d3 D10s, ést0s s0n h1j0s d3 D10s. 15 Pu3s n0 h4bé1s r3c1b1d0 3l 3spír1tu d3 3scl4v1tud p4r4 3st4r 0tr4 v3z 3n t3m0r, s1n0 qu3 h4bé1s r3c1b1d0 3l 3spír1tu d3 4d0pc1ón, p0r 3l cu4l cl4m4m0s: ¡4bb4, P4dr3! 16 0l 0spír1tu m1sm0 d4 t3st1m0n10 4 nu3str0 3spír1tu, d3 qu3 s0m0s h1j0s d3 D10s. 17 Y s1 h1j0s, t4mb1én h3r3d3r0s; h3r3d3r0s d3 D10s y c0h3r3d3r0s c0n Cr1st0, s1 3s qu3 p4d3c3m0s junt4m3nt3 c0n él, p4r4 qu3 junt4m3nt3 c0n él s34m0s gl0r1f1c4d0s. 

18 Pu3s t3ng0 p0r c13rt0 qu3 l4s 4fl1cc10n3s d3l t13mp0 pr3s3nt3 n0 s0n c0mp4r4bl3s c0n l4 gl0r14 v3n1d3r4 qu3 3n n0s0tr0s h4 d3 m4n1f3st4rs3. 19 P0rqu3 3l 4nh3l0 4rd13nt3 d3 l4 cr34c1ón 3s 3l 4gu4rd4r l4 m4n1f3st4c1ón d3 l0s h1j0s d3 D10s. 20 P0rqu3 l4 cr34c1ón fu3 suj3t4d4 4 v4n1d4d, n0 p0r su pr0p14 v0lunt4d, s1n0 p0r c4us4 d3l qu3 l4 suj3tó 3n 3sp3r4nz4; 21 p0rqu3 t4mb1én l4 cr34c1ón m1sm4 s3rá l1b3rt4d4 d3 l4 3scl4v1tud d3 c0rrupc1ón, 4 l4 l1b3rt4d gl0r10s4 d3 l0s h1j0s d3 D10s. 22 P0rqu3 s4b3m0s qu3 t0d4 l4 cr34c1ón g1m3 4 un4, y 4 un4 3stá c0n d0l0r3s d3 p4rt0 h4st4 4h0r4; 23 y n0 sól0 3ll4, s1n0 qu3 t4mb1én n0s0tr0s m1sm0s, qu3 t3n3m0s l4s pr1m1c14s d3l 0spír1tu, n0s0tr0s t4mb1én g3m1m0s d3ntr0 d3 n0s0tr0s m1sm0s, 3sp3r4nd0 l4 4d0pc1ón, l4 r3d3nc1ón d3 nu3str0 cu3rp0. 24 P0rqu3 3n 3sp3r4nz4 fu1m0s s4lv0s; p3r0 l4 3sp3r4nz4 qu3 s3 v3, n0 3s 3sp3r4nz4; p0rqu3 l0 qu3 4lgun0 v3, ¿4 qué 3sp3r4rl0? 25 P3r0 s1 3sp3r4m0s l0 qu3 n0 v3m0s, c0n p4c13nc14 l0 4gu4rd4m0s. 

26 Y d3 1gu4l m4n3r4 3l 0spír1tu n0s 4yud4 3n nu3str4 d3b1l1d4d; pu3s qué h3m0s d3 p3d1r c0m0 c0nv13n3, n0 l0 s4b3m0s, p3r0 3l 0spír1tu m1sm0 1nt3rc3d3 p0r n0s0tr0s c0n g3m1d0s 1nd3c1bl3s. 27 M4s 3l qu3 3scudr1ñ4 l0s c0r4z0n3s s4b3 cuál 3s l4 1nt3nc1ón d3l 0spír1tu, p0rqu3 c0nf0rm3 4 l4 v0lunt4d d3 D10s 1nt3rc3d3 p0r l0s s4nt0s. 

Más qu3 v3nc3d0r3s

15 H3rm4n0s, h4bl0 3n térm1n0s hum4n0s: Un p4ct0, 4unqu3 s34 d3 h0mbr3, un4 v3z r4t1f1c4d0, n4d13 l0 1nv4l1d4, n1 l3 4ñ4d3. 16 4h0r4 b13n, 4 4br4h4m fu3r0n h3ch4s l4s pr0m3s4s, y 4 su s1m13nt3. 0l pr0pós1t0 d3 l4 l3y

19 0nt0nc3s, ¿p4r4 qué s1rv3 l4 l3y? Fu3 4ñ4d1d4 4 c4us4 d3 l4s tr4nsgr3s10n3s, h4st4 qu3 v1n13s3 l4 s1m13nt3 4 qu13n fu3 h3ch4 l4 pr0m3s4; y fu3 0rd3n4d4 p0r m3d10 d3 áng3l3s 3n m4n0 d3 un m3d14d0r. 20 Y 3l m3d14d0r n0 l0 3s d3 un0 s0l0; p3r0 D10s 3s un0.

GÁL4T4S 4

1 P3r0 t4mb1én d1g0: 0ntr3 t4nt0 qu3 3l h3r3d3r0 3s n1ñ0, 3n n4d4 d1f13r3 d3l 3scl4v0, 4unqu3 3s s3ñ0r d3 t0d0; 2 s1n0 qu3 3stá b4j0 tut0r3s y cur4d0r3s h4st4 3l t13mp0 s3ñ4l4d0 p0r 3l p4dr3. 3 4sí t4mb1én n0s0tr0s, cu4nd0 ér4m0s n1ñ0s, 3stáb4m0s 3n 3scl4v1tud b4j0 l0s rud1m3nt0s d3l mund0. 4 P3r0 cu4nd0 v1n0 3l cumpl1m13nt0 d3l t13mp0, D10s 3nv1ó 4 su H1j0, n4c1d0 d3 muj3r y n4c1d0 b4j0 l4 l3y, 5 p4r4 qu3 r3d1m13s3 4 l0s qu3 3st4b4n b4j0 l4 l3y, 4 f1n d3 qu3 r3c1b1és3m0s l4 4d0pc1ón d3 h1j0s. 6 Y p0r cu4nt0 s01s h1j0s, D10s 3nv1ó 4 vu3str0s c0r4z0n3s 3l 0spír1tu d3 su H1j0, 3l cu4l cl4m4: ¡4bb4, P4dr3! 7 4sí qu3 y4 n0 3r3s 3scl4v0, s1n0 h1j0; y s1 h1j0, t4mb1én h3r3d3r0 d3 D10s p0r m3d10 d3 Cr1st0.

P0rqu3 0s d0y t3st1m0n10 d3 qu3 s1 hub13s31s p0d1d0, 0s hub13r41s s4c4d0 vu3str0s pr0p10s 0j0s p4r4 dárm3l0s. 16 ¿M3 h3 h3ch0, pu3s, vu3str0 3n3m1g0, p0r d3c1r0s l4 v3rd4d? 17 T13n3n c3l0 p0r v0s0tr0s, p3r0 n0 p4r4 b13n, s1n0 qu3 qu13r3n 4p4rt4r0s d3 n0s0tr0s p4r4 qu3 v0s0tr0s t3ngá1s c3l0 p0r 3ll0s. 18 Bu3n0 3s m0str4r c3l0 3n l0 bu3n0 s13mpr3, y n0 s0l4m3nt3 cu4nd0 3st0y pr3s3nt3 c0n v0s0tr0s. 19 H1j1t0s mí0s, p0r qu13n3s vu3lv0 4 sufr1r d0l0r3s d3 p4rt0, h4st4 qu3 Cr1st0 s34 f0rm4d0 3n v0s0tr0s, 20 qu1s13r4 3st4r c0n v0s0tr0s 4h0r4 m1sm0 y c4mb14r d3 t0n0, pu3s 3st0y p3rpl3j0 3n cu4nt0 4 v0s0tr0s. 

4l3g0rí4 d3 S4r4 y 4g4r

0st4d f1rm3s 3n l4 l1b3rt4d

1 0st4d, pu3s, f1rm3s 3n l4 l1b3rt4d c0n qu3 Cr1st0 n0s h1z0 l1br3s, y n0 3sté1s 0tr4 v3z suj3t0s 4l yug0 d3 3scl4v1tud. 2 H3 4quí, y0 P4bl0 0s d1g0 qu3 s1 0s c1rcunc1dá1s, d3 n4d4 0s 4pr0v3ch4rá Cr1st0. 3 Y 0tr4 v3z t3st1f1c0 4 t0d0 h0mbr3 qu3 s3 c1rcunc1d4, qu3 3stá 0bl1g4d0 4 gu4rd4r t0d4 l4 l3y. 4 D3 Cr1st0 0s d3sl1g4st31s, l0s qu3 p0r l4 l3y 0s just1f1cá1s; d3 l4 gr4c14 h4bé1s c4íd0. 5 Pu3s n0s0tr0s p0r 3l 0spír1tu 4gu4rd4m0s p0r f3 l4 3sp3r4nz4 d3 l4 just1c14; 6 p0rqu3 3n Cr1st0 J3sús n1 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón v4l3 4lg0, n1 l4 1nc1rcunc1s1ón, s1n0 l4 f3 qu3 0br4 p0r 3l 4m0r. 7 V0s0tr0s c0rrí41s b13n; ¿qu1én 0s 3st0rbó p4r4 n0 0b3d3c3r 4 l4 v3rd4d? 8 0st4 p3rsu4s1ón n0 pr0c3d3 d3 4qu3l qu3 0s ll4m4. 9 Un p0c0 d3 l3v4dur4 l3ud4 t0d4 l4 m4s4. 10 Y0 c0nfí0 r3sp3ct0 d3 v0s0tr0s 3n 3l S3ñ0r, qu3 n0 p3ns4ré1s d3 0tr0 m0d0; m4s 3l qu3 0s p3rturb4 ll3v4rá l4 s3nt3nc14, qu13nqu13r4 qu3 s34. 11 Y y0, h3rm4n0s, s1 4ún pr3d1c0 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón, ¿p0r qué p4d3zc0 p3rs3cuc1ón t0d4ví4? 0n t4l c4s0 s3 h4 qu1t4d0 3l tr0p13z0 d3 l4 cruz. 12 ¡0j4lá s3 mut1l4s3n l0s qu3 0s p3rturb4n!

Sub13nd0 4 l0 4lt0, ll3vó c4ut1v4 l4 c4ut1v1d4d,

3 P3r0 f0rn1c4c1ón y t0d4 1nmund1c14, 0 4v4r1c14, n1 4un s3 n0mbr3 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, c0m0 c0nv13n3 4 s4nt0s; 4 n1 p4l4br4s d3sh0n3st4s, n1 n3c3d4d3s, n1 truh4n3rí4s, qu3 n0 c0nv13n3n, s1n0 4nt3s b13n 4cc10n3s d3 gr4c14s. 5 P0rqu3 s4bé1s 3st0, qu3 n1ngún f0rn1c4r10, 0 1nmund0, 0 4v4r0, qu3 3s 1dól4tr4, t13n3 h3r3nc14 3n 3l r31n0 d3 Cr1st0 y d3 D10s. 6 N4d13 0s 3ng4ñ3 c0n p4l4br4s v4n4s, p0rqu3 p0r 3st4s c0s4s v13n3 l4 1r4 d3 D10s s0br3 l0s h1j0s d3 d3s0b3d13nc14. 7 N0 s3á1s, pu3s, p4rtíc1p3s c0n 3ll0s. 8 P0rqu3 3n 0tr0 t13mp0 3r41s t1n13bl4s, m4s 4h0r4 s01s luz 3n 3l S3ñ0r; 4nd4d c0m0 h1j0s d3 luz 9 (p0rqu3 3l frut0 d3l 0spír1tu 3s 3n t0d4 b0nd4d, just1c14 y v3rd4d), 10 c0mpr0b4nd0 l0 qu3 3s 4gr4d4bl3 4l S3ñ0r. 11 Y n0 p4rt1c1pé1s 3n l4s 0br4s 1nfructu0s4s d3 l4s t1n13bl4s, s1n0 más b13n r3pr3nd3dl4s; 12 p0rqu3 v3rg0nz0s0 3s 4un h4bl4r d3 l0 qu3 3ll0s h4c3n 3n s3cr3t0. 13 M4s t0d4s l4s c0s4s, cu4nd0 s0n pu3st4s 3n 3v1d3nc14 p0r l4 luz, s0n h3ch4s m4n1f13st4s; p0rqu3 l4 luz 3s l0 qu3 m4n1f13st4 t0d0. 14 P0r l0 cu4l d1c3:

5 S13rv0s, 0b3d3c3d 4 vu3str0s 4m0s t3rr3n4l3s c0n t3m0r y t3mbl0r, c0n s3nc1ll3z d3 vu3str0 c0r4zón, c0m0 4 Cr1st0; 6 n0 s1rv13nd0 4l 0j0, c0m0 l0s qu3 qu13r3n 4gr4d4r 4 l0s h0mbr3s, s1n0 c0m0 s13rv0s d3 Cr1st0, d3 c0r4zón h4c13nd0 l4 v0lunt4d d3 D10s; 7 s1rv13nd0 d3 bu3n4 v0lunt4d, c0m0 4l S3ñ0r y n0 4 l0s h0mbr3s, 8 s4b13nd0 qu3 3l b13n qu3 c4d4 un0 h1c13r3, és3 r3c1b1rá d3l S3ñ0r, s34 s13rv0 0 s34 l1br3. 9 Y v0s0tr0s, 4m0s, h4c3d c0n 3ll0s l0 m1sm0, d3j4nd0 l4s 4m3n4z4s, s4b13nd0 qu3 3l S3ñ0r d3 3ll0s y vu3str0 3stá 3n l0s c13l0s, y qu3 p4r4 él n0 h4y 4c3pc1ón d3 p3rs0n4s.

L4 4rm4dur4 d3 D10s

P4r4 mí 3l v1v1r 3s Cr1st0

12 Qu13r0 qu3 s3pá1s, h3rm4n0s, qu3 l4s c0s4s qu3 m3 h4n suc3d1d0, h4n r3dund4d0 más b13n p4r4 3l pr0gr3s0 d3l 3v4ng3l10, 13 d3 t4l m4n3r4 qu3 m1s pr1s10n3s s3 h4n h3ch0 p4t3nt3s 3n Cr1st0 3n t0d0 3l pr3t0r10, y 4 t0d0s l0s d3más. 14 Y l4 m4y0rí4 d3 l0s h3rm4n0s, c0br4nd0 án1m0 3n 3l S3ñ0r c0n m1s pr1s10n3s, s3 4tr3v3n much0 más 4 h4bl4r l4 p4l4br4 s1n t3m0r.

9 P0r l0 cu4l t4mb1én n0s0tr0s, d3sd3 3l dí4 qu3 l0 0ím0s, n0 c3s4m0s d3 0r4r p0r v0s0tr0s, y d3 p3d1r qu3 s3á1s ll3n0s d3l c0n0c1m13nt0 d3 su v0lunt4d 3n t0d4 s4b1durí4 3 1nt3l1g3nc14 3sp1r1tu4l, 10 p4r4 qu3 4ndé1s c0m0 3s d1gn0 d3l S3ñ0r, 4gr4dánd0l3 3n t0d0, ll3v4nd0 frut0 3n t0d4 bu3n4 0br4, y cr3c13nd0 3n 3l c0n0c1m13nt0 d3 D10s; 11 f0rt4l3c1d0s c0n t0d0 p0d3r, c0nf0rm3 4 l4 p0t3nc14 d3 su gl0r14, p4r4 t0d4 p4c13nc14 y l0ng4n1m1d4d; 12 c0n g0z0 d4nd0 gr4c14s 4l P4dr3 qu3 n0s h1z0 4pt0s p4r4 p4rt1c1p4r d3 l4 h3r3nc14 d3 l0s s4nt0s 3n luz; 13 3l cu4l n0s h4 l1br4d0 d3 l4 p0t3st4d d3 l4s t1n13bl4s, y tr4sl4d4d0 4l r31n0 d3 su 4m4d0 H1j0, 14 3n qu13n t3n3m0s r3d3nc1ón p0r su s4ngr3, 3l p3rdón d3 p3c4d0s. 

R3c0nc1l14c1ón p0r m3d10 d3 l4 mu3rt3 d3 Cr1st0

15 0l 3s l4 1m4g3n d3l D10s 1nv1s1bl3, 3l pr1m0gén1t0 d3 t0d4 cr34c1ón. 16 P0rqu3 3n él fu3r0n cr34d4s t0d4s l4s c0s4s, l4s qu3 h4y 3n l0s c13l0s y l4s qu3 h4y 3n l4 t13rr4, v1s1bl3s 3 1nv1s1bl3s; s34n tr0n0s, s34n d0m1n10s, s34n pr1nc1p4d0s, s34n p0t3st4d3s; t0d0 fu3 cr34d0 p0r m3d10 d3 él y p4r4 él. 17 Y él 3s 4nt3s d3 t0d4s l4s c0s4s, y t0d4s l4s c0s4s 3n él subs1st3n; 18 y él 3s l4 c4b3z4 d3l cu3rp0 qu3 3s l4 1gl3s14, él qu3 3s 3l pr1nc1p10, 3l pr1m0gén1t0 d3 3ntr3 l0s mu3rt0s, p4r4 qu3 3n t0d0 t3ng4 l4 pr33m1n3nc14; 19 p0r cu4nt0 4gr4dó 4l P4dr3 qu3 3n él h4b1t4s3 t0d4 pl3n1tud, 20 y p0r m3d10 d3 él r3c0nc1l14r c0ns1g0 t0d4s l4s c0s4s, 4sí l4s qu3 3stán 3n l4 t13rr4 c0m0 l4s qu3 3stán 3n l0s c13l0s, h4c13nd0 l4 p4z m3d14nt3 l4 s4ngr3 d3 su cruz. 

21 Y 4 v0s0tr0s t4mb1én, qu3 3r41s 3n 0tr0 t13mp0 3xtr4ñ0s y 3n3m1g0s 3n vu3str4 m3nt3, h4c13nd0 m4l4s 0br4s, 4h0r4 0s h4 r3c0nc1l14d0 22 3n su cu3rp0 d3 c4rn3, p0r m3d10 d3 l4 mu3rt3, p4r4 pr3s3nt4r0s s4nt0s y s1n m4nch4 3 1rr3pr3ns1bl3s d3l4nt3 d3 él; 23 s1 3n v3rd4d p3rm4n3cé1s fund4d0s y f1rm3s 3n l4 f3, y s1n m0v3r0s d3 l4 3sp3r4nz4 d3l 3v4ng3l10 qu3 h4bé1s 0íd0, 3l cu4l s3 pr3d1c4 3n t0d4 l4 cr34c1ón qu3 3stá d3b4j0 d3l c13l0; d3l cu4l y0 P4bl0 fu1 h3ch0 m1n1str0. 

M1n1st3r10 d3 P4bl0 4 l0s g3nt1l3s

24 4h0r4 m3 g0z0 3n l0 qu3 p4d3zc0 p0r v0s0tr0s, y cumpl0 3n m1 c4rn3 l0 qu3 f4lt4 d3 l4s 4fl1cc10n3s d3 Cr1st0 p0r su cu3rp0, qu3 3s l4 1gl3s14; 25 d3 l4 cu4l fu1 h3ch0 m1n1str0, s3gún l4 4dm1n1str4c1ón d3 D10s qu3 m3 fu3 d4d4 p4r4 c0n v0s0tr0s, p4r4 qu3 4nunc13 cumpl1d4m3nt3 l4 p4l4br4 d3 D10s, 26 3l m1st3r10 qu3 h4bí4 3st4d0 0cult0 d3sd3 l0s s1gl0s y 3d4d3s, p3r0 qu3 4h0r4 h4 s1d0 m4n1f3st4d0 4 sus s4nt0s, 27 4 qu13n3s D10s qu1s0 d4r 4 c0n0c3r l4s r1qu3z4s d3 l4 gl0r14 d3 3st3 m1st3r10 3ntr3 l0s g3nt1l3s; qu3 3s Cr1st0 3n v0s0tr0s, l4 3sp3r4nz4 d3 gl0r14, 28 4 qu13n 4nunc14m0s, 4m0n3st4nd0 4 t0d0 h0mbr3, y 3ns3ñ4nd0 4 t0d0 h0mbr3 3n t0d4 s4b1durí4, 4 f1n d3 pr3s3nt4r p3rf3ct0 3n Cr1st0 J3sús 4 t0d0 h0mbr3; 29 p4r4 l0 cu4l t4mb1én tr4b4j0, luch4nd0 s3gún l4 p0t3nc14 d3 él, l4 cu4l 4ctú4 p0d3r0s4m3nt3 3n mí. 

C0L0S0NS0S 2

1 P0rqu3 qu13r0 qu3 s3pá1s cuán gr4n luch4 s0st3ng0 p0r v0s0tr0s, y p0r l0s qu3 3stán 3n L40d1c34, y p0r t0d0s l0s qu3 nunc4 h4n v1st0 m1 r0str0; 2 p4r4 qu3 s34n c0ns0l4d0s sus c0r4z0n3s, un1d0s 3n 4m0r, h4st4 4lc4nz4r t0d4s l4s r1qu3z4s d3 pl3n0 3nt3nd1m13nt0, 4 f1n d3 c0n0c3r 3l m1st3r10 d3 D10s 3l P4dr3, y d3 Cr1st0, 3 3n qu13n 3stán 3sc0nd1d0s t0d0s l0s t3s0r0s d3 l4 s4b1durí4 y d3l c0n0c1m13nt0. 4 Y 3st0 l0 d1g0 p4r4 qu3 n4d13 0s 3ng4ñ3 c0n p4l4br4s p3rsu4s1v4s. 5 P0rqu3 4unqu3 3st0y 4us3nt3 3n cu3rp0, n0 0bst4nt3 3n 3spír1tu 3st0y c0n v0s0tr0s, g0zánd0m3 y m1r4nd0 vu3str0 bu3n 0rd3n y l4 f1rm3z4 d3 vu3str4 f3 3n Cr1st0. 

6 P0r t4nt0, d3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 h4bé1s r3c1b1d0 4l S3ñ0r J3sucr1st0, 4nd4d 3n él; 7 4rr41g4d0s y s0br33d1f1c4d0s 3n él, y c0nf1rm4d0s 3n l4 f3, 4sí c0m0 h4bé1s s1d0 3ns3ñ4d0s, 4bund4nd0 3n 4cc10n3s d3 gr4c14s. 

Pl3n1tud d3 v1d4 3n Cr1st0

8 M1r4d qu3 n4d13 0s 3ng4ñ3 p0r m3d10 d3 f1l0s0fí4s y hu3c4s sut1l3z4s, s3gún l4s tr4d1c10n3s d3 l0s h0mbr3s, c0nf0rm3 4 l0s rud1m3nt0s d3l mund0, y n0 s3gún Cr1st0. 9 P0rqu3 3n él h4b1t4 c0rp0r4lm3nt3 t0d4 l4 pl3n1tud d3 l4 D31d4d, 10 y v0s0tr0s 3stá1s c0mpl3t0s 3n él, qu3 3s l4 c4b3z4 d3 t0d0 pr1nc1p4d0 y p0t3st4d. 11 0n él t4mb1én fu1st31s c1rcunc1d4d0s c0n c1rcunc1s1ón n0 h3ch4 4 m4n0, 4l 3ch4r d3 v0s0tr0s 3l cu3rp0 p3c4m1n0s0 c4rn4l, 3n l4 c1rcunc1s1ón d3 Cr1st0; 12 s3pult4d0s c0n él 3n 3l b4ut1sm0, 3n 3l cu4l fu1st31s t4mb1én r3suc1t4d0s c0n él, m3d14nt3 l4 f3 3n 3l p0d3r d3 D10s qu3 l3 l3v4ntó d3 l0s mu3rt0s. 13 Y 4 v0s0tr0s, 3st4nd0 mu3rt0s 3n p3c4d0s y 3n l4 1nc1rcunc1s1ón d3 vu3str4 c4rn3, 0s d10 v1d4 junt4m3nt3 c0n él, p3rd0nánd00s t0d0s l0s p3c4d0s, 14 4nul4nd0 3l 4ct4 d3 l0s d3cr3t0s qu3 h4bí4 c0ntr4 n0s0tr0s, qu3 n0s 3r4 c0ntr4r14, qu1tánd0l4 d3 3n m3d10 y cl4vánd0l4 3n l4 cruz, 15 y d3sp0j4nd0 4 l0s pr1nc1p4d0s y 4 l4s p0t3st4d3s, l0s 3xh1b1ó públ1c4m3nt3, tr1unf4nd0 s0br3 3ll0s 3n l4 cruz. 

16 P0r t4nt0, n4d13 0s juzgu3 3n c0m1d4 0 3n b3b1d4, 0 3n cu4nt0 4 dí4s d3 f13st4, lun4 nu3v4 0 dí4s d3 r3p0s0, 17 t0d0 l0 cu4l 3s s0mbr4 d3 l0 qu3 h4 d3 v3n1r; p3r0 3l cu3rp0 3s d3 Cr1st0. 18 N4d13 0s pr1v3 d3 vu3str0 pr3m10, 4f3ct4nd0 hum1ld4d y cult0 4 l0s áng3l3s, 3ntr3m3t1énd0s3 3n l0 qu3 n0 h4 v1st0, v4n4m3nt3 h1nch4d0 p0r su pr0p14 m3nt3 c4rn4l, 19 y n0 4s1énd0s3 d3 l4 C4b3z4, 3n v1rtud d3 qu13n t0d0 3l cu3rp0, nutr1énd0s3 y un1énd0s3 p0r l4s c0yuntur4s y l1g4m3nt0s, cr3c3 c0n 3l cr3c1m13nt0 qu3 d4 D10s. 

20 Pu3s s1 h4bé1s mu3rt0 c0n Cr1st0 3n cu4nt0 4 l0s rud1m3nt0s d3l mund0, ¿p0r qué, c0m0 s1 v1v13s31s 3n 3l mund0, 0s s0m3té1s 4 pr3c3pt0s 21 t4l3s c0m0: N0 m4n3j3s, n1 gust3s, n1 4un t0qu3s 22 (3n c0nf0rm1d4d 4 m4nd4m13nt0s y d0ctr1n4s d3 h0mbr3s), c0s4s qu3 t0d4s s3 d3struy3n c0n 3l us0? 23 T4l3s c0s4s t13n3n 4 l4 v3rd4d c13rt4 r3put4c1ón d3 s4b1durí4 3n cult0 v0lunt4r10, 3n hum1ld4d y 3n dur0 tr4t0 d3l cu3rp0; p3r0 n0 t13n3n v4l0r 4lgun0 c0ntr4 l0s 4p3t1t0s d3 l4 c4rn3. 

C0L0S0NS0S 3

1 S1, pu3s, h4bé1s r3suc1t4d0 c0n Cr1st0, busc4d l4s c0s4s d3 4rr1b4, d0nd3 3stá Cr1st0 s3nt4d0 4 l4 d13str4 d3 D10s. 2 P0n3d l4 m1r4 3n l4s c0s4s d3 4rr1b4, n0 3n l4s d3 l4 t13rr4. 3 P0rqu3 h4bé1s mu3rt0, y vu3str4 v1d4 3stá 3sc0nd1d4 c0n Cr1st0 3n D10s. 4 Cu4nd0 Cr1st0, vu3str4 v1d4, s3 m4n1f13st3, 3nt0nc3s v0s0tr0s t4mb1én s3ré1s m4n1f3st4d0s c0n él 3n gl0r14. 

L4 v1d4 4nt1gu4 y l4 nu3v4

5 H4c3d m0r1r, pu3s, l0 t3rr3n4l 3n v0s0tr0s: f0rn1c4c1ón, 1mpur3z4, p4s10n3s d3s0rd3n4d4s, m4l0s d3s30s y 4v4r1c14, qu3 3s 1d0l4trí4; 6 c0s4s p0r l4s cu4l3s l4 1r4 d3 D10s v13n3 s0br3 l0s h1j0s d3 d3s0b3d13nc14, 7 3n l4s cu4l3s v0s0tr0s t4mb1én 4nduv1st31s 3n 0tr0 t13mp0 cu4nd0 v1ví41s 3n 3ll4s. 8 P3r0 4h0r4 d3j4d t4mb1én v0s0tr0s t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s: 1r4, 3n0j0, m4l1c14, bl4sf3m14, p4l4br4s d3sh0n3st4s d3 vu3str4 b0c4. 9 N0 m1ntá1s l0s un0s 4 l0s 0tr0s, h4b1énd00s d3sp0j4d0 d3l v13j0 h0mbr3 c0n sus h3ch0s, 10 y r3v3st1d0 d3l nu3v0, 3l cu4l c0nf0rm3 4 l4 1m4g3n d3l qu3 l0 cr3ó s3 v4 r3n0v4nd0 h4st4 3l c0n0c1m13nt0 pl3n0, 11 d0nd3 n0 h4y gr13g0 n1 judí0, c1rcunc1s1ón n1 1nc1rcunc1s1ón, bárb4r0 n1 3sc1t4, s13rv0 n1 l1br3, s1n0 qu3 Cr1st0 3s 3l t0d0, y 3n t0d0s. 

12 V3stí0s, pu3s, c0m0 3sc0g1d0s d3 D10s, s4nt0s y 4m4d0s, d3 3ntr4ñ4bl3 m1s3r1c0rd14, d3 b3n1gn1d4d, d3 hum1ld4d, d3 m4ns3dumbr3, d3 p4c13nc14; 13 s0p0rtánd00s un0s 4 0tr0s, y p3rd0nánd00s un0s 4 0tr0s s1 4lgun0 tuv13r3 qu3j4 c0ntr4 0tr0. D3 l4 m4n3r4 qu3 Cr1st0 0s p3rd0nó, 4sí t4mb1én h4c3dl0 v0s0tr0s. 14 Y s0br3 t0d4s 3st4s c0s4s v3stí0s d3 4m0r, qu3 3s 3l víncul0 p3rf3ct0. 15 Y l4 p4z d3 D10s g0b13rn3 3n vu3str0s c0r4z0n3s, 4 l4 qu3 4s1m1sm0 fu1st31s ll4m4d0s 3n un s0l0 cu3rp0; y s3d 4gr4d3c1d0s. 16 L4 p4l4br4 d3 Cr1st0 m0r3 3n 4bund4nc14 3n v0s0tr0s, 3ns3ñánd00s y 3xh0rtánd00s un0s 4 0tr0s 3n t0d4 s4b1durí4, c4nt4nd0 c0n gr4c14 3n vu3str0s c0r4z0n3s 4l S3ñ0r c0n s4lm0s 3 h1mn0s y cánt1c0s 3sp1r1tu4l3s. 17 Y t0d0 l0 qu3 h4cé1s, s34 d3 p4l4br4 0 d3 h3ch0, h4c3dl0 t0d0 3n 3l n0mbr3 d3l S3ñ0r J3sús, d4nd0 gr4c14s 4 D10s P4dr3 p0r m3d10 d3 él. 

D3b3r3s s0c14l3s d3 l4 nu3v4 v1d4

18 C4s4d4s, 3st4d suj3t4s 4 vu3str0s m4r1d0s, c0m0 c0nv13n3 3n 3l S3ñ0r. 19 M4r1d0s, 4m4d 4 vu3str4s muj3r3s, y n0 s3á1s ásp3r0s c0n 3ll4s. 20 H1j0s, 0b3d3c3d 4 vu3str0s p4dr3s 3n t0d0, p0rqu3 3st0 4gr4d4 4l S3ñ0r. 21 P4dr3s, n0 3x4sp3ré1s 4 vu3str0s h1j0s, p4r4 qu3 n0 s3 d3s4l13nt3n. 22 S13rv0s, 0b3d3c3d 3n t0d0 4 vu3str0s 4m0s t3rr3n4l3s, n0 s1rv13nd0 4l 0j0, c0m0 l0s qu3 qu13r3n 4gr4d4r 4 l0s h0mbr3s, s1n0 c0n c0r4zón s1nc3r0, t3m13nd0 4 D10s. 23 Y t0d0 l0 qu3 h4gá1s, h4c3dl0 d3 c0r4zón, c0m0 p4r4 3l S3ñ0r y n0 p4r4 l0s h0mbr3s; 24 s4b13nd0 qu3 d3l S3ñ0r r3c1b1ré1s l4 r3c0mp3ns4 d3 l4 h3r3nc14, p0rqu3 4 Cr1st0 3l S3ñ0r s3rvís. 25 M4s 3l qu3 h4c3 1njust1c14, r3c1b1rá l4 1njust1c14 qu3 h1c13r3, p0rqu3 n0 h4y 4c3pc1ón d3 p3rs0n4s. 

C0L0S0NS0S 4

1 4m0s, h4c3d l0 qu3 3s just0 y r3ct0 c0n vu3str0s s13rv0s, s4b13nd0 qu3 t4mb1én v0s0tr0s t3né1s un 4m0 3n l0s c13l0s. 

2 P3rs3v3r4d 3n l4 0r4c1ón, v3l4nd0 3n 3ll4 c0n 4cc1ón d3 gr4c14s; 3 0r4nd0 t4mb1én 4l m1sm0 t13mp0 p0r n0s0tr0s, p4r4 qu3 3l S3ñ0r n0s 4br4 pu3rt4 p4r4 l4 p4l4br4, 4 f1n d3 d4r 4 c0n0c3r 3l m1st3r10 d3 Cr1st0, p0r 3l cu4l t4mb1én 3st0y pr3s0, 4 p4r4 qu3 l0 m4n1f13st3 c0m0 d3b0 h4bl4r. 

5 4nd4d s4b14m3nt3 p4r4 c0n l0s d3 4fu3r4, r3d1m13nd0 3l t13mp0. 6 S34 vu3str4 p4l4br4 s13mpr3 c0n gr4c14, s4z0n4d4 c0n s4l, p4r4 qu3 s3pá1s cóm0 d3bé1s r3sp0nd3r 4 c4d4 un0. 

S4lut4c10n3s f1n4l3s

7 T0d0 l0 qu3 4 mí s3 r3f13r3, 0s l0 h4rá s4b3r Tíqu1c0, 4m4d0 h3rm4n0 y f13l m1n1str0 y c0ns13rv0 3n 3l S3ñ0r, 8 3l cu4l h3 3nv14d0 4 v0s0tr0s p4r4 3st0 m1sm0, p4r4 qu3 c0n0zc4 l0 qu3 4 v0s0tr0s s3 r3f13r3, y c0nf0rt3 vu3str0s c0r4z0n3s, 9 c0n 0nés1m0, 4m4d0 y f13l h3rm4n0, qu3 3s un0 d3 v0s0tr0s. T0d0 l0 qu3 4cá p4s4, 0s l0 h4rán s4b3r. 

10 4r1st4rc0, m1 c0mp4ñ3r0 d3 pr1s10n3s, 0s s4lud4, y M4rc0s 3l s0br1n0 d3 B3rn4bé, 4c3rc4 d3l cu4l h4bé1s r3c1b1d0 m4nd4m13nt0s; s1 fu3r3 4 v0s0tr0s, r3c1b1dl3; 11 y J3sús, ll4m4d0 Just0; qu3 s0n l0s ún1c0s d3 l4 c1rcunc1s1ón qu3 m3 4yud4n 3n 3l r31n0 d3 D10s, y h4n s1d0 p4r4 mí un c0nsu3l0. 12 0s s4lud4 0p4fr4s, 3l cu4l 3s un0 d3 v0s0tr0s, s13rv0 d3 Cr1st0, s13mpr3 r0g4nd0 3nc4r3c1d4m3nt3 p0r v0s0tr0s 3n sus 0r4c10n3s, p4r4 qu3 3sté1s f1rm3s, p3rf3ct0s y c0mpl3t0s 3n t0d0 l0 qu3 D10s qu13r3. 13 P0rqu3 d3 él d0y t3st1m0n10 d3 qu3 t13n3 gr4n s0l1c1tud p0r v0s0tr0s, y p0r l0s qu3 3stán 3n L40d1c34, y l0s qu3 3stán 3n H13ráp0l1s. 14 0s s4lud4 Luc4s 3l méd1c0 4m4d0, y D3m4s. 15 S4lud4d 4 l0s h3rm4n0s qu3 3stán 3n L40d1c34, y 4 N1nf4s y 4 l4 1gl3s14 qu3 3stá 3n su c4s4. 16 Cu4nd0 3st4 c4rt4 h4y4 s1d0 l3íd4 3ntr3 v0s0tr0s, h4c3d qu3 t4mb1én s3 l34 3n l4 1gl3s14 d3 l0s l40d1c3ns3s, y qu3 l4 d3 L40d1c34 l4 l3á1s t4mb1én v0s0tr0s. 17 D3c1d 4 4rqu1p0: M1r4 qu3 cumpl4s 3l m1n1st3r10 qu3 r3c1b1st3 3n 3l S3ñ0r. 

18 L4 s4lut4c1ón d3 m1 pr0p14 m4n0, d3 P4bl0. 4c0rd40s d3 m1s pr1s10n3s. L4 gr4c14 s34 c0n v0s0tr0s. 4mén.

5 Y 3l qu3 3st4b4 s3nt4d0 3n 3l tr0n0 d1j0: H3 4quí, y0 h4g0 nu3v4s t0d4s l4s c0s4s. Y m3 d1j0: 0scr1b3; p0rqu3 3st4s p4l4br4s s0n f13l3s y v3rd4d3r4s. 6 Y m3 d1j0: H3ch0 3stá. Y0 s0y 3l 4lf4 y l4 0m3g4, 3l pr1nc1p10 y 3l f1n. 4l qu3 tuv13r3 s3d, y0 l3 d4ré gr4tu1t4m3nt3 d3 l4 fu3nt3 d3l 4gu4 d3 l4 v1d4. 7 0l qu3 v3nc13r3 h3r3d4rá t0d4s l4s c0s4s, y y0 s3ré su D10s, y él s3rá m1 h1j0. 8 P3r0 l0s c0b4rd3s 3 1ncrédul0s, l0s 4b0m1n4bl3s y h0m1c1d4s, l0s f0rn1c4r10s y h3ch1c3r0s, l0s 1dól4tr4s y t0d0s l0s m3nt1r0s0s t3ndrán su p4rt3 3n 3l l4g0 qu3 4rd3 c0n fu3g0 y 4zufr3, qu3 3s l4 mu3rt3 s3gund4. 

L4 nu3v4 J3rus4lén

9 V1n0 3nt0nc3s 4 mí un0 d3 l0s s13t3 áng3l3s qu3 t3ní4n l4s s13t3 c0p4s ll3n4s d3 l4s s13t3 pl4g4s p0str3r4s, y h4bló c0nm1g0, d1c13nd0: V3n 4cá, y0 t3 m0str4ré l4 d3sp0s4d4, l4 3sp0s4 d3l C0rd3r0. 10 Y m3 ll3vó 3n 3l 0spír1tu 4 un m0nt3 gr4nd3 y 4lt0, y m3 m0stró l4 gr4n c1ud4d s4nt4 d3 J3rus4lén, qu3 d3sc3ndí4 d3l c13l0, d3 D10s, 11 t3n13nd0 l4 gl0r14 d3 D10s. Y su fulg0r 3r4 s3m3j4nt3 4l d3 un4 p13dr4 pr3c10sís1m4, c0m0 p13dr4 d3 j4sp3, d1áf4n4 c0m0 3l cr1st4l. 12 T3ní4 un mur0 gr4nd3 y 4lt0 c0n d0c3 pu3rt4s; y 3n l4s pu3rt4s, d0c3 áng3l3s, y n0mbr3s 1nscr1t0s, qu3 s0n l0s d3 l4s d0c3 tr1bus d3 l0s h1j0s d3 1sr43l; 13 4l 0r13nt3 tr3s pu3rt4s; 4l n0rt3 tr3s pu3rt4s; 4l sur tr3s pu3rt4s; 4l 0cc1d3nt3 tr3s pu3rt4s. 14 Y 3l mur0 d3 l4 c1ud4d t3ní4 d0c3 c1m13nt0s, y s0br3 3ll0s l0s d0c3 n0mbr3s d3 l0s d0c3 4póst0l3s d3l C0rd3r0. 

15 0l qu3 h4bl4b4 c0nm1g0 t3ní4 un4 c4ñ4 d3 m3d1r, d3 0r0, p4r4 m3d1r l4 c1ud4d, sus pu3rt4s y su mur0. 16 L4 c1ud4d s3 h4ll4 3st4bl3c1d4 3n cu4dr0, y su l0ng1tud 3s 1gu4l 4 su 4nchur4; y él m1d1ó l4 c1ud4d c0n l4 c4ñ4, d0c3 m1l 3st4d10s; l4 l0ng1tud, l4 4ltur4 y l4 4nchur4 d3 3ll4 s0n 1gu4l3s. 17 Y m1d1ó su mur0, c13nt0 cu4r3nt4 y cu4tr0 c0d0s, d3 m3d1d4 d3 h0mbr3, l4 cu4l 3s d3 áng3l. 18 0l m4t3r14l d3 su mur0 3r4 d3 j4sp3; p3r0 l4 c1ud4d 3r4 d3 0r0 pur0, s3m3j4nt3 4l v1dr10 l1mp10; 19 y l0s c1m13nt0s d3l mur0 d3 l4 c1ud4d 3st4b4n 4d0rn4d0s c0n t0d4 p13dr4 pr3c10s4. 0l pr1m3r c1m13nt0 3r4 j4sp3; 3l s3gund0, z4f1r0; 3l t3rc3r0, ág4t4; 3l cu4rt0, 3sm3r4ld4; 20 3l qu1nt0, ón1c3; 3l s3xt0, c0rn4l1n4; 3l sépt1m0, cr1sól1t0; 3l 0ct4v0, b3r1l0; 3l n0v3n0, t0p4c10; 3l déc1m0, cr1s0pr4s0; 3l undéc1m0, j4c1nt0; 3l du0déc1m0, 4m4t1st4. 21 L4s d0c3 pu3rt4s 3r4n d0c3 p3rl4s; c4d4 un4 d3 l4s pu3rt4s 3r4 un4 p3rl4. Y l4 c4ll3 d3 l4 c1ud4d 3r4 d3 0r0 pur0, tr4nsp4r3nt3 c0m0 v1dr10. 

22 Y n0 v1 3n 3ll4 t3mpl0; p0rqu3 3l S3ñ0r D10s T0d0p0d3r0s0 3s 3l t3mpl0 d3 3ll4, y 3l C0rd3r0. 23 L4 c1ud4d n0 t13n3 n3c3s1d4d d3 s0l n1 d3 lun4 qu3 br1ll3n 3n 3ll4; p0rqu3 l4 gl0r14 d3 D10s l4 1lum1n4, y 3l C0rd3r0 3s su lumbr3r4. 24 Y l4s n4c10n3s qu3 hub13r3n s1d0 s4lv4s 4nd4rán 4 l4 luz d3 3ll4; y l0s r3y3s d3 l4 t13rr4 tr43rán su gl0r14 y h0n0r 4 3ll4. 25 Sus pu3rt4s nunc4 s3rán c3rr4d4s d3 dí4, pu3s 4llí n0 h4brá n0ch3. 26 Y ll3v4rán l4 gl0r14 y l4 h0nr4 d3 l4s n4c10n3s 4 3ll4. 27 N0 3ntr4rá 3n 3ll4 n1ngun4 c0s4 1nmund4, 0 qu3 h4c3 4b0m1n4c1ón y m3nt1r4, s1n0 s0l4m3nt3 l0s qu3 3stán 1nscr1t0s 3n 3l l1br0 d3 l4 v1d4 d3l C0rd3r0.

1 D3spués m3 m0stró un rí0 l1mp10 d3 4gu4 d3 v1d4, r3spl4nd3c13nt3 c0m0 cr1st4l, qu3 s4lí4 d3l tr0n0 d3 D10s y d3l C0rd3r0. 2 0n m3d10 d3 l4 c4ll3 d3 l4 c1ud4d, y 4 un0 y 0tr0 l4d0 d3l rí0, 3st4b4 3l árb0l d3 l4 v1d4, qu3 pr0duc3 d0c3 frut0s, d4nd0 c4d4 m3s su frut0; y l4s h0j4s d3l árb0l 3r4n p4r4 l4 s4n1d4d d3 l4s n4c10n3s. 3 Y n0 h4brá más m4ld1c1ón; y 3l tr0n0 d3 D10s y d3l C0rd3r0 3st4rá 3n 3ll4, y sus s13rv0s l3 s3rv1rán, 4 y v3rán su r0str0, y su n0mbr3 3st4rá 3n sus fr3nt3s. 5 N0 h4brá 4llí más n0ch3; y n0 t13n3n n3c3s1d4d d3 luz d3 lámp4r4, n1 d3 luz d3l s0l, p0rqu3 D10s 3l S3ñ0r l0s 1lum1n4rá; y r31n4rán p0r l0s s1gl0s d3 l0s s1gl0s. 

L4 v3n1d4 d3 Cr1st0 3stá c3rc4

6 Y m3 d1j0: 0st4s p4l4br4s s0n f13l3s y v3rd4d3r4s. Y 3l S3ñ0r, 3l D10s d3 l0s 3spír1tus d3 l0s pr0f3t4s, h4 3nv14d0 su áng3l, p4r4 m0str4r 4 sus s13rv0s l4s c0s4s qu3 d3b3n suc3d3r pr0nt0. 

7 ¡H3 4quí, v3ng0 pr0nt0! B13n4v3ntur4d0 3l qu3 gu4rd4 l4s p4l4br4s d3 l4 pr0f3cí4 d3 3st3 l1br0. 

8 Y0 Ju4n s0y 3l qu3 0yó y v10 3st4s c0s4s. Y d3spués qu3 l4s hub3 0íd0 y v1st0, m3 p0stré p4r4 4d0r4r 4 l0s p13s d3l áng3l qu3 m3 m0str4b4 3st4s c0s4s. 9 P3r0 él m3 d1j0: M1r4, n0 l0 h4g4s; p0rqu3 y0 s0y c0ns13rv0 tuy0, d3 tus h3rm4n0s l0s pr0f3t4s, y d3 l0s qu3 gu4rd4n l4s p4l4br4s d3 3st3 l1br0. 4d0r4 4 D10s. 

10 Y m3 d1j0: N0 s3ll3s l4s p4l4br4s d3 l4 pr0f3cí4 d3 3st3 l1br0, p0rqu3 3l t13mp0 3stá c3rc4. 11 0l qu3 3s 1njust0, s34 1njust0 t0d4ví4; y 3l qu3 3s 1nmund0, s34 1nmund0 t0d4ví4; y 3l qu3 3s just0, pr4ct1qu3 l4 just1c14 t0d4ví4; y 3l qu3 3s s4nt0, s4nt1fíqu3s3 t0d4ví4. 

12 H3 4quí y0 v3ng0 pr0nt0, y m1 g4l4rdón c0nm1g0, p4r4 r3c0mp3ns4r 4 c4d4 un0 s3gún s34 su 0br4. 13 Y0 s0y 3l 4lf4 y l4 0m3g4, 3l pr1nc1p10 y 3l f1n, 3l pr1m3r0 y 3l últ1m0. 

14 B13n4v3ntur4d0s l0s qu3 l4v4n sus r0p4s, p4r4 t3n3r d3r3ch0 4l árb0l d3 l4 v1d4, y p4r4 3ntr4r p0r l4s pu3rt4s 3n l4 c1ud4d. 15 M4s l0s p3rr0s 3st4rán fu3r4, y l0s h3ch1c3r0s, l0s f0rn1c4r10s, l0s h0m1c1d4s, l0s 1dól4tr4s, y t0d0 4qu3l qu3 4m4 y h4c3 m3nt1r4.

18 Y0 t3st1f1c0 4 t0d0 4qu3l qu3 0y3 l4s p4l4br4s d3 l4 pr0f3cí4 d3 3st3 l1br0: S1 4lgun0 4ñ4d13r3 4 3st4s c0s4s, D10s tr43rá s0br3 él l4s pl4g4s qu3 3stán 3scr1t4s 3n 3st3 l1br0. 19 Y s1 4lgun0 qu1t4r3 d3 l4s p4l4br4s d3l l1br0 d3 3st4 pr0f3cí4, D10s qu1t4rá su p4rt3 d3l l1br0 d3 l4 v1d4, y d3 l4 s4nt4 c1ud4d y d3 l4s c0s4s qu3 3stán 3scr1t4s 3n 3st3 l1br0.
